enkaam _ ellngitgun _ I s a i a h - m _ uuknaliqe tke i llegh a _ apeghiigh uq _ . _ taaggun _ uuknaliqe llegh akun _ kiyaghnegh _ pi kau uq _ , _ ' _ ellngit _ nagate pestaagh lleqe ut _ taawanginaq _ liigike naanghite ait _ ; _ esghaate pestaagh lleqe ut _ , _ taawanginaq _ liigike naanghite ait _ esghaghkagh teng _ ,
qayughllak _ ellngit a _ umyugagh it _ pi neghllugtekau ut _ . _ sigute it _ tu saq negh ll u ug te kaa g ut _ , _ iye teng llu _ quneghtekaqe ait _ . _ Taw ate l ngu un ghi saq um eng _ iye meggneng _ esghaate nayagh ut _ , _ sigute meggneng _ nagaqugh te nayagh ut _ , _ umyugagh megteggun _ liigike nayagh ut _ , _ enkaam _ qiive nayagh ut _ whanga mnun _ naa llgh u tes qell uteng _ . _ '
" _ iwernga _ quyanaghhalek _ elpek si _ ! _ iye si _ esghaate aqe ut _ , _ sigute si llu _ nagaqugh te aqe ut _ .
ipa _ ungipaate amsi _ , _ u uk nal iq is te l gh u te t lu _ , _ yug lghutagh nge an llu _ kiyaghnegh m _ , _ esghagh yug kaqsagh ait _ esghagh kasi _ , _ iwernga _ esghagh mangite ait _ . _ nagaqugh yug kaqsagh ait llu _ nagaqugh kasi _ , _ iwernga _ nagaqugh mangite ait _ .
" _ nagate ggu _ sa meng _ pi aqe ta a _ ungipaghaate ke kaqe a _ piitesighagh a _ .
piitute t _ tume t _ saaghw itgun _ tekite ke aat _ uspute nga ut _ kitumun _ alngunak _ nagaqugh te lghii mun _ ungipagh meng _ ataneghpag u llegh meng _ ayuqe lghii meng _ . _ liigike nghite kagu _ ungipagh _ tughneghagh m _ tagi luni _ wayagh lleqe a _ tekite kaayagh lghii _ ilu akun _ .
tamaakut _ piitute t _ uyghagtuqagh kun _ suna kun _ tekite ke aat _ uspute nga ut _ kitumun _ alngunak _ nagaqugh te lghii mun _ ungipagh meng _ , _ taw an ing in aq _ ungipagh _ tugukligh iqe a _ quyake sigh ke luku _ .
iwernga _ ungipagh _ ilu ani _ mulu ma ite ngughk _ qayughllak _ akugh nge llghite ngughk _ . _ enkaam _ seghleliigh yalghiimi _ nalighmeng _ amyuqetagh tke lleg nge yalghiimi _ , _ apallugh ke luku _ ungipagh _ taw an ing in aq _ ugpeqe i nanigh uq _ .
tamaakut _ piitute t _ sikughllugtuqagh kun _ suna kun _ tekite ke aat _ uspute nga ut _ kitumun _ alngunak _ nagaqugh te lghii mun _ ungipagh meng _ , _ taawanginaq _ teggellghiigh llegh an _ kiyagh t aagh u sigh q ameng _ , _ aklungi igh i yu llegh ghllag an llu _ piite vig igh aqe a _ ungipagh _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ piite ste i igate uq _ .
tamaakut _ piitute t _ tekite ke aat _ suna kegtagh kun _ uspute nga ut _ yug nun _ nagaqugh te lghii nun llu _ liigike i lghii nun llu _ ungipagh meng _ . _ enkaam _ piite ste qugh aqe ut _ ila i _ 1 0 0 _ , _ ila i _ 6 0 _ , _ ila i _ 3 0 _ . _ "
taagken _ Jesus-em _ aapte qugh a _ ila a _ ungipaghagh an _ ellngit nun _ , _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ ataneghpag u llegh a _ qilag m _ yug tun _ piitesighaghkagh tun _ pinigh lghii meng _ piitute meng _ piitesighaghvig mini _ ayuqe uq _ .
U n ug mi _ ataasigh mi _ q av a sim al uki _ , _ anguyag a _ tagi luni _ piitesighagh ke aq _ w e e d s - meng _ akule itgun _ wh e at - et _ , _ taagken _ aghulaqekagh _ .
nunivagseghagh t _ piite yalghiimeng _ , _ wh e at - et _ akume luteng _ w e e d s - meng _ ayuqe ut _ .
piitesighagh a _ qep ghagh te l gh ut ng an _ taku luku _ aaptekagh at _ , _ ' _ atanegh _ , _ pinigh lghii meng mi _ piitute meng _ piitesigh u aghagh ziin _ piitesighaghvig gpeni _ ; _ naken _ w e e d s - et _ pi ut _ ? _ '
yug m _ kii msiigh ke ai _ , _ ' _ anguyag m _ tawaten _ pi kaqe ai _ ' _ . _ aaptekagh at _ , _ ' _ W e e d s - et _ i ku ul tek ii _ ? _ '
kiimsigh iqe ai _ , _ ' _ nakaa _ , _ qayughllak _ w e e d s - et _ ikugh kufsiki _ qemall _ wh e at - et lu _ ila leg qite te lleqe asi _ .
qerngagh ita _ wh e at - et lu _ w e e d s - et lu _ nagu steki _ kenlanga _ unatagh lleghqagh mun _ . _ enan _ unatagh yaghqaaghtekata _ un atagh tet _ ungipaate naagh anka _ w e e d s - et _ siv uk es qell uki _ , _ qep ugh luki _ paneghte yaghqaa luki _ . _ enkaam _ wh e at - et _ unatagh ste luki _ kagpag ste naagh anka _ kagpag vig mnun _ . _ ' _ "
allameng _ Jesus-em _ aapte qugh a _ ungipaghagh an _ , _ " _ ataneghpag u llegh a _ qilag m _ piitute atun _ m us t ar d -em _ ayuqe uq _ . _ piitute m _ m ek es taa llegh pig aqaa _ , _ iwernga _ yug m _ piitesighagh nghminigu _ piitesighaghvig mikun _ nun iv ag segh agh y ag g aghn eng _ aange lleghpigagh u kayugu uq _ . _ uqfig ughte nghaani _ qawaag t _ tagi luteng _ avayagh akun _ unglute yagh u iqe ut _ . _ "
allameng _ Jesus-em _ aapte qugh a _ ungipaghagh an _ , _ " _ ataneghpag u llegh a _ qilag m _ y e as t- a tun _ ayuqe uq _ . _ aghnagh m _ tugu luku _ aku u tu s k anga _ avlawa ghllag mun _ , _ enkaam _ akuutagh ghllag a _ ghhuugh ste ghllag qagh a _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ apeghtugh nghminiki _ yug lghute ghllag t _ quunpeng _ atuqe aqe ai _ ungipaghaate t _ . _ ipapestaaq _ sa u a _ qamagte luku _ apeghtuusagh kekagh a _ ungipaghaate tgun _ ayuqe uq _ .
tawaten _ pi kau lghii _ apeghiigh na luku _ u uk nal iq is te m _ pi llgh a _ , _ " _ ungipaghaate t _ atuqe lleqe anka _ aleghqugh kumki _ . _ ungipaate lleqe anka _ kiyaghnegh m _ liite tesi ma ite ka aneng _ ima _ ulima yuggaagh llegh aneng _ nuna _ . _ "
taagken _ Jesus-em _ unite luki _ yug lghute t _ iteghkagh _ mangteghagh mun _ . _ M al ig s aagh teng it a _ taku luku _ aaptekagh at _ , _ " _ sa meng _ pi s iig w at _ ungipaghaate kekagh ten _ w e e d s - et _ pii te si ghagh v ig m el nguut _ ? _ "
Jesus-em _ kiimsigh iqe ai _ , _ " _ yuug _ piitesighagh ke aq _ pinigh lghii meng _ piitute meng _ , _ ighnegh ke a _ yug m _ ;
piitesighaghvig _ nuna u uq _ ; _ pinigh lghiit _ piitute t _ yugu ut _ ataneghpag u llegh m _ pi ke ai _ ; _ w e e d s - et _ yugu ut _ tughneghagh m _ pi ke ai _ .
anguyag _ piite ste ikagh _ w e e d s - meng _ tughneghagh u uq _ . _ unatagh llegh _ nuna m _ ken l et gh uu te l q aa _ , _ un atagh tet _ yaquleg u ut _ .
unatagh llegh mi _ w e e d s - et _ qerngughte luki _ paneghte aqe ait _ . _ Taw at egh pig aq _ ken l et gh uu te llgh ani _ nuna m _ , _ yug t _ tughneghagh m _ pi i _ qerngughte luki _ paneghte yaghqaa ut _ .
ighnegh a _ yug m _ yaquleg mineng _ kayagte i yaghqaa uq _ iq i tes qell uki _ ataneghpag u llegh mineng _ qamagte luki _ seghleghqe sigh t llu _ , _ seghletun llu _ pi s tet _ .
enkaam _ ken gh eg nun _ miluute lleqe ait _ , _ tawani _ qiyaaghwagh ghllag lleqe ut _ , _ ggute teng _ terqitaagtagh magh ita _ .
taagken _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug i _ kuukgute lleqe ut _ siqinegh tun _ ataneghpag u llegh ani _ ata meng _ . _ sigute lgu usi _ , _ nagate tek _ ! _ "
" _ ataneghpag u llegh a _ qilag m _ aklungi stun _ ayuqe uq _ iigh nga lghii _ piitesighaghvig mi _ . _ yug m _ n aal k ell uki _ iiw nqigtekagh i _ . _ Q uy am _ ang tal ang aneng _ , _ aghulaqe luni _ qamagte luki _ saghya ni _ akike luki _ , _ taagken _ taana _ piitesighaghvig _ tukfigh iqe a _ . _ "
" _ whatete uq llu _ ataneghpag u llegh a _ qilag m _ : _ tukfightugh a _ ivagh i lghii _ pi niigh pigte lghii meng _ pe ar l - meng _ tukfigh yaghqagh meng _ .
naalkute nghmini _ pi niigh pigte lghii meng _ akituqagh meng _ , _ akikugh aqe a _ qamagte luku _ saghya ni _ , _ tukfigh na luku _ taana _ pe ar l - a _ . _ "
" _ ataneghpag u llegh a _ qilag m _ , _ negaghpag tun llu _ ayuqe uq _ . _ I q all in iigh tet _ negaghpag eng _ naayvagh mun _ ateghte luku _ aghqella aqe ut _ enkaam _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh meng _ iqallugte ghllag aqe ut _ .
negaghpag _ sayug luku _ qute mun _ , _ aqume luteng _ iqallug t _ avugh aqe ait _ , _ pin il ghi t _ kanaghte magh ita _ qalta nun _ , _ enkaam _ segh l ell gh i _ egte aqe ait _ .
tawatete yaghqaa uq _ ken l et gh uu te llgh ani _ nuna m _ . _ yaquleg t _ tagi luteng _ avugh lleqe ait _ seghlegh t _ yug t _ pinigh lghii neng _ .
enkaam _ seghlegh t _ ken gh eg nun _ miluute lleqe ait _ , _ tawani _ qiyaaghwagh ghllag lleqe ut _ , _ ggute teng _ terqitaagtagh magh ita _ . _ "
taagken _ Jesus-em _ aaptekagh i _ malig s aagh t en i _ , _ " _ qamagte luki _ tamaakut _ liigike stekagh i _ ? _ " _ kiimsigh iqe aat _ , _ " _ aa-a _ . _ "
taagken _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ tamaghhagh mi _ apeghtugh i kayug _ liilightuusagh neng _ apeghtuqagh _ ataneghpag u llegh aneng _ qilag m _ wh ate l ngu ug uq _ : _ mangteghagh leg _ yuug _ nusug ragh lghii _ kagpag vig mineng _ nutaghagh meng llu _ neghightagh meng llu _ . _ "
Jesus _ taaqe yami _ apeghtugh i nghmeng _ ungipaghaate neng _ aghulaqekagh _ .
aglagh luni _ ne minun _ apeghtugh i yan _ s y nag o gu e- ng it ni _ , _ yug t _ saghiigha yagutekagh at _ . _ E ll meg g neng _ aap qugh aagh utk at _ , _ " _ naken _ peghqinellegh nge a _ ? _ naken llu _ agh tugh yaghq aanghi ll e nga _ all aagh ll u wh agh t i mun _ ?
ighnegh ke nghite agu _ kaapenta m _ ? _ mary _ naa ke nghite agu _ , _ uuk _ ang leg utk en ghi t ak ii _ J am es -en kut _ , _ J o s ep h -en kut _ , _ S im o n -en kut _ , _ J u d as -en kut _ ?
nayag i llu _ mate- te nghite aat _ ? _ naken _ liite lleg nge ghllag a llu _ agh tugh yaghq aanghi ll eng allu _ ? _ "
enkaam _ tug uk l igh y un ghi t kaa t _ . _ Jesus-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ nani _ alngunak _ yug t _ sii vag kaqe aat _ uuknaliqe i sta _ iwerngaqun _ ellnga n _ katam _ nuna ani llu _ neng ll ug ut ang an illu _ . _ "
tamaani _ all aagh ll u wh agh t ip ag um ang il nguq _ qayughllak _ ugpeqe nghite kangat _ .
tamaani _ pi llegh mi _ H er o d -em _ , _ igleghte te i ste yan _ G al il e e- m _ , _ nagaqugh qu a _ Jesus-em _ apeghseghugh u ma llegh a _ .
H er o d -em _ qep ghagh t en i _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ ipa _ una _ J o h n - ngu uq _ paaptaaye sta _ , _ unguvagh ma uq _ . _ esghaghhu qun _ agh tugh yaghq aanghi ll el ek _ all aagh ll u wh agh t i llegh mun _ . _ "
qavnganghhaq _ H er o d -em _ tuqute stekaqe kanga _ John _ paaptaaye sta _ , _ qayughllak _ J o h n -em _ ungipaate kaqe kanga _ , _ " _ qaatke te nghite uten _ liilightuusagh mnnun _ tugu llegh gpegun _ H er o d i a s _ , _ anglegute gpek _ nulighh a _ . _ " _ ( _ H er o d i as -em _ ugi ke yagh kanga _ philip _ , _ H er o d -em _ uyughagh a _ . _ ) _ J o h n -em _ ungipaate llegh a _ apallugh ke luku _ H er o d -em _ tugu sqekagh a _ John _ , _ asighqellug qu _ anusimingllaghvig mun _ kanaghte sqellug qu _ . _ H er o d -em _ tuqute sug u yagh kanga _ John _ , _ naqam _ alikekagh i _ J e w s - et _ seghleliighqagh ii na yu kata _ qayughllak _ ugpeq eq k angat _ John _ uuknaliqe ste u ni luku _ .
taagken _ H er o d -em _ allgeghvig an _ aghnegh ani _ , _ H er o d i as -em _ panig a _ tu k al eg aq aq _ H er o d - em llu _ aqelqagh t llu _ sivu itni _ . _ elngaatall _ herod _ efqugh yug ghllagkagh _ ,
repall _ akeqekagh a _ , _ " _ ipapestaaq _ sa meng _ alngunak _ tungsigh kuvek _ tuune lleqe amken _ . _ "
naa mi _ kayagte llegh atun _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ whaa _ maaten _ tagivagh ghhu _ qayuutaghraag kun _ lli luku _ naa s q wa _ J o h n -em _ P aap taa y es te m _ . _ "
umiileg _ qivghuke aq _ iwernga _ akeqe i kau te mineng _ aqelqagh mi _ sivu itni _ piyuke llegh a _ kayagte tke a _ .
enkaam _ H er o d -em _ anusimingllaghvig mi _ J o h n -em _ naa s q wa _ kepe stekagh a _ .
naasqugh _ qayuutaghraag kun _ lli luku _ tuunekagh at _ aghnaghagh mun _ , _ enkaam _ naa minun _ aglagh tke a _ .
J o h n -em _ malig s aagh teng i _ tagi luteng _ yugusigh a _ llivegh yaghtugh qu aat _ . _ taagken _ Jesus _ ungipaate yaghtugh qu aat _ .
Jesus-em _ nagaqugh yamigu _ ungipagh _ , _ angyagh mun _ uugte luni _ aghulaqekagh _ paaghqagh igh llegh anun _ ellng in aghh aan al uni _ . _ iwernga _ yug lghute t _ nagaqugh yamegteggu _ ne meggneng _ maligtekagh at _ piyug meng _ .
Jesus _ qute mun _ uugte luni _ esghagh luki _ yug lghute ghllag t _ nanglleg yagute ghllagkagh i _ , _ enkaam _ naallghute qugh qu ai _ q in u yug teng it _ .
Wh an i ku y ag u _ malig s aagh teng it a _ taku luku _ pi ke aat _ , _ " _ Wh an ik w aa _ , _ maana _ paaghqite uq _ ; _ aglagh uute sqe ki _ ne nun _ ellngit neng _ neq eng es qell uki _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ M aan ll it _ . _ elpek si _ negh yaghq al i tek i _ . _ "
pi ke aat _ , _ " _ whaa _ legan _ t all im ag g aag ut _ neqekrangllagh t _ , _ iqalluggagh ak llu _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ tagite ki _ whavek _ . _ "
taagken _ yug lghute t _ aqume uute sqekagh i _ vegaagh kun _ . _ tugu luki _ tallimat _ neqekrangllagh t _ , _ iqalluggagh ak llu _ , _ sivugte luni _ qilag mun _ kiyaghnegh _ iyamsiqa yug vikekagh a _ . _ iigge mineng _ aavgugh luki _ neqekrangllagh t _ , _ malig s aagh te min un _ tuunekagh i _ uy eg tes qell uki _ yug lghute nun _ .
qamagte luni _ negh te tke aq _ kepsugh te luni _ . _ taagken _ malig s aagh tet _ tugukagh it _ qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ke luku _ paskete t _ esleqnga lghiit _ kagimlegh itneng _ neqekrangllagh t _ siipnegh t _ .
entaqun _ 5 , 0 0 0 - nguut _ yug t _ negh te tke aat _ , _ aghnagh t llu _ taghnughhagh t llu _ kesutke gpenaki _ .
taagken _ Jesus-em _ malig s aagh t en i _ kayagtekagh i _ angyagh kun _ aghv iq es t ii s qell uki _ naayvagh m _ inglu anun _ , _ ellnga n _ aglagh uute tesi ma luki _ yug lghute ghllag t _ .
yug lghute ghllag t _ ag lagh tu u tes am ik i _ ellnginagh mi _ naayghagh mun _ mat- yuqagh _ yughagh na luni _ . _ tawani _ i ghi v g agh mi _ Jesus _ ellng in aam al uku _ ,
angyagh t _ un Ê¼ g a _ naayvagh mi _ awavagh luteng _ , _ elngaatall _ imaghllug ii iqe aat _ qayughllak _ ay g ugh nagh us k angi _ .
akule gkeni _ t h r e e- k ell aag en kuk _ , _ si x - ek l aag en kuk _ unaangu luku _ Jesus-em _ takukagh i _ malig s aagh t en i _ megh m _ qaye akun _ piyug meng _ .
M al ig s aagh tet _ esghagh luku _ megh kun _ piyug lghii _ kakave na iqe aat _ . _ enkaam _ akilghuukagh t _ , _ " _ taghneghagh u uq _ . _ "
Taw an ing in aq _ Jesus-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ alinge gpenasi _ , _ whanga u unga _ ! _ "
taagken _ P e te r -em _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ atanegh _ , _ ipa _ el pe ngu ku v ek _ tagsigh nga _ elpenun _ aglagh langa _ megh m _ qaye akun _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ tea- ai _ . _ " _ enkaam _ peter _ ategh luni _ angyagh meng _ , _ megh m _ qaye akun _ piyug meng _ aglaghkagh _ Jesus - mun _ .
iwernga _ anuqe _ elpeg ke yamigu _ alingekagh _ , _ kaleve te kete luku _ akilghuukagh _ , _ " _ atanegh _ , _ yugu linga _ ! _ "
Taw an ing in aq _ Jesus-em _ akuqagh luku _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ U g peq i llegh q es taa pig uu ten _ ! _ sangavek _ malghukli ziin _ ? _ "
angyagh mun _ uugte aqe uk llu _ ellmaaragtekagh _ .
enkaam _ ang y am el nguut _ manigugh qu aat _ Jesus _ . _ pi ke aat _ , _ " _ ipapestaaq _ kiyaghnegh m _ ighnegh ke aaten _ ! _ "
taagken _ naayvagh _ aghvigh luku _ tamlagkagh t _ gennesaret- kun _ .
Tam aa kum iit _ liisuqe yamegteggu _ Jesus _ , _ ungipaate yaghtigh sqekagh it _ v i llag e- en il nguut _ q in u yug t ii ghi t _ tag i tes qell uki _ Jesus - mun _ .
manigugh ututka ait _ qinuyug lghiit _ waran _ saafte sqellug qu _ kenigh akun _ enkaam _ qamagte luteng _ tamaakut _ saafte i lghiit _ naallghute lleg ngekagh t _ .
taagken _ ila i _ P h a ris e es - et lu _ , _ apeghtugh i kayug t llu _ liilightuusagh neng _ J er us al em - e meng _ tagi luteng _ aaptekagh at _ Jesus _ ,
" _ sangameng _ malig s aagh te ten _ qaatke te igate aat _ sivunegh mta _ apeghtuusagh itnun _ ? _ negh naqe negh meggni _ uughtugh igate ut _ elqughute luteng _ apeghtuusagh itnun _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ aaptekagh i _ , _ " _ sangan _ elpek si _ qaatke igate aqe ste ki _ kiyaghnegh m _ qelegh sagh i _ maligte na luki _ elpek si _ katam _ apeghtuusagh si _ ?
kiyaghnegh m _ qelegh sagh ke a _ , _ ' _ Q u ul v agh l uk ek _ ata n llu _ naa n llu _ ' _ . _ whaten llu _ pi kau uq _ , _ ' _ kitum _ alngunak _ ata ni _ , _ nalighmeng _ naa ni _ seghlegh pestaaghtu te _ akuzi tke gkunigu _ , _ tuqute yaghqaa uq _ ' _ .
iwernga _ elpek si _ apeghtugh i aqe usi _ , _ ' _ yug m _ qu ul v an ghi sagh ng aag u _ ata ni _ nalighmeng _ naa ni _ whaten _ pi kagu _ , _ ' _ kayusiite yaghqagh lgu unga _ elpenun _ , _ iwernga _ tuun aanghi taq a _ qayughllak _ akequsagh ke kaqe aqa _ tuune lleqe ni luku _ kiyaghnegh mun _ . _ tawaten _ pi llegh gpesigun _ pakig aqe asi _ kiyaghnegh m _ liilightuusagh i _ apallugh ke luki _ elpek si _ katam _ apeghtuusagh si _ .
ukughsi _ piniiyugnegh ni _ ! _ elqughte lusi _ whaten _ I s a i a h - m _ uuknaliqe tke kaqe aisi _ !
kiyaghnegh _ pi uq _ , _ ' _ ukut _ yug t _ akuzite megteggun _ qu ul v agh aq aat nga _ , _ nakaan _ ilu meggneng _ .
temngi _ manigugh aqe aatnga _ qayughllak _ apeghtuusagh ke aqe ait _ liilightuusagh ngllaghkagh teng _ , _ katam _ whanga _ liilightuusagh ke pigte lghii stun _ . _ ' _ "
taagken _ Jesus-em _ yug lghute t _ tagsigh luki _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ nagate lunga _ liigike tek _ !
yug m _ sa u a _ qanegh minun _ kanaghtekagh a _ nukeggnaghqe i igate uq _ , _ iwernga _ yug m _ q aan gh aneng _ aanekagh _ nukeggnaghqe i kayugu uq _ . _ "
taagken _ malig s aagh teng it a _ taku luku _ aaptekagh at _ , _ " _ L ii simak en ghi si gu u _ P h a ris e es - et _ anagtegketen _ tawaten _ pi llegh gpegun _ ? _ "
Jesus-em _ kiimsigh iqe ai _ , _ " _ nunivagseghagh _ qamagte luku _ ata ma _ q ilag m el ngu u m _ piitesighagh ma ite kanga _ nusug yaghqaa uq _ .
avelghaqiinagh luki _ P h a ris e es - et _ ! _ ayaakagh stun _ maghyaghqugh i aqe ut _ . _ yug m _ ayaakagh m _ ila a _ ayaakagh _ taslugh kunigu _ , _ l aag waagh mun _ k al ef k ag taa ll equ k _ . _ "
P e te r -em _ aaptekagh a _ , _ " _ ungipaate aghte kut _ , _ sa meng _ pi s iig wa _ ungipagh aaten _ yug t _ nukeggnaghqe igate ni keten _ neghekagh megteggun _ ? _ "
Jesus-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ elpek si llu _ salin _ lii g ik ig at si i _ ?
L ii simak en ghi s teg gu _ sa u a _ alngunak _ yug m _ qanegh minun _ kanaghtekagh a _ aq saq gh w anun _ pi aqe uq _ , _ taagken _ aane aqe uq _ yugusigh aneng _ ?
iwernga _ sa u a _ qamaken _ aanekagh _ qanegh kun _ nukeggnaghqe i kayugu uq _ yug meng _ .
qayughllak _ yug m _ ilu aneng _ seghlegh _ sumeghtaghagh llegh _ pi kau yug u uq _ , _ yugte aq _ , _ gelgaghni ii aagh _ , _ allani ii aagh _ , _ tegleg ni uq _ , _ iqlengiqe tke i _ , _ segh l equ uq _ yug neng _ .
Tam aa ku s ta _ nukeggnaghqe i kayug t _ yug neng _ , _ iwernga _ uughtugh gpenani _ neghe llegh m _ n uk eg g n aghq en n aanghi t aa _ yuug _ . _ "
taagken _ Jesus _ aghulaqekagh _ tamaaken _ nuna meng _ tunge gkenun _ T y r e- en kuk _ S i d o n -en kuk _ .
taawa nguq _ C an aan - egh m ii _ aghnagh _ . _ Jesus _ takukagh a _ akilghuu magh mi _ , _ " _ kaay _ atanegh _ , _ ighnegh a _ D av i d -em _ , _ n angll eg y ag u te q egh t i nga _ ! _ panike a _ tughneghagh m _ itegh ma a _ , _ seghlegh waagh u uq _ . _ "
iwernga _ Jesus-em _ avelghaqiinagh qagh a _ . _ M al ig s aagh teng it a _ taku luku _ kay ag tagh w aaq aat _ , _ " _ iqite sqe gu _ ! _ maligsaagh magh emta _ akilghuu uq _ ! _ "
taagken _ Jesus-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ kiyaghnegh m _ kayagtekaqe aanga _ I s r a el - egh m ii ng in aghh agh nun _ , _ penniigh stun _ iflakagh stun _ ayuqe lghii nun _ . _ "
iwernga _ aghnagh _ tagi luni _ Jesus-em _ sivungagh kun _ qungughtu te kete luku _ pi ke aq _ , _ " _ atanegh _ , _ kayusiite aghte nga _ ! _ "
Jesus-em _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ anaggute nga uq _ taghnughhagh t _ neqe it _ tugu luki _ qikmigh nun _ miluute kumeng _ . _ "
aghnagh m _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ aa-a _ , _ atanegh _ , _ talwa _ yug m _ qikmigh a _ i f k agh qell gh aneng _ negh aqe ut _ . _ "
taagken _ Jesus-em _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ aghnagh _ elpek _ , _ ugpeqe i lleghtu pigte uten _ ! _ apeghiigh li _ piyuke llegh gpetun _ . _ " _ Taw an ing in aq _ panig a _ naagh llegh u tke aq _ .
taagken _ Jesus _ aghulaqekagh _ tamaaken _ nuna meng _ , _ esne akun _ naayvagh m _ G al il e e- m _ . _ qemi mun _ mayugh luni _ aqumekagh _ .
yug lghute ghllag t _ taku laghate tke aat _ , _ tagite magh ita _ Jesus-em _ sivungagh nun _ pi yug pag n ing il nguut _ , _ aqnightekagh t _ , _ ayaakagh t _ , _ akuzi igate ngugh t _ , _ ila i llu _ qinuyug lghiit _ . _ enkaam _ naallghute qugh qu ai _ .
yug lghute ghllag t _ saghiigha yuke aat _ esghapag luki _ akuzi igate ngugh t _ akuzi yagute lghiit _ , _ aqnightekagh t _ naallghute lghiit _ , _ pi yug pag n ing il nguut _ piyug yagute lghiit _ , _ ayaakagh t llu _ esghaate yagute lghiit _ . _ enkaam _ usuqekagh at _ kiyaghnegh a _ I s r a el -em _ .
taagken _ Jesus-em _ malig s aagh t en i _ tagsigh luki _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ maakut _ nanglleg yagute pigte anka _ qayughllak _ whanga mnite ut _ pi nga yu t _ aghnegh t _ , _ talwa _ neghyaghqagh ite ut _ . _ neghe ste gpenaki _ aghulaqe sug nghite anka _ , _ luuraq _ tumangani _ kayaali na yu kata _ . _ "
M al ig s aagh teng it a _ aaptekagh at _ , _ " _ maani _ kilgaa ni _ naken _ neqenge naqe sta _ naama yaghqagh meng _ yug lghute ghllag nun _ ? _ "
Jesus-em _ aaptekagh i _ , _ " _ naten _ ug l aghq ak aan _ neqekrangllagh lgu tsi _ ? _ " _ kiimsigh iqe aat _ , _ " _ maaghraghvinleg u ut _ , _ qafsina t llu _ iqalluggagh at _ . _ "
enkaam _ Jesus-em _ yug lghute ghllag t _ qelqe ai _ aq um uu tes qell uki _ nuna kun _ .
taagken _ tugu luki _ maaghraghvinleg _ neqekrangllagh t _ iqallug t llu _ , _ kiyaghnegh _ iyamsiqa yug vikekagh a _ . _ aavgugh luki _ tuunekagh i _ malig s aagh te min un _ enkaam _ uyegtekagh it _ yug lghute ghllag nun _ .
qamagte luteng _ negh te tke aat _ kepsugh te luteng _ . _ taagken _ malig s aagh tet _ siipnegh _ qerngughte luku _ maaghraghvinleg _ paskete t _ imaa iqe ait _ es l eq agh agh luki _ .
uglaghtala it _ negh te tke aat _ yug t _ 4 , 0 0 0 - ngu f tut _ , _ kesutke gpenaki _ aghnagh t llu _ taghnughhagh t llu _ .
taagken _ Jesus-em _ yug lghute ghllag t _ aglagh uute ste luki _ ellngit nun _ ellnga _ angyagh mun _ uugte luni _ u v it ang anun _ M ag a d an -em _ aglaghkagh _ .
taagken _ ila i _ P h a ris e es - et lu _ S a d d u c e es - et lu _ tagikagh t _ Jesus - mun _ an ag n iil q av ig igh nal uku _ . _ enkaam _ all aagh ll u wh agh t is q eg kaa t _ esghagh sighqagh u luku _ agh tugh yaghq aanghi llgh a _ kiyaghnegh meng _ pi u ta a _ .
iwernga _ Jesus-em _ kiimsigh iqe ai _ , _ " _ siqinegh _ tevigh yaghtugh ngestagh nghaani _ esla _ kavighrug u nghaani _ pi aqe usi _ , _ ' _ unaami _ pinigh naqe uq _ . _ '
siqinegh _ piite kestagh nghaani _ qilag a _ kavighrug u nghaani llu _ qilaga ii nghaani llu _ pi aqe usi _ , _ ' _ aghneghmi _ esla _ seghleghu naqe uq _ . _ ' _ esghapag luku _ qilag a _ lii simak aq agh si _ esla _ natete naqute anga _ . _ iwernga _ esghapag nghpesiki _ s all gh et _ aghnegh ni _ maani _ liigikepagningite asi _ sa meng _ pi sigh u ta i _ .
aghnegh m _ uu m _ yug i _ seghleghqe ma u ut _ , _ ataa s iigh negh il nguut _ kiyaghnegh mun _ , _ naqam _ all aagh ll u wh agh t i tes qu t _ whanga mnun _ . _ yeghlegi llu _ ! _ T aan ang in aghh aq _ all aagh ll u wh agh t ill eq _ es ghagh lleq agh si _ kiyaghnegh m _ all aagh ll u wh agh t i llgh a _ J o n a h - mun _ . _ " _ taagken _ Jesus-em _ unite luki _ aghulaqekagh t _ .
maligte yaaghtekete te lghiit _ inglu anun _ naayvagh m _ kaate luteng _ , _ malig s aagh tet _ pi yalghiimeng _ puygu ma lghiit _ neqekrangllagh meng _ kelqe gpenateng _ .
Jesus-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ kelenga lusi _ P h a ris e es - et lu _ S a d d u c e es - et lu _ y e as t- ang it neng _ . _ "
E ll meg g neng _ akuz im gh h utk eg kaa t _ , _ " _ tawaten _ pi uq _ qayughllak _ kelqe nghite ngugh u kut _ neqekrangllagh meng _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ liisimake kangi _ sa meng _ pi ta i _ enkaam _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ elpek si _ yug ni _ , _ ugpeq i llegh q es taa pig u usi _ ! _ sangafsi _ neqekrangllagh ite ni tsi _ ?
taawa _ lii g ik ig at si i _ ? _ N eq am ik en ghi s tek ii _ tallimat _ neqekrangllagh t _ aavgughkagh nka _ 5 , 0 0 0 _ yug nun _ , _ q af si n Ê¼ g ut ang illu _ paskete t _ siipte nghmeng _ imigh kasi _ esleqeaghaghte luki _ ?
taakut llu _ neq am ik en ghi s tek ii _ maaghraghvinleg _ neqekrangllagh t _ 4 , 0 0 0 _ yug nun _ neghe stekagh nka _ , _ q af si n Ê¼ g ut ang it lu _ paskete t _ siipte nghmeng _ imigh kasi _ esleqeaghaghte luki _ ?
naten _ sangan _ liigike nghite steggu _ neqekrangllagh u nghite ngughk _ akuzi tke kegka _ ? _ kelenga lusi _ P h a ris e es - et lu _ S a d d u c e es - et lu _ y e as t- ang it neng _ ! _ "
taagken _ malig s aagh tet _ liigikekagh at _ sa meng _ pi aqe ta a _ . _ Y e as t- ang un ghi te f tuq _ neqekrangllagh mete ngughk _ kelenga sagh ughte tkekagh a _ , _ iwernga _ kelenga sqe aqe ai _ apeghtuusagh itneng _ P h a ris e es - et lu _ S a d d u c e es - et lu _ .
taagken _ Jesus _ kaa sa mi _ tu ng ang anun _ C a es ar e a _ P h il ip pi -em _ , _ aaptekagh i _ malig s aagh t en i _ , _ " _ yug t _ kina u niigh katgu _ ighnegh a _ yug m _ ? _ "
kiimsigh iqe aat _ , _ " _ ila i _ pi aqe ut _ J o h n - ngun il uku _ paaptaaye sta _ , _ ila ita _ elijah _ , _ paninang _ ila ita _ J er em i a h - ngun iiq aat _ nalighmeng _ naligh t _ u uk nal iq is tet _ . _ "
aaptekagh i _ , _ " _ elpesi mi _ kina u na iqe ste ngnga _ ? _ "
simon _ P e te r -em _ kiimsigh iqe a _ , _ " _ Christ- ang uu ten _ , _ ighnegh a _ unguva lghii m _ kiyaghnegh m _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ quya ste lleg lgu uten _ , _ simon _ , _ ighnegh a _ J o n a h - m _ ! _ qayughllak _ yug meng _ liite mangite an _ , _ ata ma _ q ilag m el ngu u m _ elpenun _ liite stekaqe a _ .
enkaam _ pi amken _ , _ peter- nge te te n _ , _ uyghag _ . _ whagun _ uyghag kun _ nekefte lleqe aqa _ yughaghvig ka _ , _ tuqu llegh m _ agh tugh yaghq aanghi llgh an _ kay aal q es aghq aq en ghi t ng wh aagh aa _ .
elpenun _ tuune lleqe anka _ key- nge i _ ataneghpag u llegh an _ qilag m _ . _ sa u a _ alngunak _ asightekuvgu _ nuna mi _ whani _ , _ asighte yaghqaa uq _ qilag mi llu _ . _ sa u a _ alngunak _ i tem us ku v gu _ nuna mi _ whani _ , _ iteme te yaghqaa uq _ qilag mi llu _ . _ "
taagken _ Jesus _ malig s aagh te min un _ apegh tes nan igh w aaq aq _ kitumun _ alngunak _ Christ- ang un il uni _ .
taagken _ kenlanga _ Jesus-em _ liigike ste naqekagh i _ malig s aagh t en i _ , _ J er us al em - e te p es t aagh yaghq aan il uni _ , _ tawani _ aw llaag ghhagh u i nakete te _ ikfiqe ste lleqe ni luni _ El d er -en un _ , _ c h i e f _ p r i es t- en un _ , _ apeghtugh i kayug nun llu _ liilightuusagh meng _ . _ ungipagh tke ai _ tuqute yaghqaa ni luni _ taagken _ pi nga yagh u ni _ aghnegh m _ kiyaghnegh mun _ unguvaghsaghqagh u ni luni _ .
P e te r -em _ iqitute luku _ aghyuuniigh qagh a _ , _ " _ atanegh _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ pi snaanghite aaten _ ! _ tawaten _ pi naanghite uten _ ! _ "
Jesus-em _ qiive luku _ peter _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ tughneghagh _ , _ iqiten _ whanga mneng _ ! _ A m ig igh agh pe nga _ , _ qayughllak _ sumeghtaghagh llegh n _ yug m _ sumeghtaghagh llegh ke a _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ sumeghtaghagh llegh ke nghite a _ ! _ "
taagken _ Jesus-em _ malig s aagh t en i _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ kitum _ alngunak _ maligte yu kuminga _ , _ ellmi _ katam _ piyuke lleg ni _ pegte luku _ , _ qaquuragh ni _ uyamig luku _ maligte linga _ .
qayughllak _ kitum _ alngunak _ unguvallegh ni _ ellmi nun _ katam _ pik n i kum igu _ ifla yaghqaqe a _ . _ kitum _ alngunak _ pegtekunigu _ unguvallegh ni _ whanga _ apallugh ke lunga _ allgegh lleqe a _ .
sa u a ngam _ yug m _ pinighqe sigh ke lleqe agu _ pi liite luku _ nunaghllag _ , _ ifla kunigu _ unguva sigh gni _ ? _ taawa _ avangite uq _ veghte sighqagh meng _ unguva sigh gminun _ .
apegh anka _ tamaakut _ elpesi nun _ qayughllak _ ighnegh a _ yug m _ tagi yaghqaa uq _ ata mineng _ agh tugh yaghq aanghi ll el igh luni _ yaqulegtuumagh mi _ . _ taagken _ tea- ma ghhagh a _ yuug _ nallangightugh lleqe a _ apeghiigh te llegh atun _ .
ipa _ ungipaate amsi _ , _ wh aan l e nguut _ ila gpesi _ unguvallegh meggni _ esghagh yaghqaqe aat _ ighnegh a _ yug m _ tagi lghii _ umiileg u luni _ . _ "
aghvinleg _ aghneq _ atugh luku _ , _ Jesus-em _ kelqekagh i _ peter _ , _ J am es -en ku k lu _ , _ J o h n -en kuk _ , _ anglegute ke te lghiik _ , _ mayugh tke ai _ uusqagh lghii mun _ naayghagh mun _ ellnginagh ita _ .
iye itneng _ taagken _ Jesus _ allangughtekagh _ : _ gginagh a _ kuukgute ke aq _ siqinegh tun _ , _ aatkagh i llu _ q at egh r ak gu ugh tek at _ nighug stun _ .
taagken _ malig s aagh tet _ esgh aq ag ke t _ M o s es -en kuk _ El i j a h - n kuk _ aliigh lutek _ aleghqugh ka ak _ Jesus _ .
enkaam _ P e te r -em _ pi ke aa _ Jesus _ , _ " _ atanegh _ , _ itagnagh pigte uq _ whaante llegh ut _ ! _ piyuke llegh ke gkuvgu _ nekefte langi _ pi nga yu t _ azigutagh t _ , _ elpenun llu _ , _ M o s es - m un llu _ , _ El i j a h - m un llu _ . _ "
salin _ akuzi ma luku _ , _ q ilag waagh em _ n igh ug r ak eg t am _ saapekagh i _ , _ enkaam _ qilawaagh meng _ me m _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ una _ ighnegh ke aqa _ , _ piniqe pigte aqa _ , _ efqugh ke pigte aqa _ , _ nagate aqe teggu _ ! _ "
M al ig s aagh tet _ nagate luku _ me _ , _ al ing r uugh em _ ang tal ang aneng _ niinghutekagh t _ nuna mun _ .
taagken _ Jesus-em _ taku luki _ saafte luki _ , _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ nekeve tek _ , _ alinge gpenasi _ ! _ "
sivugte yalghiimeng _ Jesus - ng in aghh aq _ esghaghkagh at _ .
ukig te kete luku _ naayghagh meng _ Jesus-em _ i negh teng ng w aaq ii _ , _ " _ kitumun _ alngunak _ apegh yaqunaan _ esghaghwaagh llegh _ pi nakesi _ kenlanga _ ighnegh a _ yug m _ unguv agh tek an _ tuqu llegh meng _ . _ "
taagken _ malig s aagh tet _ aaptekagh at _ Jesus _ , _ " _ sangan _ apeghtughiste ita _ liilightuusagh t _ pi aqe atgu _ elijah _ sivuke luni _ tagi pestaagh yaghqaa ni luku _ ? _ "
Jesus-em _ kiimsigh iqe ai _ , _ " _ ipa _ elijah _ tagi pestaagh yaghqaa uq _ , _ enkaam _ sa u a _ qam ag teng ng waagh luku _ nallghusagh nqigte lleqe a _ .
iwernga _ ungipaate amsi _ elijah _ tag ing w aaq aag uq _ , _ iwernga _ yug t _ kina u ta a _ nalluke kaqe aat _ , _ piyuke llegh megestun llu _ pi kaqe aat _ . _ Taw at egh pig aq _ ighnegh a _ yug m _ ikfiqe ste lleqe aat _ . _ "
taagken _ malig s aagh tet _ liigikekagh at _ John _ paaptaaye sta _ akuzite kaqe a _ .
yug lghute ghllag nun _ uteghnigh yata _ , _ yug m _ taku luku _ Jesus _ , _ aga _ s eg es qugh teng ng in aam agh mi _ manu akun _ pi ke aq _ .
pi ke aa _ , _ " _ atanegh _ , _ ighnegh ka _ nanglleg yagute aghte gu _ ! _ sayugpag ta lgu uq _ , _ elngaatall _ ikfiqe u uq _ . _ awen _ ken gh eg nun _ ullegh aghte aqe uq _ nalighmeng _ meghquute aqe uq _ .
M al ig s aag teg pen un _ tagite yagh aqa _ , _ iwernga _ naallghutepag nigh nge i tke aat _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ elpek si _ yug ni _ , _ ugpeqe i llghite usi llu _ , _ seghlegh waagh uu si llu _ ! _ naten _ tag kaa n _ elpesinite naqe zinga _ ugpeq es qell unga _ ? _ mekelghiigh _ whavek _ tagite ggu _ ! _ "
Jesus-em _ aghyuugh qu a _ tughneghagh _ , _ taagken _ aanekagh _ mekelghiigh meng _ enkaam _ taw an ing in aq _ naagh llegh u tke aq _ mekelghiigh _ .
taagken _ Jesus _ ellng in aagh s an _ malig s aag teng it a _ taku luku _ aaptekagh at _ , _ " _ sangan _ whangkuta _ aane ste nghmeng _ aghtugh steggu _ tughneghagh _ ? _ "
Jesus-em _ kiimsigh iqe ai _ , _ " _ qayughllak _ ugpeq i llegh q es t aagh h aal ghii si _ . _ ipa _ ungipaate amsi _ , _ ugpeqe i lleg lgu yagh kufsi _ m us t ar d -em _ pii tu tes qugh h an _ angtale atun _ , _ una _ naayghagh _ pi kufsigu _ , _ ' _ ingavek _ nuug ten _ ! _ ' _ nuugte nayagh uq _ . _ enkaam _ sa u a _ alngunak _ agh tugh n ay an ghi tagh si _ ! _ "
iwernga _ taw ate l nguq _ tughneghagh _ y ugh aghh iin aghq un llu _ , _ f as t- ell egh q un llu _ aan es aghq aq agh si _ .
M al ig s aagh tet _ qerngughte te yata _ galilee- mi _ Jesus-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ ighnegh a _ yug m _ tugu luku _ tuune lleqe aat _ yug nun _ ,
enkaam _ tuqu lleqe aat _ . _ iwernga _ pingayut ii ta ani _ aghnegh m _ unguv agh tes aghq aag uq _ . _ " _ taagken _ malig s aagh tet _ qivghu ghllagkagh t _ .
taagken _ Jesus -en kut _ maligte yaaghtekete te lghiit _ C ap er n a um - e mun _ tagi yata _ , _ T em p l e -em _ t a x - meng _ q er ngugh t is teng it a _ taku luku _ peter _ aaptekagh at _ , _ " _ apeghtughiste i _ T em p l e -em _ t a x - ng aneng _ llivike ai qaa _ ? _ "
P e te r -em _ kiimsigh iqe ai _ , _ " _ aa-a _ , _ pi aqe uq _ . _ " _ peter _ itegh yan _ mangteghagh mun _ Jesus-em _ aleghqugh yuwhaagh ke a _ , _ " _ simon _ , _ natete a _ elpek _ sumegh gpeni _ ? _ K in ku ng w aaq at _ nuna t _ umiileg ita _ llivike i ste aqe kangit _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh meng _ t a x - e meng _ ? _ nunalgute meggneng _ pi aqe aat _ nalighmeng _ n aku m ii neng _ ? _ "
P e te r -em _ kiimsigh iqe a _ , _ " _ N aku m ii neng _ . _ " _ Jesus-em _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ enkaam _ umiileg t _ yug it _ llivike i naanghite ut _ .
iwernga _ seghleghyugsugh nghite apung _ t a x - meng _ q er ngugh t is tet _ . _ enkaam _ nulugh yagh a _ naayvagh mun _ iqallugte aqe yuggaagh gpek _ q aan gh ani _ naalke lleqe an _ mat- ni _ . _ tugu luku _ ll iv i ku sagh tugh nak ef kun g _ . _ "
Taa m _ kingu inagh aneng _ malig s aagh tet _ Jesus - mun _ tagi luteng _ aaptekagh at _ , _ " _ ataneghpag u llegh ani _ qilag m _ kina _ angegh lleghpigagh u a _ ? _ "
Jesus-em _ tagsigh luku _ taghnughhagh _ nekeve stekagh a _ qukagh itgun _ .
pi ke ai _ , _ " _ ipa _ ungipaate amsi _ , _ itegh naanghite u aghte usi _ ataneghpag u llegh anun _ qilag m _ w et qu kun _ t aghn ugh h agh es tun _ lliigh kufsi _ .
kina _ alngunak _ ukaligh ughte lghii _ uu tun _ taghnughhagh tun _ , _ angegh lleghpigagh u uq _ ataneghpag u llegh ani _ qilag m _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ ategh mkun _ tugukligh nghminigu _ wh ate l nguq _ taghnughhagh _ , _ whanga _ tugukligh aqe aanga _ .
iwernga _ kitum _ alngunak _ seghleghqe stekagu _ naligh t _ mekestaaghhagh t _ ugpeqe i nga lghiit _ whanga mneng _ , _ itagnagh nayagh uq _ yug t _ qaamqaghte vike luku _ uy aq w agh kun _ uyghag ghllag meng _ k al ef saq um eg teg gu _ uusqagh llegh anun _ kellii m _ .
" _ S egh legh waagh un aq nguut _ yug t _ qayughllak _ nuna mi _ whani _ nanghiiqu lleghtu pigte ut _ seghleghqe llegh mun _ . _ nanghiiqu llegh t _ seghlegh q is t i mun _ pi yaghqaa ut _ , _ iwernga _ seghlegh waagh un aq ngu uq _ kina _ seghleghqe ste i lghii _ yug neng _ !
" _ iigge gpek _ nalighmeng _ itegagh gpek _ seghleghqe stegkangaten _ , _ kepe luki _ egte naketen _ ! _ itagnagh aghagh nayagh uten _ kenle ite ngugh mun _ unguvallegh mun _ itegh kuvek _ , _ iigge i te ghngaaghpek _ nalighmeng _ itegagh ite ghngaaghpek _ miluute lleghqagh gpeneng _ kenle ite ngugh gnun _ ken gh eg nun _ , _ inglugtun _ iigge ligh luten _ nalighmeng _ itegagh ligh luten _ .
iye gpek llu _ seghleghqe stegkangaten _ ipug luku _ egte naken _ ! _ itagnagh aghagh nayagh uten _ kenle ite ngugh mun _ unguvallegh mun _ itegh kuvek _ inglupigagh _ ii- uute kete luku _ , _ miluute lleghqagh gpeneng _ ken gh anun _ h ell -em _ inglugtun _ iye lgu luten _ .
" _ wataghllak _ , _ ukaligh ke gpenaki _ naligh ghhagh inagh it _ ukut _ me ke ta ghhagh t _ . _ ungipaate amsi _ , _ qilag mi _ yaquleg ita _ quunpeng _ ata ma _ q ilag m el ngu u m _ gginagh a _ esghagh aqe aat _ .
ighnegh a _ yug m _ tagi kau uq _ yug ul in al uki _ iflakagh t _ .
" _ sumegh gpesini _ sa nayagh a _ yuug _ 1 0 0 _ penniigh leg _ , _ ataasigh _ aghulaqe yagh kan _ ? _ ivagh yaghtugh nayagh agu _ aghulaqekagh _ unite luki _ 9 9 _ penniigh ni _ qemi nite luki _ ?
ipa _ pi amsi _ , _ naalke gkunigu _ quyake ghllag yaghqaqe a _ p ak ig gu ll uku _ 9 9 -en eng _ aghulaqe ma ite ngugh neng _ .
Taw at egh pig aq _ ata gpesi _ q ilag m el ngu u m _ piyuke llegh ke nghite a _ naligh ghhagh inagh it _ maakut _ me ke ta ghhagh t _ i f l as qell uki _ .
" _ U g peq aal gu teg p ek _ seghletun _ pi kangaten _ , _ ellng in aagh ull uku _ ungipaate naken _ anaggute llegh aneng _ . _ nagate kuniten _ taawa _ il al iigh un neq ig ll equ tek _ .
iwernga _ nagate yu nghite kangaten _ , _ taku nqigte naken _ kelqellug qu _ ataasigh _ nalighmeng _ maalghug _ ugpeqagh u lgute tek _ liisimake ste u lukek _ sa meng _ pi llegh gpetegneng _ . _ tawaten _ pi lghaaten _ qayughllak _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ apeghtuusagh ke aat _ maalghug _ nalighmeng _ pi nga yu t _ lii simak is tet _ ip a pi gh q es aghq aq aat _ anaggute llegh _ .
iwernga _ nagate yu nghite kaki _ apegh nakesi _ yughaghvig m _ yug itnun _ . _ nagate yu nghite kaki _ talwa _ yughaghvig m _ yug i _ , _ kiyaghute nakesi _ G en t il e- ngu l ghii s tun _ , _ t a x - m eng llu _ qerngughte i ste u lghii stun _ .
" _ ipa _ ungipaate amsi _ , _ sa u a _ alngunak _ asightekufsigu _ nuna mi _ whani _ , _ asighte yaghqaa uq _ qilag mi llu _ . _ sa u a _ alngunak _ i tem us ku f si gu _ nuna mi _ whani _ , _ iteme te yaghqaa uq _ qilag mi llu _ .
" _ ila aneng llu _ ungipaate naqe amsi _ , _ nuna mi _ whani _ maalghug u lutek _ itagnagh qu te u kuftek _ aapte na lutek _ sa meng _ alngunak _ , _ ata ma _ q ilag m el ngu u m _ apeghiigh lleqe a _ elpetegnun _ .
qayughllak _ m aal gh ug g aat _ nalighmeng _ pi nga yug ggaat _ q er ngugh us k ata _ whanga _ ategh mkun _ , _ aku l ng it n is aghq aag unga _ . _ "
taagken _ P e te r -em _ taku luku _ Jesus _ aaptekagh a _ , _ " _ atanegh _ , _ ugpeq aal g ut m a _ seghletun _ pi manginagh kanganga _ naten _ ug l aghq ak aan _ seghevute yaghqaqe zikun _ ? _ K et w el l _ m aagh r aghv in l aa k _ ? _ "
Jesus-em _ kiimsigh iqe a _ , _ " _ M aagh r aghv in leg g iin aq _ seghevute yaghqaqe nghite an _ , _ iwernga _ 7 0 _ x _ 7 _ .
tawaten _ pi amken _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ igleghte te i llegh a _ ataneghpag u llegh ani _ qilag m _ whatete uq _ : _ umiileg m _ qep ghagh te mi _ igagh it _ yuvghiigh yaghtugh qu ai _ esghagh na luki _ as eng e tu l ang it _ .
iiwenllu _ igagh it _ yuvghiigh aqe ai _ , _ umiileg mun _ itghutekagh at _ qepghagh a _ as eng el ek _ 1 0 , 0 0 0 _ mani meng _ .
tawaten _ angka an _ mani ite ngughk _ llivike uute yaghqagh meng _ as eng em in un _ . _ enkaam _ umiileg m _ akike sqekagh i _ ellnga _ , _ nulighh a _ , _ avaquti a _ , _ saghya i llu _ llivike uute yagh u luki _ as eng eng anun _ .
iwernga _ qepghagh a _ sikmuute luni _ umiileg mi _ manu akun _ maniguute pigte luni _ pi ke aa _ , _ ' _ U taq iig agh ten _ ! _ llivike naagh aqa _ qam ag teng ng waagh luku _ ! _ '
umiileg m _ nanglleg yagute luku _ puygu sqekagh a _ as eng e nga _ enkaam _ aane stekagh a _ .
" _ taagken _ taana _ qepghagh a _ aane luni _ nallagh qagh a _ qep ghagh te l g ut ni _ 1 0 0 _ mani meng _ asengekagh _ . _ akuqagh luku _ uy aq wh akun _ pi ke aa _ , _ ' _ llivike nga _ as eng eg pen eng _ ! _ '
Q ep gh al g ut ang an _ sikmuute luni _ n angll eg si pig lluni _ pi ke aa _ , _ ' _ U taq iig agh ten _ , _ llivike lleqe amken _ ' _ .
iwernga _ yug m _ nagate ma ite kanga _ , _ yeghlegi _ anusimingllagh stekagh a _ kenlanga _ as eng e nga _ llivike llegh anun _ .
ila ita _ qep ghagh tet _ esghapag luku _ tawaten _ pi llgh a _ , _ seghleghyag te ghllag luku _ umiileg meggnun _ apegh yaghtugh qu aat _ .
enkaam _ umiileg m _ qepghagh a _ taana _ tagsiqligh luku _ pi ke aa _ , _ ' _ uyuq _ seghlegh pestaagh _ qepghagh a _ ! _ L eg an Ê¼ ng am _ seghevute amken _ as eng egh llag pen eng _ , _ qayughllak _ n angll eg si l ghii ten _ .
qepghagh lguten _ n angll eg y ag us aq leg es tun _ katam _ whanga _ nanglleg yagute lleg mtun _ elpek _ ! _ '
umiileg m _ sakrite pigte luni _ taana _ qepghagh a _ aglagh te stekagh a _ am y u utk is t en un _ an u sim ing ll aghv ig m el ngugh nun _ kenlanga _ qam ag teng ng waagh luku _ as eng e nga _ llivike llegh anun _ .
" _ esgha _ taw at egh pig aq _ ata ma _ q ilag m el ngu u m _ qamagte lusi _ pi yaghq ii si _ , _ qamaken _ ilu gpesineng _ seghevute nghite kufsiki _ yug lgute si _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ tamaakut _ apeghtuusagh ke nghmeng _ taaqe yamiki _ aghulaqekagh _ galilee- meng _ , _ nuna anun _ J u d e a- m _ , _ ing l ung an il ngugh mun _ kiiw m _ J o r d an -em _ .
yug lghute ghllag t _ malig llegh aat kaa t _ enkaam _ tawani _ naallghute qugh qu ai _ q in u yuget _ .
ila ita _ P h a ris e es - et _ taku luku _ an ag n iil q av ig igh nal uku _ aaptekagh at _ , _ " _ liilightuusagh mnni _ itagnaghtaa _ yug m _ pegtekunigu _ nuliigh ni _ sa u a _ alngunak _ apallugh ke luku _ ? _ "
Jesus-em _ kiimsigh iqe ai _ , _ " _ A t igh t iig as tek ii _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ whaten _ pi ll ghi t _ , _ ' _ piinligh yuwhaagh llegh mi _ kiyaghnegh _ yungllagh aqngami _ ulima kaqe kek _ yug nkuk _ aghnaa nkuk _ ' _ ? _ "
enkaam _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ taana _ apallugh ke luku _ yug m _ ata ni llu _ naa ni llu _ unite lukek _ , _ nulighh ghqu te lghiik _ qerngughte te lleqe uk _ , _ enkaam _ ataasiighte lleqe uk _ yugusigh ak _ .
En kaa ng am _ maalghug u nanigh uk _ , _ ataasiighte uk _ yugusigh ak _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ qerngughte te stekakek _ yeqay _ yug m _ pellegh utu te ste nghite likek _ . _ "
P h a ris e es - et _ aaptekagh at _ , _ " _ sangan mi _ M o s es -em _ L iiligh tuus al it in kut _ yug mun _ ig al i tes qell uku _ nulighh a _ p eg tug sigh q ameng _ , _ aan e sim aan llu _ ? _ "
Jesus-em _ kiimsigh iqe ai _ , _ " _ M o s es -em _ pegtesaghqagh ughte stekaqe ai _ nula isi _ qayughllak _ pineghllug u lghiisi _ . _ iwernga _ piinligh yuggaagh llegh meng _ kiyaghnegh m _ tawatetesaghqagh u nghite ni luku _ pi kaqsagh aa _ .
enkaam _ whanga _ pi amsi _ , _ yug m _ pegte yaghqaqe nghite a _ nuliigh ni _ wetku qun _ g el gh aghn iiq an _ . _ pegtekunigu _ sa meng _ alla neng _ apallugh ligh luni _ , _ nulightugh nqigtekuni _ gelgaghniigh u lleqe uq _ n ul igh q en gh h am i kun _ . _ "
M al ig s aagh teng it a _ pi ke aat _ , _ " _ T aan ang in aghh aa k an _ apallugh _ yug m _ pegte sigh qaa _ nuliigh minun _ , _ yuug _ nulightugh nghite ghngaaghmi _ itagnagh nayagh uq _ . _ "
iwernga _ Jesus-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ taana _ apallugh _ tamaghhagh mi _ tugukligh naanghite aat _ , _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ ila itnun _ tugukligh yaghqaaghte stekaqe a _ .
ila i _ yug t _ nulightugh igate ut _ allgegh kau te meggneng _ e un u c h - ng ngu luteng _ . _ ila i _ nulightugh igate ut _ qayughllak _ yug t _ e un u c h - eng ll aq aq iit _ . _ paninang _ ila i _ e un u c h - ng w aa qu t _ pinigh aghaghtu te _ qepghagh te na luku _ kiyaghnegh _ ataneghpag u llegh ani _ qilag m _ . _ kitum _ alngunak _ taana _ tugukligh yaghqaqe gkunigu _ , _ tugukligh ligu _ . _ "
taagken _ taghnughhagh t _ tagi tke ait _ Jesus - mun _ saafte luki _ y ugh aatk es qell uki _ . _ taawanginaq _ malig s aagh tet _ ineghtekagh it _ tag it is teng it _ taghnughhagh t _ .
iwernga _ Jesus-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ yeqay _ taghnughhagh t _ tagi lit _ whanga mnun _ . _ ineghte gpenaki _ , _ qayughllak _ ataneghpag u llegh a _ qilag m _ t aghn ugh h agh es tun _ ayuqe lghiit _ pi ke aat _ . _ "
enkaam _ saafte aqe luki _ quya stekagh i _ , _ taagken _ aghulaqekagh _ .
taagken _ yug m _ taku luku _ Jesus _ aaptekagh a _ , _ " _ apeghtugh i sta _ , _ sa u a _ pinigh lghii _ pi yaghqaqe zikun _ allgegh te sighqagh u luku _ kenle ite ngugh meng _ unguvallegh meng _ ? _ "
Jesus-em _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ sangan _ aap si nga _ sa u a _ pi niite anga _ ? _ ataasigh ghhagh u uq _ pinigh lghii _ . _ kenle ite ngugh meng _ unguvallegh nge yu kuvek _ qaatke ki _ kiyaghnegh m _ qelegh sagh i _ . _ "
nukalpigagh m _ aaptekagh a _ , _ " _ N a kut _ ? _ " _ Jesus-em _ kiimsigh iqe a _ , _ " _ yugtagh gpenang _ , _ gelgaghniigh gpenang _ , _ tegleg gpenang _ , _ iqlengiqe tke i gpenang _ ,
Q u ul v agh l uk ek _ ata n llu _ naa n llu _ , _ piniqe luki _ yug lgute ten _ piniqe llegh gpetun _ el pen eng _ . _ "
nukalpigagh m _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ qamagte luki _ taakut _ qaatke aqe anka _ . _ sa u a llu _ pi yaghqaqe zikun _ ? _ "
Jesus-em _ kiimsigh iqe a _ , _ " _ N aam ig teng ng waagh y u ku v gu _ kiyaghnegh m _ pi sqe llegh a _ elpenun _ , _ aglagh luten _ qamagte luku _ saghya n _ akike luku _ , _ aki a _ tamaa na _ aklumalghii nun _ tunqugh naken _ . _ enkaam _ qilag mi _ aklungi lgu lleqe uten _ , _ taagken _ tagi luten _ maligte nakevnga _ . _ "
nukalpigagh m _ nagate luku _ , _ aghulaqekagh _ iilqe pigte luni _ qayughllak _ aklungite pigte lghii _ .
taagken _ Jesus-em _ malig s aagh t en i _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ ipa _ pi amsi _ , _ piyaqnagh yaghqaa uq _ ak l ung il ngugh mun _ yug mun _ itegh lleghqagh a _ ataneghpag u llegh anun _ qilag m _ .
ungipaate naqlaatagh amsi _ ila aneng _ , _ piyaqnagh u i uute yaghqaa uq _ c am el -em _ suflughte te lleghqagh a _ sikugh m _ iye akun _ , _ ak l ung il ngu u m _ yug m _ itegh lleghqagh aneng _ ataneghpag u llegh anun _ kiyaghnegh m _ . _ "
M al ig s aagh tet _ nagate yamegteggu _ tawaten _ pi llegh _ saghiigha yug ghllag magh meng _ pikagh t _ , _ " _ kina ngam _ yuguligh lleg nge lleqe a _ ? _ "
iwernga _ Jesus-em _ taw av egh ll u w aaq _ esghagh luki _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ yug t _ pi yaghqaqe nghite kangit _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ pi yaghqaqe ai _ . _ "
taagken _ P e te r -em _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ esghaqagh kut qun _ , _ sa u a _ qamagte luku _ unite luku _ maligtekaqe amken _ . _ sa u a ngam _ allgegh lleqe steggu _ ? _ "
Jesus-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ ipa _ pi amsi _ , _ nutaghagh mi _ nuna mi _ ighnegh a _ yug m _ aqume lleqe uq _ um iil gu si g ne kun _ aqumutagh gmikun _ n igh ugh qell egh min i _ . _ taagken _ elpek si llu _ maligte tekagh ni _ whanga mnun _ aqume lusi _ qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ke luku _ umiileg m _ aqumutagh itgun _ , _ igleghte te i lleqe usi _ qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ke luku _ ramke aneng _ I s r a el -em _ .
enkaam _ whanga _ apallugh ke lunga _ kinku t _ alngunak _ unite kumegteki _ mangteghagh teng _ , _ anglegute teng _ , _ nayag teng _ , _ ata teng _ , _ naa teng _ , _ avaqutagh teng _ , _ nalighmeng _ piitesighaghvig teng _ , _ nula lleqe ut _ 1 0 0 - al pag luku _ . _ kenle ite ngugh meng llu _ unguvallegh meng _ allgegh u lleqe ut _ .
iwernga _ aange lghii lghute t _ ukaligh igh lleqe ut _ enkaam _ uk av an l e nguut _ angegh llegh ughte lleqe ut _ . _ "
paninang _ Jesus-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ ataneghpag u llegh a _ qilag m _ yug tun _ ayuqe uq _ grapes- meng _ piitesighaghvig leg _ . _ unaangu luku _ aane luni _ tugulagh saghtuqagh _ qep ghagh tek aghq ameng _ piitesighaghvig minun _ .
aghnegh mun _ tawavek _ it ag naq egk ii _ akileghtugh na luki _ ataa si k agh taa n _ d en ar i us - meng _ , _ taagken _ qepghagh yagh stekagh i _ .
N in e- ek l aag mi _ aan eq ig lluni _ esghaghkagh i _ yug t _ nekevghatu aghte te lghiit _ sa gpenateng _ akilpegaghvig mi _ .
enkaam _ pi ke ai _ , _ ' _ elpek si llu _ piitesighaghvig mnun _ qepghagh yagh tek _ , _ akileghtugh naagh amsi _ qepghagh llegh gpesistun _ ' _ .
En kaa ng am _ qepghagh yagh tke aat _ . _ taagken _ aghnegh m _ qukaa ni llu _ , _ t h r e e- k l aag m illu _ tawaten _ pilagh te aqe aq _ .
iiwenllu _ f iv e- ek l aag naq aqaa _ , _ akilpegaghvig mun _ pi ke aq _ , _ taawa nguq _ paninang _ yug m _ ila i _ ne ke v gh at aagh aq ef tut _ . _ aaptekagh i _ , _ ' _ sangafsi _ whaante aqe tsi _ aghn el qu si q _ sa gpenasi _ ? _ '
kiimsigh iqe aat _ , _ ' _ qayughllak _ kitum _ alngunak _ tugu nghite kanginkut _ qep ghagh te ngu l uta _ . _ ' _ enkaam _ pi ke ai _ , _ ' _ naqam _ elpek si llu _ qepghagh yagh tek _ piitesighaghvig mnun _ ' _ .
" _ I ghi v g agh y ag u _ piitesighaghvig leg m _ pi ke aa _ qep ghagh tet _ naa s qu ut is teng at _ , _ ' _ Q ep ghagh tet _ tuq l ugh tegh luki _ ak il egh tugh tegh q i _ kinguligh neng _ sivuligh nun _ . _ '
F iv e- ek l aag mi _ qepghagh yagh tke aat _ tagi laghate te yameng _ akileghtuusagh ngekagh t _ d en ar i us - k agh taa n _ .
enkaam _ sivuligh t _ qep ghagh tet _ akileghtuusagh nge aghagh naqe ni luteng _ pi kaayagh lghiit _ , _ iwernga _ tagi laghate te yalghiimeng _ ellngit llu _ akileghtuusagh ngekagh t _ d en ar i us - k agh taa n _ .
akileghtuusagh nge yameng _ qivraagh tke aat _ piitesighaghvig m _ yug a _ .
pi ke aat _ , _ ' _ kinguligh u luki _ tugukagh ten _ qepghagh ut _ ataasigh ghhagh mun _ aflu mun _ . _ whangkuta _ ughleghiigh ukut _ puqla ghllag mi _ aghn el qu si q _ , _ iwernga _ akileghtugh aten _ whangkutestun _ angka an _ . _ '
iwernga _ yug m _ pi ke aa _ ataasigh _ , _ ' _ nagate aghten _ , _ ilakumtaagh mni _ , _ puughte nghite amken _ . _ I tag naq egk aq an _ qepghagh na luten _ ataasigh mun _ d en ar i us - mun _ .
enkaam _ tugu luku _ akileghtuusagh n _ aglagh a _ . _ akileghtugh yug anka _ kinguligh t _ yug t _ tugukagh nka _ akileghtuusagh gpetun _ angka an _ .
piyuke lleg mtun _ mani ka _ atugh yaghqaqe aqa _ . _ aqina ziin _ eight- leg ite u te mneng _ ? _ ' _ "
taagken _ Jesus-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ enkaam _ tamaakut _ kinguligh t _ sivulii aghte yaghqaa ut _ , _ sivuligh t _ kinguligh ughte yaghqaa ut _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ J er us al em - e mun _ mayugh te kete luku _ yug lghute neng _ aafte tke ai _ qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ke luku _ malig s aagh t en i _ aleghqugh nagh u luki _ .
pi ke ai _ , _ " _ nagate tek _ , _ J er us al em - e mun _ mayugh naqe ukut _ . _ tawani _ ighnegh a _ yug m _ tuune lleqe aat _ c h i e f _ p r i es t- en un llu _ , _ apeghtugh i kayug nun llu _ liilightuusagh neng _ enkaam _ nanqigte luku _ tuqute yaghqaa ni lleqe aat _ .
taagken _ G en t il e- en un _ tuune lleqe aat _ . _ tawani _ legasiighwagh tke lleqe aat _ , _ kagsagmig lleqe aat _ , _ qaquuragh lleqe aat llu _ . _ iwernga _ pingayut ii ta ani _ aghnegh m _ unguv agh tes aghq aag uq _ . _ "
taagken _ Z e b e d e e- m _ ighnegh gkenka _ naange ak _ tagikagh _ Jesus - mun _ ighnegh gni _ kelqellug kek _ . _ manu akun _ segesqughtekagh _ aapte vike na luku _ .
Jesus-em _ aaptekagh a _ , _ " _ sa meng _ pi iigh ziin _ ? _ " _ aghnagh m _ kiimsigh iqe a _ , _ " _ akeqe nga _ ataneghpag u llegh gpeni _ ighnegh gka _ aqume ste nakegken _ aag llegh a _ aghenqignegh gpegun _ , _ ila a _ saghumignegh gpegun _ . _ "
iwernga _ Jesus-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ L iig ik en ghi tagh si _ sa u ta a _ tungsighkagh i _ . _ M egh v ik n ay agh es teg n eg u u _ qayuusigh _ meghyaghqagh ka _ ? _ " _ kiimsigh iqe ak _ , _ " _ piyaqleg u ukung _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ pi kakek _ , _ " _ qaywa _ qayuusigh mneng _ meghe lleqe utek _ , _ iwernga _ whanga u nghite uq _ nakmiigh yaghqagh _ kinku k _ aqume yaghqaa te kek _ aghenqignegh mkun llu _ saghumignegh mkun llu _ . _ ata ma _ yataaghqe kaqe ak _ taake uk _ aqume vigkagh k _ nakmikegkagh minun _ . _ "
taakut _ ila ita _ qula _ malig s aagh tet _ nagaqugh yamegtekek _ sa mate kek _ anglegute ke te lghiik _ ug um iy ag utk ag ke t _ .
taagken _ Jesus-em _ tuqlugh luki _ malig s aagh t en i _ , _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ liisima kasi _ G en t il e- et _ iglegh ut is teng it a _ at an gh utaq iit _ yug teng _ , _ aa ng waagh ugh tek at lu _ yug ita _ y uk egh q utk aq iit _ .
iwernga _ elpek si _ tawatete yaghqaa nghite usi _ . _ naligh i _ igleghte te i ste u yu kuni _ qep ghagh teng ugh ll i _ elpesi nun _ .
naligh i _ aange lleghpigagh u yu kuni _ qep ghagh te l aagh ugh s aghq aag uq _ elpesi nun _ ,
katam _ tawaten _ ighnegh an _ yug m _ pi llgh a tun _ . _ tagi mangite uq _ qep gh aa tes qell uni _ iwernga _ tagi kau uq _ qepghagh te i na luni _ , _ tuun al u ku llu _ unguvallegh ni _ n av egh qell i si q nal uku _ uglagh pigte lghii nun _ yug nun _ . _ "
Jesus -en kut _ maligte yaaghtekete te lghiit _ J er i c h o - meng _ aghulaqe ma luki _ yug lghute ghllag m _ maligtekagh at _ Jesus _ .
taawa nguq _ tume t _ sani itni _ ayaakagh k _ yug k _ aqume lutek _ . _ nagaqugh yamegnegu _ Jesus _ naghughte ni luku _ akilghuukagh k _ , _ " _ atanegh _ , _ ighneghagh ni _ D av i d -em _ , _ nanglleg yagute aghte kung _ ! _ "
yug lghute m _ ineghtekakek _ , _ nepiigh sqellug kek _ . _ iwernga _ qevuute aghaghllug qu _ wata _ akilghuukagh k _ , _ " _ atanegh _ , _ ighneghagh ni _ D av i d -em _ , _ nanglleg yagute aghte kung _ ! _ "
enkaam _ Jesus-em _ aghuliigh luni _ tuqlugh lukek _ aaptekakek _ , _ " _ S as qell u tek _ pi aqe stek _ whanga mnun _ ? _ "
kiimsigh iqe ak _ , _ " _ atanegh _ , _ iye pung _ esghagh ste aghte ki _ ! _ "
Jesus-em _ nanglleg yagute lukek _ iye ik _ saaftekagh i _ . _ Taw an ing in aq _ esghagh u sag u tke ak _ enkaam _ maligtekagh ak _ .
Jesus -en kut _ maligte yaaghtekete te lghiit _ tugh aagh y alghii meng _ J er us al em - e mun _ , _ kaate tke aat _ B et h p h ag e- mun _ M o un t _ O l iv es - m el ngugh mun _ . _ tawani _ kayagtekakek _ maalghug _ malig s aagh teg ni _ igleghte kestigh sqellug kek _ .
whaten _ pi kakek _ , _ " _ ingavek _ ne nun _ aglagh lutek _ taw an ing in aq _ esghagh lleqe aghte tek _ petug nga lghii _ donkey _ nughagh leg _ . _ I tem ll uk ek _ tagite nakegtek _ whanga mnun _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ sa meng _ pi ka nge istek _ , _ whaten _ pi naketek _ , _ ' _ Atan ghem _ aklukagh ak _ . _ ' _ Taw an ing in aq _ tagite ste lleqe ak _ whanga mnun _ . _ "
whaten _ pi kau uq _ apeghiigh na luku _ u uk nal iq is te m _ pi llgh a _ ,
" _ ungipaate yaghtugh ki _ , _ Z i o n - egh m iit _ , _ ' _ esghaqagh teggu qun _ , _ umiileg gpesi _ taku aqe aisi _ . _ Q us ev eg ng aaq _ d o n ke y - kun _ igleghte aqe uq _ , _ d o n ke y - m _ nughagh akun _ . _ ' _ "
enkaam _ maligsaagh tek _ igleghte kestagh lutek _ sivu itni _ , _ Jesus-em _ pi sqe llegh atun _ pikagh k _ .
donkey _ nughaghtuumagh an _ tagi tke ak _ Jesus - mun _ . _ qaasligh at _ aatkagh teng _ mat- aghte luki _ teghig ke sagh k _ qaye itgun _ llikagh it _ . _ taagken _ Jesus _ aqumekagh _ .
yug lghute ghllag m _ tume tgun _ aatkagh teng _ s aag tek iit _ , _ enkaam _ ila i _ uqfig m _ avayagh aneng _ ikute aqe luteng _ tume t _ llilaghtugh vikekagh it _ .
Y ul gh utegh l ag et _ Jesus-em _ siv ung an il ngu ut lu _ k i ngu ng an il ngu ut lu _ akilghuu tke aat _ , _ " _ usuqnagh ghhalek _ ighnegh a _ D av i d -em _ ! _ kiyaghnegh m _ quya ste ligu _ tagi lghii _ ategh akun _ Atan ghem _ ! _ usuqe i llegh _ q ilag m el ngugh mun _ ! _ "
Jesus _ itegh yan _ J er us al em - e mun _ , _ qamagte luteng _ J er us al em - egh m iit _ k ag ay g un neq eg s aatk at _ whaten _ pi magh meng _ , _ " _ kinangaawa _ una _ yuug _ ? _ "
Jesus-em _ malig tes teng it a _ yug lghute ghllag t _ kiimsigh iqe ait _ , _ " _ Jesus - ngu uq _ , _ uuknaliqe i sta _ , _ nazareth- meng _ G al il e e- m el ngugh meng _ pi u uq _ . _ "
Jesus _ temple- mun _ itegh luni _ aag negh squgh ke ai _ qamagte luki _ tukfightugh lghiit llu _ , _ akikugh lghiit llu _ . _ taagken _ mani meng _ n av egh qugh te t lu _ t ip el ng it _ ullegh qugh qu ai _ , _ aqumutagh it llu _ qawaag meng _ ak il p eg agh tet _ .
enkaam _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ igaqe nga uq _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ , _ ' _ mangteghagh ma _ atigh llegh kesaghqagh ke a _ , _ yughaghvig _ . _ ' _ iwernga _ elpek si _ iigh aghv ig ugh tagh si _ teg leg n iigh t en un _ ! _ "
taagken _ ayaakagh t llu _ , _ igh ull ug m el ngu ut lu _ takukagh at _ Jesus _ temple- mun _ , _ enkaam _ naallghute qugh qu ai _ .
Ch i e f _ p r i es t- et lu _ apeghtugh i kayug t llu _ liilightuusagh neng _ esghapag luki _ all aagh ll u wh agh t i llgh i _ Jesus-em _ , _ nagate luki llu _ taghnughhagh t _ temple- mi _ akilghuu lghiit _ whaten _ , _ " _ usuqe i llegh _ ighneghagh nun _ D av i d -em _ ! _ " _ elngaatall _ ugumi yuke aat _ .
enkaam _ Jesus _ aaptekagh at _ , _ " _ N ag an negh i si k ii _ taghnughhagh t _ sa meng _ pi ta i _ ? _ " _ Jesus-em _ kiimsigh iqe ai _ , _ " _ aa-a _ , _ nagate anka _ . _ A t igh t iig as teg gu u _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ pi ll ghi t _ , _ ' _ Q aanghi t gun _ taghnughhagh t llu _ allgegh nghhagh ghhagh t llu _ yataaghqe kaqe an _ usuqe i llegh _ elpenun _ katam _ ? _ ' _ "
taagken _ Jesus-em _ unite luki _ , _ J er us al em - e meng _ B et h an y - t k aq _ qavagh na luni _ tamaani _ .
Jesus _ unaangu luku _ uteghnigh te kete luku _ J er us al em - e mun _ iyataghkagh _ .
tume t _ saaghw itni _ esgha qaa _ f ig s -em _ uqfig a _ . _ taku luku _ piyaqminigu _ ququngagh raaghinagh u uq _ figs- ngunani _ . _ enkaam _ uqfig _ tawavek _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ allameng llu _ piite ste i naanghite uten _ . _ " _ Taw an ing in aq _ uqfig _ paligh iqe aq _ .
M al ig s aagh tet _ tawaten _ pi lghii _ esghapag luku _ , _ saghiigha yug te kete luku _ aaptekagh at _ , _ " _ naten _ uqfig _ sukate pigte luni _ paligh a _ ? _ "
Jesus-em _ kiimsigh iqe ai _ , _ " _ ipa _ pi amsi _ , _ mal gh uk l ill ngun aan _ ugpeqe i lleg lgu kufsi _ , _ whanga mtun _ pi lleqe usi _ , _ esghapag llegh gpesistun _ f ig s -em _ uqfig a _ . _ Taw a teng in aq _ pi naanghite usi _ talwa _ una _ naayghagh _ kayagtekufsigu _ , _ ' _ iike luten _ el pen eng _ megh mun _ milugh te n _ ' _ , _ legan _ pi lleqe uq _ .
sa meng _ alngunak _ aaptekufsi _ y ugh akun _ ugpeqe i lleg lgu kufsi _ allgegh te yaghqaa usi _ . _ "
Jesus _ kaate luni _ J er us al em - e mun _ temple- mun _ iteghkagh _ . _ apeghtugh i ma luku _ , _ c h i e f _ p r i es t- et lu _ , _ siivanllegh t llu _ taku luku _ aaptekagh at _ , _ " _ ungipaate kut _ kitum _ qelegh aten _ tawaten _ pi s qell u ten _ , _ nalighmeng _ kitum _ qelegh llegh akun _ tawaten _ pi u ziin _ ? _ "
Jesus-em _ kiimsigh iqe ai _ , _ " _ whanga llu _ aapte naqe amsi _ . _ kiimsigh kufsinga _ whanga llu _ ungipaate lleqe amsi _ kitumun _ qelegh mate ka _ .
kitum _ qelegh agu _ John _ p aap taa y egh is qell uku _ ? _ kiyaghneghtagh u a _ nalighmeng _ yug meng _ pi u a _ ? _ " _ taagken _ ell meg g neng _ akuz im gh h utk at _ , _ " _ sa meng _ pi naqe steggu _ ? _ kiimsigh kumteggu _ kiyaghnegh meng _ pi u ni luku _ , _ whaten _ pi lleqe ainkut _ , _ ' _ S ang an Ê¼ ng am _ ugpeq en ghi s teg gu _ John _ ? _ '
iwernga _ , _ ' _ yug meng _ pi u ni kumteggu _ ' _ , _ qemall _ yug lghute t _ sa lleqe ainkut _ , _ qayughllak _ qamagte luteng _ ugpeqekagh at _ John _ uuknaliqe i ste u ni luku _ . _ "
enkaam _ kiimsigh iqe aat _ Jesus _ , _ " _ nallukagh ut _ . _ " _ Jesus-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ whanga llu _ ungipaate naanghite amsi _ kitumun _ qelegh lleg nge kau tke a _ tawaten _ pilleg mnun _ . _ "
taagken _ Jesus-em _ aaptekagh i _ , _ " _ naten _ una _ sumeghtaghagh tke lleqe steggu _ ? _ yug nguq _ taawa _ maalghug gneng _ ighnegh leg _ . _ sivuligh mun _ pi luni _ pi ke aa _ , _ ' _ ighnegh mni _ , _ aghneghmi _ whani _ grapes- meng _ piitesighaghvig mnun _ qepghagh yagh ghhaaten _ ! _ '
ighnegh an _ pi ke aa _ , _ ' _ wiin _ piyug nghite unga _ . _ ' _ iwernga _ aghneghmi _ taakwani _ av utegh qell uni _ qepghagh yaghkagh _ .
taagken _ tuungligh ghhagh anun _ ighnegh mi _ pi luni _ , _ taw at egh pig aq _ pi ke aa _ . _ ighnegh an _ pi ke aa _ , _ ' _ aa-a _ , _ pi lleqe unga _ ' _ , _ iwernga _ pi ma ite ngughk _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ aaptekagh i _ , _ " _ naligh m _ ighnegh an _ qaatke kaqe agu _ ata ni _ ? _ " _ kiimsigh iqe aat _ , _ " _ sivuligh m _ . _ " _ enkaam _ Jesus-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ ungipaate amsi _ t a x - meng _ q er ngugh tes te t lu _ , _ aghnagh t llu _ akike i kayug t _ yugusigh meggneng _ sivu gpesini _ it egh aat nguut _ ataneghpag u llegh anun _ kiyaghnegh m _ .
J o h n -em _ P aap taa y es te m _ ungipaate yaghtugh kaqe aisi _ naten _ kiyaghte lleghqagh meng _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke llegh atun _ , _ iwernga _ ug pe qu mang it agh si _ . _ naqam _ t a x - meng _ q er ngugh t is te t lu _ , _ aghnagh t llu _ akike i kayug t _ yugusigh meggneng _ ugpeqe kaqe aat _ . _ talwa _ kingu aneng _ esghapag kaqe ghngaaghpesiki _ ugpeqe kangat _ John _ , _ paninang _ elpek si _ av utegh qell usi llu _ seghlegh q en nan ill ghi tu si _ , _ ug pe qu mang it agh si llu _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ ila a _ ungipaghagh an _ nagate ggu _ . _ taawa nguq _ yuug _ piitesighagh ke aq _ grapes- meng _ nuna mikun _ . _ mingllu luku _ , _ laag te gkakek _ grapes- mun _ qageghqugh sigh k _ , _ nekeftekagh a llu _ uusqagh lghii _ kelengake i vigkagh _ . _ taagken _ n av ghi t k aa _ grapes- meng _ piitesighaghvig ni _ pii te si ghagh t en un _ aflengake sqellug qu _ . _ taagken _ ellnga _ ila anun _ nuna m _ aglaghkagh _ .
saghna yaghqaaghte yata _ g r ap es - et _ , _ piitesighaghvig leg m _ qep ghagh t en i _ kayagtekagh i _ nengigh ni _ aq f as qell uki _ .
iwernga _ pii te si ghagh tet _ akuqagh luki _ qep ghagh tet _ , _ ataasigh _ an ag ul egh taa kaa t _ , _ ila a _ tuqu tke aat _ , _ pi nga yu aat _ m il ugh pag aat aghh iin aq _ tuqu tke aat _ .
Q ep ghagh te mi _ ila i _ kayagte laataghkagh i _ , _ sivuligh neng _ uglagh aghagh luki _ , _ ellngit llu _ tawatengwaaq _ pilagh te aqe ait _ .
qenwat _ ighnegh ni _ kayagtekagh a _ ellngit nun _ , _ whaten _ pi magh mi _ , _ ' _ ipapestaaq _ sii vag kete lleqe aat _ ighnegh ka _ . _ '
iwernga _ pii te si ghagh tet _ esghagh luku _ piitesighaghvig leg m _ ighnegh a _ whaten _ pikagh t _ , _ ' _ U u m _ ighnegh an _ pi liite lleqe a _ una _ nuna _ ata ni _ tuqu kan _ . _ tuqute kumteggu _ whangkuta _ pi lii lleq agh put _ una _ grapes- meng _ piitesighaghvig _ . _ '
En kaa ng am _ akuqagh luku _ , _ piitesighaghvig meng _ miluute luku _ tuqu tke aat _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ aaptekagh i _ , _ " _ piitesighaghvig leg m _ tagi kuni _ sa lleqe aki _ pii te si ghagh tet _ ? _ "
Ch i e f _ p r i es t- et lu _ siivanllegh t llu _ kiimsigh iqe aat _ , _ " _ seghlegh pestaaghtu te _ tuqu lleqe ai _ taakut _ seghlegh t _ yug t _ . _ taagken _ n av ghi lleq aa _ piitesighaghvig ni _ alla nun _ pii te si ghagh t en un _ . _ saghna lleghqagh _ kaate kan _ nengigh u lleqe aat _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ A t igh t iig as tek ii _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ whaten _ pi ll ghi t _ ? _ ' _ uyghag _ taana _ mang tegh angll agh tet _ ighsakekagh at _ megnu nagh lleghpigagh ughtekau uq _ uyghag _ . _ taana _ Atan ghem _ pil q aa _ , _ urang _ pinigh lleghpigagh u uq _ whang kun nun _ ! _ '
" _ En kaa ng am _ ungipaate amsi _ , _ ataneghpag u llegh a _ kiyaghnegh m _ elpesi neng _ awite yaghqaa uq _ , _ enkaam _ tuune yaghqaa uq _ yug nun _ piite ste i yaghqagh nun _ f r u it - ng aneng _ ataneghpag u llegh m _ . _ "
" _ kina _ alngunak _ taaggun _ uyghag kun _ iqu kuni _ , _ pelime yaghqaa uq _ . _ kina _ alngunak _ taa m _ uyghag m _ ifkagh vike gkunigu _ si f t aagh qell eq aa _ . _ "
Ch i e f _ p r i es t- et lu _ P h a ris e es - et lu _ nagate luki _ Jesus-em _ ungipaghagh ta i _ liigikekagh t _ Jesus - em nguq _ ellngit _ akuzite kaqe ai _ .
enkaam _ tugu yu kaqsagh kangat _ , _ iwernga _ alingekagh t _ yug lghute ghllag neng _ qayughllak _ ugpeqe kangat _ Jesus _ uuknaliqe i ste u ni luku _ .
taagken _ Jesus-em _ apeghtugh laataghkagh i _ taakut _ yug t _ ungipaghaate tgun _ . _ pi ke aq _ ,
" _ ataneghpag u llegh a _ qilag m _ whatete uq _ , _ umiileg m _ ighnegh ni _ nengughte naqe lghii _ yataaghqe tke a _ neqenghaghqe te na luku _ .
Q ep ghagh t en i _ kayagtekagh i _ ungip aa sagh t ii s qell uki _ tagsiqligh iqe aat _ nengughte te m _ neqenghaghqe llegh anun _ tag il agh aa tes qell uki _ , _ iwernga _ tag iy un ghi t k at _ .
taagken _ umiileg m _ pi ke ai _ ila i _ qep ghagh t en i _ , _ ' _ ungipaate yaghtugh teki _ tagsiqligh iqe anka _ neqenghaghqe lleg mnun _ , _ negh yaghq an Ê¼ nguq _ apeghiigh ut _ . _ T uq ut iigh te sim aan ka _ yugtaanegh neng _ teghig ke sagh neng _ , _ qu w in t alghii neng llu _ n ugh aghn eng _ . _ enkaam _ sa u a _ qamagte luni _ apeghiigh uq _ . _ T ag il in Ê¼ nguq _ nengughte te m _ neqenghaghqe llegh anun _ ! _ '
iwernga _ aqelqaghqagh t _ tagsiqligh iqe ait _ w aa ku mang il nguut _ . _ yeghlegi _ navek _ sa yaghtugh tke aat _ , _ ataasigh _ piitesighaghvig minun _ pi ke aq _ , _ ila a _ estugagh minun _ ,
umiileg m _ qep ghagh teng i _ ila ita _ akuqagh luki _ sakusiiqe luki _ tuqu qugh qu ait _ .
umiileg _ sakrite ghllagkagh _ enkaam _ pi ll u w agh t en i _ kayagtekagh i _ . _ tuqu qugh qu ait _ yugtaghkagh t _ , _ kum agh te kaa t lu _ nenge aat _ .
taagken _ qep ghagh t en i _ pi ke ai _ , _ ' _ nengughte naqe m _ neqenghaghqe sighqagh i _ apeghiigh ut _ . _ aqelqagh ngllagh kaqsagh kenka _ seghletun _ pi kau te meggneng _ tagipagningite ut _ .
En kaa ng am _ aane lusi _ tume nun _ nallagh kasi _ qamagte luki _ yug t _ neqenghaghqesaghtigh sqe teki _ . _ '
Q ep ghagh tet _ aane luteng _ tume ni _ qamagte luki _ nallaqagh teng _ seghleghu yagh nga a ta _ , _ pinigh yagh nga a ta _ negh yaghtigh sqekagh it _ , _ enkaam _ nengughte te vig _ esleqeaghaghtekagh _ .
" _ umiileg m _ es ghagh yagh tugh yaq min ik i _ aqelqagh t _ , _ esgha qaa _ yuug _ aate ma ite ngughk _ nengughte naqe lghii m _ aatkagh aneng _ .
enkaam _ aaptekagh a _ , _ ' _ ilakumtaagh mni _ , _ naten _ itegh ziin _ nengughte naqe lghii m _ aatkagh aneng _ aate gpenang _ ? _ ' _ yug m _ kiimsighpag nigh nge i tke a _ .
taagken _ umiileg m _ qep ghagh tet _ pi ke ai _ , _ ' _ iigge i llu _ , _ itegagh i llu _ asighte luki _ qagavek _ mamleg mun _ miluute ggu _ , _ tawani _ yug t _ qiya lleqe ut _ ggute teng llu _ terqitaagtagh lleqe ait _ . _ ' _ "
Jesus-em _ taaqe nigh ke ai _ akuzillegh ni _ whaten _ , _ " _ uglagh pestaagh _ tagsiqligh kau ghngaan _ , _ iwernga _ palaghhagh u ut _ nakmikegkagh t _ . _ "
taagken _ P h a ris e es - et _ unite luku _ Jesus _ agghi tke aat _ naten _ an ag n iil q av ig igh nal uku _ Jesus _ akuzillegh akun _ .
enkaam _ kayagtekagh it _ ila i _ malig s aagh te t eng _ , _ ila i llu _ H er o d i an - et _ Jesus - mun _ . _ whaten _ pi ke aat _ , _ " _ apeghtugh i sta _ , _ liisimake amken _ akuzi aqe uten _ ipa u luku _ . _ apeghtuusagh n llu _ naten _ kiyaghnegh m _ kiyaghte sqe sug llegh a _ ipa u uq _ . _ aangwaagh u yagh nga a ta _ , _ uk av an sagh ngaat a _ paninang _ apeghtugh aqe aten _ taw at egh pig aq _ .
enkaam _ ungipaate aghte kut _ naten _ sumeghtaghagh llegh gpeneng _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ liilightuusagh ani _ elqughutngagh a _ llivike i lleghqagh ut _ t a x - e meng _ C a es ar - mun _ ? _ L l iv ik il taa - a _ nalighmeng _ pi nghite lta _ ? _ "
Jesus-em _ liisimakekagh i _ seghletun _ piyug u kangat _ , _ enkaam _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ piniiyugnegh ni _ elpek si _ ! _ sangama _ an ag n iil q av ig igh naq utk es teng nga _ ?
keleg u vike tengnga _ mani meng _ t a x - mun _ llivike i sighqagh meng _ . _ " _ enkaam _ tagi tke aat _ mani meng _ .
taagken _ aaptekagh i _ , _ " _ kitum _ gginagh ke agu _ una _ ? _ kitum _ ategh kagu _ una _ ? _ "
kiimsigh iqe aat _ , _ " _ C a es ar -em _ . _ " _ En kaa ng am _ Jesus-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ tuune teki _ C a es ar - mun _ tamaakut _ C a es ar -em _ pi i _ , _ tuune teki _ kiyaghnegh mun _ tamaakut _ kiyaghnegh m _ pi i _ . _ "
nagate yamegteggu _ saghiigha yuke aat _ taagken _ unite luku _ aghulaqekagh t _ .
tawani _ aghneghmi _ S a d d u c e es - et _ aapte yaghtugh qu aat _ Jesus _ . _ Tam aa ku nguut _ ugpeqe i igate ngugh t _ tuqukagh t _ unguv agh tek ayug ut angi _ .
pi ke aat _ , _ " _ apeghtugh i sta _ , _ M o s es -em _ liilightuusagh i _ pi kau ut _ , _ ' _ yuug _ nulightugh luni _ tuqu kan _ avaquti gpenani _ , _ ang leg ut ang an _ tugu yaghqaqe a _ ugi igh aq _ avaquti tete na luku _ anglegute ni _ tuqukagh _ . _ '
M aan sagh tut _ maaghraghvinleg _ yug t _ anglegute ke te lghiit _ . _ nuyekligh _ nulightugh luni _ avaquti gpenani _ tuqu kau uq _ . _ enkaam _ nulighh a _ ang leg ut ang an _ tugukagh a _ .
tuungligh ghhagh a llu _ ang leg ut anga _ tuqu uq _ avaquti gpenani _ . _ enkaam _ pi nga yu an _ ang leg ut ang an _ tugu a _ taana _ aghnagh _ . _ qamagte luteng _ tugu aqe luku _ tuqu laghate te ut _ avaquti gpenateng _ .
kinguligh u luni _ aghnagh _ tuqu kau uq _ .
ungipaate aghte kut _ , _ unguvagh uute llegh m _ aghnegh ani _ kitum _ aghnagh _ n ul igh qell eq ag u _ , _ qamagte luteng qun _ tugu kaqe kangat _ ? _ "
Jesus-em _ kiimsigh iqe ai _ , _ " _ anaggute nga usi _ qayughllak _ liigike igate asi _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ , _ talwa _ agh tugh yaghq aanghi llgh a _ kiyaghnegh m _ .
tuqukagh t _ unguvagh uute kumeng _ nengughte te yaghqaa nghite ut _ , _ yaquleg stun _ q ilag m el ngugh es tun _ .
A t igh t iig as teg gu u _ kiyaghnegh m _ apegh llegh a _ elpesi nun _ tuqukagh t _ unguvagh uute lleghqagh itneng _ ? _ whaten _ pi kau uq _ ,
' _ kiyaghnegh ke aanga _ A b r a h am -em _ , _ kiyaghnegh ke aanga _ I s aa c -em _ , _ kiyaghnegh ke aanga llu _ J a c o b -em _ . _ ' _ kiyaghnegh _ kiyaghnegh ke aat _ unguva lghiit _ , _ nakaan _ tuqukagh t _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ apeghtugh i llegh a _ yug lghute ghllag t _ nagate luku _ , _ saghiigha yagute ghllagkagh at _ .
P h a ris e es - et _ nagaqugh yamegteki _ S a d d u c e es - et _ Jesus - mun _ n ep iigh q w aan il uki _ qerngughte tke aat _ .
ataasigh m _ P h a ris e es -em _ apeghtughiste an _ liilightuusagh t _ aapte qugh aa qaa _ Jesus _ an ag n iil q av ig igh nal uku _ .
whaten _ aaptekagh a _ , _ " _ apeghtugh i sta _ , _ n a tu ng aa wa _ angegh lleghpigagh _ liilightuusagh ni _ ? _ "
Jesus-em _ kiimsigh iqe a _ , _ " _ ' _ atanegh _ kiyaghnegh n _ piniqe yaghqaqe an _ qamagte luku _ ilu gpegun _ , _ qamagte luku _ unguva sigh gpegun _ , _ qamagte luku _ umyugagh gpegun _ . _ '
taana _ angegh lleghpigagh u uq llu _ , _ megnu nagh lleghpigagh u uq llu _ liilightuusagh _ .
tuungligh ghhagh a _ angegh lleghpigagh _ liilightuusagh _ sivuligh tun _ ayuqe uq _ : _ ' _ piniqe yaghqaqe aten _ yug lgute ten _ piniqe llegh gpetun _ el pen eng _ katam _ . _ '
taake uk _ liilightuusagh k _ tunemagh u uk _ tam aghh it nun _ liilightuusagh nun llu _ , _ apeghtuusagh itnun llu _ u uk nal iq is tet _ . _ "
taagken _ Jesus-em _ aaptekagh i _ P h a ris e es - et _ qerngughte te nga ma luki _ ,
" _ naten _ sumeghtaghagh te kaqe steggu _ Christ- a _ ? _ kitum _ ighnegh ke agu _ ? _ " _ kiimsigh iqe aat _ , _ " _ ighnegh ke a _ D av i d -em _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ aaptekagh i _ , _ " _ S ang an Ê¼ ng am _ D av i d -em _ akuzi aqngami _ A g legh n alghii g ne kun _ T aghnegh ag ne kun _ atigh agu _ , _ ' _ atanegh meng _ ' _ ? _ whaten _ pi kau lghii _ ,
' _ Atan ghem _ pi a _ atanegh ka _ , _ aqume i _ aghenqignegh mkun _ , _ kenlanga _ anguyag ten _ itegagh gpek _ asi anun _ lli aghte lleg mnun _ . _ '
D av i d -em _ atigh ma kagu _ , _ ' _ atanegh meng _ ' _ naten _ ighnegh ke agu _ ? _ "
naligh ghhagh inagh ita _ P h a ris e es - et _ kiimsighpag nigh nge i tke aat _ Jesus _ . _ taagken _ kenle ke luku _ kitum _ alngunak _ tetug yagutekagh at _ aapte nghmeng _ .
taagken _ Jesus-em _ pi ke ai _ yug lghute t llu _ , _ malig s aagh t en illu _ ,
" _ apeghtugh i kayug t llu _ liilightuusagh neng _ , _ P h a ris e es - et lu _ aqumga ut _ M o s es -em _ aqumutagh akun _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ qaatke aqe teki _ qamagte luki _ apeghtuusagh it _ elpesi nun _ , _ iwernga _ ellngit a _ s all ghi t _ maligte gpenaki _ . _ sa sqe aqe aisi _ naqam _ ellngit a _ pi igate ait _ .
apeghtugh i llegh it _ liilightuusagh neng _ piyaqnagh pigte ut _ yug nun _ qaatkesaghqagh u luteng _ . _ apeghtuusagh it _ uqigtuqagh stun _ akmag stun _ ayuqe ut _ akmag ste aqe kangit _ yug nun _ , _ naqamllu _ talwa _ ataasigh ghhagh _ ighneghwaagh eng _ atuqe igate aat _ kayusiite na luki _ akmagite neng _ .
" _ qamagte luki _ pinitun _ pilleg teng _ pi aqe ait _ es ghagh saq nal uki _ yug nun _ . _ talligh megteggun llu _ qagugh megteggun llu _ qillghutagh ke ait _ p at egh t aagh all uki _ s al ng aw aagh h aat _ akuzite neng _ igaqegkagh neng _ imaleg t _ , _ qaasligh meng llu _ qughalkutagh it _ taake luki _ ulima aqe ait _ .
N eq en gh aghq em mi _ , _ aqume yuneghtu ut _ aa ng waagh ugh tek at _ aqumutagh itgun _ , _ s y nag o gu e- n illu _ taw ate l ngugh teg gun _ aqume yuneghtu ut _ .
Q u ul v agh tes ug aq ut _ akilpegaghvig ni _ , _ atigh sqe sug aqe ut llu _ , _ ' _ apeghtughiste meng _ ' _ .
iwernga _ elpek si _ atigh ste gpenasi _ , _ ' _ apeghtughiste meng _ ' _ qayughllak _ ataasigh u uq _ apeghtughiste i _ , _ anglegute ke te lghii stun _ ayuqe usi _ .
kina _ alngunak _ atigh gpenaan _ , _ ' _ ata meng _ ' _ nuna mi _ whani _ , _ qayughllak _ ataasigh u uq _ ata i _ qilag mete ngughk _ .
talwa _ kitumun _ alngunak _ atigh ste gpenasi _ , _ ' _ I g legh ut is te meng _ ' _ qayughllak _ ataasigh u uq _ iglegh ut is te z i _ , _ Christ- ang u uq _ .
taana _ angegh lleghpigagh _ qep ghagh tek aghq aq agh si _ .
kina _ alngunak _ ellmi neng _ angli stekuni _ qusevegtesaghqagh u uq _ , _ enkaam _ kina _ alngunak _ ellmi neng _ qusevegtekuni _ angli ste lleg nge yaghqaa uq _ .
" _ iwernga _ seghlegh waagh un aq ngu usi _ elpek si _ apeghtugh i kayug ni _ liilightuusagh neng _ , _ P h a ris e es -en illu _ ! _ piniiyugnegh u usi _ ! _ umeg te aqe asi _ itegh naqe lghiit _ ataneghpag u llegh anun _ qilag m _ . _ elpek si _ katam _ itegh igate usi _ , _ aghula i ughtagh kasi llu _ itegh yug lghiit _ !
" _ S egh legh waagh un aq ngu usi _ elpek si _ apeghtugh i kayug ni _ liilightuusagh neng _ , _ P h a ris e es -en illu _ ! _ piniiyugnegh u usi _ ! _ esghaghlaataqu luki _ ugingighagh t _ mangteghiigh aqe asi _ . _ taagken _ pinigh ni lusi _ pi s qell usi _ taake luku _ yughagh aqe usi _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ aghyuugh lleg nge ghllag yaghqaa usi _ !
" _ S egh legh waagh un aq ngu usi _ elpek si _ apeghtugh i kayug ni _ liilightuusagh neng _ , _ P h a ris e es -en illu _ ! _ piniiyugnegh u usi _ ! _ iglegha aqe usi _ kellii kun llu _ , _ qute kun llu _ ivagh na luku _ ataasigh _ yuug _ ug pegh h n nal uku _ elpesi stun _ . _ taagken _ apeghtuusagh si _ ugpeqe gkaki _ apeghtuusagh gpesi _ ag lagh tes aghq aagh lleq aa _ hell- mun _ , _ enkaam _ elpek si _ aghyuugh llegh gpesineng _ mal gh ugh q eng ng aan _ aghyuugh lleg nge yaghqaa uq _ !
" _ S egh legh waagh un aq ngu usi _ elpek si _ , _ ayaakagh ni _ iglegh ut is t en i _ ! _ apeghtugh i aqe usi _ whaten _ , _ ' _ kina _ whaten _ pikumi _ , _ " _ akeqe i unga _ temple- kun _ " _ taana _ pi t ngun ghi tuq _ . _ iwernga _ kina _ whaten _ pikumi _ , _ " _ akeqe i unga _ g o l d - ng akun _ T em p l e -em _ " _ pi yaghqagh pestaagh ke a _ akequsagh ni _ ' _ .
elpek si _ ayaakagh ni _ tem ng it wh as t en i _ ! _ N al i ke k _ megnu nagh aghagh ak _ , _ g o l d - a _ , _ nalighmeng _ temple- a _ agleghnagh ste i lghii _ g o l d - meng _ ?
apeghtugh i aqe usi llu _ whaten _ , _ ' _ kina _ whaten _ pikumi _ , _ " _ akeqe i unga _ aghq ef ig eg ne kun _ " _ , _ taana _ pi t ngun ghi tuq _ . _ iwernga _ kina _ whaten _ pikumi _ , _ " _ akeqe i unga _ tunusagh kun _ aghqefig gnite ngugh qun _ , _ " _ pi yaghqagh pestaagh ke a _ akequsagh ni _ . _ '
A y aa ng aghh aal ek _ elpek si _ ! _ N al i ke k _ megnu nagh aghagh ak _ , _ tunusagh _ nalighmeng _ aghqefig k _ agleghnagh ste i lghiik _ tunute yameng _ ?
En kaa ng am _ kina _ akeqe i kuni _ aghq ef ig eg ne kun _ , _ akeqe i u uq _ taaggun llu _ sa kun llu _ tea- ma ghhagh akun _ aghqefig gnite ngugh qun _ .
kina llu _ akeqe i kuni _ temple- kun _ , _ akeqe i u uq _ taaggun llu _ kiyaghte lghii kun llu _ tawani _ .
kina llu _ akeqe i kuni _ qilag kun _ , _ akeqe i u uq _ kiyaghnegh m _ aqumutagh gkenkun llu _ aqumga lghii kun llu _ tawani _ .
" _ S egh legh waagh un aq ngu usi _ elpek si _ apeghtugh i kayug ni _ liilightuusagh neng _ , _ P h a ris e es -en illu _ ! _ piniiyugnegh u usi _ ! _ kiyaghnegh mun _ tuune aqe asi _ qu lagh qell gh i _ neqe mun _ neqnighsaate t _ , _ min t- et _ , _ d ill - et _ , _ c um min - et _ . _ iwernga _ avelghagh aqe asi _ apeghtuusagh t _ megnu nagh aghagh lghiit _ L iiligh tuus an il nguut _ katam _ : _ tanem ii llghite llegh _ , _ nangllegtagh llegh _ , _ ataasiighmete llegh _ . _ taakut _ atughqagh ke yagh asi _ avelghagh fqiita _ ila i llu _ liilightuusagh t _ .
ayaakagh ni _ iglegh ut is t en i _ ! _ yug tun _ ayuqe usi _ nguuyngaaghagh _ meghyaghqagh mineng _ iqite luku _ taagken _ c am el - a _ tuufte lleqe a _ !
" _ S egh legh waagh un aq ngu usi _ elpek si _ apeghtugh i kayug ni _ liilightuusagh neng _ , _ P h a ris e es -en illu _ ! _ piniiyugnegh u usi _ ! _ qayuusigh si llu _ sagnegh si llu _ qaye i _ sangigte aqe asi _ , _ naqam _ imigh nga ut _ wayagh niighkagh gpesineng llu _ , _ pakigniigh llegh gpesineng llu _ .
ayaa nga lghii _ P h a ris e e _ ! _ sivuke lukek _ sangigte kek _ ilu ik _ qayuusigh m llu _ sagnegh m llu _ enkaam _ qaaske te lutek llu _ ukmangite te lik _ !
" _ S egh legh waagh un aq ngu usi _ apeghtugh i kayug ni _ liilightuusagh neng _ , _ P h a ris e es -en illu _ ! _ piniiyugnegh u usi _ ! _ tuqukagh t _ s al ng ag is tun _ ayuqe usi _ piineqekagh t _ qatelghii meng _ . _ esghaqagh u luteng _ qaye i _ pinighhalek _ , _ iwernga _ qama _ imaqe ut _ neghqughrug meng llu _ aghu llegh meng llu _ .
elpek si llu _ tawatete usi _ . _ qaye gpesineng _ pi nighte yug ni ghllaget _ , _ iwernga _ ilu gpesini _ piniiyugnegh u usi _ , _ apeghtugh te gkasi _ liilightuusagh t _ atuqe igate asi _ . _ "
" _ S egh legh waagh un aq ngu usi _ elpek si _ apeghtugh i kayug ni _ liilightuusagh neng _ , _ P h a ris e es -en illu _ ! _ piniiyugnegh u usi _ ! _ mangteghasqwaagh ngllagh aqe asi _ llivegh itgun _ u uk nal iq is tet _ , _ pinighnaghsagh aqe asi llu _ llivegh it _ tamaakut _ kiyaghtekagh t _ elqughute luteng _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
taagken _ whaten llu _ pi aqe usi _ , _ ' _ neghigh luku _ kiyaghtekaayagh kumta _ sivunegh mnni _ , _ tuqu qu l gu sigh n ay an ghi t ng waagh ap ut _ u uk nal iq is t en eng _ ' _ .
tawaten _ akuzillegh gpesigun _ liigike ste usi _ , _ k ing un q en n il usi _ tuqu qugh teng it nun _ u uk nal iq is tet _ .
enkaam _ sa aqe tsi _ sivunegh gpesi _ piinlegh iqe aat _ apeghiigh teggu _ .
nemeghyagh ni _ elpek si _ , _ avaqutagh itni _ nemeghyagh t _ ! _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigtegkangisi _ aghyuugh yaghqaa ni lusi _ , _ naten _ anag naqe steggu _ aghyuugh lleghqagh i _ hell- mi _ ?
enkaam _ ungipaate amsi _ kayagte vike amsi _ u uk nal iq is t en eng llu _ , _ liisima lghii neng llu _ , _ apeghtughiste neng llu _ . _ ila it _ tuqu qugh lleqe asi _ , _ ila it _ qaquuragh lleqe asi _ , _ enkaam _ ila it _ s y nag o gu e- eg pesi ni _ kagsagmig lleqe asi _ , _ ila it _ t o w n -en eng _ ila itnun _ malighqugh lleqe asi _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ elpek si _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghyuugh yaghqaqe aisi _ tuqu qu llegh itnun _ qamagte luki _ kiyaghtekagh t _ elqughute luteng _ kiyaghnegh mun _ nuna mi _ whani _ , _ A b el - meng _ Z e c h ar i a h - mun _ , _ ighnegh a _ B ar a c h i a h - m _ . _ tuqutekagh i _ akule gkeni _ T em p l e- em llu _ aghqefig m llu _ .
ipa _ ungipaate amsi _ , _ elpek si _ unguva lghii ni _ maaten _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghyuugh yaghqaqe aisi _ tam aa ku nun _ seghletun _ pi llegh nun _ !
" _ kaay _ , _ Jerusalem _ , _ Jerusalem _ ! _ tuqu qu qagh katen _ u uk nal iq is tet _ , _ milugh agaatagh luki llu _ tuqu qugh katen _ kayagtekagh nka _ elpenun _ . _ uglagh u pigte luku _ qerngughte yug aqe yagh anka _ yug ten _ whanga mnun _ , _ katam _ qawaag m _ qerngughte llegh atun _ amaaghagh ghhagh ni _ yaqugh gmi _ asi anun _ , _ iwernga _ tawaten _ pi s tes ug um ang it agh pe nga _ .
En kaa ng am _ mangteghagh n _ paaghqite te lleqe a _ .
ungipaate amsi _ , _ whaken _ kenle ke luku _ esgh aghn aanghi tagh pesi nga _ alla _ kenlanga _ whaten _ pi llegh gpesinun _ , _ ' _ kiyaghnegh m _ quya ste ligu _ tagi lghii _ ategh akun _ Atan ghem _ . _ ' _ "
Jesus _ aane luni _ temple- meng _ aghulaqe ma luku _ malig s aagh teng it a _ taku luku _ keleg tke ait _ mangteghagh t _ T em p l e -em _ pi i _ .
pi ke ai _ , _ " _ esghagh asi _ tamaakut _ mangteghagh t _ . _ ipa _ pi amsi _ , _ talwa _ ataasigh _ uyghag _ n em in in n aanghi tuq _ . _ qamagte luteng _ ullegh qugh yaghqaa ut _ . _ "
Jesus _ aqume yan _ M o un t _ O l iv es - kun _ , _ malig s aagh teng it a _ taku luku _ ellng in aghh aam aagh luteng _ aaptekagh at _ , _ " _ ungipaate kut _ , _ qakun _ tamaakut _ pi yaghqau aat _ ? _ sa u lleqe a _ liisimake sighqagh ut _ tagi lleghqagh gpenun _ , _ nuna m llu _ iqugte lleghqagh anun _ ? _ "
Jesus-em _ kiimsigh iqe ai _ , _ " _ kelenga lusi _ , _ kitumun _ alngunak _ puughte ste gpenasi _ .
qayughllak _ uglagh u pigte lghii _ tagi yaghqaa uq _ atuqe luku _ ategh ka _ , _ whaten _ pi aqe luteng _ , _ ' _ whanga _ Christ- ang uu nga _ ' _ , _ puughte qughtagh u yaghqaqe aat llu _ yug lghute _ .
nagaqugh u lleqe usi _ pi ll u w aneng _ , _ akusqaghtagh u tke llegh itneng llu _ pi ll u w at _ ; _ alinge gpenasi _ qayughllak _ tamaa na _ pi yaghqaa uq _ . _ iwernga _ salin _ iqugte naqngu nghite uq _ .
