Taw an ing in aq _ makete luni _ piyuke aq _ . _ ( _ aghnaghaghhagh _ qula _ maalghug _ siipngaan _ uksughtutka uq _ . _ ) _ angayuqagh kek llu _ malig s aagh te t lu _ elngaatall _ saghiigha yuke aat _ !
taagken _ Jesus-em _ i negh teng ng w aaq ii _ kitumun _ alngunak _ ungipagh ke fqaan _ pi sqellug qu _ , _ pi ke ai llu _ , _ " _ neghyaghqagh ghhagh meng _ tuune teggu _ . _ "
taagken _ Jesus _ aghulaqekagh _ C ap er n a um - e meng _ , _ aglaghkagh _ ne minun _ nazareth- mun _ , _ malig s aagh teng it allu _ maligtekagh at _ .
S a b b at h - ngugh s ag u _ s y nag o gu e- mi _ apeghtugh ikagh _ . _ yug lghute t _ nagate luku _ saghiigha yagutekagh at _ . _ A ap qugh aagh utk at _ ell meg g neng _ , _ " _ naken _ liite aki _ ? _ kitum _ pegh q in gh ugh tes tag u _ ? _ saghiigha yug na ghllagu ut _ all aagh ll u wh agh t i llgh i _ !
naten _ tawaten _ pi a _ ? _ kaapenta u nghite a _ , _ M ar y - m _ ighnegh a _ ? _ J am es -en kut _ , _ J o s es -en kut _ , _ J u d as -en kut _ , _ S im o n -en kut _ ang leg utk en ghi t ak ii _ ? _ nayag i llu lli _ maa nte aat _ ? _ " _ enkaam _ tugukligh ma ite kangat _ .
Jesus-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ kitum _ alngunak _ uuknaliqe i sta _ sii vag kaqe a _ , _ iwerngaqun _ nuna lgu ta ita llu _ nalleqligh ita llu _ neng ll ug ut ang it allu _ pi igate aat _ . _ "
enkaam _ tamaani _ all aagh ll u wh agh t ip ag n ing it k aq _ , _ iwerngaqun _ qafsinkuuragh ghhaat _ saafte luki _ naagh llegh u tke ai _ .
enkaam _ Jesus _ saghiigha yug ghllagkagh _ , _ qayughllak _ ugpeqe nghite kangat _ . _ taagken _ Jesus _ N a z ar et h -em _ u v it ang an il ngugh nun _ ne nun _ pi aqe luni _ apeghtugh qu ai _ yug t _ .
tagsigh luki _ qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ke luku _ malig s aagh t en i _ , _ kayagte naqe nikagh i _ malghukaghte ai ta _ ungip aq is qell uk illu _ naa llgh uq ii s qell uk illu _ . _ aghulaqe vagilgata _ agh tugh yaghq aanghi ll el i qu q ii _ yug neng _ aan es q ii s qell uki _ tughneghagh t _ .
liilightugh qu ai llu _ , _ " _ iglegha llegh gpesini _ sa meng _ alngunak _ kelqe gpenasi _ iwerngaqun _ ayaviigh meng _ . _ neqekrangllagh ngunasi _ , _ aqeftaghaagh ngunasi _ , _ mani ngunasi _ pi lghaasi _ .
iwernga _ kameg lusi _ , _ simiite kaghqagh meng _ g g aat meng _ kelqe gpenasi _ . _ "
whaten llu _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ nani _ alngunak _ tukugh gpesi _ u p ugh as k ang i si _ taw an llegh h aa si _ kenlanga _ aghulaqe llegh gpesinun _ .
ne nun _ kaate kufsi _ upugha te i igate ngugh nun _ , _ nalighmeng _ nagate yug igate ngugh nun _ , _ unite nakesi _ taana _ nuna _ itegagh si _ pagulangigh magh ita _ . _ tawaten _ pi kufsi _ kelenga sagh ughte lleqe asi _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghyuugh lleghqagh aneng _ ! _ "
enkaam _ malig s aagh tet _ aghulaqe luteng _ ungipagh ke ikagh t _ yug nun _ av utegh qell uki _ seghlegh q en nan ii s qell uki _ .
tughneghagh lghute t _ aag negh squgh ke ait _ yug neng _ , _ mesiighqe aqe luki llu _ qinu yu lghute t _ naallghute qugh qu ait _ .
umiileg m _ H er o d -em _ nagaqugh qu a _ qamagte luku _ Jesus-em _ tawaten _ pi llgh a _ , _ qayughllak _ tea- ma ghhagh ani _ apegh kangit _ Jesus-em _ all aagh ll u wh agh t i llgh i _ . _ ila i _ yug t _ pikagh t _ , _ " _ J o h n - ngu uq _ paaptaaye sta _ , _ unguvagh ma uq _ enkaam _ esgha _ agh tugh yaghq aanghi ll el ek _ all aagh ll u wh agh t i llegh mun _ . _ "
iwernga _ ila it _ yug t _ pikagh t _ , _ " _ El i j a h - ngu uq _ . _ " _ ila it _ pikagh t _ , _ " _ uuknaliqe i ste u uq _ , _ neghigh luku _ u uk nal iq is tes tun _ ayuqe uq _ . _ "
H er o d -em _ nagaqugh luku _ pi ke aq _ , _ " _ J o h n - ngu uq _ paaptaaye sta _ , _ naa s q w igh tes tek aqa _ iwernga _ unguvagh ma uq _ ! _ "
qavnganghhaq _ H er o d -em _ kayagte te kaqe kanga _ John _ tugu luku _ , _ asighqe ste luku _ anusimingllagh stekagh a _ . _ tawaten _ pi stekagh a _ , _ qayughllak _ J o h n -em _ pi iigh aa ta qaa _ herod _ whaten _ , _ " _ liilightuusagh mnni _ anaggute ma uten _ tugu llegh gpegun _ anglegute gpek _ P h il ip -em _ nulighh a _ H er o d i a s _ . _ "
enkaam _ H er o d i as -em _ ugumi yagute ghllag kaqe kanga _ John _ repall _ tuqute sug pigtekaqsagh kanga _ . _ iwernga _ pipag nigh nge i tke a _ qayughllak _ H er o d -em _ tawaten _ pi stepag nigh nge i tke a _ .
H er o d -em _ alike kaqe kanga _ John _ liisimake te mineng _ yuug _ pinigh lghii _ , _ kiyaghnegh mun _ qaatke te nga ghllag lghii _ . _ enkaam _ k el eng ak es teng ng w aaq aa _ sa na yu katgu _ . _ H er o d -em _ nagate yug aqe kanga _ John _ qaywa _ seghleghyug aqe ghngaaghmi _ nagate nghminigu _ .
taagken _ H er o d i a s _ qenwat llu _ pi lleghqagh ngekagh _ . _ H er o d -em _ allgeghvig ni _ aghneq _ kaate yan _ neqenghaghqe ste i ma lghii _ k av em em _ um iil w aa ghi t nun _ , _ pi ll u w agh tet _ um iil w aa ghi t nun _ , _ iglegh ut is teng it nun llu _ galilee-kagh mii t _ .
taagken _ panig a _ H er o d i as -em _ itegh luni _ neghe uute lghii nun _ tu k al eg aq aq _ . _ H er o d -en kut _ aqelqagh ke te lghiit _ elngaatall _ efqugh kekagh at _ . _ enkaam _ umiileg m _ pi ke aa _ aghnagh aq _ , _ " _ sa meng _ alngunak _ tungsigh vike gkuvnga _ tuune lleqe amken _ . _ "
akeqekagh a llu _ whaten _ , _ " _ ipapestaaq _ tuune lleqe amken _ sa meng _ alngunak _ tungsigh kuvek _ , _ talwa _ umiileg u te i ma llegh ma _ aklungi an _ aveg llegh a _ ! _ "
taagken _ aghnagh aq _ aane luni _ naa ni _ aapte yaghtuqagh a _ , _ " _ sa meng _ tungsigh naqe zinga _ ? _ " _ naa an _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ J o h n -em _ P aap taa y es te m _ naa s q wa _ tungsigh ghhu _ . _ "
aghnagh aq _ ag l iigh w agh lluni _ umiileg mun _ tungsigh vikekagh a _ , _ " _ whaa _ maaten _ , _ J o h n -em _ P aap taa y es te m _ naa s q wa _ piyug aqa _ qayuutaghraag kun _ lli luku _ ! _ "
umiileg _ elngaatall _ qivghu ghllagkagh _ iwernga _ sa luku _ ighleke ligu _ , _ qayughllak _ akeqe u aqe aqe kanga _ aqelqagh lghute ni _ nag a tes tek luki _ .
enkaam _ taw an ing in aq _ umiileg m _ kayagtekagh a _ kelengake i sta _ tagite sqe ste luku _ J o h n -em _ naa s q wa _ . _ kelengake i sta _ aane luni _ anusimingllaghvig mun _ aglaghkagh _ J o h n -em _ naa s q wa _ kepe na luku _ .
naasqugh _ qayuutaghraag kun _ lli luku _ aglagh te luku _ aghnaghagh mun _ tuunekagh a _ . _ enkaam _ aghnaghagh m _ naa minun _ tuunekagh a _ .
J o h n -em _ malig s aagh teng it a _ nagaqugh luku _ , _ yugusigh a _ aqfa luku _ llivegh ke aat _ .
A p o s t l e- et _ uteghnigh uute luteng _ Jesus - mun _ apeghkagh it _ apeghtugh i lleg teng _ , _ naallghute qugh llegh eng _ , _ tughneghagh neng llu _ aane ste qugh llegh eng _ yug neng _ .
yug ghllag u lghii _ tagi magh meng llu _ aghulaqe magh meng llu _ pi lghiit _ repall _ Jesus -en kut _ maligte yaaghtekete te lghiit _ neghepagningite tke aat _ . _ enkaam _ malig s aagh t en i _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ natmun _ aghulaqe lta _ paaghqagh igh llegh anun _ , _ elpek si qun _ megh n aal iigh tes qell usi _ . _ "
enkaam _ angyagh kun _ paaghqagh igh llegh anun _ aghulaqekagh t _ ellng in aghh aagh h nal uteng _ ,
iwernga _ yug lghute m _ esghaghkagh it _ aghulaqe lghiit _ . _ liisimake luki _ navek _ pi naqe ta it _ , _ ketanqusnaq _ naayvagh m _ esne akun _ maligtekagh it _ . _ ne nun _ nallangigh te nghata _ legan _ yug t _ maligte aqe kangit _ . _ kaate tke aat _ takukagh meggnun _ ingyaghaghte luki _ Jesus -en kut _ .
Jesus-em _ angyagh meng _ uugte luni _ qute mun _ yug lghute t _ esghagh luki _ nanglleg yagutekagh i _ , _ qayughllak _ penniigh stun _ pen n iigh n iigh teng il ngugh es tun _ ayuqe lghiit _ . _ enkaam _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh meng _ apeghtughtagh ukagh i _ .
Wh an i ku pig s ag u _ malig s aagh teng it a _ taku luku _ Jesus _ pi ke aat _ , _ " _ maana _ paaghqite uq _ , _ wh an i ku gh llag aa llu _ . _ yug t _ aglagh uute sqe ki _ pii te si ghagh t en un llu _ , _ nengiighhagh nun llu _ . _ E ll meg g neng _ neqenge yaghtugh lit _ neq h yaghq ameng _ . _ "
iwernga _ Jesus-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ elpek si _ negh yaghq al i tek i _ . _ " _ aaptekagh at _ , _ " _ T uk f i ghi yagh tugh tes ug si ku ut _ 2 0 0 _ d en ar ii - m _ aki aneng _ neqekrangllagh meng _ negh es qell uki _ ? _ "
Jesus-em _ aaptekagh i _ , _ " _ naten _ ug l aghq ak aan _ neqekrangllagh lgu tsi _ ? _ enta _ ivagh i aghte tek _ . _ " _ naalkute yameng _ ungipagh tke aat _ , _ " _ taawa _ tallimat _ neqekrangllagh t _ , _ maalghug llu _ iqallug k _ . _ "
taagken _ Jesus-em _ malig s aagh te min un _ qafsinkaghte ai ta _ aqume ste sqekagh i _ vegaagh kun _ .
enkaam _ aqume te tke aat _ 1 0 0 - ng w aaq luteng _ 5 0 - ng w aaq luteng _ .
Jesus-em _ tugu luki _ tallimat _ neqekrangllagh t _ , _ maalghug llu _ iqallug k _ , _ qule mun _ sivugte luni _ iyamsiqa yug vikekagh a _ kiyaghnegh _ . _ taagken _ neqekrangllagh t _ iigge mineng _ aavgugh luki _ malig s aagh te min un _ tunqugh qu ai _ uy eg tes qell uki _ . _ iqallug k llu _ ii- gmineng _ aavgugh lukek _ tunqugh stekagh i _ .
Q am ag teng ng waagh luni _ negh te tke aq _ kepsugh te luni _ .
taagken _ malig s aagh tet _ tugulaghkagh it _ qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ke luku _ paskete t _ esleqnga lghiit _ kagimlegh ughtekagh neng _ neqekrangllagh neng _ , _ iqallug neng llu _ .
yug t _ negh te tke aat _ 5 , 0 0 0 - ngu f tut _ , _ kesutke gpenaki _ aghnagh t llu _ taghnughhagh t llu _ .
legan _ taaqe ut _ Jesus-em _ malig s aagh t en i _ qelqe ai _ angyagh kun _ iglegh tek es t ii s qell uki _ B et h s a i d a- mun _ , _ naayvagh m _ ing l ung an il ngugh mun _ . _ taagken _ ellnga n _ yug lghute t _ aglagh uute stekagh i _ ne itnun _ .
A g lagh tu u tes am ik i _ yughagh yaghtuqagh _ qemi mun _ .
U n ug mi _ taakwani _ angyagh t _ naayvagh mete luki _ Jesus _ ellng in aghh aa k aq _ qute mi _ .
esghaghkagh i _ mal igh s aagh t en i _ aygugh naqutke lghiit _ y aa v u qu meng _ , _ qayughllak _ anuqligh u uute kangi _ . _ akule gkeni _ t h r e e- k ell aag en kuk _ si x - ek ell aag en kuk _ unaangu luku _ , _ takukagh i _ megh m _ qaye akun _ piyug meng _ . _ naghughte naqe aqe ai llu
esghaghkagh at _ megh kun _ piyug lghii _ . _ sumegh meggni _ taghneghagh u ni luku _ aragh ghllagkagh t _ .
qamagte luteng _ alingruugh tke aat _ . _ Taw an ing in aq _ Jesus-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ ilutughte tek _ ! _ whanga u unga _ , _ alinge gpenasi _ . _ "
legan _ angyagh mun _ uugg tuq _ ell m aa r agll ug ugh tek aq _ . _ M al ig s aagh tet _ saghiigha yug ghllagkagh t _ ,
qayughllak _ paninang _ liigike igate kangat _ Jesus _ kina u ta a _ , _ qaywa _ esghapag ghngaaghmegteggu _ neqekrangllagh t _ nula stegkangi _ . _ tawatete kau lghiit _ qayughllak _ salin _ umyugagh it _ reghigh igate ngugh t _ .
taagken _ nagneqe aat _ naayvagh m _ inglu anun _ enkaam _ gennesaret- kun _ tamlag luteng _ angyagh eng _ petug qu aat _ .
legan _ angyagh eng _ unite aat _ yug t _ lii s uq ng in aam aan _ Jesus _ pi ke aat _ .
enkaam _ keleg qaghtagh te ragkiighkagh t _ Jesus _ kaate ma ni luku _ . _ Jesus _ navek _ pi yagh ghngaan _ q in u yuget _ aglagh te aqe kangit _ allighagh itgun _ ellnga nun _ .
Jesus _ kaate nghmini _ ne ghllag nun llu _ , _ ne nun llu _ , _ es l am el ngugh nun _ akilpegaghvig nun _ aglagh aqe lghii _ . _ enkaam _ yug t _ tagite aqe kangit _ q in u yuget _ akilpegaghvig nun _ Jesus - mun _ naa llgh u tes qell uki _ . _ Jesus - mun _ manigugh ututka ait _ qinu yu gnun _ waran _ saafte sqellug qu _ kenu i _ , _ enkaam _ qamagte luteng _ saafte i lghiit _ naagh llegh u tke aat _ .
P h a ris e es - et lu _ ila i llu _ apeghtugh i kayug t _ liilightuusagh neng _ J er us al em - e meng _ pi t _ , _ Jesus-em _ u v it ang anun _ qerngughte tke aat _ .
esghaghkagh it _ maligte yaaghte yan _ ila i _ uughtugh gpenateng _ neghe lghiit _ . _ uughtugh llghite ngugh t _ P h a ris e es - et _ pi s qell ghi s tun _ .
( _ P h a ris e es - et lu _ J e w s - et lu _ qamagte luteng _ negh yaghqaa nghite ngugh t _ wetku qun _ sivuke luteng _ uugh tugh waagh luteng _ , _ qayughllak _ sivugh nghmeng _ apeghtuusagh it _ atuqe u kangit _ .
talwa _ akilpegaghvig meng _ tagi negh meggni _ negh igate ngugh t _ wetku _ sivuke luten _ uk mang igh sagh waagh aq elghii t _ . _ ila i llu _ sivugh nghmeng _ apegh tuus al gh ut ang it _ atuqe u kangit _ . _ A tuq f ag il g am eg t ik i _ qayuusigh teng _ , _ sagnegh teng _ , _ siilu t _ gaaghusigh teng _ sang igh qugh waagh aqegk ang it _ . _ )
enkaam _ P h a ris e es - et lu _ apeghtugh i kayug t llu _ liilightuusagh neng _ aaptekagh at _ Jesus _ , _ " _ sangameng _ malig s aagh te ten _ uughtugh gpenateng _ negh aqe aat _ ? _ sivunegh mta _ apeghtuusagh it _ atuqe igate ait _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ kiimsigh iqe ai _ , _ " _ elqughte lusi _ I s a i a h - m _ uuknaliqe tke ma kangisi _ piniiyugnegh ni _ elpek si _ . _ whaten _ igagh kau uq _ , _ ' _ kiyaghnegh _ pi uq _ , _ " _ ukut _ yug t _ akuzite megteggun _ qu ul v agh aq aat nga _ , _ nakaan _ ilu megteggun _ .
temngi _ manigugh aqe aatnga _ , _ qayughllak _ apeghtuusagh ke aqe ait _ liilightuusagh ngllaghkagh teng _ katam _ whanga _ liilightuusagh ke pigte lghii stun _ . _ " _ '
enkaam _ elpek si _ kiyaghnegh m _ liilightuusagh i _ pakig luki _ qaatke aqe asi _ yug t _ apeghtuusagh it _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ nagnegh tke ai _ , _ " _ pakig i lleg pigu usi _ kiyaghnegh m _ liilightuusagh itnun _ qaatke pigesnagh na luki _ elpek si _ katam _ apeghtuusagh si _ .
una _ esgha _ uspute aq _ tawaten _ pi llegh gpesinun _ : _ M o s es -em _ apegh kaqe ai _ kiyaghnegh m _ liilightuusagh i _ whaten _ pi lghiit _ , _ ' _ Q u ul v agh luku _ ata n llu _ naa n llu _ . _ ' _ whaten llu _ pi kau uq _ , _ ' _ kitum _ alngunak _ ata ni llu _ naa ni llu _ segh l equ u qu m i ke k _ tuqute lleg nge yaghqaa uq _ . _ '
iwernga _ elpek si _ alla u ut _ apeghtugh i lleg si _ . _ whaten _ pi aqe usi _ , _ ' _ yug m nguq _ ata ni _ nalighmeng _ naa ni _ whaten _ pi yagh ghngaaghmigu _ , _ " _ kayusiite sighqagh lgu unga _ elpenun _ iwernga _ tuun aanghi taq a _ qayughllak _ C o r b an - ngu uq _ . _ " _ ' _ ( _ Corban _ whaten _ pi sigh u uq _ , _ siingenllu _ kiyaghnegh mun _ akequsagh ke ma aqa _ . _ )
tawaten _ pi llegh gpesigun _ apeghtugh aqe asi _ yug t _ kayusiite nghite yagh nga atki _ ata it llu _ naa it llu _ pi s qell uki _ .
enkaam _ pakig aqe asi _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta i _ , _ apeghtuusagh ke pigesnagh na luki _ yug nun _ elpek si _ katam _ akuzite si _ . _ tamaakut _ temngi _ usputagh u ut _ , _ uglagh u pigte ut _ sa u aat _ pi aqe kesi _ . _ "
taagken _ Jesus-em _ yug lghute t _ ellmi nun _ tagsigh nqigte luki _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ Q am ag teng ng waagh l usi _ nagate lusi _ liigike teggu _ sa meng _ pi tke a _ .
yuug _ neghekagh an _ nukeggnaghqe igate a _ , _ seghletun _ sumeghtaghagh llegh an _ , _ s all gh an llu _ nukeggnaghqe aqe a _ .
sigute lgu kufsi _ nagatusighqagh meng _ , _ nagate tek _ ! _ "
Jesus-em _ unite luki _ yug lghute t _ itegh yan _ malig s aagh teng it a _ aaptekagh at _ ungipaghagh an _ sa meng _ pi sagh ite anga _ .
Jesus-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ elpek si llu _ lii g ik ig at si i _ ? _ sa u a _ alngunak _ yug m _ negh aqe kanga _ nukeggnaghqe sighqagh u nghite uq _ ellnga nun _ ,
qayughllak _ neghekagh i _ igh saq gh w anun _ pi naanghite ut _ . _ A q saq gh w anun _ pi aqe ut _ enkaam _ yugusigh aneng _ aane aqe ut _ . _ " _ ( _ tawaten _ pi llegh mikun _ Jesus-em _ apegh u a _ neqe t _ qamagte luteng _ negh yaghqaa ni luki _ . _ )
pi ke ai llu _ , _ " _ yug m _ qamaken _ ilu mineng _ aane stekagh an _ nukeggnaghqe sta qaa _ .
qaamken _ yug m _ ilu aneng _ aane aqe ut _ : _ sumeghtaghagh lleg lug t _ , _ nengughte gpenani _ k itu meng _ alngunak _ atuqe i llegh _ , _ tegleg ni uq _ , _ yugte aq _ ,
gelgaghni ii aagh _ , _ pakig ni uq _ , _ alngunak _ seghletun _ pi llegh _ , _ puughte i _ , _ kayngusaghagh te llegh _ , _ aqina _ , _ yug lgute meng _ iqlengiqe tke i _ , _ qukaayug a _ , _ teme it wha _ .
tamaakut _ qamagte luteng _ seghlegh t _ yug m _ ilu aneng _ aanekagh t _ nukeggnaghqe i kayugu ut _ . _ "
taagken _ Jesus _ aghulaqekagh _ T y r e- m _ tu ng ang anun _ , _ kaate luni _ mangteghagh mun _ iteghkagh _ . _ kitumun _ alngunak _ nalluke sug u yagh kanga _ kaate lleg ni _ , _ iwernga _ ila ita _ liisimakekagh at _ .
aghnagh m _ G en t il e -em _ , _ allgeghkagh m _ P h o en i c i a- mi _ , _ S y r i a- m el ngugh mi _ nagaqugh qu a _ Jesus _ kaate ma ni luku _ . _ P an ig g aa _ ilu mikun _ tughneghagh leg _ . _ enkaam _ aglagh ragkiigh luni _ Jesus - mun _ segesqughte luni _ manu akun _ , _ manigugh tke aq _ aane ste aghte sqellug qu _ tughneghagh _ panig mineng _ .
iwernga _ Jesus-em _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ taghnughhagh t _ sivuke luteng _ neghesaghqagh u ut _ , _ qayughllak _ anaggute nga uq _ taghnughhagh t _ neqe it _ tugu luki _ qikmigh nun _ miluute kumeng _ . _ "
aghnagh m _ kiimsigh iqe a _ , _ " _ aa-a _ , _ atanegh _ , _ talwa _ qikmigh t _ tipele m _ a si ng an il nguut _ negh aqe ut _ taghnughhagh t _ i f k agh qell ghi t neng _ ! _ "
enkaam _ Jesus-em _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ naqam qun _ tawaten _ k ii m si ghagh pe nga _ aglagh ghhaaten _ , _ tughneghagh _ aane ma uq _ panig gpeneng _ ! _ "
aghnagh _ ne minun _ aglagh yalghiimi _ panig a _ ingaghmete uq _ qavaghvig mi _ , _ taawa _ llaaghan _ tughneghagh _ aane ma lghii _ panig aneng _ .
taagken _ Jesus _ aghulaqekagh _ T y r e- meng _ . _ S i d o n - kun llu _ , _ qula _ ne ghllag tgun llu _ aag luni _ naayvagh mun _ galilee- mun _ pi ke aq _ .
yug t _ ila ita _ , _ yuug _ nagaqugh te igate ngughk _ talwa _ akuziyiilngugh _ tagite luku _ Jesus - mun _ n angll eg s iit kaa t _ saafte sqellug qu _ .
enkaam _ Jesus-em _ aw iitutka a _ yug lghute neng _ . _ sivuke luku _ tekegh gni _ sigute gkenun _ kanaghte lukek _ , _ taagken _ iqite lukek _ qesigh luki _ iigge ni _ , _ ulu a _ saaftekagh a _ .
taagken _ sivugte luni _ qilag mun _ an egh p ak agh luni _ yuug _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ E p h p h at h a _ ! _ " _ ( _ taana _ whaten _ pi sigh u lghii _ , _ " _ reghigh tek _ ! _ " _ )
Taw an ing in aq _ yug m _ sigute kek _ reghigh iqe ak _ , _ ulu a llu _ piniightekagh _ , _ aga _ akuzi inagh magh mi _ pi ke aq _ akuzi yiilliqe gpenani _ .
taagken _ Jesus-em _ i negh teng ng w aaq ii _ kitumun _ alngunak _ ungipagh ke fqaan _ pi sqellug qu _ , _ iwernga _ i negh t aat agh y is t eng _ wata _ ungipagh kekagh at _ .
nagaqugh te lghiit _ tamaakut _ elngaatall _ saghiigha yug ghllagkagh t _ , _ pikagh t _ , _ " _ U u m _ yug m _ s all gha _ qamagte luni _ pi nigh perewaagh u uq _ ! _ talwa _ nagaqugh te igate ngugh t _ nagaqugh te yagute ste ai _ , _ akuz iy iil ngu ut lu _ akuzi yagute ste ai _ ! _ "
Taa m _ kingu ngiighhagh aneng _ yug lghute ghllag _ qerngughte te laataghkagh _ . _ N egh yaghq aq r ag g iigh us ata _ Jesus-em _ malig s aagh t en i _ tagsigh luki _ pi ke ai _ ,
" _ ukut _ nanglleg yagute pigte anka _ . _ Wh ang am n in naq negh meng _ pingayut ni _ aghnegh ni _ neghyaghqagh igh te ut _ .
ne itnun _ aglagh stekumki _ neghe ste gpenaki _ tume mi _ taakwani _ u llegh aa ll equ t _ , _ qayughllak _ ila i _ uyavagh neng _ tagi laghate te kau ut _ . _ "
M al ig s aagh teng it a _ aaptekagh at _ , _ " _ maani _ paaghqite uq _ naken _ neqenge naqe sta _ whaten _ ug l aghq ak alghii nun _ naama yaghqagh meng _ ? _ "
Jesus-em _ aaptekagh i _ , _ " _ naten _ ug l aghq ak aan _ neqekrangllagh lgu tsi _ ? _ " _ kiimsigh iqe aat _ , _ " _ maaghraghvinleg u ut _ neqekrangllagh t _ . _ "
enkaam _ Jesus-em _ yug lghute ghllag t _ qelqe ai _ aq um uu tes qell uki _ nuna kun _ . _ taagken _ tugu luki _ taakut _ maaghraghvinleg _ neqekrangllagh t _ kiyaghnegh _ iyamsiqa yug vike luku _ , _ k ag im ll uki _ tuunekagh i _ malig s aagh te min un _ uy eg tes qell uki _ . _ enkaam _ malig s aagh teng i _ uyegtekagh t _ .
qafsinkuuragh ghhagh neng llu _ am s ak alghii neng _ iqallug leg t _ . _ Jesus-em _ iyamsiqa yug vike luku _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ taakut llu _ malig s aagh te min un _ uyegte sqekagh i _ .
entaqun _ 4 , 0 0 0 - nguut _ yug t _ kepsugh te luteng _ negh te tke aat _ . _ taagken _ malig s aagh tet _ q er ngugh saq meg teg gu _ siipnegh _ , _ maaghraghvinleg _ paskete t _ imeg iqe ait _ esleqeaghaghte luki _ .
Jesus-em _ yug lghute ghllag t _ aghulaqe uute ste luki _ , _ enkaam _ maligte yaaghtekete te lghiit _ angyagh mun _ uugte luteng _ aghul aq ng in aam agh meng _ pikagh t _ D al m an ut h a- mun _ .
Tam aan l e nguut _ P h a ris e es - et _ taku luku _ Jesus _ aaghtiiraaghkagh at _ . _ pi ke aat _ , _ " _ A ll aagh ll u wh agh t igh llag i _ , _ enkaam _ ugpeq ell eq agh put _ agh tugh yaghq aanghi llgh en _ kiyaghnegh meng _ pi u ta a _ . _ " _ tawaten _ pi ke aat _ an ag n iil q av ig igh nal uku _ .
Jesus-em _ an egh pag luni _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ sangameng _ maaten _ aghnegh m _ yug i _ all aagh ll u wh agh t i llegh meng _ tungsigh aqe aat _ ? _ ipa _ ungipaate amsi _ , _ all aagh ll u wh agh t in n aanghi tam si _ . _ "
taagken _ unite luki _ , _ angyagh mun _ uugte luni _ inglu anun _ naayvagh m _ aghviqagh t _ .
M al ig s aagh tet _ puygu ma lghiit _ neqekrangllagh meng _ kelqe gpenateng _ , _ ataasigh ghhagh u uq _ kelqekagh at _ angyagh mete ngughk _ .
Jesus-em _ kelenga sagh uqagh i _ , _ " _ K el eng ang waagh l usi _ y e as t- at ang it neng _ P h a ris e es - et _ , _ y e as t- at ang an eng llu _ H er o d -em _ . _ "
taagken _ ell meg g neng _ aleghqugh tke aat _ , _ " _ tawaten _ pi inkut _ qayughllak _ neqekrangllagh ite ngugh u kut _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ akuz it ke ng ng uk angi _ apeghtuusagh it _ P h a ris e es - et _ , _ apeghtuusagh i llu _ H er o d -em _ . _ liisimake kangi _ maligte yaaghte yan _ liigike nghite kangat _ akuzi tkekagh a _ enkaam _ aaptekagh i _ , _ " _ sangan _ neqekrangllagh ite ni lusi _ pi tsi _ ? _ paninang _ n all uk aq et si ll u u _ , _ lii g ik ig ate t si ll u u _ ? _ U m ugh t ak ii _ umyugagh si _ ?
iye lgu lghiisi _ , _ es ghii g at si i _ ? _ sigute lgu usi _ , _ nag aq uu si g at si i _ ? _ N eq am ik en ghi s tek ii
tallimat _ neqekrangllagh t _ kagimtekagh nka _ 5 , 0 0 0 -en un _ ? _ qafsina t _ paskete t _ siipte nghmeng _ imigh steki _ ? _ " _ kiimsigh iqe aat _ , _ " _ qula _ maalghug _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ aaptekagh i _ , _ " _ maaghraghvinleg _ neqekrangllagh t _ kagimte aqe yamki _ 4 , 0 0 0 -en un _ , _ qafsina t _ paskete t _ siipte nghmeng _ imigh steki _ ? _ " _ kiimsigh iqe aat _ , _ " _ maaghraghvinleg _ . _ "
aapte laataghkagh i _ , _ " _ sangafsi _ paninang _ lii g ik ig at si _ ? _ "
B et h s a i d a- mun _ kaa sa ta _ ila ita _ yug t _ Jesus - mun _ tagi tke aat _ ayaakagh _ yuug _ , _ saafte aghte sqellug qu _ .
Jesus-em _ ayaakagh _ t as l uq luku _ aghulaqe tke a _ ne meng _ . _ taagken _ qesigh lukek _ iye kek _ saafte lukek _ aaptekagh a _ , _ " _ sa meng _ esghaate nghite ziin _ ? _ "
yug m _ sivugte luni _ yug s ugh al uni _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ aa-a _ , _ esghagh anka _ yug t _ , _ iwernga _ esghaqagh u luteng _ llangaqa _ uqfig t _ piyug te lghiit _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ allameng _ saaftekakek _ yug m _ iye kek _ . _ maatenllaam _ yuug _ esghaate naqe ghllag yalghiimi _ , _ qemall _ esgh aa s ag un neq ig tuq _ wh at egh ll u w aaq _ .
Jesus-em _ agligh sqekagh a _ ne anun _ , _ pi ke aa llu _ , _ " _ aghuliigh fqaavek _ taakwani _ ne mi _ . _ "
taagken _ Jesus -en kut _ maligte yaaghtekete te lghiit _ aghulaqekagh t _ ne nun _ tu ng ang an il ngugh nun _ C a es ar e a _ P h il ip pi -em _ . _ tume mi _ taakwani _ malig s aagh t en i _ aaptekagh i _ , _ " _ kina u ni lunga _ yug t _ pi aqe atnga _ ? _ "
kiimsigh iqe aat _ , _ " _ ila ita _ pi aqe aaten _ J o h n - ngun il u ten _ paaptaaye sta _ , _ ila ita _ El i j a h - ngun iiq aaten _ , _ enkaam _ ila ita _ nalug iqe ni luten _ u uk nal iq is tet _ . _ "
aaptekagh i _ , _ " _ elpek si _ k ing ang un iiq es teng nga _ ? _ " _ P e te r -em _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ Christ- ang uu ten _ . _ "
taagken _ Jesus-em _ i negh teng ng w aaq ii _ , _ " _ kitumun _ alngunak _ apegh gpenanga _ . _ "
taagken _ Jesus-em _ apeghtugh kestaghkagh i _ malig s aagh t en i _ , _ " _ ighnegh a _ yug m _ elngaatall _ ikfiqe pestaagh yaghqaa uq _ , _ ighsake yaghqaqe aat llu _ siivanllegh t _ , _ c h i e f _ p r i es t- et _ , _ apeghtugh i kayug t llu _ liilightuusagh neng _ . _ taagken _ tuqu lleqe aat _ iwernga _ pingayut ii ta ani _ aghnegh m _ unguvagh lleqe uq _ . _ "
Wh at egh ll u w aaq _ ungipagh tke ai _ . _ P e te r -em _ iqitute luku _ aghyuugh qu a _ .
iwernga _ Jesus-em _ qiive luni _ esghaghkagh i _ malig s aagh t en i _ taagken _ peter _ aghyuugh qu a _ . _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ awite te n _ whanga mneng _ , _ tughneghagh _ . _ sumeghtaghagh llegh ten _ yug m _ sumeghtaghagh llegh ke ai _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ sumeghtaghagh llegh ke nghite ai _ ! _ "
taagken _ Jesus-em _ yug lghute ghllag t llu _ malig s aagh t en illu _ tag sigh tegh luki _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ kitum _ alngunak _ maligte yu kuminga _ , _ ellmi neng _ katam _ piyuke lleg ni _ pegte luki _ , _ qaquuragh ni _ uyamig luku _ maligte linga _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ yuguligh yu kunigu _ unguvallegh ni _ ifla yaghqaqe a _ . _ iwernga _ kitum _ alngunak _ ifla kunigu _ unguvallegh ni _ whanga _ apallugh ke lunga _ , _ pinigh lghiit llu _ ungipagh t _ apallugh ke luki _ yug ul iyagh q aqaa _ .
sa u a ngam _ yug m _ pinighqe sigh ke lleqe agu _ pi liite luku _ nunaghllag _ , _ ifla kumikek _ unguva sigh gni _ ?
S am eng Ê¼ ng am _ yuug _ veghte sigh ke lleqe a _ unguva sigh gminun _ ?
maaten _ aghnegh m _ yug i _ ataasiighmete nghite ut _ kiyaghnegh mun _ , _ seghleghqe ma u ut llu _ . _ maani _ aghnegh ni _ kitum _ alngunak _ kayngu yagute kanganga _ , _ apeghtuusagh nka llu _ , _ whanga llu _ ighneghagh ni _ yug m _ kayngu yagute lleqe aqa _ tagi kuma _ agh tugh yaghq aanghi ll el igh l unga _ ata mneng _ k el qell uki _ agleghnagh lghiit _ yaquleg t _ . _ "
nagnegh tke ai llu _ whaten _ , _ " _ ipa _ ungipaate amsi _ , _ ila si _ nekevgha te lghiit _ whani _ tuqu naanghite ut _ kenlanga _ esghagh llegh meggnun _ ataneghpag u llegh a _ kiyaghnegh m _ tagi kan _ agh tugh yaghq aanghi llegh tu um agh mi _ . _ "
aghvinleg _ aghneq _ atugh luku _ , _ Jesus-em _ k el qell uki _ P e te r -en kut _ , _ J am es -en kut _ , _ J o h n -en kut _ , _ mat- yuqagh t _ uusqagh lghii mun _ naayghagh mun _ . _ E ll ng in aghh aal ghiit _ tawani _ Jesus-em _ yugusigh a _ allangughtekagh _ esghagh ma llegh itni _ .
aatkagh i _ qelmeghtekagh t _ qategtu te _ , _ qategh aghagh luteng _ kitum _ alngunak _ nuna mi _ qateghsagh aqe ka aneng _ .
taagken _ malig s aagh tet _ esgh ap ak ag ke t _ El i j a h - n kuk _ M o s es -en kuk _ aliigh lutek _ aleghqugh ka ak _ Jesus _ .
enkaam _ malig s aagh tet _ alingruugh te ghllag ke aat _ repall _ sa meng _ pipag nigh nge i tke aat _ . _ taagken _ P e te r -em _ pi ke aa _ Jesus _ , _ " _ apeghtugh i sta _ , _ itagnagh pigte uq _ wh aan l e ngu u kut _ ! _ pi nga yu t _ azigutagh t _ nekefte naqe aput _ , _ elpenun llu _ M o s es - m un llu _ El i j a h - m un llu _ . _ "
taagken _ qilag u aq _ aliigh luni _ saapekagh i _ . _ qilawaagh meng _ me m _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ U n ang u uq _ piniqe pigtegkegka _ ighnegh ka _ ; _ nagate aqe teggu _ ! _ "
taagken _ yugsughagh uaghaghte yalghiimeng _ M o s es -en kuk _ El i j a h - n kuk _ aviite uk _ , _ Jesus - ng in aghh aq _ taw an te f tuq _ .
ukig te kete luku _ naayghagh meng _ Jesus-em _ ungip aq es nan igh w aaq aa _ esghaate llegh at _ kenlanga _ ighnegh a _ yug m _ tuqu llegh meng _ unguv agh tek an _ .
enkaam _ i negh si s t eng _ qaatkekagh at _ , _ iwernga _ ellng in aagh h negh meg g ni _ pi aqe lghiit _ , _ " _ sa meng tuq _ pi s ii wa _ ' _ tuqu llegh meng _ unguv agh te ll eq _ ? _ ' _ "
taagken _ aaptekagh at _ Jesus _ , _ " _ sangan _ apeghtugh i kayug t _ liilightuusagh neng _ pi aqe atgu _ elijah _ sivuke luni _ tagi pestaagh yaghqaa ni luku _ ? _ "
kiimsigh iqe ai _ , _ " _ ipa u uq _ elijah _ sivuke luni _ tagi pestaagh yaghqaa uq _ y at aagh q en nal uku _ sa u a _ tamaghhagh an _ . _ A ap tagh ll am si _ , _ naqam _ sangan _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ pi kaqe atgu _ , _ ighnegh a _ yug m _ ikfiqe ghllag yaghqaa ni luku _ , _ s as iin ghi l ngugh es tun llu _ kiyaghute yaghqaa ni luku _ ?
iwernga _ ungipaate naqe amsi _ elijah _ tagi kau uq _ , _ yug t _ piyuke llegh megestun _ pi kaqe aat _ katam _ tawaten _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ pi naq n ill ghi s tun _ . _ "
T aku yaq meg tek i _ ila i _ malig s aagh tet _ , _ yug lghute ghllag _ taw an tu te f tuq _ . _ ila ita _ apeghtugh i kayug t _ liilightuusagh neng _ aaghtiiraagh aqe ait _ malig s aagh tet _ .
legan _ yug t _ esghagh luku _ Jesus _ saghiigha yug ghllag luteng _ payegh aghte luku _ quyakekagh at _ .
Jesus-em _ malig s aagh t en i _ aaptekagh i _ , _ " _ sa meng _ aaghtiiraagh aqe steki _ apeghtugh i kayug t _ liilightuusagh neng _ ? _ "
yug lghute ghllag t _ akule itneng _ yug m _ kiimsigh iqe a _ , _ " _ apeghtugh i sta _ , _ ighnegh ka _ tagite yagh aqa _ elpenun _ , _ qayughllak _ ilu mikun _ tughneghagh lgu uq _ . _ Taa m _ tughneghagh m _ akuzite igate a _ .
kaate pigte nghminigu _ iqu sta qaa _ , _ q aan gh allu _ n u v agll iigh q es taq aa _ , _ ggute i _ terqitaagtagh ste aqe ai _ , _ te v egh q w aa s taq aa llu _ . _ M al ig s aagh teg pen un _ kayagte te aghte yagh aqa _ tughneghagh _ aane ste sqellug qu _ iwernga _ pipagningite aat _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ malig s aagh t en i _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ elpek si _ yug ni _ ugpeqe i llghite usi _ ! _ naten _ tag kaa n _ elpesinite naqe zinga _ ugpeq es qell unga _ ? _ mekelghiigh _ whavek _ tagite ggu _ ! _ "
enkaam _ tagi tke aat _ . _ legan _ tughneghagh m _ esghagh luku _ Jesus _ , _ mekelghiigh _ iqu ste luku _ sayugpagtagh stekagh a _ . _ tamaani _ temngi _ ullghitag perewaaghte stekagh a _ , _ q aan gh allu _ nuvagllug iigh stekagh a _ .
Jesus-em _ aaptekagh a _ ata a _ , _ " _ qavngaghhaaneng _ tawatete a _ ? _ " _ kiimsigh iqe a _ , _ " _ me ke ta ghhagh u te mineng _ ima _ .
uglagh ghngaan _ ken gh eg nun llu _ megh mun llu _ iqu ste aqe yagh aa _ tuqu sqellug qu _ . _ pi yaghqaa kuvek _ nanglleg yagute lutung _ kayusiite aghte kung _ ! _ "
Jesus-em _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ sangavek _ tawaten _ pi ziin _ , _ ' _ pi yaghqaa kuvek _ ' _ ? _ kiyaghnegh m _ sa u a _ alngunak _ pi yaghqaqe a _ yug mun _ ugpegh lghii mun _ . _ "
Taw an ing in aq _ mekelghiigh m _ ata a _ iglagtu luni _ pi ke aq _ , _ " _ ugpegh unga _ , _ iwernga _ ug p ell egh tugh tagh aq agh nga _ ! _ "
Jesus-em _ esghagh luki _ wata _ yug t _ tagi laghate te lghiit _ qevuute luku _ aghyuugh qu a _ tughneghagh _ , _ " _ uyuq _ tughneghagh _ tuuslagh ste i lghii llu _ akuzi ste i igate ngughk llu _ qelegh amken _ aane i _ mekelghiigh meng _ , _ allameng llu _ itegh fqaavek _ ellnga nun _ pi lghaaten _ . _ "
tughneghagh m _ mekelghiigh _ araghaatagh ste ghllag luku _ , _ sayugpagtagh ste ghllag luku _ , _ aanekagh _ . _ legan _ mekelghiigh _ esghaqaaluni _ tuqukagh _ repall _ esghapag lghiit _ pikagh t _ , _ " _ tuquma uq _ ! _ "
iwernga _ Jesus-em _ iiggagh kun _ tugu luku _ kayusigh tke a _ nekeve sqellug qu _ enkaam _ nekevekagh _ .
Jesus _ mangteghagh mun _ itegh yan _ ellng in aghh aagh s ameng _ malig s aagh teng it a _ aaptekagh at _ , _ " _ sangan _ whangkuta _ aane ste nghmeng _ aghtugh steggu _ tughneghagh _ ? _ "
Jesus-em _ kiimsigh iqe ai _ , _ " _ Taw ate l nguq _ tughneghagh _ y ugh aghh iin aam _ aanesaghqagh ke a _ , _ s aam _ alla _ pi naanghite a _ . _ "
taagken _ ne meng _ aghulaqe luteng _ nagneqe aat _ galilee- kun _ . _ Jesus-em _ kitumun _ alngunak _ liisimake sug ma nge i tke a _ n aan tu l en i _ ,
qayughllak _ apeghtugh u u kangi _ malig s aagh t en i _ tuqu lleghqagh mineng _ . _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ ighnegh a _ yug m _ tugu luku _ tuune lleqe aat _ yug nun _ tuqute sqellug qu _ , _ naq am en r aq _ pi nga yu t _ aghnegh t _ atugh luki _ unguvagh lleqe uq _ . _ "
iwernga _ liigike ma ite kangat _ apeghtuusagh a _ sa meng _ pi sagh ite anga _ , _ enkaam _ aapte yug ma ite kangat _ tetug luteng _ .
C ap er n a um - e mun _ kaate luteng _ , _ it egh aa s ameng _ Jesus-em _ aaptekagh i _ , _ " _ igleghte te kete luku _ sa u a _ aaghtiiraagh te kaqe steggu _ ? _ "
kiimsigh yug ma ite kangat _ , _ qayughllak _ igleghte te kete luku _ aaghtiiraagh tke aat _ naligh eng _ angegh lleghpigagh u yaghqaa ta a _ .
Jesus-em _ aqume luni _ , _ qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ke luku _ malig s aagh t en i _ tuqlugh luki _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ kina _ alngunak _ sivulii aghte yu kuni _ nekegte li _ kinguligh u luni _ , _ qep ghagh te ngu l illu _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ . _ "
taagken _ taghnughhagh _ tugu luku _ nekeve stekagh a _ qukagh itgun _ . _ qete luku _ pi ke ai _ ,
" _ kitum _ alngunak _ tugukligh kunigu _ taghnughhagh ghhagh _ uu tun _ ayuqe lghii _ whanga _ apallugh ke lunga _ , _ tugukligh aqe aanga _ whanga _ . _ kitum _ alngunak _ tugukligh kuminga _ , _ tugukligh lleqe a _ ata ka _ kayagte ikagh _ whanga mneng _ . _ "
mulu gpenateng _ J o h n -em _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ apeghtugh i sta _ , _ yuug _ esgh aam aagh put _ ategh gpegun _ aane ste qugh lghii _ tughneghagh neng _ . _ I negh sim aagh put _ qayughllak _ whang kun nun _ ilate nga nghite ngughk _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ ineghte gpenaan _ ! _ qayughllak _ kina _ alngunak _ ategh mkun _ all aagh ll u wh agh t i ngu ku mi _ seghletun _ akuzi tke lghaghtugh naanghite aanga _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ kipullegmun _ pi nghite kanginkut _ , _ qepghagh lgutekagh ut _ .
ipa _ ungipaate amsi _ , _ kitum _ alngunak _ meghsi kangisi _ whanga _ pi ku tem neng _ , _ ipapestaaq _ akileghtuusagh nge yaghqaa uq _ . _ "
" _ ataasigh _ taghnughhagh _ ugpeqe i nga lghii _ whanga mneng _ , _ yug m _ seghleghqe stekagu _ , _ pinigh aghagh nayagh uq _ taana _ yuug _ megh mun _ ateghte yagh kuni _ uy aq gh w akun _ qaamqaghte vike luku _ uyghag ghllag meng _ .
iigge gpek _ seghleghqe stegkangaten _ kepe naketen _ . _ pinigh aghagh nayagh uten _ yugusigh gpek _ nalighnegh a _ ifla kuvgu _ unguvallegh gpek _ ifla lleghqagh aneng _ quunperugllag _ . _ taana _ pinigh aghagh uq _ inglugtun _ iigge ligh luten _ hell- mun _ aglagh lleghqagh gpeneng _ . _ tawani _ kumaghugh nga lghii _ kenegh _ qaame yaghqaa nghite uq _ .
tawani _ ' _ kingug t _ neghe kayug t _ yug meng _ tuqu yaghqaa nghite ut _ , _ kumaghugh nga lghii llu _ kenegh _ qaame yaghqaa nghite uq _ ' _ .
itegagh gpek _ seghleghqe stegkangaten _ , _ iike naketen _ ! _ pinigh aghagh nayagh uten _ yugusigh gpek _ nalighnegh a _ ifla kuvgu _ unguvallegh gpek _ ifla lleghqagh aneng _ quunperugllag _ . _ taana _ pinigh aghagh uq _ inglugtun _ itegagh ligh luten _ hell- mun _ miluute lleghqagh gpeneng _ .
tawani _ ' _ kingug t _ neghe kayug t _ yug meng _ tuqu yaghqaa nghite ut _ , _ kumaghugh nga lghii llu _ kenegh _ qaame yaghqaa nghite uq _ ' _ .
iye gpek _ seghleghqe stegkangaten _ , _ ipug naken _ ! _ pinigh aghagh nayagh uten _ ataneghpag u llegh anun _ kiyaghnegh m _ itegh kuvek _ ing lu pig agh meng _ ii- uute kete luten _ , _ inglugtun _ iye lgu luten _ hell- mun _ miluute lleghqagh gpeneng _ .
tawani _ ' _ kingug t _ neghe kayug t _ yug meng _ tuqu yaghqaa nghite ut _ , _ kumaghugh nga lghii llu _ kenegh _ qaame yaghqaa nghite uq _ ' _ .
tamaghhagh mi _ taghyugh ligh lleqe uq _ kenegh meng _ .
" _ taghyugh _ pinigh uq _ iwernga _ taghyughni igh u uute kan _ , _ naten _ elpek si _ tagh y ugh n igh ll aat aghn ay agh es teg gu _ ? _ taghyughni igh te gpenasi _ , _ n ek eg g m e tu ll usi llu _ . _ "
taagken _ Jesus _ aghulaqekagh _ tamaaken _ nuna meng _ . _ aglagh luni _ nuna mun _ ategh ke lghii mun _ J u d e a- mun _ , _ aghvigh kakek _ kiiw k _ J o r d an - ek _ . _ yug lghute m _ qerngughte vike laatagh qagh a _ enkaam _ apeghtugh qu ai _ pi aqe llegh mitun _ .
ila ita _ P h a ris e es - et _ taku luku _ an ag n iil q av ig igh naq utk ell uku _ aaptekagh at _ , _ " _ liilightuusagh mnni _ itagnaghtaa _ yug m _ nuliigh ni _ pegtekunigu _ ? _ "
Jesus-em _ kiimsigh iqe ai _ aap tem meng _ , _ " _ sangaawa mi _ M o s es -em _ qelegh sagh a _ ? _ "
kiimsigh iqe aat _ , _ " _ M o s es -em _ pi llegh q al it k aqaa _ yuug _ pegte sigh m _ igagh i _ imigh luki _ pegte sqellug qu _ nulighh a _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ tawaten _ M o s es -em _ L iiligh tuus al it k aq ii si _ pineghllug ghllag te gpesineng _ .
iwernga _ nuna ngllagh yuwhaagh llegh meng _ ' _ kiyaghnegh m _ ulima kaqe ak _ yuug llu _ aghnagh llu _ . _ '
taana _ apallugh ke luku _ yug m _ unite lukek _ ata ni llu _ naa ni llu _ nuliigh minun _ ll iigh waagh yaghq aag uq _ .
enkaam _ maalghug u nanigh lleqe uk _ , _ ataasiighte lleqe uk _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ qerngughte te stekakek _ yeqay _ yug m _ pellegh utu te ste nghite likek _ . _ "
mangteghagh mun _ it egh aa s ameng _ malig s aagh tet _ aaptekagh at _ Jesus _ tamaaken _ pi llgh aneng _ .
Jesus-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ yug m _ nuliigh ni _ pegte luku _ alla neng _ nulightugh kuni _ , _ taawa _ gelgaghniigh lleqe uq _ .
Taw at egh pig aq _ aghnagh m _ ugi ni _ pegte luku _ alla neng _ ugiigh kuni _ , _ taawa _ gelgaghniigh lleqe uq _ . _ "
ila ita _ yug t _ tagi tke ait _ taghnughhagh t _ Jesus - mun _ saafte luki _ quy as tes qell uki _ , _ iwernga _ malig s aagh tet _ ineghtekagh it _ tagite i lghiit _ .
Jesus-em _ esghagh luki _ seghleghyag te luki _ malig s aagh t en i _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ taghnughhagh t _ tagi lit _ whanga mnun _ . _ ineghte gpenaki _ , _ qayughllak _ ataneghpag u llegh a _ kiyaghnegh m _ t aghn ugh h agh es tun _ ayuqe lghiit _ pi ke aat _ .
ipa _ ungipaate amsi _ , _ kitum _ alngunak _ tugukligh nghite kunigu _ ataneghpag u llegh a _ kiyaghnegh m _ taghnughhagh tun _ , _ itegh naanghite uq _ . _ "
taagken _ taghnughhagh t _ tugu aqe luki _ , _ saafte aqe luki _ quya stekagh i _ .
Jesus _ iglegh h neq ig taq uq lu _ , _ yug m _ ketanqusnaq _ taku luku _ manu akun _ segesqughte luni _ aaptekagh a _ , _ " _ pinigh lghii _ apeghtugh i sta _ , _ naten _ sa lunga _ kenle ite ngughk _ unguvallegh _ all g egh h n ay agh si kun _ ? _ "
Jesus-em _ aaptekagh a _ , _ " _ sangan _ pinigh ni zinga _ ? _ kina _ alngunak _ pinigh nghite uq _ , _ kiyaghnegh ghhagh inagh u uq _ pinigh lghii _ .
liilightuusagh t _ liisima katen _ : _ ' _ yugtagh gpenang _ ; _ gelgaghniigh gpenang _ ; _ tegleg gpenang _ ; _ iqlengiqe tke gpenaki _ yug t _ ; _ puughte i gpenang _ ; _ qu ul v agh l uk ek _ ata n llu _ naa n llu _ . _ ' _ "
yug m _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ apeghtugh i sta _ , _ ima _ nukalpigagh u te mneng _ q aat ke ng ng w aan ka _ taakut _ liilightuusagh t _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ piniqe pigte luku _ qiive luku _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ ataasigh u uq _ pi yaghqagh n _ . _ akikugh yaghtugh ghhu _ qamagte luku _ saghya n _ , _ enkaam _ aki a _ tunqugh naken _ aklumalghii nun _ . _ tawaten _ pi kuvek _ aklungite lleqe uten _ qilag mi _ . _ taagken _ maligte yaghtugh nakevnga _ . _ "
tawaten _ pi yatni _ yuug _ nulgiighkagh _ , _ iqitekagh _ iilqe pigte luni _ qayughllak _ aklungite pigte lghii _ .
Jesus _ yug s ugh al uni _ malig s aagh t en i _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ piyaqnagh pigte uq _ ak l ung il ngugh ni _ itegh lleghqagh a _ ataneghpag u llegh a _ kiyaghnegh m _ ! _ "
tawaten _ pi y is t eng _ malig s aagh tet _ saghiigha yuke aat _ . _ Jesus-em _ pilagh te aqe ai _ , _ " _ taghnughhagh ni _ , _ piyaqnagh pigte uq _ itegh lleghqagh _ ataneghpag u llegh anun _ kiyaghnegh m _ !
piyaqnagh u i uute yaghqaa uq _ c am el -em _ suflughte te lleghqagh a _ sikugh m _ iye akun _ , _ ak l ung il ngu u m _ yug m _ itegh lleghqagh aneng _ ataneghpag u llegh anun _ kiyaghnegh m _ . _ "
M al ig s aagh tet _ wataqaaghaq _ saghiigha yuke aat _ , _ enkaam _ ell meg g neng _ aap qugh aagh utk at _ , _ " _ kina ngam _ yuguligh lleg nge lleqe a _ ? _ "
Jesus-em _ qiive luki _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ yug t _ pi yaghqaqe nghite kangit _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ pi yaghqaqe ai _ . _ "
taagken _ P e te r -em _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ esghaqagh kut qun _ , _ sa u a _ qamagte luku _ unite luku _ malig llegh aat am ken _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ ipa _ ungipaate amsi _ , _ kitum _ alngunak _ unite kumiki _ mangteghagh ni _ , _ anglegute ni _ , _ naa ni _ , _ ata ni _ , _ avaqutagh ni _ , _ nuna ni _ apallugh ke lunga _ whanga _ , _ pinigh lghiit llu _ ungipagh t _ ,
allgegh utu aghagh yaghqaa uq _ whani _ kiyagh taa llegh mi _ . _ mangteghagh a _ , _ ang leg ut angi _ , _ naange a _ , _ avaquti a _ , _ nuna a _ , _ nula ghllag yaghqaa ut _ ; _ tam aa ku nun _ maligte te luku _ amyuutke lleg nge yaghqaa uq _ . _ taagken _ taa k w an ing ani _ kenle ite ngugh meng _ unguvallegh nge yaghqaa uq _ .
iwernga _ uglagh lghiit _ angegh lleghpigagh at _ ukaligh ughte yaghqaa ut _ taagani _ , _ enkaam _ uglagh lghiit _ uk al igh pig aat _ angegh lleghpigagh ughte yaghqaa ut _ . _ "
Jesus _ aga _ sivu itnite ngughk _ iglegha u luki _ tume tgun _ J er us al em - e mun _ ayuqe lghii tgun _ . _ M al ig s aagh teng i _ saghiigha yuke aat _ , _ yug t llu _ alinge magh meng _ maligtekagh at _ . _ Jesus-em _ qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ke luku _ malig s aagh t en i _ aafte te luki _ ungipaate laataghkagh i _ sa lleghqagh mineng _ .
pi ke ai _ , _ " _ nagate tek _ , _ J er us al em -en naq u kut _ . _ tawani _ ighnegh a _ yug m _ tuune lleqe aat _ c h i e f _ p r i es t- en un llu _ apeghtugh i kayug nun llu _ liilightuusagh neng _ . _ nanqigte luku _ tuqute yaghqaa ni lleqe aat _ , _ enkaam _ tuune lleqe aat _ G en t il e- en un _ .
taakut _ legasiighwagh tke lleqe aat _ , _ qesigh qu lleqe aat _ , _ kagsagmig lleqe aat _ , _ tuqu lleqe aat llu _ . _ pi nga yu t _ aghnegh t _ atugh luki _ unguvagh lleqe uq _ . _ "
taagken _ J am es -en kuk _ J o h n -en kuk _ , _ Z e b e d e e- m _ ighnegh gkenka _ taku luku _ Jesus _ pikagh ak _ , _ " _ apeghtugh i sta _ , _ elpenun _ sa meng _ pi sqe sug ukung _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ aaptekakek _ , _ " _ sa sqe sug stek _ whanga mnun _ ? _ "
kiimsigh iqe ak _ , _ " _ N igh ugh q eng ng alghii mi _ ataneghpag u llegh gpeni _ aqume gkuvek _ aqume lgusigh yug amken _ , _ naligh ung _ aghenqignegh gpenite luku _ , _ naligh ung _ saghumignegh gpenite luku _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ pi kakek _ , _ " _ nalluke aghte tek _ sa meng _ tungsigh llegh ek _ . _ meghyaghqagh mneng _ qay uu sim el ngugh meng _ meghe lleqe stek _ ? _ paaptaaye lleghqagh mtun _ paaptaaye lleqe stek _ ? _ "
kiimsigh iqe ak _ , _ " _ pi yaghqaa ukung _ . _ " _ Jesus-em _ pi kakek _ , _ " _ meghyaghqagh ka _ qayuusigh mete ngughk _ qaywa _ meghe lleqe aghte tek _ , _ paaptaaye lleqe utek llu _ paaptaaye lleghqagh mtun _ .
iwernga _ whanga _ nakmike yaghqaqe nghite anka _ kinku t _ aqume yaghqaa ta i _ aghenqignegh mkun llu _ saghumignegh mkun llu _ , _ yataaghqe tke aat _ tamaakut _ aqume yaghqaa ut _ . _ "
taakut _ qula _ mal igh s aagh tet _ nagaqugh lukek _ J am es -en kuk _ J o h n -en kuk _ pi llgh ak _ , _ ug um iy ag utk ag ke t _ .
enkaam _ Jesus-em _ qerngughte luki _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ liisima kasi _ G en t il e- et _ iglegh ut is teng it a _ at an gh utaq iit _ yug teng _ , _ aa ng waagh ugh tek at lu _ y uk egh q utaq iit _ .
iwernga _ tawatete yaghqaa nghite usi _ elpek si _ . _ naligh i _ aangwaagh u yu kuni _ qep ghagh te ngu l i _ ila minun _ ,
naligh i llu _ aange lleghpigagh u yu kuni _ qep ghagh te l aagh ugh ll i _ tea- ma anun _ .
talwa _ ighnegh a _ yug m _ tagi kau nghite uq _ qep gh aa tes qell uni _ , _ tagi kau uq _ qepghagh te i na luni llu _ tuun al u ku llu _ unguvallegh ni _ yug ul in al uki _ yug lghute t _ . _ "
taagken _ Jesus -en kut _ maligte yaaghtekete te lghiit _ , _ yug lghute ghllag t llu _ J er i c h o - mun _ kaate luteng _ , _ aghulaqekagh t _ . _ Taa w aa nguq _ ayaakagh _ yuug _ , _ ategh a _ B ar t im a e us _ , _ ighnegh a _ T im a e us -em _ aqume luni _ tume t _ sani itgun _ tungsigh ragh aqe lghii _ .
nagaqugh yamigu _ Jesus _ N a z ar et h - egh m ii _ , _ tughwaagh ni luku _ akilghuukagh _ , _ " _ Jesus _ ! _ ighneghagh ni _ D av i d -em _ ! _ nanglleg yagute aghte nga _ ! _ "
uglagh lghii m _ yug m _ aghyuugh qu aat _ nepiigh sqellug qu _ iwernga _ q ev u ut agh all uni _ akilghuukagh _ , _ " _ ighneghagh ni _ D av i d -em _ , _ nanglleg yagute aghte nga _ ! _ "
Jesus-em _ aghuliigh luni _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ tagi sqe teggu _ . _ " _ enkaam _ tuqlugh luku _ ayaakagh _ pi ke aat _ , _ " _ seghleghhalek _ , _ tuqlugh aaten _ nekeve i _ ! _ "
qaasligh ak _ atkuyaagh gni _ mat-aghaghte lukek _ nekefqaghte luni _ takukagh a _ Jesus _ .
Jesus-em _ aaptekagh a _ , _ " _ S as qell u ten _ pi aqe ziin _ ? _ " _ ayaakagh m _ kiimsigh iqe a _ , _ " _ apeghtugh i sta _ , _ esgh aa s ag un neq ig s ug tu nga _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ igleghte lghaaten _ , _ ugpeqe i llegh gpek _ naallghute ste aaten _ . _ " _ Taw an ing in aq _ esghagh u sag u tke aq _ taagken _ maligtekagh a _ Jesus _ .
T ugh aagh y alghii meng _ J er us al em - e mun _ , _ kaate tke aat _ B et h p h ag e- m un llu _ B et h an y - m un llu _ , _ M o un t _ O l iv es - mi _ . _ taagken _ Jesus-em _ kayagtekakek _ maalghug _ malig s aagh teg ni _ ne mun _ pi sqellug kek _ . _ pi kakek _ , _ " _ kaate ghesnagh kuftek _ esghagh lleqe aghte tek _ d o n ke y - gh aq _ petug nga lghii _ kitum _ alngunak _ igleghte tke ma ite kanga _ . _ iteme te luku _ tag in nak es ek _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ aapteka nge istek _ whaten _ , _ ' _ sa naqe stegnegu _ ? _ ' _ ungip aan nak es ek _ , _ ' _ Atan ghem _ atuqe yug aa _ . _ taaqe ghesnagh kunigu _ veghute ste naagh aa _ . _ ' _ "
enkaam _ ne mun _ kaate lutek _ tume nite luku _ esghaghkagh ak _ d o n ke y - gh aq _ petug nga lghii _ mangteghagh m _ amig an _ tu ng ang akun _ . _ I tem sim al uku
yug t _ nekevghatu aghte te lghiit _ tawani _ aaptekagh gket _ , _ " _ sangan _ iteme te stegnegu _ d o n ke y - gh aq _ ? _ "
kiimsigh iqe aik _ Jesus-em _ apeghtugh llegh atun _ enkaam _ yug t _ nepiigh tke agket _ .
Jesus - mun _ kaat ute te luku _ d o n ke y - gh aq _ , _ qaasligh at _ atkuyaag tek _ teghig ke sagh m _ qaye akun _ lli yagneki _ , _ Jesus _ uugte luni _ igleghtekagh _ .
tamaakut _ yug lghute t _ igleghte te lghiit _ tume tgun _ saul- ghqu qu ait _ qaasligh at _ atkuyaag teng _ , _ ila it _ avayagh meng _ ququngagh leg meng _ ikute aqe luteng _ tume t _ sa aghte qugh vikekagh it _ .
Jesus-em _ siv ung an il ngu ut lu _ k i ngu ng an il ngu ut lu _ akilghuu tke aat _ , _ " _ usuqnagh ghhalek _ kiyaghnegh _ ! _ kiyaghnegh m _ quya ste ligu _ tagi lghii _ ategh akun _ Atan ghem _ !
kiyaghnegh m _ quya ste ligu _ tagi lghii _ ataneghpag u llegh a _ sivunegh mta _ D av i d -em _ ! _ usuqnagh ghhalek _ kiyaghnegh _ qu l igh pig agh m el nguq _ qilag mi _ ! _ "
Jesus _ kaate luni _ J er us al em - e mun _ , _ aglaghkagh _ temple- mun _ . _ tawani _ sa u a _ qamagte luku _ yuvghiigh qagh a _ . _ Wh an i ku ngu l ghii _ , _ k el qell uki _ qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ke luku _ malig s aagh t en i _ aglaghkagh _ B et h an y - mun _ .
unaami ani _ , _ B et h an y - meng _ uteghnigh te kete luku _ Jesus _ iyataghkagh _ .
uyavagh neng _ esgha qaa _ f ig s -em _ uqfig a _ ququngaghtuqagh _ , _ enkaam _ esghagh yaghtuqagh a _ f ig s - el g un ay uk an _ . _ K aa saq min igu _ ququngagh raaghinagh u uq _ , _ qayughllak _ salin _ f ig s - et _ piite yug nigh ite ngugh t _ .
Jesus-em _ uqfig _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ allameng llu _ kitum _ alngunak _ f ig s - e tugh v ik n aanghi taa ten _ ! _ " _ M al ig s aagh teng it a _ nagatekagh at _ .
kaate yameng _ J er us al em - e mun _ , _ Jesus _ , _ temple- mun _ pi ke aq _ . _ tawani _ aag negh squgh ke ai _ tukfightugh lghiit llu _ akilpegagh lghiit llu _ . _ mani meng _ n av egh qugh tet _ t ip el ng it _ ullegh qugh qu ai _ , _ aqumutagh it llu _ qawaag meng _ ak il p eg agh tet _ .
nangaqaghte yaghqaa nanigh stekagh i llu _ kinku t _ alngunak _ sa meng _ tugumiigh leg t _ T em p l e -em _ manughagh akun _ .
taagken _ apeghtugh qu ai _ yug t _ , _ " _ kiyaghnegh _ pi kau uq _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ , _ ' _ mangteghagh ka _ , _ yughaghvig u yaghqaa uq _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ yug anun _ nuna m _ . _ ' _ iwernga _ elpek si _ iigh aghv ig ugh tagh si _ w ay aghn iigh t en un _ ! _ "
Ch i e f _ p r i es t- et lu _ , _ apeghtugh i kayug t llu _ liilightuusagh neng _ nagaqugh luku _ tawaten _ pi llgh a _ , _ akuz im gh h utk eg kaa t _ naten _ tuqute lleghqagh meng _ , _ naqam _ alike magh an _ . _ alikekagh at _ , _ qayughllak _ qamagte luteng _ yug lghute ghllag t _ saghiigha yagute u kangit _ apeghiigh llegh i _ .
I ghi v g agh y ag u _ Jesus -en kut _ maligte yaaghtekete te lghiit _ aghulaqekagh t _ J er us al em - e meng _ .
unaangu luku _ igleghte te kete luku _ esghaghkagh at _ f ig s -em _ uqfig a _ p al igh waagh umalghii _ akugh ghhagh minun _ kenlanga _ .
P e te r -em _ esghagh luku _ neqagh tke a _ Jesus-em _ pi llgh a _ . _ enkaam _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ apeghtugh i sta _ , _ ii-i _ , _ f ig s -em _ uqfig a _ i negh teng ng w aaq an _ p al igh waagh um aaq _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ ugpeqe teggu _ kiyaghnegh _ .
ipa _ ungipaate amsi _ , _ kitum _ alngunak _ mal gh uk l ill ngun ani _ ilu mikun _ , _ ugpeqe gkumiki llu _ akuzite ni _ pi yaghqaa ta i _ , _ una _ naayghagh _ whaten _ pi kunigu _ , _ ' _ kellii nun _ ategh i _ , _ ' _ taawa _ apeghiigh yaghqaa uq _ ellnga nun _ .
enkaam _ ungipaate amsi _ : _ sa u a _ alngunak _ ak l uk egk agh si _ yughagh tke gkufsigu _ ugpeqe luku _ all g egh s aghq aq ut si _ , _ taawa _ all g egh lleq agh si _ .
nekeve negh gpesini _ yughagh na lusi _ , _ seghevute aqe teki _ seghletun _ pi s te si _ , _ enkaam _ ata gpesi _ q ilag m el ngu u m _ seghevute lleqe ai _ seghleghqe lleg si _ . _ "
iwernga _ seghevute i nghite kufsi _ , _ talwa _ ata gpesi _ q ilag m el ngu u m _ seghevute naanghite ai _ seghleghqe lleg si _ .
Jesus -en kut _ maligte yaaghtekete te lghiit _ k aan neq ig tek at _ J er us al em - e mun _ . _ Jesus _ igleghte ma luku _ T em p l e -em _ manughagh ani _ , _ c h i e f _ p r i es t- et lu _ , _ apeghtugh i kayug t llu _ liilightuusagh neng _ , _ El d er - et lu _ taku luku
aaptekagh at _ , _ " _ S aam _ pi lleghqagh akun _ aane ste qugh ziki _ ak il p eg agh tet _ ? _ kitum _ qelegh llegh akun _ tawaten _ pi u ziin _ ? _ "
Jesus-em _ kiimsigh iqe ai _ , _ " _ ungipaate lleqe amsi _ kitum _ q el el gh akun _ tawaten _ pi kau tke a _ kiimsigh kufsinga _ .
J o h n -em _ p aap taa y egh i llgh a _ kiyaghnegh meng _ pi u a _ , _ nalighmeng _ yug neng _ ? _ ungipaate ngnga _ . _ "
E ll meg g neng _ akuz im gh h utk at _ , _ " _ kiyaghnegh meng _ pik n i kum teg gu _ , _ pi lleqe ainkut _ , _ ' _ S ang an Ê¼ ng am _ ugpeq en ghi s teg gu _ John _ ? _ '
yug neng _ pik n i kum teg gu _ yug t _ angu yiite lleqe ainkut _ . _ " _ ( _ alingekagh t _ yug neng _ , _ qayughllak _ yug t _ qamagte luteng _ ugpeqe u kangat _ John _ uuknaliqe i ste u ta a _ . _ )
enkaam _ Jesus _ kiimsigh iqe aat _ , _ " _ nallukagh ut _ . _ " _ Jesus-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ whanga llu _ ungipaate naanghite amsi _ kitum _ qelegh llegh akun _ tawaten _ pi kau tke a _ . _ "
taagken _ Jesus-em _ ungipaghaate tgun _ aleghqugh qu ai _ . _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ taawa nguq _ yuug _ piite tesiigh aqe aq _ grapes- meng _ , _ mingllu sigh ke a llu _ u v it anga _ piitesighaghvig ni _ . _ laag te gkakek _ grapes- mun _ qageghqugh sigh k _ , _ nekeftekagh a llu _ kelengake i vigkagh _ . _ taagken _ piitesighaghvig ni _ n av ghi t k aa _ grapes- meng _ pii te si ghagh t en un _ neng i tes qell uni _ , _ enkaam _ ellnga _ natmun _ aghulaqekagh _ .
saghna yaghqaaghte yata _ ataasigh _ qep ghagh t en i _ keveg aqekagh a _ nengigh ni _ g r ap es - et _ aq f as qell uki _ .
kaate yan _ taakut _ af l eng ak is tet _ akuqagh luku _ q ev ut iigh luku _ ava u na an _ aglagh stekagh at _ .
keveg aqlaatagh qagh a _ ila a _ qep ghagh t en i _ . _ taana _ naa s q w akun _ kiitigh qu luku _ , _ kayngusaghagh te stekagh at _ .
keveg aqe i i laataghkagh _ ila aneng _ qep ghagh te mi _ enkaam _ taana _ tuqu tke aat _ . _ ila i llu _ qep ghagh te l gh ut en i _ ke v g aq en gh ak i _ legan _ tawaten _ pi aqe kangit _ , _ ila it _ qevute i aqe ait _ , _ ila it _ tuqu qugh qu ait _ .
" _ qenwat _ ataasighhaaghte uq _ keveg aqe yaghqagh a _ , _ ighnegh a _ piniqumtaagh a _ . _ keveg aqekagh a _ sumeghtaghagh magh mi _ whaten _ , _ ' _ ighnegh ka _ sii vag kete lleqe aat _ . _ '
iwernga _ taakut _ af l eng ak is tet _ ila teng _ pi ke ait _ , _ ' _ U u m _ pi liite yaghqaqe a _ una _ piitesigh u aghagh vig _ . _ tuqute lteggu _ enkaam _ piitesigh u aghagh vig _ whangkuta _ pi lii lleq agh put _ ! _ '
enkaam _ akuqagh luku _ , _ tuqute luku _ yugusigh a _ egtekagh at _ piitesigh u aghagh vig meng _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ aaptekagh i _ , _ " _ S all eq ang Ê¼ ng am _ piitesigh u aghagh vig leg _ ? _ tagi luni _ n av ghi t iv ik egk aq saq en ni _ taakut _ tuqu qugh luki _ , _ enkaam _ piitesigh u aghagh vig ni _ alla nun _ n av ghi lleq aa _ .
A t igh t iig as teg gu _ una _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ ? _ ' _ uyghag _ mang tegh angll agh tet _ ighsakekagh at _ pi yalghiimi _ megnu nagh lleghpigagh u uq _ uyghag _ .
taana _ Atan ghem _ apeghiigh kaqe a _ , _ A ll aagh ll u wh agh yug n a pig tuq _ ! _ ' _ "
J e w s - et _ iglegh ut is teng it a _ tugu yu pigtekaqsagh kangat _ , _ qayughllak _ liigike lghiit _ ungipaghaate tgun _ Jesus-em _ ellngit _ akuzite kaqe ai _ . _ iwernga _ alingekagh t _ yug lghute neng _ enkaam _ unite luku _ aghulaqekagh t _ .
Taa m _ kingu aneng _ J e w s - et _ iglegh ut is teng it a _ kayagtekagh it _ ila i _ P h a ris e es - et lu _ malig s aagh teng illu _ H er o d -em _ an ag n iil q av ig ii s qell uku _ Jesus _ . _ kayagtekagh it _ an ag n iil q av ig ii s qell uku _ akuzillegh akun _ .
kaate luku _ pi ke aat _ , _ " _ apeghtugh i sta _ , _ liisimake amken _ ataasiighmete uten _ . _ waakigate aten _ yug t _ sumeghtaghagh llegh it _ , _ talwa _ waakigate aten _ yug t _ sa u yagh nga a ta _ , _ iwernga _ ip a pi gh qell u ten _ apeghtuusagh ke aqe an _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke llegh a _ yug nun _ . _ ungipaate aghte kut _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ liilightuusagh ani _ elqughutngagh a _ llivike i lleghqagh ut _ t a x -en eng _ C a es ar - mun _ ? _ L l iv ik il taa - a _ nalighmeng _ pi nghite lta _ ? _ "
iwernga _ Jesus-em _ liisimake kangi _ seghletun _ pi u kangat _ enkaam _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ sangama _ anag vig igh naqutke ste ngnga _ ? _ M an il it agh teng nga _ , _ esghaqagh lakun _ . _ "
tuune yatni _ aaptekagh i _ , _ " _ kitum _ gginagh ke agu llu _ ategh kagu llu _ una _ ? _ " _ kiimsigh iqe aat _ , _ " _ C a es ar -em _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ tuune teki _ C a es ar - mun _ tamaakut _ C a es ar -em _ pi i _ . _ tuune teki _ kiyaghnegh mun _ tamaakut _ kiyaghnegh m _ pi i _ . _ " _ enkaam _ saghiigha yagutekagh at _ Jesus _ .
taagken _ ila i _ S a d d u c e es - et _ , _ Jesus - mun _ pikagh t _ . _ ( _ tamaakut _ pi aqe lghiit _ tuqukagh t _ unguvagh yaghqaa nghite ni luki _ . _ )
pi ke aat _ , _ " _ apeghtugh i sta _ , _ M o s es -em _ liilightuusagh ngllagh kaqe ainkut _ whaten _ , _ ' _ yuug _ nuliigh leg _ avaquti gpenani _ tuqu kan _ ang leg ut ang an _ tugu yaghqaqe a _ aghnagh _ avaquti tete na luku _ anglegute ni _ tuqukagh _ . _ '
taawa nguq _ m aagh r ag v in l ek _ yug t _ anglegute ke te lghiit _ . _ nuyeklighpigagh _ nulightugh luni _ avaquti gpenani _ tuqukagh _ .
enkaam _ tuungligh ghhagh n _ tugukagh a _ aghnagh _ , _ iwernga _ ellnga llu _ tuqukagh _ avaquti gpenani _ . _ pingayut ii ta an _ tugu luku _ aghnagh _ , _ tuqukagh _ avaquti gpenani _ .
qamagte luteng _ tugu aqe luku _ aghnagh _ tuqu laghate tke aat _ avaquti gpenateng _ . _ kingulighpigagh u luni _ aghnagh _ tuqukagh _ .
qamagte luteng _ maaghraghvinleg _ anglegute ke te lghiit _ n ul igh q egk aq saq angat _ . _ aghneghmi _ tawani _ tuqukagh t _ unguvagh uute llegh itni _ , _ naligh ita _ aghnagh _ n ul igh qell eq ag u _ ? _ "
Jesus-em _ kiimsigh iqe ai _ , _ " _ sumeghtaghagh lleg si _ anaggute nga ut _ qayughllak _ liigike igate kesi _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ , _ nalluke kesi llu _ kiyaghnegh m _ agh tugh yaghq aanghi llgh a _ .
tuqukagh t _ unguvagh uute kumeng _ tuqu llegh meng _ , _ q ilag m el ngugh es tun _ yaquleg stun _ ayuqe yaghqaa ut _ , _ nengughte te saghqagh u nghite ut _ .
A t igh t iig as teg gu u _ kiyaghnegh m _ apegh llegh a _ tuqukagh t _ unguva lleghqagh itneng _ tuqu llegh meng _ ? _ M o s es -em _ igagh ani _ apegh nga uq _ kumaghugh nga lghii mi _ uqfig llegagh mi _ . _ tawani _ kiyaghnegh m _ pika qaa _ moses _ , _ ' _ whanga _ kiyaghnegh ke aanga _ A b r a h am -em _ , _ kiyaghnegh ke aanga _ I s aa c -em _ , _ kiyaghnegh ke aanga _ J a c o b -em _ . _ '
taana _ whaten _ pi sigh u uq _ , _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ kiyaghnegh ke nghite aat _ tuqukagh t _ , _ kiyaghnegh ke aat _ unguva lghiit _ . _ enkaam _ anaggute pigte ma usi _ ! _ "
apeghtugh i kayug _ liilightuusagh neng _ tagi luni _ nagatekagh i _ aaghtiiraagh te lghiit _ . _ nagate luku _ Jesus-em _ kiimsigh i laataqu llegh a _ S a d d u c e es -en un _ , _ aaptekagh a _ , _ " _ N a tu ng aa wa _ liilightuusagh _ megnu nagh lleghpigagh _ ? _ "
Jesus-em _ kiimsigh iqe a _ , _ " _ M eg nun all eg pig aq _ un ang u uq _ : _ ' _ nagate tek _ , _ I s r a el - egh m ii ni _ ! _ atanegh _ kiyaghnegh ut _ t aan ang in aghh aag uq _ atanegh _ .
atanegh _ kiyaghnegh n _ piniqe yaghqaqe an _ tea- ma ghhagh akun _ ilu gpegun _ , _ tea- ma ghhagh akun _ unguva sigh gpegun _ , _ tea- ma ghhagh akun _ umyugagh gpegun _ , _ qamagte luku llu _ iknaqe llegh gpegun _ . _ '
T u ung l igh h a _ whatete uq _ : _ ' _ piniqe yaghqaqe aten _ yug lgute ten _ , _ piniqe llegh gpetun _ el pen eng _ katam _ . _ ' _ alla _ liilightuusagh ite uq _ taa ku g e tun _ megnu naghtutka lghii meng _ . _ "
apeghtugh i kayug m _ liilightuusagh neng _ Jesus _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ apeghtugh i sta _ , _ elqughaghte an _ ! _ ipa u uq _ taana _ pi llgh en _ , _ atanegh _ t aan ang in aghh aag uq _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ alla _ avangite uq _ kiyaghnegh meng _ iwerngaqun _ ellnga _ .
enkaam _ yug m _ piniqe yaghqaqe a _ kiyaghnegh _ tea- ma ghhagh akun _ ilu mi _ , _ tea- ma ghhagh akun _ umyugagh gmi _ , _ tea- ma ghhagh akun llu _ iknaqe llegh mi _ . _ piniqe yaghqaqe ai llu _ yug lgute ni _ katam _ ellmi neng _ piniqe llegh mitun _ . _ taake uk _ liilightuusagh k _ megnu nagh aghagh uk _ paneghte luku _ tunusagh kekagh neng _ , _ nalighmeng _ aghqe tkekagh neng _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ liigike yamigu _ yug m _ kiimsigh te a _ elqughutngagh lghii _ , _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ qantaghante uten _ ataneghpag u llegh aneng _ kiyaghnegh m _ . _ " _ Taa m _ kingu aneng _ kitum _ alngunak _ tetug yagutekagh a _ aap qugh aa negh meng _ Jesus _ .
temple- mi _ , _ Jesus-em _ apeghtugh i te kete luku _ aaptekagh i _ , _ " _ sangan _ apeghtugh i kayug t _ liilightuusagh neng _ pi aqe atgu _ Christ- a _ D av i d - mun _ ighnegh ke ni luku _ ?
agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ David _ whaten _ pi stekaqe a _ , _ ' _ Atan ghem _ pi a _ atanegh ka _ : _ aqume i _ whagun _ aghenqignegh mkun _ kenlanga _ anguyag ten _ itegagh gpek _ asi anun _ lli aghte lleg mnun _ . _ '
" _ D av i d -em _ ellnga n _ katam _ atigh kaqe a _ , _ ' _ atanegh meng _ ' _ enkaam _ naten _ Christ- a _ ighnegh ke agu _ D av i d -em _ ? _ " _ yug lghute t _ quyake sigh ke i nagh luku _ nagatekagh at _ Jesus _ .
apeghtugh te kete luki _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ kelenga lusi _ apeghtugh i kayug neng _ liilightuusagh neng _ . _ aate yuneghtu ut _ atkuyaagh meng _ akughtuqagh meng _ , _ igleghte yuneghtu ut llu _ akilpegaghvig ni _ yug nun _ qu ngugh f ik es qell uteng _ .
aqume yuneghtu ut _ aa ng waagh ugh tek at _ aqumutagh itgun _ , _ s y nag o gu e- n illu _ neqenghaghqe lghii ni llu _ .
esghaghlaataqu aqe ait _ ugingighagh t _ mangteghiigh aqe luki _ . _ taagken _ pinigh ni luteng _ pi s qell uteng _ taake luku _ yughagh aqe ut _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ aghyuugh lleg nge ghllag yaghqaa ut _ ! _ "
temple- mi _ , _ Jesus-em _ aqumga te kete luku _ tu ng ang akun _ manilghutagh m _ , _ esghapagkagh i _ yug lghute t _ kanaghtagh igh aatagh lghiit _ mani meggneng _ . _ A k l ung il nguut _ yug lghute t _ mani lghute meng _ kanagh qughkagh t _ .
taagken _ akluma lghii _ ugi igh aq _ itegh luni _ kanaghtekakek _ maalghug _ mani ngiighhagh k _ , _ qerngagh egmek _ pen n y - ngu f tu k _ .
Jesus-em _ malig s aagh t en i _ tuqlugh luki _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ ipa _ ungipaate amsi _ , _ uu m _ aklumalghii m _ ugingighagh m _ tuune gkakek _ qaayghuti u uk _ ak l ung il nguut _ tuune ke ii te neng _ .
yug t _ kanaghte i u ut _ aklungi meggneng _ , _ iwernga _ uu m _ aghnagh m _ kanagh a _ qamagte luku _ mani ngiighhagh ni _ , _ ak l uk ngu yaq anga _ ellmi nun _ kiyagh u sigh q aa luku _ . _ "
Jesus _ aane ma luku _ temple- meng _ , _ ataasigh m _ maligte yaaghte yan _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ apeghtugh i sta _ , _ ii-i _ ! _ esghaqagh ki qun _ maakut _ pinighnagh ghllag t _ mangteghagh t _ uyghag ghrukutaaghllag neng _ ulimaagh t _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ E s ghagh si k ii _ mangteghagh ghllag t _ maakut _ ? _ talwa _ ataasigh _ uyghag _ n em in in n aanghi tuq _ ; _ qamagte luteng _ ullegh qugh yaghqaa ut _ . _ "
M o un t _ O l iv es - mi _ , _ Jesus _ ellng in aghh agh mi _ aqumga ma luku _ temple- mun _ ayuqe luni _ , _ P e te r -en kut _ J am es -en kut _ J o h n -en kut _ A n d r e w - n kut _ takukagh at _ .
aaptekagh at _ , _ " _ ungipaate kut _ , _ qakun _ tamaakut _ pi yaghqau aat _ ? _ sa u lleqe a _ liisimake sighqagh ut _ tamaakut _ apeghiigh lleghqagh itnun _ ? _ "
Jesus-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ kelenga tek _ , _ kitumun _ alngunak _ puughte ste gpenasi _ .
uglagh u pigte lghii _ tagi yaghqaa uq _ atuqe luku _ ategh ka _ , _ whaten _ pi aqe luteng _ , _ ' _ ellnga u unga _ ! _ ' _ enkaam _ uglagh u pigte lghii _ puughte qugh yaghqaqe aat _ .
nagaqugh kufsiki _ pi ll u w at _ , _ akusqaghtagh u tke llegh t llu _ pi ll u w at _ , _ alinge gpenasi _ . _ tamaa na _ pi yaghqaa uq _ , _ salin _ iqugte naqngu nghite uq _ .
nuna m _ ramke i _ pi ll u w u tu ll equ t _ , _ nuna m llu _ ataneghpag u llegh i _ s ugh ug aa ll equ t _ , _ nuna t llu _ nani _ alngunak _ tu y ep egh tagh aq luteng _ pi yaghqaa ut _ , _ neqangisag ghllag aqe luni llu _ pi yaghqaa uq _ . _ qamagte luteng _ tamaakut _ aghnagh m _ ighni yu kestagh llegh atun _ ayuqe ut _ .
" _ iwernga _ elpek si _ kelenga lusi _ . _ tugu lusi _ ag ghi s t en un _ aglagh u lleqe aisi _ . _ S y nag o gu e- ni _ kagsagmig lleqe aisi _ . _ whanga _ apallugh ke lunga _ nekeve lleqe usi _ sivu itni _ iglegh ut is te t lu _ umiileg t llu _ ungipaghte u lusi _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ .
pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ ungipagh ke yaghqaa ut _ tea- ma anun _ ramke nun _ sivungagh ni _ iqugte llegh m _ .
tugu lusi _ aglagh u uute kangisi _ nanqigtivig mun _ sumeghtaghagh kestagh gpenasi _ akuzite kaghqagh meng _ . _ pi lleghqagh _ kaate aqe gkan _ akuzi aqe naagh usi _ pi sqe llegh gpesistun _ , _ qayughllak _ elpesi u naanghite ut _ akuzi lghiit _ , _ agleghnagh lghiik _ taghneghagh k _ elpesigun _ akuzi aqe naagh uk _ .
yug t _ anglegute teng _ tuqute ste lleqe ait _ , _ yug t _ avaqutagh teng _ taw at egh pig aq _ pi ste lleqe ait _ . _ taghnughhagh t llu _ angayuqagh teng _ k ip ull g in aagh luki _ tuqute ste lleqe ait _ .
whanga _ apallugh ke lunga _ qamagte luni _ yug m _ ugumiite lleqe aisi _ . _ iwernga _ kina _ alngunak _ nuqete neghtuqagh _ kenle mun _ yuguligh lleg nge yaghqaa uq _ . _ "
( _ yeqay _ atightugh lghii m _ liigike ligu _ una _ uuknaliqe llegh _ ! _ ) _ " _ esghagh kufsigu _ aglegh niigh te i sta _ paaghqite te ste i lghii _ , _ nekaghqagh ke nghite ke mini _ nekeve lghii _ , _ tamaakut _ J u d e a- m el nguut _ anagniigh ghhaat _ naayghagh nun _ .
yuug _ mangteghagh m _ qaye anite ngughk _ qamavek _ kelqesaghqagh meng _ aqfate te qugh a mi _ pi lghaaq _ .
yug m _ pii te si ghagh v ig m el ngu u m _ qaasligh gni _ aq f af q aam i ke k _ pi lghaaq _ .
S egh legh waagh un aq nguut _ tamaakut _ qumig leg t llu _ mamaghti igh lghiit llu _ tamaani _ aghnegh ni _ !
yughaghte k _ kiyaghnegh mun _ uksugh mi _ tawaten _ pi fqaan _ pi sqellug qu _ !
qayughllak _ tamaani _ aghnegh ni _ seghlegh ligh u aagh _ seghlegh atagh aa yaghq aag uq _ seghleliigh aqe llegh neng _ ima _ kiyaghnegh m _ ulima yuwhaagh llegh aneng _ nuna _ wh av e mun _ kenlanga _ . _ allameng llu _ taw ate l nguq _ seghlegh ligh u aagh _ pi naanghite uq _ .
Atan ghem _ takelli mangite yagh kaki _ tamaakut _ aghnegh t _ , _ kina _ alngunak _ unguva nayagh nghite uq _ . _ iwernga _ apallugh ke luki _ nakmikegkagh ni _ aghnegh t _ takelli kaqe ai _ .
" _ taagken _ kitum _ alngunak _ pi kangisi _ , _ ' _ esghaghte ggu _ , _ Christ- a _ whaa _ ! _ ' _ nalighmeng _ ' _ esghaghte ggu _ , _ tazigna _ esgha _ ! _ ' _ ugpeqe gpenaan _ .
Christ- a sigh waagh et lu _ u uk nal iq is te sigh waagh et lu _ allgegh uute yaghqaa ut _ . _ A ll aagh ll u wh agh t igh llag aat agh yaghq aag ut lu _ , _ sagh iigh an aghq egh llag aat agh yaghq aag ut lu _ puughte qugh na luki _ yug t _ , _ talwa _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmikegkagh i _ p uugh saq leg u ku meg tek i _ pi lleqe ait _ .
enkaam _ kelenga lusi _ ! _ sa meng _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ ungipaate kestagh amsi _ tamaakut _ pi ste gpenaki _ .
" _ ' _ kingu aneng _ taa m _ seghleliigh llegh ghllag m _ siqinegh _ mamleg lleqe uq _ , _ tanqigh _ nighugte te nanigh lleqe uq _ ,
ighaleqetaagh t _ ifkagh qu uute lleqe ut _ qilaga meng _ , _ agh tugh yaghq aanghi llgh et _ q ilag am el nguut _ iglegha llegh it _ alngunaghqe ste lleqe ut _ . _ '
" _ taagken _ yug t _ esghagh lleqe aat _ ighnegh a _ yug m _ tagi lghii _ q il aw aagh teg gun _ agh tugh yaghq aanghi ll el igh llag l un illu _ n igh ugh qell el igh llag l un illu _ .
" _ taagken _ yaquleg t _ kayagte lleqe ai _ q er ngugh tes qell uki _ nakmikegkagh ni _ yug t _ nunatagh ghhagh aneng _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ .
" _ liite vike teggu _ f ig s -em _ uqfig a _ . _ avayagh i _ unite te lugh u i aghagh luteng _ ququngagh i _ piite kestagh kata _ sungaghyug ketu te _ lii simak ell eq agh si _ kiig yaghtugh llegh _ .
F ig s -em _ uqfigagh neng _ liite llegh gpesistun _ esghagh kufsiki _ tamaakut _ q ilag am el nguut _ apegh lleg mtun _ pi lghiit _ , _ lii simak ell eq agh si _ ighnegh an _ yug m _ kaate yaghtugh ngestagh llegh a _ , _ aaqun _ amig mun _ lliigh ma uq _ .
ipa _ ungipaate amsi _ , _ maaten _ unguva lghiit _ tuqu naanghite ut _ sivungagh ni _ qamagte luteng _ tamaakut _ pi lleghqagh ita _ .
qilag a llu _ nuna llu _ aviighute yaghqaa uk _ , _ iwernga _ whanga _ akuzite nka _ aviigh u sagqagh u nghite ut _ .
" _ iwernga _ kitum _ alngunak _ nalluke a _ nani _ aghneghmi llu _ aflu mi llu _ tagi yaghqaa ta a _ . _ talwa _ yaquleg t _ q ilag m el nguut _ nalluke aat _ , _ ighnegh m llu _ nalluke a _ , _ ata inagh ghhagh m _ liisimake a _ .
kelenga tek _ , _ waaknanigh gpenasi _ qayughllak _ nallukagh i _ qakun _ tagi lleghqagh a _ .
yug tun _ ayuqe yaghqaa uq _ natmun _ pi lghii tun _ . _ aghulaqe llghite luni _ qep ghagh t en i _ aflengake i ste ngllagh lleqe ai _ mangteghagh minun _ , _ ungipaate lleqe ai llu _ sa yaghqagh itneng _ . _ A m ig n iigh te min un llu _ kelengake sqekagh a _ uteghnigh lleghqagh ni _ .
enkaam _ elpek si _ kelenga tek _ , _ qayughllak _ nallukagh i _ qakun _ mangteghagh leg _ uteghnigh yaghqaa ta a _ . _ walluumllu _ tagi uq lli _ i ghi v g agh mi _ , _ un ug em _ qukaa ni _ , _ agh tagh aq es tam i _ , _ nalighmeng _ unaangu luku _ .
En kaa ng am _ kelenga tek _ luuraq _ kaate qaghtekuni _ qavaa lusi _ angu na yu kangisi _ .
apegh kegka _ una _ elpesi nun _ , _ tea- ma ghhagh ghllag anun _ pi u aqa _ : _ kelenga lusi _ ! _ "
neqenghaghqe lleghqagh a _ P as s o v er -em _ , _ neqenghaghqe lleghqagh a llu _ Y e as t- al ill g il ngu u m _ neqekrangllagh m _ kaate yaghqagh k _ maalghug _ aghnegh k _ atugh lukek _ . _ Ch i e f _ p r i es t- et lu _ , _ apeghtugh i kayug t llu _ liilightuusagh neng _ paninang _ agghi te u lghiit _ aksaqe luku _ tugu luku _ Jesus _ tuqute na luku _ .
iwernga _ neq en gh aghq em mi _ piyug ma ite kangat _ luuraq _ yug t _ seghleliighqagh ii ghllag na yu kata _ .
B et h an y - m i nguq _ taawa _ yuug _ atigh aqe kangat _ , _ simon _ , _ leper- a _ . _ S im o n -en ku ni _ Jesus _ negh ma luku _ , _ aghnagh _ iteghkagh _ tugumiiqe lukek _ al a b as te r - ek _ aqimleghutagh k _ akitu pigte lghiik _ tepe ngllagh sigh k _ , _ n ar d - e pig meng _ ulimaagh k _ . _ sigiqe lukek _ aqimleghutagh m _ paye kek _ kuuve gkakek _ Jesus-em _ naa s q w akun _ .
Taw an l e nguut _ ila i _ ugumi yug luteng _ ila teng _ pi ke ait _ , _ " _ sangan _ tepe ngllagh sigh k _ sakusiiqe akek _ ?
akike lukek _ allgegh te kete nayagh uk _ 3 0 0 _ siipngagh lghii mun _ d en ar ii - mun _ enkaam _ aki a _ tunqugh nayagh uq _ aklumalghii nun _ ! _ " _ taagken _ aghyuugh qu aat _ aghnagh _ .
iwernga _ Jesus-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ avelghagh teggu _ ! _ sangan _ segh l equ ugh es teg gu _ ? _ pi niigh pigte uq _ whanga mnun _ tawaten _ pi llgh a _ .
akluma lghiit _ quunpeng _ tam aan s aghq aag ut _ , _ enkaam _ qakun _ alngunak _ kayusiite aqe naagh asi _ . _ iwernga _ whanga _ quunpeng _ elpesinite naanghite unga _ .
U u m _ aghnagh m _ apeghiigh aa _ pi yaghqagh ni _ ; _ te p eng ll aghq ek es tagh aa _ yugusigh ka _ llivegh lleghqagh mnun _ .
ipa _ ungipaate amsi _ , _ nani _ alngunak _ nunatagh ghhagh ani _ tea- ma ghhagh ani _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ ungipagh ke nghmegteki _ , _ apegh aqe naagh aat _ aghnagh m _ tawaten _ pi llgh a _ yug nun _ neqamike sqellug qu _ . _ "
taagken _ Judas _ iscariot _ , _ ila at _ qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ke luku _ malig s aagh tet _ , _ c h i e f _ p r i es t- en un _ pi ke aq _ uvegh ghpagte te yug ni luku _ Jesus _ ellngit nun _ , _ tugu sqellug qu _ .
tawaten _ pi y is t eng _ elngaatall _ efqugh kekagh at _ , _ akeqekagh at llu _ m an il ill eq n il uku _ . _ enkaam _ Judas _ pi lleghqagh nge naqutkekagh _ uvegh ghpagte te na luku _ .
sivuligh _ aghnegh a _ Y e as t- al ill ghi l ngu u m _ neqekrangllagh m _ neqenghaghqe llegh a _ kaate tke aq _ . _ tawani _ aghneghmi _ , _ J e w s - et _ iiwleng _ tuqute aqe kangit _ pennagh ii aghagh aat _ P as s o v er -em _ neqenghaghqe llegh anun _ . _ M al ig s aagh tet _ aaptekagh at _ Jesus _ , _ " _ nani _ y at aagh qu ll ak en _ P as s o v er -em _ neqenghaghqe lleghqagh aneng _ ? _ "
taagken _ Jesus-em _ pi kakek _ maalghug _ malig s aagh teg ni _ , _ " _ J er us al em - e mun _ aglagh tek _ , _ yug m _ meghtagh lghii m _ nallagh lleqe i istek _ , _ malig g nak es ek _ .
mangteghagh mun _ itegh kan _ taa m _ mangteghagh m _ yug a _ pin ak es ek _ , _ ' _ apeghtughiste m _ whaten _ pi sqe aaten _ , _ nani _ maligte yaaghtekete te lghii ni _ negh naqe steggu _ P as s o v er -em _ neqenghaghqe llegh a _ ? _ '
keleg u vike lleqe i istek _ q em tam el ngugh meng _ ne ghllag meng _ , _ sa u a _ qamagte luni _ apegh iigh waagh luni _ ayuqe uq _ . _ tawani _ yataaghqe te nakefkut _ . _ "
maligsaagh tek _ aghulaqe lutek _ J er us al em - e mun _ , _ kaate yalghiimek _ sa u a _ qamagte luni _ Jesus-em _ apegh llegh atun _ ayuqe uq _ . _ enkaam _ P as s o v er -em _ neqekagh qaa _ yataaghqekagh ak _ .
I ghi v g agh y ag u _ , _ Jesus-em _ k el qell uki _ qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ke luku _ malig s aagh t en i _ aglaghkagh t _ tawavek _ mangteghagh mun _ .
neghe uute u luteng _ tipele gni _ Jesus-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ ipa _ ungipaate amsi _ , _ naligh gpesi _ neghe lgusigh i lghii m _ whanga mneng _ uvegh ghpagte te naqngu aanga _ . _ "
M al ig s aagh tet _ seghleghyug luteng _ k ip ull g us n aq _ aap qugh aaq aat _ , _ " _ whanga u a _ ? _ "
Jesus-em _ kiimsigh iqe ai _ , _ " _ N al iq agh si _ elpek si _ qula _ maalghug _ siipngagh lghii ni _ , _ whanga mnun _ maligte te luni _ sagnegh mun _ neptekanga _ neqekrangllagh _ .
ighnegh a _ yug m _ tuqu yaghqaa uq _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ pi naq n ill ghi s tun _ . _ iwernga _ seghlegh waagh un aq ngu uq _ taana _ yuug _ uvegh ghpagte te i lghii _ ighneghagh neng _ yug m _ ! _ itagnagh nayagh uq _ allgegh mangite yagh kuni _ ! _ "
neghe uute u luteng _ Jesus-em _ tugukagh a _ neqekrangllagh _ . _ iyamsiqa yug vike luku _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ aavgugh luku _ tunqugh qu ai _ malig s aagh t en i _ . _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ tugu luku _ neghe teggu _ , _ una _ yugusigh ke aqa _ . _ "
taagken _ tugu luku _ qayuusigh _ wine- meng _ imaleg _ , _ iyamsiqa yug vike luku _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ tuunekagh a _ ellngit nun _ , _ qamagte luteng _ megh vike aataghkagh at _ .
Jesus-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ una _ aaw kaqe a _ , _ taaggun _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh a _ apeghiigh yaghqaa uq _ . _ tuqu kuma _ aaw ka _ kuuve lleqe uq _ ug l aa pig llegh ii nun _ yug nun _ .
ipa _ ungipaate amsi _ , _ wine- meng _ alla _ megh naanghite unga _ kenlanga _ aghneghmi _ tawani _ w in e- egh r agh aq _ meghe gkumkun _ ataneghpag u llegh ani _ kiyaghnegh m _ . _ "
taagken _ ilagaate _ atugh luku _ , _ aane luteng _ M o un t _ O l iv es - mun _ pikagh t _ .
Jesus-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ U n iq agh aa lleq agh pesi nga _ qayughllak _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ kiyaghnegh _ pi kau uq _ , _ ' _ tuqu lleqe aqa _ penniighniigh a _ enkaam _ penniigh t _ mingug iqe lleqe ut _ . _ '
iwernga _ kingu aneng _ unguvagh stegkanganga _ galilee- mun _ aglagh kestagh lleqe unga _ sivu gpesini _ . _ "
P e te r -em _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ U n i te q egh h n aanghi tam ken _ qaywa _ ila nka _ qamagte luteng _ q im ag u utegh ngaat a _ ! _ "
Jesus-em _ pi ke aa _ peter _ , _ " _ ipa _ ungipaate amken _ , _ unukun _ r o o s te r -em _ qalghigh lleg ni _ alghigh ste gpenaan _ n all un qell eq agh pe nga _ ke t wh el l _ pi nga yu neng _ . _ "
iwernga _ P e te r -em _ sagiqe pigte luni _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ qaywa _ tuqu lgusigh yagh ghngaamken _ , _ n all un q en n aanghi tam ken _ ! _ " _ ila ita llu _ qamagte luteng _ tawaten _ pi ke aat _ .
kaate luteng _ tawavek _ atigh llegh ke lghii mun _ gethsemane- meng _ , _ Jesus-em _ pi ke ai _ malig s aagh t en i _ , _ " _ aqume tek _ taaggun _ , _ yughagh ma lunga _ . _ "
P e te r -en kut _ J am es -en kut _ J o h n -en kut _ kelqekagh i _ . _ taagken _ Jesus _ alingruugh ghllag kestaghkagh llu _ seghleliigh ghllag kestaghkagh llu _ .
enkaam _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ unguva sigh gka _ qivghu ghllagu uq _ repall _ tuqu yaghqaaghte lunga _ . _ Taw an ll usi _ kelenga lgusigh tengnga _ . _ "
T a z ing a pi gh q aagh luni _ , _ nuna mun _ sikmuute luni _ yughaghkagh _ pi lleghqagh lgu kuni _ ikfiqe sighqagh ni _ atuqe fqaan _ pi na luku _ .
pi ke aq _ , _ " _ A b b a _ , _ A taa y _ , _ sa u a _ qamagte luku _ pi yaghqaqe an _ . _ awite te gu _ una _ qayuusigh _ whanga mneng _ , _ iwernga _ whanga _ piyuke llegh ka _ avelghagh luku _ elpek _ piyuke llegh n _ pi gu _ . _ "
taagken _ t aku yaq min ik i _ pi nga yu t _ malig s aagh t en i _ , _ qavaa ut _ . _ peter _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ simon _ , _ qavaa ziin _ ? _ ataasigh ghhagh _ aflu _ tegh h um at ken negh meng _ agh tugh si gu u _ ? _ "
taagken _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ kelenga tek _ , _ yughaghte k _ , _ nan ghii qu ll eng en ghi tes qell usi _ . _ ipapestaaq _ taghneghagh k _ pi yaghqaa ghngaaghmek _ iwerngaqun _ yugusigh _ kayaate uq _ . _ "
tazingavek _ aglagh nqigte luni _ yughaghkagh _ taakut _ ataasigh t _ akuzite kete luki _ .
T aku n qig saq min ik i _ malig s aagh t en i _ , _ taawa _ qavaa te u ut _ , _ qayughllak _ qavagh m _ sakniqe stegkangi _ . _ kukriqekagh t llu _ sa meng _ pi lleghqagh meng _ .
pingayut ii te kun _ taku luki _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ taawa _ qavagh u aqe tsi _ , _ meghnaali aqe tsi _ ? _ Taw at en Ê¼ ng am _ ! _ taawa _ aflu _ kaa tuq _ , _ ighnegh a _ yug m _ uvegh ghpagte te yaghqaaghte uq _ seghlegh q es t en un _ .
nekeve tek _ , _ igleghte lta _ . _ esghaqagh teggu qun _ , _ uka _ u v egh p aq ut is tek a _ ! _ "
Jesus _ paninang _ akuzi ma luku _ , _ Judas _ kaate tke aq _ , _ qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ke luku _ malig s aagh tet _ ila at _ . _ yug lghute t _ maligtekagh at _ , _ ila i _ savigpag ligh luteng _ , _ ila i _ anagutagh ligh luteng _ . _ Ch i e f _ p r i es t- et lu _ , _ apeghtugh i kayug t llu _ liilightuusagh neng _ , _ siivanllegh t llu _ kayagtekagh it _ maligte sqellug qu _ Judas _ . _ ( _ taana _ Judas _ qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ke luku _ malig s aagh tet _ ila ke kangat _ . _ )
U v egh pag ut is te m _ pi kaqe kangi _ , _ " _ yuug _ naagh yaghqaqe a _ tugu nakesi _ , _ enkaam _ aghulaqe te nakesi _ k el eng ak is te l igh luku _ . _ "
J u d as -em _ kaat ute ke llug qu _ nagnegh vike luku _ Jesus _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ apeghtugh i sta _ ! _ " _ taagken _ naate qugh a _ .
enkaam _ Jesus _ tugu luku _ nuqneghkagh at _ .
iwernga _ ataasigh m _ taw an l e ngu u m _ savigpag ni _ nusug luku _ h ig h _ p r i es t -em _ qep ghagh te l aagh a _ sigute igh aghtekagh a _ .
taagken _ Jesus-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ T ug u yagh tugh es teng ng aa _ savigpagtuumagh gpesi _ , _ anagutaghtuumagh gpesi _ nikimqun _ w ay aghn iigh tes tun _ ayuqe lunga _ ?
Agh h ut anga _ tamaghhagh an _ apeghtugh i aqe unga _ temple- mi _ tug ung ig atagh pesi nga _ . _ iwernga _ tawaten _ pi llegh gpesigun _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ pi ll ghi t _ apeghiigh ste asi _ . _ "
taagken _ qamagte luteng _ malig s aagh tet _ unite luku _ , _ qimagugh tke aat _ .
nukalpigagh m _ maligtekagh a _ Jesus _ qiipaghagh meng _ saputagh ke i i nagh luni _ . _ tugu kaqsagh kangat
iwernga _ saputagh ni _ unite qaghte luku _ qimagkagh _ amsikagh mi _ .
taagken _ Jesus _ aglagh tke aat _ H ig h _ P r i es t -em _ mangteghagh anun _ . _ Ch i e f _ p r i es t- et lu _ , _ siivanllegh t llu _ , _ apeghtugh i kayug t llu _ liilightuusagh neng _ qamagte luteng _ taw an tu ll ghiit _ .
U y av aq aan lluni _ P e te r -em _ maligsaagh qagh a _ Jesus _ c o u r t y ar d - ng anun _ H ig h _ p r i es t -em _ mangteghagh an _ . _ tawani _ k el eng ak is tet _ akule itgun _ aqume luni _ ughugsigh iqe aq _ ken ghem _ manu ani _ .
Ch i e f _ p r i es t- et lu _ qamagte luteng llu _ ag ghi s tet _ tuqute sug pigtegkangat _ Jesus _ . _ enkaam _ tagsiqligh aqe luki _ yug t _ apegh sqekagh at _ Jesus _ sa meng _ anaggute ma ta a _ . _ iwernga _ naalkute ma ite ngugh t _ tuqute sighqagh meng _ ,
qayughllak _ uglagh pigte lghiit _ temngi _ iqlengiqe tkekagh at _ Jesus _ , _ apeghkagh it llu _ allake te lghiit _ .
taagken _ ila i _ yug t _ nekeve luteng _ iqlengiqe tkekagh at _ Jesus _ , _ pikagh t _ ,
" _ N ag at k aq agh put _ whaten _ pi lghii _ , _ ' _ una _ temple- a _ yug t _ ulimaagh at _ naafqe lleqe aqa _ . _ enkaam _ pi nga yu t _ aghnegh t _ atugh luki _ alla neng _ nekefte i lleqe unga _ yug m _ ulima aqe nghite ka aneng _ ! _ ' _ "
talwa _ taakut llu _ apegh llegh it _ allake tke aat _ .
H ig h _ priest- a _ sivu itgun _ nekeve luni _ aaptekagh a _ Jesus _ , _ " _ avutke i llegh itnun _ sa meng _ pi yaghqagh ite ziin _ ? _ "
iwernga _ Jesus _ qalleg kau ma ite ngughk _ , _ kiimsigh ma ite kanga _ . _ H ig h _ p r i es t -em _ aapte laatagh qagh a _ , _ " _ Christ- ang u z ii n _ , _ ighnegh a _ manigugh aqe ke mta _ ? _ "
Jesus-em _ kiimsigh iqe a _ , _ " _ T aan ang uu nga _ . _ E s ghagh lleq agh si _ ighnegh a _ yug m _ aqumga lghii _ aghenqignegh akun _ Agh tugh yaghq aanghi ll el g em _ . _ E s ghagh lleq agh si llu _ tagi lghii _ qilag m _ qilawaagh itgun _ ! _ "
H ig h _ P r i es t -em _ aatkagh ni _ piig luki _ pi ke aq _ , _ " _ L ii simak es teng is agh ng aam ta _ lliigh ukut _ !
N ag atagh si _ seghletun _ akuzi lghii _ , _ kiyaghnegh u ni lghii _ . _ naten _ elpek si _ agghi tke steggu _ ? _ " _ agghi llegh at _ ataasiightekagh _ , _ qamagte luteng _ tuqute yaghqaa nikagh at _ .
taagken _ ila ita _ qesigh qukagh at _ Jesus _ , _ gginagh a _ saape luku _ tenglug agaataghkagh at _ . _ aaptekagh at _ , _ " _ uuknaliqe i ste u kuvek _ , _ ungipaate kut _ kitum _ tenglug aten _ ? _ " _ taagken _ k el eng ak is tet _ tugu luku _ qasaghte aataghkagh at _ .
peter _ paninang _ qakma _ manughagh mete luku _ , _ ataasigh _ aghnagh aq _ h ig h _ p r i es t -em _ qep ghagh te nga _ tagikagh _ .
esgha qaa _ peter _ ughugsigh lghii _ . _ liisuqe yamigu _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ elpek llu _ Jesus - m et kay ug uu ten _ N a z ar et h - egh m ii mi _ . _ "
