iwernga _ mesag igh aqe aq _ , _ " _ nalluke aqa _ sa meng _ pi aqe uten _ talwa _ liigike nghite aqa _ sa meng _ pi ten _ . _ " _ taagken _ peter _ aglagh aqe uq llu _ amig mun _ aan al uni _ , _ r o o s te r - a _ qalghigh iqe aq _ .
aghnaghagh m _ qep ghagh te m _ esghagh yamigu _ allameng _ taw an l e nguut _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ una _ yuug _ taakut _ ila ke aat _ ! _ "
iwernga _ peter _ mesighagh laataghkagh _ . _ mulunghituq _ nekevgha te lghiit _ pi ke aat _ peter _ , _ " _ mesighaghpagningite uten _ , _ taakut _ ila ke aaten _ qayughllak _ elpek llu _ galilee-kagh mii u uten _ . _ "
taagken _ P e te r -em _ s ii ng v all agh meng _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ iqlengiqe u kuma _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghyuugh linga _ ! _ nalluke aqa _ yuug _ akuzi tke kesi _ ! _ "
legan _ nepiigh uq _ r o o s te r -em _ qalghigh lleg ni _ alghigh iqe a _ . _ tawani _ P e te r -em _ neqagh tke a _ Jesus-em _ whaten _ pi llgh a _ , _ " _ R o o s te r -em _ qalghigh lleg ni _ alghigh ste gpenaan _ n all un qell eq agh pe nga _ ke t wh el l _ pi nga yu neng _ . _ " _ taagken _ qiyaaghwagh ghllagkagh _ .
aghtaghagh qiinagh yagu _ c h i e f _ p r i es t- et lu _ , _ siivanllegh t llu _ , _ apeghtugh i kayug t llu _ liilightuusagh neng _ , _ qamagte luteng llu _ ag ghi s tet _ qerngughte tke aat _ agghite na luteng _ . _ taagken _ Jesus _ asighqe ste luku _ aglagh te luku _ pilate- mun _ , _ tuunekagh at _ ellnga nun _ .
P il ate -em _ aaptekagh a _ , _ " _ J e w s - et _ um iil k at aan _ ? _ " _ Jesus-em _ kiimsigh iqe a _ , _ " _ elpek _ esgha _ umiileg u ni kevnga _ . _ "
Ch i e f _ p r i es t- et _ uglagh u pigte lghii neng _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh neng _ an ag g un i kaa t _ .
P il ate -em _ aapte laatagh qagh a _ , _ " _ kiimsigh te kaghqagh ite ziin _ ? _ N ag an negh i si k ii _ uglagh u pigte lghii neng _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh neng _ anaggute ni kangaten _ ? _ "
iwernga _ Jesus _ sa meng _ pi ma nge i tke aq _ enkaam _ P il at e _ saghiigha yuke aq _ .
tea- ma ghhagh ani _ P as s o v er -em _ neqenghaghqe llegh ani _ , _ P il ate -em _ aane ste aqe kanga _ ataasigh _ anusimingllagh aq _ yug t _ nakmikegkagh at _ .
taawa nguq _ B ar a b b a s _ anusimingllaghvig mete ngughk _ , _ maligte te luni _ ila itnun _ yug nun _ yugte aghagh te aqe aq _ seghleliighqagh ii ghllag mi _ .
yug lghute t _ tagi luteng _ pilate- mun _ aane ste sqekagh at _ ataasigh _ anusimingllagh aq _ tawaten _ pi aqe llegh atun _ .
aaptekagh i _ , _ " _ A an es tes ug es teg gu u _ J e w s - et _ umiileg at _ ? _ "
P il ate -em _ lii simak ng w aaq angi _ c h i e f _ p r i es t- et _ aqinake luku _ Jesus _ tagite u kangat _ ellnga nun _ .
Ch i e f _ p r i es t- et _ aaghqute aqekagh it _ yug lghute t _ B ar a b b a s _ aane ste sqellug qu _ avelghagh luku _ Jesus _ .
P il ate -em _ yug lghute t _ aapte laataghkagh i _ , _ " _ sa naqe zikun mi _ um iil ken n iiq egk esi _ J e w s -en un _ ? _ "
akilghuukagh t _ , _ " _ qaquuragh ste gu _ ! _ "
P il ate -em _ aaptekagh i _ , _ " _ sangan _ , _ sa meng _ seghlegh meng _ pi ma a _ ? _ " _ iwernga _ ig l ag t aagh all uteng _ akilghuukagh t _ , _ " _ qaquuragh ste gu _ ! _ "
enkaam _ P il ate -em _ ef qugh s ug luki _ yug lghute t _ , _ aane stekagh a _ B ar a b b a s _ . _ taagken _ Jesus _ kagsagmig ste luku _ tuunekagh a _ pi ll u w agh t en un _ qaquurigh sqellug qu _ .
P ill u w agh tet _ itghutekagh at _ Jesus _ umiileg m _ mangteghagh anun _ ( _ atigh llegh ke lghii _ P r a et o r i u m _ ) _ . _ taagken _ pi ll u w agh te l gh u te t eng _ qerngughtekagh it _ .
Jesus - mun _ aa tes tek ag ke t _ esnegrukegtagh k _ atkuyaagh k _ . _ sikughllug meng _ qaghpa ngllagh luku _ aate stekagh at _ naa s q w akun _ .
taagken _ legasiighwagh tkekagh at _ , _ " _ Q u ul v agh am ken _ elpek _ umiileg at _ J e w s - et _ ! _ "
U nagh s iigh w agh meng _ naa s q w akun _ an ag ul egh luku _ , _ qesigh qu luku _ , _ manu akun _ segesqughte luteng _ qungughte vikekagh at _ .
legasiighwagh te kete nghmeng _ taaqe yamegteggu _ esnegrukegtagh k _ atkuyaagh kek _ mat- aghte lukek _ ellnga n _ katam _ aatkagh i _ aate stekagh it _ . _ taagken _ aane tke aat _ qaquuragh na luku _ .
tume ni _ taakwani _ nallaqagh at _ yuug _ , _ ategh ke lghii _ S im o n - meng _ , _ C y r en e- egh m ii _ , _ ata ak _ A l e x an d er -en kuk _ R u f us -en kuk _ . _ naken _ qantagha neng _ tagi u uq _ J er us al em - e mun _ . _ P ill u w agh tet _ qelegh tke aat _ S im o n - mun _ uyamig sqellug qu _ Jesus-em _ qaquuragh a _ .
Jesus _ aglagh tke aat _ G o l g o t h a- mun _ . _ ( _ golgotha _ whaten _ pi sigh u uq _ , _ " _ yug m _ N aa s q w an _ nenge a _ . _ " _ )
tawani _ tuunekagh at _ wine- meng _ m y r r h - meng _ akumekagh meng _ , _ iwernga _ Jesus-em _ ighsakekagh a _ .
taagken _ pi ll u w agh tet _ qaquuragh yamegteggu _ ategh ta ii ragh u aghte te luki _ aatkagh i _ tugulaghkagh it _ .
qaquuragh kaqe kangat _ unaangu luku _ 9 - ek l aag mi _ .
qaquuragh akun _ nekegtekagh at _ avutke i llegh eng _ igaqe nga lghii _ whaten _ , _ umiileg at _ J e w s - et _ .
maalghug llu _ wayagh niigh tek _ qaquuragh ke agket _ , _ ataasigh _ Jesus-em _ aghenqignegh akun _ , _ aag llegh a _ saghumignegh akun _ .
akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ whaten _ pi llgh at _ apeghiigh uq _ , _ " _ ila leg qite te kaqe kangat _ seghletun _ pi s t en un _ . _ "
yug t _ naghughte lghiit _ naasqugh teng _ ufsug te magh ita _ legasiighwagh tkekagh at _ Jesus _ , _ " _ seghleghhalek _ , _ elpek _ ! _ temple- a _ naafqellug qu _ nekefte yaghqaqe u kuvgu _ pi nga yu t _ aghnegh t _ atugh luki _ ,
sangan _ yug ul il u ten _ el pen eng _ qaquuragh meng _ ukig nanigh ziin _ ? _ "
Ch i e f _ p r i es t- et lu _ apeghtugh i kayug t llu _ liilightuusagh neng _ legasiighwagh tkekagh at _ Jesus _ , _ ila teng _ pi ke ait _ , _ " _ yuguligh u iqe i _ ila it _ naqam _ ellmi neng _ katam _ yugulighpag nigh nge i tuq _ !
Christ- a _ , _ umiileg a _ I s r a el -em _ , _ ukig li _ maaten _ qaquuragh meng _ , _ enkaam _ esghapag luku _ ugpeqe lteggu _ . _ " _ qaquuragh lgute kenka llu _ segh l equ uq aa k _ .
taagken _ qamagte luni _ nuna _ m am legh q w aa k aq _ aghnegh m _ qukaa neng _ kenlanga _ 3 - k l aag mun _ .
tawani _ 3 - k l aag mi _ Jesus _ akilghuu ghllagkagh _ , _ " _ El o i _ , _ El o i _ , _ l am a _ S a b a c h t h ani _ ? _ " _ whaten _ pi sigh _ , _ " _ kiyaghnegh mni _ , _ kiyaghnegh mni _ , _ sangama _ unite zinga _ ? _ "
ila ita _ yug t _ nekevgha te lghiit _ nagate luku _ pikagh t _ , _ " _ nagate aghte tek qun _ , _ elijah _ tuqlughagh aa _ ! _ "
yuug _ ataasigh _ aqfaqughkagh _ mesag igh kayug meng _ . _ taagken _ nepte luku _ qu w aal ghii mun _ wine- mun _ unaghsiighwagh qun _ nekegte luku _ nengug tke a _ Jesus - mun _ melugrigh sqellug qu _ . _ pi ke aq _ , _ " _ wiintaku _ , _ esghapag kau lteggu _ El i j a h - m _ iike yaghtugh aqe yaaghagh a _ qaquuragh meng _ ! _ "
taagken _ Jesus _ aragh ghllag luni _ tuqukagh _ .
temple- mete ngughk _ safkaaghute _ malghughqekagh _ , _ pike aq _ pikegken _ kanavek _ .
P ill u w agh tet _ um iil w aa ghi ta _ qaquuragh m _ m an ung an il ngu u m _ , _ esghapag yamigu _ Jesus _ tawaten _ tuqu lghii _ , _ pi ke aq _ , _ " _ ipapestaaq _ una _ yuug _ ighnegh ke ma agu _ kiyaghnegh m _ ! _ "
aghnagh m _ ila i _ uyavagh neng _ esghapagkagh t _ . _ Taw an te f tut _ mary _ , _ M ag d al a- gh m ii _ , _ S al o m e- llu _ , _ mary- llu _ naange ak _ uyuqligh m _ J am es -em _ , _ J o s es - em llu _ .
Jesus _ , _ galilee- mete luku _ taakut _ aghnagh t _ maligsaagh kaqe kangat llu _ kayusiite kaqe kangat llu _ . _ ila i llu _ aghnagh lghute t _ taw an l e nguut _ , _ maligte te luteng _ ellnga nun _ J er us al em - et k at _ .
taawa nguq _ yuug _ , _ ategh ke lghii _ J o s ep h - meng _ , _ A r im at h e a- gh m ii _ , _ sii vag qumtaagh _ ila at _ ag ghi s tet _ . _ ellnga n llu _ utaqa u kanga _ piinligh lleghqagh a _ ataneghpag u llegh a _ kiyaghnegh m _ . _ Wh an i ku y ag u _ , _ yataaghqe llegh m _ aghnegh ani _ , _ sivu ngiighhagh ani _ S a b b at h -em _ , _ tetug nanigh luni _ pilate- mun _ pi luni _ tungsigh iqe a _ Jesus-em _ yugusigh a _ .
P il ate -em _ saghiigha yagutekagh a _ nagaqugh luku _ Jesus _ tuqu lghaghtugh ma ni luku _ . _ enkaam _ pi ll u w agh tet _ um iil waagh at _ tagsigh luku _ aaptekagh a _ , _ " _ lluu aghagh te _ Jesus _ tuqu lghaghtugh ma a _ ? _ "
U m iil waagh meng _ liigike yamigu _ Jesus-em _ tuqu llegh a _ , _ J o s ep h - mun _ tugu sqekagh a _ yugusigh a _ .
enkaam _ Joseph _ tukfigh i yaghtuqagh _ qatelghii meng _ qiipaghagh meng _ ll ii v egh yaghq anun _ atuqe aqe ke meggneng _ . _ taagken _ iike luku _ yugusigh a _ qaquuragh meng _ , _ imeg tke a _ qiipaghagh kun _ . _ taawa nguq _ uyghag ghrukutaaghllag _ sani mineng _ ilu te mun _ laag ke aq _ llivegh u luni _ . _ tawavek _ yugusigh _ kanaghtekagh a _ . _ taagken _ uyghag ghrug ghllag _ ullghitagh a qaa _ llivegh m _ paye anun _ .
M ar y - m _ M ag d al a- gh m ii m _ , _ M ar y - m llu _ J o s es -em _ naa an _ esghapagkagh ak _ nagun _ Jesus _ lli ma ta a _ .
S a b b at h - a _ alpag yan _ mary _ , _ M ag d al a- gh m ii _ , _ mary- llu _ naange a _ J am es -em _ , _ S al o m e- llu _ , _ tepe ngllagh sigh ngekagh t _ Jesus-em _ yugusigh a _ angighhe na luku _ .
sivuligh m _ aghnegh ani _ santillegh m _ , _ unaangu pigte luku _ siqinegh _ piite kestagh u luku _ lliveghtekagh t _ .
tume mi _ taakwani _ aap qugh waagh utk at _ , _ " _ kitum ngam _ up- llghite aghtagh te naqe inkut _ uyghag ghllag meng _ llivegh m _ p aa y ng an il ngugh meng _ ? _ "
taagken _ sivugte yalghiimeng _ uyghag ghllag _ aw it ng waagh luni _ ayuqe uq _ .
llivegh mun _ itegh luteng _ esghaghkagh at _ nukalpigagh _ qatelghii meng _ atkuyaag leg _ aqumga lghii _ aghenqignegh ani _ . _ aghnagh t _ elngaatall _ saghiigha yuke aat _ .
nukalpigagh m _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ saghiigha yug gpenasi _ , _ liisimake amsi _ iv aa ng waagh si _ Jesus _ , _ N a z ar et h - egh m ii _ , _ qaquuragh kaayagh lghii _ . _ Wh aan negh i tuq _ , _ unguvagh stekau uq _ ! _ esghaqagh teggu qun _ , _ whagun _ lli kaqsagh aat _ .
ungipaate yaghtugh teki _ malig s aagh teng i _ , _ peter- llu _ , _ aga _ galilee- mun _ sivullgaagh ma uq _ pi naqe ni llegh mitun _ . _ taagani _ es ghagh lleq agh si _ . _ "
aane luteng _ anag na iqe aat _ llivegh meng _ , _ qayughllak _ kukrag yug magh meng _ alingruugh u lghiit _ , _ repall _ ungelegte luteng _ . _ talwa _ kina _ alngunak _ sa meng _ pi ma ite kangat _ , _ qayughllak _ alingruugh u lghiit _ .
sivuligh m _ aghnegh ani _ santillegh m _ , _ unaangu pigte luku _ Jesus _ unguvagh kau lghii _ tuqu llegh meng _ . _ aliigh vike yuwhaagh ke a _ mary _ , _ M ag d al a- gh m ii _ . _ ( _ aghnagh meng _ taagken _ aane stekaqe kangi _ maaghraghvinleg _ tughneghagh t _ . _ )
ungipaate yaghtugh qu ai _ ellngan isag lghiit _ qivghu ma luki _ , _ qiya ma luki _ .
iwernga _ ungip aa si s t eng _ Jesus _ unguvagh ma ni luku _ tuqu llegh meng _ , _ ellmi nun llu _ esghagh ma ni luku _ ugpeqe ma ite kangat _ .
Taa m _ kingu aneng _ Jesus-em _ alla u luni _ aliigh vike gkakek _ maalghug _ malig s aagh teg ni _ , _ navek _ pi ma lukek _ .
uteghnigh lutek _ ungipite kaqsagh kangik _ ila tek _ iwernga _ ugpeqe ma ite kegket _ .
Taa m _ kingu aneng _ Jesus-em _ aliigh vikekagh i _ qula _ ataasigh _ siipnegh ke luku _ malig s aagh t en i _ neghe uute ma luki _ . _ aghyuugh qu ai _ ugpeqe i nghite llegh itneng llu _ aygughike llegh itneng llu _ esghagh tke aat _ ellmi neng _ unguvagh ste llegh mi _ kingu aneng _ .
pi ke ai _ , _ " _ aghulaqe lusi _ nunatagh ghhagh anun _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ ungipagh qite ki _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ yug nun _ .
kina _ alngunak _ ugpeqe i lghii llu _ paaptaaye lghii llu _ yuguligh lleg nge yaghqaa uq _ . _ iwernga _ kina _ alngunak _ ugpeqe i nghite ngughk _ aghyuugh lleg nge yaghqaa uq _ seghleghqe llegh minun _ .
ugpeqagh t _ all aagh ll u wh agh t ill equ t _ liigike sqellug qu _ agh tugh yaghq aanghi llegh t eng _ kiyaghnegh meng _ pi u ta a _ . _ enkaam _ ategh mkun _ aane ste qugh lleqe ait _ tughneghagh t _ yug neng _ ; _ akuzi lleqe ut _ alla stun _ ulu stun _ ;
tugute yagh ghngaaghmeng _ nemegh yameng _ , _ nalighmeng _ megh yagh ghngaaghmeng _ tuqunagh lghii meng _ sa naanghite ut _ ; _ qinuyug lghiit _ saafte nghmegteki _ naallghute aqe lleqe ut _ . _ "
Atan ghem _ Jesus-em _ malig s aagh t en i _ aleghqugh nghmeng _ taaqe yaki _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ mayugh stekagh a _ qilag mun _ , _ enkaam _ aqumekagh _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghenqignegh akun _ .
taagken _ malig s aagh tet _ aghulaqe luteng _ tea- ma anun _ ungipagh ke ikagh t _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ . _ Atan ghem _ qepghagh lgusighkagh i _ , _ ip a pi gh q es te kaa llu _ ungipagh _ all aagh ll u wh agh t is te llegh m i kun _ . _ amen _ .
T h e o p h il us _ , _ igagh ngllagh kaqe yuwhaagh mkun _ igaqe kaqe aqa _ qam ag teng ng waagh luku _ Jesus-em _ qepghagh llegh a llu _ apeghtugh i llegh a llu _ , _ piinligh yuwhaagh llegh aneng _ kenlanga _ kiyaghnegh m _ qilag mun _ m ay ugh tes legh anun _ . _ sivuke luni _ nakmiigh kau uq _ ap o s t l e- k aghq ameng _ enkaam _ apeghtugh ghllag kaqe ai _ uglagh pigte lghii meng _ agh tugh yaghq aanghi llgh akun _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ . _ Taa k w an ing ani _ anguyag ita _ qaquuragh luku _ tuqute kaqe aat _ iwernga _ pi nga yu t _ aghnegh t _ atugh luki _ unguvagh kau uq _ . _ unguvallegh mi _ kingu aneng _ 4 0 _ aghneq _ nuna mete kau uq _ , _ enkaam _ uglagh u pigte luku _ ap o s t l e- en un _ esghagh ste aatagh kau uq _ ipapestaaq _ unguvagh ma ni luni _ , _ aleghqugh na luki llu _ ataneghpag u llegh aneng _ kiyaghnegh m _ . _ allameng _ qerngughte te yata _ Jesus-em _ liilightugh qu ai _ ap o s t l e- et _ , _ " _ wataghllak _ aghulaqe gpenasi _ J er us al em - e meng _ kenlanga _ all g egh te llegh pesi nun _ agleghnagh lghiik _ taghneghagh k _ . _ ata ma _ akequsagh ke kaqe ak _ tuune lleqe ni lukek _ elpesi nun _ katam _ tawaten _ apegh lleg mtun _ . _ John _ p aap taa y egh i kaa g uq _ megh kun _ , _ iwernga _ ata ma _ p aap taa y e yagh tu ng es tagh ii si _ agleghnagh lghii gneng _ taghneghagh gneng _ . _ " _ Taa ku s ta _ igaqegkagh nka _ igagh ngllagh kaqe yuwhaagh mkun _ .
sivu ngiighhagh ani _ Jesus-em _ mayugh lleghqagh an _ qilag mun _ , _ ap o s t l e- et _ qerngughte te yameng _ aaptekagh at _ Jesus _ , _ " _ atanegh _ , _ I s r a el -em _ at an gh ut i llgh a _ pi s neq ig g naq si gu u _ ? _ "
Jesus-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ ata inagh ghhagh ma _ liisimake ai _ qayughllak _ ellnga n _ agh tugh yaghq aanghi llegh m i kun _ uspeqe kaqe ai _ . _ elpek si _ liisimake yaghqaqe nghite asi _ sa u aat _ qakun _ pi lleghqagh i _ .
iwernga _ agh tugh yaghq aanghi ll eng ell equ si _ agleghnagh lghiik _ taghneghagh k _ itegh kayek _ ilu gpesinun _ . _ taagken _ ungip aq ell eq agh pesi nga _ J er us al em - e mi _ , _ J u d e a- mi _ , _ S am ar i a- mi _ , _ uy av agh p an illu _ nuna ni _ . _ "
akuzi nghmeng _ taaqe yan _ kiyaghnegh m _ mayugh stekagh a _ qilag mun _ . _ esghapag te ma luku _ qilawaagh m _ talughtekagh a _ esghagh ma llegh itneng _ .
A p o s t l e- et _ qule mun _ esghapag uute ma luki _ , _ maalghug _ yug k _ qatelghii meng _ aate kaqe lghiik _ aliigh aghtekagh k _ saaghw itgun _ .
pi ke aik _ , _ " _ yug itni _ G al il e e- m _ , _ sangafsi _ qule mun _ esghapag uute aqe tsi _ ? _ taagna _ Jesus _ kiyaghnegh m _ mayugh stekanga _ ukig yaghqaa uq _ esgh ap all egh pesi s tu ng w aaq _ mayugh llegh atun _ qilag mun _ . _ "
taagken _ ap o s t l e- et _ uteghnigh iqe aat _ J er us al em - e mun _ M o un t _ O l iv es - meng _ . _ M o un t _ Olives _ q an tagh aghh an l e nguq _ J er us al em - e meng _ .
P e te r -en kut _ , _ J o h n -en kut _ , _ J am es -en kut _ , _ A n d r e w - n kut _ , _ P h il ip -en kut _ , _ T h o m as -en kut _ , _ B ar t h o l o m e w - n kut _ , _ M at t h e w - n kut _ , _ James _ , _ ighnegh a _ A l p h a e us -em _ , _ Judas _ , _ ighnegh a _ J am es -em _ , _ simon _ Z e al o t- a _ , _ kaate luteng _ J er us al em - e mun _ mat- yuqagh t _ qemtagh mun _ nayugh meggnun _ .
taakut _ ap o s t l e- et _ , _ aghnagh t llu _ ugpeqagh t _ , _ mary- llu _ Jesus-em _ naange a _ , _ Jesus-em _ ang leg ut ang illu _ qerngughte te luteng _ elngaatall _ ip a pi gh qell uteng _ yughagh aqe lghiit _ ataasigh stun _ .
taagken _ qafsina t _ aghnegh t _ atugh luki _ ugpeqagh t _ qerngughte tke aat _ , _ entaqun _ 1 2 0 - nguut _ . _ tawani _ P e te r -em _ nekeve luni _ pi ke ai _ ,
" _ U g peq aal gu tem ni _ , _ neq am ik agh si _ qep gh al g ut f ut _ Judas _ , _ Jesus-em _ nakmikegkagh a _ . _ A y um i r ug llak _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ uuknaliqe tke kaqe a _ D av i d - kun _ . _ taana _ uuknaliqe llegh _ apeghiigh kau uq _ J u d as -em _ uvegh ghpagte te aqe yagu _ Jesus _ . _ Jesus-em _ tug ii s teng i _ J u d as -em _ maghyaghqugh kaqe ai _ , _ enkaam _ akileghtuusagh nge kau uq _ mani meng _ . _ taagken _ akileghtuusagh mineng _ nuna nge luni _ qemite kau uq _ ellmi neng _ tawani _ . _ yugusigh a _ ifkagh yalghiimi _ quupaghtekagh _ repall _ ighneghagh i _ aanqaghte luteng _ . _ J er us al em - egh m iit _ nagaqugh yamegteggu _ tuquma ta a _ tawani _ nuna mi _ , _ ata iqe aat _ taana _ nuna _ A k el d am a- meng _ , _ whaten _ pi sigh _ , _ ' _ nuna _ aaghwqekagh _ . _ ' _ "
P e te r -em _ nagnegh tke ai _ , _ " _ David _ whaten _ igagh kau uq _ psalms- mi _ : _ ' _ mangteghagh a _ paaghqite te li _ , _ allameng llu _ kina _ alngunak _ taw an te f q aa mi _ pi li _ . _ ' _ igaqe kau lghii llu _ whaten _ , _ ' _ qepghaqagh a _ kitumun _ tugute yagh kuni _ . _ '
" _ enkaam _ nakmiigh lta _ ap o s t l e- k aghq ameng _ tugu sqellug qu _ J u d as -em _ qepghagh kaqsagh kanga _ . _ kina _ nakmike lteggu _ maligsaagh ikagh _ whang kun neng _ iglegha lgusigh aqe yamteggu _ Jesus _ . _ Taw an te kaa l ghii _ ima _ J o h n -em _ ungipagh ke llegh aneng _ paaptaaye llegh _ kenlanga _ kiyaghnegh m _ mayugh ste llegh anun _ Jesus _ qilag mun _ . _ enkaam _ whang kun nun _ maligte te luni _ ungipagh li _ ellmi nun llu _ esghagh ma ni luku _ Jesus _ unguvallegh an _ kingu aneng _ . _ "
enkaam _ ugpeqagh t _ nakmikegkagh gket _ maalghug _ yug k _ : _ M at t h i as -en kuk _ , _ Joseph _ J us tu s -en kuk _ , _ allameng _ ategh leg _ B ar s a b b as - meng _ .
taagken _ yughaghkagh t _ , _ " _ atanegh _ , _ simigh i stekaghqagh nge yug aqe ukut _ J u d as - mun _ , _ qayughllak _ unite kanga _ qepghaqagh ni _ nekaghqagh minun _ aglagh lghii _ . _ qamagte luku _ umyugagh _ liisima kan _ . _ enkaam _ naligh _ nakmike zigu _ ap o s t l e- ngu luku _ qep ghagh tek aghq aq _ elpenun _ ? _ "
taagken _ maalghug _ uyghag k _ sa mun _ kanaghte lukek _ aghul as aq meg teg gu _ aag llegh a _ aanqaghte yalghiimi _ M at t h i as - ngu f tuq _ nakmikegkagh _ . _ enkaam _ ila tke aq _ qula _ ataasigh _ siipnegh ke luku _ ap o s t l e- en un _ .
P en te c o s t -em _ aghnegh anun _ J er us al em - egh m iit _ ugpeqagh t _ qerngughte tke aat _ ataasigh mi _ mangteghagh mi _ .
taagken _ nuuskagllagan _ anuqe ghllag stun _ sulug ghllag m _ qilag meng _ pamaken _ ukig luni _ i mi qaa _ mangteghagh _ .
taagken _ llangaqa _ ulusugnite ngugh t _ key- nghhagh at _ allgeghkagh t _ , _ esghapagkagh it _ ila meggnun _ n ek egh q aa ll ghiit _ .
enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ imeg iqe ai _ agleghnagh lghii gneng _ taghneghagh gneng _ qamagte luki _ taw an l e nguut _ . _ taghneghagh m _ agh tugh yaghq aanghi llegh m i kun _ akuzi stekagh i _ n aku m ii s tun _ .
tamaa nguq _ J er us al em - e mi _ , _ J e w s - et _ kiyaghnegh mun _ qaatke te nga lghiit _ . _ naken _ nuna neng _ tagi aqe luteng _ J er us al em - egh m ii ngugh qu utk at _ .
nagaqugh te yameng _ sulug ghllag meng _ upleg tke ait _ ugpeqagh t _ qerngughte vig itnun _ . _ kaate yalghiimeng _ n aku m ii s tun _ ugpeqagh t _ akuzite ghllagu ut _ repall _ kukriqe tkekagh it _ .
saghiigha yagute magh ita _ pikagh t _ , _ " _ ukut _ akuzite lghiit _ galilee-kagh mii u ut _ .
naten _ ukut _ qamagte luta _ akuzillegh mtestun _ akuzi ut _ nallukngwaaghkagh meggneng _ ?
whaa _ wh aan tu tut _ P ar t h i a- gh m iit _ , _ M e d i a- gh m iit _ , _ El am - egh m iit _ , _ M es o p o tam i a- gh m iit _ , _ J u d e a- gh m iit _ , _ C ap p a d o c i a- gh m iit _ , _ P o n tu s - egh m iit _ , _ A si a- gh m iit _ ,
P h r y g i a- gh m iit _ , _ P am p h y ll i a- gh m iit _ , _ E g y p t- egh m iit _ , _ L i b y a- gh m iit _ C y r en e -em _ tu ng ang aneng _ pi t _ , _ C r e te - egh m iit _ , _ A r a b i a- gh m iit _ , _ whaa _ whaante ut llu _ R o m e- e meng _ laalighte aat _ J e w s - et _ , _ G en t il e- et lu _ maniguute kayug t _ J e w s - es tun _ . _ nagate aput _ akuzillegh mtestun _ ungipagh ut _ kiyaghnegh m _ apeghiigh llegh ghllag aneng _ . _ "
Q am ag teng ng waagh luteng _ saghiigha yagutekagh it llu _ kukriqe tkekagh it llu _ ugpeqagh t _ , _ enkaam _ ell meg g neng _ aap qugh waagh utk at _ , _ " _ sa aqe aat _ ukut _ ? _ "
iwernga _ ila ita _ nenglaghyugsagh tke magh ita _ pi ke ait _ , _ " _ ukut _ yug t _ meghe ghllagu ut _ ! _ "
peter- llu _ taw an l e nguq _ ap o s t l e- el g ut min i _ . _ nekeve luni _ iglagtu luni _ yug t _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ J e w - l gu tem ni _ , _ nagate u aqe aghte ngnga _ .
meghe ghllagu ni ghngaaghpesikut _ meghe ghllagu nghite ukut _ nutaan qun _ 9 - ek l aa k anga _ unaangu luku _ .
una _ whaten _ aneghte llegh _ J o el -em _ uuknaliqe tke kaqe a _ whaten _ :
' _ kiyaghnegh _ pi kau uq _ , _ kinguligh ni _ aghnegh ni _ taghneghagh gka _ kayagte yaghqaqe agka _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ yug nun _ . _ enkaam _ ighnegh si _ , _ panig si _ uuknaliqe yaghqaa ut _ , _ nukalpigagh si _ esghaghwaagh yaghqaa ut _ , _ nanevgagh si _ qavangugh yaghqaa ut _ .
talwa _ qep ghagh tem nun _ yug nun llu _ aghnagh nun llu _ taghneghagh gka _ kayagte yaghqaqe agka _ u uk nal iq es qell uki _ .
yug nun _ esghaghtesaghqagh ke anka _ sa u aat _ saghiigha nagh lghiit _ qilag mi llu _ nuna mi llu _ : _ aa k w h _ , _ kenegh _ , _ agepsugh ghllag _ ,
siqi i negh _ mamlegte yaghqagh _ , _ tanqigh _ kavighte yaghqagh _ aaw stun _ . _ tamaakut _ kingu itneng _ megnu nagh pigte lghii _ Atan ghem _ nanqigtivigkagh a _ aghneq _ pi yaghqaa uq _ .
iwernga _ aghneq _ taana _ kaate ste gpenaan _ , _ kina _ alngunak _ seghevute sqe lghii _ atanegh mun _ yuguligh lleg nge yaghqaa uq _ . _ ' _ tawaten _ Joel _ uuknaliqe kau uq _ .
" _ I s r a el - egh m ii ni _ , _ nagate aghte ngnga _ , _ liisimakekagh i _ N a z ar et h - egh m ii _ Jesus _ , _ uglagh pigte luku _ all aagh ll u wh agh t igh llag aat aq aal ghii _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ tawaten _ pi stekaqe a _ agh tugh yaghq aanghi llegh m i kun _ elpesi nun _ liite sqellug qu _ ellmi nun _ nakmike kaqe te ni _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ liisima llegh mikun _ tuune kaqe a _ Jesus _ elpesi nun _ piyuke llegh gpesistun _ pi sqellug qu _ . _ taagken _ elpek si _ q aq uu r agh tes tagh si _ tam aa ku nun _ w aa k ig al ngugh nun _ kiyaghnegh m _ liilightuusagh anun _ .
iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuqu llegh meng _ unguvagh stekaqe a _ , _ iteme te kaqe a _ tuqu llegh m _ asighqe te llegh aneng _ , _ talwa _ tuqu llegh m _ nuqneghpagningite kaqe a _ .
D av i d -em _ akuzite kegka qaa _ Jesus _ whaten _ : _ ' _ esghagh aqe aqa _ atanegh _ sivu mnite luku _ quunpeng _ : _ unite igate aanga _ , _ en kaa ng am _ seghlegh mun _ qaprag snaanghite unga _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ qaame na ke _ quya ghllagu uq _ , _ akuzillegh nka _ quya lleg perewaagh meng _ ayuqe ut _ . _ tuqu yaghqaa ghngaaghma _ sighimake naqe amken _ atanegh _ ,
qayughllak _ unite naanghite agken _ unguva sigh gka _ tuquma lghii ni _ , _ talwa _ seghleghqe ma ite ngugh m _ yugusigh a _ aghu snaanghite an _ .
A pegh tuq aq agh pe nga _ kenle ite ngugh meng _ unguvallegh nge lleghqagh meng _ , _ whang am n i sim ang in all egh p ek _ quya ste ghllagu aanga _ . _ ' _ "
P e te r -em _ nagnegh tke ai _ , _ " _ J e w - l gu tem ni _ , _ wh at egh ll u w aaq _ apegh yug aqa _ sivunegh ut _ David _ . _ liisimakagh ut _ tuqu kau uq _ , _ llivegh a llu _ n aan tu l anga _ liisimakagh ut _ .
unguva u luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ akeqe kaqe a _ , _ ' _ ipapestaaq _ k ing un gh en _ ataasigh _ igleghte te i yaghqaa uq _ yug gpeneng _ . _ ' _ D av i d -em _ uuknaliqe i ste u te mineng _ liisimake kaqe a _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh a _ . _ uuknaliqe tke kaqe a _ Christ- a _ tuquma lghiinite naanghite ni luku _ talwa _ yugusigh a _ aghu naanghite ni luku _ , _ unguvagh kau ni luku _ tuqu llegh meng _ .
T aan ang u uq _ Jesus _ kiyaghnegh m _ unguv agh tek aa _ tuqu llegh meng _ enkaam _ whangkuta _ liisimake i ste u ukut _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ nekegtekaqe a _ Jesus _ aghenqignegh mikun _ , _ tawaten _ qu ul v aq aqaa _ . _ akeqe llegh mitun _ Jesus _ , _ tuune kaqe ak _ agleghnagh lghiik _ taghneghagh k _ ellnga nun _ , _ enkaam _ Jesus-em _ whang kun nun _ tuune ak _ . _ tamaakut _ saghiigha nagh lghiit _ esghagh kesi _ , _ nagate kesi _ taghneghagh m _ agh tugh yaghq aanghi llgh akun _ pi llgh u ut _ .
" _ David _ pi kau uq _ whaten _ : _ ' _ Atan ghem _ pi a _ atanegh ka _ , _ aqume i _ aghenqignegh mkun _ kenlanga _ kayaalqe ste lleg mnun _ anguyag ten _ . _ ' _ David _ mayugh ma ite u te mineng _ qilag mun _ Jesus - e tun _ , _ ellmi neng _ akuz it ke ng ngun ghi tuq _ , _ akuz it ke ng ng w aa _ Jesus _ .
" _ Ung ip aat agh ll am si _ qamagte lusi _ I s r a el - egh m ii ni _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ ipapestaaq _ nakmike kaqe a _ Jesus _ Atan gh ul u ku llu _ Christ- ang ul u ku llu _ . _ T aan ang u uq _ Jesus _ qaquuraghkagh i _ ! _ "
yug t _ nagate luku _ peter _ , _ seghleghyug ghllagkagh t _ enkaam _ peter- llu _ ap o s t l e- el g ut ang illu _ aaptekagh it _ , _ " _ U g peq aal gu tem n ni _ , _ sa naqe sta _ ? _ "
P e te r -em _ kiimsigh iqe ai _ , _ " _ A v utegh qell usi _ , _ seghlegh q en nan igh l usi _ qiive tek _ kiyaghnegh mun _ , _ p aap taa y e tek lu _ ategh akun _ Jesus _ Christ- am _ , _ seghleghqe lleg si _ segh ev u te ll eng es qell uki _ , _ enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ tunute yakek _ agleghnagh lghiik _ taghneghagh k _ allgegh tekek _ .
atanegh _ kiyaghnegh ut _ tawaten _ pi yaghqaa uq _ , _ qayughllak _ akequsagh ke kaqe ak _ taghneghagh gni _ elpesi nun _ , _ kingunegh gpesinun _ , _ kitum u te llu _ alngunak _ uy av agh p an sagh ng aan _ tuqlughkagh minun _ . _ "
P e te r -em _ taw a teng in aq _ pi gpenaki _ wata _ sa meng _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh meng _ pi ke ai _ . _ kelenga sagh uqagh i llu _ , _ " _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghyuugh yaghqaqe ai _ seghletun _ pi s tet _ , _ enkaam _ ellngistun _ seghletun _ pi gpenasi _ luuraq _ elpek si llu _ agh y uugh y aagh ii si _ . _ "
taagken _ ugpeqe i lghiit _ ungipagh aneng _ paaptaayekagh t _ . _ enkaam _ tawani _ aghneghmi _ 3 , 0 0 0 _ yuug _ ila tke aq _ ugpeqagh nun _ .
ugpeqagh t _ iiwleng _ qerngughte te u lghiit _ liite na luteng _ ap o s t l e- en eng _ . _ Christ- akun _ anglegute ke te lghii stun _ kiyaghte aaghet _ , _ negh aqe lghiit _ , _ yughagh aqe lghiit _ qerngagh meng _ .
A p o s t l e- et _ uglagh ghngaan _ all aagh ll u wh agh t i kaa l ghiit _ kiyaghnegh m _ agh tugh yaghq aanghi llgh akun _ . _ enkaam _ qamagte luni _ saghiigha yug kau lghii _ , _ tallugh yagute kaqe kangat llu _ kiyaghnegh _ .
ugpeqagh t _ qamagte luteng _ nagneqagh u lghiit _ ataasigh stun _ , _ saghya teng _ atunem _ atuqe luki _ .
akike luki _ nuna teng llu _ saghya teng llu _ , _ allgegh ta teng _ mani t _ tuune aqe kangit _ sa meng _ aklu lghii nun _ .
Agh h ut anga _ tamaghhagh an _ qerngughte te aqe lghiit _ temple- mi _ . _ neghe lgute ngllagh aqe luki _ ila teng _ , _ quyake sigh ke i nagh luki _ neqe teng _ upugha te sigh ke aqe kangit _ .
kitumun _ alngunak _ piniqe nigh ghllag t _ , _ usuqe manginagh aqe kangat llu _ kiyaghnegh _ . _ Agh h ut anga _ tamaghhagh an _ Atan ghem _ yug ul ing uk angi _ yug t _ , _ enkaam _ ugpeqagh t _ nula ma inagh ke aat _ .
taagken _ P e te r -en kuk _ J o h n -en kuk _ aglaghkagh k _ temple- mun _ 3 - k l aag em _ yughagh te llegh ani _ .
taawa nguq _ yuug _ piyug igate ngughk _ ima _ allgegh nghhagh ghhagh u te mineng _ , _ aqume luni _ tu ng ang akun _ T em p l e -em _ iteghvig ani _ atigh llegh ke lghii _ , _ pinighnagh lghii _ amig ghllag _ . _ Agh h ut anga _ tamaghhagh an _ kinku t _ kevegtugh aqe kangat _ tawavek _ nagh ugh tan eng _ tungsigh naigh sqellug qu _ mani meng _ .
esghagh yamikek _ P e te r -en kuk _ J o h n -en kuk _ itegh lghiik _ temple- mun _ tungsigh vike gkakek _ mani meng _ .
qerngagh egmek _ esghagh luku _ yuug _ tawavek _ , _ P e te r -em _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ ukavek _ qiive i _ whangkutegnun _ . _ "
sighima pigte luni _ tuune aqe ni luni _ qiive gkakek _ .
P e te r -em _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ M an iq r ag g iit ng waagh tu nga _ iwernga _ sa meng _ tuune aqe amken _ . _ ategh akun _ Jesus _ Christ- am _ N a z ar et h - egh m ii m _ , _ piyug i _ ! _ "
tugu luki _ aghenqignegh i _ iigge i _ ne ke v e sim al uku _ yug m _ itegagh i llu _ tukughagh i llu _ ik naq ugh tek at _ ,
repall _ qetgegh kau magh mi _ nekevekagh _ aga _ piyug inagh magh mi _ pi ke aq _ . _ taagken _ maligte lukek _ iteghkagh _ temple- mun _ piyug magh mi _ , _ qetgegh qaghaqe luni _ , _ usuqe magh an _ kiyaghnegh _ .
T em p l e- m e tu ll ghii m _ esghaghkagh at _ piyug lghii _ , _ usuqe i lghii _ kiyaghnegh meng _ .
liisuqekagh at _ tu ng sigh r agh te ngu y alghii _ aqume luni _ tu ng ang ani _ iteghvig an _ T em p l e -em _ . _ saghiigha yagutekagh at _ esghagh yamegteggu _ yuug _ piyug lghii _ .
paninang _ naallghutekagh m _ yug m _ P e te r -en kuk _ J o h n -en kuk _ qete nga ma lukek _ , _ yug lghute m _ saghiigha yug magh meng _ kangllu qaghtekagh it _ S o l o m o n -em _ P o r c h - ng ani _ .
P e te r -em _ esghagh yamiki _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ I s r a el - egh m ii ni _ , _ sangafsi _ saghiigha yug tsi _ ? _ sangamta _ esghapag uute ste kut _ ? _ P i yug tes negh it agh p un g _ una _ yuug _ agh tugh yaghq aanghi ll em teg n eg un _ , _ nalighmeng _ pinigh te mtegneng _ . _ piyug igate ngugh m _ yug m _ Jesus _ ugpeq saq min igu _ naallghute uq _ .
A b r a h am -en kut _ , _ I s aa c -en kut _ , _ J a c o b -en kut _ , _ sivunegh mta llu _ qamagte luteng _ manigugh qite te a _ kiyaghnegh m _ qu ul v agh aa _ Q ep ghagh t en i _ Jesus _ . _ iwernga _ elpek si _ ag l aatk aq agh si _ pilate- mun _ nanqigte sqellug qu _ , _ igh s ak egk aq agh si llu _ P il ate -em _ iteme te yug aqe yagu _ .
yeghlegi _ pilate- mun _ yugte aghagh llegh ke aq _ i tem u tes q egk aq agh si _ ighsake luku _ Jesus _ , _ seghleghqe ma ite ngughk _ , _ qaatke te nga ghllag lghii _ .
tawaten _ pi llegh gpesigun _ tuqu tes tek aq agh si _ unguvallegh m _ A ll g egh v ig pig aa _ , _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ unguvagh stekaqe a _ tuqu llegh meng _ . _ L ii simak ng waagh agh p un g _ , _ qayughllak _ esghaqaghkagh ung _ unguvallegh an _ kingu aneng _ enkaam _ apegh yaghq aq agh p un g _ .
esghagh kesi _ una _ yuug _ nekevgha lghii _ sivu gpesini _ , _ qamagte lusi _ liisimakagh i _ piyug igate yagh lghii u uq _ ima _ allgegh nghhagh ghhagh u te mineng _ . _ I k naq ugh te kaa g uq _ ugpeqe luku _ ategh a _ taa m _ ataasigh m _ Jesus-em _ kiyaghnegh m _ unguv agh te kaa n _ tuqu llegh meng _ . _ aa-a _ , _ ugpeqe i llegh an _ Jesus - kun _ naa llgh ut ng waagh aa _ , _ esghagh kesi _ maaten _ .
" _ J e w - l gu tem ni _ , _ neghigh luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ aapte qugh a _ u uk nal iq is te t gun _ nakmikegkagh ni _ Christ- a _ ikfiqe luni _ tuqu lleqe ni luku _ . _ taana _ uuknaliqe llegh at _ apeghiigh kau uq _ igleghte te i stekete te lghii ni _ tuqute ste aqe yafsigu _ Jesus _ , _ nalluke luku _ Christ- ang ut anga _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ av utegh qell usi _ , _ seghlegh q en nan igh l usi _ qiive tek _ kiyaghnegh mun _ . _ ugpeqe teggu _ atanegh _ enkaam _ sangigte lleqe ai _ seghleghqe lleg si _ .
tawaten _ pi kufsi _ Atan ghem _ nutaghte aqe naagh ai _ taghneghagh si _ , _ kay ag g neq ig lleq aa llu _ Jesus _ nakmikegkagh ni _ Christ- ang ul uku _ elpesi nun _ .
iwernga _ Jesus _ tagi vagilgami _ qilag mete yaghqaa uq _ kenlanga _ kiyaghnegh m _ nutaghte llegh anun _ sa u a _ qamagte luku _ . _ tawaten _ kiyaghnegh _ akeqe i kau uq _ neghigh luku _ u uk nal iq is te t gun _ aaftekagh mikun _ ellmi nun _ qep ghagh te ngu luki _ .
moses _ pi kau uq _ , _ ' _ Atan ghem _ kiyaghnegh m _ uuknaliqe i sta _ nakmike lleqe a _ yug gpesineng _ , _ whanga _ nakmike llegh mitun _ uuknaliqe i ste u lunga _ . _ N ag at ng waagh nak esi _ akuzillegh a _ qamagte luku _ .
tamaakut _ nagate nghite ngugh t _ u uk nal iq is te mun _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug aneng _ aafte luki _ tuqute yaghqaa ut _ . _ '
" _ sa u a _ maana _ atugh ut _ kiyaghte lleg mnni _ S am u el -em _ uuknaliqe tke kaqe a _ . _ S am u el -em _ kingu aneng _ ila ita llu _ u uk nal iq is tet _ u uk nal iq ut q egk aq iit _ .
kingunegh ke aisi _ u uk nal iq is tet _ enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ apeghkagh i _ akequsagh t _ ellngitgun _ , _ elpesi nun llu _ pi u ut _ . _ Taw at egh pig aq _ A b r a h am - em llu _ kingunegh ke aisi _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ akeqe aqe yamiki _ sivunegh si _ A b r a h am - kun _ whaten _ , _ ' _ abraham _ , _ kingunegh gpegun _ quya ste lleqe anka _ qam ag teng ng waagh luki _ nuna m _ yug i _ , _ ' _ akequsagh _ taana _ elpesi nun llu _ pi u uq _ .
En kaa ng am _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmikegkagh ni _ Q ep ghagh t en i _ kayagte yuwhaagh kaqe a _ elpesi nun _ . _ kayagtekaqe a _ quya ste na lusi _ qamagte lusi _ tunute ste llegh mikun _ seghleghqe ma llegh gpesineng _ . _ "
P e te r -en kuk _ J o h n -en kuk _ paninang _ ungipagh ma lukek _ S o l o m o n -em _ P o r c h - ng ani _ , _ p r i es t- et lu _ umiileg at llu _ T em p l e -em _ k el eng ak is teng it a _ , _ S a d d u c e es - et lu _ tagi laghate tke aat _ .
piyuke ma ite kangat _ ap o s t l e- ek _ apeghtuusagh ak _ yug nun _ Jesus _ unguvagh kau ni luku _ tuqu llegh meng _ , _ taa m _ ip a pi gh q egk anga _ tuqukagh t _ unguvagh yaghqaa ni luki _ unguvallegh mun _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ ap o s t l e- ek _ tugu lukek _ an u sim ing ll aq ag ke t _ . _ siingenllu _ unug naqe kanga _ un aa qu si t k ag ke t _ nanqigte gpenakek _ .
iwernga _ tamaa na _ ila a _ uglagh pigte lghii _ nagatekagh _ P e te r -en ku g neng _ J o h n -en ku g neng _ ugpegh uute tke aq _ . _ En kaa ng am _ yuggagh inagh t _ ugpeqagh t _ entaqun _ 5 , 0 0 0 - ngugh tek at _ , _ aghnagh t llu _ taghnughhagh t llu _ ugpeqagh t _ ilate gpenaki _ .
unaami ani _ J er us al em - e mi _ qerngughte tke aat _ J e w s - et _ iglegh ut is teng it _ , _ siivanllegh t _ , _ apeghtugh i kayug t llu _ liilightuusagh neng _ ,
H ig h _ priest- a _ A n n a s _ , _ C a i ap h a s _ , _ John _ , _ alexander _ , _ ila i llu _ h ig h _ p r i es t -em _ ilakwaagh i _ .
taagken _ ap o s t l e- ek _ tagite ste lukek _ aaptekagh gket _ , _ " _ kitum _ agh tugh yaghq aanghi llgh akun _ yuug _ piyugte sag u te stegnegu _ ? _ kitum _ ategh a _ atuqe luku _ tawaten _ pi stek _ ? _ "
P e te r -em _ kiimsigh iqe ai _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ agh tugh yaghq aanghi llgh akun _ , _ " _ I g legh ut is t en illu _ siivanllegh ni llu _ ,
aap tagh pesi kun g _ aneghneghte i lleg mtegneng _ , _ naten _ naallghute ma ta a _ piyug igate ngughk _ yuug _ .
En kaa ng am _ liigike sug amsi _ qamagte lusi _ , _ ila i llu _ I s r a el - egh m iit _ qamagte luki _ naten _ una _ yuug _ naallghute kau ta a _ . _ naallghute kau uq _ ategh akun _ Jesus _ Christ- am _ N a z ar et h - egh m ii m _ . _ ellnga n _ agh tugh yaghq aanghi llgh an _ naallghute kaqe a _ , _ elpek si _ qaquuraghkagh gpesi _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ unguvagh stekagh an _ tuqu llegh meng _ . _ enkaam _ una _ yuug _ piyug igate yagh lghii _ whaa _ maaten _ nekevgha uq _ sivu gpesini _ .
Jesus - ngu uq _ ukut _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ pi ke aat _ , _ ' _ uyghag _ ighsakekagh i _ elpek si _ mang tegh angll agh t en i _ , _ pi yalghiimi _ megnu nagh lleghpigagh u uq _ uyghag _ . _ '
enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ kayagtekaqe a _ nuna mun _ , _ ellng in aghh aag uq _ yuguligh i yaghqagh _ . _ alla _ naten _ yuug _ yuguligh lleg nge naanghite uq _ iwerngaqun _ aat agh akun _ Jesus-em _ . _ "
J e w s - et _ ag ghi s teng it a _ sagh iigh ay ag utk ag ke t _ P e te r -en kuk _ J o h n -en kuk _ tetug nghite llegh gkeneng _ , _ qayughllak _ liisimake kegket _ igaghyagh ma ite ngugh k _ . _ L iig ik saq meg te ke k _ Jesus - m et kaa t meg neng _ tawaten _ akuzi u uk _ .
enkaam _ aaghtiiraaghpag nigh nge i tke agket _ , _ qayughllak _ esghaghkagh at _ yuug _ naa llgh ut ng waagh luni _ nekevgha lghii _ P e te r -en ku g ni _ J o h n -en ku g ni _ .
agghi vig meng _ ag ghi s tet _ aane stekagh it _ P e te r -en kut _ J o h n -en kut _ naagh llegh u tke aq llu _ yuug _ , _ enkaam _ ellngit _ agghi te inagh u magh meng _ pikagh t _ .
A ap qugh aagh utk at _ ell meg g neng _ , _ " _ naten _ pi naqe stekek _ yug k _ ? _ seghleghhalek _ ipa u ni naqagh ut _ all aagh ll u wh agh t i llgh ak _ , _ qayughllak _ J er us al em - egh m iit _ qamagte luteng _ liisimake aat _ .
taawanginaq _ ineghte yagh kumtekek _ alla llu _ akuzi tke fqaan _ Jesus _ pi sqellug qu _ kitumun _ alngunak _ wata _ kinku t _ alngunak _ nagaqugh na yu katgu _ . _ "
enkaam _ itegh ste lukek _ i negh teng ng w aaq ag ke t _ , _ " _ allameng llu _ akuzi tke fqaan _ , _ apeghtuusagh ke fqaan _ Jesus _ pin ak es ek _ . _ "
iwernga _ P e te r -en kuk _ J o h n -en kuk _ kiimsigh iqe ait _ , _ " _ Q aatk ell am si i _ kiyaghnegh _ avelghagh luku _ ? _ naligh _ efqugh nagh a _ kiyaghnegh mi _ ? _ ataasiighte ki _ umyugagh si _ .
whangkutung _ akuzite kete nghmeng _ taa q n aanghi tagh p un g _ esghaghkagh ung llu _ nagaqughkagh ung llu _ . _ "
A g ghi s tet _ aghyuughpag nigh nge i tke agket _ , _ qayughllak _ qamagte luteng _ yug t _ usuqe kangat _ kiyaghnegh _ all aagh ll u wh agh t i llegh mun _ . _ enkaam _ temngi _ alingsequ lukek _ aan es tek ag ke t _ .
taana _ yuug _ 4 0 _ ayumiqullegh _ siipngaan _ uksughtutka lghii _ , _ piyugpagningite yagh lghii _ iwernga _ maaten _ naallghute lghii _ .
P e te r -en kuk _ J o h n -en kuk _ aan e si s tek _ aglaghkagh k _ ugpeq aal g ut meg nun _ . _ ungipagh ke ak _ c h i e f _ p r i es t- et lu _ siivanllegh t llu _ pi ll ghi t neng _ .
nagate lukek _ ataasiighte luteng _ yughaghkagh t _ kiyaghnegh mun _ , _ " _ atanegh _ , _ ulima kaqe aten _ qilag _ , _ nuna _ , _ megh _ , _ sa u a llu _ alngunak _ taa kun il nguq _ , _ igleghte te u aten llu _ qamagte luki _ .
A y um i r ug llak _ A g legh n alghii g ne kun _ T aghnegh ag ne kun _ akuzi kau uten _ sivunegh mteggun _ D av i d - kun _ qep ghagh teg p eg un _ whaten _ , _ ' _ sangan _ G en t il e- et _ temngi _ s ak r itu tegh llag t at ke k _ Atan gh en kuk _ Christ- aku ll ghii k _ , _ sangan llu _ yug t _ seghletun _ piyug pigte atkek _ pipagningite ghngaaghmegtekek _ ?
nuna m _ umiileg i llu _ iglegh ut is te t lu _ qerngughte te luteng _ yataaghqe te ut _ pi ll u w aghn al uk ek _ Atan gh en kuk _ Christ- aku ll ghii k _ ! _ '
" _ ipapestaaq _ maani _ J er us al em - e mi _ tawaten _ pi kau ut _ . _ H er o d -en kuk _ P o n t i us _ P il ate -en kuk _ ilate kau uk _ G en t il e- en un llu _ I s r a el - egh m iin un llu _ k ip ull g in aagh nal uku _ , _ Jesus _ seghleghqe ma ite ngughk _ Q ep ghagh ten _ , _ nakmike gkan _ Christ- ang ul uku _ .
atanegh _ lii simak ng w aaq en llu _ yataaghqe kaqe ken llu _ tawaten _ pi lleghqagh a _ enkaam _ tawaten _ pi kau ut _ .
nagate aqe aten _ maaten _ whaa _ al ing si q uk ang in kut _ ikfiqe ste lleqe ni luta _ . _ atanegh _ , _ ik naq ugh saq agh t i kut _ enkaam _ tetug gpenaamta _ ungipagh lta _ ungipagh gpeneng _ ,
whangkutgun _ naallghute ki _ q in u yuget _ , _ all aagh ll u wh agh t is t i ku t lu _ ategh akun _ Jesus-em _ , _ seghleghqe ma ite ngugh qun _ Q ep ghagh teg p eg un _ . _ "
yughagh nghmeng _ taaqe aqe ut llu _ qerngughte te vig at _ mangteghagh _ ufsug tke aq _ . _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ imeg iqe ai _ qamagte luki _ , _ enkaam _ tetug gpenateng _ ungipaghyag tke aat _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh aneng _ .
A p o s t l e- et _ agh tugh yaghq aanghi ll el igh llag luteng _ ungipagh kekagh at _ atanegh _ Jesus _ unguvagh kau ni luku _ tuqu llegh meng _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ quya ste ghllagu kangi llu _ qamagte luki _ ugpeqagh t _ . _ ugpeqagh t _ ataasigh stun _ lli aqe aat _ ilu megteggun llu _ unguva sigh megteggun llu _ . _ enkaam _ kina _ alngunak _ pi igate ngughk _ saghya teng _ ellng in agh meg g nun _ pik n il uki _ , _ atunem _ atuqe aqe kangit _ .
nunaleg t _ , _ mangteghagh leg t _ akike nghmegteki _ nuna teng llu _ mangteghagh teng llu _ , _ allgegh ta teng _ mani t _ ap o s t l e- en un _ tuune aqe kangit _ . _ enkaam _ ugpeqagh t _ sa meng _ aklu nghata _ m an il it aqegk ang it _ , _ tawaten _ kina _ alngunak _ aklu ma ite ngughk _ .
Joseph _ taw an l e nguq _ , _ C y p r us - egh m ii _ , _ L ev i -em _ k ing un gha _ , _ ellnga n llu _ akike luku _ nuna ni _ tuunekagh a _ allgegh ta ni _ ap o s t l e- en un _ . _ A p o s t l e- et _ ata iqe aat _ B ar n a b as - meng _ whaten _ pi sigh meng _ , _ " _ kayeme sta _ . _ "
taawa nguq _ yuug _ ategh a _ A nan i a s _ , _ nulighh a _ sapphire _ . _ akikekagh a _ nalighnegh a _ nuna mi _ .
nuliigh mi _ liisima nghaani _ aksaqekagh a _ ila a _ mani m _ ellmi nun _ pi u luku _ . _ taana _ siipnegh ni _ tuunekagh a _ ap o s t l e- en un _ sumegh mini _ qamagte luku _ tuune i luku _ pi sqellug qu _ .
yeghlegi _ P e te r -em _ aaptekagh a _ , _ " _ sangan _ qaute kete zigu _ tughneghagh m _ nanghiiqu llegh a _ iq l eng iq es qell u ten _ agleghnagh lghii gnun _ taghneghagh gnun _ aksaqe llegh gpegun _ ila a _ mani m _ ?
sangan _ tawaten _ sumeghtaghagh ma ziin _ ? _ yug nun _ iqlengiqe nghite uten _ , _ kiyaghnegh mun _ iqlengiqe uten _ . _ akike llghite luku _ nuna n _ elpek _ pik sagh an _ , _ enkaam _ aki kaqe yavgu _ mani a llu _ taana _ piyuke llegh gpetun _ pi yaghqaqe yagh an _ . _ "
legan _ A nan i as -em _ peter _ nagate luku _ ullegh aghte luni _ tuqukagh _ . _ nukalpigagh t _ itegh luteng _ q ii p agh akun _ imeg te luku _ yugusigh a _ aane te luku _ llivegh ke aat _ . _ ungipagh _ A nan i as -em _ iqlengiqe llegh a llu _ tuqu llegh a llu _ mingitekagh _ , _ enkaam _ nagaqugh tke aat _ alingruugh te ghllag ke aat _ .
pi nga yu t _ aflu t _ atugh luki _ A nan i as -em _ tuqu llegh aneng _ , _ nulighh a _ iteghkagh _ nalluke luku _ ugi ni _ samatagh nge a _ .
P e te r -em _ aaptekagh a _ , _ " _ tawaten _ akitutka an _ ak ik es teg n eg u u _ nuna ek _ ? _ " _ S ap p h i r a- m _ kiimsigh iqe a _ , _ " _ aa-a _ . _ "
P e te r -em _ aapte laatagh qagh a _ , _ " _ sa yaftek _ ugi ke te lghii gni _ sumeghtaghagh ma stek _ nanghiiqu na lukek _ Atan ghem _ taghneghagh kek _ ? _ yug t _ llivegh ikagh t _ ugi gpeneng _ qakma _ manughagh mete ut _ . _ elpek llu _ tawaten _ pi lleqe aaten _ . _ "
Taw an igh ll ug g iin aq _ ellnga llu _ ullegh aghte luni _ tuqukagh _ . _ nukalpigagh t _ itegh yalghiimeng _ sapphira- llu _ taawa _ tuquma lghii _ , _ enkaam _ aane te luku _ ugi an _ saaghw akun _ llivegh ke aat _ .
Q am ag teng ng waagh luteng _ ugpeqagh t _ , _ qamagte luteng llu _ nagaqugh te lghiit _ A nan i as -en kuk _ S ap p h i r a- n kuk _ tuqu llegh gkeneng _ alingruugh te ghllag ke aat _ .
yug lghute t _ qu ng ang it ni _ ap o s t l e- et _ all aagh ll u wh agh t igh llag um ang in aq at _ . _ qamagte luteng _ ugpeqagh t llu _ ap o s t l e- et lu _ qerngughte te aqe lghiit _ T em p l e -em _ manughagh ani _ ategh ke lghii mi _ , _ S o l o m o n -em _ P o r c h - ng ani _ .
iwernga _ yug t _ ugpeqe i llghite ngugh t _ Jesus - meng _ ilate igate ngugh t _ ugpeqagh nun _ qayughllak _ al ing ek an igh aq elghii t _ , _ naqam _ pinigh na iqe kangit _ .
iwernga _ ug l a pig llegh iit _ yug t llu _ aghnagh t llu _ ugpeqe u kangat _ atanegh _ Jesus _ , _ enkaam _ ugpeqagh t _ nula ma inagh ke aat _ .
A p o s t l e- et _ all aagh ll u wh agh t ill ghi t _ apallugh ke luki _ kinku t _ alngunak _ q in u yug t iit eng _ allighagh itgun _ tagite luki _ tume tgun _ lli aqe kangit _ . _ tawaten _ pi ke ait _ qayughllak _ P e te r -em _ naghughtekaki _ luuraq _ taghneghagh nge te llegh an _ naallghute na yu kaki _ qinuyug lghiit _ .
enkaam _ J er us al em - e mun _ q an tagh an l eng ugh neng _ nuna neng _ tagi laghate tke aq _ yug lghute _ J er us al em - e mun _ . _ Q in u yug t ii teng llu _ tamaakut llu _ tughneghagh leg t _ ilu megteggun _ tagi tke ait _ ap o s t l e- en un _ , _ enkaam _ qamagte luteng _ tagi tke ait _ naallghute uute tke aat _ .
H ig h _ p r i es t- en kut _ ila ke te lghiit _ S a d d u c e es - et _ aqina tke aat _ ap o s t l e- neng
enkaam _ tugu ste luki _ kanagh stekagh it _ anusimingllaghvig mun _ .
iwernga _ unug yan _ yaquleg an _ Atan ghem _ qelpeghtekagh i _ anusimingllaghvig m _ amig i _ . _ enkaam _ aane te luki _ ap o s t l e- et _ pi ke ai _ ,
" _ aglagh lusi _ temple- mun _ , _ qamagte luku _ apegh teggu _ una _ nutaghagh _ kiyagh taa ll eq _ Jesus _ Christ- akun _ ayuqe lghii _ . _ "
A p o s t l e- et _ qaatkekagh at _ yaquleg _ . _ aghtaghagh aqe a llu _ itegh luteng _ temple- mun _ apeghtugh ikagh t _ . _ H ig h _ p r i es t- en kut _ ila ke te lghiit _ qerngughtekagh it _ J e w s - et _ siivanllegh it llu _ qamagte luki llu _ ag ghi s tet _ , _ agghi te kete na luki _ ap o s t l e- et _ . _ taagken _ anusimingllaghvig m _ um iil w aa ghi t nun _ aqfa stekagh it _ ap o s t l e- et _ .
iwernga _ umiileg u aaghet _ anusimingllaghvig mun _ kaate yalghiimeng _ ap o s t l e- et _ aviite ut _ . _ enkaam _ ag ghi s t en un _ aglagh luteng _ ungipagh tke ait _ ,
" _ anusimingllaghvig mun _ kaate yalghiikut _ amig t _ m aghq aq ugh waagh ng af tut _ , _ k el eng ak is te t lu _ amignitu te ut _ naqam _ itegh yalghiikut _ paaghqite uq _ ! _ "
T em p l e -em _ k el eng ak is teng it a _ umiileg at llu _ , _ c h i e f _ p r i es t- et lu _ ungip aa si s t eng _ kukriqe tkekagh it _ samatagh nge i _ ap o s t l e- et _ .
taagken _ kitum _ itegh luni _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ taakut _ yug t _ anusimingllagh kaqsagh kesi _ inga _ temple- mi _ apeghtugh i aqe ut _ . _ "
K el eng ak is tet _ umiileg ke te lghiit _ aqfakagh it _ ap o s t l e- et _ . _ seghletun _ pi ma ite kangit _ , _ qayughllak _ alinge lghiit _ yug neng _ T em p l e- m el ngugh neng _ tuq un n ay uk ang is t eng _ m il ugh pag aat aghh iin aq _ .
tagite luki _ itghutekagh it _ ag ghi s t en un _ enkaam _ h ig h _ p r i es t -em _ pi ke ai _ ap o s t l e- et _ ,
" _ I negh teng ng w aaq aq sagh am si _ allameng llu _ apeghtugh i fqaafsi _ ategh akun _ Jesus-em _ pi s qell usi _ , _ iwernga _ qaatke ma nge itagh zikut _ ! _ yeghlegi _ allute luteng _ J er us al em - egh m iit _ liite aat _ apeghtuusagh i _ , _ whangkuta llu _ av ut ngu s naq utk agh pe kut _ Jesus-em _ tuqu llegh anun _ . _ "
P e te r -em _ kiimsigh tke ai _ ap o s t l e- et _ , _ " _ Q aatk es aghq aq agh put _ kiyaghnegh _ avelghagh luki _ yug t _ .
qaquuragh luku _ tuqu tes tek aq agh si _ Jesus _ , _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ , _ sivunegh mta _ manigugh qite te a _ unguvagh stekaqe a _ tuqu llegh meng _ .
En kaa ng am _ qu ul v aghn al uku _ Jesus _ aghenqignegh mikun _ nekegtekaqe a _ igleghte te i ste u luku llu _ yuguligh i ste u luku llu _ . _ tawaten _ pika qaa _ I s r a el - egh m iit _ av utegh q es aghq aagh tes qell uki _ seghlegh q en nan ii s qell uki _ , _ q ii v es qell uki _ kiyaghnegh mun _ , _ seghevute na luki llu _ seghleghqe llegh itneng _ .
whangkuta _ ungipaghte u ukut _ tam aa ku nun _ pi llegh nun _ , _ maligte te luta _ agleghnagh lghii gnun _ taghneghagh gnun _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuunekagh gkenun _ tam aa ku nun _ qaatke te lghii nun _ ellmi nun _ . _ "
A g ghi s tet _ s ak r itu t kaa l ghiit _ P e te r -em _ k ii m sigh y is t eng _ tawaten _ , _ repall _ tuqute yu kaqe kangit _ ap o s t l e- et _ .
iwernga _ ataasigh _ agghi sta _ nekevekagh _ akuzi na luni _ . _ G am al i el - ngu f tuq _ , _ P h a ris e e _ , _ apeghtughiste at _ J e w s - et _ liilightuusagh ita _ , _ elngaatall _ kitum _ alngunak _ q aat kum t aagh a _ . _ K el eng ak is t en un _ aane te aghte sqekagh i _ ap o s t l e- et _ .
taagken _ ag ghi s te l g ut ni _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ I s r a el - egh m iil gu tem ni _ , _ piraamsi tete luki _ taakut _ yug t _ pi teki _ .
N eq am ik en ghi s teg gu u _ qavnganghhaq _ T h e u d a s _ pi kau lghii _ igleghte te ste ghllagu ni luni _ . _ enkaam _ 4 0 0 _ yuug _ maligsaagh ikagh _ ellnga neng _ . _ iwernga _ T h e u d a s _ tuqute yatgu _ malig s aagh teng i _ qimagugh tke aat _ , _ talwa _ kitum _ alngunak _ allameng llu _ akuzi tke sug ma ite kangat _ .
Taa k w an ing ani _ J u d as - llu _ galilee-kagh mii _ , _ qerngughte ikagh _ yugkagh meng _ k av em a _ keste i ta iqe yan _ yug m _ uglaghtala aneng _ . _ iwernga _ ellnga llu _ tuqute aqe yatgu _ yug i _ mingite kau ut _ .
enkaam _ whaa _ sume mni _ itagnagh nayagh ukut _ sa fqiita _ qakemkut _ yug t _ pi yagh kumteki _ . _ E ll meg g neng _ pi u kumeng _ tawaten _ pi llgh at _ sea-te u nanigh lleqe uq _ .
iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ pil q egk ag u _ aghula i aghte naanghite asi _ , _ k ip ull g in aagh lleq agh si llu _ kiyaghnegh _ . _ " _ enkaam _ ag ghi s tet _ qaatkekagh at _ gamaliel _ .
taagken _ k el eng ak is t en un _ itghute ste luki _ ap o s t l e- et _ kagsagmig stekagh it _ . _ I negh teng ng w aaq iit lu _ ungipagh ke nanigh sqellug qu _ Jesus _ . _ apeghiigh yamegteki _ aane stekagh it _ .
A p o s t l e- et _ aan e si s t eng _ quya ghllagkagh t _ , _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ kayngusaghagh te stekaqe kangi _ Jesus _ apallugh ke luku _ .
Agh h ut anga _ tamaghhagh an _ temple- mi llu _ kinku ni llu _ ungipagh kaqe kangat _ , _ apeghtuusagh ke aqe kangat _ Jesus _ , _ Christ- ang un il uku _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmikegkagh a _ .
tamaani _ aghnegh ni _ ugpeqagh t _ nula u luki _ G r e ek - s tun _ akuzi kayug t _ J e w s - et _ seghleghyugkagh t _ , _ H e b r e w - s tun _ akuzi kayug neng _ J e w s -en eng _ , _ qayughllak _ ug ing igh agh t iit eng _ ak l uk egk iit neng _ tuun l aa ghi g al k ang it _ . _ enkaam _ yiillgikagh it _ , _ " _ Agh h ut anga _ tamaghhagh an _ uy eg t is tet _ p al as qugh h aan _ tuune aqe ait _ whangkuta _ ugingighagh put _ . _ "
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ke luku _ ap o s t l e- et _ , _ qerngughte luki _ ugpeqagh t _ pi ke ait _ , _ " _ anaggute lleqe ukut _ pegtekumteggu _ ungipagh ke i llegh ut _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta aneng _ uy eg t is teng ugh h nal uta _ .
U g peq aal gu tem n ni _ , _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ nakmike teki _ maaghraghvinleg _ yuug _ pinigh lghii _ , _ agleghnagh lghii gneng _ taghneghagh gneng _ imigh nga lghiit _ , _ peghqinegh lghiit _ , _ uyegte i ste ngllagh lleqe aput _ .
tawaten _ pi kumta _ whangkuta _ ap o s t l e- en i _ yughagh manginagh lleqe ukut _ , _ ungipagh ke i manginagh lleqe ukut _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh aneng _ . _ "
ugpeqagh t _ efqugh kekagh it _ ap o s t l e- et _ agghi llegh it _ . _ enkaam _ nakmikegkagh at _ stephen _ , _ elngaatall _ ugpeqe i nga ghllag _ kiyaghnegh meng _ , _ imigh nga lghii llu _ agleghnagh lghii gneng _ taghneghagh gneng _ . _ nakmikegkagh it llu _ P h il ip -en kut _ , _ P r o c h o r us -en kut _ , _ N i c an o r -en kut _ , _ T im o n -en kut _ , _ P ar m en as -en kut _ , _ N i c o l a us - llu _ gentile- a _ A n t i o c h - egh m ii _ J e w s - es tun _ manigugh u sag u tke aq _ .
taakut _ yug t _ tagi tke ait _ ap o s t l e- en un _ y ugh aatk es qell uki _ , _ naa s q w it gun _ saafte luki _ yughagh tkekagh it _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh i _ mingite ma inagh ke ait _ . _ enkaam _ nula kau lghiit _ ugpeqagh t _ J er us al em - e mi _ , _ p r i es t- el gh u te t lu _ ila lghute it _ ugpegh uute tke aat _ maligte te luteng _ .
stephen _ kayusillegh leg ghllag u te mineng llu _ agh tugh yaghq aanghi ll el eg llag ut min eng llu _ agleghnagh lghii gneng _ taghneghagh gneng _ all aagh ll u wh agh t igh llag aat aq aq _ .
taagken _ ila ita _ J e w s - et _ , _ C y r en e- egh m ii ngu y alghii t lu _ , _ A l e x an d r i a- gh m ii ngu y alghii t lu _ aaghtiiraagh yaghtugh qu aat _ stephen _ . _ taakut _ yug t _ s y nag o gu e- ng it a _ ategh ke a _ , _ " _ iteme tke aat _ Q ep ghagh te l aagh et _ . _ " _ yug t _ C il i c i a- gh m ii ngu y alghii t lu _ , _ A si a- gh m ii ngu y alghii t lu _ ila tke aat _ taa ku nun _ .
iwernga _ stephen _ , _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ peghqinegh pigte luku _ akuzi stekagh a _ repall _ kiimsighpag nigh nge i tke aat _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ ila i _ yug t _ aksaqe luku _ akileghtugh qu ait _ iqlengiqe tke sqellug qu _ stephen _ whaten _ , _ " _ N ag at k aq agh put _ segh l equ uq ek _ M o s es -en kuk _ kiyaghnegh nkuk _ . _ "
siivanllegh t llu _ , _ apeghtugh i kayug t llu _ liilightuusagh neng _ , _ ila i llu _ yug t _ nagate luteng _ iqlengiqe llegh itneng _ s ak r itu t k at _ . _ taagken _ aaghtiiraagh te luteng _ aglagh tke aat _ stephen _ ag ghi s t en un _ .
Taa m _ kingu aneng _ yug t _ tagi tke ait _ ag ghi s t en un _ iqlengiqe tke sqellug qu _ stephen _ . _ pikagh t _ , _ " _ S te p h en -em _ quunpeng _ seghletun _ akuzite kaqe a _ temple- a _ , _ liilightuusagh t llu _ M o s es -em _ tuunekagh i _ whang kun nun _ .
N ag at k aq agh p ut lu _ pi lghii _ Jesus - em nguq _ N a z ar et h - egh m ii m _ naafqe lleqe a _ temple- a _ , _ allangughte lleqe a llu nguq _ kiyagh taa llegh put _ M o s es -em _ apeghtugh tke a _ whang kun nun _ . _ "
qamagte luteng _ taw an l e nguut _ esghaghkagh at _ S te p h en -em _ gginagh a _ kuukgute lghii _ yaquleg m _ gginagh atun _ .
taagken _ h ig h _ p r i es t -em _ aaptekagh a _ stephen _ , _ " _ ipa _ tawaten _ akuzi kau ziin _ ukut _ av utk is teg p ek _ ap ell ghi s tun _ ? _ "
S te p h en -em _ kiimsigh iqe a _ , _ " _ anglegute mni llu _ , _ siivanllegh ni llu _ , _ nagate aghte ngnga _ ungipamsug te naqe amsi _ ! _ sivunegh ut _ abraham _ salin _ M es o p o tam i a- m ell uku _ , _ nuugte llghite luku _ haran- mun _ , _ N igh ugh q eng ng alghii m _ kiyaghnegh m _ aliigh vike luku
pi ke aa _ , _ ' _ unite gu _ allgeghvig n _ nuna _ , _ ilakwaagh ten llu _ , _ aghulaqe i _ maghyaghqugh naagh amken _ . _ '
enkaam _ abraham _ aghulaqekagh _ Ch al d e a- meng _ , _ nuugtekagh _ haran- mun _ . _ ata a _ tuqu yan _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ maghyaghqugh qu a _ abraham _ nuna mun _ maaten _ kiyaghfig gpesinun _ .
tagite yuwhaagh aqe yamigu _ natengiighhaq _ nun al i sim ang it aa _ ellnga nun _ pi kaghqagh meng _ . _ iwernga _ talwa _ salin _ avaquti uute luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh ke kaqe a _ una _ nuna _ ellnga nun llu _ k ing un gh an un llu _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ whaten llu _ pika qaa _ , _ ' _ kingunegh ten _ aghulaqe yaghqaa ut _ nuna ke nghite ke meggnun _ enkaam _ nunatagh u lleqe ut _ . _ tamaani _ qep ghagh te l aagh u yaghq aag ut lu _ amyuqetagh tkesigh ghllag yaghqaa ut llu _ 4 0 0 _ ayumiqullegh lghute ni _ .
iwernga _ aghyuugh lleqe anka _ qep ghagh te l aagh ugh tes t il ghiit _ . _ kingu aneng _ aghyuugh i llegh ma _ kingunegh ten _ tagi lleqe ut _ nuna mun _ akequsagh kekagh mnun _ , _ tamaani _ manigugh lleqe aatnga _ . _ ' _ tawaten _ kiyaghnegh _ pi kau uq _ .
taagken _ kiyaghnegh _ akequsagh ngllaghkagh _ A b r a h am - e mun _ nalluniigh tke sqellug qu _ c i r c um c is e- ell eq _ . _ enkaam _ abraham _ c i r c um c is e- ek aq _ . _ ighnegh nge yami _ I s aa c - meng _ pi nga yu neng _ ingluleg _ aghneq _ atugh yagu _ c i r c um c is e- ek aa _ ellnga llu _ . _ Taw at egh pig aq _ I s aa c -em _ c i r c um c is e- ek aa _ ighnegh ni _ Jacob _ . _ J a c o b -em _ c i r c um c is e- el aq ii _ qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ke luku _ ighnegh ni _ . _ taakut _ piinligh sigh ke ai _ ramke an _ I s r a el -em _ .
" _ angli laghate te luteng _ J a c o b -em _ ighnegh ita _ aqinake pigtekagh at _ ang leg ut s eng _ Joseph _ , _ enkaam _ akikekagh at _ E g y p t- egh m ii nun _ qep ghagh te l aagh ul uku _ . _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ nayugh kekagh a _ ,
seghleliigh nghaani _ kayusigh aqe kanga _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ pegh q in ell el it k aa _ enkaam _ P h ar a o h - m _ umiileg an _ E g y p t -em _ , _ efqugh ke luku _ um iil g atagh aagh tes tek aa _ E g y p t- mun _ , _ igleghte te i ste ngllagh qagh a llu _ mangteghagh minun llu _ , _ qep ghagh te min un llu _ .
taagken _ negh ke igh sag ghllag ke aq _ E g y p t- m illu _ , _ C an aan - m illu _ , _ elngaatall _ uglagh _ iyatagh iqe te ghllag ke aq _ . _ sivunegh put llu _ negh ke igh sag ghllag ke aat _ .
J a c o b -em _ nagaqugh yamiki _ E g y p t- egh m iit _ g r a in - meng _ kagpag ghllag ma ni luki _ , _ ighnegh ni _ pi ke ng yagh t ii s q egk ii _ .
tuungligh ghhagh ani _ alla _ pi yata _ , _ J o s ep h -em _ anengagh ni _ ungipagh tke ai _ ellngit nun _ uyughagh ke ni luni _ . _ enkaam _ umiileg m _ P h ar a o h - m _ ang leg ut ku tu t angi _ liigikekagh i _ .
taagken _ J o s ep h -em _ lipeghsagh ke a _ ata ni _ Jacob _ , _ nengllugute lghutagh nge i llu _ n u ug tes qell uki _ E g y p t- mun _ . _ qamagte luteng _ 7 5 - ngu f tut _ .
enkaam _ J a c o b -en kut _ nuugtekagh t _ . _ tamaani _ Jacob _ tuqukagh _ , _ kingu aneng _ tagtalmi _ taakwani _ ila i llu _ sivunegh put _ tuqu laghate tke aat _ .
Taa k w an ing ani _ neghqwaagh it _ aglagh te luki _ S h e c h em - e mun _ , _ llivegh nqigtekagh it _ nuna kun _ A b r a h am -em _ tukfighkagh akun _ H am o r -em _ k ing un gh aneng _ .
" _ kiyaghnegh m _ A b r a h am - e mun _ akequsagh a _ pi yaghtugh ngestagh aqe uq llu _ , _ sivunegh put _ nula ghllagkagh t _ E g y p t- mi _ .
taagken _ E g y p t _ nutaghagh meng _ umiileg ngekagh _ , _ taa m _ umiileg m _ nallukngwaagh kanga _ Joseph _ .
sivunegh mta _ nula ghllag llegh it _ apallugh ke luki _ umiileg m _ peghqiniqe te luki _ ikfiqe stekagh i _ sivunegh put _ , _ talwa _ taghnughhagh ghhagh it _ aane te ste aqe luki _ pi ke ai _ tuqu s qell uki _ .
tawaten _ kiyaghte ma luki _ moses _ allgeghkagh _ , _ y u uk eg te pig llegh ii _ taghnughhagh _ . _ angayuqagh gkenka _ ne megteni _ iigh agh tu meng _ aflengakekagh ak _ pi nga yu t _ tanqigh t _ .
iighaghtughpagningite te yamegnegu _ aane tke ak _ . _ umiileg m _ panig an _ naalkellug qu _ allughqi luku _ , _ angli stekagh a _ ighnegh ke lghii stun _ .
E g y p t- egh m iit _ apeghtugh qu aat _ liitekagh meggneng _ . _ enkaam _ moses _ pegh q in gh u ghi gh llag y alghii mi _ akuz ill gu ugh q aagh ll ak aq _ , _ aghtugh igate ngughk llu _ sa meng _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ .
" _ moses _ 4 0 _ uksughtutkaligh yami _ I s r a el - egh m iil g ut ni _ esghagh yug luki _ esghagh yaghtugh qu ai _ .
tawani _ esgha qaa _ E g y p t- egh m ii m _ amyuutke kanga _ I s r a el - egh m ii _ . _ enkaam _ M o s es -em _ I s r a el - egh m ii _ igugh luku _ tuqu tke a _ E g y p t- egh m ii _ .
tawani _ sumeghtaghagh kaayagh lghii _ I s r a el - egh m iil g ut min un _ liigike lleqe ni luku _ kiyaghnegh mun _ kayagte lleg ni _ ellngit nun _ aghulaqe te i ste u luku _ E g y p t- meng _ . _ iwernga _ liigike ma ite kangat _ .
unaami ani _ esghagh kakek _ I s r a el - egh m ii k _ pillugute lghiik _ . _ akuzite naqutke kaqsagh kek _ , _ ' _ pillugute gpenatek _ yug lgu tke te utek _ . _ '
yeghlegi _ amyuqetagh iqe lghii m _ yug m _ ayagaghte luku _ moses _ pi ke aa _ , _ ' _ kitum _ igleghte te i ste ngllagh aten _ , _ nanqigte i ste ngllagh aten llu _ whang kun nun _ ?
whanga llu _ tuqute yug zinga _ ighivgaq _ tuqute llegh gpetun _ E g y p t- egh m ii _ ? _ '
yug m _ tawaten _ pi yatni _ moses _ qimagkagh _ M i d i an - mun _ , _ tamaani _ allaneghtagh ukagh _ . _ qenwat _ nulightugh luni _ ighnegh ngekagh _ maalghug gneng _ .
" _ moses _ , _ 4 0 _ ayumiqullegh _ M i d i an - m e tu t k ell uku _ kilgaa nun _ aghulaqekagh _ M o un t _ S in a i -em _ u v it ang anun _ . _ tawani _ esgha qaa _ yaquleg _ kumaghugh lghii mi _ uqfillegagh mi _ .
A ll aagh ll u wh agh y ag utk aqegk anga _ . _ K en qig teng ng waagh nal uku _ takukagh a _ , _ kaate yaghtugh aqe a llu _ Atan ghem _ pi ke aa _ ,
' _ kiyaghnegh u unga _ , _ sivugh nghpek _ A b r a h am -en kut _ I s aa c -en kut _ J a c o b -en kut _ kiyaghnegh ke aatnga _ . _ ' _ moses _ alingruughkagh _ repall _ ungelegtekagh _ talwa _ esghagh yug ma nge i tke a _ .
Atan ghem _ pi ke aa _ , _ ' _ kameg gken _ mataghte kek _ qayughllak _ whanga _ apallugh ke lunga _ agleghnagh lghii u uq _ nekevgha vig n _ .
esghapag anka _ yug nka _ amyuutke kangit _ E g y p t- mi _ , _ nagate anka _ ngillegte lghiit _ . _ ukig unga _ yug ul in al uki _ E g y p t- egh m ii neng _ . _ enkaam _ whaa _ kayagte naqe amken _ E g y p t- mun _ . _ '
" _ T aan ang u uq _ moses _ I s r a el - egh m iit _ ighsa kaqe yamegteggu _ pi ke aat _ , _ ' _ kitum _ igleghte te i ste ngllagh aten llu _ nanqigte i ste ngllagh aten llu _ whang kun nun _ ? _ ' _ iwernga _ ellnga u uq _ kiyaghnegh m _ uteghnigh stekagh a _ E g y p t- mun _ igleghte te i ste u luku llu _ yuguligh i ste u luku llu _ ellngit nun _ . _ tawaten _ kiyaghnegh m _ pika qaa _ yaquleg kun _ kumaghugh lghii mi _ uqfillegagh mi _ .
moses _ all aagh lu wh agh t igh llag aat agh luni _ E g y p t- mi _ , _ aghulaqe te kaqe ai _ sivunegh put _ E g y p t- meng _ . _ wata _ all aagh ll u wh agh t iigh aat aq aag uq _ R e d _ S e a- m illu _ , _ iglegha llegh meggni llu _ kilgaa ni _ maghyaghqugh aqe yamiki _ 4 0 _ ayumiqullegh ni _ .
T aan ang u uq _ moses _ I s r a el - egh m ii nun _ whaten _ pi ke aq _ , _ ' _ kiyaghnegh m _ uuknaliqe i sta _ nakmike lleqe a _ yug gpesineng _ whanga _ nakmike llegh mitun _ uuknaliqe i ste u lunga _ . _ '
T aan ang u uq _ moses _ siv un em n n it k aq _ qerngughte te aqngata _ kilgaa ni _ M o un t _ S in a i -em _ tu ng ang angi _ . _ tawani _ naayghagh mi _ yaquleg m _ aleghqugh yatni _ tugukagh i _ kiyaghnegh m _ liilightuusagh i _ apeghtuusagh t _ naten _ kiyaghte lleghqagh meng _ . _ taagken _ apeghkagh i _ taakut _ sivunegh mnnun _ enkaam _ ellngit a _ nag negh tek aq iit _ whang kun nun _ .
" _ iwernga _ sivunegh mta _ moses _ qaatke sug mangite aat llu _ , _ igleghte te i steke yug mangite aat llu _ , _ yeghlegi _ uteghte yu kau ut _ E g y p t- mun _ .
enkaam _ M o s es -em _ anengagh a _ aaron _ pi ke aat _ , _ ' _ Kiyagh neng ll agh tegh qu t _ m agh yaghq ii s qell uta _ . _ nallukagh ut _ moses _ samatagh nge a _ , _ legan _ aghulaqe te luta _ E g y p t- meng _ unite ainkut _ . _ '
enkaam _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh t _ kaa w agh agh s ug n il ngugh meng _ , _ aghqerragh uqagh at llu _ . _ neqenghaghqekagh t llu _ qu ul v aghn al uku _ ulimaagh eng _ .
" _ tawaten _ pi yata _ kiyaghnegh m _ tunutekagh i llu _ , _ pegtekagh i llu _ elngaatall _ m an ig uu tes qell uki _ siqinegh mun _ , _ tanqigh mun _ , _ ighaleqetaagh nun llu _ . _ atanegh _ whaten _ pi kau uq _ u uk nal iq is tet _ igaqe llegh itni _ , _ ' _ I s r a el - egh m ii ni _ , _ 4 0 _ ayumiqullegh ni _ iglegha u lusi _ kilgaa ni _ aghq er r aagh um ang it agh pesi nga _ tuqutagh ii negh gpesini _ teghig ke te yameng _ .
yeghlegi _ k el q ut aaq egk aq a si _ tiinta t _ manigugh vig u luki _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh mun _ M o l o c h - mun _ , _ k el q ut aaq egk aq agh si llu _ ighaleqetaagh ngllaghkagh _ maniguute yu i luku _ rephan- mun _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ anguyag gpesinun _ aghulaqe te ste lleqe amsi _ naghughte luku _ Babylon _ . _ ' _ "
stephen _ paninang _ akuzikagh _ , _ " _ sivunegh put _ kilgaa nite luki _ kiyaghnegh m _ tiinta nglligh sqekagh i _ amigh meng _ manigugh vig u luki _ ellmi nun _ . _ ulima kaqe ait _ tawatengwaaq _ kiyaghnegh m _ apeghtugh te llegh atun _ M o s es - mun _ . _ K el q ut aaq egk iit _ taakut _ tiinta t _ neqangugh sigh u luki _ kiyaghnegh m _ nayute te nga llegh anun _ .
Taa k w an ing ani _ moses _ tuqu yan _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmikegkagh a _ J o s h u a _ iglegh ut is tek es qell uku _ sivunegh mnnun _ . _ J o s h u a- m _ m agh yaghq ugh y is t eng _ nuna mun _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh kekagh anun _ taakut _ tiinta t _ kelqekagh it _ . _ takukagh meggnun _ nuna mun _ kaate yalghiimeng _ yug lgu uq _ . _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ sivunegh mnnun _ ighllegh stekagh i _ yug i _ , _ enkaam _ sivunegh put _ nelikagh t _ taaggun _ nuna kun _ . _ tamaani _ nagnegh tke ait _ taakut _ tiinta t _ maniguute vig u luki _ kiyaghnegh mun _ kenlanga _ umiileg liite llegh meggnun _ David _ .
D av i d -em _ kiyagh taa llgh a _ elngaatall _ efqugh nagh pigtekau lghii _ kiyaghnegh mi _ . _ enkaam _ D av i d -em _ aaptekaqsagh kanga _ whaten _ , _ ' _ kiyaghnegh a _ J a c o b -em _ , _ mang tegh angll agh l ak aan _ ? _ ' _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ pi te ma ite kanga _ ,
yeghlegi _ D av i d -em _ ighnegh an _ S o l o m o n -em _ mangteghagh ngllagh qagh a _ kiyaghnegh _ .
" _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh ghllag _ kiyaghsigate uq _ mangteghagh ni _ yug t _ ulimaagh itni _ . _ whaten _ atanegh _ pi kau uq _ u uk nal iq is te m _ igaqe llegh ani _ ,
' _ qilag _ aqumutagh ke aqa _ , _ nuna llu _ itegagh iitagh ke aqa _ . _ sangan _ mangteghagh ngllagh naqe ste ngnga _ ? _ M egh nal iv ig it aa ngun ghi tu nga _ .
U l im aaq en ghii si ku un _ sa u a _ qam a teng ng waagh luku _ ? _ ' _ "
S te p h en -em _ nagnegh tke ai _ , _ " _ pi neghllug ghllag ni _ elpek si _ , _ q aatk es ug ig atagh si _ , _ ugpeq s ug ig atagh si _ kiyaghnegh _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh i _ nagate yug igate asi _ , _ ighsa keraaghagh ke agsi llu _ agleghnagh lghiik _ taghneghagh k _ siv un egh pesi s tu ng w aaq _ .
qamagte luki _ kiyaghnegh m _ u uk nal iq is teng i _ sivunegh gpesi _ amyuutke kaqe ait _ . _ tuqu qugh kaqe ait _ u uk nal iq is tet _ uuknaliqe te kete yatgu _ seghleghqe ma ite ngughk _ tagi yaghqaa ni yatgu _ . _ enkaam _ kaate yan _ , _ uvegh ghpagte te luku _ tuq utk aq agh si _ .
elpesi u usi _ kiyaghnegh m _ yaquleg tgun _ tuunekagh i _ liilightuusagh neng _ , _ qaatke mangite asi _ . _ "
A g ghi s tet _ nagate luku _ stephen _ s ak r itu tegh ll ak at _ repall _ ggiiste aghagh tke aat _ .
iwernga _ stephen _ , _ imigh nga lghii _ agleghnagh lghii gneng _ taghneghagh gneng _ , _ sivugte yalghiimi _ qilag mun _ esgha qaa _ kiyaghnegh m _ n igh ugh qell gha _ , _ Jesus - llu _ nekevgha lghii _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghenqignegh ani _ .
pi ke ai _ , _ " _ esghaqagh teggu qun _ ! _ esghagh aqa _ qilag _ qelpegh lghii _ , _ ighnegh a llu _ yug m _ nekevgha lghii _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghenqignegh ani _ ! _ "
A g ghi s tet _ sigute teng _ saape luki _ iigge meggneng _ , _ araghaatagh te magh meng _ qamagte luteng _ sughukagh at _ stephen _ .
S ii ng v ag aat ameng _ aghulaqe tke aat _ J er us al em - e meng _ , _ tuqute na luku _ m il ugh pag aat aghh iin aq _ . _ taagken _ S te p h en -em _ av utk is teng it a _ qaasligh teng _ mat- aghte luki _ nukalpigagh m _ S a ul -em _ saaghw akun _ lli luki _ milugh agaatagh yuggaagh ke aat _ . _ tamaakut llu _ ila ita _ milugh agaataghkagh at _ .
whaa _ uyghag m _ tekegh igh qagh vike yatni _ stephen _ yughaghkagh _ , _ " _ atanegh _ Jesus _ , _ taghneghagh gka _ tugukligh kek _ . _ "
segesqughte luni _ iglagtu pigte luni _ pi ke aq _ , _ " _ atanegh _ , _ seghevute ki _ whaken _ seghleghqe llegh itneng _ . _ " _ tawaten _ pi luni _ tuqukagh _ .
S a ul -em _ it ag naq egk aa _ S te p h en -em _ tuqute llegh a _ . _ yug t _ piniqe i nga lghiit _ kiyaghnegh meng _ llivegh ke aat _ stephen _ qiya ke ghllag u magh an _ . _ taagken _ aghnegh meng _ kenlanga _ amyuutke ghllag yagutekagh it _ ugpeqagh t _ J er us al em - em el nguut _ . _ S a ul -em _ elngaatall _ amyuutkekagh i _ ugpeqagh t _ naa ng es qell uki _ . _ itegh aqe luni _ ne itnun _ qam ugh s iigh meng _ aane te qugh qu ai _ aghnagh t llu _ , _ yug t llu _ anusimingllagh ste qugh na luki _ . _ Q am ag teng ng waagh luteng _ ugpeqagh t _ , _ pelleghmun _ qimagugh tke aat _ nuna nun _ J u d e a- m el ngugh nun llu _ , _ S am ar i a- m el ngugh nun llu _ , _ ap o s t l e- ng in aghh aat _ qimag ma ite ngugh t _ .
tamaakut _ ugpeqagh t _ qimagugh tke aat _ tea- ma anun _ ungipagh ke ikagh t _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ n aan sagh ng aagh meng _ .
philip _ S am ar i a- lluni _ ungipagh kekagh a _ Christ- a _ , _ all aagh ll u wh agh t igh llag aat aq aq lu _ .
enkaam _ yug t _ nagate u aqe aqe kangat _ esghapag luki _ all aagh ll u wh agh t i llgh i _ .
uglagh pigte lghii neng _ yug neng _ aag negh squgh ke ai _ tughneghagh t _ ak il gh u ung it gun _ . _ tamaakut llu _ piyug igate ngugh t _ , _ unegh ii iqe aat llu _ naallghute qugh qu ai _ .
En kaa ng am _ S am ar i a- gh m iit _ elngaatall _ quya ghllagkagh t _ .
S am ar i a- m i nguq _ taawa _ alignagh lghii _ yuug _ , _ ategh a _ simon _ . _ salin _ philip _ kaate llghite luku _ alignaghtaagh llegh mikun _ sagh iigh ayug taq egk angi _ yug t _ , _ q uk aa yug taq elghii llu _ aghtugh igate ni luni _ .
enkaam _ qamagte luteng _ tam aan l e nguut _ , _ pingwaagh ghllag neng _ , _ uk av an llegh pig agh nun _ nagate yu kestagh luku _ ayuqe kangat _ . _ pi ke aat _ , _ " _ una _ yuug _ agh tugh yaghq aanghi ll eng egh ll ak aag uq _ kiyaghnegh meng _ . _ "
yug t _ nagate yu pigte luku _ ayuqe kangat _ , _ qayughllak _ qavngarugllaggaaneng _ all aagh ll u wh agh yug tek ayug uk angi _ alignaghtaagh llegh mikun _ .
iwernga _ P h il ip -em _ ungipagh ke yaki _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ kiyaghnegh m _ ataneghpag u llegh aneng _ ayuqe lghiit _ , _ ategh aneng llu _ Jesus _ Christ- am _ ugpeqekagh it _ ungipagh i _ . _ tamaakut _ yug t llu _ , _ aghnagh t llu _ ugpeqe i lghiit _ paaptaayekagh t _ .
talwa _ S im o n - em llu _ ugpeqekagh i _ . _ enkaam _ paaptaaye llegh mi _ kingu aneng _ maligsaagh qagh a _ philip _ . _ esghapag luku _ philip _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh neng _ all aagh ll u wh agh t iigh aat alghii _ saghiigha yuke aq _ .
A p o s t l e- et _ J er us al em - em el nguut _ nagaqugh luki _ S am ar i a- gh m iit _ ugpegh ni luki _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh aneng _ , _ kayagtekagh gket _ P e te r -en kuk _ J o h n -en kuk _ ellngit nun _ .
S am ar i a- gh m iit _ ugpeqe ait _ paaptaayekagh t _ ategh inagh ghhagh akun _ Atan ghem _ Jesus-em _ , _ naqam _ salin _ naligh ghhagh inagh ita _ all g egh si g al k eg ke t _ agleghnagh lghiik _ taghneghagh k _ . _ P e te r -en kuk _ J o h n -en kuk _ S am ar i a- mun _ kaate lutek _ aglaghkagh k _ ugpeqagh nun _ . _ taagken _ saafte aqe luki _ yughagh te kau uute aqe aik _ , _ enkaam _ agleghnagh lghiik _ taghneghagh k _ all g egh tek ag ke t _ .
S im o n -em _ esghapag kakek _ ap o s t l e- ek _ , _ saafte nghmegneki _ ugpeqagh t _ allgegh te aqe lghiit _ agleghnagh lghii gneng _ taghneghagh gneng _ .
enkaam _ ap o s t l e- ek _ pi kakek _ , _ " _ tukfigh i aghte langa _ agh tugh yaghq aanghi llegh meng _ whanga llu _ saaftekumki _ yug t _ all g egh u tes qell uki _ agleghnagh lghii gneng _ taghneghagh gneng _ . _ "
iwernga _ P e te r -em _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ yeqay _ kiyaghnegh m _ naa f qell i ten _ manituumagh gpek _ . _ S um egh pen ii - i _ kiyaghnegh m _ tunusagh a _ tukfigh lleqe ni luku _ pi zigu _ ?
qepghagh lgusigh i naanghite uten _ , _ qayughllak _ sumeghtaghagh llegh n _ anaggute nga uq _ kiyaghnegh m _ esghagh ma llegh ani _ .
A v utegh qell u ten _ seghleghqe sigh ke nanigh ghhu ngam _ taana _ seghlegh pestaagh _ piyuke llegh n _ . _ enkaam _ yughagh a _ atanegh mun _ luuraq _ seghevute na yu kagu _ taana _ seghlegh pestaagh _ seghleghqe llegh n _ .
taawa _ liigike amken _ aqina lleg leg ghllag u uten llu _ a sigh q eng ngaat en llu _ seghleghqe llegh gpeneng _ . _ "
S im o n -em _ pi kakek _ , _ " _ yughagh te kaghte gnenga _ atanegh mun _ tawaten _ pi llegh gpesistun _ pi fqaama _ pi s qell unga _ . _ "
taagken _ P e te r -en kuk _ J o h n -en kuk _ t is tem un il u tek _ , _ ungipagh ke i lutek _ Atan ghem _ ungipagh aneng _ aghulaqekagh k _ J er us al em - e mun _ . _ S am ar i a- mi _ iglegha u lutek _ , _ ne nun _ kaate negh megteni _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ ungipagh aqe lghiik _ .
taagken _ yaquleg an _ Atan ghem _ pi ke aa _ philip _ , _ " _ Y at aagh qell u ten _ i ke v aam _ tu ng ang an il eng ugh nun _ tume nun _ aglagh a _ p aagh q i llgh an il ngugh nun _ , _ J er us al em - e meng _ gaza- mun _ ayuqe lghii nun _ . _ "
enkaam _ y at aagh qell uni _ aghulaqekagh _ . _ taakwani _ tumangani _ esgha qaa _ E t h i o pi a- gh m ii _ e un u c h _ , _ E t h i o pi a- m _ queen- nge an _ C an d a c e -em _ , _ mani meng _ aflengake i ste nga _ . _ J er us al em - e meng _ uteghnigh aqe uq _ ne minun _ maniguute yaghtugh luni _ kiyaghnegh mun _ . _ Ch ar i o t- m i kun _ igleghte te kete luku _ atightugh aqe ai _ u uk nal iq es te m _ I s a i a h - m _ igaqegkagh i _ .
agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ pi ke aa _ philip _ , _ " _ Ch ar i o t- ng an _ saaghw anun _ aglagh luten _ maligsaagh ghhu _ . _ "
enkaam _ malighqagh luku _ nagatekagh a _ atightugh lghii _ u uk nal iq es te m _ I s a i a h - am _ igaqegkagh aneng _ . _ P h il ip -em _ aaptekagh a _ , _ " _ L iig ik si k ii _ atightuqagh ten _ ? _ "
kiimsigh iqe a _ , _ " _ naten _ lii g ik es qell uki _ pi ziki _ , _ wetku qun _ kitum _ liigike stekaki _ whanga mnun _ sa meng _ pi aqe ta i _ . _ " _ taagken _ uugte ste luku _ saaghw mikun _ aqume sqekagh a _ .
E un u c h -em _ atightugh aqe ai _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta i _ whaten _ pi lghiit _ : _ " _ penniigh t _ tuqu sagh tun ghi s t eng _ qalghigh igate ut _ , _ pennagh ii aghagh aat llu _ qig un ghi s t eng _ qalghigh igate ut _ , _ taw at egh pig aq _ ellnga llu _ sa meng _ pi aghte ma ite ngughk _ .
K ay ngu s aa k es taq ng at gu _ ig u ghi s teng it k aq _ . _ unguvallegh a _ ken l et gh uu tes tek aq _ nuna mi _ . _ enkaam _ kitum ngam _ apegh u aghte lleqe aki _ seghleghtu langi _ yug lgu ta an _ tamaani _ pi llegh mi _ ? _ "
E un u c h -em _ aaptekagh a _ philip _ , _ " _ ungipaate aghte nga _ uuknaliqe i sta _ ellmi neng _ akuzite kaqe a _ , _ nalighmeng _ kina _ alla _ pi aqe agu _ ? _ "
P h il ip -em _ piinligh sigh ke luki _ I s a i a h - am _ igaqegkagh i _ , _ ungipagh tke a _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ Jesus - meng _ .
igleghte te kete luku _ megh mun _ kaate yamek _ e un u c h -em _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ esgha _ taana _ megh _ ! _ sa u a ngam _ eltugh sigh ke lleqe zikun _ paaptaaye lleghqagh mnun _ ? _ "
P h il ip -em _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ I p a pi gh qell u ten _ ugpegh kuvek _ paaptaaye lleqe amken _ . _ " _ E un u c h -em _ kiimsigh iqe a _ , _ " _ aa _ , _ ugpeqe aqa _ Jesus _ Christ- a _ ighnegh ke a _ kiyaghnegh m _ . _ "
enkaam _ e un u c h -em _ iglegh ut is t en i _ aghuliigh sqekagh a _ . _ ategh lutek _ c h ar i o t- meng _ megh mun _ ategh ke ak _ , _ enkaam _ P h il ip -em _ tawani _ paaptaayekagh a _ .
megh meng _ uugte yayek _ Atan ghem _ taghneghagh gkenka _ aghulaqe tke a _ philip _ , _ enkaam _ e un u c h -em _ alla _ esgh am ang it k aa _ , _ iwernga _ nagneqe aq _ quya lleg ligh ghllag luni _ .
taana _ philip _ pi yalghiimi _ A z o tu s - m e te f tuq _ . _ C a es ar e a- mun _ aglagh te kete luku _ ne nun _ kaate nghmini _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ ungipagh aqe lghii _ .
S a u l _ J er us al em - em ell uni _ taawa _ paninang _ al ing si q uk ii _ tuqu qugh naqe ni luki _ malig s aagh teng i _ Atan ghem _ . _ qenwat _ D am as c us - es uk aq _ , _ luuraq _ Jesus-em _ malig s aagh teng i _ yug t llu _ aghnagh t llu _ tamaa uute na yu kata _ . _ esghagh kumiki _ tagite na luki _ J er us al em - e mun _ an u sim ing ll ii s qell uki _ . _ enkaam _ h ig h _ priest- mun _ pi luni _ lata ngllagh te sqekagh _ pi llegh q al i tes qell uni _ iglegh ut is teng it nun _ s y nag o gu e- et _ D am as c us - m el ngugh nun _ , _ tawaten _ pi na luni _ .
enkaam _ S a u l _ aghulaqekagh _ D am as c us - mun _ . _ iiwenllu _ kaate yaghtugh aqe uq _ , _ qilag meng _ nighug ghllag m _ kukegtekagh a _ .
ullegh aghte luni _ nagaqugh qu a _ me _ whaten _ pi lghii _ , _ " _ S a u l _ , _ S a u l _ , _ sangama _ amyuutke manginagh zinga _ ? _ "
S a ul -em _ aaptekagh a _ , _ " _ kina u ziin _ atanegh _ ? _ " _ me m _ kiimsigh iqe a _ , _ " _ Jesus - ngu unga _ amyuutke gkan _ .
makete luten _ aglagh a _ D am as c us - mun _ , _ tawani _ kitum _ ungipaate lleqe aaten _ naten _ pi lleghqagh gpeneng _ . _ "
yug t _ iglegh al g ut angi _ aghula i iqe aat _ tawani _ , _ akuzipag nigh ngunateng _ nagatekagh at _ me _ , _ naqam _ kina _ alngunak _ esghagh ma ite kangat _ .
S a u l _ makete yalghiimi _ esghaate nghite uq _ qayughllak _ ayaa ma lghii _ . _ enkaam _ t as l uq luku _ aglagh tke aat _ D am as c us - mun _ .
pi nga yu t _ aghnegh t _ ayaa ngakagh _ , _ talwa _ negh ma ite ngughk llu _ , _ megh ma ite ngughk llu _ .
taawa nguq _ D am as c us - mi _ , _ yuug _ ugpeqe i nga lghii _ Jesus - meng _ , _ ategh a _ A nan i a s _ . _ E s gh aagh w aa llegh qun _ Atan ghem _ tuqlugh qu a _ , _ " _ A nan i a s _ . _ " _ kiimsigh iqe a _ , _ " _ ay _ , _ atanegh _ ? _ "
Atan ghem _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ tume nun _ aglagh a _ ategh ke lghii nun _ , _ ' _ taklaghrukegte aq _ ' _ taagken _ J u d as -en ku nun _ aapte yaghtugh ghhu _ yuug _ , _ S a ul - ngu uq _ , _ tarsus- meng _ pi u uq _ , _ yughagh aqe uq _ .
E s ghagh waagh qun _ esgh am aa _ yuug _ itegh lghii _ , _ ategh a _ A nan i a s _ , _ s aa f saq min igu _ es ghagh y ag un neq ig tuq _ . _ "
iwernga _ A nan i as -em _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ atanegh _ , _ nagaqugh aqe aqa _ taana _ yuug _ uglagh pigte lghii neng _ , _ apegh naqe pigte aqe aat _ seghletun _ pi llegh ghllag a _ yug gpenun _ J er us al em - e mi _ .
pi lleghqagh nge kau uq _ c h i e f _ p r i es t- en eng _ tagi luni _ D am as c us - mun _ tugulagh na luki _ qamagte luki _ yughagh kayug t _ ategh gpegun _ . _ "
iwernga _ Atan ghem _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ aglagh a _ , _ taku gu _ qayughllak _ nakmike ma aqa _ ungip aq es qell unga _ G en t il e- en un _ , _ umiileg nun _ , _ I s r a el - egh m iin un llu _ .
liigike ste naqngu aqa _ aange luku _ ikfiqe llegh meng _ whanga _ apallugh ke lunga _ . _ "
enkaam _ A nan i as -em _ takukagh a _ S a u l _ . _ itegh luni _ saafte magh an _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ anglegute mni _ S a u l _ , _ Atan ghem _ Jesus-em _ esghaghkagh gpek _ tume ni _ tagi u luten _ , _ kayagte aanga _ elpenun _ . _ kayagte te aaten _ s aa f tes qell u ten _ esgh aa s ag un neq ig tes qell u ten _ , _ im ii s qell ut en llu _ agleghnagh lghii gneng _ taghneghagh gneng _ . _ "
Taw an ing in aq _ iqallug m _ q al tes ug n ing i _ iye gkeneng _ ifkagh qu te tke aat _ , _ enkaam _ esghagh sag u tke aq _ . _ taagken _ makete luni _ paaptaayekagh _ .
Taa m _ kingu aneng _ negh yalghiimi _ iknaqsuugtekagh _ . _ S a u l _ ugpeq an it k aq _ D am as c us - mi _ qafsina t _ aghnegh t _ .
mulu gpenani _ s y nag o gu e- ni _ ungipagh kekagh a _ Jesus _ , _ ighnegh ke ni luku _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
N ag a tu ll ghii m _ saghiigha yagutekagh at _ repall _ ell meg g neng _ aapte qugh aghte tke aat _ , _ " _ U n ang un ghi taa - a _ yuug _ J er us al em - e mi _ amyuqetagh igh ke ghllag ke aq _ yughagh kayug neng _ Jesus-em _ ategh akun _ ? _ maavek _ tagi u yagh lghii _ tawaten _ pi na luni _ , _ ugpeqagh t _ tugulagh na luki _ , _ ag l an nal uki _ c h i e f _ p r i es t- en un _ . _ "
S a ul -em _ ungipagh ke i llegh mikun _ wata _ lii g ik es tagh aqaa _ Jesus _ , _ Christ- ang ut anga _ repall _ J e w s - et _ D am as c us - m el nguut _ aaghtiiraaghpag nigh nge i tke aat _ .
S a u l _ ungipagh ke i lqinagh yan _ tawaten _ qafsinegyag ghllag _ aghneq _ , _ J e w s - et _ wataqaaghaq _ ugumi yagutekagh at _ , _ repall _ qerngughte te luteng _ agghi tkekagh at _ tuqute na luku _ .
enkaam _ aghneghtuumaan _ , _ unugtugh magh an _ D am as c us -em _ amig ghllag lghute ani _ kelengakekagh at _ tuqute na luku _ . _ iwernga _ S a ul -em _ nagaqugh qu a _ tawaten _ agghi llegh at _ .
enkaam _ un ug mi _ ataasigh mi _ , _ S a ul -em _ malig s aagh teng it a _ p as ke t- egh r ug llag eg ne kun _ mingllute meng _ eslate mun _ uk ig te kaa t _ .
taagken _ S a u l _ kaa sa mi _ J er us al em - e mun _ ilate naqe kau yaag lghii _ Jesus-em _ malig s aagh teng it nun _ . _ taawanginaq _ ii ngun aghh agh meng _ alikekagh at _ , _ qayughllak _ aygughikekagh at _ ellnga llu _ maligte yaaghte ngughsi ma ta a _ .
