ungipaate aghte nakegsi _ P h il o l o g us -en kuk _ , _ J ul i a- n kuk _ , _ N er e us -en kuk _ nayag ke te lghiik _ , _ O l y m p as - llu _ qamagte luki llu _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug i _ ellng it n il nguut _ , _ suumqagh ke anka nguq _ .
quyake te aqe tek _ naagh te meng _ kiyaghnegh m _ piniqe llegh akun _ . _ qamagte luteng _ ugpeqagh t _ Christ- am _ y ugh aghv ig an il nguut _ , _ liisimake sug aisi _ suumqagh ke aisi nguq _ .
U g peq aal gu tem ni _ , _ qelegh amsi _ k el eng as qell usi _ tam aa ku neng _ aafqugh te ste i kayug neng _ , _ tunute ste i lghii neng _ yug t _ ugpeqe i llegh itneng _ , _ k ip ull g in aal ghii neng _ apeghtuusagh neng _ liitekagh gpesineng _ . _ iqite nga tek _ tam aa ku neng _ .
yug t _ tawaten _ pikayug t _ qepghagh te u nghite aat _ Christ- a _ atanegh ut _ . _ Taa w ang in aghh aq _ ellmeng _ katam _ efqugh kekagh ghhagh inagh teng _ pi aqe ait _ . _ apeghtugh i negh meggni _ akuz it egh ll u wh aat _ atuqe aqe ait _ , _ us u qu ugh taq iit lu _ yug t _ puughhe na luki _ puughte yuguma lghiit _ .
qamagte luteng _ yug t _ nagaqugh ma ut _ qaatke te nga llegh i _ atanegh mun _ , _ enkaam _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ quyake ghllagu amsi _ . _ P egh q in gh us ug am si _ sa mun _ pinigh lghii mun _ , _ iwernga _ an ag gu te ll ngun a si _ seghlegh mun _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ n ek eg g m ell el it il ghii m _ qantaghaqun _ kagimte lleqe a _ tughneghagh _ itegagh gpesi _ asi ani _ . _ atanegh ut _ Jesus _ Christ- a _ nangllegtagh li _ elpesi nun _ .
Q ep gh al g ut m a _ T im o t h y - m _ , _ J e w - l g ut m allu _ L u c i us -en kut _ , _ J as o n -en kut _ , _ S o si p ate r -en kut _ suumqagh ke aisi nguq _ .
T er t i us - ngu unga _ , _ igagh te aqe aqa _ P a u l _ lata aneng _ . _ whanga llu _ suumqagh ke amsi _ atanegh kun _ .
whanga _ P a u l _ , _ G a i us - m e taq unga _ . _ mangteghagh ani _ qamagte luteng _ ugpeqagh t _ qerngughte te kayugu ut _ . _ ellnga n llu _ ugpeqagh t llu _ suumqagh ke aisi nguq _ . _ ne ghllag mta _ mani meng _ aflengake i ste yan _ , _ E r as tu s -em _ , _ ugpeq aal gu tem t allu _ Q u ar tu s -em _ suumqagh ke aisi nguq _ .
usuqe lteggu _ kiyaghnegh _ ! _ ellnga n _ ay ep s ug igh sagh yaq leg w ii _ ugpeqe i lleg si _ pinigh lghii tgun _ ungipagh tgun _ Jesus _ Christ- ameng _ ayuqe lghii meng _ ungipagh qu manginagh aqe ke mkun _ yug nun _ . _ T aan ang u uq _ aksaqekagh _ ungipagh _ kiyaghnegh m _ qayvighte ma nge i tke a _ ima _ piinligh yuggaagh llegh aneng _ nuna m _ .
iwernga _ maaten _ , _ piinlegh ite ngugh m _ kiyaghnegh m _ qayvighte ma ai _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ igaqugh llegh itgun _ u uk nal iq is tet _ . _ qelegh te ma ai _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ lii tes qell uki _ yug nun _ nunatagh ghhagh ani _ tea- ma ghhagh ani _ . _ tawaten _ pi kau uq _ ellngit nun _ ugpeq es qell un illu _ q aatk es qell un illu _ .
E ll ng in aag uq _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ peghqinegh lghii _ sa mun _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ . _ yug t _ usuqe litgu _ quunperugllag _ Jesus _ Christ- akun _ ! _ amen _ .
ukut _ lata t _ P a ul - meng _ pi u ut _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmikegkagh aneng _ Jesus _ Christ- amun _ ap o s t l e- ngu luku _ . _ U g peq aal g ut f ut _ S o s t h en e s _ whanga mnite uq _ .
lata aqe unga _ kiyaghnegh m _ ug pegh teng it nun _ C o r in t h - m el ngugh nun _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ aaftekagh anun _ y uk nal usi _ Christ _ Jesus - kun _ . _ nakmike kaqe aisi llu _ p el ung i tes qell usi _ maligte te lusi _ yug lghute ghllag nun _ tam ang an il ngugh nun _ , _ yughagh kayug nun _ atanegh mnnun _ Jesus _ Christ- amun _ , _ qam ag teng ng waagh l uta _ Atan qagh put _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ ata mta _ , _ atanegh mta llu _ Jesus _ Christ- am _ nanglleg ke lisi llu _ n ek eg g m ell el g us l il si llu _ .
iyamsiqa yug vike aqe aqa _ kiyaghnegh _ qayughllak _ nanglleg ke kaqe aisi _ Christ _ Jesus - kun _ .
enkaam _ ellnga kun _ aklungi igh i kau usi _ liigike llegh meng llu _ akuzillegh meng llu _ . _ enkaam _ maaten _ lii g ik atagh agh lleq agh si _ Christ- a _ , _ akuz it k atagh agh lleq agh si llu _ atanegh _ .
allangughtekagh m llu _ kiyagh taa llegh p esi _ ip a pi gh q aa _ ungipagh kekagh ut _ Christ- a _ .
agleghnagh lghii gneng _ taghneghagh gneng _ tunusagh lgu usi _ sa meng _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ , _ utaqa i u lusi _ atanegh mta _ Jesus _ Christ- am _ tagi nqigte lleghqagh aneng _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ ugpegh lleg si _ ik naq ugh s aam ang in aghn aa ghii _ kenlanga _ kingulighpigagh mete te _ aghnegh mun _ . _ inqun _ an ag gu te ll ghi tes qell usi _ atanegh ut _ Jesus _ Christ- a _ nanqigte i kan _ yug neng _ .
A taa s iigh m el ngu u m _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike kaqe aisi _ il a tes qell usi _ ighnegh minun _ Jesus _ Christ- amun _ atanegh mnnun _ .
U g peq aal gu tem ni _ , _ atanegh mta _ Jesus _ Christ- am _ ategh akun _ pi amsi _ taa q es qell usi _ aaghtiiraagh te nghmeng _ . _ aafqugh te gpenasi _ . _ sumeghtaghagh lleg si llu _ sa naqe lleg si llu _ ataasiighte naqe luki _ .
U g peq aal gu tem ni _ , _ ila ita _ Ch l o e -em _ neng ll ug ut ang an _ ungipaate kaqe aatnga _ aaghtiiraagh te aqe ni lusi _ .
ila si nguq _ pi aqe ut _ , _ " _ whanga _ P a ul -em _ maligte yaaghtekau nga _ . _ " _ ila si _ , _ " _ whanga _ A p o ll o s -em _ . _ " _ ila si _ " _ whanga _ P e te r -em _ . _ " _ paninang _ ila si nguq _ pi aqe ut _ , _ " _ whanga _ Christ- am _ maligte yaaghtekau nga _ . _ "
En kaa ng am _ q af si n aghq agh si _ Jesus _ Christ- a _ . _ P a ul -em _ q aq u r aatk egk aq i si i _ ? _ paaptaayekagh u tsi _ P a ul -em _ ategh akun _ ?
iyamsiqa yug vike aqe aqa _ kiyaghnegh _ p aap taa y em ang il k egk a _ naligh ghhagh inagh i _ iwerngaqun _ C ris p us -en kuk _ G a i us -en kuk _ .
En kaa ng am _ kina _ alngunak _ pi naanghite uq _ p aap taa y em an il uni _ ategh mkun _ .
( _ atwhay _ paaptaayekagh ke anka llu _ S te p h an as -en kut _ nengllugute ke te lghiit _ . _ iwernga _ neqamike nghite aqa _ kina _ alla _ alngunak _ p aap taa y em at ka _ ) _ .
Christ- am _ paaptaaye ligh sqe mangite aanga _ , _ iwernga _ kayagtekaqe aanga _ ungip aq is qell unga _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ . _ ungipagh ke i igate unga _ atuqe luki _ yug m _ peghqinellegh i _ , _ luuraq _ aghtugh yaghqaa nghite lghiite ste na yukagh mkun _ qaquuragh a _ Christ- am _ .
ungipagh _ Christ- am _ tuqu llegh a _ qaquuragh kun _ temngingu uq _ ifla naqe lghii nun _ . _ iwernga _ yuguligh lleg nge lghii ni _ whangkuta _ liisimakagh ut _ kiyaghnegh m _ agh tugh yaghq aanghi l q aa _ .
akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ igaqe nga uq _ , _ " _ P egh q in gh et _ peghqinellegh at _ atugh u nanigh ste lleqe aqa _ . _ liitekagh ghllag t llu _ liite llegh at _ sasii nanigh ste lleqe aqa _ . _ "
enkaam _ s an aq an Ê¼ ng am _ nuna m _ peghqinegh lghii i _ ? _ S an aq an Ê¼ ng am _ apeghtughiste i _ liilightuusagh t _ ? _ S an aq an Ê¼ ng am _ aagh t ii r aagh tet _ ? _ Q am ag teng ng waagh luni _ lii te llegh ll all gh at _ sasii nghite uq _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ temngitwha ngllagh kaqe a _ peghqinellegh a _ nuna m _ .
peghqinellegh mikun _ kiyaghnegh _ pi kau uq _ nuna m _ yug anun _ nalluke lleqe ni luni _ peghqinellegh itgun _ . _ enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike ai _ yug ul in al uki _ qamagte luki _ ugpegh lghiit _ Christ- ameng _ ungipagh kekagh mnneng _ . _ ugpeqagh u nghite ngugh t _ sumeghtaghagh te kaqe aat _ taana _ ungipagh kekagh ut _ temngingu ni luku _ .
J e w s - et _ esghaate yug aqe ut _ all aagh ll u wh agh t i llegh neng _ ugpeqe na luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh a _ ; _ G en t il e- et _ peghqinellegh nge yug aqe ut _ ugpeqe na luku _ ungipagh _ ipa u ta a _ .
iwernga _ paninang _ ungip aq naq ng waagh put _ Christ- amun _ tuqu tke kaqe ni luki _ qaquuragh kun _ . _ una _ ungipagh _ J e w s -en i _ piyaqnagh pigte uq _ ugpeqe yaghqaa luni _ , _ G en t il e- en i _ teme igh u u uq _ .
iwernga _ whang kun nun _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmikegkagh anun _ J e w s - ngugh ng aam ta _ , _ G en t il e- ngugh ng aam ta _ tawatete nghite uq _ . _ Christ- am _ tuqu llegh an _ qaquuragh kun _ liite stekaqe ainkut _ kiyaghnegh m _ agh tugh yaghq aanghi llgh an eng llu _ peghqinellegh aneng llu _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ temngitwha llegh a _ pegh q in gh atagh g agh tuq _ yug m _ peghqinellegh aneng _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ kayaate llegh a _ iknaqe aghagh uq _ yug m _ iknaqe llegh aneng _ .
U g peq aal gu tem ni _ , _ neqamike luku _ natete yagh u tsi _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuq l ugh aq ng i si _ . _ qafsinkuuragh ghhagh ni _ pegh q in gh u yagh tu si _ nuna m _ yug an _ sumeghtaghagh tke llegh itni _ . _ qafsinkuuragh ghhagh ni _ aghtugh igate yagh usi _ iglegh ut is tet _ , _ nalighmeng _ ak l ung il ngugh neng _ nengllugute neng _ pi u yagh usi _ .
iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike kaqe ai _ tamaakut _ n all u uq at _ nuna mi _ kay ngu s aa k nal uki _ peghqinegh lghiit _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike kaqe ai _ kay aal nguut _ nuna mi _ kay ngu s aa k nal uki _ tamaakut _ iknaqe lghiit _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike kaqe ai _ uk av an l e ngu ut lu _ a si t ng in aaq iit lu _ nuna mi _ . _ Tam aa ku nguut _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmikegkagh i _ , _ yug nun _ lii g ik es qell uki _ sumeghtaghagh tkekagh it _ aangwaagh u luki _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh mi _ aangwaagh u nghite ut _ .
En kaa ng am _ kina _ alngunak _ aangaayugte naanghite uq _ nekeve gkuni _ sivungagh ni _ kiyaghnegh m _ .
kiyaghnegh u uq _ tuun is te si _ unguvallegh meng _ Christ _ Jesus - kun _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ Christ _ Jesus - mun _ tuune ste ainkut _ peghqinellegh meng _ , _ elqughute ste ainkut llu _ kiyaghnegh mi _ , _ ag legh nagh tes t iin ku t u _ , _ iteme te ste ainkut llu _ seghleghqe lleg mnneng _ .
En kaa ng am _ atuqe lteggu _ , _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ igaqe nga lghii _ , _ " _ kina _ alngunak _ aangaayugte yu kuni _ , _ aangaayugte te kete liki _ Atan ghem _ apeghiighkagh i _ ellmi nun _ . _ "
U g peq aal gu tem ni _ , _ ungipagh ke i yaghtugh aqngama _ elpesi nun _ , _ atuqe mangite anka _ akuzite t _ lii g i ke pag n ing il k esi _ . _ peghqigh llegh ghllag mkun _ ungipagh ke i yu nghite unga _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh aneng _ elpesi nun _ .
pakig kaqe anka _ tamaakut _ qayughllak _ ungipagh ke i yu lghiinga _ Jesus _ Christ- ang in aghh agh meng _ tuqu llegh aneng llu _ qaquuragh kun _ .
elpesi nite aqngama _ tetug aatagh kau unga _ , _ alingruugh kau unga _ , _ ungelegtekau unga llu _ .
K uk r ag n alghii meng _ akuzi tke mangite unga _ peghqinegh ghllag m _ akuzi ta aneng _ . _ iwernga _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ agh tugh yaghq aanghi llgh an _ ip a pi gh q egk aq ii _ apeghtugh i llegh nka _ ipa u ta i _ .
En kaa ng am _ ugpegh usi _ apallugh ke luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ agh tugh yaghq aanghi llgh a _ , _ nakaan _ apallugh ke luku _ yug m _ peghqinellegh a _ .
A ng tan iit k anun _ ugpeqagh nun _ apeghtuusagh ke aqa _ kiyaghnegh m _ peghqinellegh a _ . _ iwernga _ taana _ peghqinellegh _ nuna meng _ pi u nghite uq _ , _ talwa _ iglegh ut is teng aneng _ . _ qantaghaqun _ aviighute yaghqaa ut _ .
peghqinellegh _ apeghtuusagh ka _ kiyaghnegh m _ peghqinellegh ke a _ , _ nalluke aat _ yug t _ . _ yug t _ nallukngwaagh yagh kangat _ taana _ peghqinellegh _ kenlanga _ kiyaghnegh m _ liite ste llegh anun _ . _ talwa _ nuna ngllagh mangite luni _ kiyaghnegh m _ usuqe yaghqaa luta _ pi kaqe ainkut _ peghqinellegh mikun _ .
naligh ghhagh inagh ita _ nuna m _ iglegh ut is teng it a _ liigike mangite aat _ taana _ peghqinellegh _ . _ liigike kaqsagh kumegteggu _ , _ qaquuragh nayagh nghite aat _ Atan gha _ n igh ugh qell ghem _ .
igaqegkagh ni _ akuzite ni _ igaqe kau uq _ , _ " _ tamaakut _ iye m _ esgh am ang il k angi _ , _ tamaakut _ sigute m _ nagaqugh ma ite kangi _ , _ tamaakut _ umyugagh m _ sumeghtaghagh tke ma ite kangi _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ yataaghqe kaqe ai _ pin iq is te min un _ . _ "
iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ liigike stekaqe ai _ whang kun nun _ A g legh n alghii g ne kun _ taghneghagh gmikun _ . _ taghneghagh m _ yuvghiigh aqe a _ sa u a _ tamaghhagh an _ , _ talwa _ kiyaghnegh m _ q aam n ar ug llag an il nguut _ .
yug m _ sumeghtaghagh llegh a _ kitum _ alngunak _ nalluke a _ iwerngaqun _ ellnga n _ katam _ taghneghagh gkenka _ . _ Taw at egh pig aq _ kiyaghnegh m _ sumeghtaghagh llegh a _ kitum _ alngunak _ nalluke a _ iwerngaqun _ ellnga n _ katam _ taghneghagh gkenka _ .
nuna m _ taghneghagh aneng _ allgegh te mangite ukut _ . _ yeghlegi _ , _ all g egh tek aq ag put _ taghneghagh k _ kiyaghnegh meng _ pi k _ , _ liigike na luki _ qamagte luki _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuunekagh i _ whang kun nun _ .
enkaam _ akuzi igate ukut _ yug m _ peghqinellegh akun _ , _ iwernga _ atuqe aqe aput _ akuzite t _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ apeghtugh tke ai _ . _ tawaten _ pi aqe ukut _ apegh tuus aq n em tek i _ taghneghagh m _ ip a pi llgh i _ tam aa ku nun _ allgegh tekagh nun _ A g legh nal iig neng _ taghneghagh gneng _ .
iwernga _ kina _ alngunak _ allgegh te ma ite ngughk _ agleghnagh lghii gneng _ taghneghagh gneng _ , _ tugukligh i igate uq _ tunusagh neng _ taghneghagh gneng _ pi neng _ . _ tamaakut _ tunusagh t _ temngitwha u ut _ ellnga ni _ . _ liigikepagningite ai _ qayughllak _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ kayusillegh igh inagh u kete te _ liigike yaghqaa uq _ .
yug m _ allgegh tekagh m _ agleghnagh lghii gneng _ taghneghagh gneng _ nanqigte aqe a _ sa u a _ qamagte luku _ . _ iwernga _ kitum _ alngunak _ nanqigte yaghqaqe nghite a _ ellnga _ .
akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ pi ll ghi s tun _ , _ " _ kitum _ alngunak _ nalluke a _ Atan ghem _ sumeghtaghagh llegh a _ . _ enkaam _ kitum _ alngunak _ liilightugh naanghite a _ . _ " _ iwernga _ whangkuta _ ugpeqagh ni _ sumeghtaghagh aqe ukut _ Christ- am _ sumeghtaghagh llegh atun _ .
U g peq aal gu tem ni _ , _ elpesi nite aqngama _ aleghqughpagningite kaqe amsi _ al egh qugh w aq ell em tun _ ugpeqagh ghllag t _ . _ yeghlegi _ aleghqugh kaqe amsi _ ugpegh lleg si _ ang l ill ghi l ngugh es tun _ ayuqe luki _ . _ ugpeqe i lleg si _ Christ- akun _ t aghn ugh h aghh agh es tun _ ayuqe ut _ .
K uk r ag n ang un aan _ apeghtugh kaqe amsi _ . _ katam _ tawaten _ mamagh ghhagh meng _ meghe ste lghii stun _ pi kaqe amsi _ . _ neqe pig meng _ neghe stepag nigh nge i te kaqe amsi _ qayughllak _ neq e pig tugh pag n ing il ngu usi _ salin _ . _ paninang _ maaten _ neqe pigtughpagningite aqe usi _ , _ qayughllak _ ugpeq aanghi l ngugh es tun _ ayuqe usi _ salin _ . _ L iig ik es teng ng waagh si _ ugpegh llegh gpesi _ angli nghite llegh a _ aqina llegh gpesigun llu _ aghiva te llegh gpesigun llu _ . _ U g peq aanghi l ngugh es tun _ kiyagh teng ngu usi _ .
naligh i _ pi nghmini _ , _ " _ whanga _ P a ul -em _ maligte yaaghtekau nga _ , _ " _ ila si llu _ pinegh meggni _ , _ " _ whanga _ A p o ll o s -em _ maligte yaaghtekau nga _ , _ " _ ugpeq aanghi l ngugh es tun _ pi aqe usi _ .
kinangaawa _ apollos _ ? _ kina u zinga _ whanga _ ? _ Q ep ghagh tek iin kun g _ kiyaghnegh m _ , _ kayusiite kaqe amsi _ ugpeqe sqellug qu _ Christ- a _ . _ qepghaqagh leg staghhiinagh u ukung _ Atan egh em _ qelegh tekagh aneng _ .
elpek si _ kiyaghnegh m _ piitesighagh vike aisi _ . _ piitesighagh aqe unga _ , _ A p o ll o s -em _ meghqe aqe a _ , _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ nagu sta qaa _ .
En kaa ng am _ kina _ alngunak _ piitesigh u aghagh lghii llu _ meghqe i lghii llu _ uk av an tuq _ . _ kiyaghnegh ghhagh inagh _ aange ghllag uq _ nagu ste i kayugu uq _ .
piitesigh u aghagh a llu _ meghqe i sta llu _ taw ate l ku tu k _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ akileghtugh yaghqaqe ak _ qepghagh llegh gkenkun _ .
qepghagh lgutke te ukung _ kiyaghnegh mun _ ; _ elpek si _ kiyaghnegh m _ piitesigh u aghagh vike aisi _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ mangteghagh ke aisi _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ nangllegtagh llegh _ tagivagh qagh a _ atuqe luku _ piinligh kaqe aqa _ qepghaqagh _ elpesi ni _ . _ peghqinegh lghii stun _ tunemagh iqe aqe aqa _ mangteghagh _ ulima yaghqagh _ . _ Jesus _ Christ- ang in aag uq _ tunemagh _ , _ alla _ saaghw akun _ tunemaghqagh ite uq _ . _ ila ita _ ulima vike u aat _ qaye akun _ . _ qamagte luni _ piraamsi luni _ ulima li _ .
ila ita _ atugh lleqe aat _ g o l d - a _ , _ silver- a _ , _ j e w el - a _ , _ ila ita _ unaghsigh _ , _ paligh iqe aq _ vegaagh _ , _ ungagagh llu _ tunemagh kun _ taaggun _ .
sa u a _ atuqekagh ut _ es ghagh yaghq aq agh put _ ataa si k agh taa m ta _ qam ag teng ng waagh l uta _ aghneghmi _ tawani _ Christ- am _ nanqigte i lleghqagh ani _ . _ K en ghem _ esghaghtesaghqagh ke a _ qepghaqagh ut _ nateghtu langa _ .
sa u a _ yug m _ atuqekagh a _ kumagh nghite kuni _ , _ akileghtugh sag nge yaghqaa uq _ .
iwernga _ ila yan _ yug m _ qepghaqagh a _ ifla yaghqaa uq _ kumagh kuni _ , _ akileghtugh sag nge naanghite uq llu _ . _ N aq am en r aq _ ellnga _ yuguligh lleg nge yaghqaa uq _ , _ katam _ tawaten _ kenegh meng _ aane lghii stun _ .
L ii simak ng waagh agh si _ kiyaghnegh m _ temple- ke aisi _ . _ agleghnagh lghiik _ taghneghagh kek _ kiyagh teng ngu uk _ ilu gpesini _ !
kitum _ alngunak _ naafqe gkagu _ kiyaghnegh m _ temple- nga _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ naafqesaghqagh ke a _ ellnga _ , _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ temple- nga _ agleghnagh lghii u uq _ . _ elpek si _ temple- ke aisi _ .
kina _ alngunak _ puughte te qugh a mi _ ellmi neng _ pi li _ . _ naligh i _ sumeghtaghagh u u kuni _ liite pagllag kau ni luni _ nuna m _ peghqinellegh aneng _ , _ yeqay _ maligte ligu _ Christ- a _ , _ ugpeqagh u nghite ngugh t _ tem ng ing un igh ngaat gu _ . _ tawaten _ pi kuni _ elngaatall _ pegh q in gh ugh te pii g lleq aa _ .
kiyaghnegh mi _ nuna m _ peghqinellegh a _ temngingu uq _ . _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ igaqe nga uq _ , _ " _ P egh q in gh et _ yug t _ nuna mi _ whani _ kiyaghnegh m _ pipagningite te ste aqe ai _ ellngit a _ katam _ peghqinellegh itgun _ . _ "
igaqe kau uq llu _ , _ " _ Atan ghem _ liisimake a _ pegh q in ghem _ yug m _ sumeghtaghagh llegh a _ sasii nghite uq _ . _ "
En kaa ng am _ kitum _ alngunak _ qukaayug te kete yaghqaqe nghite ai _ sa u aat _ yug t _ pi aqe kangit _ . _ sa u a _ qamagte luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ pinighqe sighqagh ughte stekaqe a _ elpesi nun _ ,
talwa _ P a u l _ , _ apollos _ , _ peter- llu _ . _ nuna llu _ una _ , _ unguvallegh llu _ , _ tuqu llegh llu _ , _ sa u a llu _ alngunak _ kiyagh taa llegh m el nguq _ maaten _ , _ sa u a llu _ alngunak _ kaate yaghqagh _ , _ qam ag teng ng waagh luki _ elpek si _ pi kasi _ .
enkaam _ elpek si _ Christ- am _ pi ke aisi _ , _ Christ- a _ kiyaghnegh m _ pi ke aa _ .
sumeghtaghagh tke tekut _ qep ghagh tek n il uta _ Christ- amun _ . _ Q ep ghagh te ngu u kut _ apeghtugh i lghiit _ ip a pi gh qell egh meng _ kiyaghnegh m _ apeghtugh tekagh aneng _ whang kun nun _ .
Christ- am _ qep ghagh teng i _ ataasiighmete yaghqaa ut _ .
whanga _ , _ ataasiighmete ni lunga _ qepghagh a _ pi kufsinga _ , _ nalighmeng _ ataasiighmete nghite ni lunga _ kitum _ alngunak _ pi kanganga _ , _ sumeghtaghagh te kete naanghite aqa _ . _ talwa _ whanga mneng _ nanqigte igate unga _ .
nalluke aqa _ sa meng _ anaggute mate ka _ , _ iwernga _ anaggute llghite ni lunga _ pi nghite unga _ . _ Atan gh h iin aam _ nanqigte yaghqaqe aanga _ .
En kaa ng am _ wiin _ nanqigte gpenaan _ kina _ alngunak _ s all gh aneng _ . _ Atan ghem _ tagi nqigtekuni _ kukegte yaghqaqe ai _ yug t _ ilu it _ al iigh qell uki _ sa u aat _ iigh nga yagh lghiit _ tesqamani _ . _ A l iigh q es aghq aq ii _ sangameng _ sa aqe ta i _ . _ taagken _ usuqe yaghqagh t _ tamaakut _ usuqe lleg nge yaghqaa ut _ kiyaghnegh meng _ .
U g peq aal gu tem ni _ , _ elpek si _ apallugh ke lusi _ A p o ll o s - lu _ whangkutung _ uspute aqe u ukung _ . _ usputagh u ukung _ elpesi nun _ liite sqellug qu _ una _ igaqe na lghii _ sa meng _ pi sagh ite anga _ . _ " _ qaatke aqe teki _ sa u aat _ igaqe nga lghiit _ akuzite ni _ igaqekagh ni _ . _ " _ naligh ghhagh inagh gpesi _ aangaayugte te kete yaqunaan _ ataasigh _ yuug _ , _ aag llegh a _ ugumi ke luku _ .
kitum _ pinigh aghagh ste isi _ ugpeq aal gu teg pesi neng _ ? _ sa u a _ qamagte luku _ kiyaghnegh meng _ pikagh i _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuune ma kangisi _ , _ aangaayugte gpenasi _ . _ ungipagh gpenasi _ whaten _ , _ " _ S ang wa _ qamagte luku _ whanga mneng _ pi kaqe aqa _ . _ "
A ll g egh teng ng waagh um aagh si _ ak l uk egk agh si _ qamagte luku _ ! _ A k l ung i ghi ng waagh l usi _ ayuqe usi _ ! _ Wh ang ku ngun a si _ umiileg ughte ma usi _ ! _ umiileg u lghiisi tuq _ , _ enkaam _ umiileg u te i lgusigh nayagh amsi _ !
sumeghtaghagh lleg mni _ kiyaghnegh m _ nekegtekaqe ainkut _ ap o s t l e- en i _ uk al igh pig aal uta _ yug neng _ . _ anusimingllaghagh stun _ ayuqe ukut _ , _ tuqute yaghqagh stun _ . _ yug t _ qam ag teng ng waagh luteng _ , _ yaquleg t llu _ esghapag aqe ainkut _ .
whangkuta _ nallungughtekau ukut _ Christ- a _ apallugh ke luku _ , _ iwernga _ elpek si _ sumegh gpesini _ peghqinegh pigu usi _ ugpeqagh ni _ . _ yug t _ waakigate ainkut _ , _ iwernga _ sumegh gpesini _ elpek si _ nagate aqe aisi llu _ qu ul v agh aq ii si llu _ , _ whangkuta _ pi igate ainkut _ .
Wh av e mun _ kenlanga _ neqangisag aqe ukut _ , _ meghyaghqagh isag aqe ukut _ , _ aatkagh isag aqe ukut _ . _ yug t _ qevute kaqe ainkut _ . _ ne ite ukut _ , _ iglegh t aag u kut _ quunpeng _ .
qepghagh aqe ukut llu _ qevuute luta _ mani nge na luta _ kiyagh t aagh u sigh q ameng _ . _ S egh l equ ul ghiit _ whang kun neng _ pinitun _ aleghqugh aqe aput _ . _ ugpeqagh u te mnneng _ am y u utk en ghi n kut _ akuz il g iig a tu ku t lu _ akite igate aput llu _ .
I q l eng iq utk en ghi n kut _ pinitun _ aleghqugh aqe aput _ tawaten _ pi fqiita _ pi s qell uki _ . _ Wh av e mun _ kenlanga _ sumeghtaghagh te kaqe ainkut _ sakwaagh stun llu _ s as iin ghi l ngugh es tun llu _ .
lata u nghite unga _ kay ngu yug g nal usi _ . _ iwernga _ piniqe pigte lusi _ whanga _ katam _ t aghn ugh h aq el ghi s tun _ liilightugh yug aqe amsi _ kiyaghtaalleghqagh gpesineng _ .
qaywa _ apegh tu ghi s te tu pig sagh ng aagh p esi _ Christ- ameng _ , _ atatu ghllag nghite usi _ . _ U g peq s u wh agh aq ng af si gu _ Jesus _ Christ- a _ nagaqugh luki _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ , _ tawani ta _ ata stun _ lliigh kanga _ elpesi nun _ .
En kaa ng am _ kiyaghte sug pigte amsi _ whanga mtun _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ T im o t h y _ kay ag teng ng w aaq a _ elpesi nun _ . _ ighnegh ke lghii stun _ ayuqe aqa _ atanegh kun _ . _ A taa s iigh m el nguq _ ugpeqe aq _ piniqe pigte aqa _ . _ negh ka ughte naagh aisi _ naten _ whanga _ kiyaghte aqe lleg mneng _ Christ- amun _ . _ Taw ate l nguq _ kiyagh taa ll eq _ apeghtuusagh ke aqe aqa _ ugpeqagh nun _ tam ang an il ngugh nun _ .
ila si _ aa ng aa yug negh ugh taq ut _ , _ qayughllak _ sumegh meggni _ laalighte naanghite ni lunga _ pi kaqe aatnga _ C o r in t h - mun _ .
iwernga _ Atan ghem _ piyuke llegh ke gkagu _ , _ elpesi nun _ pi yaghtugh ngestagh unga _ . _ taagken _ liigike lleqe anka _ aa ng aa yug negh et _ aangaayugte llegh megestun _ pi yaghqaa ta i _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ ataneghpag u llegh a _ akuzite tgun _ ayuqe nghite uq _ iwernga _ agh tugh yaghq aanghi llegh qun _ ayuqe uq _ .
kaate kuma _ s as q es ug es teng nga _ ? _ A nag ut al igh l ung aa _ agh y uugh l am si i _ , _ nalighmeng _ piniqe lusi _ , _ pinitungwaaq _ pil am si i _ ?
nagaqugh aqe aqa _ naligh gpesi nguq _ a ta mi _ nulighh a _ n ul igh q elghii s tun _ ayuqe a _ . _ seghlegh pigte lghii meng _ seghlegh q eng ngu uq _ talwa _ ugpeqagh u nghite ngugh t _ atuqe ste nayagh nghite aat _ taana _ seghleghqe llegh _ .
paninang _ yuuke te kaqe tsi _ elpesi neng _ katam _ ? _ Q iv gh ugh llag yaq leg es tun _ ! _ elpek si _ iq is aq leg es tun _ yuug _ taana _ akule gpesineng _ .
U y av an tegh llag yagh ng aagh m a _ sumeghtaghagh tke ghllagu aqa _ . _ Taw an l eng ugh es tun _ elpesi ni _ agghi tke kaqe aqa _ naten _ pi lleghqagh meng _ taana _ yuug _ ategh akun _ atanegh mta _ Jesus-em _ . _ ugpeqagh ni _ , _ allameng _ q er ngugh us ku f si _ , _ taw an l eng ugh es tun _ umyugagh mig ke lunga _ , _ aghtughyaghqanghillegh akun _ Jesus _ Christ- am _ yuug _ taana _ elpesinite ste gpenaan _ allameng llu _ pi nakesi _ . _ tuune teggu _ tughneghagh- mun _ , _ piyuke llegh mitun _ yugusigh a _ naa f qell igu _ , _ enkaam _ taghneghagh kek _ yuguligh lleg nge sqellug kek _ atanegh _ tagi nqigtekan _ .
P in ii yug te llegh si _ seghleghu uq _ . _ liisimakagh i _ whaten _ pi llegh _ , _ " _ Y e as t- am _ gh h uugh tes tegh ll ak ay u w aa _ akuute aq _ . _ "
tamaaken _ apallug ke luku _ seghleghqe llegh t _ aku leg pesi n il nguut _ iqite ki _ . _ tawaten _ pi kufsi _ pelungite lleqe usi _ akuutagh stun _ y e as t- ang il ngugh es tun _ . _ ipa _ pelungite usi _ qayughllak _ Christ- a _ P as s o v er -em _ pennagh ii aghagh aqe a _ aghqe tke kau uq _ seghleghqe lleg mnnun _ .
katam _ J e w s - et _ iq i te ll ghi s tun _ y e as t- at _ mangteghagh meggneng _ yataaghqe te vagilgamegteggu _ P as s o v er -em _ neqenghaghqe llegh a _ , _ taw at egh pig aq _ seghleghqe lleg put _ iqite lleqe aput _ . _ En kaa ng am _ pelungite lleqe ukut _ , _ ip a pi gh q eng ng all equ ku t lu _ .
ila itgun _ lata ma _ ilate nga snanigh amsi _ ugpeqagh nun _ anagnga lghii kun _ atuqe te lghii nun _ .
A ku z it ke ng ngun ghi tan ka _ uu m _ nuna m _ yug i _ anagnga lghii kun _ atuqe te lghiit _ , _ nalighmeng _ pakignegh t _ , _ w ay aghn iigh tet _ , _ nalighmeng _ tamaakut _ maniguute kayug t _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh nun _ . _ iqite yu kufsi _ taw ate l ngugh neng _ yug neng _ nuna _ un is aghq aq agh si _ .
iwernga _ lata mkun _ ilate snanigh kaqe amsi _ tam aa ku nun _ ugpeqagh u lgute u ni luteng _ pi lghii nun _ s e x - kun _ seghlegh q eng ng uk ata _ , _ nalighmeng _ pakignegh u kata _ , _ maniguute kayugu kata _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh nun _ , _ segh l equ ugh ut ng uk ata _ yug lgute meng _ , _ meghe ste u kata _ , _ wayagh nigh ughte u kata llu _ . _ talwa _ neghe lgusigh gpenaki _ taw ate l nguut _ .
whanga _ nanqigte yaghqaqe nghite anka _ ugpeqagh u nghite ngugh t _ ; _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigte yaghqaqe ai _ . _ iwernga _ elpek si _ nanqigte yaghqaqe yagh asi _ ugpeq aal gu te si _ . _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ pi ut _ , _ " _ seghleghqe sta _ iqite ggu _ akule gpesineng _ . _ "
naligh i _ aaghtiiraagh nghmini _ ugpeq aal g ut min eng _ , _ sangan _ aglagh te aqe agu _ nanqigtivig mun _ ? _ K ay ngu yug ig at si i _ ugpeqagh u nghite ngugh nun _ nanqigte ste negh gpesini _ elpek si _ ugpeqagh ni _ ? _ ugpeqagh t _ ugpeq aal g ut meg g nun _ taklaghte tesaghqagh u yagh ut _ aaghtiiraagh te llegh meggneng _ .
L ii simak en ghi s teg gu u _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug an _ nanqigte yaghqagh i _ ugpeqagh u nghite ngugh t _ ilangani _ aghnegh m _ ? _ nanqigte yaghqaqe u kufsiki _ , _ naten _ piyaqnaghtutka lleqe aat _ elpesi nun _ nanqigte lleghqagh i _ pi yaq n iil nguut _ ?
L ii simak en ghi s tek ii _ nan qig s aghq aq e ke put _ yaquleg t _ ? _ enkaam _ taklaghte qugh llegh t _ aaghte i ragh u aghte te llegh neng _ whani _ unguvallegh mi _ piyaqnagh u i uute yaghqaa yagh ut _ .
aaghtiiraagh te negh gpesini _ sangafsi ngam _ ugpeqagh u nghite ngugh nun _ pi aqe tsi _ nan qig tes qell usi _ ?
kayngu nagh ghhagh meng _ elpek si _ ! _ liisimake aqa _ akule gpesini _ liisima lghii meng _ taklaghte te i stekaghqagh lgu ut _ ugpeq aal gu tet _ aaghtiiraagh te lghiit _ .
yeghlegi _ ugpeqagh m _ ugpeq aal g ut ni _ aglagh te aqe a _ ugpeqagh u nghite ngugh nun _ nan qig t is t en un _ , _ ag ghi t k es qell uki _ aaghtiiraagh te lleg tek _ .
tawatete llegh gpesigun _ ugpeq aanghi l ngugh es tun _ kiyagh t aagh u usi _ . _ U g peq aal gu te si _ aglagh te gpenaki _ nanqigtivig mun _ . _ nepiigh ta qite ki _ anagte ghngaisi _ , _ puughte ghngaisi _ .
itupill _ elpek si _ katam _ ugpeq aal gu te si _ anagte aqe asi llu _ puughte aqe asi llu _ .
ipapestaaq _ lii simak s aghq aq sagh agh si _ seghletun _ pi s tet _ nekaghqagh ite ngugh t _ ataneghpag u llegh ani _ kiyaghnegh m _ . _ puughte ste gpenasi _ kitumun _ alngunak _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ ataneghpag u llegh ani _ nekaghqagh ite ut _ : _ s e x - kun _ seghleghqe kayug t _ , _ maniguute kayug t _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh nun _ , _ g el g aghn iigh tet _ , _ aghnaasigh t _ , _ yug t _ yug lgute meggneng _ atuqe i kayug t _ , _ aghnagh t _ aghnaa lgute meggneng _ atuqe i kayug t _ .
tamaakut llu _ teglenga lghiit _ , _ pakignegh t _ , _ megh es tet _ , _ segh l equ ugh tet _ yug neng _ , _ w ay aghn iigh tet _ , _ nekaghqagh ite ut _ ataneghpag u llegh ani _ kiyaghnegh m _ .
ila si _ tawatete yagh lghiit _ salin _ ugpeqe i llghite luteng _ Christ- ameng _ . _ iwernga _ maaten _ kiyaghnegh m _ taghneghagh gkenka _ ughvughqe kaqe aisi _ seghleghqe llegh gpesineng _ , _ aaftekaqe aisi _ kiyaghnegh mun _ , _ seghlegh qu mang il ngugh es tun llu _ lli aghtekau usi _ qayughllak _ ugpeqe i lghiisi _ atanegh kun _ Jesus _ Christ- akun _ .
ila si _ pi kau ut _ , _ " _ itagnagh uq _ sa u a _ piyuke llegh ka _ pi yagh ghngaamkun _ . _ " _ iwernga _ whanga _ pi amsi _ , _ ila yan _ sa llegh gpesi _ kayuute yiite naanghite ai _ ugpegh lleg si _ . _ aa _ , _ entaqun _ , _ " _ itagnagh uq _ sa u a _ piyuke llegh ka _ pi yagh ghngaamkun _ . _ " _ iwernga _ sumeghtaghagh yalghiinga _ seghlegh mun _ ayghigh pagllag na yukagh ma _ pi naanghite unga _ .
kina llu _ pi nayagh lghii _ , _ " _ neqe _ ulimaagh u uq _ aqsaqugh mun _ , _ aqsaqugh _ neqe mun _ . _ " _ aa _ , _ iwernga _ ilangani _ aghnegh m _ kiyaghnegh m _ naafqesaghqagh ke ak _ qamagte lukek _ aqsaqugh llu _ neq allu _ . _ yugusigh _ s e x - kun _ seghleghqe sighqagh u nghite yagh uq _ qayughllak _ yugusigh _ atanegh mun _ pi u uq _ , _ atanegh _ yugusigh mnnun _ pi u uq _ .
ilangani _ aghnegh m _ kiyaghnegh m _ makete yaghqaqe ai _ yugusigh put _ tuqu llegh meng _ agh tugh yaghq aanghi llegh m i kun _ , _ taw at egh pig aq _ makete llegh mitun _ atanegh _ Jesus _ Christ- a _ tuqu llegh meng _ .
L ii simak en ghi s teg gu u _ yugusigh si _ nalighnegh ke kangi _ Christ- am _ yugusigh an _ ? _ yugusigh ka _ Christ- am _ pi ligh tke a _ a tuq n aagh si ku un _ aghnagh mun _ akike i kayug meng _ yugusigh mineng _ ? _ nakaa _ ! _ pi naanghite aqa _ .
neqamike luku _ , _ yug m _ atuqe gkunigu _ aghnagh _ akike i lghii _ yugusigh mineng _ ataasiightekayug k _ yugusigh ak _ . _ qayughllak _ igaqe nga uq _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ , _ " _ maalghug _ yugusigh k _ ataasighte yaghqaa uk _ . _ "
iwernga _ atanegh mun _ lliigh kuvek _ , _ ataasigh u utek _ taghneghagh kun _ .
L ii simak en ghi s teg gu u _ yugusigh si _ kiyaghnegh m _ temple- ke kangi _ , _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh gkenka _ kiyaghfig i _ ? _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuune kaqe aisi _ agleghnagh lghii gneng _ T aghnegh agh min eng _ , _ enkaam _ maaten _ kiyaghnegh m _ pi liite kaqe aisi _ . _ elpesi neng _ pike nghite usi _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ s e x - kun _ seghleghqe gpenasi _ . _ S e x - kun _ seghleghqe gkufsi _ , _ nukeggnaghqe lghii stun _ kiyaghnegh m _ temple- nga _ pi lleq agh si _ . _ ila i _ seghleghqe llegh t _ tawatete nghite ut _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ tukfigh kaqe aisi _ akitu pigte luku _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ qu ul v agh teg gu _ kiyaghnegh _ yugusigh gpesigun _ .
A ap tek aq agh pesi nga _ nengughte te llegh meng _ lata gpesigun _ . _ U ku s ta _ kiimsigh te nka _ . _ pinigh uq _ yuug _ nuliigh ngunani _ .
iwernga _ yuug _ tamaghhagh mi _ nuliigh lgu yaghqaa uq _ , _ aghnagh _ tamaghhagh mi _ ugi lgu yaghqaa uq _ , _ qayughllak _ nan ghii qu ll eng n ay uk af si _ s e x - kun _ seghleghqe llegh mun _ .
yug m _ ef qugh s aghq aqaa _ nuliigh ni _ . _ Taw a teg gh pig aq _ aghnagh m _ ef qu s aghq aqaa _ ugi ni _ atuqe te llegh megteni _ .
aghnagh m _ ellnginagh mi _ yugusigh ni _ pike nghite a _ , _ ugi an llu _ pi ke aa _ . _ Taw at egh pig aq _ yug m _ ellnginagh mi _ yugusigh ni _ pike nghite a _ , _ nulighh an llu _ pi ke aa _ .
nengughte ma kufsi _ ighsake te gpenasi _ . _ wetku qun _ itagnagh kete te lusi _ atuqe te yaghqaa fqaafsi _ qafsina t _ un ug et _ yughagh aghagh na lusi _ . _ taagken _ a tuq un neq ig llegh h aa si _ nan ghii qu ll eng n ay uk af si _ tughneghagh- meng _ qayughllak _ nuqete yaghqaa nanigh kau lghiisi _ .
qelegh u nghite amsi _ n ul igh t ii s qell usi _ nalighmeng _ ug iigh es qell usi _ . _ iwernga _ piyug kufsi _ pi lghaasi _ .
whanga mtun tuq _ nulightugh fqaafsi _ , _ aghnagh ni llu _ ugiigh fqaafsi _ . _ iwernga _ allake te ukut _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ nuliigh lgu stekayugu ai _ ila i _ yug t _ , _ ugi lgu stekayugu ai _ ila i _ aghnagh t _ . _ iwernga _ itagnagh stekayugu ai _ ila i _ yug t _ nula i u na ki _ , _ aghnagh t llu _ ugi u na ki _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ allake te lghii _ tunusagh _ tuun egk ay u w aa _ yug nun llu _ aghnagh nun llu _ .
una ta _ pi kegka _ nulightugh ma ite ngugh nun _ , _ ugiigh ma ite ngugh nun llu _ , _ ugingighagh nun llu _ : _ pinigh nayagh usi _ nulightugh nghite yagh kufsi _ whanga mtun _ , _ aghnagh ni llu _ ugiigh nghite yagh kufsi _ .
iwernga _ yuug _ pinigh aghagh nayagh uq _ nulightugh luni _ n uq e te pag n ing il nguq _ aghnagh yug llegh mineng _ . _ aghnagh llu _ pinigh aghagh nayagh uq _ ugiigh luni _ n uq e te pag neng il nguq _ yug yug llegh mineng _ . _ pinigh aghagh nayagh usi _ nengughte lusi _ nanghiiqu lleg nge lleghqagh gpesineng _ seghleghqe llegh mun _ s e x - kun _ .
ukut _ akuzite t _ whanga mneng _ pi u nghite ut _ , _ qelegh sagh u ut _ atanegh meng _ nengughtekagh nun _ . _ aghnagh _ iqite yaghqaa nghite uq _ ugi mineng _ .
iwernga _ iqite kuni _ , _ alla neng _ ugiigh yaghqaa nghite uq _ nalighmeng _ ugi minun _ lliigh nqigte li _ . _ yug m llu _ iqitesaghqagh ke nghite a _ nuliigh ni _ .
una _ qelegh sagh _ whanga mneng _ pi u uq _ ila itnun _ . _ ( _ Atan ghem _ sa meng _ pi aghte mangite a _ . _ ) _ yuug _ ugpeqe aq _ ugpeqagh u nghite ngugh meng _ nuliigh lgu kuni _ ellminite yu lghii meng _ , _ iqite ste nghite ligu _ .
aghnagh llu _ ugpeqe aq _ ugpeqagh u nghite ngugh meng _ ugi lgu kuni _ ellminite yu lghii meng _ , _ iqite nghite li _ .
inqun _ yuug _ ugpeqagh u nghite ngughk _ aa f teng ng w aaq aag uq _ kiyaghnegh mun _ qayughllak _ nulighh a _ ugpeqagh u lghii _ . _ aghnagh llu _ ugpeqagh u nghite ngughk _ aa f teng ng w aaq aag uq _ kiyaghnegh mun _ qayughllak _ ugi a _ ugpeqagh u lghii _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ taghnughhagh it _ pelungite ut llu _ aa f teng ng w aaq aag ut lu _ .
iwernga _ naligh _ ugpeqagh u nghite ngughk _ iqite yu kuni _ , _ iqite li _ . _ taagken _ ugpeqe aq _ yuug _ nalighmeng _ aghnagh _ iteme li _ taw ate l ngugh meng _ nengughte llegh mineng _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ n ek eg g m ell usi _ kiyaghte sqe sug aqe aisi _ .
ugpeqagh mi _ aghnagh mi _ , _ ugi gpenite kuvek _ kay us ii taq s aagh an _ yuguligh llegh mun _ . _ nalighmeng _ ugpeqagh mi _ yug mi _ , _ nuliigh gpenite kuvek _ kay us ii taq s aagh an _ yuguligh llegh mun _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ ataa si k agh tagh p esi _ ugpeq is taq ng i si _ Christ- ameng _ , _ nengughtekau tsi _ nalighmeng _ nengughte ma nge i tsi _ ? _ C i r c um c is e- e kaa t si i _ nalighmeng _ pi ma nge i tsi _ ? _ Q ep ghagh te l aagh u yagh et si i _ nalighmeng _ qep ghagh te l aagh un ghi te t si i _ ? _ almesiqe lusi _ tawaten _ nagnegh tek _ qayughllak _ Atan ghem _ tawatete stekaqe aisi _ . _ qamagte luki _ ugpeqagh t _ taagken _ apeghtugh aqe anka _ .
yuug _ c i r c um c is e- ek aq _ ugpegh aqngami _ , _ allangughte te qugh a mi _ pi lghaaq _ . _ C i r c um c is e- em ang il ngu q lu _ ugpeqe aq _ , _ c i r c um c is e- en aq ef q aa mi _ pi lghaaq _ .
C i r c um c is e- ell eq lu _ c i r c um c is e- en ghi te lleq lu _ pi t ngun ghi tu k _ . _ P it ngu yaghq aq ta _ taana _ qaute kete luki _ kiyaghnegh m _ liilightuusagh i _ .
A taa si k agh tagh p esi _ ugpeqe i aqngafsi _ , _ natete llegh gpesistun _ almesiqe teggu _ .
Q ep ghagh te l aagh u yagh s ii n _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuqlugh aqe yaten _ ? _ sumeghtaghagh tke gpenaan _ . _ iwernga _ qep ghagh te l aagh un an igh naq ngu ku v ek _ , _ sa aqe ziin _ legan _ tawaten _ pi lghaaten _ .
Q ep ghagh te l aaq _ nakmikegkagh a _ Atan ghem _ , _ ellnga n _ iteme nga lghii ke a _ . _ Taw at egh pig aq _ qep ghagh te l aagh un ghi l nguq _ yuug _ nakmikegkagh a _ Christ- am _ , _ ellnga n _ qep ghagh te l aaq aa _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ tukfighpag kaqe aisi _ , _ enkaam _ qep ghagh te l aagh ugh teg pen a si _ yug nun _ .
U g peq aal gu tem ni _ , _ tamaghhagh gpesi _ aghula igh te yaghqaa usi _ ilate nga llegh gpesigun _ kiyaghnegh mun _ almesiqe lusi _ tawaten _ tuqlugh llegh atun _ .
A ap taq agh pesi nga _ naten _ sumeghtaghagh te kaqe ta i _ ugiigh ma ite ngugh t llu _ nulightugh ma ite ngugh t llu _ . _ Atan ghem _ ungipaate mangite aanga _ liilightuusagh meng _ tam aa ku nun _ yug nun _ , _ iwernga _ ungipaate naqe amsi _ sumeghtaghagh lleg mneng _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ nangllegtagh llegh akun _ ap o s t l e- ngugh te kaa gu nga _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ neghyuke nakefsinga _ .
S egh l el iigh llag ugh tuq _ nuna _ maaten _ . _ sume mni _ whanga _ itagnagh yaghqaa uq _ yuug _ almesiqe luni _ .
nulightugh ma ziin _ ? _ iqite ste gpenaan _ nulighh n _ . _ nulightugh ma ite kuvek _ , _ nulightugh naqe gpenang _ .
iwernga _ nulightugh kuvek _ seghlegh q eng ngun ghi tu ten _ . _ ugiigh ma ite ngughk _ ugiigh kuni _ , _ seghlegh q eng ngun ghi tuq _ . _ iwernga _ nulightugh kufsi _ , _ aghnagh t llu _ ugiigh kumeng _ piyaqleg iigh aghagh yaghqaa usi _ whani _ kiyagh taa llegh mi _ . _ piyaqleg iigh sug nghite pigte amsi _ tawaten _ .
U g peq aal gu tem ni _ , _ una ta _ pi kegka _ : _ atanegh ut _ tagi yaghtugh ngestagh uq _ . _ taana _ apallugh ke luku _ nengughtekagh t _ qepghagh te litgu _ atanegh _ neng ugh sim ang il ngugh es tun _ .
qivghu lghiit llu _ qepghagh te litgu _ q iv gh un ghi l ngugh es tun _ . _ quya nga lghiit llu _ qepghagh te litgu _ quy an ghi l ngugh es tun _ . _ tamaakut llu _ tukfightugh ghllag kayug t _ qepghagh te litgu _ av ang il ngugh es tun _ .
Kiyagh teng ngu l usi _ nuna mi _ whani _ , _ megnu ke aghagh gpenaan _ nuna m _ s an q ut anga _ . _ qayughllak _ nuna _ almesiqe luni _ aviighute yaghqaa uq _ .
Kiyagh taa llegh m eng tuq _ whaken _ s um egh tagh aatk egk iil ngu usi _ . _ nulightugh ma ite ngughk _ qep gh all egh qagh t aagh a tuq _ Atan ghem _ qepghaqagh aneng _ qayughllak _ ef qugh s ug aqegk anga _ .
nuliigh leg _ qepghagh aghagh qagh yu qu uq _ kiyagh taa llgh em _ qepghaqagh aneng _ qayughllak _ ef qugh s ug aqegk anga _ nuliigh ni _ . _ enkaam _ sumeghtaghagh llegh a _ mal gh ugh q eng ng aa qu q _ .
Taw at egh pig aq _ aghnagh t llu _ ayuqe ut _ . _ aghnagh t _ ugi igh tke aat _ , _ ugiigh ma ite ngugh t llu _ qep gh all egh qagh t aagh a tut _ Atan ghem _ qepghaqagh aneng _ , _ qayughllak _ yugusigh teng llu _ taghneghagh teng llu _ tuune yug aqe ait _ iingunagh ita _ atanegh mun _ . _ iwernga _ ugi leg _ qepghagh aghagh kayugu uq _ kiyagh taa llgh em _ qepghaqagh aneng _ qayughllak _ ef qugh s ug aqegk anga _ ugi ni _ . _ ellnga n llu _ sumeghtaghagh llegh a _ mal gh ugh q eng ng aaq _ .
tawaten _ pi amsi _ kayusiite na lusi _ . _ nengughte snanigh nghite amsi _ . _ iwernga _ nakmike sug aqa _ pinigh lleghpigagh _ elpesi nun _ qepghagh te sqellug qu _ atanegh _ uglafqe sigh ngunasi _ .
nuliighqagh leg m _ atuqe yug yagute kunigu _ nuliighqagh ni _ , _ nengughte lik _ . _ enkaam _ nengughtekumek _ seghlegh q eng ngun aanghi tu k _ .
iwernga _ yug m _ lii simak ng w aa qu m igu _ naten _ pi lleghqagh ni _ , _ n uq e tu t ngu kum ig u llu _ atuqe yu llegh mineng _ nuliighqagh ni _ , _ pinitun _ pi u uq _ . _ kitum _ alngunak _ n ul igh t ii s qugh aanghi l kum igu _ , _ nulightugh yug nghite kuni _ pinitun _ pi u uq _ .
nuliighqagh leg _ nengughte luni _ pinitun _ pi u uq _ , _ iwernga _ nuliighqagh leg _ nengughte nghite kuni _ pinigh aghaghtu te _ pi u uq _ .
aghnagh _ alla neng _ ugiigh yaghqaa nghite uq _ ugi ni _ kiyaghte luku _ . _ iwernga _ ugi ni _ tuqu kan _ , _ piyuke llegh mineng _ ugiigh yagh ghngaaghmi _ itagnagh uq _ , _ taawanginaq _ ugpeqagh ghhagh inagh meng _ .
iwernga _ quy ang aagh atagh agh yaghq aag uq _ ugiigh nqigte nghite kuni _ . _ Taa ku s ta _ sumeghtaghagh llegh nka _ . _ ugpeqe aqa _ kiyaghnegh m _ taghneghagh kek _ whanga mnite uk _ .
kiimsigh yug anka _ aap qugh aa ll esi _ negh ke neng _ aghqe tkekagh neng _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh nun _ . _ ipa u uq _ whaten _ pi llegh i _ , _ " _ liisima lleg lgu ukut _ qamagte luta _ . _ " _ Taw ate l nguq _ liisima llegh _ aangaayugte ste i kayugu uq _ , _ iwernga _ piniqe llegh m _ ik naq ugh teng ng w aa _ ugpegh llegh ut _ .
yuug _ pi ll gu yug neq _ , _ esghaghhu ta _ taana _ paninang _ liite yaghqaghtuqagh _ .
iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ pin iq is t en i _ whaten _ pi yaghqaqe ai _ , _ " _ whanga _ pi ke anka _ . _ "
enkaam _ neghe lleqe sta _ aghqe tkekagh meng _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh nun _ ? _ liisimake aput _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh t _ kiyaghnegh u nghite ut _ . _ ataasigh ghhagh u uq _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ alla _ kiyaghnegh ite uq _ .
ila ita _ yug t _ ugpeqe aqe aat _ kiyaghneghtu ni luku _ , _ ataneghtu ni luku _ qilag llu _ nuna llu _ .
iwernga _ whangkuta _ liisimakagh ut _ ataasigh ghhagh u uq _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ ellnga _ Atan gh u uq _ . _ sa u a _ qamagte luni _ ellnga neng _ pi u uq _ , _ kiyagh teng ngu u kut _ ellnga nun _ . _ liisimakagh ut llu _ ataasigh ghhagh u uq _ atanegh _ , _ Jesus _ Christ- ang u uq _ . _ ellnga kun _ sa u a _ qamagte luni _ ulima kau uq _ , _ unguva u ukut llu _ ellnga kun _ .
ila ita _ ugpeqagh t _ nalluke ait _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh t _ kiyaghnegh pigu nghite u langi _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ ugpeqe aqe ait _ neqe t _ aghqe te kaqe ni luki _ kiyaghnegh pig nun _ . _ enkaam _ nenegh meggni _ aghqe tkekagh meng _ sumeghtaghagh aqe ut _ , _ " _ seghleghqe unga _ . _ "
iwernga _ neqe _ pi t ngun ghi tuq _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ usuqe aghagh naanghite aisi _ neghe llegh gpesigun _ neqe meng _ . _ aghqe tkekagh meng _ neghenghite kumta _ sa u a _ alngunak _ i f l an aanghi tagh put _ kiyaghnegh meng _ ayuqe lghii _ . _ talwa _ neghe ghngaamta _ allgegh te na nghite ukut _ ellnga neng _ .
ugpeqagh ghllag ni _ elpek si _ , _ piyuke llegh gpesistun _ pi yaghqaa lghiisi _ , _ liigike nga te gpesineng _ taana _ ip a pi gh qell eq _ apeghtuusagh ke kaqe a _ . _ iwernga _ kelenga lusi _ kay aal nguut _ ugpegh llegh it _ ayuq n iigh q eg pen ak i _ ellngit a _ sumeghtaghagh llegh itni _ anaggute nga lghii meng _ .
naligh ita _ esghagh kuniten _ negh ma luten _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh t _ temple- nge i te ni _ , _ ellnga llu _ negh yug yaaghte uq _ sumeghtaghagh llegh mini _ anaggute nga yagh ghngaan _ .
enkaam _ liisima llegh gpek _ seghleghqe stesagh u aghagh a _ kay aal nguq _ ugpegh llegh a _ ifla ste luku _ , _ ugpeqagh u lgute kan _ Christ- am _ tuqu tkekagh a _ .
En kaa ng am _ ayuq n iigh q eg ku f si k i _ sumeghtaghagh llegh itni _ anaggute nga lghii meng _ , _ seghleghqe lleqe usi _ ellngit nun llu _ Christ- am un llu _ .
enkaam _ neghe lleg mkun _ aghq ut q egk ameng _ seghleghqe ste na yukagh mkun _ ugpeqagh u lgutke a _ , _ allameng llu _ negh naanghite unga _ sa meng _ tamaaken _ .
iteme nga unga _ , _ piyuke lleg mtun _ pi yaghqaa unga _ . _ A p o s t l e- ngu unga _ esghagh tke aq _ Jesus - meng _ atanegh mnneng _ . _ qepghagh te lleg mkun _ ellnga _ ugpeqagh u usi _ elpek si _ .
talwa _ ila ita _ ap o s t l e- e pig un ghi n n igh ngaat nga _ elpek si _ lii simak agh pesi nga _ ap o s t l e- ep iig uu nga _ atanegh kun _ , _ qayughllak _ kiyagh taa llegh p esi _ Christ- amun _ kelgute kanga _ .
Taa ku s ta _ apegh aqe kenka _ segh l eq is tem nun _ .
B ar n a b as - lu _ whangkutung _ tu ng sigh n aanghi s tuun g _ neghyaghqagh meng llu _ meghyaghqagh meng llu _ elpesi neng _ apeghtuqagh mtegneng _ ?
navek _ pinegh mtung _ k el qep ag n ing i tes teg n ek ii _ ugpeqagh t _ nuliigh pung _ il ang is tun _ ap o s t l e- et _ , _ Atan ghem _ ang leg ut ang is tun llu _ , _ P e te r - e tun llu _ ?
B ar n a b as - lu _ whang ku tuun g _ ellng in aghh aam tun g _ qep gh aa sim ang in agh yaghq aq es teg n eg u u _ neqekaghqagh ung _ ?
P ill u w agh te m _ tukfigh yaghqaqe nghite ai _ saghya ni _ pi ll u w agh t en ill uni _ . _ Taw at egh pig aq _ grapes- meng _ pii tes iigh agh te m _ neghe kayugu ai _ ila i _ piite stekagh ni _ . _ P en n iigh n iigh tem llu _ penniigh mi _ mamagh an _ ila a _ pikayug u a _ .
taakut _ usputagh t _ yug m _ apeghtuusagh ke ai _ , _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ L iiligh tu s aan illu _ apeghtuusagh t _ tawatete ut _ .
igaqe kau uq _ liilightuusagh ni _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuunekagh akun _ M o s es - mun _ : _ " _ S ug r ug iit al igh pen an _ o x - a _ wh e at - et _ tutmagh ste nghpesiki _ qantagh it _ si g iq es qell uki _ . _ " _ kiyaghnegh m _ sumeghmike nghite agu _ o x - a _ ?
sangami _ kiyaghnegh _ tawaten _ pi a _ ? _ O x - ng in aghh aaq _ sumegh ke agu _ ? _ nakaa _ , _ whangkuta llu _ suumqagh ke ainkut _ . _ ipapestaaq _ whang kun nun llu _ igaqe kau uq _ , _ qayughllak _ piitesighaghvig meng _ y at aagh q is t en un llu _ s aghn as t en un llu _ neghyuke kayugu aput _ nengighqe aput _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta i _ piite yaghqagh stun _ ayuqe ut _ . _ whangkutung _ piitesighagh vike kaqe amsi _ , _ enkaam _ taghneghagh si _ quya stekau ut _ . _ tungsighpag lleqe stuung _ tungsigh vike gkumsi _ ak l uk egk am teg neng _ ?
apeghtughiste m _ ila i _ elpesi neng _ allgegh te u kata _ ak l uk egk am eg g neng _ , _ whangkutung _ wataqaaghaq _ pi yaghq agh pig aa yagh tu kun g _ . _ yeghlegi _ qepghagh yug kau ukung _ m an ing er eg aghn al u tun g _ ak l uk egk am teg neng _ allgegh te na lutung _ . _ ilangani _ mani pagite aqe ukung _ . _ talwa _ tamaani _ aapte yug igate amsi _ ak il egh t ii s qell u tun g _ . _ una ta _ apallugh ka _ , _ kitumun _ alngunak _ whaten _ pi sug nghite ukung _ , _ " _ P a u l _ ungipagh kau iqe uq _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ akileghtuusagh nge pigesnagh na luni _ . _ "
liisima kasi _ T em p l e -em _ qep ghagh teng i _ neghe kayug t _ neqe meng _ temple- mun _ tuunekagh meng _ . _ aghqefig m llu _ qep ghagh teng i _ nengigh kayugu ut _ aghqe te kaghqagh meng _ .
tawatete uq _ Atan ghem _ qelegh sagh a _ : _ Ung ip agh te t lu _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ ak l uk egk at eng _ allgeghsaghqagh ke ait _ tam aa ku neng _ ugpeqe ikagh neng _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ .
elpesi neng _ sa meng _ alngunak _ allgegh te igate unga _ pi kaghqagh ke yagh ke mneng _ . _ sumeghtaghagh tke gpenanga _ sa meng _ alngunak _ tungsigh ni lunga _ maaten _ . _ quya aqe unga _ akileghtigh sqe igate ngugh u nga _ elpesi nun _ ungipagh ke i negh mni _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ . _ ungipagh ke i naqngu unga _ akileghtuusagh ite ghngaaghma _ talwa _ panegh yagh ghngaaghma _ . _ enkaam _ kitum _ alngunak _ pi naanghite aanga _ , _ " _ P a u l _ ungipagh kau iqe uq _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ akileghtuusagh nge pigesnagh na luni _ . _ "
iwernga _ aa ng aa yug u sigh q ii tu nga _ ungipagh ke i negh mni _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ , _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ qelqe aqe aanga _ ungip aq is qell unga _ . _ S egh legh waagh un ay agh tu nga _ qaatke nghite yagh kumkun _ kiyaghnegh _ .
nakmike kaqsagh kumkun _ una _ qepghaqagh _ whanga mneng _ akileghtugh te yaghqagh lgu ni lunga _ pi nayagh unga _ , _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike kaqe ta aneng _ pi yaghqaqe aqa _ akileghtuusagh ite ghngaaghma _ . _ alla _ naten _ pi lleghqagh ite unga _ .
sangaawa _ akileghtuusagh ka _ ? _ akileghtuusagh ke aqa _ una _ , _ quya pigte aqe unga _ akileghtuusagh ngunanga _ ungipagh ke i negh mni _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ , _ qaywa _ akileghtugh yaghqaqe yagh ghngaaghpesinga _ .
Q ep ghagh te l aagh un ghi sagh ng aagh m a _ , _ whanga mneng _ katam _ qep ghagh te l aagh ugh te kaa gu nga _ kitumun _ alngunak _ , _ yug mun _ uglagh lghii mun _ ugpeqe sqellug qu _ Christ- a _ .
J e w s -en in n em ni _ kiyaghte aqe unga _ ellngistun _ , _ ugpeqe sqellug qu _ Christ- a _ . _ kiyaghte negh mni _ G en t il e- en i _ liilightuusagh tgun _ kiyagh t aagh ni _ , _ ellngistun _ kiyaghte aqe unga _ liisimake ghngaamkun _ qaatke te lleg mkun _ liilightuusagh tgun _ yuguligh lleg nge yaghqaa nghite ghngaaghma _ , _ ugpeqe sqellug qu _ Christ- a _ .
G en t il e- en in n em ni _ nalluke i lghii ni _ liilightuusagh neng _ , _ ellngistun _ kiyaghte aqe unga _ nalluke lghii stun _ liilightuusagh t _ , _ ugpeqe sqellug qu _ Christ- a _ . _ Q aat ke ng ngun ghi n n il uki _ pi u nghite anka _ kiyaghnegh m _ liilightuusagh i _ , _ iwernga _ q aat ke ng ng w aan ka _ Christ- am _ liilightuusagh i _ .
K ay aal ngugh ni _ kiyaghte negh mni _ ellngistun _ lliigh aqe unga _ , _ ugpeqe sqellug qu _ Christ- a _ . _ En kaa ng am _ kinku stun _ alngunak _ kiyaghte aqe unga _ natete yagh nga a ta _ , _ naten _ alngunak _ yug ul ill eng es qell uki _ .
tawaten _ pi aqe unga _ nag aq ii s q eq egh ll uki _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ , _ qayughllak _ quya ste lleg nge aqe lghiinga llu _ ugpeq en gh at gu _ Christ- a _ .
qamagte luteng _ ke tan qu s tet _ sivulii yu kayugu ut _ , _ iwernga _ ataasigh ghhagh _ kayaalqe i i kayugu uq _ . _ Kiyagh taa llegh pesi ni _ Christ- amun _ , _ ke tan qu s tes tun _ kayaalqe i i naqe aqe tek _ .
K e tan qu s tet _ ulape aqe ut _ yugusigh teng _ ik naq ugh h nal uki _ qayughllak _ qaghpa nge yug aqe lghiit _ avayagh meng _ ququngagh leg meng _ . _ tamaakut _ paligh yaghqaa ut _ . _ iwernga _ qaghpa _ ugpeqagh t _ allgeghsaghqagh at _ qu un pe k aghq aag uq _ .
K e tan qu s tes tun _ taklaghruketun _ ketanqu aqe unga _ kaate na lunga _ kenle mun _ . _ nalighmeng _ teng l ug tes tun _ , _ tenglug agaatagh aqe unga _ kayaalqe i i na lunga _ .
ungipagh kau iqe unga _ naten _ kiyaghte lleghqagh meng _ Christ- amun _ . _ whanga llu _ kiyagh teng ngu unga _ ellnga nun _ enkaam _ yugusigh mnun _ qaatke ste aqe unga _ , _ luuraq _ pi nghite kuma _ kiyaghnegh m _ iqite na yu kanganga _ ellmi neng _ .
U g peq aal gu tem ni _ , _ sumeghtaghagh tke sqe sug anka _ J e w s - et _ , _ maligsaagh ikagh t _ M o s es - meng _ . _ E g y p t- meng _ aghulaqe aqngameng _ qamagte luteng _ maligtekaqe aat _ qilag u aq _ , _ maghyaghqugh i lghii _ tume kaghqagh itgun _ . _ kaa sa ta _ kavilngugh mun _ kellii mun _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ p ell egh tek aqegk anga _ megh _ aghv ii s qell uki _ yaywaaseng _ .
qamagte luteng _ paaptaayekagh u lghiit _ qilawaagh kun llu _ kavilngugh kun llu _ kellii kun _ maligte yaaghte u luteng _ M o s es - mun _ .
qamagte luteng _ neghe kau ut _ manna- meng _ ,
meghe kau ut _ ataasigh meng _ taagken _ megh meng _ kiyaghnegh m _ taghneghagh gkenka _ tuunekagh aneng _ . _ meghe kaqe aat _ megh _ maaqekagh _ uyghag meng _ . _ Taa m _ uyghag m _ maligsaagh kaqe kangi _ kiyaghnegh m _ taghneghagh gkenkun _ . _ uyghag _ taana _ Christ- ang u uq _ .
tawaten _ kiyaghnegh m _ aflengake kaqe ghngaisteng _ , _ paninang _ allute luteng _ ef qugh sim ang il k angat _ ellnga _ . _ enkaam _ tumangani _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuqu ste aqe luki _ yugusighkwaagh it _ mingite kau lghiit _ kilgaa ni _ .
tamaa na _ qamagte luni _ pi llgh at _ whang kun nun _ usputagh u uq _ , _ k el eng as aagh iin kut _ ellngistun _ piyuke fqaan _ seghlegh _ pi sqellug qu _ .
manig ughte ngughte gpenasi _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh nun _ il ang is tun _ . _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ igaqe kau uq _ , _ " _ yug t llu _ aghnagh t llu _ negh aqe ut _ , _ megh aqe ut _ taagken _ aghula aqe ut _ . _ " _ tawaten _ maniguute kau ut _ g o l d - meng _ ulimaagh mun _ kaa w agh agh mun _ .
seghleghqe fqaamta _ s e x - kun _ il ang is tun _ . _ A ll g egh negh a _ seghleghqe llghite a _ 2 3 , 0 0 0 _ yuug _ tuqu laghate te kau uq _ ataasigh mi _ aghneghmi _ .
N an ghii q un aq ef q aam teg gu _ Atan ghem _ nuqete neghtu llegh a _ pi lteggu _ , _ il ang is tun _ . _ nemeghyagh t _ tuqu qugh kaqe ait _ ila i _ sivunegh put _ qayughllak _ nanghiiqu kaqe kangat _ atanegh _ .
A ku z il g agh pen a si _ il ang is tun _ . _ yaquleg m _ tuqu ste i kayug m _ tuqu qugh kaqe ai _ ila i _ sivunegh put _ qayughllak _ akuz il g aatk aqegk angat _ kiyaghnegh _ .
qamagte luki _ tamaakut _ sivunegh mta _ atuqekagh it _ , _ usputaghqagh u kau ut _ whang kun nun _ . _ igaqe kau ut _ kelenga sagh u te u luteng _ whang kun nun _ kiyaghte lghii nun _ kinguligh ni _ aghnegh ni _ , _ ellngistun _ pi fqaamta _ pi s qell uta _ .
enkaam _ kina _ alngunak _ sumegh mini _ pikumi _ ugpegh lleg ni _ aghula igh te ni luku _ , _ kelenga li _ luuraq _ seghleghqesagh u aghte uq _ .
qamagte luteng _ nanghiiqu lleg si _ all ak aa y ag un ghi tut _ yug nun _ . _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh _ ata siigh mete uq _ , _ nanghiiqu llegh mun _ qaasghutesaghqagh ke nghite ai _ iknaqe lleg si _ , _ ik naq ell el it aq n aagh ii si _ nuqete sighqagh meng _ . _ enkaam _ iqite aqe lleqe usi _ taagken _ nanghiiqu llegh meng _ .
piniqekagh mni _ , _ maniguute gpenasi _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh nun _ .
aleghqugh amsi _ sumeghnegh lgu lusi _ , _ sumeghtaghagh te kete nakesi _ sa meng _ pil q a _ .
I y am si qay ag un n em teg gu _ qayuusigh mete ngughk _ wine- a _ Atan ghem _ neqenghaghqe llegh ani _ , _ nengigh aqe ukut _ Christ- am _ aaw aneng _ . _ iigge mnneng _ aavgugh luku _ neqekrangllagh _ n en em teg gu _ , _ nengigh aqe ukut _ Christ- am _ yugusigh aneng _ .
neqekrangllagh _ aavgugh kau ghngaaghmi _ ataasigh u uq _ . _ uglagh ghllag yagh ghngaamta _ , _ ataasigh meng _ taagken _ negh aqe ukut _ . _ enkaam _ kelgute aqe a _ nal igh neq ugh n il uta _ ataasigh mun _ yugusigh mun _ .
sumeghtaghagh te kaghte ki qun _ I s r a el - egh m iit _ ; _ nenegh meggni _ aghqe tkekagh meng _ , _ ilate aqe ut _ maniguute lghii nun _ kiyaghnegh mun _ aghqefig gni _ .
S um egh pesi n ii _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh t _ kiyaghnegh pigu aat _ ? _ neqe t llu _ aghqe tkekagh t _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh nun _ , _ manigugh sigh pigu aqe aat _ ?
nakaa _ ! _ nalluke i lghiit _ kiyaghnegh meng _ aghq er r aagh aq ut _ tughneghagh nun _ , _ nak an _ kiyaghnegh mun _ . _ ilate nga ste sug nghite amsi _ tughneghagh nun _ .
Christ- amun _ pi liite stekau kufsi _ tughneghagh t _ maligte naanghite asi _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ Atan ghem _ qayuusigh aneng _ meghe gkufsi _ , _ tughneghagh t llu _ qayuusigh itneng _ megh naanghite usi _ . _ Taw at egh pig aq _ Atan ghem _ neqenghaghqe llegh ani _ neghe kayugu kufsi _ neqekrangllagh meng _ Atan ghem _ tipele gkeni _ , _ tughneghagh t llu _ tipele itni _ negh naanghite usi _ neqe meng _ .
whangkuta _ Christ- am _ pi liite ke ii te ni _ tughneghagh t _ maligte naqe gkumteki _ , _ kiyaghnegh _ qu ng yagh tes l eq agh put _ . _ neqamike luku _ ellnga _ iknaqe ghllag uq _ whang kun neng _ .
ila si _ pi kau ut _ , _ " _ itagnagh uq _ sa u a _ piyuke llegh ka _ pi yagh ghngaamkun _ . _ " _ iwernga _ whanga _ pi amsi _ , _ ila i _ salleg si _ pinigh nghite ut _ . _ aa-a _ , _ entaqun _ , _ " _ itagnagh uq _ sa u a _ piyuke llegh ka _ pi yagh ghngaamkun _ , _ " _ iwernga _ ila yan _ sa llegh gpesi _ kayuute yiite naanghite ai _ ugpegh lleg si _ .
kina _ alngunak _ ellng in aa yug te f q aa mi _ pi uq lli _ , _ yeghlegi _ ila ni llu _ sumeghtaghagh te kaqe luki _ .
sa u a _ alngunak _ kemeg qragh k _ tukfighkagh i _ estugagh meng _ negh aqe teggu _ sumeghtaghagh tke gpenaan _ aghqe tke kau ta a _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh nun _ .
qayughllak _ igaqe kau uq _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ , _ " _ nuna _ , _ sa u aat llu _ qam ag teng ng waagh luki _ taw an l e nguut _ Atan ghem _ pi ke ai _ . _ "
ugpeqagh u nghite ngugh m _ negh yaghtigh sqe kangisi _ piyug kufsi _ pi lghaasi _ . _ sa u a _ alngunak _ ketfaghtuqagh at _ negh aqe teggu _ sumeghtaghagh tke gpenaan _ aghqe tke kau ta a _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh nun _ .
iwernga _ kitum _ pi kangisi _ , _ " _ taana _ aghqe tke kau uq _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh nun _ , _ " _ neghe gpenaan _ , _ ungip aat is teg p esi _ ugpegh llegh a _ kay aal is n ay uk af si gu _ , _ qayughllak _ ellnga ni _ anaggute nga lghii u uq _ . _ entaqun _ sumeghtaghagh na yalghiisi _ , _ " _ sangama tuq _ piyuke lleg mtun _ pi yaghqaa nghite zinga _ ? _ sangama tuq _ kitum _ i negh qugh agh aq anga _ alla tun _ sumeghtaghagh kayug m _ whanga mneng _ ?
iyamsiqa yug vike gkumkun _ kiyaghnegh _ neghyaghqagh mneng _ , _ sang an Ê¼ ng am _ kitum _ segh l equ ugh lleq anga _ neghe gkuma _ iyamsiqa yug tkekagh mneng _ ? _ "
enkaam _ qamagte luku _ sa llegh i _ qu ul v aa si q aq i teg gu _ kiyaghnegh mun _ , _ talwa _ neghe lleg si llu _ meghe lleg si llu _ .
sa gpenasi _ seghleghqe ste i yaghqagh meng _ J e w s -en un _ , _ G en t il e- en un _ , _ ugpeqagh nun llu _ .
E f qugh h naq utk aq an ka _ yug lgute nka _ salleg mkun _ alngunak _ . _ whanga inagh mnun _ pinigh lleghqagh _ pi igate aqa _ , _ iwernga _ pinighqe lleghqagh itnun llu _ yug lgute ma _ pi aqe unga _ , _ uglagh lghii _ yuguligh lleg nge sqellug qu _ .
enkaam _ whanga mtun _ pi aqe tek _ , _ katam _ whanga _ maligte lleg mtun _ Christ- a _ .
usuqe amsi _ neqamike kefsinga _ , _ atuqe kesi llu _ apeghtuusagh nka _ .
iwernga _ liigike sug amsi _ Christ- a _ naasqugh u te i u uq _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ yug nun _ , _ yugu uq llu _ naasqugh u te i lghii _ nuliigh mineng _ .
nasqughiitagh igh luni _ yuug _ yughagh kuni _ nalighmeng _ ungipagh kuni _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh aneng _ yughaghvig mi _ , _ qu ul v agh yaghq aq en ghi t aa _ naa s qu ut il gh i _ .
enkaam _ aghnagh _ nasqughiitagh igh gpenani _ yughagh kuni _ nalighmeng _ ungipagh kuni _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh aneng _ , _ qu ul v agh yaghq aq en ghi t aa _ naasqugh u te i lghii _ . _ tawaten _ pikumi _ qig ugh w aaq as tun _ meqe ste luni _ ayuqe lleqe uq _ .
aghnagh _ nasqughiitagh igh yug nghite kuni _ , _ kepugh li _ nuyiigh te luni _ . _ iwernga _ aghnagh ni _ kayngu nagh lghii u uq _ qigugh llegh llu _ nuyiigh te luni llu _ kepugh llegh _ , _ enkaam _ nasqughiitagh igh nga li _ .
yuug _ nasqughiitagh igh yaghqaa nghite uq _ maniguute kuni _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ nangaghnegh atun _ ulimaagh u uq _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ aange llegh a _ esghigh sqellug qu _ . _ iwernga _ aghnagh _ ul im aagh uq _ yug m _ aange llegh a _ esghigh sqellug qu _ .
liisimake kesi _ yuug _ aghnagh meng _ ulimaagh u nghite ngughk _ , _ iwernga _ aghnagh _ yug meng _ ulimaagh u lghii _ .
yuug _ ulimaagh u nghite uq llu _ aghnagh mun _ iwernga _ aghnagh _ ulimaagh u uq _ yug mun _ .
taana _ apallugh ke luku _ aghnagh _ nasqughiitagh igh yaghqaa uq _ , _ enkaam _ yaquleg t _ liigike litgu _ yuug _ aghnagh mun _ naasqugh u te i u ta a _ .
iwernga _ neqamike teggu _ Atan ghem _ uspeqe llegh a _ , _ yug nkuk _ aghnaa nkuk _ aklu kete te nga uk _ .
aghnaqe yug ggaaq _ yug meng _ ulimaagh u ghngaan _ , _ taagken _ kenlanga _ yuug _ qamagte luni _ allgegh kau uq _ aghnagh meng _ , _ iwernga _ aghnagh t llu _ yug t llu _ qamagte luteng _ kiyaghnegh meng _ pi u ut _ .
sumeghtaghagh te kaghte ggu qun _ : _ ipa _ anaggute nga a _ aghnagh m _ nasqughiitagh ngunani _ yughagh llegh a _ kiyaghnegh mun _ ?
yug t _ quunpeng _ ugpeqe aqe aat _ n uy iigh tek agh nguq _ yuug _ uk av agh taq uq _ ellmi neng _ ,
iwernga _ aghnagh m _ nuyagh ghllag ni _ qu ul v aa si q aa _ . _ nasqughiitaghqagh u luni _ ellnga nun _ pi kau uq _ .
paninang _ kina _ aaghtiiraagh yug u kuni _ nasqughiitagh meng _ , _ ungip aan neq ig tagh ll akun _ taana ta _ ap o s t l e- en i _ apegh tuus aq aq eg ke f ut _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug an _ atuqe aqe aat _ apeghtuusagh _ n aan sagh ng aagh meng _ .
whaken _ apeghtugh yug amsi _ qerngughte te aqe llegh gpesineng _ maniguute llegh mun _ . _ usuqepagningite amsi _ qerngughte te aqe llegh gpesinun _ qayughllak _ aq n igh qu ut agh agh aq usi _ pinighqe te gpenasi _ .
ungipaate aqe aatnga _ qerngughte te negh gpesini nguq _ ila si _ aa f q em er aagh utaq ut _ , _ ataasigh stun _ pi gpenateng _ . _ ugpeqe kestagh luku _ lliigh aqa _ .
entaqun _ aafqugh te llegh gpesigun _ liigike yaghqaqe asi _ naligh si _ ipa _ qaatke te nga ta i _ atanegh mun _ .
enkaam _ qerngughte te negh gpesini _ Atan ghem _ neghesta igh llegh anun _ , _ negh yagh tuun ghi taq agh si _ .
neghe uute negh gpesini _ tamaghhagh gpesi _ negh ragkiigh aqe usi _ neqe gpesineng _ , _ ila si _ utaqa gpenaki _ . _ enkaam _ ila si _ iyatagh aqe ut _ , _ ila si _ suume aqe ut _ .
N egh ig at s ii - i _ , _ megh ig at s ii - i _ ne gpesini _ ? _ nalighmeng _ ugumi ke stekagh i _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug i _ ? _ kayngusaghagh te ste naqutke aqe stekagh i _ ava ite ngugh t _ ? _ sa meng _ pi lamsi _ ? _ U s uq l am si i _ ? _ nakaa _ , _ usuqe naanghite amsi _ !
sa u a _ liite kaqe a _ atanegh meng _ apeghtuusagh ke aqe aqa _ elpesi nun _ . _ Atan ghem _ Jesus-em _ i ghi v g agh mi _ tawani _ uvegh ghpagte te lleghqagh mini _ tugukagh a _ neqekrangllagh _ .
iyamsiqa yug vike yamigu _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ aavgugh luku _ , _ pi ke aq _ , _ " _ una _ yugusigh ke aqa _ elpesi nun _ pi u uq _ . _ negh aqe teggu _ neqamike sigh u luku _ whanga mneng _ . _ "
negh nghmeng _ taaqe yameng _ , _ taw at egh pig aq _ tugu luku _ qayuusigh _ w in e- egh r agh agh meng _ imaleg _ , _ pi ke aq _ , _ " _ una _ qayuusigh _ kiyaghnegh m _ nutaghagh u uq _ akequsagh a _ aaw mkun _ . _ awen _ megh aqe teggu _ neqamike sigh u luku _ whanga mneng _ . _ "
enkaam _ quunpeng _ nenegh gpesini _ taagken _ neqekrangllagh meng _ , _ menegh gpesini llu _ taagken _ qayuusigh meng _ , _ k el g ut ng w aaq agh si _ Atan ghem _ tuqu llegh a _ kenlanga _ alla _ tagi lleghqagh anun _ .
kina _ alngunak _ temngi _ neghe gkuni _ Atan ghem _ neqekrangllagh aneng _ , _ meghe gkuni llu _ Atan ghem _ qayuusigh aneng _ , _ qu ul v aghn aanghi t aa _ Atan ghem _ yugusigh a llu _ aawallu _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ sivuke luni _ yug m _ avuteghqe te kete liki _ seghleghqe lleg ni _ alla _ pi yaghqaa fqiita _ pi na luki _ . _ enkaam _ neghe lghaaq _ neqekrangllagh meng _ , _ meghe lghaaq llu _ qayuusigh meng _ .
kina _ alngunak _ neghe lghii _ neqekrangllagh meng _ , _ meghe lghii llu _ qayuusigh meng _ , _ Atan ghem _ yugusigh a _ liigike naqe gpenaan _ sa meng _ pi sagh ite anga _ nan qig te ll eng yaghq aa qu q _ atanegh meng _ .
taana _ apallugh ke luku _ uglagh usi _ kay aal ngugh n illu _ qinuyug nga lghii ni llu _ enkaam _ qafsina t _ tuqu laghate te kau ut _ .
iwernga _ ip a pi gh qell uta _ nanqigtekumta _ whang kun neng _ katam _ enkaam _ avuteghqe tke gkumteki _ seghleghqe lleg put _ , _ Atan ghem _ nanqigte naanghite ainkut _ tawaten _ pi kumta _ .
iwernga _ Atan ghem _ apeghtugh yug nghminikut _ naten _ kiyaghte lleghqagh meng _ , _ nanqigte aqe ainkut _ . _ aghyuugh yaghqaa fqaamta _ pi na luta _ nanqigte i kuni _ ugpeqe i igate ngugh neng _ .
enkaam _ ugpeq aal gu tem ni _ qerngughte te negh gpesini _ negh na lusi _ Atan ghem _ neqenghaghqe llegh aneng _ neghe kestagh gpenasi _ , _ utaqatu te aqe lusi _ .
iyatagh lghiit _ tamaakut _ ne meggni _ negh lit _ en kaa ng am _ Atan ghem _ nanqigte nghite liki _ . _ aglagh kuma _ elpesi nun _ ila i _ aaptekasi _ kiimsigh naagh anka _ .
U g peq aal gu tem ni _ , _ liite sug amsi _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ tunusagh aneng _ .
N eq am ik agh si _ salin _ ugpegh llghite lusi _ maniguute ste aatagh kaqe kangisi _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh nun _ akuzi igate ngugh nun _ . _ aaghqute aqe stekau lghiisi _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ liigike sug amsi _ kina _ alngunak _ whaten _ pi lghii _ , _ " _ Jesus _ seghleghu uq _ , _ " _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ akuz is teng ngun ghi t aa _ tawaten _ . _ iwernga _ kina _ alngunak _ whaten _ pi lghii _ , _ " _ Jesus _ Atan gh u uq _ , _ " _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ akuz is teng ng w aa _ tawaten _ .
agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ tunusagh i _ alla ghhagh inagh u ut _ , _ iwernga _ tunusagh t _ qamagte luki _ taa m _ ataasigh m _ taghneghagh m _ tunusagh ke ai _ .
uglagh pigte uq _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh _ qepghagh te i lleghqagh _ ila mun _ , _ iwernga _ taana _ ataasigh _ atanegh _ qepghagh te lleg nge aqe uq _ .
uglagh u pigte uq _ allake te lghii _ kiyaghnegh m _ qepghaqagh a _ , _ iwernga _ taa m _ ataasigh m _ kiyaghnegh m _ pi ste aqe ai _ whang kun nun _ .
agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ liite stekayugu a _ agh tugh yaghq aanghi ll en i _ ugpeqagh tgun _ tun us al it k am i kun _ . _ tunusagh t _ kitumun _ alngunak _ pinighqe sighqagh u ut _ .
Taa m _ ataasigh m _ taghneghagh m _ yug m _ ila i _ akuzi ste aqe ai _ peghqinellegh mikun _ , _ ila i _ liisima llegh mikun _ .
Taa m _ ataasigh m _ taghneghagh m _ ugpeq ill el it agh aq aq ii _ ila i _ yug t _ , _ ila i _ agh tugh yaghq aanghi ll el it aq ii _ naallghute i yaghqaa luki _ aqnighnegh neng _ .
taghneghagh m _ tuune kaqe ai _ ila i _ yug t _ all aagh ll u wh agh t i sigh q ameng _ . _ ila yan _ yug m _ tugukligh kaqe a _ ungipagh ke i lleghqagh _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh aneng _ . _ ila yan _ yug m _ tugukligh kaqe a _ liigike i lleghqagh _ agleghnagh lghii m _ T agh egh am _ nalighmeng _ tughneghagh t _ igleghte te u ta a _ kina _ . _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ akuzi ste aqe ai _ ila i _ yug t _ aw llaag ghhagh u i nakete te _ ulu kun _ . _ enkaam _ ila itnun _ mumegh igh qugh ste aqe ai _ akuzillegh t _ .
qamagte luteng _ tamaakut _ tunusagh t _ ataa si k agh t aghh agh meng _ taagken _ ataasigh gneng _ taghneghagh gneng _ pi u ut _ . _ tuune yukagh ni _ tamaakut _ naligh itneng _ tunute yaghqagh mi _ tuune aqe ai _ .
katam _ yugusigh _ ataasigh _ nalighneghtu ghllag _ , _ qamagte luteng _ nalighnegh t _ yugusigh m _ pike kangi _ . _ qaywa _ uglagh ghngaaghmeng _ ataasigh u uq _ yugusigh _ , _ Christ- allu _ tawatete uq _ .
qamagte luki _ ugpeqagh t _ nal igh n equ ghii _ Christ- am _ yugusigh an _ . _ ila put _ J e w s - nguut _ , _ ila i _ G en t il e- et _ , _ ila i _ qep ghagh te l aagh et _ , _ ila i _ qep ghagh te l aagh un ghi tut _ . _ iwernga _ qamagte luta _ paaptaayekagh u ukut _ taaggun _ ataasigh kun _ A g legh n alghii g ne kun _ T aghnegh ag ne kun _ , _ Christ- amun _ yug usi lii tes qell uta _ . _ qamagte luta _ tugukligh kaqe agput _ ataasigh k _ taghneghagh k _ .
yugusigh _ ataasigh u nghite uq _ nalighnegh _ , _ nalighneghtu pigte uq _ .
itegagh t _ whaten _ pi ghngaaghmeng _ , _ " _ I ig g eng un ghi l ngu unga _ , _ yugusigh m _ pike nghite aanga _ . _ " _ taaqe naanghite u aghte ut _ yugusigh mete nghmeng _ .
sigute _ whaten _ pi ghngaaghmi _ , _ " _ iye u nghite unga _ , _ yugusigh m _ pike nghite aanga _ . _ " _ taaqe naanghite u aghte uq _ yugusigh mete nghmeng _ .
yugusigh _ iye raaghinagh u yagh kuni _ , _ n at en Ê¼ ng am _ nagaqugh nayagh a _ ? _ nalighmeng _ sigute raaghinagh u yagh kuni _ , _ n at en Ê¼ ng am _ naagh te nayagh a _ sapag nigh meng _ ?
iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ ulima mangite ai _ yugusigh put _ tawatete luki _ . _ nakmikegkagh mineng _ nalighnegh lightuqagh ke ai _ .
yugusigh _ ataasigh u yagh kuni _ nalighnegh _ yugusigh u nayagh nghite uq _ .
ipapestaaq _ yugusigh _ nalighneghtu pigte uq _ .
tea- ma ken _ apallugh ke luku _ iye m _ pinagh nghite ai _ iigge t _ , _ " _ A k l uk en ghi tam si _ . _ " _ Taw at egh pig aq _ naasqugh m _ pinagh nghite i _ itegagh t _ , _ " _ A k l uk en ghi tam si _ . _ "
ipapestaaq _ yugusigh mta _ n at angi _ kayaate tesugnite ngugh t _ megnu nagh pigte ut _ .
yugusigh mta _ n at angi _ sume mnni _ meg nun ap ag il nguut _ , _ elngaatall _ aflenga kaqe aput _ . _ yugusigh mta _ n at angi _ esghagh sug igate ke put _ pilugug nga aqe aput _ ,
ila i _ tamaakut _ esghagh yagh ghngaaghmeng _ ayuqe lghiit _ pilugug igate aput _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ ulima aqe yamigu _ yugusigh _ , _ megnu nagh aghagh stekaqe ai _ megnu naghpag i tesugnite ngugh t _ .
enkaam _ yugusigh _ qepghagh kayugu uq _ qerngagh mi _ . _ nalighnegh m _ qamagte luteng _ aflenga kaqe ait _ ila teng _ tawatengwaaq _ .
ataasigh _ aqnigh nghaani _ qamagte luteng _ aqnigh kayugu ut _ . _ ataasigh _ us uq ell eng en gh ani _ qamagte luteng _ quya kayugu ut _ .
qamagte lusi _ ugpeqagh ni _ Christ- am _ yugusigh ke aisi _ , _ nal igh neq ugh ii si _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ ugpeqagh nun _ nakmike kaqe ai _ sivuke luki _ A p o s t l e- et _ aange lleghpigagh u luki _ , _ tuungligh ghhagh i _ u uk nal iq is tet _ ( _ ungipagh ke i lghiit _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh aneng _ ) _ pingayut igh a _ apeghtughiste t _ , _ taagken _ all aagh ll u wh agh t is tet _ , _ tamaakut llu _ agh tugh yaghq aanghi ll el it k at _ naa llgh ut i mun _ , _ kayusigh i yaghqagh t _ ila meggneng _ , _ pinigh lghiit _ iglegh ut is tet _ , _ tamaakut llu _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh stun _ akuzi kayug t _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuune yukagh ni _ tamaakut _ naligh itneng _ tunute yaghqagh mi _ tuune aqe ai _ .
qamagte lusi _ A p o s t l e- ng ut si i _ , _ uuknaliqe ste u tsi _ , _ apeghtughiste u tsi _ ? _ qamagte lusi _ agh tugh yaghq aanghi ll el it kaa t si i _ all aagh ll u wh agh t i sigh q ameng _ ,
naallghute i kayugu tsi _ ? _ qamagte lusi _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh stun _ akuzi kayugu tsi llu _ mumegh igh qugh kayugu tsi llu _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh neng _ akuzillegh neng _ ? _ nakaa _ !
iwernga _ piyuke teki _ aange aghagh lghiit _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ tunusagh i _ . _ whaa _ maaten _ apegh naqe aqa _ pinigh aghagh lghii _ taa ku neng _ .
akuzi kayugu yagh ghngaaghma _ yug t llu _ yaquleg t llu _ akuz ill ghi s tun _ , _ temngi _ tengngaagtagh lleqe unga _ nalighmeng _ lengaaghtagh lleqe unga _ piniqe i nghite kuma _ .
uuknaliqe kayugu ghngaaghma _ , _ liigike kayugu ghngaamki _ aliite nghite ngugh t _ qamagte luki _ , _ liisima llegh _ qamagtekaqsagh ghngaamkun _ , _ ugpeqe i lleg lgu ghngaaghma _ naayghagh nun _ nuugte i sighqagh meng _ , _ pi t ngun aanghi tu nga _ piniqe i nghite kuma _ .
tuune yagh ghngaamki _ qamagte luki _ sa nka _ aklumalghii nun _ , _ nalighmeng _ paneghtesagh ghngaaghma _ ungipagh ke i llegh ka _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ apallugh ke luku _ , _ allgegh te naanghite unga _ piniqe i nghite kuma _ .
piniqe llegh _ nuqete neghtu uq llu _ , _ nangllegtagh uq llu _ ; _ piniqe llegh _ aq in ang i tuq _ , _ nalighmeng _ y am r r ang i tuq _ , _ nalighmeng _ aa ng aa yug negh i tuq _ .
piniqe llegh _ seghleghyug te ite uq _ , _ nalighmeng _ ellng in aa yug negh i tuq _ . _ piniqe llegh _ sagiqe igate uq _ piyuke llegh mitun _ pi na luni _ , _ q ik egh qu ng ig a tuq _ , _ nalighmeng _ neqamike i igate uq _ anaggute llegh meng _ .
piniqe llegh m _ quya sigh ke igate a _ seghlegh _ , _ yeghlegi _ quya sigh ka qaa _ ip a pi ll eq _ .
piniqe llegh _ ataasiighmete uq _ sang wa _ sa yagh ghngaan _ . _ iiwleng _ ugpeqe i nga uq _ , _ iiwleng _ neghyuke i nga uq _ , _ iiwleng _ nuqete neghtu uq _ .
piniqe llegh _ kenle ite ngughk _ . _ uuknaliqe llegh t _ ken l et gh u us aghq aag ut _ ; _ alla stun _ akuzillegh t _ taaqe yaghqaa ut _ ; _ liisima llegh _ ken l et gh u us aghq aag uq _ .
qayughllak _ tunusagh gput _ liisima llegh llu _ uuknaliqe llegh llu _ iighwite nghite ngugh k _ .
iwernga _ iighwilngugh _ kaate kan _ , _ qamagte luteng _ iighwite nghite ngugh t _ av iigh ugh s aghq aag ut _ .
taghnughhagh u lunga _ akuzi kayugu yagh unga _ , _ sumeghtaghagh kayugu yagh unga _ , _ liigike kayugu yagh unga _ t aghn ugh h agh es tun _ , _ iwernga _ yugughte yalghiinga _ t aghn ugh h agh es tun _ pi nanigh unga _ .
liigike llegh ut _ kiyaghnegh meng _ iighwite nghite uq _ , _ katam _ tawatete uq _ esghagh lghii stun _ taghneghaghqugh te lug kun _ . _ Q aku q aaq un _ lii g ik ng waagh yaghq agh put _ kiyaghnegh _ qayughllak _ es ghagh lleq agh put _ gginasaghqugh luku _ . _ maaten _ liisima llegh ka _ iighwite nghite uq _ . _ ilangani _ aghnegh m _ liisima llegh ka _ iighwigh yaghqaa uq _ katam _ tawaten _ kiyaghnegh m _ lii simak ng w aaq ang anga _ iigh w igh m a _ .
En kaa ng am _ ukut _ pi nga yu t _ ken l et gh u un n aanghi tut _ : _ ugpegh llegh _ , _ sighima llegh _ , _ piniqe llegh _ ; _ iwernga _ piniqe llegh u uq _ angegh lleghpigagh _ .
piniqe lleg nge yug aghagh yaghqaa usi _ p ak ig gu ll uku _ sa meng _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ . _ iwernga _ piyuke teki llu _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ tunusagh i _ , _ wata _ pi y uk s aghq aq agh si _ ungipagh ke i llegh _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh aneng _ .
yuug _ akuzi nghmini _ alla stun _ ulu stun _ aleghqugh aqe a _ kiyaghnegh _ . _ yug t _ aleghqagh igh igate ai _ qayughllak _ liigike naagh i te aat _ . _ akuzi aqe uq _ agh tugh yaghq aanghi llgh akun _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ yug m _ nallukekagh aneng _ .
iwernga _ yuug _ tunusagh leg _ ungipagh ke i llegh meng _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh aneng _ akuzi kayugu uq _ yug nun _ . _ akuzi ta i _ kayusigh i kayugu ut _ , _ kayeme i kayugu ut _ , _ ilutughsagh i kayugu ut _ yug nun _ .
yuug _ akuzi kayug _ alla stun _ ulu stun _ kayusiite kayugu uq _ ellmi neng _ katam _ , _ iwernga _ yuug _ ungipagh ke i kayug _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh aneng _ kayusigh i kayugu uq _ ugpeqagh neng _ .
qamagte lusi _ piyug kaqsagh amsi _ akuz is qell usi _ alla stun _ ulu stun _ , _ iwernga _ wataqaaghaq tuq _ tunusagh lgu lghiisi _ ungipagh ke yaghqaa luki _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh i _ . _ tamaakut _ ungipagh ke i kayug t _ aange aghagh ut _ akuzi kayug neng _ alla stun _ ulu stun _ . _ akuzi kayug t _ alla stun _ ulu stun _ m um igh qugh te l gu yaghq aag ut _ kay us ii tes qell uki _ ugpeqagh t _ .
U g peq aal gu tem ni _ , _ elpesi nun _ pi lunga _ aleghqugh yagh kumsi _ alla stun _ ulu stun _ liigike yaghqaqe nghite ke gpesigun _ n at en Ê¼ ng am _ kay us iin n ay agh es tem si _ ? _ iwernga _ apeghtugh yagh kumsi _ kiyaghnegh m _ kelgutekagh aneng _ whanga mnun _ , _ nalighmeng _ ungipaate yagh kumsi _ sa meng _ liitekagh mneng _ , _ nalighmeng _ uuknaliqe tkesagh kumkun _ kiyaghnegh m _ sa lleghqagh a _ , _ nalighmeng _ apeghtugh yagh kumsi _ ip a pi gh qell egh meng _ elngaatall _ kayusiite nayagh amsi _ .
flute- a llu _ harp- a llu _ seghletun _ q al ghi gh tek ay ek _ kitum _ alngunak _ lii g ik naa ng it aa _ sa u a _ ilagaate _ atugh aqe ta a _ .
P ill u w agh te m _ b ug l e- a _ q al ghi gh tek ag u _ seghletun _ ila ita _ pi ll u w agh tet _ nalluke lleqe aat _ pi ll u w all egh qagh t eng _ .
Taw at egh pig aq _ akuzi kufsi _ alla stun _ ulu stun _ , _ kitum _ alngunak _ liigike naanghite aisi _ sa meng _ pi i qu tsi _ . _ A ku z in ghi l ngugh es tun _ pi yaghqaa usi _ .
uglagh pigte uq _ allaghhiinaq _ akuzillegh _ , _ a tuq is teng it a _ liigike aqe ait _ .
iwernga _ liigike nghite kumkun _ yuug _ akuzi lghii _ alla kun _ akuzillegh kun _ n aku m ii ngu uq _ whanga mni _ , _ enkaam _ whanga llu _ n aku m ii ngu nga _ ellnga ni _ .
En kaa ng am _ elpek si _ , _ tunusagh nge yu pigtekufsi _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ tunusagh aneng _ , _ tungsigh tek _ kayute kaghqagh meng _ ugpeqagh nun _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ yuug _ akuzi kayug _ alla stun _ ulu stun _ , _ yughagh li _ mumegh igh qugh yaghqaa luku _ sa meng _ pilleg ni _ .
yughagh yagh kuma _ alla stun _ ulu stun _ , _ taghneghagh gka _ yughagh lleqe uk _ , _ iwernga _ umyugagh gma _ liigike naanghite ak _ .
sa naqe zinga ngam _ ? _ yughagh lleqe unga _ taghneghagh mkun _ , _ yughagh lleqe unga llu _ umyugagh mkun _ . _ Taw at egh pig aq _ ilagagh lleqe unga _ taghneghagh mkun _ , _ ilagagh lleqe unga llu _ umyugagh mkun _ .
qayughllak _ taghneghagh gpegun _ usuqe gkuvgu _ kiyaghnegh _ alla stun _ ulu stun _ , _ n at en Ê¼ ng am _ liigike igate ngugh m _ usuqe i lgusigh lleqe aten _ kiyaghnegh mun _ iyamsiqa yug llegh gpeneng _ ? _ nalluke a _ sa meng _ pi aqe uten _ .
yughagh llegh n _ pi niigh pigte yagh ghngaan _ ila a _ yug m _ kayusillegh nge naanghite uq _ .
iyamsiqa yug vike aqe aqa _ kiyaghnegh _ akuzi aqe lghiinga _ alla stun _ ulu stun _ uglagh aghagh luku _ elpesi neng _ .
iwernga _ yughaghvig mete negh mni _ apeghtugh i yug aqe unga _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ apeghtugh i aqe unga _ qafsinkuuragh ghhaat _ akuzite t _ atuqe luki _ liigike yaghqagh si _ , _ akuzi naanghite unga _ alla stun _ ulu stun _ uglagh pigte luku _ liigike yaghqaqe nghite ke gpesineng _ .
U g peq aal gu tem ni _ , _ sumeghtaghagh gpenasi _ t aghn ugh h aghh agh es tun _ . _ sumeghtaghagh aqe tek _ anglikagh stun _ , _ iwernga _ seghleghqe sug llegh i _ t aghn ugh h aghh agh es tun _ ayuqe uq _ .
liilightuusagh ni _ igaqe nga uq _ : _ " _ kiyaghnegh _ pi uq _ , _ ' _ kayagte lleqe anka _ yug t _ alla neng _ nuna neng _ al egh qugh yagh t ii s qell usi _ ellngit a _ katam _ ul ung is tun _ . _ aleghqugh lleqe amsi _ q aanghi t gun _ iwernga _ paninang _ nag an n aanghi tagh pesi nga _ . _ ' _ "
enkaam _ tunusagh a _ akuzillegh m _ alla stun _ ulu stun _ ip a pi gh qu s iig uq _ ugpeqe i igate ngugh nun _ , _ nakaan _ ugpeqe i kayug nun _ . _ ungipagh ke i llegh _ ugpeqe i lghii nun _ ayuqe uq _ , _ nakaan _ ugpeqe i igate ngugh nun _ .
En kaa ng am _ yughaghvig gpesini _ ugpeqagh t _ qamagte luteng _ akuzite yagh kumeng _ alla stun _ ulu stun _ , _ ila i _ yug m _ nalighmeng _ ugpeqagh u nghite ngugh t _ itegh kumeng _ nallungughte ni lleqe aisi _ .
iwernga _ ugpeqagh u nghite ngughk _ nalighmeng _ liigike igate ngughk _ yughaghvig gpesinun _ itegh luni _ nagate kunisi _ ungipagh lghiisi _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh aneng _ , _ nagate luni _ nan qig teng ng waagh ll equ q _ seghleghqe ste u ni luni _ .
qamanlliqekagh i _ aksaqe nga lghiit _ qayvighqe lleqe ut _ . _ enkaam _ qungughte luni _ manigugh lleqe a _ kiyaghnegh _ . _ whaten _ pi lleqe uq _ , _ " _ ipapestaaq _ , _ kiyaghnegh _ whaante uq _ elpesi ni _ . _ "
U g peq aal gu tem ni _ , _ una ta _ apeghtuusagh ke naqutke aqe kegka _ . _ qerngughte te negh gpesini _ maniguute na lusi _ ila si _ ilagagh aqe naagh ut _ , _ kina _ apeghtugh i aqe lleqe uq _ , _ nalighmeng _ naligh i _ ungipagh lleqe uq _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh ke sqekagh aneng _ , _ nalighmeng _ naligh i _ akuzi lleqe uq _ alla stun _ ulu stun _ , _ naligh gpesi _ mumegh igh qugh lleqe ai _ . _ ugpeqagh t _ ugpegh llegh itnun _ ik naq ugh us iil it _ qamagte luteng _ .
yughaghvig mi _ kina _ akuzi naqngu kuni _ alla stun _ ulu stun _ , _ maalghug _ nalighmeng _ pi nga yu t _ pi lghaat _ , _ utaqa luki _ ila teng _ taaqe lleghqagh it _ . _ kitum llu _ mumegh igh qugh nakangi _ sa meng _ pi ll ghi t _ .
iwernga _ m um igh qugh teng is k an _ akuzi lghii mun _ alla stun _ ulu stun _ , _ akuzi te qugh a mi _ pi lghaaq _ . _ alla stun _ ulu stun _ akuzi yu kuni _ kavyuguute gpenani _ akuzi lghaaq _ ellmi nun llu _ kiyaghnegh mun llu _ .
uuknaliqe istek _ maalghug _ nalighmeng _ pi nga yu t _ ungipange lghiit _ kiyaghnegh meng _ akuzi lit _ . _ qamagte luteng _ nagate lit _ , _ liigike litgu _ ungipagh _ kiyaghnegh meng _ pi u ta a _ .
iwernga _ kina _ ungipange gkan _ kiyaghnegh meng _ , _ akuzi lghii _ nepiigh li _ , _ ungipange lghii _ akuzi sqellug qu _ .
tawaten _ pi kufsi _ qamagte luteng _ ungipagh ke i yaghqagh t _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh aneng _ akuzi aqe lleqe ut _ . _ enkaam _ qamagte luni _ nagate lghii _ , _ liite li _ , _ t aag av eng in aa ll eng l illu _ .
neqamike luki _ ungipagh ke i kayug t _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh aneng _ , _ agh tugh yaghq aanghi ll el it kaa g ut _ akuzi sighqagh meng _ , _ taaqe sighqagh meng llu _ . _ iiwleng _ agh tugh yaghq aanghi ll el gu ut _ akuzi sighqagh meng _ nalighmeng _ taaqe sighqagh meng _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ alngunak _ pi sug igate ainkut _ . _ qerngughte te lleg put _ nekegmete sug aqe ai _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug i _ qerngughte te nghata _ ,
aghnagh t _ akuzi ste u yaghqaa nghite ut _ yughaghvig ni _ . _ akuzi yaghqaa nghite ut llu _ iglegh ut is te ngu yaghq aanghi tu t lu _ qerngughte te nga lghii ni _ , _ qayughllak _ liilightugh sag ni llu _ igaqe nga uq _ tawaten _ .
A ap qugh agh y u ku meng _ , _ ugi teng _ ne meggni _ aapte litki _ . _ yughaghvig ni _ aghnagh t _ akuzi lleghqagh at _ anaggute nga uq _ .
elpek si _ C o r in t h - egh m iit _ ugpeqagh t _ aa ng aa yug negh u usi _ . _ S um egh pesi n ii _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta i _ elpesi neng _ pi u aat _ ? _ E ll ng in aghh agh pesi nun _ apeghtugh te kau aat _ ?
kina _ alngunak _ sumegh mini _ uuknaliqe i ste u ni luni _ pikumi _ , _ nalighmeng _ ugpegh ghllag ma ni luni _ , _ liigike liki _ lata tkekagh nka _ elpesi nun _ Atan egh em _ qelegh sagh ke ai _ .
tugukligh nghite kagu _ una _ apeghtuusagh _ , _ tugukligh gpenaan _ ellnga _ .
