pi laatagh ma kangi _ , _ â _ eltughagh ghhagh ma _ keveg aqe aanga _ , _ panig gpek nguq _ pinigh llegh a _ tugu ligu _ . _ â
pi laatagh ma kangat _ , _ â _ S ak es qell uni _ pi a _ ? _ â
Taw a teng waagh w aaq _ sivuligh ghhagh m _ akuzillegh atun _ akite laatagh aat _ .
taagken _ sivugte laatagh uq _ .
atghagh laatagh uq _ .
kaate yan _ eltughagh ghhagh n _ aapte ma kanga _ , _ â _ qayugham _ ? _ â
nengyugh ghhagh n _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ imatuq _ aghni lleqe aten _ .
qenwat _ an ag ul egh tes l eq agh pe nga _ . _ â
taagken _ pi ma kanga _ eltughagh ghhagh n _ , _ â _ whanga llu _ an ag ul egh lleq am ken _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ aghnalqwaagh ghhagh m _ qamagte ma kanga _ nenglu _ .
kingulighpigagh ghhagh t _ nenglu t _ taku ma kangi _ .
L eg an nguq _ qineghte uq _ , _ yug nguq _ esghagh u aghagh a _ .
Yug w em _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ seal- gnun _ pi ziin _ ? _ â
nulighh a _ nuughqaghte ma lghii _ .
nuughqaghte luni _ pi ma kanga _ aghnalqwaagh ghhagh _ , _ â _ neqe leg nun _ pi ziin _ ? _ â
aghnalqwaagh ghhagh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ nakaan _ , _ neqe leg nun _ pi nghite unga _ .
eltughagh ghhagh ma _ keveg aqe aanga _ .
P an ig en nguq _ pinigh llegh a _ tugu ligu _ . _ â
ata an _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ tugu naqe a _ .
atghagh lleqe uq _ , _ maligte lleqe aaten _ . _ â
aghnagh aq _ qiya ma lghii _ , _ ug w ii negh meng _ ighsa luni _ .
naa an _ angegh te yu nghite kanga _ tawavek _ yaywaali mun _ , _ qayughllak _ pupig ghllag u lghii _ .
aghnaghagh m _ maligte ma kanga _ aghnalqwaagh ghhagh _ .
taagken _ itegh luni _ aghnagh aq _ aagra nun _ ayapegh ma yagh lghii _ .
vuvegh k _ aghipa ghllag u uk _ .
kangighagh ghhagh kun _ peghleghte ma lghii _ , _ ighu gni _ qantagh lukek _ atkug mineng _ .
qiya ma lghii _ , _ ug w ik aghq ani _ nag as aq min igu _ , _ kumeg yalghiimi _ , _ â _ g - g - g _ . _ â
aghnagh aq _ qavaa ma lghii _ .
qavagh yan _ , _ eltughagh ghhagh ni _ aghnalqwaagh ghhagh m _ ghhute gnun _ ateghte ma kanga _ .
kelig ma kanga _ pupig a _ .
taagken _ mekelghiigh _ pin iigh q w aam akanga _ .
esghaqaaluni _ nukalpigagh _ , _ pinighhalek _ !
taagken _ nenglu mi _ nategh a _ tanughqe ma kanga _ .
taagken _ nenglu ni _ tukegh ma kanga _ .
taagken _ nanigh t _ kumagh qugh ma kangi _ .
nenglu _ n igh u wh al ek _ .
nunivag m _ tu ng ang ani _ nenglu mi _ m ii ng l ut anga _ qelpeghte ma kanga _ , _ awergha _ nusug ragh ma kanga _ .
sa u a _ tamaghhagh an _ , _ atg- ke uk _ , _ il ep gh aaq _ , _ qallevag _ , _ k ap es eg aq _ , _ agaghte uute ma kanga _ .
taagken _ aywaa n _ tu ng anga _ , _ megh m _ tu ng ang an _ m ii ng l ut anga _ qelpeghte ma kanga _ .
tanemlleqa _ aklungi _ nusug ragh ma kanga _ .
eltughagh ni _ taagken _ pilugug ma kanga _ ukileghyag meng _ .
quyngigh liigh ghllag ma lghii _ .
sagnegh ghllag t _ malghugnegh t _ pugnegh meng _ imigh ma kangi _ .
alegh kek _ mekestaaghhagh k _ qaye gkenkun _ tawaqapig t _ lli ma kangi _ .
aghnagh aq _ teghsagh ma kanga _ aghnalqwaagh m _ , _ â _ aghnagh aq _ uyuq _ , _ angayuqagh ten _ neqe meng _ taglaate ki _ . _ â
taakwavek _ qiive yalghiimi _ ug w ik aghq am in un _ , _ es ghagh yaq min igu _ nukalpigagh _ pinighhalek _ !
aghnagh aq _ nenglagh kau ma lghii _ , _ â _ T e h em _ , _ te h em _ . _ â
aghnalqwaagh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ sukate luten _ aqume i _ . _ â
aghnagh aq _ aqume luni _ aatkagh ni _ mataghte qugh ma kangi _ .
alla neng _ aatkagh neng _ tuune ma kanga _ aghnalqwaagh m _ .
qalleg vag ma lghii _ naayghagh _ ughug kestagh lghii stun _ ayuqe lghii meng _ , _ ukileghyag m _ ang tal ang aneng _ .
taagken _ k ap es eg aam alghii _ qaye akun _ .
taagken _ taglagh ma lghiik _ ug w i ku ll ghii k _ .
S ag negh pag et _ tugu luki _ taglagh ma lghiik _ .
kaate lutek _ mangteghagh mun _ , _ aghnagh aq _ tuqlugh i ma lghii _ , _ â _ Q am aa y _ ! _ kenegh meng _ nuug te ngnga _ . _ â
aghnaghagh t _ anighqute _ kumaghllug qu _ nuug te ma kangat _ .
E s ghagh yaq meg te ke k _ ne k _ pinighhalek _ ! _ qimag ma lghiit _ .
itegh qaghtagh te ma lghiit _ , _ kenegh eng _ unite luku _ .
ungipaate ma kegket _ ang ayuq ag t eng _ , _ â _ ne k _ sama _ pi niigh pigte uk _ ! _ â
aghnaghagh m _ pi laatagh ai _ , _ â _ sukate lusi _ , _ kenegh meng _ tuune tengnga _ . _ â
kenegh meng _ aatghute ma lghiit _ .
itegh ma lghiik _ ug w i ku ll ghii k _ .
taagken _ mekelghiigh m _ saki ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ nunalgute ten _ kelgugh ki _ .
T ag il agh all in nguq _ . _ â
tagi laghate ma lghiit _ .
I tegh aa s ata _ ungipamsug te ma kangi _ pupig mineng _ q al m am in eng _ .
taagken _ s ag negh pag em _ angenegh kek _ tawavek _ ellngit nun _ negh e simak ek _ .
taagken _ qiliigh nagh meng _ tawaqapig meng _ q an egh m i qu um ak angi _ .
taake uk _ ila kek _ sagnegh m _ saki minun _ tuune ma kek _ .
taagken _ atghagh ma lghiik _ .
aghnaghagh t _ maligte ma kegket _ .
aghnalqwaagh ghhagh m _ aghnaghagh t _ ayapegh lghiit _ amiwaagh kun _ repa ma aqe kangi _ , _ qayughllak _ angayuqagh ita _ ighleke kaqe kangit _ .
taawa _ nulightugh uq _ mekelghiigh _ .
tefaay _ !
I is tu m ii m _ tugukagh i _ afsengagh m _ negh kangi _ qamagte luki _ , _ siipte te aghte gpenaan _ uksuqun _ neghyaghqagh meng _ .
seghleghyugkagh _ elngaatall _ .
iwernga _ nanevgagh _ afsengagh _ pi ke aq _ , _ â _ itagnagh uq _ ellnga llu _ kitum _ panike a _ . _ â
tawaten _ pi llegh mikun _ segheve tke a _ , _ neqamike yaghqaaghtekagh a _ allameng _ afsengagh t _ neqe meng _ naange te fqiita _ pi yaghqaaghtekagh _ .
U g w ing an _ pin iq s al ii tagh aqaa _ qayughllak _ ila ni _ sumegh ke sag u te kangi _ , _ nangllegtaghtekanga _ .
I is tu m ii _ megnu nagh lghii meng _ liite lghii
aasa m _ ungipagh aa
ungipaghagh ni nguq _ imani _ , _ taa kun nguq _ aghnaghagh t _ tallimat _ .
aghulaghqugh ma lghiit _ , _ tutmaghwaagh yagh ma lghiit _ .
llaaghanwha _ t aag av eq aagh aq _ kaate luteng _ iigge llegh ghllag _ kaate ma kangat _ aange pigte lghii _ .
ataasigh _ aghnagh aq _ tutmaghwaagh ma lghii _ .
tawaten _ tutmaghwaagh negh ke te ziin _ kanagh ma lghii _ .
tawavek _ q el pegh saq min igu _ peknegh meng _ imigh ghllag luni _ .
tagsigh ai _ ila ni _ , _ â _ tagi tek _ , _ whaa _ naalkute unga _ . _ â
taakut _ aghnaghagh t _ tagi ma lghiit _ .
ellnga _ I is tu m ii _ , _ ila a _ ketngigtu ma ai _ , _ ataasigh _ Q ug tuq agh tu u r ugh m ii _ , _ enkaam _ Agh v egh tugh m ii _ , _ t all im aat _ U ll ung ag tu u r u _ .
taagken _ elngaatall _ nengighqe ait _ aghnaghagh t _ taakut _ kenigh megteggun _ taw an ll uki _ , _ si q l ug w aq _ av ang iit ng waagh luku _ .
tawaten _ peghu vyiigh luku _ unite ma kangat _ .
elngaatall _ quya pigte luteng _ aglagh ut _ aghnaghagh t _ .
aglagh luteng _ ne meggnun _ , _ ug w i nga _ I is tu m ii m _ naken _ pi a _ , _ entaqun _ ama _ peknegh yaghkagh _ .
itegh luni nguq _ aghnagh ghhagh _ taana _ elngaatall _ sumeghtaghagh ghllag _ .
U g w ing an _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ iyatagh unga _ , _ si q l ug w aghq u _ . _ â
taawa _ avelghaqiinagh aa _ .
â _ enta _ sukate luten _ iyatagh unga _ si q l ug w aghq u _ , _ â _ pi laatagh aa _ ug w ing an _ .
alingughyug te inagh mineng _ aane luni _ si q l ug w ani _ legan _ esghapagtu qiinagh luku _ unite ma kanga _ .
unite luku _ , _ ug w in i _ pi ma kanga _ :
â _ A a y _ , _ uq es q aghh agh m a _ sa ite u unga _ !
I is tu m iin kut _ , _ ketngigtu ma ainkut _ ,
Agh v egh tugh m iin kut _ , _ U ll ung ag tu u r un kut _ ,
qugtuqagh mii nkut _ naa ng sim iit _ ! _ â
legan _ ug w ing an _ tawavek _ , _ qezigh ni _ amqeghte aghte luku _ , _ s ii ng yaq min igu _ legan _ aga _ n ev agh mi _ ullegh uq _ , _ q e tegh agh tuq _ .
imani nguq _ pi a _ qiya magh mi _ :
â _ M ak e teng ng aa y _ , _ ng aa y _ , _ ng aa y _ , _ ng aa y _ !
M ak e teng ng aa y _ , _ ng aa y _ , _ ng aa y _ , _ ng aa y _ ! _ â
Taa w an l eng ugh nguq _ ug w at ang ani _ nanevgagh ghllag _ , _ afsengagh _ .
Taa m _ pi ma kanga _ :
â _ makete gu _ , _ makete gu _ ,
Q ugh r ugh aam _ avaqutagh a _ ,
K uy ap eg r ug aagh em _ eltugh aa _ ! _ â
makete ma kanga _ .
tawaten _ esgh ap agh ng aagh m igu _ legan _ siinge laatagh aa _ !
legan _ qiyaaqe lghii _ aghnagh _ :
â _ M ak e teng ng aa y _ , _ ng aa y _ , _ ng aa y _ , _ ng aa y _ !
M ak e teng ng aa y _ , _ ng aa y _ , _ ng aa y _ , _ ng aa y _ ! _ â
T aag u m _ pi laatagh aa _ :
â _ makete gu _ , _ makete gu _ !
Q ugh r ugh aam _ avaqutagh a _ ,
K uy ap eg r ug aagh em _ eltugh aa _ ! _ â
makete ma kanga _ .
tugu luku _ aq um e sim akanga _ .
taawa _ pinigh kau aghte a _ , _ aghyuugh kanga _ taa m _ nanevgagh m _ .
taawa _ pinitun _ nulugh igh qugh a _ .
tefaay _ , _ al iin gh akun _ , _ amsanagh akun _ !
aa _ ggute ke a _ !
iyaa-kagh m _ ungipagh aa
qaa ii te aq _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ gguusiqe ma lghii _ .
naa ni _ , _ W illu _ , _ ungipaate ma kanga _ , _ â _ ggute ka _ aqnigh ghllagu uq _ . _ â
W ill u m _ ug w in i _ seat- a _ itegh yan _ pi a _ , _ â _ qaa ii te aq _ gguusiqe ghllagu uq _ . _ â
â _ tea- ai _ , _ G g ut l um un _ esghaghtesaghtugh ltegnegu _ , _ â _ sa ta m _ qaa ii te aq _ pi ma kanga _ .
aagra neng _ nategh mun _ ategh lutek _ sa ta m _ atkug ni _ aate a _ .
Yug w et _ atkug teng _ nategh kun _ agaghtekayugu kangit _ .
qamaken _ s u ug wer ng en eng _ Q ii taa m _ naange a _ nuug luni _ Q ii taa m _ nasaperagh a _ tuune a _ .
Q ii taa m _ nasaperagh ni _ aate luku _ , _ ata ke te lghiik _ aglagh uk _ G g ut l un ku nun _ .
guygu u uq _ G g ut l un kut _ mangteghagh at _ .
kaate yaghtugh yalghiimek _ tepe a _ neqnigh ghllag _ naagh aa _ Q ii taa m _ , _ o v en - kun _ neqekrangllaghpag ni _ .
Q iit aan kut _ ellngit _ egllu ite ngugh t _ .
nanigh meng _ gaaghusigh ke lghiit _ .
O v en - kun _ gaaqagh m _ tepe anga _ n all un iit ng w aal ghii _ n aagh yaq min igu _ neqnigh ghllag _ .
E s l ak l i q _ amigh k _ qelpate uq _ .
Q iit aan kuk _ ata ke te lghiik _ saayguraagh mun _ itegh yalghiimek _ nategh meggneng _ alla u uq _ imani _ , _ s u ug wer ng eng i te f tuq _ .
ilukligh _ amigh k _ q el pegh saq meg teg gu _ aagra stun _ ayuqe nghite uq _ .
nengigh ita _ q aam n angat _ ig agh tes tun _ , _ yughaghte stun _ ayuqe uq _ .
taawa _ egllu k _ o v en - el g ek _ , _ maalghug _ qayungllaasigh k _ qaye ani _ .
egllu m _ qula ani _ llivelghagh mi _ taawa _ c o f f e e- ng ll aa si q lu _ qayugh ligh sigh llu _ .
llivelghagh lgu uq _ mingle mi _ inglugtun _ .
T a b l e- ek _ qergese m _ manu ani _ .
kangighagh mi _ taawa _ sa u ak _ llivelghagh k _ , _ qaye gkeni _ ukitu tete lutek _ angighhe te leg k _ aghmigusigh k _ .
G g ut lu m _ upugha te ai _ .
â _ uteghvagh lusi _ .
aqume i _ taaggun _ , _ â _ ken ii m aag ken ka _ aqumutagh k _ .
sa ta m _ pi a _ , _ â _ gguusiqe lghii _ taana _ esghaqigh sqellug qu _ tagi aqe ukung _ . _ â
â _ aa-a _ , _ taaggun _ aqume i _ , _ â _ aghmigusigh leg m _ llivelghagh m _ saaghw akun _ aqume sqe a _ qaa ii te aq _ , _ G g ut lu m _ .
â _ whaa _ legan _ esghagh naqe aqa _ .
qayugh a _ utaqa i te kete luku _ , _ â _ G g ut lu m _ pi a
seat- a _ .
aghnagh m _ seat- a _ qayugh ste a _ , _ neqekrangllagh meng _ tuune a llu _ .
G g ut lu m _ taku luku _ qaa ii te aq _ pi a _ , _ â _ agitaghten _ . _ â
qaa ii te aq _ agitaghte yan _ G g ut lu m _ yuvghiigh ai _ g g ut angi _ .
â _ N a tu ng w aa _ aqnigh lghii _ , _ â _ aapte a _ .
qaa ii ta m _ kelgute a _ .
â _ kii _ , _ suflu u ma lghii _ , _ pinighsagh naqe aqa _ , _ â _ G g ut lu m _ pi a _ .
â _ S ii m ii y aq _ !
kayusiite yaghtugh nga _ , _ â _ G g ut lu m _ tuqlugh aa _ .
aghnaghaghhagh _ qemtagh meng _ ukig uq _ .
â _ taana _ kayute ke aqa _ , _ â _ G g ut lu m _ pi a _ qaa ii te aq _ .
G g ut lu m _ g gu ut n iigh usi ni _ piite te kete luki _ , _ S ii m ii y aq _ pi a _ , _ â _ T a z ing kuk _ igarutaagh k _ tagite kek _ . _ â
I g ar ut aagh s ug n ing iigh h iil ngu uk _ tagite ak _ .
itegagh mineng _ S ii m ii y aam _ sa u ak _ tu k egh r agh aa k _ .
G g ut lu m _ tugumiigh aneng _ Q ii taa m _ nagate a _ , _ â _ t z z z z _ , _ t z z z z _ , _ t z z z z _ â _ .
G g ut lu m _ pi a _ qaa ii te aq _ , _ â _ iflasagh luku _ whaken _ kaape sigh meng _ , _ igarutaagh luku _ ilaagh naqe aqa _ .
piniighte lleqe a _ aqnigh nanigh lleqe uq _ .
S ii m ii y aam _ kayusigh naqe aanga _ . _ â
â _ agitaghten _ , _ â _ G g ut lu m _ pi a _ qaa ii te aq _ .
agitaghte uq _ qaa ii te aq _ .
pi laatagh aa _ G g ut lu m _ , _ â _ Q aan gh en _ kagpestaagh pigu uq _ agitaghte ghllag i _ . _ â
qaa ii te aq _ q un egh qu m agh mi _ agitaghte ghllag yan _ ifla uute yagh aa _ .
M aa te q w aq un _ nagate a _ temngi _ , _ â _ t z z z z _ â _ aqnighte nghite te a _ .
G g ut lu m _ , _ Q ii taa m _ g g ut anga _ qepghagh luku _ taaqe yamigu _ pi a _ , _ â _ taawa _ taaqe amken _ alla _ aqnigh naanghite uq _ . _ â
taaqe yan _ qaa ii te aq _ aghnagh m _ pi a _ , _ â _ neqekrangllagh ta ii sqesugh ghngaamken _ q aan gh en _ um ugh q w aa ng alghii _ .
ang _ , _ aglagh kuvek _ q aan gh en _ piniightekan _ negh naketen _ . _ â
paper _ s a c k - a _ tuune a _ , _ imani _ tepe kegte uq _ .
Q iit aan kuk _ sa ta nkuk _ aane aqngamek _ sa ta m _ igamsiqa yug vike ai _ G g ut l un kut _ .
Q ii taa m _ aglagh te kete luku _ naagh aqe a nguq _ tugumiigh ni _ , _ o v en - kun _ gaaqagh t _ neqekrangllagh t _ .
kaspig m _ paqnamiqe llegh a
iyaa-kagh nkuk _ tengutkaleg nkuk _ ungipagh aat
kaspig _ itegh yaghagh ma lghii _ , _ qayugh ghllag nge uq _ anuqe ghllag _ aqlagha ghllag _ , _ uksugh u lghii _ .
wata _ anuqligh kanga _ umegnegh ughte magh mi _ tegh ig n iigh us k anga _ esla mi _ nagh aaq _ .
itegh yalghiimi _ pin igh y u ug tuq _ nighugh lghii llu _ p uq l al nguq _ nenge aat _ .
suupe liighpag ni _ naagh ma kanga _ .
naange a _ quyngigh meng _ suupe liigh aqe uq _ neqekrangllagh magh mi _ suupeliightugh sighqagh meng _ .
â _ kameg gken _ ufsug yaghtugh kek _ !
itegh kuvek _ agaghte nakegken _ , _ â _ naa an _ pi ma kanga _ .
kaspig _ ategh luni _ saayguraagh mun _ ufsug luni _ , _ itegh luni _ kameg gni _ agaghte ma kek _ .
taagken _ taku ma kek _ anengagh ni llu _ n ay ag g an illu _ .
anengagh a _ atightugh aqe uq _ igagh neng _ l i b r ar y - meng _ navghaghkagh mineng _ .
N ay aag g aa _ negikragh aqe uq _ t aghn ugh h agh w agh meng _ m ag a z in e- m el ngugh meng _ .
apa _ qaghlu ngllagh aqe uq _ t a b l e- leg ni _ .
kaspig m _ taku luku _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ A p aa y _ ungipaghagh te nakefkut _ ! _ â
taghnughhagh t _ nag as ug w aqegk angat _ apa eng _ ungipaghagh nghaani _ .
ungipamsug te aqe kangi _ taghnughhagh u luni _ naghaagh llegh meggneng _ .
ungipamsug te aqe kangi llu _ ayvegh niigh llegh meggneng _ , _ nanugh niigh llegh mineng _ .
piniqe lleghpigagh ke aqe kangit _ ungipagh ai _ mayeraaghpag t llu _ teghig ke sagh t llu _ akuz ik ayug w et _ .
â _ ungipaghagh u lleqe amsi _ ighivgaqun _ mayeraaghpag meng _ un Ê¼ g an l eng ugh meng _ kellii ni _ , _ â _ apa ita _ pi ma kangi _ .
kaspig _ suupe liigh uute kete luku _ s um egh tagh am alghii _ q el an gh um agh mi _ apa ita _ ungipaghagh u lleghqagh aneng _ , _ sa naqe lleqe a tuq _ mayeraaghpag _ !
negh nghmeng _ taaqe luteng _ anglegute ke te lghiit _ egllu m _ saaghw ani _ aqume te ma lghiit _ .
kaspig m _ apa eng _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ ungipagh aa _ . _ â
legan _ iiwen _ s um egh tagh aat ke ng ng in agh ng aagh m igu _ apa mi _ ungipaghagh qugh a _ , _ iye kek _ angqaperug kegte tete te uk _ .
apa at _ piinligh ma lghii _ , _ â _ apegh vagilgamkun _ kellii n _ mayeraaghpag a _ apegh naqe aqa _ naayvagh m _ yug nge sta _ .
ilangani _ nalluniite aqe uq _ qayughllak _ megh _ q ap r ag taq egk anga _ .
uksaagh mi _ naayvagh _ siku yuwhaagh nghaani _ qam ag teng ng waagh luni _ siku igate ngughk _ .
ila a _ naten _ siku llghite kayug _ .
tamaakut _ siku llghite ngugh t _ ategh i _ negagh yu llegh ke aat _ .
Y us eng et aghh aam _ megh _ q ap r ag taq egk anga _ kumlate snanigh aqe kanga _ qayughllak _ naayvagh _ iingunagh mi _ siku nghaani _ naayvagh m _ ilu a _ m am legh q w aag aqegk anga _ qule mun _ esghapag nanigh aqe lghii _ .
enkaam _ aghtugh yagute llegh minun _ kenlanga _ n eg ay ul q al g us naq aqegk anga _ . _ â
â _ A p aa y _ , _ sa aqa ngam _ negagh yu llegh ke i aghte te nghaani _ ? _ â
kaspig m _ aapte ma kanga _ .
â _ Y us eng et aghh aq _ qefliqe ghllag aqe lghii _ enkaam _ kumlate snanigh i aqe lghii _ siku _ um ugh tes nan igh aqegk anga _ megh _ q ap r ag taq luku _ .
utaqa i aqe lghii _ kanagh yaghqagh meng _ , _ kanagh kata _ ila ke na luki _ siku m _ asi ani _ mamleg ghllag mi _ . _ â
â _ S aaq an ng am _ kanaghkagh t _ ? _ â _ kaspig m _ aapte a _ .
apa an _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ nalluke aput _ , _ enkaam _ pinigh uq _ sa lleghqagh meng _ liisimake luni _ kinku t _ kanagh kata _ . _ â
â _ N at en ng am _ pi lleqe sta _ , _ sa yaghqaa sta _ , _ ap aa y _ ? _ â
â _ sa lleghqagh meng _ liisimake luni _ pinigh uq _ .
kayute meng _ aqfate qaghte yaghqagh t _ .
ila ita _ sayug naqe yaghqagh at _ taana _ kanaghkagh _ .
K el eng ang waagh luni _ es n ev ap agll af q aa mi _ kanagh na yu ka mi _ ellnga llu _ . _ â
â _ S am eng am _ sayug sigh ke lleqe sta _ , _ â _ kaspig m _ aapte a _ .
â _ ivagh i luni _ sa meng _ , _ u un gh ameng _ , _ taake lghii meng _ unaghsigh meng _ , _ talwa _ j a c ke t- tet _ aligh a _ q i llgh u qu ull uki _ , _ sa u aat _ tafsi t _ , _ sayug sighqagh u luki _ tawavek _ kanaghkagh mun _ .
aqlagha mi _ n us ug w aghh naq s aghq aal ghiit _ kanaghkagh t _ .
I s ek in ami _ yug w et _ mulupag igate ngugh t _ . _ â
â _ kelenga ghllag lleqe unga _ n eg ay ul q ameng _ .
wiin _ y us eng e taa m es un ghi tu nga _ mamleg ghllag mi _ .
K ell iin ng am _ mayeraaghpag a _ apegh ghhu _ , _ â _ kaspig m _ pi a _ .
â _ aa _ , _ â _ apa an _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ taana _ mayeraaghpag _ kellii nite ngughk _ wata _ seghlegh atagh aag uq _ , _ y aku gh nagh atagh tuq _ .
umiileg ke a _ kellii n _ qam ag teng ng waagh luni _ , _ siku yan _ , _ ii w em _ , _ tu ng y uu m _ , _ maaqellegh m _ .
ilangani _ wata _ ugumi yagute ghllag aqe ai _ yug w et _ wataqaaghaq _ naayvagh m _ yungestagh aneng _ talwa _ . _ â
â _ sa aqa ngam _ ? _ â _ kaspig m _ aapte ma kanga _ .
â _ puughte aqe ai _ yug w et _ , _ â _ apa an _ kiimsigh ma kanga _ , _ â _ puughte i sighqaghtu ghllag uq _ . _ â
â _ sangaawa t _ puughte i sagh i _ ? _ â _ kaspig m _ aapte laatagh aa _ , _ anglegute ni _ nagate ma luki _ iye it _ n ang llag r ak e tun _ .
â _ alqimagh u isigh ste ghllag aqe a _ sigugnegh _ .
alqime i an _ tamaa na _ puughte i sagh igh kaqe a _ .
qaye mineng _ esghaqaaluni _ anigu _ nallunagh lghii _ piiznga ta a _ megh mun _ , _ tuute lghii ni _ ifkagh te na lghii _ .
kayute meng _ aqfaate uute ghngaaghmeng _ kaate ste gpenaki _ aga _ ughhe yaghqagh _ ifkagh tke aq _ . _ â
â _ esnaghni ii te qugh a mi _ pinigh uq _ , _ â _ kaspig _ pi ma lghii _ .
â _ taawa _ ipa _ pi uten _ , _ â _ apa ita _ pi ma kangi _ .
â _ T aan ang iin aanghi tuq _ puughte i sagh i _ .
mayeraaghpag m _ megh _ iig g w tes negh min igu _ esne _ u us q aghq w aag aqaa _ .
qiighnite luni _ aatqaghte lghii ni _ uugte naagh nghite ngugh t _ .
enkaam _ es n ev eq es t iigh tes nan igh aq iit _ .
wata _ taghnughhagh t _ esnagh niigh snanigh aqe ait _ . _ â
â _ A p aa y _ , _ ungipagh aten _ pi niigh pigte ut _ .
kelenga lleqe ukut _ mayeraaghpag meng llu _ y us eng e taa m eng llu _ , _ â _ kaspig _ pi ma lghii _ . _ â
â _ I ng agh sagh tugh teg ng am _ ! _ â _ apa ita _ pi ma kangi _ eltughagh ni _ .
â _ unaami _ igaghyagh yaghqaa usi _ . _ â
â _ G o o d n igh t _ apa _ , _ â _ kaspig m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ sunanguq _ qavangugh ke nghite langi _ mayeraaghpag t _ . _ â
taagken _ ingaghte yaghtugh ma lghii _ .
M egh n u m _ sukate luni _ q av am alghii _ talwa _ unug llegh ke sigh _ qavangugh qagh gpenani _ .
unaami _ ell m aa r aghq w aam akanga _ , _ siqi neghllug ughte ma kanga _ .
qayug nghmeng _ taaqe luni _ kaspig _ aane luni _ ilakumtaagh ke te lghiik _ igaghvig mun _ aglagh ma lghiik _ .
igleghte te kete luku _ aleghqugh tke magh an _ igagh nghmeng _ taaqe gkan _ sa lleghqagh ek _ .
kaspig _ nag all aagh pen ani _ unaaghsi ma lghii _ .
S iq in ghem _ repall _ anigu _ n igh w aag pag tagh qell uku _ qakma _ .
nighwaagpagtagh llegh t _ esghagh nghminiki _ llangaqa nguq _ pi aqe aat _ , _ â _ tea- ai _ aane i _ , _ naghaagh yagh a _ . _ â
kaspig m _ kellaag k _ esghagh nghminikek _ sumeghtaghagh te kaqe kek _ sa yamek _ nalleq _ sukangiite ghllag akek _ aliineghllug ghllag mi _ imani _ .
qenwat llu _ apeghtughiste ita _ r ii s aagh naq n im ak angi _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh t _ amig mun _ piyug ragkiighute ma lghiit _ .
aane luteng _ naligh ita _ kaspig m _ ilakumtaagh a _ pi ma lghii _ , _ â _ esnagh mun _ pi lta _ , _ siku _ igleghte lghii _ esghapag yaghtugh lteggu _ . _ â
kaspig llu _ mekelghiigh ghhagh k llu _ maalghug _ esnagh mun _ atghagh ma lghiit _ .
agigte yalghiimeng _ talwa _ kellaag igh a _ pinighnagh pigte uq _ .
sikuqwaagh ghhagh t _ aghul iigh waagh luteng _ llangaqa _ suupeliigh mi _ s al t in e _ c r a c ke r - et _ puglegha lghiit _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh m _ ataasigh m _ pi ma kangi _ ila ni _ , _ â _ kaangqwagh lta _ yeqay _ , _ siku t _ aghula i te u aghte ut _ ! _ â
kaspig m _ aag llegh gni _ aatqaghtagh te yayek _ siku mun _ , _ sumeghtaghagh gpenani _ ellnga llu _ qetgegh ma lghii _ .
kaangqwagh te ma lghiit _ , _ teghigniqe te ma lghiit _ .
A w av an llegh pig aan naq u sim alghiit _ .
kaangqwagh te ghngaaghmeng _ naligh t _ kelute mun _ esghagh yalghiimi _ ughhe aqe ai _ .
aragh ma kangi _ ila ni _ , _ â _ H aa k _ , _ uugh h iin ku ut _ ! _ â
qamagte luteng _ kelute mun _ qiive luteng _ aragh u aghagh taute ma lghiit _ , _ â _ U ugh h iin ku u - ut _ ! _ U ugh h iin ku ut _ ! _ â
qaasqagh mi _ yug w em _ angyagh meng _ qepghagh lghii m _ nag aq um ak angi _ .
kayute meng _ piighaghte luni _ , _ d o r y - meng _ atghagh te luteng _ aqfa ma kangit _ iv en r um eng _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh t _ awavagh te ghllag ma kangi _ , _ llangaqa _ esghaqagh u luteng _ q aw aag g aat _ sikuqaagh mi _ .
mulu gpenateng _ kaate luki _ tugu ma kangit _ .
qalleg qagh gpenateng _ taglagh ma lghiit _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh t _ ell meg g neng _ esghaqagh qu te magh meng _ , _ naligh ghhagh inagh t _ iqenge aghte gpenateng _ , _ agh s ugh w aal uteng _ .
llangaqa nguq _ mekelghiigh ghhagh ni _ kelute mun _ muluugh ghllag lghiit _ .
llangaqa llu _ nun m aa s qu v eg aghh aq _ igleghte lghiit _ .
kaspig _ tuufsagh nge ghllag ma lghii _ apa ni llu _ mayeraaghpag a llu _ kellii n _ s um egh tagh aatk es aq min i ke k _ .
qute mun _ kaateqaghsi ma lghiit _ .
Yug w et _ qaake ma kangit _ qute mun _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh t _ uugte ghngaaghmeng _ qalleg qagh gpenateng _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh t _ mayugh ma lghiit _ qaasqagh mun _ igaghvig mun _ taglagh ma lghiit _ .
kaspig m _ alegh kek _ sumeghtaghagh ma lghiik _ , _ â _ sa meng tuq _ apeghtughiste mta _ pi naqe inkut _ ?
sa meng tuq _ igaghyagh lgute mta _ pi naqe inkut _ ?
sa meng tuq _ angayuqagh mta _ pi naqe inkut _ ? _ â
kaspig m _ t aan ang in aghh aq _ sumegh kekagh a _ , _ â _ apa ma _ sa meng tuq _ pinagh kanga _ ? _ â
qaasqagh m _ qaye anun _ qaygeghte yalghiimi _ pika _ esghagh aa _ yuug _ , _ apa ni _ .
S ik ig g aam _ P uugh neq gu utk anga _ meteghllug ghrug
ayumigh m _ ungipagh aa
ungipaghagh ni _ imani _ , _ taana nguq _ si k ig g aq _ m e tegh ll ug w em _ neghe vzigh qagh a _ .
ataasigh mi _ aghneghmi _ , _ meteghllug _ tengaa ma lghii _ pagani _ asitmun _ ivagh i magh mi _ neghyaghqagh meng _ .
S ik ig en nguq _ ellnga ni _ elngaatall _ negh yugnagh lghiit _ .
esghaate yami _ yagtaghagh ma lghii _ .
esghagh ma kanga _ sikig _ riigte mineng _ aane luni _ navek _ pangaleg lghii _ .
N al ugh qagh sim alghii _ riigte an _ manu akun _ .
S ik ig g aq _ tagi luni _ itegh yug ghllag ghngaaghmi _ kiyaghte ma lghii _ qayughllak _ meteghllug _ taw an l e nguq _ .
taagken _ S ik ig g aam _ itegh na luni _ puughte yuguma kanga _ .
aapte ma kanga _ , _ â _ M e tegh ll uu y _ , _ aghula aqe ziin _ ? _ â
S ik ig g aam _ aawallu _ meteghllug _ puughte aghte ma kanga _ .
â _ aa-a _ , _ aghula pestaagh kayugu unga _ , _ â _ quy aagh agh tegh r ug um agh mi _ meteghllug _ angegh aghte ma lghii _ , _ â _ aghula nayagh unga _ legan _ whaa _ . _ â
â _ aa _ naqam _ ! _ â _ S ik ig g aam _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ atugh utagh ghllag ken _ .
aghula _ . _ â
taagken _ atugh te ma kanga _ iigge mineng _ saguyagh ke luni _ :
â _ Q un g _ qugh l un g _ qugh l un g _ , _ q un g _ qugh l un g _ !
Q un g _ qugh l un g _ qugh l un g _ , _ q un g _ qugh l un g _ !
Q un g _ qugh l un g _ q un egh te p all aghq aagh lu ten _ ,
q un g _ qugh l un g _ !
Q un g _ qugh l un g _ av legh te p all aghq aagh lu ten _ ,
q un g _ qugh l un g _ ! _ â
meteghllug ghrug nguq _ aghula ma lghii _ yaagpagte aghte aqe luni _ sighla ma lghii _ atugh te yatni _ .
S ik ig g aam _ atuute mi _ q un egh q en n all gha _ kaate yagu _ , _ meteghllug _ qu un ghagh sim alghii _ .
Q un egh qell uni _ elngaatall _ aghula ma lghii _ .
S ik ig g agh nguq _ atugh ghllag _ , _ wh at en nguq _ pi magh mi _ lliigh uq _ , _ â _ itegagh n _ inglu a _ quulvani _ , _ qugh l un g _ . _ â
L eg an nguq _ M e tegh ll ug w em _ itegagh ni _ qu ul v agh agh tegh r un egh min igu _ p aag g uq agh aq _ .
S ik ig g aq _ s uk an gh h agh m i tun _ itegh qaghte ma lghii _ taa m _ aghula lghii m _ M e tegh ll ug w em _ ighu gkenka _ akule gkenkun _ .
M e tegh ll ug w em _ akuqagh yagh aa _ yaghlegi _ papeg igh inagh a _ aku qam akanga _ , _ sakeqe ma kanga _ .
iwernga _ S ik ig g aq _ itegh qagh uq _ sakeqe llegh meng _ papeg ligh luni _ .
meteghllug _ unite qaghte ma kanga _ papeg m _ sakeqe llegh aneng _ tugumiigh iigh luni _ .
aglagh te ma kanga _ .
riigte mi _ ilu ani _ ng ill eg r ug sim agh mi _ iil qu mal gh i _ papeg igh te ni luni _ .
qiive magh mi _ ataasigh _ avaqutagh ani _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ N a tu ng am _ si k ig g aq _ papeg ita _ ?
aatak _ veghte naqe yaghtuqagh ghhu _ p aap g aqa _ meteghllug meng _ .
qikmigh m nguq _ iye aneng _ n av egh lleq aqa _ . _ â
M e tegh ll ug w em _ ne anun _ si k ig agh aq _ aglagh luni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ naa ma _ papeg ni _ veghute sqellug qu _ aapte sqe aaten _ .
N av egh lleq aa nguq _ qikmigh m _ iye aneng _ . _ â
M e tegh ll ug w em _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ tuuneqaghte naanghite aqa _ papeg a _ .
saama llu _ qikmigh m _ iye aneng _ pitu unga _ . _ â
aglagh ma lghii _ si k ig agh aq _ naa ni _ ungipagh saghtu ma kanga _ M e tegh ll ug w em _ k ii m si t ang aneng _ .
â _ kii _ , _ n a tu ng am _ sikig _ papeg ita _ , _ â _ ngillegte pigte luni _ si k ig agh aam _ naange a _ pil at aam alghii _ .
â _ enta _ aatak _ ungip an neq ig sagh tugh h u _ neghsagh m _ ii y ng an e nguq _ n av egh lleq aqa _ papeg ka _ . _ â
S ik ig agh aq _ aglagh nqigte ma lghii _ M e tegh ll ug w em _ ne anun _ .
taawanginaq _ w aa ke p an ghi ll atagh tuq _ naavghute yaghqagh aneng _ S ik ig g aam _ .
â _ yaghlegillu _ whaa _ iyetu unga _ , _ â _ M e tegh ll ug w em _ pi ma kanga _ si k ig agh aq _ .
S ik ig agh aq _ aglagh nqigte luni _ naa ni _ ungip a sim akanga _ M e tegh ll ug w em _ kiimsigh llegh aneng _ .
S ik ig agh aam _ naa an _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ enta _ ungip as agh tugh h u _ whaa nguq _ n av egh lleq aqa _ maatenllaam _ neq n igh r ak eg tam eng _ .
ungipaate naken _ naghuyagh m _ iye aneng _ tuune lleqe aqa _ . _ â
S ik ig g aam _ avaqutagh ghhagh a _ aglagh laatagh ma lghii _ meteghllug mun _ ungipaate na luku _ naghuyagh m _ iye aneng _ n av egh h n aagh n il uku _ p aap g aq _ .
M e tegh ll uk r ug w em _ kiimsigh ma kanga _ , _ â _ N av egh h n aanghi t aa _ papeg ni _ naghuyagh m _ iye aneng _ , _ y eq ay tuq _ aa _ , _ yug w em _ iye aneng _ .
itupill _ tam an ameng _ n av egh tes naa yagh aqa _ ! _ â
aglagh luni _ si k ig agh aam _ naa ni _ ungipaate ma kanga _ wetku _ yug w em _ iye aneng _ n av egh lleq n il uku _ papeg a _ .
naa ngiighhagh a _ iil qam iq ng waagh luni _ pi ma lghii _ , _ â _ kaay _ seghleghhalek _ , _ nak en ng am _ yug w em _ iye aneng _ pi ke ng naq si nga _ ! _ â
S um egh y al igh tuq _ wata _ s um egh tagh aat ke ng ng iin aq _ .
â _ E m aa y _ , _ â _ si k ig agh aam _ naa ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ sangan mi _ ivagh i nanigh stuung _ me ke ta ghhagh meng _ uyghag meng _ yug w em _ iye atun _ ayuq es ug n il ngugh meng _ , _ tawaten wha _ p uugh h n ay an ghi s teg gu _ meteghllug _ ! _ â
S ik ig g aam _ avaqutagh ghhagh ni _ tuune ma kanga _ qaliqenghaagh ghhagh meng _ aqeftaghaagh meng _ , _ pi ma kanga llu _ saghna yigh sqellug qu _ iy es ug n it aagh meng _ uyghag meng _ .
uteghnigh yan _ aq ef tagh aghh ani _ esleqe luku _ uyghag meng _ , _ naa an _ keveg aqlaatagh ma kanga _ meteghllug mun _ .
â _ meteghllug _ , _ meteghllug _ , _ ang _ taawa _ piyukekagh gpeneng _ yug w em _ iye aneng _ tagite amken _ ! _ â _ kaate qaghte te kete luku _ si k ig agh aam _ pi ma kanga _ meteghllug _ .
E f qugh q w aam akanga _ elngaatall _ meteghllug _ .
meteghllug nguq _ pi ma lghii _ , _ â _ K g w ug g _ , _ tea- ma ken ta _ esgha _ negh yug w aq elghii nga _ ! _ â
A ku q w aam aan _ aqeftaghaagh ghhagh _ si k ig agh agh mun _ tuune ma kanga _ naa an _ papeg a _ .
aga _ si k ig agh aq _ ne minun _ s uk at ng waagh luni _ aglagh aghte ma lghii _ .
naa ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ E m aa y _ , _ taawa _ papeg n _ ! _ â
naange a _ quy aa pig lluni _ papeg ni _ aatqaghte ma kanga _ aga _ paperegte i inagh magh mi _ .
inga _ ne mini _ M e tegh ll ug r ug w em _ qelpeghte luku _ qaliqenghaagh _ aq ef tagh aghh aq _ nusug ma kanga _ ataasigh _ uyghag _ iyete yu gnite ngughk _ .
taagken _ iigge mini _ ull ghi t ap er eg waagh te sim akanga _ .
N eq n igh yug w em _ angtale aneng _ q aan gha _ meghaaghtu qu ma lghii _ .
aga _ qaneghmig aghte a nguq _ , _ imani nguq _ aqnighnagh ghhalek _ , _ k ang r ug utegh llag umalghii _ C - R - U - U - U - N - C - H _ !
ayungkaghagh
tamekestagh t _ yaagigh igate ngugh t _ , _ ughhe igate ngugh t _ ellngaate meng _ , _ mesiigh meng _ ulimaagh t _ :
â _ aghnagh aq _ naa an _ pi ma kanga _ , _ ayungkaghagh _ taana _ siipnegh _ tuune gu _ aghnaghaghhagh mun _ . _ â
qilaga t _ tulimagh itgun
aagra m _ ilu yan _ paagna i _ , _ qulighnegh i _ :
mekelghiigh ghhagh _ naa an _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ iiggagh ten _ qilaga t _ tulimagh itgun _ teghlegtekaqe anka _ . _ â
aneghte lghii nguq _ ( _ aneghte lghii _ )
maaten _ pi llegh mitun _ alla _ pi iigh aatagh lghii _ :
S ik ig g aq _ neghe lleg mta _ neqekrag m _ kagimleghwaagh aneng _ negh luni _ riigte minun _ aglagh luni _ itegh luni _ aag nghmini _ tagi aqe luni _ , _ tawaten _ aneghte lghii nguq _ esghapag aat _ .
uumtagh m _ ( _ uumtagh _ )
nenglu m _ ilu yan _ nun am el nguut _ , _ sa meng _ alngunak _ k an agh f ik egk ayug w et _ :
aghnalqwaagh ghhagh m _ pi r ugh t ani _ qawaag m _ qateg i _ tukrug aat _ uumtagh m _ asi anun _ kanaghte ma kangi _ .
tutmaghwaagh yagh ma lghiit _ ( _ tu t m agh w aaq _ )
uksaagh mi _ nuna _ kumlaregagh nghaani _ ne meng _ uyavagh ni _ afsengagh m _ si q l ug w aan eng _ ivagh i lghiit _ nuna _ tutmagh aqe luku _ .
S iq l ug w at _ akuuragh nghmegteki _ ketngig it _ nalighmeng _ p u tu k gh w it _ kanagh aqe ut _ :
aghnaghagh t _ ata eng _ tangigh sqellug qu _ pekneghtigh sqellug qu _ tutmaghwaagh yagh ma lghiit _ .
kenigh megteggun _ ( _ kenigh t _ )
A t ku g w em _ , _ qaligh m _ , _ qiipaghagh m _ a si l igh negh i _ nuqutuqagh t _ g g aat meg g neng _ qantagh ke lghii ni _ :
yuug _ esnagh mun _ agigte yalghiimi _ iq all ug w aq _ tepe qaghtagh ma kanga _ .
Yug w em _ ila i llu _ esnevagh luteng _ kenigh megteggun _ saghna te ma lghiit _ qantaghqagh ite ngugh t _ .
tutmaghwaagh negh ke te ziin _ ( _ tu t m agh w aaq _ )
tutmaghwaagh ghngaaghmi _ sa lghii _ , _ nalighmeng _ tutmaghwaagh te kete luku _ sa lghii _ :
aghnagh aq _ tutmaghwaagh negh ke te ziin _ aghula ma lghii _ .
ila it _ asa- ni luku _ , _ apagh aatagh ni luku _ taku ma kangat _ .
peknegh meng _ ( _ peknegh _ )
P ii te sigh aam _ pii k n angi _ c o t t o n - n es ug n il ngu u m _ akugh i _ :
aghnagh aq _ peknegh meng _ naalkute nghmeng _ aghtugh luni _ saqlagte luni _ tagi ma lghii _ .
ufsug yagh a _ ( _ u f s uk _ )
sa u aat _ aatkagh t _ , _ ulig t _ anigu i _ , _ pagula i _ , _ ifkaghte na luki _ kaa g tu l ghii ni _ un agh s iigh w agh meng _ , _ alngunak _ sa meng _ an ag ut aghq agh yug n ameng _ :
â _ kameg gken _ anigu ghllag u uk _ ufsug yagh a _ qakmavek _ , _ â _ naa an _ ighnegh ni _ pi ma kanga _ .
n igh w aag pag tagh qell uku _ ( _ n igh w aag pag t aq _ )
S aam _ ak is q aghnegh an _ nighug u uute aatagh ste llegh i _ :
aw ligh neghllug mi _ meghutlug lghute _ egte llegh ni _ si q in ghem _ ak is q aghnegh an _ n igh w aag pag tagh qell uku _ es ghagh agh put _ .
si q l ug w aq
neqelghutagh _ nuna kun _ laag te luni _ , _ laag llegh _ mingllu luni _ qaye a _ aghvegh m _ ag l aan eng _ takaghqughvike luni _ nevugh meng _ saapekagh _ umu luku _ iwerngaqun _ paye a _ .
isekinagh lghiit _ enkaam _ neqe mun _ aghu nigh ite ngugh t _ :
S iq l ug w aq _ ukmangigh aqe luku _ im igh aq agh put _ enkaam _ imagh kegte aqe uq _ .
qaghlu ngllagh aqe uq _ ( _ qaghlu _ )
T ap gh aghn eng _ pateghtuqagh t _ aqnigh nigh ite ngugh t _ qamugh mun _ , _ tegh ig l ug w em _ amiiragh aneng _ ulimakagh t _ qamugh sigh u luki _ qikmigh nun _ :
yuug _ nutaghagh meng _ qaghlu ngllagh aqe uq _ qikmigh minun _ .
iingunagh mi _ ( _ iingunagh an _ )
Q am ag teng ng waagh luni _ , _ sa u aat _ ikuvike llghite ngugh t _ :
nengiighhagh _ iingunagh mi _ aghvegh _ iingunagh an _ qaake naqe kangat _ esghapag yaghtugh ma kangat _ .
siku yan _ ( _ siku _ )
siku _ taana _ , _ n a tu m _ s aam _ siku a _ :
naayvagh m _ siku yan _ iqeghte a _ sungaghyug a _ ughug kestagh yalghiimi _ .
ii w em _ ( _ ii k w _ )
kellii n _ , _ naayvagh t _ megh it _ esne meng _ awavagh ghllag negh meggni _ llangaqa _ naange ghllag luteng _ :
I i w em _ qalmesagh _ aw av an l e nguq _ aliigh uute ghllag ma uq _ .
tu ng y uu m _ ( _ tungyugh _ )
kellii n _ , _ naayvagh t _ megh it _ esne mun _ taglagh ghllag negh meggni _ , _ uleve ghllag negh meggni _ :
angyagh _ es n ev an l e nguq _ tu ng y uu m _ kaate ma a _ .
maaqellegh m _ ( _ m aaq em _ )
kellii n _ megh an _ maaqellegh an _ saste llegh a _ nalighmeng _ maaqellegh m _ ayuq e tu l nga _ :
maaqellegh m _ aghvightagh u aatagh llegh an _ siku _ n ek eg negh a _ allangughte aqe a _ .
alqimagh u isigh ste ghllag aqe a _ ( _ alqime i an _ )
uksugh mi _ naayghagh t _ , _ uusneghwaagh t _ , _ sigugnegh t _ , _ q ag u r ug w it _ paagken _ an uq an negh min i _ , _ umegnegh _ suupe m _ anigu _ neve aqe uq _ awatmun _ pii z taq uq _ qagughrug neng _ .
qaye mineng _ nallunagh lghii _ tuute lghii ni _ ayeme luni _ ifkagh u qagh yu k _ .
naayghagh ni _ alqime i an _ uglaghi nghmini _ uqigtughte nghmini _ ellmi neng _ ifkagh qagh yu k _ , _ lengke kayug _ : _ paagken _ anuqe _ mulu nghmini _ sigugnegh _ alqimagh u isigh ste ghllag aqe a _ .
nunaki aqe uq _ ( _ nuna ke i _ )
teghigniqe a _ , _ pin igh y u ug ta _ :
yuug _ ellng in aghh agh mi _ al ii negh ll ug l ag mi _ kiiw m _ esne ani _ kum aq il uni _ , _ negh aqe luni _ , _ nulugh magh mi _ aghn el qu si q _ nunaki aqe uq _ .
uvegte luku
Taw an ing in aq _ :
mekelghiigh ghhagh m _ tukughagh ni _ aqnighte luki _ mulu magh an _ naa an _ c l in i c - mun _ aglagh te ma kanga _ .
H e al t h _ a i d e- te m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ uvegte luku _ tagite qaghte naqe gpenaan _ . _ â
atngaghute leg _ ( _ atngaghute t _ )
aghnagh t _ neghigh luku _ t aat g it n il nguut _ terellegh t _ :
aghnalqwaagh _ atngaghute leg _ , _ taqugh kek _ igaghtuqagh k _ esghaqaaluni _ aghn al q waagh s ug n ing it ng waagh tuq _ .
ighwaaghtuute te n _ ( _ ighwaaghtuute a _ )
teghig ke sagh t _ anigu mun _ , _ nuna mun _ ingaghte aqe luteng _ n ev egh taq luteng _ mingughhu te lghiit _ :
Yug w em _ qikmigh ni _ megh meng _ uugte yan _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ tamaani _ ighwaaghtuute te n _ . _ â
qikmigh _ ighwaaghtuute luni _ nekeve luni _ efsug te yalghiimi _ yuug _ isiqaghte ma kanga _ .
waamte amken _ ( _ waamte a _ )
puughte i _ .
A m y ugh waagh luki _ , _ ipa u nghite ngugh meng _ sa meng _ pi lghii ni _ :
aghnaghagh m _ uyughagh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ kii _ , _ nanugh ghllag _ inga _ . _ â
qiya yan _ pi a _ , _ â _ waamte amken _ , _ nanugh u nghite uq _ . _ â
ag ghi yug negh llak _ ( _ ag ghi yug neq _ )
P iy uk ell ghii nagh m i tun _ pi naqe ghllag _ , _ sagiqe ghllag _ :
mekelghiigh _ uksugh mi _ maqaghqe gpenani _ napi naqe ghllag _ angayuqagh mi _ maqaghqe sqe ghngaatni _ .
ata an _ agh y ugh um akanga _ , _ â _ elpek _ ag ghi yug negh llak _ !
esla _ nallu kan _ qakun _ allangughte lleghqagh a _ . _ â
kasug ma kanga _ ( _ k as uk _ )
qagi m _ sa kun _ alngunak _ tekite yuwhaagh llegh a _ isiqghuute ghllag qagh yu k _ :
mekelghiigh m _ elqwaagh t _ sigugnegh m _ a si ng an il nguut _ aqfaagh aghte yagh luki _ kasug ma kanga _ .
suflu u ma lghii _ ( _ suflugh _ )
ggute m _ aghu llegh a _ :
ggute nka _ g gu ut n iigh te m _ yuvghiigh luki _ , _ ataasigh _ suflu u ma lghii _ .
aghqiiwtu te _ ( _ aghqiiw _ )
uksugh mi _ s apegh h n aghq w aan gh ani _ anigu kun _ piyug lghii ni _ piyug llegh t _ nallu nigh ite ngugh t _ aghqiiw i _ nagate aqe ke put _ :
qakma _ manughagh mteggun _ naghughte lghiit _ nallu nigh ite ngugh t _ aghqiiwtu te _ piyug llegh it _ .
pi y aan neq eg s aat aq elghii t _ ( _ pi yu a _ ) _ Yug w et _ uksugh mi _ piyug meng
siku gnun _ ayvegh meng _ , _ maklag meng _ , _ neghsagh meng _ unangniigh na luteng
megh meng _ ivagh i yagh te aqe lghiit _ : _ siku k _ kaa s u wh aan gh egk en i _ yug w et
pi y aan neq eg s aat aq elghii t _ .
ataata ut _ ( _ atugh a ta _ )
ata m _ ang leg ut anga _ yuug _ :
ataata ut _ quunpeng _ napi ghllag _ enkaam _ unange aqe lghii _ .
ilangqughqu aqe ukut _ ( _ ilangqughqu _ )
ilangqugh meng _ aqfate lghiit _ meghqagh meng _ :
mekelghiigh ghhagh t _ quunpeng _ qepghigh sqe aqe kangit _ enkaam _ ilangqughqu aqe ukut _ esla _ naafte ghngaan _ meghagh ite igate ngugh u kut _ .
b o il er - et _ ( _ boiler _ )
melghutagh t _ entaqun _ 1 0 _ g all o n - et _ umeg leg t _ , _ tugutagh leg t _ takemriig u aaghet _ :
B o il er - et _ kagimlegh meng _ ilangqugh meng _ imigh aqe aput _ .
ilughwaghniighute neghtu ghllag yagh lghiit _ ( _ ilughaghte ni uq _ )
ilughagh ke te lghiit _ am y ugh waagh ull ghiit _ , _ s ug w aag usi g al nguut _ :
ilughagh ke te lghiit _ ilughwaghniighute neghtu ghllag yagh lghiit _ maaten _ pi pagnanigh ut _ .
qaasligh at _ ( _ qaasligh t _ )
umuqagh t _ akughtuqagh t _ qaasligh u luteng _ ggateg ke te _ atughqagh t _ :
ukut _ qaasligh at _ mat- qaghte yug nigh ghllag u ut _ .
kaki sigh ghllag _ ( _ kaki _ )
kaki sigh kun _ kaki ghllag _ :
aghnagh m _ ug w in i _ , _ avaqutagh ni _ , _ an Ê¼ g agh ani _ aatkagh ngllagh aqe kangi _ qiipaghagh meng _ k ak i si g ne kun _ .
enkaam _ quunpeng _ kaki sigh ghllag _ .
yupig m _ S an q ut ang anun _ apeghtuusagh kekagh nun _ liite aghagh sighqagh t
iyaa-kagh m _ apeghtu sagh i
sa ngllagh yaghqagh t _ : _ T ug w eq _ nalighmeng _ uunghagh
atughqagh t _ : _ atugh llghite ngughk _ igaasigh _ nalighmeng _ unaghsiighwagh _ igagh _ 1 _ 1 _ / _ 2 _ x _ 2 _ inches _ kuynge mun _ ukmangiisigh _ nalighmeng _ paper _ c l ip - meng _ .
naten _ tug w eq _ ulima yaghqau a _ :
imeg te luku _ m aal gh ug w eg neng _ igagh _ am es t aagh h aq _ igaasigh m _ iq ug w akun _ er as er -em _ tu ng ang akun _ .
igagh _ neve ste luku _ igaasigh kun _ s c o t c h _ tape- meng _ il ef k agh aghh n ay uk an _ .
kepe nakesi _ igagh _ imeg tke aq _ saqugmun _ n u v uk r ug wa _ ipeg sqellug qu _ .
wayagh _ kepe luku _ 1 _ 1 _ / _ 2 _ inches _ tag kaa n _ .
agughte luku _ 1 _ / _ 4 _ in c h - ngu luku _ uzive qaghtagh na yu kan _ igaasigh mun _ nekegtekuni _ .
agughtekagh _ wayagh _ neve ste nakesi _ s c o t c h _ tape- meng _ igaasigh mun _ ig iil gh akun _ iq ug w akun _ 1 _ inch _ piiznga an _ .
agughte nakesi _ wayagh _ piiznga lghii _ nekreg u luku _ .
igaghqwaagh leg _ tu ug gh u uq _ , _ nekreg aa _ alngunak _ sa mun _ atugh u uq _ .
akuzillegh t _ sa llegh mun _ uspute nga lghiit
1 _ . _ tunag m _ qukaa ni _ .
efqughute nga lghiit _ , _ qaatke te ma lghiit _ , _ qepghaghtuqagh t _ , _ qepghagh tke ai ta _ , _ ilakwaagh ita _ piniqe pigtegkangit _ .
â _ mekelghiigh _ taana _ qaatke te nga te mineng _ tunag m _ qukaa nite uq _ â _ angyaleg an _ pi ma kangi _ yug w et _ .
2 _ . _ K aag k as agh ta _ .
E f qugh agh ta _ elngaatall _ .
aghnaghaghhagh m _ apa ni _ kaapelqagh meng _ awaligh ma kanga _ .
apa an _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ tamaaken _ negh yuguma lunga _ kaa g k as agh tagh pe nga _ ! _ â
3 _ . _ kaviigh ghhagh _ .
puughte i lleg _ , _ peghqinegh _ .
aghnaghaghhagh m _ uyughagh ni _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ puughte luku _ dollar-nga _ sa meng _ n av egh sim akanga _ .
naa ita _ pi ma kanga _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ , _ â _ kaviigh ghhagh m _ taa m _ puughte laatagh ma uten _ .
4 _ . _ meteghllug ghllag _ .
puughhe negh kegte aq _ , _ nalluqagh _ .
naa an _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ elpek _ legan _ meteghllug ghllag _ , _ tuune laatagh magh an _ d o ll ar - en _ â _ .
5 _ . _ iye k _ miluqutagh ka _ .
alngunak _ esgh aq waagh agh t alghii ni _ iye t _ q ap r ag sim ii ta _ .
aghnaghaghhagh m _ aangqagh ghhagh ni _ n aal ken negh meng _ aghtugh luku _ naa ni _ aapte yagh aa _ kay usi tes qell uni _ ivagh kanga _ yaghlegi _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ amen _ iye gken _ miluqutagh ke kek _ , _ naalke lleqe an _ . _ â
quyngigh k _ maalghug _ sumeghneghtuqagh k
Q ay g egh h aam _ ungipagh aa
iimnanguq _ .
kiyaghte ma uq _ yuug _ ighnegh leg _ mekestaaghhagh meng _ , _ panig leg llu _ .
taana _ nuyekligh _ ighnegh a _ quunpeng _ quyngigh mi _ nayugh i aqe lghii _ .
ilangani _ maaten _ esnaghtagh t _ tannge t _ naghughte te kete luku _ taana _ quyngigh igh ghllag _ mekelghiightuumagh an _ tugu ma kangat _ .
taagken _ igleghte ma lghii _ .
tawani _ uksaagh u uq _ .
qenwat _ uksugh ma lghii _ .
naqam _ mekelghiigh _ ratamyaag luni _ ayuqe lghii _ .
naqam _ neghe ste aqe kangat _ , _ taawanginaq _ ilu ani _ qavagh igate ngughk _ !
maaten _ ilangani _ , _ esla mi _ qavagh naqe yan _ quyngigh k _ maalghug _ tagi ma lghiik _ .
ila a _ gginagh a _ aveg luni _ tagnegh lghii _ inglu a _ qategh lghii _ .
aag llegh an _ yugusigh a _ ukileghyag _ .
taake uk _ apa an _ qam ugh te ke f taa k _ .
taake uk _ ingaghte aqe lghiik _ akeleghraagh ke luku _ , _ llaaghanwha _ ghhuute igate kanga _ .
tawaten _ kiyaghte ma lghiit _ igleghte ma lghiit _ .
tawani _ kiyagh taa llegh mi _ mengteghagh mii i _ ivagh i aqe ut _ .
aghnagh aq _ nayag a _ ivagh i ma lghii _ , _ naayghagh m _ am at ang anun _ pi yalghiimi _ esghagh ma kangi _ tume ghllag t _ .
ataasigh meng _ unug yagu _ ingaghte uute ma lghiik _ .
ingaghte yata _ aag llegh an _ quyngigh m _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ Taa kun is ku v ek _ wata _ ikfiqe lleqe uten _ .
whaa _ maalghug gneng _ megh nal i ku y eng _ kaate lleqe ut _ ne meggnun _ !
unaami _ aane gkuvek _ ingavek _ uy av agh p anun _ tume nun _ aglagh ghhaaten _ .
kaate kuvek _ ukavek _ ayuqe luten _ nekevgha lghaaten _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ qavaa ma lghiit _ .
unaami _ unaangu luku _ taghtugh luni _ mekelghiigh _ pilugug uq _ .
negh te ma lghiit _ .
taaqe yata _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ aglagh ma lghii _ , _ kaa sa mi _ negh ma lghii _ .
negh nghmeng _ taaqe luni _ aglagh ma lghii _ tazingavek _ tume nun _ uy av agh p anun _ .
kaate luni _ ellngit nun _ ayuqe luni _ nekevgha ma lghii _ .
inga _ qaghluughi na luteng _ tagsigh ma yagh kangat _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ .
A v el gh aq in aam ak angi _ legan _ ellngit nun _ ayuqe luni _ nekevgha ma lghii _ .
ila ita _ pi ma kangat _ , _ â _ sa u luku _ tuqu li _ qaywaam _ ! _ â
taagken _ tuqutagh igh na luteng _ malighqugh ma lghiit _ .
sivuke luni _ quyngigh _ uzive ma lghii _ .
qenwat _ taake uk _ quyngigh k _ mekelghiigh ghhagh m _ qavagh lgute kek _ uzive ma lghiik _ maligte te lutek _ .
pangaleg ma lghiik _ mekelghiigh ghhagh mun _ .
mulu luni _ tazingavek _ mekelghiigh ghhagh mun _ kaate yaghtugh magh mi _ aag llegh a _ quyngigh a _ guughte ma lghii _ .
quyngigh m _ kaate yatni _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ uughqaghte ma lghii _ sivutmute _ ayuqe luni _ aqume ma lghii _ .
pangaleg te ma kangat _ .
tamaa na _ yuug _ malighqagh i ma yagh lghii _ .
uyavagh te luki _ quyngigh m _ alegh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ U meg negh sigh h u _ ! _ â
llaaghanwha _ um eg negh sigh yaq en ni _ .
umegnegh ughte ma kanga _ qanigtuumagh mi _ , _ anuqetu magh mi _ .
naqam _ kingu at _ umegnegh _ sivungagh t _ aliinegh _ .
tamaa na _ yuug _ tuqu laghate ma lghii _ .
aag llegh an _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ legan _ igatagh negh gpeni _ tuqute luki _ negh luten _ pegte luki _ igleghte aqe i _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ igatagh nghmini _ tuqute luki _ neqagh luni _ pegte luki _ tam avek _ aghulaqe aqe lghii _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh _ ima _ uksaagh _ tannge t _ metngegh tke aat _ , _ iglegh teng ng iin aam al uku _ qenwat _ upenghagh u ma lghii _ .
ighni laghate te ma lghii _ quyngigh _ .
quyngigh m _ pi laatagh ma kanga _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ , _ â _ legan _ ighninghhagh t _ unite aqe ki _ , _ malighqagh te aqe naagh ut _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ unite aqe kangi _ .
mulu luteng _ ataasigh meng _ qavagh luteng _ kaate aqe lghiit _ .
igleghte te kete luku _ quyngigh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ una _ s aam _ naayghagh ke agu _ ? _ â
mekelghiigh ghhagh m _ naayghagh _ esghapag yagh kete ni _ naayghagh eng _ asi mikun _ uusneghwaagh leg _ .
uusneghwaagh m _ aw at ang an il nguut _ mengteghagh i _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh m _ akite ma kanga _ , _ â _ esgha _ taana _ naayghagh _ whangkuta _ naayghagh ut _ ! _ â
llaaghanwha _ aglagh ma lghiit _ .
iiwenllu _ qemi meng _ teve naqe aqe uq _ , _ yug w em _ panig ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ ghhukaghagh _ kuuve yaghtugh ghhu _ up- ghhagh ghllag nge a _ . _ â
aghnagh aq _ aane luni _ ghhukaghagh _ tugu luku _ kuuve ma kanga _ .
kuuve luku _ uteghmun _ qiive yalghiimi _ esghagh ma kek _ maalghug _ quyngigh k _ teve lghiik _ uusneghwaagh meng _ .
tawani _ esghapag ma kangi _ qenwat _ ata an _ qama _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ nalleghiite ziin _ , _ nikimqun _ sa meng _ esghapag inagh uten _ ! _ â
itegh luni _ ungipaate ma kangi _ .
nulighh ghqu te lghiik _ aane lutek _ es ghagh yaq eg t eng _ quyngigh eng _ , _ qenwat _ uglaghi ma lghii _ .
qenwat _ qamagte ma lghii _ .
Yug wa _ talugh nga lghii _ .
wetku _ mulu luni _ yug wa _ aliigh ma lghii _ .
esghagh yamegteggu _ quyake luku _ q iy ak luku _ .
yuug _ qavaghtuqagh
ayumigh m _ ungipagh aa _ iyaa-kagh m _ apegh llegh a
ungipaghagh ni nguq _ imani _ , _ ne mi _ tea- ma ni _ esne meng _ unegken _ kellii neng _ neqenge kayug ni _ uksugh yuwhaagh mi _ siku k _ m all eg y u wh aan gh egk en i _ .
Yug w et _ , _ nukalpigagh t _ ategh utu aqe lghiit _ , _ ay v egh aat aq el ghi t _ puglegh akun _ .
unange aqe lghiit _ maklagte aqe lghiit _ anglu akun _ .
tamaa _ y u wh aq _ ellnga llu _ piyaa aqe lghii _ unug ghllagu luku _ nighugte ste gpenaan _ .
sikuvag nun _ kaate nghmini _ vuuslegh t _ qu ng ang it gun _ laag te luni _ uqiite luni _ aghn el qu si q _ qavagh aqe lghii _ ivagh i niigh gpenani _ .
taghtugh nghmini _ aghnegh m _ qukagh a llu _ naghughte luni _ , _ taglagh uute aqe lghiit _ pi yu aat _ .
taglagh aqe lghii _ maligte te luni _ .
Yug w et _ ungipamsug te nghata _ , _ taana _ yuug _ pim aq elghii _ , _ â _ ii _ , _ el ngaat all - aa _ , _ esgh atagh teg pen anga _ naalkute aghte gpenanga _ , _ akuuraate aghte gpenanga _ anglu meng _ puglegh meng _ uteghnigh laatagh unga _ . _ â
ataasigh meng _ yug w et _ naligh ita _ esgh am ak angat _ naten _ sa aqe ta a _ .
E s gh ap ag yaq meg teg gu _ , _ ii s ku gh saq meg teg gu _ vuuslegh t _ , _ sikuvag t _ qu ng ang it nun _ aglagh luni _ qavaa ma aqe lghii _ .
N ul iigh h anun _ apegh ma kangat _ .
unaami _ unaangu luku _ yuug _ y at aagh qell aat am alghii _ .
U n ug w agh llag y an _ , _ n ul iigh h an _ kingu aneng _ tuumte ma kanga _ .
maligte ma kanga _ uy aa v an lluni _ esgh aghn ay uk ang at ni _ lii g ik n ay uk ang at ni _ .
llaaghanam _ sikuvag nun _ t aku kum t aagh min un _ kaate luni _ aghuliigh llegh ani _ tuvagh m _ , _ naagu _ talugh uq _ qu ng ang it nun _ tamaavek _ .
tawani _ esghapag llegh ke i i na ma kanga _ .
tazingavek _ t aku k es tam akanga _ iig k agh ameng _ .
elngaatall _ igkamsug luku _ pi yalghiimi _ taawa _ s an q ut angi _ , _ uyiigh i _ , _ uunghagh i _ saaghw ani _ naqam _ .
qavagh ani _ uyiigh a _ tugu luku _ taglaate ma kanga _ .
aghnagh _ ne mun _ kaate luni _ ug w i mi _ uyiigh a _ iigh luku _ itegh ma lghii _ .
llaaghan _ wh an i kum aan _ taglagh luni _ yuug _ ungipagh yalghiimi _ , _ â _ ii _ , _ elngaatall _ angtaagh ii yagh aqa _ , _ angtughte yagh aqa _ sa u a _ maklag _ , _ ima _ sa aqe kete te uq _ .
saavgumiigh i uute unga _ .
taawa _ s an q ut aagh h aan ka _ ima _ aghulaqe te ai _ . _ â
taawa _ n ul iigh h an _ angegh luku _ sa meng _ pi nghite a _ .
I ghi v g agh mi _ taakwani _ n ul q aa v iigh tuq _ yuug _ .
nuliigh ni _ keveg aqe a _ , _ â _ ingavek _ ku g w egh pen un _ keveg aqe laken _ .
U y iigh aghh agh meg g ne nguq _ aq u pil q en naq l it nga _ s an q ut aagh iit ng waagh um anga _ . _ â
angegh luni _ nulighh a _ aane luni _ tazingavek _ ku g w egh min un _ pi ma lghii _ .
uteghnigh luni _ uyiigh _ iighkagh ni _ tugu luku _ itghute luku _ tuune ma kanga _ .
Yug w em _ tugu luku _ yuvghiigh aa _ , _ liigike a _ ellmi _ uyigh ani _ .
sa meng _ pi nghite uq _ .
unaami _ un ug w agh llag l aat agh tuq _ .
maaten _ tawavek _ iighagh vig minun _ pi gpenani _ , _ anglu meng _ ivagh i uq _ .
anglu _ kaate luku _ , _ maklag m _ anglu a _ , _ esghapag aa _ .
llaaghanwha _ uka _ mayugh uq _ maklag _ .
iwerngaqun _ sugupag kek _ nuug yayek _ tawavek _ nagh ull eg yaq min igu _ legan _ unake a _ .
kii _ , _ imani _ iknaqe uq _ elngaatall _ .
aga _ pi akun _ taaggun _ nengte uq _ iwernga _ kiksag aa _ uyiigh m _ kangigh a _ .
tawaten _ maklag stun _ uyatu tekagh mi _ sama _ nengte uq _ .
maklagte lghii _ , _ anglu a _ nuqutughte a _ tawaten _ qaake yaghqaaghte luku _ .
naghigh yan _ s ayug w aa _ , _ s ayug w aa _ .
S ayug w aa _ , _ s ayug w aa _ iiwenllu _ whaa _ aliigh naqe aqe uq _ , _ samaken _ nuughqaghte yalghiimi _ , _ aanqaghte yalghiimi _ , _ yug w em _ negh qugh r ug wa _ .
neghqughrug _ uughqaghte luni _ yuug _ taana _ q ev ut qugh taa m akanga _ gginagh a _ es n eg uugh ll uku _ puufqellug qu _ .
N egh qugh r ug w em _ nuqnegh luku _ uyiigh a _ pi kaqe kanga _ , _ aga _ itegh uq _ veghute uq _ anglu mun _ .
yuug _ nekeve luni _ uyigh ani _ , _ sanqute ni _ imeg luki _ taglagh uq _ .
esghagh luku _ nulighh an _ aapte a _ , _ â _ kii _ sa ghllag ziin _ , _ sangavek _ gginagh igh te ghllag ziin _ ? _ â
â _ elngaatall _ angtaagh ii yagh aqa _ . _ â
yug w em _ kiimsigh ma kanga _ , _ â _ angtaagh ii yagh aqa _ , _ sa u a _ taaga _ , _ repall _ neng te m _ angtale aneng _ nuqnegh naqe m _ anglu m _ esne akun _ gginagh ka _ kaa g ut aat am _ g g in iigh ut ng waagh aa nga _ . _ â
taawa _ angegh aqe kanga _ , _ sa meng _ pi igate kanga _ .
qafsina t _ aghnegh t _ atugh luki _ gginagh ni _ pi niigh ghraagte yan _ , _ y atagh qell uni _ aghulaqe laatagh uq _ , _ piyaa laatagh uq _ .
unange uute aqe lghiit _ ayveghagh te aqe lghiit _ pi yu aat _ .
taawa _ qavagh nghite uq _ iv agh il atagh tuq _ anglu meng _ .
llaaghanwha _ anglu meng _ naalkute luni _ taawa _ uq l igh ll atagh tuq _ .
uka _ mayugh laatagh uq _ , _ nuug laatagh aa _ sugupag m _ .
iwerngaqun _ tawaten _ alla _ naghulleg aa _ , _ nengte uq _ aga _ .
tawaten _ pilate- aghte uq _ , _ imani _ iknaqe uq _ .
I l um s u whang un ani _ , _ legan _ whaa _ neghqughrug _ sama _ q ev ut qugh naq l atagh aa _ .
iwernga _ y u wh aam _ nuqnegh aa _ .
taawa _ naghigh yan _ uka _ sayug laatagh aa _ , _ amu a _ , _ amu a _ .
N u ug tes aq min igu _ maklag ghllag _ .
legan _ p an agh agh min eng _ tuqute a _ angtaagh ghllag _ .
qaake luku _ ellng in aghh agh mi _ maklag ghllag _ angtaagh ghllag _ repall _ nalluke a _ sa u ta a _ .
U n ang ig all ghem _ pi ma lghii _ , _ â _ una _ tegh ig l ug w em _ av aaq ut agh ll ak en ghi t aag u _ , _ â _ n all u m _ angtale an _ .
taawa _ m ak l il uni _ , _ qamiigh luni _ taglagh uq _ .
El ng at all _ quyake aat _ upugha te aat _ .
Taa m _ kingu aneng _ taawa _ qavagh yaghtugh nanigh uq _ , _ unange yagute uq _ tam aa ku s tun _ maligte te luni _ .
yugu lghii _ ellnga llu _ , _ pi ke ng yagh qay alghii _ qavagh igate yagh kuni _ .
tefaay _ ! _ tagtale ke a _ taawa _ .
Q ay agh tugh h aq lu _ maalghug _ aghnagh k llu
El q iil aam _ ungipagh aa
ungipaghagh ni nguq _ imanagh i _ , _ aghnagh k nguq _ taake uk _ maalghug _ uusnegh m _ qaye ani _ unatagh ma lukek _ u ug ken _ uka _ sa u a _ qay agh tugh h aq _ aliigh ma lghii _ .
nallangigh lukek _ tespikavek _ pi ma kek _ , _ â _ kinku k _ p aag ku uk _ , _ aghnagh k _ p aag ku uk _ . _ â
avelghaqiinagh ma kangat _ .
maamtawha nguq _ , _ â _ kinku k _ p aag ku uk _ , _ aghnagh k _ p aag ku uk _ ? _ â
aag llegh an _ akite ma kanga _ , _ â _ A ng al q at an y aa ng an kuk _ , _ U n ay aa ng an kuk _ . _ â
â _ tagi tek _ qaake naqe amtek _ , _ aglagh te naqe amtek _ ne gpetegnun _ . _ â
aavgugh vig tgun _ taakwagun _ ukig ma lghiik _ .
aag llegh a _ ug w avek _ itegh ma lghii _ qayagh an _ , _ aag llegh an _ kingu anun _ .
igleghte ma lghiit _ .
nalleghaghhalek _ q el an gh um alghii k _ elngaatall _ .
igleghte ma lghiit _ .
qenwat _ sivuyag mete ngughk _ ug wa _ gh h u utegh llag yaq min igu _ .
â _ A a- v e- v e- v e- v e- v e- y aa - aa _ !
salin _ kaate yug niite aqe sta _ ? _ â
Y u wh aam _ akite ma kanga _ , _ â _ U u - ku - ku - ku - ku uk _ , _ tekeghagh ghhagh _ t a z in a _ ivgagh kumteggu _ kaate lleqe ukut _ . _ â
taawa _ igleghte ut _ .
nasiqe luku _ ivgagh yaghqagh _ kingu anite ngughk _ enraq _ , _ â _ A a- v e- v e- v e- v e- v e- y aa - aa _ !
salin _ kaate yug niite aqe sta _ ? _ â
â _ U u - ku - ku - ku - ku uk _ tekeghagh ghhagh _ t a z in a _ ivgagh kumteggu _ kaate lleqe ukut _ . _ â
Q en w an nguq _ aghnagh k _ ghhuu yaghtugh ngestagh uk _ .
aanqute i ma lghii _ sivuyag mete ngughk _ ug wa _ ,
â _ P in a- aagh - _ ng aagh - m aa - ng aa _ ,
P iy uugh - aa - ng aa - aagh - m aa - ng aa _ ,
Y aa - a- y aa - a- y aa - ng aa _ ,
N aag u ngu uq _ p aam - n a- ng aa _ , _ Q uy g gu u
P iy uugh - ii - yagh ii - y aa - y a- y ii - y aa - y a- y ii - y aa _ ,
M eng aa - gh uu - ngu uq - ang a y _ . _ â
â _ U u - ku - ku - ku - ku uk _ tekeghagh ghhagh _ t a z in a _ ivgagh kumteggu _ kaate lleqe ukut _ . _ â
kingu anite ngughk _ maateqwaaqun _ aanqute ma lghii _ ,
â _ P in a- aagh - ng aagh - m aa - ng aa _ ,
P iy uugh - aa - ng aa - aagh - m aa - ng aa _ ,
Y aa - a- y aa - a- y aa - ng aa _ ,
N aag u ngu uq _ p aam - n a- ng aa _ , _ Q uy g gu u
P iy uugh - ii - yagh ii - y aa - y a- y ii - y aa - y a- y ii - y aa _ ,
M eng aa - gh uu - ngu uq - ang a y _ . _ â
nepiightugh ngugh _ legan _ , _ suqsugh ghhalek _ uugna _ ug w at ang an il nguq _ qayagh ani _ sivuyag anite ngughk _ aga _ aanqaghte yalghiimi _ tan pegh h akun _ ukite qaghte te luni _ , _ aghqullug _ .
maateqwaaqun _ kingu aneng _ .
taawa _ aghqullug u lutek _ , _ iwerngaqun _ qula igh luku _ m igh yagh yaq meg n eg u _ , _ m igh yagh yaq meg n eg u _ , _ m igh yagh yaq meg n eg u _ , _ i wer ng aq un nguq _ y u wh aq _ kaleftagh at _ .
aghnaghaghhagh _ tagitug mi _ I f l ang waagh ak aq
A l g al i k
iimnanguq _ .
aghnaghaghhagh _ iimna _ kiyaghte ma lghii _ angayuqagh ite ngughk _ iwernga _ apa leg _ nengyugh leg _ .
maaten _ ilangani _ nuna lgu ta ita _ aghnaghagh t _ keleg ma kangat _ aghnaghaghhagh _ aghulaghqugh naqe ni luteng _ .
llaaghanwha _ aghnaghaghhagh _ aapute ma lghii _ nengyugh ghhagh minun _ .
angegh ma kanga _ ellnga llu _ maligte te sqellug qu _ aghul aghq un un _ .
taagken _ aghulaqe ma lghiit _ aghnaghaghyaget _ .
unatagh ma luki _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh meng _ piitekagh meng _ tagitug ughte te ghllag ma kangi _ .
tagitug ughte ghllag yagu _ aghnaghagh t _ atghagh ma lghiit _ .
A t gh amun _ aghnaghaghhagh _ pi yaq es eng _ aviite uq _ .
aghnaghagh t _ alinge luteng _ angayuqagh meggneng _ aghnaghaghhagh _ tuq l ugh agh aat agh yaq es eng _ akite nghite ai _ .
ima _ aviite uq _ .
aghtugh luku _ tuqlughagh aatagh nghmeng _ miiwen _ sivu meggni _ atghagh ma na yu kan _ aghnaghaghhagh t _ mengteghagh mun _ atghagh ma lghiit _ .
kaate luteng _ aghnaghagh t _ mengteghagh mun _ aghnaghaghhagh m _ apa i _ aap saq meg tek i _ kaate ma ta a _ , _ aviite uq _ .
aghnaghaghhagh m _ ila ni _ av iil ng agh y am ik i _ qiyaaghwagh magh mi _ ivagh ma yagh kangi _ aviite ma lghiit _ .
yaghlegi nguq _ suna _ taake uk _ paye k _ .
aghnaghaghhagh _ paye m _ saaghw ani _ qiya kestagh ghngaaghmi _ qavaa ma lghii _ .
qavaa ma luku _ tagh sagh r am _ taghtugh a _ .
taghtugh yalghiimi _ aghnagh ngugh _ suna _ taana _ nunalgute ke nghite kanga _ .
aghnagh m _ aghnaghaghhagh _ aapte ma kanga _ , _ â _ sa aqe ziin _ tawani _ ? _ â
aghnaghaghhagh m _ akite ma kanga _ , _ â _ aghulaghqugh yagh luta _ tagitug ughte yagu _ ila nka _ iflii ma anka _ .
entaqun _ unite lunga _ atghagh ma ut _ .
ifla u iqe lunga _ ila nka _ aghtugh luki _ ivagh nghmeng _ whani _ qavaa ma lghiinga _ . _ â
aghnagh m _ pi laatagh aa _ , _ â _ tea- ai _ maligte nga _ qamavek _ itegh ltung _ ! _ â
llaaghanwha _ itegh ma lghiik _ .
itegh yalghiimek _ imani nguq _ aghnagh m _ nenge lunga _ qetngigh uq _ , _ ug w at anga _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh meng _ neqetu uq _ .
aghnagh m _ aghnaghaghhagh _ negh e sim akanga _ mangtag meng _ quyngigh meng _ .
aghnagh m _ pi ma kanga _ aghnaghaghhagh _ , _ â _ wiin _ whani _ kiyaghten _ !
unaaqute aqe gkagu _ aane aqe gkuma _ , _ whani _ utaqa aqe nga _ .
igatagh aqe gkuvek _ neghyukekagh gpeneng _ negh aqe i _ utaqa gpenanga _ . _ â
qavagh lutek _ unaami _ taghtugh negh megteni _ aghnagh _ aane aqe lghii _ .
Agh n el qu si q _ aviite aqe lghii _ .
wetku _ unug yaghtugh magh an _ tagi nghmini _ itghute aqe lghii _ tungtu meng _ ilangani _ pilagkagh meng _ mangtag meng _ .
aghnaghaghhagh _ apa an _ nuna lgu ta ita _ ivagh yagh luku _ aghtugh yamegteggu _ aviite yan _ qenwat _ wesqaawi te ma kangat _ .
tagtalmi _ kiyagh taa llgh em _ aghnagh m _ aghnaghaghhagh _ aapte ma kanga _ , _ â _ apa gpenun _ aghyuqe aghte igate ziin _ ? _ â
aghnaghaghhagh m _ akite ma kanga _ , _ â _ aghyuqe ghngaaghma qun _ naten _ aglagh langa _ .
N aan t at _ apa nka _ nalluke kenka _ . _ â
aghnagh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ whaa _ qavagh yaghtugh unga _ .
qavagh kuma _ angatumeng _ taghtugh naanghite unga _ .
qemall _ aghyuqe lleqe uten _ , _ pellagh yug lleqe uten _ .
apa gpek _ saama _ s u um q en negh meng _ elpek _ qavagh _ palaghhagh _ atuqe aqe aat _ .
repall _ iye it _ iqaghtagh igh ma ut _ .
I ghi v g an gh ag u _ qagugh mig te lutek _ qavagh naqe aqe uk _ . _ â
aghnaghaghhagh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ wetku qun _ elpek _ maligte nakevnga _ . _ â _ aghnagh m _ angegh ma kanga _ .
â _ whaa _ apeghtugh naqe amken _ .
vuvalla mi _ egmightaatagh u uute kumeng _ kay aal q en naa y uk ang aten _ . _ â
aghnagh m _ saguyagh k _ tugu lukek _ ilagagh ma lghii _ alignaghtaagh ma lghii _ .
aghnaghaghhagh m _ esghapag ma kanga _ .
apeghiigh yami _ aghnagh m _ aghnaghaghhagh _ aapte ma kanga _ , _ â _ qayugham _ liite i ziin _ ? _ â
aghnaghaghhagh m _ akite ma kanga _ , _ â _ A - a _ liite unga _ ! _ â
aghnagh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ legan _ atghagh luten _ v u v all aku f si _ tawaten _ pi lghaaten _ . _ â
taagken _ aane yalghiimek _ nutaan _ uksaagh aqe a _ .
atghagh ma lghiik _ , _ atghagh ma lukek _ unug ma kanga _ .
kaate yaghtugh yamek _ aghnaghaghhagh m _ mengteghagh anun _ aghnagh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ uteghte naqe unga _ whanga _ .
ellnginagh gpek _ kaate lghaaten _ . _ â
aghnagh _ aga _ uteghte yan _ aghnaghaghhagh m _ uteghmun _ qiive yagh kete ni _ , _ kaynge _ aga _ maaten _ tu mang it gun _ pangaleg aqe uq _ .
aghnaghaghhagh _ kaate luni _ amig m _ reghillegh akun _ qineghte yalghiimi _ qama _ apa kek _ qagugh mig te lutek _ qavaa te aqe uk _ .
aghnaghaghhagh m _ tenglugtugh magh an _ amigh k _ qam ay aagh m ig yaq en ni _ tagh tugh simak ek _ .
qama _ pi ma lghiik _ , _ â _ kay _ , _ llangaqa _ eltughagh ghhagh mta _ me a _ ! _ â
â _ aaqun _ whanga u unga _ tagi unga _ !
enmis _ sukate lusi _ qelpegh te ngnga _ ! _ â
â _ kaay _ eltughagh ghhagh ut _ tagi uq _ ! _ â
qelpegh te ma kangat _ .
itegh yalghiimi _ apa ita _ iye it _ q av agh l aa ghi g all ghem _ iqaghtagh igh luteng _ .
eltughagh ghhagh eng _ neghe ste luku _ qavaa ma lghiit _ .
unaami _ aap qugh aagh yagh aat _ apa gkenka llu _ aghnaghagh t llu _ tagi luteng _ aghul agh qu l g ut ang it a _ naken _ pi ta a _ .
aghnaghaghhagh _ ak saq ng waagh umalghii _ .
taagken _ aghnaghaghhagh m _ apa a _ v u v all am alghii _ .
sughu ke aq _ tagi laghate te luni _ negh te nghmeng _ taaqe yami _ ungipaghagh te ma lghii _ .
taagken _ alla _ neghe uute luteng _ enraq _ egmightaatagh u te ma lghiit _ , _ alignaghtaagh te ma lghiit _ .
ila ita _ sungagh t _ k ag im ll uki _ saguyagh megteggun _ qaake luki _ saguyagh teng _ k all ag an egh meg tek i _ sungagh t _ iighwigh aqe ut _ .
enraq _ ila ita _ tugu ta i _ ayvegh m _ mengqugh tun _ ullegh qaghtagh aqe kangit _ .
aghnaghaghhagh m _ nengyugh ghhagh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ whanga llu tuq _ egmightu aatagh lghiinga _ ! _ â
nutem nguq _ apa a _ pi ma lghii _ , _ â _ sa meng _ pi aqa _ , _ sa naqe aqa _ ? _ â
aghnaghaghhagh m _ nengyugh ghhagh a _ pi ma lghii _ , _ â _ E ll ng all u tugh nguq _ egmightu aatagh lghii _ . _ â
â _ legan mi _ sa aqa _ , _ â _ pi ma lghii _ apa a _ .
nutem nguq _ ila i _ sughukagh m _ aghnalqwaagh t _ pi ma lghiit _ , _ â _ yakugh ke luten _ !
Agh nagh aq r u wh aq _ ag ghi yug ne pi w aa _ !
kimaawi ste i naqe uq _ ila itneng _ alignaghtaagh naqe lghii neng _ . _ â
aghnaghaghhagh _ ketfagh luni _ saguyagh k _ tugu lukek _ ilagagh ma lghii _ .
ilagagh ma luku _ uka nguq _ suksug ghllag _ aliigh ma lghii _ .
iiwen _ pi aqe ut _ amig kun _ ug wa _ qagi t _ kasug ma lghiit _ ilu te mun _ nategh mun _ .
aghnaghaghhagh m _ saguyagh gni _ k all ag agh yaq en ni _ qagi t _ iig w y alghii meng _ , _ kii _ nategh mi _ tepe aq _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh _ ii gu sim akanga _ .
aghnaghaghhagh _ nekeve luni _ sagnegh gneng _ tugu tete luni _ tamaaken _ tepagh meng _ imigh lukek _ sagnegh gni _ sughu ke aq _ tunqugh ma kanga _ .
qamagte yamigu _ tunqugh nghmeng _ enraq _ siklagh meng _ tungsigh ma lghii _ .
tuune yatni _ ug w at ang anun _ aglagh luni _ mingle _ siklagh yagh kete ni _ kii _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh _ tangegh iqe aq _ peksigaghte ma kanga _ .
itagnatun _ sagnegh k _ tugu lukek _ imigh aqe lukek _ tamaaken _ tangighkagh meng _ .
sughu ke aq _ uyegte ma kanga _ .
qamagte yamigu _ mumegh _ tugu luku _ aghnaghaghhagh m _ mingle _ kenuqagh yagh kete ni _ megh _ meghraag kegte pigte lghii _ maaqe ma lghii _ mingle aneng _ .
meghute meng _ tugu tete luni _ megh si l aam akanga _ tamaghhagh an _ sughu ke aq _ .
taagken _ kenlanga _ aghnaghaghhagh _ ugpeq s al ii taa t _ .
V u v all an egh meg g ni _ aqfa aqe kangat _ nuna lgu ta ita _ .
qamagte uq _ .
qilughwaagh neng _ wayagh te lghiik
ayumigh m _ ungipagh aa _ puughhute m _ apegh llegh a
ungipagh aq _ , _ anipaghllag _ nalug ma kestagh ma luku _ qilughwaagh ghllag ni _ naken _ meteghllug _ tagi ma lghii _ .
kaate luni _ M e tegh ll ug w em _ aapte ma kanga _ ,
â _ A n ip aa y _ , _ sa aqe ziin _ tawani _ ?
awite te n _ ne ke nghite aten _ , _ whanga _ ne ke anka _ . _ â
anipa m _ pi ma kanga _ ,
â _ whanga _ ne ke anka _ .
iqlengiqe uten _ ne ke nghite aten _ .
whanga _ ne ke anka _ , _ awite te n _ iqite te n _ taagken _ . _ â
taagken _ pi ma kanga _ M e tegh ll ug w em _ ,
â _ entami _ tuqlugh qagh ki _ qilughwaagh t _ taakut _ , _ angegh kangaten _ taawa _ ne ke lleqe aaten _ . _ â
anipa _ qalghigh yagh uq _ , _ naagu _ sa meng _ pi aghte nghite ut _ .
M e tegh ll ug w em _ pi ma kanga _ ,
â _ whanga qun _ nagate aghte nga _ tuqlugh qagh langi _ . _ â
qalghigh yalghiimi _ meteghllug qrug _ ,
â _ Q gh waagh w q _ , _ q gh waagh w q _ , _ q gh waagh w q _ ! _ â
ii _ , _ akiingqwaghte aghagh u i _ .
â _ qayugham _ angegh kangatnga _ esghaghhu _ , _ awite te n _ ne ke nghite aten _ . _ â
anipa _ tenge ghrug ma lghii _ ima _ .
U q it aq es tagh ng aan _ aga _ tenge ste luku _ , _ meteghllug qrug _ nalug ma lghii _ taaggun _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh _ metngegh tke aq _ Agh si g all gh aan un
ayumigh m _ ungipagh aa _ ungazigh meng
yuug _ kiyaghte ma lghii _ nuliigh leg _ avaqutagh lgu ma lghii _ maalghug gneng _ .
ataasigh _ panig a _ , _ ataasigh _ ighnegh a _ , _ tamaghhagh egmek _ mekestaagh staghhiinagh k _ .
yuug _ taana _ unange yu pigte lghii _ , _ unange aqe lghii _ neghsagh meng _ , _ maklag meng _ , _ ayvegh meng _ .
nulighh an _ neghsagh t _ unangkagh i _ afta aqe kangi _ mengteghagh mini _ .
enkaam _ quunpeng _ nutaghagh meng _ neqe meng _ neq e kum aaq elghii t _ .
ilangani _ naghaagh ma lukek _ taghnughhagh k _ mengteghagh m _ uughqa ni _ esghagh ma kangat _ angyagh _ igleghte lghii _ megh mi _ ataasigh meng _ yug ke lghii _ .
legreliqe tke ma kangat _ taghnughhagh k _ kina u ta a _ tagi lghii _ .
aghnaghaghhagh _ nuyekligh u ma lghii _ uyughagh mineng _ , _ tamaaken _ naa minun _ apegh ma kanga _ sivuke luku _ ,
â _ U pag ugh naq agh put _ angyagh _ uukna _ nallukekagh ut _ . _ â
angegh ma kangi _ naa ita _ .
aqfaasnaq _ taghnughhagh k _ esnagh mun _ pi ma lghiik _ .
yuug _ kaate ma lghii _ esnagh mun _ taawanginaq _ uugte gpenani _ qute mun _ .
nayag an _ uyughagh ni _ tugu ma kanga _ talligh akun _ .
Yug w em _ aghnagh aq _ aapte ma kanga _ angyagh meng _ ,
â _ uyughagh n _ tagivagh nayagh nghite zigu _ tugumiiqe sqellug qu _ ? _ â
aghnaghagh m _ pi ma kanga _ ,
â _ entaqun _ qiya lleqe uq _ . _ â
Yug w em _ pi ma kanga _ ,
â _ qiya kan _ tuune lleqe aqa _ .
aghnaghagh m _ tuune a _ uyughagh ghhagh ni _ iiggagh nun _ yug w em _ .
Yug w em _ qaake luku _ angyagh minun _ taghnughhagh _ kete ma lghii _ kilgaa nun _ megh mun _ .
igleghte ma lghiit _ si q in ghem _ tevigh vig anun _ .
aghnaghaghhagh _ qiya magh mi _ naa minun _ aglagh ma lghii _ .
ungipaate ma kanga _ sa mun _ yug mun _ tugu ma ni luku _ uyughagh ghhagh ni _ .
naange aat _ qiya ma lghii _ ighnegh minun _ saama _ alinge ma lghii _ ug w im in eng _ .
tagi ma lghii _ ug w i nga _ mughu ta neng _ tusigate luni _ , _ uglagh u pigte luku _ unange ma lghii _ neghsagh meng _ .
itegh luni _ aapte ma kangi _ ,
â _ naagu _ ighnegh ka _ ? _ â
nulighh an _ akite ma kanga _ ,
â _ Yug w em _ tagikagh m _ angyagh kun _ tugu ma a _ ighnegh ut _ , _ enkaam _ aghulaqe te ma a _ .
alangghu nagh ghhalek _ whangkuta _ !
ellnga n _ aghulaqe te ma a _ whangkuta _ ighnegh ut _ agh si g all gh an _ tu ng ang anun _ . _ â
Yug w em _ kaat ute ma kagh nge a _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ nallunagh llegh anun _ esnagh m _ .
mamleg pigte ma lghii _ .
Yug w em _ unite ma kanga _ aghulaqe ma lghii _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ ava u na an _ neqe u na an _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh _ al ngun ag an _ igleghte ma lghii _ mamleg mi _ .
qula ani _ qalghigh magh meng _ tengaa ma lghiit _ turiig t _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh _ qiya ma lghii _ qalghigh llegh itneng _ nagaqugh te luni _ alingyug ma lghii _ ellng in aghh agh mi _ mamleg mi _ .
negh ka nge i te ma lghii _ igatagh luni _ aligh ni _ nguug ragh luku _ lliigh ma kanga _ .
meghnugh ghllag yami _ asivaqun _ qavaa ma lghii _ temngi _ tamaani _ .
taghtugh yami _ igleghte laatagh ma lghii _ .
igleghte ma luku _ tafsi a _ ileme ma lghii _ .
tafsi a _ qughagh ghllag ma lghii _ qinuyugte ma kanga _ mekelghiigh ghhagh m _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh m _ nalluke ma kanga _ naten _ naallghute lleghqagh a _ enkaam _ esghagh ma lghii _ sivutmute _ .
esghagh ma kanga _ sivu mini _ m ek el eng es t aghh aq _ n igh u wh aq _ ak am k eg t alghii _ ighaleqetaaghte yug nitagh lghii _ .
enkaam _ aglagh ma lghii _ tazingavek _ n igh u wh agh mun _ .
igleghte yalghiimi _ wata _ sivutmute _ n igh u ug sim ang in aam akanga _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh m _ esghagh ma kanga _ tu r iig g aq _ .
T u r iig g aam _ pi ma kanga _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ ,
â _ tugu gu _ whanga _ amiiragh ka _ . _ â
enkaam _ turiig m _ qesug ma kanga _ yaqugh mineng _ taake lghii _ silug _ .
tuune ma kanga _ mekelghiigh ghhagh mun _ pi magh an _ ,
â _ qavagh naqe negh gpeni _ , _ qavagh aqe i _ qagi t _ kelu kaghagh itni _ .
unaangu luku _ taghtugh aqe gkuvek _ esghagh aqe gkufki _ naayghagh t _ aglagh aqe i _ tazingavek _ .
Q ay g eq l it ku v ek _ naayghagh neng _ esghagh lleqe aten _ asi itni _ mengteghagh t _ .
ukig ggaaten _ enkaam _ kaate yaghtugh ngestagh luki _ aghuliigh ghhaaten _ . _ â
mekelghiigh ghhagh _ igleghte ma lghii _ tugumiiqe luku _ turiig m _ si l ug wa _ .
aghneq _ qamagte yan _ qavaa ma lghii _ saaghw itni _ qagi t _ turiig m _ pi llgh a tun _ .
unaangu luku _ taghtugh yami _ igleghte laatagh ma lghii _ .
igleghte ghngaaghmi _ esghagh ma kangi _ naayghagh t _ .
taku ma kangi _ kaate luki _ maye ii ma lghii _ qule mun _ .
qaygeghte luni _ llaaghanam _ esghagh ma kangi _ mengteghagh lghute _ naayghagh m _ awatangani _ .
ukig ma lghii _ kaate yaghtugh ngestagh luni _ mengteghagh nun _ aghuliigh ma lghii _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh _ iknaqughi ghllag ma lghii _ .
turiig m _ iknaqughi te ma kanga _ .
ne mi _ tawani _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ pinitun _ negh e simak angat _ .
ne m _ yug w i _ qerngughte ma lghiit _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ nanghiigh na luku _ .
aglagh ma lghiit _ pennagh nun _ .
asi akun _ pennagh m _ llilaghtugh ma kangat _ uglagh pigte lghii _ savig _ .
pi ma kangat _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ nal ug u tes qell uki _ awatghute luki _ savig t _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh _ sivulii luni _ nalugute ma lghii _ qamagte luki _ savig t _ qayetghute ma kangi _ .
ila i llu _ nalugute ma lghiit _ , _ savig tgun _ tuute ma lghiit _ , _ uglagh llegh a _ tuquma lghii _ .
aglagh ma lghii _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ mengteghagh mun _ .
taagken _ ungipaate ma kangi _ mengteghagh mii it _ , _ ila i _ yug w it a _ q et g egh agh luteng _ savig kun _ tuquma ni luki _ .
upugh ma lghiit _ iknaqe lghii meng _ mekelghiigh meng _ .
kayagte ma kangat _ aghulaqe sqellug qu _ .
ilangani _ aghnegh m _ aghulaqe ma lghii _ .
mayugh luni _ n ay y gh amun _ esghagh ma kanga _ ne ni _ .
uteghnigh ma lghii _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ iknaqughi ghllag luni _ .
aqupilqe i llegh m _ A k il egh tu s aa
puughhute m _ ungipagh aa
ungipaghagh ni _ imani _ , _ y u wh agh nguq _ taana _ un ang u pig ll uku _ es n igh q w at aam alghii _ .
sigugnegh igh ghllag luni _ uusqagh pigte luku _ esnagh _ ayuqe uq _ .
tawaten _ yuug _ igleghte ma luku _ nak en nguq _ qikmigh ghhagh _ mulaagh qu aqe uq _ .
mulu luni _ q al ghi l q waagh agh aq elghii _ llangaqa _ aq n igh q w aal uni _ .
taawa _ taw a tes t aghh in aq _ naqam _ y u wh aam _ n aan tu l nga _ esghagh gpenaan _ .
tawaten _ igleghte ghngaaghmi _ qenwat _ esghagh aa _ sigugnegh m _ esne akun _ pakineg kau te lghii _ .
sivuligh t _ itegagh ghhagh u i ni _ aliigh qagh lghiit _ nuqnegh naqe mikun _ taaggun _ ima _ aga _ este aghagh uq _ .
sama _ tekite luni _ qalghigh ghllag uq _ .
sama _ m ul aq um al uku _ tawavek _ pakineg qagh vig anun _ upleg luku _ up-tu aqe a _ .
Y at aagh q eng ng waagh luni _ whaa _ nalugute ghesnagh te _ akuqagh ma kanga _ , _ qaake a _ .
qikmigh ghhagh _ qaake yatni _ quy am _ ighwaaghtuute ma lghii _ .
taagken _ yug w em _ ighu kek _ qikmigh ghhagh m _ paagh ma kek _ inglugtun _ .
paagh lukek _ taagken _ aga _ sivungagh ni _ pangaleg uq _ .
maligte nghite yatni _ uteghte luni _ paagh laatagh aa _ , _ naqam _ aga _ pangaleg aqe luni _ .
tawatestaghhiinaq _ qikmigh ghhagh _ aneghte uq _ .
qenwat _ elpeg yug luni _ y u wh aam _ malighqagh aa _ qikmigh ghhagh m _ unite luku _ ayuqe kanga _ .
qikmigh ghhagh m _ uteghte vike luku _ paagh aqe luku _ pangaleg aqe lghii _ .
qenwat _ y u wh aq _ s uk aagh t aa _ .
aawallu _ maateqwaaqun _ y u wh aam _ unite yagute a _ qikmigh ghhagh _ .
qikmigh ghhagh m _ kaate luku _ quy aal aat agh tuq _ ighwaaghtuute laatagh uq _ .
taawa _ y u wh aq _ sukaghi ma lghii _ maateghhaq _ qikmigh ghhagh m _ ak il egh tu m akanga _ s uk agh i meng _ .
tefaay _ al iin gh akun _ !
kevgaaslug _ neghnavregagh
V i r i _ V _ .
kiyaghte ma lghii _ ataasigh _ yuug _ ellng in aq el t aghh aq _ .
nuna mi _ tu ng ang ani _ ava ite ngughk _ nuna lgu ta ite ngughk _ .
unangniigh llegh ke kanga _ taawanginaq _ si k ig g iin agh meng _ .
talwa llu _ sikig meng _ neq ek elghii _ .
naqam _ quunpeng _ pi y aan agh aaq elghii _ .
gaagh niigh nghmeng _ taaqe nghmini _ negh luni _ , _ taaqe nghmini _ ingliigh luni _ qavagh aqe lghii _ .
unaami _ piyaa aqe lghii _ .
unange luni _ uteghnigh nghmini _ unakegkagh ni _ sikig t _ afta aqe luki _ .
aymaake i _ gaagh aqe kangi _ .
amiiragh i _ kinegh ngllagh aqe kangi _ ingleghqagh u luki _ naliini _ tanpeghqagh u luki _ .
ilangani _ maaten _ unaangu luku _ taghtugh yami _ sumeghtaghagh ma lghii _ sivuke luni _ esnighqwagh na luni _ .
taagken _ aane luni _ esnagh m _ tu ng ang anun _ aghulaqe ma lghii _ .
esnagh mun _ kaate luni _ igleghte ma luni _ esghagh ma kanga _ esnagh mi _ unguva lghii _ tepe nghhagh _ neghnavregagh ghhagh _ .
taana _ neghnavregagh ghhagh _ unguva an _ tugu luku _ mengteghagh minun _ aglagh te ma kanga _ .
taglagh luni _ kangighagh ani _ mengteghagh m _ petugtu aq _ amigh _ up- yu aatagh a _ kepe luku _ uk ig sim akanga _ .
ukigllug qu _ i tem sim akanga _ .
I tem ll uku _ neghnavregagh ghhagh _ unguva an _ qepute ma kanga _ .
qepute luku _ almesigh itun _ petug ma kanga _ kangighagh kun _ .
piyaa vig mi _ unange laatagh ma lghii _ sikig meng _ .
sikigtagh ni _ akmag iigh luku _ uteghnigh ma lghii _ mengteghagh minun _ .
kaate luni _ unakegkagh ni _ sikig _ lli ma kanga _ egllu m _ saaghw akun _ .
lli luku _ akite kun _ aqume ma lghii _ .
aqume luni _ neghnavregagh _ pi ma kanga _ ,
â _ enta _ sa aqe ziin _ , _ pi s tem ni _ unangkagh ka _ afta gu _ ! _ â
unangkagh a _ sikig _ um yug w am in eng _ qayuutagh mun _ uugte luni _ ellmi neng _ amiiragh igh ma lghii _ .
amiiragh ii nghmeng _ taaqe luni _ ellmi neng _ llaag t _ uglafqe te ma lghiit _ , _ ighneghagh igh ma lghii llu _ .
U g l af q un egh meng _ taaqe yan _ yuug _ pi laatagh ma lghii _ ,
â _ sa aqe ziin _ pi s tem ni _ gaagh te nga _ ! _ â
Yug w em _ esgh ap ag yaq min igu _ sikig m _ negh kangi _ ugkellikagh i _ qulmesiite mun _ kanaghte uute ma lghiit _ ell meg g neng _ .
egllu m _ qula akun _ qulmesiite _ ellmi neng _ agaghte ma lghii _ .
llaaghanwha _ yuug _ ugke t _ ugute yata _ negh ma lghii _ .
negh nghmeng _ taaqe luni _ pi laatagh ma lghii _ ,
â _ sa aqe ziin _ pi s tem ni _ ingliigh te nga _ !
ingaghte naqe unga _ ! _ â
yuug _ aane ma lghii _ esla mun _ , _ mulu gpenani _ itegh ma lghii _ .
itegh yalghiimi _ ungavig _ ellmi neng _ apeghiighsagh ma lghii _ .
itegh luni _ qavaa ma lghii _ .
unaami _ taghtugh yami _ piyaa laatagh ma lghii _ .
I i w en nguq _ qemi meng _ teve aqe uq _ meteghllug _ esghagh ma kanga _ .
esghagh luku _ yug w em _ pi ma kanga _ ,
â _ uuk _ aqelqagh _ !
natmun _ igleghte aqe ziin _ ? _ â
M e tegh ll ug w em _ pi ma kanga _ ,
â _ temngi _ maani _ igleghte aqe unga _ . _ â
Yug w em _ pi laatagh ma kanga _ ,
â _ uuk _ weni _ whanga _ aqelqagh ke laken _ , _ atghagh ltung _ , _ negh yaghtugh ltung _ ! _ â
taagken _ yug w em _ aqelqagh ni _ meteghllug _ mengteghagh minun _ itghute ma kanga _ .
itegh lutek _ yug w em _ upugha te ma kanga _ aqelqagh ni _ meteghllug _ .
meteghllug _ utaqa i ma lghii _ aqume luni _ sikig m _ amiiragh akun _ .
yuug _ pi ma lghii _ ,
â _ sa aqe ziin _ pi s tem ni _ , _ aqelqagh _ gaagh te gu _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ sikig m _ negh kangi _ ell meg g neng _ ketfagh luteng _ ugkelli aqe lghiit _ .
ugkelli luteng _ ell meg g neng _ qulmesiite mun _ itegh luteng _ agaghte ma lghiit _ egllu m _ qula akun _ .
meteghllug _ aqume luni _ qiivaqu aqe lghii _ uzimun _ .
mengteghagh m _ ilu ani _ aghtugh aqe lghii _ esgh an negh meng _ .
kitum _ yuug _ apeghiighsagh te aqe agu _ .
negh nghmeng _ taaqe lutek _ itegh ma lghiik _ ungavig mun _ .
qavagh lutek _ unaami _ taghtugh lutek _ , _ negh lutek _ aghulaqe ma lghiik _ .
Yug w em _ meteghllug _ pi ma kanga _ ,
â _ whanga _ piyaa naqe unga _ , _ elpek _ navek _ pi naqe ziin _ ? _ â
M e tegh ll ug w em _ akite ma kanga _ ,
â _ whanga _ aki yan _ tu ng ang anun _ ivagh i aqe unga _ ne meng _ . _ â
taagken _ pellegh utu te ma lghiik _ .
yuug _ aygugh mun _ aghulaqe ma lghii _ .
meteghllug _ aki yan _ tu ng ang anun _ aghulaqe ma lghii _ .
meteghllug _ pengughqagh meng _ talughte luni _ , _ yuug _ iigh te luku _ esghapag ma kanga _ , _ talughte neghsigh ma kanga _ .
talughte yan _ qemi meng _ meteghllug _ yataaghqe ma lghii _ yug w em _ mengteghagh anun _ .
kaate luni _ mengteghagh mun _ itegh luni _ aqume ma lghii _ .
yug tun _ ellnga llu _ pi ma lghii _ ,
â _ enta _ pi s tem ni _ gaagh te nga _ ! _ â
neghnavregagh m _ avelghaqiinagh ma kanga _ iwernga _ wata qun _ .
qenwat _ aghtugh luni _ meteghllug _ qefliqe ma lghii _ .
uzimun _ mengteghagh _ ivagh i vike ma kanga _ .
sunanguq _ taana _ esghagh kanga _ kangighagh mi _ petug luni _ amigh _ ii m w aq aq _ .
M e tegh ll ug w em _ ketfagh luku _ i tem sim akanga _ .
S aag saq min igu _ esghagh ma kanga _ neghnavregagh ghhagh _ unguva lghii _ .
meteghllug _ sumeghtaghagh ma lghii _ ,
â _ U n ang w aaq s eng alghii _ yug w em _ kayute anga _ . _ â
M e tegh ll ug w em _ neghnavregagh _ qesugragh luku _ amigh mun _ imeg te ma kanga _ .
ne akun _ petug luku _ aane luni _ aghulaqe ma lghii _ .
yuug _ unange luni _ uteghnigh ma lghii _ .
kaate luni _ unangkagh ni _ egllu m _ saaghw akun _ lli luku _ pi ma lghii _ ,
â _ sa aqe ziin _ pi s tem ni _ , _ gaagh te nga _ ! _ â
avelghaqiinagh ma kanga _ .
alla _ pi laatagh aa _ .
aghtugh ma kanga _ .
mataawi tete yamigu _ amigh _ ketfagh luku _ s aag saq min igu _ imeg tekagh ni _ esghagh ma kanga _ qesugragh luni _ .
taagken _ almesigh liite laatagh ma kanga _ kiyaghnegh a _ .
ellmi neng _ apeghiighsagh luni _ lliigh laatagh ma lghii _ .
A l iin gh akun _ amsanagh akun _ .
tefaay _ !
T ung yuuk _ , _ I i w ek _ , _ maaqellegh k _ sivuqagh mi
A ku l k i m _ apegh llegh a
maaqnegh ughte nghaani _ tu ng y ugh aqaa _ .
quunpeng _ tanqigh _ naqenqaghqe nghaani _ tu ng y u pag llag aqaa _ .
tawani llu _ maaqellegh k _ iknaqe pigte aqe uk _ .
A siv agh atagh aam _ nalighmeng _ qu ung v aam _ tu ng y u pag tes taq aa _ .
kiyang _ six _ h o u r s - mi _ maaqellegh k _ aghvightagh ke ak _ .
I ke v r egh aagh h negh ani _ iiw aqe a _ .
tepe aghte nagh uq _ esnighqwagh lghii ni _ ii w mun _ ayuqe luku _ .
tepe aq _ iigh h w taq aa _ tu ng y un gh ani _ .
I i w mi _ iqanengenaaghte nagh a qaa _ qalmesaghtu llegh ani _ esne mi _ .
kayute nagh aqe uq _ iqanengenaagh meng _ nayigh itni _ t aan Ê¼ g ani _ qalmesagh ni _ .
aywaayage m _ iiwpag ste aqe a _ .
I ip agh ll an gh ani _ ell m aa r al q in aan aq aq uq _ .
S ul pi k
T uu g _ â _ ghi m _ apegh llegh a
M ek elghii gh h agh nguq _ taana _ S ul pi k _ , _ aange ghllag nghite ngughk _ , _ q ug w in t ar k ag g aq _ , _ ang l in as u wh aq _ elngaatall _ .
I g g aa r k it aagh aq elghii _ ilangani _ piyug nghmini _ .
elngaatall _ iye kek _ n ang llag r ak gu utaq elghii k _ ilangani _ .
nasaperaghpag qaghte luni _ ayuqe lghii _ army _ c ap - meng _ .
atugh kek _ j a c ke t- egh llag ek _ , _ nag tuq agh p al g ek _ , _ aligh kek _ taake lghiik _ ellnga ni _ .
