atuqe aqe lghii llu _ qu ll ig llag eg neng _ segesqugh kek _ ilaagh ghllagkagh gneng _ , _ kameraagh ghllag gneng llu _ singigh a _ singigh gpenateng _ .
elngaatall _ legra aqe lghii _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ sa meng _ esghaghkagh mineng _ .
A m y ugh w aa tuq aq _ am y ugh waagh usi q aqegk anga _ uglagh lghii _ sa u a _ esghaghkagh ni _ ilakumtaagh minun _ .
quunpeng _ teghigniqe u lghii _ nenglagh aqe lghii _ .
nenglagh kaqe kangi _ sa u aat _ alngunak _ sumeghtaghagh tkekagh ni _ .
sumegh ke igate kanga _ talwa _ esla m _ all ang ugh h r ak eg tu l nga _ ne meng _ uyavagh nun _ piyutagh u nghmini _ .
A m y ugh waagh ng aagh mi _ pinitun _ pingwaagh ke lghii _ .
ilakumtaagh an _ piyuke aqe kangat _ ila u luku _ qayughllak _ um yug w aq eg t aq _ .
sa lleghqagh meng _ s u um q aa ll at an egh min i _ n ul q av iigh sim aaq elghii _ , _ aghul iil k iq nan im aaq elghii _ .
kiyang _ nenglaghnagh luku _ sa u a _ esgh am aaq egk anga _ .
enkaam _ quunpeng _ sa meng _ ila minun _ neng lagh t i llegh q ameng _ um yug w am i kun _ sumeghtaghagh ma aqe lghii _ .
kaagkagh _ qell u ug ta _ .
kaagkagh t _ qell u ug t aat an egh meg g ni _ q es ug yug w em _ .
â _ atugh lghiit _ qesug nagh pigte ut _ aghula te ghllag t _ repall _ kaagkagh ka _ qell u ug t aa _ .
qenwat _ aghula unga _ , _ â _ aghnaghagh m _ ilakumtaagh ni _ ungipaate ma kangi _ .
S A N G U L L U U K _ qemi mi
S iv uq aghh m iit lu _ , _ sivungagh mii t llu _ apeghtughiste ita _ ulimaagh at
S ul pi k _ taana _ qemi mun _ mayugh kusiigh ghngaaghmi _ sa meng _ allakaayagh gmeng _ esghaate igate ngughk _ .
alla _ maaten _ mayugh luni _ , _ agigte luni _ , _ yug s ugh ay alghii mi _ sa u a _ allake ma kanga _ esghagh igate kete ni _ tes p am an ll uku _ , _ elngaatall _ iye kek _ n ang llag r ak g uu sim alghii k _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh m _ sa u a _ taana _ esghagh luku _ elngaatall _ egtugte pagte ma lghii _ .
Taw at en nguq _ egtugte pagte te kete luku _ aragh ma lghii _ ,
â _ K a- a- a y _ ! _ â
E s ghagh yaq min ig u nguq _ melqugh leg ghllag _ , _ angqaperug kegte aq _ , _ uka llu nguq _ taku kestagh aqe a _ .
â _ kaay _ , _ sa naqe zinga ngam _ ? _ â _ pi ma lghii _ S ul pi k _ .
E s gh an q eg si t k es aq min ig u nguq _ iye ghllag kek _ , _ ggute ghrugllag i llu _ .
A g it aghq egh llag luni _ ellng agh ll ug w in aan un _ ayuqe uq _ .
nanugh m _ m el q w a tun _ melqugh leg ghllag _ , _ ayvegh m _ tugu ta atun _ tulughyag ghllag kek _ , _ iye ghrugllag kek _ legan _ kilgaa ni _ miluqutagh ke kek _ .
N un m aa s qugh h aq _ uka _ taku kestagh aa _ .
alingruugh ghllag luni _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ qimag na luni _ sumeghtaghagh ma lghii _ , _ enraq _ pi yalghiimi _ al ing r uu pag llag em _ ighu kek _ kayaali ste qugh u aghagh ma lghiik _ .
iitek nguq _ talligh gni _ aghul a sim aag ken ka _ pi yagh uq _ ,
â _ H u y _ ! _ H u y _ ! _ â
alike aghte nghite a nguq _ .
taagken _ s l ing s h o t- eg ni _ suumqagh u te ma kek _ .
nusug lukek _ uyghag ligh lukek _ qiinghute luku _ guute naqe yagh aa _ , _ guutepagningite uq _ , _ talligh kek _ ung el eg tegh llag em _ .
En r agh nguq _ s l ing - eng an _ r u b b er - ke k _ agh y u m _ kepe kaqe ma lghiik _ .
â _ A - a y _ ! _ â _ , _ pi uq _ S ul pi k _ .
Taw ate tegh ng aag ken ka _ inglu inagh u ghngaan _ qiinghute luku _ guusagh aa _ , _ manu ngiighhagh akun _ uyghag a _ tekite uq _ .
sumeghtaghagh uq _ sa lleghqagh meng _ .
â _ sa meng _ milugh qaghte lakun _ ! _ â
tamaavek _ esghaquaghaghte yalghiimi _ uyghag nguq _ whaa _ saaghw ani _ , _ akuqagh aa _ tawavek _ milugh na luku _ .
uqliite luku _ , _ nekefqaghte magh mi _ miluute kete luku _ aragh ma lghii _ , _ â _ A a- aa _ ! _ â
aragh te lghiit _ nag as aq min ik i _ llangaqa nguq _ igaghvig mi _ ilakumtaagh i _ ,
â _ A q n igh n naq agh pe ku ut _ alla _ m il ugh pen aam t aa _ ! _ â
pi yalghiimi _ mekelghiigh ghhagh t _ taakut _ pi nga yu t _ igaghyagh lgute i _ amiiragh ghllag m _ asi aneng _ aga _ qimagugh te ma lghiit _ .
S ul pig em _ malighqagh luki _ kaate yamiki _ qeleqetaaghtagh ma kangi _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh t _ alinge ma lghiit _ qayughllak _ iknaqe lghii _ ellngit neng _ , _ wata _ s u w ag ul uni _ .
A ke qu ugh taa t _ seal- i qugh naqe ni luku _ , _ savig teng _ , _ uunghagh teng _ , _ qamiye teng _ tuune aqe ni luki _ sa u a _ ipa _ akequsagh keqaghte litgu _ .
wetku _ ak equ ugh teng ng waagh y at ni _ q el eq e tan egh meng _ taaqe ai _ .
taagken _ ag l am alghiit _ .
kaate luteng _ akequsagh teng _ tagite uute ma kangit _ S ul pig mun _ .
aane te kete luku _ S ul pig en ku neng _ ataasigh _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ pi ma lghii _ ,
â _ allameng llu _ am y ugh waagh n aanghi tagh put _ .
qakimallu _ s u f l ug w al w aaq l i _ ! _ â
iye _ inglupigagh
angyagh na mi _ nalighmeng _ sa meng _ egtug nagh mi _ ug m es t aagh h al uku _ qavagh lghii ni _ .
Yug w et _ pi aqe ut _ ,
â _ T eng _ â _ gh un aag uq _ , _ iye _ inglupigagh _ un ug mi _ qavagh naqe ut _ . _ â
S U L P I G E M _ pilaataqu llegh a
W am iy aam _ apegh llegh a
â _ S ul pii k _ !
S ul - P I I K _ ! _ â
S ul pig em _ naa an _ tuq l um akanga _ ,
â _ S ul pi k _ , _ tagi aghten _ , _ tagi ragkiigh qagh a _ ! _ â
S ul pig nguq _ igleghte te kete luku _ H o n d a- meg teg gun _ pi ma lghii _ ,
â _ seghleghhalek _ entaqun _ whaa _ aghyuugh naqe aatnga _ . _ â
legan _ naa an _ i negh qugh waagh waagh aa _ honda-k _ m et ng egh u te f q aa y ek _ pi sqellug kek _ .
ineghtekau ghngaaghmi _ n uq en negh m e nguq _ aghtugh uq _ , _ metngegh yug ghllag _ , _ esnighqwagh yug ghllag _ qenwat _ aghulaqe ma lghii _ .
naqamllu _ esnighqwagh llegh a nguq _ una _ agh y uu ll ngun ani _ aghqe aghtekagh _ .
esnighqwagh vigkagh minun _ kaate luni _ , _ qagughrug kun _ H o n d a- g ni _ aghula i aghte lukek _ , _ ategh luni _ piyug meng _ esnagh mun _ at gh aam al gh i _ .
taakwani nguq _ tepagh meng _ saghna yalghiimi _ .
qagi igh ghllag nguq _ , _ saveg ii aghte luni _ megh _ un _ â _ g a _ , _ imani nguq _ qagitu uq _ .
S ul pi k _ saghna pigte ghngaaghmi _ sivugte yalghiimi _ neghsagh _ qagi m _ ayeme te aqe a _ , _ repall _ n ang llag pag tuq _ .
quya pigte luni _ nalla anun _ aglagh aghte luni _ nengulgha sag u _ akuqagh luku _ kelevagh ma kanga _ .
iiwenllu _ k el ev aghq agh aqaa _ nengulgha llegh neng _ sivugte yalghiimi _ ila a _ neghsagh m _ kana _ ayeme te laatagh aa _ .
legan _ taana _ peghhe qagh luku _ ila a llu _ teskana _ takuaghaghte luku _ nengulgha sag u _ akuqagh aa _ .
imange i nguq _ aangwaagh uq _ .
P eg n ek an i q _ s ayug w aa _ .
alla _ qingsig qagh yalghiimi _ qagi nun _ , _ paninang _ pi nga yu a _ ayeme te laatagh aa _ .
sumeghtaghagh ma lghii _ ,
â _ wiin _ allameng _ qingsig naqe nghite unga _ ! _ â
elngaatall _ quya uq _ .
â _ taawa _ aghyuugh naqe nghite aatnga _ honda-k _ metngeghute kegka _ . _ â
salin _ kay aal nguq _ enraq _ nuna _ kum l al uni _ qiighnagh ghllag _ enkaam _ qam ull g in n aq _ .
qiighnite nghmini _ nuna mun _ gginagh a _ mateg qaghte vzigh aqe lghii _ .
iwernga _ neng l eng el tagh aq elghii _ quy am _ neghsagh meng _ .
taagken _ pegnem _ ataasigh _ kaat ute qaghte luku _ H o n d a- mi _ uvite anun _ ila i llu _ aqfa i _ .
elngaatall _ piyaqli aqe aq _ qayughllak _ mekestaaghhaa lghii _ .
Q iigh n it agh am i kun _ taaggun _ qamagte qaghte luki _ pegnem _ kaat ute te luki _ H o n d a- g min un _ meghnaali ma lghii _ .
S um egh tagh am alghii _ ,
â _ seghleghhalek _ n at en ng am _ q aku gh naq si ng i _ , _ aglagh te naqe zingi _ . _ â
aghliigh yug yagh luni _ sumeghtaghagh uq _ ,
â _ iitek llu _ uteghpagtagh lleqe unga _ , _ ataasigh t _ k a tu ll uki _ ila i _ aqfa aqe luki _ pi lleqe anka _ . _ â
meghnaali yami _ ataasigh _ qaake naqutke ma kanga _ H o n d a- min un _ .
tugu luku _ kevegsigh u aghagh a _ ima _ peghhe qaghaqe a _ qayughllak _ uqigtu ghllag _ .
ila i llu _ nan ghi q w agh sim ay aq angi _ mataawi te ma kangi _ .
S ul pi k _ yug s ugh ay alghii mi _ , _ h ii k _ , _ maalghug _ es n igh q w ak _ esnevagh aqe uk _ .
ukapighqaagh yayek _ tagsigh ma kek _ .
arekull _ nulighh ghqu te uk _ elkek llu _ es n igh q w ak _ .
uka _ tagi qrugtugh ngugh _ y u wh aq _ .
Y u wh aam _ kaate luku _ upugh ma lghii _ ,
â _ kii _ , _ un ang s am aten _ ! _ â
S ul pi k _ quya pigte lghii _ , _ pi ma lghii _ ,
â _ T ep u ghii _ taaggun _ elngaatall _ uygute luteng _ ! _ tea- te te _ â _ g avek _ esghagh negh mni _ aku r agh aq an ka _ ayeme te lghiit _ , _ kelevagh aqe anka _ legan _ . _ â
taagken _ yug w em _ pi ma kanga _ ,
â _ una _ am s ak en gh at _ qaake naqe aqa _ H o n d a- g pen un _ qayughllak _ honda-gken _ me ke ta ghhagh k _ . _ â
iwernga nguq _ tun u teg ken kun _ qaake luku _ asighte te vyigh aa _ .
taagken _ pi ma kanga _ yug w em _ ,
â _ maalghug _ taake uk _ qaake lleqe agka _ honda-gka _ aange uk _ , _ saama _ iknaqe uk _ . _ â
Yug w em _ quy aku llu _ aga _ iglegh q aat ng in am agh meng _ .
angayuqagh an _ S ul pig em _ p eng _ â _ gun- ii te aat _ av iit ng w aal ghii _ S ul pi k _ .
liigike kangat _ metngeqagh u lghii _ H o n d a- g ne kun _ .
S ul pig em _ naa an _ ug w in i _ pi ma kanga _ ,
â _ naagu _ S ul pi k _ , _ navek _ pi a _ , _ p eng en ghi si gu u _ ?
ivagh yaghtugh naqe gu _ ! _ â
ata a _ pi ma lghii _ ,
â _ navek _ m ek elghii q r u wh aq _ aghulaqe laatagh a _ !
whaa _ legan _ agh y uugh m ig t aan aq ng w aaq a _ ! _ â
ata a _ y at aagh qell uni _ ila gkenkun _ H o n d a- m _ aghulaqe uq _ .
iiwenllu _ igleghte lqinagh aqe uq _ uka _ key- nghhagh at _ , _ mamlegte yaghtugh lghii _ .
H o n d a- ng igh h aat _ taakwavek _ tume tgun _ s an iv aq un _ iglegh at _ , _ taakwavek _ qiive yalghiimi _ liisuqe a nguq _ S ul pi k _ uka _ H o n d a- ng iigh h aag ne kun _ tagi lghii _ .
taagavek _ qiive qaghte luni _ am ig im ak angi _ .
T ugh waagh yaq min ik i _ piyaqminiki _ , _ kii _ , _ neghsagh meng _ usi lug teng _ .
kaate luki _ aghuliigh uute ma lghiit _ .
S ul pig em _ ata a _ p uy gu ugh nguq _ ima _ agh y uugh m ig naq ngu yaq anga _ S ul pi k _ .
S ul pig em _ piighaghte ma kanga _ ata ni _ ,
â _ qivghu pigte unga _ elngaatall _ metngegh lghiinga llu _ H o n d a- k lu _ metngeghute kegka _ . _ â
ata an _ pi ma kanga _ ,
â _ aa-a _ , _ wiin _ aglagh kumta _ aleghqugh lleqe amken _ . _ â
wetku _ kaate luteng _ ne mun _ S ul pig em _ neng ll ug ut angi _ pi yalghiimeng _ taakut _ qamagte luki _ pi nga yu t _ neghsagh t _ S ul pig em _ mallu ke ai _ .
qamagte luteng _ quya te ut _ elngaatall _ .
pi nga yu a _ taana _ neghsagh m _ us iit il ghi mun _ tuune ma kangat _ , _ kayusigh i lghii _ qayughllak _ .
naange a _ elngaatall _ afta ma lghii _ .
afta nghmeng _ taaqe luni _ uyegte ma lghii _ awalightu ma lghii _ u v iq l im eg g nun _ , _ qu yagh llag em _ ang tal ang aneng _ .
taagken _ apeghiigh luteng _ , _ S ul pig em _ naange a _ neghsagh liigh ma lghii _ .
ugke t _ ugute neghsigh te kete luki _ angayuqagh gkenka _ aleghqugh ma kangat _ S ul pi k _ qaatke te nghite llegh aneng _ , _ metngegh llegh aneng _ , _ H o n d a- g neng _ metngeghute i llegh aneng _ .
ata an _ pi ma kanga _ ,
â _ S ul pi k _ !
qakimallu _ uqiigh te aqe i _ , _ naa v utaq l i ten _ , _ nalighmeng _ sa kun _ tenpe te aqe i _ .
iwernga _ aneghneghte uten _ mallu nge ughtagh u lghiiten _ . _ â
alaghrang _ naa an _ pi ma kanga _ ,
â _ aghulaqe naqe negh gpeni _ navek _ aap ut ng w aaq agh lu ten _ pi aqe i _ !
ungipaate aqe luta _ , _ en kaa ng am _ pengeg fqaamta _ pi aqe lta _ !
aapute aghte manginagh lukek _ honda-k _ atugh aqe i akek _ . _ â
taawa _ S ul pi k _ liite uq _ aapute yagute naqe uq _ .
akeqe ma kangi _ angayuqagh ni _ ,
â _ quunpeng _ neqamike aqe lleqe aqa _ n a pi yug ll agh ng aagh m a _ sivuke lunga _ aapute aqe lleqe unga _ .
whaken _ kenlanga _ elpetegnun _ aapute aqe lleqe unga _ . _ â
ata an _ pi ma kanga _ ,
â _ elngaatall _ aviite yaghqagh ghllag _ taawa _ all g egh sim aan _ .
taana llu _ ilate luku _ atuqe gkuvgu _ qaatke te ma llegh _ , _ pinighhalek _ elngaatall _ , _ quya te aqe lleqe ukut _ . _ â
siingvallagha
Q ug w ay un ghi te m _ , _ ef qugh y un ghi te m _ me t _ aan es qagh tam eng _ akuzi lghii ni _ .
mekelghiigh _ naa mi _ megh t ii s q es at ni _ naa ni _ pi a _ ,
â _ aa-a _ , _ pi lleqe unga _ ! _ â
ata an _ pi ma kanga _ ,
â _ siingvallagha igate ut _ , _ me n _ ayghigh lleqe uq _ . _ â
naayghagh _ taku ste na nigh ke aq
Q i r g eng aa w e te m _ apegh llegh a
S ul pig em _ nengyugh ghhagh n _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ kaay _ , _ megh iitagh ke ukut _ ! _ â
â _ meghtagh lleqe unga _ ! _ â _ kiimsigh ma kanga _ S ul pig em _ .
negh nghmeng _ taaqe luni _ taayughqe ma lghii _ meghtagh na luni _ .
aate ma kangi _ uqig allugh ghhagh k _ k am er aagh pag g aag n illu _ j a c ke t- tegh pag g aag n illu _ .
tespamavek _ kiiw gnun _ piyug meng _ meghtagh ma lghii _ .
aghneghmi _ tawani _ amsanaghllugllak _ , _ nguuyngaaghagh ghllag _ .
elngaatall _ ngu uy ng agh aat _ qinuyugte ma kangat _ S ul pi k _ .
malghugnegh neng _ qalta ligh luni _ kiiw gnun _ tespamavek _ meghtagh ma lghii _ a tuq r ugh waagh um agh mi _ ,
â _ ayaangaa- a _ , _ ayaangaa- a _ , _ ayaangaa _ . _ â
â _ K aa - aa _ ! _ â
A q n igh q w aam alghii _ elngaatall _ .
arekull _ vegtaagh m _ kaape ma kanga _ aghenqignegh akun _ ullungag akun _ .
qiya vzigh ma lghii _ aq n igh q w aam _ angtale aneng _ .
I ig g ell u wh agh min eng _ q ug w in p ay u wh aghn eng _ ef l ugh w agh agh sim akanga _ kaape lleg ni _ .
kiiw gnun _ kaate luni _ qalta ni _ imigh ma kangi _ .
A t gh amun _ qalghigh te lghiit _ piyaqminiki _ leghllegh t _ aga _ tespamavek _ kiiw m _ tu ng ang anun _ pi aqe ut _ .
tumangani _ qalta ghhagh ni _ lli luki _ megh n aal im al gh i _ .
nekevgha te kete luku _ tawani _ esghapag ma kanga _ naayghagh _ taana _ nengyugh ghhagh n _ apegh qumtaagh a _ ungipaghagh mini _ .
awen _ sumeghtaghagh te kaqe kanga _ ungipaghagh mi _ taana _ nateghtu langa _ naayghagh _ sangami llu _ taku snanigh kau ta a _ .
taagken _ kaate yaghtugh yalghiimi _ mangteghagh mun _ nengyugh ghhagh a _ p eng g aaq ef tuq _ uteghpaarkitaagh magh mi _ esghagh naqe magh an _ uka _ qemigh a mi _ .
â _ kaay _ , _ S ul pi k _ elngaatall _ pengegsigh uten _ ! _ â _ pi ma kanga _ nengyugh ghhagh n _ .
S ul pig em _ iqenge te yagh aa _ nengyugh ni _ , _ pegnem _ inglupigagh meng _ iqenge te a _ qayughllak _ ullungag a _ puuve ghllag nga lghii _ .
â _ ukavek _ enta _ esghaqagh lakun _ gginagh n _ !
kii _ , _ sa laatagh ziin _ ?
sullevneghhaleg _ una _ !
kitum _ pi uten _ ? _ â _ aapte ma kanga _ nengyugh ghhagh n _ .
S ul pig em _ kiimsigh ma kanga _ ,
â _ nakaa _ , _ vegtaagh m _ taglagh ma lunga _ kaape kaqe aanga _ pamavek _ meghtagh ma lunga _ ! _ â
piniqe pigtekanga _ nengyugh ghhagh n _ taw an igh ll u wh iin aq _ ukmangigh aghte ma kanga _ ullungag a _ .
I ghi v g agh y an _ , _ negh te nghmeng _ apeghiigh yameng _ , _ S ul pig em _ taku yuguma kangi _ ilakumtaagh ghhagh ni _ kiiw gnun _ pikagh t _ .
taagken _ pi y aat aagh luni _ kiiw gnun _ sa u a _ nagaqugh ma kanga _ .
nagasugni yalghiimi _ llangaqa _ sa u a _ qagugh ak _ , _ nalighmeng _ kaynge _ , _ nanugh _ .
nagaqugh ma kangi _ akuzite lghiit _ k iig w em _ esne gkeni _ .
piyaqminiki _ aragh kaqe te lghiit _ arekull _ ilakumtaagh i _ naghaagh te aqe ut _ .
â _ S ul pi k _ , _ sukate luten _ tea- ai _ ! _ â _ aragh ma lghii _ ataasigh _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ ,
â _ kayusiite aghte kut _ iqallug _ una _ tug un aq utk aq agh put _ . _ â
S ul pi k _ sukate naqe pigte luni _ pi y ull un aagh umalghii _ enraq _ ighu k _ takestaaghhagh m _ suka ighlliqe ma lghii _ .
â _ S ul pi k _ aghuliigh i _ nagnegh aghte lleqe uten _ esnevaghpag kuvek _ ! _ â _ pi ma kanga _ mekelghiigh ghhagh m _ .
siingenllu _ S ul pi k _ uka _ ull ghi t ap er e waagh aq ef tuq _ aragh magh mi _ .
aga _ isiqghuute ghllag uq _ ! _ naate naagh a nguq _ iqallug _ tugu naqekagh at _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh t _ t ak w agh agh ll uku _ S ul pi k _ kayusiite luku _ ne ke v e simak angat _ .
qute mun _ taslugh luku _ uyghag m _ saaghw akun _ aq um e simak angat _ .
kameraagh kek _ anighaaghte lutek _ uq ig tugh q w aam alghii k _ megh m _ im igh yaq min i ke k _ .
pi yalghiimeng _ iqallug _ kameraagh an _ ilu ani _ .
taagken _ aglagh uute ma lghiit _ S ul pig em _ iqallug _ tugumiiqe luku _ .
S ul pi k _ un iq agh aa simak angat _ qayughllak _ agh i r aam _ sukangiite ghllag lghii _ .
nagate laatagh ma kanga _ taana _ qawaagte yu gni _ qalghigh lghii _ llangaqa _ tespikegken _ naayghagh meng _ .
U p u m _ angtale aneng _ elngaatall _ iqallug _ qete ghllag ma kanga _ .
S ul pi k _ ne mun _ kaate yalghiimi _ nengyugh ghhagh a _ pengeg aqlaatagh uq _ .
â _ kaay _ , _ sa laatagh ziin _ sangavek _ aghitqe ghllag ziin _ !
P ug w im agh yagh s ii n _ ? _ â
I q l igh mi _ S ul pig em _ kiimsigh ma kanga _ ,
â _ E s tugh agh ll unga _ kiiw gnun _ aghitqe unga _ ! _ â
â _ kii _ , _ S ul pi k _ uyuq _ q aku n ng am _ liite naqe ziin _ ! _ â _ nengyugh ghhagh n _ agh y un iigh um akanga _ .
U n ug mi _ tawani _ amsanaghllug ghllag u uq _ , _ ighaleqetaagh ghllag _ .
tanqigh _ elngaatall _ nighugtu te _ tespikegken _ naayghagh meng _ aliigh kestagh aqe uq _ .
S ul pi k _ aane yuguma lghii _ .
aane luni _ mangteghagh m _ qaye anun _ mayugh luni _ am aa ngu yug sim alghii _ .
â _ A aa - r uu u _ ! _ â _ mulaagh ma lghii _ .
â _ paamyuq _ un ug w aa _ itegh i ngam _ , _ â _ nengyugh ghhagh a _ amig meng _ eslate mun _ qineghte luni _ tuqlugh aa _ .
S ul pi k _ qetgegh yalghiimi _ qakma _ miiguute ghllag uq _ manughagh kun _ .
S ul pi k _ itegh yalghiimi _ aagra ita _ ilu a _ nighug ghllag _ qayughllak _ nanigh at _ qetngigh lghiit _ .
A ll i ghi gh waagh luku _ nuna kun _ y at aagh q ut ng waagh luku _ nengyugh ghhagh n _ ayuqe a _ .
â _ A p aa y _ , _ alla _ ungipaghagh te aghte nga _ ! _ â
S ul pig em _ aapte a _ nengyugh ni _ .
â _ aa-a _ , _ â _ nengyugh an _ angegh ma kanga _ ,
â _ emta _ nagate lghaaten _ naghaagh gpenang _ aghul iigh waagh lu ten _ ! _ â
S ul pig em _ piniqumtaagh a _ ungipaghagh an _ atugh laatagh aa _ aghnalqwaagh ghhagh m _ , _ tanqigh m _ yug w i _ .
S ul pi k _ nagate u ghngaaghmi _ aghsaan _ aap qugh waagh llak _ .
qenwat _ aapte ma kanga _ nengyugh ni _ ungipaghaate mete nghite ngugh meng _ ,
â _ sangami _ all aagh ll u wh aa wa _ naayghagh _ piikna _ ? _ â
nengyugh an _ k ii m sim akanga _ ,
â _ kitum _ alngunak _ taku igate a _ test- pig ke na _ naayghagh _ ! _ â
â _ sangan _ ? _ â _ iq l im yug waagh um agh mi _ S ul pig em _ aapte a _ .
â _ qayughllak _ whangkuta _ tespikavek _ pi igate ngugh u kut _ ! _ â
nengyugh ghhagh n _ qenwat _ pi ma kanga _ ,
â _ N at aat agh t ii nga _ i negh teng ng waagh aq am ken _ tespagavek _ pi gpenang _ ! _ â
ineghte ghngaatni _ mekelghiigh ghhagh m _ um yug w aghh aag ken eng _ avaagh igate ngughk _ aligate llegh a _ naayghagh mun _ .
legan _ iiwen _ nengyugh ghhagh n _ aghh ut anga _ tamaghhagh an _ pengeg aqe kanga _ .
repall _ p eng g em _ iiskughte aqe kanga _ S ul pi k _ navek _ aghulaqe na yu kan _ nallu nghmini _ .
ataasigh mi _ aghneghmi _ S ul pi k _ n ul q aa v iigh sim alghii _ navek _ pi na luni _ .
iiwen _ t aan ang w aaq elghii _ naayghagh _ um yug w aan il nguq _ .
naqamllu _ esghagh nghminigu _ almesiqe aqe kanga _ , _ alla u nghite ngughk _ ila itneng _ naayghagh neng _ .
â _ A a p _ , _ ap aa y _ ! _ â
S ul pig em _ nengyugh ni _ tuq l um akanga _ iighaghtugh magh mi _ mangteghagh m _ tunuqagh anun _ .
nengyugh an _ kiimsigh ma kanga _ ,
â _ ay _ , _ sa meng _ pi aqe ziin _ ? _ â
S ul pig em _ pi ma kanga _ ,
â _ naayghagh _ taku kaqsagh aqa _ ap aa y _ , _ naqamllu _ sa nghite unga _ ! _ â
â _ sangama _ qaatke nghite zinga _ ! _ â _ nengyugh ghhagh n _ agh y ugh um akanga _ .
S ul pig em _ piighaghte ma kanga _ ,
â _ puughte amken _ ! _ â
â _ ii-i _ , _ â _ ken im ii ta _ S ul pi k _ piighaghte ma kanga _ nengyugh an _ ,
â _ paagkut qun _ esghaqagh ki _ kaangugh lghute t _ . _ â
S ul pi k _ pi ma lghii _ ,
â _ A p aa y _ , _ naayghagh m _ qula akun _ aag ut _ , _ naqamllu _ sa nghite te ai _ . _ â
â _ sa u luku _ emta _ ! _ â _ pi ma lghii _ nengyugh ghhagh a _ .
uksaagh nghaani _ vegaagh llu _ , _ nunivagseghagh llu _ paligh kestagh nghaani _ ne mi _ tawani _ qu ug g utaq elghii t _ .
S ul pig en ku t lu _ angaghqugh aqe lghiit _ esnagh meng _ quugkagh meng _ uksulqusigh _ atughqagh meng _ .
â _ kaay _ , _ naagu _ qalqalima ut _ ? _ â _ nengyugh an _ aapte ma kanga _ S ul pi k _ .
â _ kii _ , _ puygu ma aqa _ quugte vig mni _ , _ â _ S ul pig em _ ungipaate a _ .
â _ aa _ , _ aqfa aghte gu _ q ug w agh s iigh nal unga _ pi aqe unga _ kumagh u qu te kaghqagh meng _ , _ â _ nengyugh an _ kayagte a _ .
S ul pig em _ esnagh mun _ quugte vig minun _ tesamavek _ qalqalima _ aqfa ma kanga _ .
igleghte te kete luku _ taakwani _ tumangani _ sa meng _ nagaqugh te ma lghii _ .
nagasugni yalghiimi _ naayghagh meng _ sa u a _ nag aq um akanga _ .
llangaqa nguq _ ellnga _ tuqlugh kanga _ .
nagasugni kestagh ghngaaghmi _ neqagh te ma kanga _ qalqalima _ aq f aa ken ni _ .
naalkellug qu _ wata _ quugte luni _ taglagh ma lghii _ .
Q aam g g ung in aq _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ elngaatall _ n ul q aa v iigh te m _ pil at aam akanga _ , _ navek _ pi y aat aagh yug llag em _ .
kaateqaghte luni _ aapte ma kanga _ nengyugh ni _ ,
â _ pagavek _ pi aghte langa _ , _ uqfigagh yagh qagh langa _ ? _ â
â _ aa _ , _ k el eng ang waagh lu ten _ .
sa u a _ allake gkuvgu _ tespagani _ uteghte lghaaten _ , _ â _ nengyugh an _ angegh ma kanga _ .
unaami ani _ nengyugh ghhagh n _ allake ma kanga _ S ul pi k _ .
P in qu sigh min eng _ S ul pi k _ aghuliigh lleg ke iqe nghite uq _ .
repall _ nengyugh an _ aksaqe luku _ iiskughte ma kanga _ kelengake ma kanga _ qayughllak _ S ul pi k _ naayghagh mun _ ayuq ng w aal ghii _ .
llaaghanam _ S ul pi k _ aga _ tespagavek _ pi aqe uq _ .
nengyugh an _ esghapag ma kanga _ uteghmun _ qiive ghesnagh aqe luni _ naa y ghagh ll ug w in agh mun _ taglagh lghii _ .
S ul pi k _ iiwenllu _ naayghagh m _ nategh anun _ kaate aqe uq _ naken _ sa u a _ nagate laatagh aa _ .
naayghagh _ qule mun _ y u v ghii gh waagh yaq min igu _ paga _ kiigh ani _ qughsatku ghllag _ ellng agh ll u w in aan un _ ayuqe luni _ .
qughsatku ghllag _ nekefqaghte luni _ q alghii ll u ug llag um agh mi _ esla _ p a teg p aghq w aa _ .
S ul pi k _ al ii ng em _ repall _ iflaaghwagh ma lghii _ sa ma lghii _ aviite qaghte aghte ma lghii _ .
taagken _ liite qaghte luni _ qimag naqe ma lghii _ .
kayalaawi ghngaaghmi _ ungelegte ghngaaghmi _ s uk aa ng iigh h aag ni _ qamagte lukek _ aqfaate ma lghii _ .
elngaatall _ aqfaate ma lghii _ uteghmun _ qiive yukagh gpenani _ .
pi yalghiimi llu _ whaa _ mangteghagh meggnun _ kaate yaghtugh aqe uq _ .
kaate yalghiimi _ nengyugh ghhagh a _ amig meng _ eslate mun _ esgh ap ag aaq ef tuq _ .
taawa _ liite a _ sangami _ naayghagh _ taku snanigh kau ta a _ .
liite a llu _ sangan _ nengyugh ni _ qaatkesaghqagh ke te ni _ .
aqsa m _ imigh a
anglegute ke te ii na lghiit _ .
mekelghiigh k _ nayag eng _ pi ng ayuq luku _ angyagh meng _ nunaagh meggnun _ pi ma lghiit _ .
apa ita _ alegh ni _ pi ma kanga _ ,
â _ taaga _ aqsa m _ imigh a _ kete ut _ . _ â
kilgaa n _ qikmighagh a
iyaa-kagh m _ apegh llegh a
S ul pig em _ qikmigh ni _ S iil p ak _ mangteghagh meggnun _ l iv ing - r o o m - m e mun _ itghute luku _ , _ neghsagh m _ q ug w e z ii neng _ iqlugte yaghqagh meng _ tuune ma kanga _ .
A qu m ut agh llag eg ne kun _ n ev egh lluni _ sumeghtaghagh uq _ sa lleghqagh meng _ , _ navek _ piyaa aatagh u lleghqagh meng _ .
â _ S ul pi k _ !
una _ qikmigh _ sa aqlaatagh a _ whani _ ?
legan _ tanughqe i u aghte unga _ !
aane ste gu _ ! _ â _ naa an _ agniqe te ma kanga _ .
U p ugh q w aam akanga _ S ul pi k _ sumeghtagh aqe ste aq _ .
aqume qaghte te kete luku _ naa ni _ piighaghte ma kanga _ ,
â _ aa-a _ aane ste naqe aqa _ ! _ â
S ul pig em _ k am er agh eg ni _ , _ S h o e _ P a c - ke k _ aate ma kek _ .
talwa _ allake te uk _ , _ inglu a _ aghnagh m _ pike a _ , _ inglu a _ yug w em _ .
naqam _ qamagte lutek _ si z e _ 6 - ek _ .
iwerngaqun _ inglu a _ aange lghii _ .
Jacket-tek _ a tuqu m tagh eg ni _ pin i qu m tagh eg ni _ aate ma kek _ .
taake uk _ ar m y - t _ field _ j a c ke t- teg ke t _ angegh lleg ke ghngaaghmikek _ atuqe aqe kek _ legan _ aligh kek _ ulpegte aghte lukek _ .
nasaperagh llu _ eslaghllag ke aq _ C at - meng _ igagh leg _ c o n t r a c t o r - r en eng _ pi ni _ aat qu um ak angi _ .
K it c h en - kun _ aane aqe uq _ .
qikmigh an _ maligte a _ .
K it c h en - mi _ neqekrangllagh meng _ pe an ut _ b ut te r - meng _ s an d w i c h - eng ll agh luni _ aqume luni _ negh uq _ .
S iil p ak _ l iv in g _ r o o m - e mun _ uteghte uq _ .
S ul pig em _ ata an _ , _ G g iil uu m _ , _ kuynge a _ en d _ t a b l e- leg neng _ ashtray- mete ngughk _ ateghte luku _ iqlugte a _ .
iqlugte ma luku _ G g ii lu _ itegh uq _ .
â _ S ul pi k _ !
qikmigh _ una _ sa aqa _ whani _ ?
aane ste gu _ ! _ â
G g iil uu m _ aghyuugh aa _ , _ â _ alla _ qikmigh nge naanghite u aghte uten _ .
qikmigh n _ kelengake igate an _ . _ â
S ul pi k _ negh ek es t aq _ u p ugh q aam _ repall _ neqe ni _ nuna mun _ ifkagh aa _ .
â _ aa-a _ ! _ â _ S ul pig em _ angegh aghte a _ ata ni _ .
S ul pi k _ aane yalghiimi _ imani _ al iin gh u uq _ .
qikmigh ni _ pe tug w agh ll uku _ pi y aat aagh umalghii _ naayghagh mun _ .
igleghte te kete luku _ a ta mi _ kuynge a _ S iil pag em _ iqlugtekagh a _ sumeghtaghagh tke ma kanga _ .
â _ naten _ kuynge u teqaghte lakun _ , _ â _ pi ma lghii _ S ul pi k _ .
E ll ng in aghh aagh ng aagh m i nguq _ akuzi aqe lghii _ .
naayghagh m _ nategh akun _ , _ naayvagh m _ esne akun _ tume tgun _ S ul pi k _ igleghte aqe lghii _ .

llaaghanwha _ d r iv er - et _ uugte ste aqe kangat _ .
enkaam _ uteghmun _ t r u c k - e kun _ igleghte nghmini _ teghigniqe aqe lghii _ .

qallate luku
Taw an ing in aq _ , _ mulu gpenani _ sa yaghqagh t _ piighaghte lghii ni _ .

igaghvigraaghagh
iyaa-kagh m _ apegh llegh a
usi ii sta _ angyaghpag _ kaate ma lghii _ .
qaa ii te aq _ esnagh mun _ pi na luni _ naa ni _ aapte ma kanga _ , _ â _ naagu _ M aa r p a _ ?
angyaghpag t _ es ghagh yagh tugh yug w an ka _ . _ â
Q ii taa m _ anengagh ni _ M aa r p a _ maligsaagh aqe kanga _ navek _ pi nghaani _ .
â _ M aa r p a _ qepghagh aqe uq _ esnagh mi _ .
I g aghv ig r aagh aghq agh nguq _ kaat ute a _ us ii s te m _ , _ â _ naa an _ ungipaate a _ .
apa an _ qaa ii te aq _ pi a _ , _ â _ whangkutung _ pi ltung _ . _ â
Q iit aan kuk _ apa ke te lghiik _ qaasqagh meng _ agigte yalghiimek _ unaghsigh _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh _ q aku m ak angat _ .
alla _ salngag _ uglagh ghllag _ aange aqe luteng _ mekestaaghhagh u aqe luteng _ tamaa _ .
sa u ak _ iglegha aqe uk _ leveklug ghllag k _ qamiye vyiigh gneng _ qamugh ke lutek _ .

â _ igaghvigraaghagh mete te _ ? _ â _ Q ii taa m _ aapte a _ naa ni _ .

unaami _ igaghyagh lleqe uten _ . _ â

mekestaaghhagh t _ naa ita _ nalighmeng _ nengyugh ita _ maligte aqe luki _ .
P an tun kuk _ mekelghiigh ghhagh llu _ ataasigh _ q iy aam alghii k _ apeghtughiste meng _ alinge lutek _ .
apeghtughiste m _ aghnagh m _ mekelghiigh ghhagh m _ aag llegh a _ wiin _ aglagh te sqe a _ salin _ mekestaaghhaa ni luku _ .
qaa ii te aq _ t a b l e- leg nun _ apeghtughiste m _ aglagh te a _ .
sa meng _ apeghtugh i sta _ akuzi uq _ laluramke stun _ Q iit aan kut _ liigike nghite aat _ .
aghnagh m _ taghnughhagh mineng _ tagite i lghii m _ Q iit aan kut _ m um ig g ut ii _ , _ â _ elpek si _ taw an l eng ugh ni _ t a b l e- leg ni _ , _ T a b l e _ O n e- ngu usi nguq _ . _ â
E s tam ag u f tut _ mekelghiigh ghhagh t _ tawani _ t a b l e- leg ni _ .
apeghtugh i sta _ laluramke _ akuzi laatagh uq _ .
aghnagh m _ taa m _ tagite i lghii m _ mumegh igh qugh te laatagh aa _ igaghyagh nun _ , _ â _ N o r t h _ star _ usi ii sta _ tagi aqe uq _ .
aghnequn _ negh nghmeng _ taaqe gkufsi _ igagh naanghite usi nguq _ . _ â
taagken _ apeghtughiste m _ apeghtugh ai _ Q iit aan kut _ whaten _ pi s qell uki _ , _ â _ N o r t h _ star _ i s _ c o min g _ . _ â
Q ii taa m _ liite naqe ghllag aa _ aglaqugh mi _ apegh na luku _ angayuqagh minun _ .
qamagunginaq _ peghqigsagh uq _ , _ â _ N o r s _ star _ i s _ c o min g _ . . . _ N o r s _ star _ i s _ c o min g _ . . . _ â
aanleghaate luteng _ tamaakut _ ig agh yaq uu si t _ igaghyagh nghhagh t _ Q iit aan kut _ pi aqe ait _ , _ â _ L it t l e _ Y ell o w _ B eg in ne r _ ! _ â _ R e a d in g _ Book-ni _ liite tke aat _ â _ L it t l e _ Y ell o w _ Ch i c ken _ â _ enkaam _ igaghyagh nghhagh t _ mekestaaghhagh t _ L it t l e _ Y ell o w _ B eg in n er s - ngun iiq egk ang it _ .
qaa ii te aq _ aglagh yami _ ellmeggnun _ iitghute kete luku _ aragh uq _ , _ â _ N o r s _ star _ i s _ c o min g _ ! _ â
ata an _ usuqe a _ , _ â _ kii _ , _ aawallu _ liite aghte ma uten _ igaghyagh luten _ . _ â
uksaagh aqe a llu _ Q ii taa m _ ata a _ itegh luni _ ungipaate a _ nuliigh ni _ igaghvigraaghagh _ taaqe ni luku _ , _ yuvghiigh yagh te aqe ni luku _ .
qaa ii te aq _ pi a _ , _ â _ whangkutung _ igaghvigraaghagh _ yuvghiigh yagh ltegnegu _ . _ â
igaghvigraaghagh mete te _ itegh yayek _ Q iit aan kuk _ ata ke te lghiik _ aghnaghagh m _ ungipaate ak _ ellnga n _ igleghte te naqe ni lukek _ .
amigh k _ q el p al nguq _ itegh yuwhaagh aat _ .
taana _ r o o m - megh r ug llak _ llivelghagh ghllag u uq _ , _ s ayug w aat at _ savikenghaagh t _ tamaa _ .
yuug _ laluramke _ inga _ r a d i o - m _ manu ani _ aqume luni _ .
aghnaghagh m _ pi uk _ Q iit aan kuk _ , _ â _ taana _ o f f i c e- ngu uq _ . _ â
yuug _ laluramke _ nekeve luni _ sa meng _ al egh qugh w aa _ Q ii taa m _ ata a _ .
qaa ii te aq _ ata an _ ungipaate a _ , _ â _ neghesti m _ kingu aneng _ igaghyagh t _ n u ug lleq un nguq _ whavek _ igaghvigraghagh mete te _ . _ â
O f f i c e- mi _ ila a _ taawa _ amigh k _ ila anun _ r o o m - m e mun _ .
taamavek _ ivgagh yalghiimeng _ taawa _ t a b l e- legh r ug llag ek _ uzimun _ pumsugtu uk _ .
pilagtuusigh _ , _ walamnaag _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh _ taawa _ r a c k - m mi _ .
aghnaghagh m _ pi a _ , _ â _ taana _ ulimavig u uq _ . _ â
taagken _ r o o m - m e meng _ aane luteng _ o f f i c e- kun _ aane ut _ .
enraq _ ila a _ r o o m - m em _ it egh yaq meg teg gu _ egllu lgu uq _ .
mingle mi _ taawa _ sa u aat _ aghvigisighsugnite ngugh t _ .
mingle meng _ taawa _ sa u aat _ q el m eq eg t at _ nekegnga lghiit _ .
ataasigh m _ aghnaghagh m _ q ii p saq min igu _ megh _ maaqe uq _ .
aag llegh a _ q ii p saq min igu _ uguqnagh lghii _ megh _ maaqe uq _ .
aghnaghagh m _ igleghte te i ta igh a ta _ ungipaate ai _ , _ â _ una _ aghvig i vig u uq _ gaagh vig u uq _ . _ â
Q iit aan kuk _ ata ke te lghiik _ amigh k _ uglagh ghllag _ itegh ghhaat _ .
ughvughqefig t _ , _ aghaligh vig _ , _ c l as s r o o m - m et _ , _ anagh vig t _ y u v ghii gh tegh iit _ .
mangteghagh _ aa ng em _ , _ amigh k _ uglagh m _ repall _ i f l ang waagh an agh lluni _ .
Q iit aan kuk _ egllu meng _ p uq l aaq ut meng _ esghaate nghite uk _ .
mingle mi _ tamaa _ sa u aat _ savikenghaagh t _ aghnaghagh m _ p uq l aaq ut ngu un ii _ .
Q iit aan kuk _ ata ke te lghiik _ s aa f saq meg tek i _ maatnegh ghllagu ut _ .
aghnaghagh m _ igleghte te i ta ita _ alla _ samavek _ ukig te ak _ .
mayughaatagh neng _ nateqlite luteng _ amig mun _ itegh yalghiimeng _ sa ngugh ghllag k _ taawa _ .
aghnaghagh m _ puqlaqu te u na aik _ megh mun _ uguqnaghsigh sagh inagh ik _ .
taagken _ mayughaatagh tgun _ mayugh luteng _ amig kun _ aw llaag ke te _ aane ut _ maaten _ itegh vike nghite ke megteggun _ .
qaa ii te aq _ aglagh uq _ sumeghtaghagh tke magh an _ megh _ mingle meng _ maaqe kayug _ .
qelanqe ma kanga _ igaghvigraaghagh mete te _ igaghyagh lleghqagh ni _ .

kiig m _ wh an i ku k es t aani _ amsanaghllug ghllag u uq _ aq lagh agh r aag tek es t aq _ .
qagugh ak _ q al ghi sim agh mi _ naghughte qugh a tuq _ negh niigh vig meggnun _ aglaghtu te aqe ut _ .
siqinegh _ asivagh kestaamaan _ ilakumtaagh ke te lghii ni _ tegh ig nal kum tam n neng _ naghaagh te ukut _ iighaate ukut _ sungaghyug kegtagh mi _ vegaaghtuqagh mi _ .
esla mi _ neqelghutagh m _ saaghw ani _ naa ka _ qasiqagh meng _ gaagh aqe uq _ esghapag magh emta _ .
tamaani _ aghnagh t _ qiipaghagh igh te aqe lghiit _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh meng _ q ip agh aghq ameng _ .
ila i _ av l aa w aat ameng _ saghna luteng _ naama yaghqaaghte nghata _ qiipaghagh igh aqe lghiit _ .
ila i _ es tug w agh meng _ tukfighagh meng _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh meng _ iqeghte aqe lghii meng _ qiipaghagh igh aqe lghiit _ .
naa ka _ pingayugnegh neng _ q ii p agh aal ek _ .
ataasigh k _ qepghagh te zikek _ g agh usi ke k _ .
ila kek _ temngi _ an _ â _ gun- igh qragh te zikek _ .
pingayugnegh kek _ wetku _ sa mi _ J ul y - mi _ , _ kuusme mi _ , _ S un d ay - y amun _ aate aqe kek _ .
taake uk _ qiipaghagh k _ gaaghusigh kek _ puygu naagh nghite kegka _ .
kavilngugh k _ pii tes iigh ameng _ igagh leg k _ qatelghii meng _ , _ sungaghyug kegtagh meng _ , _ sungaghyaag meng _ .
llangaqa _ i ghi v g an gh h as tun _ neq am ik ng waagh ag ka _ taake uk _ atugh u kek _ quni ii nga i sigh ke gkakek _ whanga mun _ .
Taa m _ qiipaghagh m _ aligh a _ negh u v al nguq _ qigughrug nite ngughk _ allangughte te ukagh _ kiyagh taa ll em ni _ .
tawani _ kiig mi _ kitum _ milugh aanga _ naasqugh mkun _ .
Q ii y aagh w agh tu nga _ elngaatall _ .
gaagh vig mineng _ naa ma _ tuqlugh aanga _ , _ â _ tea- ai _ ! _ tea- ai _ whavek _ .
unite ki _ taakut _ qinunaghqe lghiit _ . _ â
naa ma _ apegh tugh anga _ , _ â _ taghnughhagh t _ qinunaghqe nghata _ avelghaqiinagh aqe ki _ , _ unite aqe ki _ . _ â
taagken _ quni igh aanga _ aligh aneng _ taa m _ negh u v al ngu u m _ , _ ilutu na lghii m _ kavilngugh m _ qiipaghagh m _ .
kina _ alngunak _ efqugh kekagh lgu aqe lghii _ enkaam _ kiyagh taa ll ghi t _ malig g naq egk ayug w it _ .
whanga _ efqugh ke kaqe a _ piniqe pigtekaqe a _ naa ke aqa _ S iv ug llegh ii _ .
ungazigh meng _ tag ik ag uq _ Ch uk o t k a- meng _ es neng an il ngugh meng _ ungazigh meng _ .
maaten _ ungazigh m _ yug wa _ nuughqagh u te kau lghii _ tasigh mun _ .
naa ka _ el ng at all _ kaki yuqagh _ .
uglagh u pigte luku _ muutagh nge aqe lghii _ kameg meng _ , _ atkug meng _ ila aneng llu _ aate te kaghqagh m _ .
kitumtu te _ alngunak _ sa u a _ pi naqe kayugu kanga _ , _ ilangani _ apeghtughiste u magh mi _ , _ ilangani _ aghallegtagh nge magh mi _ .
nenge a _ quunpeng _ m ing ll eg neq eg t aq _ .
temngi _ kiyagh taa ghi g al nguq _ piniqe i nga lghii _ aghnagh _ .
maaten _ paninang _ wh at egh ll u w aaq _ neqagh te aqe agka _ kavilngugh k _ qiipaghagh k _ .

sivuqagh m _ naayghagh a

ukileghyagte luni _ anigu meng _ .

ukaagh
iglegha llgu uq _ aghneghmi _ nunaagh mnnun _ nasqagh mun _ itghagh naqe lghiikut _ .
amsanaghllug ghllag u uq _ qilagigh luni _ naqam _ iglegha nagh uq _ .
maaten _ ataasigh ghhagh neng _ nasqaghte aqe ghngaamta _ , _ mekestaaghhaa lunga _ kiig ta a _ tamaghhagh an _ itghagh aqe yalghiikut _ .
angyat mnnun _ uugte naqe te inagh _ , _ â _ t v v v v _ â _ l ev ek l ug w an _ ivenruute m _ , _ megh m _ kasughqu llegh an _ kaate ragkiigh yug ste aqe kanginkut _ nasqagh mun _ .
ataasigh meng _ kaate naqe te inagh _ teskiwavek _ aag kaqe te lghii gni _ , _ A q et lu _ , _ aqfaasnaq _ esnagh meng _ uusnegh u aq _ m ay ugh agh p un g _ .
naangngwaaghagh ta lgu lghii _ q el an gh aq elghii kun g _ kaate lleghqagh mnneng _ nunaagh mnnun _ .
â _ A q et _ , _ ii-i _ !
naangngwaaghaate m _ utaqa aqe ainkung _ ! _ â
pekagh magh ma _ pi aqa _ .
A q et _ naa ng waagh at ag nun _ aqume qaghte te kete luku _ kayagte aanga _ , _ â _ aaga ste nga _ . _ â _ aaga ste aqa _ qevute lugh u i aghagh te kestaamaan _ aaga llegh igh inagh u kete te _ .
qevuute luni _ aaga yalghiimi _ taqughte ghllag kek _ qagh leg agh t aagh aa k _ .
naangngwaaghagh vig m _ napaqagh kek _ aghvegh m _ ag l uq saq ek _ , _ tapghagh kek _ aqumutagh igh lutek _ unaghsigh meng _ .
ilangani _ aaga ghllag negh mta _ napaqagh kek _ qaprag aqe lghiik _ aaga llegh inagh mteggun _ .
naangngwaaghagh vig m _ asi i _ iime luteng _ itegagh mnneng _ pakig qaqu nghmeng _ aaga naqe m _ .
T aan ang in aanghi tuq _ p iiq eg ke f ut _ nasqaghte lleg mnneng _ kenlanga _ pi w all em n nun _ sivuqagh mun _ igaghyagh na luta _ .
ila a _ tegh ig nal kum t aagh put _ p ug w im an em ta _ naayvaghpag mi _ nasqagh meng _ q an tagh an l e nguq _ .
liite naqe aqe lghiikut _ p ug w im ameng _ aghqestaallegh ani _ esne ani _ .
ivegh aqe lghiikut _ kenlanga _ megh _ tamlu mnnun _ kaate llegh anun _ .
megh m _ asi ani _ nuna _ piyugkagh ut _ maatnegh aqe lghii _ qetustaaghhagh u magh mi _ itegagh mnni _ .
ila a _ teghigniqe sigh ut _ iigge mnneng _ ila put _ i si qagh tan em tek i _ kenlanga _ ghhuu te m _ ungelegte luta _ lliigh lleg mnnun _ .
taagken _ itegagh raaghinagh m ta _ vegaaghtuqagh kun _ piyug aqe lghiikut _ .
ataasigh meng _ A q et _ qetgegh uq _ aragh magh mi _ , _ â _ kaa _ ! _ â
tuute qaghte yalghiimi _ sikughllug kun _ .
taagken _ s eng el q ameng _ uteghpaarkitaagh uq _ all agh ll u wh agh meng _ nutaghagh meng _ tu k al eg alghii s tun _ .
â _ kelenga luten _ , _ â _ aragh aanga _ , _ â _ ila i _ tamaakut _ vegaagh m _ ipeg pigte ut _ .
aqnighnagh pigte ut _ tuute qaghtekufki _ . _ â _ iwernga _ ilangani _ mangteghagh mun _ iit qagh s ug w aq elghii kut _ aqfaate aqe lghiikut _ vegaagh m _ qaye akun _ leganqun _ sikig stun _ kaviigh meng _ qimag lghii stun _ .
aliineghllug mi _ piyutagh u aghagh qu kut _ esnagh mi _ ivagh i aqe ukut _ tepekagh meng _ aqimle lghutagh meng _ , _ negaghpag m _ p ug n at ng aneng _ .
mulu gpenaamta _ uglaghi ghllag aqe ut _ s aghn ap ut _ enkaam _ es tug w agh ii r aagh utaq u kut _ mangteghagh mta _ tunuqagh ani _ .
U gh ar r ameng _ pi e- y es qu ng ll aagh aq u kut _ akume luku _ q en aa v z egh agh meng _ , _ uyghag meng _ , _ qu qu ng agh meng _ .
aki kaghqagh lug ke i _ es tug w am n ni _ lli aqe aput _ .
ata mta _ il aa k waagh a _ nengllugute ke te lghiit _ tam aan l e nguut _ uviqligh ke ke put _ .
mangteghagh at _ n ut aagh aq _ whangkutestun _ ayuqe nghite ngughk _ tunemagh a _ nuna mun _ tuute nga lghii _ .
ellngit a _ mangteghagh at _ nuna meng _ tuute nga nghite ngughk _ un agh sigh pag meng _ neng k il agh luni _ ayuqe lghii _ .
ataasigh meng _ n ell iq r u ug em _ kaate ainkung _ .
A q et lu _ aagh h w meng _ itegh lutung _ mangteghagh m _ asi anun _ naalkute ukung _ l aag waagh llag meng _ tesamani _ .
U q f il q aagh meng _ takaghqughvike luku _ s aap agh p un g _ vegaagh meng _ qu qu ng agh meng _ .
S aap saq ef un g _ nallunagh ghhalek _ nuna mun _ il at ng waagh luni _ .
taagken _ es ghagh agh p un g _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ nagh ugh llegh h i _ , _ tuq l ugh agh p un g _ , _ â _ tea- ai _ naghaagh lgusigh yaghtugh kung _ .
whani _ teghig nagh pigte uq _ ! _ â
mekelghiigh ghhagh _ aaghhe uq _ sa kun _ waakaghte gpenani _ kanagh yagh ngllaghkagh mnnun _ .
â _ T h un k _ ! _ â
K al ef k ag tuq _ l aag waagh mun _ .
N eng l ap ag llag em _ repall _ aqsa ligh negh ka _ aq n igh n aghq w ag aa _ .
kanagh yagh ngllaghkagh ut _ pi niigh pigte yan _ nan ghii q w aaq agh put _ taghnughhagh itnun _ iglegh at _ .
Wh an i ku mi _ siqinegh _ tevigh ste gpenaan _ , _ A q et lu _ aqfaate aqe ukung _ asitmun _ uusneghwaagh mi _ esnagh mun _ .
S uk er agh llag em _ iqu aqe lghiikung _ ullghitagh magh emtung _ asitmun _ nenglagh te magh emtung _ .
wetku _ iq un gh an _ ingyaghaghte aqe kegka _ nategh anun _ iqu nghite negh mni _ .
tesamani _ esnagh mi _ meghnag liigh qu kung _ esghapag magh an _ siqinegh _ tevigh lghii _ .
elngaatall _ all aagh ll u wh agh yug nagh tuq _ esghapag kau luni _ .
qilag a _ kumgayaaghte luni _ iqeghta meng _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh meng _ .
Q il aa waagh et _ llangaqa _ si l ug w et _ angighhekagh t _ kumgayaagh m _ iqeghtagh atun _ .
ataasigh meng _ emta _ siqinegh _ tevigh yan _ taglagh lutung _ mangteghagh mnnun _ ingaghte qughtu kut _ .
A q e te m _ sigutqugh aanga _ , _ â _ whaa tuq _ m aan llegh h ii kut _ quunperugllag _ . _ â
sivuqagh m _ uyghag i
Y im ig g aam _ apegh llegh a
kestekau nghite ngughk _ uyghag _ tutmagh kaqe a
tea- ma anun _ igleghte te ikagh t _ .
iimken _ ima
sivunegh mta _ tutmagh kaqe aat _ una _ nuna _ .
uyghag t _ maakut _ ul im gh us ii k at _ .
liite tke ait _ apeghtu sagh neng
uuvganeng _ atugh u lghiit _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh _ ighsa luni
qaatke te nghmeng _ naa minun
taagken _ unakegkagh a _ ila ni _ .
nengleg ketu te _ segh h es l eng luteng _ un ug mi _ ,
ukmangightu te _ maqaaghte luteng _ aghte llegh mi _ .
maakut _ uyghag t _ naghaagh vig ukagh t
naa m _ taghnughhagh ghhagh ni
esnagh mun _ naghaagh yagh te aqe kanga
A m s aan agh ll ug llag mi _ .
kestekau nghite ngugh t _ uyghag t _ ukut
Taw ate l nguut _ ayumigh ke ta a _ tamaghhagh an
T ut m aa s gh aqegk at _ yug w et _ maaqute lghii stun
Q u un pegh llak _ aghul ii ll ngun aan _ .
alpa m _ manig i
A w it aam _ apegh llegh a
whangkuta _ maaten _ ataasigh inagh u gpenaan _ upenghagh mi _ pen nagh tek ayug u tem m neng _ liisimake ke put _ alpa m _ manig i _ , _ ila i _ aange aqe luteng _ , _ ila i _ m ek es t aagh h aag w aq luteng _ ayuqe lghiit _ .
enkaamllu _ alpa t _ mangtaagh ngllagh igate ngugh t _ ighni aqe lghiit _ temngi _ legan _ uyghag m _ qaye akun _ .
ayumigh _ laluramke t _ kaate llghite luki _ sivunegh put _ u pen gh an gh ani _ angyaghtu nghmeng _ taaqe negh meggni _ pennagh nun _ k iig sagh tu qay ug w et _ .
enkaam _ alpa m _ manig aneng _ m an ig n ii qay ug w et _ .
tawatete kayugu te meggneng _ liite tke ait _ alpa m _ manig i _ naten _ sa kayugu ta i _ .
whaten _ enkaam _ ungipamsug kaqe ait _ , _ igh n i yug waagh lu te nguq _ tugu luki _ manig it _ utegh agh t il uteng _ sivuligh meng _ mani gmeggneng _ m ek es t aagh h aag w aq ut _ manig it _ .
taagken _ enkaam _ pingayut igh nghmegteki _ nalighmeng _ estamat igh nghmegteki _ utegh agh t ill et eng _ , _ m an ig in nguq _ inglugtun _ n u v ug yug taq ut _ .
tallimat igh nghmegteki nguq _ utegh agh t ill et eng _ qenwat _ manig it _ inglugtun _ n u v ug y uk gu ugh taq ut _ .
ipa _ tawatete yaghqaa ut _ , _ qayughllak _ mangtaagh ngllagh igate ngugh t _ alpa t _ temngi _ legan _ uyghag m _ qaye akun _ igh n ik ayug w et _ .
enkaam _ inglu inagh anun _ n u v ug yug teng ng aku meng _ , _ i f k agh yug n am el nguut _ i f k agh aat am _ avaquti naagh nghite ngugh t _ .
naqamalla _ inglugtun _ n u v ug y uk gu ugh te ku meng _ uzive llegh i _ nengigh inagh meggnite luteng _ lliigh yaghqagh t _ .
taawa _ avaquti yaghqagh t _ .
T ug w eq _ / _ uunghagh
iyaa-kagh m _ apegh llegh a
atughqagh t
atugh llghite ngugh meng _ igaasigh meng
1 _ 1 _ / _ 2 _ X _ 2 _ inches _ angka lghii meng _ igagh meng
kuynge m _ uk mang is ii neng _ nalighmeng
me ke ta ghhagh meng _ paper _ c l ip - meng
ulima llegh a
1 _ . _ igaasigh m _ eraser- nge an _ tu ng ang akun _ imeg te ggu _ igagh _ mal gh ug eg neng _ .
neve steggu _ igagh _ s c o t c h _ tape- meng _ .
nuqnegh lleqe a _ igagh _ igaasigh m llu _ saag na yu kan llu _ .
kepe nakesi _ igagh _ un egh w aag mun _ .
2 _ . _ kuynge m _ uk m aa ng ii si i _ 1 _ 1 _ / _ 2 _ in c h es - n gh ul uku _ kepe luku _ .
inglu a _ agh ugh h nak esi _ o n e _ qu ar te r _ in h c - ngu luku _ .
A g ugh negh em _ uziveaghaghte aghte snaanghite a _ ig a sim un _ nekegtekan _ .
nekegte nakesi _ wayagh _ igaasigh m _ iq ug w an _ inglu akun _ s c o t c h _ tape- meng _ 1 _ 1 _ / _ 4 _ inch _ piiznga an _ .
agughte nakesi _ wayagh _ piiznga lghii _ nekreg u luku _ .
taawa _ uunghagh _ taaqe uq _ .
nekreg a _ alngunak _ sa mun _ a tug uq _ .
I g uq wa _ igagh leg _ un egh w aag mun _ kepekagh meng _ tu ug gh u uq _ .
mughute kayug _ tamaghhagh mi _ tug w egh meng _ kelqe aqe uq _ mughute negh meggni _ .
savikenghaagh leg _ n u v ug y uk eg tam eng _ ( _ igagh _ un egh w aag mun _ kepekagh _ ) _ siku mun _ um ut al es uu si g uq _ .
siku _ ugmestaaghhagh u kan _ nalighmeng _ qetustaaghhagh u kan _ tug w eq _ sufluqaghte te yaghqagh _ siku mun _ .
mughu ta m _ liisimake yaghqagh a _ kanagh nagh ta a _ .
angyagh mi _ kangqwaaghtuqagh mi _ tu um k aghq am el ngugh meng _ siku mun _ ay agh qu si q egk ayug w et _ .
inglu a _ nekreg leg _ atuqe llegh a _ uglagh lghii _ .
unangkagh t _ siku m _ esne anun _ kaate nghata _ nekreg luki _ qaake aqe lghiit _ .
ayvegh meng _ , _ m ak l ag m en t _ pilag lghii ni _ u ngu ut i mun _ a tu qay ug w et _ .
tuugtagh mun _ si q l ug w ameng _ n us ug usi q egk ayug w et _ .
â _ nekreg luku _ nekreg t _ ng ev y eg neng _ iknaqe nagh ut _ . _ â
â _ T u ug gh en _ atugh ghhu _ .
ketngig gpeneng _ pinigh uq _ . _ â
leghllegh
leghllegh t _ upenghagh mi _ kaawtu ta itneng _ iingtagh lug ke i llu _ unake naqe kayugu ut _ .
leghllegh t _ qawaagyag neng _ negh yugnagh lghiit _ maani _ sivuqagh mi _ .
qikmigh m _ I l aku m taa llegh pig aa
quutmii t _ ungipagh aat
A y um i r ug llak _ kiyaghte ma lghii _ qikmigh _ uqfigtuqagh mi _ ellng in aghh agh mi _ .
qikmigh _ amaa mun _ aglagh ma lghii _ .
pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ A m aa y _ , _ qerngagh emtung _ kiyaghte ltung _ ? _ â
â _ A - aa _ , _ sa aqe stuung _ legan _ , _ â _ akite ma kanga _ amaa m _ .
qerngagh egmek _ kiyaghte yagute ma lghiik _ .
tagtalmi _ qikmigh _ sa meng _ nagaqugh te luni _ qilug ma kanga _ .
â _ ii-i _ qilug gpenang _ , _ â _ ineghte ma kanga _ amaa m _ , _ â _ kaynge _ tagi lleqe uq _ , _ neghe lleqe ainkung _ . _ â
qikmigh _ sumeghtaghagh ma lghii _ , _ â _ K ay ng aw h a _ whang ku teg neng _ iknaqe nghite a _ sangan qun _ amaa m _ alike agu _ . _ â
taagken _ qikmigh m _ ivagh yaghtugh ma kanga _ kaynge _ .
naalkellug qu _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ qerngagh emtung _ kiyaghte ltung _ ? _ â
â _ A - aa _ , _ â _ angegh uq _ kaynge _ .
llaaghanam _ qerngagh egmek _ kiyaghte yagute ma lghiik _ .
ilangani _ aghnegh m _ qikmigh _ qilug laatagh ma lghii _ .
kaynge m _ agh y un iigh aa _ , _ â _ saa _ una _ , _ qilug gpenang _ ! _ Yug w em _ nagaqugh lleqe aaten _ .
qemall _ tagi luni _ pi teg qagh lleq iin kun g _ ! _ â
qikmigh _ sumeghtaghagh laatagh ma lghii _ , _ â _ awilleqa _ yuug _ iknaqe lleghpigagh u lghii _ .
sangan qun _ uu m _ alike laatagh agu _ . _ â
ivagh yaghtugh luku _ naalke ma kanga _ yuug _ .
taana llu _ aapte laatagh aa _ , _ â _ qerngagh emtung _ kiyaghte ltung _ ? _ â
Yug w em _ angegh aa _ .
kiyaghte lqinagh lutek _ , _ ataasigh mi _ un ug mi _ qikmigh _ sa meng _ nagaqugh te laatagh luni _ qilug ma lghii _ .
Yug w em _ kayeme a _ , _ â _ taku gu _ , _ taku gu _ !
tugu gu _ , _ tugu gu _ ! _ â
qikmigh _ sumeghtaghagh ma lghii _ , _ â _ yuug _ ipa _ alinge igate uq _ . _ â
qikmigh _ taawa _ alligte ma lghii _ yug mi _ .
tefaay _ !
alpa
alpa t _ megh m _ qawaag ke ai _ .
qawaag m _ ila atun _ uq egh h mun _ aghulaqe igate ut _ uksugh mi _ .
uksugh mi _ megh ughte negh an _ ang yagh n aghh negh ani _ esghagh aqe ait _ .
upenghagh mi _ esne mun _ taglagh yagute aqe ut _ .
alpa _ uglagh u pigte lghii _ pennagh ni _ megh mi _ nalug ma uute aqe uq _ .
paninang _ uglagh ghllag _ tengaa te aqe uq _ .
alpa t _ pennagh ni _ ighni aqe ut _ .
manig i _ kiyang _ ataa si w aq ut _ , _ ila i _ m aal gh ug w aa qu t _ .
manig i _ tugu lghii ni _ alla _ ighni aqe ait _ , _ utegh agh t iin iiq iit _ .
pennagh ni _ piyaqnagh u i llegh ani _ yug w et _ , _ mekelghiigh t _ mayugh luteng _ alpa m _ manig aneng _ tugulagh te aqe ut _ .
P al as qugh h aq _ tug w aaq aat _ .
uglagh ghllag _ piyaqnagh llegh anite ngughk _ tugu igate uq _ .
alpa m _ negh kangi _ negh aqe aput _ , _ nutaghagh at _ inikagh t _ gaagh luki _ .
tukrugtekagh t _ gaagh luki _ nalighmeng _ ilangani _ tawatete luki _ negh aa qu t _ .
amighqwaagh i _ atkug kaqe ait _ .
yuginagh _ qula _ siipnegh ke luku _ alpa m _ amighqwaagh a nguq _ naama aqe uq _ atkug u luni _ .
tunusagh t _ kumag nun
T ag i kaam _ ungipagh aa
iimnanguq _ .
kiyaghte ma lghii _ nguuyngaaghagh _ , _ umiileg at _ paallghu nkut _ , _ q et g egh y aan kut _ , _ apayepayiigh nkut _ , _ m el ngu un kut _ .
umiileg _ taana _ qam ar il ak ay uk _ .
ilangani _ kiig m _ , _ nguuyngaaghagh m _ nunalgute ni _ taakut _ pi ma kangi _ , _ â _ Q am ar il an aq unga _ , _ qerngughte te k _ ! _ kina _ kayaalqe i i lghii _ s an qu te l ill eq aqa _ ! _ â
llaaghanwha _ paallghu nkut _ , _ q et g egh y aan kut _ , _ apayepayiigh nkut _ , _ m el ngu un kut _ qerngughte te ma lghiit _ nguuyngaaghagh m _ mangteghagh an _ saaghw anun _ .
taagken _ nguuyngaaghagh m _ qamarila m _ ay aa v iigh a _ qiighw nge ta leg _ napaghte ma kanga _ , _ saaghw akun _ lli ma kangi _ sanqute t _ .
taagken _ nguuyngaaghagh m _ q et g egh y aan kuk _ paallghu nkuk _ pi ma kek _ , _ â _ elpek tek _ nuna _ uzive tegnegu _ . _ â
En kaa ng am _ m el ngu un kuk _ apayepayiigh nkuk _ kayagte ma kek _ , _ â _ elpek tek _ naayghagh _ uzive tegnegu _ , _ taagken _ uteghnigh ghhaasi _ whavek _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ q et g egh y aan kuk _ paallghu nkuk _ sivuke lutek _ igleghte ma lghiik _ .
pengughqagh meng _ talughte yamek _ iigh ma lghiik _ .
iigh lutek _ pinitun _ megh n aal ing waagh um alghii k _ .
meghnaali yamek _ taana _ pengughqagh _ uzive luku _ , _ nguuyngaaghagh m _ mangteghagh an _ saaghw anun _ tagi ma lghiik _ .
kaate yamek _ nguuyngaaghagh _ pi ma kangat _ , _ â _ tagi ukung _ nuna _ uzive luku _ ! _ â
apayepayiigh ghhagh nkuk _ m el ngu un kuk _ uzive ma kangat _ pengughqagh ghllag _ .
qesiqun _ uzivekagh at _ pengughqagh u nghite uq _ uyghag ghllag u uq _ .
apayepayiigh _ uteghnigh ma lghii _ nguuyngaaghagh mun _ .
melngugh _ nun m aa wh t ap ag em _ kinguligh u luni _ kaate ma lghii _ .
katelghaate yata _ nguuyngaaghagh m _ sanqute meng _ tunqugh ma kangi _ .
paallghu _ tuune ma kanga _ avaqutagh mi _ at ku g w aneng _ qatelghii meng _ .
A as aq min igu _ taagken _ kenlanga _ paallghu t _ q at egh simak angi _ .
apayepayiigh _ tuune ma kanga _ negaghpag meng _ .
taagken _ kenlanga _ apayepayiigh t _ negaghpag niigh yagute ma lghiit _ sugukelengiigh meng _ nguuyngaaghagh meng _ .
qetgeghyagh _ tuune ma kanga _ ayaviigh mineng _ .
taagken _ kenlanga _ qetgeghyagh t _ q et g en egh tugh simak angi _ s uk aagh sim agh meng _ .
melngugh _ tuune mangite ma kanga _ qayughllak _ nun m aa wh taq aq _ .
quunpeng _ s um egh tagh agh llag ugh sim alghii _ .
enkaam nguq _ m el nguut _ igleghte yagute ma lghiit _ naasqugh teng _ qugh agh ll uki _ .
qamagte uq _ .
P ag r ug w aq
P ag r ug w aat _ tamaakut _ pin igh r ak eg t at _ qawaag t _ sivuqagh mi _ .
uksaagh mi _ aghul aqegk ayug w et _ .
I gh n ik ayug w et _ pennagh ni _ q il ugh aagh ni _ al ngun a l _ naayghagh ni _ .
sa mun _ atuqe igate ngugh t _ am igh q aagh i _ negh igate ngugh t _ negh kangi _ .
iwernga _ neghyaghqagh t _ negh ke igh sag mi _ .
ata m _ liilightugh llegh a _ ipa u uq
T ag i kaam _ ungipagh aa
kiyaghte ma lghii _ ungazighmii _ aghnagh _ ug w il ek _ maalghug gneng _ ighnegh leg k _ .
tagtalmi _ ug w ing igh aam alghii _ .
sighineg mii m _ yug w em _ nulighh ite ngugh m _ nagaqugh luku _ ug w ing ii ll ghii _ ungazigh mun _ tagi ma lghii _ .
taana _ yuug _ ak l ung il nguq _ .
tagtalmi _ aghnagh _ tugu ma kanga _ enkaam _ sighineg mun _ aglagh te ma kangi _ .
taake uk _ mekelghiigh ghhagh k _ atakaghqagh ita _ ighleke aqe kek _ pi aqe kek _ , _ â _ qagavek _ alngunak _ ilate qaghtagh gpenatek _ , _ qaagkut _ amyuqetagh ghllag ut _ amyuutke lleqe i istek _ . _ â
P uugh sim aq eg ke k _ ighnegh gni _ inqun _ ulape sqellug kek _ .
llaaghanwha _ aag negh megteni _ naayghagh nun _ aghulaqe aqe lghiik _ .
tespagani _ ulape aqe lghiik _ .
mekelghiigh k _ iknaqughi ma lghiik _ saama _ angli ma lghiik _ .
ilangani _ uk s uu m _ un ang ul uku _ tungtuqu yagh ma lghiik _ .
uteghnigh lutek _ nagnegh ma lghiik _ esavghagh te lghii nun _ maligte te ma lghiik _ .
tamaa na _ yuug _ naghughte qugh luku _ aw al igh pig aagh ll u tek _ nefkagh aqe lghiik _ .
llaaghanwha _ ayveghagh lutek _ taglagh aqe lghiik _ .
tamaa na _ taglagh uute lghii _ naghughte qugh luku _ kaate aqe lghiik _ ne mun _ .
tawaten _ kiyaghte ma lghiit _ uksulqusigh _ .
ataasigh meng _ unaangu luku _ tungtuqu yagh laatagh ma lghiik _ .
tungtute lutek _ atghagh ma lghiik _ aghneghtu ghllag luku _ .
tungtu kekagh tek _ kaat ute te luki _ nagnegh laatagh ma lghiik _ yuug _ tamaa na _ maligte luku _ esavghagh ma lghiik _ .
ata ita _ aw al igh pig aagh tes nan igh aq saq ek _ .
tawani _ aghtugh ma lghiik _ ayveghagh nghmeng _ .
tamaakut _ ila i _ ayveghagh te luteng _ taglagh uute ma lghiit _ elkek _ ayveghagh naqe ma lukek _ .
qenwat _ wh an i kum akanga _ .
ayveghagh qaghte lutek _ iiwenllu _ yataaghqe aqe ak _ uyughagh a _ kelute mun _ qiive yalghiimi _ esghaate ma lghii _ puyughpag meng _ .
anengagh ni _ aragh u aghagh a _ , _ â _ I ii _ , _ iike te ainkung _ ! _ â
anengagh an _ ayvegh _ pegte luku _ kelute mun _ kilgaaqu ma lghiik _ .
esne anun _ siku m _ kaate yalghiimek _ nutem _ am el tugh q w aal uni _ .
naqam _ iiwleng _ tea- te te _ â _ g avek _ siku _ s aag r uk eg t aq _ .
tamaa na _ s aag r uk eg t aq _ siku _ anuqe mi _ legan _ megh m _ teve yaghqagh a _ .
taagken _ kete mun _ qimag ma lghiik _ .
uyavagh ghllag lutek _ kaate ma ka ak _ iighwilngugh ghllag _ .
sikuvag nun _ mayugh lutek _ tespamani _ qaye itni _ laag te lutek _ kiyaghte ma lghiik _ .
uyughagh n _ pi ma kanga _ anengagh ni _ , _ â _ weni _ tuqusigh naqngu nghite kumtung _ sa naqe i _ ! _ â
taagken _ mekelghiigh _ nuyekligh _ tunag mineng _ saguyagh igh luni _ ilagagh ma lghii _ .
ilagagh ma luku _ uyughagh n _ nagaqugh ma kanga _ uy av agh p aneng _ meteghllug _ qalghigh lghii _ .
ilagaate _ qamagte yamigu _ uyughagh ni _ aapte ma kanga _ , _ â _ sa meng _ nagaqugh te aghte nghite ziin _ ? _ â
uyughagh n _ nag aq utegh ng aagh mi _ akite ma kanga _ , _ â _ waniwanllu _ nagaqugh te aghte nghite unga _ . _ â
alla _ ilagagh ma lghii _ .
ilagagh ma luku _ meteghllug _ qalghigh laatagh ma lghii _ uy av agh p aneng _ , _ iwernga _ maateghniineng _ q an tagh an lluni _ .
uyughagh ni _ aapte laatagh ma kanga _ .
maaten _ uyughagh a _ nag aq un n im alghii _ .
nagaqugh ghngaaghmigu _ n uy ek lii m llu _ alla _ ilagagh ma lghii _ .
ilagagh ma luku _ alla _ meteghllug _ qalghigh lghii _ nagaqugh ma ka ak _ q an tagh an ll iigh agh luni _ .
ilagaate _ qamagte yamigu _ uyughagh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ nagaqugh nghite aqa _ ! _ â
iwernga _ nagaqugh ma ka ak _ .
alla _ ilagagh ma lghii _ .
qenwat _ qakma _ uq egh h mi _ qalghigh ma lghii _ , _ â _ Q uq qu q qu q qu q qu q _ . _ â
anengagh an _ meteghllug _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ awii _ .
whanga inagh u kuma _ pi naanghite unga _ ! _ â
uyughagh n _ aapte a _ anengagh ni _ , _ â _ sa meng _ pi aqa _ ? _ â
akite ma kanga _ , _ â _ pi aqe uq _ whanga inagh ma _ taglaate na lunga _ . _ â
qakma _ qalghigh laatagh uq _ meteghllug _ , _ â _ Q uq qu q qu q qu q qu q _ ! _ â
anengagh an _ pi a _ , _ â _ A aa _ , _ nanghiiqu naqe i _ ! _ â
uyughagh n _ aapte ma kanga _ anengagh ni _ , _ â _ sa meng _ pi aqa _ meteghllug _ ? _ â
anengagh an _ akite a _ , _ â _ whaten _ pi aqe uq _ , _ â _ â _ nanghiiqu na lunga _ maalghug u lutek _ .
taawanginaq _ uka _ tume mi _ mayugh yaghqagh _ uusqagh lghii _ â _ . _ â
anengagh an _ uyughagh ni _ qemqagh u aghagh a _ aan al u tek _ .
aane lutek _ uyughagh ni _ n ev egh tes qu m akanga _ .
N ev egh s an _ aqume luku _ gginagh a _ kenigh mineng _ saape ma kanga _ .
taagken _ m e tegh ll ug w em _ ghhatagh te ma kek _ igleghte ma lghiit _ qu ul v aq un _ .
igleghte luteng _ , _ igleghte luteng _ nalugute ma kangi _ .
tawani _ meghnaali ma lghiit _ .
anengagh an _ uyughagh ni _ n ev egh tes qell aat aam akanga _ .
N ev egh s an _ aqume luku _ gginagh a _ saape luku _ kenigh mineng _ ghhatagh laatagh ma lghiit _ .
mulu luteng _ nal ug l aat am alghiit _ .
pi yalghiimeng _ m e tegh ll ug w em _ megh nal iv ig kun _ naayghagh mi _ alungutellegh leg mi _ uyghag kun _ nalugute ma kangi _ .
tawani _ aghuliigh ma lghiit _ taawanginaq _ naayghagh _ mayughvig ite uq _ .
anengagh an _ ila a _ tughneghagh- ni _ tuqlugh ma kanga _ amiklug _ .
amiklug _ qalghigh ma lghii _ .
anengagh an _ aleghqugh ma kanga _ amiklug _ , _ â _ whanga inagh u kuma _ pi naanghite unga _ ! _ â
uyughagh n _ aapte a _ anengagh ni _ , _ â _ sa meng _ pi aqa _ ? _ â
anengagh an _ kiimsigh ma kanga _ â _ pi aqe aanga _ whanga inagh ma _ may- te na lunga _ . _ â
uyughagh n _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ wetku qun _ whanga _ sivuke lunga _ mayugh te linga _ , _ taagken _ elpek _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ am ik l ug w em _ sivuke luku _ uyughagh a _ may- te ma kanga _ .
taagken _ uteghte vike ma kanga _ anengagh a _ .
qaygeghte lutek _ ne mun _ aglagh ma lghiik _ .
mekelghiigh k _ ne mii it _ ilag aan neq eg s aat aq elghii t _ .
qagugh m _ nunalgute m _ alignalghii ngiighhagh a _ ilag aq ay u wh aa _ ilagagh te aqe lghii _ .
ila i _ pi aqe lghiit _ un _ â _ g a _ tuquma ni lukek _ nag aq um an il uteng _ .
ata at _ kingulighpigagh u luni _ ilagagh ma lghii _ .
ilagagh kestagh ghngaaghmi _ nepiigh qagh luni _ akuzi ma lghii _ , _ â _ llangaqa _ whaa _ siku m _ ilu anite lunga _ ilagagh unga _ , _ iqlengiqe unga _ weni _ ! _ â
alla _ ilagagh laatagh ma lghii _ .
nepiigh qagh luni _ pi ma lghii _ , _ â _ ilagagh kestagh ghngaaghma _ m e tegh ll ug w em _ pi unga _ ghhatagh te na lunga _ .
aygugh mun _ aghulaqe ukung _ .
igleghte lutung _ aghuliigh lutung _ siku kun _ meghnaali ukung _ .
taagken _ aghulaqe laatagh ukung _ .
aghuliigh ukung _ ingani _ m e tegh ll ug w em _ meghnaali vig ani _ .
weni _ iqlengiqe unga _ . _ â
kaate lutek _ mekelghiigh k _ iiyagh kun _ qineghte lutek _ nagate ma lghiik _ .
qama _ ata ak _ ilagagh aqe uq _ .
ilagagh ghngaaghmi _ nepiigh qagh luni _ akuzi ma lghii _ , _ â _ taagken _ meghnaali lunga _ am ik l ug w em _ mayugh te aanga _ .
qaygeghte yamtung _ tagi unga _ .
kaate yama _ iiyagh mun _ mayugh unga _ . _ â
taaqe ma lghii _ ilagagh nghmeng _ .
nukalpigagh t _ pi ma kangi _ , _ â _ enta _ qakmavek _ iiyagh mun _ agigte yaghtuqagh tek _ . _ â
nukalpigagh t _ aane yalghiimeng _ paaghqite uq _ .
qayughllak _ mayugh naqe yata _ awatmun _ mekelghiigh k _ ullghitagh ma lghiik _ .
itegh luteng _ ungipaate ma kangat _ .
mekelghiigh k _ nenglu m _ saaghw akun _ aqume ma lghiik _ .
ata ak _ ellmi neng _ aane luni _ esghagh ma kek _ .
itegh sqe ma kek _ .
quyake ma kegket _ .
ata ita _ pi ma kek _ , _ â _ sa lutek _ uugte lugh stek _ ? _ â
â _ taanegken _ ima _ t ak agh pag ll el g aat aa f tuq _ .
Y u llegh pag kun _ qutenge ukung _ . _ â
ata gkenka _ pi ma kek _ , _ â _ llaaghinaan _ t ak agh pag ll el g aat aam aaq _ ! _ â
uyuqligh m _ akite ma kanga _ , _ â _ llaaghinaan _ elpek _ iye llgagh u uten _ ! _ â
taagken _ kenle ke luku _ awavagh ghllag nanigh ma lghiik _ mekelghiigh k _ .
qamagte uq _ , _ tefaay _ !
tekeyiighagh
apegh aqe ait _ sivuqagh mi _ tekeyiighagh at _ upenghagh mi _ kingulighpigagh lug teng _ kaate luteng _ siv ul igh pig al uteng _ uksaaqestagh nghaani _ aghulaqe aqe lghiit _ .
tekeyiighagh at _ igh n ik ayug w et _ q en agh m illu _ qenaavzeghagh mi llu _ im qagh llegh ani _ .
Q aw aag g aat _ tea- ma kut _ tenge qaghte luteng _ mang tagh meg g neng _ ukig aghtagh vike aqe kangit _ yug w et _ naghughte lghiit _ , _ mang tagh meg g nun _ pinagh yu kata _ .
ilutuqagh _ A f s eng aagh aghh aq
quutmii t _ ungipagh aat
ilangani _ , _ aane ma lghii _ unaangu luku _ af s eng aagh aghh aq _ .
Agh n el qu si q _ aviite luni _ uteghnigh uq _ i ghi v g aam aan _ .
nengyugh ni _ ungipamsug te a _ af s eng aagh aghh aam _ , _ â _ whanga _ iknaqe llegh u unga _ , _ pin igh q all gh u f tu nga _ , _ nangyiite llegh u unga _ nunivag mi _ . _ â
â _ naten _ liigike ziin _ ? _ â _ nengyugh an _ aapte a _ .
eltughagh n _ kiimsigh aa _ , _ â _ aane lunga _ riigte meng _ igleghte yalghiinga _ kaate unga _ megh mun _ .
yakugh yug gpenanga _ p ug w im ameng _ aghvigh unga _ inglu anun _ . _ â
â _ liisimake aqa _ taana _ megh _ p ug w im egk an _ , _ â _ pi a _ nengyugh an _ , _ â _ quyngigh m _ tuumke a _ .
qantaghaqun _ naghughte ma uq _ quyngigh _ , _ tu m angi _ me u ma ut _ . _ â
nengyugh ni _ pi laatagh aa _ af s eng aagh aghh aam _ , _ â _ nagaten _ .
esghagh aqa _ naayghagh _ enmis _ naghughte aqa _ . _ â
â _ liisimake aqa _ , _ â _ pi a _ nengyugh an _ , _ â _ taana _ temke u uq _ naayghagh u ni ken _ . _ â
A f s eng aagh aghh aq _ wata _ ungipagh uq _ , _ â _ pi yalghiinga _ pillugute aqe uk _ kaynge k _ , _ tagnegh lghii llu _ qategh lghii llu _ .
alinge gpenanga _ peglleghqute agka _ . _ â
nengyugh an _ pi a _ eltughagh ni _ , _ â _ kaynge u ni kegken _ taake uk _ ngu uy ng aagh aan ku ngu uk _ yaq ell eng et aan kuk _ . _ â
N all gh ugh q aat agh y at ni _ qiya uq _ af s eng aagh aghh aq _ .
nengyugh an _ neng l aq luku _ pi a _ , _ â _ iwernga _ elpek _ alinge ma ite ngugh u te n _ , _ ipapik _ iknaqe uten _ , _ pinighqe aghte uten _ . _ â
taawa _ itagnaghi uq _ af s eng aagh aghh aq _ .
tefaay _ !
sangameng _ quyngigh t _ Agh ul i si g at at
quutmii t _ ungipagh aat
ilangani _ , _ quyngigh m _ nallagh ma kanga _ afsengagh _ .
afsengagh _ pegh q in gh umalghii _ .
afsengagh m _ aapte a _ , _ â _ quyngigh _ , _ navek _ pi aqe ziin _ ? _ â
quyngigh m _ akite a _ , _ â _ vegaagh meng _ megh meng _ ivagh i qu nga _ . _ â
afsengagh m _ pi a _ , _ â _ wiin _ iighaate aghte ltung _ . _ â
â _ A - aa _ , _ â _ angegh aa _ quyngigh m _ .
â _ quneghte naqe unga _ sivuke luten _ elpek _ iigh i _ ivagh lleqe amken _ , _ â _ afsengagh m _ kayagte a _ .
quyngigh _ iigh yaghtugh uq _ vegaaghtuqagh mun _ .
taawanginaq _ sighunegh kek _ aliite uk _ .
afsengagh m _ m aat gh aq _ naalke a _ quyngigh _ qayughllak _ sighunegh kek _ esghagh kek _ .
quyngigh m _ pi a _ , _ â _ H aa _ , _ el p eg ng am _ iigh i _ ivagh naqe amken _ . _ â
quyngigh _ quneghte yan _ afsengagh _ iigh yaghtugh uq _ vegaagh mun _ .
quyngigh m _ ivagh aa _ , _ ivagh aa _ afsengagh _ .
Wh av e mun _ kenlanga _ naalke igate a _ .
E g ll ung ll aq _ naghaaghute meng
iyaa- ka
atughqagh t
igagh meng _ meghutlug meng _ ( _ O at s - m _ , _ meghaatagh ngllagh yaghqagh m _ qantagh aneng _ )
P l as t i c - meng _ umeg meng
pumsukegtagh te meng _ , _ savig meng _ m ek es t aagh agh meng
kuynge m _ ukmangiisigh aneng _ , _ waya meng _ t r as h _ b ag -em _ qeputagh aneng
C o n s t r u c t i o n _ paper- meng _ suflu kaghqagh meng _ , _ umeg mun _ tugutaghqagh meng
ulima llegh a
1 _ . _ kelgute llegh tun _ , _ kepe i uute kek _ qantaghqwaagh k _ naten _ t h r e e _ nalighmeng _ four _ in c h es - ngu l uk ek _ u us qagh tu l ke k _ .
taagken _ qiigh vigkagh _ negig te yaghqagh _ .
negig llegh a _ egllu kaghqagh m _ ang tal ke k _ nasiqute lukek _ .
plastic _ umeg _ qaye gkenkun _ nekegte yaghqagh _ .
2 _ . _ qiigh vig _ umeg ngllagh yaghqagh _ egllu kaghqagh m _ kepellegh gkeneng _ .
U um waagh ng as qell uk ek _ umegkagh _ 1 _ / _ 2 _ inch _ aange luku _ q iig v ig k ameng _ uzimun _ iike yaghqagh _ .
kelgute llegh tun _ reghighsaghqagh _ umeg m _ a si l igh negh a _ t r i ang l e- ngu luku _ me lug kegte sqellug kek _ egllu k _ .
T ap e- p es aghq aq _ tugumavigkagh _ umeg mun _ .
egllu kaghqagh m _ kepellegh k _ asiliqutagh u lukek _ ulima yaghqagh k _ .
egllu ngllagh lghii m _ piyuke llegh mitun _ u us qagh tu t kaa g ken ka _ kepe lukek _ .
3 _ . _ kepe yaghqagh k _ maalghug _ uniistaaghhagh k _ waya k _ nalighmeng _ kuynge m _ ukmangiisigh aneng _ 2 _ in c h es - ngu l uk ek _ .
igaghqwaagh meng _ qantagh leg t _ w ay aagh h aat _ t r as h _ b ag - m mun _ qeputagh t _ pinigh ut _ .
peghte lukek _ waya k _ qukagh gkenkun _ T ap e- es aghq ak _ umeg mun _ kepellegh m _ tunge kek _ .
1 _ / _ 2 _ inch _ pii z ng aag ken ka _ pegh ng all ghem _ tu ng anga _ umeg meng _ .
agughte yaghqagh k _ piiznga lghiik _ agaghte yaghqaa lukek _ egllu m _ esne gkenkun _ qiigh vig m _ nalla akun _ .
4 _ . _ Taa m _ qantaghqwaagh m _ uumgagh kun _ angqaperug kegte luku _ teregh yaghqagh _ 1 _ in c h - ngu luku _ d i am e te r _ esne aneng _ tu ng ang akun _ 1 _ / _ 2 _ inch _ aw av an tu t kaa n _ .
taana _ angqaperug kegtagh ngllaghkagh _ pilag yaghqagh _ qukaa kun _ .
taagken _ aveg llegh k _ taake uk _ qukagh gkenkun _ pil aag aat agh yaghq ak _ .
angqaperug kegte aq _ es tam aghq es aghq aq _ .
E s tam agh qell gh et _ alla _ qukaa ii kete te _ aveg yaghqagh t _ .
taagken _ enraq _ qule mun _ agughte qugh yaghqagh t _ .
suflug mun _ aa tes v ig kaa g ut . E g ll u m _ qaye akun _ umeg te yaghqagh _ .
5 _ . _ imeg yaghqagh _ angqaperug kegte luku _ c o n s t r u c t i o n _ ap pe r _ suflug m _ ukimallegh an _ es leg tal ng a tun _ .
S c o t c h _ tape- meng _ neve ste luku _ saagaghte na yu kan _ suflu ligh vig mun _ iqug a _ kanaghte yaghqagh _ .
taakut _ s u f l ul igh v ig m el nguut _ qule mun _ agughte qughkagh t _ qaye itgun _ suflug t _ aate stekayugu yagh ut _ .
igaghqwaagh u lghiit _ ukut _ uniistaaghhagh u ut _ suflu k _ nuqnegh naanghite aat _ .
S ul pi k _ naapte lghii _ kaviigh meng
T uu g _ â _ ghi m _ apegh llegh a
S ul pi k _ quunpeng _ sumeghtaghagh aqe lghii _ un ku s en iigh meng _ k av iigh n iigh meng _ uksugh mi _ .
uspeqe aqe lghii _ neqesghagh ightugh na luni _ temngi _ tamaagun _ nunivag kun _ uy av an tegh llag pen aan _ ne meng _ .
piyug meng _ kaate yugnagh luki _ s ii f q aghn al uni _ .
S ul pig em _ kaviigh meng _ naapteaghaghte lleghqagh ni _ sighimake gpenaan _ s ii f q aq aal ghii _ .
unaami inagh _ esghagh yaghtugh na luki _ unkuse ni _ yataaghqe uq _ .
ata an _ repall _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ kii _ , _ legan _ siifte uten _ esghagh yaghtugh naqe yu ikagh i _ ? _ â
S ul pig em _ ata ni _ qingsig qagh luku _ y uk em s ug sim agh mi _ aghulaqe uq _ .
kaate yaghtugh yamigu _ unkuseniigh vig ni _ eg tug r u ug tuq _ .
sivuligh t _ unkuse ni _ q an tagh an ll iigh agh y am ik i _ wata _ egtugnegh a _ s uk aagh t aa _ .
K aa saq min ik i _ avangite ut _ .
â _ temngi _ egtugte ma unga _ av ang i r r ug neng _ ! _ â
S ul pi k _ uniigh miqe pigte luni _ pi ma lghii _ .
â _ maaten _ un ku s em a _ tuungligh ghhagh itnun _ kaate yaghtugh kuma _ emta _ eg tug r u ug g n aanghi tu nga _ , _ â _ S ul pi k _ ellmi neng _ akuzite ma lghii _ .
kaate yaghtugh yami _ ima _ n uq et m i kun _ taaggun _ egtugte laatagh uq _ .
elngaatall _ quupkagh ma lghii _ unkuse ni _ es ghagh yaq min ik i _ k av iigh h agh nguq _ taawa _ naapte ma lghii _ .
iye kek _ angqaperug kegte tete te uk _ , _ ungelegte magh mi _ esghagh luku _ naa p t ani _ .
â _ N at en ng am _ tuqute naqe zikun _ kaviigh ii qu na _ , _ â _ S ul pi k _ pi uq _ , _ â _ entaqun _ atuute yagh kumkun _ , _ ilagaate yagh kumkun _ aghula magh ma _ aghuliigh nayagh uq _ amqeghte naqe nayagh nghite te aanga _ . _ â
taagken _ atugh uq _ aghula magh mi _ .
kaviigh ghhagh m _ aghuliigh luni _ esghapag aa _ .
maateqwaaqun _ elngaatall _ ang al k ell aat agh tuq _ , _ iike te naqlaatagh uq _ .
S ul pi k _ en r agh ng am _ aragh magh mi _ talligh gni _ aghul a sim aag ken ka _ tukagh ma lghii _ .
paninang _ kaviigh _ aghuliigh nghite uq _ angalke uq _ elngaatall _ .
ima _ unaangu luku _ esghagh yaghtugh kaqe kangi _ unkuse ni _ .
Agh n el qu si q _ tuqute naqe m _ tagtale ani _ kaviigh _ , _ elpek nge yalghiimi _ mamlegte yaghtugh aqe a _ .
iighwziig magh mi _ , _ quneghte magh mi _ , _ qesigh kau magh mi _ taa ku ng in aghh aag neng _ niinghute vikekagh a _ kaviigh ghhagh _ .
qenwat llu _ tuquteqaghtekagh a _ .
esghagh yaghtugh nghite ai _ ila i _ unkuse mi _ qayughllak _ mamlegtekanga _ .
S ul pi k _ kaate yan _ kaviigh ligh luni _ ne mun _ angayuqagh gkenka _ aghyugh aat _ muluugh ghllag lghii _ p eng _ â _ g in n il uku _ .
sangan _ muluugh ta a _ ungipaghsugh aat _ .
S ul pig em _ ungipaate ai _ piyaqli i llegh mineng _ tuqute i naqe m _ kaviigh meng _ .
ata an _ aapte a _ , _ â _ naten mi _ tuqute zigu _ ? _ â
S ul pig em _ kiimsigh aa _ , _ â _ ilagagh unga _ , _ aragh unga _ , _ talligh gka _ nengug te lukek _ aghulate agka _ , _ tukagh unga _ aghuliigh sqellug qu _ ngiigte na luku _ . _ â
ata an _ apeghtugh aa _ kaviigh meng _ tuqute i llegh meng _ .
pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ unaghsiighwagh ghhagh _ q aan gh anun _ kanaghte luku _ amqeghtekagu _ up- lleghte luku _ tuute naken _ igh saq gh w an _ nalla akun _ .
aga _ sukate pigte luni _ tuqu lleqe uq _ . _ â
tawani _ uksugh mi _ S ul pi k _ liite uq _ kaviigh niigh llegh meng _ tuqute i llegh meng _ .
elngaatall _ naapte aghtagh qu uq _ .
S ul pi k _ I il qay ug w ig al nguq
A nag ut aam _ apegh llegh a
Q al ug y aam _ ighnegh ghhagh ni _ , _ S ul pi k _ , _ ungipamsug te aqe kanga _ ullghitag igh te luku _ qimugsigh meng _ iglegh usi q aq s aghn il uteng _ .
apegh aqe kanga llu _ ghhavegh _ , _ pi ng ay u wh aghn eng _ qikmigh ke luni _ tevragh kayugu yagh ni luku _ .
Q al ug y aan kut _ qikmigh leg t _ ataasigh meng _ , _ qam is lu ul g et _ , _ ullghitag leg t _ .
S ul pi k _ qimugsigh naqe ma lghii _ t o b o g g an - n ek _ qamite kete lukek _ .
qikmigh eng _ pot _ , _ uyate te igh luku _ q ii p r agh ut en eng _ s n ap - pe t ii _ t o b o g g an - mun _ .
igleghte na luni _ aqume qaghte aqe yagh lghii _ yeghlegi _ qikmigh m _ uughqaghte aqe kanga _ .
qenwat llu _ qikmigh _ k il g aan l e nguq _ P o t- te m _ esghagh luku _ malighqagh ma kanga _ ug w avek _ aatnegh mun _ .
S ul pi k _ taklagh an _ t o b o g g an - kun _ qam um akanga _ .
aantagh ni _ pot _ aghuliigh luni _ aantagh niigh uq _ .
S ul pig em _ qam ugh t aagh naq utk aa _ igleghte na luni _ , _ aghtugh aa _ .
S ul pig em _ neghnagh igh lleg lghutagh _ plastic _ b ag - a _ naalkellug qu _ P o t- mun _ naagh ste luku _ maghyaghqugh aa _ ne meggnun _ .
kaat ute qaghte yamigu _ pe tug w aa _ .
itegh naqe yami _ kameraagh ghllag gni _ i teg m igh q ut ng waagh aa k _ .
saayguraagh mun _ itegh luni _ amig m _ saaghw akun _ nekeve ste lukek _ qamavek _ ilu te mun _ itegh uq _ .
paaghqite ut _ .
S ul pig em _ s u f l ug w aghh ani _ agaghte vig aneng _ ateghte luku _ s u f l ug w am _ mesiigh aneng _ , _ sangighqugh sigh meng _ , _ igh ll ugh w aat meng _ ketfagh te uq _ .
sivuke luku _ s u f l ug w aq _ sangigte luku _ taagken _ igh ll uugh w agh aa _ .
ighlluughaate ni _ mingllite naqe luku _ mesiilghutagh ghhagh k _ aagute lukek _ kuuve ma kek _ .
mesiilghutagh ghhagh k _ makete qaghte naqe lukek _ en r agh ng am _ s u f l ug w ani _ ullegh aghte ma kanga _ .
mesiigh _ kuuvekagh _ nepsag luku _ paper _ c u p - ng iigh h agh mun _ sivugh luku _ enkaam _ agha lghutagh ghhagh gnun _ mesiilghutagh gnun _ kuuve ma kanga _ .
S u f l ug w ani _ mesiighqe ghngaaghmigu _ esghagh ma kanga _ sivuqligh _ nakeghsagh ta a _ naate naagh a _ ayemkagh ma lghii _ ullegh aghte aqngami _ .
nakeghsaate a _ pin - n et ng af tuq _ .
suumqagh u te a _ j a c ke t- mi _ esteg ani _ t h r e e _ pen n y - ng iigh h aq _ tuquuqagh _ naalkutaagh ni _ .
taagken _ tuquuqagh meng _ aan e sim akanga _ pin- nga _ .
alquutagh _ t a b l e- leg neng _ tugu luku _ puu a _ us p us aq min igu _ nakeghsaatetu te _ um ut at k af tuq _ .
U l im gh usi l gh ut ak _ ke t f am ak ek _ .
P um s ug w eg ne kun _ alquutagh _ amqeghte ste luku _ puu aneng _ h a c k s aw - meng _ kepe te ma lghii _ .
ayemekagh _ nakeghsaate _ uspute aqe luku _ nakeghsaate ngllagh u aghagh a _ s u f l ug w ani _ .
alquutagh _ kepekagh ni _ walamnaag meng _ neghuvaghsagh luku _ s ayug w aat ag nun _ kanaghte ma kanga _ .
I ii w en llu _ ul im gh usi t _ kanaghqutagh ke ai _ angayuqagh kek _ it egh aa tu k _ .
naa an _ kuuve llegh _ mesiigh _ esghagh luku _ ukmangigh ste a _ S ul pig mun _ pi magh an _ , _ â _ sangan qun _ kelenga luten _ pi igate ziin _ ! _ â
ingaghte uute luteng _ S ul pi k _ qavagh nghmeng _ aghtugh uq _ .
quunpeng _ Q al ug y aam _ ungip am s ug w i _ qimugsigh naqe lleg ni llu _ sumeghtaghagh tke ai _ .
allamenguq _ alquutagh ghhagh m _ p u un g _ kepekagh ni _ nakeghsaate u luku _ naten _ apegh lleghqagh a _ n ul q aa v iigh utk aa _ .
S ul pi k _ liite yaaghagh uq _ sa u aat _ sumegh mini _ piyaqnagh u i tesugnite ngugh t _ el tugh y al g et _ katam _ qimugsigh naqe aqe nga a mi _ .
S ul pig em _ pinighsagh kaqe ghngaaghmigu _ nakeghsaate _ , _ aligh u u ma lghii _ qayughllak _ naa an _ kepe negh ke uq _ alquutagh _ naalke gkunigu _ aghyuugh yaghqaqe kanga _ .
U m yug w ag ni _ ataasiighte ak _ unaami _ aghtekan _ naa ni _ ungip an nal uku _ .
aga _ qavagh inagh magh mi _ .
S U L P I K _ nulugh yagh lghii
tengutkaleg m _ apegh llegh a
aghvaghllug ghllag _ siqi neghllug ghllag _ .
S ul pi k _ manughagh meggni _ pilagtugh vig gni _ aqume luni _ s av igh h waagh aq aa nguq _ unaghsigh ghhagh _ .
N egh sang ll aghn aq utk aq ugh nguq _ a ta mi _ naangqugh meng _ neghsagh ngllagh llegh atun _ .
savighhe llegh a _ ifkagh aqe lghii _ qenwat _ k am ell uu wh aghq ek lu _ savighhe llegh ghllag ughte uk _ .
â _ A l iin es ag g aq _ nulugh yagh yagh kuma _ , _ â _ sumeghtaghagh ma lghii _ , _ â _ nulugh yagh kuma _ iqallugte nayagh nghite zinga _ . _ â
semqatwhali gni _ imeg lukek _ esteg mig lukek _ a ta mi _ nuluusigh a _ ivagh yaghtugh ma kanga _ .
â _ S am eng am _ iqsag ke naqe zinga _ , _ â _ sumeghtaghagh ma lghii _ , _ â _ saghya lghutagh mi _ naalkute nayagh nghite zinga _ . _ â
ivagh i yalghiimi _ iqsag _ naalke ma kanga _ .
nekegte ma kanga _ nuluusigh kun _ .
â _ una _ iqsag _ aghsaan _ aange pigte a _ , _ â _ sumeghtaghagh ma lghii _ , _ â _ iwerngaqun _ sa meng _ alla _ pi langa _ , _ entaqun _ iqallug ni _ iwernga _ takumsunaghte uq _ . _ â
esnagh mun _ atghagh ma lghii _ , _ iggaarqitaagh magh mi _ ighu ngiighhagh kek _ takestaaghhagh k _ , _ es leg m ar ug g aa k _ .
nuluusigh _ uyamig a _ piiste ghllag luni _ iqsag a _ piyug llegh akun _ aghulate magh mi _ .
esnagh mun _ kaate luni _ miluute ma kanga _ iqsag ni _ .
megh _ qateghllug ghllag _ iqsag a _ awavagh qagh a qun _ tekite ma lghii _ .
aqume luni _ utaqa i ma lghii _ .
qagi vzeghagh ghhagh t _ ayeme aatagh llghite a _ , _ si q in gh em llu _ maatnegh an _ qavaghni sta _ .
â _ qavangsi yagh kuma _ , _ â _ sumeghtaghagh ma lghii _ , _ â _ I q all ug w et lu wh a _ qavaa te aqe nghite aat _ . _ â
qavagh luni _ qavangugh ma lghii _ aa ng ell egh pig agh meng _ iqallug meng _ es ghagh aq eg ke m min eng _ .
elngaatall _ seghlegh ghllag u uq _ .
Q ak em ku ni _ , _ iq all ug naa qu ng iigh h aam _ uzivgagh aqe a _ iqsag a _ .
iqallug ghnaggagh m _ kaate yaghtugh aa _ iqsag ghrugllag a _ , _ papasqitagh llegh an _ megh _ imaghllugte a _ repall _ .
taagken _ nalugute vike ma kanga _ iqsag a _ .
S ul pi k _ u p u m _ taghtugh aghte ma lghii _ .
elpek nge yalghiimi _ nekevgha uq _ , _ s aam _ s ayug w agh sim akanga _ nekefqaghte ste luku _ .
â _ U wh ii y _ ! _ â _ sumeghtaghagh ma lghii _ , _ itagnagh nayagh uq _ iqallugte yagh kuma _ , _ saamna _ entaqun _ qavangugh ke kaqe a _ iq all ug pag llag u uq _ .
S ayug w aat aatk all gh uugh um alghii k _ .
S ay u v legh aq aghnegh min igu _ , _ iq all ug w em _ s ayug w agh tegh llag aqegk anga _ .
qenwat _ qagi vzeghagh ghhagh nun _ kaate yaghtugh uq _ .
â _ ugumi _ . . . _ â _ akuzimleghagh uq _ , _ â _ I q all ug w em _ yeghlegi _ whanga _ entaqun _ negh naqe aanga _ . _ â
iiwenllu _ megh mun _ kaate naqe aqe uq _ , _ esghagh ma kanga _ ilakumtaagh ni _ , _ alleg te aq _ , _ ukig aqe uq _ esnagh mun _ H o n d a- g m i kun _ .
â _ alleg te aagh _ !
sukate pestaagh luten _ tea- ai _ !
kayusiite nga _ ! _ â _ aragh ma kanga _ .
A all g ut aam _ es ghagh yaq min igu _ S ul pi k _ sayugsigh u lghii _ , _ tazingavek _ sukera vike ma kanga _ .
â _ sukate luten _ ! _ â
S ul pig em _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ petug ggu _ una _ ullghitagh gpegun _ . _ â
I k naq ng iigh h a tek _ qamagte luki _ s ayug s iigh um ak angat _ , _ petug qaghte ma kangat _ ullghitag nun _ .
ughhe qaghtagh te lutek _ iglegh te simak eg ke t _ ullghitagh k _ .
mayugh te kete luku _ esnagh m _ uusneghwaagh anun _ uteghmun _ esghagh ma kangat _ gginagh a _ megh mi _ kay ull un aagh llag em _ .
â _ iqallug u nghite uq _ ! _ â
A all g ut aam _ pi ma kanga _ S ul pi k _ , _ â _ sangaawa tuq _ ? _ â
S ayug yaq meg n eg u _ , _ ggute leg ghllag u uq _ .
iye ghllag kek _ neghsagh m _ iye atun _ angka lghiik _ elkegkenun _ ayuqe lutek _ .
S all u ug w em _ q aan gh ani _ , _ g g ut angi _ tawaten _ pil ag tu u sigh pag em _ g g ut ang a tun _ ayuqe ut _ .
â _ entaqun _ taglaate fqaan _ pi yagh kumtegnegu _ . _ â
A all g ut aam _ pi ma kanga _ S ul pi k _ , _ â _ neqniite sug ni te pigte uq _ . _ â
S ul pig em _ taawa _ kayutagh mi _ neqnigh a _ sumegh ke nghite kanga _ .
taku yu nghite u aqe a _ .
aleghquute ma lukek _ , _ s all u ug w em _ aglu gni _ tagh p agh tegh llag l uk ek _ umeg aghte ma kek _ .
U s ku gh w at _ sakeqe ma lghiit _ .
upugh luni _ A all g ut aam _ iglegh agh tes l uk ek _ ullghitagh k _ mekelghiigh ghhagh k _ q e tegh agh te v z ii m alghii k _ .
naagh llegh u aghte pagte yamek _ uteghmun _ es ghagh yaq meg n eg u _ , _ s all uuk _ aga _ naghullgute aqe uq _ ang tugh h aa s tun _ niinghute lghii stun _ .
megh kun _ tekite yalghiimi _ siqfallag u uute ghllag ma lghii _ .
â _ seghleghhalek _ ! _ â
