tape- meng
S u f l ug w amun _ qantagh ngllagh llegh
liighqe te aagh _ nekegte luku _ igagh kun _ teregh nakesi _ uzimun _ .
negikragh luku _ terellegh kun _ qukaa kun _ peghhe nakesi _ liighqe te aagh _ terellegh ngeltagh tgun _ .
tasig ligh vigkagh t _ uki qugh luki _ t ap e- pen nak esi _ qaye a _ qantagh m llu _ uumgagh nun llu _ q i llgh ut f ig k aa _ .
umeg a _ t ap ghagh p aw aal igh nak esi _ .
A k m ag t angll aq
liighqe te aagh _ nekegte luku _ igagh kun _ , _ teregh nakesi _ uzimun _ .
negikragh luku _ terellegh kun _ peghhe nakesi _ liighqe te aagh _ te r ell eg el t at gun _ .
negikragh tekek _ maalghug _ 1 _ / _ 4 _ â _ b y _ 1 _ â _ ig aa meng _ tasig ligh vigkagh k _ .
T ap ghagh p aw aagh meng _ kepe te lghaaten _ tasigkagh meng llu _ umeg mun llu _ q i llgh u tu sigh q ameng _ .
T ap e- pen nak esi _ pi sqe llegh atun _ .
mayeraaghpag ghllag
M e ke ng am _ apegh llegh a
ungipaghagh ni _ imanagh i _ , _ mayeraaghpag ghllag nguq _ taana _ aange pigte lghii _ yugrukutaagh ghllag _ mangteghagh leg ghllag _ nenglu leg ghllag _ .
T all im ag y ag et _ aghnaghagh ngeltagh ghhagh t _ inghu yagh ma lghiit _ .
inghu ma luki _ mayeraaghpag ghllag m _ taku ma kangi _ .
qimag te ma yagh lghiit _ malighqagh luki _ kaate luki _ ratamiiragh gminun _ k an agh qu simak angi _ .
paye kek _ t ap ghagh meng _ qilleghte lukek _ uyamig lukek _ aga _ navek _ aghulaqe uq _ .
kii _ , _ aghnaghagh ngeltagh ghhagh t _ alingruugh te ma lghiit _ .
ataasigh _ pi ma lghii _ , _ â _ navek _ pi naqe inkut _ ? _ â
P ii llgh aghq un _ ataasigh _ qineghte yalghiimi _ unaghsigh _ napaqagh ghllag _ inga _ taku aqe a _ .
uya mini _ kaat ute te luku _ ateghte luku _ taana _ napaqagh ghllag _ aleghquma kanga _ , _ â _ U n naa q ek ang aa _ , _ un naa q ek ang aa _ u un naa q e pil ug w at g i _ ! _ â
napaqagh ghllag _ pakreg aghte ma lghii _ qukagh mikun _ .
mayeraaghpag m _ taaggun _ ratamiiragh gni _ napaqagh m _ iq ug w akun _ asighte te ma kek _ ayug w ill uku _ .
apeghiigh luni _ pi laatagh uq _ , _ â _ U n naa q ek ang aa _ , _ un naa q ek ang aa _ u un naa q e pil ug w at g i _ ! _ â
kii _ , _ t ak l aagh agh s alghii mi _ napaqagh ghllag _ pi kaa r ug ll aa k _ qu ul v agh p ani _ aghnaghagh ngeltagh ghhagh t _ .
mayeraaghpag ghllag _ aglagh luni _ ne minun _ itegh ma lghii _ .
kii _ , _ aghnaghagh ngeltagh ghhagh t _ alingruugh te ghllag t _ qaprag qagh gpenateng _ ifkagh na yukagh meng _ .
qiya aghte te ngeltagh te ghllag t _ qiya mreghagh te ghllag t _ .
elngaatall _ taw aani _ q en w an nguq _ iye it _ puuve uute ghllag ut _ q iy aagh w agh llag em _ al ii ng em _ ifkagh na yukagh meng _ .
Taw aaten _ q iy aam al uki _ uk im all gh aghq un _ qineghte yalghiimi _ ataasigh _ sama nguq _ afsengagh ghhagh _ asi itni _ naghughte naqe aqe uq _ .
taagavek _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ afsengagh ghhagh _ aag y u uq _ llaaghan _ y u wh aa y eng alghii ten _ ileme teqaghti kut _ . _ â
afsengagh ghhagh m _ qule mun _ esgh am akanga _ , _ â _ I l em u te q aghh n aanghi tam si i _ aamta _ whaa _ negh n ii m s ug um al uta _ m il ugh pag aat agh aq agh pesi kut _ tuqutagh qagh zikut _ ! _ â
aga _ naghughte uq _ .
kingu aneng _ legan _ qiya aghte te tete laatagh ut _ .
tawaten _ pi ma luki _ kaviigh ghhagh _ enraq _ uka _ .
kaviigh ghhagh _ naghughte naqe yan _ ataasigh m _ pil aat am akanga _ , _ â _ kaviigh ghhagh _ aag y u uq _ llaaghan _ y u wh aa y eng alghii ten _ ileme teqaghti kut _ . _ â
uka _ tagi i ma lghii _ .
legan _ quya uute ma lghiit _ aghnaghagh ngeltagh t _ uk ig g naq egk angi _ .
â _ naten qun _ il em ull am si _ pik ar ug llak _ ? _ â
kaviigh m _ qule mun _ aapte ma kanga _ .
â _ mayeraaghpag _ whaten _ pi kau uq _ legan _ , _ â _ U n naa q ek ang aa _ , _ un naa q ek ang aa _ u un naa q e pil ug w at g i _ ! _ â _ aghnaghaghhagh m _ kiimsigh ma kanga _ .
kaviigh ghhagh m _ aatakqun _ napaqagh _ al egh qugh yaq min igu _ , _ â _ U n naa q ek ang aa _ , _ un naa q ek ang aa _ u un naa q e pil ug w at g i _ ! _ â
sunami _ napaqagh ghllag _ pakreg aghte ghllag naagh a _ .
pakreg aghte yan _ kaviigh ghhagh m _ taana _ tapghagh a _ iq l ug saq min igu _ , _ iq l ug saq min igu _ qenwat _ il em t aa _ .
I l em s ag u _ aanleghaate ma lghiit _ aghnaghagh ngeltagh ghhagh t _ estamat _ .
ataasigh _ aghnaghaghhagh _ tegh tugh h negh meng _ mataawi te aat _ q iy am _ q av an gh um ill agh qell uku _ sama _ tegh ghhagh ani _ ratamiiragh m _ .
â _ aa _ , _ taw an ll i _ qavagh li _ ! _ â _ ataasigh m _ qenwat _ pi ma kangi _ ila ni _ .
aghnaghaghhagh t _ taakut _ un in naq ng aam eg teg gu _ in gh uk aghh aat eng _ katag luki _ ratamiiragh gnun _ vegaagh ghllag meng _ imigh lukek _ taw an n il uteng _ pi s qell uteng _ qilleghte ma kegket _ .
petug lukek _ napaqagh kun _ aghnaghaghhagh t _ aatak _ aragh ut _ , _ â _ U n naa q ek ang aa _ , _ un naa q ek ang aa _ u un naa q e pil ug w it g i _ ! _ â
napaqagh ghllag _ t ak l aagh agh tegh llag y alghii mi _ aghnaghaghhagh _ pika _ ellng in aghh agh mi _ qavagh _ .
qimagugh te luteng _ uy av agh p anun _ elngaatall _ iiskughte ma kangat _ mayeraaghpag _ .
mayeraaghpag m _ esghagh yaghtugh naqe ma kangi _ ulaagh ghllag ni _ tugumiiqe luku _ , _ â _ naa ke i _ aghnaghaghhagh t _ esghagh yaghtugh naqe anka _ . _ â
mayeraaghpag m _ taku luki _ kaate luki _ napaqagh ghllag _ aleghqugh laatagh aa _ , _ â _ U n naa q ek ang aa _ , _ un naa q ek ang aa _ u un naa q e pil ug w it g i _ ! _ â
napaqagh ghllag _ pakreg aghte ghllag yan _ ulaagh mineng _ pil ag agh saq min i ke k _ ratamiiragh k _ vegaagh _ pagunghagh _ ifkagh qu uute ma lghii _ .
aviite yata _ aghnaghaghhagh t _ qefliqe luni _ wata _ pil ag agh tagh yaq min i ke k _ aghnaghaghhagh m _ iq el q wa _ kepe qaghte ma kanga _ .
â _ key- ke a _ , _ key- ke a _ , _ key- ke a _ , _ key- ke a _ !
K um ak igh tek aghn agh agh pe nga _ , _ kum ak igh tek aghn agh agh pe nga _ .
enta _ kumakigh naqe amken _ , _ â _ aghnaghaghhagh m _ qiya magh mi _ pi ma kanga _ .
â _ huk _ aa-a _ , _ â _ mayeraaghpag _ kaa g k as agh s ag g aghn eng _ .
ingaghte yan _ aghnaghaghhagh m _ kumakigh aa _ .
afsengagh _ , _ nguuyngaaghagh _ , _ melngu _ , _ kingu k _ , _ sa u a _ kumag ke a _ .
L eg an nguq _ tuqute aqe ai _ .
mayeraaghpag ghllag _ qavagh uq _ nun ak i m _ .
qavagh yan _ iye kek _ p aa r gh ul iigh aa k _ inglugtun _ .
taagken _ mayeraaghpag _ qavagh luni _ , _ qavagh luni _ aghnaghaghhagh m _ pi magh an _ tegh tugh sim akanga _ , _ â _ uyuq _ pikavek _ meqsaghtugh a _ . _ â
mayeraaghpag _ esghagh naqe yalghiimi _ aghtugh uq _ .
â _ S ang aam ek _ iye gka _ sa uk _ . _ â
â _ saa _ , _ qavagh gpeni wha _ nevuute ma nghite ak _ , _ â _ aghnaghaghhagh m _ pi a _ , _ â _ taslugh naqe amken _ pikavek _ meqsaghtugh a _ . _ â
amenam _ t as l um akanga _ maye raagh ghllag _ .
kaat ute te luku _ kiiw gnun _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ uuhuk _ megh i _ , _ megh i _ ! _ â
mayeraaghpag _ megh yalghiimi _ , _ megh yalghiimi _ , _ megh yalghiimi _ kiiw k _ qam ag agh ll uk ek _ .
kii _ , _ nekeve naqe yalghiimi _ aqsa ghllag a _ meghllag meng _ imigh luni _ .
aghnaghaghhagh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ pikavek _ yeqay _ us negh waagh mun _ aghula yagh a _ atugh u lleqe amken _ taslugh naqe amken _ . _ â
iye kek nguq _ natengiighhaq _ q el p er eg aaq es tagh aq ef tu k _ .
T as l um akanga _ tespikavek _ .
kaat ute te luku _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ U h uk _ , _ aghula _ ! _ â
aghnaghaghhagh m _ atughtu a _ elngaatall _ .
qetgegh kau magh mi _ yaagpagte yagh uq _ aqsa a _ qu p agh tegh llag tuq _ .
piyaqminigu _ tuqu ng waagh luni _ maye raagh ghllag _ .
aqsa aneng _ aanleghaate uq _ qayugh te aq _ , _ sagnegh _ , _ savig _ , _ ulaagh _ , _ sa u a _ .
ila i _ aghnaghagh ngeltagh at _ tagi laghate te ma lghiit _ .
aghnaghaghhagh m _ kayagte ma kangi _ ellngit llu _ tug ul aa tes qell uki _ .
quya uute magh meng _ atghaghtu te ma lghiit _ .
tefaay _ !
yaywaali _ nulightugh lghii _ nanugh meng
A p ang al uu m _ apegh llegh a
kiyang _ uglagh u pestaagh lghii m _ t a z ing ke r ug llak _ imagh a _ nanugh t _ yugu yagh na iqe kangit _ .
taana _ nagate kaqe a _ ungipagh ke naqe aqa _ , _ nanugh t _ yugte yug nightu ta i _ yug w es tun _ nangaghnegh i _ ayuqe ta i _ .
elngaatall _ yuug _ nuliigh leg _ , _ pinigh lghii _ sa kun _ all aagh h in aghq un _ .
ilughagh ghhagh a _ y ay w al ing iigh h aq _ yug ugh tek es t aq _ ellnga nite ngughk _ ne ite ngughk _ qayughllak _ .
aflengake u kanga _ il ugh w aghh ani _ pinitungwaaq _ iwerngaqun _ am y ugh waagh em _ saaghw akun _ agh s aagh m i kaa t k aqegk anga _ .
enkaam _ uksaagh mi _ siku k _ tag in gh egk en i _ yataaghqe te ghllag aqe lghii _ yuug _ unangniighusighqagh meggneng _ .
uunghagh _ , _ uyiigh _ apeghiighsagh aqe kangat _ qayughllak _ siku k _ kaate kayek _ piyaa uute yaghqau aqe lghiit _ .
mekelghiigh _ s um egh tagh aq ay u ug llegh h ii _ yugughte lghii _ .
ellngagh a llu _ uunghagh ghhagh meng _ ulimasigh u ma lghii _ .
luuraq _ maligte te luni _ nengigh yaghqaaghte na luni _ kayute ughte na luni _ tawavek _ nengllugute minun _ .
leganqun _ yug w em _ ilughagh ni _ esghagh aa _ uunghiitaghtugh na luni _ qinuyug a _ , _ â _ seghleghhalek _ ilughagh ka _ uunghagh ngllagh aqe uq _ sa u a ngam _ aqsaqugh u naqe a _ , _ uunghiitaghtugh naqe ukut _ whaa _ . _ â
elngaatall _ t aan as t aghh iin aq _ q aan gh an _ ima qaa _ .
qenwat _ ilughagh ghhagh n _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ kitumun _ u un ghii t angll ii s qell unga _ pi zinga _ , _ naangilngugh nge a _ nulighh ite ngugh nge a _ nayag ite ngugh nge a _ wetku qun _ nuliigh gpek _ uunghiitagh ngllagh nakanganga _ . _ â
kii _ , _ yuug _ wata _ saghiighqe uq _ , _ qinuyug a _ il ugh w ani _ uunghiitaghtugh na luni _ .
qenwat _ wh an i ku y an _ meghnugh luni _ mekelghiigh _ kagtaghte ma lghii _ aane ma lghii _ .
tespikani nguq _ kelutagh nge i te ni _ qilughwaagh ghllag t _ ellng in aghh aat _ .
tespikegkut _ uqiigh ghhagh itnun _ uq it agh yagh tu m alghii _ .
iiwen _ whaa _ kaate aqe uq _ up- qite vigkagh minun _ qilughwaagh ghllag t _ mengqughte te ma lghiit _ elngaatall _ .
E s ghagh agh saq min ik i _ amigh k _ qelpegh aqe uq _ aghnagh _ whaa _ qineghte uq _ , _ elngaatall _ ineqsunagh ghllag _ .
aghnagh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ sangavek _ n angll eg n aghq e si n _ sa qu ziin _ aqlagha ghllag mi _ ne mete kestagh ghngaaghpek _ ? _ â
mekelghiigh m _ ungipaate a _ , _ â _ elngaatall _ ilughagh ma _ qinuyugte aanga _ uunghiitaghtugh na luni _ .
wasiwa _ kitum _ uunghiitagh ngllagh lleqe aanga _ . _ â
â _ tea- ai _ itegh i _ utaqa i yagh a _ uunghiitagh ngllagh naqe amken _ , _ â _ aghnagh m _ pi a _ .
itegh yalghiimi _ ne u uq _ .
taawa nguq _ k el ut ang ani _ nanugh m _ amiiragh ghllag a _ esghagh aa _ .
elngaatall _ aghnagh m _ pugnegh iigh te a _ sa meng _ akughtu te a _ .
A ku tun neq eg sagh luku _ apegh iigh yaq min ik i _ sagnegh ghllag k llu _ s ag n es qu v eg aghh aa k lu _ iigge m _ imagh ghhagh kek _ imightugh ma kangi _ .
aghnagh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ taawa _ apeghiigh unga _ atghagh a _ .
Q in u yug ll at aq ang aten _ nungyaghagh gneng _ qiigh negh ke i i nagh luten _ aragh ghhaaten _ whaten _ â _ U un ghii tam aan g _ , _ u un ghi tam eng _ . _ â
tuune lleqe amken _ .
taake uk _ angenegh ghllag kek _ nategh m _ qukaa kun _ lli nakegken _ , _ tea- ma anun _ negh sqellug kek _ .
taake uk _ s ag n es qu v eg aghh aa k _ ilughagh gpenun _ tuun ak eg ken _ .
whaten _ pi naken _ , _ â _ ang _ , _ taawa _ u un ghi tagh t aa _ elngaatall _ . _ â
taaqe gkatki _ en kaa ng am _ aane te naketen _ tugu naagh anka _ . _ â
mekelghiigh _ atghagh uq _ .
legan _ itegh uq _ ilughagh n _ pi laatagh aa _ , _ â _ seghleghhalek _ u un ghi tagh tugh naq u ku t lu _ entaqun _ keleg yaghtu ma a _ u un ghi t angll agh tek aghq ani _ . _ â
mekelghiigh m _ pi a _ , _ â _ kitumun _ u un ghii t angll ii s qell unga _ pi zinga _ , _ ava ite ngugh nge a _ sa ite ngugh nge a _ ? _ â
Yug w em _ taw an l e nguut _ pi a _ , _ â _ seghleghhalek _ m aa ku gh si _ negh l aagh pen aa si _ kepsugh yaghagh lleqe usi _ uunghagh ite aq _ seghlegh ghllag u naqe uq _ i ghi v g agh mi _ whani _ . _ â
qinuyugte lqinagh yatni _ mekelghiigh m _ ilughagh ni _ tawavek _ pi a _ , _ â _ qinu na ghhalek _ una _ , _ sullevneghhaleg _ ! _ â
mekelghiigh _ taawavek _ pii g w agh luni _ nuug ke i nagh luni _ nungyaghagh gneng _ aragh uq _ , _ â _ U un ghii tam aan g _ , _ uunghiitagh meng _ . _ â
whaa _ iiwen _ aghnagh _ .
sagnegh t _ tuune ai _ .
mekelghiigh m _ itghute ai _ .
kii _ , _ sagnegh ghnaggagh k _ nategh m _ qukagh kun _ lli uk _ .
â _ esnevagh lusi _ taake uk _ neghe tekek _ , _ â _ mekelghiigh m _ tamaakut _ kayagte ai _ .
taake uk _ s ag n es qu v eg aghh aa k _ mekelghiigh m _ ilughagh minun _ aglagh te ak _ , _ â _ ang _ , _ ukuk _ elpek _ neghe kek _ .
elngaatall _ uunghagh ite aghte a _ sa aqe ziin _ . _ â
ilughagh n _ mekelghiigh _ pi a _ , _ â _ kii _ , _ ugumi ke pigte ma zinga _ m ek el eng es t ay u wh aa k _ ukuk _ kepe yutekaghqagh ghhagh u nghite ngugh k _ tagivagh agken _ . _ â
â _ legan _ qalleg gpenang _ negh i _ , _ â _ mekelghiigh m _ akite a _ .
esnevagh uute luni _ negh un neq eg s aa tut _ .
taana _ ilughagh a _ s ag n es qu v eg aghh aag neng _ tugu tete luni _ negh lukek _ esghagh nghminikek _ almesiqe lukek _ .
amawha _ tugu tete luni _ negh luni _ esghagh nghminikek _ almesiqe aqe kek _ .
M ataa w it ng waagh aa k _ naa ng te q aghh negh meng _ .
iwerngaqun _ kepsugh ghllag ghngaaghmi _ negh yagh aa k _ .
aghtugh yamikek _ , _ â _ I i - h i - h i - h i - h ii _ , _ kepsugh unga _ .
taawa _ u un ghii tagh tugh qagh pe nga _ , _ il uu y _ . _ â
â _ uunghiitaghtugh naqe aqe luten _ sa aqe ziin _ uunghagh ite aghte a _ , _ â _ mekelghiigh m _ aghsaghte ma kanga _ .
â _ yeghlegi llu _ weni _ kepe yu ma unga _ , _ â _ Yug w em _ sagnegh squghhagh k _ tuun um aag ken ka _ pi a _ .
mekelghiigh m _ tugu lukek _ qamagte luku _ imagh a _ kanagh a _ qanegh minun _ .
aane te luki _ sagnegh t _ itegh uq _ .
iiwen _ ingaghte aqe uq _ mekelghiigh _ ilughagh n _ taku a _ .
kii _ , _ enraq _ qinuyug a _ q em qagh waagh aa _ asute na lutek _ .
â _ liisimake kevnga _ nulighh ite ngugh u nga _ , _ naten _ pi na luten _ pi ziin _ , _ â _ mekelghiigh m _ pi a _ .
â _ kitum i _ uunghiitagh ngllagh aten _ ?
nulighh ite yagh kuvek _ avangite nayagh uten _ .
whaa _ nuliigh lgu uten _ esghaghhu _ , _ â _ ilughagh n _ pi a _ .
Q av agh tes negh it ng waagh aa _ mekelghiigh _ il ugh w aan _ .
qenwat _ qavagh ste naqe nghite te yatni _ aane luni _ tespikavek _ taglagh laatagh uq _ mekelghiigh _ .
legan _ kaa tuq _ qilughwaagh t _ qelpegh aghte te laatagh aa _ .
â _ sa laatagh aten _ ? _ â _ aghnagh m _ aapte a _ .
â _ elngaatall _ qinuyugte aanga _ qavagh ste nghite aanga _ ilughagh ma _ as un al uni _ , _ asute na lutung _ , _ â _ mekelghiigh m _ ungipaate a _ .
â _ legan _ atghagh luten _ whavek _ kayagte gu _ tagligh sqe gu _ , _ â _ aghnagh m _ kayagte a _ .
mekelghiigh _ atghagh uq _ .
itegh yan _ il ugh w aan _ pi laatagh aa _ .
â _ qinu na ghhalek _ una _ , _ kii _ sullevneghhaleg _ .
enta _ pikavek _ qilughwaagh nun _ taglagh a _ , _ â _ mekelghiigh m _ tagligh sqe a _ .
â _ ii _ , _ nutem qun _ peq l iq ut aaq agh pe nga _ pi leg ghllag u ghngaaghpek _ , _ â _ yug w em _ pi a _ .
pilugug ragkiigh luni _ aga _ tag l in aam agh mi _ .
legan _ kaa tuq _ qilughwaagh t _ qelpegh te a _ .
itegh yalghiimi _ elngaatall _ aghnagh _ pi nigh _ kaki iqe uq _ taawa _ .
Yug w em _ ing aghh un naq utk es aq min igu _ aghnagh _ .
aghnagh m _ p iiq sagh ang uq _ , _ â _ Q in u yug tagh pe nga _ ingaghte vike naanghite amken _ , _ ingaghte luten _ qavagh a _ .
I ng agh f ik n aanghi t ng waagh am ken _ . _ â
ii _ , _ yug w em _ qinuyug a _ .
pi laatagh aa _ aghnagh m _ , _ â _ Q in u yug tagh pe nga _ ingaghte vike naanghite amken _ naq am all ameng _ ug w ing igh h aqa _ kaana _ n ul iigh pen is aq an _ ingaghte vike nayagh amken _ .
maaten _ kana _ aa v ng aaq _ ne mini tuq _ , _ iqite nga uq _ . _ â
â _ temngi _ pi uten _ aleghqugh ghllag luku _ n ul igh q a _ taglagh unga _ .
qavigh sqellug kek _ pi kaqe aqa _ , _ â _ yug w em _ pi a _ .
â _ tagi aghten qun _ k el gu v ik agh ll ak en _ , _ â _ aghnagh m _ pi a _ .
nanilghagh gni _ m ak r eg saq min igu _ reghigh uq _ kanavek _ nenglu mun _ .
E s ghagh yaq min ik i _ kana _ ug w at ang ani _ il ugh w aghh ani _ at ku wh agh min eng _ ulig luni _ enmis _ qavagh aqe uq _ .
nuliigh ni llu _ esghagh aa _ ellng in aa f tuq _ .
â _ enta _ sa u lukek _ pi zikek _ allakagh mete uk _ test-kagh nkuk _ .
whangkutung _ allakagh mete ukung _ .
ingaghte ltung _ , _ â _ yug w em _ sagiqe te a _ .
qenwat _ aghnagh _ talligh akun _ tangyegh akun _ tugu luku _ s ayug s iigh luku _ lliigh aa _ yug w em _ .
â _ kii _ , _ yuug _ una _ qinu na pigte ma a _ , _ â _ aghnagh _ pi uq _ .
nanugh m _ amiiragh ghllag a _ aghnagh m _ aate luku _ yuug _ ug w iigh h aa _ , _ tuqute a _ .
taagken _ yugusigh a _ mingllite luku _ atkug ni _ mat- aghte luku _ taw an tuq _ .
taagken _ unaami _ qenwat _ nighugte a _ .
ilughagh ni _ itegh yaghqagh _ mekelghiigh m _ qelanqe a _ .
mulu inagh yan _ qenwat _ aane luni _ qilughwaagh nun _ taglagh uq _ .
legan _ kaa tuq _ whaa _ amig m _ qelpegh te a _ .
â _ naagu _ ilughagh ghrug ka _ pengeg luku _ qenwat _ esghagh yaghtugh aqe aqa _ , _ â _ mekelghiigh m _ aghnagh _ aapte a _ .
â _ esgha _ taana ta _ ilughagh n _ , _ â _ aghnagh m _ keleg u vike a _ , _ â _ ilughagh ke ken _ legan _ qivghuke yu kuvgu _ qivghuke yaghqaqe ken _ .
qinuyugte yanga _ taawa _ q in u ku um aaq a _ .
whanga _ yugu nghite unga _ esgha _ taana _ amiiragh ka _ .
aygugh lleqe unga _ ne mnun _ siku k _ malleg qagh inagh kayek _ , _ maani _ k ii kaa t k ag unga _ .
saama _ nanglleg ke luten llu _ aghuliigh vike amken _ whani _ . _ â
mekelghiigh m _ pi a _ , _ â _ maligte naqe amken _ kitum qun _ aflengake linga _ .
taawa _ qinuyugte aqe naagh aatnga _ maa nte kuma _ .
elngaatall _ n angll ek is tek am ken _ elpek _ . _ â
aghnagh m _ pi a _ , _ â _ maligte naqngu kuvnga _ sa meng _ s an q ut aagh h agh meng _ gu un n iigh uk agh agh meng _ avelghagh gpenang _ kelqe lghaaten _ . _ â
mekelghiigh _ atghagh luni _ yataaghqe uq _ .
amennguq _ mekelghiigh _ ughluvegh llgagh u uq _ .
ughluvegh ni _ , _ saningughtagh ni _ tugu luki _ taglagh uq _ .
Taa m _ aghnagh m _ amiiragh ghllag a _ agh iq ng waagh aa _ qayughllak _ atuqe naqe kanga _ .
aghnagh m _ aa saq min igu _ amiiragh _ leganqun _ nanugh ghllag u uq _ .
taawa _ un ug mi _ aane lutek _ aygugh mun _ aghulaqe uk _ .
esnevagh yamek _ mekelghiigh _ nanugh m _ sigute gmi _ akule gkenkun _ aqume ste luku _ p ug w im ut aa _ .
P ug w im ut aaq egk anga _ , _ p ug w im ut aaq egk anga _ siku mun _ kaate negh megteni _ uugte lutek _ piyug meng _ lliigh aqe lghiik _ .
igatagh negh megteni _ nanugh ghllag _ unange ni nghmini _ neghsagh meng _ un ak eng aq elghii _ .
iwerngaqun _ mekelghiigh _ neghe ste luku _ aminaqekagh i _ ellnga n _ qamagte luki _ negh aqe kangi _ .
Taw aaten _ kiyaghtekagh k _ .
tagtalmi _ si ku g n it ku ll aagh llag lu tek _ qaallgute a _ nanugh m _ , _ â _ amenam _ taawa _ meghnugh unga _ .
M egh n ut am ken _ , _ tuqlugh i naqe unga _ ku g w em neng _ p aa y gh es qell u tun g _ .
imani _ aliigh kata _ ku u g _ â _ gh en ka _ tallugh yug yaqunang _ kakave yaqunang _ .
payegh naketen _ gginagh it _ q uk as al eg luki _ esgh am ak luki _ sa naanghite aaten _ taw aaten _ pi kuvek _ . _ â
nanugh m _ taawa _ vuuslegh t _ uqiigh at _ anigu a _ iigge a _ .
S ug r ug w eg ni _ kanaghte lukek _ taw aa v ek _ kii _ ug w in igh llag aat agh luni _ sivugte luni _ igleghte uk _ .
T a z ing an iq aagh aq _ taw aa teng w aaq _ alla _ pi laatagh uq _ .
pingayut ii ta ani _ taw aaten _ pi llgh em _ kii _ sivungagh t _ aga _ pengetaagte ghllag aa _ qaprag te ghllag _ aliighte yu gnite uq _ .
â _ taakwa _ taakwa _ payegh ainkung _ , _ ku g w egh m a _ taakwa _ payegh ainkung _ .
aatak _ pi sqe lleg mtun _ pi naqe lghaaten _ , _ â _ nanugh m _ pi a _ .
tughwaagh yalghiimi _ kii _ , _ nan ul gh utegh ll aa k _ pangaleg te aqe uq _ .
legan _ mekelghiigh _ taagken _ nanugh m _ saaghw aneng _ aqfaasnaq _ pi sqe llegh atun _ paayghi a _ s um egh tagh am agh mi _ , _ â _ siingenllu _ tuqu kau lghiinga _ neghigh pigte luku _ . _ â
kii _ , _ kaat ute te luteng _ mekelghiigh _ quy ak saq meg teg gu _ nanugh t _ nagun _ ipa _ sugrug mig aqe aghte litgu _ alunge aghte aqe luku _ .
nayag eng llu _ taana _ kaate luku _ quy aa kaa t _ .
mekelghiigh _ elngaatall _ nanugh m _ qaye inagh akun _ aygugh uq _ .
ne meggnun _ kaat ute aat _ .
nanugh lghute ghllag nguq _ tamaa _ .
ataasigh igh ngugh _ taawa _ aange pigte uq _ .
itghute aat _ ne meggnun _ mekelghiigh _ .
atkug teng _ m at aghq ugh yaq meg tek i _ yugughte uute ut _ .
uglaghyagagh ghllag u ut _ elngaatall _ .
U g w at ang an i te f tugh nguq _ taawani _ nanevgagh ghllag _ sa na nigh ke aq _ .
tawaten _ tagtalmi _ aghnagh m _ pi ma kanga _ mekelghiigh _ , _ â _ U g w ik aghq al gu nga _ qaga _ .
nagaqugh unga _ ug w ik aghq am ang uq _ aqelqaghniigh naqe aaten _ , _ tuqute naqe aaten _ nuliighqagh ni _ wayagh naqe ni luku _ .
whaa _ un am ing in aq _ legan _ keleg naqe aaten _ . _ â
mekelghiigh m _ akite a _ , _ â _ qayughllak qun _ pi langa _ .
elpek _ n angll ek es teng iigh h aqa _ maligtekaqe kemken _ tuquma te kete na luten _ .
legan _ yugusigh ka _ pegte luku _ ayuqe aqa _ . _ â
unaami _ qakma _ mayugh ai _ iiyagh itnun _ .
K el g iyagh tu m _ pi a _ , _ â _ naagu _ mekelghiigh _ tesqamna _ aqelqagh i _ n ul iigh q iigh naq egk aan nguq _ keleg yaghtigh sqe a _ aglagh li nguq _ aaghqutaate naqe a _ .
â _ aa-a _ , _ aglagh naqe unga nguq _ , _ â _ mekelghiigh m _ kiimsigh aa _ .
mekelghiigh _ pilugug uq _ .
nanevgagh ghllag m _ ug w a teg n il ngu u m _ qaallgute a _ , _ â _ kameg gka _ ukuk _ aate kek _ qiighnagh ite ngugh k _ . _ â
mekelghiigh m _ es ghagh yaq min i ke k _ ii _ , _ nanugh m _ ighu ghllag i _ itegaghtu magh meng _ .
â _ N ak a _ whatete ghngaaghma _ pi naqe unga _ , _ â _ mekelghiigh m _ pi magh an _ aane uq _ .
mekelghiigh _ malig llegh aat aat _ aghnagh m _ ku g w el gh ut ang an _ .
ii _ , _ yug ghllag u uq _ q er ngugh t aagh v i k _ kangllu te ghllag luni _ ayuqe uq _ .
taawa nguq _ nanugh ghnaggagh _ tallu i kek _ naflugh mun _ kenle ke lukek _ melqiite ghllag ke ak _ .
Q ugh s at ku gh n aag g aa f tuq _ utegh p aa r k it agh aq ef tuq _ .
El q un ev r ag llag ek _ taawa _ saaghw ani _ .
mekelghiigh _ ellnga _ legan _ wh at egh ll ug waagh ul ghii _ qughsatku ghllag _ kaate yaghtugh luku _ aghuliigh uq _ .
mekelghiigh _ qughsatku ghllag m _ pi a _ , _ â _ tamaa ke raaghinagh _ nuliighqagh ka _ wayagh ste nghmeng _ pi lunga _ tagsiqligh amken _ .
taawa _ nan ghi qagh luki _ wiin _ aghnaa igh naqe ait _ .
enankin _ nanghiigh te aghte lutung _ entaqun _ itagnagh yaghqaa lghiikung _ .
kayaalqe gkuvnga _ taawa _ aghnaa igh lleqe kevnga _ .
aamtaam _ whanga _ kayaalqe gkumken _ paninang _ whanga _ nuliighqagh ke kegka _ . _ â
qughsatku m _ mekelghiigh _ pi a _ , _ â _ kelenga te i unga _ aangqagh ghhagh mneng _ whaken _ milugh naqe amken _ . _ â
taagavek _ aglagh qagh luni _ miluyagaghpaghqu yalghiimi _ uka _ aq f ay ng waagh y alghii mi _ .
kaate lukek _ elqunevraag k _ talligh mineng _ p a teg yaq min i ke k _ uka _ leveklugtu te _ mekelghiigh mun _ tagi stek _ .
â _ naten qun _ pi langa _ siingenllu _ kayaalqesaghqagh ke kanganga _ , _ â _ mekelghiigh _ sumeghtaghagh uq _ .
Taa k w an t aagh agh l uk ek _ p aa s qam aag ken ka _ itegagh mineng _ ak iq agh yaq min i ke k _ elqunevraag k _ p el im n neq eg sagh l uk ek _ k ag im teng ng waagh l uk ek _ .
legan _ kagimleghwaagh ghhagh u lutek _ ifkagh uk _ .
kii _ , _ aga nguq _ ii s qam s u whang un ani _ aglagh uq _ ne minun _ mangteghagh minun _ qughsatku ghllag _ .
ii _ , _ kay aal q en n il uku _ qughsatku ghllag _ mekelghiigh mun _ elngaatall _ esgh ap ag y aq _ aragh te ghllag uq _ .
aghnagh m _ ku g w el gh ut angi _ ne meggnun _ aglagh ut _ mekelghiigh llu _ taana _ .
itegh yata _ nanevgagh ghllag m _ taa w u m _ aapte ai _ , _ â _ Q ay ugh w am _ nateghtu ta k _ ? _ â
â _ aangqagh igh ma a _ mekelghiigh m _ umiileg ut _ tazinga _ .
angegh kakek _ kagimte ma uk _ , _ â _ naligh ita _ kiimsigh aat _ .
â _ taawa _ y u wh aat _ tea- ma kut _ m aal gh u wh aghn eng _ ighu llgagh at _ , _ inglu u nghite ut _ . _ â
taakwna nguq _ legan _ me ke a _ nanevgagh ghllag m _ , _ â _ inglu u nghite ut _ ! _ â
unaami _ qakma _ keleg laatagh aat _ mekelghiigh _ , _ â _ Y u wh agh nguq _ esqamna _ aqelqagh ghhagh i _ aglagh li _ aghn iigh naq egk aan nguq _ este aghagh te naqe a _ . _ â
mekelghiigh m _ kiimsigh aa _ , _ â _ ahaa _ , _ aglagh naqe unga _ .
natete naqlaatagh a _ este aghagh vig _ . _ â
nanevgagh m _ ungipaate a _ , _ â _ este aghagh te naqe aaten _ megh mun _ ayuqe lghii mi _ pennagh mi _ .
T es aam a _ megh m _ tegh h an i tut _ pi nga yu t _ uy gh aag et _ .
ataasigh _ tegh ig l ug w es tun _ angka uq _ , _ ila a _ q et g agh waagh tes tun _ , _ enkaam _ pi nga yu aat _ angtaagh ghllag stun _ .
T a z i ngu m _ umiileg m _ taana _ qukaqligh _ megh meng _ aliigh ste aghte aqe a _ p al aghh agh meng _ ayagaghte nghminigu _ tegh ghhagh aneng _ samaken _ . _ â
nanevgagh _ pi laatagh uq _ , _ â _ nukalpigagh u lunga _ whanga inagh ma _ qukaqligh _ taana _ weni _ gh h atagh tegh pag aq aqa _ megh eng _ .
aatak _ naten _ pi naqe lghaaten _ .
ayapghaatagh gka _ ukuk _ aate kek _ . _ â
mekelghiigh _ pi uq _ , _ â _ yeghlegi llu _ taw aa te tegh ng aagh m a _ alla _ pi naqe unga _ . _ â
taawa _ aglagh laatagh uq _ .
pennagh m _ q ag ugh r ug w ani _ utegh p aa r k it agh aq ef tuq _ qughsatku ghnaggagh _ .
Taw aa teng w aaq _ pi laatagh aa _ qughsatku m _ , _ â _ kayaalqe gkuvnga _ aghnaa igh lleqe kevnga _ , _ aamtaam _ whanga _ kayaalqe gkumken _ p an in eng _ nuliighqagh ke kegka _ .
esghapag nga _ tawaten _ pi s qell u ten _ m agh yaghq un naq am ken _ . _ â
qughsatku _ pennagh neng _ aga _ estu uq _ megh mun _ .
legan _ aga _ naagu _ talugh qagh uq _ .

taawa _ nuug luni _ uugg tuq _ .
â _ H aa _ , _ el p eg ng am _ , _ â _ kayagte a _ mekelghiigh _ .

kii _ , _ pinqusigh mineng _ pagsinga _ uglagh uq _ imani _ .

taawa _ tuqute a _ .

â _ tuqute ma a _ , _ mekelghiigh m _ tuqute ma a _ .

nanevgagh _ akuzi uq _ , _ â _ H ii k _ , _ taa w aa _ m aal gh u wh aghn eng _ ighu llgagh at _ y u wh aat _ inglu u nghite ut _ .
tugumiigh ghhagh it _ g uu tu t ang it _ suvinaghtu ut _ aqnighnagh ut _ .

ii _ , _ pilugugtugh uq _ nanevgagh _ .

avangite te usi _ , _ am ig igh waagh teng ii tu si _ . _ â

mekelghiigh _ n angll ek is te min eng _ nulightugh uq _ .
tagtalmi _ ighnegh nge ma lghiik _ .
naqam _ enraq _ veghute naqutke ghllag aat _ mekelghiigh _ ne anun _ nulighh a llu _ igh negh h allu _ maligte te lukek _ .

uzive a

ungipaghagh t
imlaa ngiighhagh t
I m l aa ng iigh h aa s _ tamaakut _ .
A f tan aq m tek i _ maana _ tamlu ngiighhagh itgun _ s eg ll uki _ tekegh mnneng _ nayug luki _ .
maana _ . . . _ am ii r aagh h ii _ gh h atagh ll uki _ .
taagken _ ghhuugh aqe aput _ .
G h h u un em tek i _ legan _ amiiragh i _ ghhatagh aqe ut _ yugusigh meggneng _ .
itegagh ghhagh aneng _ iiggagh ghhagh aneng _ gh h uugh waagh luki _ .
taakut _ ukimallegh i _ qilleghte luki _ naa s q w akun _ s ev l ugh akun _ .
Q ill agh ll uki _ lli aqe aput _ nategh mun _ .
legan _ m el q w i _ k iin gh aq ut _ g g at am agh meng _ am ii r a s _ taakut _ yugusigh meggneng _ .
ghhatagh nghata _ qafsina neng _ qavagh qugh luki _ ghhatagh nghata _ it gh u il uki _ afta aqe aput _ .
afta luki _ s ev l ugh h w aan eng _ u ug ken _ q a pi q el tagh luki _ naa s q w i _ .
uulte magh ita _ .
ighneghwaagh ghhagh i _ es tu ghi t neng _ qep ugh luki _ iigge i llu _ itegagh i llu _ .
U us luki _ sa ta i _ qaaske aqe luki _ kevigh aqe ait _ .
kevigh luki _ taaqe nghmegteki _ nategh mun _ ateghte luki _ k in eng ll agh aq h t _ kenlanga _ kinegh llegh itnun _ .
ugtinghagh
U g t in gh a s _ tamaakut _ .
alngunak _ ugtinghagh u iqe aput _ amiiragh t _ meqekagh t _ nalighmeng llu _ uygaagh t _ k iigh u tes n em tek i _ m el q w i _ meqesigh luki _ tawaten _ gh ef sigh luki _ gh ef sigh luki _ gh ev en gh ata _ agaghte luki _ aqlaghsigh luki _ .
aqlagh nghata _ kaki aqe aput _ .
A m ii r aghh aa s _ tamaakut _ kaki aqe aput _ .
kaki luki _ en kaa ng am _ ug t in gh et _ tamaakut _ uq f ii ll eg am _ qaye i _ sa u luki _ atigh aqe atki _ .
S av igh h waagh luki _ s av igh h waagh luki _ whangkuta _ sakmani _ .
T ep en gh ata _ uq f ii ll eg at _ saghna luki _ .
Q aa y gh ul eg en gh ata _ s av igh ll uki _ s av igh h en aam al uki _ legan _ un llegh um agh meng _ kavighte aqe ut _ .
qaayghu meng llu _ saghna luta _ q aa y gh us _ tamaakut _ s av igh h waagh luki _ ug t in ghi t kaa q ap ut _ sa kun _ sagnegh u aagh qun _ kavighute t _ tamaakut _ ugh t in ghi tet _ .
sagnegh u aagh qun _ kanaghte luki _ maatnegh lghii mun _ megh mun _ ku u v en em tek i _ aga _ k av igh q waagh aq ut _ .
P uu f sigh luki _ tawani _ puuve nghata _ kavighqwaa nghata _ .

kuuve luki _ tawaten _ imeg luki _ lli aqe aput _ .
I t gh u ug un negh sigh aq ap ut i _ .
ketfagh luki _ tawaten _ iigge mnneng _ el ngaat a _ mingug te aqe aput _ am ii r a s _ taakut _ mingug aqe aput _ .
mumigte aqe luki _ m ing ug ll uki _ m ing ug ll uki _ imeg luki _ lli aqe luki _ it gh u ug u tes qell uki _ .
qafsina t _ qavagh qugh aqe aput _ qafsina neng _ qavagh qugh luki _ tawaten _ esghagh aqe luki _ kavighte ma nghata _ .
kavighte ma nghata _ ug t in ghi tet _ taakut _ nusug ragh luki _ .
siighnagh m _ ke p ell gh aan un _ kanaghte luki _ .
alla _ atughqagh u uute luki _ saghna aqe aput _ egte igate aput _ .
En kaa ng am _ taakut _ ugtinghagh t _ k el ag g n em tek i _ ke h ig i _ saafte luki _ .
maana _ aqlagh nghata _ aqlagh ghraag nghata _ mesiigh ghhagh meng _ sa ta i _ aga _ agh igh h aq ap us _ tamaakut _ ugtinghagh t _ .
gheve naanghite ut _ mesiigh m _ gheve snaanghite ai _ itghuugute neghsigh luki _ p ell um ghagh aq ap ut _ ne ngestagh ke aput _ taawa _ ugtinghagh u iqe ukut _ atughqaghqagh ke aput _ .
sukilpagh
S uk il p aghh aa s _ tamaakut _ , _ pennagh ani _ , _ anaavag luki _ kii ite u aqe ut _ .
enkaam _ . . . _ anaavag luki _ atkugkagh meng _ naate nghmegteki _ at ku g k aagh h negh meg te l d _ afta aqe ait _ nayug luki _ segge gpenaki _ talligh ghhagh itgun _ nayug luki _ yugusigh ita _ .
N aa s q w i _ kepe luki _ nusug luki _ talligh ghhagh itgun _ u us luki _ naate nghmegteki _ atkugkagh u luki _ keligagh aqe ait _ .
qayughllak _ ila i _ qugintagh ghllaget _ .
keligagh luki _ qugaag ii na ai _ tamaakut _ taaqe nghmegteki _ .
neghigh luku _ , _ neghigh luku _ q av ng ar ug llak _ ghhute t _ kiyang _ taghnughhagh nun _ ugh h us taq iit _ .
En kaa ng am _ tamaakut _ sukilpagh ghhagh t _ kanaghte uute luki _ aghvig aqe ait _ .
kenlanga _ m es iigh negh it ng w aan gh ata _ .
maaten _ legan _ meghtu kau lghiikut _ megh kun _ s a teg taq n ay ag ap ut _ .
S o ap - el igh luki _ .
taagken _ apeghiigh nghmegteki _ uk mang igh w aa negh meg tek i _ taaqe nghmegteki _ sategte nghmeng _ nuvugh luki _ sukilpagh ghhagh m _ amiiragh ghhagh i _ tamaakut _ amighqwaagh igh a _ .
N u v m gh luki _ agaghte aqe ait _ uksugh mi _ aqlagha mi _ elngaatall _ sa ta ngiighhagh i _ .
aghsugh aqe ut _ .
K iin gh aq ut _ .
itghute nghmegteki _ tu k r u ug f ag il ata _ ul u waagh aq iit _ .
U lu waagh luki _ tawaten _ atkugkagh t _ naate nghmegteki _ s eg g ugh aq iit _ .
qafsineg u aqe aat _ imani _ atkug t _ s uk il p at _ nalluke anka _ .
En kaa ng am _ kaki aqe ait _ .
qaye aneng _ entaqun _ .
maana _ qaye aneng _ m el q w aneng _ kaki luki _ .
kaki luki _ naate nghmegteki _ atkug t _ tamaakut _ taaqe nghmegteki _ qikmigh raagh ghhagh meng _ nag naa qu sigh luki _ aligh an _ paye i _ puvisaagh igh aqe ait llu _ qikmigh raagh meng _ t aghn eq eg t aa _ maqagh ghllag t _ uq em el eng es t aagh h aat _ .
ighneghllug
I gh negh ll ug e s _ tamaakut _ ayvegh m _ ighneghllug i _ maklag m _ ighneghllug i _ m ak l ag u ug ut _ ategh i _ .
ii- u na ghllag i ta _ qilu i _ n at angi _ iwerngaqun _ avelghagh luki _ qilu i _ entaqun _ .
saghna aqe ait _ ayveghagh negh meggni _ meqete luki _ t aan Ê¼ g ani _ tawaten _ piighhe aqe ait _ .
pi aghte luki _ taglaate nghatki _ ughugsigh luki _ it gh u il uki _ sagnegh kun _ .
ughvugh aqe ait _ q aan m angi _ megh kun _ .
megh meng _ kuuve luki _ imigh luki _ ughvugh aqe ait _ .
U gh v ugh waagh luki _ qayugh te a qun _ s aag ll uki _ ayvegh m _ ighneghllug i _ tamaakut _ .
qaye i _ k d ig agh aq iit _ ughvig kun _ .
keligagh luki _ qamagte nghmegteki _ , _ u us luki _ qaye i _ tamaakut _ .
taaqe nghmegteki _ keligagh nghmeng _ u us luki _ ilepenghaagh i _ .
En kaa ng am _ , _ maana _ uulte naqe nghmegteki _ uy gh ag g agh meng _ kanaghte vike luki _ n ar ang un aan _ legan _ uulte aqe ait _ .
U us luki _ uulte nghmegteki _ en r agh ng am _ ilepenghaagh i _ keligagh aqe ait _ .
keligagh luki _ tawaten _ taaqe nghmegteki _ sagnegh ghllag kun _ sa kun _ ughvugh aqe ait _ .
Agh h ut anga _ tamaghhagh an _ megh i _ simigh aatagh nghmegteki _ anigu meng _ anigu t _ gheve nagh pigte na iqe ait _ .
anigu meng _ kanaghte vike luki _ gh ev ng w aan gh ata _ sivugh qaghaqe luki _ sa aqe luki _ .
G h ev ng waagh w aan gh ata _ ghhuugh luki _ uksugh mi _ agh s ugh h naq negh meg tek i _ ini aqe ait _ .
aamtaam _ agh s ugh h naq en ghi n negh meg tek i _ kiig mi _ ini aqe ait _ .
ghhuugh luki _ ghhuugh luki _ tawaten _ qamagte luki _ nayemte aqe ait _ .
N ay em ll uki _ tawaten _ agaghte aqe ait _ .
agaghte luki _ k iin gh w aan gh ata _ it gh u il uki _ s eg g ugh luki _ imeg magh ita _ imeg luki _ imeg luki _ taawa _ qamagte aqe ait _ taaqe aqe ait _ .
Agh s ugh t a s _ tamaakut _ uksugh mi _ .
maklagu t _ tamaakut _ keligagh igate ait _ qaye i _ iig g em eg g neng _ kumlu meggneng _ qaye i _ ikugh aqe ait _ .
sa u luki _ at igh aq sagh et _ estugte aqe ait _ .
estugte luki _ taaqe nghmegteki _ elngaatall _ .
maana _ uu si uki _ ilepenghaagh t _ keligagh aqe ait _ .
uksugh mi _ tawaten _ agh s ugh h negh meg tek i _ k an agh ll ug et _ ategh i _ aghsughtagh u ut _ .
tamaakut _ igh n c gh ll u pig et _ ig f i negh ll ug et _ agh s ugh te llgh el nguut _ qaligh kaqe ait _ .
Agh s ugh t a s _ tamaakut _ ighneghllug t _ agh s ugh tek at _ .
aghsughtagh u aqe ut _ ategh i _ kaki nghmegteki _ .
siighnagh
siighnagh t _ tamaakut _ en kaa ng am _ ayvegh m _ siighni a _ angtughpag m _ aghnasaleg m _ siighni a _ .
amalleqa _ ayveghagh negh meggni _ saghna aqe kangit _ siighni a _ .
kelengake pigte luki _ pil ag n ay uk am eg tek i _ imanagh lgu nghata _ taglagh nghmegteki _ imani _ n us ug i uki _ s ag negh pag kun _ niive luki _ .
amalleqa _ ugh v ugh waagh luki _ ughvugh luki _ m aan aaq iit _ .
qaye i _ sivuke luki _ qapigh aqe ait _ savig meng _ .
piig yaqunaki _ pikegken _ ig l ag aan eng _ kanavek _ q a pi gh h aq iit _ kelengake pigte luki _ .
qapigh luki _ taaqe nghmegteki _ u us luki _ amalleqa _ keligagh aqe ait _ q aam n angi _ .
keligagh luki _ taaqe nghmegteki _ s ag negh pag kun _ tamaagun _ kanaghte luki _ ugh v ugh waagh aq iit _ .
Agh h ut anga _ tamaghhagh an _ megh i _ simigh aqe luki _ , _ tawaten _ upenghagh mi _ siighni a _ nekegte yagh te aqe ut _ .
anigu meng _ me ligh aqe luki _ .
anigu t _ gheve nagh pigte na iqe ait _ .
tawaten _ amalleqa _ ila i _ aq ef tagh aghq aal uki _ pi nghmegteki _ aghsughtagh ke ait _ .
elngaatall _ s iigh n a s _ tamaakut _ kagpag sigh ghllag u ut _ atugh kaqsagh ait _ .
neqe mun _ , _ aq ef tagh agh amun _ un at ap s ug mun _ saguyagh m _ sii anun _ siighnagh t _ atuqe aqe ait _ .
akitu pigte ut _ maani _ elngaatall _ .
Agh n as all ghii naa m _ angtughpag m _ siighni a _ saghna aqe ait _ .
amalleqa _ gh ev ng w aan gh ata _ gh ev ng w aan gh ata _ ghhuugh luki _ .
ghhuu ghllag luki _ elngaatall _ ila i _ aange pigte aqe ut _ .
ghhuugh luki _ inillghaatagh ke te _ agaghte uute aqe ait _ pakregnegh akun _ .
kuug igh neghtu uute aqe ut _ k iin gh aq ii s _ tawaten _ .
kiig mi _ sivungagh mi
kiig nghagu _ , _ sivuke luteng _ kiiw t _ pinagh uute aqe ut _ .
nani _ tanqigh mi _ entaqun _ may- mi _ , _ nalighmeng _ J un e- mi _ taakwani _ .
anigu _ ughug nghaani _ , _ piite te siigh at _ nunivagseghagh t _ p iit qu utaq ut _ .
En kaa ng am _ qawaag t _ ighni laghate te aqe ut _ .
manig yagh te aqe ut _ tawani _ tanqigh ani _ J un e- n em _ , _ alpa m _ manig aneng _ .
En kaa ng am _ nunivagseghagh t _ p iit qu un negh ani _ , _ aghulaghqugh te aqe ut _ aghnagh t _ , _ nunivag yagh te aqe ut _ .
akmagutagh ghhagh teng _ im igh tu utaq h t _ .
Q u qu ng agh meng _ saghna aqe ut _ , _ angukagh meng llu _ .
neghigh luku _ taagani _ , _ kiyang _ neghsapig meng _ nayug aqe ut _ nun iv aat aghq ameng _ .
nayug luki _ kinegh nghata _ aghi ste luki _ uspeqe aqe ait _ yataaghqe aqe ait _ .
En kaa ng am _ awataghpag t _ kinegh nghata _ taakut _ y at aagh qell uki _ .
sivuke luki _ itegagh i _ imigh aqe ait _ qu qu ng agh meng _ .
taagken _ qu qu ng agh meng _ imigh luki _ , _ navek _ qalqasigh an _ asi anun _ .
tawaten _ m el q w i _ qam an ing an ill uki _ nunivag meng _ kevigh aqe ait _ , _ kenlanga _ iig g aghh illu _ taakut _ imigh luki _ qu qu ng agh meng _ .
nunivag meng _ imigh luki _ ilangakun _ nunivagtu negh meggni _ , _ iwerngaqun _ pikavek _ , _ esleqe aqe ait _ .
nunivag t _ n uugh naq en gh ata _ qu qu ng agh meng _ imigh aqe ait _ .
qilleghte luki _ te p taa q el uki _ ( _ teptaaqe aqe ait _ ) _ .
taaqe nghmegteki _ , _ saayguraagh m _ qaye anun _ qaake aqe ait _ , _ nalighmeng _ si q lu w am _ qaye anun _ .
uksaagh mi _ taakwani _ nalighmeng _ uksugh mi _ taakwani _ mumigte ghesnagh aqe luki _ uk s u tes taq iit _ .
En kaa ng am _ ila a _ saghna aqe lghiit _ .
siklagh niigh aqe ut _ aghnagh t _ tangighkagh meng _ , _ qullikagh meng _ , _ akughagh meng _ , _ uqfigagh meng _ , _ saqlag meng _ , _ saghna aqe ut _ .
siighnagh m _ kepellegh anun _ kanaghte luki _ navek _ aq lagh al igh anun _ mingllite aqe ait _ .
uksugh mi _ taakwani _ tangigh ste aqe luki _ , _ un ang en gh ata _ nutaghagh kun _ , _ kemekrag kun _ uqugh ke te _ .
En kaa ng am _ yug e s _ tamaakut _ yataaghqe aqe ut _ , _ quugkagh meng _ quugsaghtugh aqe luteng _ , _ siimghu meng _ qupugh aqe luteng _ quug meng _ , _ tagite uute aqe ait _ mangteghagh meggnun _ .
uksugh mi _ quugkagh u luki _ nalighmeng _ mayughti aqe ut _ unaghsigh meng _ .
uksugh mun _ quugkagh meng _ .
amalleqa _ , _ yataaghqe aqe ut _ pinighsagh aqe ait _ mangteghagh teng _ mat- qaghte yagh aqe ait _ .
sa u a _ neqesghaghqagh _ , _ neqesghagh ightugh aqe luteng _ .
sa aqe luteng _ yataaghqe aqe ut _ uksugh mun _ .
qawaagniigh aqe ut _ ng el q aagh agh meng _ , _ leghllegh meng _ .
L egh llegh e s _ tamaakut _ ghhiitagh luki _ agaghte aqe ait _ ulpegte luki _ .
N g el q aagh aat _ tamaakut _ ilangakun _ ghhiitagh luki _ akmagutagh gnun _ kanaghte uute aqe ait _ , _ uksugh mun _ neqekaghqagh t _ ( _ neqekaghqagh u luki _ ) _ .
En kaa ng am _ nani _ taakwani _ uksaaqestagh nghaani _ igaghyagh uute aqe ut _ taghnughhagh put _ .
igagh te aqe ut _ uksulqusigh _ h o l i d ay - negh ag u _ taaqe luteng _ h o l i d ay - luteng _ alla _ piinligh luteng _ igagh te aqe ut _ uksulqusigh _ , _ kenlanga _ upenghagh mun _ .
upenghagh mi _ taaqe uute yaghagh aqe ut _ qayughllak _ samavek _ pugughilegh mun _ angyagh yagh uute aqe ut _ .
aghvegh niigh yagh te aqe ut _ .
pilaataqu negh meggni _ maalghug _ , _ pi nga yu t _ , _ estamat _ , _ unake aqe ait _ .
Q am ag teng ng waagh luni _ allute luni _ yuug _ , _ mekelghiigh _ , _ teve uute aqe uq _ .
pilag yagh te aqe uq _ .
pilag aqe ait _ aghvegh ghllag t _ .
taaqe nghmegteki _ nengighqe aqe luki _ .
inpite qugh aqe luteng _ .
En kaa ng am _ aghveghni ii aagh _ taa q en gh ani _ en r ak _ angyaghte qu uute aqe ut
upenghagh mi _ ayvegh meng _ , _ maklag meng _ , _ teghiglug meng _ , _ neghsagh meng _ neqekaghqagh meng _ .
S iq lu w al w aaq sagh tut _ .
S iq lu w al w aaq sagh tu kut _ , _ maaten _ si q lu w ap ag ii sim aaq _ .
qantaghtugh luki _ , _ pinitun _ kagpag luki _ , _ nutaghagh u luki _ , _ kumlasighvig meggnun _ kanaghte uute aqe ait _ .
En kaa ng am _ neqe _ legan _ aklukaghte gpenaan _ .
unange ni uq _ it aghn an gh ani _ , _ pinigh nghaani _ , _ un ang sagh w aa llgh at _ neq e meng _ legan _ kagpag ghllag aqe ut _ .
S iq lu w al g ul uta _ neqe _ manguna _ tamaa na _ tuugte qugh luku _ .
S iq lu w at _ uk mang igh waagh luki _ , _ kanaghte uute aqe yagh ait _ .
neqekaghqagh u luki llu _ .
qikmigh mun llu _ neghqutkagh u luki _ .
amalleqa _ maana _ . . . _ am iq en gh ata _ aghn a si n ghagh meng _ amigh kau iqe ut _ .
ayvegh t _ aghnasaleg t _ amiiqagh u iqe ait _ .
amu iqe i luki _ , _ uqiigh luki _ , _ upenghagh mi _ tawaten _ amighkagh lug kun _ angyagh m _ amighkagh lug akun _ qantagh luki _ meqesigh aqe ait _ .
M eq en gh ata _ esneli luki _ aghnagh t _ kiigtagh ke ait _ .
Taa q en gh at k i _ niightugh aqe ait _ yug t _ kinegh llegh itnun _ kenlanga _ .
kinegh nghata _ maana _ , _ imeg luki _ , _ navek _ lli aqe ait _ , _ m aan as qell uki _ atughqagh ke kangit _ .
ilangakun _ entaqun _ ayumiqullegh _ wiin _ amigh te gpenaki _ kiyaghute aqe ait _ .
En kaa ng am _ am iiq a s _ tamaakut _ en r ak _ tanpegh at _ megh mun _ ateghte luki _ aghisigh aqe ait _ kellii mi _ .
aghisigh luki _ aghi nghata _ aghnagh t _ piighhe aqe ut _ ivalu meng _ , _ aghv eq in ghagh meng _ .
pi aghte luteng _ tawaten _ a si sigh q ameng _ sivuyag anun _ pi kaghqagh meng _ , _ kingu anun _ pi kaghqagh meng _ .
pi aghte luteng _ naate nghmegteki _ qiipagh t _ tamaakut _ aghisigh luki _ sa meng _ uqigtuqagh meng _ uy ghagh meng _ nalighmeng _ sa meng _ iq ug i kun _ k an ag un _ uyghigh luki _ agaghte luki _ pikavek _ sa kun _ pikagun _ agaghte luki _ nengesigh aqe ait _ .
N eng en gh ata _ taawa _ amu iqe i naqe negh meggni _ atugh aqe ait _ .
aghnagh t _ q af si n Ê¼ g ul uteng _ , _ kaki aqe ait _ angyagh t _ .
maana _ . . . . _ asiigh ke ut llu _ u ug n ang illu _ kingu i llu _ k ak il agh aq iit _ .
nalluke anka _ naten _ pilag llegh i _ .
tawaten _ iwernga _ amu iqe ait _ .
taaqe nghmegteki _ ku v igh luki _ piineqe aqe ait _ , _ taawa _ lli aqe ait _ .
apeghiigh nghmegteki _ , _ atughqagh u luki _ ang y a s _ tamaakut _ angyapig t _ upenghagh mun _ .
kiig mi _ maaken _ savikenghaagh meng _ angyagh ke luteng _ upenghagh mi _ angyaghtugh aqe ut _ .
kiig mi llu _ navek _ pinegh meggni _ ang yaq aq ii s _ tamaakut _ .
kiig mi _ enraq _ amalleqa _ nunaagh meggnun _ pi laghate aqe ut _ .
unangniigh na luteng _ , _ iqallug niigh na luteng _ , _ iigge na luteng _ , _ aki ughtekanga _ maaten _ tugutlug llu _ , _ ar t i f a c t- llu _ s pe c im en - a _ .
naalkuteqaghte negh meggni _ elngaatall _ ak iv ag si t k aq iit _ tu k f igh tugh tet _ aglagh nghata _ .
llaaghanwha _ legan _ sa mun _ akituqagh mun _ .
ullghitagh mun _ sa mun _ allgegh sigh ke aqe ait _ .
En kaa ng am _ kiyang _ uksaaqestagh nghaani _ iigge aqe ut _ elngaatall _ .
qawaagniigh magh meng _ .
uksaagh mi _ mughute magh meng _ .
uqlighsagh magh meng _ , _ unange negh meggni _ amiiragh it _ saghna luki _ aki ngllagh aqe ait _ .
N eq ang i s _ tamaakut _ ilangakun _ neqetu negh meggni _ agaghte luki _ aqlaghsigh aqe ait _ .
nutaghagh yug negh meggni _ nutaghagh u luki _ gaagh aqe ait _ .
taana _ elngaatall _ megnu nagh pigte yagh uq _ .
awaligh uute aqe luteng _ ava ite ngugh nun _ ne nun _ .
awalightugh aqe luki _ elngaatall _ .
tawaten _ neqe _ quunpeng _ ila meggnun _ tuune luku _ ayuq aq sagh agh put _ y u pig g agh ni _ whangkuta _ .
laluramke t _ pi ll ghi t ni _ s h ar e- el uku _ yug lgute mnun _ ava ite ngugh nun _ .
neqe pig
afta luki _ neghsagh t _ un ang en gh ata _ , _ gaagh aqe aput _ .
maana _ . . . _ ugkelli luki _ , _ megh t _ taghyugh ligh luki _ , _ ilangakun _ aghipsaate luki _ , _ ilangakun _ k it egh qell uki _ d ep en d s _ o n _ naten _ piyuke llegh stun _ .
enkaam _ ayvegh t llu _ tawaten _ pi aqe aput _ , _ maana _ nutaghagh u luki _ maana _ ugkelli luki _ manguna t _ , _ kemekrag ligh luki _ .
qilu i _ ughvugh luki _ u us luki _ , _ ilangakun _ ighsaqugh t llu _ gaagh aqe aput _ .
aghipsaate luki _ pi y un em tek i _ k it egh qell uk illu _ .
uuk _ , _ maana _ ilangakun _ neghsagh t _ kinegh ngllagh luki _ aqlagh nghata _ ama _ gaagh aqe aput _ , _ negh s at i u _ tamaakut _ .
inglu t _ legan _ agaghte aqe ke put _ aq lii s qell uki _ .
aa-a _ , _ taawa _ .
neqekrangllagh
sivuke luku _ m as h _ b o w l - kun _ , _ qayuusigh _ maatneghraag _ kuuve luku _ , _ maalghug _ alquutagh ngestagh k _ s ak ar ameng _ , _ ang u r gh aa ll uk ek _ s ak ar a _ .
kuuve nakegken _ maalghug _ package-k _ y e as t- ak _ tawavek _ maatneghraag mun _ megh mun _ .
qallaqugh neghsigh ma luku _ , _ p al aq an ii luku _ qayuusigh meng _ s ak ar a _ sagnegh mun _ tawavek _ kuuve luku _ .
para meng _ tawaten _ pi nga yu t _ p eng ugh ugh ll uki _ al qu ut agh pag et _ tawavek _ ilate naken _ s ak ar amun _ .
enkaam _ maalghug _ alquutagh ngestagh k _ taghyugh meng _ .
maalghug _ qayuusigh k _ ug uq nagh llag meng _ megh meng _ kuuve nakegken _ tawavek _ para mun _ , _ p ar an ku g nun _ s ak ar an ku g nun _ kenlanga _ para _ ughug llegh anun _ .
ughug kan _ en kaa ng am _ ang u r gh aa ll uku _ , _ ilate naken _ maalghug _ qayuusigh k _ mamagh meng _ , _ f r es h _ milk- meng _ nalighmeng _ d r y _ milk _ mamagh ngllagh qagh luku _ .
taake uk llu _ maalghug _ manig k _ , _ ilate lukek _ tawavek _ ang u r gh aa ll uk ek _ , _ y e as t- allu _ ilate luku _ .
enkaam _ elngaatall _ nun m aa wh aq _ avlawa ligh luku _ eg g b e ate r - el gu ku v ek _ nalighmeng _ el e c t r i c _ b e ate r - el gu ku v ek _ .
N un m aa wh aq _ avlawa ligh magh an _ ang u r gh aan nak en _ , _ kenlanga _ igughte llegh anun _ .
aghtugh yagute kan _ el e c t r i c _ b e ate r - meng _ , _ iigge gpeneng _ taana _ akuute naken _ .
avlawa _ ilate naken _ tawavek _ akuutagh mun _ kenlanga _ igughte llegh anun _ .
igughtekan _ tawani _ sagnegh mi _ mesiigh ligh luku _ taana _ akuute an _ ghhuughsigh naken _ saape luku _ sangighqugh sigh meng _ v eg ll um eng _ kenlanga _ ghhuu llegh anun _ .
ghhuugh kan _ en kaa ng am _ gaagh naken _ mesiigh kun _ .
tawaten _ mesiighquute tke aat _ neqekrangllagh t _ kenlanga _ qamagte llegh gpeneng _ taana _ akuute aq _ .
mangteghapig
neghigh luku _ mang tegh a pig g aal uta _ mangteghapig put _ ef lu ug al g et _ nategh leg t _ angyagh m _ amu iqe yagh ka aneng _ ategh i _ vuvegh t _ .
En kaa ng am _ mingle t llu _ quyngigh m _ amiiragh i _ , _ sang w at _ allighaghqagh t _ , _ aagra t _ .
iwhani _ taakut llu _ , _ maana _ , _ sang aa w at ii _ , _ p uy g aan ka _ ima _ ( _ suugernge t _ ) _ .
tawaten _ eng kaa ng am _ , _ nanigh lightugh luteng _ nanigh m _ p uy uq er ug aqegk angi _ puyuqe aqe kangi _ entaqun _ .
maana _ aagra ten _ tamaakut _ tanughqe aqe kangit _ .
T an ugh qell uki _ m aan aaq luki _ sa meng _ iwhani aqe luki _ ( _ sategte luki _ sallegte aqe kangit _ ) _ .
E ng kaa ng am _ aq lagh agh r aag mi _ q at egh r ak e tun _ kinegh na iqe kangit _ s u p el g agh luteng _ vuvegh teng _ tamaakut _ .
ama _ tan ugh q eng ng waagh aqegk ang it _ .
neghigh luku _ ila it _ nekegte ghllag na iqe kangit _ legan _ whangkutestun _ maaten _ n ek eg sagh waagh aq elghii t _ .
temkagh ak
sivuke luki _ nazighagh at _ temkag ngllagh aqe aput _ .
maana _ qafsina t _ pi nga yu t _ estamat _ angtale akun _ amiiragh m _ .
En kaa ng am _ sivuke luki _ af tan em tek i _ aghvig aqe aput _ amiiragh t _ elngaatall _ uk mang igh sagh waagh luki _ , _ m es ii ghii t ng waagh luki _ .
maana _ kiig mi _ aane ste luki _ , _ sa kun _ tefte luki _ nalighmeng _ c l o t h es l in e- kun _ , _ m el q w i _ kinegh ngllagh aqe aput _ .
kinegh nghata _ n iigh tugh aq h ik i _ .
uksugh mi _ anigu kun _ tuute aqe aput _ .
tuute luki _ ufsug luki _ niightugh aqe aput _ .
kinegh nghata _ en kaa ng am _ ( _ niighigh luki _ esne igh luki _ pellug aqe aput _ ) _ pellug luki _ , _ p ell u ghi k i _ , _ pi nga yu t _ , _ estamat _ nalighmeng _ p ell u ghi k i _ aghvig luki _ aane ste luki _ .
maana _ upenghagh mi _ qafsina neng _ qavagh ste luki _ itghute luki _ aqlagh ma nghata _ ulug aqe aput _ .
kinegh nghata _ nenge qagh luki _ pellug meng _ taawa _ l iigh qell uki _ temkagh u luki _ kaki aqe aput _ .
amiiragh t _ , _ m aal gh ut _ ighu ke luki _ ataasigh _ n aal k ak luku _ .
En kaa ng am _ maaten _ z ip p er - el igh luki _ ugh f ig i _ paagkut _ ( _ paagna i _ ) _ q ii p agh aghh ag l i meng _ iwhani luki _ kakivike luki _ sa u luki _ atigh aqe ait _ ( _ n ung igh sigh aq ap ut _ ) _ .
kaankut llu _ tukughagh i _ en kaa ng am _ n ung igh si g l il uki _ maana _ .
taawa _ tawaten _ ulima aqe aput _ temkagh at _ .
I l ep gh aagh et
Q ull ig et _ maakut _ il ep gh aagh et _ .
quyngigh meng _ amigh meng _ ulima aqe ke put _ .
amigh t _ ugmestaaghhagh t _ entaqun _ sa u luki _ atigh aqe atki _ , _ y e ar l ing - et _ .
tamaaken _ il ep gh aa ng ll agh aq ut _ .
maana _ aghu iqe luki _ sa ta i _ agh iq ng waagh luki _ .
imeg luki _ lli luki _ y u ku tagh r aag g negh ata _ pe t l ug aq iit _ .
pellug luki _ pellug luki _ y u ku taq luki _ imeg luki _ lli luki _ , _ itghuugute nghata _ ketfagh luki _ ulug aqe ait _ elngaatall _ ulug luki _ esne i _ maana _ tukegh aqe ait _ , _ nengte aqe ait _ , _ unite te lugh u i aghagh aqe ut _ tukegh nghmegteki _ .
tawaten _ lli luki _ ketfagh aqe luki _ ulug aqe luki _ kenlanga _ unite te lugh u i aghagh llegh itnun _ .
unite te lugh u i aghagh nghata _ taawa _ k av igh v aag meng _ kavighte aqe ait _ .
ila i _ tea- ma uten _ kaviigh igh yagh te lghiikut _ .
kavighyaag meng _ kavighte luki _ qaye akun _ mesiigh ghhagh meng _ m es iigh qell uki _ ( _ angighhe aqe ait _ ) _ .
M aan an ay uk ata _ kavighyaag i _ gheve na yu kata _ ( _ ifkagh na yu kata _ ) _ .
tawaten _ ulug aqe luki _ taaqe nghmegteki _ lliighqagh ke ait _ il ep gh aagh et _ .
L l iigh qell ghiit _ n all uk ek an igh an ka _ .
iwernga _ tawaten _ entaqun _ tu ung gh ugh ll uteng _ ayuqe ut _ tem kaa s tun _ .
tawaten _ tukughagh i llu _ kaankut _ , _ qukagh i llu _ es n el aag u sigh luki _ q ii p agh aghh agh m e a g _ n ung igh sigh aq iit _ .
I l ep gh aagh e s _ tamaakut _ tem kaam _ ilu akun _ m el q w i _ qam an ll uki _ kemegmigllug ke i _ atuqe aqe ait _ .
kameg
amalleqa _ tamaakut _ neghsagh t _ amiiragh t _ , _ k am eg m i m _ a tuq naq n em tek i _ , _ neghsapig t _ un Ê¼ g avek _ m ugh un iigh mun _ atuqe aqe ait _ .
qazigyagh t _ quyillegtagh u aqe ut _ .
ategh it _ qu iy ill eg t at _ .
qazigyagh meng _ ulima aqe aput
En kaa ng am _ , _ neghsapig t llu _ qazigyagh t llu _ .
En kaa ng am _ amalleqa _ neghsapig t _ tamaakut _ amiiragh t _ qigugh luki _ , _ m el q igh at _ atigh kau luteng _ .
M el q igh a s _ tamaakut _ amalleqa _ mughunniigh mun _ atugh aqe ut _ kameg t _ .
S ang aa w at ii _ ategh it _ , _ aku gh v ig aw aa qu t _ .
kelulighagh ke aput _ maalghug gneng _ megh mun _ itegh yaghqaa fqiita _ ( _ taape yaghqaa fqiita _ ) _ .
En kaa ng am _ m el q igh a s _ tamaakut _ ama _ iwhani u aqe ut _ ipigkingwaagh u aqe ut _ .
ipigkingwaagh mun _ kaamwaagh ke ut _ ipigkingwaagh at _ takestaaghhagh t _ tukughagh mun _ ayuqe lghiit _ ipigkingwaagh ngllagh aqe aput _ .
En kaa ng am _ kaa m g e s _ tamaakut _ uygaagh meng _ uygu aqe aput _ .
paagna i _ k al ef tagh luki _ n ung igh te l igh luteng _ ( _ n ung igh te l igh luki _ ) _ .
En kaa ng am _ singig ligh aqe aput _ ama _ uygaagh meng _ singigh ghqusigh luki _ .
Q uy ill eg t a s _ tamaakut _ singigh ghqusigh aqe aput _ ug t in ghagh meng _ .
nalighmeng _ m el q igh agh meng _ .
ilangakun _ m el q igh aa s _ tamaakut _ ( _ ilu i _ ) _ q aam n angi _ es l al igh neq luki _ .
En kaa ng am _ , _ m el q igh aa s _ tamaakut _ akughvigagh ngllagh aqe aput _ .
upenghagh mi _ an yagh tu mi _ atuqe aqe ait _ kaa m g e s _ tamaakut _ .
tawaten _ legan _ uygiinghagh meng _ uygu luki _ n ung igh sigh luki _ maalghug gneng _ kelulighagh ke aput _ .
maana _ megh mun _ itegh yaghqaa fqiita _ ( _ taape yaghqaa fqiita _ ) _ .
En kaa ng am _ i pig k ing waagh e s _ tamaakut _ ama _ m el q igh aa w aq ut _ .
Agh h ut anga _ tamaghhagh an _ kaame kaqe kangit _ .
maana _ i pig k es t aghh aal uki _ ipigkingwaagh t _ ategh it _ .
uygiinghagh meng _ uygu luki _ , _ singigh luki _ , _ uygiinghagh meng llu _ .
maklag m _ amiiragh aneng _ natigh aqe aput _ egte luki _ .
En kaa ng am _ ila i _ kameg m _ ratamyaag t _ .
ategh it _ ratamyaag u aqe ut _ .
kiig mi _ kameraagh ighllug qu _ atuqe aqe kangit _ .
taape neghllug t _ piyug mi _ megh mi _ .
aghinagh mi _ atugh aqe kangit _ .
iwhani _ kameg t _ atugh t _ mughunniigh mun _ angyaghtugh sigh mun _ atugh t _ .
melqugh igh aat _ kameg ngllaghkagh t _ m el q igh aa s _ tamaakut _ qigugh luki _ akughvigagh ke aqe kangit _ .
A ku gh v ig a s _ tamaakut _ taaqe nghatki _ atugh nghmeng _ u us luki _ sa ta igh aghte llegh igh a _ qigugh llegh an _ ilaagh luki _ .
kelu ligh luki _ maalghug gneng _ m es iigh qell uki _ taape neghllugte yagh luki _ natigh aqe ait _ tamaaken _ m el q iigh agh meng _ singighte luki _ .
enkaam _ kiig mi _ atuqe aqe ait _ piyug mun _ .
quyngighniigh negh meggni _ atuqe aqe ait _ ivagh i yagh te negh meggni _ .
uksaagh mi _ es n igh q w at aan negh meg g ni _ sa mun _ legan _ atuqe aqe ait _ en kaa ng am _ .
sanaghte a
kamegkagh t _ amiiragh t _ .
quyillegtaghqagh t _ kamegkagh t _ .
M el q w i _ esla anite luki _ pellug aqe aput _ sivuke luki _ pellug luki _ m es ii v r egh agh t en gh ata _ m el q w i _ b r us h - aq ap ut _ s o ap - el igh luki _ megh mun _ .
B r us h - el uki _ kinegh ngllagh aqe aput _ m el q w i _ .
kinegh nghata _ sa ta i _ aghu iqe luki _ imeg luki _ lli aqe aput _ y uq ut agh tes qell uki _ .
Y uq ut aghh negh ata _ taawa _ l iigh qell uki _ atuqe aqe aput _ kameg mun _ .
En kaa ng am _ alla u ut _ temkagkagh t _ allighte kaghqagh t _ .
nazighagh at _ s an aghh n em tek i _ pellug luki _ aghvig luki _ esla kun _ agaghte uute luki _ .
aqlagh nghata _ kinegh nghata _ itghute luki _ ulug aqe aput _ .
ulug aqe luki _ ulug aqe luki _ taa q n em tek i _ nenge qagh luki _ taawa _ l iigh qell uki _ kaki aqe aput _ temkagh u luki _ nalighmeng _ allighte u luki _ .
enkaam _ m el q w igh aa s _ tamaakut _ qigughkagh t _ m el q w i _ .
neghsapig t _ .
pellug luki _ sa ta i _ pellug luki _ taa q n em tek i _ tan ugh qell uki _ .
melqugh igh ai _ ama _ sa ta i _ imeg luki _ lli aqe aput _ y uq ut agh tes qell uki _ .
taawa _ itghuugute nghata _ liighqe aqe aput _ mughunniigh mun _ kameg u luki _ aghinagh mun _ akughvigagh t _ .
uygaagh
En kaa ng am _ uy g aagh q a s _ tamaakut _ .
neghsagh t _ nayug luki _ afta aqe aput _ .
nayug luki _ , _ am ii ii i _ yugusigh aneng _ ii k n em tek i _ u us luki _ uqiigh aqe aput _ .
uqiigh luki _ taagken _ itegagh i _ ii x i _ taw an ll uki _ sagnegh mun _ kanaghte aqe aput _ .
Taa q n em tek i _ uqiigh nghmeng _ uqugh aneng _ saape aqe aput _ taakut _ uygaaghqagh t _ nayugkagh put _ .
En kaa ng am _ navek _ lli aqe aput _ maatnegh ghraag llegh mun _ meqesigh aqe aput _ .
meqesigh luki _ m eq en gh ata _ aghh ut anga _ tamaghhagh an _ kelenga kaqe aput _ .
M eq en gh ata _ meqete luki _ sivugh sigh ngllagh aqe ukut _ unaghsigh meng _ .
M aal gh ut _ unaghsigh t _ sivugh sigh ke aqe aput _ .
maalghug u luta _ aghnagh ni _ sivugh aqe aput _ mesughllug i _ .
mesughllug i _ siv ugh waagh luki _ taagken _ ughvugh luki _ .
ughvugh luki _ taagken _ s o ap - el igh luki _ m e h gh luki _ lli iqe aput _ .
Agh h ut anga _ tamaghhagh an _ tawaten _ ken l ang ang w aa ll ghi t _ .
Agh h ut anga _ tamaghhagh an _ qiipe aqe luki _ qipugh luki _ qipugh luki _ megh i _ simigh aqe luki _ .
ilangakun _ anigu meng _ taakut _ kevigh aqe aput _ ghhute t _ .
En kaa ng am _ . . . _ ughug negh meggni _ ugh sigh aq ut _ tamaakut _ uygaagh at _ .
Agh h ut anga _ tamaghhagh an _ tawaten _ sivugh aqe luki _ qipugh aqe luki _ kenlanga _ gh ev ng w aan gh ata _ suugh te nanigh nghata _ megh i _ .
taagken _ suugh te nanigh nghata _ s ug g ell gh el gu ut _ tamaakut _ uygaagh at _ kaki aqe aput _ .
itegagh i _ sivuke luki _ gh ef e igh naq n em tek i _ kepugh aqe aput _ iigge i llu _ .
enkaam _ gh ef si negh meng _ taa q n em tek i _ itegagh i _ taakut _ k ak il agh aq ap ut _ .
iigge an llu _ , _ aa _ , _ itegagh an llu _ uk im all gh el g ell ghiit _ .
K ak il agh luki _ uyaqugh t llu _ pikegkut _ naa s q w i _ kepellegh m _ k ak il agh aq ap ut _ .
K ak il agh luki _ q aam ku ng it neng _ q aam ku ng aneng _ uygaaghqagh m _ taa m _ .
K ak il agh luki _ uk im all gh el g im ay uk ata _ y u v ghii gh waagh luki _ .
kaki sigh m _ q ii p an gh ut aghh aan eng _ gh uu qu sigh luki _ gh uugh aq ap ut _ .
kenlanga _ tamaakut _ awataghpag t _ uygaagh t _ .
G h h uugh waagh luki _ aane te luki _ kum l a sigh aq ap ut _ .
kumlate te nghata _ u ug n angi _ uy aq ugh h i _ ukut _ k el agh ll uki _ kaki llegh it _ unaghsigh kun _ sa kun _ qengagh m _ unaghsigh akun _ nuuve te luki _ .
tuquuqagh te aqe aput _ nalighmeng _ asighte luki _ .
uksugh mi _ an uq am _ suupe aqe ai _ taw an taq ut _ aqlagha mi _ uksugh mi _ .
tanqigh _ sa u a _ a tugh aq agh put _ .
taagken _ s uu p ng w aan gh ata _ saye akun _ asitmun _ pilag luki _ t all ii ghii t gun _ tapghagh mun _ nuuve luki _ .
ilangakun _ inillghaatagh ke te _ inglugtun _ qilleghte uute aqe ait _ .
tawani _ k iin gh waagh tes taq ap ut _ .
suupe u aghte ste aqe aput _ .
seggekagh t _ uygaagh t _ amiiragh t _ seggekagh t _ u v ghii n em tek i _ gh ef sigh luki _ tawaten _ .
G h ev ng w aan gh ata _ amiiragh m _ niightuute ka qun _ niightugh luki _ aywaa n _ tu ng ang akun _ tu ng at gun _ lli aqe aput _ nalighmeng _ mangteghagh m _ sani akun _ .
sivuqagh m _ U N G I I P A A
A ku l k i m _ apegh llegh a
A ku w aaq _ qaye ii lleghte aqngamta _ , _ taa m u m _ ila yan _ ategh i _ liite aput _ .
kinku u ta i _ taamani _ kiyaghtekagh t _ ayumigh _ liite aput _ .
ukut _ igagh t _ pi ll ghi t ni _ , _ ay um i r ug ll aa k _ sa u a _ 1 1 , 0 0 0 _ ayumiqullegh _ , _ uukna _ alaska _ salin _ ugpeqe llegh meggni _ qute u luku _ pamavek _ .
sivuligh t _ kiyaghtekagh t _ , _ ukani _ alaska- mi _ , _ kiyaghtekau lghiit _ esne mi llu _ , _ qungevagh ni llu _ pagani _ .
iqallug meng _ , _ teghig ke te yameng _ neq ek luteng _ .
S c i en t is t- tet _ ugpeqe llegh itni _ O n i o n _ P o r tag e- en Ê¼ nguq _ 1 0 , 5 0 0 _ uksughtu tke aagh _ .
ayumightagh ghllag u uq _ .
whani _ igagh ni _ whaa _ ila i llu _ ategh i _ :
T ang l e _ L ak e _ , _ H e al y _ L ak e _ , _ taana llu _ kukuleg _ , _ m aan l e nguq _ qiighqagh mi _ , _ taawanginaq _ k i w an l e nguq _ sivungagh mi _ .
taana ta _ G e is t- am _ , _ ar c h e o l o g is t -em _ , _ U n iv er si t y - ng anun _ A l as k a- m _ , _ iig f ik egk aa _ mangteghagh ngllagh luteng _ aange lghii meng _ .
qepghaqagh u uq _ tawani _ uglagh lghii _ ayumiqullegh _ .
I ig ll uteng _ liigikekagh at _ yug t _ kiyaghtekau ni luki _ 1 0 , 0 0 0 _ ayumiqullegh _ .
En tag un _ 1 0 0 _ y e ar s - ngugh tuq _ paaghqagh ite u te mineng _ .
ipa u uq _ whanga mni llu _ .
Taa m _ kukuleg m _ ang tal nga _ apegh ma kangat _ ; _ 8 0 0 _ feet _ tag tal nga _ , _ 1 4 0 _ feet _ iq e tu l nga _ .
tawaten _ angka ni luku _ apeghkagh at _ .
asivagh nun _ samavek _ laag ke aat _ esghagh na luku _ naten _ agh y uq agh tu l nga _ .
N al ku s aaq at _ elngaatall _ tawani _ .
M aa te meng _ kenlanga _ tazimavek _ , _ 2 0 0 _ ayumiqullegh _ .
ila i _ naalkutaagh it _ liigike nayagh anka _ nateghtu langi _ , _ naken _ tagi kau ta i _ .
mayughwaagh mi _ q af si n Ê¼ gu ut _ nenglullug t _ maa _ .
ataasigh _ naayghagh m _ iinwaagh anite uq _ .
liigike lleg mni _ sivulighte aq _ na _ neli yuwhaagh ke aq _ , _ maani _ sivuqagh mi _ , _ ategh ke ait _ iinwaagh mii t _ .
ayumightagh ghllag t _ , _ aghyugh qagh lleghpigagh at _ n aal ku t aagh en Ê¼ nguq _ maani _ uugte vig meggneng _ pi u ut _ .
N aat gh an il nguut _ taakut _ naayghagh m _ mayughwaagh mii u ut _ , _ maalghug gneng _ q as pi qu ll ghii neng _ neli llegh it _ ataasigh t _ pungughmii t _ iglegha lgutke ait _ .
Taa m _ asi ani _ naalke lleqe asi _ s an qu ut aa ghi t _ ayumightagh t _ agavek _ â _ O l d _ B er in g _ S e a- gh m ii nun _ . _ â
ayveghyage mii t _ taakut _ ama _ ne t _ , _ aygugh ghhagh itni _ mayughwaagh mii t _ .
ayuqligh m _ ila yan _ salin _ atigh aqe ainkut _ ayveghyage mii neng _ .
S iq lu w agh y ag m iit _ taakut _ naayvagh m _ aygugh ghhagh anite ut _ , _ taakwavek _ kete mun _ .
sume mni _ taakut _ S iq lu w agh y ag m iit _ entaqun _ 2 0 0 - 3 0 0 _ y e ar s - ngu t _ .
iwernga _ taakwani _ naalkutaagh t _ pungughmii stun _ ayuq ek an igh tut _ .
ila i _ naalkutaagh m _ aghyugh ghllag aqe luteng _ ayuqe ut _ .
unegkut _ ne mta _ ak ing an il nguut _ nenglullug t _ entaqun _ 1 5 0 _ y e ar s - nguut _ , _ wallu _ ing av aq aan t at _ .
wata _ un Ê¼ g an l e nguut _ , _ maaten _ qagi m _ naafqekagh i _ , _ 1 9 0 0 -em _ n at ang ani _ ne u yagh lghiit _ : _ A n ang t in kut _ , _ Taa ng y at en t kut _ , _ kinku t llu _ .
taawa _ lii g ik egh r aag agh put _ nani _ kiyaghtekau ta i _ yug t _ , _ qavngaghtagh u ta i llu _ .
tawani _ O l d _ B er in g _ S e a _ T w o - mi _ allangughte ut _ igaqragh llegh it _ .
whanga mni _ qamagte luteng _ pi niigh pigte ut _ .
ila i _ igaqragh llegh it _ q aa y v an taq luteng _ qukagh itni _ .
punguug _ taake uk _ mal gh ugh qell u tek _ ayuqe uk _ :
sivuligh k llu _ , _ punguug _ , _ kinguligh k llu _ punguug _ .
P u ngu u m _ culture-nga _ mingite te luni _ ayuqe uq _ .
sivuqagh mi _ maani _ ulu ii ma uq _ naalke aqe aat _ pungughmii stun _ ayuqe lghii _ .
ketngipalag ni _ naalkute kau unga _ uugte vig stun _ ayuqe lghii meng _ .
taagani _ nuugtekagh t _ uugte vig neng _ taakwavek _ D r . _ B an d i m _ iiggekagh anun _ , _ taagken _ nuugtekagh t _ tekeghagh anun _ .
sivu ligh aat _ taakut _ K et ng ip al am _ p eng w aa k r ag an il nguut _ .
naalkutaagh put _ tawani _ uugte vig stun _ aghyugh qaghtutka ut _ .
sivuligh m llu _ P u ngu u m _ pi atun _ ayuqe lghii meng _ pi lgu uq _ tazikna _ .
ila i _ pin ii pig taa qu t _ .
naalkutaagh mteggun _ il g g n em ta _ liigike aqe aput _ naken _ c ul tu r e meng _ pi u ta i _ ulima llegh itgun _ .
uugte vig _ taana _ siv ul igh t all egh pii g aag uq _ maani _ . _ naalkutaagh mnni _ terellegh it _ m aal gh ut _ saaqwligh igh qutagh lghiit _ . _ terellegh t llu _ qam av negh tuq at _ .
uugte vig _ taana _ 2 0 0 0 _ y e ar s - neng _ ing av an tuq _ .
uugte vig mii t _ ul ii m aa ghi ta _ terellegh it _ s am av negh tuq at _ , _ awalighnegh i _ terellegh t _ q aa y v an l e nguut _ , _ angqaperugtagh llgagh u aqe luteng _ .
tuungligh kek _ uugte vig k _ taake uk _ O l d _ B er in g _ S e a _ O n e- ngu uk _ .
paninang _ uksughtutka lghiik _ tawaten _ 2 0 0 0 _ y e ar s _ .
O l d _ B er in g _ S e a- m _ igaqragh llegh an _ terellegh i _ s am av negh tuq at _ agughte magh meng _ .
taamani _ ul im ay iit k an it _ , _ iwernga _ pinigh lghiit _ igaqragh llegh i _ .
whaa _ maaten _ tu k f igh tugh tet _ tu k f ii ghi naa q utegh l i aq u ut _ taghnughhaghwaagh meng _ , _ naa s qugh waagh meng _ , _ ila aneng llu _ pinigh lghii meng _ sa meng _ all aagh ll u wh agh meng _ .
tamaakut _ taghnughhaghwaagh t _ uugte vig nun _ kaate luteng _ ayuqe ut _ .
kiyang _ taw a tek an i q _ ull im all gh i _ ayuqe te ut _ .
ila i _ taghnughhaghwaagh m _ ull m all gh i _ E g y p t- egh m iit _ ul m aa ghi s tun _ ayuqe ut _ .
N aa s qugh waagh em _ enkaam _ ila i _ I n d i an - egh m ii s tun _ ayuqe ut _ , _ igaqragh llegh it llu _ tawatengwaaq _ ayuqe aqe ut _ .
S I V U G A M _ K I Y A G H T A A L L G H A _ ayumigh
U v i m _ ungipagh a
elngaatall _ liisagh lghiinga _ , _ liite llegh ma _ kenle aneng _ taagken _ mang tegh a pi p er eg w aaq _ .
nenglu m _ ulima llegh anun _ nuugh uute kau unga _ .
nalluke anka _ enkaam _ .
iwernga _ iigna llu _ Q ay g egh t aan kut _ mangteghagh ita _ uk ak agh aan il nguq _ waamte uute te m _ allgegh vike a _ .
sallghite kanigh luku _ n at anga _ , _ k a tu m llu _ neq el gh ut al ug g am ta _ nalla ani _ , _ kaay _ , _ naa v ng w aa ll ghi l nguut _ , _ q ak em n allu _ peghukagh _ naa v ng w aa ll ghi te f tuq _ .
taakut _ es ghagh u _ .
mangteghapig ghllag u uq _ , _ ila i _ sama _ megh mun _ lliigh uute ut _ esghagh llegh nka _ , _ kiyang _ maalghug _ .
Taa ng y at en ku t lu _ , _ A n ang t in ku t lu _ tes k an an l e nguut _ .
A n ang t igh llak _ , _ paa- a _ angli stekagh a _ .
enkaam _ whangkuta _ k an an sagh pe tu kut _ angyilghagh mnni _ .
enkaam _ ug w ak agh am n ni _ T em ke r u un kut _ .
ingate kaghagh itni _ Q an e ngu un kut _ , _ qeghagh lug t _ tazingkut _ kete kaghagh itni _ N em aa y aan kut _ , _ un Ê¼ g an tu sagh tut _ .
qaasqagh _ un Ê¼ g ar ug llak _ .
uughqaghtagh ughte aqe ghngaaghmi _ pi igate ngugh t _ qaasqagh mun _ taakwavek _ , _ tes am an teng ng in agh aq ut _ .
tamaani _ entaqun _ all ang ugh tem llu _ aa s k ell i kaa l ghii _ .
enkaam _ taakwani _ ak il igh negh ani _ Taa ng y at en kut _ sama _ samavek _ lliigh ma ut _ .
kelu kaghagh itni _ A n ang t in kut _ .
enkaam _ kelu kaghagh itni _ A y m er g en kut _ .
enkaam _ taakwani _ t a z ik an iq aagh aq _ E gh q aagh aan kut _ , _ maaten _ ikegkut _ I i r g un kut _ angyaghwaagh lghutagh ita _ kete kaghagh itni _ .
U k ak agh iit ni _ enkaam _ S ii v aghh aan kut _ , _ M aa s q em _ ata a _ .
enkaam _ t aag eg kut _ qiwaaghmii lghute u ut _ .
nalugvig m _ amenqun _ uyghagagh u ta t _ t aag eg kut _ .
ilagagh te ma nkut _ , _ U q eng el iigh aan kut _ , _ N gu ung ay an kut _ es ghagh tegh an ka _ .
mangteghapig it _ t aag an tu sagh pe tut _ , _ llangaqa _ maaken _ aafte aghagh luteng _ taagavek _ .
enkaam _ taakwna _ entaqun _ uzive te yu ainkut _ esghagh lleg mni _ ug a _ mangteghagh it _ aghula i te ut _ , _ n ay aa s _ taana _ .
kelu kaghagh at _ up- ke na nga _ p aq eq r ag g ii sagh tuq _ , _ mang tegh aq r ag g ii sagh tuq _ , _ nunatu ghllag yagh uq _ .
kiyang _ uk an tu s alghiit _ , _ iwerngaqun _ taa w an iq aagh aq _ S aa v l an ku t lu _ , _ aghillug nkut llu _ , _ taawani _ maaten _ ayapghute m _ nayugh ani _ .
taakwani _ saaqwligh igh qutagh luteng _ t aan Ê¼ g ani _ im u te m _ qaye ani _ iwhani _ , _ M in aan kut _ .
tazingani _ A s un agh aan kut _ , _ P iin tegh ll an kut _ , _ U w e te l en kut _ , _ Q u w aa r in kut _ , _ K i ngu waagh h aan kut _ , _ Q en aagh aan kut _ .
U w al iit _ u w ani _ maaten _ angyilghagh vig it _ taawani _ .
tawatete yagh lghii _ taakwna _ nunaghllag _ .
iwerngaqun _ taawani _ A t ay aghh aam _ guygu an _ nalighnegh ani _ K u ul un kut _ taw an tut _ ellng in aghh agh meng _ .
ketfaghkagh ani _ tamaani _ mangteghagh t _ tamaa _ es ghagh tegh an ka _ .
taagani _ aghneghte neghtugh kanga _ , _ A y u w igh s aat en kun illu _ , _ N egh yug en kun illu _ .
Taa k w an tu sagh tut _ ketfaghkagh ani _ .
Kiyaghnegh un egh tuq a kut _ taagani _ .
M ang tegh a pi p er eg w aaq _ .
ayumigh m qun _ tanpigh kayug i _ , _ tamaa na _ .
aange lghii m _ whangkuta qun _ aange ghllag lghii _ mangteghagh ut _ .
T all im aw aa qu t _ tan pegh h et _ .
saye t _ uugkut _ amenqun _ qiipaghagh ghllag u aqe lghiit _ .
Agh v il qell uki _ saye t _ taa w eg kut _ .
tawatete aqe ut _ .
T all im aneng _ whangkuta qun _ tanpegh ke aqe ut _ .
T ag sigh ap er u waagh meng _ niightugh lghii stun _ tawaten _ putu t _ ataasigh t _ aflu ke aqe luki _ n iigh tugh tegh aqegk ang it _ .
kisaate i _ sa i _ uyghag meng _ uq ig ku sigh luki _ , _ qayughllak _ u pen gh an gh ani _ kuug igh negh mun _ lliigh nghaani _ , _ masaaghi nghaani _ tuquuqagh tke aq _ tamaa na _ niightugh vig a _ makregaghte aghte aqe uq _ .
kii _ , _ kuug igh negh mun _ sayug i _ entaqun _ iknaqe pigte ut _ .
tamaakut _ malighqutagh ma t _ uyghu iqe aat _ itagnagh ma aqe lghiit _ uyghag t _ atugh it _ .
nenglullug u yagh lghii _ iigna _ naghaagh vig ghllag _ , _ ul ap naa r iq f ig llak _ uyghagtuqagh _ tazigna _ qellinegh _ .
qerngughte vig u yagh lghii _ , _ legan _ iiwen _ qelli ghllag luni _ naghaagh vig m _ ul ap naa r iq f ig a _ nukalpigagh m _ .
whangkuta qun _ mal ik r u ut agh taq unga _ m ek es t aanghi t gun _ tam aa ku t gun _ pi aghte aqe ukut _ .
esgha _ tamaakut _ uyghag t _ aange pigte aqe ut _ , _ neghqute m nguq _ tagite kaqe aqe ai _ .
entaqun _ iknaqe pigte uq _ .
kuule t _ estamat _ esgha _ maakut _ aa ng ep aagh r u llegh pig ii _ akmag kayugu ai _ , _ entaqun _ h un d r e d _ p o un d s - nguut _ .
amavek _ ivgagh naqe nghmini _ mangteghasqwaaghqagh ni _ sivugnagh mete te _ qam ag teng ng waagh luku _ ak m ak ayug w aa _ .
kii _ , _ iknaqe pigte uq _ taawa _ .
I ng an ll uki _ esghaqagh ma aqa _ naten _ imani _ tullumeg t _ es l egk ak aat _ .
aywaa neng _ an uq l in Ê¼ gh ani _ amiiragh t _ iq ug i kun _ petug luki _ , _ sa aqe aki _ ulug aqe aki llu _ .
kii _ , _ aghnegh h utk aq ii _ matagh mi _ tawaten _ .
qayughllak _ uvinegtu pigte uq _ .
inglu anun _ aghvightagh ke luki _ aghnegh teng ng waagh aq uq _ .
simigh aqe ai _ amiiragh ni _ , _ qevuute luni _ pinigh ghllag _ ulima yu ghllag _ .
taakut _ tawatete yaghpete ut _ .
1 _ . _ U v i
2 _ . _ T em ke r u
3 _ . _ K an ing o k
4 _ . _ N em ay ak
5 _ . _ T ung iy an
6 _ . _ A n ang t i
7 _ . _ I m er g an
8 _ . _ E k w aa h ak
9 _ . _ S ii v a h ak

1 1 _ . _ O k ig el i h ak
1 2 _ . _ N g ung ay a
1 3 _ . _ O o s ev as e uk
1 4 _ . _ S aa v l a
1 5 _ . _ A h il uk
1 6 _ . _ M in ak
1 7 _ . _ A s un a h ak
1 8 _ . _ P en tag l a
1 9 _ . _ O w it t il i n
2 0 _ . _ K u w ar i
2 1 _ . _ K i ngu w a h ak
2 2 _ . _ K en a h ak
2 3 _ . _ K ul u
2 4 _ . _ A y u w ik s an
2 5 _ . _ N ek y uk
tawaten _ ukavek _ nuugtekau ukut _ q ag ing ugh tegh lluni _ qaasqagh mun _ taakwavek _ aghsaan _ pi ste ghllag gpenaan _ salin _ .
taakwavek _ nuugh qugh te kau ukut _ .
tagi ukut _ taakwavek _ kelevagh uute kau ukut _ tamaani _ taw ate tu sagh pe tu kut _ .
elngaatall _ amalka _ piniqe te ghllag luni _ ayuqe te yaghpete uq _ , _ upughatu tete luni _ kiyaghnegh at _ .
nagaqugh lleg mni _ salleg mni _ , _ n ell iq r u ug un n em t allu _ qelegh te aqe kanginkut _ agh y uugh es qell uta _ , _ ata mta llu _ t aag eg ku gh h m ii nun _ .
yimi ke gpenaamta _ qelegh te aqe kanginkut _ agh y uugh es qell uta _ .
ukut _ kiyang _ a ngam ta _ , _ N egh yug en kuk _ , _ ayugighsagh te nkuk _ , _ naa mta _ kugegh kek _ .
tawatete yaghpete uq _ .
taakwani _ allangughte kestagh magh mi _ angli llegh a _ mangteghagh a _ ug l aa ghi k es taa m agh mi _ .
taakwna _ imiite ghllag _ mangteghagh qaqu _ all g er eg aam agh mi _ .
una llu _ pinigh yagh lghii _ iigna _ igaghvig _ una _ ukaligh _ naafqe llegh m _ kenle a _ taana _ , _ pinigh ghllag yagh lghii _ .
kii _ tawani _ aqfaqugh te ghllag aqe yagh lghiit _ .
ilulighnegh itgun _ whangkuta _ mekestaaghhagh ni _ .
E x er c is e- es t i _ ev er y _ d ay - k an i q _ .
N egh yagh tu neng _ igaghyagh neng _ aag negh mta _ p uq legh aag g negh ani _ uksugh mi _ , _ whaa _ aq f aq ut _ .
legan _ aag negh mta _ ilate aqe lghiikut _ .
ilangakun _ p uq legh aag g negh ani _ , _ t ap gh aghq un naq un Ê¼ nguq _ .
taakwagun _ U uy neq _ kenle ke ma aqe kangat _ .
sukalqagh msiigh _ tamaa na _ .
whangkuta _ uk av aneng _ ukegken _ .
taakwani _ s aag g utegh llag aq ut _ .
qamaggute aqe uq _ , _ mekelghiigh iighpag ni _ whangkuta llu _ .
kaate negh meggni _ tugh um gh an neq eg s aat aq ut _ .
aamta _ sariigh te lghiit _ , _ qemqagh uute lghiit _ tamaakut _ aqlagha _ yakugh ke igate aat _ .
I gh en naq un _ esghaghtu pigte aqa _ .
sa meng _ s ate r eg aatk at _ t aan ang u uq _ qemqagh uq _ , _ esghaate na luteng _ .
naligh _ menutu kan _ al ik s al ii s aghq aa _ taa m _ .
qaatke sag liite yaghqagh a _ .
tawatete uq _ .
sa meng _ naqam _ segh l el iigh meng _ avangite uq _ .
ghhuute igate ai _ , _ tughumgha te aqe ut _ , _ nanevgagh t _ ineghte aqe ait _ .
kumlaaghqe lleqe aisi _ taw at en Ê¼ ng am _ pi tek _ .
aamta _ ar an Ê¼ gh ata _ sate luteng _ taawa _ aghulaqe uute aqe ut _ , _ kilgaaqu te sqe aqe kangit _ seghleliigh te laatagh naqe ni luki _ , _ sa naqlaatagh ni luki _ .
legan _ q el ell ghi s tun _ , _ q aat kum t aagh llag it _ , _ whangkuta llu _ repall _ .
alingnaghte luteng _ repall _ nagate lleg mnni _ angeneghte aput _ tamaakut _ .
ii-ii _ esghagh lleqe aaten _ pi lleqe aaten _ , _ esgha _ esghapag lghii _ tazigna _ .
tawatete yaghpete ut _ , _ llangaqa _ sa meng _ itagnagh nghite ngugh meng _ kelengaruugh luteng _ .
qamugh te nghata _ tawaten _ k iig w ken _ , _ alngunak _ legan _ aghulaqe aqe lghii ni _ .
kina _ qamugh te na luku _ .
amalka _ qetgegh aatagh te kanigh luni _ ayuqe te yaghpete uq _ .
kina _ alngunak _ legan _ ayuqe yaghpete aat _ .
nani _ ug ani _ piyaqli i lghiit llu _ legan _ ayuqe yaghpete ait _ whanga _ liite lleg mni _ .
tawaten _ sa lghiit _ pillugute lghiit _ , _ nan Ê¼ ghii gh u tes taq iit _ .
taana _ inglu a _ ik naq en gh ani _ , _ aa-a _ taa q nak en Ê¼ ng am _ tawaten _ pi nghmeng _ .
â _ Taa q nak en Ê¼ ng am _ qule ii uq _ el pen eng _ , _ sa meng _ alla _ pi gpenaan _ . _ â
taawa _ ava iitagh ke ai _ .
piniqe llegh meng _ tuune aqe ait _ amalka _ .
siivanllegh t _ igleghte te i u ut _ tamaani _ .
taghtugh negh mta _ legan _ ilangakun _ taawa _ aghulaqe aqe ukut _ first _ b ell - l en at ang ani _ .
T es pik eg ku s ta _ h ig h _ s c h o o l -em _ u w al igh negh ani _ uyghagagh ghhagh t _ .
tawani _ utaqa i te aqe ukut _ kaate negh mta _ .
nula ghllag negh mta _ tawani _ nukalpigagh ni _ taawa _ iv g agh yagh ameng _ g uu tu taq ut _ tes k ig w ken _ .
tawaten _ unaangu luku _ esla _ seghleghu nghaani _ , _ tawani nguq _ uyghagte te naqe ut _ .
uyghag meng _ ategh leg t _ .
T ugh um gh an neq eg s aat aq ut _ taa ku ni _ kinku ni _ mangteghagh ni _ , _ aagra itni _ .
uyghag u te meng _ ategh leg t _ .
anigu _ um ugh h negh ani _ naghaagh vig _ ulima aqe aat _ .
itegagh m _ n aam an Ê¼ gh a tun _ nuqutupag fqaan _ .
qellughqagh vig k _ t a z ing kuk _ qellughqagh vig ghllag u yagh uk _ , _ igaghvig m _ saaghw ani _ napaqagh k _ .
sa u a _ legan _ agleghnagh lghii _ sa u a _ uksugh mi _ tamaani _ pi igate kangat _ .
sa u aat _ sariigh t _ , _ nagh aa ll qu s iigh em _ sariigh i _ agleghnagh ut _ , _ nanevgagh t _ pi snanigh llegh it _ .
naqamalla _ k iin Ê¼ gh an illu _ , _ u pen Ê¼ gh an Ê¼ gh ani _ taawa _ sa u a _ reghigh aqe uq _ , _ amalka _ sariigh _ .
K iin Ê¼ gh ag u _ tawaten _ test- pig ke na _ maaten _ pi wh an in kut _ , _ M ang taq ul in kut _ mangteghagh vike yagh kangat _ , _ ila ngllagh vig ghllag _ .
pika _ ayaviileg t _ at gh an Ê¼ gh ata _ keleg qaghtagh te aqe lghiit _ .
T iig un naq un Ê¼ nguq _ .
ayaviileg t _ k el eg tet _ amalka _ yugpag t _ .
tiig te naqe ut _ !
elngaatall _ kemeg migkagh inagh meng _ sa meng _ aate luteng _ .
U g l aa ghi gh ll an egh meg g ni _ , _ nanevgagh t _ qelegh nghmegteki _ .
angyilghagh neng _ , _ iv g agh y uq ameng _ , _ uuvganeng _ tes pii k eg ken _ q el gh aaq egk ang it _ .
ii _ , _ whangkuta _ taakwagun _ paayghi vig u ut _ ukegkut _ .
liilightugh aqe kangit _ â _ nuqeghsigh gpenaki _ , _ naayghagh m _ m ing legh r ug w aa kun _ qamagte lusi _ aag aqe tek _ . _ â
ila i _ qayughllak _ ke t f agh p aq un _ qiive aqe ut _ .
pi ste na nigh ke ait _ kaate nghata _ agh y uugh m ig aq iit _ .
taawa _ tugutagh ke ut _ .
tanemlleqa _ tugh um gh an neq eg s aat aq ut _ .
tamaani _ mekelghiigh ni _ , _ m ek elghii gh pag ugh sim aam ta _ pi aqe lghiikut _ .
iknaqe lleg leg t _ .
uuvganeng _ taana _ iknaqughi kestaghkagh _ , _ S un aagh r uk _ taana _ .
iknaqe lleghpigagh u yagh lghii _ A m ag u _ atg- ghhagh ke aq _ pamaken _ .
anglegute ke te lghiik _ y uk egh q en gh ek _ , _ sa meng _ qu u f t in aq luni _ whaken _ village- meng _ ayuqe lghii _ .
qule ii naqe k _ anengagh ke te lghiik _ , _ may- u kau uq _ anengagh a _ .
tawaten _ tagtalmi _ , _ ii-i _ S un aagh r ug em _ kaate a _ , _ kaate luku _ , _ ii-i _ sa nanigh uq _ saste nanigh aa _ .
qalepangi ghllag kek _ sa kek _ , _ ke p sigh aa k _ .
taawa _ kaate a _ kitugh aa _ sa nanighqe a _ .
llangaqa _ n at anga _ iimna _ aghsaan _ lliighqagh a _ sa mi _ village- mi _ whani _ y uk egh q en naq ell gha _ .
taawa _ kitugh aa _ .
taawa _ m aal gh u _ , _ pi nga yu _ aghni te kaghte aqe aat _ , _ mulu negh meggni _ pi nga yu neng _ .
E x c er c is e- meng _ , _ k il g aa qu meng _ .
T aan ang u uq _ kilgaaqu _ , _ tughumgha _ .
ilangakun _ tawani _ maaten _ K u ul un kut _ angyilghagh itni _ .
aastu ghllag yagh lghii _ , _ kilgaaqu te ghllag aqe lghiit _ , _ kiyang _ wh an i ku mi _ .
qellinegh ghllag mi llu _ tawani _ .
naghaagh vig ghllag u yagh uq _ taana _ .
uyghag _ taana _ kii _ , _ ila ita _ aya kataghaghkagh at _ .
ila i _ pi kegte pigte aqe ut _ , _ tughumgha igate ngugh t _ sa igate ngugh t _ , _ pi kegte pigte aqe ut _ esghapag kau luteng _ .
I ghi v g as iigh h negh ata _ tawaten _ sigute gemni _ imani _ itegh nghata _ .
whangkuta qun _ an eng aag put _ taake uk _ , _ kiyang _ entaqun _ qaagna llu _ tawatete aqe lghii _ .
â _ naken _ pi ziin _ ? _ U l ap s aneng _ pi ziin _ ? _ I ghi v g a sigh ll alghii ten _ .
U l ap s aneng _ kaate ziin _ , _ sa ziin _ ? _ â
aghnagh t _ i ghi v g a si s nan igh w aa qay u w iit _ , _ pi igate u aghte ut _ aghneq _ naten _ lliigh nghaani _ .
awatiiteg neng _ akequsagh leg t _ .
aane ste gpenaki _ aatkagh igh luki _ sakagh t _ i ghi v g agh mi _ pikagh t _ sakagh t _ .
enkaam _ aghnaghaghhagh t _ sa u aat _ kelenga luteng _ .
iwerngaqun _ ug w iiq a s _ tamaakut _ itupill _ taawa _ itagnagh ut _ .
enkaam _ sa meng _ p eg g meng _ avangite kanigh yagh uq _ .
unaami _ entaqun _ pi nga yu _ , _ es tam a _ aflu _ aghh mun _ tuungsagte nghaani _ elngaatall _ aanleghaate aqe lghiit _ .
nukalpigagh _ sa aqe lghii _ iimna _ yuvghiigh aqe kangat _ sa aqe kangat _ .
qetgegh aatagh te luni _ ayuqe yaghpete uq _ .
whanga llu _ sa lghii nun _ piyaqli lghii nun _ pi iigh aatagh kau unga _ .
T aan ang u uq _ emta _ aghyuugh ta lgu uq _ pi nghite llegh _ piyaqli i lghii nun _ .
taawa _ aghyuugh llegh ke a _ kilgaaqu _ .
T aan ang u uq _ agh y u ul eq _ .
tenge vig mteggun _ , _ whanga llu _ ilate aghtekau unga _ .
tenge vig mteggun _ aga _ ii-i _ qayughllak _ alinge ste luta _ qelegh luta _ .
Yug ugh tek a s _ tam aa kun Ê¼ ng am _ wata _ .
ila i _ ii-ii _ pin q eg s ag g aghn eng _ ayuqe ut _ esghapag lleg mni _ whanga _ .
qaatke te ma ghllag t _ esghapag lleg mni _ .
ulape luteng _ iknaqughi aqe ut _ .
unaghsigh meng _ sa meng _ aa _ , _ navek _ naayghagh leg mun _ mayugh luteng _ ukig aqe luteng _ , _ tawaten _ tugumiigh iigh luteng _ meghnugh pagllag gpenateng _ taaqe kayug t _ .
taqayuqe na yukagh meng _ taqayuqe gkumeng _ ik naq u ghi mun _ pi lleghqagh igh te yaghqagh t _ , _ taaqe lleqe ut _ , _ avangite te lleqe ut _ .
I gh en n aq _ esgha _ tawaten _ pi ke aq _ .
T aq ayuq em _ avangite tke aq _ .
A ku l gh aagh tes luku _ kilgaaqu ste aqe kangat _ .
Tam aan agh l ag em _ taqayuqe stekagh _ .
kaate nghaani _ tan pegh h ek _ tespikagun _ qellinegh kun _ angayuqagh ita _ n aku t lu _ angag ita _ aagkut _ k ii - ii _ , _ neqenghaghqe te aqe ut _ .
whangkuta _ neghe lleghqagh ite ngugh ni _ , _ nanevgagh i i na ut _ neqnighqutagh ke ut _ neqenghaghqe te ghllag aqe aat _ I gh en n aq _ taana _ kiyang _ is gh all em ni _ .
A ku l gh aagh llag luni _ aghulaqe aqe lghii _ .
U ku m _ pi i _ qateghrakegtagh t _ , _ tagnegh lghii _ , _ qateghrakegtagh _ .
entaqun _ maavek _ segesqugh mun _ akughtu tke aat _ .
llangaqa _ umupag nghite ngugh t _ sa u aat _ maklag t _ teghiglug t _ .
tuye inagh t _ ukut _ naflugh leg t _ , _ pamavek _ qakeghllug ke i _ pie- aghagh te aqe aat _ . _ tawatete ut _ , _ pin igh nagh s al g et _ n at angi _ sa lget _ igaqragh leg t _ .
K aan angi _ m ak r eg g negh meg tek i _ qughagh aqe ut _ .
