qalepgute magh ita _ kilgaaqu te kete naqe nghmegteki _ pi aqe ait _ .
qalepgute magh meng _ entaqun _ suka mun _ pi sigh t _ .
taakut _ esghagh kaqe anka _ .
ayuqe yaghpete ut _ taawa _ .
K ii - ii _ , _ llangaqa _ sa meng _ itagnagh nghite ngugh mun _ pi lleghqagh meng _ nanevgagh t _ ii s ku gh t ii r eg at _ .
T es pik an taq elghii t lu _ siqlugagh ghllag mi _ , _ nani llu _ qerngagh meng _ .
taana _ aghyuutagh lleghpigagh u uq _ ifkaghte te _ , _ tamlu nkut _ ata at _ .
me a _ q aa y v an l e nguq _ , _ iknaqe u aq _ .
nuughtugh kanigh anka _ , _ iitek _ tughumgha kayugu luki _ .
iknaqe pigte uq _ ifkaghte te _ taana _ .
Y aa v g agh s iin kut _ , _ egmigh u aghte te nkut _ ik naq ng waagh u yagh pe tut _ ivenrugh ta nge i tete luku _ tamaani _ .
angu ghllag kaqe a _ , _ a tuq egh l ak aqaa _ , _ ayghigh te luku _ whanga qun _ meghnugh igate unga _ , _ ayghigh te luku _ .
A y g ugh n am ell uki _ sa u aat _ teghig ke sagh t _ pin em tek i _ , _ i f k agh agh luki _ yaavuqugh aghte aqe ukut _ .
taawa _ elngaatall _ unaagh ghhagh aneng _ amsanagh u nghaani _ taawa _ y aa v u qu meng _ .
K ay ung ll uta _ , _ kay ung ll uta _ , _ neghaali aqe luta _ .
taagken _ kiyang _ qaatke sigh kekagh _ pi aqe kangat _ taglagh uute te mun _ wh an i ku mun _ taa k w n n ang ani _ aghvenge llegh m _ kingu ani llu _ taakwani _ k all egh t ang yagh a tes q aqegk ang in kut _ .
A ng waagh at aq u ut _ .
ila i _ , _ kii _ sukate pigte aqe ut _ .
tawani _ I f k agh ut en ku t gun _ pi unga _ , _ n uk al pig agh waagh ul uku _ salin _ ifkaghte te _ .
tuqutagh yagh lghii tgun _ ayvigtegh mii nun _ amavek _ angyaghwaagh kun _ .
S ip el an ku t lu _ taakut _ tuqutagh yagh naqe t _ .
taawa _ qemqaghtugh ai _ ifkaghte te m _ , _ ighneghqagh ke a _ S ip el a _ taana _ .
pisagh lghiikut _ , _ ii-ii _ , _ aga _ nusug kestagh ainkut _ taakut _ ighneghqagh an _ taa m _ .
tallimat ke aghtagh te _ y u ku tu kut _ .
enraq _ esgha _ taa m _ sasigh a _ seghlegh ghllag t _ , _ E gh q aagh aam _ .
maalghug gneng _ nanghiigh aqe aqa _ .
aga _ uyavagh ste gpenaki _ angwaaghute _ tugu luku _ maalghug gneng _ pi luki _ , _ inglu anun _ aghvigh luni _ , _ maalghug gneng _ pi luki _ , _ qaake a _ .
A a y _ , _ amu yagh ke put _ .
nanevgagh m _ aag us aq min i kut _ yaavuquute put _ taa k w an l eng ugh ni _ yaavuquute itnun _ pi ll g ill iq a sim agh meng _ .
elngaatall _ pi nge i kete te _ taaggun _ .
ii _ , _ esgha _ seghleghllug u ma lghii _ yuug _ taana _ .
aagken llu _ ivenruute _ allgegh kestaamaan _ , _ U z iv us iin ku t gun _ angwaaghtugh lunga _ , _ ivenrugh magh emta _ , _ telaananga magh emta _ , _ aga _ sivu mnni _ , _ aga _ amu aqe aput _ , _ whaa _ kaate yaghtugh aput _ , _ aga _ iivagh yalghiimeng _ .
I i r gu m _ neqagh m _ tawaten _ apegh llegh ke a _ .
angwaaghute ni nguq _ pi mafte a _ tawaten _ .
ima _ aga _ , _ kii _ ayuqe uq _ esgha _ .
sasigh leg t _ pi lget _ sa lget _ ayumigh m _ sa i _ .
ila i _ pi tke pigte ait _ nagate lleg mni _ , _ sa meng _ pi yaq n am eng llu _ u ug gu si q aq luki _ , _ sa meng _ qute mi _ tamaani _ taw ate tu sagh pe tut _ .
A Q E L L Q A G H N I I Q
A p ang al uu m _ apegh llegh a
neghigh luku _ sa u aat _ yug t _ naken _ kaate nghata _ maakumiu u nghite ngugh t _ aqelqagh t _ .
sivuqagh m _ iglegh negh ani _ tamaakut _ aqelqagh t _ kaate nghata _ nanghiigh yaghqau aqe lghiit _ , _ ik naq e tu l ng i _ , _ s uk a tu l ng i _ .
kiyang _ ungazigh meng _ pamaken _ pangeghte aat _ pi nghata _ , _ taa ku nguut _ aqelqaghniigh yug aqe kangit _ , _ tea- ma anun _ pagsinga na lghiit _ .
tawani _ tanqigh mi _ pinaghvig mi _ nalighmeng _ tuungligh ghhagh ani _ angutughvig mi _ pangegh t _ kaate nghata _ pamaken _ angyagh t _ , _ ilangakun _ family-tuumagh meng _ .
kiyang _ akilpegagh na luteng llu _ , _ pirughte na luteng _ pangeghte aqe lghiit _ .
iwernga _ t aan ang u uq _ aange lghii _ aqelqaghniigh llegh _ , _ talwa _ ilangakun _ aqelqagh t _ neghe ste gpenaki _ piinligh qagh yu k _ .
tawaten _ piinligh qagh yu k _ , _ yuug _ mat- ke ma ai _ ayaviightuumagh mi _ qellinegh mun _ esnevagh aqe uq _ .
tawaten _ yug meng _ esgh h aan negh meg g ni _ liigike aqe aat _ sa naqute anga _ .
aqfaqugh vig mi _ uzivgagh aqe uq _ , _ n ul angll ameng _ ategh leg _ .
kina _ alngunak _ yuug _ ateghaate aqe uq _ aq f aq uq _ piinligh nghaani _ .
nukalpigagh _ iingunagh mi _ avelghagh yaghqaa nghite ngughk _ tawavek _ .
siivanllegh t _ iiskughte i aqe ut _ kina _ avelghagh na yu kan _ .
kina _ nukalpigagh _ avelghagh kuni _ repall _ kayngu nagh lgigh a _ .
tawani _ aqfaqugh te lghiit _ nula ghllag negh meggni _ s uk aagh sim agh meng _ lliigh aqe ut _ .
paghyugh lghii _ tunuvagh magh mi _ , _ qenwat _ q af si n Ê¼ g g aagh taq ut _ .
paghyugh uute luni _ tunuvagh uute nghaani _ taana _ paghyugh neghllug _ kayaalqe i i aqe uq _ .
sivuqagh _ qamagte luni _ pagsinga aqe uq _ tawani _ , _ qellinegh mun _ tag il agh aat egh l ag aq uq _ aq el q aghn iigh mun _ esghapag yagh te aqe uq _ ing l uk s u ug ull ghii meng _ .
aqelqagh t _ aqelqaghniigh aqe ait _ , _ naligh t _ pinigh ta i _ .
A q f aq u m _ kingu aneng _ yuug _ at ku g w igh luni _ atghagh aqe uq _ qukaa nun _ aqfaqugh vig m _ .
peghleghte luni _ utaqa i aqe uq _ tes k an ani _ .
taana _ tugh um gh ameng _ ategh leg _ .
ungazighmii t llu _ maakumiu t llu _ ateghteiiraagh te aqe ut _ , _ iq un negh is t eng _ tunuvagh aqe luteng _ .
qenwat _ iknaqe llegh t _ siipte aqe ut _ taawa _ taana _ kina _ ategh ta igh te nghmini _ kayaalqe i i aqe uq _ .
neqamike lleg mni _ m aa kum iin Ê¼ nguq _ kayaalqe sigate ut _ .
aqfa qu mi _ tamaakut _ s uk aa ghi k at _ , _ paghyugh neghllug t _ kayaalqe i i kayug t _ .
ama _ tughumgha te mi _ , _ iknaqe lghiit _ , _ tughumgha lleg t _ yug iq eng egk ayug et _ .
Taa m _ aq el q aghn iigh em _ kingu ngiighhagh aneng _ teghig nagh llegh _ piinligh qagh yu k _ kalleghta _ , _ a tuq llu _ .
sa u a _ p uy g aagh ll uku _ tamaghhagh mi _ teghigniqe te aqe uq _ tawani _ .
sivuqagh m _ K I Y A G H T A A L L G H A _ 1 9 3 0 - N I
A ku l k i m _ apegh llegh a
tamaani _ us ii s tegh llag em _ kiig nghaani _ saghya _ kaa tu t kay u wa _ .
ataasigh ghhagh meng _ kaate kayug _ , _ enkaam _ ayumiqullegh mun _ saghya _ naama ste naqe aqe kangat _ .
N at u _ esnagh _ qagi ite nghaani _ taakwani _ usingigh aqe luni _ .
paamggun _ nalle kun _ , _ saamggun _ uughqa kun _ , _ ilangakun _ , _ kiyang _ uksaagh mi _ , _ amagun _ T ev legh ag ne kun _ , _ ilangakun _ U uy negh q un llu _ usingigh qagh yu k _ uukna _ qagitu nghaani _ .
angyaghwaagh kun _ saghya _ angyaghpag meng _ angaghqugh aqe lghii _ .
estamagnegh t _ d r um - et _ usi ke kayug i _ enkaam _ tapghagh meng _ qaamqaghte luki _ yug t _ uglagh te luki _ sayug aqe luki _ , _ enkaam _ qute meng _ up- llghite aghtagh luki _ tunuvagh aqe luki _ .
elngaatall _ tam agh agh mi _ sivuqagh m _ yug a _ , _ aghnagh a _ qepghagh te kayug _ tawani _ .
taghnughhagh ke te luni _ talwa _ ak m aghq ut kay uk _ .
saghya _ kiyang _ akmag luku _ ne mun _ atghagh te kayug _ , _ ila i _ qimugsigh meng _ .
D r um - a _ tamaa na _ up- llghite aghtagh luku _ atghagh te aqe aat _ kenlanga _ naangellegh anun _ .
T r a c t o r - ng ill uku _ tawaten _ ayuqe kau uq _ kenlanga _ taake uk _ K l e e t- T r a c - meng _ ategh leg k _ t r a c t o r - ek _ , _ D - 2 - u us tun _ ayuqe lghiik _ kaate llegh gkenun _ .
maligte te lutek _ B I A -em _ igaghvigkagh anun _ kaate uk _ , _ igaghvig _ ulima naqe aqngan _ .
enkaam _ pillugagh u luku _ W o r l d _ W a r _ ii- mi _ taakut _ S iigh m iit _ ( _ C A A _ housing _ ) _ nekeftekau ut _ .
tamaani _ uglagh lghii _ mat- ke ma ai _ qepghagh te kau uq _ ak il egh tu saq luku _ s ev en t y _ c en t s _ an _ hour _ .
tamaani _ nalug vike yuwhaagh _ ulima kaqe aat _ suna meng _ tangeghtuqagh meng _ angaghqugh te aqe luku _ taakwegken _ nenglullug neng _ wh e e l _ b ar r o w - kun _ .
Taa k w an tuq _ ak il igh negh it ni _ Q ay g egh t aan kut _ taagavek _ aki mun _ .
iwernga _ taa m _ sivungagh ni _ qafsinagnegh _ tengegkayug _ kaate kau uq _ maavek _ salin _ nalugvig ighllug qu _ , _ mekestaaghhagh t _ tengegkayug t _ .
O t t o _ W ill i am _ G e is t- t en kut _ ila i llu _ ar c h e o l o g is t- et _ tagite ait _ sivuligh t _ tengegkayug t _ .
taana _ tengegkayug ke yug u aq _ qesug nagh lleghpigagh u kau uq _ tamaani _ .
I ing un aghh agh mi _ sivuqagh _ pagsinga kau uq _ tawani _ teng egk ay is ug g aa llegh mi _ all agh ll ug g agh yug em _ s aam _ leg r e yug em _ .
sivungagh ni _ taa m _ tengegkayug ighllug qu _ m a il - a _ , _ sa u a _ lipeghsagh aq _ akmavek _ wetku _ ayumiqun _ ang yagh pin negh ani _ kaate kayugu yagh lghii _ .
taagken _ tengegkayug igh sagte te luni _ kiyang _ uksugh mi _ naayvagh _ ayug in Ê¼ gh ani _ kaate aghtekayug t _ .
T aag ag un llu _ qaasqagh m _ qaye akun _ kiig mi _ nalug aatagh kau ut _ .
maaten _ whaa _ nalugvig mteggun _ nalug yagute ut _ .
kiig mi _ megh kun _ nalug kayug t _ , _ ar m y - t _ pi it _ , _ naayvagh kun _ nalug aatagh kau ut _ .
pillug a mi _ tamaani _ maakumiu t llu _ alaska _ T er r it o r i a l _ G u ar d - ngugh qu utegh ll ak aag ut _ .
governor _ gruening- inkut _ , _ major _ â _ M uk tu k _ â _ M ar s t o n -en kut _ ilaligh lutek _ tagi uk _ piinligh i na lutek _ atg- meng _ maani _ .
enkaam _ kingu aneng _ taa m _ pegh qig g sagh tes t iy at _ , _ ar m y - t _ yug it _ , _ tagi ut _ maavek _ .
M r . _ D a ugh er t y _ , _ taana _ igagh a _ maani _ , _ m a j o r - ng uk aq _ sivuqagh m _ c o m p an y - ng ani _ .
K u z aat a _ taana _ c ap t a in - ngugh tuq _ sivuqagh m _ mayor-nga _ .
taakut _ A pe tek in kut _ , _ W al ang an kut _ , _ U ugh qagh m iin kut _ , _ nuug na te nkut _ l i e ut en an t- ngugh qu u tut _ , _ sivuqagh m _ council _ member-ngi _ .
enkaam _ , _ K an ug g aq _ taana _ first _ s er g e an t- k ell uku _ .
S er g e an t- tet _ , _ c o r p o r al - l et _ , _ ila i _ kinku t _ p uy g aan ka _ ategh it _ T un d r a _ A r m y - t _ , _ nalighmeng _ sigute i llu _ iye i llu _ ar m y - m _ .
sivuqagh m _ yugpag a _ , _ nukalpigagh a _ ilate te uute uq _ army- nun _ tamaani _ .
taagken _ , _ taa m _ kingu aneng _ , _ July _ , _ l 9 4 9 - mi _ , _ alaska _ army _ N at i o n a l _ G u ar d - et _ piinligh ut _ .
nukalpigagh _ kiyang _ tawani _ piinlillegh mi _ ilate te uute ghllag kau uq _ .
C A A - t _ sivuligh _ mangteghaghqagh at _ qamughtugh ghhagh m _ , _ ategh a _ B o z o _ , _ tagite kaqe a _ maavek _ b ar g e- e kun _ .
saghya _ b ar g e- m el nguq _ , _ sivuqagh m _ yug an _ qamagte luku _ usingigh kaqe a _ two _ h o u r s - mi _ .
J un e- mi _ taana _ qamughtugh ghhagh _ kaate kau uq _ maavek _ .
aga _ mangteghagh t _ nekefte qugh na aqe magh ita _ pi kaqe ait _ .
enkaam _ apegh igh tegh y ata _ , _ es l an iigh teng it _ yug t _ tagi laghate te ut _ ila i llu _ qep ghagh te m _ akmaken _ .
tamaani _ nutaan _ esghaate ukut _ esghagh igate ke mnneng _ , _ es l an iigh tet _ qepghagh sagh it _ , _ taake uk llu _ t r a c k o r - egh llag ek _ , _ D - 7 - n ek _ .
nalugvig ngllagh ut _ taagken _ s te e l _ mat- meng _ taakwagun _ maaten _ nalugvig mteggun _ .
weni _ tengegkayug llu _ kaate aghte yagute uq _ .
M a il - eng y aag u tu u ku t lu _ up-tu aqe i i ghllag gpenaamta _ .
enkaam _ taa m _ kingu aneng _ mulu luni _ nalugvig kegte yagh ut _ .
S te e l _ mat- a _ m ak r egh qugh luku _ , _ asphalt- meng _ simigh aat _ .
Taa ku nguut _ M o r ris o n - K n u d s en - n en kut _ c o n t r a c t- tegh ik at _ tawavek _ nal ug v ing ll amun _ .
taagken _ taaqe llegh an _ kingu aneng _ , _ tengegkayug m _ tagi llegh a _ akwaangigh kau uq _ maavek _ .
talwa _ salin _ nalugvig ighllug qu _ M i r r o w _ A i r _ S er v i c e- en kut _ tagi kayugu yagh ut _ .
pillugagh u luku llu _ tamaani _ , _ John _ Cross _ saghya meng _ tagite kau uq _ ataasigh meng _ veghagh ke lghii kun _ , _ megh kun _ nalug kayug kun _ .
amalleqa _ ar m y - t _ tengegkayug it _ tagi i aghagh u aatagh kau ut _ uksugh mi _ , _ talwa _ maakut _ , _ B - 2 9 - et _ .
sivuligh t _ s c h e d ul e- l el uteng _ tagi yagutekagh t _ W i en - es en kun qu ut _ , _ taagken _ alaskan- ke ut _ , _ enkaam _ M un z -en kut _ .
tawatete uq _ tengegkayug m _ ug l aa ghi llgh a _ tazimken _ .
ayumigh m _ mangteghasqwaagh i llu _ mangteghapig i llu
P el aa si m _ apegh llegh a
mangteghasqwaagh t _ sivuke naqe anka _ kiig mi _ atugh t _ . _ U g lagh tal es tun _ angka i ta _ ulima aqe lghiit _ .
ungavig u ut _ amigh t _ i ghi v g an gh ani _ nekegte luki _ qavaa te kayug ni _ , _ nanigh ligh luki _ .
ila i _ mang tegh as q waagh aq ut _ inglu ke te luki _ t en t- as tun _ ayuqe luki _ , _ pi aqe kangit _ , _ kiig mi _ nayugh put _ .
aghte nghaani _ ung av ig e s _ taakut _ , _ taghnughhagh t llu _ taghtugh qu uute nghata _ , _ iike luki _ uteghmun _ petug aqe ut _ .
taawa _ enkaam _ tawaten _ kiigtagh ke ut _ .
G aa mi _ tawani _ gaagh aqe luteng _ , _ qula i _ r egh il nguut _ .
azigutagh igh aqe luki _ amig m _ tu ng ang aneng _ taagken _ enkaam _ agepsugh t _ qu legh ll ug in agh mun _ legan _ pi aqe lghiit _ .
A m s aan aan Ê¼ gh ani _ seghlegh waagh u ut _ taawa _ .
puyugh _ aane gpenani _ mingite ghllag nghmini _ repall _ an egh s ii ll iq nagh lluni _ ayuqe uq _ .
enkaam _ aane qaghtagh aqe ukut _ .
mekestaaghhaa luta _ i ghi v g agh m illu _ nulugh yagh te t _ tag l an Ê¼ gh ata _ kayu liigh ragkiigh negh meggni _ kii _ puyughllug ghllag u aqe uq _ .
iwernga _ kiyaghfig t _ kiilqusigh _ .
enkaam _ en r agh ng am _ mangteghagh t _ aange lghiit _ qeghagh luki _ uk s uu m _ mangteghagh i _ qeghagh luki _ .
aagra m _ saghya a _ kiyang _ sa u a _ aate tke aq _ , _ uk s uu m _ aatkagh a _ qeghaate luku _ .
ighulugh i _ asi akun _ takagh qugh luki _ siv uk ll uki _ , _ enkaam _ tanpegh meng _ qantagh luki _ taakut _ kiilqusigh _ .
enkaam _ S ep tem b er - ngugh h negh ani _ piinligh aqe ut _ mang tegh agh pag mun _ .
M ang tegh agh pag e s _ tamaakut _ ang q ap er uk an iig ut _ , _ sivutmute _ taake luteng _ .
aghveghaqetagh u ut _ qukaa n _ pi i _ .
taakut _ ateghte luki _ sivuke luki _ qeghagh t _ unaami _ atughqagh t _ .
I gh ul us _ taakut _ angaghqugh luki _ enraq _ mangteghillegh mun _ tawavek _ saghya a _ taana _ qeghagh t _ .
alla neng _ tanpegh meng _ qantagh luki _ .
enkaam _ ighulugh t _ mangteghagh m _ mingle akun _ ayaqighte qugh luku _ .
unaami _ unaangu pigte luku _ mangteghasqwaagh t _ naa f qell uk illu _ .
taakut _ aghveghaqetagh t _ sivuke luteng _ napaghte aqe ut _ , _ s ii v an taq ut _ qukaanite nghite ut _ .
enkaam _ l aag ull u uteng _ ayuqe lghiit _ .
peghu luki _ pe tug tegh luki _ es tam aneng _ .
ighulugh t _ n ef tegh qugh naq en gh ata _ yug t _ mayugh aqe ut _ .
T ap ghagh meng _ piiznga a ta _ qaquuragh meng _ , _ sivutmute _ qaquuragh i _ ayuqe ut _ .
aghveghaqetagh t _ taakut _ pii s tegh pag luteng _ o n e- f o o t- neng _ taa k ll uteng _ .
enkaam _ t ap ghagh meng _ iqug i _ taakut _ kingu aneng llu _ pi meng _ , _ sivulighte nghmeng llu _ .
tapghagh a _ taaggun _ aghveghaqetagh m _ singig akun _ n eg av luku _ .
sivulighte negh i _ takite aghagh aqe ut _ .
enkaam _ yug t _ tawavek _ mayugh aqe ut _ tullumeg t _ unaghsigh t _ nekegte luki _ .
taake ghllag lghiit _ tunuqagh m _ pi i _ .
ighulugh t _ sa u ut _ t h i r t y _ feet- ngugh t _ ila i _ o n e _ b y _ f o u r - et _ .
enkaam _ nemegh te magh ita _ tugu aqe luki _ .
siingutagh igh luki _ nuuve te nghata _ pi aqe ait _ .
ayvegh m _ tulimagh i _ unaghsigh kun _ nuuve te luki _ taakut _ ighulugh t _ un ii s t aagh aal ghiit _ .
pikavek _ singikrag mun _ nuuve te luki _ taaggun _ unaghsigh kun _ inglu a llu _ tawaten _ ig g w ani _ unaghsigh _ sa u a _ tuqu uq agh p ak _ qu w aat aq luku _ ingleghtagh kun _ , _ nemegh te vigkagh t _ iqug i _ ighulugh m _ r an m em el nguut _ nemghutagh ke luki _ taagken _ tawaten _ n ef tegh qugh aq aat _ ighulugh _ nemghutagh ke luku _ sani anun _ tawavek _ .
S iv ul igh negh e s _ taakut _ tullumeg u ut _ atigh llegh i _ .
eslege lghiit _ , _ angqaperug kegtagh t _ teggmag lghiit _ tespikavek _ qule mun _ pilagh aqe kangit _ .
enkaam _ ighulugh a _ qamagte luki _ n ef tegh q un egh meg teg gu _ guulgute u ut _ atigh llegh i _ m aal gh un eng _ napaqagh leg t _ .
tuquuqagh meng _ lliigh kau lghiit _ , _ ag uq aag m ell uki _ tunuqagh m _ pi i _ siv uk ll uki _ nekegte aqe ait _ .
enkaam _ yug m _ esghapag aqe ai _ , _ qule mun _ ay ag si negh q es iigh luki _ sakniqe te luki _ , _ nuna i _ tuute yameng _ ategh ke ut _ .
tuute vigkagh t _ apumeg iitagh t _ nuna mun _ unaghsigh t _ .
enkaam _ iqug i _ taakut _ ayagute u ut _ atigh llegh i _ guulgute m _ napaqagh i _ .
enkaam _ sakniqe te luki _ nekegte luki _ tawaten _ sani an _ pi i _ tawaten _ ama _ guulgute t _ taakut _ ayagute i _ ama _ tuusagh igh luki _ , _ enkaam _ esghapag lghii m _ yug m _ tawaten _ atunem _ gh h uugh negh tu tal angi _ , _ inglugtun _ n ef tegh qugh tes taq luki _ esghapag luki _ .
enkaam _ taakut _ guulgute t _ ighulugh tgun _ asighte te luki _ , _ allameng _ am el tu tagh agh aq elghii t _ , _ iqug i _ taakut _ s ayug tegh aat aq iit _ av legh n ay uk ata _ ighulugh t _ .
enkaam _ teg g m aagh q waagh llag aq ii _ ighulugh t _ un iil eng es t aghh aa y alghiit _ .
enkaam _ mayugh aqe luteng _ .
T an pegh h et _ , _ tafutagh u ut _ ila i _ , _ ranme m _ tu ng ang ani _ tanpegh t _ quupekagh t _ sivuke luki _ n ek egh qugh luki _ taa ku s _ tunuqagh m _ tan pegh h i _ ighulugh tgun _ tamaagun _ qulighnegh i _ q el uugh tegh utaq iit _ . _ taakut _ enkaam _ sani an _ pi i _ a si l iit _ pi nghata _ . _ yanga u ut _ reghillegh i _ .
taakut _ alla neng _ tanpegh meng _ ilaagh luki _ pi aqe ait _ .
enkaam _ tagsigh aq _ atuqe aqe aat _ uglagh u pigte luku _ .
Q ul iit _ tanpegh t _ n ef tegh q un gh ata _ mekelghiigh u luta _ tagsighagh mun _ n u v ugh teng un em ta _ putu nge i kete te _ teghigniqe aqe ukut _ m ay ugh amun _ nuvugh yug te aqe lghiikut _ .
T an pegh h a _ qamagte luku _ tawaten _ saye i _ entaqun _ o n e- t h i r d - ev z ii _ mangteghagh m _ uteghmun _ .
angyaghpag m _ te l an ang ang aneng _ um ugh p aa r ug llag meng _ at as tam eng _ tanpigh aqe ait _ .
llaaghanwha _ tan pegh s ugh n ap ang un aan _ lli aqe aat _ tawaten _ .
tagsigh aq _ uglagh u pigte luku _ atuqe aqe aat _ .
tagsighagh t _ tamaakut _ tapghagh at _ amenqun _ tanpegh mun _ atuqe aqe lghiit _ .
ayvegh m _ , _ qasiqagh m _ uyiigh ngllagh llegh m _ taaqe negh a _ keleve aqe luki _ .
alngunak _ ayvegh m _ ikellegh aneng _ uziftagh ke luki _ qelutagh u luku _ tagsighagh u luku _ .
qasiqagh t llu _ ilangakun _ tawaten _ .
alngunak _ es l egk ak ii ta _ keleve aqe ut _ tag sigh a s _ tamaakut _ .
qasiqagh m _ uyiigh ngllaghkagh m _ taaqe negh i _ taakut _ .
unkuvag t _ pi nghmegteki _ taawa _ taaqe negh i _ .
sa u a _ ik ell gh aq _ u z i f qugh aq aat _ talwa _ amiiqagh m _ liighqe llegh i _ , _ tekerqagh i _ u z i f qugh aq iit _ qelutagh u luki _ .
uglagh u pigte lghii _ tagsigh aq _ atuqe aqe aat _ .
Y u ku tagh sigh luku _ mangteghaghpag lghii ni _ .
enkaam _ n ut agh ap er u waagh meng _ kinegh nghhagh meng _ tunuqagh i _ ak il igh negh em _ tu ng angi _ , _ ilangakun _ whangkuta qun _ ay w an _ tu ng angi _ awatkaghtagh t _ ataasigh t _ , _ ilangakun _ malghugnegh t _ ilate aqe ut _ , _ p al aghh aan Ê¼ gh ata _ amiiqagh igh llegh t _ .
Taa q s ug g waagh mun _ mang tegh agh pag e s _ tamaakut _ , _ akuzi lghii ni _ qay iig r ugh ll uteng _ ayuqe ut _ , _ akuzillegh it _ taa q s ug g w aal ghii ni _ .
tallimat _ tan pegh h et _ mang tegh agh pag mun _ , _ esgha _ taa ku s ta _ tawaten _ tunuqagh m _ taakut _ sanim- a _ malghugnegh t _ qule ii iqe te luteng _ , _ enkaam _ tallimagnegh t _ .
tawaten _ n ek egh qugh luku _ taa q en gh ata _ , _ ingliigh magh meng _ , _ nefkuuragh _ , _ qasugh iqe aq _ qeghaate kayug _ .
nefkuuragh t _ pi nigh ghllag t _ . _ enkaam _ mang tegh a s _ taa q en gh at aa _ m iig tem meng _ ategh leg t _ .
kenegh meng _ kum agh ll uteng _ tamaaken _ qasiqagh meng _ , _ nefkuuragh meng _ eghqwaagh aqe luteng _ .
kayute t _ ila i _ ighleke aqe kangit _ negh es qell uki _ .
K aag tu um agh meng _ m ak l in Ê¼ ghagh meng _ nefkuuragh meng _ .
paaw i _ maligte luki _ nefku kayugu lghiit _ .
paaw i _ qupughragh negh meggni _ , _ uyghag kun _ , _ qalqalima meng _ , _ sa meng _ kaa g tugh aqegk ang it _ .
kavighrug ketu te _ qupughragh llegh i _ paaw m _ .
N eq n ii pig tu ut _ tepe kegte pigte lghiit _ .
qayughllak _ sivuligh _ unakegkagh _ maklag _ , _ ayvegh _ nefku igate ngughk _ wiin _ , _ kepellegh ni _ sa ni _ qayugh utaghpag ni _ kiyaghte aqe lghiit _ , _ enkaam _ m es iigh ut ng waagh aq elghii t _ . _ T ep es u ung naq ek es t at _ nefku aqe lghiit _ , _ enkaam _ qamavek _ iiwleng _ k iin gh w aa qay ug et _ m es iigh ut ng w aa negh meg g ni _ .
enkaam _ tepe kegte pigte ut _ .
taawa _ mangtag leg t _ mangtag meng llu _ m iig tem meng _ ategh leg _ .
neqnigh ghllagu ut _ n ef ku u r a s _ tamaakut _ sivu ligh aat _ .
aamtaam _ n ef ku nagh sim an _ unakegkagh t _ kaa tu tagh es n aq _ nefku lghii ni _ , _ maaten _ elpek si _ nefku llegh gpesistun _ taawa _ alla u aqe ut _ .
mesugh i _ ellngagh lugh u aghte ste gpenaki _ qaye i _ k iin Ê¼ gh aghh negh meg g ni _ ellngagh nanigh aqe lghiit _ enkaam _ q aam n angi _ aghipate aqe luteng _ , _ alla u ut _ enkaam _ .
mesiigh tke aat _ neq n igh tu s _ taawa _ .
neqe m llu _ kagpag llegh a
P el aa si m _ apegh llegh a
taaqe negh mta _ sa mun _ un ang n iigh mun _ lliigh aqe ut _ .
naten _ nefkuuragh t _ qeghaate aqe aat _ ?
S iv uk ll uki _ nefkuuragh t _ taakut _ .
I gh u ul ut _ n ek egh qu qay ug ul ghiit _ qeghagh tgun _ sivuke luki _ enkaam _ q aa y ng i kun _ ighulugh m _ nefkuuragh _ , _ qasugh u iqe aq llu _ sa aghte qugh luki _ tan pegh h agh aal iq agh luki _ tanpegh meng _ .
uksugh mun llu _ pin Ê¼ gh ata _ tanpegh meng _ saape aqe luki _ pikayug u ut _ .
U pen Ê¼ gh aam _ pi llgh i _ ukut _ aagra m _ sagh y aa ng aneng _ tan pegh h agh aal igh luki _ aatkagh meng _ pikayug t _ q aa y ng i kun _ enkaam _ tanpegh meng _ qantagh aqe kangit _ .
uksugh mun _ pi kaghqagh t _ tamaakut _ ama _ tawaten _ tanpegh meng _ saape luki _ uksughtekayug t _ .
eghqwaagh te yaghqagh t llu _ tawaten _ .
uqiigh luki _ nefku aqe lghiit _ .
uqiightugh luki _ en kaa ng am _ kinegh rakegtagh t _ .
tamaa na _ sa u a _ ila a _ tu lii m aq _ kiilqusigh _ negh magh an _ ayuqe lghii _ .
M ang tegh as q w aal ghii ni _ k in ell ghi s tun _ sivuligh t _ nefku t _ kiig negh ke aat _ qeghaate kayugu ut _ , _ siv u ul iit _ kinegh nghhagh t _ .
alla u yagh lghii _ , _ nefku kayug t _ wetku _ kiiw t _ pin an Ê¼ gh ata _ .
nefku yaghagh ngugh _ tagitugtu uq _ .
ila a _ uksugh mun _ pi kaghqagh _ qeghaate aqe aat _ .
E gh q waagh us aghq a s _ tamaakut _ ama _ u pen Ê¼ gh aghh aan eng _ saghna kayug t _ .
aghvenge lghii ni _ awataghpag t _ mangtag meng _ imigh kayug t _ .
enkaam _ payangite nghaani _ quyngigh m _ kevigh a _ atghagh te nghatki _ angyaleg m _ k ag p aag aqegk angi _ .
taana _ kiig mi _ uukagh _ pi nghaani _ nefku kayug _ , _ nunivag _ saghna aqe kangat _ tuqusigh aqe luki _ .
awen _ ungipagh kaqe anka _ laluramke nun _ nunivag t _ tuqusigh aqe ni luki _ ak m aag ut akun _ .
tuqu negh meggni _ mesugh i _ q ug aagh q w aa kay ug un il uki _ , _ ila i _ katam _ j u i c e- es tun _ ayuqe na iqe anka _ .
enkaam _ maaten _ kinguligh nun _ o r ang e _ j u i c e- ngun il uki _ liite lghii nun _ j u i c e- meng _ ayuqe na iqe anka _ .
enkaam _ tamaa na _ uksaagh mun _ ll iin Ê¼ gh ani _ O c t o b er - mun _ nunivag meng llu _ kevigh te luku _ awataghpag mun _ .
aqlaghaghte nghaani _ tamaa na _ eghqwaagh te kaghqagh _ uukagh _ asighte aqe luku _ angyagh m _ yug an _ uukaghtagh teng _ asighte luki _ tagite aqe kangit _ q egh aghn aq en gh ata _ .
eghqwaagh te kaghqagh t _ uksuqun _ ellngit a llu _ atuqe yaghqaa luki _ itake aqe kangit _ .
enkaam _ qafsina _ asighnegh _ , _ qula neng _ ug l aagh aq luku _ asighte aqe luku _ sang wa _ .
ila i _ nefkuuragh meng _ pikayug t _ .
aamta _ whangkuta _ uukagh _ , _ tawaqa _ , _ pugneghqagh _ , _ nunivag t _ taakut _ q aa y ng an it aq ut _ qeghagh nun _ qaake luteng _ , _ tanpegh meng _ saape luki _ enkaam _ a sigh teng ng waagh aq iit _ .
uukagh t _ kinegh nghhagh t _ , _ ig g w ani _ pi niigh pigte ut _ S ep tem p er em _ uukaghti a _ .
kinegh ghllag ste gpenaki _ qeghaate aqe lghiit _ eghqwaagh te kaghqagh u luki _ .
aamta _ sivuligh t _ A ug us t -em _ pi i _ masleg kanigh aqe ut _ .
uuk _ , _ ila a _ uukagh _ J ul y - mi _ pi yaghq aan Ê¼ gh ani _ kingugtagh u ghllag qagh yu k _ .
ukut _ en k am m _ ggata i _ neq ang iit ng waagh um aaq egk angi _ kingug m _ .
september _ taana _ k ing ug n ap ag il nguq _ enkaam _ pinigh aqe ut _ .
aatkagh m _ kaki llegh a _ , _ atuqe llegh a _ neghigh luku
W ay eng i m _ apegh llegh a
mekestaaghhaa lunga _ liite unga _ kaki meng _ .
I q r ag m e tagh ngaat a _ kaki naqutke kau unga _ , _ nal i ke k _ e igh t _ , _ n in e- y e ar s - ngu l unga _ .
kelug nka _ natete yagh luteng _ nan ghii q waagh aat am _ qenwat _ tawaten _ liite unga _ .
whanga _ liite lleg mni _ sa u a _ maana _ maaten _ atugh ut _ uk av an sagh tuq _ .
iitek _ allgegh luni _ ayuqe uq _ , _ taawanginaq _ uk av an te f tuq _ .
palaghhagh u yagh uq _ aate tke aq _ , _ iitegngam _ kameraagh _ aklunagh luni _ ayuqe uq _ .
kameg ngllagh aqe kangit _ neghsapig t _ .
qazigyagh meng _ melqugh ligh luku _ yug t _ ipigtu luku _ , _ ipigkestaaghhagh u luku _ kaame kegka _ yug t _ .
U y g iin Ê¼ ghagh meng _ kay an qu si q at _ , _ aa r r agh waagh us iig ut _ .
whanga _ tawaten _ liite lleg mni _ .
ataasigh t _ amiiragh t _ kameg mun _ naama kayug t _ , _ neghsagh t _ aa ng k eg t at _ neghsapig t _ .
qazigyagh t _ aa ng egh ll an Ê¼ ghi l nguut _ amsakelghii t _ .
neghsapig t _ s u f ll ugh r ag g negh ll ug et _ .
U n Ê¼ g avek _ un Ê¼ g a pi s iil uki _ whanga _ liite lleg mni _ , _ neghsapig t _ un Ê¼ g a pi s iil uki _ piniqe aqe ait _ .
A y um iq un Ê¼ gh ani _ s u f ll ugh r ag g negh ll ug et _ qazigyagh neng _ .
qazigyagh t _ ay um iq un aq ut ng in aq _ taa p ng ig sim aaq egk angi _ .
kukupag t _ ung ll en egh tu ng it neng _ seghleqe aqe ait _ .
aghi negh meggni _ unglleg neghtuqagh t _ .
amiiragh t _ k in en Ê¼ gh ata _ , _ pellug luki _ iqangigh aqe ait _ sa ta i _ m es iigh negh igh aq iit _ m el q w illu _ .
whaten _ uksugh mi _ pikagh t _ m el q w i _ taane luki _ mesiigh i _ taane vyiigh aqe ait _ .
aane te luki _ anigu kun _ tu ut qugh luki _ enkaam _ ilu akun _ niightugh aqe ait _ .
talwa _ l iigh q i mun _ pattern- nge isagh ut _ .
A tu l ug g agh teg gun _ atuqe yagh ka itgun _ nasiqute luki _ aange aghagh luki _ pi aqe ait _ .
aghvegh m _ ivalu i _ qiipagh ke aqe ait _ asi an _ tu ng angi _ tukughagh i _ .
emta _ ang tugh aat _ ivalu kegtekayugu ut _ .
iitek _ ila i llu _ amsakaghtagh t _ aghv e pig et llu _ ivalu kegte ut _ .
enkaam _ pin em tek i _ iike luki _ qupughragh luki _ , _ qupughhugh luki _ , _ kinegh ngllagh luki _ k in en Ê¼ gh ata _ qiipi aqe aput _ .
tallu luki _ pi aqe aput _ .
quyngigh m _ ivalu i _ am es t aagh h aat _ kameg m _ uygu anun _ , _ qule mun _ kaleftagh u sigh t _ , _ uygiinghagh t _ qule i _ kameg m _ .
kaleftagh meng _ ategh ke ut _ .
K al ef tagh luki _ kaki aqe ait _ .
Y aag k es t aagh aat _ kaki llegh t _ .
quyngigh m _ ivalu i _ am es t aagh h aal uki _ qiipi luki _ tespagavek _ atuqe aqe ut _ .
aghvegh m _ pi i _ qayughllak _ ila i _ , _ iitek _ ila i _ taaqe kayug t _ am es t aagh h aal uki _ .
qiipi lghii ni _ whaten _ t ap ghagh p aw aagh em _ q ii p el gh a tun _ qiipe magh ita _ es leg tal k aghq ii s tun _ tallu luki _ , _ uygaagh ke luki _ u ug n ang i kun _ , _ nuuve neghqagh i _ taakut _ am ell iigh agh aq luki _ taagavek _ .
tagneghsagh naqe lghii ni _ tagneghli meng _ sa meng _ tag negh s ar eg agh aq iit _ , _ kaleftagh mun _ whaten _ atuqe naqe lghii ni _ , _ uygu sigh u luki _ pi lghii ni _ .
kenuleg t _ siku ut _ kameg mun _ kaki sigh t _ , _ maaten _ t h r e e- si d e d - k aqegk ang it _ kenuleg t _ tamaakut _ ipeg lghiit _ sang y iil nguut _ .
tespagavek _ kameg m _ uygu anun _ kenug ite ngugh t _ angqaperug kegtagh t _ kaki sigh u ut _ .
atungag meng _ aange lghii meng _ , _ amsakaghtagh meng _ i wh an i meng _ nateghqagh ke kayugu yaghpete ut _ .
whanga _ liite lleg mni _ un Ê¼ g avek _ kameg t _ qasiqagh meng _ nateghqagh igh kayugu ait _ kiyang _ .
aghisigh luki _ yataaghqe aqe ait _ aghi nghata _ egte luki _ .
sa u a _ tamaghhagh mi _ amiiragh _ yukutate luni _ kaki nqegte uq _ .
elngaatall _ taaqe lghii ni _ k in eng ll agh waagh aq iit _ .
N a z igh aam _ amiiragh i _ temkagh ke kayugu ait _ , _ uksugh mi _ atugh u ut _ whanga _ liite lleg mni _ .
sivuligh ghhagh mta _ aagkut _ kiig mi _ ellng in aal uki _ u us ll uki _ sa ta i _ qaasligh u luki _ atuqe kayugu yaghpete ait _ .
maaten _ whanga _ liite lleg mni _ uksugh ghhagh inagh mi _ atuqe yagute ma kangit _ .
amigh meng _ qamagun _ il ep gh aagh meng _ ilupeghagh igh luki _ .
T em kaa s _ taakut _ qaye akun _ amiiragh t _ m el q w i _ qaasligh ke luki _ uksugh mi _ maqagh ghllag t _ .
Taa ku nguut _ qaamkut _ ilukligh t _ ategh i _ il ep gh aagh et _ .
taakut _ qaasligh at _ temkagh at _ , _ n ung igh te l g et _ paagna i _ qukagh i llu _ , _ tukughagh i llu _ taakut _ qamagte luteng _ temkagh at llu _ il ep gh aagh et lu _ .
kameg m _ ilu akun _ allighte t _ amiiragh t _ .
ila i _ pi lget _ qallukagh meng _ allighte ke aqe ut _ .
amigh meng _ ama _ qalleg vag kaqe ut _ , _ nuqutuqagh t _ yugusigh a _ nasagh ite ngugh t _ n ar an Ê¼ ghi ll uteng _ ayuqe lghiit _ .
amalleqa _ tawaten _ ugmestaaghhagh meng _ amigh meng _ iluklighte luki _ ila i _ uksugh mi _ m il q w i _ qam an ll uki _ .
qaasligh at _ taakut _ m il q w i _ qaye anite luki _ .
uksugh mi _ whaten _ aghnagh m _ amalleqa _ atugh it _ q as pi qu ll uki _ .
ighu i _ segesqugh mun _ kenle kut _ .
maqaghqe ghllag luteng _ ayuqe yagh lghiit _ qiipaghagh _ kay aal nguq _ tamaani _ iwernga _ ama _ ila i _ nuugh nga lghii ni _ inglupigagh ghhagh u kayugu ut _ , _ s aat gh waagh h aal uki _ sa ta i _ qaasligh ke luki _ qallevag t _ , _ alla _ qaye akun _ atkug luteng _ .
amigh ghqu aq _ kiyang _ atkug kaqsagh kangat _ , _ sukilpagh _ , _ alpa _ , _ metghagh _ , _ k ang Ê¼ gh w aag m eng llu _ atkug kayugu yaghpete ut _ .
weni _ whanga llu _ liite lleg mni _ sa u a _ kayaali kestagh ta a _ .
ila a _ atuqe pagnanigh magh an _ liite kau unga _ .
yug t _ ng el qagh meng _ , _ alpa meng _ kiyang _ atkug kaqe ut _ .
saye i _ atkug ngllagh aqe ait _ atuqe aqe ait _ at ku ng ll amun _ .
P aam n ang illu _ atuqe kayugu ut _ naate lghii ni _ , _ n aam al igh llegh h ii ni _ .
amalleqa _ amiiragh i _ aghvig luki _ yataaghqe llegh i _ pi aqe ait _ k el ig agh waagh luki _ .
taaqe neghllug pigu ut _ sukilpagh t _ wata _ mekestaaghhagh t _ .
naate neghllug pigu ut _ , _ pegte aqe luki qun _ enraq _ kaki aqe lghiit _ .
I ghi v g agh m illu _ whaten _ kiyang _ pikayug u ut _ .
aghneghmi _ whaten _ sa meng _ neqenge naqe meng _ qep gh am s u r eg agh tuq aq _ , _ qepghaqagh _ ug l aa pig teng ngu yagh tuq _ aghnagh ni _ mangteghapig mete luni _ , _ kiyang _ i ghi v g agh mi _ aghuliigh qagh negh meggni _ kaki llegh kesagh kangat _ .
ne m _ qepghaqagh a _ .
sapeghhnagh mi _ whaten _ kanegh ghllag kayugu ut _ aagra m _ qaye i _ , _ nategh mi _ .
qama _ qayughllak _ puqla ghllag u aqe lghii _ , _ iiyagh _ es leg tan qell uku _ ag ep s ugh taa qay ug et _ egllu stun _ , _ enkaam _ kanegh ghllag qagh yu k _ .
naqamllu _ taw an ll iq iig al k ang it _ . _ ifkaghte luki _ , _ alleg luki _ egte aqe luki _ .
nanigh t _ taakut _ ama _ uqughqagh aneng _ yataaghqe llegh i _ , _ uqugh isag lleghqagh i _ uqigh aqe luki _ .
nutaghagh inagh meng _ whaten _ pinegh meggni _ , _ iitegngam _ aqlagha mi _ whaten _ mesiigh i _ nuugh aatagh naqe ghllag t _ t ang taq er eg ameng _ lliigh lghii ni _ .
kapeghte luteng _ kumlate luteng _ whaten _ tamaakut _ ugh ug tem meng _ ayuqe lghiit _ sukate nagh ut _ .
aqlagha igh te mi _ t ang taq er eg il uteng _ lliigh aqe ut _ enkaam _ sukangiite aqe ai _ mesiigh ngllagh llegh i _ .
uglagh _ mesiigh _ atuqe aqe aat _ nanigh mun _ , _ ila ita _ maalghug u aqe lghiit _ pag u m _ inglegh m _ nanigh a _ .
inga _ alla _ maalghug _ inglu ani _ enkaam _ estamat _ nanigh t _ atuqe kayugu ait _ .
tamaakut _ neghsagh m _ uqigh a _ awatkaghtagh meng _ akume vleghagh luteng _ pinigh aqe ut _ .
aamta _ ellng in aal uteng _ kumaghugh naqe ghllag aqe ut _ .
A k si g ung waagh luteng _ kumaghugh igate ut _ .
taawanginaq _ yakumangilngugh ni _ pama yug ma t _ .
neghsagh meng llu _ atkug ngllagh kayugu te u lghii ni _ .
P aq n iil nguut _ qevuute luteng _ y u ku tan ami _ .
kiyang _ taa ku nguut _ qawaag m _ am ii r i _ kiyang _ atugh t _ .
qikmigh meng _ puvite ke ut _ , _ puvisaagh igh kayugu ut _ .
ataasigh t _ agaten _ amaa llgagh at _ esghaqagh aqe anka _ , _ pamakaghtagh t _ .
weni _ maaten _ quynginge magh an _ liite kau unga _ .
quyngigh u uute luku _ salin _ t aag an ing ani _ tespamaken _ amigh llu _ pi ma aqe yagh kangat _ .
U pen Ê¼ gh ami _ amiiragh t _ m il q w igh luki _ kaame kaqe ait _ .
aghinaghte nghaani _ m el q w il ngugh meng _ kaame kaqe ut _ .
uksugh mi _ aamta _ melqughtugh ma lghii meng _ kaame ke kayugu ut _ .
quyillegtagh u ut _ uksugh mi _ aatkagh it _ .
uliigh t _ tamaakut _ mughu te mun _ atugh u ut _ .
U n Ê¼ g a pi si m _ kameg m _ ategh ke ai _ , _ uliigh _ .
quyillegtagh t _ maani _ qute mi _ n av e g _ ama _ pi mun _ atugh t _ .
A ku gh v ig aa s _ tamaakut _ agh in aghnegh ani _ angyagh mun _ ivghaagh sigh t _ u pen Ê¼ gh ami _ taape neghllug t _ .
taawanginaq _ tawaten _ taa p ng ig g negh ata _ tu k r u ug g negh ata _ aghvig luki _ mesiigh meng _ sa ta i _ angighhe aqe ait _ q aam n angi _ .
mulu negh meggni _ m es iigh negh ii taq ut _ .
enkaam _ taape neghllug ghraagte aqe ai _ .
aghyugh negh meggni _ taa p ng ig tek ayug ii _ .
amiiragh _ aklu niite luku _ simigh qiinagh aqe luku _ taa p ng ig tek aq _ pikayug u aat _ .
kiig mi _ enraq _ temkag lug t _ aghvig luki _ , _ sa ta i _ kavighte luki _ pi aqe ait _ kameg ngllagh aqe ait _ .
aamqute u ut _ nateghqagh m llu _ amiiragh m llu _ aku l ang an il nguut _ enkaam _ uk at ang an il nguut _ qiipagh m _ itegh qagh i uute ai _ elngaatall _ sagniite u ut _ , _ sagniite ke ai _ .
T ap ghagh p aw aagh m eng qun _ atugh lghii ni _ , _ kelug mun _ itegh qagh i aatagh u ut _ seve uute na yu kata _ sa na yu kata _ .
test-pag kut _ qu ul ng an il nguut _ uygu u ut _ .
U n Ê¼ g an tut _ uu m _ iteg ngestagh m _ taa k w n ang an il nguut _ mughnegh t _ , _ nateghqagh m _ tu ng ang ani _ .
paagna an _ pi i _ nungighte u ut _ , _ singigh a _ , _ putulghi i _ , _ n ung igh teng i _ .
uygu yan _ kaki llegh i _ neftegte llegh i _ kaleftagh u uute luki _ tawaten _ ayuqe ut _ .
test-pag kut _ nungighte yan _ ig g wh an ing i _ nungighte yiite te t _ .
qallukagh at _ kameg t _ estullug meng _ ategh ke ut _ , _ quyngigh m _ ighu i _ ategh i _ qallukagh at _ es tu ll ung l aq ay u ug it _ .
ipigtu luki _ piyug lghii ni _ ipigkestaaghhagh u luku _ ilaaghtugh aqe luki _ aange lghiit _ ayuqe ait _ .
ipigkingwaagh t _ ipigkestaaghhagh at _ kameg t _ , _ enkaam _ ipigtuqagh t _ pagavesengwaagh t _ .
neghigh luku _ U N A N G N I I L E Q _ maani _ sivuqagh mi
A ku l k i m _ apegh llegh a
whaten _ uksaagh mi _ kum l al uni _ an ig un Ê¼ gh ag u _ , _ elngaatall _ yuug _ yataaghqe te ghllag kayugu uq _ , _ siku k _ kaate ste gpenakek _ .
tapghagh _ , _ u un Ê¼ gh aq _ , _ q aan Ê¼ ng w aaq _ , _ sa u a _ atughqagh _ un ang n iigh mun _ apeghiigh naqe aqe kangat _ .
uyiigh _ , _ tuugkagh _ , _ ay v egh n iigh mun _ atughqagh _ tug aagh es n angll agh tegh aqegk angat _ .
sa u a _ qam iy allu _ tamaa na _ , _ qaghlu kaghqagh _ qikmigh mun _ ulima luku _ , _ pi lleghqagh _ kaate ste gpenaan _ pi aqe kangat _ .
taagken _ uk s un Ê¼ gh an _ , _ uksugh na iqe aat _ siku k _ k aan negh egk en i _ maavek _ .
tawani _ yuug _ tengghuniqe te aqe uq _ pi y aa mun _ uksugh yuggaagh nghaani _ qayughllak _ teghig ke sagh m _ unake naqe llegh a _ piyaqnagh iitagh ke lghii _ siku gni _ un Ê¼ g ani _ .
unaangu luku _ aghte ste gpenaan _ sivuke pigte luku _ eslaqagh ke lghiit _ aane luteng _ , _ saamna llu _ esne _ qagi a _ ag ig sagh tu ugh aqegk angat _ navek _ wiin _ pi vagilgameng _ .
P in in Ê¼ gh ani _ mughu te mun _ , _ y at aagh qell uteng _ aga _ aghulaqe uute aqe lghiit _ sanqutetuumagh meng _ .
kiyang _ paamggun _ kiwavek _ naayghagh m _ sivungagh nun _ esghaate naqe magh meng _ tegh ig meng _ pi aqe lghiit _ .
ilangakun _ taa k w an ing iigh aq _ ayveghagh te aqe lghiit _ tegh ik _ qantaghate nghaani _ .
U y ii ghi s _ taakut _ elngaatall _ kelengake sqe lleg leg t _ ig l ak aa si q n ay uk at k i _ ayvegh niigh kumeng _ .
A y v el g un Ê¼ gh ani _ tawaten _ sanqute teng _ quunpeng _ yataang _ pi aqe lghiit _ pi llgu na llegh ani _ siku m _ .
liilightuusagh _ taana _ , _ uyiigh teng _ quunpeng _ uughqa n _ tu ng ang an ill uki _ iiwleng _ pi sqe lleg leg t _ .
qayughllak _ ayumigh _ nan Ê¼ ghii q aal ghiit _ , _ yug t _ ayvegh mun _ nusug na iqe ait _ uyiigh kun _ iglag ke aqe aat _ .
enkaam _ tamaaken _ ap aa ll uq luku _ uyiigh t _ anuqe m _ tu ng ang ak u _ pi snanigh lleg leg t _ , _ teng te ku y eng _ ig l ak aa s ii yaghq at _ .
taana qun _ kiiw u aq _ sivungagh mi _ ayvegh m _ nusug qu a _ tawaten _ uyiigh an _ ig l ak agh luku _ tazimantekagh _ .
unangniigh llegh _ tamaa na _ liilightuusagh ghllag u uq _ qayughllak _ awen _ peleghqe tke kayug _ .
ila a _ whaa _ p uy g uk ef ut _ .
Tam aa tu m _ liilightuusagh a _ , _ esla m _ , _ siku m _ , _ megh m _ , _ maaqellegh m _ s aam lu _ ila yan _ n ate tu l ng aneng _ liite luteng _ wetku _ ell meg neng _ mughute yaaghtekayug t _ nukalpigagh t _ . _ wiin _ sivuke luteng _ pi ke sigh nun _ maligsaagh te luteng _ un ang n iigh mun _ piinligh kayug t _ liite kayug t _ tawaten _ nan Ê¼ ghii gh luku _ mughute ni uq _ .
kina _ t aan Ê¼ g ani _ ayveghagh nghmini _ tawani _ ila ni _ pi yaagh lgute ni _ apagh aatagh aqe ai _ uusqagh llegh anun _ siku m _ m ayuq agh l in i _ .
enkaam _ u v il igh negh m el nguut _ tamaakut _ pi yu aat _ esghaate negh migte ni _ tagi laghate te aqe lghiit _ nengigh yagh uute aqe lghiit _ .
K aat qu un n negh ata _ uglagh te luki _ ayvegh teng _ qaake luki _ , _ qamagte luni _ yuug _ nengigh uute aqe uq _ .
aga _ asighte i luteng _ q aan Ê¼ ng w aat eng _ kelute mun _ taglagh naqe magh meng _ pi aqe lghiit _ .
tawaten _ kingu ligh qutagh luteng _ igleghte te aqe ut _ uygu uute qugh te luteng _ .
uka _ qamugh te lghiit _ ne meng _ esghagh nghmegteki _ , _ nanevgagh u aqe ut _ q el egh r agh tet _ , _ siivanllegh t _ kayagte aqe ait _ mekelghiigh t _ p aa y ghi s qell uki _ , _ igaghyagh t llu _ tamaakut _ pi ste aqe kangit _ igaghyagh u ghngaita _ .
kinku t _ tuungqagh teng _ qamuutagh ke ait _ , _ kinku t llu _ alngunak _ .
tawani _ neqe _ pi y u wh aan Ê¼ gh ani _ , _ tamaghhagh mi _ quya kayugu uq _ , _ qayughllak _ sivuqagh _ iingunagh mi _ nutaghagh meng _ neqe meng _ naasiigh yaghqaa lghii _ .
tawatete uq _ tamaani _ ataasigh stun _ yug a _ ayuqe te yagh uq _ .
ilangani _ tamaakut _ pi yu aat _ yug t _ , _ tevragh t _ , _ up- qlighte te aqe lghiit _ meghhagh ni _ nalighmeng _ iighwilngugh m _ kangite gkeni _ .
neghsagh llu _ tamaani _ aklunagh pagite yagh lghii _ .
aga _ iighwilngugh t _ qu u p aghn aq ut ng in aq _ nuug inagh magh meng _ kiyang _ pi aqe yagh lghiit _ uksugh yuggaagh mi _ tawaten _ .
tagtalmi _ ikevagh ughte luni _ megh ughte nghagu _ amalleqa _ angyagh meng _ pinegh meggni _ ayvegh _ , _ maklag _ , _ neghsagh _ unake aqe kangat _ .
taawanginaq _ uksugh mi _ s all eg yug um agh taq egk anga _ . _ siku k llu _ pin in Ê¼ gh egk eg ni _ kiyang _ aghneghtu mi _ esavghagh te aqe lghiit _ un Ê¼ g avek _ ama _ neqete luteng llu _ taglagh aqe luteng _ .
neqete naqe a _ taana _ iiwleng _ ayuqe lghii _ , _ tawaten _ pi llgh ugh t aghh negh ani _ .
neqangisag lleghqagh _ p ak ig g ut aqegk angat _ saama llu _ aghnegh tugh negh ani _ tegh ik llu _ awavagh qagh yu k _ .
tawani llu _ esla _ pin igh agh luku _ pi naqe kayug t _ .
tawani llu _ uksugh yuggaagh mi _ qawaagni ii aagh _ pikayug _ .
aygughara meng _ unaangu luku _ agh tagh aq es tan Ê¼ gh ani _ k ang Ê¼ gh w aa k _ , _ alpa meng _ , _ m et ghagh meng _ ilangakun _ akume luni _ aygugh ghllag qagh yu k _ , _ enkaam _ aygughara meng _ ategh leg _ .
I ghi v g agh mi _ enraq _ eslugh ghllag qagh yu k _ u qu m ig teng ngu uq _ ategh a _ .
aywaa neng _ anuqe _ ug av aneng _ ayuq en Ê¼ gh ani _ qawaagniigh llgu nagh aqe uq _ .
naten _ ilangakun _ siku k llu _ kaa sagh an Ê¼ gh egk eg ni _ nani _ tamaani _ kaneghyengesi mi _ , _ qighunegh _ pi ghllag qagh yu k _ .
qighunegh meng _ ategh leg _ tamaa na _ al p aagh aa y alghii _ tenge igate ngughk _ q ug il ip ag llag em _ , _ enkaam _ ilangani _ uksugh llegh m _ sigh l at k egh ll ak ay u w aat _ siku mete luku _ , _ meghagh ite u tke aq _ , _ kiyang _ amani llu _ , _ qawani llu _ .
emta _ iin Ê¼ gh us al ek _ , _ uglagh negh mii ni nguq _ nenge a _ ugh um ak ayug un il uku _ pi aqe aat _ enkaam _ kelenga sagh u uute luni _ ayuqe uq _ .
enkaam _ uksugh _ navek _ taakwavek _ L l uugh v ig mun _ ll in Ê¼ gh ani _ angyaleg _ tam agh agh mi _ aghvegh mun _ sanqute t _ yataaghqe te aqe kangit _ .
angyaghwaagh u yagh lghiit _ aghvegh niigh sagh it _ tamaani _ . _ G aa r in Ê¼ gh i _ ghhuugh m llu _ simigh aqe luki _ naavuma na yu kata _ , _ tamaakut llu _ aghqelengestagh i _ .
keniliigh te magh meng _ pi aqe lghiit _ pi llgh ugh te f ag il g ag u _ kete ghesnagh yaghqaa luteng _ .
quunpeng _ taakut _ kenilegh t _ kelengake luteng _ ayuqe lghiit _ , _ an ig un Ê¼ gh ak i _ pekete aqe luki _ , _ amalleqa _ v u um an Ê¼ gh ak illu _ r egh igh taq luki _ iiwleng _ .
aamta _ tu v al g un Ê¼ gh ani _ tawaten _ ataasigh inagh t _ kenilegh t _ segge aqe ait _ , _ qay ugh l ak _ ilangakun _ tuvagh _ aastu aqe lghii _ .
A as k es t aagh h aan Ê¼ gh ani _ kiyang _ malghugnegh t _ pi aqe ait _ , _ u w at ang agh m iit lu _ , _ ak ing agh m iit lu _ .
taawa _ aghveghni ii aagh _ piinligh aqe uq _ aghvegh llu _ igleghte magh mi _ pi aqe lghii _ .
saama llu _ megh ugh h negh tugh taq egk anga _ . _ esla _ unaami _ pin igh s ug n in naq en Ê¼ gh ani _ pi aqe lghiit _ , _ iye _ inglupigagh _ atugh naqe ni luku _ .
unaangu pigte luku _ ilangakun _ atghaghtegh te aqe lghiit _ iglag ke luku _ teng Ê¼ gh un iq em _ aq f aal igh aat aa sim agh meng _ taa yug n iigh em _ .
taakut _ kiyang _ A wer g en kut _ sivulii yuneghtuqagh t _ .
elngaatall _ aga _ kete uute negh meggni _ n ap aghh waagh taq egk anga _ telaananga m _ .
pilaataqu negh meggni _ aga _ aghvenge i nagh magh meng _ pi aqe lghiit _ ilangani _ , _ ama _ tawaten _ ila a _ ayumiqullegh m _ avangite aqe luni _ ayuqe lghii _ angyaghnaghpag i te m llu _ pi ste aqe kanga _ .
kinku t _ taakut _ aghvenge negh meggni _ aga _ napaatagh aqe lghiit _ , _ enkaam _ liisimake luki _ ivenrugh u uute qaghtagh te aqe lghiit _ napaatagh meng _ esghaate negh meggni _ .
P aag ken lu _ ne meng _ qineghpeghwaaghute kun _ liisima kaqe kangit _ ilangakun _ , _ enkaam _ ne mi llu _ qesugniqe te aqe lghiit _ aghv e ngu ugh um agh meng _ .
tuqute luki _ aghvegh teng _ apeghiigh nghmegteki _ enraq _ kelute mun _ kaalgugh naqe aqe lghiit _ .
angyagh _ qamagte luni _ kaalguutagh ke lghii _ uy gu uq utegh llag luni _ uka _ aliinegh meggni _ .
kaalgughkagh teng _ kaat ute te nghmegteki _ ategh leg t _ teghlug te meng _ , _ teghlug te na iqe kangit _ .
unuk _ pi tke igate aat _ aga _ pilag naqe magh meng _ pi aqe lghiit _ aqsaqughiitigh qagh luteng _ .
tamaani _ neghigh luku _ mangtag _ nengigh te igate yaghpete aat _ , _ enkaam _ angyagh _ iingunagh mi _ aghvegh mi _ tawani _ pi naqute kayug _ .
tamaakut _ angyagh m _ yug i _ kay ung q an Ê¼ gh et _ suyvaghte aqe lghiit _ , _ iwernga _ tea- ma a _ pikayug _ , _ naasiigh qagh yu k _ .
suqi a _ , _ llaag i _ , _ sa i llu _ taa m _ aghv el ghem _ agghi te aqe ai _ , _ inpite qugh magh mi _ pikayug llu _ navek _ alngunak _ .
taagken _ kiig m _ aghnagh a _ piite nghaani _ , _ aghvegh iitagh ke kanga _ .
tawani _ enraq _ ay v egh n iigh mun _ neq n iigh mun _ legh iigh aqe lghiit _ .
tawani llu _ tanqigh mi _ tegh ig em _ avaqutaghagh a _ all g ek qay uk _ , _ qasiqagh leg _ , _ teghiglug leg _ un aku gh aqegk angat _ .
neqe _ uglagh luku _ pinagh kaqe kangat _ tegh ik _ aligh u aatagh luku _ , _ esla _ pin in Ê¼ gh ani _ q av al q ug pen at eng _ angyaghtugh aqe lghiit _ .
kagpag naqe magh an _ neqe _ pi aqe kangat _ .
tamaani llu _ qikmigh _ atugh ghllagu yagh lghii _ enkaam _ ila a _ kiyang _ neghqutkagh u luku _ saghna ghllag aqe aat _ .
tuugte magh an _ manguna _ , _ kemeg qragh k _ tamaa na _ nefku magh an _ , _ neqangisag lleghqagh _ p ak ig g utk aqegk angat _ liisimake luku _ .
tawani _ pinaghvig mi llu _ ayughaayag _ qawani _ pi aqe aat _ nani _ taakwani _ tapghugh m _ ketanga ni llu _ .
siku pagite te aqe kanga _ tawani _ tanqigh mi _ iwernga _ qavregh meng llu _ ayveghagh te kayug t _ un Ê¼ g ani _ .
qavregh _ taana _ aghnasaleg _ amsakaghtagh meng _ akume luni _ qasiqagh leg t _ akuuragh qaghaqe ait _ .
aga _ awavagh magh mi _ taana _ qavregh _ pikayug _ .
Q em iigh un negh an ii nguq _ pig tek ayug u f taa t _ .
sikungigh te a _ maligte luku _ tegh ik llu _ maligte te kayug _ .
tawani llu _ pinaghvig mi _ kiyang _ m a tu m _ qiighqagh m _ qawaag a _ kaat quute te kayug _ .
alpa eng _ unake aqe aat _ qawaagniigh luku _ .
unaangu pigte luku _ ug ani _ singikrag mi _ s uk il p aq ul ghii _ pi aqe kangat _ , _ i ghi n Ê¼ gh an illu _ wh an i ku mi _ .
amiiragh a _ tam aa tu m _ qawaag m _ atkugkagh u luku _ p eg t ii r ak ig al k angat _ , _ alpa _ , _ ngelqagh _ , _ sukilpagh _ , _ ila i llu _ .
kiwani _ naayghagh mi _ uzive yaaghte nghaani _ tawani _ an n av ag luku _ pikayug _ .
uugtekayug _ i ghi v g agh m illu _ , _ unaangu luku llu _ .
ategh kek _ i ghi v g aa y aan ku nguut _ , _ un aa y aan kuk _ .
naputuqagh _ naayghagh _ teskiwna _ anag vag vig meng _ , _ ategh i _ napu t _ .
aywaa neng llu _ i ke v agh m eng llu _ napu leg _ , _ emta _ pinigh llegh i _ sivulii yug te kaqe ait _ anuqe _ pin in Ê¼ gh an illu _ .
tamaa na _ anag vag ni uq _ teghig nagh pigte uq _ liite lghii ni _ an av ag meng _ .
enkaam _ an av ag y aq _ uglagh u pigte aqe uq _ .
U g l aa ghi n Ê¼ gh ani _ qagugh ak _ kiyang _ nukalpigagh _ tamaavek _ teng Ê¼ gh un iq utaq elghii _ .
uglagh luku _ qagugh ak _ unake nghmegteggu _ kagpag kayug at _ kiyang _ ighaluqi luku _ pi aqe kangat _ .
I gh al uq ameng _ ategh ke ut _ tamaakut _ mesiigh kun _ kanaghtekagh t _ .
tawaten _ ila a _ neqe m _ k ag p al gha _ ayuqe lghii _ tamaani _ neghigh luku _ .
nani _ tamaani _ elte nagh vig mi _ qagugh ak _ igh n in Ê¼ gh ani _ agavek _ pennagh nun _ angyagh meng _ manig yagh te kayug _ megh _ pin in Ê¼ gh ani _ , _ alpa m _ manig anun _ , _ amalleqa _ agavek _ nunivag mun _ kiyang _ piyug meng _ pi aqe ut _ m et gh aam _ s aam _ manig anun _ ila i _ .
sukilpagh m llu _ manig anun _ k ig w avek _ naayghagh mun llu _ manig yagh aqe lghiit _ ama _ .
tamaani _ salin _ qawaagniighusigh _ all g egh l aa ll ghi ll uku _ neghigh luku _ tea- ma kut _ atugh aqe kangit _ negaghagh t _ , _ suqagh meng _ ulimaagh t _ metghagh mete te _ atugh t _ .
tamaakut _ sukilpagh mun _ atugh t _ ategh ke ai _ qitavestaagh t _ , _ naghuyagh mun _ enkaam _ atugh t _ maklegsagh meng _ ategh leg t _ , _ enkaam _ ngelqagh mete te _ atugh t _ ategh ke ai _ ayengqeghragh t _ .
ama _ tamaakut _ kuuvragh meng _ ategh leg t _ ulima llegh i _ negaghpag stun _ ayuq ek an it _ teghiglug mun _ naapte luki _ pi sigh t _ .
enkaam _ llangaqa _ unange ni uq _ tegh ig mun _ aghsaan _ ayuqe aqe lghii _ kiig mi _ iwernga _ ila i _ nunaagh meggnun _ aglagh uute aqe lghiit _ kiyang _ unatagh anun llu _ .
nunivag anun _ , _ uqfigagh anun _ sa mun llu _ unatagh m _ ila anun _ .
sa u a _ atughqagh _ sa mun _ unaghsigh _ angwaaghute kaghqagh _ , _ yaavuquute kaghqagh _ , _ ivagh aqe kangat _ sa mun llu _ ila anun _ atughqagh _ .
quugkagh meng llu _ quug meng _ qerngughte i aqe luteng _ mayughtagh ke luki _ qerngagh ita _ .
kiig mi _ nun aagh m el nguut _ yug t _ kiyang _ unange na i aaghet _ neghsagh meng _ , _ qawaag meng llu _ .
sa mun _ tamaavek _ pi v ik eg ll agh akun _ nun aa ng lagh aq elghii t _ kiyang _ .
samavek llu _ uughqa nun _ iq all iyagh aq elghii t _ .
kiilqusigh _ iqallug eng _ naapte aqe kangat _ tesamani _ naayvaghllag mi _ .
W e ku llu _ kum l ay agh tun Ê¼ gh ani _ uteghnigh uute aqe lghiit _ .
teskiwavek _ kangii nun _ angyagh meng _ itghagh luteng _ tes k i wh ken _ saghya eng _ , _ angyagh t llu _ teve te qugh luki _ qaqlungighig nun _ teve aqe lghiit _ naayvaghllag mun _ .
U kum llu _ uughqa n _ meghe a _ pin in Ê¼ gh ani _ taakwagun _ angyagh meng _ pikayug u ut _ qagi ite nghaani _ .
pugughileghmii t llu _ taakut _ avelghagh igate ngugh t _ kiig ta a _ kiyang _ tam agh aan _ teskiwavek _ pikayug t _ iqallugagh nun _ w ek u _ apeghiigh negh meggni _ ngelqagh u aghagh niigh nghmeng _ .
iqalliniighvig _ ategh leg _ , _ egkugh a _ tespagna _ , _ tapghaaghagh llu _ , _ aghvigh tek llu _ qupnegh niigh vig t _ , _ taanegna _ ke t l igh neq _ iqallupig niigh vig _ .
enkaam _ tespamna _ nuna meng _ ategh leg _ k iig w t aghn iigh v i k _ .
ukani _ tamaa na _ iqallug _ pi igate yaghpete aat _ tamaani _ , _ wetku _ qantaghaqun _ pi yagute kau ut _ liite luku _ .
yeqay _ uukagh eng _ sighla tke ghllag kayugu aat _ nulugh luku _ k ii p aghq en Ê¼ gh ani _ .
tamaa na llu _ kayu _ kiwani _ naayghagh m _ sivungagh ni _ pikayug at _ .
tawani _ uk s aagh yagh tun Ê¼ gh ani _ amalleqa _ yuug _ qimugsigh qagh yu k _ yataaghqe te kayug _ , _ qamiye meng _ , _ qaghlu meng _ qimugsigh sighqagh meng _ sa meng llu _ ila aneng _ un ang n iigh mun _ atughqagh meng _ .
tamaani _ neghigh luku _ qamiye _ paaragh ite usagh lghii _ , _ taatghusigh ite usagh lghii _ .
qamiye mun _ taatghusigh at _ atugh it _ unaghsigh t _ tamaani _ ingleghagh t _ akule itgun _ asitmun _ ken Ê¼ g ut kay ug et _ , _ ategh ke ai _ y ag aa r in at _ .
talwa _ uyghiite ite ngugh t _ tamaani _ .
aghuliigh negh meggni _ taakut _ kagsagute teng _ qikmigh meng _ sivungagh kun _ napaghte aqe ait _ .
kagsagute t _ tamaakut _ qikmigh mun _ aghyuugh sigh u ut _ .
P i negh ll iq en Ê¼ gh ata _ kagsagmig aqe ait _ enkaam _ qikmigh m _ al ik s al ii taq iit _ .
tawatete yagh lghii _ tamaani _ iglegh neq _ .
N A T E N G _ angyapig m _ ulu ii ma llegh i
A ku l k i m _ apegh llegh a
ayumigh _ ul im gh usi q _ pinigh lghii _ maaten _ atugh ut _ aviite yagh lghii _ .
sa u a _ tam aagh h aan _ maani _ all g egh tek aq _ atuqe kaqe kangat _ sa ngllagh naqe negh meggni _ unangniighusigh _ tamaghhagh an _ ul im ap er ug waagh luku _ pi aqe kangat _ tamaani _ .
angyaghtugh sigh t _ angyagh t _ tamaani _ atugh it _ ategh ke lghiit _ angyapig meng _ .
T ag tal ng i _ kiyang _ yuginagh _ itegagh _ siipngagh lghiit _ .
I q e tu l ng i _ kiyang _ yaagnegh stun _ iqetutka aqe ut _ .
mayughneghqagh _ , _ neghqwaaghtaghqagh _ esne mi _ ivagh luku _ pi aqe kangat _ angyat ngllagh naqe negh meggni _ .
tuquuqagh igh te luku _ nemegh perewaagh _ nemegh yaghqagh _ pi aqe kangat _ s uq agh m em _ kelevekagh meng _ nemegh kete luteng _ .
enkaam _ s aam n ang illu _ angyagh m _ taklaghmete luki _ ulima aqe yagh kangit _ ayumigh _ .
I ngu sigh luki _ tawaten _ pi nga yu neng _ ingluleg _ yuug _ aqume uute yaghqaa luku _ alla _ angyaleg _ angyalligh kun _ .
tamaakut _ aghnasaleg t _ uvineg kegtagh t _ amiiqagh u iqe ait _ amighqagh u luki _ angyagh mun _ .
sivuke luki _ kiighte luki _ niightugh kayug t _ m eq en Ê¼ gh ata _ .
amigh i naqe negh meggni _ sivuke luki _ kenite aqe ait _ agh ing waagh es qell uki _ .
M aal gh u _ , _ pi nga yu _ tanpegh _ naama kayug _ angyagh mun _ amu i luni _ kiyang _ .
uyguragh anun _ qiipagh t _ kaki sigh t _ ategh ke ai _ tea-si sigh t _ ivalu meng _ ulimaagh it _ pi aghte luteng _ .
angyagh mun _ amu i luki _ aghnasaleg t _ liisima kangit _ mulu neghtuqagh t _ ugi neng _ , _ saama _ uvineg kegte yu i magh meng _ .
ugi t _ tam aa kun Ê¼ nguq _ ataa si ghagh meng _ ay um iq uk ayug u f tut _ , _ imange yuguma magh meng _ ayuqe lghiit _ .
angyagh m _ amu i _ tamaani _ talwa _ p iin eq iig as aq ang it _ .
enkaam _ pi nga yu _ ayumiqullegh _ atugh luku _ amu i nguq _ simigh yaghqaaghtekayugu ut _ .
saamkut _ ku y aag it _ aghu kayug t _ , _ saama llu _ uk i yug um agh tek ayug et _ .
angyagh negh meggni _ igleghte te yu ait _ .
A ng waagh meng _ , _ y aa v u qu meng _ , _ telaananga meng llu _ .
siighnagh t _ kaki te uute luki _ telaananga ngllagh ma aqe kangit _ tamaani _ ayumigh _ .
sanqute t _ A Y V E G H N I I G H M U N
Q av al gh aam _ apegh llegh a
sanqute t _ tamaakut _ unangniighusigh u ut _ tegh ig mun _ un Ê¼ g ani _ kellii ni _ .
Taa ku nguut _ awataghpag t _ , _ tapghagh at _ , _ u un Ê¼ gh at _ , _ tuugkagh at _ .
qerngagh meng _ atigh llegh i _ â _ sanqute t _ â _ .
angyagh mi _ atugh t _ allakanigh u ut _ siku gni _ atugh neng _ .
U un Ê¼ gh at _ unaghsigh u ut _ aghvinleg _ itegagh _ tag t at k elghii t _ angqaperugtekagh t _ iigge meng _ tugu yaghqaa luki _ .
iqug ani _ tugegh meng _ ategh leg t _ naangqugh t _ n u v ug yug tek at _ u ug n angi _ peqigte luteng _ nemegh tke aat _ .
taakut _ tu ug Ê¼ gh et _ siku m _ um ut al ng anun _ esghaate yu i ut _ .
U n Ê¼ g ani _ siku gni _ a tu pig uu s _ tamaakut _ .
enkaam _ u un Ê¼ gh am _ inglu an _ iqug ani _ , _ ategh i _ i qu uy at _ , _ tuugkagh ligh vig t _ .
ama _ tugute t _ peqigte luteng _ nemegh ke aat _ suqagh meng _ k el ev ng w aaq ameng _ .
I qu uy am _ u ug n angi _ kepe negh kegtagh t _ qukagh i _ igarutaagh lleg leg t _ giimagh mun _ nekegte vig t _ .
taakut _ giimagh t _ k il g aan l e nguut _ tapghagh ghhagh meng _ nuuve luteng _ qukagh megteggun _ ayuqe ut _ .
tapghi a _ u un Ê¼ gh akun _ nemegh tke aat _ naten _ entaqun _ t h r e e _ inches _ tag k alghiit _ , _ iqug i _ n u v ug yug ll uteng _ ayuqe ut _ .
inglu i _ i qu uy akun _ aate stekayug t _ , _ inglu i _ tuugkagh kun _ aate stekayug t _ .
A a tes legh ii ni _ giimagh m _ tapghi a _ neng q eng ng waagh aq ut _ .
wetku _ naghullgute lghii ni _ il ef k agh agh tek ayug et _ .
taakut _ giimagh m _ tapghi a _ ategh lgu ut _ aaghsi meng _ .
enkaam _ taa m _ aaghsi m _ u un Ê¼ gh amun _ nemegh llegh m _ siipnegh i _ taa k egh pag g aat _ ama _ atugh u ut _ , _ ategh ke ai _ qalu ukut _ .
taakut _ tuugkagh m _ nuvug i _ savigtagh leg t _ , _ inglu i _ igarutaagh ke aat _ giimagh m _ inglu an _ nuvug a _ itegh yaghqaa luku _ tawavek _ .
enkaam _ taagken _ tu ug kaam _ k i w ak agh aan il nguq _ tapghagh _ taana _ tu ug kaam _ up- yu aatagh a _ , _ ukimallegh akun _ nuuve tke aq _ ategh a _ tukaghsiigh u uq _ .
En Ê¼ ng at all _ taana _ tukaghsiigh mun _ uyiigh _ q i llgh un naq eg ku ni _ , _ qapruute u uq _ ategh a _ .
tapghagh m _ uygu te llegh atun _ ayuqe ut _ taawanginaq _ m aal gh un eng _ nuuve te luteng _ .
tukaghsiigh m _ amalleqa _ uygu te llegh i _ taakut _ estu tete lugh qugh luteng _ kipullegmun _ pi yaghqagh t _ .
sanqute t _ ulima kumeng _ tuugkagh _ aate ste luku _ neng ll uku _ uteghmun _ aaghsi kun _ nuuve te luku _ .
enkaam _ taagken _ qaluuku meng _ uyiigh _ awatghute luku _ aaghsi kun _ taana _ nuuve te luku _ ataasigh meng _ nusugteqagh igh luku _ q i llgh us aghq aq _ .
aga _ ay v eg h _ naghulleg kuni _ u un Ê¼ gh aq _ aga _ mayugh yaghqagh _ uyiigh mete ghngaaghmi _ puglegh yaghqagh _ n ar an Ê¼ ghi l nguq _ nuqutuqagh _ .
taawa _ taa ku nguut _ ayvegh niigh sigh t _ sanqute t _ .
taakut _ giimagh t _ n af ll u ug ut _ , _ ayvegh mun _ itegh qaghtekuni _ tuugkagh _ , _ una _ u un Ê¼ gh aq _ ullegh kuni _ aga _ iteme yaghqagh _ .
En kaa m am _ q aagh i _ , _ taakut _ n u v uk r ug m el nguut _ qilleghnegh ghhagh t _ estullugnegh u ut _ ategh i _ .
taaggun _ iq uk r ug i kun _ ukite luki _ nuuve te luki _ neng ll uki _ , _ eggmagh luki _ , _ taakut _ iqukrug i _ q i llegh te pig meng _ qilleghte yaghqagh t _ .
estullugnegh u ut _ ategh i _ .
kiiwhkut _ kangii ut _ , _ k ang igh tem meng _ ategh ke ut _ .
enkaam _ taagken _ , _ tuugkagh m _ k i w ak agh aan il nguq _ tapghagh _ taana _ tuugkagh m _ up- yu aatagh a _ , _ tuugkagh at qun _ ukimallegh leg t _ , _ taaggun _ tapghagh ghhagh t _ nuuve te luki _ , _ tukaghsiigh u ut _ ategh i _ .
sanqute i _ A G H V E G H N I I G H E M
Q av al gh aam _ apegh llegh a
tamaakut _ whaa _ aghveghqutagh ke aqe kangit _ tuugkagh ghllag t _ , _ aghv egh q ut aan Ê¼ ghi sagh tut _ .
ighlleghute u na iqe ait _ , _ ighlleghute meng _ ategh ke ut _ .
elngaatall _ aghv egh q ut an Ê¼ nguq _ esgh h a _ taakut _ uyghag t _ , _ ighlleghute m _ savigtigh a _ .
tuugkagh at qun _ giimagh lgu lghiit _ whaa _ k i ngu l iigh aam _ tuugkagh i _ s av ik en Ê¼ gh aagh meng _ .
ighlleghute u ut _ tuugkagh ghllag t _ taakut _ .
taakut _ elngaatall _ uyghag t _ ugmestaaghhagh t _ aghveghqutagh u ut _ .
ukimallegh llgagh u aqe ut _ ila i _ .
S iv uy ag te m _ quunpeng _ na sa mi _ nungighte nga kete te _ petug luki _ , _ un Ê¼ g aani _ .
N el eg teng ng waagh pen ak i _ whavek _ ighlleghute mun _ , _ si g iq n ay uk am ik i _ kelenga ke m _ angtale aneng _ .
wetku _ whaa _ aghvegh meng _ pi naqe negh meggni _ nelegte luki _ pikayug u ait _ .
enkaam _ taakwegkut _ ighlleghute m _ k i w ak agh aan il nguut _ amalka _ giimagh ghllag u ut _ , _ kuukegh u na iqe ait _ .
A ng tugh pin Ê¼ ghagh llag et _ nuvug yugsaghkagh t _ whavek _ ighlleghute m _ tun ut ang anun _ .
K u uk et _ amalka _ tungu i _ .
amenqun _ saveg t _ maakut _ tungig leg t _ .
tamaa na u ut _ .
kuukegh u na iqe ait _ .
elngaatall _ uniilliighaghte yu aqe aat _ tu k agh te s _ taakut _ .
P egh ng agh meng _ nuuve te luteng _ taaggun _ , _ pegh ng agh llag meng _ tuteg te luteng _ kakitu tke aat _ saviigagh t _ maklag t _ t ap ghagh r ak aaq egk ang it _ maaten _ .
kingwaagh u ut _ ategh i _ .
taakut _ tu k agh te ngu f tun Ê¼ nguq _ tawaten _ tuteg tke aat _ uniilliighaghte yaghkagh t _ awataghpag mun _ taaleg mun _ ayuqe lghiit _ .
elngaatall _ ku k eg mun _ tawavek _ aate ste luku _ , _ taaggun _ putu luteng _ keniqaate lgu na iqe ai _ , _ amalka _ tekeghmigute stun _ ayuqe lghiit _ .
U un Ê¼ gh aam _ ila i _ tekeghmigute lgu ut _ .
elngaatall _ uglagh te luki _ neng ll uki _ tawavek _ keniqaate mun _ aate sqe aghte aqe ait _ , _ uglagh te luki _ neng ll uki _ .
elngaatall _ quunpeng _ taakut _ taawa _ taw an taq ut _ u pen Ê¼ gh al qu si q _ .
ayag mun _ tawavek _ kumlu mun _ nemegh tekagh mun _ aate ste nghmegteki _ uglagh te luki _ , _ taawa _ quunpeng _ n el g aq ut _ p es ku g si g a tut _ , _ quunpeng _ taw an taq ut _ .
quunpeng _ kete negh meggni _ , _ s aa v g um iigh waagh luteng _ amalka _ , _ taawa _ taakut _ quunpeng _ aa te z ng alghiit _ ayag mun _ ayuqe lghiit _ .
taake uk _ elngaatall _ tukagh tek _ kangigh leg t _ , _ taaleg mun _ tukagh tek _ ilate te lutek _ amenqun _ aw at ii teg ne kun _ ilate luteng _ q i llgh ut kay ug et _ .
A w at it nguut _ .
Taa m _ kingu u i aghagh a _ tapghagh _ taana _ , _ taana _ tapghaghrag _ , _ tapghaghrag meng _ ategh leg _ , _ un ku u v ak _ .
miglegrungigh u yagh ghngaaghmi _ qukiinaani _ .
miglegrungigh at _ elngaatall _ ayvegh _ aghn aagh an Ê¼ gh h aagh ll uk _ , _ t aghn ugh h ang en Ê¼ gh h agh ll uk _ miglegrungigh _ .
tamaa na u yagh ghngaan _ qukiinaani _ t ap ghagh r angll aagh aq ut _ keleve luki _ two _ an d _ a _ h al f _ inches _ es l egk ak ii ta _ .
tapghaghrag meng _ elngaatall _ aat qu s _ tamaakut _ unkuvag t _ , _ miglegrungigh at _ .
taaggun _ ineqerewaagh m _ kenle akun _ umu llegh akun _ uziftagh ke ait _ .
elngaatall _ taakut _ k i w aa k agh ii _ tapghagh at _ , _ pi nga yug u lghiit _ ayumigh m _ awataghpag i _ .
kingwaagh meng _ ategh ke ut _ , _ elngaatall _ maklag t _ , _ saviigagh u yagh ghngaaghmeng _ , _ meqesigh kaayagh ghngaaghmeng _ .
kingwaagh meng _ ategh ke ut _ , _ kingwaagh u ut _ .
unkuvag t _ en Ê¼ ngaatall _ tapghaghrag u ut _ ategh i _ .
taakut _ aw atagh p aag et _ .
S iv uq l igh pii g aq _ aange lghii _ , _ tuungligh ghhagh a _ amsakelghii _ , _ tuungligh ghhagh a _ q a z ig yagh aa yagh ng agh mi _ qukiinaani _ , _ kingwaagh _ .
taaleg _ , _ A ku ul a _ , _ kingwaagh _ .
taaleg u ut _ siv uq l igh pii g aat _ taakut _ .
U ugh q w aag et _ , _ aghsaan _ aa ng ep agll an Ê¼ ghi l nguut _ .
tegag staghhiinagh t _ awataghpi aqe ait _ kiyang _ .
iitek _ aghnagh t llu _ awataghpi aqe ait _ amle i _ taakut _ qagh r il ghagh luki _ .
qaghrilghagh at _ ilaagh sigh t _ unaghsigh t _ ii m ll uteng _ esneghrug i _ .
enkaam _ qamagun _ ilu akun _ kaki luki _ esneghrug i _ uzimun _ tawavek _ amalka _ ilaagh mun _ kumyugte aqe ait _ esneghrug i _ qamagun _ qu l igh negh i kun _ .
elngaatall _ n em gh aq ii s _ taa ku ng i _ iime negh kun _ taaggun _ .
qaghrilghagh m _ esneghrug a _ uzimun _ iimnga lghii _ .
asighte aqe ait _ taaggun _ neng ll uki _ .
Q agh r il gh aag us _ taakut _ .
enkaam _ qepe luki _ inglugtun _ p u tu k gh i _ itegagh an _ qevuute luki _ neng ll uki _ tawaten _ .
amenqun _ naflugh ghhagh a _ p u tu k gh an _ .
K i w ak agh aa kun _ qepute aqe ait _ p u tu k gh i _ inglugtun _ enkaam _ uulte negh meggni qun _ sa squghhagh u aqe lghiit _ .
El tuq s am agh meng _ ayuqe ut _ .
taakut _ ama _ sanqute meng _ ategh ke ut _ .
ayumigh m _ eghqwaagh llegh a llu _ , _ eghqwaagh sagh a llu
A p ang al uu m _ apegh llegh a
kitum _ igleghte te lleqe agu _ ayumigh m _ yupig ita _ eghqwaagh llegh a _ ?
maalghug u uk _ , _ nalighmeng _ pi nga yu t _ allake te lghiit _ sivunegh leg t _ maani _ sivuqagh mi _ ramke t _ .
ataasigh t _ taakut _ pugughileghmii t _ .
ila i _ siv un Ê¼ ghi ta _ ategh i _ aymaramket _ .
paamken _ ungazigh meng _ pi ut _ , _ q er ng agh llag meng _ nenglu t _ q er ng agh m el nguut _ iimken _ sivunegh meggneng _ ima _ ataasigh mi _ ne mi _ .
sanighmelngughmii t _ ategh it _ .
nenglu it _ taw aaten _ sani qligh ke te ghllag luteng _ ayuqe lghiit _ n ek eg negh i _ .
taakut _ ategh it _ , _ ramke t _ ilakwaagh ke te lghiit _ paamken _ tagikagh t _ , _ maani _ k ing un Ê¼ ghi t _ whaa _ kiyaghte ut _ , _ talwa _ angyaleg itnun _ atigh te luteng _ ayuqe ut _ .
ila i _ taakut _ ramke t _ ategh i _ nangupagaghmii t _ .
nenglullug it _ ama _ qaye ii llegh ni _ ayumightagh t _ q er ng agh m el nguut _ nenglu t _ .
ayumigh _ tamaakut _ yug t _ liisimake kangat _ naten _ eghqwaagh llegh llu _ , _ sa meng llu _ eghqwaagh te yaghqagh meng _ , _ qerngughte i llegh m llu _ iglegh negh a _ .
ataasigh meng _ ay u um i qu llegh ni _ eghqwaagh kayug t _ naate yagh aq _ kaate nghaani _ .
laluramke t _ â _ moon _ worship _ â _ - ngun iiq egk angat _ , _ teme igh u u uq _ .
whaten _ A y m aa r am ke t _ pikayug u ut _ eghqwaagh naqe negh meggni _ : _ us aa _ taana _ u pen Ê¼ gh aa _ tamaghhagh an _ pangeghtekau yu k _ eghqwaagh te yaghqagh leg nun _ , _ quyngigh m _ tunugh anun llu _ qilu anun llu _ .
tamaakut _ qerngughte luki _ k ag p aag aq luki _ kiig negh ke aat _ .
amalleqa _ nunivag meng _ awataghpag kun _ kagpag i kayugu ut _ .
uteghnigh nghmini _ tes p am ken _ uukagh meng _ nefku kayug _ egh q waagh mun _ atughqagh meng _ .
salngag t llu _ tawaqa t _ , _ nalighmeng _ tawaqapig meng _ pamaken _ atghagh te kayug _ .
aghvenge ma negh meggni _ , _ ataasigh t _ awataghpag t _ mangtag meng _ imigh luki _ siqlugagh mun _ k an ag taq luki _ .
tamaa na _ neqe _ eghqwaagh te yaghqagh _ kagpag kayugu aat _ kenle aanga _ taw aa v ek _ aghnegh anun _ eghqwaagh vigkagh mun _ , _ tawani _ tanqigh mi _ nazighaghsigh mi _ , _ kergamqun _ nutaghagh _ tanqigh _ piite nghaani _ .
Taa m _ sivu ngiighhagh ani _ P ii f q em meng _ ategh leg _ .
tawani _ taana _ angyaleg _ egh q waagh mun _ igleghte te i ste u aqe uq _ .
nulighh a _ taana _ angyaleg m _ sa meng _ akuute yaghqagh meng _ akuute qugh aqe uq _ .
ayvegh m _ uqugh an _ mesiigh i _ akuute sagh igh kaqe ai _ nun ii v ag mun _ , _ tunu meng _ ila luki _ .
qamagte lutek _ nulighh ghqu te lghiik _ aatkagh meng _ , _ egh q waagh em _ aate te kaghqagh aneng _ aate yaghqagh k _ .
wetku _ taw an ing in aq _ aate yaghqagh t _ .
Tam aa kun Ê¼ nguq _ ateghagh m _ aate kaqe ai _ .
ateghagh naqe negh meggni _ aate kayug it _ .
aghneq _ ataasigh _ yataaghqe te kaqe aat _ , _ neqe _ sa u a _ apegh iigh tegh r aa negh meg teg gu _ .
unaghsigh kun _ sagnegh kun _ neqe _ qamagte luku _ q an tagh tegh luku _ nategh m _ qukaa kun _ qerngagh ita _ lli luki _ , _ tanpegh meng _ saape luki _ qavaghtaghkagh it _ .
tawani _ un ug mi _ taa m _ angyaleg m _ qafsina t _ ilagaate t _ atugh aqe ai _ tam aa v eng in aq _ pi sigh t _ .
ivaghullug meng _ ategh leg t _ tamaakut _ .
nangllegsiisigh t _ .
taagken _ unaangu pigte luku _ agh t aagh aq es t aq _ maligte luku _ angyagh m _ yug an _ neng ll u ug u te t eng _ ila ke luki _ atghagh uute aqe ut _ tamaaken _ sagnegh meng _ tugumiigh iigh uute luteng _ , _ kanavek _ angyilghagh nun _ .
taagken _ angyagh _ angyilghagh neng _ ateghte luku _ , _ taakut llu _ neqe t _ qaake luki _ angyagh mun _ , _ k an aa v ek _ ken ii legh nun _ angyagh _ atghagh te aqe aat _ .
Taw aani _ kenilegh ni _ aghuliigh luteng _ utaqa i aqe ut _ siqinegh _ piite neghsigh aqe aat _ .
whaa _ siqinegh _ pii tek es tan Ê¼ gh ani _ naayghagh m _ qaye aneng _ , _ angyaleg m _ tamaa na _ sagnegh _ llilaghtugh ste aqe a _ anigu m _ qaye akun _ , _ taagken _ tamaaken _ sagnegh m _ imaa neng _ tugu tete lugh aqe luni _ eghqwaagh aqe uq _ .
eghqwaagh negh meggni _ tugu tete lugh luteng _ t aan Ê¼ g avek _ megh mun _ milugh utu te kete luku _ sa meng _ akuzimleghagh magh meng _ m an iig uu tu si meng _ , _ igamsiqa yug magh meng _ ag u m _ ayumiqullegh m _ tunugh u sagh aneng _ pi aqe ut _ .
tawaten _ eghqwaagh nghmeng _ taaqe nghmini _ angyaleg _ , _ tawaqa t llu _ iingunagh ita _ megh mun _ miluute luki _ p iiq eg kaa ng i _ taakut _ yug t _ negh es qell u uki _ .
tawani _ ken ii legh ni _ neghe uute ghllag kayugu ut _ .
kina _ alngunak _ tagi lghii _ elngaatall _ negh sqe aqe aat _ .
taana _ llangaqa _ eghte qugh u aagh _ nangllegsiisigh u uq _ ama _ ig am si q aa yug u us iig uq _ .
tanqigh mun _ m an iig uu tu s iin Ê¼ ghi tuq _ , _ taawanginaq _ taana _ tanqigh m _ piite yuwhaagh llegh a _ iiskughte aqe aat _ taw an igh ll u ug w aaq _ ay u um i qu llegh mi _ pi na luteng _ .
nangllegsiisigh _ u um un _ u pen Ê¼ gh aam _ neqnigh u llegh a _ pilaataqu sqellug qu _ .
taakut _ pugughileghmii t _ ramke it _ eghqwaagh kayugu ut _ tawani _ tanqigh mi _ L l uugh v ig mi _ , _ amalleqa _ tawaten _ tanqigh _ p iin Ê¼ gh aa luku _ .
tawaten _ ama _ neqe _ ii ng ke r ug llak _ negh yug n aq _ qerngughte luku _ pikayug t _ .
taawanginaq _ taa kun Ê¼ nguq _ pugughileghmii t _ , _ ilakwaagh ke te ii na lghiit _ eghte qugh u aagh mi _ negh te kayugu ut _ .
alla t _ pi igate ut _ .
taakut _ ila i _ ramke t _ , _ nangupagaghmii t _ , _ egh q w aa qay u ug u f tut _ tawani _ teghiglugsigh mi _ tawaten _ tanqigh _ piite nghaani _ .
alngunak _ kina _ negh yaghtuqagh yu k _ tawani _ egh q w aan Ê¼ gh ata _ .
tamaa na _ angyaleg _ eghqwaagh qagh yu k _ qam ag g luni _ ateghagh m _ aatkagh aneng _ aate luni _ pikayug _ .
temngi _ alla _ aate igate te ait _ , _ iwerngaqun _ aghvenge negh meggni _ wetku _ aate kayug it _ .
E G H Q W A A L L Q E M _ yataaghqe llegh
P el aa si m _ apegh llegh a
ila a _ nefkuuragh meng _ eghqwaagh u sqe kayug _ .
A p r il - er ug llag mun _ ilangakun _ kaate stekayugu ait _ .
L l uugh v ig mi _ eghqwaagh kayug t _ .
whangkuta _ nazighaghsigh mi _ , _ ilangani _ F e b r u ar y - mun _ kaa t ng waagh um aan _ , _ ilangani _ J an u ar y - m _ naange nghaani _ .
amenqun _ kalanta ni _ tanqigh t _ ne w _ m o o n - et _ alngunak _ ayuqe lghiit _ .
tanqigh pig kun _ ayuqe lghiit _ whangkuta _ .
piite ghesnagh nghata _ , _ sivulii lghii ni _ eghqwaagh yaghagh aqe lghii ni _ .
ataasigh u yagh na iqe aat _ angyagh _ tazimani _ , _ enkaam _ aafte lghiit _ tawaten _ legan _ ataasigh _ uspeqe llegh _ .
taana _ Q u w aa r en _ allakanigh _ .
saki mini _ key- aghtekau uq _ , _ enkaam _ saki mitun _ pi llgh a _ ayuqe uq _ .
A t ay agh aan kut _ , _ P us aan kut _ ata at _ .
whangkuta _ A ng q a teng an w at en kut _ taakut _ siv ul ii w aq ut _ qayughllak _ ig wh ani _ entaqun _ P el aa si ngu m ay agh tuq _ ataasigh u luteng _ angyagh t _ .
taagken _ ug l aa ghi y ameng _ entaqun _ tegh leg nge a _ lli aqe aq _ .
enkaam _ taana _ Q u w aa r in llu _ aaftekagh _ .
enkaam _ eghqwaagh llegh it _ tawaten _ , _ whangkuta _ pi yagute yamta _ maaten _ A ng q a teng an w an _ taana _ siv ul ii w aq elghii _ .
whangkuta _ , _ P us aan kut _ , _ U w e te l en _ , _ k i ngu l igh h a _ angyaleg _ , _ qilleghte uute te _ taana _ ang y al g ugh teng ng an _ eghqwaagh kayugu ste luku _ .
P us aam _ kinguligh u ste luku _ pika qaa _ .
ataasigh t _ negh kestagh u kut _ eghqwaagh sagh ke aqe ut _ .
aghvenge lghii ni _ mangtag meng _ .
enkaam _ sivuke luku _ tamaa na _ ategh qugh luku _ eghqwaagh te yaghqagh _ aghneghmi _ , _ P ii f q em meng _ ategh leg _ .
aavgugh qagh yu k _ mangtag meng _ mangtag lgu negh mta _ avegtugh magh an _ , _ uukagh _ aavgugh luku _ , _ pellug magh emta _ nunivag meng _ .
uqughqagh meng llu _ ayveghagh lghii ni _ saghna aqe lghiikut _ .
kapeghte i luteng _ uqingllagh magh meng _ .
tawaqa _ aavgugh magh an _ .
uukagh _ tamaa na _ neghyaghqagh stun _ , _ pugnegh iigh magh meng _ .
pugnegh t _ mekestaaghhagh u aqe ut _ .
paamken _ atghagh tke aat _ mekestaaghhaa lghiit _ .
enkaam _ apeghiigh lghii ni _ kagpag luki _ , _ unaami _ nighugte nghaani _ angyagh t _ ateghte luki _ , _ awataghpag t _ , _ t ap ghagh r ag e s _ tawaten _ angyagh naqe lghii stun _ .
sagnegh t _ neqe t _ aq f aaq eg g ke put _ tawaten _ angyagh naqe lghii stun _ esnagh mun _ atghagh te luki _ .
siqinegh _ piite neghsigh aqe aat _ eghqwaagh gpenateng _ wiin _ .
igaghyagh kayugu luta _ utaqa i te kete luku _ kay ag g negh in kut _ qaprag aqe lghiikut _ , _ mayughaate aqe lghiikut _ vuuslegh nun _ .
siqinegh _ piite kestagh nghaani _ , _ esnevagh u qugh luki _ megh m _ esne anun _ , _ eghqwaagh luten _ , _ eghqwaagh luteng _ , _ taaqe negh meggni _ , _ p ell u um egh t at _ , _ pugnegh t _ aa v g ugh waagh luki _ .
mangtag _ avegtugh aq _ sagneghnite aqe lghii _ .
tunuvagh te luki _ neghe uute ghllag kayug ni _ esnagh a mi _ .
taawa _ kiyang _ al ngun a g _ naken _ negh yagh qagh yu k _ .
yuggagh t _ agigte lghiit llu _ , _ nagun _ , _ apagh aatagh luki _ negh es qell uki _ .
taawa _ mangtag lgu lghii ni _ , _ kiyang _ mangtag meng _ negh aqe ut _ .
N eq n iigh q waagh ll ak ayug et _ whang kun ni _ aghyugh negh meggni _ .
A w atagh pag m el nguut _ neq n igh tu s _ taawa _ .
enkaam _ taaqe negh mta _ taglagh luteng _ , _ angyagh t llu _ qaake luki _ apeghiigh luki _ .
tamaa na _ awite qugh luku _ .
llaaghanwha _ legan _ angyagh m _ yug an _ uukagh t _ ilate katen _ legan _ tugulagh aqe kangit _ .
A av g ugh tegh luku _ tea- magh an _ uukagh _ , _ nunivag llu _ , _ aavgugh magh an _ mangtag _ .
awalightugh aqe lghiit _ , _ mangteghagh _ qamagte luku _ awalightugh aqe kangat _ .
enkaam _ im ii s al i k _ , _ sa meng _ amiiragh _ , _ sa u a _ al ngu un ak _ ulimasigh _ .
whangkuta _ pinegh meggni _ walamnaag _ sa u a _ igarutaagh _ .
aghnagh t _ ighneghllug _ , _ sa u a _ amiiragh _ .
I m ii s ap er u w aal ek _ .
taawa _ qam ag teng ng waagh luni _ egh q waagh em _ negh kanga _ tamaa na _ negh y u uk ayug a _ .
tawatestaghhiinaq _ whangkuta _ qamagte luten _ ila put _ kayusigh aqe luki _ ayuqe lghii ni _ egh q waagh naq en gh ata _ .
kayu siightu tete luta _ qerngughte te aqe luta _ ayuqe lghii ni _ .
aamta _ ila i _ negh y iig al ngu us _ talwa _ , _ negh ka ite ngugh t _ nun iv ag g agh meng _ legan _ eghqwaagh tke kayug t _ .
ila i _ tamaakut _ pugughileghmii neng _ ategh leg t _ u ku ta _ qasiqagh meng _ pikayug u ma ut llu _ , _ nunivag _ , _ ququngagh _ sa u a _ , _ ila i _ ququngagh raaghinagh ghhagh meng _ .
L l uugh v i r ug llag mi _ wetku _ ila i _ eghqwaagh te kayug t _ U w al iit _ , _ P ug u ghi legh m ii s taa kut _ , _ akule ke inkut _ , _ S ul u ug en kut _ , _ T em ke r u un kut _ taakut llu _ ifkaghte te u uq _ liite yama _ angyaleg _ , _ tamlu m _ ata a _ .
L l uugh v ig mi _ ama _ eghqwaagh kayugu ut _ .
entaqun _ qu qu ng agh m eng llu _ , _ tunguuya meng llu _ kineghkagh meng _ eghqwaagh tke ut _ .
ivaghullug _ I L A G A A T
P el aa si m _ apegh llegh a
I ghi v g an Ê¼ gh ani _ , _ egh q waagh em _ el ag aat angi _ taakut _ atugh aqe ait _ .
ilagagh aqe ut _ angyaleg t _ taakut _ .
ivaghullug meng _ ategh leg t _ .
El ng at aal l _ , _ repall _ tu saq n ap ang un a teng llu _ .
N angll eg si m _ ang tal ang aneng _ , _ wata _ eghqwaagh llegh mi _ tawani _ nanglleg naghsagh pigte luteng _ ilagagh negh meggni _ iglag teng _ qugh agh tegh llag l uk ii _ pi aqe kangit _ .
N angll eg si m _ ang tal ang aneng _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
U uk naa - aa - aa ngu u - u uq _ .
S aam naa - aa - aa ngu u - u uq _ ,
T ag l alghii - ii - ii _ s aa - aam n aa _ .
ketangaa- u an _ aghveghaa- a _ s aa - aam naa - aa
Agh v el eg g l ag uu - uu - l ii _ .
E ll ng all uu - uu - u u _ .
Q ag im aa _ il ug an ii - ii - ii _ .
U k naa - aa - aa ngu u - u uq _ .
S aam naa - aa - aa ngu uq _ ,
K et ang aa - aa - aan _ ayveghaa- a _ s aa - aam n a _ .
Agh v el eg ll aag ul uu - uu - l ii
El ng aa - aa - aa ll uu - uu ngu - u uq
Q ag im aa _ il ug an ii - ii - ii _ .
U uk naa - aa - aa ngu u - u uq _ .
S aam naa - aa - aa ngu u - u uq
T ag l alghii - ii - ii _ s aa - aam n aa _ .
ketangaa- u an _ m ak l aq aa - aa - aa ngu uq _ .
E ll ng all uu - uu - u u _ .
Agh v el ag llag u ul ii - ii - ii ng ii _ .
Q ag im aa _ il ug an ii - ii - ii - ng i y _ .
A G H V E G H N I I G H E M _ P I L L G H I
P el aa si m _ apegh llegh a
taawa _ enkaamngam _ angyaghnagh llegh mun _ tawavek _ .
aghvenge negh meggni _ avii kayug t _ , _ â _ W u - h u - h u - h u um eng _ ! _ â _ ayuqe ut _ av ii s _ tamaakut _ .
aquutagh t _ qule mun _ nengug te luki _ , _ angyapig m _ aquutagh i _ .
K el g ut ngu f tun Ê¼ nguq _ kiyaghnegh mun _ n us un Ê¼ gh ata _ aga _ aghveqe luki _ .
enkaam _ tuqute nghata _ wiin _ angyagh _ awillaghate te luni _ .
uzive luki _ kaspugte lghii ni _ avii kayug t _ w u - h u - h u - h u um eng _ ayuqe ut _ .
enkaam _ taa q en gh ata _ tagi laghate te luni _ qepghagh aqe ait _ .
ila i _ kaa l g ugh naq en gh ata _ kaa l gu ut aghq aa meng _ , _ ikute magh meng _ mangtag meng _ pi aqe lghiit _ .
awataghpag ightugh luku _ siv ul igh negh i kun llu _ , _ kingu nge i kete te llu _ .
enkaam _ ghhatagh luteng llu _ igleghte negh meggni _ aga _ angyagh m _ yug a _ qamagte luni _ avii kayug _ w u - h u - h u - h u um eng _ .
qukaghite lghii ni llu _ , _ whaa _ tamlag yaghtugh lghii ni llu _ avii aqe lghiit _ .
taawa _ qepghagh aqe kangit _ .
enkaam _ kaat ute te nghata _ taakut _ angyaleg t _ mangtag meng _ pi luteng _ awataghpag t _ imigh aqe kangit _ .
suqi a _ taakut _ inglu i _ sivuligh t _ iike yuggaagh t _ aghvenge lghii m _ qamagte luki _ pikayug u ai _ .
veghagh i llu _ taakut _ qamagte luki _ pikayug u ai _ .
inglu i _ suqagh n _ taakut _ angyagh mun _ all gh u ul eg nun _ , _ pi ng ay u ul eg nun _ , _ taakwavek _ in pi qu us gh aq aq iit _ .
siipnegh _ tamaa na _ suqagh _ siivanllegh nun _ in pi qu us gh aq aq aat _ aghnagh nun llu _ .
enkaam _ apeghiigh negh meggni _ , _ angyaleg t _ elqiigh luteng _ ayuqe aqe lghiit _ .
angyaleg t _ kaate lghii ni _ apeghiigh lghii ni _ qepghagh llegh i _ aghvegh m _ , _ angyaleg m _ aa _ elqiigh uute luta _ siv uy ag te t lu _ angyaleg t llu _ .
aquutagh t _ , _ qalugyagh t _ siv uy ag te m _ tugu luki _ mang tag g agh meng _ ikute luteng _ enkaam _ taglagh aqe ut _ .
A qu ut as taa kut _ mangteghagh m _ sivugh u nga kete te _ qavighnga i ta _ napaghte aqe ait _ .
Q al ug y a s _ taakut _ amig m _ aywaa kun _ asighte te aqe ait _ napagh ita _ .
enkaam _ nunivag t _ egsug i _ taakut _ ikute luteng _ peghu aqe lghiit _ , _ aghv eng mun _ pi kaghqagh t _ , _ enkaam _ tugu luki _ , _ itghute luki _ , _ angyagh m _ yug an _ ug lagh tal ng a tuq _ .
angyaleg m _ nulighh an _ , _ q i llegh teng ngu us _ taakut _ , _ taqughtekete te _ , _ qiiyngu t _ amenqun _ quyngigh m _ manu i _ melqughtuqagh t _ .
taagken _ ikute te luteng _ naten _ angka i ta _ petug kayugu ait _ .
aavgugh aqe ait _ angyagh m _ yug an _ uglaghtala atun _ , _ aghtequgh ligh luki _ , _ enkaam _ qaltaaghwagh ghhagh u ut _ .
qaltaaghwagh ghhagh t _ , _ unaghsigh t _ sa u aat _ , _ ila i _ s uq aa w ut _ , _ tawavek _ kanaghte uute luki _ , _ megh meng _ ila aghte luki _ , _ angyaleg m _ nulighh an _ tugumiiqe luki _ atghagh aqe uq _ .
enkaam _ aquutagh t _ alla _ ila i _ , _ ang y il gh an il nguut _ , _ taakut _ k el qell uki _ , _ uugte luteng _ , _ siv uy ag te t lu _ , _ angyaleg t llu _ .
taakut _ aquutagh t _ angyaleg m _ atuqe luki _ , _ taakut _ angyaleg m _ nulighh i _ angyagh m _ sivuyag an _ kelu kaghagh ani _ , _ m all egh q eng ng waagh aq iit _ ang y a s _ tawaten _ .
angyagh t _ wiin _ iggagte aatagh aqe ait _ tawaten _ t all im aneng _ iggagte aatagh luki _ av iin Ê¼ gh ata _ .
aquutagh teng _ qule mun _ nengug te nghatki _ , _ enkaam _ nulugh igh i te a _ taa m _ qaltaaghwagh t _ qule mun _ nengug te aqe ait _ .
avii nghmeng _ taa q en gh aat a _ , _ enraq _ aghv igh ll uki _ ig g ag aat agh luteng _ .
tawaten _ ama _ inglu anun _ nengug te luki _ av iin Ê¼ gh ata _ , _ ama _ inglu aneng _ aghv igh ll uki _ ama _ qaltaaghwagh teng _ nengug te aqe ait _ qule mun _ .
A v iit _ W u - h u - h u - h uu nguut _ ar at _ av ii meng _ ategh leg t _ .
tawaten _ aviillegh _ W u - h u - h u - h u - h u - h u u _ pi aqe ut _ .
taagken _ taa q en Ê¼ gh ata _ taakut _ aghvegh m _ tegh r ugh waagh i _ sivuyag kun _ neftegtekayugu ut _ .
iike luki _ naten _ iqetu tke ai ta _ , _ mangtagtuumagh ita _ kiwavek _ n ate r ug llak _ tag k ii ta _ mangtag i _ .
N ef teg taq us _ tawaten _ .
taakut _ teghrughaagh t _ taagken _ qaltaaghwagh m _ megh aneng _ kuuve qaghte aghte aqe ait _ sivuke luki _ .
teghrughaagh t _ veghagh m _ iqug ke ai _ , _ iime qaghte luteng _ ayuqe lghiit _ .
V ii s tun _ ayuqe lghiit _ .
T egh r ugh aagh us _ taakut _ .
qaltaaghwagh m _ megh aneng _ kuuve qagh qaghaqe ait _ sivuke luki _ enkaam _ taakut _ tuune aqe ait _ .
S iv uy ag tet _ sivuke luteng _ nunivag meng _ , _ mang tag g agh meng _ pi luten _ , _ megh qagh luteng _ , _ kinguligh ghhagh nun _ , _ iwerngaqun _ angyaleg mun _ .
enkaam _ taa q en Ê¼ gh ata _ , _ puuskaate t _ aghnagh m _ ighu ita _ aku l ang ii kun _ aghvequte aqe ait _ .
tawaten _ whanga llu _ pi kanga _ es tam aneng _ .
pi iigh aatagh kau unga _ .
puygu laatagh ma aqa _ whangkuta _ sivuke luku _ pi llegh p us _ taana _ .
Agh n a s _ tagi laghate te aqe lghiit _ ilagagh yagh ut _ .
ivi t _ , _ iv iigh un Ê¼ ghi l nguut _ .
ivi u ut _ aghnagh t _ aqume uute luteng _ .
aqumutagh igh luki _ aquutagh m _ taa m _ kelu kaghagh akun _ .
Taa m _ angyaleg m _ nulighh an _ atghagh naqe lghii ni _ ilagaate meng _ aanqute i tete luki _ unite aqe ai _ enkaam _ taakut _ kingu itneng _ ilagagh aqe ut _ .
nunanigh pigtu ut _ ilagaate t _ ig l ak g al ek _ .
nalluke anka _ ilagaate t _ , _ liite mangite anka _ iv i s _ tamaakut _ .
I g g w an ing in aat _ iv aagh ull u ug et _ .
enkaam _ apeghiigh luteng _ tawaten _ tag l an Ê¼ gh ata _ , _ angyagh t _ usingigh luki _ sayug luki _ kelevagh luki _ .
tamaa na _ angaghqugh luku _ qamestagh _ , _ suqagh n _ inglu i _ manughagh mun _ .
ivi igh ghllag kayugu luki _ .
N un an i pig tu s _ tamaakut _ ivi t _ .
En kaa ng am _ angaghqugh te lghii _ yuug _ esghapag lghii ni _ nun m aag g aq _ , _ ila i _ qamugh meng _ ayuqe lghiit _ .
N un m aag g aq _ mangteghagh meggnun _ aglagh kestagh aqe ut _ ilagagh lghii neng _ nagate magh meng _ .
iglakegte pigte lghiit llu _ , _ aghn agh pag et _ tamaakut _ ima _ m ek elghii gh h aa tem m neng _ .
taana _ Q u w aa r en _ aghvenge kayug _ kiyang _ u pen Ê¼ gh aat anga _ .
nagate kanga _ tamaaken _ .
Q u w aa r en _ P us aan kut _ ata at _ .
ataata ke luku _ whanga _ ayuqe aqa _ .
