aghvenge neghtuqagh _ u p o n Ê¼ gh aat anga _ kiyang _ .
enkaam _ nagate lghiinga _ , _ esghapag kanga _ tamaaken _ ima _ mekelghiigh ghhagh u te mneng _ , _ whang kun neng _ pi y aagh ll em n nun _ tawaten _ .
Agh nagh pag et _ iglag kegtagh ghhalek _ .
enkaam _ taaqe aqe ut _ angaghqugh nghmeng _ , _ apeghiigh nghata _ enkaam _ taagken _ enraq _ angyaleg m _ tugukagh mineng _ suqagh meng _ , _ kiyang _ aghnagh t _ pi aqe lghiit _ , _ inpite qugh aqe ait _ suqagh meng _ .
enkaam _ inpite qugh nghmeng _ apeghiigh nghmegteki _ , _ en r agh ng am _ angyagh m _ yug i _ nengigh te ste aqe ait _ .
tamaa na _ qamestagh _ , _ aghvegh m _ llaag i _ , _ talligh m _ nuvukrug i _ , _ veghagh m _ nuvukrug i _ , _ qengagh i _ , _ iye i _ , _ iye i _ ukut _ iy igh pig aat _ iike luki _ , _ q al t aagh w ag nun _ kanaghte luki _ petug kayugu ut _ .
taakut _ qamestagh t _ , _ taakut llu _ llaag t _ uy v as aghq en negh meng _ apeghiigh aqe kangit _ .
nekegte luki _ tawaten _ taakut _ eghqwaagh aqe lghiit _ , _ enkaam _ taa q en Ê¼ gh ata _ qamestagh i _ taakut _ siqlugagh mun _ angaghqugh aqe ut _ , _ k an aghq ugh aa qu t _ si g l ug agh m iig aq ut _ .
enkaam _ tegh r ugh waagh e s _ taakut _ aghveghaqetagh kun _ pe tu w aq iit _ .
A w atagh pag e s _ taakut _ mangteghagh m _ sivulighte negh akun _ pi ng ay u w aaq elghii t _ , _ petug aqe ait _ .
elqiigh t llu _ mat- aghte luki _ taakut _ apeghiigh aqe lghiit _ , _ agh in Ê¼ gh waagh nun _ n ef tegh qu qay uk _ .
kelqe te aaghet _ quunpeng _ agh in Ê¼ gh waagh nun _ elqiigh t _ .
atungag t _ ukagun _ n as qu ugh u tet _ am y ut leg el l _ yukutate aqe lghiit _ .
kinegh negh meggni _ u ku m _ pi i _ teregh u aghte te neghtu pigte ut _ , _ tu k r u ug taq egk angi _ .
enkaam _ i ghi v g an Ê¼ gh ani _ egh q waagh em _ ilagagh ta i _ taakut _ ivaghullug t _ atugh aqe ait _ .
ilagagh aqe ut _ angyaleg t _ taakut _ .
ivaghullug meng _ ategh leg t _ .
qafsina t _ liite kaqe anka _ ilagaate t _ .
elngaatall _ repall _ tu saq n ap ang un a teng llu _ n angll eg g si m _ ang tal ang aneng _ .
wata _ eghqwaagh llegh mi _ tawani _ nanglleg naghsagh pigte luteng _ ilagagh negh meggni _ iglag teng _ qugh agh tegh llag luki _ pi aqe kangit _ .
N angll eg g si m _ ang tal ang aneng _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
eghte qugh u aagh _ taana _ tanqigh mun _ pi ngun Ê¼ ghi l nguq _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
K ag pag aal ghii _ sivuke luku _ tuune kayugu lghii _ .
aghvegh mun _ tawavek _ n angll eg g s ii si q _ .
qerngughte i sigh _ taana _ , _ kiyang _ aghvegh _ taana _ angegh llegh u lghii _ unake naqe yaghqagh _ .
taakut _ amalka _ kiyaghnegh mun _ aflenga kaqe kangit _ tunusagh u luki _ tukfigh sigh u luki _ .
tawaten _ uspeqe llegh i _ nakaan _ tanqigh mun _ .
apeghtughiste m _ tanqigh mun _ pi llgh un il uki _ pi aqe kangi _ .
moon _ w o r s h ip - meng _ ata iqe ai _ apeghtughiste mta _ whangkuta _ .
tanqigh mun _ pi ngun Ê¼ ghi l nguut _ , _ yupig ni _ kiyaghnegh mun _ tunusagh t _ .
T a z im ak er ug llak _ liisimake kangat _ kiyaghnegh _ taana _ .
ima _ siv ul iigh aghn eng _ y uk s ug g aagh neng _ liisimake kangat _ repall _ atigh igate aat _ ell qugh ll uku _ ategh aneng _ , _ aa ng es q em _ aa ng tal ang aneng _ .
A t ii p all aagh yaghq aa nguq _ aange uq _ , _ t all ugh nagh pe tugh nguq _ .
enkaam _ apa meng _ atigh luku _ ayuqe aat _ , _ aa ng es q em _ ang taa l ang aneng _ .
aghvegh m llu _ uyvasaghqe llegh a
P el aa si m _ apegh llegh a
taakut _ llaag t _ eghqwaagh naqe lghii ni _ keneligh luteng _ .
uksugh mi _ uqfigagh m _ tangigh llegh m _ q aam n angi _ am es t aagh h aat _ , _ saghna aqe lghiit _ .
enkaam _ pe tug t aagh aqegk ang it _ aagra ni _ quunpeng _ kinegh ghngaita _ .
paneghte aqe kangit _ kenegh kun _ .
K um aghh negh meg g ni _ taakut _ uqfigagh m _ ggiillegh i _ p an egh qugh aaq iit _ uglaghi naqe pigte luki _ .
En kaa ng am _ tawaten _ taakut _ apeghiigh nghmegteki _ taakut _ tawaten _ pi nghmeng _ , _ pi nga yu t _ un ug et _ qavagh t _ pikayug t _ .
aamta _ qepghagh u ngugh lug ni _ q av an Ê¼ gh ani _ aghte negh ni _ , _ m aal gh un eng _ i ghi v g agh ni _ tawaten _ ilagagh aqe ut _ .
taakut _ ilagaate t _ atugh aatagh aqe ait _ enkaam _ pi nga yagh u ni _ agh llegh em _ taakut _ teghrughaagh t _ petug nga lghiit _ qeteghte aqe ut _ .
tawaten _ keneligh luki _ eghqwaagh luteng _ ama _ iike luki _ , _ i teg si n Ê¼ gh u ut _ mangtagti a _ taakwegkut _ .
natengiighhaq _ es l egk ak aan _ entaqun _ naten _ iqetutka aqe ut _ o n e _ f o o t- n a- h al f - neng _ , _ f iv e _ inches _ es l egk ak ii ta _ .
T egh r ugh aagh e s _ taakut _ mangtag i _ uteghmun _ iike luki _ , _ taakut _ ken gh et _ kum agh ll uki _ eghqwaagh aqlaatagh kangit _ tamaaken _ ggiillegh meng _ panegh qugh magh meng _ .
enkaam _ aw atagh p aag et lu _ ikugh aqe ut _ , _ aquutagh t llu _ taakut _ iike magh ita _ .
qalugyagh t llu _ nefteghqe aqe aat _ , _ taawa _ taaqe nghmegteki _ apeghiigh aqe aat _ taaqe aqe ut _ amalka _ aghvegh m _ qepghagh llegh a _ .
enkaam _ iye i _ taakut _ qageghte luki _ sa kun _ qalusiqagh kun _ sa kun _ sagnegh u aagh qun llu _ megh i _ taakut _ ila ke luki _ iye an _ megh i _ .
tamaa na _ ggiillegh m _ panellegh a _ akuute aqe aat _ mesiigh meng _ ila aghte luki _ ug l aa ghi nal uki _ akuute aqe ait _ .
enkaam _ akuute nghmeng _ taaqe nghmegteki _ angyagh m _ sivuyag i _ aghenqignegh i _ aghvegh ghhagh t _ , _ m i ngu ugh h utaq iit _ puyugh meng _ taagken _ .
T ag neq eg te pig tu ut _ uq f iig am _ ggiillegh an _ panellegh i _ .
aghvegh t _ ulima aqe ait _ aghenqignegh m _ tu ng ang akun _ , _ saghumignegh an _ tu ng ang akun _ veghagh ghhagh inagh t _ pi aqe ait _ asitmun _ teregh luki llu _ inglugtun _ .
enkaam _ aq u ut a s _ taakut _ amalka _ piineqe aqe ait _ aligh a _ taakut _ qu ul q am _ tu ng aa ng akun _ taaggun _ asitmun _ ighighte luteng _ ayuqe ut _ s l an t- el uteng _ .
qulighnegh i llu _ taakut _ m ing ugh h aq iit _ .
enkaam _ tagneqegte pigte aqe ut _ , _ kinegh ngllagh aqe ait _ .
taawa _ aghvegh m _ taana _ uyvasaghqe llegh a _ apeghiigh aqe uq _ taaqe aqe uq _ .
alla _ angyagh yaghqaaghte aqe ut _ .
A ng yagh tugh lu uteng _ ayveghni ii aagh _ pi luku _ .
ila i llu _ aghvenge aqe lghiit _ ama _ tawaten _ uyvasaghqe kayug t _ ellmeng _ pi llegh megestun _ uyvasaghqe kayug t _ .
tawaten _ ama _ veghagh i _ siqlugagh mig kayug it _ .
enkaam _ sa mun _ ang yagh tu mun _ ll iigh aq us _ taawa _ .
qamestagh m _ aavgugh llegh i _ uyvasaghqe llegh i llu
P el aa si m _ apegh llegh a
enkaam _ angyagh uute luteng _ tawaten _ , _ ang yagh n aq _ kayaali nghaani _ enkaam _ taakut _ qamestagh i _ aqfa luki _ angaghqugh luki _ unaangu pigte luku _ siqinegh _ qu ul v aghq aaq es tan gh ani _ p eg g et _ sa u aat _ kayute kellug ke i _ ang agh qu mun _ .
enkaam _ ighleke aqe kangit _ , _ whangkuta qun _ kayute teng _ .
taakut _ ama _ tawaten _ uy v as aghq el g et _ .
eghqwaagh qagh luteng _ ama _ tawaten _ , _ taawa _ apegh iin Ê¼ gh ata _ eghqwaagh nghmeng _ elngaatall _ pil iigh un neq eg g s aat kay uk _ qamestagh m _ mangtag aneng _ .
aavgugh luki _ naten _ umu tate ke ii te a _ qamestagh m _ am es taa llgh i _ , _ mangteghagh nun _ awaligh uute kaqe ait _ .
wetku _ tawani _ nengighqe aqe ait _ .
mangteghagh _ qamagte luku _ .
enkaam _ tawaten _ ama _ imiisagh leg _ sa meng _ piyukekagh meggneng _ .
En kaa ng am _ aghnaghaghhagh t llu _ aw al igh tu mun _ , _ aw al igh tugh y un egh tugh q aag aq ii _ .
imiisagh u ut _ akileghtuusagh t _ amalka _ .
aghnagh u aghagh aat _ sa meng _ neqe meng _ negh yug n ameng _ pi aqe luki _ , _ enkaam _ ayghigh luteng llu _ aw aal igh tugh naq aq elghii t _ .
taawa _ taa q en Ê¼ gh aat a _ tegh r uugh aagh e s _ taakut _ petug aqe lghiit _ aagra m _ qula akun _ .
A G H Q E S A G H T U M _ pi a
P el aa si m _ apegh llegh a
enkaam _ ang yagh n aq _ kay aal in Ê¼ gh ani _ , _ enraq _ aghq es agh tu mun _ pikayug ni _ .
ila ke te lghii _ , _ kelgute te luta _ siivanllegh t _ , _ taakut _ aghvengekagh ni _ teghrughaagh t _ .
aghnagh t _ kelgugh luki _ q er ngugh ul uteng _ taglagh uute aqe lghiit _ .
qasiqagh m _ itegagh a _ , _ mangtag _ , _ aghn a s _ tamaakut _ , _ mangtag _ agaghte i i ragh u aagh _ .
ila i _ nefkuuragh meng llu _ , _ tawaqa _ , _ quyngigh m llu _ tulimagh aneng _ pi ma aqe aat _ p am aa ken _ atghagh tekagh meng _ .
Q is g eng an kut _ , _ A nagh as u ug en kut _ , _ W iy allu _ taana _ pikayug _ iknaqe llegh a _ umiileg _ .
enkaam _ kum agh ll uteng _ ungagagh meng _ qiigh aqe luki _ eghqwaagh aqe lghiit _ , _ â _ A a siv aa s aam n a _ t aa _ , _ â _ siv un Ê¼ gh et _ tuqlugh aqe luki _ tag il agh aa tes qell uki _ ken Ê¼ ghem _ asi anun _ neghe ste naqe ni luki _ eghqwaagh aqe kangit _ .
taagken _ apegh iin Ê¼ gh ata _ neghe uute ghllag aqe ukut _ .
teghrughaagh t _ nengighqe aqe luki _ neghe uute aqe ut _ .
elngaatall _ neqe m _ neqnigh lleghpigagh i _ tegh r uugh aagh e s _ taakut _ piinlegh i _ k in Ê¼ gh ag an egh meg g ni _ , _ kii _ mesiigh _ uqlughte nanigh negh meggni _ , _ g ev y agll uteng _ tesqamani _ s aan igh r u ug tek es tagh lu uteng _ aa _ urang _ neqnigh ut _ neqe t _ .
elngaatall _ neghe uute ghllag kayug ni _ .
taaqe negh mta _ kenegh mun _ alleg luta _ veg meng _ sa meng _ .
A t gh amun _ kilgaaqu te aqe ukut _ mekelghiigh ni _ .
enkaam _ qamagte luni _ tawaten _ angyaleg a _ , _ angyagh meng _ taaqe llegh at _ p u v aa ll al uku _ , _ taa k w an ing ani _ aghqesaghtugh aqe luteng _ .
allakagh meng _ pi vig leg t _ alngunak _ kinku t _ .
kiyang _ yug a _ aghq es agh tugh v il i k _ n aan taq luteng _ .
ila i _ angyagh meng _ pi aqe luteng _ .
kiyang _ qamagte luni _ .
enkaam _ amalka _ ayumiqullegh _ kaspugte aqe uq _ .
enkaam _ taana _ whanga _ sumeghtaghagh te kaqe aqa _ , _ qam ag teng ng waagh luku _ sangiighhagh a _ , _ p u v all ar aa llgh aa _ , _ aghq es agh tu m s uk _ apeghiigh aqe kangat _ J un e -em _ kiyang _ naange nghaani _ taakwani _ .
enkaam _ July _ taana _ whanga _ sumeghtaghagh te kete negh mkun _ , _ sa mun _ nunivagseghagh mete te _ saghna vig _ , _ ne w _ y e ar - ngu s qell uku _ . _ alla _ nutaghagh _ amalka _ ay um i qu l eq _ igleghte te aqe kangat _ .
taawa _ sa u a _ n ul ugh y aq _ , _ an av ag y aq _ atuqe magh an _ .
aghnagh t _ aghulaghqugh te aqe lghiit _ iwerngaqun _ kiilqusigh _ al iin Ê¼ gh un Ê¼ gh aani _ .
aghhunneghagu _ avelghagh gpenateng _ navek _ pi aqe luteng _ .
N ul ugh y aq _ , _ kayu _ pin Ê¼ gh ani _ , _ n ef kaa q luku _ , _ mesiigh kun _ ateghte aqe luku _ .
uukagh _ tawaten _ ama _ mesiigh mun _ ateghte aqe luku _ ila a _ .
aghula i te gpenani _ yug a _ legh iitu te mneng _ esghapag lleg mni _ ayuqe lghii _ .
navek _ pi ma inagh _ , _ ila a _ tamaa na _ sang ll aq _ navek _ pi igate ngughk _ .
sa meng _ angyagh meng _ ulima _ .
ila a _ mallu nge aqe luni _ , _ u ug teng aq luni _ , _ aghv egh m eng lu _ mallu nge aqe luteng _ .
alngunak _ ayvegh meng _ m all ung en Ê¼ gh ata _ pi laghate aqe luni _ .
kelgugh aqe kangit _ aq f a tes qell uki _ aghvegh meng _ m all ung en Ê¼ gh ata _ , _ aghvesiigh meng _ , _ qu ng v uugh agh meng _ wataghllak _ avelghagh igate ngugh t _ .
enkaam _ pilag nghmegteki _ , _ ila ke te lghiit _ qerngagh meng _ pilag aqe lghiit _ , _ enkaam _ apeghiigh negh meggni _ ne iitagh ke luki _ .
taakwavek _ qenwat qun _ esgha _ aghvepig llu _ qenwat qun _ ne iitagh ke luku _ lliigh lghii _ m aa te mun _ ukavek _ wha _ tawaten _ .

sivungagh m _ Kiyagh taa llgh a _ neghigh luku
mat- yu ke aq _ sivungagh mii
K ing i kaam _ apegh llegh a

S ip el an kut _ maavek _ lliigh magh ita _ tagi ukut _ wetku _ .
anengagh ka _ G al aag er ng en _ aghnaa igh te yan _ kayagte aanga _ qepghagh te yaghtigh sqellug qu _ .
amen- a _ , _ ayvigtegh mii t llu _ , _ S ip el an ku t lu _ qerngughte te kau ut _ taa m _ sivu ngiighhagh ani _ maavek _ sivungagh mun _ .
quyngigh m _ q ap r aghq aqegk angi _ .
taagken _ en kaa ng am _ tagi ukut llu _ aghnaa igh te yan _ G al aag er ng en _ .
kayusigh yaghtigh sqe a _ ataqagh m _ .
En kaa ng am _ qenwat _ ellngit llu _ tagi ut _ .
tazigna ta _ mangteghagh at _ .
sivuke luta _ k an an s alghii kut _ , _ aaygu m _ maaten _ nayugh kekagh ani _ .
En kaa ng am _ , _ elngaatall _ k ag p ell ghagh tegh llag l uta _ ayuqe yalghiikut _ .
ingaghte uute negh mta _ sakighte luta _ , _ qavaghvig ite ngughk _ tamaani _ .
igaghvig _ sakmavek _ pi u yaghpete aat _ , _ P in aa y am _ itghagh te ma kanga _ , _ taghnughhagh a _ m a tu m _ pillgite na yu kan _ .
llaaghanwha _ legan _ .
P i wh an in kut _ M r . _ F ar l is -en kut _ , _ S ip el an kut _ , _ pinagh u yankut _ , _ P ang aw y in kut _ ayvigtegh mi _ taamani _ quyngigh _ sigh un egh tu p aal ug llak _ tugu naqutke kangat _ .
A g Ê¼ ghi l ghiit _ nagate vyiigh anka _ , _ ne m _ k el ut ang ani _ taamani _ ayvigtegh mi _ .
Tam aa ke y ag g aq _ quyngigh neng _ sigh un gh i _ aange lghiik _ .
enkaam _ sivuke luku _ ungazighmii m _ neli kaqsagh kanga _ maana _ sivu nge aq _ , _ M ay uk aam _ .
enkaam _ amani _ sivukekagh _ Q u v eg si legh mi _ nenglu ngiighhagh m _ aag llegh a _ makete luku _ .
alghigh ta ani _ nun al gu si qagh agh put _ .
whangkuta _ l o g _ h o us e- meng _ mangteghagh luta _ .
almesiqe a _ nutem _ tawaten _ mesag ghllag _ .
T u tem q ii r aagh h agh meng _ tu um k ell uta _ .
kelulighnegh itgun _ u w al igh negh it gun _ mangteghagh ukut _ M ay uk aan kut _ , _ maagun _ sivungagh kun _ .
T aan Ê¼ g an te f tuq _ .
elngaatall _ nategh ke te luni _ f l o o r - eng ll aam alghii _ pi wh an i meng _ , _ salngagkwaagh m _ , _ ing l it r aagh meng _ , _ taqughkwaagh aneng _ .
elngaatall _ taake uk _ neghe llegh nkuk _ , _ S ii v aghh aan kuk _ taghnughhagh ke lukek _ .
enkaam _ n ul igh qell uku _ T al iq n aq _ , _ taana llu _ saki ni _ entaqun _ W aa y i _ .
En kaa ng am _ tawani _ itghagh yuwhaagh aqngamta _ , _ I i r gu m _ itghagh sigh nkut _ maavek _ .
amavek _ maaken _ M ay uk aan kut _ taakut _ sivu ngiighhagh mnni _ itghagh kau lghiit _ .
maghagh mete te _ it ghagh w aaq agh tu kut _ ayvigtegh meng _ amaken _ tawani _ kiig ani _ .
En kaa ng am _ taamani _ G al aag er ng en kuk _ M ay uk aan kuk _ uyghiite ngllagh uk _ .
angyi aghte tke aat
malghukuraagh _ tesqawani _ unguvigagh m _ tapghagh ani _ , _ nalluke aqa _ sa ke aq _ aquutagh ii aghagh luni _ wallu _ tepe kau a _ .
yug i _ , _ pugughileghmii t _ tume liqe luteng _ , _ naalkekagh it _ qenwat _ , _ maalghug _ .
samagun _ naayghagh t _ uugh q it gun _ ivagh luki _ qimugsigh meng _ .
En kaa ng am _ kitum _ taa m _ am agh agh si ni _ nangllaghqe ghllag yan _ up- lleghsi ma kanga _ , _ naayghagh t _ uugh q it ni _ samani _ .
up- lleghte luku _ , _ talwa _ akuzi nanigh luni _ , _ up- lleghsi ma kanga _ i wh an i m _ A y m er g em _ .
piiwagh te u yagh kangi _ iv agh it _ kinku t _ taa m _ malghukuraagh m _ yug i _ .
esghaqagh kau ma aqa _ taana _ malghukuraagh _ .
unguvigagh m _ entaqun _ tapghagh ani _ tesqawani _ .
napaqagh ghllag a llu _ , _ taana llu _ yugusigh a _ .
kingu a llu _ taawa _ aminghagh vyiigh llgagh u uq _ natengiighhaq _ .
uugte aq
Taa ku ngu u kut _ tawani _ , _ K em ug y illu _ , _ veghtekagh llu _ , _ A taq a _ wallu _ S ing aa w e tegh ll ak lu _ iwhani llu _ K an egh tegh yaq lu _ , _ uugta nge ukut _ tesqawani _ ayvegh meng _ .
tuqute luku _ kagimtegkangat _ , _ elngaatall _ taana _ S ing aa w e tegh llak _ n at ang aneng _ tuufqaghtagh lghii _ .
ii _ aghnalqwaagh _ qemall _ , _ tukaate ma a _ neghekagh an _ entaqun _ , _ m igh y am _ kaate kaqe a _ elngaatall _ , _ tesqawani _ taaqe luni _ tuufqaghtagh nghmeng _ .
M ay uk aan kuk _ A m aw un kuk _ nayag ak _ .
tamaani _ aghnaaghtekau uq _ .
iknaqe qrug raaghinagh _ elngaatall _ taana _ aghnalqwaagh _ .
M ay uk aam _ angyi lghii
T es k an an te f tut _ M ay uk aam _ angyi lghii _ , _ tekeghagh an _ u ku m _ tu ng ang iigh h aani _ .
anguksag kaqsagh aput _ amaken _ tapghapagagh meng _ maavek _ lliigh yama _ , _ tes k an ani _ tukughagh i _ kenle nge i kete te _ samagun _ kepugh llegh it _ .
whaten _ ayuqe yaghpete ut _ , _ enkaam _ iighsuute meng _ qughagh qugh vike luteng _ .
arekull _ M ay uk aam _ tamaani _ tawaten _ angyilghagh ma aqe kanga _ .
F am il y - ng in aghh aa w aq elghii t _ maani _ taakut _ M ay uk aan kut _ .
inglu a _ qaake luku _ angyaghwaagh m _ enkaam _ ayagsigh luku _ , _ inglu a _ enraq _ iighsugh luku _ qaake aqe a _ .
tawaten _ angyilghagh ma aqe kanga _ .
mat- yu ke aq _ sivuke pigte luni _ maavek _ lliigh kau uq _ .
enkaam _ tuqu yan _ , _ S ip el an kut _ kiiw gneng _ samaken _ quyngigh eng _ nula ghllag yan _ malghughqellug qu _ , _ ila a _ ayvigtegh mi _ , _ ila a _ maani _ , _ tawaten _ pi kau ut _ .
angyaghpag ghllag _ R u b y
En kaa ng am _ una _ R u b y _ angyaghpag ghllag _ pi nga yug qu ragh u aagh _ , _ esghagh ma aqa _ taana _ , _ S te am er - ngu yagh pe tuq _ .
tawani _ esghagh aqe yamkun _ kingu mikun _ whaten _ mal gh u ku r aagh h agh es tun _ el qagh t aghh agh meng _ lliigh ma lghii _ .
R u b y _ maagun _ uyghigh uq _ , _ igaghvig _ tagite a _ , _ igagh vike yuwhaagh _ .
P in aa y am _ itghagh tke a _ tawani _ .
tawaten _ pi luku _ umiileg llu _ tes ak m um llu _ apeghtughiste a _ kina u yagh uq _ .
D u p er tu is - ngu yagh t aa _ wallu _ p uy g aaq a _ tes ak m u m _ apeghtughiste a _ .
ipa _ apeghtugh i sta _ , _ igaghyagh vike yuwhaagh ka _ whanga _ C am p b ell - ngu yagh tuq _ .
elngaatall _ taana _ apeghtugh i sta _ qepghaqagh ghllag pestaagh u yagh uq _ .
L o s _ angeles- meng _ tagi kau uq _ , _ C al i f o r n i a- meng _ .
sa n _ F r an c is c o - m _ uughqa ghhagh anite ngughk _ taana _ L o s _ angeles _ .
Taw all ii m a _ naten _ angka aqa _ akileghtuusagh a _ aghvig nghaani _ .
wetku _ upenghagh ghhagh inagh mi _ m a il - l el it kay uk _ .
C ut te r - et gun _ wetku _ m a il eng egk ay uk _ taana _ yuug _ .
En kaa ng am _ elngaatall _ kuusme mi llu _ , _ N e w _ Y e ar - m illu _ igagh nghmeng _ taaqe luni _ kiiw gnun _ aglagh luni _ , _ kiiw gneng _ tes am ak en _ pugughilegh mun _ .
pugughilegh meng _ wetku _ tagi aqe luni _ .
nulighh ghqu te lghiik _ kuusmeyagh aqe lghiik _ kiiw gnun _ tesamavek _ quyngighqwaagh nun _ .
petgegh nghhagh
quyngighqwaagh t _ liisimakekagh nka _ pi wh an in ku nguut _ , _ S ip el an kut _ , _ pinagh u yankut _ , _ petgegh nghhagh _ taana _ iiwenllu _ liite aqe unga _ tuqu uq _ .
imagh yagh ghllag luku _ n at ang akun _ , _ wallu _ ighu an _ kenle akun _ .
taaghta mun _ p a si s k angat _ i o d in e- meng _ aghaligh naqe luku _ tuqute ni luku _ .
ata an _ I meg y uu te m _ wallu _ pasike kanga _ .
elngaatall _ P in aa y am _ iknaqughi ni yagh aa _ taana _ petgegh nghhagh _ .
esghaghhu nguq _ samani _ tapghagh mun _ taagavek _ quugsaghtugh negh meggni _ , _ angyaghpag m _ palutagh ghllag a _ kakegllugiitagh mineng _ uygaaghte luku _ , _ whaten _ navek _ tamaavek _ qenaagh mun _ m ugh aa y a _ kanagagh gminun _ , _ ingavek _ qam ugh te min un _ uyamig aghte luku _ aq f al aa meng _ aglagh te kaqe a _ .
quyngigh m _ ataasigh m _ katamngwaagh _ usi a _ , _ taana _ angyaghpag m _ palutagh ghllag a _ .
tawaten _ ungipagh kaqe a _ .
En kaa ng am _ taana _ petgegh nghhagh _ tuqu yan _ , _ uyughagh anun _ tagi ste aat _ quyngigh a _ U n meg g agh mun _ .
enkaam _ quyngighqwaagh uq _ taana _ U n meg g aq _ .
taakut _ amalka _ piinligh i yuwhaagh ke aat _ .
entaqun _ uy gu r egh aneng _ maaken _ laaligh neng _ ungipamsug meng _ nagaqugh aqe aqa _ g o v er n m en tem nguq _ maana _ quyngigh liqe aqe kanga _ ig atagh llag meng _ kenle ke luku _ .
P an egh aat kaa l ghii _ nalluke kegka _ whanga _ , _ sivuqagh _ tesakemna _ .
enkaam _ pugughilegh mun _ neqe meng _ aqfate aqe luteng _ .
kiyalighagh t _ maakut _ , _ kukuleg t _ yug lgutusagh lghiit _ , _ pugughilegh t _ tamaakut _ .
ungipamsug ke luki _ liite aqe anka _ .
alaka ghhagh
En kaa ng am _ tes k i wh kuk _ N un aag ak _ , _ kukuleg mii u uq _ entaqun _ , _ alaka ghhagh u uq _ .
uyiigh meng _ am el tu l ke k _ usputagh qagh lukek _ , _ qute mun _ taglaate luku _ taana _ uyiigh _ .
aag vig kaghte luni nguq _ nalugute nghmini _ aghvigh qaghte aqe yagh lghii _ .
ighleke aqe kangat _ qetgegh luni _ t ang egh tun gh aa s ku ni _ uteghmun _ megh mun _ ifkagh na yu kan _ uyghag ghllag u lghii _ .
T aam aa _ El q il eg m ii _ uy am ig aat ak ek _ maalghug _ uyghag ghllag k _ t ak er ii k an i k _ .
aag llegh a _ naten _ whaten _ entaqun _ ten _ f e e t- em y aa k _ , _ y aag n ev z i q _ iq e tu l nga _ .
U y am ig aat aq n iiq ag ke t _ , _ taake uk _ , _ alaka ghhagh mun _ tawavek _ .
tapghapagagh mi
taagken _ I i r gu m _ itghagh te luta _ amavek _ tapghapagagh mun _ , _ azigutagh leg ghllag u yagh uq _ unegken llu _ paagken llu _ , _ whaten _ unaghsigh meng _ azigutagh leg ghllag t _ tes k an an sagh tut _ esnagh ghhagh m _ tun ut ang ani _ .
sa qaghte laatagh sta _ uqughte ta ghhagh ngunaamta _ itghagh ma lghiikut _ .
nefkuuragh put _ elngaatall _ sika ke lghii stun _ aghneghte aqe lghiikut _ .
esghaghhu _ W ang q e te l em _ t a z ing ken _ quyngigh _ qineghpeghwaagh yagh luku _ esghagh ma kanginkut _ .
esghagh luta _ legan _ tespikegken _ , _ uk al igh meng _ naayghagh meng _ , _ samavek _ mangteghagh mii meggnun _ pi gpenani _ tespikegken _ egmigh vike ma kanginkut _ .
taagken _ ungipaate luku _ , _ neqe ghllag u na ait _ ama _ elqiileg mi _ taamani _ .
En kaa ng am _ n at ang ani _ taa m _ whanga _ maligte luku _ taama _ pi ukung _ akmag yagh unga _ neqe meng _ .
unaami _ W iigh allu _ tagi ukung _ esne perewaagh kun _ akmag aatagh lutung _ quyngigh meng _ , _ ayvegh meng _ sa meng _ .
taamani _ W aagh naa m _ pennagh ghhagh ita _ qaye itni _ si k ig g aq _ aga _ sivu ngiighhagh mtegni _ , _ suna _ p am u m _ kayagte te agu _ malighqigh sqellug qu _ .
aatakqun _ temngi _ pi yagh aqa _ , _ ak m ag aat al eg llag ul ghii nga _ .
taagken _ kaate lutung _ tamaani _ esgha _ kiyagh taa ll eq _ pi niigh pigte yagh lghii _ .
taana _ P ang aw y i _ amalka _ tuvghagh ke luku _ , _ ataasiighte pagtekaayagh lghiit _ pinagh u yankut _ , _ V egh tek aan kut _ .
P ang aw y i _ tuvghagh ke luku _ .
pedersen
pedersen _ una _ kaate nghaani _ ilangakun _ sakmavek _ piiwagh aqe lghiit _ , _ naa p tagh t eng _ akike yaghtugh aqe kangat _ kaviigh _ .
En kaa ng am _ itghagh yamta _ taamavek _ tawaten _ aglagh yamta _ taawa _ pedersen _ itghagh kayugu yagh lghii _ maavek _ .
ilangakun _ taamaken _ upag aqe lghiikut _ maavek _ .
ilangakun _ ellnga n _ P e d er s en -em _ taa m _ u un Ê¼ g gun _ itghagh vike aqe kanginkut _ .
umiileg _ taana _ pilleg qrug raaghinagh _ .
aga _ siku m _ tugu luku _ naagu _ maaqute aqe a _ .
entaqun _ alpag te nghatni _ pi wh an il uni _ whaa _ al iigh w aaq es tagh aq elghii _ sakmaken _ .
pedersen _ taana _ angyaghugh magh mi _ , _ akilpegagh magh mi _ ayuqe uq _ .
aghvepig mun _ angyaghughtu yaghpete uq _ liisagh lghiinga _ , _ sivuqagh mete luta _ salin _ .
naghughte aqe uq _ , _ uk s aagh en ku g ni _ , _ u pen gh aan ku g ni _ .
N o m e- e te ll eq
entaqun _ N o m e- a _ n el i mun _ sagh iigh q es u wh aagh aq ng an _ liite kau lghiinga _ .
esghaghhu qun _ maaten _ whaa _ ang yagh p ang es t iigh us k anga _ .
N o m e- ell uteng _ piiwagh negh meggni _ , _ esnagh aneng _ sa meng _ s aghn am s ug um aaq elghii t _ , _ egtekagh itneng _ laluramke t _ .
piyag qu te _ ( _ B e a r _ ) _ N o m e- e taq ut _ .
Ch e e c h ak o _ C o m p an y - ll uteng _ tawaten _ akilpegagh luteng _ .
tawaten _ N o m e- es aghq aa negh meg g ni _ aki kaghqagh meng _ yataaghqe aqe lghiit _ uksugh ghhagh aneng _ ima _ .
naten _ pi aqe aat _ , _ taana _ A taa yagh h aq _ entaqun _ kaangqugh ke luku _ .
esghaghhu qun _ suqagh meng _ akike luteng _ N o m e- eq aat aq elghii t _ .
Taa k w an ing ani _ umyugagh meggneng _ lliigh ut _ .
Ch e e c h ak o _ allgeghllug qu _ sivuqagh m _ tes ak m u m _ .
sa yukagh yu k _ , _ whaten _ sanighte luku _ sayug aqe kangat _ iigh s uu teg ne kun _ , _ pi yug tes tem meng _ amalka _ .
enkaam _ tespamani _ ungazigh mi _ malghukuraagh _ , _ S aap l ang u f tuq _ ategh a _ .
enkaam _ avate mi _ tawani _ H a z e l _ , _ ama _ malghukuraagh _ , _ ang er k av av legh aag uq _ natengiighhaq _ U n a z igh m iit _ an yagh pag it neng _ .
tukfigh iqe ait _ N o m e- m e meng _ .
maaten _ paga _ N o m e- a _ angyaghpag ngestagh meng _ avaqraggiighute ma uq _ .
wetku _ entaqun _ nakmiigh aqe yagh kata _ tamaaken _ lipeghsagh luteng _ akmavek _ pi aqe nayagh lghiit _ .
tawaten _ nula kau uq _ sivu nge aq _ .
sivuke pigte luku _ M ay uk aam _ ungazighmii m _ , _ atghagh luni _ S iv uq am et ku ll aal uni _ , _ S iv uq aghh m ii ngugh tek aq _ .
uyughagh ke te lghiik _ A m ag un kuk _ , _ nayag ke luku _ S ing aa w e tegh llak _ taakut _ .
taana _ A m ag u _ taawa _ iknaqe qrug pigte yaghtu uq _ .
iwernga _ S un aagh r ug em _ entaqun _ kitugh yagh aa _ , _ pi nanigh magh an _ .
P aa ng Ê¼ gh et
elngaatall _ upenghagh u uute nghaani _ payangite nghaani _ naa v gh ut kay ug yug agh tu uq _ liisagh lghiinga _ .
tespamaken llu _ pangeghte luteng _ , _ maligte luki _ maakumiu t _ , _ sakmani _ .
ukavek _ lliigh yug niite ghllag luta _ mekelghiigh ghhagh u lunga _ .
tespamavek _ nangenqagh naqe yagh luta _ , _ amsanaghllug _ elngaatall _ .
amsanaghllug mi _ imani _ teghigagh ighlliqe luta _ evlug ghllag t _ kaate luki _ .
entaqun _ B er in g _ S t r a it - mi _ kaate kaqe ke put _ amsanaghllug mi _ imani _ evlug ghrugllag t _ .
taagken _ pi yalghiikut _ , _ i wh an in kut _ A l an kut _ nallagh aput _ qavregh meng _ malighqugh luteng _ .
tawaten _ malighqugh llegh ke ut _ , _ kitum _ alngunak _ ayvasaa stekagh a _ naghulleg nghmegteggu nguq _ ellngit a _ pikayug u aat _ .
P iy a _ ( _ B e a r _ ) _ tespamavek _ eng in e- ek eg sagh yagh tu qay ug u yagh tuq _ , _ navek _ nalluke aqa _ .
P iy a _ una _ C o as t _ G u ar d _ Cutter _ aqimle ightugh a _ .
apeghtughiste m _ tawavek _ apegh luki _ P iy an ku nun _ .
sa n _ F r an c is c o - te ll eq
T h et is - ngu yagh tuq _ aag llegh a _ .
taameng _ pi yameng _ q em igh t aagh yagh tuq _ p al aghh agh meng _ .
En kaa ng am _ V egh tek aan kut _ taa m _ i wh an in kut _ angu sagh u te nkut _ , _ I n u un kut _ aghvigh te kaqsagh ai _ taaggun _ T h et is -em _ .
I wh an in ku ngu yagh pe tun Ê¼ nguq _ ipa _ aghvigh yaghqagh t _ , _ igaghyagh kayug t _ ukut _ , _ I i r g un kut _ entaqun _ kinku t _ S un aagh r ug en kut _ , _ kina u uq _ pi nga yu aat _ .
En kaa ng am _ kiyaghte luni _ V egh te kaam _ kanavek _ sa n _ F r an c is c o - meng _ b r i d g e- el ii m an ik angat _ , _ tamaani nguq _ avangite yagh uq _ taa k m an ll uki _ ellngit _ .
En kaa ng am _ eltughagh minun _ kelgute aqe kangi _ igaqegkagh nite luku _ esghagh nghminigu _ taana _ b r i d g e- egh llak _ .
whaken _ sa n _ F r an c is c o - meng _ navek _ , _ G o l d en _ gate- mun _ entaqun _ .
tawavek _ kenle ke luku _ b r i d g e- el ii m an iiq aat _ .
F er r y _ b o at - kun Ê¼ nguq _ aghvigh qragh u llegh a _ ellngit _ taa k m an ll uteng _ .
En kaa ng am _ uteghnigh ut _ ang yagh ut gun _ malghukuraagh kun _ , _ kina u yagh uq _ taana _ malghukuraagh _ , _ uksughte luteng _ wetku _ taakut _ .
I n uugh nguq _ taana _ ig aq ay u ug te v y iiq aal ghii _ , _ umiileg anun _ lata ste luku _ aghv egh n iigh y at _ .
aygugh uute naqe yata _ tawavek _ tagi luteng _ legan _ pi naqe ni ma kangi _ .
ivagh i ma _ aghnagh _ iknaqe lghii
puughhute m _ apegh llegh a
elngaatall _ aghnagh ghhagh _ taana _ iknaqe lghii _ , _ yuguma neghtuqagh _ repall _ W o r l d _ W a r _ T w o - mi _ tamaani _ unguva yagh lghii _ .
Agh nal q waagh llag luni _ , _ nekeve nanigh luni _ , _ p ak r eg ng aghh agh mi _ talwa _ lli aqe aq _ .
wetku _ taa m _ pi ll ug am _ kingu aneng _ tuqukagh _ .
ivagh i ma u uq _ ategh a _ , _ A g aan kuk _ , _ K ar g in kuk _ nayag ak _ .
sivuke luku _ A y ng er a _ ugi ke yagh kanga _ , _ P aa ll eng et aq _ panike luku _ .
taake uk _ tuqu laghate tke ak _ qamagte lutek _ enkaam _ qalu m llu nguq _ tugu kaqsagh kanga _ .
ama _ taana llu _ tuqukagh _ .
taagken _ enkaam _ T ut m ate l g em _ tugukagh a _ .
taake uk _ ne k _ agh y u p aa r igh llag lu tek _ tuqu laghate tke ak _ , _ wetku _ W o r l d _ W a r _ T w o - m _ kingu aneng _ .
flu- lutek _ qerngagh egmek _ , _ k i ngu l igh aq ut agh lu tek _ , _ ikfiqepag gpenatek _ , _ qinuyug te kete luku _ tuqu laghate tke ak _ .
iknaqe pigte ma lghii _ aghnagh ghhagh _ taana _ .
ayumigh _ ayveghagh negh meggni _ ayvii llegh it _ alla t _ maaten _ pilleg mnneng _ .
ayvegh meng _ n as q un gh i _ uy av lu tu um agh llag it a _ uteghvagh qu te _ iike aqe kangit _ neqetuumagh ita _ .
T aam nguq _ ivagh i ma m _ angtughpag m _ n as q un ghii _ tugutagh nge i kete te _ tugu luki _ saaygu m _ qaye anun _ miluute ma aqe kangi _ .
sivu liigh aput
M ek en egh si m _ apegh llegh a
T aag an ii _ qiighqagh _ maana _ yugtu pigte ma yagh lghii _ .
qafsina _ villages- nge ma yagh lghii _ , _ sivuqagh _ , _ sa igh kuvek _ , _ kiyalighagh _ , _ kukuleg _ , _ qangeghsagh _ - _ kiwatangaghmii t _ , _ tawaten _ ungipamsug kaqe kanga _ A q aam _ .
a qaa _ i wh an it _ aghnagh ke ghrug aat _ , _ pagaliit _ .
pagaliit _ T u us aan kuk _ A kum ut aan kuk _ panig ak _ .
T u p aa nga _ nuyeklighpigagh u na iqe a _ .
anglegute ke te lghiit _ , _ enkaam _ ellnga _ I q mal u wa _ , _ P aa z ak _ uy uq l igh pig aan iiq aa _ .
kukuleg _ yug lgu luku _ repall _ esghagh kaqe na iqe a _ .
angayuqagh gkenka nguq _ tesakmaken _ kukuleg _ yug lgu luku _ kukuleg u te kaqe aat _ ellnga _ .
L eg an Ê¼ nguq _ kukuleg mun _ tagyuqa ut _ , _ taakwavek _ ketliqagh t _ sani itneng _ u w al igh negh akun _ igleghte aat _ .
kii _ , _ nenglu m _ qaye a _ paga _ ke tan q waagh aq r ig t aa _ yuug _ naavghute uq _ .
angyaghyage neng _ sivuqagh meng _ aragh ut _ .
taamagun _ tam lii v ig g aa w aq elghii kun _ , _ t aag g un Ê¼ nguq _ tamlag ut _ .
taana nguq _ tamlu ii vig u na iqe aat _ angyat igh vig u magh mi _ , _ kangegh igh lughkagh ghhagh _ taana _ .
yugtu pigte yaghpete uq _ .
elngaatall nguq _ angyagh eng _ saafte nghite aat _ tenpe te aqngan _ .
yug m nguq _ qagh leg tek aq ii _ taagken _ .
tawaten _ ungipamsug kaqe ai _ .
yug lgu luku nguq _ liisimake a _ .
Taw at en Ê¼ nguq _ aghnaghaghhagh u luku _ pi aqe kangat _ .
Taw at en Ê¼ nguq _ aghnaghagh penaagh u luteng _ ellngit _ , _ entaqun _ k ell m ig si g all uteng _ salin _ , _ iwernga _ ungipagh ngugh _ nagaqugh aqe uq _ whaten _ k ii p aghq em mi _ uksaagh m _ tu ng ang ani _ , _ K iy al igh agh m iin Ê¼ nguq _ tes q ag a _ aqiiyag ut _ .
ii _ , _ leg r e taq elghii n Ê¼ nguq _ aghnaghagh llegagh t _ ellngit _ .
kiyalighagh mii t _ pi nghmegteki _ , _ tes q ag um nguq _ yug i _ angvigagh pigte ut _ .
pi nghmegteki _ m et ghagh meng _ atkug te luteng _ , _ aate kau uute luteng _ .
tawaten _ tagtalmi _ il ang aku n Ê¼ nguq _ , _ K i w at ang agh m iin Ê¼ nguq _ tes q ag a _ aqiiyag t _ .
pi nghmegteki _ , _ nagh uy am e nguq _ atkug ghpagte te luteng _ .
esgha _ T ul iin kut _ nalighnegh it _ maaten _ entaqun _ kiwatangaghmii t _ .
qangeghsagh mii t _ , _ taa ku s ta _ kiwatangaghmii t _ elngaatall _ saki nka _ ukut _ whanga _ , _ M egh y u un kut _ .
kiwatangaghmii u na iqe ait _ , _ pungughmii t _ kiwatangaghmii t _ .
U n meg g aan kuk _ , _ M egh y u un kuk _ anglegute ke te lghiik _ .
P in aa y am _ nuyeklighpigagh u na iqe a _ petgegh nghhagh _ taa ku ni _ , _ aw lug ke i _ uy uq l igh pig aan iiq sagh aat _ .
mekelghiigh u luteng _ , _ apangiighhagh ut llu _ aagna _ , _ apangiighhagh ut llu _ aamta _ entaqun _ seghleghllug u ma yagh uq _ .
U pen gh aam _ whaten _ un ug ani _ q aw aag n iigh nagh sim aan _ , _ anengagh mi _ N gu ung ay an kuk _ A l ang an kuk _ qawaagniighusigh at _ metngeghute laatagh ma kanga _ .
qawaagyagh yagh luteng _ , _ E gh q aagh aam _ guute qaghte vike ma kanga _ taana _ aw lug ke i _ , _ sivuqagh mi _ .
A q aam _ sivuqagh mete luni _ ungipagh a _ , _ aghnaghagh u luni _ .
taawa _ sivuqagh llu _ , _ sa igh kuvek llu _ nagate llegh mini _ uglagh na iqe yagh aa _ .
U pen gh aam nguq _ esla ani _ tawaten _ amsanaghtu pigte yagh na iqe a _ t aag an ing ani _ elngaatall _ .
ataasigh ghhaghte negh nge uq _ aghnegh t _ qafsina t _ naqam _ en r agh nguq _ naafte nghmini _ uksugh mi _ elngaatall _ taa ku ng in aghh aag neng _ umeg a qaa _ .
naqam _ aliigh nghmini _ t aag av er ug llak _ .
upenghagh mi _ tawaten _ taagani _ sivunegh mnni _ m aal gh u w aaq sagh tun Ê¼ nguq _ mangteghagh t _ kiyaghute yu ait _ .
uksaagh mi _ mang tegh agh pag tu utaq un Ê¼ nguq _ kum l an aq ell ghem _ sivu ngiighhagh ani _ .
upenghagh mi _ ang yagh n aq _ taaqe ghesnagh nghaani _ , _ mang tegh as q waagh m un Ê¼ nguq _ aanleghaate aqe ut _ .
taakut _ mang tegh agh p ate nguq _ naafqe aqe ait _ .
N aa f qell uki _ kagpag aqe ait _ .
kiig mun _ , _ s um m e r _ h o us e- mun _ nuugte aqe lghiit _ , _ mangteghasqwaagh mun _ .
M ang tegh as q waagh en Ê¼ nguq _ tamaakut _ mekestaaghhaa ut _ mang tegh agh pag neng _ .
B e d r o o m - m eng i _ qaamkut _ ung av ig u un Ê¼ nguq _ atigh llegh i _ .
En k ang am _ sivungagh ni _ taawani _ k it c h en - et _ amalka _ , _ g aat _ .
qula i _ r egh il nguut _ , _ gaagh vig t _ .
mangteghasqwaagh t _ tamaakut _ tawatete na iqe ait _ .
Taw at en Ê¼ nguq _ sivuqagh _ mangteghasqwaagh mun _ aanleghaate yuwhaagh luni _ , _ sivuqagh _ gaagh u uute nghmini _ , _ qaqsungigh at _ , _ naghuyagh t _ , _ esne m _ tu ng ang aku n Ê¼ nguq _ naghughte negh meggni _ nutem _ alpag negh meggni _ saye it _ p uy uq em leg agh waagh luteng _ .
Taw a teng waagh nguq _ siquveg mi _ tesamani _ ayuqe na iqe ait _ .
esgha _ tawaten _ neng y ugh m a _ ungipamsug kaqe a _ .
En kaa ng am _ entaqun _ s aam _ aqnighnegh m _ qiighqagh m _ yug a _ v i llag e- em ta _ m aa tu m _ yug a _ s t r i ke - em aa _ ayumiqullegh mi _ wallu _ ataasigh mi _ yugu i ma a _ .
sivuqagh ghhagh inagh _ s u r v iv e- em alghii nguq _ .
tamaa na _ v i llag e -em _ ila a _ tuqu laghate tke aq _ tawani _ , _ paaghqite tke aq _ .
tawaten _ apegh kaqe a _ .
I i teg ng o q _ sivuqagh llu _ yug igh ghllag kaqsagh aa _ , _ iwernga _ esgha _ siipnegh u ma lghii _ .
kukuleg _ entaqun _ esgha _ tam aa tu m _ , _ I eg an _ nenglu m _ ilu ani _ tesqamani _ aghuliigh uute tke aq _ .
qantaghaqun _ entaqun _ esgha _ kukuleg _ paaghqite tke aq _ .
nanigh u llegh a _ pugughilegh m
pugughilegh _ , _ r ep all nguq _ pennagh t _ t aag eg kut _ tu um l igh llag luki _ ayuqe yaghpete ai _ .
neli yagh ghngaaghmegteggu _ nanugh m _ nenglu it _ kanagh aqe luki _ .
nellug yug negh meggni _ unite aqe luki _ .
tawatete yaghpete uq _ pugughilegh _ t aag an ing ani _ .
yuug nguq _ tespamaken _ avate meng _ atg- ghhagh ke aq _ , _ Q aaq a _ .
sivuke luni nguq _ tapghugh kun _ neli kau uq _ .
tapghugh _ uksugh mi _ neqe niigh vig a _ aw av aq aan l e nguq _ .
pugughilegh mun _ teve ma lghii _ .
tawaten _ nanugh _ ivagh i tke a _ naten _ ef legh h te llegh q ameng _ .
tawaten _ sa u a _ tamaghhagh an _ nanghiiqu ma kanga _ , _ kum agh taq luku _ , _ sa u a _ kum agh taq luku _ , _ nanugh _ tamaa na _ efleghte naqe nghmeng _ , _ iqite ste naqe nghmeng _ .
taawa nguq _ kingulighpigagh u uq _ , _ nanugh m _ naanghagh aneng _ ayaawagh ke luni _ ken gh ek _ kum agh simak ek _ .
taawa nguq _ nanugh _ qerngughte ghllag luni _ taawagun _ singigpag qu te _ ategh kau uq _ .
L eg an Ê¼ nguq _ aneghnegh an _ agepsughte luku _ .
taawa nguq _ yuggagh m _ taa m _ pugughilegh _ nanigh igh te stekaqe a _ .
nanugh m nguq _ ne ke yaghpete a _ t aag an ing ani _ .
tawaten _ apegh aqe aat _ .
S iv un gh en ka _ kingikagh at
taana ta _ esghaghhu _ whanga _ ategh ka _ me ke negh i _ .
F i f t h _ g en er at i o n - ngun iiq aa nga _ nanevgaghtagh ghhagh ma _ whanga _ tespikegken _ ategh meng _ .
M ek en egh si ngu ugh nguq _ liisimake llegh a _ .
M ek en egh si m _ ighnegh a _ awte lugh u i nga _ .
awte lugh u i ngam _ ighnegh kek _ A l ang an kuk _ N gu ung ay an kuk _ .
En aa ng en a _ nayag ke luku _ , _ M aa s q em _ naange a _ .
En kaa ng am _ G al aag er ng en kuk _ , _ K ing ik aan kuk _ M aa s q en _ ilughagh ke ak _ .
En kaa ng am _ taana _ awte lugh u i nga _ un Ê¼ g ani _ peleghqe kau na iqe aat _ uksugh yuwhaagh mi _ tanemlleqa _ qighuneghyage mi _ qimugsigh mi _ entaqun _ pi ke aq _ .
qikmigh ita _ qighunegh mun _ teghiigh tke a _ .
liilightuusagh u laatagh uq _ qighunegh _ uglagh ghllag _ q er ngugh negh llak _ kaate qaghte luku nguq _ , _ pula snanigh aqe aat _ .
kanagh naghtugh ngugh _ , _ kiingighte te ghllag luni nguq _ uglagh te mineng _ ayuqe uq _ .
liilightuusagh _ .
tamaavek _ qikmigh ita _ kaate qaghte te luku _ kanaghkagh _ .
entaqun _ qikmigh a llu _ atunem _ pi naqute yalghiimeng _ qikmigh ita _ mughugtekagh at _ wallu _ tawani _ aliite yagh luni _ .
taagani _ nani _ eskimo _ c us t o m _ ellmi neng _ kenle ngllagh llegh _ ayuqe yagh lghii _ .
tawatete luni _ t aan Ê¼ g an i nguq _ peleghqekagh _ kiyang _ taglaate igate aat _ imaken _ ima _ .
taake uk _ ighnegh gkenka _ tu gu yug ll agh ng aagh meg teg n eg u _ qayughllak _ pi lik _ liilightuusagh u lghii _ , _ mamlegte naqe magh mi _ .
iwerngaqun _ ku gu ut it k egh ng aagh meg teg n eg u _ unitekagh ak _ .
tanemlleqa _ taw a tes agh tun Ê¼ nguq _ t aan Ê¼ g ani _ yug t _ peleghqe kau nghata _ aghnaghaghhagh u luki nguq _ atiiqe aqe yagh ait _ .
En kaa ng am _ N gu ung ay am _ nuyeklighpigagh u na iqe aat _ aghnaghaghhagh u luku _ atiiqekagh a _ awte lugh u i nga _ taana _ .
tanemlleqa _ awte lugh u i nga _ I m ing ate m _ ilughagh aneng _ Agh nagh ll ug g aam _ ku ug Ê¼ gh aneng _ E s tug r u ug meng _ ug w iigh umalghii _ .
En kaa ng am _ p an ig g aghq ek _ taake uk _ A v r u w aan kuk _ , _ K uk ii y ang an kuk _ .
whangkuta _ il ugh w aag put _ .
En kaa ng am _ tanemlleqa _ E s tug r uuk _ tuqu yan _ taake uk _ aghnaghaghhagh k _ aflengake i ste nga i uute yayek _ , _ entaqun _ q an tagh an llegh pig agh mun _ I m ing at mun _ aflengake sqellug kek _ qallegsaghagh te yagh lukek _ , _ I m ing ate q r ug em _ entaqun _ apetuyuugte te ma uk _ .
En kaa ng am _ apangiighhagh mta _ qullug ightuqagh ke gkek _ qayughllak _ taa m _ panig mi _ p an ig g aghq ek _ eltughagh ghhagh gni _ taawa _ tugukligh kaqe kek _ .
anglikagh k _ whang kun ni _ aghnaghaghhagh k _ taake uk _ ug w iigh tu u te llegh meg nun _ kenlanga _ .
K al aa w y in ku g neng _ K em ug y in ku g neng _ ug w iigh tu ut kaa gu k _ .
En kaa ng am _ taana _ E s tug r uuk _ tuqu yan _ paninang _ A w al q ameng _ ug w iigh umalghii _ awte lugh u i nga _ , _ enkaam _ Q av al gh aan kuk _ , _ A qu u tun kuk _ mekelghiigh perewaagh ghhagh k _ taaggun _ all g egh simak ek _ .
taagken _ entaqun _ elngaatall _ q er ng aq an iig m ek _ aviighute uute ma uk _ ug w i ku ll ghii k _ .
tanemlleqa _ Q av al ghagh llak _ taana _ esgha _ ilughagh ka _ taagken _ apallugh ke luku _ .
tawatete uq _ whanga _ lii g ik ell q a _ .
aghvegh niigh yuwhaagh llegh at _ sivungagh mii t
qagugh mii m _ apegh llegh a
pugughilegh mi _ aghvegh niigh yuwhaagh llegh ka _ ungipagh ke naqe aqa _ .
aghvegh niigh llegh _ piinligh yuwhaagh llegh ka _ , _ tesamani _ pi te i uq _ kaviigh niigh qagh yu k _ angayuqagh igh te magh mi _ kaviigh niigh qagh yu k _ elngaatall _ ellng in aghh agh mi _ .
taawanginaq _ angayuqagh igh te luni _ ellng in aghh aagh te kaa l ghii _ , _ iitek _ anengagh ghhagh a _ , _ taawanginaq _ q in uy u waagh aq elghii _ .
ungipagh kaqe kangi _ tuvagh m _ saaghw ani _ , _ u pen gh aam llu _ ilangani _ tu v agh llag luni _ tawaten _ , _ aghvegh t _ tuvagh m _ saaghw ani _ k aagh t aagh aq elghii t _ esghapag aqe kangi _ .
tawaten _ tagtalmi _ sumeghtaghagh lunga _ elngaatall _ es tu waagh sim agh m allu _ , _ es tu w agh mun _ qepghagh yagute magh ma _ .
puuskaate meng _ lipeghsagh yug unga _ , _ maalghug _ pi agka _ .
elngaatall _ sa u luki _ lipeghsagh ni luki _ atugh u naanghite ni luki _ pi kangit _ .
taana _ P it ii m _ ungipamsug llegh a _ sanighte te luku _ nanghiiqu na lunga _ , _ ungipaate gpenaki _ pi luki _ .
taagken _ allgegh te yama _ estugagh meng _ qakiqniqe unga _ tesamavek _ 1 9 7 2 mi _ .
angyagh ut _ te v ut agh p un g _ , _ P ag ay agh m ii llu _ m aal gh ug g aam tun g _ .
sivuligh t _ ne t _ tesamani _ .
K aa tu tagh put _ pegnem _ , _ iwernga _ P it ii m _ kayusiite ainkung _ .
taawa _ tawani _ ayumiqullegh mi _ piinligh yuwhaagh kaqe a _ aghvegh niigh llegh _ .
sumeghtaghagh lunga _ kingumun _ ukavek _ atugh u yaghqaa uute yu gnite yan _ .
llaaghanwha _ legan _ atugh ughte uq _ .
aghvegh niigh vig ite yagh luteng _ sivungagh mii t _ , _ maaten _ kinguliighagh mnnun _ nutaan _ aghvegh niigh vigkagh _ allgegh uq _ .
iwerngaqun _ laluramke t _ sakwaaqe i naqe ghllag t _ , _ neqe mnnun _ aghv egh n iigh mun _ tamaavek _ .
tamaani _ ayumiqullegh mi _ all g egh tek aq aqa _ taana _ .
tawani _ ayumiqullegh mi _ iv en r um eng _ nanghiiqu yagh luta _ maallgute nghmeng _ aghtugh ukut _ .
iitek _ I v el gh ani _ taakwani _ , _ I v el gh aa f tut _ taakwegkut _ , _ maaten _ I v el gh at _ liite ke put _ , _ aghvenge nayagh ukut _ ingutugh ghhagh meng _ .
aghveqe yagh kunigu _ taape nayagh kanga _ entaqun _ .
ghhuugh _ entaqun _ guute nayagh lghii _ s av eg pag kun _ tamaagun _ .
taana _ iv en r um eng _ kaa te v z igh agh put _ , _ aaqun _ kaa sim aagh put _ iitek _ .
tawani _ ayumiqullegh mi _ aga _ aghvenge i nagh magh emta _ pikani _ , _ aghvenge i nagh magh emta _ elngaatall _ .
sivuke luta _ awatiigh qagh luta _ siku akun _ , _ qungughvig t _ ke t ang it ni _ .
Agh v it egh llak _ elngaatall _ , _ awatiigh ukut _ , _ te l an ang angll agh l uta _ .
En kaa ng am _ s av eg p al eg nun _ pi luta _ , _ s av eg p ang l uta _ alla neng _ awataghpag meng llu _ pi luta _ taawa _ aghvenge ukut _ .
A y um i qu ng ani _ taawa _ aghvenge aatagh kau ut _ .
entaqun _ maaghraghvinleg _ .
M aagh r aghv il qell uku _ qawiighnegh _ .
Taa m _ kingu aneng _ elngaatall _ aghveghni ii aagh _ akuz is agh ang uq _ q af si n Ê¼ g g aa w aq luni _ lliigh uq _ .
tawaten _ aghv egh n iigh em _ tagtale ke a _ taawa _ .
tuungligh ghhagh a
quyngighqwaagh llegh
piinlillegh a _ quyngigh m
U v i m _ apegh llegh a
D r . _ J a c k s o n _ yusqughhagh u uq _ p iin l i ghi y u wh aagh te v ut _ ug pegh meng _ , _ maaken llu _ quyngigh meng _ .
esgha _ tawatete luta _ enraq _ itghagh aqe lghiikut _ tapghugh mun _ kiig mi _ .
me t _ kaate ut _ , _ piiwagh lta nguq _ .
nanevgaghtagh ut _ sulug _ piiwigh sqe aat _ quyngigh meng _ sa meng _ , _ taawa _ g o v er n m en t- mun _ itegh uq _ amalka _ whaten _ qepghagh lghii stun _ .
taawa _ tu w aat _ aawallu _ quynginge yaghqaaghte ut _ .
quyngigh _ aa ng Ê¼ gh aa _ , _ uglagh m _ ighsake yagh kanga _ tagite llegh a _ .
qule ke aghtagh te _ usi kaa tagh agh put _ amavek _ , _ K ep k agh y al q ag ne kun _ taaggun _ .
A sigh qell uki _ tawaten _ , _ qule ke aghtagh te _ .
entaqun _ yuginagh _ tallimat _ siipnegh ke luku _ .
saghligagh _ uglagh negh kellug qu _ .
taawa _ I iy iit aan kut _ , _ Agh tuq aa y ag en kut _ , _ k in ku gh y ag et _ taawa _ , _ elngaatall _ ayaviigh iigh luteng _ pil aan qell uteng _ .
kevegtugh luki _ qaake luki _ lli luki _ asighqe sagh i _ il em taq iit _ .
kingulighpigagh ghhagh ughte nghata _ nekefqaghte luteng _ ke t ar w aaq saq ang it _ , _ leganqun _ lli luki _ quyngigh m _ aga _ alpag aqe ait _ .
maalghug gneng _ usi ii kut _ , _ pi nga yu a _ taana _ t all im ag g aal uki _ .
angyaghwaagh kun _ taamavek _ maaken _ .
taamavek _ ag lagh y un Ê¼ ghi tuq _ P iy a _ ( _ B e a r _ ) _ angyaghpag _ .
taagken _ laag vlaagh ghhaat _ ( _ L ap l an d er s _ ) _ neqe at _ ag l aat agh put _ .
taakut _ T z aa r an ku nguut _ entaqun _ aghnagh m _ ategh a _ , _ weni _ kellmighqepag llghite unga _ .
avaqutagh kek _ weni _ angli tete lutek _ ayuqe uk _ , _ maalghug u uk _ mekelghiigh k _ .
pinigh t _ ne t _ taakut _ , _ laag vlaagh ghhaat _ , _ quyngigh meng _ pi ut _ .

nayghapag kun _ taaggun _ k i w al igh negh an _ kenle akun _ tiinta lug teng _ , _ ne ngllagh naqe kangit _ entaqun _ .
P am an s alghii _ esghagh kesi _ entaqun _ , _ aqfayegaagnite yagh lghii _ .
N ek sagh aa s _ taana _ .
G uy g ugh ll ug g aq _ pinigh lghii _ .
tawatete ut _ .
entaqun _ nuugte aqe luteng _ , _ nuugte aqe luteng _ , _ amenqun _ kangii kun llu _ ataasigh _ ulima kangat _ .
kangigh kun _ pamagun llu _ s av ig g aq _ ulima kaqe aat _ , _ quyngigh _ malig s aagh em _ ang tal ang aneng _ .
tawatete yaghpete uq _ .
quyngighqwaagh llegh ka
T ul ii m _ apegh llegh a
liite yuwhaagh llegh ka
sivuke luku _ ighni llegh ka _ apegh naqe aqa _ .
sivuqagh mi _ allgegh kau unga _ .
taakut _ ap agh pig aqa _ una _ nalluke aqa _ , _ tegh leg nge a _ , _ S aa v l an kuk _ anglegute ke te lghiik _ .
S aa v l a _ anguksag kaqe aqa _ , _ P el aa si n kut _ ata at _ .
anguksag ghllag kaqe aqa _ .
aghillug nkut _ , _ Q u w aa r en kut _ , _ M in aan kut _ , _ taakut _ siivanllegh t _ sulug nkut _ , _ ifkaghte te nkut _ anguksag ghllagkagh nka _ .
enmis _ qelegh i luteng _ ayuqe lghiit _ , _ esghapag luteng _ ayuqe lghiit _ nukalpigagh nun _ , _ qayughllak _ whaten _ anguyag leg stun _ ayuqe lghiit _ .
inglu qligh mnneng _ pamaken _ upenghagh u ta a _ tamaghhagh an _ payangite kayug _ .
A q el q aghn iigh meng _ atigh luki _ , _ aqelqaghniigh kayugu kangit _ .
tamaakut _ aqfate te mun _ ayuq es ug n il nguut _ taawa _ elngaatall _ aqfate te meng _ pi ste aqe ait _ .
A am t aa _ tughumgha te ste luki _ whaten _ ik naq ng waagh mun _ ayuq es ug n il nguut _ taawa _ ik naq meng _ enraq _ pi ste naqutke aqe ait _ .
qayughllak _ pangeghtekan _ anguyag lgu yaghqagh t _ taakut _ .
tawatete ut _ payangite nghaani _ , _ taakut _ awatangani _ tughumgha te kayug t _ , _ taawa _ tugutu te aqe ut _ tughumgha te kayugu ut _ , _ nakaan _ anguyag ke te luteng _ taawanginaq _ aqelqaghni ii aagh _ .
anguyag ke te nghite ut _ piniqe te luteng _ elngaatall _ , _ naa v gh u tu ll uteng _ ayuqe ut _ tespamaken _ ungazigh meng _ , _ n uugh naq an i q _ entaqun _ tanpegh _ .
entaqun _ aghnasaleg pagite ma aqe uq _ tespamna _ natete aqa _ .
amu i qaghte na qaqu ut _ , _ uyiigh _ , _ atungagh k _ .
N av egh taq iit _ taaqe u aqe aat _ at ku w et _ , _ il ep gh aagh et _ , _ s an agh teng ng w aaq at _ amigh t _ .
quyillegte neghtuqagh t _ entaqun _ allgegh te aqe lghiit _ .
entaqun _ aki kaqe kangit _ tapghagh at _ quyilleg nun _ tespagavek _ , _ enkaam _ tukfigh aqe kangit _ , _ n av egh taq egk ang it _ entaqun _ amigh meng _ .
tawatete ut _ .
Taa w aa _ sivuqagh mi _ allgegh kau unga _ 1 9 0 3 mi _ .
taawanginaq _ maalghug u uk _ taawa _ b i r t h _ d ate - egk a _ .
sivuqagh mi _ M aa s q em _ , _ g o v er n m en t -em _ file- nga ni _ piyaqmininga _ si x - ngu f tuq _ ighni llegh ka _ , _ A ug us t _ 6 _ .
En kaa ng am _ c h u r c h -em _ file- nga ni _ A ug us t _ 1 2 - ngu f tuq _ .
M al gh ugh qell uni _ sangami _ ayuqe ma a _ .
S i x - kun _ kiyang _ pi aqe unga _ imigh i negh mni _ .
T e a c h er - el gu f tuq _ tea- aghte a _ , _ te a c h er - k es u wh aaq agh put _ liisimake kaqe a _ .
nulighh ghqu te lghiik _ taake uk _ , _ apeghtughiste k _ C am p b ell -en kuk _ .
nutaan _ aanqaghte aqe aat _ kete mun _ taawa _ , _ b o y s _ r o o m - e meng _ ategh leg _ .
taana _ ig aghv il iit k aq agh put _ mekestaaghhagh ni _ aanqaghnegh _ taana _ .
esgha _ tawatete uq _ t a z ing an i r ug p ak _ allgegh lunga _ esgha _ whaa _ maaten _ whaten _ yugtu tekagh ligh unga _ .
Q uy ng igh q w aal eq _ - _ neli yuwhaagh llegh
1 9 1 4 - mi _ quyngighqwaagh unga _ .
1 9 1 4 - mi _ mangteghiigh yuwhaagh llegh itni _ legan _ kiig ani _ .
whanga _ uksugh ani _ itghagh unga _ .
Q uy ng il eg t i meng _ aqfa atnga _ quy ng igh q waagh es qell unga _ .
A nagh ay aagh mun _ ap p r en t i c e- ngu l unga _ .
A nagh ay aam _ aqfa unga _ ap p r en t i c e- ngu l unga _ .
A p p r en t i c e- ngugh tu nga _ taawa _ .
tea- ngatu _ U n meg g aam _ tugu kaqe a _ tawani _ .
entaqun _ apeghtughiste m _ nanglleg yagute lunga _ m ek elghii gh h aagh ng aagh m aa _ ap p r en t i c eng ugh tes tek aqegk ang anga _ A nagh ay aagh mun _ , _ angayuqagh gka _ maavek _ lliigh lghiik _ .
1 9 1 4 - ngu f tuq _ taawa _ neli yuwhaagh llegh _ .
I n uu m _ l o g _ h o us e _ taana _ S ip el an kuk _ , _ l o g _ h o us e- ngu f tuq _ 1 9 1 4 - mi _ ulimaagh u uq _ neli yuwhaagh llegh _ .
estamagnegh ghhagh u ut _ .
S ip el a _ , _ N u ngu k _ , _ A nagh ay aaq _ , _ U n meg g aq _ , _ taa ku ngu f tut _ .
pi nga yu neng _ inglu lgu yagh lghiit _ quyngighqwaagh t _ .
aveg luteng _ pi kau ut _ .
En kaa ng am _ ayvigtegh mi _ P in aa y a _ , _ P ang aw y i _ , _ meteghllug _ , _ R aa qu q _ , _ taakut _ ayvigtegh mete ut _ .
entaqun _ ag Ê¼ ghi ll uteng _ tawaten _ p ell egh tek at _ .
taawa _ esgha _ 1 9 1 4 - mi _ quyngighqwaagh kanga _ .
A nagh ay aagh mi _ en kaa ng am _ four _ y e ar s - ngu f tuq _ ap p r en t i c e- ngu llgh em _ kiyagh taa llgh a _ .
estamat _ ayumiqullegh t _ atugh luki _ kayagtekayugu ait _ ellngit neng _ ll iigh es qell uki _ .
tamaani _ qam ag teng ng waagh waagh luni _ quyngigh leg m _ nalluniigh kayug a _ .
quyngigh _ nalluniightugh luni _ ayuqe yagh uq _ .
upenghagh mi _ whaten _ tegleg yaghqagh ghhagh u nghite ut _ enraq _ avaquti ut _ .
whangkuta _ nalluniigh lleg mtestun _ nalluniigh kumteki _ , _ whaa _ pi kumteki _ , _ kii _ taa m _ yug m _ quyngigh a _ naqam _ nughagh a _ una _ s aam _ yug m _ nalluniigh luku _ .
tegleg yaghqaa nghite ut _ , _ naa ita _ liisimake kangit _ .
naten _ ug l aghq ak aan _ quyngigh _ , _ nughagh _ qerngughte ghllag luni _ , _ kiiw ni _ whaten _ aghv igh h naq n em teg gu _ , _ nughagh ngeltagh lghute _ elngaatall _ q er ngugh q utegh llag aq elghii _ , _ naa ite a _ ivagh magh ita _ , _ naalke aqe ait _ legan _ aga _ , _ aghulaqe te magh ita _ .
tawatete ut _ , _ tugulagh kayugu ait _ .
nallavragh yaghqaqe nghite ait _ tawatengwaaq _ iqeghte aq _ ayuqe yagh ghngaan _ .
quyngigh m _ nalluniightu llegh a
En kaa ng am _ A nagh ay aam _ nalluniigh llegh a _ v ii s tagh iin aa f tuq _ .
takestaaghhaa lutek _ sigute kek _ qamagte lutek _ .
whanga _ en kaa ng am _ aghenqignegh a _ awalighnegh a _ iike yalghiimi _ L _ .
taakwna _ kepe negh kegte uq _ inglu a _ .
ataasigh mi _ ayumiqullegh mi _ nalluniigh llegh _ tamaa na _ aghvinleg u uq _ .
ataasigh mi _ ayumiqullegh mi _ quyngigh meng _ nalluniigh i llegh a _ .
A p p r en t i c e- ngugh te m _ nalluniigh llegh a _ .
aghvinleg _ saghligagh _ , _ maalghug _ yug k _ .
En kaa ng am _ sivuligh mi _ aghvinleg _ .
estamat _ saghligagh t _ , _ maalghug _ yug k _ .
En kaa ng am _ aag llegh ani _ ayumiqullegh m _ , _ pi nga yu neng _ ingluleg _ .
aghvinleg _ saghligagh _ , _ maalghug _ yug k _ .
nalluniigh kayug t _ .
En kaa ng am _ pi nga yagh u ni _ qula _ .
aghvinleg _ saghligagh _ estamat _ yugte aqe luki _ , _ tawaten _ nalluniightugh aqe luki _ .
En kaa ng am _ es tam aani _ tawani _ , _ qula _ allameng _ , _ tawatengwaaq _ ug l aghq ak aan _ , _ aghvinleg _ saghligagh _ estamat _ yug t _ .
taawa _ u pen gh an gh ani _ , _ kiig nghaani _ kayagte aqe ait _ .
ellngit neng _ kiyaghte yaghqaaghte ste aqe ait _ , _ taawanginaq _ tiinta meng _ , _ egllu meng _ , _ avlawa _ sa u a _ , _ kagimkagh _ tunqugh aqe aat _ , _ sa meng _ pi yaghqaa gpenaki _ .
gaaghusigh _ qamagte luku _ tunqugh kayugu aat _ .
tawaten _ ayuqe uq _ .
katam _ tawaten _ ayumigh _ panig teng _ tugumiightu nghmegteki _ , _ saki itnun _ aglagh ste naqe nghmegteki _ .
tugumiightu lghii stun _ tawatengwaaq _ tug um iigh tuq all gh uugh aq iit _ ap p r en t i c e- et eng _ .
ellngit neng _ kiyaghte yaghqaaghte ste aqe kangit _ .
tawatete uq _ .
tugumiightu lghii stun _ katam _ .
tugumiigh iigh uq _ tamaa na _ , _ panig teng _ saki itnun _ aglagh sug kayugu ait _ m ul u pag naq en gh ata _ .
nengaa teng _ taakut _ tugumiightugh luki _ aglagh stekayug it _ .
tawatete laatagh ut _ .
enkaam _ whanga _ pi aqe unga _ , _ ap p r en t i c e- et _ tawaten _ es l eq en gh at k i _ tugumiightugh luki _ ag lagh tes legh ii s tun _ .
aghvinleg _ ayumiqullegh _ atugh yagu _ S ip el am _ pi a _ , _ â _ A nagh ay aaq _ , _ qakun _ tulugh u i _ kayagte naqe zigu _ nalleghaghhalek _ aghvinleg _ ayumiqullegh _ pi naqe a _ ! _ â _ upenghagh ke te _ pi naqe a _ .
U pen gh an gh ani _ ivgagh mi _ taawani _ , _ pedersen _ kaate nghaani _ , _ taawani _ ighni ste i kayugu lghiikut _ .
akilpegagh niigh luta _ apeghiigh yamta _ , _ tent- a _ , _ qawaagniighusigh _ , _ suflugagh _ , _ eg llu _ , _ av l aa wa _ , _ ii- u na qaghtagh te _ tukfightugh aa _ sa meng _ nuugh yaghqaa gpenanga _ , _ taawa _ umyugagh mneng _ lliigh ste aanga _ .
En kaa ng am _ angayuqagh nka _ legan _ t en t- am nun _ tagi ta nka _ , _ U n meg g aan kun it aq s alghiit _ .
A taa sim e taq s alghiit _ , _ upenghagh mi _ taawavek _ ivgagh mun _ ighni ste i yagh te aqe lghiit _ .
tawaten _ c o r r al - mun _ kanaghtekayugu lghii _ tamaani _ .
enkaam _ quyngigh _ keste nghmegteggu _ , _ quyngightutala _ liisima kaqe kangat _ , _ yug m _ taa m _ quyngigh an _ ug lagh t at al anga _ teregh te kayugu lghii _ .
tawaten _ ayumiqullegh ni _ kiyagh taa ll em ni _ 4 0 0 - ngugh tek aq _ quyngigh ka _ s ii p ng aagh luni _ .
legan _ naa itnite luki _ nughagh at _ , _ ighninghhagh u luki _ nalluniigh aqe aput _ .
naa ita _ avaqutagh yug neghtuqagh t _ , _ repall _ unite igate ait _ taw an ll uki _ , _ manu itnite luki _ inag itnite luki _ nalluniightugh aqe aput _ , _ ighninghhagh ghhagh u luki _ .
aamta _ ila ita _ angayuqagh ita _ unite qaghte luki _ esghapag aqe ait _ , _ apegh iin em tek i _ wetku _ taku aqe ait _ .
ila i _ tamaakut _ avaqutagh yug neghtuqagh t _ s ugh ug agh aq ut _ en kaa ng am _ ila mnnun _ naghpigh ste luki _ nuqnegh ste luki _ nalluniigh luki _ wetku _ , _ qayughllak _ avaqutagh yug neghtuqagh t _ s ugh ug agh aq ut _ , _ avaqutagh teng _ tugu snanigh aqe ait _ .
S ugh ug aghn aq en gh ata _ naghpigh luki _ nuqnegh aqe ait _ .
four _ y e ar s - mi _ quyngigh ka _ 4 0 0 - ngugh tuq _ , _ saghligagh nge yuqagh nge a _ qayughllak _ .
upenghagh mi _ igh n is t in un _ pinegh mni _ kiyang _ saghligagh meng _ ighni aqe lghiit _ .
entaqun _ saghligagh nge yuqagh t _ nula rakegte na pigte ut _ .
esghaghhu qun _ tawaten _ tuyugh i i aghagh ta mi _ quyngigh meng _ tuyugh i kayugu lghiit _ uksaagh nghaani _ .
seven _ h un d r e d _ d o ll ar s - meng _ quy n igh tuq at _ tamaakut _ m o ne y - ngu utaq elghii t _ D e c em b er - mi _ .
En kaa ng am _ taakwavek _ ukavagh magh mi _ quy ng igh tu tal es tun _ tawaten _ m o ne y - ngu utaq ut _ .
quyngightuqagh t _ tamaakut _ $ _ 7 0 0 . 0 0 - ngugh sim aaq elghii _ .
esgha _ tawatete laatagh ma lghii _ .
M o ne y - ngu ut kay ug u yagh tut _ , _ igug ighkagh meng _ tuyugh i kayugu yagh lghiit _ akmavek _ B o x er - kun _ , _ unaghsigh u luku _ Boxer _ , _ unaghsigh ghhagh u luku _ , _ Wh it l em _ umiileg kesagh kanga _ tagi i aghagh u aatagh ghllag kau lghii _ kayusigh i kau lghii _ .
pedersen _ taawa _ kayusigh i kau uq _ es tu w ii ll uku _ , _ akilpegagh niigh qagh yu k _ .
wetku _ apeghiigh nghata _ , _ pedersen _ , _ akilpegagh niigh nghmeng _ taaqe negh mta _ , _ J ul y -en aq en gh ani _ J ul y mi _ wetku _ tagi laghate te aqe ukut _ , _ tagi aqe ukut _ maavek _ sivungagh mun _ .
kiyang _ quy ng im e tu tem neng _ nalluke kegka _ sa u a _ ila a _ , _ ne mun _ tag il qu ng ig al ngu unga _ kiyang _ quy ng im et kay ug ul ghii nga _ qayughllak _ .
taakut _ aghh ut anga _ tamaghhagh an _ quyngigh igh kut _ kelengake u kangat _ .
wetku _ ighni ste i _ taa q en gh ani _ , _ ne mun _ tagi luta _ unaami _ taakut _ quyngighqwaagh ke luteng _ , _ quyngigh _ aqfa aqe luku _ tagite aqe luku _ tawatestaghhiinaq _ ayuqe yagh uq _ .
unaami _ tuungligh ghhagh t _ pi aqe luteng _ .
En kaa ng am _ taakut _ unaami _ , _ taakut _ quyngigh ghqu yaghqagh t _ maalghug u luteng _ aghulaqe aqe ut _ .
N ay ugh nan igh aq eg ke f ut _ temngi _ aqfa aqe luku _ p iiq eg ke f ut _ .
neli llegh _ igaghvig ligh llegh
En kaa ng am _ tawaten _ tagtalmi _ igaghvig ligh naqe yan _ , _ ayvigtegh mii t _ taamkut _ tagi laghate te ut _ .
M e et ing - e yagh tut _ .
qerngughte te ut _ meeting- aat _ .
igaghvig _ whaa _ qaake naqe kangat _ , _ nagun _ nekegte lleghqagh meng _ ag Ê¼ ghi t kaa t _ .
En kaa ng am _ m e et ing - el uteng _ tawaten _ , _ ayvigtegh _ taa m n aa _ nuna kegte yagh ghngaan _ , _ uksugh mi _ sa nigh ite u ta aneng _ , _ um eg negh p aa ll u ut ang aneng _ , _ savig ite u ta aneng _ avelghagh aat _ anuqetuqagh _ .
ayvigtegh _ sa nigh ite ngughk _ piyaa nigh ite ngughk _ .
naqam _ qu ut f agh meng _ quunpeng _ umegnegh ughte aqe kanga _ .
ivgagh _ taawna _ nuna kegte aq _ pi yu ghngaaghmegteggu _ atg- ghhaghte neghtuqagh _ .
mangteghagh t _ suupe te inaghte na yu kata _ qenaagh u ta aneng _ .
qayughllak _ ayumigh ite nghaani _ , _ kii _ t iin t av ig et _ suupute ghllag ma aqe kangi _ qenaagh u lghii _ .
maana _ mesagtu ghngaan _ nunallug mete ghngaan _ nakmike aat _ uk ag ung iigh h aq _ r egh igh tek ayug ut ang aneng _ neq n iigh v ik eg tu t ang aneng _ .
aghuliigh aat _ maana _ sivu nge aq _ nunallug mete ghngaan _ maagun _ pi naqe aat _ .
aywaa meng _ anuqlighpag igate ngughk _ maana _ ikevagh ghhagh inagh meng _ anuqligh qagh yu k _ .
taawa _ ayvigtegh mii t _ itagnagh ut _ , _ tagite ait _ mangteghagh teng _ naa f qell uki _ tagi laghate te ut _ maavek _ .
tagi ut _ taghnughhagh teng _ ig agh y ii s qell uki _ , _ q er ngugh un neq ig tut _ quyngighqwaagh t _ enkaam _ .
taawanginaq _ nani _ tanqigh mi _ puygu ma aqa _ igaghvig _ q aa k s ug wh aa llgh a _ , _ naqamalla _ kitum _ entaqun _ .
igagh ngllagh llegh mete ngughk _ .
G o v er n m en t -em _ igagh u ni te u lghiit _ , _ imatuq _ avangite aat _ .
igagh a _ pi yuwhaagh aqngami _ entaqun _ T h o m p s o n ngu uq _ entaqun _ .
D u p er tu is - ngu yagh tuq _ ulimaghista _ igaghvig meng _ .
sivuqagh mi _ apeghtughiste u yagh lghii _ .
igaghvig _ ulima naqe aqngan _ , _ taa m _ ulima yaghtugh aa _ .
igaghvig _ ulima ut _ , _ sivungagh m _ igaghvig a _ .
T es k an ag un _ nutem _ pi ut _ , _ whagun _ igaghvig ghllag u yagh lghii kun _ whaa _ maaten _ .
Taw an s alghii qun _ ig aghv ig g aq _ sa u a _ mekestaaghhagh _ .
kenlanga _ T r o ut m an -en kut _ maavek _ apeghtugh i llegh itnun _ atuqekagh at _ taana _ .
En kaa ng am _ M r . _ W ill i am -en kut _ lliigh magh ita _ igagh vike yuwhaagh m _ kingu ligh aa _ kumagh kau uq _ .
T a z ing ag un _ nekegtegkangat _ , _ maaten _ uu m _ nekagh ughtekanga _ , _ taaggun _ nekegtekagh at _ .
kumagh kau lghii _ , _ kii _ taawa _ qam ag teng ng w aaq aqaa _ .
D r um - a _ tamaa na _ iqe iqe ughtagh ukagh at _ sukate luku _ , _ iqite kaqe kangat _ guute na yu kan _ .
iwerngaqun _ tan k - angi _ taakut _ qafsinagnegh u lghiit _ qerngagh meng _ , _ wallu _ aghv in leg negh u yagh ta _ .
taakut _ aghula i te ut _ .
G u uq aq at _ , _ qimagugh tke aat _ ukavek _ .
M r . _ W ill i am _ , _ qikmigh a llu _ tes qam an l e ngu uk ak _ W al te r -em _ aane te kaqe ak _ .
naten _ f l o o r -em _ asi a _ r egh i te f tuq _ .
A aghh w meng _ itegh vikekagh i _ .
agepsugh ghllagu lghii _ , _ esghagh vig ite ngughk _ aagh h w meng _ ivagh lukek _ qikmigh llu _ , _ M r . _ W ill i am - llu _ aane tke ak _ .
walter _ liisima laatagh ma a _ , _ saamna _ f l o o r -em _ asi a _ agepsugh ghllagu ghngaaghmi _ , _ naten _ uusqaghtu tekagh mi _ s aam n anga _ avangite ma a _ , _ r egh i sim aa _ , _ esghagh a _ aane te kaqe kangi _ .
naten _ ayuqe nayagh lghii _ , _ agepsugh m _ naafqe kanigh luku _ W ill i am _ talwa _ .
qaamte i na luni _ tes qam an te kaa y alghii _ , _ qikmigh ghllag a llu _ taw an tek aq _ .
unaghsigh llu _ , _ igaghyagh llegh ka llu
El ng at aal l _ tawatete uq _ quug ghllag u yaghtu uq _ S ag un gh ang es t aan kuk _ , _ S ag un gh aan kuk _ taake uk _ , _ enkaam _ aklunagh isag lghii _ quugkagh meng _ .
mangteghiightuqagh u lghiit _ legan _ tamaaken _ unaghsigh meng _ qupughhugh luteng _ .
taakut _ S ip el an kut _ l o g _ h o us e- ngu luku _ ulima kaqe aat _ .
llaaghinaan _ esgha _ nalluniigh aa ta qaa _ I n uu m _ 1 9 1 4 - mi _ nekeftekau lghii _ .
Taa w aa _ sivuqagh mi _ whaten _ lii g ik ng waagh pen anga _ itghagh kau lghiinga _ maavek _ , _ mekelghiigh ghhagh u lunga _ , _ 1 2 _ y e ar s ng ngu l unga _ .
igaghyagh unga _ tesakmani _ iitek _ .
S e c o n d _ g r a d e- ngu l unga _ taaqe unga _ , _ igaghyaghpag gpenanga _ .
maani _ itupill _ y o un g _ me n _ c l as s - et gun _ igaghyagh aatagh unga _ .
Y o un g _ me n _ c l as s - et _ igaghyagh kayugu yaghpete ut _ i ghi v g agh mi _ .
igagh te kayugu yagh ut _ yug t _ i ghi v g agh mi _ .
igaghyagh kayugu yalghiikut _ tamaani _ yug tgun _ , _ ima _ taaqe aat _ sangan _ , _ piyug nanigh aat _ .
Q uy ng igh n iigh em _ piyaqli i llegh a
quyngigh igh ni uq _ elngaatall _ ikfiqe na pigte uq _ .
talwa _ ighni ste i mi _ mangteghagh isag lghiikut _ .
esla mi _ legan _ uyghag t _ may- ughte luki _ , _ azigutagh ghhagh mi _ taawa _ .
talwa _ sa ngunaamta _ , _ s l e e pin g _ b ag - ngun aam ta _ , _ ulig ngunaamta _ legan _ tawaten _ ingaghte aqe lghiikut _ .
tawatete yaghpete uq _ .
I wer ng aa _ aatkagh put _ maqagh lghiit _ .
qamagun _ nughagh at _ maakut _ ighninghhagh t _ , _ nughagh ghhagh t _ , _ angli ma ite ngugh t _ qamagun _ ilukligh u luki _ , _ en kaa ng am _ qaye akun _ tuqutagh nge ste aq _ maana _ aate te kaghqagh _ nughagh _ .
aate te kaghqagh ughtekagh _ .
tamaa na _ m el q w i _ qaute kete luki _ atkug kaqe aput _ .
I l ep gh aagh l uta _ tem k agh l uta _ .
amigh meng _ alla ighsigh luta _ , _ kameg luta _ , _ amigh meng _ ayapegh aatagh luta _ .
T aan ang in aag uq _ umegnegh ughte nghaani _ seghlegh pigu uq _ .
azigutagh ghhagh mi _ tawani _ .
iwernga _ tagtalmi _ sunglug ta ghhagh neng _ , _ sunglug ta ghhagh t _ sa u aat _ azigutagh liite aput _ .
mangteghagh ke yaag te aput _ .
legan _ unaghsigh meng _ tawaten _ ulima luki _ , _ c an v as - meng _ qantagh luki _ .
llaaghanwha _ legan _ azigutagh t _ piniraaghinagh t _ .
A n uq l igh naq en gh ani _ pe tug tegh aq luki _ up- lleghte na yu kaki _ .
alaghrang _ egllu ngllagh ut _ , _ ulluvikagh t _ f iv e _ g all o n - et _ , _ tamaa na inagh u yagh lghii _ ulluvikagh _ f iv e _ g all o n - a _ .
tamaaken _ egllu ngllagh yagute ut _ , _ suflu ngllagh luteng _ k ag p el eng es t ayug g agh meng _ .
suflugkagh t _ sa u aat _ , _ egllu kaghqagh meng _ pedersen _ tagite kayugu lghii _ saag nga lghii meng _ , _ g al v an i z e- et _ sa u aat _ egllu kaghqagh ghllag t _ entaqun _ whaten _ p l y w o o d - es tun _ angka lghiit _ .
kepugh luki _ ulima kayug it _ .
whangkuta _ enkaam _ suflu ngllagh negh mta _ , _ meghutlug t _ legan _ uygu uute qugh te luki _ suflu ke aqe ke put _ .
llaaghanwha _ legan _ .
ivgagh m _ qaye ani _ ighni ta iqe lghiikut _ , _ pugughillghagh mete te _ ukig yagute ukut _ , _ pugughillghagh qun _ sunglug ta ghhagh t _ ulima luki _ , _ egllu ligh luta _ , _ quugtu pigte lghii _ legan _ , _ q av ang si y u w aal ghii _ , _ qavangsi yagh aqe lghii _ .
quyngigh ut _ ukig te luku _ pugughillghagh mete te _ aga _ mayugh aqe lghii _ .
mayugh nghaani _ maligte yaaghaghkagh ut _ , _ maligte yaaghaghkagh ut _ iwerngaqun _ unglegh qaqu luni _ ll iigh naq en gh ani _ , _ um ul ghagh aq agh put _ , _ ukig taqagh ut _ tawavek _ nayugh mnnun _ .
pilaataqu lghii ni _ four _ hours _ unglegh ma te kaqe aat _ .
taawanginaq _ emta _ ila ita _ nayugh i lghiit _ kipullegte vig _ tugh aan gh ani _ neghe snanigh aqe kangat _ ungllegtu aatagh aqe kangat _ t ak el eng es t ayug g aal uki _ , _ unglegh ma llegh _ lliigh ma aqe kangat _ , _ o n e _ hour _ , _ two _ hours _ .
ungllegtagh ta m _ whaa _ kipullegte i lleghqagh _ k aan naq en gh ani _ , _ ighleg yagute ma aqe kangat _ liigilliigh luki _ .
kiyang _ quyngigh mete kanga _ whanga _ .
utaqa i aqe lunga _ taakut _ aleghqagh nka _ tagi nghata _ .
esghaghhu qun _ G en ug en kut _ , _ M al ig utk aan kut _ , _ ayugighsagh te nkut _ quyngighqwaagh aatagh kaayagh ut _ .
taawa _ mulu nghite ut _ .
sivugh qaghte negh meggni _ taawa _ itghagh igate ut _ .
entaqun _ iilqayug aqe ut _ nanghiigh nghmegteggu _ ikfiqe na a _ .
neghe gpenaamta _ , _ qavagh gpenaamta _ igleghte negh mta _ t aan ang u uq _ ikfiqe na llegh _ .
En kaa ng am _ ivagh i yami _ tawani _ ilangakun _ un aa mun _ kenlanga _ kaate gpenaamta _ ivgagh mete luta _ pi aqe kanginkut _ .
nanghiigh aatagh kangat _ , _ en kaa ng am _ ima _ piiwagh aqe ut _ quy ng igh q waagh waagh luteng _ .
iilqayug neghllug te mneng _ whanga _ .
M egh n ugh nan igh waagh l unga _ , _ t en m aa w ing waagh l unga _ .
A ng tan gh h am tes tun _ igleghte aqe lghiikut _ , _ enkaam _ megh n ugh nan igh waagh l uta _ .
enmis _ uteghmun _ aqfaaghtu te aqe luku _ quyngigh ut _ ll iigh agh put _ tughwaagh negh mta _ , _ ivagh i yagh negh mta _ .
O n e _ week _ aghul aq utk aq eg ke f ut _ quyngigh mun _ pinegh mta _ , _ tuqutagh ii lleghqagh _ pi naq en gh ani _ .
A m an sagh tuq _ c o r r al - a _ , _ tuqutagh igh yuwhaagh llegh ut _ qitneg mi _ .
qitneg mete yagh lghii _ c o r r al - a _ , _ t aan ang in aa y alghii _ .
En kaa ng am _ c o r r al - eng ll agh tut _ ivgagh kun _ .
taawa _ taawavek _ sakmaken _ sivuqagh meng _ tuqutagh igh yagh yagute ut _ .
T aam av er ug llak _ pikayug u yagh ut _ qitneg mun _ sivuqagh meng _ tuqutagh yagh te aqe yagh ut _ .
H er d -em _ tukfigh kayugu yagh aa _ , _ atungagh k _ , _ uyiigh _ , _ tegh ig l aaq _ , _ qaghlu kau luku _ .
quyngilegti llegh
quunpeng _ quy ng il eg t i meng _ ayuqe yalghiikut _ , _ qimugsigh gpenaamta _ .
P egh q igh t il uta _ pi aqe lghiikut _ , _ repall qun _ ataasigh meng _ , _ es tam aneng _ inglu lgu luta _ pugughilegh meng _ c o al - e meng _ piiwagh te i kau ukut _ , _ quy ng il eg t ip er e waagh meng _ igaghvig mun _ , _ sivuqagh m _ apeghtughiste anun _ .
sivuqagh _ entaqun _ usingigh vig ite yan _ , _ natete yan _ pugughilegh kun _ c o al - a _ qaake ma kangat _ .
G o v er n m en t -em _ c o al e nga _ igaghvig m _ .
Q uy ng il eg t i meng _ c o al - e meng _ piiwagh te i yaghtugh ukut _ sivuqagh mun _ es tam aneng _ inglulegyag u luta _ .
M aal gh ut _ usi ke aatagh aput _ ataasigh kun _ quyngigh kun _ , _ 1 5 0 _ p o un d - et _ c o al - et _ ataasigh t _ .
whangkuta _ quyngigh put _ u tuq an gh ul ghiit _ , _ tenmaawikagh t _ qamugh mun _ , _ qamugh qu sigh ghllag t _ .
ukut _ ayvigtegh mii t _ ellngit a _ nuteghagh t _ quyngigh teng _ atugh naqe luki _ , _ naavyigh yuguma lghiit _ qamugh u aatagh igate ngugh t _ , _ tenmaawi kau nghite ngugh t _ .
up- si llu ta _ tesamavek _ te v mun _ pangalegti tete yalghiimeng _ legan _ unite ainkut _ aga _ , _ ayvigtegh mii t _ taakut _ quyngigh at _ nuteghagh u lghiit _ , _ whangkuta _ u tuq an gh ul ghiit _ .
pugughilegh meng _ up- si llu ta _ aygugh uute yalghiikut _ , _ nuug ukut _ whangkuta _ enraq _ usite yalghiikut _ .
tevelqug ni _ utaqa i ukut _ , _ pugughilegh meng _ s aag gu tu kut _ .
W ang q e te l en _ aviite uq _ .
G al aag er ng em _ pi inkut _ , _ â _ W ang q e te l en _ entaqun _ uka _ . _ â _ T as l ugh ameng _ uka _ allgegh lghii _ .
M aa s q en _ pi aqe a _ , _ â _ M aa s q en _ , _ sa meng _ piyugte gpenaan _ pi naken _ , _ entaqun _ uka _ q ef l iq ng w aal ghii _ . _ â
aa _ , _ whangkuta _ sivungagh mii ni _ , _ salin _ tagi llghite luki _ ayvigtegh mii t _ , _ tamlu _ , _ whanga _ , _ M aa s q en _ , _ M egh y uq _ .
En kaa ng am _ ayvigtegh meng _ taamaken _ , _ W ang q e te l en _ , _ G al aag er ng en _ , _ A lu wa _ , _ N ung un aq _ , _ Q en l uk _ , _ A k iy a _ , _ aghvinlegyage t _ .
whangkuta _ es tam ag uu kut _ , _ qule u ukut _ qerngagh emta _ .
W ang q e te l em _ quyngigh a _ p agh y u m _ qam uy iil nguq _ , _ unite naqe ak _ usi gni _ , _ aag llegh a _ waran _ qaake sqe aat _ .
taana _ enraq _ ighsa kau te aqe aat _ qaake naqe nghite aat _ .
pi atnga _ , _ â _ elpek _ nanghiiqu yagh kuvgu _ , _ usi ke yagh kuvgu _ . _ â _ sivuughagh kestagh ghngaamkun _ quyngigh ka _ naavyigh na yu kan _ pi nga yiite aqa _ .
â _ masingka _ legan _ itagnagh lghii _ ! _ â
M agh yaghq ugh tek luku _ W ang q e te l en _ igleghte ukut _ sukatutala atun _ .
quyngigh a _ ung legh aat a tugh q w aag a _ megh n u m _ .
qamiye put _ , _ qamiye pigu ut _ iqetu ghllag luku _ two _ f e et ng w aa qu t _ iq et aagh all uki _ qamiye ngllaghkagh t _ .
qayughllak _ kilgaa ni _ petug vike magh ita _ pi aqe ke put _ , _ legan _ aaghwte te luki _ unite aqe ke put _ quyngigh put _ .
ne mun _ atghagh aqe lghiikut _ aagh h w ll uki _ .
suqaghnegh i _ savikenghaagh u ut _ .
En kaa ng am _ pi yalghiikut _ masingka _ pi ng ayug ugh ngaat a _ sivuqagh mun _ kaat ute anka _ .
kii _ qamugh neghtu pigte ut _ , _ kiilqusigh _ atuqe aqe kangit _ qayughllak _ .
kiig u yagh ghngaan _ unaghsigh mun _ qamughtugh u sigh ke aqe kangit _ .
En kaa ng am _ qamugh mun _ iknaqe ut _ naa v y igh yaghq aanghi sim agh meng _ ayuqe ut _ .
Ch i e f _ H er d er - meng _ tugutellegh _ , _ nakmiigh llegh
taagken _ c h i e f _ h er d er - meng _ tugu tete naqe ut _ , _ c h i e f _ h er d er - k aghq ameng _ .
sivuligh _ S ip el ang u uq _ c h i e f _ h er d er - a _ , _ en kaa ng am _ P ang aw y ing ugh lluni _ , _ P ang aw y ing ugh sim aan _ nutaghagh meng _ c h i e f _ h er d er - k aghq ameng _ tugu tete naqe ut _ .
quyngigh _ c o r r al - mun _ kanaghte luku _ , _ key-tagh ut _ , _ pi nga yug u luta _ , _ P ang aw y i _ , _ ggayegllug _ , _ whanga _ .
N al im t aa _ tu ng q waagh aghh naq ag u _ , _ tu ng q waagh agh te llegh q aa _ esghagh naqe aat _ .
pi nga yu neng _ ay um iq uk at _ , _ y e ar l ing - et _ , _ pi nga yu neng _ uksughtekagh t _ , _ o l d _ d o g _ , _ o l d _ d o g - meng _ atigh yaghqagh t _ , _ tawaten _ .
atightugh aatagh yagh ke put _ whangkuta _ quyngigh m _ ay um i qu tu tal angi _ .
keste i luta _ apeghiigh luta _ pi yalghiikut _ , _ â _ kii _ ! _ whanga _ elqughaghte ma kegka _ quyngigh _ kiyang _ ay um i qu tu tal nga _ ! _ â
amenam _ ungazighmii stun _ , _ p aam ku s tun _ , _ quy ill g is tun _ , _ quy ng im e tu tem neng _ liigilliigh kaqe kegka _ quyngigh m _ uksughtutala a _ , _ nayugh ke m _ angtale aneng _ .
tawatete kangat _ pamani _ , _ quyilleg t _ lii simak ng waagh luki _ uk s ugh tu taa l a _ tawaten _ ayumiqullegh i _ , _ kiyagh taa llgh i _ lii t ng waagh luki _ ayuqe kangit _ .
Taw a teng waagh w aaq _ ayuqe yaghpete uq _ .
aawallu _ quy n i mun _ c h i e f _ h er d er - ngu l unga _ tu w aat nga _ .
quyngigh _ tu ng q waagh agh tek egk a _ .
tawani _ c h i e f _ h er d er - ngu l q in agh tu nga _ , _ m ay o r - ngu m agh m a _ , _ es tu w agh mun _ d i r e c t o r - ngu m agh m a _ .
E s tu w am _ saghya a _ whangkuta _ ag Ê¼ ghi t k egk ayug uy aq ef ut _ , _ A n i c a- m _ tugu mangite luku _ .
akitutala _ qerngagh emta _ ul im al agh luku _ , _ sivuqagh mii t llu _ qerngughte te luta _ ulima luku _ pi kay ug uy aq ef ut _ .
sivuqagh mi _ K u z aat a _ m ay o r - k es aq angat _ .
enkaam _ qerngagh emtung _ K u z aat allu _ qepghaqagh u lghiikung _ kiyang _ es tu w agh mun _ .
llaaghanwha _ legan _ kayanqute _ maana _ uk igh qugh aq eg ke f ut _ , _ aki ite ngugh mun _ sa mun _ neqe mun _ uk ig te llegh put _ pi kay ug uk ef ut _ , _ enkaam _ es tu w agh put _ iflii igate ngughk _ .
aki pagite yagh ghngaaghmi _ ghhuugh _ tamaa na _ , _ tamaavek _ ag l aghh n em teg gu _ ifla igate ngughk _ .
maana _ ila a _ neqe m _ akimsuggiite u lghii _ , _ enkaam _ tamaavek _ neng igh q en n em teg gu _ aki ite ngugh mun _ , _ ak i tugh te v legh agh yagh ng aagh mi _ kayanqute _ tamaa na _ atugh ut _ ivagh i niigh sigh _ piyaqli na yu kata _ .
tawatete kayugu yagh lghii _ .
maaten _ A n i c a- mun _ lliigh luni _ tawaten _ lli aqe aq _ .
tawatete yagh ukut _ , _ elngaatall _ taw a teng waagh w aaq _ qep gh al q es agh agh put _ sivuqagh mii t llu _ whangkuta llu _ .
M e et ing - ek ayug uy alghii kut _ kiyang _ council-ni _ , _ sivuqagh m _ council-ngi _ , _ whangkuta llu _ , _ qerngughte te luta _ aghv igh aat ameng _ tawaten _ m e et ing - ek ayug ni _ .
ilangani _ maavek _ tagi luteng _ , _ kiyang _ whangkuta _ tesakmavek _ , _ M r . _ D a ugh er t y _ kiyaghte luku _ , _ m e et ing - e yaq ayug u yagh tu kut _ .
M r . _ D a ugh er t y _ seghleghllug u yagh lghii _ qayughllak _ tamaani _ .
qayughllak _ whaten _ D a ugh er t y - m _ quunpeng _ tesakmavek _ J ul y - e y aam aam ta _ pi stekayugu yagh kanginkut _ .
qerngughte te luta _ J ul y - aaq elghii kut _ , _ tawatete yalghiikut _ .
maaten _ pamaken _ inglu aneng _ pi nanigh yalghiimeng _ , _ aqelqaghniigh sigh ughtekanga _ aangqagh igh aq _ .
Ch i e f _ H er d er -em _ qepghaqagh a
Ch i e f _ h er d er -em _ qepghaqagh a _ tamaa na _ elngaatall _ quyngigh _ , _ quy ng igh q waagh tet _ hour-ngit _ , _ ig agh te l igh l uta _ .
F o r t y - f iv e _ c en t s - an - h o u r - ngu f tuq _ tamaani _ qepghagh llegh _ .
aghsaghmete yaghtu uq _ f o r t y - f iv e- c en t s - an - h o u r _ , _ iwernga _ tawaten _ angka yagh uq _ .
enraq llu _ m o ne y - pig meng _ akileghtugh gpenaamta _ , _ quyngigh meng _ pikayug u kanginkut _ .
iwerngaqun _ h er d er - ngugh sim aam ta _ m o ne y - ng iigh h agh meng _ ila luta _ lliigh ainkut _ .
Taw a teng waagh w aaq _ pi nga yu neng _ inglu lgu luta _ quyngighqwaagh kau lghiikut _ .
Ch i e f _ h er d er - et _ tamaakut _ quyngigh mun _ kay ag t i mun _ , _ taakut _ quyngighqwaagh yaghqagh t _ qepghagh kayugu ait _ , _ quunpeng _ quyngigh _ tawaten _ lliigh nghaani _ tawavek _ tuqute i lleghqagh _ lliigh nghaani _ tawani _ tanqigh mi _ , _ y at aagh q es tek es t aagh aqegk ang it _ .
Ch i e f _ h er d er -em _ qelegh llegh a _ tawatete uq _ , _ quyngigh ghqu yaghqagh t _ taakut _ ulima kayugu ai _ quunpeng _ .
tuqute i aagh mi _ , _ tawaten _ ug l aghq ak alghii _ sivuqagh meng _ atungagh k _ , _ uyiigh _ , _ m o ne y - meng _ ila i _ , _ quynginge na ta it _ .
saama _ qepghagh negh meggni _ llaaghanwha _ hour-ngit _ taakut _ quyngigh mun _ legan _ qiifte aqe kangit _ .
aki msuggagh ngunaan _ urang _ , _ qam ag teng ng waagh waagh luku _ qepghagh lghii _ , _ en kaa ng am _ quynginge uute kayugu yagh lghii _ , _ tuqu ta u uute aqe lghii _ .
saama _ ila ita _ pirughte i te aqe kangit _ .
whangkuta _ katam _ quyngigh leg ni _ , _ iwerngaqun _ nasiqute ste aqe ainkut _ piyuke lleg mtestun _ inwa _ tukfigh luku _ .
En kaa ng am _ whangkuta _ tun qugh aq eg ke f ut _ aki u na an _ tanemlleqa _ quyngigh yaghkagh nun _ tamaavek _ .
whanga qun _ kayusiite i naqe nghmeng _ katam _ whanga _ tukfigh aqe luki _ aki it _ pilagh kanga _ , _ h er d -em _ p al agh agh tek ayug uk angi _ .
whanga _ u p uu p eng _ pinitun _ tukfigh aqe kenka _ , _ qayughllak _ negh yugnagh pigte lghii _ quyngigh _ , _ maaten _ paninang _ taw ate l nguq _ .
urang _ nulasagh kumegteggu _ whangkutestun _ ayuqe yagh kumeng _ , _ whaa _ quyngigh m _ yug ita _ kelengake yagh kumegteggu _ ighni ta iqe luteng _ , _ tuqute llegh _ kayaate nayagh lghii _ .
kaviigh m _ , _ meteghllug m _ , _ tuqute kayugu kanga _ nughagh _ , _ kelengake nghite ngugh ni _ .
meteghllug qrug t _ tamaakut _ tegh h i kun _ nughagh ghhagh t _ qellu it _ n us uk at aam aaq egk ang it _ .
kaviigh ghhagh t _ tamaakut _ u w igh h ugh luki _ tuqute aqe ait _ .
tamaaken _ en kaa ng am _ apallugh ke luku _ , _ S ip el am _ c h i e f _ h er d er - ngu luni _ tuqutagh ii negh mta _ , _ nayugh i negh mta _ , _ kaviigh niigh ste aqe kanginkut _ tuqu qite te neng _ .
taakut _ amiiragh i _ P e d er s en - mun _ tuune luki _ money-ngi _ taakut _ nayugh ikagh ni _ , _ kaviigh t _ tuqu tke aput _ P e d er s en mun _ tuune luki _ , _ akike luki _ , _ money-ngi _ taakut _ whangkuta _ nayugh ikagh ni _ nengigh te sta qaa _ .
money-ngi _ ne iitagh ke aput _ nayugh ikagh ni _ .
L l aagh an wh aa _ n ugh aam _ tuqu llegh a _ kay aal nguq _ , _ wetku _ um eg negh ugh negh ani _ upenghagh mi _ esla _ naafte nghminigu _ ghhuu ste qugh aqe lghii _ , _ g gh u ug aq elghii t _ n ugh w aghh aat _ ilangani _ .
aamta _ ilangani _ aghsaan _ tuqu llegh a _ ayuqe aqe uq _ .
taawa _ esla _ naafte luni _ aliigh yuwhaagh llegh ani _ pinegh mta _ , _ kii _ , _ tuq waagh taq um aaq elghii _ .
En kaa ng am _ i f l ang ig al ke f ut _ , _ nughagh ghhagh t llu _ tamaakut _ ighninghhagh ghhagh t _ akike kayugu kangi _ c h i e f _ h er d er -em _ .
tamaakut _ tuqukagh t _ nayugh ikagh ni _ tawani _ legan _ akingite ut _ , _ avangite ut _ pilagh aqe ke put _ saghna aqe ke put _ , _ aviite yaghqaa yagh lghiit _ qayughllak _ .
T aan ang ul ghii _ uk s um ii _ , _ uksaagh mi _ whaten _ kum l al uni _ aniguvzeghagh yagh luni _ , _ eslallugughte luni _ p uq l aghq w aal uni _ aqlaghate ghpagte nghmini _ s aam n anga _ legan _ siku nghminigu _ negh vig iitagh ke lghii _ .
qayugtugh yagh ghngaaghmeng _ , _ es tu w iin negh meg g ni _ tuqu kayugu ut _ , _ estug teng _ naa ng taq egk ang it _ .
En kaa ng am _ kiyang _ naayghagh mi _ kiyaghte naqe neghtuqagh t _ , _ naayghagh t _ ava ite ngugh t _ itagnagh lghiit _ , _ enraq _ ungagagh pagite te kayugu lghiit _ .
ungagagh _ tamaa na _ uksugh mi _ neq ek egk anga _ quyngigh m _ .
ungagagh _ enraq _ tamaa na _ lii saq ef ut _ , _ laavlaaghmii t _ liite stekagh at _ ungagagh m _ piite llegh a _ .
T all im an Ê¼ nguq _ ayumiqullegh t _ , _ quyngigh m _ neghenghite nghminigu _ , _ nagu kayugu uq _ .
ungagagh t _ tamaakut _ talligh ma _ ayumiqullegh _ atugh luku _ wetku _ negh yaghqaaghte ma aqe lghiit _ .
piite luteng _ sukangite pigte ma lghiit _ .
upenghagh mi _ itagnagh lghii _ alngunak _ piinghagh _ maana _ quyngigh m _ neghe kayugu kanga _ .
laavlaaghmii t _ tag i u wh aaq aa f tut _ quyngigh _ maligte luku _ .
pinagh u yankut _ , _ S ip el an kut _ , _ Q al un ku ngu l ghiit _ sivuligh t _ , _ quyngigh _ qaake yuwhaagh aqngan _ qula _ .
Agh tuq aa y ag en kut _ quyngighqwaagh t _ , _ P et g en gh h aan kut _ kinku t _ sivuke luteng _ .
En kaa ng am _ ay um i qu ng ani _ alla _ qaake tke aat _ quyngigh meng _ .
En kaa ng am _ taakut _ taaqe ut _ , _ S ip el an ku ngugh tut _ taakut _ , _ elngaatall _ quunpeng _ S ip el a _ , _ P in aa y a _ , _ petgegh nghhagh _ ( _ paninang _ kiyaghte yagh lghii _ ) _ .
petgegh nghhagh _ entaqun _ umiileg kesagh kangat _ tamaani _ , _ M egh y u un kut _ anengagh at _ .
laag vlaagh t _ taakut _ entaqun _ maalghug u ma yagh uk _ , _ wallu _ q af si n Ê¼ gu yagh t at _ .
apeghtugh i yuwhaagh ke aat _ .
quyngigh m _ y u kum t aagh i _ entaqun _ uuvganeng _ .
Q am iy ng in Ê¼ nguq _ qayagh u ut _ , _ u ug gun _ qamuutagh leg t _ , _ uvegh igate laatagh ut _ .
qaya stun _ tawaten _ ayuqe ut _ qam iy ng it _ .
amenam _ entaqun _ nuyaaghite te ghllag nghata _ atugh aqe kangit _ .
aamta _ nuyaagh luteng _ naafqesaghqagh ke ait _ , _ qapragtu ghllag ut _ .
quyngigh mun _ apeghtugh i llegh
apeghtugh naqe yuwhaagh lghii ni _ , _ naten _ uy a tu t k aagh luki _ , _ sa u a _ f iv e- t o - si x _ feet _ uyatu tke ai ta _ petug aqe aput _ .
taakut _ enlegkutagh t _ qamughaghtagh yaghqaa luki _ , _ qamugh ghllag yaghqaa gpenaki _ , _ aaw ghhaghtagh meng _ pi yaghqaa luki _ , _ aqnighte na yu kata _ , _ ii- sqeaghaghte na yu kata _ .
quunpeng _ nal ugh q ut agh llag aq u _ tu gu y u wh aan em tek i _ .
qaprag ghllag aqe ut _ , _ sigh un ghi t _ kepugh luki _ h o l d a- l igh luki _ petug aqe ke put _ .
unaami _ wetku _ pin em tek i _ aghuliigh ma aqe lghiit _ .
unaami ani _ enraq _ qaghlu aqe aput _ .
qaghlu it _ pi y u wh aan em tek i _ , _ enraq _ tanemlleqa _ qaghlu yuwhaagh negh meggni _ ef legh yug em _ iwernga _ mulu pagigate ut _ .
liisagh ke put _ tu gu y u wh aan em tek i _ tawaten _ apegh tugh naq n em tek i _ qaghlu magh ita _ lliigh aput _ .
Q agh l uugh um ii ta _ , _ qaghlu it _ pe tug tegh waagh luki _ tawavek _ , _ s aag teng it _ qugh w aghn ay uk ata _ .
S aag teng it _ naten _ tag kaa qu t _ , _ teghiglug t _ tag tal k ell uki _ .
tapghagh ghhagh meng _ uygaagh ke aput _ .
teghiglug t _ peghte luki _ whaten _ iqetu tke ai ta _ sa u a _ t h r e e _ inches _ , _ peghte luki _ tawaten _ s aag tek aq ap ut _ .
qaghlu t _ pi niigh pigte ut _ tamaakut _ teghiglug t _ , _ amiiragh i _ , _ m el q w i _ qaye anite luki _ .
unange i _ melqiite aqe lghiit _ , _ u uk n angi _ ag tugh am _ qagh lu ku s iigh tegh llag em _ .
P egh qig s an em k i _ , _ whanga qun _ kiyang _ pi nga yu neng _ qavaghtaghkagh nka _ , _ apegh tugh naq n em k i _ .
