amenam _ pi nqegtagh t _ wallu _ akuuragh aqe zingi _ .
emta _ ila ita _ ilullug t _ , _ s ugh ug agh ll aag et _ quunpeng _ .
anusigaa aqe ut _ , _ uka _ legan _ sughug i kayugu ut _ , _ enkaam _ qamiye teng _ n ap agh agh taq egk ang it _ uka _ tagi nghata _ .
uyiigh t _ tag tal k ell uki _ tawaten _ s aag tek aq ap ut _ .
enkaam _ qamiye put _ uka _ tagi nghata _ sani igh te nghata _ uughqaghte aqe luta _ .
taawa _ uk an ll uki _ quunpeng _ sayughqaaghkagh put _ qiifte naqutke aqe aput _ , _ qiive yagute aqe ut _ ukavek _ aghenqignegh mun _ .
Q ii f naq n em tek i _ angyalligh qugh magh ita _ qamiye put _ taakwavek _ , _ elngaatall _ taawa _ qiive aqe lghiit _ .
P ang al g ugh aq ut _ , _ p ang al g ugh aq ut _ , _ p ang al g ugh nan in gh at aa _ amu kestagh aqe aput _ .
whaa _ q ii v aat a tugh ll uteng _ lliigh nghata _ , _ aghula i aghte aqe luki _ .
qenwat _ t en m aa w is n em tek i _ taawa _ uy a tu tal ang is tun _ lliigh aqe aput _ .
S aag teng an _ tag tal ng i _ , _ tenpe yaghqaa gpenaki _ sa u a _ si x - f e et _ entaqun _ f iv e- f e et _ tawaten _ uyatu tekagh ligh aqe aput _ .
aghuliigh aghtekata _ , _ tenpe gkumteki _ , _ ighu i _ ay em n naa qep ut _ .
kiyang _ pi nga yu _ whanga _ qavaghte luki _ peghqightu aatagh kaqe anka _ , _ pi nga yu _ qavagh _ .
tawatete kau ut _ pi nga yu neng _ qavaghte luki _ peghqigh aqe ut _ peghqigsaghkagh nka _ .
akuuragh aatagh kaqe anka _ ilullug ite ngugh t llu _ .
I ng lu sigh aq ap ut _ tenmaawi nghata _ , _ enkaam _ m agh yaghq ugh teng ugh taq ut _ .
tamaakut _ aamta _ f o ll o w - meng _ ata iqe aput _ , _ taa k w egk es t aghh iin aq _ , _ elngaatall _ f o ll o w - t _ tamaakut _ usi iigh aqe aput _ .
ellnginagh meng _ igleghte yaghqaa nghite ut _ , _ quyngilegti sighqagh u nghite ut _ ellnginagh meng _ .
uziveketaagh ghllagu aqe ut _ igleghte gpenateng _ naqam _ petug luteng _ t as l ugh an q eg tut _ , _ f o ll o w - meng _ atigh luki _ ayuqe aput _ .
En kaa ng am _ qamiye mteggun _ petug luki _ usi lug ke i _ whaa _ igleghte te kaqe aput _ , _ whaa _ usi igh ghllag luteng _ , _ naqamllu _ itagnagh aqe lghiit _ .
tawaten _ iglegh usi q n em tek i _ , _ f o ll o w meng _ atunem ta _ yugu yagh nga a ta _ , _ aqume luteng _ maligte te aqe lghiit _ , _ taawanginaq _ ellnginagh meng _ igleghte yaghqaa nghite ut _ p eg ng agh meng _ , _ uziveketaagh yaghqagh t _ igleghte gpenateng _ .
sangameng _ tawatete aqe aat _ inglusi i ma ite ngugh t _ .
enkaam _ ing lu te l g et _ pinigh ut _ quunpeng _ .
emta _ tawatete laatagh ut _ qikmigh stun _ , _ s uk all el w aaq luteng _ .
sukate ngugh t _ sukaghllag u ut _ .
whaten _ igleghte te negh mta _ , _ pangalegti tete naqe negh mta _ aga _ sukate ngugh meng _ quyngigh lgu negh mta _ aga _ unite qaghte aqe aput _ ila put _ .
A q f ay ng w aa k eg t at _ tam aa ku ut _ , _ aqfayngwaag negh meggni _ whaa _ p ang al g et _ ila i _ .
pangalegti naqe te inagh _ aga _ , _ ilangani _ pangalegti te kayugu lghiikut _ qayughllak _ .
uyaute iqe aq _ taana _ kiyang _ tuqu qugh kau uq _ ii- sqeaghaghte ste aqe luki _ .
naten _ pi aqe aki _ apeghtugh i nghmini _ .
entaqun _ nuqnegh qagh nghminiki _ aghvequte ste aqe kangi _ .
ii- sqeaghaghte negh meggni _ sivugte yaghqaa nanigh aqe ut _ .
naasqugh t _ ukut _ iisqagh teng _ aqnighte nghmegteki _ , _ sivugte yaghqaa nanigh aqe ut _ , _ en kaa ng am _ tuqute aqe aput _ .
emta _ tawaten _ ayuqe laatagh ut _ , _ ila ita _ apeghtugh qu ait _ ilullug ghllag t _ s ugh ug agh y un egh tuq at _ .
whanga _ amenam _ apeghtuqagh nka _ ilulliqepag gpenateng _ , _ llangaqa _ pin q eg tegh r aa s t aghh iin aat _ .
emta _ pi aqlaatagh ait _ tamaakut _ ilullug t _ , _ umyugagh it _ natete ma aqe lghiit _ , _ suugllug kanigh ma aqe lghiit _ .
Taw ate taq ll aat agh pe tut _ .
manigugh luteng _ quyngigh t _ atughqagh u ut _ , _ s as naq ef q aa meng _ .
S ugh ug agh y un egh tuq a s _ taawa _ anusigaa aqe ut _ , _ legan _ iiwen _ mekelghiigh t _ qamiye meggneng _ aafte igate ut _ .
S ugh ug ll an ghi s t eng _ legan _ qamiye teng _ n ap agh agh taq iit _ , _ qay ug m ig naq negh tuq at _ qayughllak _ .
kii _ , _ taawa _ nula kaayagh uq _ , _ 1 0 , 0 0 0 - ng uk aag uq _ kingulighpigagh _ c o r r al - ek aq _ .
N al i ke k _ ifkagh llegh nkuk _ , _ N u uq it aan kut _ c h i e f _ h er d er - ngu l uk ek _ .
nula pagllag kau uq _ .
En kaa ng am _ tawani _ uksugh mi _ elngaatall _ , _ upenghaghyag u _ pi yalghiikut _ , _ kii _ uughqa ni _ samani _ naayghagh ghhagh t _ u v it ang it ni _ .
yaywaalingiighhagh u na iqe kangat _ saamna _ i wh an i m _ aygugh ghhagh anite ngughk _ , _ suvinagh ghraag ggaat _ , _ ayvigtegh m _ k el ut ang an il nguut _ .
N ay gh an n aq _ , _ suvinagh ghraag ggaat _ , _ naayghagh ghhagh _ taana _ .
U v it ang ani _ tawani _ kii _ , _ ung legh um agh ll aa k _ , _ tuqukagh lghute ghllag _ .
legan _ unglegh ma negh ke te ziin _ tawaten _ p an egh aatk aq _ .
En kaa ng am _ qiighqagh _ maana _ tawaten _ ug l aghq ak alghii mun _ quyngigh mun _ atughqagh u nghite uq _ , _ mekestaaghhaa uq _ .
U k s uu m _ negh kanga _ piyaqnagh pigte lghii _ .
Q al te meng _ , _ aqsaqugh mig itgun _ pi yagh ke put _ , _ uyghag m _ q al teng aneng _ , _ neqe u nghite ngugh t _ amenam _ .
uyghag m _ q al teng aneng _ aq saq ugh h m ik elghii t _ , _ seghleghu lghiit _ neqe u nghite ngugh t _ .
quyngigh m _ atuqe llegh a
I meg y uu te m _ apegh llegh a
quyngigh t _ qamagte luteng _ neghe kayugu ut _ .
sugupag i _ ayakagh aqe luki _ , _ si g ut angi _ , _ sigh un gh an _ m el q w i _ , _ itegagh i _ ayakagh aqe luki _ negh ugh aq iit _ .
A q saq gh w i _ pi wh an iy uk agh pen ak i _ ukifkagh yukagh gpenaki _ .
taakut _ q aa y ng an il nguut _ aqsaqugh m _ taakut _ tunu t _ pugughyi u ut _ .
I ik ng waagh luki _ aqsaqugh t _ , _ wetku _ iike luki _ tes qam kut _ imigh a _ il ak ell il uki _ , _ aqsaqugh mete luki _ tawani _ qu w ii sigh luteng _ neghe kayugu ut _ .
aqsaqugh m _ n at ang ani _ alamke t _ , _ ugh v ugh waagh luki _ neghe kayug t _ , _ vegllugte yug nigh t _ tamaakut _ , _ aqsaqugh t llu _ ugh v ugh waagh luki _ neghe kayug t _ .
kevighqagh i _ taakut _ n aan l e nguut _ , _ ilu yan _ tunugh aneng _ imigh luki _ ke v ing ll aq ay u w iit _ .
ilu yan _ tunugh aneng _ uulte magh ita _ imigh kayug t _ .
qellu i _ tamaakut _ ama _ uulte magh ita _ , _ tunughtuqagh t _ .
whangkuta _ negh igate aput _ iiskag i llu _ , _ tengug i llu _ .
ila ita _ negh aqe ait _ .
Q il eg y igh llag i _ taakut _ , _ qilu i _ uzimun _ pikayug t _ , _ i ku gh waagh luki _ q an l ag igh waagh luki _ tunu ghllag t _ angqaperugtu te _ tawaten _ .
amalleqa _ qamagte luku _ yugusigh anite ngughk _ taana _ neghe kayugu uq _ .
amu i _ uksaagh nghagu _ m el qugh tugh negh ata _ allighaghqagh ughte aqe ut _ .
upenghagh mi _ m el qugh ll u ug tegh llag aq ii _ makugte negh meggni _ .
amiiragh i _ ug m el eng es t aghh aat _ m el q egh q el eng es t aagh h aat _ asiighqagh u luki _ saghna kaqe kangit _ .
taakwani _ nani _ J ul y - mi _ aate te kaghqagh ughte aqe uq _ .
katamngwaagh _ melqughtu langi _ lliigh aqe ut _ pi nigh ghllag t _ aange lghii u yagh ghngaaghmeng _ , _ legan _ m el q egh qell iigh agh aqegk angi _ .
ighni ste i _ april- mi _ piinligh aqe ut _ kiyang _ , _ yug inagh meng _ .
kipullegte i stekete te luteng _ o n e _ w e ek - ek agh taa n _ .
ivgagh mete luta _ nutaan _ maana _ quyngigh _ atghagh luni _ ellmi neng _ tamaani _ ighnegh iightugh aqe uq _ uvite kaghagh mnni llu _ .
taklaghte luta _ esghapag aqe aput _ tawaten _ esghapagkagh mtestun _ legan _ , _ nughagh at _ kinegh naqe te inagh _ aga _ igleghte aqe ut _ .
umegnegh u luku _ tiinta lug teng _ nayugh i aqe ut _ .
tiinta lug teng _ ighni ste i mi _ tawaten _ .
uglagh ghllag yagh lghii _ quyngigh _ .
pi nga yu a
sivunegh mta _ nangaghnegh i
iike ta t
M ek en egh si m _ apegh llegh a
esgha _ taakut _ iike ta t _ tesakmaken _ .
Q un aghh aq _ mekelghiigh pigu luku _ ii ku taa m ak at _ .
qafsineg ii ta ani _ qavagh m _ un ug mi _ tawani _ , _ ii _ , _ ayngelite ghllag mun _ kaat ute ma kagh nge i _ , _ eflugh te luki _ elngaatall _ maaqe ghllag _ .
siivanllegh ita _ pi ma kangit _ ( _ entaqun _ liisimake kanga _ ) _ .
â _ seghleghhalek _ navek _ lliigh te aqe inkut _ , _ N un aag ag nun _ ak lii taq en ghi t in ku ut _ .
sangami _ ayngelite ghllag _ uukna _ allgegh a _ . _ â _ N un aag ak _ negh igh h aan eng _ nangllegtagh na iqe agket _ .
â _ N un aag ag ne kun _ whaa _ entaqun _ eflugh te ainkut _ . _ â

tawaten _ ag Ê¼ ghi ngu ull uteng _ ataasiighte luteng _ ( _ uusqagh pigte lghii _ amenqun _ vuuslegh ghllag u aqe lghii _ ) _ .
ayngelite ghllag k _ .
eflugh te nga llegh ghllag mun _ amu isigh negh meggni _ aan Ê¼ ng all gh w aaq elghii k _ .
ayngelite u na iqe ait _ , _ tuvagh m _ whaten _ maaqellegh m _ eflugh te ghllag m _ t ak lagh r uk g igh llag luteng _ naqam _ vuuslegh i _ uusqagh ghllag t _ .
N un aag ag ni _ taakwani _ vuuslegh ghllag u aqe lghii _ .
entami qun _ ataasiighte pagte luteng _ ataasigh _ ayag ma kangat _ .
uugte luni _ pi yalghiimi _ , _ pi ma kangi _ , _ â _ kii _ , _ sa ngugh ghllag k _ test- pig ka _ mamlegute uk _ . _ â
siivanllegh ita _ pi ma kangi _ , _ â _ seghleghhalek _ entaqun _ taawa _ N un aag ak _ ! _ N egh igh h aan eng _ nangllegtagh na iqe agket _ . _ â
tawaten _ uyiighagh teng _ , _ entaqun _ esgha _ uyiighagh leg perewaagh t _ , _ uyiighagh ni _ saagllug qu _ tawaten _ uyiighagh kun _ taaggun _ mayugh uute ut _ .
K i ngu l igh pig agh nguq _ iiwen _ nuyilegh u te kestagh aqe a _ sayug aghte aat _ .
piyaqmegteggu _ m ugh aa yagh ll aa k _ , _ qivallug ghllag _ , _ m ugh aa yagh llak _ .
naqam _ test- pig ka _ en leg a _ aligh ite ngughk _ .
siivanllegh ita _ pi ma kangi _ , _ â _ seghleghhalek _ taawa _ aghuliigh llegh anun _ uugte ukut _ . _ â _ N un aag ak _ negh igh h aan eng _ n ang leg t aghn iiq ag ke t _ .
â _ aghuliigh llegh anun _ kaate ukut _ .
whaken _ igleghte naanghite ukut _ , _ tazingavek _ aglagh luta _ N un aag ag nun _ qavangsi naqe ukut _ elngaatall _ egtug yug gpenaamta _ . _ â _ ( _ aatkagh kegte pigte lghiit _ entaqun _ neghigh luku _ . _ )
â _ unaami _ wetku _ aghtekan _ mingle anun _ taglagh lleqe ukut _ . _ â
taawa _ aghte neghsigh ma kangat _ .
llaaghanam _ agh saq min igu _ , _ N un aag ak _ .
taawa _ mingle anun _ pagavek _ , _ q iv all ug ll aa k _ , _ tu um ll ug llak _ , _ elngaatall _ igleghtekagh t _ .
aghneq _ naten _ lliigh magh an _ entaqun _ tapghagh ghhagh kun _ taakwagun _ qutenge ma lghiit _ .
siivanllegh ita _ apaate ma kangit _ uk at mun _ .
kukuleg mun _ u w avek _ kaate naqe sqe ai _ .
I i w en Ê¼ nguq _ mamleg a qaa _ kukuleg mun _ kaat quute ut _ , _ kukuleg nguq _ p aagh q iin negh h aq an ii m alghii _ tamaani _ .
nenge lunga _ kiyaghute lghii _ salin _ .
siivanllegh ita _ pi ma kangi _ , _ â _ elngaatall _ tegh h um as aq um eng _ nagh ugh es nagh tes n ay an ghi t ii si _ , _ maani _ qavagh naqe ukut _ .
taawanginaq _ nenglu itnun _ itegh gpenasi _ . _ â

tamaani _ ighulugh meng _ ivagh i luteng _ mangteghasqwaagh ngllagh ut _ .
legan _ nanevgagh m _ apeghtugh ai _ , _ â _ kinku nun _ taa ku nun _ n av ghagh yagh aq l usi i _ legan _ unguva pigte lghii stun _ pi tek _ .
kinku t _ navghagh vike aqe luki _ sa meng _ tanpegh meng _ ighulugh meng _ tamaaken _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ legan _ tawaten _ navghagh aqe luteng _ .
taawa _ azigutagh _ taaqe luku _ qavagh ut _ .
naagu nguq _ saq r ag g aq _ llaaghanwha _ , _ wetku nguq _ unaami _ aghtaghagh naqe llegh mi _ , _ qaga nguq _ aghqiiw _ , _ q ii ll aghq u _ .
nanevgagh m _ pi aqe kangi _ , _ â _ seghleghhalek _ upugha te aisi _ .
apeghiigh kufsi _ n av gh aghh a si _ tamaakut _ yug itnun _ veghute qugh nakesi _ .
maaken _ igleghte lleqe ukut _ . _ â
apeghiigh luteng _ iglegh naq ng ameng _ whaten _ tu um ll ug llag mi _ imani _ , _ whaten _ uygu uute qugh te luteng _ igleghte ma ite ngugh t _ .
S ak igh m e nguq _ kangighagh anun _ pikavek _ taglagh kau ut _ .
En taq un Ê¼ nguq _ al ing y u waagh ut ng uk aal ghiit _ qamagte luteng _ .
tawaten _ taagken _ taglagh kau ut _ s ak igh meng _ , _ pikavek _ kangighagh anun _ kukuleg m _ .
kangighagh u negh nge uq _ wetku _ ukavek _ igiigh yameng _ naallghute ut _ .
Q un aghh aq _ una _ atallug nkut _ ata at _ , _ Q er ngugh te kaam _ ug w ik saq anga _ , _ atallug nkuk _ , _ W aa ll an kut _ ata ak _ , _ Q un aghh aq _ taana _ .
En kaa ng am nguq _ n ang yagh t aghq waagh ll ak aq _ , _ an u sim igh te m _ mekelghiigh pigu luni _ , _ ii ku taa m ak aq _ .
tawaten _ ungipagh kaqe aat _ .
ila i _ iike ta t
taakut _ ila i _ ungipamsug m _ nunanigh ut _ , _ puygu kanigh luki _ iwernga _ ungipamsug ke naqe anka _ .
uksaagh ghhagh u negh nge uq _ iike tke aat _ , _ siku k _ malleg qagh inagh yayek _ .
N ap a z ig en kut _ , _ M es uu r un kut _ , _ Q et iin an kut _ , _ kinku t _ , _ iike tke aat _ .
uksughtekagh t _ iitek _ B er in g _ S e a- mi _ esgha _ .
uksughte ma lghiit _ navek _ taakwavek _ .
Taw at en n iiq sagh iin Ê¼ nguq _ taa k w ag ung iigh h agh nguq _ ivgagh te nghminiki _ kiyang _ uteghnigh igate ut _ .
sivuqagh mi _ iike te neghtuqagh t _ .
naqamalla nguq _ awavagh qu te _ ivgagh te nghminiki _ entaqun _ maaqnegh m nguq _ aygugh mun _ ukavek _ ivgagh te aqe kangi _ .
aamta _ taa k w ag ung iigh h agh nguq _ pi nghminiki _ entaqun _ i ke v r egh aam _ aghvigh te meng _ pi aqe kangi _ .
Taw ate t k an Ê¼ nguq _ uksughtekagh t _ .
ellmaaragte nghaani nguq _ maaqnegh m _ sukate pigte luki _ aygugh te aqe yagh kangi _ .
naayghagh ghhagh _ sukate luni _ aliigh aqe yagh lghii _ , _ ima nguq _ aygugh u aghte nghaani _ iivagh aqe lghii _ .
taawa nguq _ aghneghtuumaan _ qiighqagh _ maana _ ila kepagningite te aat _ .
A y v i kaa t ng in aghh agh nguq _ taana _ talughte neghlliqe yagh uq _ .
taawa nguq _ tagtalmi _ aviighute uq _ temngi _ meraaghinagh ghllag mun _ lliigh ut _ .
S i ku v ag llag en Ê¼ nguq _ nekagh ughte ait _ , _ tawaten _ entaqun _ nalighnegh i _ ne ngllagh luki _ .
ellmaaragte nghaani nguq _ tuvagh u te aqe kangi _ .
M ugh utaq elghii n Ê¼ nguq _ tamaani _ .
P iy u wh aagh h iin agh m un Ê¼ nguq _ taana _ sakniqe tkesagh aat _ megh _ , _ megh ite ngugh t _ .
ayveghagh luteng _ wallu _ maklagte luteng _ , _ qilu aneng _ entaqun _ ighneghllug ngllagh luteng _ , _ aatkagh meng _ kiigh akun _ whaten _ q en legh waagh luteng _ pi ma lghiit _ .
anigu meng _ , _ peghqinegh pigu ma ut _ esgha _ t aag n ap ut _ , _ esghaghhu _ anigu meng _ imigh luki _ yugusigh megteggun _ mengllagh yagute ut _ .
yugusigh m _ maatnegh an _ ugh ug taq egk angi _ .
taawa _ megh _ ak l uk nan igh aat _ .
taana nguq _ es tam aat _ mulu gpenani _ aviighute uq _ .
aghipa m _ s aam _ entaqun _ enraq llu _ kanagh luni _ , _ asi gni _ uniigh yayek _ iilqayug luni _ tuqute ma lghii _ .
taakut _ pi nga yu t _ uksughtekagh t _ tawani _ .
M es uu r un kut _ , _ N ap a z in kut _ , _ Q et iin an kut _ .
qete i i na qrug ngugh _ taana _ atugh kayugu ma a _ .
taana _ N ap a z in aq _ alignagh lghii _ , _ ilagagh qagh yu k _ .
T ugh negh aan Ê¼ nguq _ megh m _ uusqagh llegh anun _ pi igate ma lghiit _ , _ megh mi _ kiyaghsigate ma lghiit _ .
T ugh negh iigh ut ng w aaq aag ut _ meghllag mun _ lliigh yameng _ .
A l al ak ang in aghh iin aagh te kaa g un Ê¼ nguq _ .
A l al ak ang u f tugh nguq _ tughneghagh i _ mesungesag t _ .
Taa ku ng in agh aagh sim alghiit _ megh m _ pi i _ .
Taw at en Ê¼ nguq _ esla _ naafte luni _ milegtaagh te naqe negh meggni _ ell meg g neng _ ilutughsagh te aqe luteng _ iknaqsuugte te aqe luteng _ kiyaghtekagh t _ .
milegtaagh te naqe negh meggni _ taana _ pi ng ay ugh tek _ pi aqe ka ak _ , _ â _ qete i i na _ ! _ seghleghhalek _ , _ seghletun _ kiyaghte naqlaatagh ukut _ , _ averngu lta _ . _ â _ atugh ghpagte ste aqe ka ak _ pi ng ay ugh tek _ taana _ .
ii _ , _ n em et alghii s tun _ llaaghanwha _ qesugniqe aqe lghiit _ avara te magh meng _ ell meg g neng _ .
llaaghanwha _ milegtaagh lleghqagh eng _ o v er c o m e- aaq egk angat _ .
taaqe negh meggni _ taana _ pi nga yu aat _ enraq _ ilagagh aqe lghii _ .
taawa nguq _ mesungesag inagh ghhagh t _ taakut _ tughneghagh i _ tagi aqe lghiit _ .
aamta _ ila a _ tughneghaan _ ivegh igate ma ut _ entaqun _ , _ aviighute uute tke aat _ .
uksugh ghllag _ avii tke aat _ , _ uksaagh ghhagh aneng _ ima _ , _ siku k _ malleg qagh inagh llegh gkeneng _ .
entaqun _ may- mi _ ima _ wetku _ nani _ K am s aatk am _ nalighnegh akun _ qutengekagh t _ .
tawaten _ apegh ait _ .
A k l uk nan igh aan Ê¼ nguq _ megh _ .
anigullugte luni _ lliigh yalghiimi _ taakut _ nayigh ita _ akeleghraagh a _ meghaagh nge luni _ , _ tamaaken _ meqekagh t _ .
esghaghhu qun _ repall _ ughug yan _ , _ taakut _ nayugh teng _ uy iigh agh meg g neng _ asighte ma kangit _ entaqun _ ug l af n ay uk ak i _ .
T u v aghn an iq angi _ taa ku ng in aghh aagh tut _ , _ aqlagha igh u uute kanga _ .
tawaten _ kiyaghte ghngaaghmeng _ qute _ aliigh ma kangat _ .
qute mun _ paga _ tugh aagh tut _ .
tawaten _ kiyaghte ghngaaghmeng _ kii _ , _ tekeghagh ghllag _ ika _ .
tawavek _ tekeghagh ghllag mun _ itghute kanigh ai _ u ku m _ tu ng ang akun _ .
tekeghagh ghllag _ taana _ tugh waagh yaq meg teg gu _ kii _ , _ sugenregh igh ghllag luni _ .
H aa k _ ! _ seghleghhalek _ tawavek _ kaatute kumegteki _ whaa _ seghleghu naqe ut _ .
iitek _ whaten _ aklu i te kanigh luteng _ , _ qute m _ ke t f ag g aa kun _ taakwavek _ aan uugh utk an iq angi _ .
taana _ pi ng ay ugh tek _ pi laatagh ma ka ak _ , _ alignagh lleghtagh tek _ , _ â _ seghleghhalek _ seghleghu naqe ukut _ , _ ingavek _ atneghagh anun _ lliigh kumta _ sugenregh mun _ , _ ukut _ nayugh mta _ unite lleqe ainkut _ .
alignagh na iqe luten _ naten _ pi naqe i _ . _ â
amsanaghllugllak _ .
tawaten _ ilagagh luni _ A l al ak ani _ taakut _ aleghqugh qu ai _ naten _ kayute ngllaghkagh _ .
qateghllug ghllag mi nguq _ imani _ sikuvag ghllag t _ kelute mun _ qukfighute naagh aat _ elngaatall _ , _ tawavek _ kangighagh anun _ .
qute meng _ aw av aq aan ll uteng _ tegh h akun _ tuute tke aat _ , _ aghqe itagh i tke aat _ , _ nalugutekagh neng _ aw av aq aan ll uteng _ .
iwernga _ i f q all agh ng aagh meng _ u ug llegh aatk at _ .
tanemlleqa _ ii w en Ê¼ nguq _ gh h atagh tek es tagh aq ii _ qute mun _ taakwavek _ uugtekagh t _ .
piyaqmegteggu _ t ap ghagh ll aa k _ sa ite ngughk _ ava ite ngughk _ , _ enkaam _ n aan tu l e y eng _ nalluke kangat _ .
Taw at en Ê¼ nguq _ tungtu tgun _ ( _ b i g _ d ip pe r _ ) _ aygugh ut _ .
aghte nghaani _ si q in ghem _ tu ng ang anun _ igleghte aqe luteng _ .
T ap ghagh llag u f tugh nguq _ aygugh mun _ esne _ tawaten _ .
elngaatall _ sa u a _ tu m es ug n ing iigh h aq _ avangite uq _ .
temngi qun _ aatakqun _ igleghte ut _ .
qafsina _ qavagh _ atugh magh an _ , _ wallu nguq _ tanqigh _ .
H ii k _ , _ ii m qagh t all egh s ug n ing iigh h aat _ tapghagh m _ qaye ani _ esghagh ait _ .
tume u lleghqagh i _ n all un eq nagh luteng _ temngi _ iime qaghte luteng _ .
tawaten _ tagtalmi _ igleghte ghngaaghmeng _ iime qagh ta vleghagh _ tamaa na _ nula kestagh ma lghii _ .
tawaten _ seghleghhalek _ negh ke igh te naqe ut _ qute mun _ lliigh yalghiimeng _ .
tawaten _ igleghte llegh mi _ nalluniigh te ut _ tumete yug ni u luteng _ .
tawaten _ igleghte llegh mi _ tapghagh m _ qaye ani _ kii _ , _ peghwaagh ghllag t _ kaa saq meg tek i _ iq all u w agh llak _ peghwaagh ghllag _ .
negh ut _ elngaatall _ .
negh luteng _ , _ angyagh u aatagh luteng _ taawa _ igleghte ut _ .
aygugh lqinagh luteng _ peghwaagh t _ kaate nghmegteki _ taawa _ iq al u w aa w aq elghii t _ .
tawaten _ igleghte ghngaaghmeng _ tekeghagh _ q em igh y uk _ inga _ aliigh aat _ , _ iiwen _ q em igh yug meng _ taagken _ mayugh aqe ut _ , _ amaken _ yug m llu _ atunem _ .
atunem _ aliigh te ut _ .
kii _ , _ piyaqmegteggu _ yuug _ tusaqepagningite aat _ , _ ulu _ alla _ .
seghleghhalek _ tu saq un negh i te m _ enraq _ seghleghu naqe ut _ , _ lii g i kun negh i te m _ .
qete i i na _ taana _ , _ esgha _ sa u a _ kiyagh taa llegh llag em _ apegh iigh waagh luku _ ayuqe nghminigu _ , _ mekelghiigh u luni _ nukalpigagh pigu luni _ k i d n ap - e kaa m alghii _ .
tespamna _ quteghllag _ negh igh h aan eng _ y u wa _ amyuqetagh na iqe aat _ .
K i d n ap - egh ik ayug un iiq aat _ qiighqagh m _ m a tu m _ anglinghhagh aneng _ , _ aghnaghagh aneng _ , _ nukalpigagh aneng _ metngeghute i kayug _ .
taana _ qete i i na _ metngeghute kau ma yagh lghii _ .
tawaten _ enraq llu _ esgha _ tuune aqe luki _ , _ tuune aqe luki _ tawaten _ pi ma aqe ait _ .
A s aag g aan kut _ maakut _ ungip aq ag egk ang it _ tawaten _ pi kau ni luki _ .
taana _ Q et iin aq r uk _ tawaten _ pi kau ma lghii _ .
quyilleg nun _ akike kau ma yagh lghii _ .
quyilleg ni _ qepghagh luni _ , _ qepghagh luni _ aghyuqe yami _ metngeqagh qrug u uq _ .
uteghnigh kau ma lghii _ naqam _ .
nukalpigagh k _ maalghug u lutek _ yug m _ qep ghagh tek egk ak ek _ quyilleg m _ .
Q i te f kay u ug te q r ug um aa _ esghaghhu _ .
seghleghhalek _ aag llegh gkenka _ pil aat agh aa k _ , _ â _ seghleghu naqe ukut _ , _ yug lgute mun _ kaa t ng waagh l uta _ tu saq un negh i te m _ seghletun _ pi naqe ukut _ , _ aatak _ qiteve te naqe gu _ ! _ â
Q et iin aq r ug em _ q i te v us aq min igu _ , _ ii _ iingken _ ak is aq min igu _ nutem _ nag ate ll ghi s tun _ tawatengwaaq _ akuzillegh a _ ayuqe luni _ .
ii _ , _ napaghpagtagh te lutek _ aga _ payegh te uk _ .
ii _ , _ kaat ute te lutek _ q et legh u tug nguq _ , _ elngaatall _ .
piyaqminigu _ taana _ qep gh al g ut ni _ neghigh luku _ mekelghiigh _ whaa _ nallagh utu te aqe uk _ .
tawaten _ aleghquute lutek _ pi ma kangi _ , _ ama _ negh ghllag _ taa m an n il uku _ , _ â _ keleg qaghte te yaghtugh naqe amsi _ .
T aam u m _ ne m _ upugha te i llegh a _ tawatete uq _ , _ yug m _ kaate lghii m _ uu m _ pana teng _ u ut q igh ll uki _ elpesi nun _ nengug te aatagh lleqe ait _ .
tugu manginagh nakesi _ , _ tugu manginagh nakesi _ .
tuqute naanghite aisi _ , _ upugha te i llegh it _ tawatete ut _ . _ â
taawa _ aga _ aglagh uq _ llaaghanwha _ .
M aa te q w aaq un Ê¼ nguq _ llaaghanam _ kii _ , _ yuug _ inwa nguq _ palaghhagh _ kaat quute uq _ .
llaaghanam nguq _ kaate lghii m _ uu m _ pana teng _ u ut q igh ll uki _ , _ taawa _ tugu ma inagh ke ait _ .
taake uk _ N ap a z ug en kuk _ M es uu r un kuk _ ne m _ tam aa tu m _ umiileg an _ aqelqagh ke ma kek _ .
taana _ Q et iin aq r uk _ taa m _ aqelqagh ke ma kanga _ qepghagh lgutkekagh an _ .
taawa _ taake uk _ ulu ke lukek _ , _ Q et iin an kuk _ taana llu _ .
P an in ang uq _ ne m _ tam aa tu m _ ulu a _ alla u uq _ .
taawa _ taake uk _ ulu ke lukek _ kiyaghte ut _ .
Taa m _ N ap a z ug em _ , _ nuyekligh ke ma atgu _ ungipaate sqe ma kanga _ Q et iin amun _ , _ â _ I k ii f si n Ê¼ nguq _ ne mnni _ samani _ sivuqagh ghhagh mi _ tawaten _ un iil iq egh llag l uta _ qutengeqaghte negh mta _ taghyugh igh aqe yagh ukut _ !
a tuq _ sa u a _ pin igh yuuk _ a tuq aq sagh agh put _ . _ â
ii _ , _ umiileg m _ piyaqminiki _ , _ umiileg an _ nuna m _ taa m _ , _ â _ seghleghhalek _ legan _ pi aqe llegh gpesistun _ pi tek _ . _ â _ taawa _ taana _ Q et iin aq r uk _ a tugh tek l aat aam ak angat _ .
elngaatall nguq _ qesugniqe stekaqe a _ negh ghllag _ taana _ ellng in agh agh mi _ .
taana _ entaqun _ N ap a z in aq _ ilagagh luni _ , _ qaywalleqa nguq _ tughneghaghtu pigte ma a _ qute mun _ uugte yalghiimi _ .
Taa kun Ê¼ nguq _ A l al ak angi _ agh sagh p aag te kaa g ut _ .
ghhute itgun _ , _ melghutagh itgun _ p u ug p agh qu m _ yuug _ q im aag ll uku _ .
tawatete kau ut _ .
maalghug gneng _ tawani _ ayumiqullegh k _ kiyaghte ma lghiit _ .
ataasigh inagh u yaghqaa yagh lghii nguq _ naligh t _ , _ wallu _ qete i i na _ nelliqe luni _ sa luni _ taagken _ anaggute luni _ taake ughtagh aqe aat _ .
iike te llegh meggneng _ estamat ii te kun _ wetku _ , _ es tam aani _ ayumiqullegh m _ ungazigh mun _ kaateqaghsi ma lghiit _ .
E s tam aan i nguq _ ayumiqullegh m _ wetku _ sivuqagh mun _ uteghnigh kau ut _ taakut _ .
taawa _ igleghte mafte ut _ .
tawaten _ ungipagh kaqe ait _ .
taawa _ ken l ep ghi ll aat agh tuq _ .
aghnaghagh u lleg mneng _ neqamike llegh ka
N uugh naa m _ apegh llegh a
S iv uk egh pig agh l unga _ liisagh lghiinga _ A n as ug en kut _ pamani _ guygu ita _ kelu kaghagh itni _ mangteghapig mi _ , _ tawani _ liite unga _ .
En kaa ng am _ entaqun _ nuug ukut _ tespagavek _ , _ sa meng _ n u ug g ut f ut _ apallugh a _ nalluke aqa _ .
nekeve te _ , _ whanga _ , _ aqume igate ngughk _ , _ M ik l aghh aq _ .
enkaam _ P aa z ag em _ ang leg ut angi _ taakut _ I q mal u wa _ , _ T u p aa nga _ , _ a qaa _ , _ A g e z a _ .
whanga _ ategh ka _ A g e z ang un iiq aat _ , _ uy uq l igh pig aq _ .
I q mal u w am _ taa m _ M ik agh aq _ nulugh igh qugh a _ .
taana _ Agh nagh agh p ak _ ug w ing ii s an _ , _ entaqun _ qilleghte uute te m _ ata an _ n ul igh q es aq anga _ K i ngu waagh h aam _ .
P el egh q es ata _ enkaam _ tugu te ste qugh luki _ tawavek _ lli aqe aq _ .
taakut _ ama _ atalgute ke te lghiit _ A ng q a teng an w at en kut _ , _ Q aal un kut _ .
taakut _ P el aa si n ku t lu _ , _ U w e te l en kut _ ila ke te ut _ .
ila ke te luta _ whangkuta _ ayuqe ukut _ .
taakut _ qayuutagh m _ ila ke ai _ .
taana _ naqam _ enraq _ P el aa si _ apakagh ut _ imani _ ategh a _ .
enkaam _ n ev ng am _ entaqun _ atiiqe te aqe luteng _ .
saama _ entaqun _ ilaliigh te aqe lghiit _ tawaten _ neghe lgutke te luteng _ lliigh negh meggni _ .
tawaten qun _ liite lleg mni _ nagate aqe anka _ .
naange aat _ taana _ A tek ang u uq _ , _ T ang a tun kut _ taakut _ entaqun _ anglegute ke te lghiit _ U w e te l en kut _ .
U w e te l em _ nulighh a _ W am ii y aq _ .
taana _ W iy a _ , _ aymaramket _ aghnaa t _ .
En kaa ng am _ taana _ ug w igh pig ani _ tuqu yan _ taagken _ I y eng q igh meng _ ug w iiq aq _ .
En kaa ng am _ taakut _ P aa ng an kuk _ uziva nkuk _ , _ aghnagh t qun _ ataasigh t _ anglegute ke te pestaagh t _ , _ tume _ ataasigh _ , _ aanvig _ ataasigh _ , _ allameng _ at ak aq sagh ng aagh ngaat a _ .
P aa ng Ê¼ gh et
whangkuta qun _ p am an ll ii m ta _ , _ asag ghllag mta _ taa m _ , _ N agh uq ang u f tuq _ taana _ p am an ll ii m ta _ k ing un gh at _ , _ elngaatall _ sungagh meng _ atghagh te aqe kanginkut _ tangyeghute meng _ , _ qupag meng _ .
elngaatall nguq _ tamaa na _ pi tke pigte aat _ megnu nagh lghii _ .
entaqun _ sivunegh put _ tes p am ken _ pi u ut _ .
esgha qun llu _ ukut _ W al ang an kut _ , _ ila put _ whangkuta _ .
nallukngwaagh yalghiikut _ whangkuta _ , _ ellnga n _ U uk et am _ ungipamsug te kaqe ainkut _ .
liisagh lghiinga _ upenghagh u ta a _ tamaghhagh an _ quunpeng _ pangeghte a _ .
tagitug mi _ qevuute luteng _ tawaten _ amsanaghllug ghllag mi _ suqsugh t _ uka _ aliigh aqe lghiit _ .
sakmani _ nagh aa negh tuq a kut _ aatnegh mi _ .
taagken _ emta _ tawaten _ tagitugllug _ , _ I q mal u w an kuk _ , _ A y ak in kuk _ , _ aatnegh kun _ iggasighte lutek _ esghapag aqe kanginkut _ , _ naghaagh te aqe lghiikut _ aatnegh m _ asi ani _ taakwani _ .
sangamta _ tawaten _ pi llegh ut _ nalluke kegka _ .
qaasqagh mi _ ama _ pinegh mta _ aghillug m _ esghapag aqe kanginkut _ .
uuk _ mate- yaag yu ngiighhagh _ ama _ taana _ quunpeng _ q aa s qam en negh tuq aq _ .
L iit ng waagh l uta _ pi yalghiikut _ esgh ap al u ug usi q _ taghnughhagh nun _ , _ nanugh t _ naken _ ikegken llu _ , _ kiiwhken llu _ pi yaghqagh t _ .
tawaten _ emta _ upenghagh mi _ kii _ uka _ s uq s ugh al iigh llak _ , _ nutem _ pi inkut _ , _ â _ tagi laghate te k _ . _ â _ Taw ate l nguut _ ar aq r u w aq elghii t _ kaate yaghtugh negh meggni _ .
â _ aa _ , _ m il ugh m ig te ku ut _ , _ tagh negh iigh te ku ut _ . _ â _ P iq r u w aq elghii t _ ungazighmii t _ .
upenghagh u ta a _ tamaghhagh an _ kaate kayugu ut _ akilpegagh niigh ghllaget _ .
entaqun _ aghsaan _ ayuqe yagh lghii _ tespamani _ aklungi igh lleghtu ghngaaghmeng _ .
ila i qun _ wenigh a _ saaputagh ite aqe ut _ talwa _ qalleg vag qiinagh luteng _ , _ aghnagh m _ ila i _ q al ip aag g agh meng _ .
yug t _ tamaakut _ saatghwaagh qiinagh luteng _ akilpegagh na i aaghet _ .
qevuute luteng _ aki kegte ghllaget _ .
qallukagh at _ s an agh teng ng w aaq at _ k av igh teng ng waagh luteng _ .
sungagh _ , _ ugtinghagh _ , _ qikmiiraagh _ k av igh teng ng w aaq aq _ , _ sa u a _ legan _ pinighsagh pigte luku _ aki kaghqagh _ .
qayugh leg nun _ , _ sa meng _ maaken _ es tu w aam _ pi anun _ aki it _ .
qiipaghagh put _ maakut _ wh ate l nguut _ ugpeqagh meng _ atigh luki _ aghnagh ita _ .
ugpeqagh ghhagh leg nun llu _ aki it _ tawaten _ .
quunpeng _ liisagh lghiinga _ upenghagh u ta a _ tamaghhagh an _ akequsagh leg ni _ taghnughhagh ni _ , _ puughte aqe kanginkut _ entaqun _ .
nalleqligh ke na iqe lghiit _ , _ entaqun _ taagani _ ila teng _ .
S iv ul iigh am ta _ ila ke te lghiit _ nalleqligh u lghiit _ ellngit ni _ .
nalleqligh mta nguq _ p iiq egk ang in kun Ê¼ nguq _ tamaakut _ , _ â _ taghnughhagh si _ k el eng ak l uk ii _ kalngagmig lleqe aput _ . _ â _ puughte luta _ entaqun _ .
kalngagmig na yu kanginkut _ whangkuta _ it egh aat aq elghii kut _ .
urang _ aki kegte pigte ut _ .
liite lleg mni _ taake uk _ U ugh qagh t aan kuk _ kinku k _ aklungite na iqe agket _ tespamani _ .
uughqaghte a qun _ taana _ kaate nghmini _ nulighh a _ qiipaghagh ghllag _ quunpeng _ .
enraq _ entaqun _ tawaten qun _ ila i _ nak min Ê¼ gh h iin aq ayug et _ .
iwernga _ sivuqagh meng _ sa u a _ allgegh qugh luku _ taglagh aqe lghiit _ tespamavek _ .
taake uk llu _ Q aa ll n aan kuk _ pamapi kayugu yagh uk _ Agh y ag aan kuk _ , _ arekull _ tes p am an te f tut _ taakut _ A m ag un kut _ .
Q aa ll n aq _ A m ag u m _ nulugh igh qugh a _ , _ Agh y ag aq _ panike a _ .
En kaa ng am _ P in aa y am _ whaten _ apeghsugnitekagh i _ , _ A m ag u _ taana _ ellnga n _ atghagh stekaqe a _ am y uq naq ng ag u _ taana _ nayag ni _ .
Y uk egh q eng ng ak an i q _ taana _ A m ag u _ entaqun _ .
aqelqaghni ii aagh _ , _ upugha te i llegh
aqelqaghniigh ta leg _ tamaani _ .
liisagh lghiikut _ qellinegh _ esgha _ teskana _ igaghvig ghllag m _ n a tu m _ neliite tke a _ .
uyghag ghrugllag t _ taawa _ angqaperug kegtagh leg t _ pi nga yu t _ , _ mekestaaghhagh _ ataasigh _ , _ amalleqa _ taana _ aqelqaghniigh sagh it _ .
aqfaqugh vig leg ghllag u yaghpete uq _ taawa _ .
taana _ Q ell in gh u f tuq _ ategh a _ , _ q er ngugh v i k _ .
aqfaqugh te ghllag t _ .
iwernga _ whanga _ iitek _ liite aqa _ , _ esghapag kaqe anka _ legan _ ategh aqe luteng _ aga _ .
pekagh lghii _ entaqun _ una _ aqume magh mi _ , _ ila a _ ategh aqe luni _ .
enkaam _ entaqun _ pekagh igate ngugh t _ yug iq eng n iiq iit _ naqam _ .
enkaam _ t aan Ê¼ g ani _ Q ell in ghem _ qukaa ni _ tughumgha te ghllag aqe ut _ .
esghapag na pigte uq _ , _ iinghusaleg _ emta _ .
esghapag lqinagh naqe negh mta _ tunuvagh uute sqe aqe kanginkut _ .
â _ naghaagh kestagh tek _ ulape naanghite usi _ aghnaghagh ni _ . _ â _ naqam _ mekelghiigh t _ esghapag aqe ut _ .
ima wha _ wiin _ esgh ap ag y ugh ng aam ta _ tunuvagh aqe ukut _ , _ iwernga _ esghapag aqe ukut _ .
liisagh lghiinga qun _ whanga _ , _ yug t _ taakut _ kinku t _ entaqun _ aagken _ naken _ kilgaaqu aqe aat _ s am aw un _ naayghagh m _ mingle akun _ kaspugte luku _ .
entaqun _ tawatete aqe yagh ut _ .
aqelqaghni ii aaghet _ apeghiigh negh meggni _ enraq _ k all egh tegh ll an egh meg g ni _ pi ng ay ugh qell uteng _ .
aki yan _ qaasqagh ani _ , _ u w at ang an _ qaasqagh ani _ , _ ne m _ tun ut ang ani _ .
seghlegh ghllag u ut _ elngaatall _ .
whaa _ entaqun _ apeghiigh negh meggni _ aqelqaghniigh nghmeng _ tawaten _ , _ enraq _ atugh aqe lghiit _ tes k an ani _ sulug nkut ni _ .
amenqun _ taakut _ atughte ghllagu na iqe yagh kangit _ .
iitek _ angukagh put _ .
M ik l aghh aam _ , _ sulug nkut _ nayag at _ tugukagh a _ , _ naa mta _ ata an _ , _ ategh a _ iknaqe negh _ .
kii _ , _ en r agh ng am _ whangkuta _ asag mta _ taa m _ S ing l eng am _ , _ igh l e kum t aagh llag in kut _ atugh nun _ kanavek _ panrengi naqe negh mta _ .
ellnga _ qayughllak _ leg r eng ig a tuq _ .
naqam _ taana _ panig a _ pugughileghmii u lghii _ , _ asag ke te lghiik _ atghagh aqe lghiik _ A n as ug en kuk _ .
kana _ elngaatall _ q el pegh q en n iiq egk angat _ saye at _ una _ q el pegh qell u ku nguq _ .
iglag it qun _ wh aan t alghii s tun _ ayuqe ut _ .
atugh ghllag t _ tawaten _ .
sa sqe qaghte aqe linkut _ ipa _ meghtigh sqe ainkut _ , _ kayusiite sqe uq _ , _ taghnughhiqe te sqe uq _ , _ legre na yukagh mta _ .
naqam _ tazingkut _ yug ngertagh ghhagh t _ panig it _ atghagh uute kayug t _ .
pi aqe kanginkut _ whangkuta _ S ing l eng am _ , _ â _ pagaliit _ atigh igate ut _ , _ aghula igate ut _ . _ â _ whangkuta _ .
taagken _ apeghiigh nghata _ tawaten _ atugh ghllag nghmeng _ , _ tumighqaate naqe negh meggni _ , _ taglagh uute naqe negh meggni _ , _ tumighqaate naqe na iqe ut _ .
P uy g ii m agh meng _ ila i _ waame te aqe lghiit _ , _ entaqun _ amsanagh ghhagh u luku _ taglagh uute na luteng _ .
sumeghtaghagh te kete negh mkun _ maaten _ esgha _ , _ neve ste uute ghllag luta _ entaqun _ imaken _ ima _ ayuqe lghiikut _ whaa _ .
taagken _ enraq _ tumighqaate nghata _ pellagh nagh ni _ ama _ .
tawaten _ kingu itneng _ atugh ghllag qagh yagh ghngaaghmeng _ , _ esla llu _ naafte nghaani _ .
T es k an an illu _ tawaten _ aneghte aghte aqe ut _ ilangani _ .
U z iv legh ull uteng _ apeghiigh negh meggni _ tughumgha te aqe luteng _ , _ temngi _ aqelqagh ite ghngaaghmeng _ .
awiim _ ulape sigh ke kangit _ .
taana llu _ sivuqagh _ k as p ug agh taq luku _ k il g aa qu meng _ .
nalluke aqa _ whanga _ apegh luku _ pi aqe aat _ .
whanga _ apegh yug igate aqa _ sa na yu kangatnga _ .
apa ut llu _ taana _ k il g aaq uk ayug g aan iiq sagh aat _ .
taana _ angag ke na iqe lghii _ naten _ nalluke aqa _ , _ awiim _ neve sqe te te m _ pil q egk anga _ .
angag ke na iqe lghii _ S un aagh r uk _ taana _ ama _ .
iknaqe llegh ke aqe kanga _ sivuqagh m _ , _ iknaqe uq _ .
mekelghiigh t _ enkaam _ entaqun _ amalka qun _ , _ amenqun _ whaa _ laluramke t _ esgha _ qimugte naqe aqe kangit _ .
T e a c h er - ke f taa t _ amalka _ .
K il g aa qu mun _ , _ tes k an ani _ aq f aq um un _ .
I k naq el q aan iiq aat _ .
tamaakut _ Y agh aan kut _ kilgaaqu ste u na iqe yagh ait _ , _ aantagh mii m llu _ ata a _ Q aa lu _ .
qepe qaghtugh usigh luteng _ kilgaaqu kayug t _ tamaakut _ .
qepe qagh uute kek _ taake uk _ aqume igate ngugh mete uk _ Q aal u m _ .
qiinghigh mangite agka _ sa u te kek _ .
salem- perewaagh _ entaqun _ tamaghhagh mi _ sa llegh _ .
nanughaghtagh leg t _ tamaakut _ iknaqughi ghllagkagh t _ .
nanughaghtagh luteng _ aatkagh it _ tunugh ke isigh luteng _ qu ll ig it _ , _ temkagh it _ , _ iknaqe lghiit _ , _ sukate ngugh t _ .
I i r g ugh ll ak lu _ una _ tunuqite lgu luku _ angukagh ka _ whanga _ .
temngi _ yuug _ kiyagh t aagh yaghq aanghi sagh pe tuq _ liisagh lghiinga _ , _ nukalpigagh _ yugughtekagh _ , _ nukalpigagh _ maana _ anglinghhagh _ .
whaa _ whangkutestun _ entaqun _ yugtu tekagh liqe aq _ sa meng _ ik f iq l iigh llegh h ii _ aga _ kayusigh magh an _ ayuqe yaghpete aat _ .
tawatete yaghpete ut _ kayusigh i ghllagu yaghpete ut _ .
kinku t _ ukut _ keveg iitagh u lghiit _ aga _ meghtagh uute ait _ .
whangkuta qun _ Q ip eng am _ quunpeng _ meghtagh uute aqe ainkut _ .
aga _ kinku t _ esghagh aqe ait _ , _ â _ U u - h uuk _ , _ qetgegh teki _ piyaqleg iigh uq _ . _ â _ aga _ qetgegh luki _ wayagh luki _ tugu aqe luki _ .
esghapag inagh yaghqaa nghite yaghpete ut _ .
taawa _ upleg luki _ tugumiigh it _ tugu aqe luki _ .
uksugh mi _ whaten _ umegnegh mi _ kinku t _ alngunak _ neng aa ng it egh ngaat a _ anigu m _ pi nghaki _ pe ke tu taq luki _ .
nengaa ita _ qep gh aat kay ug w iit _ .
maaten _ all ang ugh te m _ talwa _ kayusigh i na niite ut _ .
aghnagh ghhaat _ , _ aghnagh lqinagh u aghtekagh ghhagh t _ aan t it _ aga _ legan _ aghnaghagh nun _ qetgeghtugh luki _ aante i te ste aqe luki _ .
K ay usi ghi p er e waagh llag u yagh tut _ .
siivanllegh t _ tamaakut _ whang kun neng _ yugpallaghte ghllagkagh t _ s ii v an llegh un ik ay u w iit _ .
A pegh tugh am s uk _ entaqun _ sa llegh meng _ .
aghnagh t _ tamaakut _ ama _ whang kun nun _ aghnagh nun _ ama _ apegh tugh am s ug et _ .
E ll ng it neng l uq un _ liite luta _ whaa _ whangkuta _ legan _ iglegh t ani _ .
qaatke te ma ghllagu yagh lghiit _ talwa _ entaqun _ .
entaqun _ ukavagh magh mi _ aamta _ lliigh kau uq _ .
ila a _ aamta _ tamaa na _ negh igh h aan eng _ segh l el u uk ay uk _ ama _ entaqun _ n ate l nguq _ .
puvalla
taakwani _ whang kun ni _ puvalla meng _ esghaate mangite unga _ angli u lunga _ .
avangite ukut _ sa ite ukut _ .
taawanginaq _ apa ghllag ut _ taana _ aghillug _ uksaagh te nghatni _ , _ isi _ ke v ii w aq elghii _ quyngigh m _ kevigh kaqe kanga _ isigima _ .
L iit ng waagh l unga _ pi yalghiinga _ aghveghwaagh ke uq _ aghvegh ngllaghkagh ghhagh _ .
sa u a _ wallu _ melqugh igh aq _ enraq _ liigike llghite aqa _ .
inglukutagh ke lghiikung _ whangkutung _ .
U ugh qagh m iin kuk _ aqume igate ngugh nkuk _ , _ nekeve te nkuk _ , _ T u us aan kuk _ , _ A g ig s ug en kuk _ Q ag aq un kuk _ , _ inglukutagh ke luta _ , _ whangkutung _ aghillug llu _ .
inglu ke neghtu aanga _ whanga _ .
P eg g n em tek i _ aga _ legan _ , _ akuqagh aqe ke put _ kaate nghata _ .
emta _ natete yaghqagh nun _ , _ ellnga qun _ taana _ whangkuta _ apa ut _ , _ whaa _ ay um i qu luku _ , _ sa kan _ uksaagh kan _ ifla lleqe uq _ , _ taana _ legan _ igleghte aq _ , _ qukaghite nghmini _ s all ip g agh taq luni _ .
alingnagh igh ke ghrug ke aq _ nutem _ .
awiim _ ellngit a _ ugpeqe ghllag luki _ ayuqe kangit _ .
sa meng _ puvalla raagh meng _ esgh h aa sim ang itu nga _ whanga _ , _ tamaani _ liite aqngama _ whang kun ni _ .
aghqesaghtughtu ukut _ yeqay _ , _ A taa yagh h aq _ aghqesaghtughtu uq _ , _ taakwavek _ maaten _ h o usi ng - el iit k agh pesi nun _ .
T aan Ê¼ g an tuq _ naayvagh m _ esne ani _ wallu _ taakut _ anagh nge ainkut llu _ K eg y u uq en ku t lu _ , _ naa n tuq _ taakwani _ akeleghraagh itni _ aghqesaghtugh vig _ .
talwa _ naaghte yameng _ kum agh t i si qig al nguq _ yuug _ .
saghna sqe aqe kanginkut _ taglagh negh mta _ , _ mang tag g aat _ upenghagh _ ima _ entaqun _ agaghtekagh t _ taakut _ k el qell uki _ .
â _ A w al m ig g agh meng _ saghna aqe tek _ , _ â _ pi aqe ainkut _ .
A w al m ig g agh meng _ saghna aqe lghiikut _ .
taakwani _ sa u aat _ masugkwaagh ghhagh t _ .
kaate negh mta _ esteg mineng _ nusug luku _ uy gh ag g aq _ qateghrakegtagh _ , _ aghnegh ghllag _ una _ awalmig _ peqagh ghhagh t _ lli luki _ aw al m ig g aat _ taakut _ .
qelanegh na ghllag _ kum agh t in aqa _ .
taawa _ aan gh ugh ll uteng _ taakut _ kumagh nghata _ supughragh nghminiki _ , _ qenwat _ kumagh aqe ut _ .
En r agh ng am _ yuggagh m _ , _ whanga inagh u laatagh lghiinga _ sa kayug _ ug um in aghn aghq egk ay uk _ ilangani _ .
aygughiketagh ghllagu yalghiinga _ aghnaghagh u lunga _ taagani _ .
aghyuugh aqe kanganga _ sa meng _ qalleg aghtagh fqaama _ nag at ng waagh es qell unga _ .
unegkut _ unguva lghiit _ eghqwaagh nghminiki _ P el aa si n kut _ kinku t llu _ .
naqamllu _ sa u aat _ aviite aqe ut _ ken gh eg nun _ tawavek _ .
pi aqe kegka _ , _ â _ P el aa si _ kana _ kiyagh taa q es tagh ng aagh mi _ q aan gh akun _ . _ â
â _ aa _ , _ pi naqlaatagh uq _ una _ aghn agh agh r uu p ak _ ! _ â _ A taa yagh h aq _ pi uq _ .
naqam _ kelgugh aqe kanginkut _ .
taghnughhagh perewaagh ni _ kelgugh luta _ aghqesagh uute aqe ainkut _ whangkuta _ taakut _ aghqesaghtugh vig lgu ukut _ , _ naa n tuq _ ama _ taakwani _ tapeghagh m _ n at ang ani _ .
teghigniqe te aqe ukut _ .
Agh v eng en gh ata _ S al qu m si ll eq
whaa _ u pen gh an gh ani _ tawaten _ un Ê¼ g a _ aghvenge ni nghatki _ , _ naghaagh te ghngaamta _ elngaatall _ taglagh uute luta _ , _ uka _ kaa l g un gh aat a _ pi y ut q er r ag k iigh aq u kut _ , _ mekelghiigh ghhagh t llu _ , _ aghnaghagh t llu _ .
whangkuta _ aghnaghagh ni _ ughvughqe te luta _ taaqe luta _ taq ugh teng ng waagh l uta _ , _ samaken _ nanigh m _ asi aneng _ aallnegh meng _ qilag aput _ pi luki _ atghagh uute aqe ukut _ .
sangamta _ nalluke aqa _ nangaghnegh m _ almesiqe laatagh kanga _ .
taawa _ mangtagtu uute aqe ukut _ tesamani _ .
P ilag et _ atalughagh meng _ m il u v ik aqegk ang in kut _ .
angyaleg t _ tamaakut _ esghapag na lleghpigagh at _ .
nulighh it _ pika _ angyilghagh ni _ .
kaankut _ ug w i meng _ aquutagh _ pi te lghii ii nigh itgun _ q al t aagh w r ag g aat _ , _ aghul ak all gh u un egh meg g ni _ esghapag na pigte ut _ .
nulighh it _ pika _ kenilegh m _ nalighnegh ani _ , _ angyaleg t _ kana _ angyagh mi _ , _ aghvenge lghiit _ taakut _ .
iwerngaqun _ apeghiigh aqe ait _ , _ q al t aagh w r ag g agh meng _ nulighh it _ tugumiigh iigh luteng _ .
K a tu m _ ug w i meng _ sa te lghii ii nagh u kete te _ qalta teng _ aghulate aqe luki _ .
tawatete laatagh lghiit _ entaqun _ .
taakut _ iv igh teng it _ manughagh kun _ aqume uute luteng _ .
uka _ llaag t _ angaghqugh aqe kangit _ , _ taakut _ aghvegh leg t _ atigh aqe luki _ apallugh ke aqe luki _ ilagagh aqe lghiit _ .
ilagaate it _ nalluke anka _ liite mangite anka _ , _ naqam _ whanga llu _ aqume aqe lghiinga _ .
I v igh utegh llag aq ut _ aghnagh perewaagh t _ , _ aghni ut llu _ entaqun _ naken _ ug w iiq at _ tagi luteng _ aghvenge lghii nun _ ug w it eng _ sa teng _ aghv eng en gh ata _ .
taakut _ aymaramket pig t _ , _ aymaramket pigu na iqe anka _ yug squgh u ta ghhagh t _ taakut _ .
W iyagh ll aw aaq elghii _ taana _ , _ aghnaghagh t _ panig it llu _ , _ whangkuta llu _ ila ke luta _ , _ iglakegte ghllag _ aghnagh _ ivi igh nghmini _ .
M al ig te v y iiq agh aq agh put _ iitek _ , _ tawaten _ angyaleg t _ atigh aqe luki _ .
I v igh te l ep er e w aal g et _ entaqun _ aghvenge negh meggni _ .
iwerngaqun _ naangellegh itnun _ llaag t _ angaghqugh llegh it _ .
esgha _ siqlugagh lgu yaghpete ukut _ A pe tek in kut _ kelu kaghagh itni _ llaag lghutagh lgu aq _ .
llaag lghutagh _ entaqun _ ilukligh u uq _ , _ ataasigh _ amig ke luku _ .
Taa k w an tut _ whangkuta _ siqlugagh put _ , _ taana _ ama _ neqelghutagh u na iqe a _ A ng q a teng an w ate m _ .
ellngit a nguq _ si q lu w aq agh aat _ taana _ .
nuyekligh teng _ entaqun _ naasqugh ke luki _ legan _ pi aqe lghiit _ .
maaten _ qavngaq _ pi yaqegka _ K ing un gh am _ k el g us aq min igu _ , _ en m is s _ iiggellug igh ghllag luni _ , _ siqlugagh ut _ taana _ ughyugh ghllag luni _ .
esgha _ k el ut ang it n il nguut _ siqlugagh t _ taakwegkut _ , _ taa ku nguut _ siqlugagh put _ taa k w an tut _ .
K ag p am s ug llag et _ , _ nani _ tawani _ tanqigh mi _ pi aqe lghiit _ .
paninang qun _ salin _ maana _ , _ ug w iigh um agh m a _ tuyugh qaghaqe ainkut _ ukut _ nayugh mta _ R aa qu un kut _ .
uziva nkut _ salin _ entaqun _ angyeghetagh _ sa u a _ atuqe u luku _ .
mangtag _ , _ qasugh iqe aq _ sa u a _ tuyugh aqe aat _ .
angyeghetagh t _ tamaakut _ sa u aat _ entaqun _ neqe t _ angyagh mun _ kelqe te aaghet _ , _ ategh i _ angyeghetagh t _ .
taakut _ alla _ akmagtagh ghhagh t _ aghinghwaagh u na iqe ait _ .
sanqute t _ , _ aghvegh mun _ pi sigh t _ , _ aghinghwaagh lghutagh t _ .
aghvenge naqe llegh _ piraamsi tete luku _ ayuqe yagh kangat _ .
eghqwaagh uute aqe luteng _ tanqigh mi _ nani _ .
angyagh mun _ pi sigh _ enkaam _ entaqun _ y at aagh q en naq negh meg g ni _ eghqwaagh uute aqe lghiit _ .
K aa v am _ angli naqe llegh a
K aa v am _ apegh llegh a
siknegh
siknegh mi _ tesamani _ qafsina neng _ akuuragh aqe aqa _ qazigyagh _ , _ whaten _ iiwleng _ pi gpenaan _ , _ ayumiqullegh t _ ataasigh t _ .
U w al igh negh meng _ taa w eg ken _ esneghag ni _ .
nalluqagh nge a _ , _ angyengestagh lgu lghiinga _ .
ilu te mun _ m aaq ek _ uughqaghtagh t _ all g eq es t at _ .
negig llegh k _ wh aa ng iigh h aagh ll u tek _ kenle kek _ , _ uk s aa pag mi _ whaten _ , _ ilu te mun _ tu ng yuuk _ maaqe ghllagek _ .
unake luki _ upag aghte luki _ tugu naqe i nagh ma luki _ , _ taakwavek _ malleg aghte nghminiki _ tegh lu w agh taq luki _ .
tawatete naagh zinga _ .
naqam _ unange ghllag _ , _ qayughllak _ uygu te ghllag _ .
U un Ê¼ g gun _ aag lghii _ sa u luku _ .
Taw a teng in aan aq ng am a _ , _ angalqatagh nka _ il em ll uki _ kete qaghte lunga _ , _ kaate luki _ taw av eng iigh h aq _ ang all q at ameng _ , _ nekreg ite ngugh nge a _ , _ angalqatagh aghte aqe anka _ .
legan _ taakwavek _ , _ enraq _ y aku gh naq an i q _ , _ k ag s aat aqegk ang anga _ laagh anun _ .
Wh aa ng iigh h aq _ negig llegh m _ kenle kek _ .
aghvinleg _ tugu qaghte aqa _ .
ila a _ aga _ tegh lu w agh taq anga _ , _ wh an ik w aaq aa _ iiwen _ , _ siqinegh _ tevigh yagh uq _ .
G u ut ng w aaq aag unga _ iwerngaqun _ wh an ik w aa _ .
unaami _ uughqaghte aat _ kaate ghllag ma lghiit _ .
teskiwani _ U m e y aal ag ni _ , _ qenu _ anuqe ngunani _ puglegh meng _ pi lghii _ amsanagh _ .
sa u a _ kagpesqwaagh _ , _ n all uk egh ll agh ng aam k i _ suflugagh m _ qepghagh llegh i _ , _ piyuke lleg mtun _ lli aghte naqe aqa _ .
kingu a _ walamnaag aghagh aqa _ nakeghsagh ta a _ .
pinigh yagh lghii _ apeghiighkagh _ .
naakghite te ste ghllag aqa _ , _ uk at gh ut agh llak _ .
teskiwavek _ ( _ nutaan _ unange ghraag vyiigh yagute aqe unga _ ) _ kaate yalghiinga _ taawa _ , _ aghnegh u p aag um aan _ , _ uksaagh mi _ , _ nuug aqe uq _ kiiwhken _ elngaatall _ .
Wh aa ng iigh h aagh h negh ata _ gu un n em k i _ , _ ukatghute ghllag luki _ .
ii _ guusagh lghiinga _ .
unange gpenanga _ seghleghhalek _ ghhuugh ghhagh nka _ sikna yagute anka _ .
nuug ghllag _ unite luku _ quug meng _ qerngughte i yalghiinga _ , _ ghhuugh meng _ si k n ay ag u te m _ .
teghiglug t _ esgha _ repall _ qungeghrug i _ aliigh aqe ut _ qenughhaghagh vleghagh mi _ mallegkagh m _ ang tal ang aneng _ .
iwerngaqun _ , _ aglagh negh mni _ legan _ guute aqe unga _ .
â _ sangami _ tawatete a _ . _ â
awavagh qagh a qun _ nuug lghii _ pii s ut agh agh luku _ guusagh kegka _ leganqun _ .
tugu naagh nghite kegka _ am s an aghq w aa k anga _ .
entaqun _ kiiwna a _ w al am naa pag em _ uk at gh ut a tugh q w aa s tegh ll ak aqa _ .
taawa _ mataawi kau unga _ .
sivu nge aq
maana llu _ sivu nge aq _ nuugtu yagh lghii _ .
uksugh mi _ tuvagh _ r egh igh h negh min i _ nuug leg pigu uq _ , _ unange na pigte yagh uq _ , _ maaten _ avangite te a _ .
aghsaan _ nuug pagite te a _ .
tawaten _ malleg lutek _ me ngunani _ kiyaghte uq _ .
R aa qu q _ taana _ esavghaghtu raaghinagh _ .
K el eng ak aq eg ke f ut _ .
T u um ll ug llak _ , _ angyagh llegh ke sigh ghllag _ .
ii _ , _ inwa _ w al gu y aag g agh mun _ , _ qikmigh a llu _ ik naq el g aq at _ .
aa _ , _ maghyaghqugh aqe kanginkut _ w al gu y aag luni _ .
â _ puughte i lghiit _ tamaakut _ angwaaghute meng _ anagu aqe luki _ ! _ â _ amenam _ legan _ anagu aqe ke put _ .
esnevagh aqe ukut _ legan _ nuug aqe ut _ .
kayagte aqe kanginkut _ amsakellegh inagh aneng _ , _ nuugtu nghaani _ .
qafsina _ unake luku _ , _ tamaani _ ig l eq aq w aaq elghii _ , _ llaaghanwha _ ilangakun _ maklagte aqe lghii _ qavaghsigh meng _ .
llaaghanwha _ legan _ taakwegkut _ segge llegh ghllag t _ uteghmun _ itagnagh aqe ut _ .
A ng y all qu sigh llak _ , _ qikmigh a llu _ iknaqe lghiit _ .
nuugtu pigte yagh uq _ .
sangami _ maaten _ nuug pagite te agu _ .
leveklug ghllag m _ s aam _ tegh h a _ s aku s l ug tugh q w aam _ s aam _ .
maana _ sivu nge aq _ nateghtu langa _ nallukngwaagh kegka _ .
siknegh mete aqe lghiinga _ quunpeng _ un ang segh waagh mun _ lliigh ghngaan _ .
uksugh ghhagh inagh mi _ .
uksaagh m _ un ang segh waagh a _ nallukngwaagh aqa _ .
qineghpeghwaagh aqe lghiinga _ liigilliigh yama _ .
naten _ lliigh nghaani _ , _ uksaaghpag kestagh nghaani _ , _ ayvegh _ ukavek _ esgh aq aq u tugh h negh at gu _ .
kaana _ ayveghagh igate uq _ k i w al igh neq an i q _ .
negh niigh vig ghllag _ , _ quunpeng _ ayvegh leg _ , _ q an t aagh an tuq _ kana _ .
whaa _ tagtalmi _ esgh aa ll aagh nan igh tu nga _ .
qantaghante uq _ , _ aghula i aatagh u ghllag _ .
E s gh aa ll aagh nan igh tu nga _ .
nalluke kegka _ nateghtu langa _ , _ m aan sim ang itu nga _ , _ siknegh mete kanga _ .
pugughilegh meng _ ken qig ll aagh pen anga _ tesamani _ tagi unga _ maavek _ .
taawa _ tagi ukut _ pugughilegh meng _ .
S iv ul igh pig aal u tun g _ , _ ( _ A nagh ay aan kut _ quyngighqwaagh t _ m aan l e nguut _ ) _ , _ W aa ll allu _ tagite ainkung _ I m ing ate m _ .
W aa ll a _ taana _ kiyalighagh mii u yagh lghii _ .
taakwagun _ , _ qamiye t _ malghugnegh t _ , _ W aa ll a _ qamugh ke luku _ .
qikmigh ghhagh t _ pin igh waagh et _ , _ naten _ ken qig ll aagh pen anga _ , _ entaqun _ qavagh aqe lunga _ .
naten _ tawaten _ , _ wallu _ kangigh mii nun _ kaate sta _ .
A nagh ay aaq _ quyngilegti _ .
taawa _ quyngigh a _ qateghrakegtagh ghllag _ .
sa u ak _ qam iy ell u ug pag ek _ , _ natete ak _ , _ aghqestaagh pigu uk _ .
I wh an it wh a _ qamisli llegh ke nghite atkek _ L ap l an d - egh m iit _ .
aa _ , _ un u w aa _ mamleg a _ .
ii _ naayghagh ghrug ghllag _ whaa _ qigug mi _ ang q ap er uk eg llak _ .
whaa _ tagtalmi _ lii simak ng waagh pe taq a _ .
uugna qun _ N aa y ghagh p aw un iiq egk angat _ .
taana _ , _ tawani _ ima _ esghagh llegh ka _ .
unug llegh ke sigh _ tagi ukut _ , _ naten _ uyatu tke a _ , _ ken qig ll aa ll ghi taq a _ .
naa kek _ taake uk _ qimugsigh k _ aviite uk _ .
M eng y aa ken ghi tag put _ .
kaate luni _ legan _ quyngigh ni _ pegte a _ .
taawa _ alla _ saaghw ani _ quyngigh lgu uq _ .
Wh aa ng iigh h aq _ petug luni _ , _ mangteghagh m _ ingate kaghagh ani _ , _ u ku m _ qemi m _ uk ak agh aani _ .
taawa _ sivungagh mun _ lliigh uq _ .
I meg y uu tem llu _ angayuqagh i _ , _ S ip el an kut _ , _ N ung ug en kut _ , _ whangkuta _ , _ estamagnegh u uq _ mangteghagh _ .
M ang tegh a pig g aat _ , _ whangkuta llu _ , _ I meg y uu tem llu _ angayuqagh i _ , _ N ung ug en ku t lu _ tanpegh ghhagh t _ .
taakut _ S ip el an kut _ entaqun _ l o g _ h o us e- ngun iiq egk ang it _ .
qaamkut _ mingle i _ unaghsigh t _ , _ sivuqagh m _ mangteghagh atun _ .
iwernga _ m aan ang il nguut _ , _ unaghsigh t qun _ nuug uute ghllag luteng _ , _ whaten _ r o o f - em s iil g et _ .
tanpegh meng _ r o o f - el igh luteng _ .
T u um ll ug ll aa k _ aghpumla ghllag _ .
maaten qun _ tu um ll ug g nan iq anga _ , _ aghpumla nga i uute kanga _ .
entaqun _ an uq e tugh tek anga _ .
tamaani qun _ aghpumla u lghii _ qu un pegh llak _ .
anigu _ temngi _ tekite ghllag _ , _ mangteghagh t _ n u v uk r ug g ii _ , _ anigu ghllag _ .
umegnegh ughte nghminigu _ taagken _ , _ ii _ entaqun _ qaamte aqe a _ , _ tamaa na _ teng tegh ll an egh min igu _ .
A a y _ , _ ayveghagh lghiit llu _ wh aa ng iigh h aa w aq ut _ .
unaagh nge i nagh u kete te _ naken _ qamugh t _ whaa _ .
neghsaghtu magh mi wha _ ayuqe yagh nghite a _ , _ esghaghhu qun _ k an ani _ tekeghagh ani _ kana _ eftughuute aqe ut _ awen _ .
K ell m ig te ll ghi l ngu unga _ nalluke kenka _ , _ entaqun _ luugh gni _ .
tawaten _ kum l aagh qell uni _ , _ I n u un kuk _ kinku k _ , _ N u ngu w aa llu _ , _ U v ing w aa llu _ , _ quyngigh meng _ t as l ugh w agh lu tek _ kiiwhken _ tagi aqe uk _ qam iy ng i k _ usi lug teng _ .
K aa tu saq meg n ek i _ , _ neghsagh t _ ig ugh q w aa k at _ paseghagh ghllag t _ .
entaqun _ ighivgaq _ unange luteng _ , _ naten _ aqfaqugh ma ait _ , _ q a z ig yagh p agh qu t _ naken _ pi atgu _ .
quyngigh t _ t as l ugh ameng _ tagi aqe ut _ U v ing w aa llu _ , _ N u ngu w aa llu _ , _ I n uugh u uq _ iitek _ aag llegh a _ .
Q a z ig y ap ag llag s ug n itu t lu _ aange pigte ut _ , _ enraq _ si ku gh nag llag luteng _ ayuqe ut _ .
kukuleg
kukuleg _ teskiwna _ maaken _ esghaqaaluni _ , _ legan _ napaqagh m _ ul i waagh luni _ ayuqe uq _ .
qeghagh ghllag _ , _ sa u ut _ .
qeghaghtu pigte uq _ u llegh aa te ll ghi lluni _ .
angyagh meng _ teskiwavek _ , _ mangteghagh ngllagh naqe t _ , _ mangteghagh vyiigh ghhagh _ sa u a _ .
taakwegken _ esne meng _ unaghsigh meng _ angyagh kun _ usi ii kut _ , _ usi iigh ukut _ .
maligsaagh yug neghtugh kanga _ palaghmete ghngaaghma _ .
Y aa v uq ugh tek luki _ I m ing at en kut _ , _ entaqun _ M egh y u un kut _ , _ W aagh y in kut _ , _ kinku t _ P et g en gh h aan kut _ .
E s negh r u wh aa kun _ angyapig kun _ y aa v u qu meng _ .
teskiwani _ kukuleg m _ kangighagh ani _ , _ whaa _ maaten _ liigike yaqegka _ , _ kangighagh akun _ tamlag qagh luteng _ sa ut _ piyutagh u aghte te ut _ , _ uqligh aat _ wallu _ .
tamaa _ nenglullug t _ n at angi _ ifkagh aqe luteng _ naqam _ n ef teg ng aaq luteng _ .
me nge ghllag luteng _ q aam n angi _ .
yug m _ naasqugh lghutagh nge i _ tamaa _ .
ii _ tan pegh h agh aaq _ sa u a _ tamaa _ .
angyagh t _ tamaa _ ulpig aghte aghte aqe luteng _ , _ ayemqugh aqe luteng _ .
amig lgu aqe luteng _ , _ sa ngllaghkagh ghllag pestaagh _ , _ pelungigh ghllag _ , _ s aag r uk eg llak _ .
maaten _ kiwa _ qete llegh ughte ma uq _ .
S egh legh waagh u uq _ .
tawani _ entaqun _ yugu i te ghllag mi _ , _ sa ma uq _ , _ tuqu laghate te ma uq _ .
sa n qun _ tamaa _ nenglu ni _ .
Y u v ghii gh waagh yaq um ta _ entaqun _ s aku s l ug llak _ sama _ .
enraq llu _ tamaani _ llangaqa _ un ay agh aq iig a tes ug n i tut _ .
Taa w aa _ unaghsigh meng _ usi iigh luteng _ , _ kepe te aqe luteng _ .
Taa k w n anga _ p uy g aaq egk egk a _ nateghtu langa _ , _ naqam _ n at anga _ neqamike aqe anka _ .
uughqa ni _ samani
tagtale mii _ ii _ naten _ imani _ ayumiqullegh _ atuqe luku _ maani _ , _ llangaqa _ mulupag gpenani _ , _ aglagh ukut _ pugughilegh mun _ .
Taa kun ii _ , _ angayuqagh gka _ taake uk _ , _ ap ag k aa _ , _ liite lghiinga _ angayuqagh ke lukek _ taake uk _ .
aglagh ukut _ pugughilegh mun _ .
tamaani _ kiig ainkut _ , _ upenghaghagh a _ , _ salin _ ken qig ll aa ll ghi l ngu unga _ .
tagtale mii _ kiig aqe a llu _ , _ A nagh ay aan kut _ suna _ taakut _ , _ angyapig kun _ .
A nagh ay aan kut _ , _ I m ing at en kut _ , _ kinangaawa _ W aagh y ing w aa llu _ esteg ragh u a llu _ , _ taana llu _ naa ghllag ka _ , _ kaate ut _ qamagte luteng _ .
Tam aan te ku ll aal ut aan g _ kete ukut _ .
napaqagh ghhagh m _ qikmigh t _ qu ut qugh ut ii _ kangii nun _ kiwavek _ .
taakut _ P ug u ghi legh m el nguut _ A g aan ku t lu _ , _ A n aw ut aan ku t lu _ malghugnegh t _ .
tawaten _ teve luta _ entaqun _ .
maaten _ liisagh lghiinga _ , _ tapghaaghagh qun _ , _ iiwen _ siqinegh _ te v igh yagh tu ugh aq uq _ tamlag ukut _ .
napaqagh ghhagh _ kangii neng _ taagken _ uteghte uq _ .
qikmigh t _ itghagh u uute kangi _ .
Tam aan te ku ll aal ut aa _ , _ iqallug ut _ awen _ un ak agh put _ .
kii _ awen _ siknegh _ nag aq u tugh taq aa _ .
siknegh _ quunpeng _ q aanghi t nun _ lliigh uq _ .
arekull _ siknegh mun _ aglagh u aqe ukut _ .
ii _ ii _ , _ qenwat llu _ igleghte ukut _ .
tawaten _ tek egh al gh un qun _ taakwna _ , _ naagu _ siknegh _ .
ii _ at i qu s a tugh ll aat agh aat _ .
S ung agh yug g al ek _ kanagh a _ p eng ug ull uni _ , _ siknegh u naqe lleqe uq _ .
Taa w aa _ ketmiighte vigkagh ut _ , _ E s negh agh p aag u f tu k _ ategh kek _ .
qateghllug tek _ inga _ .
esneghagh m _ k el utegh ll u waagh ani _ tapghagh mi _ taakwani _ , _ kelute mii ii aghte lutek _ E s negh agh p aag u f tu k _ .
naayvagh mun _ whavek _ kanaken _ esneghag neng _ esneghagh k _ .
ii _ ii _ , _ nuug t wha _ tamaa _ esghaqagh aqe aput _ , _ naayvagh mi _ .
T a z ing kuk _ kaate yaghtugh yaqegput _ uugte ghllag lutek _ qategh ghraagte lutek _ , _ negh s a pig p aghq ughllak _ .
temngi _ qenaagh kun _ uugte luteng _ naayvagh m _ esne akun _ , _ kii _ .
guute nghite ait _ avelghagh ait _ .
kii _ ii _ , _ taakwagun _ aningugh luta _ , _ allakagh mi _ siknegh _ naayvagh lgu lghii _ .
atghagh ukut _ , _ ii _ aghqe i aghaghtu uq _ imani _ .
nuug _ tamaa na _ , _ q aw aag ll aa k _ , _ s am segh h agh aagh meng _ .
arekull _ aglekesegagh u aqe ut _ .
S am segh h agh aq ng waagh aq an ka _ .
kii _ , _ teskanavek _ kaate yaghtugh yalghiikut _ , _ qagi t _ un Ê¼ g a _ , _ esneghagh k _ r egh igh qell u tek _ , _ ayeme aqe ut _ kana _ .
qawaag ghllag u uq _ , _ neghsagh ghllag _ .
ii _ legan _ suqsugh ghhalek _ neghsagh t _ qimag aqe ut _ naken _ .
unange naqe mun _ w aa ken ghi tut _ kaate naqe i nagh ut _ .
enraq llu _ nak ev legh agh meng _ anuqe _ ayuqe uq _ .

tamlag luta _ nenglullug lghute ghllag t _ kii _ taa k w aa _ .
sungaghyug te aqe lghiit _ esghaghkagh nka _ , _ kaa _ si q lu w al gh un qun _ taakwna _ kelute mnni _ .
taagken _ tent- ta lug teng _ , _ uqlighsagh naqe ut _ ingavek _ .
angyapig llu _ esnevagh te naqe aat _ .
I negh qugh w agh waagh l unga _ nuyaaghqagh ii na yukagh ma _ , _ legan _ aga _ uyavaghqagh ughte ut _ , _ kingu itneng _ , _ igh s ak in gh egk en i _ yaag aghte aqe lunga _ .
ii _ naqam _ riistuniqe magh ma _ aghyuugh na yu kangatnga _ .
Q ik m igh agh es tun _ entaqun _ maligsaagh naqe lghii stun _ .
guute lutek _ , _ u p aghq agh taq lu tek _ T ut m ate l g en kuk _ , _ A nagh ay aan kuk _ .
tagsigh aagnenga llu _ esghagh lunga _ .
taawa _ nuug aqe uq _ , _ ilu te mun _ m aaq egh ll aag u f tu k _ .
legan _ guute lutek _ unake luki _ u p aghq agh taq luki _ .
iwerngaqun _ wh an ik w aa _ tagi ukut _ .
taane a _ nenglu vyiigh _ sa u a _ , _ S ip el am _ entaqun _ nekeftekaqe laatagh aa _ .
pinighsagh luku _ taw an naq ngu f tu kut _ arekull _ .
taana _ nayughkagh ut _ .
nevugh ligh aat _ qaye a _ , _ nevugh lgu uq _ nutem _ .
egllu llgagh u uq llu _ taawa _ naagu _ suflug meng _ iv aghn aghh aq _ .
tamaa _ c o p p er - et _ , _ legan _ taakwavek _ suqlughte luki _ , _ waya meng _ sa meng _ , _ wayaghtu uq llu _ c o p p er - meng _ tamaa _ .
suflug t _ taaqe ait _ .
arekull _ B al en a- m _ nalighnegh aneng _ m ak r egh qu llgh u f tut _ .
angyaghpag m _ taa m _ aghqe itagh i tekagh m _ .
taawa _ tesamani _ tepe luni _ angyaghpagllug m _ ing lu v in gha _ .
taawa _ quug u luni _ qalqalimaqu lleghtu uq _ .
quug ke luku _ taana _ .
tamaa _ telaananga m _ sa i _ , _ napaghyagh i _ s an igh yagh waagh i _ .
ikiqun _ quyngighqwaagh t _ angaghqugh kaqe ait _ .
siipnegh it _ kepugh ait _ taakut _ .
taake pigte aqe ut _ p eng ii w aq ut lu _ entaqun _ quug ke aqe aput _ , _ llaag i _ savikenghaagh ghllag meng _ siteghte aqe luteng _ .
siknegh mun _ lliigh sigh ut _ taana _ , _ n a tu ng aa wa _ ayumiqullegh _ .
agaten _ paninang _ aviite qaghte aqe lunga _ , _ p uy g aaq l unga _ naten _ .
kaviigh iigh na i ughtagh u ukut _ , _ enraq llu _ tamaani _ k av i q _ , _ k av iigh n iigh em _ tanqigh a _ qelpegh llegh a _ ava ite ngughk _ , _ taaqe llegh a _ kenle ngllagh llghite ngughk _ .
alngunak _ entaqun _ legan _ s ii f q aq _ an ig u v z egh an gh ani _ .
tekeghagh aneng _ ak m aghq uk aqaa _ kaviigh _ T ut m ate l g em _ .
Q af si n Ê¼ g ugh h negh min igu _ kaviigh nge lleg ni _ , _ kaviigh niigh yug nanigh aqe uq _ kenle lgu uq _ , _ taaqe aqe uq _ .
uglagh ghllag luku _ kaviigh ii igate uq _ .
entaqun _ k av ii v lu ug saq leg es tun _ taaqe aqe uq _ .
taagken _ kenle ke luku _ , _ ataasigh ghhagh _ ayumiqullegh _ avelghagh gpenaamta _ ag l ap er e waagh llak _ .
tawani _ nani _ A ug us t- mi _ , _ ilangakun _ July _ naange ghesnagh nghaani _ , _ wallu _ J ul y - mi _ paninang _ J ul y - ngu luku _ aglagh aqe lghiikut _ .
uksaagh kanigh u luku _ aqfa aqe ainkut _ A nagh ay aam _ qimugsigh meng _ .
tefte i aghagh qu kut _ ayvigtegh kun _ taakwagun _ .
legan _ ay um iin negh in kut _ teve aqe ukut _ .
tagtale mii _ , _ wetku _ quyngigh _ apeghiigh nghaani _ aglagh yagute ukut _ .
C o r r al - m un qun _ kanaghte aqe kangat _ .
C o r r al - m iq un _ tuqutagh igh yagute lghiit _ , _ ila i llu _ qitneg mi _ .
Taa m _ wetku _ kingu aneng _ aglagh aqe ukut _ .
siingenllu _ ivenruute _ allgegh lghii _ .
ii _ , _ ii _ , _ qimugsigh meng _ angaghqugh aqe ukut _ tevnga ni _ .
qenwat _ qikmigh ghhagh put _ neng en ghi gh waagh aq ut _ .
iitek _ taawani _ kangii ni _ muluugh aqe ukut _ .
T ev eq aghh n em t aa _ taawa _ qimugsigh llegh ut _ kayaali qaghte aqe uq _ .
sivuligh mi _ tamaani _ pi yaaghte yuwhaagh lleg mnni _ uk am ameng _ , _ uk am ap er u w aaq _ qikmigh tgun _ .
ukamagh aatagh unga _ whanga llu _ qikmigh tgun _ .
tenmaawi lunga _ , _ meghnugh pagnanigh lunga _ .
iitek _ qikmigh ghhagh t _ , _ angyagh ghhaat _ repall _ qukfighute ste aqe ait _ .
I v en r us tun _ tawaten _ teghugh ii aghte i negh meggni _ , _ repall _ angyagh ghhaat _ ip tag tagh agh luteng _ .
enraq llu _ angyengestagh meng _ quunpeng _ qamughagh lgu aqe lghiit _ .
sivuke luta _ T ap gh aagh as t aghh in aghq un _ .
elngaatall _ iqallugte aqe ukut _ , _ qupnegh meng _ kiyang _ .
tagtale mii _ ii _ pugughileghmii t _ katelghaate aqe ut _ iq all ug y at _ .
A g aan ku t lu _ , _ A nag ut aan ku t lu _ , _ k i w al iq ut agh luteng _ .
Agh v igh teg ne kun _ taaggun _ A g aan kut _ .
A nag ut aghh aan ut _ taakut _ , _ Agh tuq aa y ag en ku t lu _ kisii mi _ .
nasiqe aghte aqe ut _ aga _ piiwagh uute aqe ut _ tam aan te l q in agh luteng _ .
T em ke r uu llu _ taana _ , _ tefte i uute qugh ghllag _ .
quunpeng _ tefte i uute qugh ghllaget _ T em ke r u un kut _ .
ilangakun _ sivu ngiighhagh mnni _ , _ kingu mnneng _ ilangakun _ .
tamaagun llu _ whaa _ ilangakun _ tamlag aqe ut _ .
qagugh mun _ quunpeng _ mayugh aqe ut _ .
quyngighqwaagh t _ salin _ ik ay ugh te l g ul uteng _ sa u na iqe ka itneng _ L ap l an d - egh m ii neng _ neli kaqe aat _ ukagun _ k i w al igh negh akun _ .
qagugh _ taana _ k i ngu r ug ll am n neng _ mangteghagh liqe aqe aat _ .
qafsinagnegh t _ mangteghagh t _ taw an sagh tut _ .
S ip el an kut _ , _ pinagh u yankut _ , _ U n meg g aan kut _ , _ P ang aw y in ku t lu _ .
taane a _ g o v er n m en t- mun _ pik n iiq aat _ entaqun _ apeghtughiste ita _ nayugh at _ .
angumake nghite anka _ nalluke anka _ .
sakmavek _ piiwagh magh ita _ W al ang an kut _ , _ mulu magh ita _ .
tawani _ piiwagh llegh gpesi _ kenle ani _ guygu t _ allgegh qugh ait _ .
kiig aa _ legan _ q aku ghiit _ .
sangaawa _ 1 9 2 5 - 1 9 2 6 - mi _ .
taakwani _ nani _ 1 9 2 4 - 1 9 2 5 - mi _ .
ila ita wha _ qaga _ neqamike nghite atki _ .
ataasigh kun _ t aan eg kut _ ketligh at _ , _ pi nga yu neng _ ingluleg _ mangteghagh _ qaake aat _ .
Taa m _ te l an ang ameng _ ayuqe lghii m _ , _ H o l m es - ngun iiq egk ang it a _ .
aleghquusigh t _ allgegh nghhagh t _ , _ maakut qun _ ken Ê¼ g agh t at _ .
Tam aa w un _ l ip egh sagh at _ .
sa u a _ te a c h er - ng iigh h aq _ amsakaghtagh ghhagh _ , _ entaqun _ seghleghlluggagh ughtekagh _ ken Ê¼ g agh t akun _ .

taana _ telaananga _ u pen gh ay agh a pig ul uku _ holmes _ , _ B u c k l an d - ngun iiq egk angat _ umiileg a _ , _ ighnegh a _ John _ .
telaananga meng _ , _ akilpegagh magh mi _ .
kaviigh meng _ tukfightugh magh mi _ , _ sa meng _ tugute meng _ .

naligh ni _ taakwani _ ayumiqullegh ni _ kaviigh _ akitu pigte uq _ .
akitu lleghpigagh at _ s aam _ $ _ 6 0 - mun _ kaate qaghte luteng _ .
qenghaghtu t _ tamaakut _ entaqun _ $ _ 1 0 0 _ siipngaan _ wallu _ $ _ 7 5 _ .
tamaani _ unangsagh yagute magh ma _ , _ kaviigh iigh nigh ughte ngughsi magh ma _ ak i tugh q aag aa _ .
kii _ kaviigh t _ pi naqe yuwhaagh lghii ni _ unake neghllug u laatagh ma ut _ .
iitek _ k av iigh n iigh p aghq w aaq s alghii nga _ mekelghiigh ghhagh u lunga _ , _ nagun _ aag aqe aat _ .
tagtalmi _ liite te m llu _ s aam _ p iit k eg sim llu _ .
tawaten _ kaviigh niigh aatagh llegh mi _ , _ ayumiqullegh m _ ilangani _ kaviigh pagite luni _ , _ ilangakun _ kaviighyag ghllag aqe luni _ .
maaten _ katam _ iigsagh aatagh llegh stun _ , _ kaviigh niigh te ghllag _ , _ ii _ kaviigh niigh te aqe uq _ .
kaviigh nge naqe te perewaagh ghllag _ , _ katam _ maaten _ tugutlugte naqe ghllag lleg mtestun _ .
amenam _ maligte te nagh kaqsagh lghiinga _ k av iigh n iigh mun _ , _ taawa _ uq eng egh m e taq elghii nga _ .
aghulaqe uute aqe uq _ elngaatall _ , _ k ii p aghq en gh ani _ , _ k av iigh n iigh y aan neq eg s aat aq uq _ .
uuvganeng _ yataaghqesagh te aqe uq _ .
aghneghtu nghaani _ uteghnigh uute aqe luni _ .
K i nguv aq un _ iwerngaqun _ , _ tanqigh a _ un ku s en iigh em _ umeg llegh anun _ kenlanga _ , _ ikugh lleg mnnun _ kenlanga _ .
T ak es taa pig g aa yagh tuq _ .
N o v em b er - meng _ legan _ F e b r u ar y _ naangellegh anun _ .
sangan _ tawaten _ s ii f q all ghem _ ag Ê¼ ghi ll g ill ii qell gha _ takestaaghhagh _ maaten _ qemall _ seghlegh ghllag u uq _ .
november _ first- meng _ april- mun _ taakwavek _ .
unkuseniigh na niite lghii llu _ .
nanugh
uuvganeng _ entaqun _ nanughtu uq _ .
T um e meng _ quunpeng _ , _ aywaa yagh nghaani _ tawaten _ tume liqe ghllag aqe ut _ .
maaten _ s n o w _ m a c h in e- eng y alghii meng _ sukate luku _ nanugh _ qerngughtegkangat _ .
uuvganeng _ nanughtu uq _ , _ nanugh m _ tume liqe aqe ut _ , _ nanughagh aqe ut _ awen _ .
nanughagh aatagh unga _ .
ataasigh meng _ tesamani _ , _ naqam _ tume liqe ghllag _ , _ aviite u aghte ut _ .
T u um ll uku _ qituk _ aange pigte uq _ , _ tu um ll uku _ qimugsigh meng _ tumeyag ghllag _ nanugh ghllag _ entaqun _ .
esghaate igate unga _ .
qituk _ maani _ qineghpeghwaaghute kun _ esghaate unga _ .
naqam _ tume t _ tamaa _ esghaate gpenanga _ .
T u um t iv aghq ugh ll aa k _ .
aywaa nun _ teve yaghtugh negh mni _ uteghte aqe lunga _ .
aga _ aywaa n _ esne a _ aliinegh mkun _ uteghte aqe unga _ tesamavek _ .
tawaten _ alla _ esgha _ tu um ll uku _ taana _ , _ q an l eng un i sim aa _ .
anuqe m _ , _ n u ug te m _ , _ qiive ma lghii _ .
nanugh meng _ esghaate igate ngugh u nga _ , _ aa y _ amsakaghtagh _ .
tuqute yaqegka _ nanugh ghrukutaaghllag _ , _ uqig ghllag _ pegnem _ n ev egh tek aq aqa _ .
wiin _ n ev egh negh ll iq luku _ , _ llaaghinaan _ s aag r uk eg tuq _ .
tume _ awen _ esghagh kaqsagh aqa _ , _ te mang aneng _ esghaate gpenanga _ .
qituk _ maaken _ qineghpeghwaaghute kun _ esghaateqaghte lunga _ maani _ enraq _ yug lgu uq _ .
amu a ngam nguq _ pike a _ .
esghaateqaghtekaayagh unga _ enraq _ yug lgu uq _ .
taana _ ama _ esghagh luku _ , _ ama _ qituk _ qineghpeghwaaghute kun _ , _ siknegh mi _ .
Q aa y aam _ aga _ taku aqe a _ .
nutem llu _ tughwaagh ma kanga _ .
S n o w _ m a c h in e -em _ nanugh _ agh tuq nan igh tes t aa _ .
paninang _ esghaate na qaghte aqe unga _ , _ aviite u aghte ut _ .
naqam _ satun _ aa y _ wh at egh ll u w aaq _ .
taakut _ esghagh aataghkagh nka _ , _ megh mete ngughk llu _ un Ê¼ g ani _ , _ paaggun llu _ esghagh kaqe a _ .
Wh at egh ll u w aaq _ legan _ gginagh ke te luki _ n all un aghh ii tut _ .
aag llegh a _ lii g ik ng waagh luku _ , _ aag llegh a _ lii g ik l aagh pen aan _ uk aw ung iigh h aq _ maaqute ste kestagh lghii _ .
salngagkwaagh u ni lukek _ yeghlegi _ , _ aange pigte uq _ negh n ii m s ug llak _ entaqun _ maaqute kanga _ iigh w il ng waagh h agh mi _ kezemtagh ghllag _ taana _ .
naqam _ naate tke a _ el p eg y uk _ .
ungipaate aqa _ , _ â _ S al ng aw h k aagh llag ek _ taaga _ maaqute aqe ak _ . _ â
â _ ii _ nanugh u nghite a _ ? _ â
Q i negh neq ig s aqegk a _ aviite uq _ .
pugughilegh mi _ ungipaate anka _ , _ â _ entaqun _ sa u a _ nan uu w allu _ , _ uugte u a llu _ an al gh waagh h agh ni _ . _ â
Yug n iil q w aam _ ellmi nun llu _ esghagh ma na ai _ .
E g tug yug em _ pi luta _ esgh aghn aq saq ef ut _ aviite uq _ , _ avangite uq _ .
waaknanigh ukut _ , _ tagi ukut _ .

V u pig et _ neqnigh u llegh at
ggayegllug m _ apegh llegh a
neqnigh u llegh _ kenle ite yagh uq _ avangite yagh uq _ .
iwerngaqun _ unake yu llegh megestun _ ug l aghq ak aan _ unake kayugu yagh aat _ .
tawaten _ ug l aghq ak aan _ unake lleghqagh meng _ kenle ite yagh uq _ .
upenghagh mi _ tawaten _ angyaghtu negh meggni _ naamakaghte na iqe lghiit _ , _ pi nga yu neng _ ingluleg _ ayveghagh negh meggni _ n aam ak agh tem meng _ atigh llegh ke uq _ .
ayveghagh llegh m _ uglaghtala a _ e igh t _ , _ n aam ak agh teng ngu f tuq _ atigh llegh a _ .
yupig ii negh ghllag u aqe yagh lghiit _ .
ila i _ aamta _ whaten _ yug pagite aqe luteng _ ayuqe yagh lghiit _ .
enkaam _ n ate t k an igh mi _ angyagh igate aqe luteng _ , _ y u pag il nguut _ .
tamaakut _ y u p iin gh et _ alngunak _ angyagh llegh megestun _ angyagh kayugu yagh ut _ .
T w el v e- ngu yagh pe tut _ angyagh m _ uglaghtala a _ neghigh luku _ .
S aa v l an ku t gun _ angyagh yuwhaagh unga _ .
taagken _ A ng q a teng an w at kun _ angyagh na lunga _ pi y ag h _ l unga _ , _ kayute u naanghite ni lunga _ ighsake aanga _ .
elngaatall _ s u w aghq w aal unga _ nutem _ angli kuma _ ellngitgun _ angyagh yaghqaa gpenanga _ .
angli magh ma _ tawaten _ yungllagh yagh aanga _ , _ taana _ puygu nghite kegka _ ighsake llegh ka _ .
K ay ut ngun aanghi l q a _ , _ piyug nghite unga _ .
U w al iit _ , _ S aa v l an kut _ , _ aghillug nkut _ , _ Q u w aa r en kut _ , _ N em aa y aan kut _ , _ T em ke r u un kut _ , _ ifkaghte te nkut _ , _ E gh q aagh aan kut _ , _ Ung al aan kut _ , _ sulug nkut _ , _ N gu ung ay an kut _ , _ akule ke inkut _ , _ angyagh kayugu yaghpete ut _ angyaghwaagh kun _ lliigh magh meng _ .
taakut _ kiyang _ Q u w aa r en kut _ upenghagh u ta a _ tamaghhagh an _ aghvenge kayugu ut _ .
aghvenge ste u ut _ taakut _ , _ aghvengyuqagh t _ .
P us aa _ siv uy ag tek luku _ Q u w aa r en _ ata ke kanga _ .
P us aan kut _ , _ A taa yagh h aan kut _ , _ Agh n il un kut _ , _ kunukagh nkut _ , _ T a tu w in kut _ , _ taa ku ngu f tut _ avaquti a _ Q u w aa r i m _ .
elngaatall _ agh t iil nguut _ yuggagh t _ quunpeng _ .
angyaghwaagh kun _ lliigh magh meng _ , _ amsanaghllug mi _ whaten _ taglagh uute negh meggni _ , _ quunpeng _ sivulii manginagh aqe lghiit _ y aa v u qu meng _ .
entaqun _ y aa v u qu meng _ neghaalipag igate ngugh t _ .
angyagh at llu _ enraq _ sukate magh mi _ ayuqe lghii _ entaqun _ .
P ak r eg r ak eg t aghh aq _ angyagh ghhaat _ angyaghwaagh _ .
sivuke luku _ nanevgaghtagh ka _ piyaa nghaani _ maligte aqe kegka _ .
taagken _ maavek _ lliigh magh emta _ aviighute magh an _ umyugagh mneng _ lliigh unga _ .
kiyang _ umyugagh mneng _ piyaa aqe lunga _ lliigh unga _ , _ aviighute magh an _ nanevgaghtagh ghhagh ka _ taana _ .
ayveghte ni uq _ suflugagh neng _ whanga mni _ talwa _ teghig nagh uq _ .
T eng Ê¼ gh un agh tuq _ ayvegh meng _ naghulleg negh _ , _ sugupag igh negh _ .
suflugagh meng _ talwa _ teghig nagh uq _ .
yakugh nagh ite uq _ , _ uyiighagh t _ kangigh a _ taakut _ sa kun _ vuuslegh kun _ ayug il ngugh qun _ agaghte luki _ , _ qaamqaghte te luki _ .
S ug u pi luki _ pi aqe ke put _ whaten _ puglegh anite luki _ pi aqe ke put _ .
atghagh naqe negh meggni _ uygute luteng _ aneghte yagh qu aqe lghiit _ sugupag teng _ qerngughte yuggaagh qagh nghaki _ tawaten _ wetku _ sugupag ii iqe kenka _ .
aamtaam _ a si t ng in aaq an i meng _ pi lghii ni _ neghqugh na lghii _ .
U un gh at lu _ , _ naghulleg qagh inagh luku _ pegte lghii ni _ uunghagh igh te na lghii _ .
tuugkagh mete luki _ tawani _ atghagh te kayug i _ .
naghulleg luki _ tawaten _ naqamalla _ , _ qesug lghii ni _ , _ pi igate kangi _ neng te l ghii ni _ .
uyiigh t _ nengte lghii ni _ u un gh akun _ petug llegh i _ .
naghigh aghte aqe lghiit _ , _ iike aqe lghiit _ .
N eng tagh luteng _ tawaten _ nasiqute luki _ sulleve te luki _ , _ siingenllu _ taku laghate te aqe kangit _ ayveghagh lghiit _ tawaten _ , _ sayug luki _ taawa _ tuqute aqe kangit _ .
nalluniite aqe ut _ anglu megteggun _ aneghte negh meggni _ agepsugh u aghte tete te kayugu ut _ .
A ll aagh iin aag ut _ puglegh m _ n u qu tu l ng i _ .
aamta _ naa f legh m ell uki _ uka _ samaken _ mayugh nghata _ , _ es n ev agh waagh l uta _ tawavek _ laag ghhagh anun _ naa f legh mi _ tawani _ .
uka _ mayugh aqe lghiit _ whaten _ qu ngugh qell uteng _ .
whaa _ aan aq en gh ata _ ke p ell egh teg gun _ taaggun _ naghulleg lghii ni _ , _ taawa _ unake na lghii _ .
Q ag aq u m _ pangeghte llegh kek
Q ag aq u m _ apegh llegh a

sivuqagh meng _ tesakmaken _ mekelghiigh u lunga _ p ang egh naq unga _ tawani _ tanqigh mi _ pinaghvig m _ q uk aghnegh ani _ taakwani _ .
tespamavek _ ungazigh igh unga _ sivuqagh meng _ .
â _ enkaam _ , _ in aan m ell eng i _ ungazigh _ ! _ T egh r aa s t u _ ! _ â _ enkaam _ i ghi v g agh mi _ u pen gh aam _ aghnegh ani _ i ghi v g aam aan _ taglagh ukut _ nani _ taakwani _ siqinegh _ tevigh magh an _ .
taawa _ taglagh ukut _ igleghte ukut _ malghugnegh u luta _ , _ A taa yagh h aan ku t lu _ qilleghte uute te nkut llu _ .
whanga _ qilleghte uute te nkut ni _ .
qavaghni nghite unga _ q es ug n iq em _ ungazigh _ esghagh naqe kegka _ .
tawaten _ iiwen _ mangteghagh t _ sivuqagh m _ mangteghagh i _ talughsaghtugh aqe aput _ , _ qayug ngllagh ukut _ .
qayugh te ma luta _ U uy gh aam _ pi inkut _ , _ â _ aghviqagh mun _ kaate ukut _ . _ â _ qateghllug ghllag _ , _ aghviqagh u naqe lleqe uq _ , _ esneghag tun _ tawaten _ p ap ap aagh lu tek _ iqetu lutek _ .
alpag lukek _ taawa _ taglagh ukut _ .
U uy gh aq _ nekeve luni _ aruugh aqe lghii _ ingute kun _ nekeve luni _ .
qayugh te nghmeng _ taaqe luta _ pi inkut _ , _ â _ uaf- ke aq _ aliigh uq _ . _ â _ pi yalghiikut _ qemigh _ sa u a _ .
taawa _ taglagh ukut _ .
qute m _ maaqe niite kek _ alpag lukek _ arughsit _ aliigh aput _ .
taawa _ taglagh ukut _ , _ taglagh ukut _ .
siqinegh _ piite kestagh uq _ , _ whaa _ tamlag yaghtugh ukut _ .
angyagh ghllagu uq _ aatnegh at _ .
Tam l aghq utaq ef tuq _ angyaghugh tke aq _ .
elngaatall _ neqe siigh u te ma lghii _ , _ ayveghagh te ma lghii _ .
whaa _ kaate naqe ukut _ , _ kii _ yuug _ esnevagh uute yalghiimi _ , _ gginagh _ alla inagh _ es ghagh agh put _ .
ivenruute k _ aghula i aghte lukek _ nusug agput _ .
angyagh _ k el ev agh p ani _ nutem _ , _ ateghviga ii te ainkut _ u p ugh am _ s aam _ alngunak _ .
taagken _ tawani _ kanglluute kete luta _ .
Taa m _ angyagh m _ imagh a _ .
Q aaq ang u f tuq _ taglaate ainkut _ ellmeggnun _ .
imani _ mangteghaghtu uq _ , _ yugtu uq _ p eg gu llgh i _ tamaa na _ .
qesugniqe ghllag _ , _ ke tan q waagh aa llgh i _ S iv uq aghh m iit _ kaate lghiit _ .
taagken _ manughagh mun _ kaa llu ta _ angyagh m _ imigh u ni _ tawani _ pi inkut _ , _ â _ tawani _ utaqa itek _ nengighqe lleqe amsi _ ilakwaagh mnun _ . _ â
â _ paye a _ kenegh meng _ aane uten _ . _ â _ qamaken _ anighqute _ tugumiiqe luku _ tuune a _ qaaqagh mun _ .
qaaqagh m _ tawaten _ milugh lghii stun _ pi aqe luta _ alleg luta _ , _ â _ H aa _ , _ taawa _ . _ â _ ilakwaagh i _ uvite mi _ utaqa it _ .
tea- ngatu llu _ whangkutung _ yug ghllag m _ s aam _ aglagh te ainkung _ , _ malig tagh p un g _ .
kaa llu ta _ itegh ukut _ .
yug ghllag m _ taa m _ nughagh ak _ maalghug _ allighaghqagh k _ kiig negh ke ak _ ilu te mun _ miluqutagh ke ak _ .
atkug igh lutung _ itegh unga _ .
aghnagh m _ s aam _ itegagh nka _ kelig ai _ .
taawa _ itegh lunga _ amsikaghte naqe yagh unga _ , _ aghnagh m _ am si k agh agh taa k _ kameg gka _ , _ iikaghagh ak _ tawavek _ kayagte aanga _ allighagh mun _ .
nutaan _ allighagh kun _ iggasighte lunga _ negh naqe unga _ qayuutagh m _ esne ngiighhagh akun _ .
tea- ngatu _ qiive aghte yaqegka _ el ng allu _ iggasighte ma lghii _ .
taakut _ tukugh pung _ aqumgagh meng _ .
taawa _ neghe uute ukut _ .
ikuyeg ka _ meghnugh uq _ aq um yug llag ugh tu nga _ .
qenwat _ ayapegh lunga _ negh unga _ .

taawa _ taana _ mekelghiigh _ may- nga u naqe lleqe uq _ .
T aam qun _ aleghqugh aqe aanga _ .
aane ukung _ .
aane luteng _ iglegh us aq min i nga _ tesqagani _ , _ naa ke i _ ila nka _ esghagh nanigh anka _ .
puughhe na yu kanganga _ uteghnigh yug unga _ .
aglagh ukung _ .
Taa ku ngu f tut _ Q er ngugh tek aan ku ngu f tut _ taa m _ ata a _ may- ngam _ .
taagken _ aghnegh upag magh an _ qavaghni yama _ qavagh unga _ .
Wh an i kum aan _ taghtughtu inkut _ atugh naqe ni luki _ .
taagken _ atugh lghii nun _ aglagh ukut _ , _ navek _ pi langa _ maligte te unga _ atugh lghii nun _ .
mangteghagh ghrug ghllag _ , _ paagna a _ niighigh luku _ , _ yuug _ qineghte uute luni _ elngaatall _ asitmun _ .
whanga llu _ m ay eq ell eg agh l unga _ qineghte unga _ .
taagken _ qineghte yalghiinga _ yug ghllag u uq _ nategh _ elngaatall _ , _ aq um g av ig g aq _ t aan ang in aq _ aghul av ig g aq lu _ r egh i te f tuq _ .
yug ghllag u uq _ amig mun _ iiwleng _ .
legan _ ategh aqe ut _ alla t _ , _ ila i _ ategh vzigh luteng _ alla t _ mellu tete nghata _ ila i _ ategh aqe ut _ .
taagken _ apeghiigh luteng _ neghe uute ut _ siivanllegh t _ , _ whangkuta _ neghenghite ukut _ tamaani _ temngi _ iglegha ukut _ , _ esghagh yukekagh ut _ es ghagh agh put _ .
Yug llag u f tu uq _ ungazigh _ , _ mangteghagh ghllag _ .
teghigniqe ukut _ k all egh taq l ut aa _ , _ naghaagh lqusiigh aqe luta _ .
mulu ukut _ tespamani _ anguugh ainkut _ nak e meng _ an uq ll igh luni _ .
iwernga _ aghyuqe vig ite ngughk _ , _ teng Ê¼ gh un aq _ elngaatall _ .
taawa _ pegge nanigh lunga _ , _ maligte te lunga _ tukugh mnun _ qavagh yagute unga _ .
tukugh nka _ taakut _ pi niigh pigte ut _ .
quyilleg t _ kaate ut
tawaten _ kiyaghte ma luta _ quyillgaagh ghhagh _ kaa tuq _ , _ taa kun i tuq _ , _ nulighh ghqu te lghiik _ .
akuzi igate ngughk _ whangkutestun _ naqam _ mumegh igh qugh te aqe kangat _ .
ungipamsug nghaani _ taa m _ tukugh mta _ mumigte te aqe ainkut _ .
tea- magh an tuq _ ellnga llu _ , _ liite ghraag unga _ akuzillegh aneng _ nag ate m _ .
ila i _ neqamike anka _ paninang _ , _ ila i _ p uy g aan ka _ quyillgaagh t _ akuzillegh it _ .
taana _ atuute llgagh u uq _ , _ atugh yaghtugh uq _ aghnegh m _ ilangani _ nani _ .
nagaqugh unga _ , _ aghulaqe naqe negh meggni nguq _ quyillgaagh t _ mangteghagh nun _ qikmightuumagh meng _ takuughagh aqe ut _ .
tungsigh niigh llegh it _ tawatete na ait _ .
tukugh ma _ w aa ken ghi s at gu _ , _ aghulaqe naqe yayek _ nengiighhagh k _ taake uk _ , _ qaghluughisaghtugh agka _ .
qiteve aqe lghii _ , _ tusaqe igate kegka _ .
taakut _ qaghlu t _ akuqagh luki _ , _ kenigh nghaki _ taakut _ qaghlu yaghqagh t _ taku luki _ qaghlu aqe anka _ .
taana _ naqam _ enraq _ melqupag _ sa u a _ qaghlu sqe a _ , _ kenigh aa _ , _ tawaten _ pi unga _ , _ â _ K ul u f ten _ . _ â _ taawa _ K ul u f t en et _ entaqun _ melqupag u ut _ ellngit ni _ .
