nuna an _ N ek eg negh a
taawa _ sivuqagh tun _ ayuqe uq _ naayvagh _ .
sivuqagh _ esghagh aqe kesi a _ , _ tawatete u aghte uq _ ungazigh m _ n ek eg negh a _ sivuqagh tun _ .
naayvagh kun _ taakwagun _ aghulaqe uq _ .
tawaten _ sivuqagh tun _ tapghagh lgu uq _ .
naayghagh i _ pag ar ug llak _ .
sivuqagh meng _ aliite aqe lghiit _ mamleg siigh t _ naayghagh t _ ak iv an tut _ .
tungeqligh a _ taana _ ungazigh m _ uughqa nun _ tume u uq _ , _ ategh a _ ukigyaghagh u uq _ .
I g aghv ig an Ê¼ nguq _ taw an sagh tuq _ ukigyaghagh mi _ .
nuugte ma kangat _ k i nguv aq un _ pi yalghiikut _ mangteghagh m _ qu ng ang anun _ .
taagken _ pi laatagh ainkut _ aygugh meng _ , _ aanyaghagh u uq _ p am ar ug ll aa k _ , _ ungazigh meng _ taagken _ sungaghyaagte lutek _ ayuqe uk _ naayghagh k _ .
maaken _ naayghagh neng _ paagken _ esghagh lghii ni _ naayghagh t _ aghq el eng es tagh aat _ , _ tawatete ut _ aghqestaaghhagh u ut _ aygugh mun _ .
taana _ ungazigh m _ aygugh ghhagh ani _ qiighqagh ghllag _ iwhani u uq _ nunangighagh u uq _ .
A l p agh llag u f tugh ngu uq _ nuna igh aq _ , _ ne m _ qula akun _ alpa _ igleghte ghllag _ , _ qawaagniigh igate ngugh t _ , _ alpa meng _ negh igate ngugh t _ .
metghagh ghhagh inagh meng _ qawaagniigh llegh ke ut _ .
taakut _ tukugh nka _ angyengestagh squllgagh u ut _ taawa _ petug luni _ nategh kun _ .
qawaagniighusigh ghhagh it llu _ takestaaghhaa ut _ kepe luteng _ ayuqe ut _ .
upugha negh ghllag u ut _ ungazighmii t _ tamaani _ pilleg mni _ sivuligh mi _ .
T aan ang u uq _ sivuligh _ whaa _ pangeghte yuwhaagh llegh ka _ salin _ laluramke nge i tete luku _ .
uglagh u pigte uq _ ungazigh _ , _ entaqun _ m a tu m llu _ sivuqagh m llu _ qerngughte te yagh ghngaaghmi _ paninang _ uglagh uq _ .
U p ugh an egh ll aa k _ , _ aag negh mta _ taakut _ pi inkut _ , _ â _ qayugh yagh a _ . _ â _ ighsa negh mta _ pi aqe ainkut _ , _ â _ P el u us ang iigh h aagh ng aan _ . _ â _ taawa _ aane yug nanigh ukut _ u p ugh agh llag em _ , _ kepe yu m _ .
manguna _ whangkutestun _ negh kangat _ quyngigh _ .
quyngigh t _ awatkaghtagh t _ aqii nghhagh t _ , _ awatangani _ aqii luteng _ tagi tke ait _ .
T uk r u ug ll uteng _ neq n it _ elngaatall _ awatkaghtagh t _ .
aqii ma aqe lghiit _ u pen gh ay agh aa luku _ taagavek _ aki anun _ angyagh kun _ .
naken _ tasigh meng _ , _ avate meng _ yug nge aqe luteng _ taagavek _ angu aghtekaghqagh meng _ .
aate yameng _ , _ aki anun _ taagavek _ n aan t at _ imani _ quyilleg t _ ak iv an sim aat _ .
quyngighqwaagh t _ Kiyagh taa llgh at
Q u un pe nguq _ quyngigh eng _ aflenga kaqe kangat _ uksulqusigh igh ghllag _ .
uksugh mi _ tunuvagh aqe luteng _ pagavek _ mugu aqe luteng _ , _ quyngigh eng _ negh manginigh sqellug qu _ pinigh lghii meng _ .
atigh llegh i _ tawatete ut _ nuugte naqe negh meggni _ mugu ma aqe lghiit _ .
enkaam _ qam iy egh naa qu ng it _ tamaakut _ tan Ê¼ ngu u r ng e ngu f tut _ .
iwerngaqun _ usi igh ghllag luki _ mugu ma aqe lghiit _ .
nunivag m _ qukaa nun _ pamavek _ uksugh mi _ um eg n ep ag i llgh anun _ entaqun _ negh vig kegtagh mun _ quyngigh eng _ aghulaqe te aqe luku _ , _ tun u v agh llag l ut aan g _ ungazigh meng _ .
paamna _ ungazigh _ aange pigte lghii _ nuna _ .
tespagani _ uksughte luteng _ u pen gh aq es tan gh ani _ esne mun _ aligate ma aqe lghiit _ kiiw t _ pinagh lleghqagh i _ siv ut gh ull uki _ .
quyngigh meng _ qikmigh ke luteng _ .
taawa _ mugu nqigte ma aqe lghiit _ esne anun _ u pen gh aq es tan gh ani _ .
taawa _ tamaaken _ neqenge ma aqe lghiit _ tukfigh i luteng _ , _ tuugte aq _ , _ manguna _ .
manguna t _ tuugtagh u lghiit _ whang kun ni _ , _ akike luki _ tanpegh _ , _ uyiigh _ , _ t ap ghagh p ak _ .
quyilleg nun _ akike ma aqe kangat _ quynginge natke ma aqe kangat _ .
quyilleg t _ tamaakut _ tukfighagh eng _ tapghagh _ quyngigh meggnun _ s aag te kum aan _ .
sanqute ke aqe kangat _ , _ nateghqagh _ kameg meggnun _ .
ungazighmii t _ Kiyagh taa llgh at
esghagh yagh kufsiki _ ungazighmii t _ aatkagh it _ n u qu tu p aagh r ug ll aag u ut _ , _ nasagh ite ngugh t _ nasaperagh meng _ nasagh ke lghiit _ .
taawanginaq _ at ku g w it _ ukut _ collar-ngi _ maaten _ , _ qikmiiraagh t _ entaqun _ iingunagh ita _ c o ll ar - k aq iit _ .
uksugh mi _ taakwavek _ qule mun _ iwhani luki _ nasaperagh meggneng _ taagken _ sigutngiitagh leg meng _ qepe nghmegteki _ legan _ puvite leg t _ , _ lliigh aqe ut _ naagu _ s u p ug g aq _ .
kameg it _ n u qu tu p aagh r ug et _ , _ ila i _ esghaghkagh nka _ q all uk agh meng _ temkag lgu aqe ut _ , _ pinigh t _ maqagh t _ atugh it _ .
sa u aat _ maqagh u na iqe ait _ aatkagh t _ ama _ , _ wallu _ atkug ghllag t _ tamaakut _ .
liite qugh yagh unga _ , _ ungazighmii t _ akuzillegh it _ whang kun neng _ ila i _ s an iv aq aan taq ut _ , _ nag negh agh qu nguut _ .
avate meng _ kenle ke luni _ whangkutestun _ akuzi kayug _ ila a _ tawaten _ qiteve ma _ .
qiteve a _ nagate aqe a _ tespamani _ , _ aleghquute aqe ut _ katam _ whangkuta _ whaten _ aleghquute negh mta _ .
ungazigh _ taana _ ikevaghllug mun _ ukavek _ tekeghagh igh luni _ ayuqe uq _ , _ sivuqagh tun _ tawaten _ taakwagun _ .
Agh q es taa y u wh aag uq _ , _ tawaten _ atigh llegh a _ sivuqagh m _ at ill qu m si llgh a tun _ ayuqe uq _ .
aatnegh leg _ , _ uughqa _ , _ i mun _ , _ si q lu w agh y aag et _ , _ tawaten _ sivuqagh m _ atightullegh atun _ .
taawanginaq _ naayghagh ite uq _ ungazigh _ tu ung v ani _ , _ ukigyaghagh ghhagh inagh _ k i w ar ug llak _ talwa _ entaqun _ kukuleg meng _ uyatu uq _ naayghagh m _ kenle a _ uughqa neng _ ukigyaghagh u ni kangat _ .
tamaani _ esghagh lleg mni _ qimugsigh u uq _ .
ugriilegh mun _ qimugsigh meng _ akilpegagh yagh te aqe ut _ , _ es tu w al gu f tuq _ U g r ii ll ghii n aq _ taana _ , _ ungazigh _ es tu w ii sagh pe tuq _ tamaani _ .
sivuligh mi _ pangeghte aqngama _ .
elngaatall _ iqa _ piniqe aat _ seghleqe igate aat _ tamaani _ .
pelungighsagh yug pagigate yaghpete ut _ tamaani _ .
tawani _ esghapag aqe yamki _ angyagh t _ tam lagh qu ll ghiit _ neqe meggneng _ angaghqugh yalghiimeng _ angyagh meng _ whaken _ , _ yug it _ mat-aghaghte luteng _ kemeg raaghinagh ughte luteng _ temkagh ke i i nagh luteng _ .
manguna t _ ugkellikagh t _ putu itgun _ tugu luki _ g g aat meg g nun _ miluute luki _ taagken _ ke t ar w at aq iit _ angyagh meng _ qute mun _ .
tawaten _ angaghqugh aqe ut _ .
apeghiigh luteng _ tamaakut _ k an u ug tegh ll ak at _ esnagh mi _ tawani _ aniguvzeghagh ghhagh kun _ qikmigh stun _ tawaten _ ighwaaghtuute aqe ut _ aq s ag et eng _ aaw igh aqe ait _ ila meggnun _ sangighqugh ste aqe ait _ .
taakwagun _ maaqe aqe ut _ pamyughagh itgun _ il ep gh aa ghi t nun _ qamavek _ .
T aan ang u uq _ ungazighte llegh ka _ sivuligh _ .
teghigniqe kau unga _ nuna _ alla _ esghagh kegka _ .
elngaatall _ A m er i c a- m _ tawaqa a _ piyuke aat _ , _ kuynge a _ .
ellngit a _ tawaqa it _ alqegkagh stun _ tawaten _ ayuqe ut _ tawaqapig it _ .
M al gh ugh qell uteng _ ayuqe ut _ .
pinigh llegh i llu _ , _ sungaghyug kegtagh u ut _ kayaate llegh i _ .
iknaqe llegh i _ tamaakut _ kiiwhtagh stun _ tawaten _ iqeghtagh atun _ ayuqe ut _ s eq em eng el tagh agh luteng _ llangaqa _ isaah- iqe aghtagh lghii stun _ .
pinigh llegh i _ tawaqa m _ .
melugyaghqagh it _ tamaakut _ qellistekagh ghhagh u ut _ .

kagime yug ma t _ elngaatall _ .

tamaani _ pingwaagh ghhagh inagh t _ aklungi igh llegh i _ I v aq aan kut _ tamaakut _ A m er i c a- m _ angyaghpag aneng _ tukfigh i kayug t _ , _ suqagh meng _ , _ tugute meng _ kaate nghata _ tespamavek _ .

ighnegh i _ q af si n Ê¼ gu ut _ .

nukalpigaghlluggagh u uq _ elngaatall _ .

aghnegh m _ ilangani _ atugh aqe ut _ , _ sa u a _ naghaagh llegh ke sigh _ aviite kau uq _ , _ t aan ang u uq _ upugha te i sagh it _ a tuun kuk _ igatagh gpenaamta _ kiyagh tes qell uta _ .

sivuligh _ puygu kanigh aqa _ ungazighte llegh ma _ ila a _ .

sa u uq _ four _ h o u r s - k agh tagh put _ .
ivenruute t _ kay aal nguut _ angyaghwaagh kun _ tawani _ sivuligh mi _ .
kinguligh mi _ sukate kau ukut _ .

wallu _ enmis _ n uugh sim as teg gu _ t h r e e _ hours _ .

siku _ aghviqagh mun _ lliigh magh an _ .

taakut _ teng tek at _ taglaate naqe aput _ .
taakut _ qiwaaghmii t _ t aag eg kut _ ellngit a _ pi ita _ nekreg te nkut _ taglaate kaqe ait _ .
taakut _ ungazighmii t _ A taa yagh h aam _ ilakwaagh ke ai _ p am an ll iiq ef t ii _ taglaate naqe aput _ .

taawa _ P il u w uk lu _ taw an tuq _ , _ taawa _ taglagh ukut _ , _ taglagh ukut _ , _ tawaten _ .
naate yagh aq _ ungazigh mun _ , _ A taa yagh h aam _ liite u aqe anga _ m agh yaghq ugh w aqegk ang in kut _ .
taawanginaq _ tag l amun _ maalghug gneng _ qay ung lagh aq u kut _ .
pi inkut _ U uy gh aam _ , _ â _ kuynge si _ , _ tawaqa si _ iigh tegh nak esi _ . _ â _ I igh tegh iit _ , _ katamqun _ atughqagh ghhagh inagh teng _ s an q utk ell uki _ esteg mig luki _ .
ungazighmii t _ tungsigh ghllaget _ A m er i c a- m _ tawaqa aneng _ , _ melugyaghqagh aneng _ , _ kuynge aneng _ .
tawani _ angyaghugh te llghite ut _ kaate yaghtugh yalghiikut _ esnevagh ghllag laatagh ainkut _ .
kii _ mangteghagh it _ uusqagh i ma lghiit _ qavngaq _ pi yuwhaagh lleg mneng _ , _ pangeghte yuwhaagh lleg mneng _ .
whaa _ angyagh _ malleg uq _ , _ atkug yu aghte te luteng _ lliigh uute ma lghiit _ , _ angyagh _ s ay u w aat _ .
S iv uq aghh m iit _ angyaghwaagh teng _ safkaagh kayugu kangit _ .
safkaagh naqe yagh ait _ , _ ruuseghmii k _ maalghug _ whaa _ s u f lu w al igh lu tek _ esnevagh aghte uk _ .
kalngagagh _ tamaghhagh an _ y u v ghii gh yaq meg n eg u _ nusug ragh aqe luku _ .
angyagh m _ ilu a _ , _ yuvghiigh aat _ ruuseghmii k _ maalghug _ .
seghleghhalek _ , _ sa naqe lleqe inkut _ sumeghtaghagh unga _ .
taawa _ atghagh naqe nghite ukut _ sivuqagh mun _ .

taana _ taawa _ tu ku q aq egh k egk a _ , _ taana _ may- nga _ .
maaten _ tawani _ ungazigh mi _ sivuligh mi _ igaghte u nghite yaghpete uq _ .

ruuseghmii t llu _ taw an te f tut _ .
ruuseghmii ghllag ughte ma lghii _ .
maalghug _ elngaatall _ s u f lu w al g ek _ , _ anagutagh leg k _ igleghte ghllagek _ quunpeng _ , _ ev er y _ day _ igleghte ghllagek _ .
entaqun _ p o l i c e- nguut _ maaten _ .
taagken _ apeghiigh luta _ igaghvig mun _ atghii sqe ainkut _ .
atghagh uute ukut _ .
arekull _ neghe ste naqe ainkut _ , _ igamsiqa yug luteng _ yug t _ ungazighmii t _ taakut _ angyagh t _ taglaate llegh itneng _ , _ taagken _ .
taagken _ taake uk _ p o l i c e- ek _ maalghug _ igleghte aqe lghiik _ .
ungipaate ainkut _ ungazighmii t _ .
whaten _ pi manginigh sqellug kek _ quunpeng _ .
T h r as tu w i _ uy av aq aan sagh ng aag ken ka _ .
Yug en Ê¼ nguq _ ataasigh t _ liigike gkumegteki _ taa ku s t aghh iin aat _ yug t _ nallaqagh teng _ tuqute yaghqaqe ait _ tallimat ii ta ani _ t h r as tu w iin ghi l nguut _ .
taawa _ whangkutung _ tiiwri llu _ uy av aq aan sagh ngaat a _ t h r as tu w iigh agh taq eg ke p un g _ unguva na lutung _ iglegh tegh l ag ul ghii kun g _ .
taagken _ pi unga _ , _ tiiwri llu _ q iigh h us k ang in kun g _ agha niigh yagh na lutung _ h o s pi tal - mun _ .
H o s pi tal - el gu f tuq _ , _ atghagh ukung _ .
tenglugtugh lutung _ whaa _ taa m _ iye ite ngugh u uq _ ayvegh ghhagh _ .
iye k _ pamavek _ esghagh yaghqaa nghite ngughk _ .
pi inkung _ , _ â _ sivuqagh mii u stek _ ? _ â _ A ang Ê¼ ghagh p un g _ .
pi laatagh ainkung _ , _ â _ sa meng _ pi stek _ ? _ â _ Q iigh mun _ agha niigh yagh u ukung _ .
â _ aa _ , _ itegh tek _ . _ â
akuzipig kayugu uq _ .
â _ utaqa itek _ tawani _ S ap as l y _ aqfa naqe aqa _ . _ â _ naagu _ S ap as l y _ mulu uq _ .
ivgagh luni _ pi inkung _ , _ â _ T ag ill eq ugh nguq _ . _ â _ muluugh uq _ tawani _ .
pi aqe ainkung _ , _ â _ S ap as l y _ nalleghiite a _ . _ â
H ii k _ , _ ivgagh qagh uq _ tea- aghte a _ taana _ .
imani _ iqlighmete uq _ .
aapte ainkung _ .
entaqun _ taa m _ ayvegh ghhagh m _ pi a _ agha niigh yagh u ni lutung _ qiighw mun _ .
taawa _ tunqugh ainkung _ aq im legh u ut aghh aghq un _ imiite lutung _ .
igamsiqa yug vike luku _ aane ukung _ .
amigh k _ um eg naq ng waagh luku _ alla _ ig am si qay ug v ik l aat agh agh p un g _ , _ alla _ tagi sqe ainkung _ .
A ang Ê¼ ghagh p un g _ .
imani _ agha it _ iknaqe ut _ .
taawa _ atuqe apung _ .
M o v i e- it _ igaghvig mi
taagken _ igaghvig mun _ aglagh lutung _ m o v i e- naq n iit _ .
â _ K in u _ , _ k in un aq un Ê¼ nguq _ . _ â _ S iv uq aghh m ii ng in aan Ê¼ nguq _ k in un naq iit _ .
sivuke luta _ neghe ste laatagh ainkut _ .
taawa _ coffee-ngit _ whaten _ c o f f e e- m tes tun _ ayuqe lghiit _ , _ taawanginaq _ g r in d - em ang il nguut _ .
G r in d - el uki _ qayugh liite ait _ .
kagimkagh it _ ig uq r ag llag u ut _ kaa g tugh luki _ , _ k ag im ll uki _ akume kaqe ait _ .
tawaten _ whangkutestun _ neqekrag it _ , _ taawanginaq _ y e as t- am n neng _ whangkuta _ gh h uugh negh t aagh a tut _ .
ategh ai _ egh ll ip a _ .
tamaakut _ para ligh luteng _ neq n igh ll aw aagh u ut _ .
ayghigh te yagh ke put _ , _ para kun _ j am - e igh luki _ neghe uute ukut _ , _ qayugh te ukut _ .
ruuseghmii neng _ tukfigh aqe ait _ .
U t ataa w e te m _ tawani _ ungipamsug te ainkut _ m o v i e- m _ sivungagh ni _ .
nani _ ugriilegh mi _ igaghyagh luteng _ , _ igagh te luteng _ aanleghaate luteng _ , _ kiiw u uk nguq _ , _ aga _ mangteghagh t _ ing l ung an il nguut _ nayigh at _ .
ruuseghmii t _ taa w k eg kut _ apeghtughiste t _ inglu ani _ .
aghvigh uute ma lghiit _ piyug meng _ .
I i w en Ê¼ nguq _ kiiw gnun _ qukaghite naqe aqe ut _ , _ uka nguq _ qikmigh igh ghllag _ .
piyaqmegteggu _ aange ghllag _ u w igh sagh s ug n igh llak _ .
uteghmun _ igaghvig mun _ , _ qiighnite aqe luteng _ si k waagh agh mi _ tamaani _ , _ ila teng _ ngiigte aqe luki _ alingruugh te m _ qimagugh te ma lghiit _ , _ aagh waagh aq luteng _ .
uugte qaghte luteng _ apeghtughiste mun _ tawavek _ , _ apeghtughiste mun _ itegh luteng _ tenglugtugh luku _ pi ma kangat _ kay us ii s qell uteng _ .
pi ma kangat _ , _ â _ qikmigh igh ghllag _ inga _ u w igh sagh s ug n igh ll aw aagh u uq _ . _ â
ruuseghmii m _ taa m _ qineghte luni _ pi ma kangi _ , _ â _ qikmigh u nghite uq _ kuuni u uq _ ugighhe yiite uq _ . _ â
El ngaat all nguq _ neng l aq saq min ik i _ , _ neng l aa tun Ê¼ nguq _ .
N ut aan Ê¼ nguq _ ellngit _ esghaate lghiit _ , _ ellngit _ ungazighmii t _ tamaaken _ kuuni meng _ .
taagken _ qikmighagh ghhagh _ .
A n Ê¼ g ii sim al uki _ igaghvig m _ manughagh ani _ , _ m el ug utaq un Ê¼ nguq _ maghhuurka meng _ , _ melug te ma luki nguq _ , _ ug lagh tun Ê¼ nguq _ aqume uute luteng _ ila i _ .
Q ik m igh aghh agh nguq _ melqupagraag ghhagh _ tagi uq _ naken _ tamaaken _ .
ila ni _ pi ma kangi _ U t ataa w e te m _ , _ â _ entaqun _ una _ qikmighagh ghhagh _ ellnga llu _ melug yug uq _ . _ â _ taagken _ kuynge ni _ melug luku _ ag ep s ugh t aagh q egh llag luku _ , _ tugu luku _ qikmighagh ghhagh _ , _ qengagh kek _ mellu lukek _ q aan gha _ , _ q aan gh akun _ suupe ma kanga _ qengagh kek _ mellu lukek _ nuqnegh luku _ .
L eg an Ê¼ nguq _ pegte a _ qengagh gmikun _ ag ep s ugh t aagh um agh mi _ melug lghii stun _ .
qikmighagh ghhagh _ tamaani _ iglegh qu r gh alghii _ , _ q en w an Ê¼ nguq _ ullegh aghte uq _ .
nenglagh qu ma kangat _ tuq w aal gh i _ qikmighagh ghhagh _ taana _ .
taawa nguq _ nekeve luni _ aga _ navek _ aghulaqe uq _ , _ piniighte luni _ .
Taa m _ ungipamsug qu a _ U t ataa w e te m _ .
T aan ang in aghh aagh sim alghii _ U t ataa w en _ maaten _ ungazighte lleg mni _ kinguligh mi _ .
tawani _ siivanllegh _ tamaa na _ entaqun _ tuqu laghate te ma ni luku _ .
amen _ qellinegh lgu uq _ , _ elngaatall _ siivanllegh _ tamaa na _ aarragh te ste luku _ .
tanqigh t _ naa ng en gh ata _ siivanllegh ghhagh inagh t _ meghsi aqe ait _ kelengake luki _ tawaten _ gu ar d - te tu f tut _ .
ungazigh _ suulya ghllag ughte ma lghii _ tamaani _ k el eng an aghq w aam akanga _ .
taagken _ m o v i e- ll uta _ , _ nagnegh uq _ may- nga _ apeghtuqagh ni _ esgh ap ag es qell uki _ .
taana _ Q agh l uu y am _ ighnegh ke a _ m agh yaghq ugh tek luku _ elngaatall _ q ii f qagh tam s u waagh us alghii meng _ iigge teng _ pateg te aghte aqe luki _ .
J u i c e- m eng wh a _ tagite ainkut _ tamaaken _ ruuseghmii m _ aghnagh m _ s aam _ , _ meghaatagh meng _ .
upugha ghllaget _ upugha ma ghllag t _ , _ ruuseghmii t _ apeghtughiste t _ .
iyatagh ste gpenaamta _ igagh te nghmeng _ taa q en gh ani _ .

J un e- mi _ paninang _ tawani _ igagh te aqe ut _ .
tuqlughaasigh _ kavite ngughk _ s ay u w aq aat _ , _ lengaaghuute aqe a _ .
igaghyagh _ ug l aa pig te f tu uq _ .
igaghvig at _ aange ghllag uq _ .
Q af si n Ê¼ g un ii kaa t _ si x te en - ngun iiq aat _ apeghtughiste at _ .
Kiyagh taa llgh em _ A ll ang ugh negh a
L igh t h o us e- el gu f tut _ .
L igh t h o us e- a _ aliite aqe lghii _ sivuqagh meng llu _ entaqun _ .
maaken llu _ akisqaghte te aqe uq _ , _ uusqagh pigte uq _ .
qateghrakegtagh meng _ piineqe luni _ pik an te f tuq _ u z iv e ke t aagh et _ .
E s tam ag y ag u f tut _ akisqaghte ta i _ .
yupig meng _ k el eng ak is te l gu f tut _ f am il y - t _ .
atghagh yaghqaa nghite ngugh u kut _ t aan Ê¼ g avek _ S iv uq aghh m ii ni _ .
Taa ku ngu f tut _ ang yagh teng it _ e igh t- ngu f tut _ ungazigh m _ taa ku s t aghh iin aat _ aghh ut anga _ tamaghhagh an _ angyagh ut _ pi nga yu neng _ ingluleg _ angyagh _ .
H o u r - a _ kaate negh ghhagh ni _ taa m _ umiileg m _ kingu m _ , _ M ay o r - ng an _ , _ umiileg an _ ungazigh m _ qelegh aqe ai _ h o u r - a _ kaate ni luku _ ang yagh uu tes qell uki _ .
taawa _ anuqataghagh u ghngaan _ angyaghugh te aqe ut _ .
esla _ seghleghu aqe lghii _ uteghnigh aqe ut _ sa ngunateng _ .
I v aq aan ku nun _ tawavek _ , _ ig l i negh a _ es tu waagh sim alghii _ .
aklungi igh llegh ke a _ ungazigh m _ .
aklungi igh lleg liite ma kangi _ taakut _ I v aq aam _ avaquti a _ .
kete te yu ke aq _ taana _ es tu w aa f tuq _ , _ taana _ naligh _ ighnegh a _ angu u uq _ ama _ saste u uq _ .
taana _ P ik es aq _ angyaleg _ kayaalqe i i ma lghii _ upenghagh mi _ ataasigh mi _ o n e _ t h o us an d _ dollars _ ( _ o n e _ t h o us an d _ r u b l e _ ) _ .
angyaghniigh llegh m _ teghig ke sagh _ un ak el gha _ 8 0 _ maklagte yaghqaa yaghpete ut _ , _ 1 0 0 _ ayvegh _ , _ 6 0 _ neghsagh _ .
Taa ku ng in aat _ P ik es aan kut _ tungqaghaghte ma kangat _ unangniigh llegh _ .
taawa _ o n e _ t h o us an d _ r u b l e- meng _ m o ne y - meng _ w in - em ak angat _ .
manughagh at _ qep ghagh tegh llag u f tut _ .
angtughpag ghllag t _ iingunagh ita _ am iiq il agh luki _ uqiigh ma aqe kangit _ .
taghyugh ligh luki _ entaqun _ angyaghpag tgun _ taakmavek _ aghvigh te ma aqe ait _ .
ungazigh _ tawani _ kinguligh mi _ mangunatugh niigh te ma lghii _ .
E s l equ un ku g neng _ , _ ke m ek r ag en ku g neng _ .
tukfigh luku _ lliigh ma kangat _ neq s eng _ , _ ellmeng _ si q lu w aq sagh ng aagh meg teg gu _ .
taawa _ igaghvig m _ k el ut ang ani _ apegh kausigh naagh qu ghllagek _ .
aghnagh t _ si q lu w am eg g nun _ si q lu w agh qu luteng _ , _ sagnegh teng _ imigh luki _ tawavek _ apegh kau sigh gnun _ aglagh luteng _ , _ apegh qagh luki _ taglaate luki _ neqe teng _ , _ es tu w amun _ llivike yaghtugh aqe ait _ neqe t _ taakut _ taglaatekagh teng _ .
E s tu w aan un _ pi unga _ , _ mekestaaghhaa uq _ es tu w agh pig aa _ .
taagken _ tukfigh i luteng _ w ar e _ h o us e- eng anun _ aqfate aqe ut _ , _ w ar e _ h o us e- e nga _ esghagh yaghtigh sqe aat _ , _ w ar e _ h o us e- egh naa qugh ll aa k _ inglu a _ saghya ghllag u uq _ , _ inglu a _ taagna _ nanaagh _ , _ amu a _ , _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh _ megh llegh ke uq _ , _ agaghte uute luni _ ayuqe uq _ .
kaviipig _ , _ silver _ f o x _ , _ sangusiq _ amiiragh _ , _ b e av er - a _ amiiragh _ , _ neghsagh m _ am ii r a _ t aag an tu te f tuq _ aki at _ akikekagh at _ .
taawa _ neq ek r ang l aghv il gu f tut _ .
tanemlleqa _ tawani _ neqekrangllagh vig itnun _ gaagh vig u uq _ .
A an tu ngu f tuq _ yupig _ , _ akuzi kayug _ whangkutestun _ , _ h al f _ b r e e d - a _ ruuseghmiig igh a _ , _ upugha negh ghllag _ ama _ whangkutestun _ akuzi kayug _ .
Agh h ut anga _ tam aagh h an _ neqekrangllagh ghllagu uq _ , _ es tu w agh meg g nun _ , _ egh ll ip ameng _ tamaaken _ .
aghneghmi _ I v aq aan kut _ taakut _ , _ I v aq aam _ panig a _ neqekrangllaghte u uq _ aghneghmi _ .
U n ug mi _ taana _ A an t u _ , _ A an tu ngu f tuq _ yuggagh _ h al f _ breed _ R u us egh mi _ whangkutestun _ akuzi kayug _ .
uugte neghtu yaghpete uq _ mekelghiigh u luni _ A m er i c a- m _ angyaghpag akun _ akmavek _ S e at t l e- mun _ .
taana llu _ P iig l a _ ungipamsug uq _ sivuligh mi _ tawani _ pangeghte lleg mni _ .
S e at t l e- mi _ uksughtekau uq _ ategh a _ P iig l ang u f tuq _ , _ neng l at aal ghii _ yuggagh _ .
ategh _ uglagh u pigte uq _ .
taakut _ tukuqekagh nka _ , _ may- ngam _ ata ke a _ sivuligh mi _ pista u yagh uq _ , _ kinguligh mi _ ruuseghmii t _ pi llgh at _ , _ pista u nanigh ma lghii _ .
ruuseghmii ni _ q il gh aghn aa f tuq _ , _ kay ngu un aa f tuq _ pi sta _ ategh u luni _ , _ ategh a _ simigh ma kangat _ Q er ngugh tek agh meng _ .
qerngughtekau aghte ma lghii _ .
kiiste i vig _ T uk al eg aghv ig mi
D an c e- ev il gu f tuq _ , _ d an c e- ev ig it nun _ pi yalghiinga _ kiiste i vig _ tes qam an ll aat agh pe tuq _ .
nukalpigagh _ taana _ 2 0 _ y e ar s _ igaghyagh luni _ uteghnigh aqe uq _ L en ing r a d - meng _ .
elngaatall _ apeghtugh i aqe uq _ gu it ar - e meng _ , _ v i o l in - e meng _ , _ nengtaatagh meng _ .
elngaatall _ aghnagh aqe te luni _ seghleghllug u ut _ , _ gu it ar em agh meng _ , _ v i o l in - em agh meng _ , _ a c c o r d i an - em agh meng _ .
kiiste i vig _ taana _ taku kestagh aa _ mekelghiigh m _ qam aten _ .
D an c e- es qell uku _ ellnga llu _ , _ ataasigh t _ aatqaghte aqe lghiit _ .
sivungigh luku _ ketngig ni _ itegagh ni _ keveg luki _ ke t ng ig g iin aag ni _ tuute lukek _ p ap er egh t it aa _ .
kiiste i vig _ nekefqaghte uq _ .
kiiste i vig _ tu s iig agh llag ul ghii _ nekefqaghte magh mi _ aga _ nalug qagh te luni _ aragh kau magh mi _ aga _ ellngistun _ iigge ni _ qukagh mikun _ whaten _ inglugtun _ pi wh an iiq luki _ leganqun _ napaqagh _ taana _ uziveaghaghte aqe luku _ sighla ghllag _ .
elngaatall _ aragh aat _ , _ aatqaghte vike aqe aat _ legan _ aghnaghagh t _ , _ mekelghiigh t _ k ip ull g in aa ll uku _ , _ araghqagh ii aagh _ kiiste i vig _ .
A r aghq in aq s ami _ , _ sa u a _ ungazighmii _ mekelghiigh _ taku kestagh aa _ , _ tawaten _ d an c e- em agh mi _ iigge ni _ qukagh mikun _ inglugtun _ nekegte luki _ , _ taawa _ legan _ ellngistun _ ruuseghmii stun _ ketngig ni _ napaghte luku _ aga _ itegagh mineng _ aga _ papasqitagh vike a _ , _ aga _ nekefqaghte sta _ .
nalug kau te aghte magh mi _ elngaatall _ sighla te ut _ .
naange niite anga _ P ang egh llegh m a
taagken _ navek _ pi laatagh ukut _ .
tawaten _ iiwen _ d an c e- ev ig meng _ taglagh aqe ukut _ angyaghyag ni luteng _ , _ pi yalghiikut _ uughqa neng _ angyaghyag aqe ut _ .
upugha te ait _ , _ tawaten _ maakumiu stun _ upleg te ghllag aqe kangit _ quya ke m _ elngaatall _ .
qiteve ma u ut _ , _ akuzipig meng _ aghsaan _ ayuqe ut _ , _ iitek _ akuzi msiigh aqe ut _ .
Taa ku ngu f tut _ teng tek at _ qiwaa neng _ .
avate meng _ pi u ut _ , _ qiwaaghmii t _ taakut _ esghaghkagh nka _ sivuqagh mi _ teng tek at _ .
taana _ N g ep en k aw aa w et ngu f tuq _ ataasigh _ liigike aqa _ sivuqagh mun _ , _ akuzi msiigh qagh yu k _ , _ G ut g ug y i _ .
G ut g ug y in kuk _ , _ G ul g ug y in kuk _ taake uk _ anglegute ke te lghiik _ .
P il u w ug em _ lii simak ng w aa ghii _ taakut _ G ul g ug y in kut _ , _ G ut g ug y in kut _ , _ piinliite nkut _ , _ whanga llu _ esghagh kaqe anka _ taakut _ teng tek at _ .
taana _ akuzipigpag igate ngughk _ N g ep en k aw aa w en _ , _ kiyang _ qiteve ghllagu ut _ .
nagate lghii ni _ q i te v et _ tamaakut _ liite nagh ut _ , _ liigike nagh aqe ut _ .
Taa m _ tukugh ma _ may- ngam _ apeghtugh aqe kanganga _ .
ruuseghmii stun llu _ q i te v m eng llu _ .
Agh h ut anga _ tamaghhagh an _ i ghi v g agh mi _ ungipamsug te aqe aanga _ .
taakut _ A taa yagh h aam _ pillgilliqe tke vzigh ai _ suqagh t _ ugriilegh mun _ akikesaghtugh stekagh i _ , _ m ay o r - ng akun _ , _ umiileg akun _ ungazigh m _ .
tugu vzigh aat _ A taa yagh h aq _ , _ iwernga _ peglleghqute ma kangat _ .
atghagh naqe ghngaamta _ piniighte ghngaan _ wiin _ nuqnegh ainkut _ .
A taa yagh h aq _ apeghiigh na luku _ .
atghagh naqe yamta _ , _ igagh _ , _ tes p am u m _ ungazigh m _ igagh a _ , _ quyngigh m _ amu i _ atghagh te yaghqaa nghite ngughk _ sivuqagh mun _ , _ sa u a llu _ tamaa na _ ila a _ .
atghagh naqe yamta _ , _ sivuke luku _ taana _ wiin _ , _ atg- ghhagh _ pi vagilgan _ , _ taana _ ugriilegh mun _ kingu u uq _ mayor-nga _ ungazigh m _ A taa yagh h aam _ s uq ameng _ akilpegagh yaghkagh _ veghute ait _ suqi a _ pi naqe nghite ait _ .
taagken _ atghagh ukut _ .
E S T A M A A
ayumigh m _ ungipaghagh ta i
S ing aa w e tegh llag em _ Ung ip am s u wa
puughhute m _ apegh llegh a
neghigh luku _ aghnagh ghllag _ taana _ S ing aa w e tegh llag u f tuq _ ategh a _ , _ P il ug ug en kun i te f tuq _ sivungagh mi _ .
taakut _ pilugug m _ avaquti a _ aflengake ghllagu ai _ .
quunpeng _ an Ê¼ g igh aq elghii t _ .
esnagh mun _ tawaten _ alla _ pi yalghiikut _ kana _ tekeghagh ani _ an Ê¼ g igh aq ef tut _ .
tagsigh luta _ aglagh uute yamta _ ungipamsug te ainkut _ .
qenaagh kun _ aqume uute luta _ whangkuta _ nag as aq ef ut _ nunanigh ghllag _ .
pi yalghiimi _ , _ ellng in Ê¼ nguq _ sivuke luteng _ sivungagh mi _ kiyaghte yuwhaagh kau ut _ salin _ taakwna _ paaghqite luku _ .
N egh sagh llag u yagh pe tugh nguq _ qazigyagh meng _ neli yuwhaagh aqngameng _ .
R ep all nguq _ afta vig ngllagh luteng _ pi kau ut _ quug meng _ , _ unaghsigh meng _ .
qayughllak nguq _ unaghsigh ghllag u yaghpete uq _ tamaa na _ .
ellnga nge uq _ taana _ quunpeng _ pi yug g agh meng _ sivugh qaghte aqe lghii _ , _ akmag aatagh luni _ kaate aqe lghii _ .
taakwna nguq _ maaten _ nalugvig ughtekagh _ naayvagh ghrugllag u yagh uq _ kiiw m _ esne aneng _ kenle ke luni _ .
piyug nghmini nguq _ kiiw m _ esne akun _ tagi aqe lghii _ .
tekeghagh a nguq _ taana _ p eng ug r ak eg sagh tuq _ mingle a llu _ ig g ag r uk eg sagh pe tuq _ .
I i wh l ak ayug u yagh tugh nguq _ k an av er ug llak _ repall _ talughte luni _ .
iinghusaleg u uq _ wataghllak _ ii wh l an gh ani _ t aan Ê¼ g avek _ ategh yaqunaki _ pi sqe lleg leg _ , _ uleve qaghtekayugu ni luku _ sukate pigte luni _ .
A y um igh nguq _ taghnughhagh lghute _ tuqu laghate te kau uq _ ii wh l ag mi _ uleve qaghte te luki _ .
ilangani _ tawaten _ ellngit _ neqangisag ma lghiit _ , _ iyataghnagh iqe ma lghiit _ .
talwa nguq _ tawani _ tepagh isag ghllag _ , _ elqwaagh isag ghllag _ .
elngaatall nguq _ quunpeng _ esnighqwagh aqe lghii _ taana _ S ing aa w e tegh llak _ .
sa meng _ naalkute na luni _ elqwaagh ghhagh meng _ .
atgenra _ ava isag ghllag _ .
alla _ unaangu pigte luku _ esnighqwagh luni _ pi yalghiimi nguq _ tekeghagh a _ , _ teskana nguq _ , _ ii wh l ag luni _ un Ê¼ g av er ug llak _ ayuqe uq _ .
U n Ê¼ g all u nguq _ elqwaaghtu uq _ qiliigh nagh _ , _ enraq _ iinghusaleg u lghii _ .
saama llu _ enraq _ ellng in aghh aal ghii _ t aan Ê¼ g avek _ atg- ghhaghte yu ghngaaghmi _ .
aqume luni _ t aan Ê¼ g avek _ ayuqe luni _ esghapag ma lghii _ .
tawaten _ aq um t aagh ng aagh mi _ p aagh q il ngugh mi _ , _ pama _ k el ut ang aneng _ kafsagtagh ma lghii _ .
Q ii v yaq min igu _ taawa _ temngi _ nuna meng _ amigh k _ q el p agh mi _ , _ ava isag lghii _ .
Agh n as qugh h w agh nguq _ aane aqe uq _ q al ip aa k agh lluni _ , _ nuna meng _ gh h atagh ng agh mi _ .
naten _ qaligh ghhagh gni _ kafsagtagh nghminikek nguq _ ellnga nge uq _ legan _ nun ak iigh w agh aq elghii _ , _ sa aqe lghii _ kayaali inagh aqe lghii _ .
elngaatall _ qevuute luni _ ell pe k ng an aq aq elghii _ s an ay uk ang at ni _ .
naqam nguq _ , _ qaligh ghhagh gni _ k af s ag t aghn an in gh egk en i _ ava iitagh ke luni _ .
L eg an Ê¼ nguq _ qaligh ghhagh gni _ kafsagtagh aqe ak _ ellnga _ uniigh naqe aqe lghii _ , _ qevuute pigte luni _ iwernga _ esteqe aqe lghii _ , _ tegh h um an aq aq elghii _ wata _ .
taagken _ aghnalqwaagh ghhagh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ kii _ aghnagh ghllag mi _ whani _ , _ aghtugh amken _ seghlegh ghllag u uten _ elngaatall _ iknaqe uten _ .
whanga _ aane vike amken _ kayusigh nagh u luten _ neqangisag lghiisi _ .
enta _ tawani _ utaq iig i _ un Ê¼ g avek _ saghna yagh te naqe amken _ . _ â
naagu nguq _ legan _ aga _ atghagh uq _ t aan Ê¼ g avek _ talugh qaghte luni _ qalmesagh t _ awata itnun _ .
naqamllu _ mulupag gpenani _ uka nguq _ aliigh uq _ .
kaate yalghiimi nguq _ kenigh ghhagh ni _ imigh ghllag luku _ .
pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ enta _ kenigh ghhagh n _ . _ â _ key- nghmini _ aghn as qugh h w aam _ kenigh anun _ katag ma kangi _ .
E s ghagh yaq min ik i _ , _ elqwaagh _ , _ tepe aq _ , _ uupa _ all aagh iin aq _ .
llaaghanwha nguq _ neghekagh t _ .
siingenllu nguq _ pi llgh ugh ull uki _ neqengekagh t _ .
tawaten _ ungipamsug ma luku _ tagitug ghrug mi _ aglu k _ allgegh uk _ .
pi inkut _ whaa _ , _ â _ esghapag tekek _ aglu k _ ay em n naq ag ka _ . _ â

ayvegh m _ aglu kek _ tamaaken _ tugu lukek _ napaghte ak _ .
taagken _ t a z ing a pi gh q aagh luni _ uyghag meng _ tugu tete luni _ aglu k _ m il ugh yaq min i ke k _ unake lukek _ aglu k _ ayemkaghagh ak _ .
aga llu _ aglu k _ akuuraate lutek _ aglu m _ qukagh kek _ gheve uk _ .
suna _ aragh qrug a _ , _ â _ A ag l uk _ ay em tag k aa _ . _ â

A y um igh nguq _ ellngit _ tawaten _ nagh aa qay u d et _ .
akuuraate lutek nguq _ aglu k _ gheve aqe lghiik _ llaaghan _ .
T aan ang u uq _ taawa _ S ing aa w e tegh llag em _ ungipamsug a _ .
talwa _ salin _ quyngighqwaagh t _ neli llghite luki _ .
ellngit a nguq _ sivu nge aq _ neli yuwhaagh kaqe aat _ .
K u ug Ê¼ gh egk en ka _ M ay uk aan kuk _ , _ A m ag un kuk _ , _ P iin tegh l am _ ighnegh kek _ .
nanevgagh ghhagh m _ G ug ii ng em _ kasivag te llegh a _ nanugh meng
puughhute m _ apegh llegh a
ungipamsug _ ayumigh _ yuggagh _ pugughileghmii _ G ug ii ng en _ , _ nanevgagh ghhagh ughte magh mi _ .
sukate yagh lghii _ , _ iknaqe yagh lghii _ nukalpigagh u luni _ .
nanevgagh luni _ sa nanigh magh mi _ , _ temngi _ esnagh mun _ ukig qagh luni _ siku gnun _ k an av eng iigh h aq _ pi yagh luni _ analghu ghllag t _ awata itni _ nanugh ghllag nkuk _ kasivag tke ak _ .
N an u un Ê¼ nguq _ tamaakut _ kasivag lghii ni _ sughug i kayugu ut _ qimag igate ngugh t _ .
legan _ sughukagh a _ uka _ .
aatak _ mayugh aghtekagh _ analghu nun _ .
sa ite ngughk _ sanqute ite ngughk _ iwerngaqun _ s av ig g ani _ tafsimig ke luku _ .
qaygeghte qaghte luni _ uteghmun _ qiive yalghiimi _ , _ uka _ legan _ nagnegh aqe uq _ nanugh ghllag _ .
aatakqun _ temngi _ s av ig g ani _ amaaghaghte luku _ qule mun _ nengug te luku _ pi ma lghii _ , _ â _ whaken _ pi lleqe amken _ , _ whaken _ pi lleqe amken _ ! _ â
kii _ , _ nanugh ghllag nguq _ tukegh aghte ghllag luni _ leg an Ê¼ nguq _ aga _ siigte ghllag magh mi _ kete mun _ pakegte ma lghii _ .
pelleghmun _ anagniigh utu te ma lghiik _ .
ellnga _ qule mun _ pamavek _ key- llegh kaghte i yaghtugh aghtekagh _ .
pugughilegh _ uusqagh lghii _ p am an l e nguq _ nenge aat _ .
iwernga nguq _ nani _ k an an ing iigh h aq _ tuqu tke aat _ malighqagh luku _ .
qilag m _ taghnughhagh a
M ek en egh si m _ apegh llegh a
tawaten _ pagaliit _ aghnaqe kangat _ , _ pagaliit _ entaqun _ ungipaghagh itneng _ , _ angayuqagh mineng _ ungipagh aq _ entaqun _ liite qugh kaqe kangi _ .
ungipaghagh ni nguq _ imani _ , _ nenge uq _ tamaa na _ tan em l eq a _ umiileg leg _ .
umiileg a _ nuna m _ tam aa tu m _ t all im aneng _ panig leg _ .
U k s aagh un negh is te nguq _ aghnaghagh t _ pagunghagh eng _ pi aqe kangat _ .
elngaatall _ in gh uy iq utaq elghii t _ .
Taw at en Ê¼ nguq _ in gh uy aneng _ kaate nghata _ naa ita _ pikegken _ aakagh itneng _ inghu sightu ait _ n iv ugh tegh aqegk angi _ .
alla _ tawaten _ ayumiqullegh _ pi luni _ , _ pagunghagh _ saghna yaghqaaghte luni _ inghu yagh llegh mi _ tawaten _ inghu ghngaaghmeng _ uy uq l igh pig aam _ nanigh ke aagh _ anglegute mineng _ s an iv aghq aagh luni _ taghnughhagh _ nag aq ugh w aa _ qiya lghii _ .
ighninghhagh _ taghnughhagh _ qiya lghii _ elngaatall _ .
tawaten _ nagate aqe luku _ qiya llegh akun _ taakwavek _ pi luni _ kaa saq min igu _ taghnughhagh _ ighninghhagh _ m ek elghii gh aa f tugh nguq _ .
elngaatall _ an egh r eng it ke m meng _ tugu luku _ n ii v us gh am in un _ kanagh a _ .
K u ug Ê¼ ghi l nguut _ whaa _ sumeghtaghagh yalghiimi _ seghleghhalek _ angayuqagh gkenka _ quyake naqe ak _ ku ug Ê¼ ghi l nguut _ .
taagken _ uteghnigh uute luteng _ tawaten _ emta _ naa ita _ almesigh ghhagh mitun _ aakagh itneng _ whaken _ in gh uk egk iit _ nivugh kangi _ .
U y uq l igh pig aam _ inghu sightu a _ k at ag yaq min igu _ kii _ , _ aga _ sa u a _ ifkagh uq _ .
piyaqminigu _ taghnughhagh _ enraq llu _ mekelghiigh ghhagh u uq _ .
ii _ , _ quyake naqe na iqe a _ aghnaghagh m _ piyaqminigu _ , _ teng v i mun _ , _ kipullegmun _ , _ naa an _ piyaqminigu _ .
â _ kii _ , _ aghnagh aq _ seghleghhalek _ waran _ ata n _ , _ ug w ik a _ nuna m _ m a tu m _ umiileg ke nghite yagh kagu _ .
S aku s iiq naq ll u um af t an _ elngaatall _ .
yug ngunang _ aqsanguma ziin _ qavngaq _ . _ â
aghnaghagh m _ ungipaate ghngaatni _ aygughike a _ , _ yug ngunani _ aqsa nge sta _ legan _ .
U g w in i _ nani _ qaga _ yug ni _ q er ngugh t aagh ull ghiit _ .
itegh yan _ , _ â _ kii _ , _ yug mi _ whani _ , _ panig gpek _ kay ngu sagh aa tes naq l ugh aaten _ s aku s iiq naq l ugh w aaten _ .
waran _ nuna m _ qagugh m _ umiileg ke nghite yagh kangaten _ . _ â

â _ saa _ , _ sangama _ ? _ â
â _ esghaqagh ghhu qun _ taana _ taghnughhagh _ . _ â

yuug _ sumeghtaghagh qagh luni _ , _ â _ naken _ pi a _ ? _ â
â _ entaqun _ esgha _ yug ngunani _ aqsanguma uq _ . _ â
yuug _ iisqiighute luni _ panig ni _ pi a _ , _ â _ Wh aan n aanghi tu ten _ , _ aane ste naqe amken _ , _ qagavek _ lliigh naqe uten _ .
nunalgute mnun _ qagavek _ talwa _ kinku nun _ itegh snaanghite amken _ , _ liilightugh te naqe amken _ , _ tesqagavek _ temngi _ lliigh naqe uten _ . _ â _ taawa _ aan e sim akanga _ .
nunalgute m _ nanglleg yagute ghngaaghmigu _ qayughllak _ pi ligu _ umiileg m _ iinghute kanga _ .
taawa _ tesqagavek _ lliigh uq _ .
uksaaqestagh ma kanga _ , _ kum l al uni _ aqlaghaghte a _ , _ kumlate a _ .
I ghi v g agh mi _ tawaten _ tan q igh ll ug ll aa k _ , _ taghnughhagh a nguq _ qiya ghllag _ .
sa meng _ tesqagani _ azigutagh ngllagh vyiigh luni _ kiyaghte aagh _ .
wata _ aqlaghaghtekanga _ kum l akanga _ .
Taw at en Ê¼ nguq _ uteghpaarkitaagh te aqe a _ .
qenwat _ mengilegyagute luku _ pi aqe a _ , _ â _ taghnughhagh mi _ whani _ nanglleg ke gpenanga _ qiyaaqe ai _ , _ piyaqnagh te _ whanga _ lli aghte lunga _ . _ â
tawaten _ uteghpaarkitaagh kestagh ghngaaghmi _ h ii k _ , _ tanqigh _ mamlegpag u uute uq _ .
tawaten _ uteghpaarkitaagh ghngaaghmi _ me m _ tun ut ang aneng _ , _ â _ kii _ aghnaghagh mi _ wh an ii _ , _ n af ugh nagh qu ten _ ell ngaatall _ , _ aqfa aqe amken _ .
wasaq _ whanga _ angayuqagh gken _ n ang leg y ag ull uk ek _ , _ nanglleg ke lukek _ ava ite ngugh k _ ighnegh ite ngugh k _ , _ elpegun _ tuune kaqsagh agka _ ighneghqagh meng _ .
tea- ai _ maligte nga _ aqfa aqe amken _ . _ â

piyaqminigu _ yuug _ , _ q at egh r ak eg te pig llegh ii meng _ , _ qateghrakegtagh meng _ aatkagh leg _ .
Q im ug s ii f tugh nguq _ , _ qikmigh a _ q at egh r ak eg te p er u waagh et _ qamagte luteng _ .
â _ tea- ai _ itegh i _ taghnughhite gnun _ tawavek _ . _ â
mayugh te a nguq _ , _ mayugh te a _ . _ ( _ uyatu pigte ma a _ pamavek _ qilag mun _ . _ )
tawaten _ tagtalmi _ aghnagh aq _ meqsug uq _ .
salug naqe uq _ m eq s ug em _ ikfiqe sta _ .
yug m _ akuzite aqe yagh kanga _ , _ â _ seghleghhalek _ kaate yaghtugh ukung _ , _ kaate kuvek _ meghe lleqe uten _ . _ â _ seghleghhalek _ sakniqe uq _ salug naqe uq _ .
qenwat _ yug m _ pi a _ , _ â _ aa-a _ , _ tawani _ utaqa i ai _ meghqe te qagh naqe amken _ .
W atagh llag ng aam _ p uugh tes aq un an g _ .
taawa _ p uugh te sim aku v ek _ qayughllak qun _ elpek _ pil q eg ken _ taawa _ ifla lleqe uten _ . _ â _ naagu _ aghulaqe uq _ .
legan _ aghulaqe luni _ m ul ugh pag luni _ me m _ pi a _ , _ â _ aghnagh aq _ uyuq _ ukavek _ qiive aghten _ , _ esghaqagh nga qun _ .
aatkagh pung _ naavghute ltegneki _ . _ â _ ii _ , _ iike na ghhalek _ , _ â _ kii _ , _ aghnagh aq _ una _ qu w ay u w ig at aghh agh meng _ elngaatall _ .
W ar an Ê¼ ng am _ taawa _ qiive aghte ait _ . _ â
qenwat _ aghnagh aq _ nuqete yagh luni _ qiive uq _ .
piyaqminigu _ kaay _ , _ tag neq g al ek _ qallevag kek _ ngevreghagte lutek _ .
â _ aatkagh pung _ naavghute ltegneki _ , _ ukut _ aatkagh nka _ esghaqagh ki qun _ pi nigh ghllag t _ elngaatall _ . _ â

â _ yaghlegillu _ i negh teng ng w aaq aq sagh aa nga _ wataghllak _ kitumun _ p uugh n ay uk ang anga _ . _ â

â _ elngaatall _ puughte aaten _ t aag u m _ yug m _ .
pi naanghite uten _ , _ naten _ pi naanghite uten _ . _ â _ qinu na ghhalek _ .
qenwat _ aghnagh aq _ aaghte ste laatagh uq _ .
legan _ qallevag gni _ mat- aghte lukek _ ellnga n _ qallevag kek _ taake uk _ aate ak _ , _ melngu u luni _ qamiye m _ ingleghagh an _ aku l ang akun _ ifkagh uq _ .
taawa _ aghnagh _ taana _ ellnga _ , _ aatkagh i _ aate luki _ taghnughhite gnun _ itegh uq _ .
M ul ugh pag llag luni _ pama _ yuug _ uteghnigh uq _ .
aapte a _ , _ â _ naagu _ qaame na a _ , _ s al u waagh tu ten _ ? _ â

â _ yaghlegillu _ utaqa i aqe unga _ ! _ â _ aghnagh m _ puughte a _ .
aghnagh aq _ sa luni _ pi li _ sama _ melngu ughte luni _ , _ akuzi na luni _ pi yagh uq _ , _ temngi _ legan _ aneghte ghllag uq _ .
naagu _ aga _ unite luku _ igleghte uq _ .
yug m _ liigike a _ , _ liigike ghngaaghmiki _ igleghte uq _ .
taawa _ s p a c e- mi _ entaqun _ nani _ tespagani _ kiyaghte uq _ taana _ melngu ughte luni _ .
tawaten _ tagtalmi _ tu ng tun Ê¼ nguq _ uka _ tagi aqe ut _ q er ng aghnegh et _ .
amig igh te naqutke aqe yaghtugh ngugh _ , _ aklu i uute naqutke aqe yaghtugh ngugh _ ima nguq _ aga _ alpag aqe ut _ kaate ste gpenateng _ , _ suka ite ngughk _ .
taawa _ tawaten _ kiyaghte uq _ .
tawaten _ alla _ uka _ tagi yata _ , _ uk an te r ug pag llag luki _ ima _ sivu kaghqagh itnun _ amig igh te naqutke uq _ .
sivuligh t _ qenwat _ aga _ , _ qenwat _ naghughte ut _ .
( _ taana _ pegte aghte luku _ tespamavek _ lliigh naqe unga _ . _ )
taghnughhagh _ q iyagh ll aa k _ , _ yug m _ liigike ghngaaghmigu _ .
navek _ pi luni _ kaate nghmini _ pi aqe kanga _ , _ â _ sa aqe ziin mi _ naqam _ aviillegh mni _ ? _ â
â _ S as qell unga _ pi aqe zinga _ kaki aqe lghiinga _ , _ wangi aqe lghiinga _ , _ tekegh ngllagh aqe lghiinga _ . _ â _ taawa _ yug m _ nepiigh te aqe kanga _ .
( _ taagken _ taawa _ tawavek _ uteghte unga _ ) _ .
aghnagh aq _ taana _ tungtu t _ uka _ tagi yata _ , _ siv ut gh ull uki _ elngaatall _ tume kaghqagh itnun _ amig igh te ragkiigh uq _ .
kii _ , _ sivuligh t _ aga _ naghughte uute ut _ .
kingulighpigagh ghhagh m _ nalighnegh akun _ agtugh qagh aa _ legan _ , _ qallevag kek _ qu u p agh saq min i ke k _ , _ aghnagh _ qallevag mineng _ aane yalghiimi _ , _ aghnagh _ legan _ matagh mi _ tawaten _ .
taawa _ tawaten _ kiyaghte uq _ .
tagtalmi _ yug m _ aatkagh meng _ kelqe te luku _ ivagh yaghtugh aa _ .
taawa _ naalke ma kanga _ .
pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ kii _ aghnagh mi _ wh an ii _ taa m eng wh a _ tawaten _ kiyagh t aagh aq u ten _ , _ pineghllug pigu ma ziin _ elngaatall _ .
naagu _ l iiligh tugh waagh yaq em ken _ wataghllak _ puughte ste gpenang _ pi s qell u ten _ . _ â
â _ tea- ai _ maligte nga _ taglaate naqe amken _ .
kaate kuma _ tespamavek _ tu ung lii yug saq un an g _ wataghllak _ pi lghaaten _ . _ â
mayugh te luku _ kaat ute a _ , _ legan _ itegh uq _ kii _ , _ t aghn ugh aan _ quyake magh an _ taku luku _ q et llegh aat agh aa _ .
taagken _ tawaten _ kiyaghte luteng _ , _ qavagh ngllagh aa _ taana _ aghnagh _ .
P uugh t is t en i _ qavagh ngllagh aa _ , _ qavagh ngllagh aa _ .
qavagh ste a _ ken gh ek _ kumaghllug kek _ .
qavagh ngllagh luku _ tagtalmi _ takuyangllagh aqe luku _ , _ aghnagh _ teghtugh nanigh uq _ qavagh uq _ .
taana _ puughte i ste nga _ aghnagh _ .
taagken _ qavagh yan _ , _ keveg luku _ ken gh eg nun _ tazingavek _ aglagh te kestagh aa _ .
K en gh eg nun _ miluute a _ , _ yug m _ taa m _ mayugh te ikagh m _ .
taagken _ aga _ av iil gh w as tun _ ukikagh _ ken gh eg ne kun _ taaggun _ .
taana ta _ ungipagh aq _ taw ate l nguq _ , _ kiyaghnegh nkuk _ S at an -en kuk _ .
taake uk _ esgha _ ungipaghaate k _ .
kiyaghnegh ghllag m _ ighnegh ni _ nuna mun _ whavek _ tuune kaqsagh kanga _ .
nuna m _ yug an _ tugukligh ma ite kanga _ .
Taw ate l nguq _ kiyaghnegh m _ satan _ taana _ asitmun _ egtekaqe kanga _ .
ungipaghagh mta _ title- nga ta _ taana _ .
paninang _ akeqe luku _ kenegh mun _ anusimingllagh yaghqaqe kanga _ .
taana ta _ ungipaghagh an _ yug lgute mnun _ ungip agh aatk es u w aqegk egk a _ .
N agh uy ang ugh tek aq
M ek en egh si m _ apegh llegh a
taane a _ tanemlleqa _ I m ing ate m _ ungipamsug kaqe kanga _ .
( _ aagna _ p an ig g aqa _ whanga _ N agh uy a _ . _ pugughilegh llu _ naghuyagh lgu lghii _ . _ )
naghuyagh m _ taa m _ at iiq el u ug ut anga _ , _ N aa w y ang u yagh tugh nguq _ yug m _ ategh a _ taana _ .
iike te luteng _ entaqun _ pugughileghmii t _ ighnegh ke te lghiit _ .
taawa _ naghuyagh m _ taa m _ , _ kiyagh taa llegh llag em _ entaqun _ kayusillegh _ tuun yaq min igu _ .
entaqun _ naghuyagh mun _ tawaten _ naghuyagh t _ kayute kellug ke i _ qutenge stekagh i _ .
taawanginaq _ l iiligh tugh waagh luki _ pi kaqsagh kangi _ , _ wataghllak _ kelute mun _ qamagte luki _ ingaghte uute luki _ q av aa tes qell uki _ kayagtekaqsagh kangi _ .
taana _ ataasigh _ entaqun _ nukalpigagh _ sa u a _ entaqun _ aygugh itagh ma uq _ , _ pineghllug ma uq _ tawaten _ ungipamsug ughte yaghqaa luni _ .
unaami _ aghte yagh kanga _ taakut _ kelute mun _ ingaghte uute nga lghiit _ , _ qute mete luteng _ elpeg kekagh t _ .
taana _ aviite uq _ .
taawa nguq _ N agh uy ang ugh sim alghii _ .
nani _ pennagh ni _ n aan ll uku _ apegh aqe yagh aa _ I m ing ate m _ u ku nun _ legan _ A g l ugh aan ku nun _ aghqesaghtugh vig at _ .
taana _ N agh uy a _ ellnga n _ talwa _ esghagh kaqe na iqe a _ I m ing ate m _ , _ yugu yagh lghii _ taana _ N agh uy a _ .
taawa nguq _ m el qugh ll u ug tegh llag luni _ lliigh ma lghii _ .
qalghigh llegh a _ iglaglluugte ghllag luni _ .
taagken _ esghagh nanigh aat _ en taq un Ê¼ nguq _ aviighute ma uq _ .
taana ta nguq _ esgha _ siv un gh at _ taakut _ A g aan kut _ .
ungipagh aq _ aling tagh u i i i i itu nga
qagugh mii m _ apegh llegh a
ungipaghagh ni nguq _ imanagh i _ aling tagh u i i i i itu nga _ taana _ .
aling tagh u i i i i itu nga _ qerngughte i uq _ elngaatall _ .
kii _ , _ aling tagh u i i i i itu yameng _ al ing ig a tu t ang aneng _ atigh ma ut _ entaqun _ .
ima _ t a z im ke r ug ll aa k _ ungipagh aq _ taana _ aling tagh u i i i i itu nga _ .
U pen gh an gh an i nguq _ pungughmii t _ sikungigh te nghaani _ taa k w n aa _ , _ enlegmete te _ pagavek _ aghviqagh igh aqe lghiit _ .
upenghagh ii yaghtugh aqe ut _ m a in l an d - mun _ tespagavek _ .
upenghagh ii aqe ut _ tespagani _ ne eng _ punguug _ unite lukek _ .
A l ing t ii tu ng ang in aghh aq _ tam aan taq elghii _ ne mi _ tamaani _ .
sumeghtaghagh ma lghii _ , _ â _ qayngun _ whaa _ sa u a _ q in uy u waagh llak _ pi lleqe uq _ tughneghagh igh naqe yagh kumkek _ punguug _ , _ entaqun _ . _ â
esgha _ ay um i r ug llag ugh ng aagh mi _ nenglullug lgu ma uq _ alla _ , _ sivu liigh ait _ aag ku r ug llag et _ entaqun _ .
alingtagh u itu ngam _ taa m _ siv ul iigh ani _ naa f q en naq ii _ .
elngaatall _ tughneghagh igh naqe ma kek _ punguug _ .
kelgugh ma lghii _ , _ kelgugh ma kanga _ P u ngu u m _ yug a _ neghyu i sqellug qu _ ellmeggnun _ .
nenglullug nun _ kaate luni _ nenglullug t _ qineghte luki _ ategh it _ tuqlughragh luki _ nag as ii s qell uki _ P u v all an aq n il uni _ .
Taa ku nun _ aglagh luni _ taakwna _ atigh luku _ p u v all an aq n il uni _ nag as ii s qell uki _ .
elngaatall _ neqenge naqe lghii _ aling tagh u i i i i itu nga _ .
apeghiigh yami _ ken Ê¼ gh h w ak _ kumaghllug kek _ , _ sasiqumtaagh at _ ayumigh _ ken Ê¼ gh h w igh luteng _ neqe _ ken Ê¼ gh h w am _ u v it ang anun _ llilaghtu ghllag aqe luku _ .
W uu tu t k aghq ani _ tiguynge _ sa u a _ , _ tiguynge t _ tamaakut _ aksigutagh u aqe ut _ , _ ayumigh m _ tiguynge i _ .
anighqute ni _ , _ tamaakut _ tiguynge t llu _ iigh luki _ navek _ tug waagh es nagh yaghq aal uki _ .
kelgugh qu a _ elngaatall _ punguug _ .
I ii _ , _ wh an i ku k es t aq _ maligte luku _ tugh negh al u wh aqaa _ qerngughte yalghiimi _ elngaatall _ .
ila i nguq _ mingle meng _ tamaaken _ itegh aqe lghiit _ , _ ila i _ qule aneng _ paagken _ ukig aqe lghiit _ .
ila i _ mingle meng _ naken _ taagken _ , _ ila i _ samaken _ nuna m _ asi aneng _ mayugh aqe lghiit _ .
elngaatall _ tughneghagh _ qerngughte a _ .
â _ taawa _ apeghiigh unga _ . _ â _ iwerngaqun _ tugh negh al u wh aq _ neqe mun _ whavek _ sekete uute lghii _ .
taakut _ w uu tu t k aghq ani _ anighqute t _ tugu luki _ aliigh aghte te kete luki _ qete te a _ tuqu qu ghllag aa _ .
ila a nguq _ al ig n a pig llegh ii _ aga _ nuna m _ asi anun _ itegh aqe uq _ , _ pagavek _ qilaga nun _ , _ mingle mun _ .
ila a nguq _ aamta _ n ate l nguut _ , _ temngi _ t en p ut agh aaq elghii n Ê¼ nguq _ tamaani _ tughneghaan- ghngaaghmeng _ elngaatall _ , _ taawa _ al ing r uugh em _ ang tal ang aneng _ .
tawaten _ kelengaruugh uq _ aling tagh u i i i i itu nga _ .
qavagh nanigh uq _ sa uq _ kelenga uq _ , _ ak in ay uk ang at ni _ .
elngaatall _ qavagh m _ s ak n iq es at n ii _ ( _ ii _ , _ aghnegh m _ ilangani _ qalmesagh ghllag _ ii negh min ii _ qute mun _ lliigh qagh yu k _ ) _ qalmesagh ghllag mun _ teskanavek _ atghagh luni _ qavangsi ma lghii _ , _ iye gni _ s uq w aghh agh meng _ ayagsightugh lukek _ inglugtun _ , _ esghapag pigte lghii stun _ legan _ qavagh _ .
I y e g _ naqam _ tagh p agh r ak eg llag ek _ , _ taawa _ qavagh uq _ .
ii _ , _ m eng egh ag llag em _ teghtugh a _ elngaatall _ .
ii _ ii _ , _ paga nguq _ esnagh mi _ tughneghagh _ qerngughte ghllag luni _ .
guutute kaghagh ni _ taakut _ k el qell uki _ tawani _ .
K ay ag tagh waagh utaq ef taa t _ tughneghaan- lgute meggnun _ tamaavek _ .
â _ I m an tagh aa y _ aa _ uygu te gu _ , _ uygu te gu _ . _ â _ uygute na luku nguq _ aling tagh u i i i i itu nga _ .
â _ nakaan _ , _ nakaan _ , _ nakaan _ , _ aa _ K an an tagh aam _ pi naagh aa _ . _ â _ K an an l e ngu u m _ tughneghagh m nguq _ mingle anun _ kayagte te a _ .
â _ nakaan _ , _ nakaan _ aa _ P ik an tagh aam _ pi naagh aa _ . _ â _ P i ku m _ qu ul v an l e ngu u m _ tughneghaan _ .
K an an tagh agh mun _ pi sqe aqe luku _ elngaatall _ , _ kay ag tagh waagh utaq ef taa t _ .
ii _ , _ sumeghtaghagh uq _ aa _ taawa llu _ whanga _ .
makete qaghte te kete luku _ guute laatagh ma kangi _ .
aniighwte aghte qugh a _ elngaatall _ tuqu qu ghllag luku _ .
taawa nguq _ tughneghagh igh te a _ .
naten _ kiik _ lliigh nghaani _ atghagh uute kayug t _ enleg meng _ tes pag ken _ .
atghagh uute luteng _ elngaatall _ uksaaqestagh aa _ punguug ni _ tawani _ .
aqlaghaghte nghaani qun _ mangteghagh t _ sa aqe lghiit _ miigtagh aqe lghiit _ w et ng aaq w aaq elghii t _ aqlagha mi _ .
T ak ev uq _ igleghte ma lghii _ , _ alingtagh u itu ngam _ kelengake ma kanga _ , _ s aa v g um iigh waagh luni _ ii _ , _ uyiigh _ , _ kangigh a _ iiyagh kun _ kanaghte luku _ , _ taagken _ n uq negh tegh yaghq aa _ .
wetku _ kaate kan _ naghulleg yaghqagh a _ .
mangteghagh nun _ k aan negh min ii _ qagugh mig te ghllag aqe luni _ siklaate luni _ .
qama _ akite aqe kangat _ tenglugtugh aqe kangat _ , _ kii _ iq l in q eg sagh mi _ payugte kestagh aqe lghii _ siklaate luni _ .
iinghute ma ka nge a _ ellmeggnun _ kaate kan _ akite fqaan _ tenglugtugh fqaan _ pi s qell uki _ .
taawa _ ellngit nun _ pi luni _ , _ akite nghite nghatni nguq _ , _ kii _ ii _ , _ q en Ê¼ ngu ll iq egh llag luni _ payugte kestagh aqe lghii _ .
tawaten _ siklaate ghllag aqe lghii _ , _ qagugh mig te aqe lghii _ mangteghagh kun _ .
taagken _ kete mun _ taakwavek _ , _ siklaate luni _ akite nghite yatni _ , _ ii _ q en Ê¼ ngu ll iq egh llag luni _ sivugte kestagh yan _ naghulleg aa _ .
ii _ ii _ , _ neng s alghii mi _ elngaatall _ T ak ev uq _ anagniigh yalghiimi _ .
uyiigh _ qamaken _ nuqnegh kanga _ elngaatall _ .
nenglu _ pikegken _ segge ma kanga _ segge ma kanga _ , _ naange naqe yan _ uyiigh m _ kangigh a _ kaate yan _ peghhe qagh ma kanga _ .
S aap g ut aa _ , _ T ak ev uq _ sa u a _ taana _ .
uksaagh mi _ taakwani _ uksugh luni _ , _ aling tagh u i i i i itu nga _ pi y aat aagh luni _ navek _ t aan Ê¼ g avek _ , _ mangteghagh _ suna _ taana _ .
megh mete ma uq _ entaqun _ .
taawa nguq _ nanevgagh ghllag _ quulqite gni _ aqume luni _ ii _ .
tamaa _ yugtuqagh _ aghnaghtu uq _ .
upugha te aat _ elngaatall _ .
gaagh te naqe aat _ .
nanevgagh ghllag m _ aa _ siv ug ll un ing ugh aa _ , _ â _ aqelqagh ka _ aa _ aling tagh u i i i i itu nga _ g aagh u teg gu u _ .
gaagh te ggu _ negh es teg gu u _ tuugkagh rraag meng _ , _ giimagh rraag meng _ , _ i qu uy ar r ag meng _ . _ â _ ahaa _ , _ gaagh te sqe ma kanga _ .
atightugh luki _ imanagh t _ sa u aat _ giimagh rraag t _ , _ i qu uy ar r aag et _ , _ tuugkagh rraag t _ , _ tapghaaghagh at _ .
gaagh te aat _ elngaatall _ .
ugute luteng _ negh ma lghiit _ .
neqnigh ghhalek _ imanagh _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh _ neghe a _ .
iwerngaqun _ ke p s ugh agh iigh luni _ aling tagh u i i i i itu nga _ .
negh nghmeng _ taaqe yan _ nanevgagh ghllag m _ taa m nguq _ qiive luni _ qaallgute a _ , _ â _ alingtagh u itu ngam _ aa _ s an q ut aani _ ellmi neng _ negh ai _ . _ â
legan _ tawaten _ pi uq _ , _ ii _ ang v an gh akun _ ug m es taa llgh akun _ tuugkagh _ , _ giimagh _ , _ i qu uy aq _ legan _ piisqaghte a tuq _ , _ tapghaaghagh _ tamaa na _ uya iigh aq _ .
S an q ut aan i nguq _ negh mafte ai _ .
taawa _ tuquma lghii _ aling tagh u i i i i itu nga _ .
tefaay _ !
yuug _ neqengyuqagh _ ungipagh aq
siftugh te m _ apegh llegh a
ungipaghagh ni nguq _ imanagh i _ taana nguq _ yuug _ neqengyuqagh _ .
elngaatall _ neq eng y u p aa r ug llak _ urang _ .
Q u un pe nguq _ naken _ pi y aan eng _ , _ angyagh neng _ kaate nghmini _ negh sagh si ghagh llag luni _ kaate aqe lghii _ .
aghnagh m _ elngaatall _ nulighh an _ nefku ghllag aqe kangi _ ila i _ negh kangi _ .
amiiragh i _ nayug luki _ , _ nayug luki _ negh kangi _ kanaghte uute aqe luki _ .
tagtalmi _ taagken _ yuug _ neqete nanigh yalghiimi _ , _ neqe meng _ kaat ute na nigh yagh lghii mi _ , _ ima _ neqe ngllagh ghllag qagh a _ taana _ nefku ghllag _ avangite te a _ negh ke igh te uk _ , _ yuug _ neqenge yu igh te yalghiimi _ .

neqenge nanigh yan _ aghnagh _ sumeghtaghagh uq _ , _ â _ U p uu p eng _ nunivagseghagh ghhagh meng _ pi yagh kuma _ entaqun _ negh nayagh ukung _ ighivgaqun _ . _ â
pennagh nun _ nunivag yagh yalghiimi _ , _ tawaten _ saghna ma luku _ , _ ug w ing ang uq _ uka _ kaleve qaghte ghllag luni _ qaya ghhagh a _ taglagh yalghiimi _ .
kii _ sama nguq _ usingigh yalghiimi _ neqe ghllag _ ug w ing an _ qaake ma kanga _ .
N ak en Ê¼ nguq _ pennagh m _ saye aneng _ taakwegken _ aghnagh _ aane luni _ kayusiite luku _ ima nguq _ aga _ it egh aa tu k _ pennagh m _ saye anun _ , _ uyghag m _ asi anun _ , _ amig anun _ tawavek _ it egh aa ll u tek _ aga nguq _ umeg te uk _ .
aghnagh _ sumeghtaghagh uq _ , _ â _ U g w ik a _ taameng _ neq eng y iigh ull ii _ , _ aghnagh meng _ naalkute ma lghii _ pennagh m _ saye ani _ whaa _ . _ â _ aglagh ma lghii _ nunivagte gpenani _ .
kaate yan _ ug w in i _ p em akanga _ , _ â _ sangavek _ neqenge yu igh te ziin _ ? _ â
â _ esgha _ sangama _ neq eng y iigh us k ang anga _ . _ â
taagken _ aghnagh _ quunpeng _ aghh ut anga _ tamaghhagh an _ pennagh m _ saye anun _ pi ghllag ughte uq _ .
U g w in i _ aghul aq en gh ani _ ellnga llu _ aghul aq aq lluni _ .
allamenguq _ pi yalghiimi _ ataasigh meng _ aghneghmi _ , _ aghnagh ngugh _ taawa _ pennagh m _ saye ani _ aqumga aqe uq _ , _ iwhani _ pellugtugh aqe uq _ elngaatall _ aliineghllug ghllag mi _ .
taku ma kanga _ aghnagh m _ taa m _ .
â _ sangavek _ agavek _ ne mun _ aglagh igate ziin _ , _ ellng in aghh agh p ek _ pellagh yug igate ziin _ ? _ â

â _ nakaa _ , _ ne ke aqa _ una _ neghightagh u unga _ una _ ne ke aqa _ whanga _ . _ â
â _ kumakigh te aghte ltung _ ? _ â
aa _ , _ aa _ igh s ak es tam i kun Ê¼ nguq _ angegh uq _ .
taawa nguq _ gaagh aqe uq _ neghsagh meng _ esla kun _ elngaatall _ .
pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ elpek _ sivuke luten _ kumakigh laken _ . _ â _ aqume luni _ taagken _ ingaghte ste luku _ kumakigh aa _ .
qavagh ngllagh aa _ elngaatall _ kumakigh aa _ , _ ima nguq _ qavagh uq _ .
qavagh yan _ aghsug kestagh luku _ nuna kun _ lli kestagh luku _ ugke a _ taana _ qallaqugh ghllag _ tugu luku _ sigutanga kun _ aghnagh m _ kuuve ma kanga _ legan _ tuqute luku _ .
I il q wa _ qaamna _ , _ sigute kek _ panegh yalghiimek _ tuquma lghii _ .
tuqu yalghiimi nguq _ taakwavek _ iq r agh qell uni _ llangaqa nguq _ ighyaghqesagh lghii mi _ iq l igh mi _ .
aqume ste luku _ , _ aqume vyiigh ste luku _ , _ pelluk u a _ tawavek _ , _ iigge nge ai _ piifte luki _ , _ aqumgagh an _ tawaten _ unite ma kanga _ .
U n ill u ku u _ pennagh m _ qaye ani _ taklaghte luni _ kelengake ma kanga _ qaya ghhagh _ taglagh yaghqagh _ , _ ug w in i _ .
kii _ , _ uka nguq _ taglagh yalghiimi _ usi ii ghllag luni _ , _ kaleve qaghte ghllag luni _ .
taagken _ kaate yan _ esnagh mun _ kaate luni _ nuliigh siigh ni _ taana _ , _ aghnaghagh ni _ sa ni _ , _ elngaatall _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ kayusiite yaghtugh nga _ . _ â _ tuqu kau lghii _ avelghaqiinagh ma kanga _ .
â _ egmiinaq _ sukate luten _ aghn aq el qu si g pen an g _ kayusiite yaghtugh nga _ . _ â

â _ naqam _ iq l igh p ek _ tespikani _ esghapag nga _ .
egmiinaq _ tea- ai _ kayusiite yaghtugh nga _ neqe ghllag u unga _ kayusiite yaghtugh nga _ . _ â _ avelghaqiinagh aa _ .
â _ ugumi nagh na ghhalek _ naqam _ iq l igh p ek _ esghapag nga _ . _ â _ qenwat _ sakrite uq _ .
uughqaghte luni _ s ayug agh saq min igu _ imani nguq _ uniistaaghhagh u uq _ .
P iy aq min ig u nguq _ tuqu ul uni _ , _ an egh negh s ugh yaq min igu _ .
ii _ akuqagh luku nguq _ elngaatall _ yuug _ qiyaaghwagh yalghiimi _ inag mig ke luku _ nuliigh siigh ni _ , _ aghnaghagh ni _ taana _ .
qiyaaghwagh yalghiimi nguq _ , _ qiyaaghwagh ma luku _ aghnagh m _ nuliigh pig an _ tes p am u m _ pennagh m _ q aa y ng an il ngu u m _ unite ma kanga _ .
nalleghaghhalek nguq _ naagu _ yuug _ .
kii _ kaate yalghiimi nguq _ up- ke aa _ qayugh a _ kaleve qaghte luni _ .
kaate luni nguq _ , _ â _ kii _ nutaan _ repall _ neqete uten _ ? _ â
â _ aa _ , _ nutaan _ repall _ neqete unga _ . _ â _ E s gh al q ug pen aan Ê¼ nguq _ iye gni _ iigh manginagh lukek _ , _ gginagh ni _ iigh manginagh luku _ .
kayusigh qu luku _ , _ taglaate qugh lgusigh luku _ it egh aa ll u tek _ aghnagh m _ esghagh luku _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ kii _ sa yamek _ iye gken _ puuve ghllag ak _ . _ â
â _ esghaghhu _ nutaan _ neqenge yalghiinga _ , _ piyaqleg iigh yalghiinga _ entaqun _ iye gka _ puuve uk _ . _ â
gaagh ragkiigh lutek _ negh te kete luku _ .
â _ sa yamek llu _ iye gken _ puuve ghllag ak _ ? _ â _ taawa _ naghughte nghminigu _ , _ â _ sa yamek llu _ iye gken _ puuve ghllag ak _ ? _ â
qenwat _ yug m _ taa m _ ug w ing an _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ U um lleq a _ pi ma kanga _ ! _ â _ taawa _ iye k _ puuve ghllag ni lukek _ q in un aghq utk es aq min igu _ .
â _ U um lleq a _ pi ma kanga _ â _ , _ taw at en Ê¼ nguq _ pi tkellug qu _ uulegh u ma lghii _ tawaten _ pi magh mi _ .
U um lleq a _ pi ma kanga _ .
taawa _ ungipaghaate m _ kenle ke a _ .
tefaay _ al iin gh aku un _ !

pugughilegh
pugughilegh
K aa v am _ apegh llegh a
pugughileghmii u llegh ut
Q uy ng igh tu um agh m e nguq _ anguyag nge luteng _ anag ma lghiit _ qavagh nanigh naqe yameng _ aate yameng _ .
tawatete ut _ naqamalla _ whaa _ aap gh waagh aqa _ nagate lleg mtun _ .
sangan _ ug lagh y ag agh llag en nguq _ W al ang am _ aap gh waagh yaq min igu _ tazingani _ aa sa mi _ .
nenglu _ ataasigh _ nenglu ghrug ghllag _ , _ yugunqegte pigte ma aqe aat llu _ .
angayuqagh gket _ tawani _ neng l uk saq em eg g ni _ .
pi nga yu neng _ ingluleg nguq _ W al ang am _ apegh llegh ani _ , _ aanleghaate luni _ angyaghugh te aqe uq _ , _ angyagh _ , _ tesqamaken _ .
â _ tawaten _ sikig stun _ entaqun _ , _ â _ whanga _ sumeghtaghagh lleg mni _ .
taagavek _ nenglu ngllagh luteng _ , _ taakwavek _ taana _ ataasigh _ ang ayuq ag t eng _ tuumkellug qu _ .
Agh v egh taq egk ang an nguq _ elngaatall _ .
Yug w il ng a si yug w em _ ungip aghq angll agh yug w em _ kaa te pig negh in ku t qun _ esghaghhu _ .
aghvenge luteng _ , _ yugtu pigte lghii _ entaqun _ maaghaghte aqe kangit _ aghvenge ghngaaghmeng _ .
nuugh aqe lghiit _ .
Yug il ng a si yug w em _ kaa simak ang l _ .
Agh v el q aagh agh llag a _ tungyugh u uute yagu _ mat- llegte luku _ , _ qaye igh luku _ , _ putuugh luku _ iighsugh ma kangat _ mangtag a _ al iigh qell uku _ .
G h h atagh simak angat _ pakag aat _ amalka _ .
nengqe ghllag luteng _ ukut _ tapghaghrag t _ iighsuute t _ .
amenqun _ uughqa _ esgha _ nangaghte aqe kanga _ uksaagh mi _ .
katelghaate ghllag yan _ , _ s an q ut aat eng _ peghu luki _ t aag ag un _ .
ii _ , _ qelegh kangit _ legan _ tesamavek _ .
kergamqun _ samavek _ k ag p es taa llgh anun _ lliigh yuwhaagh kau ta i _ taakwegkut _ kepe ma kangit _ .
ngiigte ghllag luku _ ila a _ kete mun _ at egh ug ll uku _ .
waame lghii _ una _ legan _ s an q ut aa te nguq _ tugulagh luki _ tuqu qugh t aag iit _ qamagte luki _ .
ungipagh ngllagh naqe m _ piyaqminiki _ .
taagken _ taana _ t aan ang in aq _ tume _ .
taku vigkagh a _ aasa mun _ uksugh mi _ t aan ang in aghh aq _ .
naken _ sani gneng _ taku vig ite ngughk _ .
awiim _ neqe igh negh ke uq _ sa u a _ , _ sengngugh qagh yu k _ .
nagaqugh luteng _ entaqun _ aki naqe naqe lghiit _ .
megh meng _ taana _ kuvugh ghllag ma kangat _ tume _ taana _ .
S ik waagh aagh tes tegh llag um ak angat _ , _ iwerngaqun _ samavek _ nategh anun _ .
taakwna _ , _ sani kek _ iighagh vigkagh meng _ un Ê¼ g avek _ nategh anun _ .
I w em g aq un _ tes k an ani _ n ate q l is agh ami _ uglagh luni _ guutute kaghqaghtuumagh mi _ , _ leg an nguq _ s ugh ug w i _ kaate nghmini _ taakwani _ estu laghate te aqe lghii _ .
estu ma luku _ tuqu qu ghllag luku _ nateqlitekagh _ tes k an ani _ pi aqe luku _ .
sughug ghllag _ qamagte ma kangat _ .
aki naqe m _ qavagh nanigh ma lghiit _ quunpeng _ kelenga ghllaget _ .
esla kegte na iqe yagh kangat _ .
quyngigh eng _ um ul gh aam ak angat _ siku gnun _ .
T es am ag un nguq _ , _ aasagh mii lgu uq _ tesamna _ n a tu ng w aa _ pugughilegh m _ ug w al igh negh a _ .
aasagh mii lgu uq _ .
taaggun _ uugte ma lghiit _ quyngightugh ma ghllag meng _ .
quyngigh at _ tuqu ghllag ma lghii _ , _ en taq un nguq _ taakwani _ qavaghtagh llegh mi _ tagh y ugh tu pag llag em _ .
â _ kii _ , _ u ug g utk at aam aat _ . _ â

tuqu qugh ma kangat _ naa ng te v z igh luku _ .
tazimaken _ ima _ quy ng ing yaq leg es tun _ .
tawaten _ entaqun _ gheve luteng _ , _ segheve luteng _ .
nalighnegh i _ en r agh ng am nguq _ , _ qafsinagnegh _ angyagh _ tawaten _ naayghagh nun _ pugughilegh _ ke t gh u te qagh ll uku _ .
ila it _ taakut _ veghute ma lghiit _ .
â _ entaqun _ W al angat _ maaten _ .
whangkuta _ unegte ukut _ .
tawatete uq _ ungipagh a _ avatmii u lleg mta _ .
A g ar ug ll aa k _ .
pugughileghmii t
S aam aa _ nagaqugh qaghaqe ukut _ q av ng ar ug llak _ ategh _ Agh n ang iigh aq _ , _ N un ii v aagh mi _ .
whangkuta _ ateghkagh ut _ Agh n ang iigh aq _ .
G ug w ii ng em nguq _ nayag ke yaghpete a _ .
entaqun _ ipa u uq _ .
G ug w ii ng en _ avatmii _ apa ka _ , _ apa ma _ ata a _ .
A n ang w aan aag uq _ ap agh pig aqa _ siv ul igh pig aq _ .
alla _ sivuligh leg _ .
Taa ku neng _ allgegh kau unga _ A n ang w aan aan ku neng _ , _ G ug w ii ng en ku neng _ , _ N ap aq aghh aan ku neng _ , _ Yug n iil q w aan ku neng _ .
esghagh nghiteqaghte aqa _ nuughtugh qaghte aqa _ G ug w ii ng en _ .
allgegh magh ma _ tuqukagh _ , _ wallu _ allgegh ste gpenanga _ .
nulighh a _ kiyalighagh mii u uq _ W aa ll a _ .
nanevgagh magh mi _ entaqun _ tugukagh a _ .
N ul iigh pig aa _ P ang ang ang u f l uq _ .
napaqagh ghhagh _ ap agh pig aq aqa _ Yug n iil q w aam _ ata a _ uu m _ napaqagh ghhagh m _ ategh a _ , _ I tegh yagh aam _ ku ug gha _ .
W aa ll a _ kiyalighagh mii u uq _ , _ ukut _ I meg y u ut en kut _ pi ke aat _ .
kiyalighagh mii u ut _ taakut _ ukut _ A y waagh m iit _ nani _ qangeghsagh mii t _ .
M al gh ugh qell uteng _ entaqun _ nun aghq aat _ qangeghsagh _ .
U n meg g aan kut _ , _ S um uu si n kut _ , _ alaka ghhagh nkut _ kiyalighagh m _ yug ke ai _ .
maalghug _ alaka ghhagh k _ sivuligh llu _ kinguligh llu _ pi nigh staghhiinagh k _ qamagte lutek _ .
W aa ll a _ kiyalighagh mii u uq _ nayugh ke ghllag kaqe aqa _ liisagh lghiinga _ .
tagi ukung _ enmis _ whangkutung _ .
tesamani _ pugughilegh mi _ kiyagh llegh ii _ .
tespikavek _ qemi mun _ k el u tem m n il ngugh mun _ mayugh lutung _ , _ segesqugh gmikun _ ayapegh luni _ aliineghllug _ k i w at mun _ nekegte luni _ aghuliigh aqe lghii _ .
entaqun _ qama _ kiyalighagh mun _ um yug w ak _ kaa t ng waagh lu tek _ .
akuzillegh it _ tawaten _ ayuqe ut _ iitek _ whangkutestun _ anagte yaghqaa gpenateng _ tusaqe neghllugte yaghqaa gpenateng _ .
ungipamsug ke llegh a _ taana _ ellnga _ kiyalighagh mi _ , _ panignaghllug u yagh lghii nguq _ ellnga llu _ .
repall _ ne u yagh lghii _ W aa ll a _ taagani _ avaqutaghllug u lghii _ avaqutagh lgu yagh lghii _ .
ukegken _ enraq _ yug nge kau na yu kan _ pi aqe aat _ nallu negh ke te ziin _ , _ kiyalighagh _ .
alaska- meng _ , _ m a in l an d - meng _ .
Q an tagh an llegh aneng _ taakwegken _ .
tawaten _ mal gh uk l it ke m meng _ , _ n all un q em meng _ ang l is agh teg m a _ taakut _ , _ aamta _ ken qig teng ng waagh pen a tek _ temngi _ yug nge kau na yu kan _ tazimaken _ pi aqe aat _ .
A g aan kut _ nagaqugh aqe anka _ saghumig nkuk nguq _ N aagh ul u un kuk _ avaqutagh ke ait _ walluumllu _ naa gket _ maalghug _ .
ivagh i ma nkut _ , _ tan- qagh u yankut _ , _ A g aan kut _ , _ K ar g in kut _ .
A g aam _ nulighh a _ itegh yagh aq _ nengyugh ka _ .
I tegh yagh aam _ aag na nga _ avatmii u uq _ .
naqamllu _ atghagh kau nghite ngugh ni _ t a z ing an i r ug llak _ aag n ap ut _ aneghtekagh t _ tawaten _ .
Taw ate l g ut ku t ng waagh n iiq iit _ akuzillegh it _ .
enkaam _ A g aam _ avaqutagh ke ai _ K av nagh u un kut _ , _ A g l ugh aan kut _ , _ napaqagh ghhagh nkut _ , _ Q ay g egh t aan kut _ , _ U kum an kut _ , _ atghagh u yankut _ , _ M aghq an eq _ .
allameng _ nuyekligh lgu ut _ nalug iqe yagh aat _ .
nagate lleg mni _ peleghqe tke ai _ K ar g i m _ , _ S agh um ig en ku ngu uk _ S ing ig p aa y an kuk _ .
taagani _ qungughvig ni _ peleghqe ma na iqe ait _ .
A g aam _ aag llegh a _ avaqutagh a _ K ar g i m _ ellnga n _ ila a _ .
K ar g i _ , _ A g aq _ , _ tan- qagh u nga _ , _ ivagh i ma _ taakut _ liisimake anka _ .
taana _ T ut m ate l ek _ A qu l ag en kuk _ Q aaq w aan kuk _ avaqutagh ke ak _ .
qaaqu aq _ aghnagh u uq _ esghagh ghllag kaqe aqa _ taa m _ maaten _ G ug w ii ng em _ ata lgu ta an _ nayag a _ .
T ut m ate l g em _ n ul igh q es u wh aagh a _ P in i r k ag u f tuq _ .
taagken _ nengyugh ghhagh ka _ puughhute _ .
ivagh i ma _ kingulighpigagh _ .
avaquti a _ A nagh ay aan kut _ , _ aki vig nkut _ , _ nategh mii nkut _ .
Yug n iil q w aaq _ napaqagh ghhagh m _ ighneghqagh ke a _ sa a _ qangigagh a _ , _ ilughagh n _ avaqutagh ke a _ .
T ut m ate l g em _ nayag a _ T en m ii w en _ , _ t aan ang in aq _ liisimake aqa _ .
Taa k w n aa _ atalgute ni _ aviighute uute kau na iqe a _ uglagh ghllag na iqe yagh ai _ .
U ngu q t i _ il ugh w aa _ , _ Q aa y aam _ avaqutagh a _ , _ Q aaq w aan kut _ ku ug gh at _ .
Q aa y aq _ tes am kum ii ngu uq _ ilate nga uq _ whang kun nun _ .
N al igh neq agh put _ whangkuta _ pikagh ut _ Q aaq w aam _ kugegh ke a _ alla neng _ ata leg _ .
G ug w ii ng em _ itegh yagh aq _ panig a _ napaqagh ghhagh nkuk _ .
anglegutetu yagh lghii _ tuqu laghate tke aat _ .
anagutagh ghhagh _ taana _ nengyugh ghhagh ma _ ataata ke a _ puughhute m _ .
A nag ut aam _ ata a _ melqughtu u na iqe aat _ .
aaga _ A nag ut aam _ nulighh a _ .
avaqutagh lgu yagh lghii _ tagneghli meng _ , _ peleghqe tke aat _ puughhute m _ ku ug gh an _ .
atghagh u nga _ A g aan kut _ panike aat _ allughqagh m _ taw aaten _ anagutagh mete te _ lli aqe aq _ .
tan- qagh u nga _ A g aam _ nayag ke a _ .
G g in aq utk an i k _ esghaqagh u lutek _ .
A am t ay aq _ aghyugh kau uq _ naagu _ tamaani _ sa kaghqagh ghhagh _ .
K ar g i m _ avaquti a _ ayuqligh nkuk _ S ing ig p aa y an kuk _ .
Yug waagh h aq _ puughhute m _ ata a _ , _ nulighh a _ N aa ng iigh aq _ .
avaqutagh ke ai _ Yug waagh h aam _ , _ pekete te aq _ , _ agigte te _ , _ puughhute _ , _ N al ug w i _ .
Yug n iil q w aaq _ ellng in aq el t aghh aq _ ata ka _ .
naqam _ il ugh w al gh ut angi _ taakut _ , _ Q ay g egh t aan kut _ .
A nagh ay aaq _ taana _ anglegutkaghqagh a _ .
enkaam _ whanga _ , _ I k an uq _ , _ N al ug w i _ .
napaqagh ghhagh m _ ighnegh ke a _ Yug n iil q w aaq _ .
Q aan aan kut _ tes am an tuq _ ama _ ramke t _ allakagh meng _ .
tanem _ avaqutagh a _ t aan ang in aghh agh s ug n ill uku _ nagate te qugh aqe aqa _ elqwaagh ghqu _ , _ T aq aa ng an kuk _ .
pugughileghmii t _ naqamllu _ whaten _ whangkutestun _ pugughileghmii stun _ qerngagh meng _ atigh llegh at _ ayuqe nghite ngughk _ , _ pugughileghmii t _ naqam _ .
alla t _ nunatagh t _ kinku t _ ungipagh ke igate ait _ .
iitek nguq _ nunatagh meng _ nula u yagh uq _ taku aqe luku _ whaten _ negh naqe m _ s aam _ amenqun _ ivagh i ghllagu yagh lghiit _ , _ neqe _ taana _ .
nula u yaghtugh ngugh _ whaken _ qiighqagh m _ yug w an _ lliigh vike aqe luku _ nula u yaghtugh ngugh _ .
atigh llegh i _ pugughileghmii u nghite ngugh t _ , _ naqamllu _ liigike llghite anka _ n aku m ii ng w aaq luteng _ .
pugughileghmii lghute _ t aan ang u uq _ nagate lleg mni _ N ung ug w en ku g neng _ A nagh ay aan ku g neng _ .
negh naqe m _ aneghneghte naqe m _ siivanllegh i nguq _ piiwagh mafte ut _ kiyang _ tawaten _ ke v g aghq al igh luteng _ .
legan _ nenglu meng _ taagken _ whang kun neng _ q em g agh m e tegh ll all em m neng _ aane luteng _ sivuqagh mun _ piiwaghkagh t _ , _ qavngaq _ imani _ .
ataasigh u yagh ukut _ , _ ataasigh mi _ nenglu mi _ , _ pelleghqagh ke te llegh u uq _ .
qafsina t _ entaqun _ kiyalighagh mun _ .
enkaam _ taakut _ ata ii qugh stegkangi _ A nagh ay aam _ tanem _ taagken _ nenglu meng _ aanekagh t _ ighsake te te nkut _ , _ silas-tu te te nkuk _ K iy al igh am el ngu uk _ .
kiyalighagh mun _ lli aqe aat _ .
pugughileghmii lghute _ tesakmani _ nula ghllag lghii _ .
taagken _ nenglu meng _ ataasigh meng _ aane luteng _ piiwaghkagh t _ .
maani llu _ sivungagh mi _ nula aqe uq _ .
tawaten _ nagate vyiigh llegh ke aqa _ taagken _ ang l is agh teg em neng _ .
N ag as ug w ig as alghii ng allu _ qemall _ maaten _ avuteghqe ghllag _ .
neqamike yaghqagh t _ liigi _ neq am ik es qell uki _ ungipamsug te aqe kanginkut _ .
W aa k ig al ngugh ni _ .
taana _ ayumightagh ghllag _ qaaqu aq _ ung ii p am s ug t aagh llak _ w aa k ig al ke f ut _ .
I m ing ate m _ sa kagu _ ?
sakegh nghite a _ I m ing an _ s ak en ghi tagh put _ iike nagh te mineng _ nulighhtuqagh _ .
aghnagh nge naqe m _ akequsagh ke luku nguq _ yugusigh ni _ , _ ii ng ke r ug llak _ ellngit ni _ tawani _ nengaawagh u lghii _ .
T ut m ate l g em _ n angll eg t ap aa yug ut min eng _ tugukligh laatagh qagh a _ .
alla ghllag _ quutmii neng _ ungazigh meng _ allgeghkagh _ , _ allgellegh a _ entaqun _ ayuqe lghii _ .
taakut _ A al aan kut _ , _ A n ang w aan aan kut _ A a z ug w en kun nguq _ anglegute ke te ut _ , _ apa nka _ .
anglegute ke te lghiit _ , _ taana _ A al aaq _ n uy ek l igh pii g aq _ A n ang w aan aq _ , _ A a z uk _ uyuqligh _ , _ lluu yu k _ maaten _ sakemna _ .
avaqutagh lgutu te lghiit _ .
taake uk _ melngu nkuk nguq _ T ap gh al ug w en kuk _ A al aam _ avaqutagh ke ak _ .
taana _ A a z uk _ uyuqligh _ panig inagh meng _ , _ Q aaq w aan kuk _ , _ P an i ku t aan kuk _ .
temngi _ neqamike vyiigh llegh nka _ puygutagh unga _ apegh anka _ .
nepiigh igate yagh uk _ angli saghteke _ aag n am m neng _ ungipagh meng _ .
repall _ maaten _ avuteghqe aqe unga _ .
elngaatall nguq _ aghv it egh llak _ utaq iig aq n aagh tan nguq _ ingutugh meng _ .
ingutugh meng _ kiyang _ .
entaqun _ piyuke lleg teng _ itagnaghi nghata _ aghv es ag m e nguq _ kayagte aqe ait _ .
nemeghqagh u luki _ suqi a _ .
tagtale mii _ aa ng ep aagh r ug meng _ q aan ng waagh q ameng _ sa yaghqagh meng _ pakegte aqe luki qun _ amen _ sa ngllagh yaghqagh meng _ .
tawaten _ nagate aqa _ nagaqughsugnite aqa _ whaa _ nagate llegh ka _ sa u a _ yuug _ Q aa qam e nguq _ ategh leg _ .
nakaan _ una _ Q aaq a _ ungazigh mete ngughk _ kina _ t aan ang un ghi l nguq _ .
ategh qu te _ all aku s n aq _ uglagh lghii _ .
repall _ nagaqugh aqe lghiinga _ K iy al igh aq lu nguq _ Y aa v g agh si l gu yagh tuq lu _ , _ ategh ite ngugh lgu yagh uq _ .
S aku n negh il nguut _ ategh i _ akuuraate nga lghiit _ .
Q aaq a _ P ug u ghi l eng l aq aq
taana _ sa u a _ Q aaq a _ pugughilegh ngllagh qagh ngugh _ .
sivuke luni nguq _ T u p n aghq un _ nekegtekau yaghpete uq _ .
Taw at en nguq _ ul ap naa r iq luni _ taw a tes ug w ni _ nagate aqa _ pugughilegh _ nallagh ma kanga _ neqetu ghllag _ , _ nanugh ghllag _ enraq _ .
entaqun _ upenghagh mi wha _ nallagh ma nghite agu _ , _ aghvegh ghllag nguq _ kellii ni _ tamaa na _ qavregh ghllag _ .
taawa _ entaqun _ takukagh a _ al ing yug w ig a tu t min eng _ nanugh meng _ .
L eg an nguq _ nanugh _ tawaten _ .
entaqun _ y ung y u wh aaq _ nutaan _ nalluke kangat _ .
nanugh m _ ne ke luku _ .
ii _ , _ nenglu ngllagh llegh ke te luku _ leg an nguq _ nenglu i _ ifkaghte aqe ai _ nanugh m _ .
Taw at en nguq _ qule iqe te lukek _ a siv an ll uku _ a si l i q _ taana _ taw at en nguq _ nayugh keqaghte ak _ .
T aag ken nguq _ ef legh h naq utk es aq min igu _ .
aghtugh aa _ pi neghllug _ .
tawaten _ pi ghngaaghmi _ ken l ek s ag g aghn eng _ uqugh a nguq _ ayaawagh ke luku _ ken gh eg nun _ .
ii-ii _ , _ taa m ag un nguq _ I q al ug w ilag ne kun _ ukig uute ghllag uq _ .
N al iig ne kun _ imani _ ke t lii g ne kun _ kaate lghii _ una _ .
tawaten _ nula ghllag uq _ taakwani _ .
tagtale mii _ ategh ghllag uq _ .
Taw at en nguq _ ke tegh ll ug w in agh mun _ .
Taw at en nguq _ nekegte luni _ n u v ug yug lluni _ .
legan _ kaate lghii _ iigh w il ngugh llag es tun nguq _ qategtu te _ .
esla kegte yagh na iqe kangat qun _ ayumigh _ .
unaami _ teghtugh yalghiimi _ qupegh ghllag _ iighwilngugh ghllag stun _ .
qafsiniite kun _ qavagh m _ aga _ asivagh inagh uq _ .
qupegh _ talugh qagh uq _ .
tawaten _ nagaqugh aqa _ .
taawa _ nanigh igh te a _ paninang _ nanughtuqagh _ .
ungipagh kaqe kanga _ T ut m ate l g em _ taa m _ ang l is agh tem a _ n ap iigh llegh h iin nguq _ waame aqe ut _ nan um un _ sanitmiighte aghte lghiit _ tagtalmi _ .
tamaa na ngugh _ tume ghllag _ nanugh m _ tu um l i llegh ll ak aa _ amenqun _ iqetu pigte lghiit _ .
nanugh m _ tu um l il agh llag luku _ ila i _ ik f iq n at _ kiigh ani _ .
nenglu _ q af si n Ê¼ gu yagh ta _ uglaghraag _ qaya _ paamna _ nenglu ligh vig ite ngughk _ tangeghtu ghllag _ .
ketwhelqun _ , _ uygu na ni _ kana _ allameng _ taana _ K ang k iil ghem _ asi ani qun _ , _ taghnughhagh ghhagh it _ estu igate ut _ .
M ang tegh as q waagh v ig u yagh tugh nguq _ qaye a _ paamna _ upenghagh mi _ mayugh uute aqe ut _ .
atigh llegh i _ mangteghasqwaagh t _ taakwavek _ mayugh uute aqe ut _ , _ kiigtagh ke ut _ taakwani _ .
pennagh ni nguq _ taagani _ pen nan it ku ll aal uteng _ qagugh ak _ piyuke llegh eng _ entaqun _ ngelqagh u aghagh u aghte llegh mun _ kenlanga _ .
itghagh aqe ut _ tagi luteng _ iq all ug w anun _ .
enkaam _ n all un iil ku taq aq agh put _ ng el q aagh aq _ teng en gh ani _ , _ iqallug _ sama _ tea- ma anun _ lliigh aqe uq _ ug w av agh aq uq _ ukavek _ aghvighteg nun _ navek _ kaate ghllag aqe uq _ .
S ugh ug w et
T aag an i r ug llag an ii _ talwa _ Q aaq w aam _ entaqun _ sivungagh ni _ sughu k _ allgeghkagh _ .
tespamaken _ aywaa neng _ iglegh tan eng _ nakaan _ uughqa neng _ .
taakwegken _ uq ev aneng _ aate yameng _ pi llghite ut _ ukegken _ aywaa neng _ pikagh t _ .
taakwegkut qun _ yug w it _ tuqu qugh kau ni kangit _ kiyalighagh mii t _ .
entaqun _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ aki naqe m _ .
U ugh q an nguq _ uukna _ yug wa _ pi llghite uq _ uukna _ , _ A v a tes taa k w eg kut _ , _ tea-si inkut _ .
aygugh a _ uukna _ anguyiqe kau uq _ ungazigh meng _ kenle ke luni _ .
qiighqagh _ entaqun _ un ay m igh w aaq aq saq angat _ .
pillugute lghii stun _ maaten _ katam _ entaqun _ .
N an i r ug llak _ ag an i r ug llak _ entaqun _ .
sa igh kuvek
taana _ sa igh kuvek _ ungipaghagh u luku _ repall _ nagaqugh aqa _ elngaatall nguq _ yug ll aa k _ .
naken llu _ nagaqugh qagh nghite ngugh u kut _ whaa _ maaten _ taa ku s ta _ siquveg mii u yagh lghiit _ .
yugtu lleghpigagh u na iqe aat _ .
Taw at en nguq _ esgha qun _ napaqagh an _ iqetu langa _ entaqun _ ip aa ngu uq _ ag ar ug llak _ este na ghllag _ taana _ iqetutale kellug qu _ napaqagh u yagh ut _ agavek _ .
Taw at en nguq _ t all im agh qell uni _ ayuqe yagh uq _ .
U n Ê¼ g ar ug ll aa k _ ketligh at _ ila it _ .
nanevgagh ghhagh m nguq _ s ug w ag luni _ ayvegh aneng _ neqete nghmeng _ aghtugh luni _ taglagh luni _ ne nun _ kaate nghmini _ meghsi ngllagh luni _ leg an nguq _ tuun egh at ni _ tun ut mun _ kuuve aqe ai _ .
negh ghllag _ qamagte luku _ taana _ un Ê¼ g avek _ .
nuliigh ni _ kaate luku _ meghsi ngllagh vike a _ , _ agniqe te a _ itegh luni _ pi sqellug qu _ , _ ungipaghagh u uq _ .
tuune a _ qinuyagute luku _ .
T un ut mun _ kuuve a _ .
ii-i _ , _ aghnalqwaagh ghhagh m _ agh iv al egh t aag aa _ allghiinegh iqe qrug ni luku _ .
aga _ itegh uq _ enraq llu _ .
Taa k w an te q r u wh aam aa _ enraq llu _ k el ul igh pig agh ni _ .
ii _ , _ leg an nguq _ itegh uq _ , _ qagingughte ghllag aa _ .
nuliigh ni nguq _ qineghte yaghtigh sqe a _ .
ellnga neng _ kayagte a _ ellnga neng _ pi sqellug qu _ .
sagiqe te yatni _ qineghte yalghiimi _ aghnalqwaagh _ kii _ , _ q ag igh r u ku ut aagh llag et _ .
taawa nguq _ tungeqligh t _ taana _ k as ug w aq ef t aa _ ayemqe aqe a _ .
maaten _ siquveg m nguq _ tes am u m _ liisimakekagh mta _ tuungligh a _ .
taanegna nguq _ n u tem lu _ qamagte ma kanga _ ketligh _ .
T i d a l _ w av e- es tegh llag um akanga _ .
negh ghllag _ taanegna _ estamat _ iq e tugh llag aat at _ iighwte ai _ .
tawaten _ nagate aqa _ yug w ii te llgh an _ kenle a _ .
naqamllu _ naa ke i _ k ing un ghi t _ siquveg mii t _ nag aq iig al ke put _ .
entaqun _ qam aghq w aam ii _ .
mayeraaghpag _ A naq si
siknegh mi _ ama _ ang v ig a pig n iiq aa _ yuug _ .
yug ghrugllag u na iqe aat _ , _ taa w aa _ kelgute yagh aat _ napaqagh squghhagh _ .
Wh ag un nguq _ kaapute luni _ ayuqe uq _ ( _ tuye akun _ ) _ whagun llu _ ighu m _ kenle akun _ .
nengug luku nguq _ esgha _ naama kusiigh aqlaatagh ma atgu _ .
U ngu q t i nguq _ angvigagh ghllag uq _ , _ A nagh ay aam _ apegh aqe a _ .
nuqsaleg aqe a nguq _ taana _ napaqagh a _ nengug luku _ .
Q em igh ll ug w em _ tag taa l anga _ .
qazigyaghagh ghhagh m nguq _ iq el q w akun _ pakineg luku _ tuquma lghii _ .
ivghaagh lghii _ am si k agh lluni _ entaqun _ qazigyaghagh meng _ , _ teghig ke sagh ke te _ nuyaaghite yagh lghii _ .
naghulleg aqe luki _ , _ p ak in Ê¼ g um akanga _ nagun _ iq el q w akun _ itegagh akun _ , _ taawa _ taana _ tuqusiigh iqe a _ , _ pakineg llegh a _ qazigyaghagh m _ .
ategh a _ A naq si _ , _ siknegh mii _ .
A t ku yagh h aam _ .
esgha qun _ tuqu naqe negh mta _ aghtugh igate ngugh u kut _ .
yug lgu luku _ enmis _ angu kaqe aat _ siknegh _ ukegkut _ kinguligh t _ .
Y ul gu f tugh nguq _ tamaa na ai _ yug w ii te llegh llag em _ entaqun _ n at ang ani _ yug lgu yagh uq _ enmis _ i ngu tugh h agh m e nguq _ paaghqite te yan _ yug pagite te yan _ aghvenge aghte aqe ut _ tagtalmi _ , _ siknegh mi _ .
amenqun _ ama _ neghqwaaghtuqagh _ .
allakagh mi _ ne u uq _ siknegh _ .
siquveg meng _ allakagh mete uq _ .
yug lgu luku _ entaqun _ Q aaq w aan kut _ liite tke aat _ , _ liisimakekagh at _ .
negaghpag ngllagh llegh
Q ii p am e nguq _ ivalu meng _ negaghpag ke aqe ut _ taagani _ .
elngaatall _ uksulqusigh igh ngugh _ qiipe aqe kangat _ .
A m er iig agh all gh i _ tamaakut _ qupneghqutaghqagh t _ , _ eslege llegh i _ kiiwhtaghqutaghqagh t _ , _ iqate lughqutaghqagh t _ , _ negaghpagkagh t _ .
Taw at en nguq _ p u us ngugh r ag g aat _ imigh aqe ait _ whaa _ qafsina m _ yaagneghqagh m _ negaghpag m _ , _ nalluniightugh luteng _ emta _ taaggun _ .
qafsina _ imightugh luku _ .
whaten qun _ kaki naqe negh meggni qun _ qiipi aqe lghiit _ , _ tawaten _ .
Q in ung i tut _ .
entaqun _ itagnaghi nghata _ , _ aghi ste luki nguq _ en r agh ng am _ paaggun _ neng qell uki _ .
I g l ag teng ng waagh aq aan nguq _ , _ nenglute aq _ .
taawa _ kiyaghte aqe ut _ .
P eq l igh sigh at _ .
tagtale mii _ agh i sigh l uk ii _ tawaten _ nekegte aqe luki _ .
entaqun _ piyuke lleg teng _ kaate nghata _ en r agh ng am _ qilag aqe luki _ negaghpag ngllagh aqe luki _ .
suqagh meng _ pugughyaagh ke na iqe ait _ yeqay _ .
kangghwaag niigh sigh t _ negaghpag t _ .
angli naqe llegh ka _ pugughilegh mi
Agh nagh aghn ii m _ apegh llegh a
akuzi naqe lghii _ aghnaghaghni ii unga _ ungipamsug naqe lghiinga _ pugughilegh mi _ angli lleg mneng _ .
aghnaghaghhagh _ allgegh ma lghii _ 1 9 2 8 - mi _ .
angayuqagh kek _ A g l ugh aan kuk _ nategh mii nkuk _ .
A g l ugh aq _ taana _ A g aan kuk _ I tegh yagh aan kuk _ ighneghagh k _ , _ n uy ek l igh pig aam _ tuungligh ghhagh a _ .
enkaam _ nategh mii m _ angayuqagh kek _ T ut m ate l g en kuk _ P in i r k ag en kuk _ .
taawa _ allgegh yalghiinga _ nalluke aqa _ talwa _ aakagh ka _ ug w iigh umalghii _ sivungagh mii neng _ qiwaaghmii neng _ .
aakagh gka _ maalghug _ .
K u ug gh egk a _ maalghug _ nuyekligh ak _ whanga mneng _ .
nuyeklighpigagh _ aakagh ka _ N aa ng iigh aq _ , _ tuungligh ghhagh a _ K ar g i _ .
naghuyagh nkuk _ , _ T ap gh al ug w en kuk _ yugte aqe lukek _ .
whanga _ Agh nagh aghn i q _ , _ uyughagh gka _ maalghug _ taake uk _ N aagh ul u un kuk _ P it iin kuk _ .
iitek _ angu aqa _ apa ka _ taana _ A g aq _ .
Wh a teng w aaq _ lii g ik ng waagh pen aan _ .
iitek _ naghaagh te negh mta _ nagh agh utk aghq ameng _ sa meng _ tagite aqe kanginkut _ , _ ak mal iigh agh meng _ , _ qateghyiighagh meng _ sa meng _ naghaaghute kaghqagh meng _ .
Wh a teng w aaq _ liigike gpenaan _ , _ A g aa f tuq _ taawa _ siivanllegh ut _ .
taake uk _ asag gka _ A g aam _ panig kek _ A t gh aa ng an kuk _ U kum an kuk _ .
Q ay g egh t aan kuk _ , _ napaqagh ghhagh nkuk _ ighnegh kek _ , _ A g l ugh aq _ n uy ek l igh pig aam _ tuungligh ghhagh a _ .
kinku u ta i _ t aag eg kut _ nalluke anka _ .
taana _ asag ka _ atghagh u nga _ ug w il gu f tuq _ taawa _ Agh tuq aa y ag meng _ .
enmis _ mang tegh il uteng _ m aal gh ug y aag eg neng _ .
aag llegh a _ mangteghapig _ tanpegh meng _ amu iqe lghii _ , _ aag llegh a _ guygu _ .
kiig nghaani _ nuugte aqe luteng _ .
taawa _ mangteghapig ghllag llu _ whanga qun _ angu aqa _ tawani _ n ayuq egk ayug w at _ .
K iig un negh is t eng _ legan _ tan pegh h a _ iike luku _ qaame na nga _ uk mang igh waagh luku _ kiigtagh ke ut _ guygu mi _ .
