iwernga _ paninang _ ayagyu t llu _ atuqe u luki _ paninang _ taawa _ esghagh anka _ nanigh t _ .
angli naqe llegh ka _ elngaatall _ aghula i te gpenaamta _ , _ qawavek llu _ iq all in iigh y aan un _ pi aqe luta _ , _ apeghiigh nghmegteggu _ aate te kaghqagh _ .
qawaag m _ amiiragh a _ apeghiigh nghmegteggu _ qawavek _ enraq _ iq all ug w anun _ pikayug u ut _ .
iqallug igh ghllag luteng _ tesqawani _ elngaatall _ .
alla _ pamavek _ nuna mun _ enraq _ kiiwhtagh anun _ enraq _ pi aqe lghiit _ .
qanii luteng qun _ kangii nun _ alla _ uteghte pagte luteng _ wetku _ tawaten _ uteghnigh naqe aqe ukut _ pugughilegh mun _ .
liite lleg mni _ elngaatall _ neqetu pigte uq _ .
U pen gh aan negh is t eng _ kiyang _ llangaqa _ n a z igh aan kuk _ tegh ig l ug w en kut _ .
teghiglug _ kuuvragh luku _ , _ tasigu luku _ enkaam _ pi aqe kangat _ .
S u f l ug w aq _ llangaqa _ atuqepag igate kangat _ .
kuuvragh _ neghusigh ke pigte aat _ elngaatall _ teghiglug meng _ .
whanga _ qepghagh yagute magh ma _ kiyang _ n ayug w aq eg ke put _ tapghaghqagh t _ , _ uyiighqagh t _ , _ angalqataasighqagh t _ .
taakut _ N gu sigh m iit _ tagi negh meggni _ tan- qagh u nga llu _ kiyaghte luku _ taawa _ esghagh aqa _ amalleqa _ key- nqigte gpenaan _ .
A g aam _ nayag ke a _ .
El q waagh q un kut _ taakut _ kaate aqe ut _ uksugh mi llu _ qimugsigh meng _ , _ kiig mi llu _ angyagh meng _ .
tamaa na _ amiiragh _ nazighagh _ aate te kaghqagh u luku _ , _ teme kaghqagh _ inglukagh ghqu tete luku _ kinku nun _ tuune aqe kangi _ .
taana llu _ tengghu nagh pigte aqe lghii _ angyaghpag _ ategh a _ T r a d e r _ kaate nghaani _ .
amiiragh _ , _ tapghagh _ , _ sa u a llu _ iv o r y _ , _ aate tke aq llu _ , _ kameg llu _ .
T r a d e- aaq egk angat _ uksugh mun _ naamakaghqagh _ sa u a _ qayuq _ kagimkagh _ .
T o as t _ b r e a d - egh llag u f tuq un _ tamaani _ liite lleg mni _ .
taakut _ enkaam _ atalgute nka _ Q ay g egh taa m _ avaquti a llu _ , _ W es q eg et en kut _ , _ ayuqligh nkut _ , _ T ak eq s iig en kut _ .
napaqagh ghhagh _ taana _ nulightugh luni _ K uk iy ang ameng _ .
ayapghute nkut _ , _ A nag ut aan kut _ , _ A g aan kut _ , _ asag u ma ainkut _ avaquti a _ .
Taa m _ enraq _ kingu aneng _ igaghyagh mun _ entaqun _ sivuqagh mun _ piiwagh qaghaqe luta _ .
whangkuta llu qun _ ang yagh n aghh negh ani _ aghv egh n iigh mun _ piiwagh qaghaqe ukut _ o n e _ m o n t h - ng iigh h aq _ .
enkaam _ tawani _ pii w aq all em m ni _ t aan ang iigh h aq _ ig agh y aatk aq agh put _ , _ whanga llu _ N aagh ul uq lu _ .
Taa m _ tagtale ngiighhagh a _ o n e _ month _ ig agh y aatk aq agh put _ .
whanga _ igaghyagh yuwhaagh llegh ka _ sivungagh mun _ .
sivu nge aghte ukut _ nani _ , _ qafsina _ y e ar s - ngugh tegh llag um agh m a _ .
nategh mii m _ ku ug gha _ tes k i w an l e nguq _ , _ angag ka _ A nagh ay aaq _ .
enkaam _ amalleqa _ qawavek _ tevnegh meggni _ , _ tesqawani _ q em g ugh utaq u kut _ .
apangiighhagh ka _ taana _ naa ma _ ata a _ T ut m ate l ek _ , _ U m a _ .
tea- ma ghhagh gkenka _ naqamalla _ ategh gni _ atuqe kek _ .
sivuligh _ n ul iigh pig aa _ P in i r k ag u f tuq _ naa ma _ qantaghhagh a _ .
enkaam _ allameng _ aviighute yan _ nulightugh luni _ puughhute meng _ nalluke aqa _ .
wetku _ ivagh i ma meng _ nulightugh magh an _ taana _ liisimake aqa _ .
taana llu _ allughqagh at _ siftugh te _ .
E s n igh q w aq lu _ kiyang _ tesqawani _ q em g ugh utaq elghii ni _ taghnughhagh u luta _ salin _ mekestaaghhaatu tete luta _ .
tesqawavek _ pite kayugu ut _ , _ taakut llu _ N ung ug w en kut _ , _ A pe tek in ku t lu _ esghaqagh aqe anka _ , _ W al ang an ku t lu _ taakut _ .
siknegh mun _ pi yamta _ tamaakut _ es ghagh tegh an ka _ .
N aq am en r aq _ nengyugh ka _ taana _ itegh yagh aq _ lii simak ng waagh aqa _ .
kiyang _ I tegh yagh agh meng _ liite aqa _ sa u a _ tamaa na _ k ag p ar egh all eq _ .
kagpag llegh a _ neqe m _ liite aqa _ I tegh yagh agh meng _ akuute llegh i _ sa u aat _ liite qugh anka _ .
qaywa _ wh at egh ll ug w aaq _ apeghtugh aqe yanga _ tawani _ liite gpenaki _ , _ k i nguv aq un _ lii g ik ng waagh an ka _ .
piinlillegh aneng _ iwernga _ apeghtugh llegh an _ liite luki _ sa u a _ yaayasi tke igate aat _ .
talwa _ ng el q aam _ qilu ngiighhagh i _ si pegh qugh waagh luki _ agaghte aqe luki _ .
M et gh aam _ , _ ng el q aam _ itegagh a _ n u v ugh tegh luku _ kinegh ngllagh aqe luku _ .
angiite tke aq _ entaqun _ igataghnagh iqe llegh mun _ .
agnepa llu _ entaqun _ sa u a _ yaayasi tke igate kangat _ .
atugh yaghqagh perewaagh _ sangiighhagh _ qam ag teng ng waagh luni _ .
nunivagseghagh ghhagh mun _ talwa _ tamaavek _ k ag p ar egh all ghi t _ ellnga neng _ lii qugh tegh an ka _ .
nunivag _ , _ ququngagh _ sa u a _ tamaa na _ akugh anun _ kenlanga _ .
akugh _ uglagh u pigte uq _ taawa _ neghe kayug ut _ elngaatall _ .
alqegkagh t llu _ , _ p ugh p u uq et lu _ qallate luki _ kagpag kayugu ait _ , _ q all at ng waagh luki _ uksugh mi _ neqekaghqagh u luki _ .
ila i llu _ akugh ghhagh m _ tamaakut _ suqlag t _ , _ suqlamengestagh t _ akughllug ke i _ ama _ pi kay ug w it _ neqnigh ghllaget _ , _ peknegh t _ .
sa u a _ tamaa na _ neghyaghqagh _ elngaatall _ liilightugh te aqe kangat _ .
ata ma _ A g l ugh aam _ pi aqe kanganga _ , _ â _ sa u a _ esghaghkagh i _ ayvegh m _ aq saq gh w an il nguq _ neghyaghqagh perewaagh u uq _ tepagh u luku _ esghagh kufsigu _ . _ â
enkaam _ amalleqa _ tamaa na _ inghu yaghqaghte a _ aqavzig _ , _ pagunghagh _ , _ kaavlag _ .
Taa ku ngu f tut _ inghu luteng _ enraq _ pi kay ug w et _ .
elngaatall _ aqavzig ghllag u uq _ , _ pagunghagh ghllag u uq _ .
nunivag _ taana _ kiyang _ S ing ig p ameng _ aagken _ pennagh neng _ atate zikun _ tag it egh ll ak ayug w at _ qiipaghagh t _ imigh ghllag luki _ .
laluramke t llu _ esghagh qaghte yug ni tke anka _ laalighte aat _ nalighmeng _ taakut llu _ kiyaghtekau aat _ tesamani _ .
nurse- a llu _ gallegher- meng _ ategh ke lghii _ kaate aghte uq _ .
asag ka _ taana _ up-uma _ emta _ qinuyug ghllagu laatagh uq _ tamaani _ .
liite lleg mni llu _ tawani _ legan _ B i b l e- en eng _ atightugh kayug ni _ , _ ilagagh kayug ni _ , _ yughagh te kayug ni _ .
S un d ay - n kuk _ W e d n es d ay - n kuk _ legan _ taake uk llu _ aflengake lukek _ ayuqe agput _ .
taakut _ elngaatall _ atalgute nka _ q em qagh waagh aqegk en ka _ tag is qell uki _ ellngit llu _ ilagagh aqe luta _ qerngagh emta _ yughagh aqe luta _ .
B i b l e- egh llag et qun _ taawa _ igaqegkaghtuqagh t _ yuvghiigh na ghllaget _ whang kun n l _ taw an te f tut _ , _ naken _ imani _ pi kaqe atki _ umu ghllaget _ .
umuqagh meng _ qaspeghagh ke lghiit _ .
mekestaaghhaa lunga _ whanga _ tengghu nagh lleghpigagh u aqe lghii _ uksugh mi _ elngaatall _ sakmaken _ sivuqagh meng _ qaygeghte aq _ nalighmeng _ A g l ugh aq _ kaate nghmini _ usi igh ghllag luni _ mission _ b o x - ngun iiq egk ang it _ R e d _ C r o s s -en eng llu _ .
Wh ang kun ni _ taghnughhagh ni _ elngaatall _ qiliigh nagh lleghpigagh u aqe lghiit _ , _ tengghu nagh lleghpigagh at _ , _ quyanagh lleghpigagh at _ .
qaywa _ paper _ s a c k - et _ talwa _ es l eq ell ngun at eng _ imaleg u yagh ghngaita _ nuts- meng _ , _ c an d y - meng _ , _ p o p _ c o r n - meng _ whang kun ni _ elngaatall _ quyanagh ghllag t _ .
uksugh mi _ enkaam _ sa yaghqagh ite aqe lghii ni _ , _ entaqun _ sa meng _ i wh an i llegh qam m neng _ quunpeng _ naghaagh ste aqe kanginkut llu _ sa meng _ .
kiyang _ llangaqa _ e x er c is e- es taq egk ang in kut _ ilu anite ghngaamta _ , _ u ul t aat ameng _ sa meng _ peghlaaghwagh meng _ , _ es tugh pag tam eng _ .
tawaten _ ilu ani _ q aw aw aanghi n n em ta _ mekestaaghhagh meng _ uyghagagh u te aqe lghiikut llu _ .
whanga _ angli lleg mni _ igaghyaghqagh llu _ aklunagh pigte aqe lghii _ .
M ag a z in e -em _ ig iit all gh aa kun _ te r ug w it egh llag aq elghii kut _ .
taana _ enkaam _ quunpeng _ whanga _ f av o r i te - k ell uku _ qimugsigh _ usi leg ghllag _ mission _ b o x - meng _ sakmaken _ sivuqagh meng _ tagi lghii _ te r ug w iy uk ell egh pig aqegk egk a _ .
tawani qun _ siv ul igh pig agh mi _ igaghyagh lleg mni _ sivungagh mun _ ar t is t- ngun iiq aat nga _ qayughllak _ entaqun _ uuvganeng _ te r ug w igh llag em _ .
sa u aat _ legan _ te r ug w in em k i _ elqughaghte aqe luki _ .
kiig mi _ amalleqa _ neqamike aqa _ teghigniqe llegh ka _ .
iighaate aqe lghiikut _ , _ veg a llu _ r iig ll ug w allu _ taake ghllaget _ tamaavek _ iighaate aqe lghiikut _ .
sa meng llu _ ategh i _ esgha _ puygu kenka _ , _ naghpigh aqe luki _ aglu t _ ila mta _ inglu ke te luta _ ataasigh _ qam ugh tek luku _ aglu gneng _ naghpigh naqute aqe ke put _ .
qenwat _ naghpigh lleg t _ uglaghi ghllag aqe lghiit _ naghpigh iqe ait _ neghqwaagh t _ tamaakut _ qamugh it _ .
qetgagh te aqe luta llu _ , _ sa u aat _ tamaakut _ naghaagh lleg put _ teghig nagh tun _ avighaate aqe ut _ .
A tuq es ug w aq an ka _ whanga _ maaten _ eltughagh mnun _ .
tamaakut llu _ enkaam _ quyngigh meng _ iv agh in iigh tet _ , _ quyngighqwaagh t _ .
quyngigh ghllag u yagh u uq _ liite lleg mni _ tamaani _ , _ uglagh pestaagh ghllag _ enraq _ kaynge m llu _ entaqun _ malighqagh nghminiki _ pangaleg u ghllag aqe lghii _ quyngigh _ s aam llu _ vegtaagh m _ p ang al g ugh q egh llag aqegk anga _ .
aagken _ imagh a _ P eng ut neng _ aliigh luni _ pamagun _ K ang igh aag ne kun _ kiwavek _ aga _ teve ghllag aqe lghii _ .
allameng _ sivuqagh meng _ uteghnigh yalghiikut _ uvite mi _ nughagh ghhagh t _ legan _ tuquma aqe lghiit _ .
tamaani _ entaqun _ nula ghllag llegh ani _ quyngigh m _ .
ata ma _ A g l ugh aam _ ungipamsug ke nghminiki _ qawani _ quyngigh igh na i aaghet _ P ang aw y in kut _ kinku t _ kiyalighagh mi _ nani _ tesqawani _ .
Q uy ng in nguq _ legan _ qaghlu luki _ qam is lu ug llag et _ uq f il q aagh meng _ tes q aw an l eng ugh meng _ avayagh aneng _ kepugh ghllag luteng _ usi igh nghmegteki _ quyngigh t _ qam ugh tek luki _ qikmigh stun _ .
taawa _ ellnga llu _ igagh lgu uq _ b u c k _ d e er - meng _ quyngigh lgu kau ni yagh uq _ ellmi llu _ .
enraq _ taa m _ kingu aneng _ aviite luta _ salin _ pennaghqute te luni _ sa u a _ maana _ c ar e- en an igh luku _ .
tamaani _ enkaam _ mekestaaghhaa lunga _ quy ng igh y at _ kaate aqe lghiit _ i wh an in kut _ R aa qu un kut _ , _ k in ku ng w aaq at _ ila i _ uglagh _ katelghaate aqe lghii _ .
kiig mi _ enkaam _ anglu ighpag magh ma _ piyug meng llu _ U y at iq aan kut _ maakut _ kaate aqe ut _ quyngigh meng _ iv agh iy at _ .
enkaam _ entaqun _ Agh tuq aa y ag en kut _ , _ Q ay g egh t aan kut _ ig agh y ii s qell uki _ entaqun _ taghnughhagh teng _ siv ul igh pig aag ut _ sivuqagh mun _ n uugh q w aatk at _ liisimake lleg mni _ .
napaqagh ghhagh nkut _ siingenllu _ up-uma _ kiiste i vig meng _ ug w iigh tuq _ .
enkaam _ kayute igh te naqe ni luni llu _ A g l ugh aq _ pi aqe lghii _ , _ sivuqagh mun _ ellnga llu _ pii g w agh tu kut _ i w em g a _ taa m _ kingu aneng _ , _ A g l ugh aq _ aviighute magh an llu _ paninang _ P it ii m _ nayugh ke yagh aa _ elngaatall _ .
nulightugh luni _ pi te i uq _ kaviigh niigh uq _ tesamani _ elngaatall _ .
pi ta igh u uq _ whanga _ ug w iigh um agh m a _ kingu mneng _ taagken _ pi te i uq _ kingulighpigagh u uq _ sivuqagh mun _ lli aqe aq _ .
tawani llu _ pi te i uq _ salin _ kiyaghte luku _ taa ku nguut _ N ung ug w en kut _ , _ qagugh mii _ kelgute luni _ mangteghagh ghhagh a _ atugh naqe ni luku _ aghv egh n iigh mun _ .
Agh v egh llag w aaq elghii _ taa k w n ang iigh h aq _ qantagh aq _ taawa _ taagken _ piinligh kau uq _ maaten _ neli kangat _ itagnatun _ aghv egh n iigh mun _ .
ipa _ whangkuta _ kingulighpigagh u ukut _ .
taana _ apa ka _ A g aq _ kiyaghte luki _ iitek _ entaqun _ s ii v an llegh pig aq aat _ tesamani _ .
iitek _ T ut m ate l g en ku t lu _ kaate aghte aqe ut _ .
kiyang _ qawani _ iqalliniighvig mi _ qerngughte te aqe lghiikut _ taakut llu _ El q waagh q un kut _ q an tagh an teng nguut _ kaate neghtuqagh t _ tesamavek _ .
kiyang _ k iig gun _ tevnga kun _ A pe tek in ku t lu _ taakut _ waamte uute te nkut _ te v egk ayug w et _ .
enkaam _ tamaani _ wetku _ esghagh aqe kegka _ uglagh lghii _ yuug _ .
pugughilegh
U kum am _ apegh llegh a
iighwite luta _ K ar g i _ kiyaghte luku _ , _ entaqun _ talwa _ taghnughhagh pagite ukut _ A g aan ku ni _ .
piqalag _ taake uk _ nunaagh gket _ , _ ne gket _ mangteghagh leg k _ .
ighulugh leg k _ ika _ akmagutagh leg k _ .
iwernga _ mayugh aatagh lleg mni _ imani _ nuna ughtekagh _ .
I ng an taq elghii n nguq _ pennaghte negh meggni _ , _ sivuke luteng _ kuyag nge ma gni _ .
kuyag nge ma gni _ tawani _ kiyaghte luteng _ atghagh aqe lghiit _ agavek _ piqalag nun _ .
taakwagun _ sugugte luteng _ , _ yug w it a _ angaghqugh aqe kangit _ .
aghni ut _ pamagun _ m ay ugh tu utaq elghii n nguq _ .
I tegh yagh aan kut _ , _ W al ku tan kut _ .
esghaghhu nguq _ W al ku t am _ kay aal q ek atagh aqegk anga _ itegh yagh aq _ .
tawaten _ emta _ qu ut qu ut aqegk ang i nguq _ qikmigh t _ , _ A g l ugh aam _ .
amenqun _ P iq al am _ paagna a _ uusqagh ghllag _ tespagani _ .
Taw at en nguq _ iiwenllu nguq _ ivgagh naqe aqe ut _ uugte na luteng _ I tegh yagh aan kut _ ar agh tun nguq _ , _ â _ A g l ugh aq _ ullegh uq _ , _ pennaghqute te uq _ ! _ â _ test- pig ke na _ anigu leg _ .
legan _ taagken _ sa u luki _ usi teng _ qetgegh te aat _ .
ellnga n llu nguq _ iitek _ esghagh aa _ uka _ .
qikmigh a _ talwa _ naa ke i _ .
P al aghh agh m e nguq _ aliigh qaghaqe uq _ .
esghaghhu nguq _ K ar g i _ ataata a _ , _ A g aam _ anengagh a _ , _ sa mi nguq _ sugugte lit _ aga _ nalug tke aq _ .
aga _ taakwagun _ whaa _ siingenllu _ itegh qaghte lghii _ anigu mun _ tespikavek _ .
I wer ng aq un nguq _ sa luku _ pi litgu _ .
aliigh te nghminigu nguq _ pika _ yug u yug lluni _ .
qughagh nghaani nguq _ ima _ talughte te aqe a _ .
ullegh na nigh an _ tawaten _ ukig te ma kangat _ .
aaw yagh ghllag _ , _ naasqugh ghllag a _ u uk nagh llag a _ k iil u ug tegh ll ak aq _ .
navek _ pi kau aat _ tawavek llu _ uugta t _ alaghrang _ piqalag nun _ .
taawa _ taana _ pennaghqute te llegh an _ angegh llegh ke a _ .
qikmigh a _ talwa _ avii tke aat _ naa ke i _ .
taana _ yugusigh ghhagh a _ tugu qaghtekagh at _ .
alignagh yagute aqe kanga _ ilagagh igate ngughk _ naqam _ sa igate ngughk _ , _ K ar g i _ , _ anengagh ni _ A g aam _ .
E s gh h agh u nguq _ yug u pag n ing il nguq _ unguva stekagh a _ A g l ugh aq _ qangigagh ni _ .
kinku u lghii ni _ tuqu yaghqagh _ .
N aa s q wa _ kagimekagh _ .
taakwani _ kingu ani _ whangkuta _ , _ N aa ng iigh aq lu _ allgegh magh an _ , _ ifkagh nqigte laataghkagh _ .
ifkagh gpenani _ kaave i ke ghllag ke aq _ .
talligh kek _ sa ghllag ke ak _ .
N ap aq aghh aan ku nguut _ , _ A g l ugh aan kut _ , _ whangkuta _ M il gh ul ag ni _ N aa ng iigh aq _ , _ nategh mii _ , _ whanga _ .
utaqa i ni _ pennaghtagh neng _ .
N g el q aagh agh y at _ napaqagh ghhagh nkut _ , _ A g l ugh aan kut _ , _ Q ay g egh t aan kut _ .
kingu itneng _ whangkuta _ , _ N aa ng iigh aq lu _ amsakelghii _ tamaani _ , _ ang taa l g ut ku te v z ig ni _ .
neqe meng _ gaagh luta _ , _ apeghiigh luni _ nategh mii _ utaqa i ukut _ manughagh mi _ qakmani _ .
nutem _ paga _ , _ aliigh yalghiimeng _ aga _ qagughrug mi _ tan-kaghyage m _ qula ani _ , _ imani llu _ sukaghllag t _ .
mate- te ghhagh inagh _ aga _ aliighagh ut _ whaa _ ukig ut _ .
kaate yalghiimi _ imani _ seghleghu ut _ .
iwerngaqun _ gginagh ghhagh _ una _ sallghite uq _ .
kaate luni _ manughagh mun _ tafsi igh yalghiimi _ aa w yagh p aghq u _ ifkagh qu uute uq _ .
ilapga qu te aqe uq _ , _ naasqugh ghllag a _ .
aaw ightugh luku _ , _ qantaghqagh leg nun _ aqfaqugh naqe uk _ napaqagh ghhagh nkuk _ , _ Q ay g egh t aan kuk _ .
manughagh mi _ qakmani _ .
whangkuta _ sa aqe ukut _ ilu ani _ .
Q iin ghagh s alghii mi _ imani _ sungghanagh uq _ â _ aglagh uute naqe ukut _ ! _ â _ ima _ aga _ siv ug w agh tuq _ .
pi naqe i nagh ma luta _ aga llu _ A ku l pegh amun _ kaate yaghtugh ma lghii _ .
M al igh q aq ef ut _ N aa ng iigh aq _ , _ whanga _ , _ nategh mii _ .
ima _ aga _ n uugh tugh aq er tagh put _ .
enankin _ nategh mii m _ aga _ k at qagh t aa _ , _ ug w in i _ A g l ugh aq _ , _ arekull _ sa ghllag _ nalpagh ghllag _ kenlanga ii te ghllag _ .
N uq negh tegh aat aq anga _ kaateqaghtagh ung _ .
N aa ng iigh aq lu _ aghn agh aghh al uku _ .
N uq neq luku _ kenigh akun _ tukegh lleghtagh ghllag ni _ , _ legan _ ava igh lleg ke ainkut _ .
pugughilegh mun _ amavek _ aglagh te ainkut _ .
T um ang i llgh anun _ atghagh te luta _ tume nun _ pi aqe luta _ .
ukig te luta _ mayugh aqe luta _ , _ uyghagkagh ightu aghagh a sa _ .
amalka _ qikmigh kun _ tugu laghate luta _ .
aawallu _ S il q in ang ag nun _ kaate aghte ukut _ .
iiwenllu _ samaken _ ukig te luta _ mayugh aqe ukut _ tume nun _ agavek _ ika _ nategh mii _ araghaatagh ghllag _ wasi _ nagaqugh lleqe aat _ , _ ing ar ug p ak _ , _ paghyugh lghiikut _ whangkuta _ .
enankin _ kaa t qagh saq min in kut _ y u wh aa k _ , _ napaqagh ghhagh nkuk _ .
aga _ ima _ , _ whangkuta _ peghte uute luta _ .
amalka _ qikmigh _ neng yagh a _ , _ igleghte naqe a _ , _ A g l ugh aq _ .
sa mi _ kaate lta _ whangkuta _ , _ neghigh pigte luku _ kaat ute ma kagh nge aat _ .
taawa _ ingaghmete uq _ , _ ingaghte ma kangat _ n ek g umalghii _ Agh tuq aa y ag em _ inag mig ke a _ .
aqfaqugh ma kanga _ I tegh yagh aam _ Agh tuq aa y ak _ .
tamaa na _ qanegh mineng _ aaw a _ p aam s ug tegh aq ef t aa _ talligh m _ uu m _ kiitigh llegh a _ , _ at ku g wa _ piig aqe luni _ .
nuqete naagh nghite ngugh t _ qaligh ghhaat _ qiipaghagh t _ , _ at ku g w et _ amighqwaagh t _ .
N aa s q wa _ qukfighte aqe luku _ , _ ag av es aa s luku _ aqume ste luku _ legan _ qanegh mineng _ nusug luki _ uyghag t _ lli aqe ai _ , _ kii _ uyghag ghllag u uq _ amighregagh m _ kiigh a _ .
whaa nguq _ naasqugh _ una _ ukifkagh kaayagh kuni _ unguva nagh u yagh nghite uq _ .
qanegh mineng _ ulu mineng _ , _ n us ug w aq ii _ uyghag t _ ila i _ aange aqe luteng _ .
I w em g aq un _ ef l ugh waagh aq luki _ uy gh ag igh tegh waagh aa _ .
N ek eg r aam s iigh luni _ taagken _ igleghte yaaghte yalghiimi _ piniighte yalghiimi _ ellng in aghh aa yaghq aag pen ani _ , _ quunpeng _ al el igh y un egh tugh q w aal uni _ .
sa uq _ k ak av legh waagh aq luni _ , _ alingruugh ghllag aqe luni _ , _ n ek g aq luni _ .
taawa _ ugpegh llegh gni _ aghula igh te lukek _ .
Wh ang ku ng in aam ta _ alignalghii mun _ pi naqe ghllag _ .
qenwat qun _ A aw y aan kuk _ nulighh ghqu te lghiik _ tagi tke agput _ , _ aqfa kek _ kitum _ , _ at gh ak _ maavek _ .
naqamllu _ sa nghite ak _ , _ temngi _ sa naanghite ni luku _ naten _ y u wh aam _ .
N ul iiq r u wh aa _ taana _ leganqun _ tengghu nagh _ aghnagh ghhagh _ .
nalla ghhagh _ pi uq _ , _ â _ ukughsi _ , _ elpesi ni llu _ quy ang a pig si nga _ ? _ â _ agnepa _ tawatete igate yagh unga _ tug un ghii n em k i _ iilqe ghllag aqe unga _ sa yaghqagh nun _ . _ â _ legan _ aghnagh ghhagh _ qalepangi ghllag _ ilag av aghq ughllak _ .
N u te r n _ pi inkut _ , _ â _ tuqu naanghite uq _ alingutke gpenaan _ .
U m yug w ag ka _ qama _ pi niigh pigte uk _ . _ â
taagken _ yug w em _ k el q ut aaq saq min i nga _ A g l ugh aam _ , _ navek _ pi nghmini _ .
piniighte a _ mulunghituq _ , _ maavek llu _ tagi aqe luni _ .
taawa _ tagtale ke a _ .
angli naqngu lunga
W es q eg e te m _ apegh llegh a
kiig mi _ tesamani _ kiyaghte llegh ut _ .
kii _ , _ ne mete igate ukut _ .
pennagh ni _ kiyaghte luta _ aga _ nasiqe negh meggni _ qawavek _ naayvagh mun _ .
M il gh ul ag n illu _ , _ kuyag nge ma gni _ kiyaghte aqe ukut _ .
alpa _ sa u a _ ng el q aagh aq _ pi iqagh ut _ kiilqusigh _ .
iqallug _ iwerngaqun _ nasiqute luku _ , _ tagi aghte luta _ esnagh mi _ t en tal uta _ kiyaghte aghte luta _ apegh ii negh meg g teg gu _ k ag pag tegh l uta _ itghagh aqe luta _ aghvighteg nun _ .
F o u r te en _ y e ar s - ngugh sim agh m a _ sivuqagh mun _ lliigh ukut _ .
aglagh aqe luta _ , _ piiwagh qagh luta _ .
angyaghpag kun _ aglagh qaghaqe luta _ tagi aqe luta _ .
tagi luta _ qenwat _ ll ii pii g tu kut _ ayuqligh _ igaghyagh lghii _ qayughllak _ tuungligh ka _ .
P iig w ap iig tu kut _ f o u r te en _ y e ar s - ngugh sim agh m a _ .
sivuqaghte negh mta _ I i r g un kun it aq u kut _ , _ ila nga nigh kun _ uu m _ aasa m _ angayuqagh itni _ Agh nagh ll u wh aan kut _ .
angyaghpag t _ pugughilegh mete luta _ kaate aqe lghiit _ T r a d e r _ , _ angyaleg at _ kina _ M r . _ R an ka _ , _ ila nga nigh kun _ Castell _ .
C as te ll - kun _ at a si meng _ sivuqagh meng _ pugughilegh mun _ aglagh ukut _ .
I i r g un ku t gun _ piiwagh luta _ aglagh te ainkut _ taaggun _ .
Taa ku ng in aag ut _ angyaghpag t _ .
igaghyagh llghite unga _ .
sivuqagh mi _ o n e- y e a r _ igaghyagh qagh lunga _ taaqe kau unga _ .
naghaaghute lgu ukut _ sa meng _ ulimaagh meng _ , _ unaghsigh meng _ nagh agh u teng ll aq at _ , _ qamiye u aq _ , _ angyaghwaagh _ , _ sa u a _ .
uqfigagh t qun _ amen _ tangigh llegh ghqu aaghet _ pi c ku p _ s t i c k s - k ell uki _ tamaaken _ naghaagh te kaqsagh ukut _ , _ iighhagh u te meng _ , _ qawawaagh meng _ .
M e tegh ll ug waagh et _ sa u aat _ un agh s ii w aq ll uteng _ .
mangteghagh t _ Agh tuq aa y ag en kut _ , _ A g l ugh aq _ , _ whangkuta _ .
guygu mun _ whangkuta _ lliigh ukut _ lii t ng waagh um agh m a _ neqamike aqa _ .
entaqun _ taakut _ qemtagh ghllag mi _ napaqagh ghhagh nkut _ ata ke te lghiit _ tawani _ whangkuta _ guygu mun _ lliigh ukut _ .
angyat nge llegh _ nalluke aqa _ , _ liisagh lghiinga _ taawa _ angyaghwaagh lgu ukut _ .
entaqun _ P e d er s en - meng _ pik n iiq aat _ .
nekreg te nkut llu _ tes am an tagh taq luteng _ entaqun _ anglegute mini _ tawani _ Agh tuq aa y ag mi _ esghagh aatagh aqe anka _ kaate aghte nghata _ ilangani _ .
Ung ip am s ug w et _ tamaakut _ ila i _ enraq _ al ing yug w em _ , _ kiyang _ i ghi v g agh mi _ ungipamsug te lghii neng _ .
I p ang ugh tes ug n igh q w aan gh ata _ al ing y ag un n em k i _ ila i _ , _ naa ke i _ q av aghn aq r ag k iigh em _ .
qevuute lunga _ qemall _ ilangani _ q iv gh uk aq ll uki _ .
sangan lli _ nag at ng waagh nan igh si nga _ .
puygu ma anka _ ungip am s ug w et _ sa u aat _ nagate ghllag luki _ .
qemall _ whaa _ neqangugh lleqe anka _ .
amalka _ esgha _ legan _ liite lleg mni _ e x er c is e- es tegh llag um aaq in kut _ estughte pagte aq _ sa u a _ , _ q et g aq _ e x er c is e- e sim aaq egk ang in kut _ esgha _ naghaagh ste nghmegtekut _ , _ pin igh y u ug tes taq iin kut _ .
aanqaghte luta _ alla _ mangteghagh t _ uzifqaghte luki _ wiin _ neghe ste gpenaamta _ .
I gh s aan ing i tes qell uta _ entaqun _ pin igh y u ug tes qell uta _ malighqutagh ke u yalghiikut _ legan _ .
kii _ , _ naghaaghute _ all aagh iin aq _ sa u a _ nagh aal qu s iigh utk aq saq ef ut _ .
pugughilegh m _ P an egh aa te llgh a
U kum am _ apegh llegh a
A nag ut aam _ taana _ ungipamsug ke kanga _ p an egh aat egh llak _ .
talwa _ ellnga _ nukalpigagh u luku _ , _ ungipamsug ke yaghqagh a nguq _ talwa _ urang _ seghleghu uq _ .
Q am ag teng ng waagh luni _ pugughilegh _ yug w iq aa _ , _ ig at am _ s aam _ q in u yug w em _ .
mesiighllug kun _ anigu t _ nepte luki _ negh aqe luki _ .
nanigh m _ peqagh i _ , _ u qu ll ug w i _ , _ ellngagh ta i _ qaamkut _ negh aqe luki _ .
avaqutagh teng _ paneghte yu i ma kangit _ .
taagavek _ aane te luki _ kiiw m _ inglu anun _ lli aqe luki _ , _ kay aal i m _ ukavek _ lliigh ut _ .
taagani _ kayaali llegh mi _ , _ legan _ amig meng _ aane ste luki _ ifkaghte aqe kangit _ , _ manughagh mun _ tawavek _ .
qenwat _ aane te nanigh ma kangit _ .
taana ta _ P it ii m _ iiggekagh a _ a sim m n il nguq _ saamna _ yug meng _ imaqe ghllag uq _ .
Agh ul iigh tu utegh l ag luteng _ .
katamqun _ anagte u ma lghiit _ I tegh yagh aan kut _ , _ A g aan kut _ , _ A nag ut aan kut _ , _ napaqagh ghhagh nkut _ uy ugh aq ut alghiit _ .
pamavek nguq _ mayugh aqe lghiit _ taslugh kete te luteng _ .
sa meng _ neqe meng _ iv agh im s ug yagh aq elghii t _ napaqagh ghhagh nkut _ I tegh yagh aan kut _ .
tamaani nguq _ tuqu quqagh _ , _ llivegh _ .
K ang k iil ghem _ pegh y al q aani _ taakwani _ .
entaqun _ iglegh taa yagh luteng _ panegh pigesnaghkagh t _ , _ negh ke igh llegh m _ .
S iq l ug w am _ , _ iigge llegh i _ afsengagh m _ sa i _ negh ugh aq luki _ , _ mesiighllug vyiigh ghhagh i _ negh ugh aq luki _ .
megh kun _ pugughilegh _ neqe igh ghllag kaqe na iqe kanga _ A nag ut aam _ .
L eg an nguq _ tuugtagh t _ aane te luki _ kaate nghata _ maaken _ , _ aa v g un egh meg g tek i _ q uk i kun _ aafkagh inagh aqe luki _ .
A q im l en nguq _ tuugtagh m _ aveg llegh m _ katamngwaagh _ .
P an egh aa te llgh ani _ tamaani _ .
neqetu yagh lghii _ pugughilegh _ .
sivuqagh _ igataghnagh _ .
iwernga _ megh kun _ pugughilegh m _ negh ka aneng _ anagkagh t _ entaqun _ .
T es am an te kaa y alghii kut _ siipnegh ghhagh ni _ angayuqagh gka llu _ , _ ang leg uk agh aan k allu _ , _ taa w ar aa ghi n aq _ nanevgaghtagh ut llu _ .
tazikani _ A nag ut aan kut _ , _ atghagh u yankut _ , _ Agh tuq aa y ag en kut _ .
taawa _ pugughilegh m _ yug ke aa _ .
T ut m ate l g en kut _ neghigh pigte luteng _ mekestaaghhaa luta _ talwa _ itghaghkagh t _ sivungagh mun _ .
A nagh ay aam _ itghagh tke ai _ .
Q aaq w aan kut _ , _ T ut m ate l g en kut _ , _ puughhute nkut _ .
taakut _ itghagh tke ai _ aki vig nkut _ , _ tagnegh linkut _ panig ni _ ila i _ .
Q aw ag em _ amighqwaagh i _ , _ atkug ngllaghkagh t
nanevgaghtagh mta _ ungipagh iqe te igate kanginkut _ .
K u ku leg m iin nguq _ pugughilegh mun _ piyug uute ghllag negh meggni _ upenghagh mi _ .
sagnegh _ pakegtekagh _ , _ akmag ke luku _ qayugh te aq _ .
sukilpagh mun _ , _ qawaag m _ amighqwaagh anun _ .
kiyang _ aate kau yaghpete ut _ ng el q aan kut _ , _ sukilpagh nkut _ , _ alpa nkut _ , _ naghuyagh nkut _ , _ q aq s ung iin kut _ .
esghaghteqagh nka _ angayuqagh ma _ naa ma _ ulima aqe kangi _ .
qaqsungigh at _ atkug u luteng _ entaqun _ alpa stun _ 3 5 - nguut _ .
naghuyagh t _ , _ ngelqagh stun _ 2 5 - nguut _ .
sukilpagh t _ 8 5 - ngu luteng _ at ku g w et _ .
akmaliighagh ghhagh t _ tamaakut _ 1 0 0 _ atkug u luteng _ n aam ak ayug w et _ .
amighqwaagh t _ esghapag lleg mni _ sivuke luki _ ghhute kun _ ghhute ngllaghkagh kun _ tequgh kun _ , _ naagu _ s o ap - eng iigh h aq _ aghvig nghminiki _ naa ma _ , _ talwa _ whanga _ , _ q at egh r ak g al ek _ taa q n em tek i _ .
I n in aq n em tek i _ , _ tequgh ghhagh t _ te qugh p aag tek aghh aat _ mesiigh meng _ kuuve luki _ q at egh q w aa s luki _ .
angighhwaagh luki _ amighqwaagh t _ .
itghuugute neghsigh luki _ , _ ini luki _ .
N eng t aghh n em tek i _ , _ aa y q at egh r ak e tun _ .
whanga _ qantaghaqun _ taaqe kanga _ tamaaken _ amighqwaagh meng _ qepghagh nghmeng _ .
ighleg yagute yatnga _ taaqe unga _ .
aki ngllagh ghllagu yalghiinga _ amighqwaagh meng _ tamaaken _ , _ ng el q aan ku g neng _ , _ al p an ku g neng _ , _ s uk il p aan ku neng _ .
Q ug w in ii _ sivuke luki _ keligagh aqe ke put _ .
G ev es teng ng waagh luki _ ngelqagh at _ , _ naghuyagh t _ .
qateg i _ ukut _ atugh aqe ut _ qamagte luteng _ .
qateg i _ allakagh meng _ atugh u ut _ , _ salleg i _ allakagh meng _ .
pinighhalek _ at ku g w et _ maqagh ghhalek _ .
ghhuu yaghqagh ghhagh u nghite ngugh t _ .
aghsughtagh ghhagh meng _ kiigh mig luki _ , _ ngelqagh at _ qaasligh ke luki _ .
quyngigh meng _ amigh meng _ il ep ghagh luteng _ .
kavighyaag meng _ kavighte luki _ amigh t _ taakut _ , _ il ep gh aagh et _ k av i r r ak g al ek _ pinighhalek _ .
T em k agh luki _ aat kay ug w et _ .
I tegh yagh aam _ ungipamsug te nghminikut _ sangita _ p aam ku gh h m ii ng it a _ nalighnegh ita _ upenghagh u uute nghatni nguq _ n ugh agh meng _ , _ neqe meng _ , _ amigh meng _ atghagh te ghllag aqe kanga _ , _ tagite aqe kangat _ .
sa eng _ nayag eng _ taana _ P ang anga _ tagite aqe kangat _ , _ P ang ang aa w en _ upenghagh u ta a _ tamaghhagh an _ , _ amigh _ , _ neqe _ , _ quyngigh _ , _ tawaqapig _ .
talwa _ esghaghkagh nka _ tawaqapig i _ .
sungaghyug kegtagh ghllag t _ ququngagh ghllag t _ iknaqe ghllaget _ tawaqa t _ .
ila i _ sungaghyaag u aqe luteng _ .
taana qun _ naa ma _ imeg te a _ , _ maana _ nazighagh _ qukaa kun _ kepe luku _ tamaaken _ imaleg _ .
iknaqe ghllag _ , _ tawaqa isag negh meggni _ ikute aqe luteng _ taagken _ amiiragh meng _ taapekagh meng _ .
maaten _ esghapag lleg mni _ tawaqa llu _ allangughte uq _ .
melugyaghqagh _ allangughte uq _ .
pugughileghmii t
pugughilegh mi _ U kum am _ angayuqagh kek _ A g aan kuk _ I tegh yagh aan kuk _ .
avaquti a _ anglegute nka _ uglagh u pigte lghiit _ .
qule u yaghpete ukut _ pi nga yu t _ siipnegh ke luki _ , _ k in ku gh y aw aat _ .
liisimakekagh ghhagh nka _ atghagh u yankut _ , _ A g l ugh aan kut _ , _ Q ay g egh t aan kut _ , _ napaqagh ghhagh nkut _ , _ K av nagh u un kut _ .
L ii sim aku q en ka _ taakut _ .
A g aam _ taa m _ nayag i _ ivagh i ma nkut _ , _ tan- qagh u yankut _ , _ W es q eg et en kut _ , _ saghumig m _ avaquti a _ .
N aagh ul uq _ ama _ sa ke aa _ .
K ar g i _ taana _ anengagh a _ , _ megh mi _ tuqukagh _ , _ ighnegh ghhagh a llu _ A g aam llu _ ighnegh a _ .
negaghaghni ii aagh mi _ uksugh mi _ S ing ig p ami _ taawani _ .
quunpeng _ negaghagh niigh ghllaget _ taakut _ m et ghagh meng _ .
kangghwaag _ un aku gh aqegk angat _ .
emta _ tawaten _ negaghagh yagh luteng _ aviite ut _ tazimante ut _ .
unaami _ iv agh yagh tugh yaq meg tek i _ , _ taawa nguq _ qawaagtagh teng _ allakagh ita _ , _ avaqutagh mi _ qawaagtagh ghhagh i _ allakagh ita _ negaghagh ghhagh i _ ellnga n _ .
uugte ma lghii nguq _ kanaken _ aghipatuumagh mi _ .
tawani _ y at aagh qell uki _ taakut _ aga nguq _ taaggun _ ategh ma lghii _ .
taawa _ tazimante ut _ .
taakut _ T ut m ate l g en kut _ tes am an tek at _ esghaghkagh nka _ aki vig nkuk _ A nagh ay aan kuk _ avaqutagh kek _ T ut m ate l g em _ , _ nulighh a _ P in i r k ak _ .
I tegh yagh aam _ ku ug gha _ taana _ T ut m ate l ek _ .
itegh yagh aq _ naa ka _ , _ quutmii t _ panig at _ .
taana _ I tegh yagh aam _ ata a _ G ug w ii ng en _ .
N ul iigh pig ani _ tuqu yan _ ungazigh mun _ nulightugh yaghtugh luni _ , _ G ug w ii ng en _ .
atghagh yalghiimi nguq _ P ang ang ang u f tuq _ nulighh a _ .
enkaam _ I tegh yagh aan kuk _ , _ N ap aq aghh an kuk _ avaqutagh kek _ .
tuqu yan _ , _ kukuleg mun _ qawavek _ nulightugh yaghtugh ma lghii _ .
tagi yalghiimi _ nuliigh ligh luni _ W aa ll ameng _ .
talwa _ whanga _ esghaqagh kaqe a _ , _ aghnagh ghllag _ kukuleg mii _ .
taana llu _ G ug w ii ng en _ esghaqagh vyiigh kaqe aqa _ .
taana _ W aa ll a _ iwerngaqun _ pe k am _ tuqu tke a _ .
taana _ G ug w ii ng en _ ug w i nga _ sa meng _ q ug w el ng i meng _ negh neghllug te luni _ tuqukagh _ .
umeg ke i
A y um i r ug llak _ , _ neghigh luku _ tesamani _ umeg ke i _ aghnagh _ tuquma lghii _ .
taglaate luku _ kiiw m _ taagavek _ inglu anun _ ika _ aliite uq _ .
T all im aneng _ qavagh yan _ ug w ing an _ esghagh yaghtugh ma kanga _ .
taakwegken _ nenglu neng _ ag ig saq min igu _ ika nguq _ aqume luni _ .
taku luku _ aaggun _ uyavagh qu te _ alingyug ke m _ .
aghnagh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ alinge yu ke gpenanga _ tea- ai _ taku nga _ , _ tea- ai _ aqfa nga _ . _ â
aglagh luni _ yuug _ , _ si q in ghem _ aghnagh _ q at egh r ak g it agh ta _ tagneghkwaagh lug ni _ siqinegh ghllag ke aq _ , _ ugu te ghllag ke aq _ .
tagite a _ atghagh te a _ , _ ighsa uq _ ne mun _ itegh nghmeng _ .
T es q ag ag un _ uvite megteggun _ tan pegh h ek _ ayagsigh lukek _ ne ke ak _ .
Taw an ll uku _ , _ sa yaghqagh t _ negh kangit _ ighsa kaqe luki _ .
pi niigh luni _ ungipamsug kekagh a _ kingu liigh aq _ allangughte lleqe ni luku _ .
lengaaghsi magh mi _ , _ qelmeghte magh mi _ , _ qilag kun _ igleghte yaaghte yaghqagh _ .
L eg an nguq _ esnagh mun _ un Ê¼ g avek _ ugkelli yaghtugh aqe lleqe ut _ kinguliighagh put _ whangkuta _ .
taawa _ elqughte a _ .
ipapik _ tuqu nqigte ma lghii _ mulu luni _ qafsina _ ayumiqullegh _ atugh luku _ .
ataata ngiighhagh ma _ A nag ut aam _ esghagh kaqe na iqe kanga _ umeg ke i _ taana _ .
Taa ku ng in aa f tu kut _ whanga _ liisagh lghiinga _ katam _ family- ngiighhagh ni _ pugughilegh mi _ , _ A g l ugh aan kut _ .
l wer ng aq un _ tazikegkut _ A nag ut aan kut _ , _ Agh tuq aa y ag en kut _ , _ atghagh u yankut _ .
Agh tuq aa y ak _ S iv uq aghh m ii _ .
igagh a _ taana _ Taa s n a _ .
esla m _ seghlegh m _ tesamagun _ qaakekagh at _ .
talwa _ uksugh _ qukaghte ste gpenaan _ tagikagh _ .
laluramke meng _ esghaate igate ngugh ni _ pugughilegh mi _ .
angyagh t _ ayvegh m _ kangllukagh i
taakut _ ayumightagh ghllag t _ aviitete te luta _ , _ A g l ugh aghh iin aan kuk _ A t gh aa ng an kuk _ avaqutagh ke u lukek _ .
agigte te nkut _ taakut _ angyagh t _ G ug w ii ng en kut _ angyaghut _ .
nani _ t aan Ê¼ g ani _ nalle inagh mi _ ayvegh m _ kanglu ghllag aatagh luki _ taakut _ G ug w ii ng en kut _ anag ma lghiit _ .
Taa kun nguq _ sama _ qagegh ta ghllag t _ .
Q aag ghii s an _ taku luki _ pi yaq meg tek i _ megh _ yug ghllag _ , _ taakut _ agigte te nkut _ panig i _ , _ nulighh a _ , _ avaquti a _ .
ategh ka llu _ taw an n ii _ .
K an u ug ll un i nguq _ iimna _ megh _ .
angyagh t _ aagh w ng agh mi _ naa f qell uni _ .
T aan ang in aghh agh nguq _ ategh ka _ pukanegh llgagh u yagh lghii _ s u f l it agh mi _ .
Taa m _ apangiighhagh mta _ ighsake ma kanga _ qaake lleghqagh a _ .
legan _ unite luki _ taglagh ma lghiit _ .
K i ngu ng it ne nguq _ taakwani _ kiig mi _ qikmigh at _ naave ut _ mulaagh te aatagh ghllaget _ .
K ang k ii legh mi _ ing an s alghiit _ P egh y al q am _ uk ak agh aani _ mangteghagh at _ .
qikmigh ke te luki _ tuqu qugh ma ait _ , _ mangteghagh ke te luki _ panegh qugh ma kangit _ .
nanugh m _ T aghn ugh h iiq eng ell gha
nenglu it _ tamaakut _ ayumightagh ghllag t _ .
aviite luki _ talwa _ I tegh yagh aan kut _ tugutu te mangite luki _ .
entaqun _ ayumigh _ yugtu pigte yagh lghii nguq _ m a tu meng _ talwa _ .
nenglu i _ estamat _ yugtu ghllaget _ .
aatghute ghllag negh meggni nguq _ t aghn ugh h ap er ug w aaq _ unite luku _ .
angyaghugh te ghllag negh meggni _ .
tesamani _ esnagh mi _ naghaagh te ghllag aqe lghiit _ , _ taghnughhagh it _ .
alla _ tawaten _ nagh aagh utegh llag lu te nguq _ amaken _ U y g un aneng _ nanugh ghllag m _ ivgagh ma aki _ qughsatku m _ .
qughsatku m _ uugte vike ma kangi _ .
nanugh ghllag m _ tuqu qugh ma a _ taghnughhagh _ tamaa na _ .
A t a sigh h iin aq _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ anagkagh _ .
tuqu quqagh ni _ tamaa na _ negh u um aa _ ila i _ siipte aqe luki _ , _ naa squghhagh inagh i _ negh aqe luki _ , _ nak agh iin ii _ negh aqe luki _ .
Tam lagh qu s alghii meng _ taghnughhagh ghllag _ , _ kanug ghllag _ kaana _ esnagh m _ kenle ani _ .
T aghn ugh iigh waagh luni _ , _ ataasigh ghhagh _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ legan _ .
taamna _ taghnughhagh igh vig _ , _ naghaagh vig it _ akullghute aat _ aki itnite ngughk _ .
taghnughhagh _ naghaagh yagh te ghllag aqe lghii _ taamavek _ .
esghaghhu _ taakut _ kaave ghllag ma ut _ qula at _ .
sama _ taghnughhagh a _ qam ag teng ng waagh luku _ peghu ghllag qagh a _ naghaagh vig at _ .
neqamike llegh ka _ pugughilegh mete luta
ayapghute m _ apegh llegh a
whanga _ ayapghute u unga _ , _ napaqagh ghhagh m _ panig a _ , _ K uk iy ang am _ panig a _ .
N g us iig ni _ allgegh kau unga _ O c t o h e r _ 2 9 , 1 9 2 7 _ .
ayumiqullegh _ ataasigh _ N g us iig n ill unga _ pugughilegh mun _ aglagh kanga _ .
napaqagh ghhagh meng _ K uk iy anga _ ug w iigh umalghii _ .
tesamani _ liite unga _ .
K em ug y i ngu yagh pe tuq _ K uk iy ang am _ ug w ik s u wh aagh a _ .
sivugh qaghte luni _ sivuqagh meng _ maaken _ aglagh yagh luni _ i f l ang waagh al uni _ tuqu kau uq _ , _ ghhuu kau uq _ .
qikmigh ghhagh inagh ghhagh a _ megh yaghq ugh te nga _ El q waagh qu m _ apegh kaqe a _ kaate tke aq _ .
napaqagh ghhagh mi _ tawani _ liite unga _ .
liisagh lghiinga _ Q ay g egh t aan ku t lu _ , _ napaqagh ghhagh nkut llu _ q er ng agh m e tu te f tu kut _ .
taakut _ A g l ugh aan kut _ allakagh mete ut _ .
A g aq _ esghaqagh kaqe a _ .
itegh yagh aq _ nayugh ke ghllag kaqe aqa _ .
A g aq _ aghuliigh yaghtugh magh an _ taghtugh kau unga _ .
taawa _ ingaghte luni _ qinuyug u uq _ , _ ighu a _ uki nga lghii _ sa u aat qun _ maame igate ngugh t _ , _ agha lgu aqe yagh kata _ tamaani _ entaqun _ pinigh aqe nayagh lghii _ .
iwerngaqun _ manu ani _ tawani _ qavagh aqe lunga _ ellnga ni _ .
A l i a _ tawaten _ qavagh laatagh lunga _ taghtugh yalghiinga _ nuugte ma kangatnga _ .
pi yalghiinga _ tuquma lghii _ .
A g aq _ napaqagh ghhagh nkut _ ata ke aat _ , _ nulighh a _ itegh yagh aq _ .
liite lleg mni _ ne t _ malghugnegh t _ iwerngaqun _ atghagh u yankut _ taakut _ pi ng ayuq luki _ .
tawaten _ kiyaghtekayug ni _ uksughte aqe luta _ kiigtagh ke luta _ ayumiqullegh t _ atugh aqe luki _ .
sivuqagh m _ n ate tu l nga _ whanga qun _ nalluke yagh aqa _ .
whanga qun _ 1 7 _ y e ar s - ngugh sim agh m a _ maavek _ lliigh kau unga _ .
S a tugh q w aa k ang in kut _ q in uy u tugh h naq aat agh llag et _ enkaam _ maavek _ sivuqagh mun _ tawaten _ agha leg nun _ tagi i aghagh u aatagh lghiit _ kayaali naqe ghllag ughte lghiit _ .
sa meng _ agha ite ngugh u lghiit _ tesamani _ , _ m aa ke ng in aghh aq _ agh ang egk ayug w et _ .
maapi i aghagh u aatagh llegh ut _ liisimake aqa _ .
maapi luta _ aglagh aqe luta _ pi iigh aataghkagh ni _ .
K u z aat am _ aqfa aqe kanginkut _ ang yagh tu mun _ , _ yug w is ag llag ul uni _ .
enkaam _ maaken _ neqe ngllagh luteng _ aglagh te aqe luta _ .
maani _ mangteghagh ite yagh ukut _ .
tazikna _ kitum _ I v ig ug w em _ pik sagh aa _ .
taakut _ liisimake anka _ M aa y aan kut _ wh a teng w aaq _ , _ alike magh ita _ esghagh kaqe anka _ .
upenghagh mi _ neqe niigh aqe ut _ esavghagh luteng _ , _ ataasigh ghhagh neng _ ayveghagh qaghaqe ut _ maklagte aghte aqe ut _ tawaten _ y u pag il nguut _ , _ qerngughte luteng _ , _ angyagh _ ataasigh _ .
J un e- ngugh h negh ani _ elngaatall _ tawani _ un aku gh aq ut _ inwa _ ghhuugh ghhagh mun _ .
kuuvragh kun _ negaghpag kun _ maagun _ o aten _ ii s tu t k alghii kun _ .
tapghagh at _ , _ qasiqagh m _ amenqun _ tamaaken _ keleve te luteng _ inwa _ gh h uugh s ugh n aghh aq _ .
ghhuugh teng _ it aku m t aagh llag it _ .
Wh a teng w aaq _ an Ê¼ g il q ug pen aam ta _ nanugh meng _ kelengaruugh ni _ , _ qayughllak _ nanughtuqagh _ .
A q iy ag aq iin kut _ , _ es tug w aam llu _ negh ka aneng _ aglagh te aghte aqe ainkut _ .
maaken llu _ quyngigh lgu luku _ piyug meng _ kaate aqe ut _ sivungagh meng llu _ maaken llu _ .
kaynge lgu luku _ , _ kaynge _ ama _ taana _ mekestaaghhaa luta _ esghagh kaqe a _ .
angli ghllag magh an _ ighleg yagute aqe kanginkut _ , _ legan _ iiwen _ iiskughte aqe kanginkut _ navek _ aghulaqe lleghqagh ut _ .
qayughllak _ neqe mnneng _ tegleg u ghllag _ , _ qikmigh put _ tuqute aqe luki _ .
B r o w n - ngu uq _ color-nga _ tag neq eg negh i tuq _ .
T aan ang in aag uq _ nagate kaqe a _ kaynge _ ataasigh ghhagh _ , _ ava ite ngugh u yagh lghii _ kay ng eng it n uy alghii _ .
A g l ugh aan kut _ taakut _ napaqagh ghhagh nkut _ kingulighpigagh ughtekagh t _ .
taawa _ aglagh yug nanigh uq _ sivuqagh mun _ lliigh u aghte uq _ iilqayug kanigh lghii _ yug w ii te m _ .
nenglutuqagh _ , _ iigge snanigh aqe kanginkut _ neghsagh meng _ nuyaaghqagh ii na yukagh mta _ amenqun _ tepe a _ sa u a _ aliigh na yu kan _ igh l ek el u ug ut angat _ .
wetku _ qagi inagh ghhagh m _ aliighte nghagu _ naalkute aghte aqe ukut _ tug ut lu wh agh meng _ , _ tuugkagh ghhagh meng _ .
tawatete ut _ iwerngaqun _ nengyugh mta _ ungip am s ug wa _ I tegh yagh aam _ taana _ mangteghagh squghhagh _ , _ ku ug gh an _ uuknaliqe aqngami _ nekeftekaqe a _ c h u r c h - e ngu luku _ .
tagtalmi _ sa u aat _ angyaghpag t _ kaate luteng _ te a c h er - k aghq aq _ tes am ag un nguq _ qaake ma kangat _ .
tesamani _ enkaam _ igaghyagh vleghagh kau ma lghiit _ esgha _ .
napaqagh ghhagh nkut _ A g l ugh aan kut _ taakut _ nekreg te nkut _ tesamavek _ pi luteng _ nagnegh luteng _ , _ W aal an kut _ , _ ayuqe inkut _ tesamani _ igaghyagh te ma lghiit _ , _ U n iigh taq aan kut _ .
taana llu _ liisimake kegka _ G e is t- ta _ .
taawa _ d y n am i te - tegh llag et _ , _ entaqun _ mining- u aqe ut _ .
tesamani _ uksugh ghqu ghllag ut _ , _ uksughte aatagh ut _ .
taana _ mangteghagh ghhagh _ guygu ngiighhagh _ qaake llegh a _ liisimake aqa _ .
N an ek - e kun _ angyaghpag squghhagh kun _ angaghqugh kaqe aat _ .
kaviigh meng _ , _ ulimaagh meng _ qerngughte te luteng _ Q ay g egh t aan kut _ kakikagh meng llu _ ila luki _ tukfigh iqe aat _ .
tesamna _ maaten _ una _ aghqelli ma ut _ , _ uusqagh ghllag yagh uq _ .
anuqe m _ tagtalmi _ tuquuqagh i _ entaqun _ anate te m _ naranghigh luni _ aghqelli kaqe aat _ .
uusqagh ghllag yagh uq _ , _ an uq ek eg tegh llag tuq _ tesamna _ .
anuqligh nghmini _ mangteghagh t _ q ap r ag taq egk angi _ , _ uusqagh te mineng _ .
taana _ mangteghapig _ , _ napaqagh ghhagh llu _ qu ug w et _ quupe aqe luki _ pinighsagh qaghkagh ut _ , _ ul im ak aq agh put _ whangkuta _ .
nenglu u yagh uq _ sivuke luni _ .
nenglu mi _ tawani _ liite kau unga _ , _ nenglu m _ ilu ani _ .
enkaam _ unaghsigh meng _ pi iigh aatagh yan _ angaghqugh aqe luki _ , _ quupe aqe luki _ ul im al agh te qagh put _ .
tanpegh meng _ pii k nal igh luku _ .
A g aan kut _ nenglu meng _ tawavek _ nuugtekagh t _ enkaam _ taw an lluni _ tuqu kau uq _ .
nulighh a _ taana _ aq s all ug w em _ iwerngaqun _ taawa _ un am taq e pig es naq aqaa _ .
ayaa yaghtugh ngestagh aqe uq llu _ , _ whaten _ t aghn ugh h agh es tun _ lliigh kestagh aqe uq llu _ esghaghhu qun _ nagh aal g utk en naq aq eg ke f ut _ .
nengyugh ghhagh inagh mta _ ungipamsug te aghte vyiigh qaghaqe ainkut _ .
A g aam _ ata i _ taakut _ k in ku ng w aat _ uvegh luteng _ tuqukagh t _ l v el gh ani _ taakwani _ , _ qungughvig ni _ entaqun _ kangsumqaghte luteng _ tuqukagh t _ .
qerngagh emta _ Agh nagh aghn iq lu _ , _ ayuqligh llu _ ang l ik a kut _ r o o m - a _ entaqun _ mangteghagh _ una _ k ag p ell iigh agh luku _ aa f q eng er taa tu kut _ .
N ul agh il ghii n iq un _ k ag p ell iigh agh aqegk angi _ mangteghagh t _ f am il y - tugh llegh h ii ni _ .
tagtalmi _ nani _ tamaani _ esla m _ seghlegh m _ ang uugh em _ neqangisag luta _ lliigh ukut _ .
qayugh m _ aw ar k ing iigh h ii _ uqug ligh aqe luki _ neqekagh ke ke put _ .
T an pegh h et _ p uu f luki _ tapghaghqagh t _ gaagh luki _ .
S iq l ug w am _ p uy an eq r u wh aa _ kelig aqe luku _ , _ tawaten _ neq ek egk agh put _ .
E ll m aa r agll eq _ maligte luku _ aliillegh _ maligte luku _ sakma _ J an u ar y - mi _ tawani _ N ay eg r egh aq _ aghvenge aqe uq _ mangtag ghllag t _ kaat ute i aat _ El q waagh q un kut _ , _ K u z aat an kut _ .
taawa _ neqete ukut _ .
naten _ sangamta _ negh ke igh te qaghte ghllagkagh ni _ sangamta _ , _ esla m _ seghlegh m _ entaqun _ .
T egh ig l ug w em _ inglu i _ , _ uksaagh mi _ un aku gh llag luku _ tanpegh nun _ kanaghte uute aqe luku _ kayu _ , _ iqallug _ , _ qagugh ak _ k ag pag tegh aqegk angat _ uksugh mi _ negh yaghqaa luki _ .
nalighnegh ghhagh a _ egh q al ik agh teg pen aan _ .
qawaag m _ itegagh i _ nuvugh aqe luki _ agaghte uute aqe luki _ uksugh mi _ p uu f luki _ , _ aghi ste luki _ , _ gaagh luki _ negh aqe ke put _ .
kiyang _ nulugh yagh qaghaqe ukut _ tagtalmi _ , _ iq s ap ag il ngugh ni _ tamaani _ .
nulugh yagh llegh _ tamaghhagh an _ s u f l ug w al iq aam ang in aq _ , _ nanugh meng _ k el eng ar uugh em _ .
N egh ev legh aq es t ani _ tawaten _ .
riigh nge ka inagh _ angyaghpag _ , _ at a sigh h iin agh meng _ pedersen _ esghaqagh kaqe a _ .
kingulighpigagh u ni luku _ pugughilegh mun _ usingigh iqe aq _ .
Taa q n iit ngu f tugh nguq _ iglegha llegh a _ .
Taa m _ kingu aneng _ riigh nge gkankut _ , _ N an ek -en kut _ kaate aqe ut _ tesamavek _ sivulii luteng _ pugughilegh kun _ tekite aqe ut _ .
taagken _ k i nguv aq un _ sivuqagh mun _ , _ sivungagh mun _ pi aqe ut _ .
akilpegagh aqe ut _ kagimkagh _ , _ iiqmig _ , _ tawaqa _ entaqun _ avelghagh igate kangat _ , _ sikeriigh t _ .
avlawa qun _ iitek _ p iiq eg ke f ut _ qayuq _ .
qayugh t _ tamaakut _ I ii s alghii nga _ qamagun _ f o il - el g et _ qaye i _ vegaagh t _ J ap an es e- e meng _ ategh leg t _ , _ tu m ap ag il nguut _ neqnigh ghllaget _ .
F o il - eng i _ tamaakut _ Agh nagh aghn iq lu _ elngaatall _ teghigniqe tke aqlaatagh ke put _ aksaqe luku _ tegleg luki _ g gu te r n teg gun _ m a teg taq luki _ .
iqenge negh mta _ q el megh uu tes qell uki _ iingqagh put _ .
Wh a teng w aaq _ enraq _ pi gpenaamta _ , _ nagate snanigh aqe kanginkut llu _ ungipamsug te nghata _ .
Q ep gh am s ug llag ni _ quunpeng _ aghula i te gpenaamta _ .
nunivag niigh aqe luta _ , _ maani _ av iil nguut _ piitesighagh at _ saghna aqe luki _ , _ legan _ esghaqagh u luteng _ m i r ug w an at _ .
U n at aan kut _ , _ mellu inkut _ s aghn al agh aq ap ut _ uksugh mi _ pi kaghqagh u luki _ .
iitegngam _ aqavzig _ elngaatall _ s aghn aaq agh put _ .
tuungligh ghhagh a
sivunegh mta _ nangaghnegh i
kukuleg mii t
P en ap ag em _ apegh llegh a
tawaten _ nagate lleg mtun _ U g w e te l e meng _ ap ang iigh h am m neng _ apegh naqe aqa _ .
ungipamsug te aqe kanginkut _ , _ kukuleg mii t _ p el ung igh llag en nguq _ elngaatall _ iqangite naqe negh ghllag t _ , _ aatk aq eg llag et _ , _ igaqragh ghllag _ sa at _ tamaghhagh mi _ ayuqe lghii _ .
entaqun _ ataa s iigh negh un aq egh llag et _ ip a pi gh q eng ng an aq egh llag et _ sa mun _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ .
S agh ll ak an nguq _ tagtalmi _ .
elngaatall _ am y uq e tagh sigh waagh llag em _ kaate tke ai _ , _ entaqun _ nanghiiqu llegh m _ s aam _ kaate te ghllag ke ai _ m aa te ngu yaq an _ sumeghtaghagh llegh _ .
tawaten _ ukut _ kiyaghte aaghet _ uu m _ nuna m _ pi yan _ puughte ghllag kaqe kangi _ sivuke luki _ .
L eg an nguq _ piyaa luteng _ un Ê¼ g ani _ ayvegh t _ unguva i ta _ manguna itneng _ ikute luteng _ , _ legan _ amyuqetagh igh ke ghllag ke aat _ .
pi aqe lghii _ whaten _ U g w e te l en _ , _ â _ imatuq llu _ talwa _ ayvegh ghhagh inagh t _ pi kaqe atki _ , _ awiim nguq _ teghig ke sagh _ qam ag luku _ seghletun _ tawaten _ amyuutke kaqe kangat _ . _ â
tuqute gpenaki _ ikute aqe luteng _ legan _ .
entaqun _ tawaten _ teghig nagh nge tke ai _ elngaatall _ .
legan _ tawaten _ unguv al ngugh meng _ whaa _ ikute aqe luteng _ gaagh yaghqagh meng _ , _ neghyaghqagh meng _ .
tagtalmi _ yuug _ ataasigh _ sa ghllag ke aq _ elngaatall _ .
entaqun _ ke v g aa kaa l ghii _ yuug _ taana _ .
S aam _ kaate kaqe kanga _ , _ nunalgute ni _ elngaatall _ aatk ang l aa tes q egk ii _ pinighsagh pigte luku _ , _ pelungighsagh te naqe ni luteng _ pi kaqe kangi _ .
aghnagh _ kaki tke aq _ elngaatall _ .
aarragh tke aq _ igaqragh ghllag meng _ tawaten _ pin igh r ak eg te pig ll uku _ ulima tete luteng _ .
entaqun _ apegh iigh yaq meg teg gu _ tamaa na _ qelegh te llegh a _ , _ entaqun _ tam aan ang in aq _ pi gpenaan _ mangteghagh ke te luki _ s ag n ell gh aq ull uki _ ukmangigh stekagh i _ yug w em _ taa m _ .
Yug w em _ taa m _ pi llgh a tun _ legan _ pikagh t _ maligtekagh at _ , _ alignagh ite ngughk _ yuug _ taana _ entaqun _ .
laluramke nun _ ungipamsug ke nghminigu _ p r o p h e c y - k aan iiq egk angat _ yuug _ taana _ .
tawaten _ apeghiigh uute yan _ , _ enraq llu _ tawani _ i ghi v g agh mi _ pi lleghqagh itni _ amsanaghllug ughtekagh _ , _ an uq eq r ag g ang un ani _ , _ q ag iq r ag g ang un ani _ legan _ megh _ unegna _ taghneghaghqugh te stun _ q at egh ll ug w em _ ang tal ang aneng _ lli aqe aq _ .
esnagh mun _ atghagh uute ste ghllag luku _ yuug _ elngaatall _ kum agh t igh llag luteng _ b o n _ f i r e- egh ll ak at _ entaqun _ .
K um agh t igh llag luteng _ quug _ qerngughte luku _ aarragh te luteng _ tawaten _ entaqun _ neqe meng _ k el qell uteng _ .
Yug w em _ wh al en _ pi ke ai _ , _ â _ temngi _ tawaten _ aneghte nghite u amsi _ , _ nuna _ uukna _ tagi lghii _ qateghrakegtagh _ iqa ite ngughk _ ava ite ngughk _ tuus aghq aq en ghi l ke f ut _ n uk eg nagh l uta _ . _ â
taana _ apeghiigh te sqellug qu _ pelungighsagh te sqellug qu _ .
esgha _ legan _ B i b l e- et _ pi ll ghi s tun _ pikagh t _ .
taghneghaghqughkagh t _ megh kun _ u un Ê¼ g gun _ , _ mumigte aqe luteng _ yuvghiighkagh t _ .
elngaatall _ pelungighsaghkagh t _ entaqun _ seghletun _ pi llegh eng _ taana _ qivghukekagh at _ sa ke aat _ apeghraghkagh at _ .
seghleghqe llegh eng _ , _ seghlegh y uk ell egh t eng _ aag negh squgh ke aat _ elngaatall _ .
taghneghaghqughkagh t _ t aan Ê¼ g avek _ nuna mun _ .
pi aqe kangi _ U g w e te l em _ , _ â _ En taq un nguq _ seghevute uute tke aat _ . _ â
piniqe llegh _ i ghi v g agh mi _ tawani _ naalkekagh at _ .
I wer ng aq un nguq _ tawaten _ taakwna _ nuna _ yug w em _ taa m _ atigh aqe kanga _ taakwna _ nuna _ tagi lghii _ q at egh r ak eg llak _ ava ite ngughk _ tagneqragh ite ngughk _ iqa ite ngughk _ .
taana _ pelungighsagh te sqekagh a _ , _ ukmangigh sqekagh i _ nunalgute ni _ tamaakut _ .
entaqun _ apeghiigh luteng _ esgha _ taa m _ kingu aneng _ mulu gpenateng _ , _ q av am eg g ne nguq _ tuqu laghate kau ut _ .
A q n igh pen ate nguq _ q av agh pag utk aan iiq egk ang in nguq _ .
nenglu m _ legan _ imigh a _ qavagh negh ke te ziin _ tuqu laghate tke aat _ .
ungipamsug _ taana _ elngaatall _ all aagh ll u wh agh y ag ut aqegk egk a _ c o m p ar e- r aaq egk egk a _ , _ sumeghtaghagh aqe lghiinga _ whaten _ igamsiqa yagute aqe kegka _ .
repall _ pi aqe kenka _ min is te r - et _ , _ â _ Taa k w an ing ani _ whaa _ ken l et gh u us k an _ nuna _ , _ entaqun _ ila i _ legan _ esghagh yaghqagh put _ yuguligh llegh nun _ iteghkagh t _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ nangllegtagh a _ esghagh kaqe kegka _ elngaatall _ , _ yupig t _ taw a teng waagh w aaq _ laluramke stun _ ugpeqe luku _ ayuqe kangat _ h o n o r - egh llag luku _ ( _ i n _ t h e i r _ o w n _ w a y _ ) _ ellmeng _ katam _ pi llegh megestun _ .
U n d er s tan d - te llegh meg es tun _ ayuqe kangat _ . _ â
anglinghhagh u lunga
A m ig iq aam _ apegh llegh a
elngaatall _ whanga _ qaatke ghllag luki _ angayuqagh nka _ ata nka _ taakut _ angli kau lghiinga _ .
neqe _ sa u a _ angaghqugh ghllag nghatgu _ qepghigh sqe aqe kangatnga _ qinutagh ghllag naagh ni lunga _ .
enkaam _ kayusiite aqe kenka _ neqe meng _ qepghagh nghata _ .
P is q egh llag at nga _ s as q egh llag at nga _ .
sumeghtaghagh aqe lghiinga _ ilangakun _ k all egh s aghn al ung allu _ sa lunga llu _ qinuyug lunga _ .
panignagh u na iqe lunga _ nukeggnaghqe ste ghllag aqe aatnga _ .
U g w iigh y am allu _ tagi negh mni _ agligh sqe aqe kangatnga _ .
agligh sqe nghatnga _ A p aat an ku nun _ atghagh aqe lghiinga _ .
amalleqa _ pi q r ug w aqegk ang anga _ , _ panike na iqe kanganga _ apagh ta m _ .
â _ S ing l eng am _ qelanqe lleqe aaten _ . _ â
S ing l e nga _ taana _ whangkuta _ agani _ pi kum ak angat _ .
â _ S ing l eng am _ qelanqe lleqe aaten _ aglagh a _ . _ â
aglagh aqe lghiinga _ qiya vleghagh magh ma _ sumeghtaghagh magh ma _ , _ panike na iqe lunga _ ighsayagute ghllag atnga _ .
l gh s ay ag un n il unga _ .
test-kagh nkuk _ enraq _ atalgute gka _ ugumikeraagh naqe ghllag k _ , _ A ku l iq aan kuk _ , _ Agh n aam k am in kuk _ .
apagh ta m _ panig i _ , _ taana llu _ T ep ar gh uq _ .
T ep ar gh uq _ taana _ entaqun _ taghnughhagh ghhagh u luku _ A y ak in ku nun _ angag itnun _ tuune kaqe aat _ .
E g m igh agh llak _ .
aag lleg nge a nguq _ naa ke a _ .
apagh ta m nguq _ n ul igh q ef t aa _ aag lleg nge a _ .
ayag ke inkut _ nayag ke aat _ .
T aag eg ken _ tagi laghate kau ut _ .
whanga llu _ atalgute gka _ taake uk _ .
ugumi ke ghllag yagh kanginkut _ T ep ar gh uu m _ .
urang _ ugumi ke yagh ainkut _ , _ maaten _ qemall _ .
pi aqe kenka _ panig nka _ , _ maalliqun _ pin iq s al iigh llag aa nga _ qavngaq _ ugumi ke ghllag lunga _ .
alingyug ketagh ghllag _ , _ paninang _ maaten _ alingyug ketagh ghllag _ .
A l ing yug w ig al ngu unga _ , _ un ug taq elghii ng allu _ ellng in aghh agh m a _ .
navek _ aghulaqe uute aqe aat _ .
itegh nghata _ pi aqe kenka _ , _ â _ navek _ aghulaqe uute aqe tsi _ ? _ â
pangeghte aat
ungipamsug ghllag t _ elngaatall _ .
payangite ghllag qagh yu k llu _ angukagh ut _ .
elngaatall _ legan _ tam lagh qu ll uteng _ whaa _ qay ung ll aq _ , _ aqelqagh put _ taakut _ qayug ngllagh te ma luki _ q en aagh p all aq u _ , _ q iin q an em ni _ kana _ qaasqagh mi _ u z iv legh et _ .
aqfaqugh te t _ aqelqaghni ii aaghet _ .
legan _ qayugh qiinagh luteng _ neghe gpenateng _ .
elngaatall _ tawaten _ aqfaqugh te luteng _ uzimun _ ataasighhaaghte aqe luteng _ , _ entaqun _ aneghte negh meggni _ aatqaghte vike aqe luki _ .
apeghiigh negh meggni _ enraq _ mataghqe te luteng _ tugh um gh an neq eg s aat aq ut _ .
enraq _ talwa _ esghapag snanigh aqe kangit _ .
Agh n aam k am illu _ amigh k _ umeg sighwaagh luku _ r egh il qugh ll uku _ esghapag aqe lghiikung _ .
sangamta _ esghapag snanigh aqe inkut _ .
sa u a _ tamaghhagh mi _ liisagh lghiikut _ agleghnagh staghhiinagh _ .
iwerngaqun _ taaqe luteng _ apeghiigh negh meggni _ taglagh uute negh meggni _ elngaatall _ negh ul gh utaq ut _ .
enkaam _ tumighqaate nghata _ llangaqa llu _ nun a tugh q w aa s ug n it aq iin kut _ .
luteng _ apeghiigh negh meggni _ taglagh uute negh meggni _ elngaatall _ negh ul gh utaq ut _ .
enkaam _ tumighqaate nghata _ llangaqa llu _ nun a tugh q w aa s ug n it aq iin kut _ .
K el qugh luteng _ kalngag meng _ ila i _ uyamig luteng _ .
amigh m _ liiqnegh a _ legan _ tan - ek as tun _ tawaten _ .
ugtinghagh it _ pi nigh ghllag t _ legan _ whaten _ .
qallukagh _ s an aghq ugh waagh luni _ .
ayallaghwaagh llu _ , _ angyaghwaagh llu _ allgegh naqe ghllag at _ elngaatall _ , _ iiwen _ kaki sigh m _ siku i _ .
S i ku un nguq _ ataasigh t _ all g egh te q aghnegh meg tek i _ , _ kaki yaghtugh negh meggni _ tam aan al eg nun _ k el qell uki _ pi aqe kangit _ , _ siku ut _ .
S i ku gh h naq egh llag et _ maaken _ kaki sigh m _ sikugh aneng _ .
Q av ng agh t ar ug llag et _ sikugh nka _ P e d er s en - meng _ ima _ tukfighagh t _ , _ pinigh t _ taake ghllag nghite ngugh t _ , _ taa k egh pag et _ katamngwaagh t _ kenug kegte nghite ngugh t _ pinigh t _ .
whaa _ panig ma _ naa ng sagh tu ghii _ .
aflenga kaqe anka _ neghightagh ghllag t _ .
sagnegh nka _ ima _ aghnaghagh u lunga _ all g egh tek an ka _ .
K el g uq un em k i _ kinku nun _ n all egh ay ag ut aqegk ang it _ .
talwa _ G e is t- am _ aqeftaghaagh i _ sungaghtuqagh t _ .
pi lgu unga llu _ tamaaken _ sakma _ .
taakut _ enkaam _ panig nka _ taw a tek an iig ut _ whanga mtun _ pivagru negh ghllag _ aag qagh ghhaat _ .
aamtaam _ eltughagh nka _ pillgite u aghte ut _ .
whanga mtun llu _ taawa _ pi s qell uki _ aghyuugh aqe kenka _ , _ maligte naagh nghite kangatnga _ .
kii _ , _ akuzi aqe unga _ ilangakun _ apeghtugh na luki _ ungip am s ug un n em k i _ angli naqe lleg mneng _ .
ineghneghlliqe gpenanga _ whanga _ angli kanga _ sa mun _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ .
P el aa si _ entaqun _ taana _ pilleg pigte yagh uq _ elngaatall _ ungipamsug nghmini _ .
taameng _ ig agh yaq ayug w et lu _ liisagh lghiikut _ yug w et _ s ev en - ek l aag mi _ un ug mi _ igaghyagh te aqe lghiit _ .
H ig h _ s c h o o l -em _ igagh i _ qamagtekaqe kangi _ talwa _ .
enkaamllu _ p uy g ii ng ig al q waagh llag u yagh tuq _ .
l g agh y aat kay ug u yagh tut _ un ug mi _ .
apeghtughiste ke yuwhaagh t
taana _ igaghvig _ ulima aqe na iqe kangat _ tamaavek _ nanevgagh nun _ .
S aa v l an ku nun _ , _ P us aan ku nun _ , _ kinku nun llu _ ulima aqe na iqe kangat _ .
K ay us iit k aq n iiq egk ang q at _ tea- aghte a _ .
aglu m _ inglu igh llegh aneng _ repa ke luteng _ .
T ang egh tugh llag tun nguq _ elngaatall _ aglu t _ tamaakut _ , _ ayvegh m _ aglu igh a _ .
tamaaken _ repa ke luteng _ ulima kaqe na iqe aat _ .
kayusigh kaqe na iqe aat _ .
iwernga _ liisagh lghiikut _ pinigh ghllag _ igaghvig ghllag _ .
whaten _ igagh yami _ ikiqun _ uglagh ghllag _ whangkuta _ te a c h er - k egk aq en ghi l ke f ut _ .
nulighh ghqu te ii na lghiit _ .
maaten llu _ te a c h er - egh llag ugh llegh h ii _ .
N i c ke r s o n -en kut _ maani _ te a c h er - ngugh ll ak aag ut _ .
minister- nge magh mi _ , _ te a c h er - ngu m agh mi _ ayuqe lghii _ .
T h o m p s o n - n en kut _ ama _ te a c h er - ngugh ll ak aag ut _ tawaten _ nulighhqaghtu an _ .
iwernga _ sa u a _ ayuqligh _ ama _ te a c h er - k egk aq agh put _ uk av an l eng ugh ni _ .
Agh naa r tuq _ ayuqligh _ .
P ill waagh atagh at _ taana _ N i c ke r s o n - ngun ik angat _ te a c h er - ke r taa t _ .
whangkuta _ taana _ ayuqligh _ te a c h er - k egk aq agh put _ .
negh yagh uute kayug ni _ whang kun nun _ .
negh yaghtugh luta _ o n e- ek l aag yagh tun gh ani _ tagi aqe luta _ .
talwa _ mangteghagh pagite yagh lghii _ .
T aan Ê¼ g ani _ qafsinkuuragh ghhaat _ .
enkaam _ uvite _ pinigh ghllag _ .
aante aput llu _ s am av egh ll ug w in aq _ , _ mallagh ite ngugh t llu _ .
sa kun _ avlawate ta kun _ , _ paper _ s a c k - ke kun _ qantagh luki _ anuqligh nghaani _ aantagh nun _ aante i negh mta _ teng tes taq eg ke put _ , _ teng taq egk angi _ .
entaqun _ sa pagite luta _ mallagh ite ngugh u kut _ talwa _ .
akilpegaghkagh t
N uugh tek an igh meng _ anglikagh ni _ whangkuta _ .
T aan ang u r tuq _ kiyang _ tukfigh yug qumtaagh at _ tawaqa nkut _ , _ iiqmig nkut _ , _ qay u un kut _ , _ avlawa nkut _ .
Taa ku ngu r tut _ kiyang _ tukfigh yuke llegh it _ .
avlawa _ kiyang _ , _ avlawa t llu _ tamaakut _ neqekrangllaghpag gpenaki _ , _ kiyang _ avlawa liigh aqe kangit _ .
enkaam _ mulu ghllag aqe ut _ , _ neqekrangllagh qaghaqe luteng _ .
nutaghagh llu _ taawa _ nanigh m _ neqekrangllagh a _ neqekrangllagh meng _ negh yugnagh ghllag _ .
sa kun _ qay ul gh ut ag b h aghq un _ J av a _ T e a- ngun iiq egk ang it gun _ ukite luki _ neqekrangllagh aqe lghiinga _ .
K ang gh ug r ak gu ugh ll uteng _ ila i _ o aten _ mesiigh m _ taa pe k an igh luki _ neqnigh ghllaget _ whang kun ni _ .
neqe ut
ii _ , _ neghsagh _ kaat ute ghllag nghmegteggu _ .
A y m aa k el agh tugh aq eg ke f un g _ N ap aaq lu _ .
tazingavek _ s aag b h w am m nun _ si q l ug w amun _ kanaghte aqe luki _ .
kaate negh megteni _ qam ug b llag lu tek _ .
qaye akun _ aligh mta _ qalqalima meng _ aveg aqe luki _ .
S iq l ug w iig b aq elghii kun g _ qalqalima meng _ kemekrag meng _ .
S ag negh w aag b llag et _ imigh luki _ kapeghte i lutung _ iq ug w akun _ kapeghtekagh pung _ lli luki _ .
neghe uute negh mta _ taaggun _ kapeghtekagh kun _ iwhani _ neqnigh ghhalek _ , _ ilangakun _ tengug meng _ .
qalqalima kun _ elngaatall _ unaghsigh kun _ si f tagh ll uki _ si q l ug w iiq akun _ taaggun _ .
legan _ pellumeghtagh put _ pightugh vleghagh ghhagh t _ .
qazigyagh m llu _ , _ ayvegh m llu _ uqigh a _ l ar d - es tun _ ayuqe ut _ .
whaten _ ayapegh aatagh luta _ aku un n em tek i _ neve sqe aghtagh luteng _ ayuqe aqe ut _ .
P i r aam si t ng waagh luki _ akuute aqe ke put _ , _ neghyaghqagh stun _ tawaten _ angka i ta _ aavgugh aqe luki _ .
mesiightu luki _ pi sqe aqe kangit _ qavagh ghqu negh meggni nguq _ mesiigh i uute kayugu ut _ .
maaten _ tawaten _ pi aghte aqe yagh anka _ eltughagh nka _ ukut _ avaqutagh nka _ , _ seghleqe aqe ait _ .
A ku ut ang waagh llag l uta _ uksulqusigh _ .
akuute luki _ kum l a sigh aq luki _ .
I q all ug w aq lu _ pi ghllag nghatgu _ N ap aaq _ tengertagh igh yu neghtu ghllag _ .
tengertagh t _ tenge kayugu na iqe kangit _ , _ taawanginaq _ aygughike aqe kenka _ .
A ku un n em tek i _ uglagh ghllag t _ .
sagnegh u aaghet _ takeriig t _ tamaagun _ tengertagh meng _ akuute ghllag lunga _ ateghte luku _ , _ neghe uute naqe yamta _ neqagh luku _ entaqun _ , _ â _ kaay _ , _ akuute aq _ aqfa aghte naqe aqa _ . _ â
I t gh us aq min igu _ legan _ tekerqagh u ni te uq _ kanegh _ .
tenge ma na ait _ naqam _ .
tengertagh meng _ ategh ke lghiit _ .
nalighmeng _ mesiigh i _ , _ nalighmeng _ s all gh i _ anagte lghii ni _ tawatete ut _ .
ila i _ ghhuughpagtagh pigesnagh luteng _ pi ma aqe lghiit _ .
N egh q w aa ghi gh waagh luki _ iq all ug w at _ tamaakut _ , _ qay ev r eg aghh ii _ tamaakut _ ikugh luki _ , _ qete luki _ , _ mesiigh meng _ akuute luki _ qayagh itneng _ ku u v i ke v legh agh luki _ kum l a sigh aq eg ke put _ .
tengertagh u ut _ ategh i _ .
aygughike ma aqe yaqenka _ , _ taana _ esghagh luku _ wetku _ ugpeqe yagute anka _ .
mangteghapig t llu _ , _ mangteghasqwaagh t llu
taagken _ mangteghagh put _ upenghagh mi _ , _ amaa iqe aq _ , _ tapghaghqagh _ apegh iin em teg gu _ naafqe aqe ke put _ mangteghagh t _ .
mangteghasqwaagh mun _ lliigh aqe luta _ uqugh meng _ itagsi naqe nghmeng _ .
mangteghapig m _ tan pegh h i _ ikugh luki _ aagra i llu _ naa f qell uki _ , _ mangteghagh m _ qukaa kun _ taaggun _ , _ maqaghqute t llu _ , _ veg t llu _ maqagh te t _ llilaghtugh luki _ tanpegh meng _ asiliqutagh igh luki _ iwhani _ , _ kagpag aqe kangit _ tan pegh h mun _ llilaghtugh luki _ sa meng _ t ap gh al aag meng _ nemegh luki _ .
kiigtagh ke lghiit _ mangteghasqwaagh mi _ .
mangteghasqwaagh mi _ kiyaghte aqe lghiikut _ ayagyu ligh luki _ .
aghte nghaani _ taakut _ ayagyu put _ m ak r eg ll uki _ petug luki _ paaggun _ .
aghneghte aqe lghiikut _ suksugtagh kun _ qayug ngllagh aqe luta _ .
gaagh ngllagh luteng llu _ gaagh aqe lghiit _ eslallug mi _ .
aliinegh mi _ aamta _ qagani _ gaagh aqe lghiit _ .
aanqaghte pagte te luki _ mangteghasqwaagh mi _ gaagh ngllagh aqe ut _ .
G aa ngu f tut _ anuqe mi _ , _ eslallug mi _ taaggun _ gaagh aqe lghiit _ .
uqugh _ piyaqnagh kanigh yagh lghii _ liisagh lghiinga _ qayughllak _ .
U pen gh aam _ wh al en _ uqiightu llegh a _ uqug ngllagh llegh a _ eg si g al ke f ut _ , _ k ag p ap er e w aaq _ akmagutagh kun _ .
wetku _ uksaagh mi _ naayvagh _ esneli nghaani _ , _ kum l aagh taq ul uni _ lliigh nghaani _ mangteghagh uute aqe ut _ .
taakut _ paaggun _ iwhani sigh u ut _ , _ mangteghagh m _ qamagun _ ilu akun _ tanpeghtagh igh luteng _ .
tanpigh luta _ taakut _ aagra t _ nekegte aqe ke put _ .
amu i ut _ aagra t _ , _ amigh t _ maakut _ allighaghqagh ughtekagh t _ .
amenqun _ allighaghqagh u na iqe ke put _ melqughtuqagh t _ , _ tamaakut _ kaki luki _ , _ unaghsigh meng _ naten _ es l egk ak alghii meng _ .
vuvegh m _ , _ v u v igh naq n em tek i _ .
una _ iiggereghwaagh vig _ iigge igate luni _ veg ghllag u yagh uq _ .
taagken _ veg meng _ saghna ghllag aqe luta _ .
samagun _ tan pegh h agh aagh et _ ilaagh uute luki _ ikellegh ghqu aaghet _ tunemagh ke luki _ amalka _ .
enkaam _ veg meng _ pi luki _ vuvegh igh aqe ke put _ tanpegh meng _ .
ukite aqe luki _ , _ n ap agh y egh aan iiq iit _ uu m _ amigh m _ amalka _ ayagsigh ta i _ .
tawaten _ ameltu aqe luki _ napaghte qugh vike aqe ait _ .
test-pag kut _ kelu t _ eslege lghii meng _ ingavek _ iiwleng _ qukaa ii kete te _ llivike luki _ .
test-pag kut _ ama _ tawaten _ es l egk ak alghii meng _ c e il ing - ng eng i _ amalka _ aagra m _ .
sa ni te mun _ llilaghtugh vike luki _ ulig aqe ke put _ .
tawaten _ uusqaghtutka i ta _ unaghsigh t _ , _ kevigh luki _ veg meng _ .
U uy negh mun _ enraq _ , _ n at anga _ taake ghllag lghii _ veg a _ , _ wh at egh llak _ legan _ .
elngaatall _ akmag aatagh aqe lghiit _ , _ amenqun _ uq eng el eng es t aagh h aat _ .
tespamavek _ tawavek _ amenqun _ iiggereghwaagh vig u yagh lghii mun _ veg meng _ saghna yagh negh mta _ qiipaghagh t _ imigh aqe ke put _ aligh a _ qilleghte aqe luki _ .
U q eng es quy u wh aat _ kenegte ghllag aqe luki _ , _ keviite kaghqagh meng _ .
taakwegkut _ uzimun _ aagra t _ kevigh luki _ asi i _ kenegte ghllag luki _ .
elngaatall _ at ku v leg aq _ sa u a _ qagugh ak _ atg- ke uk _ taaqegkagh _ at ku v leg aq _ , _ amigh _ .
amigh m _ qaye akun _ qakmagun _ eslatagh akun _ maqaasghagh igh uute kaqe kangit _ .
puqla ghllag t _ .
tespamna llu _ tawaten _ tanpigh luku _ veg meng _ ul ig aq eg ke f ut _ .
enkaam _ supug ite ngugh t _ .
taawanginaq _ p uq l aghh negh ani _ tanpegh pigu luku _ qepghagh na ghllag _ .
legan _ q ak em n a _ naghigh aqe uq _ tanpegh pigu luta _ , _ kanegh _ ifkagh qu ghllag aqe uq _ .
taakut _ veg t _ ifkaghte luki _ , _ apeghiigh nghaani _ ifkagh qu nghmeng _ , _ kameraagh i llu ta _ kameg put _ repall _ aghi aqe kangi _ .
whaten _ anigu i _ ifkaghte luki _ miluute aqe luki _ .
A n ig ung igh waagh luki _ mayugh luta _ saul- ghqu nqigte aqe luku _ veg a _ .
taakut _ anigu t _ aane ste qugh aqe ke put _ ghhute tgun _ ing l ug t aagh utaq luki _ .
N ap aam _ emta _ kalngagagh t _ imigh luki _ uqigtu ghllaget _ qam un em teg n ek i _ eg t iv im m nun _ ug w avek _ .
anigu u lghiit _ k aan gh et _ egte aqe aput _ .
taawa _ mate- yagh i yaaghte nghaani _ taakwna _ uqegh _ ifkagh aqe lghii _ .
sa meng _ s ap uugh agh tagh yagh tugh aq eg ke f un g _ .

allgellegh ke a _ F e h r u ar y _ 1 2 _ , _ 1 8 9 8 _ .
taana _ h i r t h _ d ay - ke f taq a _ liisagh lghiinga _ .
angayuqagh nka _ nalluke anka _ , _ anglegute nka _ .
kergam _ taghnughhagh u lunga _ ifla laghate ma lghiit _ .
enkaam _ W aa y i ngu f tuq _ aflengake i steke _ , _ S ii v aghh aam _ nayag a _ .
taagken _ enkaam _ taaghta nkut _ tagi luteng _ 1 9 0 0 - mi _ allughqi ma kangatnga _ taaghta nkut _ .
entaqun _ esghaqagh u lunga _ seghleghu yalghiinga _ , _ esghaghhu qun _ allughqi kangatnga _ .
enkaam _ taaghta mi _ tawani _ , _ ( _ E . _ O . _ C am p h el l _ ) _ , _ qafsina _ y e ar s _ kiyaghte unga _ .
entaqun _ m ek elghii gh pag ugh s am a _ , _ angyagh yaghqaaghte yama _ S ul ug w en ku t gun _ angyii sqe aanga _ .
enkaam _ S ul ug w em _ it ag naq s anga _ taaggun _ angyagh unga _ taaghta m _ pi llgh a tun _ .
unaangu luku _ angyaghnagh nghaani _ A m am eng am _ keleg yaghtugh aqe aanga _ .
teghtugh negh mni _ whaa _ angyaataghqe aat _ aqeftaghaagh kun _ kevigh te uute luteng _ kelqesaghqagh t _ .
enkaam _ atghagh lunga _ , _ kete luta _ t aan Ê¼ g ani _ taakut _ angyagh m _ yug w it a _ taakut _ taaghta m _ angyaatagh igh uute yu ai _ kiyang _ negh aqe kangit _ .
whanga _ eghqwaagh sagh itneng _ qasiqagh meng _ neghe kayug _ .
tamaani _ laluramke m _ negh kanga _ piyaqnagh lghii _ , _ taaghta mi _ yeghrat _ .
taagken _ tawaten _ tagtalmi _ , _ nengigh aqe lunga _ nefku yagute uq _ maklag meng _ , _ ayvegh meng _ .
Q egh as ta _ test-ankut _ M e ke ng an kut _ ke t ang it ni _ taaghta m _ qeghigh a _ .
elngaatall _ yuug _ pin ii pig tu uq _ tea- aghte a _ taana _ .
tagtalmi _ ayumiqullegh m _ ilangani _ , _ amaa iqe i ste aatnga _ S ul ug w en kut _ .
taawa _ taglaate luku _ , _ kitumun _ uqiigh ste luku _ taaghta m _ , _ akmagutagh gnun _ kanaghte luku _ akmavek _ tuyugh aa _ .
arekull _ q aw aag n iigh usi ng es qell unga _ pi ma kanganga _ ulimasightuumagh an _ .
enkaam _ ay um i quy an _ kaate yalghiimi _ 1 6 _ qawaagniighusigh _ , _ kanuyaaghrug _ qafsina _ igagh ghqu aq _ , _ ulimasigh leg _ .
igaghqwaagh u yagh lghiit _ ul im ak ayug w et _ qawaagniighusigh m _ pi i _ , _ ghhuugh t _ .
llaaghanwha _ atuqe aqa _ taana _ elngaatall _ .
allameng _ upenghaghyag u _ angyagh laatagh unga _ .
A m am eng ang u uq _ taana _ keleg i steke _ .
elngaatall _ angyagh u uute i te aqe kangatnga _ , _ un Ê¼ g ani _ negh es qell unga _ entaqun _ .
iwernga _ negh igate kenka _ , _ angyagh t _ yug w it a _ taakut _ negh aqe ait _ .
whanga _ angyeghetagh itneng _ eghqwaagh te yameng _ neqnighqagh ke unga _ elngaatall _ qasugh iqe aq _ , _ sa u a _ , _ pugnegh _ .
allameng _ amaa iqe i laatagh unga _ tawani _ , _ amaa iqe i ste laatagh aatnga _ .
enkaam _ taglaate luku _ kitumun _ uqiigh ste laatagh aa _ elngaatall _ .
pangeghte yuwhaagh llegh ka
enkaam _ tagtalmi _ tawaten _ pangeghte naqe ut _ , _ S ul ug w en kut _ .
whanga llu _ taaghta m _ pangeghte sqe aanga _ .
taana _ amaa iqe aq _ akike yaghtigh sqe a _ llaaghanwha _ .
U v in ku nguut _ , _ A m am eng an kut _ , _ whanga _ amalka _ anglinghhagh pestaagh t _ yug w i _ S ul ug w em _ .
ellnginagh emta _ naten _ pangeghte ukut _ , _ pangegh t _ maligte luki _ .
pamaken _ pangegh t _ maligte luki _ .
kii _ , _ elngaatall _ anguugh kaqe ainkut _ .
atghagh aqe yagh luta _ qukaghite negh mta _ uughqaghtagh ghllag t _ k aan n em tek i _ uteghte aqe luta _ .
elngaatall _ aghyuqe kau unga qun _ whanga _ .
taana _ amiiqagh ka _ maligte te luku _ ellmeggnun _ maalghug gnun _ amig nge natke ma kangat _ .
M aal gh u m _ amigh m _ akike ma kangi _ tan pegh h et _ tamaakut _ agh ip al nguut _ .
enkaam _ tawani _ uteghte aatagh llegh m _ tagtala ani _ , _ U v illu _ mangteghagh _ tespamna _ , _ ungazigh _ , _ qamagtekagh ung _ aqelqaghte vike aqe luku _ .
tawaten _ atghagh aqe yagh luta _ uteghte aqe luta _ , _ esla m _ seghlegh m _ , _ quunpeng _ ikevagh _ .
ikevagh ke te _ seghleghu lghii _ whaa _ lii g ik saq ef ut _ .
tagtalmi _ tawaten _ kiyaghte ma luta _ angyaghpag t _ kaate ut _ , _ malghukuraagh ghhagh t _ , _ iiwen _ tanqigh _ naange aqe uq _ , _ tes p am an te llegh put _ .
qanigughte aqe luni _ .
Agh y uq n a pig tu uq _ elngaatall _ .
taagken _ angyaghpag ggaat _ kaate yalghiimeng _ malghukuraagh u ut _ .
maaten _ qavngaq _ tagi aqngami _ angyaghpag m _ D er h l y - m _ umiileg ligh tke a _ p uy g aaq a _ ategh a _ .
Taa m _ atghagh te ainkut _ , _ iwerngaqun _ tespamaken _ atghagh te ainkut _ maavek _ .
enkaam _ unaangu pigte luku _ kaa llu ta _ , _ whang kun nun _ taglagh lunga _ t aagh tan ku nun _ ii _ , _ quyake aatnga _ elngaatall _ .
maalghug gneng _ amig nge ma ni unga _ .
enkaam _ taaghta m _ lli te ii te ma kanginkut _ t w en t y _ dollars _ angyaghpag mun _ tawavek _ .
alaghrang _ angyagh aatagh lunga _ tawani _ elngaatall _ nengigh aatagh lunga _ , _ taagken _ enraq _ p ang egh tem mun _ .
pangeghte yuwhaagh llegh ke aqa _ taana _ anguugh ta leg _ agh y uq n a pig tu uq _ .
taagken _ nukalpigagh ughte yama _ , _ pangeghte unga _ elngaatall _ angyaghwaagh kun _ , _ qafsina neng _ pangeghte unga _ .
angyaghpag t
ayumiqullegh m _ ilangani _ Ung al aq _ aghvenge ma lghii _ k ii p aghq em mi _ J un e- mi _ .
elngaatall _ suqagh a _ pi luku _ A taa yagh h aan kut _ , _ Agh tuq aa y ag en kut _ , _ Ung al aan kut _ 1 9 1 1 - mi _ N um e- et k at _ .
N um e- ell uteng _ tagi yalghiimeng _ , _ s l uu p - e ngu m alghiit _ Ch e e c h aku - ngu f tuq _ ategh a _ ang yagh p al qu sigh r aag p ak _ ataasigh meng _ napaghyagh ke lghii _ .
E ng in e- el gu yagh pe tuq _ , _ kay aal ngu ug neng _ iwernga _ telaananga kayug _ , _ savikenghaagh meng _ sanepuute leg _ , _ 1 9 1 1 - mi _ .
enkaam _ tawaten _ kiyaghte ma luta _ , _ usi ii ste nga _ taaghta m _ kaa tuq _ malghukuraagh _ tanemlleqa _ .
elngaatall _ usingigh lghiit _ .
S iv uq aghh m iit _ angaghqugh kangat _ , _ akileghtuusagh a _ neqe meng _ akileghtugh kayugu kangit _ neqekrag t _ ataasigh t _ un e _ c en t- ngu luki _ .
E s tug w ii tuq _ tamaani _ .
