qiteve te aqe yagh aatnga _ , _ ava ite ngugh u nga _ .
liitekagh ghhagh nka _ qafsinkuuragh ghhaat _ .
taagken _ qayugh te aq _ ke t f agh yaq meg teg gu _ , _ kemeg qragh k _ naten _ angka uq _ qateghrakegtagh _ .
aag llegh a _ taana _ liigike aqa _ maklag m _ kuyag ke a _ .
aghnagh _ av eg tugh l un l _ , _ avegtugh luni _ miluute ai _ .
T ag n ell ghii n aan eng _ negh naagh zinga _ whanga _ qategh llegh i _ avelghagh luki _ .
sa u na yu kan _ , _ nanugh u na yu kan _ , _ quyngigh u yagh nghite a _ sa u yagh a _ .
taagken _ maklag t _ naange yata _ , _ pi aqa _ , _ â _ T ep ay - a _ , _ malig si t _ . _ â
V eg ll ug w et _ tungsigh anka _ , _ taaqe ni unga _ .
T ep ay - a _ taaqe u uq _ , _ malig si t _ vegllug u ut _ .
ii _ , _ qiteve laatagh ut _ elngaatall _ .
entaqun _ avaqutagh teng _ sa meng _ seghlegh meng _ pi snanigh aqe aatnga _ , _ tusaqe naagh ni lunga _ .
taagken _ qayugh te naqe ukut _ .
qayugh te ma luta _ ii _ , _ qakma _ nutem _ me mikun _ T ul uq _ .
whanga mnun _ pi u uq _ .
ii _ , _ itegh luni _ tawani _ elngaatall _ , _ ellnga llu _ qayugh uq _ .
Y ii ll g iy aq min ik i _ elngaatall _ tu saq n aanghi tun nguq _ .
uksulqusigh igh ngugh _ taakut _ neqe leg t _ .
I gh leg tu pig tun nguq _ elngaatall _ iwernga _ , _ taw an sim aaq elghii _ elngaatall _ aghn ell qu si q _ .
En taq un nguq _ ig atagh aq s eng agh tut _ , _ neq aagh h agh meng _ tuun l un gh at ni _ taawa _ aane ma aqe lghii _ .
kingu itneng _ entaqun _ neghe uute aqe lghiit _ .
pi aqa _ tagtalmi _ , _ â _ igataghnagh iqe vig ite usi _ , _ sighineg mii t _ ama _ aghvenge ghllag ma ut _ aange pigte uq _ elngaatall _ . _ â
â _ enmis _ suqagh a _ tukfigh ma a _ P e d er s en -em _ . _ â
ii _ , _ aghnagh _ ullegh aghte uq _ elngaatall _ .
l i _ , _ tamaani _ elngaatall _ uvagha uq _ quy am _ angtale aneng _ amaken _ aghvegh meng _ .
whaa nguq _ ellnga llu _ pirughte yaghtugh pestaagh naqe uq _ awataghpag meng _ k el qell uni _ .
uqugh aneng _ sa aneng _ keveg iqe i na luni _ .
ii _ , _ taakut _ n ang q al ug pag taa ll uteng _ sa ut _ esghapag aat _ elngaatall _ .
apeghiigh yami _ quya nghmeng _ ungipaate ai _ , _ qiteve te ai _ .
kii _ , _ nekeve qaghtagh te kau ut _ elngaatall _ , _ mengwaagte ma a _ elngaatall _ .
taawa _ pirughte yagh uute naqe aqe ut _ ellngit llu _ .
angyaghpag kun _ aag yaghqagh t _ taawanginaq _ .
atghagh te aatnga qun _ T ul uq lu _ taana _ uugte luni _ .
taakut llu _ angyagh t _ entaqun _ ungipaate ait _ taglagh luteng _ .
whangkuta _ aghulaqe ukut _ taakwagun _ esnigh ukut _ uteghmun _ nunaagh kun _ pi aqe luteng _ .
ungazigh _ kaate laaghigate aat _ angyaghpag kun _ pi yaaghte te mneng _ .
teglenga pigte na iqe aat _ elngaatall _ .
enkaam _ sa u a _ tu gu yug n aq _ k ag pag tegh aq agh put _ kaate yaghtugh negh mta _ .
mangteghagh m _ nalla akun _ pi gpenaamta _ sani akun _ pi aqe luta _ .
S an iv an tegh ng aagh meng _ , _ piyug meng _ angyagh meng _ upag uute aqe lghiit _ .
liigi _ taawa _ tawatete uq _ ungazigh _ taana _ .
aywaa ni _ akilpegagh llegh ut
enkaam _ alla _ ayumiqullegh mi _ maavek _ tuumke aqe kanganga _ P e d er s en -em _ .
N um e- e kun _ qaake kayugu yalghiikut _ .
I gh en naq lu _ , _ imagh mii llu _ , _ whanga _ , _ K em ug y i _ , _ I n u uq _ , _ taaggun _ uugtekayugu ukut _ uuvganeng _ .
enkaam _ tagtalmi _ K em ug y in kuk _ , _ I n u un kuk _ aviighute uk _ .
uugte nanigh ut _ .
whanga _ , _ I gh en n aq _ , _ imagh mii _ , _ M egh y uq _ , _ taa ku ngugh tu kut _ uugtekayug ni _ .
aghvegh niigh gpenaamta _ ak il p eg ameng _ .
A k il p eg ameng _ lliigh ukut _ kaviigh _ , _ amiiragh _ , _ ulima uq _ , _ alngunak _ sa u a _ aki at _ .
tan- lgu a _ qawaag m _ melangaagh a _ .
aki ite ngugh t _ entaqun _ nanglleg ke aqe kangi _ .
mani k _ , _ alpa m _ manig a _ .
alpa m _ manig anun _ whanga _ pinigh llegh anun _ tes t- es ii gu nga _ , _ kalevekagh ghhagh inagh t _ tu k f iq ayug w et _ .
puglegha lghiit _ yug nge kau lghiit _ .
taakut _ yug ngekagh t _ veghute aqe aput _ .
iwernga _ tukfigh aqe kangi _ elngaatall _ .
nuna _ qamagte luku _ esne a _ taakwna _ akilpegagh vike luku _ paamna _ , _ inglu anun _ enraq _ aghvig negh mta _ sivuqagh mun _ maavek _ , _ C an a d a- m u u _ esne kun _ .
uukna _ kaviigh ghllag u uq _ Canada _ .
uukna _ akeleghraagh a _ N ung leg r aq _ , _ sighineg _ , _ al i a _ qukaa ni _ imtug _ .
imtug meng _ taagken _ ava n _ .
avate meng _ taagken _ qigugh a _ , _ taana lli _ sangaawa _ qiwaa m _ kangighagh a _ p uy g aaq a _ .
taagken _ agavek _ ungazigh mun _ .
ungazigh meng _ t aag eg ken _ nanevgagh ke i yankut _ nuna at _ ama _ p uy g aaq a _ .
T aag eg ken _ n all uk ek an igh aqa _ ategh a _ kenlanga _ N ev uq amun _ .
nevugh ke aq _ taana _ ama _ naayghagh mete uq _ .
uulegh _ ama _ u aten _ ama _ uyatu tke aagh _ whavek llu _ entaqun _ nasqagh tun _ , _ naayghagh meng _ teve a _ .
uulegh mi _ tawani _ es tug w aan un _ taglagh lutung _ P e d er s en - llu _ .
kaviightu uq _ agaghte uute luni _ taawa _ .
arekull _ uulegh m _ es tug w aq ef t aa _ , _ ruuseghmiig igh a _ .
kaviigh _ avugh aa _ elngaatall _ tawani _ .
whanga _ kanaghte magh an _ aqeftaghaagh ghllag tgun _ .
tawaten _ pi ghngaaghmi _ , _ tuqlugh aanga _ , _ â _ una qun _ esghaqagh ghhu _ . _ â _ pi yaqegka _ kaviigh u uq _ whanga mni qun _ iitek _ .
pi yalghiinga _ r a h h it _ skin- nge ma lghii _ .
papeg liqe aq _ , _ taameng _ m el q wa _ takestaaghhaa li _ , _ naqam _ q at egh r ak eg te pig llegh h ii _ .
ruuseghmii mun _ tawavek _ kelgute a _ .
qivghu uq _ tukfigh llegh mineng _ tawavek _ .
uulegh mii t _ p uugh teng ng waagh um ak angat _ .
iwernga _ tukfigh aa _ tawatete ghngaan _ .
taagken _ apeghiigh luta _ inglu anun _ ukavek _ aghvigh ukut _ .
sivuqagh meng _ maaken _ piinligh luku _ , _ S iv uq aghh m iit _ kaviighagh t _ tukfigh luku _ , _ kangigh mii t _ kaviighagh t _ , _ pugughileghmii t _ kaviighagh t _ , _ tapghapagagh mii t _ kaviighagh t _ , _ tukfigh luku _ taagken _ aygugh aqe lghiikut _ .
ingaligh t _ taakut _ ul im aap er eg waagh llag u ut _ .
ighlleghaasigh _ sa u a _ alngunak _ , _ tugute _ ulima uq _ .
uuvganeng _ ulima kayug ghllag u ut
taakut _ , _ ingaligh mii t _ .
elngaatall _ tukfightugh aqe kanga _ , _ igh llegh aat f aghq u _ sa u a _ teghig ke sagh _ .
qafsinkaghte aqe aki _ imani _ .
taawa _ sighla luteng _ taglagh aqe lghiit _ .
E s tug w al gu uq _ tawani _ pedersen _ , _ S m all _ D i um e d e- mi _ ingaligh ni _ .
kina u yagh uq _ ategh a _ liisimake yagh aqa _ .
ingaligh ni _ atugh llegh
tawaten _ angyagh meng _ atghagh luteng _ , _ taglagh naqe yameng _ ii-ii _ , _ angyagh m _ yug wa _ q al ghi ll agh qu uq _ , _ angwaagh te kete luku _ .
Q al ghi ll agh qu uq _ elngaatall _ atugh naqe na ait _ .
Q alghii ll agh qu m _ ungipaate aqe ainkut _ atugh naqe ni luki _ .
aga _ taglagh ut _ .
kingu aneng _ P e d er s en - mun _ pi lunga _ , _ â _ pagaveg- a _ atugh lghii nun _ nagate yagh yagh ka ite zinga _ , _ imagh mii llu _ , _ l gh en naq lu _ , _ whanga llu _ ? _ â
P e d er s en -em _ pi unga _ , _ â _ U m iil g atagh aq _ esgha _ tesqakemna _ liigike ste gu _ .
angegh amken _ liigike ste naken _ taana _ um iil g atagh aq _ taglagh u tsi _ liisimake sqellug qu _ . _ â
aane lunga _ ungipaate luku _ um iil g at aagh aq _ taana _ , _ â _ umiileg m nguq _ angegh ma kanganga _ legan _ esgha _ teskiwna _ dory _ , _ taaggun _ taglagh tek _ . _ â
taglagh ukut _ taaggun _ igh en naq lu _ , _ imagh mii llu _ , _ whanga llu _ .
K el utegh ll ug w in aghq un _ tamlag ukut _ uy gh ag ap ag i llgh akun _ .
I gh en naa m _ legan _ kayusiite gpenaamta _ , _ aga _ I gh en n aq _ .
T uq l ugh agh yagh agh p un g _ imagh mii llu _ .
kelevagh te luku _ angyagh _ taana _ , _ aglagh ukung _ .
kii _ , _ atugh yug pigte ma lghii _ elngaatall _ .
kaate yalghiikut _ nutaan _ pi kestagh aqe ut _ .
ii _ , _ upugha te ainkut _ elngaatall _ .
ii _ , _ atughtu ut _ .
aghula ut _ elngaatall _ .
apeghiigh luteng _ kayagte ainkut _ aghul as qell uta _ aghula kayugu lghiinga qun _ whanga _ aga _ ategh unga _ .
nuna ni _ ighsa snanigh aqe kanginkut _ siivanllegh t _ sa meng _ .
ii _ , _ tawaten _ k all ag p ak _ pi yan _ uzive kestagh yalghiinga _ iwerngaqun _ aghnagh _ nekeve uute luni _ y aaq ghii tu taq ef tuq _ .
whanga mnun _ kayusiite i _ .
A t a si q _ apeghiigh luku _ , _ imagh mii _ enraq _ .
tanemlleqa _ tawaten _ elngaatall _ .
aghnagh m _ aghul as aq min ig u u _ .
taagken _ apeghiigh yan _ , _ I gh en n aq _ alaghrang _ aghula igate uq _ kay ag tagh waagh yagh agh put _ pipagningite u aghte uq _ .
taagken _ atghagh luta _ inglu anun _ pi ukut _ enraq _ , _ ukavek _ N o m e- e mun _ .
N o m e- e mun _ kaa llu ta _ tawavek _ , _ malghugnegh t _ S c o w - et _ akmaken _ s te am - akun _ tagite ma aqe kangit _ saghya anun _ ilakaghqagh t _ .
entaqun _ maaken _ angyaghpag a _ ul ev agh agh ng aaq elghii _ ak il p eg ameng _ .
tamaani _ 1 9 2 8 - ng w aa llu _ , _ 1 9 2 9 - ng w aa llu _ .
teller- mi _ aghqella llegh ut
enkaam _ taagken _ aygugh aqe luta _ tukfigh i aqe luta _ .
teller- mi _ tawani _ iqallug _ aghqella taqagh ut _ .
P e d er s en - ngu uq _ tanemlleqa _ teller- mete ngughk _ .
inglu anite ngughk _ m is si o n - n et _ tu ng ang it n il nguq _ .
aghqella te aqe ainkut _ .
aghqella _ wh al en _ uzive te luku _ whanga _ at egh qugh teng w aa qu nga _ .
I ing Ê¼ g gu r ug llak _ tamlag te luku _ , _ t a z ing ken _ s ay un em teg gu _ , _ nutem _ uka _ kavighte te ghllag luni _ taglagh aqe uq _ .
ila a _ tepe ste luku _ , _ iingunagh an _ tepe sigate aat _ .
uglagh _ tepe luni _ tawani _ tepe ste luni _ .
aw llaag ghhagh inagh ghllag u uq _ .
nuna nge aik _ , _ iqallug _ , _ kayu _ , _ puvangitaghagh _ , _ neghnavregagh _ , _ sighunpayaag _ .
pekete ta meng qun _ imigh aqe aput _ kalngagagh t _ , _ k an ani _ avugh yaghqaa luki _ .
taana _ k i ngu m m neng _ u aten _ pi aqe atgu _ .
megh mun wha _ pekete aqe nghite atgu _ .
S i ku l in gh w aa llegh put
taagken _ iqallug meng _ pi luta _ tespagavek _ enraq _ .
siku _ pi magh mi _ elngaatall _ siku _ .
siku anun _ kaate aqe ukut _ ay gu v ani _ taakwani _ si ku gh ll aw aagh u uq _ .
siku niigh lleg pigu uq llu _ enraq _ pedersen _ taana _ .
gaarinegh pig meng _ d y n am i te - tek l uta _ .
elngaatall _ ugh ug w igh pen aam ta _ d y n am i te - tes t en i _ siku mun _ ateghaate luta _ .
ii-ii _ , _ gu uq agh aq agh put _ megh kun _ ukimallegh kun _ ighllute aqe luki _ .
amenqun _ nakreg leg ghllag u aqe lghiit _ angyaghpag t _ taa k egh llag meng _ .
Y um r al igh luki _ tawaten _ asighte te luki _ kum agh ll uki _ , _ ighllute luki _ qimagugh te aqe luta _ .
kii _ , _ 5 0 _ p o un d -em _ guute llegh i _ , _ siku t _ aange lghiit _ pag aa aa _ !
S egh legh ll aw aagh u ut _ .
enkaam _ tume ngllagh luku _ , _ aghula i te aqe lghiikut _ tawani _ .
angyaghpag _ uka _ tagi luni _ , _ tagi luni _ , _ saaghw mteggun _ taaggun _ aag luni _ aghuliigh igate ngughk _ .
pi ke sigh t _ legan _ nagun _ tapghagh kun _ akuqaghtugh luta _ uugte aqe ukut _ .
I ng av er ug llak _ alla _ ategh yaghqagh ni _ qayughllak _ .
nukalpigagh ni _ elngaatall _ tengghu nagh _ elngaatall _ .
U gh um aagh meng _ naange luta _ .
tawaten _ siku mi _ igleghtekayugu uq _ .
enkaam _ sallghite yagh kuni _ maaten _ , _ i c e _ b r e ak er - mi _ umiileg _ pi niigh pigte nagh u yagh uq _ .
aygugh llegh ut
A y gu v anun _ lliigh luta _ , _ taakwna _ es tug w agh tu uq _ , _ ama _ taakwani _ angyaghwaagh kun _ mal gh ug negh teg gun _ .
angyaghpag ut _ kanagh a _ aw av ani _ .
saghya a _ tag l aaq ugh aq eg ke f ut _ es tug w am _ .
neghe llegh llu _ naghughte aqe lghii _ , _ salngag _ taglaate qugh luku _ elngaatall _ .
esghaghhu _ N u r t h _ S t ar - ek s u wh aagh ul uku _ S iv uq aghh m iit _ en leg aqegk angat _ salngag _ qelpegh qugh ma ni luku _ , _ maani _ usingigh negh meggni _ .
tespagani _ tawatete uq _ .
igatagh negh mta _ legan _ sa u aat _ salngag t _ qelpeghte luki _ negh aqe ukut _ .
angyaghpag _ qayughllak _ kanagh a _ , _ negh vig llu _ naghughte aqe kanga _ .
esghagh a _ N u r t h _ S t ar - ek s u wh aaq _ tawatete ma lghii _ aghqestaagh ghllag mi _ usingigh nghmini _ .
taagken _ iiwen _ P u in t _ hupe- mun _ kaate negh mta _ , _ yug meng _ tugulagh te aqe uq _ .
aghvinleg _ tug w aaq aa _ , _ ken l em m n ii _ kayute u luku _ .
A ghi si nan kut _ tamaakut _ S tan l e y - n kuk _ .
stanley _ taana _ qavngaq _ maaken _ A n c h u r ag e- e taq ng am ta _ tengegkayug kun _ esghaqagh kaqe a _ .
P o in t _ H o pe - egh m ii _ B ar r o w - mun _ lli aqe aq _ .
kii _ , _ upugha te kaqe aanga _ elngaatall _ .
A ghi si n a _ enraq _ taana _ tuqu yug ll aag u f tuq _ .
taagken _ tawavek _ kaa llu ta _ yug meng _ tugulagh te luni _ , _ mangtag _ tukfightugh luku _ awataghpag mete ngughk _ .
F i f t y _ keveg iqe aq _ tukfigh aqe kanga _ mangtag _ , _ tekeghagh mi _ tawani _ .
K en l em m ni _ aki u luku _ .
U g w avek _ sivuyag m _ qaye anun _ ll il agh tegh aqegk ang it _ .
S iq in gh aqegk angi _ taawani _ .
ataasigh _ ellng a tugh q w aag aa _ awataghpag _ .
P e d er s en -em _ pi unga _ , _ â _ taana _ imagh mii llu _ awataghpag _ akmagutagh mun _ kuuve luku _ neq ek nak esi _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ ukite luku _ akmagutagh gnun _ kuuve luku _ aa y _ , _ k av igh r uk wh al ek _ uqugh a _ elngaatall _ .
arekull _ tekeghagh mii t _ kevigh sagh it _ , _ mangtag _ , _ uqugh _ tawaten _ ug l aghq ak alghii _ kevigh te ma aqe kangat _ .
mangtag llu _ , _ uqugh llu _ .
llaaghanwha _ neqekagh ut _ elngaatall _ , _ neqnigh ghhalek _ .
saallghaghte te llegh ut
tawaten _ allameng _ angyaghpag t _ kaate laatagh aput _ A r c t i c - ngu f tuq _ .
pedersen _ lishuurne- mun _ lliigh magh an _ .
taana _ arctic _ L e av it t -em _ pi a _ .
ilu akun _ siku m _ iglegha te aqe ukut _ , _ un Ê¼ g a _ siku ghllag _ .
ii _ , _ tawaten _ kiyaghte ghngaamta _ qu ut f agh meng _ saallghaghte a _ .
tepe naqe ainkut _ seghleghhalek _ .
ii _ , _ kete mun _ elngaatall _ ang waagh as alghii kut _ taakut _ A r c t i c - et _ enankin _ aange lghiit _ , _ aga _ I eg an _ igleghte ut _ .
whangkuta _ sangyite aqe luta _ qenwat _ tu mang it gun _ aatqaghte luta _ tu mang it gun _ taakwagun _ .
awavagh ghllag luta _ llangaqa _ te p n aanghi llegh mun _ lliigh luta _ .
A r c t i c - et _ taakut _ aghuliigh ut _ .
enkaam _ whangkuta _ sa ni te mun _ pegnem _ apumgute luta _ aghula igh ukut _ .
tagtalmi _ tawaten _ ellmaaragte yagu _ kelute mun _ tag lagh tuun neq ig ll uta _ esne akun _ taakwagun _ .
B ar r u w - mun _ kaa llu ta _ arctic _ taw an tuq _ .
whangkuta _ naghughte ukut _ .
taana _ arctic _ usingigh yaghqaa lghii _ , _ tawavek _ Ch ar l e s _ B r o wer - mun _ .
Ch ar l e s _ B r u w e r _ es tug w aq aat _ L e av it t- en kut _ .
taagken _ naghughte ukut _ whangkuta _ elngaatall _ , _ P o in t _ L a y _ , _ nagh ugh qugh agh put _ amavek _ D em ar c at i o n _ P o in t _ kaate luku _ nagh ugh tagh put _ .
B ar r o w _ ivgagh lghii ni _ ken l eng waagh anun _ asivagh mete te _ qiive kayugu ukut _ .
asivagh mete ut _ C an a d a- n kut _ .
aghqe itagh i te llegh
asivagh mete te _ qiive luta _ taakwani _ sa uq _ tagitug ghraag ughtagh a _ .
imukun _ naasi qu gpenateng _ , _ whanga qun _ naasiigh qu ste nghite aanga _ .
ii _ , _ aghqitaghagh ightu kut _ igleghte kestagh ghngaamta _ .
iitek _ uutqiigh aghtagh yagh uq _ .
sa u a _ q em igh y uk _ el qugh agh simak ef ut _ , _ sani kek _ naqam _ uusqagh lghiik _ .
iitek _ all aagh h iin agh aq sagh tu uq _ , _ aghtugh uq _ .
qavaa yagh lghiit _ teghtugh qugh luki _ .
angyaghwaagh _ evlug ngllagh magh mi _ angyaghpag m _ u v it ang ani _ , _ angwaagh magh emta _ , _ uteghmun _ pi magh mi _ .
angyaghpag _ talwa _ aghulate igate uq _ .
nanugh u uq _ taana _ aghqe itagh i sigh ut _ .
tawaten _ un ug w aa _ ghhatagh nghite ukut _ .
yuug _ ataasigh _ pegge stekagh at _ .
aghnagh _ taana _ nuliigh ni _ lengaaghte aghtekagh a _ eng in e- eg nun _ qamavek _ .
umeg igh lleg _ taana _ ellmi neng _ angyallighte aqe uq _ .
unaami _ unaangu pigte luku _ teghtugh luta _ teghtugh qugh luta _ uyghiite k _ maalghug _ angyaghwaagh k _ tuteg te lukek _ uyghiite t _ unaghsigh meng _ sanighyigh luki _ uyate te igh luki _ atghagh te aqe aput _ t aan Ê¼ g avek _ , _ uyghiite t _ uqig ghllag u lghiit _ , _ angyaghpag m _ uyghigh ta i _ .
iwerngaqun _ aw av anun _ atghagh te luki _ qalqalima meng _ , _ uyghiite t _ aga _ kaleve aqe ut _ .
enkaam _ angyaghpag meng _ taagken _ angwaagh magh emta _ uteghmun _ , _ taakut _ tangki mii ii te a _ iighsuute t _ uyghiite _ , _ ghhatagh naqe m _ angtale aneng _ , _ angyaghwaagh _ qagi ngllagh magh mi _ .
taawa _ un ug w aqegk anga _ sa gpenani _ .
H ii k _ , _ tagtalmi _ uyghiite k _ samaken _ nusug negh megteni _ iwerngaqun _ ugh w ar r ameng _ akleg i _ taakut _ imigh ghllag ma aqe lghiit _ .
tangki t _ iknaqe te meggneng _ s ayug w aqegk ang it _ .
taagken _ ila a _ tagtalmi _ kii _ uyghiite _ sakeqe te uq _ , _ qivghuke a _ elngaatall _ .
ataasighhaaghte uq _ uyghiite _ .
C o al - a _ at egh qugh agh put _ elngaatall _ megh mun _ .
qafsina _ t o n _ megh mun _ eg tagh put _ .
legan _ megh mun _ s an iv anun _ k al er taq ap ut _ .
D i es e l _ tamaa na _ tavaghte aqe luku _ ellnga n _ uqughqagh a _ .
D r um - a _ qafsinegyag _ at egh qugh agh put _ .
angyaghpag m _ saghya a _ inglu anun _ angaghqugh magh an _ , _ qaame na nga _ angyaghpag _ ig g ag es qell uku _ .
pingayut ii ta ani _ tawani _ pi yalghiikut _ aywaa meng _ anuqligh ma kanga _ .
pika _ qute _ pi ka ngiighhagh _ .
ii _ , _ waame niigh uq _ elngaatall _ tawani _ uyghiite k _ taake uk _ nagh qell in ghi t ng waagh tu k _ elngaatall _ .
uutqiigh magh mi _ , _ ellnga n _ angyaghpag _ c um p as s - e kun _ nalluniigh magh an _ .
aaghhaghte na ai _ tagtalmi _ .
whangkuta _ qamani _ saghya _ inglu anun _ ughumaaghte luta _ elngaatall _ inglu anun _ saghya _ aghv igh qu q ef ut _ .

mesiigh ghhagh inagh _ tamaa na _ tavaghte luku _ .
ii- k _ , _ iiwen _ aghnegh m _ qute kaghagh ke a _ , _ h ii k _ aaghhaghte na ai _ angyaghpag _ .

H ii k _ , _ ghhatagh ukut _ qenwat _ .
taawa _ uutqiigh ukut _ uyghiite kun _ taaggun _ , _ eng in e- em aam ta _ , _ d r um - el gh utegh llak _ taana _ .
uyghiite mun _ kaa llu ta _ tawavek _ qiive luta _ sayug luku _ , _ t aan Ê¼ g avek _ elngaatall _ angwaagh uq _ , _ tawaten _ ig g ag ng agh llag em ta _ elngaatall _ .

tungtutuqagh _ .
qiighqagh mun _ tungtu yagh aqe lghiit _ , _ ii _ , _ en leg anun _ .

malghukuraagh _ s l o o p - a _ .

wayaghte llegh

P e d er s en - mun _ tuune ait _ .

pi unga _ , _ â _ T e d d y _ kayusiite yaghtugh ghhu _ . _ â

ungipaate a _ umiileg _ .

taagken _ enkaam _ aygugh ukut _ .

enkaam _ tagi ukut _ .
enkaam _ ayumigh ke magh an _ S w en s en - ngu f tuq _ taana _ tes pag ag un _ aag qagh yu k _ naqamalla _ ruuseghmii neng _ p er m it - el ek _ .

A k il p eg am _ nangaghnegh a

esgha _ tawatete ut _ .

tawaten _ kiyaghte aqe ukut _ angyaghpag mi _ .

Y ugh aq
Y ugh aq _ taana _ .
N ag an n em k i _ taawa _ , _ â _ aag yu i aagh _ tanem _ â _ nagate aqe kegka _ legan _ pi nghatgu _ .
Y ugh agh yaq min i nga _ , _ talwa _ saafte gpenanga _ , _ iigge ni _ qule mun _ nengug te ai _ , _ nengug te luki _ whaa _ qilag m _ pamaken _ qu l igh h aan _ qu l igh h aan eng _ qilag m _ pi nga yu an _ qafsig ke llegagh te _ amiiragh aneng _ ay ap gh aat ii s qell uni _ pi uq _ .
qaamna _ sa u a _ aqnighqagh ii lghii _ pinighsagh na luku _ .
tungsigh llegh a _ esgha _ taana _ in te r es t- te t k egh ll ak aqa _ B i b l e- e mi _ H e av en s _ o f _ H e av en - qun _ atightu kangat _ .
sumeghtaghagh tke ghllag aqe kegka _ .
taagken _ tungsigh luni _ wetku _ tawani _ taawa _ elngaatall _ ef l ugh waagh um agh m a _ .
ayapegh aatagh luni _ qaamna _ aqnighnegh _ pinighsagh naqe a _ , _ m aa ng n naq aa _ .
M aa ng n naq n iiq iit _ entaqun _ s o o t h en aq negh meng _ .
M aa ng ta _ taana _ un d er s tan d - te y aqegk a _ s o o t h - ngu f tuq _ .
entaqun _ ukut _ yughagh qite te a _ nagate nghmegteki _ ukut _ ip a pi gh q egh ll an gh ata _ , _ neghyu ghllag negh meggni _ piniighte aqe ai _ .
taawa _ yughagh nghmeng _ taaqe luni _ whaa _ piniighte na ai _ ayapghaatagh gneng _ igamsiqa yug uq _ , _ qilag m _ p am u m _ pi ng ay aan nguq _ qafsig aneng _ ayapegh aatagh luni _ pi lghii _ .
tefaay _ , _ naa ng taq iit _ qesigh aqe ainkut _ taawa _ .
qesigh luta _ taaqe aqe ut _ .
E v er y _ p r ay e r _ , _ b eg in n ing - e nga _ , _ â _ aag yu i aagh _ tanem _ â _ , _ naangnegh a _ â _ tefaay _ â _ .
amen- nga _ entaqun _ taana _ te f aa y ng w aaq elghii _ .
aag yu i aagh _ taana _ taawa _ maaten _ whaa _ kinku nun _ n uy ek l igh nun _ aapte aghte aqe yagh aqa _ .
nallu kaqe aat _ .
akuzitekagh ut _ , _ part _ o f _ o u r _ p r ay e r _ , _ beginning _ o f _ p r ay e r _ .
entaqun _ whangkutestun _ sa meng _ pi llgh u uq _ wallu _ .

ateghte i
kina lli _ ama _ angyat teng _ aga _ angyagh lghiit _ ateghte i lghii _ nagate laatagh aqa _ ?
tawaten _ sivuke laatagh aa _ , _ â _ aag yu i aagh _ tanem _ â _ , _ angyat ghhagh ni _ aagkut _ taghneghagh ngunaki _ ava u na ki _ meghraag pigte luki _ kete sqe ai _ .
sa mun _ teghig ke sagh mun _ esghagh yaghqaa gpenaki _ taghneghagh nge te yaghqaa gpenaki _ aga _ , _ un Ê¼ g ani _ ivagh i naigh sqe ai _ .
N aa ng saq min ik i _ y ugh ani _ , _ qesigh uq _ sivuke luni _ angyaleg ita _ sigutanga n _ tunute nga kete te _ qesigh uq _ .
alla _ pi laatagh uq _ .
sivuyagte yan _ sigute gkenka _ tun ut ang akun _ qesigh laatagh aa _ .
esgha _ al egh qu qay ug w it _ .
T egh ig si t
T egh ig si t _ tamaakut _ negh ke igh sag ghllag mi _ elngaatall _ pi kay ug w et _ .
T egh ig si l g et _ ungipaghagh neng _ entaqun _ ayumigh ghhagh aneng _ ayuqe lghiit _ .
teghigsigh negh meggni _ entaqun _ seal- i qugh kayugu laatagh ut _ , _ alignalghii u ut _ .
sivunegh lgu lghiit _ ayvegh ughtekagh meng _ .
ayvegh nge yu ghllag t _ sivuqagh m _ ayvegh nge yu lleghtagh igh i _ siv un gh an nguq _ ayvegh ughtekau lghii _ .
A y v egh teg gun _ ayumigh ite nghaani _ tagi aqe luni _ , _ tagi aqe luni _ .
melqunge luni _ qenwat _ tazimantekagh _ .
ima _ kaate laatagh nghmini nguq _ q alghii gh aq elghii _ ayvegh lghute m _ qalghigh te lghii m _ qu ng ang an ill uni _ kingunegh minun _ .
ategh teng _ atightugh aqe kangi _ .
ipa u ut _ tamaakut _ entaqun _ ayumigh _ ungip am s ug w et _ .
laluramke nun _ W iy am _ tamaa na _ c o m p ar e- en n em kun _ , _ elqughaghte te luni _ ayuqe uq _ , _ p al aghh agh meng _ allangughte vleghaghkagh _ .
ayumigh m _ Kiyagh taa l gha
A r t i c l e _ l aw s - et _ taakut _ kiyagh taa ll ghi t _ ayumigh m _ O l d _ T es tam en tet _ pi it _ yupig m _ legan _ kiyagh taa llgh a tun _ ayuqe ut _ .
sangiighhagh _ qamagte luni _ itake ghllag luni _ ayuqe uq _ .
En kaa ng am _ yupig ni _ whangkuta _ iglegh negh put _ tawatete yaghpete uq _ legan _ ukmangite ghllag _ .
ungipamsug te negh mta _ maaten _ nani _ ungipamsug te negh mta _ .
talwa _ esghapag snanigh ghllag luta _ ayuqe kanginkut qun _ .
esghagh yugnagh ghllaget _ .
A v eg tugh h agh mun _ neghe uute naqe mi _ whaten _ aqelqagh leg ni _ , _ liilightuusagh leg _ , _ avegtugh lleghqagh meng _ , _ sa u a _ tamaghhagh mi _ .
kenletu lleghpigagh u ukut _ entaqun _ whangkuta _ l iiligh tuus aq em r ug w aaq _ sa u a _ uglagh u pigte lghii _ .
sa ite ngughk _ enkaam _ ayumigh _ .
neqe m _ ila a _ neghe snanigh luku _ ayuqe kanga _ ila a _ sa u a _ anglinghhagh nun _ tamaavek _ , _ ila a _ aqsaleg nun _ aghnagh nun _ .
liisimake luki _ entaqun _ sa lget _ tamaakut _ yupig t _ peghqinegh pigu lghiit _ .
talwa _ piitesighagh m _ ila a _ alngunak _ whaten _ negh yaghqaa nghite ngughk _ .
agleghnagh ni luki _ pi aqe kangit _ , _ agleghnagh u nghite uq _ entaqun _ atigh llegh a _ taana _ .
puvalla t
puvalla t _ tamaakut _ entaqun _ yug w em _ kitum _ sa u a _ esghagh luku _ puvalla ughtekayugu uq _ taawa _ puvalla liite kayugu uq _ , _ entaqun _ g i f t- teng aq elghii t _ yug w et _ taakut _ sa meng _ nani _ .
P u v all an egh meg g ni _ tawaten _ , _ elngaatall _ p ar t y - l ghii s tun _ katam _ ayuqe ut _ , _ amalka _ c o r e- el g et _ iwernga _ akugh leg t _ .
sa u a _ tawaten _ aan gh u te llegh t eng _ liisimake kangat _ .
P in ig h _ atugh aqe aat _ p u v all an egh meg g ni _ .
neqenghaghqe ghllag kayugu ut _ .
uzive na iqe kangit llu _ tapghagh at _ whaten _ aghveghaqetagh kun _ petug luki _ .
aghnagh t _ tugu luki _ yug w et _ paamken _ inglu aneng _ tun ut ng it n ill uteng _ .
D an c e- es tun _ legan _ tawaten _ u z iv ng waagh utegh ll ak ayug w en nguq _ neng l aghq iq utegh ll ak ayug w et _ .
seghlegh _ sa u a nguq _ p uy g aaq egk angat _ puvalla mi _ tawaten _ qerngughte te luteng _ .
A ll aagh iin aag ugh nguq _ puvalla _ tamaa na _ , _ kitum _ yug w em _ pi a _ alla u aqe luni _ pattern- nga _ .
S aa y at
ila ita _ s aa y aan iiq egk ang it _ puvalla it _ .
S aa y at _ tamaakut _ t a x i d er m is tes tun _ ul im aa ghi s tun _ ayuqe ut _ .
naqam nguq _ kana _ sagnegh t _ , _ qayuutagh ghhagh t _ neqe meng _ imigh luki _ qukaa ni _ tawani _ kenghhwagh m _ saaghw ani _ lli luteng _ .
kiiwhken _ kiwa _ , _ nallu kaqe kangit _ maakut _ ila ita _ anglinghhagh t _ , _ yug w et _ aqume luteng _ piighhagh meng _ entaqun _ amel leg ngestagh ghhagh meng _ ivalu meng _ paaggun _ pi z i te t gun _ pi luki _ .
qawaag m nguq _ amighqwaagh i _ , _ sa u aat _ entaqun _ alngunak _ qawaag t _ , _ iwhani _ esghaghkagh teng _ taakut _ qawaag t _ akuqagh kayugu kangit _ .
A m igh q waagh en nguq _ afta nghmegteki _ s eg ll uki _ kevigh luki _ .
kinegh nghata _ kevigh luki _ unguva lghii stun _ legan _ whaten _ ulima luki _ .
nagun _ paamggun _ kaki te aqe ait _ qiipagh t _ .
pika nguq _ qawaag t _ nalug luteng _ it egh aan negh meg g ni _ esghagh aqe ait _ .
esghapag ghngaaghmegteki nguq _ qawaag t _ , _ yaqugh teng _ whaten _ s aag ll uki _ , _ neqe mun _ kanavek _ pi luteng _ , _ p u v ug lu te nguq _ , _ aga _ qu ul v agh agh taq ut _ .
T es k ig u m _ esghapagsagh ke nghmini _ elngaatall _ , _ esgha _ p ar t y - es tun _ ayuqe lghiit _ p u v all all ghi t _ .
P u v all an nguq _ tamaakut _ seghlegh ite ut _ quy an agh ll aag u ut _ , _ qu yaq ayug utegh ll ak ayug u ut _ .
eghte qugh u aagh
eghte qugh u aaghet _ maakut _ angyagh m _ piinligh lleghqagh ani _ el ngaat al i _ nangllegsiisigh t _ , _ tungsigh ragh sigh t _ elngaatall _ taakut _ .
Y e a r _ r o un d _ entaqun _ neqe _ sa u a _ unakegkagh eng _ , _ part- sa _ taana _ s av e ek ayug w at _ .
angyagh _ piinligh yaghtugh nghaani _ ategh qugh luku _ , _ tunugh _ tamaa na _ pugnegh iigh luku _ , _ kaape llegh ke i luteng _ nunivag meng _ , _ sa u a _ akuute aq llu _ pi luku _ .
aghveghaqetagh m _ u v it ang akun _ n ek egh qugh luki _ tawaten _ , _ alqimagh yukagh gpenaki _ , _ saafte yukagh gpenaki _ naten _ itake ghllag luki _ .
angyaleg m _ nuliigh ghhagh inagh n _ qep gh aq ayug w i _ akuute yaghqagh t _ tamaakut _ .
tanpegh meng _ ulig luki _ qavaghtekayugu ut _ .
U n ug w em _ q uk an gh ani _ angyaleg nkuk _ , _ siv uy ag t en kuk _ nulighh a llu _ taana _ iv agh ull ug w aq ut _ ilagagh aqe ut _ .
taaqe negh megteni _ sivuyagtekete te lghiik _ aane lutek _ tuune i yaghtugh aqe uk _ .
taawa _ eghqwaagh aqe ut _ , _ egh waagh luteng _ qay u ut as qu v eg aghh aat _ sa u aat _ , _ sagnegh nge ste aq _ uglagh u pigte uq _ .
eghqwaagh yaghtugh negh meggni _ tuune i yaghtugh naqe na iqe ut _ .
Y e ar l y _ c at c h - e y eng _ taana _ ang yagh n aq _ pi naq en gh ani _ tu ng sigh w aa negh meg g ni _ entaqun _ taana _ tuun egk ayug w aat _ .
I q ug wa _ amalka _ veghute lghii stun _ amalka _ pi kay ug w aat _ .
elngaatall _ tawani _ tu ng si qay ug w et _ .
taawa _ ul ig i uki _ unaami _ aghte nghaani qun _ samavek _ esnagh mun _ enraq _ angyat teng _ kete luki _ eghqwaagh aqe lghiit _ .
taakut _ elngaatall _ eghqwaagh tkekagh teng _ taglagh negh meggni _ , _ taawa _ qaagken _ negh yagh tu m _ negh aqe kangi _ .
taawa _ qagavek _ enraq _ taana _ m ing il at kay ug w at _ ang ef q aghh aan _ tawaten _ qamagte luku _ taagken _ ikute te luki _ aw al igh tugh taa kay ug w iit _ T es q ag eg kut _ enraq _ temngi _ tugu gpenaki _ aw al in ghi s t eng _ sangiighhagh meng _ imiite aqe luki _ .
amalka _ n av egh te v legh agh aq luki _ .
kingulighpigagh _ qepghagh llegh _ nagate kaqe kegka _ whang kun ni _ eghqwaagh aqngameng _ .
tawani _ un ug mi _ iv agh ull un egh meng _ U g w e te l en _ taaqe luni _ aane luni _ tuune i yaghtugh luni _ itegh luni _ , _ taawa nguq _ pugnegh at llu _ , _ kaapelqagh at llu _ tugu vike ma kangat _ P ing ayug g aag un nguq _ tu gu v ik negh meg g tek i _ .
E s k im o - t _ ugpeqe ghllag luki _ ayuqe kangit _ , _ tugh negh aan nguq _ pi ng ay u wh aghn eng _ ighneghwaagh ke ut _ .
taawa nguq _ iq ug w aneng _ tugu te ma lghii _ tawaten _ tugu te aatagh ma lghii _ .
kii _ alinge yalghiimek _ , _ W am ii y aq _ alingruugh yalghiimi _ .
T uq iin aq ng in an gh at ang uq _ negh ka itneng _ tes am an ll uki _ tawaten _ tu gu v ik egk ayug w ii _ tughneghagh m _ , _ taghneghagh m _ s aam _ .
alingruugh ghllagkagh _ , _ ellnga _ tuqu kau uq _ .
entaqun _ al ing egh llag em _ tuqute kaqe a _ .
alinge igate yagh kumeng _ entaqun _ p as s aaq n ay alghiit _ .
ugpegh ke ghllag m _ , _ r es pe c t- egh llag em _ taawa _ ipa _ aa tes tek ayug w aa _ .
taana _ esgha _ puygu nghite kegka _ whaa _ .
pi nga yu neng _ tughneghagh t _ ighneghwaagh ke na iqe kangit _ .
uyvasaghqe a
uyvasaghqe a _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh u uq _ .
taana _ amenqun _ t ap e en i _ qikmigh meng _ pi lghiit _ uy v as aghq eng ngu uq _ tamaa na _ , _ tawaten _ an egh ll eq _ qamagte luni _ ategh a _ alngunak _ .
amalka _ alignalghii m llu _ kina _ kayagte yagh kunigu _ qinuyug ta ii lghiit _ , _ tusigagh luni _ sangameng _ tawaten _ an egh tu t s eng _ alignalghii kun _ liigike naqe luku _ , _ alignalghii m _ kayagte yagh kumiki _ apeghtugh yagh kumiki _ tawaten _ pi s qell uki _ uy v as aghq en n ay alghiit _ .
taana _ qikmigh _ tape- mi _ U uy gh aan kut _ i wh an ing at _ .
qikmigh t _ tamaakut _ ng iig aq iit _ q in u yug llag nun _ tam aa ku nun _ ngiigte ste luki _ tuqute aqe ait _ .
naavghusagh ke aqe ait _ .
qikmigh u naanghite ut _ , _ sang ugh ll u wh agh t eng _ pivake ghllagkagh eng _ taakut _ q in u yug w et _ n aal gh u tes q eq agh ll uki _ ng iig luki _ egte aqe ait _ .
S u f l ug w aq _ sa u a _ .
uyvasaghqe a _ tamaa na _ alla u uq _ .
uglagh uq _ ategh _ .
qani
tamaakut _ ama _ s u i c i d e- ek at _ qani na iqe kangit _ .
S u i c i d e _ taana _ qani u uq _ , _ yugtagh u nghite ngughk _ yugte aq _ allakagh mete uq _ .
Tam aa kun nguq _ qanig ke aat _ segh l ell egh pig aq ii _ yug w em _ elngaatall _ , _ um yug w ii te llegh pig aan nguq _ qani kayugu ut _ .
qinuyug negh meggni _ , _ k iy ang uq _ yuug _ pinigh lghii _ qanig perewaagh _ ell meg g neng _ tuqute aqe ut _ .
N aq am en r aq _ lii simak is te l igh luteng _ tawaten _ entaqun _ nanevgaghtagh meggnun _ , _ nuyekligh igh ta meggnun _ akuz ing waagh luteng _ , _ e x p l a in - neng waagh luteng _ , _ naallghute yaghqaa nghite lleg teng _ liigike negh meggni _ .
taawa _ amenqun _ ne m _ tun ut ang ani _ uyghag ghllag _ i r r eg ul a r _ si d e- taw an s alghii _ .
neghqute mun _ uyghag ke na iqe kangat _ .
neghqute m nguq _ naken _ tagi tke a _ entaqun _ ulape u luni _ tawaten _ qani vig u luku _ .
P i yug m e nguq _ taglagh aqe ut _ qani naqe lghiit _ tamaakut _ yug w en nguq _ kiyang _ pinighikagh t _ iilqayug yuguma ghllag ut _ .
pi aqe kangi _ U g w e te l em _ , _ â _ Tam aa kun nguq _ pinighi pigesnagh luteng _ qateghyiighagh m _ um yug w aan eng _ um yug w al g et _ ell meg g neng _ tuqute aqe ut _ naallghute lleghqagh eng _ iilqayuke nghmegteggu _ . _ â
taawa nguq _ taglagh luteng _ uyghag nguq _ taana _ akite kete luku _ , _ ila i nguq _ legan _ guute negh meggni _ , _ esghaghhu nguq _ uyghag _ taana _ iilqugh vleghagh ghllag u yagh uq _ .
ila i nguq _ legan _ kenuqagh aqe ut _ ell meg g neng _ tuqute aqe ut _ .
entaqun _ esgh ap ag te l igh luteng _ maligte luteng _ .
entaqun llu nguq _ ila i _ pi aqe kangi _ , _ naa llgh us aghq agh ll u wh aat _ .
naqam nguq _ ila i _ tamaakut _ pinighi kau nghite ngugh t _ um yug w agh tuq at _ neghqwaagh it _ uki iqe luteng _ ke m g i m _ ang tal ang aneng _ , _ naave luteng _ .
piniighte aqe ai nguq _ naallghute aqe ut _ igleghte yagute aqe ut _ .
M er eg te meng _ tume t _ sivuqagh mun
tapi i sag m _ apegh llegh a
N egh q un nguq _ taana _ akmaneghpallugh _ , _ aglagh naqe negh meggni _ mangteghasqwaagh t _ sa u ut _ entaqun _ naten _ angka qaghte lit _ , _ tan pegh h ek _ tawaten _ .
esgha _ mangteghasqwaagh _ iingunagh an _ akmag ma kanga _ maaken _ taamavek _ aglagh negh meggni _ sivugnagh mete te _ .
ayag ke itagh te t _ sa it _ , _ naten _ angka an _ s aku sim aat _ imani _ .
esghaghhu _ atiiqe te yagh ghngaaghmeng _ , _ aghsaan _ tawaten _ .
En kaa ng am _ ayuqligh _ sangan _ ilughagh ke steggu _ whangkuta _ sa meng _ apallugh ke luku _ .
nanevgaghtagh ma _ taa m _ angayuqagh ma _ sa ke aat _ entaqun _ .
tanemwha qun _ Y aagh u _ U g w al iit lu _ pike kangat _ , _ taa m eng wh a _ apallugh ke luku _ pi ma nghite a _ .
esghaghhu _ maaken _ amavek _ akmag kayugu ma lghiit
M er eg te meng _ piinlillegh a
entaqun _ tazingani _ aam n ang u yagh tuq _ neghpigagh a _ meregta _ .
tegh vleghagh m _ qula ani _ tazinga _ nenglu t _ ay um igh tan egh q es iigh et _ esghagh aqe kenka _ tamaa _ naghughte aqe kenka _ .
aghvegh m _ el q un ev r ag i _ , _ ang tugh h aam _ el q un ev r aku m aaq egk angi _ esghaghhu _ .
tawaten _ uyghag stun _ q al te tu t k al igh luteng _ lli aqe aat _ , _ ay um igh tan egh q es iigh em _ entaqun _ angtale aneng _ .
kinkungaawa t _ imani _ .
esgha _ y ul g em _ kenle aneng _ ukavek _ tagi ste naqe kegka _ .
taawa _ tazingavek _ piiwagh luteng _ enraq _ qaye igh llegh nun _ .
qaye igh llegh t _ ama _ nenglullug llgagh u aqe ut _ tamaa _ neng lu r r aag g agh meng _ .
naqam _ taamna _ meregta _ negh ll aa k _ elngaatall _ uglagh pestaagh meng _ .
uglagh lghii _ nenge a _ elngaatall _ yug wa _ .
mengyagh llegh
esghaghhu _ repall _ tawaten _ ayuqe lghii _ .
navek _ ug w avek _ qerngughte vig ghllag mun _ , _ neng l ugh nag llak _ sa u a _ qerngughte vig _ .
ayuqligh t _ q ar g ing un in ay aq angat _ taawavek _ uksaagh mi _ puvalla yagh uute kayugu ma lghiit _ .
elngaatall _ p u v all an gh ani _ yaywaali leg _ tamaa _ elngaatall _ ellng in aghh agh meng _ kezemaghhagh meng _ .
N ay u ghi s tek luku _ , _ k el eng as tek luku _ , _ taghnughhagh lghute ghllag _ taana _ .
ne ghllag m _ taghnughhagh lghute ni _ , _ taana _ af l eng ak is tek luku _ , _ tawavek _ tagi qu ghllag luki _ .
elngaatall _ taawavek _ piiwagh uute ghllag luteng _ taana _ n ay u ghi s tek luku _ .
legan _ tanqighllug ghllag _ aliigh neghllug ghllag _ .
S iiq aat agh tek ayug w i _ qayughllak llu _ sa nghata _ tawaten _ .
puvalla _ kitum _ pi a _ taana _ ef qugh h negh min igu _ , _ atugh laataqu nghminigu _ , _ kaa _ , _ leganqun _ .
elngaatall _ sa u a _ pi naqlaatagh yalghiimi _ , _ taghnughhagh t _ teghhwaaghigh tke aat _ .
taakut _ elngaatall _ taghnughhagh lghute ghllag _ teghhwaaghigh te ut _ paye u naqe yalghiimi _ entaqun _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh _ y uq egh r agh tagh tuq _ sa uq _ elngaatall _ , _ egtug yug uq _ , _ ugmelli iqe uq _ sa uq _ .
qenwat llu _ alla _ yuqeghte yalghiimi _ , _ kii _ , _ k av igh h al aa k _ kenegh ghllag _ uka _ unegken _ .
entaqun _ paye aneng _ k an ak en a _ mengyagh t _ esgha _ tawatete ma lghiit _ .
â _ seghleghhalek _ qenwat llu _ m eng yagh naq iin ku t aa _ , _ heng _ elngaatall _ aragh tek _ ! _ â
esghagh yaghtugh nghminigu _ uka _ tag l aq _ al ii ghi n aq _ naken _ teskanaken _ paye aneng _ .
â _ S egh legh h al ek aa _ qenwat llu _ mengyagh naqe aisi _ , _ elngaatall _ pineghlliqe tek _ , _ aragh teki _ â
alla _ pi yalghiimi _ , _ whaa _ kaate yaghtugh ma lghii _ legan _ kenegh ghllag _ .
tughneghagh t _ kenegh meng _ atkug na iqe kangit _ tughneghagh _ aamtayaghhaq _ aw llaag ghhagh inaghtu te _ iglegh negh a _ ayuqe lghii _ .
kii _ , _ alla _ pi yalghiimi _ kana _ malleg ma lghii _ .
â _ S egh legh h al ek aa _ , _ taawa _ pi naqe aisi _ , _ elngaatall _ aragh tek _ ! _ â
pi yalghiimi _ , _ ii- k _ sa u a _ aane uq _ tesqamaken _ uka _ mayugh uq _ .
elngaatall _ itegh qagh qiinagh luni _ , _ amenqun _ ag l ugh at _ esghagh ke put _ nenglullug _ iikna _ ulima aqe yamegteggu _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh _ tamaavek _ uughqaghte luni _ elngaatall _ taw an ii _ , _ â _ heng _ , _ elngaatall _ aragh tek _ ! _ â
kii _ , _ pi yalghiimi _ qakma _ saaygu tgun _ elpeg kesagh ke yagh lghii mi _ , _ el pe k saq meg teg gu _ , _ kii _ nenglu _ , _ nuna _ iggagte uq _ teskanavek _ , _ sunglug uq _ amig mun _ .
kii _ , _ s u p ugh r agh yaq min igu _ , _ sa yalghiimi _ aneghziig yalghiimi _ tes k an av ek aa _ ig g ag llag um agh mi _ .
elngaatall _ pi megteggun _ taaggun _ , _ tatame aatagh te ut _ , _ kakave niigh te ut _ , _ sa luteng _ pi lit _ leganqun _ estu laghate te ut _ tesqamavek _ naa ke i _ .
T aghn ugh h aq s a _ palaghhagh u a _ , _ qam ak agh ii _ .
S egh legh al ek _ mekelghiigh _ alinge uq _ .
amen- a _ im g agh alghii ni _ sa lghii ni _ tughneghagh t _ pinegh meggni _ entaqun _ ken ghi q eng egk ayug ul ghiit _ .
aga _ kenegh _ mayugh uq _ , _ aga _ qenwat _ qaame aqe luni _ , _ tawaten _ aneghte luni _ .
nasiqute luku _ ukig luni _ agigte yaghtugh yalghiimi _ aga _ .
pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ maalliqun _ whanga _ p iiq aghh n aagh y uk agh pe nga _ . _ â
ii _ , _ aghuliigh qaghte luni _ u ut qagh tuq _ .
tespikavek _ ne minun _ maaten _ mayugh aghte uq _ .
elngaatall _ an egh p agh quy alghii mi _ all an qig g agh meng _ itegh luni _ , _ ii _ p es ku g w agh te v z igh aq luni _ , _ ifkagh vzigh aqe luni _ p al aghh agh meng _ sa kun _ eltugh luni _ .
H ii k _ , _ naghigh luni _ aga _ igleghte uq _ .
legan _ all an qig g agh meng _ taawa _ pi aqe kanga _ .
sa uq _ , _ nagnegh uq _ uteghnigh nghite uq _ .
atghagh uq _ aqeftapag m _ t aan Ê¼ g avek _ paye anun _ .
tawatete aqe ainkut llu _ , _ nan iq eng y at _ sa u aat llu _ pikayug u ut _ , _ naken _ megh meng _ , _ qute meng _ .
K en eng yaq ayug w et _ s ak ayug w et _ , _ enkaam _ megh _ kenegh meng _ itake pigte luku _ ayuqe yagh kangat _ , _ nunaagh ni _ whaten _ .
tagi laghate te ghllag luteng _ taghnughhagh teng _ pi yaq meg tek i _ , _ naate naagh aat _ , _ taakut _ angayuqagh it _ puvalla yaghkagh t _ .
El ngaat all aa _ agh y uugh m ig aat _ sa ut _ , _ pegnem _ akuzi ste luku _ .
qenwat _ pi ma kangi _ , _ â _ El ngaat all aa _ elpek si llu _ aragh tek _ , _ pineghlliqe tek _ .
tawaten _ pi aqe naagh usi _ i negh h n em si _ , _ elpek qun _ naa gpek _ , _ ata gpek _ m eng yagh lleq iin ku t i _ ! _ â
Y ul qu sigh llag et _ anglikagh t _ ang tan iit k at _ , _ sa u a _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh _ tawaten _ ineghneghlliqe ut _ neghyuke luku _ uteghte na luki _ taghnughhagh teng _ , _ pi u lghiit _ .
wetku _ taw a teng in aq _ pi yaghqaa na yu kata _ .
qineghte yaghtugh yalghiimi _ ii- u ke _ .
â _ heng _ , _ wata _ ar agh teg aa _ , _ qenwat llu _ taakwa _ pi qaghte naqe aisi _ , _ legan _ tawaten _ pi llegh mitun _ pi qaghnaqe aisi _ . _ â
elngaatall _ , _ M er eg tem ii nguut _ t a z im an i r ug llak _ M er eg te m _ yug wa _ .
entaqun _ nenglullug ughtekagh m _ D r . _ B un d i - n kut _ iigge aqe luki _ lli aqe ait _ .
A m u m _ yug w i _ .
Y uk s u wh aa ghi ta _ qukagh a _ waran _ entaqun _ .
elngaatall _ kinku k _ taake uk _ maalghug _ taaggun _ amig m _ qula akun _ guutute ligh lutek _ utaqa uk _ , _ sa meng _ imani _ guutute ke ak _ .
Taw at egh pig aq _ maaten _ pi llegh tun _ , _ aneghziig aatagh nghmini _ legan _ tes k an ag un _ .
iiwenllu _ estu laghate te naqe luni _ lliigh aqe uq _ , _ ii _ , _ uu h u uk aaq agh luki _ sa ma kangat _ , _ guute ma kangat _ .
pakreg ghpagte ghllag ma lghii _ .
aanziigh ghllag yalghiimi _ sa yalghiimi _ , _ mighyagh ghllag yalghiimi _ taghnughhagh m _ ak il egh tegh llag luku _ , _ qiya te ghllag t _ .
esgha _ sallghite ma lghii _ taghnughhagh _ , _ sa u a _ h o u r - mi _ sa mi _ tughneghagh m _ aqsa ani _ .
maatnegh a _ tem p er a tu r e nga _ kayaate ma uq _ .
kii _ , _ elngaatall _ utegh tes tek atagh ll ak iit _ taawa _ .
U g w at mun _ piinlillegh
taakwavek _ tagi ut _ , _ tagi ut _ ii _ , _ k ing un ghi t _ maaten _ esgha _ entaqun _ Ung al aan kut _ , _ nekreg te nkut _ , _ W aam segh aat en kut _ , _ yuungaaghagh nkut _ , _ kinku t _ taakut _ M er eg te m _ yug w i _ M ang en an kut _ .
enraq llu qun _ esghaghhu _ maavek _ lliigh yagh luteng _ entaqun _ m aan tek es tagh ng aagh meng _ taamagun _ nenglu ngllagh ma lghiit _ M er eg te kun _ , _ nenglu ngiighhagh _ M ang en an kut _ ulimaagh at _ M er eg tem ii ngu l ghiit _ qayughllak _ .
taamaken _ legan _ aglagh luteng _ sakmavek _ sivuqagh mun _ si q l ug w agh qu m aaq elghii _ aghnalqwaagh _ .
legan _ sagnegh k _ uyamig ke lukek _ whavek _ ne mun _ tagi pigte lghii stun _ taaga _ aglagh aqe lghii _ si q l ug w aghq u _ amavek _ M er eg te mun _ .
taakwa _ aghvigh qaghte vig t _ esghaghhu _ M ang en an kut _ tu mang it _ .
aghsughalegh m _ k i w at ang ani _ taawa _ qenngumsag _ sa u a _ nangupagagh meng _ ategh ke uq _ .
En kaa ng am _ yug w i _ kinku t _ taakut _ nangupagaghmii u na iqe kangit _ esghaghhu _ taawavek _ piiwagh kestagh u u ma lghiit _ , _ tag ik es t aq _ entaqun _ sivuqagh mun _ whaa _ .
N ul am _ mingite kestagh yalghiimi _ M er eg te m _ yug wa _ .
taawa _ taakwagun _ tume tgun _ piiwagh lghii ni _ S an iv legh et _ .
S an iv legh ni _ taakwavek _ .
aghsughalegh _ taana _ kitugh lghii ni _ taakwegkut _ tume t _ taakwa _ .
esghaghhu _ ne kun _ tu um l il uteng _ ayuqe ma aqe lghiit _ taakwa _ nenglu t _ , _ nenglu ngiighhagh t _ ing ang iigh h aq _ uyghag t _ tamaakut _ mingle itni _ qulighnegh itni _ .
N eng l ull u wh aat _ kaate aqe anka _ m aal gh ug w aaq luteng _ .
T a z ing an iq aagh aq _ kitum i _ tawani _ ila i _ taawa _ .
sigasit ni _ tawani _ taawa _ ila i _ .
S an iv legh et _ legan _ tume ghllag leg t _ , _ ayumigh m _ M er eg te m _ yug w it a _ tu mang it _ qelli ghllag luteng _ ug w avek _ .
uyghagagh ni _ tamaani _ uyghag _ n ek egh qugh aq luni _ tu um l ing waagh luni _ .
taawavek _ esnevagh negh mni _ whanga _ esghagh llegh ka _ apegh aqa _ , _ qayughllak _ yugtu yagh ni luki _ ugpeqe aqe kegka _ .
taawavek _ pi yalghiinga _ , _ tes k ig w ken _ , _ taakwa _ nenglagh u aghagh ta t _ , _ nenglagh u aghagh ta t _ ayvigtegh mun _ tawavek _ .
ayvigtegh mi _ taawa _ elngaatall _ nenglu t _ sa u aat _ .
nenglutu uq _ ayvigtegh llu _ taana _ .
tespikani _ quulvani _ , _ s an iv legh ni _ taakwani _ , _ tazingani _ inglu anun _ aghvigh aghte lghii ni _ paninang _ nenglu t _ taawa _ .
N g iig tek aan kut
ayag ke inkut _ tawani _ , _ A y ak i m _ ungip am s ug w ani _ , _ sika ghhagh m _ ungipagh ani _ , _ aghqesaghtughtuqagh t _ , _ satuqagh t _ eghqwaaghtuqagh t _ entaqun _ .
N g iig tek aan kut _ taw an n iiq iit _ .
ngiigtekagh meng _ ategh ke ut _ nenglu ghllag t _ , _ elngaatall _ negh ghllag _ entaqun _ uglaghyagagh ghllag t _ .
Q il ugh aagh et _ legan _ siklaate ghllag luteng _ ngiigte ma kangit _ yugtuumagh an _ .
En kaa ng am _ ategh ke lghiit _ ngiigtekagh meng _ .
N g iig tek aan kut _ atigh neghllugte igate kangit _ taakut _ ellngit _ U g w al iit _ .
M er eg te m _ nalighnegh ke na luki _ entaqun _ I i r gu m _ esgha _ Q av al gh aam _ el tu ugh aa _ ataasigh _ taana _ ngiigtekagh _ .
uyuqligh _ aghnaghagh ghllag _ taana _ .
A w al q am _ panig a _ ngiigtekagh _ .
esgha _ tawaten _ pi kau ma lghiit
taagken _ aghvigh luta _ s an iv legh et _ ku k r ag n aghq w aag ii _ , _ entaqun _ qaye akun _ aag ma aqe ut _ , _ lliigh ma aqe ut _ .
taawa _ iwernga _ ivgagh lghii ni _ sani vleghagh ite te luni _ .
taawa _ neng l ull u wh aq _ tawani _ A y ak in ku ni _ , _ sivugnagh mi _ .
nenglu _ aange llegh ke sigh u uq _ .
elngaatall _ taakut _ amaken _ M er eg te meng _ qaygeghte luteng _ amalka _ tume t _ qaye itgun _ .
taagken _ tan em wh aqa _ tesamavek llu _ ukig vig lgu uq _ , _ sivugnagh mi _ tawani _ .
entaqun _ nalighnegh meggnun _ sa meggnun _ ukig qagh kayugu ut _ taana _ nenglullug _ elngaatall _ , _ Q en aagh aan kut _ kinku t _ nenglu mun _ tawavek _ pikayug u ma lghiit _ .
taagken _ enraq _ S iv ug nagh meng _ taakwa _ tume t _ ug w avek _ A ku l k eg ne kun _ qay g egh tek ayug w et _ tu um l il uteng _ taa m _ neng l ull ug w em _ yug w it a _ tu um l i llgh i _ .
N ek egh qugh waagh luteng _ elngaatall _ ukavek _ akulkeg nun _ q av i mun _ ukig luteng _ .
Taa m _ neng l ull ug w em _ yug w an _ tu um l i llgh i _ .
taakwavek _ A y ak in ku nun _ , _ N egh q ut en ku nun _ , _ Q en aagh aan ku nun _ kaate luteng _ ayuqe lghiit
mayughwaagh mii t
entaqun _ esgha _ 1 6 0 0 - mi _ nani _ neli kau ma lghii _ maani _ .
tagi yalghiimeng _ esgha _ mayugh aagh mi _ tespikani _ .
uukna qun _ mangteghagh t _ aagkut _ manu at _ h o usi ng - et _ , _ esnagh u yagh lghii _ entaqun _ .
tapeghagh meng _ ategh ke lghii _ esgha _ .
mayugh aagh qun _ esgha _ taamaken _ tea- ait _ neli ma lghiit _ .
sa lghii meng llu _ esgha _ A y v egh y ag teg gun _ neli luteng _ ayuqe lghiit _ taamaken _ tag ik es t am _ ang tal ang aneng _ .
sivuqagh _ yug nge kestagh yalghiimi _ .
entaqun _ kana _ qiighqagh mi _ sa mi _ tawani _ neghqute nkut _ .
taghnughhagh mun _ atigh i llegh _ sivuqagh mi
iyaa-kagh nkuk _ , _ K ep el g un kuk _ apegh llegh at
kitum _ atigh aqe aki _ taghnughhagh t
taghnughhagh teng _ atigh naqe nghmegteki _ sivuke luki _ ateghqagh meng _ siivanllegh teng _ aapte luki _ , _ ateghqagh meng _ tuunekagh aneng _ atigh aqe ut _ .
nalighmeng _ k itu meng _ taagken _ atigh naqe ni luki _ siivanllegh teng _ ungipaate aqe ait _ , _ nalluke sigate ait _ .
ila ita _ ategh it _ ataa s ii w aq ut _ , _ ila i _ naqam _ m aal gh ug w aaq luteng _ , _ pi ng ayug w aaq luteng _ .
naten _ ila i _ wata _ uglagh aqe luteng _ .
laluramke stun _ whaten _ ayuqe nghite ngugh u ut _ first _ n am e _ , _ l as t _ name- ke te nghite ngugh u ut _ , _ John _ P a u l _ H en r y _ J o n es - e tun _ tawaten _ .
ategh t _ uglagh ghngaita _ kiyang _ ataasigh t _ ategh t _ atuqe aqe ait _ .
katam _ K aa v am _ pi llgh a tun _ ig angll aq am m ni _ kitum _ taa m _ ategh an _ legan _ nal i ke k _ atughqagh _ .
ila ita _ ramke m _ taghnughhagh teng _ aane ste gpenaki _ ateghqagh meng _ y at aagh q ut kay ug w iit _ .
sivunegh neng
T aag eg ken _ ima _ ellmeng _ sivugh nghmeng _ ategh it _ at iit kay ug w iit _ kingumun _ ukavek _ aviigh tke aat _ .
enkaam _ puygu igate kangit _ sivunegh teng _ kinku u ta i _ .
taagani _ sivuqagh m _ akuzillegh a _ igaqe nga nghite yagh ghngaan _ .
wiin _ kiyaghte luki _ , _ unguva luki _ atiiqe igate kangit _ , _ entaqun _ t aag eg ken _ ima _ qelegh sagh _ .
iwernga _ esgha _ aghnaghagh m _ ighnegh ni _ qantaghaqun _ atigh ma yagh agu _ a ta mi _ ategh aneng _ salin _ kiyaghte luku _ , _ ata an _ efqugh ke ma nge i tke a _ , _ piyuke ma nge i tke a _ .
naten _ ategh t _ aglagh aqe aat _ ramke m _ ila anun
kiyang _ yug w em _ , _ ata m _ tu ng ang aneng _ taghnughhagh t _ allgegh nghata _ atigh kayugu kangit _ .
iwernga _ nuliigh teng _ ellngit a _ pi itneng _ at iiq is tek ayug w it _ , _ akileghtugh kayugu kangit _ .
tawaten _ esgha _ ategh t _ ramke m _ ila aneng _ tag ik ayug w et _ , _ ag l aq ayug w et _ .
aghnagh m _ ategh _ iglegh ut kay ug wa _ .
U g w iigh luni _ tuqu yagh kan _ , _ ug w ing an _ pi ita _ atiiqe yaghqagh a _ .
nalighmeng _ aghnagh m _ ellnga n _ ramke an _ atiiqe yaghqagh a _ .
ila i _ ategh m _ tawatengwaaq _ akuuragh utu tete luteng _ ayuqe aqe ut _ kinku t _ ramke itni _ nalighmeng _ nani _ nuna mi _ .
ategh t _ whani _ igaqe llegh mi _ atuqekagh t _ temngingu ut _ .
ategh u kata _ aku u r am _ pi ste lleqe ai _ .
nuna meng _ , _ nunaagh mun _ atightullegh
kiyang _ ramke m _ ila yan _ taghnughhagh teng _ atightugh aqe ait _ pennagh m _ , _ nuna m _ , _ s aam _ tekeghagh m _ ategh aneng _ .
katam _ â _ qule iqe aq _ â _ taana _ nunaleg m _ legan _ atigh te nayagh kanga _ .
nalighmeng _ taghnughhagh t _ tawani _ allgeghvig itneng _ atigh nayagh kangat _ nalighmeng _ aviighute vig aneng _ nuna meng _ .
taagken _ nalighmeng _ llivegh vig aneng _ , _ qungughvig aneng _ .
ategh t _ teghig ke sagh t _ , _ qawaag t _ , _ piitesighagh at
aw llaag ghhagh inagh _ ategh _ nag aq ugh aq eg ke f ut _ , _ qawaag m _ ategh a _ , _ teghig ke sagh m _ ategh a _ s aam llu _ piitesighagh m _ , _ ategh leg _ tamaaken llu _ uglagh uq _ .
akuzillegh meng _ atigh llegh
kiyaghte luteng _ sa meng _ pituqagh t _ .
yuug _ taana _ sa meng _ pitu kan _ , _ taana _ akuzillegh a _ t aghn ugh h agh m un nguq _ atigh te yagh ghngaaghmi _ .
amalka _ yuug _ , _ M uk aq _ , _ kiyaghte luni _ pituqagh _ , _ â _ K gu ug g _ ! _ â
A t iiq saq meg teg gu _ , _ taghnughhagh _ â _ K gu ug g meng _ â _ ( _ â _ K gu ug g _ â _ ) _ ata iigh aat _ .
sa mun _ elqughaghte tekagh mun _ atigh llegh
aghnagh _ aqsaleg _ sa llegh mun _ elqughute kan _ legan _ taana _ atigh te ma ut _ , _ nalighmeng _ qavangugh llegh _ , _ esghaghwaagh llegh _ .
amalka _ yug w em _ unaghsigh m _ qaayghu a _ m ak r eg saq min igu _ , _ qaayghu m _ a si ng an i te f tuq _ yungllaghkagh ghhagh _ .
enkaam _ taana _ atigh te ma kanga _ â _ M ak r eg tek aq _ â _ .
allangughte na luteng _ atiiqe i llegh
taagani _ agha _ , _ aghaligh vig _ aviite luku _ , _ taghnughhagh nge nghmeng _ aghtugh lghiit _ , _ natete nghata llu _ qinuyugtu nghata _ , _ qiyatu nghata _ , _ alla _ atigh nqigte aqe kangit _ ategh lgu ghngaita _ alla neng _ .
amalka _ taana _ , _ tuumte i _ , _ alla _ atigh ma kangat _ qiyatu ta aneng _ , _ seghlegh meng _ .
megh mi _ aviigh tke aat
kiyang _ ayumigh ghhagh aneng _ megh mi _ yug w et _ peleghqekagh t _ atiiqe aqe ait _ aghnagh ghhagh u luki _ .
ategh t _ tan- kestagh u aghte yaghkagh t llu _ alla tun llu _ ata iqe aat
kiyang _ ategh t _ yeghrat _ taake ghllag lghiit _ takelli luki _ ate lii t kay ug w iit _ .
amalka _ M ak im ing aa w en _ , _ taake yagute luku _ makigh meng _ tuqlughagh ta m _ qenwat _ ateligh te a _ taana _ ategh _ , _ mat- ke i _ .
taghnughhagh t llu _ salin _ akuzi yaaghte gpenateng _ atigh llegh it _ ila ita _ ramke m _ nag negh taq egk ang it _ tawaten _ .
katam _ S aap ugh a _ ategh _ .
taghnughhagh m _ atigh llegh a _ â _ P u ug wa _ , _ â _ ateligh tke a _ .
naqamllu _ ayghigh te aqe kangit _ .
pi nga yu a
ayumigh m _ ungipaghagh ta i
A y ng agh l ing aa w et en kuk _ , _ Q il ak agh iil aan kuk
puughhute m _ ungipagh aa
ungipaghagh ni nguq _ imani _ taake uk nguq _ aghnaghaghhagh k _ il ugh aq ut alghii k _ .
K ug w el es t aghh iin aa k _ , _ yaywaalingiighhagh at _ .
ategh ik _ A y ng agh l ing aa w et en kuk _ , _ Q il ak agh iil aan kuk _ .
A y ng agh l ing aa w en _ taana _ n ate t alghii _ , _ nallagh u lghii _ , _ igh s an it agh al gh i _ .
ilughagh ghhagh a _ Q il ak agh iil aq _ n ek eg g m et alghii _ , _ aatkagh kegte aq _ , _ pinitun _ kiyaghte aagh _ kaki ghllag _ quunpeng _ .
taana _ A y ng agh l ing aa w en _ it ghii gh naq egh llak _ , _ an Ê¼ g igh naq egh llak _ sa gpenani _ .
alla _ tawaten _ kaki ma luku _ Q il ak agh iil aq _ , _ ku ug g Ê¼ gh aa _ ugh lu v gh w aa ng ll aam alghii _ .
iiwen _ taaqe yaghtugh luku _ ugh sagh tu utk ell uku _ qineghte yaghtugh ma lghii _ , _ taana _ ugh lu v gh waagh h ani _ n ap agh luku _ mingle kun _ .
aga _ aane magh an _ aghnaghaghhagh m _ naten _ tekegh ni _ pe t g egh ll aat aq ul uku _ , _ ten- ke i vike luku _ ugh lu v gh waagh a _ ayemkagh ma kanga _ .
alingruugh ma lghii _ , _ itegh kuni _ agh y uugh n ay uk ang at ni _ , _ ughneg mi _ asi anun _ iigh ma kanga _ .
itegh luni _ ku ug g Ê¼ gh aan _ ivagh ma kanga _ ughluvegh ni _ , _ â _ naagu _ ughluvegh u aqa _ wh aan s alghii _ navek _ pi zigu _ ? _ â
amenam _ aghnaghaghhagh m _ ivagh sighwaagh aa _ el ng an llu _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh m _ sagiqe te luku _ ivagh aa _ elngaatall _ .
qenwat _ ugh n eg g aa _ ik igh agh luku _ piyaqminigu _ whaa _ ay em ng waagh luni _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh _ nutaan _ qefliqe uq _ elngaatall _ pi igate yagh lghii _ .
N ay ag g ani _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ sangan _ aksaqe zigu _ ay em ll uku _ ? _ â
taagken _ ayeme llegh aneng _ yaakestaaghhagh an _ anag ma yagh kanga _ , _ aghnaghaghhagh _ uniigh miqe luni _ qiyaaghwagh ma lghii _ .
nutaan _ ku ug g Ê¼ gh aan _ tawaten _ pi kanga _ .
aghnagh aq _ kagpag luni _ nengagh ma lghii _ aane luni _ navek _ taagavek _ aghulaqe ma lghii _ .
tawaten _ igleghte ghngaaghmi _ , _ iiwen _ aghtaghagh aqe a _ inga _ sa u aat _ iime negh m _ ilu ani _ esghagh ai _ .
kaate luki _ piyaqminiki _ ii m q aghnegh em _ ilu ani _ k am ul ug w al gh un _ ukaagh igh ke ghllag ke aat _ .
aqume luni _ aqeftaghaagh ghhagh ni _ nusug luku _ am sigh qu ugh tegh um ak angi _ qam ag teng ng waagh luki _ .
taaqe luki _ negh luni _ qavaa ma lghii _ saaghw itni _ .
qavagh ghngaaghmi _ taghtugh yalghiimi _ m ev lu ug tet _ nagate ai _ , _ p iiq un nguq _ whaa _ , _ â _ kii _ , _ aghn agh aghh aq s a _ una _ n ang leg t a pig ta _ .
elngaatall _ taghtughsagh qu na an _ meghnaali li _ . _ â
nepiigh yata _ aqume yalghiimi _ aviite ut _ , _ kameg t llu _ taakut _ aviite ut _ .
taagken _ igleghte laatagh uq _ esghagh laatagh ai _ sa u aat _ , _ enraq _ naayvagh m _ esne ani _ .
piyaqminiki _ kii _ iqallug lghute _ , _ afta llghite ngughk _ qenwat _ a si l iit _ unegh ii aghte luteng _ .
aqume luni _ af tal agh tegh um ak angi _ agaghte aqe luki _ qam ag teng ng waagh luki _ .
taaqe luki _ negh luni _ qavagh laatagh uq _ .
tawaten _ me m _ tagh tugh taq egk anga _ , _ pi aqe kangat _ â _ kii _ , _ aghnaghaghhagh _ una _ igamsiqa nagh ghhalek _ nangllegtagh pigte a _ . _ â
nepiigh nghata _ aqume nghmini _ paaghqite te luni _ .
aqume luni _ igleghte laatagh uq _ .
mangteghagh t _ inga _ esghagh ai _ , _ tazingavek _ aglagh uq _ .
kaate luni _ qineghte yalghiimi _ aghnagh ghhagh _ qama _ nategh mi _ qep ghii l ug taq ef tuq _ elngaatall _ .
aghnagh m _ esghagh luku _ upugh tke a _ , _ aapte a _ , _ â _ kaay _ , _ aghnagh aq _ uyuq _ naken _ pi ziin _ ? _ â
uniighyug lunga _ ne mneng _ ukavek _ aghulaqe unga _ .
wasi _ ku ug g Ê¼ ghagh m a _ sa aghte aqe aanga _ ugh lu v gh waagh min eng _ qivghu vike lunga _ anagu kanganga _ , _ tekegh mneng _ petgegh vike luku _ ay em s am kun _ .
aghnagh m _ pi a _ , _ â _ aa _ , _ naqam _ tea- ai _ itegh i _ . _ â
aghnagh aq _ itegh yan _ aghnagh m _ tunugh _ tuune a _ , _ â _ ang _ , _ pugnegh iigh i _ elngaatall _ .
iigge ten _ alqimagh yaqunaki _ , _ legan _ al q im agh te qu f k i _ pugnegh n _ mekelli lleqe an _ . _ â
aghnagh aq _ pugnegh iigh uq _ peghqigh kau lghii _ legan _ kukriqe nghite uq _ .
iigge ni _ alqime yukagh gpenaki _ taaqe a _ .
taagken _ taaqe yagu _ aghnagh m _ pi a _ , _ â _ I ing ku nun _ aglagh te gu _ , _ wataghllak _ qiigh negh ke i i sqe kangaten _ qineghte yaqunang _ pi lghaaten _ .
nategh mi _ utaqa i lghaaten _ .
legan _ kanagh luku _ aq u pi legh n aghq egh ngaat a _ wata _ qineghte yaqunang _ . _ â
awaligh i uq _ s ag negh pag ek _ pugnegh meng _ ulevaghaghte lukek _ .
itegh yan _ qamaken _ aagra neng _ upughasagh aat _ legan _ itegh sqe magh an _ , _ aghnagh aq _ legan _ ighsa u aghte uq _ .
kii _ , _ leg an nguq _ qama _ lengaaghtu te _ sagnegh k _ piyaqmegtekek _ .
taaqe lukek _ qama _ kete t _ ikighte luki _ piyaqminikek _ sagnegh ghllag k _ sungagh meng _ all aagh iin agh meng _ imigh ghllag lutek _ .
aghnaghagh m _ tugu lukek _ aane uq _ .
taagken _ itghute yakek _ aghnagh m _ tuune laatagh aa _ enraq _ ivalu lghute meng _ .
â _ ang _ , _ piighhe ki _ nuvagte yukagh gpenaki _ qamagte luki _ . _ â
aghnagh aq _ temngi _ kiyagh s ug w ig al nguq _ legan _ aqume luni _ tallu luki _ piighhe ai _ nuvagte yukagh gpenaki _ taaqe a _ piighhagh ghrug ghllag _ .
aghnagh m _ taaqe yagu _ sagnegh k _ sungagh ghllag meng _ imaleg k _ taake uk _ tuune ak _ , _ â _ ang _ , _ taagken _ nuvugh a _ . _ â
aghnagh aq _ legan _ teghigniqe uq _ nuvugh uq _ , _ nuvugh aa _ uy aq ugh h m i k _ , _ qukaghute kaghqagh _ , _ qenleghwaaghqagh _ , _ tangyeghute _ , _ tukughte te _ iwerngaqun _ sungagh ghllag _ qamagte a _ qiipi aghte te gpenani _ .
taaqe yaki _ aghnagh m _ aa tes qugh w ii _ ellnga nun _ .
aghnagh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ allakagh ghhagh gpek _ tesqamani _ ungavig ni _ qavagh ghhaaten _ legan _ egtug yug gpenang _ qavagh ghhaaten _ s aam _ pi naanghite aaten _ . _ â
aghnagh aq _ itegh luni _ qavagh uq _ .
qavagh ghngaaghmi _ elpeg ke aghte yalghiimi _ m eng egh aa ll ghiit _ llangaqa nguq _ n a pi t _ katelghaate lghiit _ ama _ nagate ai _ .
P iiq un nguq _ â _ kii _ , _ sa u a _ nangllegtagh ghllag _ ukavek _ kaate ma uq _ .
legan _ kameg lghute put _ k iin gh waagh luteng _ am sigh qugh waagh luteng _ , _ iqallug lghute put _ af tal agh waagh luteng _ . _ â
legan _ elpeg ke aghte luni _ qavagh laatagh uq _ .
qavaa ma luku _ aghnagh m _ teghtugh a _ .
â _ aghnagh aq _ aamyuq _ aqume i ngam _ , _ tea- ai _ ketfagh a _ . _ â
makete qaghte luni _ ungavig mineng _ aane yalghiimi _ aghnagh m _ y at aagh q ut ng waagh luku _ .
legan _ aghnagh aq _ neqiinagh uq _ .
taaqe yan _ aghnagh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ enta _ yataaghqe i _ atghagh a ngam _ .
aane gkuvek _ tamaa na _ esghagh kan _ alike gpenaan _ pi naagh an _ , _ legan _ atghagh ghhaaten _ ne gpenun _ qiive yaqunang _ q ug w in ayug ng aagh p ek _ uteghmun _ , _ legan _ avelghaqiinagh luki _ iglegh llegh aaten _ .
iwerngaqun _ legan _ kaate yaghtugh kuvek _ anengagh ghhagh n _ tuq l ugh w aghn ak en _ .
pi naken _ whaten _ , _ â _ taawa _ anguyagkagh meng _ tagite amken _ â _ .
U g w ik aghq agh p ek _ taku naagh aaten _ alinge gpenang _ atghagh a _ . _ â
taagken _ me atun _ aane yalghiimi _ uvite mi _ tamaa _ kay ng ev aghq u _ ila i _ qavaa te t _ .
legan _ atghagh uq _ me atun _ alinge aghte gpenani _ .
pama _ legan _ s aam _ malighqagh aa _ tun ut ang aneng _ kavlegtu te _ , _ siinge aqe luku _ .
legan _ aghnagh m _ pi llgh a _ neqamike luku _ kakave gpenani _ atghagh uq _ .
qemi meng _ agigte luni _ kaate yaghtugh yami _ tuqlughagh aa _ anengagh ni _ , _ â _ taawa _ anguyagkagh meng _ elngaatall _ tagite amken _ . _ â
kii _ , _ uka nguq _ yug lghute _ ketanqu te ghllag _ ellnga nun _ , _ pana meng _ , _ pi teg segh ameng _ tugumiigh iigh luteng _ .
uteghmun _ qiive yalghiimi _ uka _ kay ng egh l ag em _ malighqagh aqe a _ .
kaate luteng _ pi teg saq meg teg gu _ kaynge ghllag _ tuqute aat _ .
ullegh aghte luni _ , _ kii aneng _ yuug _ nukalpigagh _ aane yalghiimi _ n ang agh al q eg llak _ , _ yuukegte ghllag _ , _ iknaqe ghllag _ .
uka _ aghnaghagh mun _ tagi uq _ .
taawa _ t aan an u f tuq _ ug w ik aghq aa _ .
Q il ak agh iil aq _ ug w iiq agh tuq _ .
yuug _ neqengyu ghllag _ , _ aghvenge yu ghllag _ tawani _ kiyaghte ut _ ku g w egh min i _ .
aga _ navek _ pi nghata _ mughute nghata _ ilughagh ghhagh n _ A y ng agh l ing aa w e te m _ itegh vike aqe kanga _ .
siqni ghllag _ ellnga llu _ ug w iigh yug llak _ pi nigh ghllag meng _ .
A ap qugh waagh aqegk anga _ naten _ naqamalla _ ug w iigh um at anga _ .
qenwat _ Q il ak agh iil aam _ ungipamsug te ma kanga _ , _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ I m a tugh ng am _ ug w ii ll em tun _ ug w iigh lleq si n _ ighsanitagh lghiiten _ .
talwa _ kaki igate ngugh u te n _ .
waran _ pii llgh agh ten _ amsighqe igate keten _ .
N al qig ang il ngu u ten _ . _ â
amenam _ aglagh luni _ , _ iitqiinagh luni _ anengagh ghhagh ni _ qinuyug a _ ugh lu v gh aa ng ll ii s qell uku _ , _ weni _ qinuyug a _ .
qenwat _ anengagh ghhagh n _ mengilegyagute luku _ amenam _ yataaghqe te uq _ .
â _ qinu na ghhalek _ una _ , _ wasagh ii te _ taana _ ata ma _ ulimaagh a _ sa llghite ngughk _ salin _ . _ â
pi msiigh luku _ pegte a _ .
aghnaghagh m _ qinuyug a _ enraq _ qineghte yaghtigh sqe a _ .
qenwat _ aga _ aane uq _ .
kingu aneng _ tekegh ni _ petgegh naqutke a _ petgeghsagh nghminigu _ anagte luku _ qenwat _ itegh yaghtugh uq _ .
U p uu p eng _ aghtugh yamigu _ tugu luku _ ketngig luku _ ayemte a _ enraq llu _ ay em ll uku _ ughneg llegagh mi _ asi anun _ iigh aa _ .
iigh luku _ kaki sighwaagh uq _ .
anengagh ghhagh a _ itegh luni _ ne mikun _ aqume uq _ .
W aa ken ghi t aa _ ughluvegh ngllaghkagh ni _ .
qenwat _ A y ng agh l ing aa w e te m _ pi a _ , _ â _ enta _ ughluvegh n _ ivagh ghhu _ ukani llu _ ughneg ma _ asi ani _ . _ â
mekelghiigh ghhagh m _ pi a _ , _ â _ tagivagh ghhu _ liisima kan _ . _ â
â _ enta _ nekeve luten _ ivagh ghhu _ . _ â
qenwat _ nekeve luni _ ivagh aa _ ughneg llegagh a _ ikighte luku _ tug w aa _ ayeme luni _ .
â _ una _ aghnagh aq _ .
A y em m nal uku _ ul im a tes qugh waagh si nga _ awii _ , _ sa u luku _ . _ â
egte naqe yagh aa _ , _ aghnaghagh m _ pi a _ , _ â _ enta _ qivghuke gu _ , _ anagu nga _ . _ â
â _ sangan _ s a pig llegh ii s tun _ ul im a tes qugh waagh l unga _ ayemte an _ , _ enraq llu _ an ag us q e si n _ ? _ â
â _ legan _ anagu nga _ . _ â
qenwat _ mekelghiigh ghhagh m _ yaakestaaghhagh an _ aagute lugh aa _ temngi _ .
qiya ghllag uq _ aqnigh magh mi _ .
kagpag ragkiigh luni _ aga _ aane uq _ nengagh uq _ .
iitek _ pi yagh aa _ ku ug g Ê¼ gh aan _ .
aane luni _ taakwagun _ Q il ak agh iil aam _ apegh llegh akun _ igleghte uq _ .
igleghte ghngaaghmi _ kameg lghute _ kaate a _ nuna m _ ii m qagh llegh ani _ lli luteng _ aghipa ghllag t _ , _ piig aqe luteng _ , _ naatghigh qugh te aqe luteng _ .
aqume luni _ esgh ap ag g iin aq _ qinuyagute ai _ .
sivughtu msiigh luki _ , _ am sigh qu v y iigh luki _ taaqe gpenaki _ pegte aqe luki _ wata _ naafqe ai _ .
naafqe ghllag luki _ qavagh uq _ .
qavagh ghngaaghmi _ tawaten _ elpeg ke yalghiimi _ m eng egh aa ll ghiit _ .
â _ kii _ , _ aghnaghaghhagh _ una _ qep gh all aag m e tuq _ .
ima _ kameg put _ wata _ naafqe ma ai _ . _ â _ nepiigh yata _ aqume yalghiimi _ paaghqite uq _ .
aqume luni _ igleghte uq _ .
inga _ sa u aat _ esghagh ai _ , _ piyaqminiki _ iqallug lghute _ afta ma ite ngugh t _ ila i _ a si l iit _ unegh ii aghte luteng _ repall _ .
kaate luni _ sivuke luni _ unegh ii aghtekagh meng _ negh ughtagh u uq _ .
taaqe luni _ afta vyiigh luki _ qinuyagute luki _ mingughhu te ghllag naqe yamiki _ taaqe ai _ .
Q av aam al gh i _ .
taghtugh yalghiimi _ akuzite ghllag t _ â _ kii _ , _ aghnagh aq _ una _ nalqigangite uq _ elngaatall _ naqam _ naa ng tegh llag um ii _ iqallug put _ . _ â
nepiigh yata _ aghnagh aq _ aqume yalghiimi _ paaghqite uq _ .
igleghte laatagh uq _ .
mangteghagh t _ aliigh luki _ kaate ai _ , _ kaate luni _ mangteghagh mun _ qineghte yalghiimi _ aghnagh _ qama _ qepghagh aqe uq _ nategh mi _ .
aghnagh m _ esghagh luku _ pi a _ , _ â _ kay _ , _ aghnagh aq _ uyuq _ naken _ pi ziin _ ? _ kina u ziin _ ? _ â
aghnaghagh m _ pi a _ , _ â _ A y ng agh l ing aa w et ngu unga _ , _ nengagh u unga _ qayughllak _ ku g w egh m a _ an ag ul egh y anga _ ukavek _ nengagh unga _ .
tekegh mneng _ ughluvegh a _ ayemtegkegka _ . _ â
â _ naqam _ itegh luteng _ una _ tunugh _ k ag im ll uku _ pugnegh iigh ghhu _ . _ â
amenam _ iitqiinagh luni _ tunugh _ kagimte a _ .
aghnagh m _ pi a _ , _ â _ iigge ten _ alqimagh yaqunaki _ pugnegh n _ mekelli i aghagh lleqe uq _ . _ â
amenam _ kelenga aghte yagh luni _ iigge ni _ alqimagh qiinagh aqe luki _ legan _ akuute a _ .
Taa q saq min igu _ pugnegh squghhagh _ s ag negh pag em _ qukagh ghhagh ani _ .
aghnagh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ aatak _ ii ng ku nun _ awaligh i _ .
kepsugh te u naanghite uq _ , _ legan _ itegh kuvek _ upugha lleqe aaten _ , _ iit gh es qugh waagh lleq aaten _ aagra nun _ .
wataghllak _ avelghaqiinagh naagh aten _ .
wata _ talwa _ qineghte yaqunang _ .
legan _ pugnegh n _ kanaghte luku _ utaqa i lghaaten _ . _ â
amenam _ aghnaghagh m _ pugnegh llegagh ni _ aglagh te a _ .
itghute a _ legan _ aq u pi legh n aghh agh meng _ u p ugh as aq meg teg gu _ , _ itegh sqe aat _ waran _ qiigh negh ke i i sqellug qu _ .
I i teg iig uq _ pugnegh ni _ kanaghte luku _ igh s am ll eg agh yagh tuq _ , _ enraq _ legan _ u p ugh as aq meg teg gu _ , _ waran _ qiigh negh ke i i sqellug qu _ .
qenwat _ q iin ghagh s alghii mi _ mamleg ghllag _ p aagh q il nguq _ .
naqam _ siv ug w agh s alghii mi _ qama _ legan _ uglagh ghllag t _ sagnegh kek _ kavlegtu te _ .
maateqwaaqun _ whaa _ sagnegh kek _ nuugte ta gket _ .
S ung agh p ak _ ataasigh igh ghllag _ sagnegh an _ qukaa ni _ .
tagi luni _ itegh uq _ .
itegh yan _ aghnagh m _ tuune a _ ivalu meng _ , _ â _ ang _ , _ piighhagh ngllagh a _ .
nuvagte yukagh gpenaan _ mekegragh yukagh gpenaan _ . _ â
amenam _ A y ng agh l ing aa w en _ aqume luni _ tallu luku _ ivalu ni _ piighhe a _ nuvagragh qaghaqe luku _ .
Taa q saq min igu _ piighhagh squghhagh _ tan- leg ngestagh ghhagh _ .
aghnagh m _ sagnegh k _ tuune ak _ .
â _ ang _ , _ nuvugh a _ sungagh meng _ . _ â
tugu luku _ s ung agh p ak _ nuuve te a _ qiipagh mikun _ ataasigh igh ghllag _ .
aghnagh m _ tuune a _ ellnga nun _ , _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ taamani _ ayagyu ni _ qavagh ghhaaten _ .
legan _ alinge gpenang _ , _ egtug yug gpenang _ s aam _ pi naanghite aaten _ . _ â
aghnagh aq _ ivgagh luni _ qavagh uq _ .
qavagh ghngaaghmi _ tawaten _ akuzite lghiit _ taghtugh aat _ .
ama nguq _ pi aqe ut _ , _ â _ kii _ sa u a _ ukavek _ kaate ma a _ elngaatall _ n all ek aghn il nguq _ , _ pik r aghn iil nguq _ , _ ighsanitagh lghii _ , _ nal qig ang il nguq _ .
ama nguq _ aghnagh m _ pi aqe ai _ , _ â _ kaa _ kaa _ , _ ama _ qavaa uq _ . _ â
tawaten _ qavaa ma luku _ aghnagh m _ ama _ tuqlugh aa _ , _ â _ A y ng agh l ing aa w en _ qakun _ taghtugh naqe ziin _ ?
aqume luten _ tea- ai _ . _ â
aqume qaghte luni _ ivgagh yalghiimi _ aghnagh m _ y at aagh q ut ng waagh luku _ .
â _ enta _ negh l ut en ng am _ aglagh a _ ne gpenun _ . _ â
taaqe yan _ aghnagh m _ yataaghqellug qu _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ enta _ aane luteng _ aglagh a _ ne gpenun _ .
wataghllak _ alinge gpenang _ aane gkuvek _ pi lghaaten _ .
legan _ aglagh ghhaaten _ uteghmun _ qiive yaqunang _ s aam _ maligte ghngaaten _ .
siinge ghngaaten _ avelghaqiinagh luku _ legan _ igleghte lghaaten _ . _ â
aane yalghiimi _ tamaa _ kaynge ghllag u uq _ elngaatall _ .
esghagh luki _ tamaakut _ ila i _ nekevgha lghiit _ q ug w in ay uk ii _ elngaatall _ .
enraq _ aghnagh m _ alinge snanigh kanga _ .
aghtugh uq _ nuqete nghmeng _ .
alinge uq _ , _ uuvganeng _ aragh magh mi _ ketanqusnaq _ qimag uq _ .
legan _ kingu aneng _ uka _ s aam _ malighqagh aa _ , _ q e tegh qell uni _ anagniigh uq _ .
araghaatagh magh mi _ leg an nguq _ t ak lagh mi _ tekite nghmini _ .
A aghh w aa r ag k iigh um agh mi _ nekefqaghte luni _ anagniigh aqe lghii _ .
qemi meng _ ag ig agh te qagh s ami _ , _ araghaatagh ghllag ma lghii _ .
K ug w en i _ tuq l ugh w agh llag um aan _ elngaatall _ , _ â _ taawa _ anguyagkagh _ . _ â
uka nguq _ legan _ pi teg segh al g et _ yug w et _ , _ pana leg t _ ketanqusnaq _ ellnga nun _ uka _ .
uteghmun _ qiive nghmini _ uka _ kaynge ghllag m _ malighqagh aqe kanga _ .
Yug w et _ kaate luku _ pitegte aat _ , _ aga _ tuqu luni _ ullegh yan _ kii aneng _ nanevgagh llegagh ghhagh _ aane uq _ .
uka _ tagi uq _ A y ng agh l ing aa w et mun _ , _ kaate yan _ tawatete ghngaan _ atghagh te a _ ne minun _ , _ ug w ik aa _ .

tefaay _ naange uq _ .
aliigh neghsigh sigh _ Y ag es gu
aasa m _ ungipagh aa
sa u a nguq _ taana _ aghnagh _ , _ wallu _ y u wh aa wa _ , _ pi ma lghii _ , _ â _ Y eq ay tuq _ aliigh neghsigh kegka _ . _ â
legan _ aklu aghte gpenani _ whaa _ aanqute i yalghiimi _ :
â _ Y ag es g uu u u _ , _ y ag es gu _ , _ y ag es gu _ .

L eg an nguq _ nepiigh uq _ al iigh yaq min igu _ .

tamaani _ esghaqu yalghiimi _ avangite uq _ .
pagavek _ esghagh yalghiimi _ , _ ang y an nguq _ paga _ .
tespagavek nguq _ esghapag ai _ elngaatall _ .
imani nguq _ , _ â _ sivuyagta _ uugyuq _ elqiigh n _ ateghte gu _ . _ â
L l aagh an nguq _ legan _ siv uy ag te m _ elqiigh ni _ aga _ ateghte luku _ , _ uka _ ukig uq _ , _ ukig uq _ , _ tuute yan _ tazingavek _ taku a _ .
piyaqminigu _ pinighhalek _ .
tugu luku _ legan _ taaggun _ aate ste vig akun _ talligh mig ma kanga _ .
igleghte laatagh uq _ .
iiwen _ uyavaghqagh ughte uq _ , _ eslallugughte ghllag ma kanga _ .
M aat en nguq _ aatkagh i _ k iin gh w aaq aa y alghiit _ , _ whaa _ es l all ug ugh tegh llag yaq min igu _ aghitqe ghllag luni _ .

â _ Y ag es g uu u u _ , _ y ag es gu _ , _ y ag es gu _ .

L eg an q un nguq _ al iigh l aat agh yaq min igu _ , _ aghvaghllug ghllag _ siqi neghllug ghllag _ .
legan _ aatkagh i _ kinegh laatagh ai _ .
tawaten _ pi llegh tun _ akuzite ghllag t _ taakut _ ataasigh t _ angyagh t _ .
pi ma kanga _ ang y all igh te m _ , _ â _ qukaghte qugh a _ uugyuq _ , _ elqiigh n _ ateghte gu _ . _ â
legan _ elqiigh ni _ mat- aghte luku _ i f k agh l i aat agh aa _ .
uka _ ukig laatagh uq _ , _ ukig laatagh uq _ , _ t a z ing ag un _ tekite laatagh uq _ .
tazingavek _ taku a _ .
piyaqminigu _ maateghniineng _ pin igh atagh aq _ , _ up- ke na nga _ qelmegh ghllag _ .
legan _ tugu nghminiki _ aate aqe kangi _ talligh mikun _ .
taawa _ igleghte laatagh uq _ , _ ne mineng _ uyavagh ghllag uq _ .
L eg an nguq _ p al aghh agh meng _ kiyaghte uq _ , _ eslallug _ kaate laatagh uq _ , _ maateghniineng _ elngaatall _ yaagtu ghllag _ eslallug _ .
L eg an nguq _ suumqagh u te aqe kanga _ aliigh neghsigh sigh _ ,
â _ Y ag es g ii uu u _ , _ y ag es gu _ , _ y ag es gu _ .
