A ap aa y ag es gu _ , _ aap aa _ y ag es gu _ ,
G h h ugh h ugh h iy a _ . _ â
L eg an nguq _ al iigh agh ll aat agh yaq min igu _ si q i negh l uuk _ , _ maaten _ sivuligh meng _ aagken _ elngaatall _ siqinegh _ uguqnagh aghagh luni _ .
elngaatall _ k iin gh w aa ghii _ aatkagh i _ whaa _ legan _ .
L eg an nguq _ pi laatagh uq _ meraaghinagh _ naken _ .
S iv uy ag tem nguq _ t aag w u m _ ang y all igh t en i _ pi a _ , _ â _ angyalligh a _ kiiwyuq _ elpek llu _ elqiigh n _ ateghte gu _ . _ â
A ng y all igh tem nguq _ pike ta mikun _ taaggun _ ateghte ma kanga _ , _ aga _ ifkagh uq _ .
A a y _ , _ pinigh aghaghtu te _ uka _ ukig yalghiimi _ elqiigh _ .
elngaatall _ utaqa laatagh aa _ uukna _ uki lghii _ .
uka _ ukig uq _ , _ ukig uq _ , _ tekite yan _ tazingavek _ piyaqminigu _ , _ pin igh atagh aq _ elqiigh _ elngaatall _ .
satuqagh _ qughalkutaghtuqagh _ elngaatall _ .
P in igh atagh aq _ taa ku g neng _ maaten _ , _ legan _ tugu luku _ talligh mig laatagh aa _ .
talligh mig luki _ sumeghtaghagh uq _ , _ â _ aglagh yagh kuma _ esgha _ ne mnun _ . _ â
legan _ taakut _ qerngagh ita _ tugumiiqe luki _ aglagh uq _ , _ aglagh uq _ , _ aglagh uq _ .
entaqun _ unuk _ ataasigh _ atugh luku _ , _ aag llegh ani _ wh an i kum aan _ kaa tuq _ ne minun _ .
eslallugughte na nigh ke aq _ , _ quunpeng _ aligh u iqe aq _ elngaatall _ .
allameng _ eslallugughte gpenani _ ne minun _ kaate tke aq _ .
aneghrengi ghllag _ elqiigh neng _ .
tefaay _ !
iiyagh ghhagh inagh leg
El q iil aam _ apegh llegh a
ungipaghagh ni nguq _ imani _ , _ mekelghiigh ghhagh nkuk nguq _ taake uk _ nenge yu qutagh lghiik _ nenglu mi _ kiyaghte aaghek _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh _ aane igate ngughk _ sa luni _ aane li _ aatkagh ite ngughk _ .
Q u un pe nguq _ aghn el qu si q _ at ku wh ani _ aate luku _ maghuyugte luni _ kiyagh t aagh aq elghii _ .
M agh u yug t aagh neng _ sivugte nghmini _ iiyagh ni _ taana nguq _ aghulate luku _ taawa _ almesimitun _ nekegte aqe lghii _ tawaten _ .
quunpeng _ tawaten _ kiyaghte aagh _ elngaatall _ .
sangan _ naqam _ iiyagh ni _ qelpeghte aqe agu _ .
alla nguq _ tawaten _ , _ um iil el gu un nguq _ , _ maalghug _ um iil g eg ke t _ aag llegh a _ ak l ung il nguq _ , _ aag llegh a _ ak lu umalghii _ .
A ng yagh u un naq en nguq _ upenghagh mi _ , _ ellnga llu _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ qakiqniqe ma lghii _ .
qaywa nguq _ nengyugh ghhagh n _ ighleke yagh aa _ , _ â _ sa meng _ aate luten _ angyagh naqe ziin _ ? _ â
mekelghiigh ghhagh m _ pi ma kanga _ nengyugh ni _ , _ â _ aatkagh ten _ tagivagh ki _ aate naqe anka _ . _ â
L eg an nguq _ nengyugh ghhagh mi _ aatkagh ghhagh i _ aate luki _ me akun _ taaggun _ aane ma lghii _ .
tawavek _ iq uk l igh pig agh nun _ esnevagh ma lghii _ , _ yaywaalingiighhagh _ , _ â _ ukughsi _ angyat nge a _ qaa _ ? _ â
â _ weni nguq _ angyagh lleqe uten _ nenglu m _ yugkwaagh a _ uyuq _ . _ â
siinge luku nguq _ aga nguq _ kete aqe ut
T u ung l igh h it nun _ tawavek _ , _ â _ ukughsi _ angyat nge a _ qaa _ ?
enkaam _ qaa _ igu yu aanga _ . _ â
weniqruk nguq _ angyagh lleqe uten _ aghnalqwaagh m _ aatkagh aneng _ aatkagh leg _ .
L eg an nguq _ aga _ unite aqe aat
umiileg ghllag mun _ tawavek _ kaate ma lghii _ , _ ak l ung il ngugh mun _ .
kaate luni nguq _ pi a _ , _ â _ ukughsi _ angyat nge a _ qaa _ , _ enkaam _ qaa _ igu yu aanga _ ! _ â
L eg an nguq _ yug w em _ taawa _ pi a _ , _ â _ I - ii _ siv uy ag tek aghq agh ll u wh aq _ !
elpek _ aghnalqwaagh m _ aatkagh aneng _ aate luten _ qalleg vag luten _ weni nguq _ sivuyagtekete lleqe amken _ . _ â
legan _ m il u us aq min ig u nguq _ kelute mun _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh _ qiya ma lghii _ .
taakwna _ angyagh _ tawaten _ qamagte a _ .
iwerngaqun _ iquklighpigagh at _ tazinga _ , _ umiileg m _ aag llegh a _ aghn agh ap er ug waagh meng _ panike lghii _ .
Agh nagh ap er ug waagh meng _ y uk luni _ kete aqe lghii _ .
tawavek _ kaate luni _ pi ma kangi _ , _ â _ ukughsi _ angyat nge a _ qaa _ , _ enkaam _ qaa _ igu yu aanga _ ? _ â
â _ legan _ angyagh naqe lghiiten _ .
taawa _ y uk naq am ken _ , _ siv uy ag tek naq am ken _ . _ â
kete i aqe ut _ qaake luku _ , _ aghvenge yiite ghllag _ .
taana _ ak l ung il nguq _ aghv eng y ugh l ak _ .
I i w en nguq _ ke t f aghq aagh aq ut _ kaay _ , _ aghvegh m _ p u ug yaq min ik i nguq _ legan _ tuune luni _ .
legan _ yaywaali ngiighhagh m _ aghv eq saq min ig u nguq _ tuq un neq eg sagh luku _ .
aawallu nguq _ taana _ aghvenge yiite ghllag _ umiileg _ aghvenge aghte uq _ .
ii _ , _ angyagh m _ qetgegh te ma kangi _ elngaatall _ .
I i w en nguq _ kaalguutagh t _ apeghiigh aqe ait _ legan _ p aag ken nguq _ anuqe _ atghaghsagh lghii mi _ uka _ legan _ eftugh tun _ , _ kii _ an uq l igh llag yaq min igu _ .
â _ aa _ , _ sa u luku mi _ taana _ y uk ll aat aam a z igu _ .
leganqun qun _ tuqu laghate naqe ukut _ whaa _ megh mi _ seghlegh mi _ . _ â
avelghaqiinagh luku _ legan _ an al gh u v ag teg gun _ tugu laghate luni _ angyagh _ .
paagken _ an uq l igh llag yaq min igu _ legan _ elngaatall _ pi kay u wh aq _ s ak ay u wh aq _ tamaa na _ nagh p agh si qay u wh aq _ qamaggute uq _ , _ aghtugh aat
M ek elghii gh h agh nguq _ taana _ maamtawha _ pi uq _ , _ â _ I l eng tuq _ ima _ . _ â
naligh ita _ nagaqugh qagh laatagh luku _ .
â _ aa _ , _ u um nguq _ pi ligu _ , _ u um nguq _ pi ligu _ ! _ â
T aam nguq _ ak l ung il ngu u m _ pi aqe kanga _ , _ â _ aa _ , _ pi ligu _ ellng an pi lleq aa _ whaa _ amsanagh ste lleqe a _ pi kay ug waagh h aat _ maakut _ mataawi te aat _ . _ â
mekelghiigh ghhagh _ qep uugh y alghii m i nguq _ .
Q al iv l ug w aghh aghq ek _ nengyugh ghhagh mi _ atuqe lukek _ .
Q ep uugh waagh luni _ tayeghqagh luni nguq _ ayapegh aatagh ghhaak _ aate lukek _ aanqute i ma lghii _ talligh ghhagh ani _ qule mun _ ayuqe luku _ aghulate magh an _ ,
â _ A - n uq - l i - ii _ , _ n a- ng e- ll u - gu - ng u _ ,
S i - l a- m i - ng i _ , _ u - k i - i - n ang e- ll u - gu - ng u _ ,
A - i - y a- i - y a- nga _ , _ y a- i - y a- i - y i - y a _ , _ i - y a- iy i - y a- nga _ ,
S il am it _ uk in aghn ing it _ aghn it _ p ay ugh a _ ,
U q - ugh - t aq _ , _ uq - ugh - t aq _ . _ â
megh _ pateg ma kanga _ inglu aneng _ - - _ â _ uqughte aq _ ! _ â _ - - _ maalghug gneng _ .
M aa te q w aaq un nguq _ legan _ kaay _ qilag a _ kaagkagh a _ piikna nguq _ ukite aghte luku _ legan _ uk ig tegh ii yaq min igu _ .
A a y _ , _ amsanaghkwaagh lug ni _ naagu nguq _ maaten _ an uq ll igh llak _ .
qateghllug ghllag nguq _ taglagh ma lghiit _ aghvenge luteng _ taakut _ .
Taa m _ umiileg m _ taana _ umiileg _ ak l ung il nguq _ pi aqe a _ , _ â _ qayugham _ esghaghhu _ yaywaali t _ esgh ap ag te leg llag et _ yaywaali m llu _ aghnalqwaagh m _ aatkagh aneng _ aatkagh leg m _ yakugh ke a _ . _ â
taana nguq _ q all em s u wh aq _ qemall _ umiileg _ .
taawa _ taglagh ma lghiit _ elngaatall _ aghvenge luteng _ .
impite igate kanga _ yug w em _ taa m _ aghv e ngu q am _ , _ avelghagh qumtaagh an _ impite igate kanga _ qam ag teng ng waagh luku _ impite qugh ma kanga _ .
A pegh iigh lu te nguq _ taana _ nengyugh ghhagh a _ ighsa nga kete te _ nenglu ngiighhagh _ ifkaghte luku _ atghagh te luku _ taana _ mekelghiigh _ aatk angll agh yaq meg teg gu nguq _ mekelghiigh _ pinighhalek _ .
taana _ uyuqligh _ panig ni _ aga _ n ul igh q es teng ng in aam aan _ .
taawa nguq _ aghv eng y u ghi gh llag tuq _ taana _ aghv eng y ii te p aagh r uk _ yuug _ .
mekelghiigh perewaagh meng _ avaqutagh ligh luni _ .
taawa _ naange uq _ .
meteghllug ghllag nkuk _ anipaghllag nkuk
I tegh yagh aam _ anagutagh mete te _ neghigh luku _ apegh llegh a
ungipaghagh ni nguq _ imani _ m e tegh ll ug w et _ , _ anipa t _ qateg perewaagh u yagh lghiit _ .
anipa nkuk _ m e tegh ll ug w en kuk _ piniqe te pigte yagh lghiik _ , _ quunpeng _ q er ng agh m e taq elghii k _ .
tawaten _ kiyagh tegh ng aag m ek _ anipa m _ meteghllug _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ yeqay _ ig aq r agh waagh u te l tun g _ , _ pinighnaghsagh te ltung _ . _ â
â _ A - aa _ ! _ â _ meteghllug ghllag m _ ang ghagh sim akanga _ .
â _ elpek _ sivuke laken _ . _ â
anipa ghrug _ angegh ma lghii _ .
I g aa si t aq _ ketfagh ma ka ak _ si l ug k aagh h agh m eng llu _ .
I g aa si t aq _ taana _ nanigh m _ ellngagh ta aneng _ , _ qulmesiite m _ puyugh aneng _ akuutekagh meng _ imaleg _ tagnegh pigte lghii meng _ .
anipaghllag nguq _ aghul iigh waagh luni _ ig agh te sim alghii _ , _ repall nguq _ qavaa ma lghii _ .
meteghllug ghllag m nguq _ pinighsagh pigte luku _ elngaatall _ igaqragh ma kanga _ .
taaqe luku _ tagh tugh sim akanga _ .
A n ip agh r ug w em _ taghneghagh ni _ meghaagh ghhagh mi _ es ghagh yaq min igu _ imani nguq _ pinigh uq _ .
T aag ken nguq _ ima _ anipa t _ ig agh r ak gu ugh te kaa f tut _ .
anipa m _ meteghllug _ pi ma kanga _ â _ heng _ , _ el p eg ng am _ . _ â
â _ A - aa _ â _ , _ meteghllug _ ang gh umalghii _ .
anipa m _ silug _ ig aa si tam un _ nepte luku _ meteghllug _ agtugh kau ma yagh kanga _ aga nguq _ nalug kau te uq _ qalghigh kau magh mi _ , _ â _ Q un g _ ! _ â
anipa m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ uuk _ , _ aghula i luten _ seghletun _ pi ste lleqe te ni _ â _ amawha nguq _ agtugh qagh nghatni _ tamaani _ nal u um si tuq _ qalghigh magh mi _ , _ â _ Q un g _ , _ q un g _ , _ q un g _ ! _ â
anipaghllag m nguq _ pi aqe a _ , _ â _ aghula igh te luten _ qenwat _ naafqe ta n _ igaqragh llegh ka _ ! _ â
taawa nguq _ meteghllug ghllag _ qaprag ghllag _ qalghigh kaqe magh mi _ nalughqutagh ghllag _ tamaani _ .
qenwat llu nguq _ an ip agh l ag em _ ugumi yagute luku _ ig aa si tam in eng _ meteghllug ghllag _ kuuve ghllag ma kanga _ .
aga nguq _ q al ghi gh r ug um agh mi _ tenge qagh uq _ , _ â _ Q gh w aaq _ , _ q gh w aaq _ , _ q gh w aaq _ ! _ â
T aag ken nguq _ ima _ m e tegh ll ug w et _ tagneghtekau ut _ .
enkaam nguq _ allameng llu _ il aku n nan ii m af tun nguq _ .
ivisa ngiighhagh
W am ii y aam _ ungipagh aa
ungipaghagh ni nguq _ imani _ .
ne mi nguq _ tawani _ , _ qu un pe nguq _ angyaghugh te aqe lghiit _ , _ neqe ngllagh te aqe lghiit _ .
taawa nguq _ tam aan te f tuq _ ne mi _ tamaani _ yuug _ ataasigh _ ighnegh ite ngughk _ .
taawa nguq _ nulighh a _ , _ panike luku _ ataasigh _ .
angyaghugh te ghllag nghata nguq _ yug w is ag aq elghii _ qayughllak _ ighnegh ite ngughk _ .
nuliigh ni llu _ , _ p an ig g an illu _ y uk l uk ek _ angyagh aqe lghii _ .
kete aqe lghiit _ p an ig g ani _ taghtugh qaghte nghaani _ .
kingulighpigagh ghhagh u luteng _ kete luteng _ , _ aga _ angyagh t _ upleg te aqe lghiit _ nunavag meng _ elngaatall _ , _ uka nguq _ tagi laghate te nghata _ , _ taawa _ ellngit _ ag l at _ .
ayveghagh llghite a nguq _ siipneghkwaagh ghhagh itneng _ saghna aqe lghiit _ ellngit _ .
iwernga nguq _ tawaten _ neqenge vleghagh aqe lghiit _ .
En kaa ng am nguq _ uteghnigh aqe lghiit _ unugtagh u ghllag nghaani _ .
pegnem nguq _ neq e te r eg agh aq elghii t _ .
A taa sim e nguq _ aghneghmi _ , _ nun av ag p aghq ugh llag nguq _ nani _ imani _ , _ aruugh yagh luteng _ esghagh luku _ u p leg un neq eg s aa ll aat agh aat _ .
L eg an q un ngu q - aa _ , _ atghaghtegh te ragkiighute yalghiimeng _ , _ ellng in nguq _ kingulighpigagh ghhagh u laatagh ut _ .
iwernga nguq _ tawatete ghngaan _ p an ig g ani _ taghtugh qaghte yan _ , _ naqamllu nguq _ tagh tugh s ug w ig al k anga _ , _ atghaghtegh luteng _ ellngitllug nge uq _ kete ut _ .
Taw at en nguq _ amsanaghllugllak _ , _ qutenge uq _ q an tagh an ll uku _ wiin _ nallangigh naqe aqe kangi _ tegh ig et _ , _ angyagh t _ saamkut _ an uq lii t qagh tek ang at ni _ qute _ qantaghante sqe luku _ .
sa kan _ , _ tag itu g ugh us k ang at ni _ qute _ qantaghante sqellug qu _ .
T aag ken nguq _ taw at en ngu q - aa _ , _ amsanaghllugllak- a _ , _ qute _ paga _ q an tagh an ll uku _ , _ aag ku l gh u tet _ upleg te te ghllag t _ uyavagh ghllag ke aat _ nalla itnun _ iglegh te r eg aam al uku _ , _ sa meng _ nagaqugh te ma lghiit
T aag ken nguq _ yug w em nguq _ taa m _ pi a _ , _ â _ K aa - k aa _ , _ yaavuqugh nghmeng _ uyuq _ aghnagh aq _ taaqe aghten _ , _ kaa - k aa _ nagate aghte tek _ sangaawa _ ? _ â
yaavuquute ni _ qaake luki _ nasiigh luteng _ nagate yalghiimeng _ , _ sa u a nguq _ .
â _ U n eg ku gh si i _ , _ neng aa k i teng ng aa _ , _ q aa k i teng ng aa _ , _ â _ leg an nguq _ nagaqugh aat _ .
sunanguq _ yug w em _ aquutagh ni _ qiifte agu _ kelute mun _ .
aghnagh m _ taa m _ nulighh an _ qiive qaghte luku _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ sa u luku _ pi naqlaatagh zigu _ amyughaagh u aqe yaaghte uq _ . _ â
avelghaqiinagh luku nguq _ k el ut m un nguq _ pi luteng _ , _ qute mun _ tenpete luteng _ , _ kayagte ma kanga _ , _ â _ enta _ esghagh yaghtuqagh ghhu _ sangaawa _ uugte luten _ , _ â _ nuliigh ni _ pi ma kanga _ .
nulighh a nguq _ uugte luni _ , _ tawavek _ p eng ug negh waagh anun _ qaasqagh m _ , _ yug s ugh w am alghii _ .
Yug s ugh w al uni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ paaghqite uq _ . _ â
uugte naqe yaghtugh ngugh _ angyagh mun _ , _ nak en nguq _ pi laatagh aa _ , _ â _ whaante unga _ , _ whaante unga _ ! _ â _ qaghi ite ghllag _ .
taakwavek nguq _ yug s ugh waagh agh taa tut _ , _ ivagh i ragkiighute ut _ .
â _ whaante unga _ megh z egh aagh h agh mi _ . _ â
â _ aatak _ meghhagh _ tazigna _ esghagh yaghtuqagh ghhu _ . _ â
aga nguq _ aghnagh _ aglagh luni _ , _ megh aagh m un nguq _ pi yalghiimi _ , _ avangite uq _ , _ i wer ng aq un nguq _ taawa _ ivisa ngiighhagh _ .
taagken _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ sa ite uq _ , _ avangite uq _ iwerngaqun _ ivisa ngiighhagh _ taawa _ . _ â
â _ seghlegh ghhagh meng _ , _ taana _ naqam _ qaake lteggu _ . _ â
Agh nagh agh nguq _ sa uq _ ag n iq s u ug tuq _ , _ â _ kimaawi ghllag ukut _ . _ â
aghnagh m nguq _ tugu luku nguq _ q ug w ak l aagh pen aan _ , _ angyagh m _ aqume vig akun _ aqnighte naqe pigte luku _ miluute a _ , _ m es aaq g uu ll uku _ .
taagken _ tawaten _ puglegh luteng _ igleghte ma lghiit _ .
igleghte ma luki nguq _ .
â _ N ul iin g _ , _ n ul iin g _ , _ angyagh m _ megh aagh h anun _ kanaghte aghte nga _ . _ â
avelghaqiinagh ma kanga _ .
iwernga nguq _ ata an _ nagaqugh luku _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ aa _ , _ seghleghhalek _ sa meng _ taana _ pi aqa _ weni _ , _ pie- ghesnagh aqe luku _ pi aghte gu _ .
sa meng _ pi aqa _ ? _ â
â _ esghaghhu _ angyagh m _ meghaagh anun _ k an agh tes qell uni _ pi lghii _ . _ â
â _ kanaghte gu _ . _ â
tugu luku nguq _ miluute a _ angyagh m _ megh z egh aagh anun _ .
T aag ken aa _ , _ imani nguq _ megh mete luni _ kana _ enraq _ .
â _ N ul iin g _ , _ n ul iin g _ , _ yaavuquute ten _ taakut _ qaake ki _ . _ â _ avelghaqiinagh luku nguq _ aghnaghagh m _ ugumi yagute pigtekanga _ .
imani nguq _ , _ â _ N ul iin g _ , _ n ul iin g _ , _ yaavuquute ten _ taakut _ qaake ki _ . _ â
avelghaqiinagh yagh luku _ ata an _ aghyuugh laatagh aa _ .
aga _ yaavuquute gni _ agniqe pigte luni _ qaake ma kek _ unake naqe pigte luku _ taana _ ivisa ngiighhagh _ .
L eg an nguq _ qaake ai _ , _ suqsugh ghhalek nguq _ , _ suqsugh ghhalek _ , _ taw at en nguq _ pi yalghiimeng _ sukera kestagh aqe ut _ .
L eg an nguq _ yuug _ n angll agh qell uni _ , _ aghnagh aq llu _ , _ aghnagh llu _ n angll agh qell uteng _ elngaatall _ , _ u p um y egh aam agh meng _ , _ qu yagh llag um agh m e nguq _ .
S uk er agh llag y alghii m e nguq _ , _ leg an nguq _ angyat lghute _ kaate qagh i luki _ naghughaghte aqe ait _ .
T egh ig mun _ kaate luteng _ , _ ay v egh al egh t aagh llag luteng _ taglagh ma luki nguq _ , _ taawa nguq _ angyat lghute _ taagna _ upleg te a _ taagavek _ igleghte aq _ .
L eg an nguq _ nangllaghqe te luteng _ naghughaghte nghata _ esghapag nghmegteki _ .
saghiigha yug ghllaget _ , _ all aagh ll u wh agh yug llag et _ , _ â _ aagkut _ sukate pigte aat _ ! _ â
ima nguq _ yuug _ t a h n a _ igh negh it alghii _ un ang y uugh q waagh llag aa _ , _ aklungi igh i ghllag uq _ , _ ay v eng y uugh q waagh llag aa _ .
Q u un pe nguq _ ivisa ngiighhagh _ taana _ aflenga kaqe kangat _ .
tefaay _ !
sikughaagh nkut _ , _ kaviigh ghhagh nkut _ , _ meteghllug ghllag nkut
iyaa-kagh m _ apegh llegh a
U k s uu m _ negh ke igh sag ani _ , _ kaviigh ghhagh _ pirughte yaghtugh ma lghii _ sikughaagh t _ umiileg itnun _ .
akmagtagh ghhagh ni _ akmag ke luku _ igleghte ma lghii _ .
kaate yalghiimi _ sikughaagh t _ umiileg ita _ nenglu anun _ , _ imani _ saaygu an _ amig a _ kagpestaaghhagh u uq _ .
kaviigh ghhagh _ nenglagh yug magh mi _ sumeghtaghagh ma lghii _ , _ â _ sikughwaagh t _ umiileg at _ qaamna _ u aten _ es l egk ak aa _ . _ â
akmagtagh ghhagh ni _ mat- aghte luku _ pegnem _ kangsugh ghngaan _ amig kun _ ilu te mun _ kanaghte ma kanga _ .
aatkagh ni _ mataghte aqe luki _ kanaghte uute ma kangi _ .
taagken _ itegh ma lghii _ kangsugh ghngaaghmi _ .
itegh luni _ saaygu t _ ilu itni _ ilepghaagheg ni _ aate ma kek _ .
atkug ni llu _ , _ temkaag ni llu _ agaghte ma kangi _ .
taaqe luni _ aagra nun _ itegh ma lghii _ .
sikughaagh t _ um iil g an nguq _ pika _ k el ut ang ani _ aqume luni _ , _ qenngulliqe ghllag luni _ .
imani nguq _ am es t aagh h aag uq _ .
tamaa nguq _ sikughaagh t _ aghnagh ait _ qepghagh te ghllag t _ , _ qaprag te ghllag t _ naqam _ qalleg qagh gpenateng _ .
U p ugh at aghh negh it aan nguq _ kaviigh ghhagh _ .
kaviigh ghhagh _ qalleg qagh gpenani _ alinge sighwaagh ma lghii _ .
sikughaagh t _ umiileg at _ qiigh ma lghii _ , _ â _ U gh h u - gh h u u _ . _ â
kaviigh ghhagh _ upugh sighwaagh ma lghii _ tupag ghpagte magh mi _ .
umiileg _ aga _ aane uq _ sa meng _ pi aghte gpenani _ .
taawa _ kaviigh ghhagh _ taw an tuq _ naligh ghhagh inagh ita _ aleghqugh qagh gpenaan _ .
maateqwaaqun _ sikughaagh t _ umiileg at _ itegh yalghiimi _ , _ kaviigh ghhagh m _ at ku g wa _ atuqe luku _ , _ nuqutu lleg ke ghllag luku _ .
kaviigh ghhagh _ neng lagh yug ll agh ng aagh mi _ pegnem _ nuqete ma lghii _ elngaatall _ .
umiileg _ qiighw laatagh ma lghii _ , _ â _ U gh h u - gh h u u _ . _ â
kaviigh ghhagh _ tupag ghpagte sighwaagh aqe lghii _ .
umiileg _ nutaan _ akuzi uq _ , _ â _ aqelqagh _ , _ qayuq _ g g aat f ak a _ ? _ â
kaviigh ghhagh _ neng lagh yug ll agh ng aagh mi _ pi ma kanga _ qusevegte pigte luni _ , _ â _ uuk _ , _ sangantuq- a _ at ku wh aqa _ aate laatagh zigu _ , _ k el u wh ii _ av legh r u ug g nal uki _ . _ â
umiileg nguq _ temsiyaaghagh uq _ , _ aga _ aane uq _ .
alla _ itegh yalghiimi _ enraq _ kaviigh ghhagh m _ temkagh kek _ atuqe lukek _ , _ nuqutu lleg ke ghllag lukek _ .
sikughaagh ghhagh _ qiighw ghllag laatagh uq _ , _ â _ U gh h u - gh h u u _ . _ â
pi laatagh uq _ , _ â _ aqelqagh _ , _ qayuq _ igh u v ag egk a _ ? _ â
kaviigh ghhagh m _ pi laatagh aa _ me ni _ alingesugnite naqe pigte luku _ , _ â _ U uk - aa _ , _ sangan tuq _ qu ll ig g aag ka _ aate laatagh zikek _ k el u wh ii _ s ev uu tes qell uki _ . _ â
umiileg _ aga _ aane laatagh uq _ iqemyaaghagh magh mi _ .
alla _ itegh yalghiimi _ iq l igh mi _ , _ pinighhalek _ elngaatall _ .
â _ aghnaghagh t _ , _ aqelqagh _ upugha teggu _ , _ neqlightugh teggu _ ! _ â
umiileg m _ kayagte ai _ .
nutaan _ upugha te aat _ kaviigh ghhagh _ .
neqe meng _ all aagh iin agh meng _ ketfagh te aat _ .
kaviigh ghhagh nkuk _ umiileg nkuk _ negh uk _ .
negh te kete luku _ umiileg m _ aapte a _ , _ â _ S aam _ uk ag un - aa _ aagte ta ten _ ? _ â
kaviigh ghhagh m _ pi a _ , _ â _ avaqutagh ghhagh nka _ negh es qell uki _ neq ell g aan ay uk avek _ enankin _ , _ aag vike amken _ . _ â
umiileg m _ aragh ai _ , _ â _ aghnaghagh t _ , _ yataaghqe te nakesi _ pirughte i uute yaghqagh meng _ . _ â
taagken _ kaviigh ghhagh _ pi a _ , _ â _ qavagh luten _ unaami _ wetku _ aglagh ghhaaten _ , _ pirughte i lleqe aaten _ . _ â
unaami _ kaviigh ghhagh _ pi yalghiimi _ akmagtagh ghhagh a _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh meng _ neqe meng _ imigh luni _ .
akmagtagh ni _ aane sta _ .
ellnga llu _ kaviigh ghhagh _ aane uq _ , _ kangsugh nghite uq _ .
kaate luni _ iiwenllu _ akmagtagh ni _ mataghte aqe a _ , _ meteghllug ghllag _ whaa _ tagi uq _ .
kaviigh ghhagh _ pi a _ meteghllug ghllag m _ , _ â _ kii _ , _ naqamalla _ naken _ neqete yu igh ziin _ . _ â
kaviigh ghhagh m _ pi a _ , _ â _ sikughaagh t _ umiileg itnun _ pirughte yaghtugh lunga _ , _ llaaghanwha _ taawa _ . _ â
meteghllug ghllag _ imani _ , _ â _ aa _ , _ whanga llu _ unaami _ pirughte yaghtuqagh lleqe unga _ . _ â
K av iigh h am _ pi a _ , _ â _ ii-ii _ pig p eng an g _ , _ qay ngun wh aa _ igiiterug naanghite uten _ .
whaken _ tuune lleqe amken _ . _ â
imani nguq _ meteghllug ghllag _ , _ â _ aa _ , _ tunusagh t _ kemnagh u i te ut _ . _ â
unaami _ meteghllug ghllag _ ak m ag tagh pag ll ani _ akmag ke luku _ si ku gh aagh en ku nun _ pi uq _ .
K aa s al gh l i mi _ imani nguq _ amig at _ kagpestaaghhagh u uq _ .
meteghllug ghllag _ pi ma lghii _ , _ â _ aa _ , _ n at en ll aam _ qaamna _ umiileg _ es l egk ak aa _ ? _ â
amig m _ paye a _ naafqellug qu _ , _ nuqutughte luku _ itegh ma lghii _ .
nategh kun _ atkug ni _ , _ temkaag ni llu _ mat- aghte luki _ , _ agaghte luki _ itegh ma lghii _ aagra nun _ .
itegh yalghiimi _ sikughaagh t _ umiileg at _ pika _ k el ut ang ani _ aq um l un l _ , _ imani _ am es t aagh h aag uq _ , _ naqam _ qenngu ghllag a _ , _ n ul g l igh llag luni _ .
upugha te aghte nghite aat _ .
qalleg qagh gpenateng _ naqam _ tamaa _ il ang l _ qaprag te ghllag t _ .
sa meng _ pi aghte gpenaan _ meteghllug ghllag _ , _ umiileg _ aga _ aane uq _ .
meteghllug ghllag _ sumeghtaghagh uq _ , _ â _ alike naanghite anka _ , _ akmagtagh ka _ whanga mneng _ imigh lleqe aqa _ . _ â
umiileg _ itegh yalghiimi _ M e tegh ll ug w em _ at ku g wa _ atuqe luku _ , _ angegh lleg ke ghllag luku _ , _ nuqutu lleg ke ghllag luku _ .
M e tegh ll ug w em _ esghagh luku _ , _ nenglagh ghllag ma lghii _ , _ elngaatall _ tuqutngwaagh ma lghii _ .
umiileg m _ pi a _ , _ â _ aqelqagh _ , _ qayuq _ g g aat f ak a _ ? _ â
M e tegh ll ug w em _ kiimsigh aa _ , _ â _ A a- h a- h a- h aa _ , _ sangantuq- a _ aku g ll ak a _ aate laatagh zigu _ .
llangaqa _ atkug ka _ , _ ne mni _ inga _ p ell ug ut aagh meng _ nuuvekagh _ .
A a- h a- h a- h aa _ . _ â
â _ U g um in aq r u wh agh meng _ ! _ â _ pi magh mi _ aane uq _ umiileg _ .
alla _ itegh yalghiimi _ , _ M e tegh ll ug w em _ temkagh kek _ atuqe lukek _ .
legan _ M e tegh ll ug w em _ esghagh nghminigu _ tuqutngwaagh aqe lghii _ .
umiileg m _ pi laatagh aa _ , _ â _ aqelqagh _ , _ qayuq _ igh u v ag egk a _ ? _ â
M e tegh l ug w em _ pi a _ , _ â _ A a- h a- h a- h aa _ , _ sangan _ qu ll ig egk a _ aate laatagh zikek _ ?
llangaqa _ qu ll ig egk a _ ne mni _ inga _ nguulghute meng _ nuuvekagh k _ ! _ â
umiileg _ eggmillgha magh mi _ aga _ aane uq _ .
itegh yalghiimi _ gginagh _ seghlegh _ , _ qenngu ghnaggagh a _ .
aleghquute aghte gpenateng _ ingaghte uute ut _ .
meteghllug ghllag _ ingaghte luni _ qavagh uq _ .
qavagh ghngaaghmi _ is ek in am _ , _ suqsugh m _ teghtugh aghte yalghiimi _ , _ qu ng yagh ag neng _ eslate mun _ saaygu neng _ maaqute aqe a _ .
megh kun _ nal ug w ig al nguq _ , _ alingruugh uq _ .
sa ni te mun _ patimlla luni _ qute mun _ uugg tuq _ .
kaame ngunani _ , _ atkug ngunani _ , _ il ep gh aaq iin agh luni _ aghipa ghllag _ aglagh uq _ ne minun _ .
kaviigh ghhagh _ taawa _ manughagh mi _ aqumga aqe uq _ .
kaviigh ghhagh m _ pi a _ , _ â _ K ii - ii _ , _ qayugham _ sikughaagh t _ umiileg ita _ pirughte i te aaten _ ? _ â
M e tegh ll ug w em _ pi a _ , _ â _ sikughaagh t _ umiileg at _ inglu u nghite uq _ . _ â
kaviigh ghhagh m _ pi a _ , _ â _ qayngun qun _ igiiterug mangite laatagh uten _ ! _ â
tefaay _ .
piinlillegh
P e tu w aam _ igagh llegh a
ungipaghaate t _ up-uni _ igagh ni _ apeghtughiste m _ l i ngu is t -em _ G e o r g i y _ A . _ M en o v s h c h ik o v -em _ igaqe yuwhaagh kaqe ai _ apeghtughiste u luni _ pamani _ 1 9 3 0 - ni _ .
up-uni _ igagh ni _ qula _ aki mig aq _ siipnegh ke luku _ ungip agh ata _ M en o v s h c h ik o v em _ igaqugh qu ai _ whangkuta _ S iv uq am el ngugh n i m _ at igh tu ll em n n u _ mumegh igh qugh anka _ ama _ L al u r am ke t i mun _ mumegh igh qugh anka _ .
qamagte luki _ ungipaghaate t _ ukut _ M en o v s h c h ik o v -em _ 1 9 8 8 -em _ igagh aneng _ , _ M ate r i al y _ i _ is s l e d o v an ii a _ p o _ i a z y k u _ i _ f o l Ê¼ k l o r u _ c h ap l in s k ik h _ es k im o s o v _ ( _ M ate r i al s _ an d _ A nal y si s _ C o n c er n in g _ t h e _ L ang u ag e _ an d _ F o l k l o r e _ o f _ t h e _ Ch ap l in s k i _ E s k im o s _ ) _ , _ pi u ut _ p u b l is h ek at _ R u us e mi _ .
una _ qepghaqagh _ allgegh kau uq _ mani nge yama _ g r an t meng _ U n iv er si t y _ o f _ alaska _ F a i r b an k s -em _ P r o v o s t- ang aneng _ .
allgegh te llegh kun _ sivugh qagh unga _ ruuseghmii t _ atightullegh itneng _ mumegh igh qugh anka _ whang kun nun _ at igh tugh yug nagh tes qell uki _ kaneghyengesi m _ tanqigh ani _ 2 0 0 1 - mi _ .
piyuwhaaghmun _ 4 5 _ ungipaghaate t _ 4 9 -en eng _ 1 9 8 8 -em _ igagh aneng _ .
iwernga _ pi yalghiinga _ ila i _ ungipaghaate m _ siingenllu _ apeghkagh t _ , _ ila i llu _ aghsaan _ ayuqe lghiit _ .
pi nghite yaqenka _ , _ yuginagh _ aki mig aq _ siipnegh ke luku _ siipte uq _ mumegh igh qugh yaghqagh nka _ .
igleghte te kete luku _ tawaten _ nanqigte manginagh magh ita _ pi anka _ .
anagngatu pigte lghii _ M en o v s h c h ik o v -em _ igagh llegh ani _ .
ila i _ atightugh neghllug ghllag t _ repall _ R u us egh m is tun _ ayuqe lghii kun _ mumigte luki _ wetku _ lii g ik ng waagh an ka _ sa u ta i _ ipa _ .
P aam ku gh m iit _ akuzillegh at _ allakanigh _ ( _ katam _ ellngit a _ uk in i whang ku tes tun _ k ak i - _ , _ ama _ ellngit ni _ enngaatall _ whang tu tes tun _ elngaatall _ ) _ , _ tes p am ku gh m ii s tun _ ayuqe ut _ up-uni _ igagh ni _ .
ilangakun _ P aam ku gh m iit _ akuzillegh at _ igagh llegh a _ anagnga sug ni lleqe uq _ ( _ katam _ w eng tegh aq _ nakaan _ mangteghagh _ ) _ .
enkaam _ ila i _ akuzite m _ whanga _ nalluke kenka _ , _ sivuke luki _ angayuqagh mnun _ N ay gh waagh m iin ku g nun _ J un e- en ku g nun _ aapte agka _ sa u ta i _ .
enkaam _ ellngit a _ nallukekagh it _ siivanllegh nun _ aapte yaghtugh anka _ sa u ta i _ .
igamsiqa yug vike anka _ kayusigh kau yatnga _ K ep el g un kut _ , _ A nag g ut en kut _ , _ iyagh u kankut _ , _ U u z ag en kut _ , _ A v aal ag en kut _ , _ enkaam _ kiyang _ rosa _ .

U A F - mun _ uteghnigh yama _ qaluvig m _ tanqigh ani _ 2 0 0 2 - mi _ yupig m _ P r u f is er nga _ S te v en _ J a c o b s o n - llu _ y u v ghii ghagh p un g _ qepghagh llegh nka _ yupig stun llu _ laluramke stun llu _ .
amalleqa _ tawani _ upenghagh ani _ r e c o r d aan ka _ C D - mun _ maligte te nga lghii _ igagh tgun _ .
ama _ n im am _ apegh llegh i _ I g o r _ K r u p n ig meng _ S m it h s o n i an _ I n s t itu t i o n - meng _ allgegh ta put _ tuune ai _ S iv uq aghh m ii ni _ nallukekagh put _ p am an l e nguut _ nuna t _ .

U A F _ C o ll eg e _ o f _ L i b er a l _ A r t s -em _ umiileg an _ John _ L e ip z ig -em _ ama _ A N L C - m _ umiileg an _ L aw r en c e _ K ap l an -em _ mat- ni _ pi yaq leg g in aagh taa k _ te r u w is te meng _ muute i yaghqaa lunga _ Q ak g in ku g neng _ A p u ghi t en ku g nun _ Ch ef aghn agh meng _ ungip agh aat en un _ ilate yaghqagh lug ke i _ .
David _ K o es te r _ U A F -em _ A n t h r o p o l o g y _ D ep ar t m en t- meng _ qep ghagh tegh y ag neng _ kayute kesagh aqa _ U n d er g r a d u at e _ R es e ar c h _ O p p o r tun it y _ P r o g r am -em _ mani nge vig aneng _ .

ama _ igamsiqa yug vike anka _ N a uk a _ P u b l is h in g _ H o us e- en kut _ S t . _ P e te r s b u r g _ , _ R us si a- m el nguut _ aa ng gh ut kaa ng i _ A N L C - n kut _ ukut _ ungipaghaate t _ p u b l is h -en k al uki _ whatete luki _ .
ukut _ igagh t _ ama _ CD _ neghyuke te luki _ akuzipig lleg mnnun _ yupig t llu _ kiyagh taa llgh anun _ nagnegh te yaghqaa luku _ iglegha lleg mnnun _ iknaqughi sagh u luku llu _ , _ p am an ll ii m ta _ ungipaghaate itneng _ .
Ung ip agh agh tet _ : _ ( _ M en o v s h c h ik o v - meng _ V al en t in a _ ( _ Y ata _ ) _ kunukagh m _ mumegh igh qugh qu ai _ , _ enkaam _ I g o r _ K r u p n ig em _ n all gh ugh q egk ii _ ) _ .
1 _ . _ ayvegh ghhagh _ ( _ 1 9 1 4 - 1 9 4 7 _ ) _ .
ungazighmii _ .
ungazigh mi _ allgeghkagh _ .
A y aa ng agh mi _ all eq aq _ , _ enkaam _ y ay w aal ing ugh teg k aq _ , _ nuna lgu ta an _ angli stekagh a _ kayusigh iqe a _ .

2 _ . _ peter _ tagikagh _ ( _ 1 9 2 6 - 1 9 4 1 _ )
ungazighmii _ mekelghiigh _ .
mughunniighte m _ ungip agh agh te m _ G al m ug y i m _ ( _ nani _ 1 8 8 0 - 1 9 5 7 _ ) _ ighnegh a _ .

angayuqagh u kek _ ruuseghmii ii te i igate yagh uk _ .
T ag i kaam _ ata an _ G al m ug y i m _ uglagh _ sa u a _ yuginagh _ sa u a _ siipngaan _ ungipaghagh te a _ liisimake yagh aa _ .
avaqutagh minun _ ila minun _ nuna lgu ta minun _ ungipaghagh aqe lghii _ sa nghite nghmini _ mughunniigh nghite nghmini _ .
T ag i kaam _ nagatekagh i _ neqamike te qugh u i _ a ta mi _ ungip agh at angi _ .
ila itnun llu _ laalighqwaagh aqe lghii _ unug nghagu _ v u v all an gh at allu _ ungipaghagh yaghtugh aqe lghii _ , _ awtu magh meng _ aghula magh meng _ .

U k am ang aan
iimnanguq _ ungazighmii t _ sivuqagh mun _ atghagh ma lghiit _ .

neqagh lutek _ qavaa ma lghiik _ .
unaami _ un ang ul uku _ taghtugh ma lghii _ U k am ang aan _ .

sumeghtaghagh ma lghii _ , _ â _ qaywa _ tuqu langa _ ! _ â
anag ma kanga _ naa s q w akun _ qevuute luku _ .
aghnagh ghrukutaagh ghllag _ aqume ma lghii _ nenglagh magh mi _ , _ â _ H a h a h a h a _ !
tawaten _ tawaten _ tawaten _ !

yugu nghite unga _ , _ kaynge u unga _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ aghulaqe ma lghii _ U k am ang aan _ ungazigh mun _ .

igleghte ma luku _ yuggagh m _ esghagh ma kanga _ m eng tegh aam _ saaghw aneng _ .

yug lghute t _ ughluvegh teng _ pana teng _ tugulagh luki _ malighqagh aat _ .

yaghlegi _ mulaagh uq _ kaynge stun _ .

nasagh ni _ mataghte a _ .

yug t _ esghagh luku _ liisuqe aat _ llaaghan _ U k am ang aan _ .

aghnaghagh m _ atkug ni _ mat- aghte luku _ taglagh ma lghii _ .

iwernga _ qavangugh ma lghii _ .
angyagh t _ tagi iqe ut _ .
angyagh t _ kaate ut _ .
aragh ma kangat _ , _ â _ U k am ang aat ngu z i n _ ? _ â
â _ ipapik _ . _ â

llaaghanwha _ uugg tuq _ U k am ang aan _ angyagh mun _ esghagh gpenani _ .
suqsughtagh ut _ suqsughtagh ut _ .
sivuqagh mun _ kaate ut _ .
Q en agh p all aa tut _ .
â _ E s gh aghh aat en ng am nal ug u llgh aaten _ qute mun _ ! _ â
llaaghanwha _ sivuke luni _ nalugute uq _ U k am ang aan _ esghagh gpenani _ .

U k am ang aan _ pi ma kangat _ , _ â _ esgha _ taana _ angyaataghqagh ghhagh n _ !
aglagh naqe gkuvek _ tugu naken _ ! _ â
qavagh kestagh ghngaaghmi _ taghtugh yalghiimi _ angyagh t _ aviite ut _ .
pi yalghiimi _ nuna mi _ alla mi _ liisuqe a _ llangaqa _ sivuqagh mi _ .
naqam _ saaghw ani _ aghvegh ghllag k _ maalghug _ mallu k _ .
taglagh ma lghii _ mengteghagh mun _ U k am ang aan _ .

quya ghllag ma lghii _ mengteghagh mun _ kaa tuq _ .
aragh ma lghii _ ilu te mun _ , _ â _ Q am aa y _ ken gh h agh meng _ kum aghh ut agh tek _ . _ â

qavaa te aqe ut _ .

ata a _ taghtugh uq _ .

nuliigh ni _ taghsagh aa _ , _ â _ uyuq _ uyuq _ , _ taghtugh a _ sukate luten _ !
llangaqa _ U k am ang aa te m _ me a _ nagaqugh aqa _ . _ â
naange a _ nuug uq _ .
aapte ma kanga _ , _ â _ kina u ziin _ ? _ â

itegh ma lghii _ aagra mun _ .
ata ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ negh nghmeng _ taaqe gkufsi _ yuug _ qaagna _ kelgugh luku _ angyaatagh ghhagh nka _ saamkut _ pilag yaghtugh nakesi _ ! _ â
ata an _ aapte ma kanga _ , _ â _ sa kun _ tagi ma ziin _ ? _ â
â _ qavangugh lunga _ ungazigh mi _ esnagh mi _ qavangugh ke anka _ angyagh t _ S iv uq aghh m iit _ .

ata a _ ugpegh uq _ panig mineng _ .

aghvegh k _ maalghug _ pilag ma kegket _ .

tefaay _ .
ungipaghagh an _ ukiivag mii t
iimnanguq _ ukiivag mii _ nuliigh leg _ , _ avaqutagh ite ngughk _ .
nuliigh ni _ awen _ iiwleng _ qitegh aqe kanga _ .
ama _ nunalgutetuqagh t _ .
maaten _ ilangani _ aghnagh _ aane ma lghii _ ugi a _ mughute ma luku _ .
aane luni _ , _ an ig u sigh aq luni _ , _ megh k _ anigu meng _ kevigh ma kek _ .
llaaghanwha _ itegagh an _ asi i _ aghi ma kangi _ .

itegh yami _ , _ qulmesiite ni _ megh meng _ imigh ma kanga _ .

kaate luni _ , _ itegh ma lghii _ .

nulighh a _ angegh ma lghii _ , _ â _ aa-a _ ! _ â
aghnagh m _ neghsagh _ itghute ma kanga _ .
ugi a _ ef s ugh luni _ , _ itegh ma lghii _ .
itegh yami _ , _ nuliigh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ enta _ , _ itegagh nka _ malliigh ki _ ! _ â
llaaghanwha _ aghnagh m _ ugi mi _ itegagh i _ alleg ma kangi _ .
yuug _ ay av i si tam un _ aaghhe ma lghii _ .
kaa sa mi _ atkug ni _ mataghte ma kanga _ .
taagken _ amsikaghte uq _ .
nulighh an _ pilugug i _ agaghte qugh ai _ .

saafte yagh ke gni _ , _ aghipate uk _ .
yug m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ sa yamek _ kameg gken _ aghipate ak _ ?
awituwaq _ yug neng _ alla neng _ ugiigh aqe uten _ ! _ â
â _ waniwanllu _ , _ ugiigh igate unga _ !
taawanginaq _ megh k _ anigu meng _ kevigh lukek _ , _ itegh unga _ . _ â
ugi an _ wanlegi _ nuliigh ni _ qitegh ma kanga _ .
apeghiigh yamigu _ ing agh qu ll uteng _ qavaa te ma lghiit _ .
unaami _ unaangu luku _ taghtugh ma lghiit _ .
taghtugh luteng _ yuug _ tungtuqu yagh ma lghii _ .
kingu aneng _ aghnagh _ pilugug ma lghii _ .
pilugug luni _ , _ aghulaqe ma lghii _ siku gnun _ .
ama _ sumeghtaghagh ma lghii _ , _ â _ entaqun _ megh mi _ tuqu yagh kuma _ , _ pinigh nayagh unga _ . _ â
taagken _ igleghte ma lghii _ .
meghnugh nghmini _ aqfaate aqe luni _ , _ qenwat _ puqla yaagh ghqu ma lghii _ .
puqla yagh kete yami _ aghuliigh ma lghii _ .
meghnaali te kete luku _ uteghmun _ esghagh yalghiimi _ mengteghagh m llu _ esnagh m llu _ aku l ang ani _ .
tawani _ meghnaali ma lghii _ .

qenwat _ unug yaghtugh aa _ .
taagken _ aghuliigh laatagh uq _ .
esghagh yalghiimi _ n em in it aq ef tuq _ .
aghnagh _ sumeghtaghagh ma lghii _ , _ â _ entaqun _ kiyaghnegh m _ megh mi _ tuqu ste negh a _ ighleke aanga _ .
itupill _ qute mi _ tuqu s q e simak ang anga _ . _ â
taagken _ sumeghtaghagh nghmeng _ taaqe luni _ , _ ukiivag mun _ mayugh ma lghii _ .
naqam _ alla _ sukate pigte luni _ ukiivag m _ qaye anun _ uugte ma lghii _ .
uugte luni _ esghagh ma kanga _ uyghag ghrukutaaghllag _ s ag legh agh llak _ .
taaggun _ aghnagh _ aqume ma lghii _ .
tawani _ q iy aam alghii _ , _ nuna _ tukeghragh magh an _ .
nutaan _ ugi ni _ q i te l qu v in gh aa _ neqagh te a _ .
Q iy am _ ang tal ang aneng _ repall _ aragh ma lghii _ .
qiya ma luku _ s ag legh agh llak _ sivutmute _ aghelqute qaghte ma lghii _ .
Q iy aq es tagh ng aagh mi _ aghuliigh aghte ma lghii _ .
uteghmun _ esghagh yalghiimi _ paye k _ es ghagh aa k _ .
aghnagh _ nekeve luni _ paye gnun _ qineghte ma lghii _ .
qineghte luni _ esghagh yagh kete ni _ qaame na nga _ mamleg ghllag uq _ .
tawani _ esghapag ma lghii _ ama _ sumeghtaghagh ma lghii _ , _ â _ entaqun _ qamavek _ ifkagh yagh kuma _ , _ tuqu nayagh unga _ . _ â
aghnagh _ aqume luni _ paye gnun _ ighu gni _ kanaghte uute ma kek _ .
tesqamani _ saafte te naqutkesagh uq _ mingle aneng _ .
aghtugh yami _ pi ma lghii _ , _ â _ entaqun _ ifkagh langa _ ! _ â
llaaghanwha _ aghnagh _ ifkagh ma lghii _ .
ifkagh yalghiimi _ kuyapegagh kun _ tuute ma lghii _ .
ifkagh vig a _ taana _ nenglu ghllag u uq _ .
taagken _ aghnagh _ k i w at m iigh sim alghii _ , _ talligh gni _ s aag tagh ll uk ek . aq f aat aq luni _ .
qenwat _ egkugh anun _ kaate nghmeng _ aghtugh yami _ sumeghtaghagh ma lghii _ , _ â _ una _ neng lu kun iq egk egk a _ entaqun _ nunaghllag u uq _ . _ â
taagken _ igleghte ma lghii _ .
N igh ug g aq _ aliigh ma kanga _ .
taagken _ igleghte ma lghii _ .
N igh ug g aq _ taana _ taku ma kanga _ .
N igh ug g aq _ angli ma lghii _ .
qenwat _ mengteghagh llu _ aliigh ma lghii _ .
kaate ma lghii _ aghnagh _ mengteghagh ghrukutaaghllag mun _ .
taagken _ itegh ma lghii _ .

ungavig ghllag neng _ nukalpigagh _ nuug ma lghii _ .
nuug luni _ pi ma lghii _ , _ â _ S aam _ aghnaqe aten _ ? _ â
â _ ukiivag mii u unga _ ! _ â
â _ qaywa _ tughneghaan- nghite ziin _ ? _ â
â _ tughneghaan- nghite unga _ , _ yupig u unga _ !

yug m _ akite a _ , _ â _ tughneghaan- nghite unga _ y u pig g aag unga _ , _ y u pig g aag unga _ !
El p eg ng am _ sa qu ziin _ ukavek _ ? _ â
â _ ugi ma _ qitegh kanganga _ uglagh pigte luku _ ip ag f ig un _ tuqu na lunga _ pi yagh unga _ .

enta _ itegh i _ ! _ â
llaaghanwha _ aghnagh _ itegh ma lghii _ .
itegh yan _ yug m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ A m si k agh ll u ten _ neqe meng _ aveg a _ !
negh ltung _ ! _ â
llaaghanwha _ aghnagh _ amsikaghte uq _ .
A m si k aghh negh meng _ taaqe luni _ qayugh te aq _ ketfagh aa _ .
taagken _ neqe meng _ avegtugh uq _ .
apeghiigh luni _ avegtughagh t _ miluute ma kangi _ .
negh ma lghiik _ .
negh nghmeng _ taaqe lutek _ , _ yug m _ aghnagh _ pi a _ , _ â _ enta _ allighagh t _ s aag t ik i _ ! _ â
llaaghanwha _ aghnagh m _ allighagh t _ s aag simak angi _ .
taagken _ ingaghte uute ma lghiik _ .
ingaghte uute lutek _ qavaa te ma lghiik _ .
unaami _ unaangu luku _ taghtugh yamek _ , _ aghnagh _ ugi an _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ mughute aghte naqe unga _ qaya kun _ aghvegh leg nun _ .
aghvenge lunga _ tagi lleqe unga _ . _ â
yuug _ nategh mun _ ategh ma lghii _ .
ategh luni _ qaya ni _ uk ig sim akanga _ .
ukigllug qu _ , _ aqume ma lghii _ qaya minun _ .
uunghagh ni _ tugu luku _ , _ mingle _ naghulleg yagh kete ni _ mingle _ quupaghte ma lghii _ .
quupaghte yalghiimi _ megh ghllag _ mingle meng _ itegh ma lghii _ .
yuug _ kete ma lghii _ , _ esla mun _ angwaagh ma lghii _ .
A n qagh s an _ qu u p agh llak _ maame ma lghii _ , _ ama _ nategh _ megh i te ma lghii _ .
taagken _ aghnagh _ ugi mi _ kingu aneng _ ukini ma lghii _ kameg neng _ .
iiwenllu _ aghnegh m _ qute kaghagh ke a _ , _ kameg k _ taaqe ma kek _ .
taaqe yamikek _ enraq _ ugkelli ma lghii _ .
gaagh ma lghii _ .
ugke t _ ugute yaki _ aq um e simak angi _ .
mulunghituq _ u v it ang aneng _ mengqughte te ma lghii _ , _ ama _ megh ghllag _ itegh ma lghii _ .
itegh yan _ aghnagh _ sumeghtaghagh ma lghii _ , _ â _ awituwaq _ ugi ka _ taglagh uq _ . _ â
taagken _ aghuliigh ma lghii _ .
llaaghanwha _ ugi a _ qu u p agh llag kun _ nuug ma lghii _ .
nuug yalghiimi _ aghvenge ma lghii _ .
aghvegh _ ii- u na ghllag an _ nategh mun _ itghute ma kanga _ .
Q uu p agh llak _ taana _ maame ma lghii _ .
nategh mi _ yug m _ aghvegh ghllag _ kagimte ma kanga _ .
taagken _ tawani _ kiyaghte ma lghii _ .
maaten _ ilangani _ aghnagh _ aqsanguma lghii _ .
aqsa nge luni _ ighni yalghiimi _ mekelghiigh ghhagh meng _ , _ taagken _ taghnughhagh nge ma lghiit _ .
yuug _ tungtuqu yagh nghmini _ tungtu nge aqe lghii _ .
megh mun _ pi nghmini _ megh m _ teghig ke sagh a _ allaghhiinaq _ unake aqe kanga _ .
ama _ awergha _ allaghhiinaq _ tawani _ kiyaghte lghii _ .
taghnughhagh ghhagh _ sukate luni _ angli ma lghii _ .
mulunghituq _ aghnagh _ aqsa nge laatagh uq _ , _ ighni yalghiimi _ aghnaghaghhagh meng _ .
taawa _ m aal gh ug eg neng t aghn ugh h ang um alghii k _ .
maaten _ ilangani _ yug m _ nuliigh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ entaqun _ whavek _ tagi aghten _ .
kingunegh ten _ nagate yaghtuqagh ki _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ aghnagh _ ugi mi _ saaghw anun _ aglagh ma lghii _ .
tawani _ nagate ma lghii _ .
nagaqugh te nghmeng _ aghtugh uq _ .
yug m _ aapte ma kanga _ , _ â _ qayugham _ sa meng _ nagaqugh te aghte nghite ziin _ ? _ â
â _ nakaa _ nag aq u ut aghnegh h itu nga _ . _ â
â _ aa-a _ ! _ â
yug m _ nuliigh mi _ sigute kek _ s uu p atagh aa k _ .
pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ enta _ all am eng m ing l e mun _ sigute gken _ mategllug kek _ nagaten _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ aghnagh m _ sigute gni _ mingle mun _ mategsagh ke gni _ kingunegh ni _ atugh ghllag lghiit _ nagate ma kangi _ .
aghnagh _ qiya ma lghii _ ama _ aragh ma lghiit _ k ing un gh i _ eslallugughte te ni luteng _ .
taagken _ tawani _ qiya nghmeng _ taaqe ma lghii _ .
taaqe luni _ sumeghtaghagh ma lghii _ , _ â _ amen _ nuna mnun _ aglagh naanghite unga _ .
luuraq llu _ nuna mnun _ kaate kuma _ ugi ma _ tuqu lleqe anga _ . _ â
ugi an _ aapte ma kanga _ â _ aghyuqe aghte igate ziin _ ? _ â
akite ma kanga _ , _ â _ aghyuqe ghngaaghma _ sa lunga _ pi langa _ ?
T um anga _ whanga mni _ n all un agh tek anga _ . _ â
â _ enta _ k al ng ag g aa k _ kumlu gpetun _ angka lghiik _ maalghug _ ulima kek _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ aghnagh m _ k al ng ag g aa k _ maalghug _ ulima ma kek _ .
apeghiigh yakek _ , _ ugi minun _ kelgute ma kek _ .
llaaghanwha _ ugi an _ tugu ma kek _ .
tugu lukek _ awergha m _ all aghh iin am _ melqugh aneng _ imigh ma kek _ .
imigh nghmeng _ taaqe yamikek _ aghnagh _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ enta _ piighhagh ngllagh a _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ aghnagh _ piighhagh ngllagh ma lghii _ .
taaqe yami _ ugi minun _ kelgute laatagh aa _ .
ugi an _ piigh ghhagh kun _ k al ng ag g aa k _ maalghug _ petug ma kek _ ama _ aghnagh llu _ aghnaghaghhagh llu _ .
apeghiigh yamiki _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ whagun _ nategh m _ qukaa nun _ uk ig g naq am ken _ .
enan _ k i nguv neng _ mengteghagh llu _ maligte te naagh uq _ . _ â
taagken _ nategh m _ qukaa nite ngughk _ s ag legh agh llak _ awite ma kanga _ .
awite yagh kete ni _ paye ghllag k _ aliigh ma lghiik _ .
qaame na nga _ nighugh pigte lghii _ .
yug m _ nuliigh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ enta _ pinitun _ negh lta _ aghulaqe vagilgavek _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ negh ma lghiik _ .
negh te kete luku _ yug m _ nuliigh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ taana _ aghnaghaghhagh _ elpek _ keveg aqe lleqe an _ .
whanga _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ taana _ keveg aqe lleqe aqa _ .
ama _ ungipaate naqe amken _ , _ ukiivag mi _ saama _ ugi n _ nulightugh ma uq _ aghnaghagh neng _ maalghug gneng _ ineqsunagh pigte lghii neng _ .
enekiitek _ v u v all aa qu t _ , _ esghagh lleqe aten _ .
En taq un ng am _ uk ig g naq am ken _ .
enan _ mengteghagh _ k i nguv neng _ maligte te naagh uq _ .
iiwen _ ug iv ek _ aapte naagh aaten _ , _ avelghaqiinagh naken _ .
sagiqe gkan _ pi naken _ , _ â _ enan _ unaami _ ungipaate nagh amken _ . _ â
iiwen _ nategh anun _ kaate kuvek _ uteghmun _ esghagh naagh uten _ .
mengteghagh _ esghagh lleqe an _ .
esghagh kuvgu _ piighhe aq _ il em qugh luku _ panike te lghiitek _ aglagh ghhaatek _ mengteghagh mun _ .
aglagh kuftek _ mengteghagh _ qelpeghtekufsigu _ , _ itegh kuftek _ signegh t _ m aal gh ug negh et _ tugu lleqe aten _ .
tugu kufki _ ila kek _ signegh k _ mangtag meng _ avegtugh te aqe lukek _ imigh lleqe agken _ .
ila kek _ quyngigh meng _ avegtugh te aqe lukek _ imigh lleqe agken _ .
U g iv ek _ mengteghagh anun _ aglagh u lleqe agken _ .
llaaghanwha _ nanevgagh at _ neghe lleqe ait _ .
taawa _ qamagte unga _ .
U k ig g naq am si _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ yug m _ paye k _ suupe yagh ke gni _ anglu igh aatagh ma lghiik _ .
taakwagun _ p ay eg ne kun _ uk ig simak ang it _ .
nuna mun _ tuute ma lghiik _ .
tuute yamek _ kalngag _ es ghagh yaq es eng _ angli ghllag ma lghii _ .
mengteghagh _ tunutagh nge i te nun _ ifkagh ma lghii _ .
Agh nak p an i ku ll ghii k _ , _ q ii v lu tek ag l aam alghii k _ .
kaate lutek _ itegh ma lghiik _ .
itegh lutek _ aghnagh m _ signegh t _ m aal gh ug negh et _ tug um ak ang ek _ .
tugu luki _ ila kek _ quyngigh meng _ imigh ma kek _ , _ ila kek _ mangtag meng _ .
apeghiigh yamikek _ p an ig g ani _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ enta _ tawani _ utaqa nga _ .
ugi ka _ payugte naqe aqa _ , _ naten _ kiyaghte aqa _ . _ â
panig an _ angegh ma kanga _ .
llaaghanwha _ aghnagh _ ugi minun _ aglagh ma lghii _ .
kaate luni _ itegh ma lghii _ .
taawa _ v u v all aaq ef tut _ ama _ yugtu ghllagu uq _ .
atugh aqe ut _ aghula magh meng _ .
aghnagh _ aagra mun _ nuug yan _ q all eg nan igh waagh u sim alghiit _ .
taagken _ tawani _ esghapag ma lghii _ .
ugi ni _ esghagh yagh kete ni _ quulqite m _ qaye ani _ n ul iig q ek _ maalghug _ ing agh t aagh utaq ef tu k _ .
aghnagh m _ ugi minun _ signegh k _ quyngigh meng _ imaqe lghiik _ tuune ma kek _ .
â _ ang _ , _ ukuk _ naasiigh kek _ ! _ â
llaaghanwha _ ugi an _ signegh gneng _ ataasigh _ avegtugh aq _ negh ma kanga _ .
taaqe yamigu _ nuliigh minun _ tuune ma kek _ .
sivuke luku _ nuliigh ni _ liisuqe mangite ma kanga _ .
nulighh an _ signegh k _ tugu ma kek _ .
tugu lukek _ yug nun _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ uyegte ma kek _ avegtughagh t _ ataa si k agh taa n _ .
Taa w at egh pig aq _ naama ma lghiik _ signegh k _ .
ila kek llu _ signegh k _ tugu ma kek _ m an tag meng _ imaqe lghiik _ .
tanemwha _ ugi minun _ tuun l aat agh aa k _ .
pi laatagh aa _ , _ â _ enta _ ukuk llu _ naa sigh q ek _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ ugi an _ signegh k _ mangtag meng _ imaqe lghiik _ tugu ak _ naa sigh l aat agh aa k _ .
avegtugh aq _ ataasigh _ neghe a _ .
taaqe yamigu _ nuliigh minun _ signegh k _ tuune ma kek _ .
nulighh an _ sughukagh nun _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ uyegte ma kek _ .
tanemwha _ signegh m _ imagh a _ naama laatagh uq _ .
signegh t _ imaa igh te yata _ aane ma lghii _ .
aane luni _ mengteghagh minun _ aglagh ma lghii _ .
kaate luni _ itegh ma lghii _ .
taagken _ ugi an _ yug lghute _ tamana _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ U ku gh si y _ , _ entaqun _ aagna _ nulighhqagh ka _ ! _ â
nuliigh ni _ aag llegh a _ ineqsunagh lleghpigagh a _ tugu ma kanga _ .
pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ elpek _ at av ek naa v ek _ enngaatall _ panike nakangaten _ ! _ â
U w at mun _ ayagaghte ma kanga _ .
aghnagh _ quulqite meng _ asitmun _ ifkagh ma lghii _ .
pilugug luni _ aane ma lghii _ .
aane yan _ yuug _ pi laatagh uq _ , _ â _ U ku gh si y _ , _ entaqun _ aagna _ nulighhqagh ka _ , _ llangaqa _ n ul igh q a _ . _ â
ila a llu _ nuliigh ni _ tugu ma kanga _ .
pi laatagh aa _ , _ â _ uyuq _ elpek llu _ naa v nun _ at av nun _ aglagh ghhaaten _ ! _ â
yug m _ siinge ma kanga _ quulqite m _ qaye aneng _ asitmun _ .
ifkaghte laatagh aa _ .
aghnagh _ pilugug luni _ aane ma lghii _ .
yuug _ pilugug ma lghii _ enkaam _ aane ma lghii _ .
nutaghagh _ mengteghagh _ esghagh ma kanga _ .
tazingavek _ aglagh ma lghii _ .
kaate luni _ itegh ma lghii _ .
itegh yalghiimi _ nuliigh ni _ esghagh ma kanga _ .
nulighh an _ quyake ma kanga _ aapte ma kanga _ , _ â _ sangaawa gmi _ taake uk _ aghnaghagh k _ ? _ â
yug m _ akite ma kanga _ , _ â _ whanga _ n ul igh q es agh ag ka _ . _ â
yug m _ aapte a _ , _ â _ elpek _ naken _ pi ziin _ ? _ â
â _ unaami _ ungipaate naagh amken _ . _ â
taagken _ aghnagh m _ qayugh te aq _ ketfagh luku _ ugi ni _ neqlightugh ma kanga _ .
ugi a _ negh ma lghii _ quyngigh meng _ .
negh nghmeng _ taaqe yan _ nulighh a _ alla igh i ma lghii _ nutaghagh u ta ghhagh inagh meng _ .
allighagh igh nghmeng _ taaqe yan _ ing agh qu ll uteng _ qavaa te ma lghiit _ .
unaami _ taghtugh luteng _ nulighh an _ ugi ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ pilugug i _ ungipaate naqe amken _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ yuug _ pilugug ma lghii _ .
enkaam _ nulighh ghqu te lghiik _ aanleghaate ma lghiik _ .
aanleghaate lutek _ ukiivag mun _ mayugh ma lghiik _ .
qaye anun _ uugte yalghiimek _ s ag legh agh llak _ esghagh ma kangat _ s ag legh am _ saaghw ani _ maye ghllag t _ .
aghnagh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ taawa _ ungipaate naqe amken _ , _ maye t _ ukut _ angegh qugh lteki _ mengteghagh mun _ . _ â
ugi an _ angegh ma kanga _ .
llaaghanwha _ angegh qugh ait _ mengteghagh mun _ .
awergha _ allaghhiinaq _ amigh _ ila ke te nghite ngughk _ m el q wa _ .
U n aghh aan eng _ angaghqugh aat _ unug llegh m _ kenlanga nun _ .
apeghiigh yameng _ aghnagh m _ ugi ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ unaami _ nun al g ut f ut _ tamaghhagh an _ awergha meng _ tallimat ke aghtagh te _ uyegte naken _ amig ligh aqe luku _ ataa si k agh taa n _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ yuug _ angegh ma lghii _ .
taagken _ it egh aa tu k _ .
I tegh aa ll u tek _ negh uk _ .
taagken _ ingaghte uute lutek _ qavaa te ma lghiik _ .
unaami _ taghtugh lutek _ , _ yug m _ nunalgute ni _ qamagte luku _ tuq l ugh tegh um akanga _ .
taagken _ uyegte ma kanga _ amigh meng _ ataa si k agh taa n _ awergha neng _ tallimat ke aghtagh te _ .
qamagte ma kanga _ mengteghagh _ tamaghhagh an _ .
taagken _ kenlanga _ yug m _ nuliigh ni _ pillugagh nanigh aa _ ama _ pinitun _ kiyaghte yagute ut _ .
yuug _ neq eng y u ghi gh llag tuq _ , _ ama _ aklungi igh i ma lghiit _ .
qamagte uq _ .
tefaay _ !
yaywaalingiighhagh ak
iimnanguq _ , _ aghnaghaghhagh llu _ mekelghiigh ghhagh llu _ n ay aku t alghii k _ .
nayag an _ ategh a _ T ay ke ng aa w en _ , _ mekelghiigh ghhagh m _ ategh a _ T ay k eg er g en _ .
nuna mi _ kiyaghte lghiit _ N u ut qam i _ .
nunalgutetuqagh t _ ama _ umiileg leg t _ .
umiileg ita _ yaywaalingiighhagh ak _ piniqe pigte kek _ .
maaten _ ilangani _ igatiqe ma lghiit _ nuna lgu ta it _ .
katamqun _ umiileg at _ neqe leg _ .
taagken _ umiileg m _ nuliigh ni _ pim aqegk anga _ , _ â _ yaywaalingiighhagh ak _ neqagh ghhagh meng _ tuun agh taa q i ke k _ , _ salin _ esghaghhu _ kay aal ngu uk _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ nulighh an _ neqe meng _ aglagh te ma kek _ .
llaaghanwha _ negh kayugu ma lghiik _ igatiqe mangite ma lghiik _ .
nuna lgu ta it _ p an egh aa sim alghiit _ .
maaten _ ilangani _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ sumeghtaghagh ma lghii _ , _ â _ naten _ pi yagh kuma _ neqe meng _ tugu tete nayagh zinga _ . _ â
mekelghiigh _ un agh sigh waagh meng _ itghute ma lghii _ .
taagken _ savighhe ma kanga _ .
T ull um k egh ll uku _ taaqe ma kanga _ .
taaqe yamigu _ neghqwaagh ghhagh _ tug ut ku v in gh aghh aq _ ulima ma kanga _ tug egh pag g aq _ .
taaqe ma kanga _ .
taagken _ tapghagh ghhagh meng _ ivagh i ma lghii _ .
naalkute yami _ un agh sigh waagh em _ iqug akun _ petug ma kanga _ .
enkaam _ asi anun _ uy gh ag g aq _ petug ma kanga _ .
taagken _ T ay k eg er g en _ yataaghqe ma lghii _ .
nayag ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ qiiptaasigh meng _ taaqe te unga _ .
qiiptagh yagh naqe unga _ .
aghulaqe gkuma _ elpek _ siklagh yagh naagh uten _ mengteghagh m _ saaghw anun _ piitute leg nun _ . _ â
taagken _ T ay k eg er g en _ esnagh mun _ atghagh ma lghii _ .
sigugnegh mun _ uugte ma lghii _ .
uugte luni _ anglaagh _ ukite naqe ma kanga _ .
ukite yamigu _ qiiptaasigh ni _ ateghte luku _ qiiptagh ma lghii _ elqwaagh meng _ .
nayag a _ T ay ke ng aa w en _ aane ma lghii _ .
alungutellegh m _ asi ani _ siklagh ma lghii _ .
siklagh luni _ piitute meng _ akugh ke tete te ma lghii _ .
taagken _ s aghn aam al uku _ yuug _ tagi ma lghii _ .
ratamiiragh kek _ qategh lghiik _ .
kaate luni _ T ay ke ng aa w en _ tuqlugh ma kanga _ , _ â _ T ay kun g _ , _ T ay kun g _ , _ whanga _ tugu yug aqe yagh amken _ ! _ â
T ay ke ng aa w em _ akite ma kanga _ , _ â _ elpenun _ s um egh tagh an ghi tu ng an ul igh q es qell unga _ .
enmis _ aghulaqe i _ ! _ â
llaaghanwha _ yuug _ aghulaqe ma lghii _ .
pi yalghiimi _ qatelghii u uq _ .
taagken _ yuug _ ila a _ tagi ma lghii _ .
ratamiiragh kek _ kavilngugh k _ .
kaate luni _ yug m _ tuqlugh ma kanga _ , _ â _ T ay ku un g _ , _ T ay ku un g _ , _ tugu na luten _ pi aqe yagh amken _ ! _ â
T ay ke ng aa w em _ akite ma kanga _ , _ â _ sumeghtaghagh nghite unga _ elpenun _ nulightugh u lunga _ !
enmis _ aghulaqe i _ ! _ â
llaaghanwha _ yuug _ aghulaqe ma lghii _ .
pi yalghiimi _ k av ii pig g aa f tuq _ .
taagken _ tawani _ kiyaghte ma lghii _ .
kiyaghte ma luku _ yuug _ tagi ma lghii _ tagneqegtagh meng _ atkug ke lghii _ .
yug m _ tuqlugh ma kanga _ , _ â _ T ay kun g _ , _ T ay kun g _ , _ esghaqagh qu te _ ukavek _ ! _ â
llaaghanwha _ T ay ke ng aa w em _ esghagh ma kanga _ .
esghagh luku _ iqlighte ma lghii _ .
allameng _ tuqlugh ma kanga _ , _ â _ T ay kun g _ , _ T ay kun g _ , _ ugi ke yukagh nghite zinga _ ? _ â
T ay ke ng aa w en _ yaghlegi _ nenglagh ma lghii _ , _ â _ E t e _ , _ et e _ . _ â
yug m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ nengligh sqe nghite amken _ ipapik _ pi amken _ . _ â
T ay ke ng aa w em _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ taawanginaq _ whanga nge i na nghite unga _ , _ anengagh lgu unga _ .
aamtaam _ ighleke kau yanga _ ugiigh naanghite unga _ .
aamtaam _ angegh kanganga _ ugiigh lleqe unga _ . _ â
yug m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ wiin _ aghulaqe naqe unga _ .
enan _ anengagh an _ tagi kan _ whanga llu _ tagi naagh unga _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ yuug _ aghulaqe ma lghii _ .
T ay ke ng aa w en _ piitute meng _ alla ghhagh inagh meng _ s aghn aam alghii _ .
taaqe luni _ itegh ma lghii _ .
mulunghituq _ T ay k eg er g en _ esnagh meng _ taglagh ma lghii _ mengteghagh minun _ .
Q ii p taq e ngu m alghii _ elqwaagh meng _ .
elqwaagh t _ qu ng ang it gun _ maklag _ kanaghte ma kanga _ .
itegh luni _ nayag ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ Q ii p taq e ngu m anga _ elqwaagh meng _ .
elqwaagh t _ qu ng ang it gun _ maklag meng _ q ii p taq e ngu m anga _ . _ â
nayag an _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ kay _ , _ w al en q akun _ !
neghe lleqe ukung _ i ghi v g aghh aq _ ataasigh ghhagh _ . _ â
taagken _ T ay ke ng aa w em _ maklag _ af l aam akanga _ .
T ay k eg er g em pim akanga _ , _ â _ umiileg ut _ neqe meng _ aglagh te gu _ , _ elqwaagh meng _ unatagh meng _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ T ay ke ng aa w em _ sagnegh ni _ neqe meng _ imigh ma kek _ elqwaagh meng _ ama _ unatagh meng _ .
taagken _ aglagh te ma kek _ umiileg m _ nulighh anun _ .
kaate luni _ itegh ma lghii _ .
itegh yan _ qamaken _ aapte ma kangat _ , _ â _ kinangaawa _ ? _ â
T ay ke ng aa w em _ akite ma kangi _ , _ â _ whanga u unga _ , _ taawa _ neghyaghqagh ghhagh t _ . _ â
umiileg m _ nulighh an _ nuug vike ma kanga _ .
aapte ma kanga _ , _ â _ kinku t _ neqenge aat _ ? _ â
â _ T ay k eg er g en _ maklag meng _ q ii p taq e ngu m alghii _ . _ â
taagken _ aghnagh m _ sagnegh k _ tugu ma kek _ .
tugu lukek _ niive lukek _ T ay ken aa w e mun _ tuune ma kek _ .
llaaghanwha _ T ay ke ng aa w em _ aglagh te ma kek _ .
kaate luni _ itegh ma lghii _ .
itegh luni _ amsikaghte ma lghii _ .
mulunghituq _ nategh meng _ kavleg u te ma lghii _ .
T ay k eg er g em _ aapte ma kanga _ , _ â _ kinangaawa _ ? _ â
yug m _ nategh meng _ akite ma kanga _ , _ â _ whanga u unga _ . _ â
â _ I it q aal ten _ ! _ â
llaaghanwha _ yuug _ itegh ma lghii _ .
itegh yalghiimi _ aghneghniimna u uq _ .
itegh yan _ T ay k eg er g em _ aapte ma kanga _ , _ â _ sa qu ghllag ziin _ ? _ â
yug m _ akite ma kanga _ , _ â _ nayag n _ tugu yaghtugh aqe aqa _ .
I i te g _ â _ qute _ ighleke nghite kuvgu _ enan _ nayag ka _ tugu nayagh an _ . _ â
T ay ke ng aa w em _ T ay k eg er g en _ aksaqe luku _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ T ay k eg u r _ , _ angegh nakevnga _ ! _ â
taagken _ yuug _ T ay k eg er g em _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ aghnagh aq _ umyugaleg u lghii _ angegh yug kuni _ ugiigh lleqe lghii _ . _ â
taagken _ T ay ke ng aa w en _ pi ma lghii _ , _ â _ taawa _ ugiigh unga _ , _ ighsa nghite unga _ ! _ â
llaaghanwha _ yug m _ T ay ke ng aa w en _ aglagh te naqe a _ .
T ay k eg er g en _ pi ma lghii _ , _ â _ wiin _ ataasigh meng _ qavagh a _ .
unaami _ aglagh ghhaaten _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ yuug _ tawani _ qavaa ma lghii _ .
unaami _ unaangu luku _ nuliigh ni _ aglagh te ma kanga _ .
yug m _ nayag a _ T ay k eg er g e mun _ tagi ma lghii _ .
T ay k eg er g en _ nulightugh uq _ .
T ay k eg er g en _ enngaatall _ un ang y u pig llegh ii _ .
maaten _ ilangani _ yuug _ tagi ma lghii _ T ay k eg er g e mun _ .
pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ T ay k eg u r _ , _ seghlegh un ay an ghi s ta _ mengteghagh put _ qerngughte te yagh kumteki _ . _ â
T ay k eg er g em _ akite ma kanga _ , _ â _ entaqun _ pinigh nayagh ukut _ . _ â
unaami _ taghtugh luteng _ mengteghagh teng _ naafqe ma kangat _ .
naafqellug qu _ mesungesag m _ saaghw anun _ aglagh ma lghiit _ .
taagken _ mesungesag t _ tunuqagh itgun _ mengteghagh u ma lghiit _ .
tawani _ kiyaghte ma lghiit _ .
maaten _ ilangani _ yuug _ tagi ma lghii _ .
kaate luni _ itegh ma lghii _ .
T ay k eg er g en _ tuqlugh ma kanga _ , _ â _ T ay k eg u r _ , _ whang kun nun _ aglagh qagh a _ , _ esghapag yaghtuqagh nga _ ! _ â
llaaghanwha _ T ay k eg er g en _ ellngit nun _ aglagh ma lghii _ .
itegh yan _ T ay ke ng aa w em _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ ugi ka _ esghapag ggu _ mughute naqe lghii _ . _ â
yug m _ kameg ni _ tugu ma kanga _ .
tugu luku _ nuliigh minun _ tuune ma kanga _ .
â _ T ay ke ng aa y _ , _ kaame ka _ piginegh igh ghhu _ ! _ â
llaaghanwha _ T ay ke ng aa w em _ maklag m _ ung al gh ung aneng _ kameg a _ kanaghte vike ma kanga _ .
inglu a _ neghsagh m _ ung al gh ung aneng _ kanaghte vike ma kanga _ .
taagken _ yuug _ kameg ma lghii _ .
kameg luni _ nekeve yalghiimi _ aghenqignegh a _ itegagh a _ maklag stun _ puug ma lghii _ .
inglu a _ neghsagh stun _ puug ma lghii _ .
taagken _ esnagh mun _ atghagh ma lghii _ .
kaate luni _ aqume uq _ .
aqume yan _ maklag _ neghsagh _ n u ug legh a sim alghii _ .
taagken _ yug m _ savig mineng _ kenuqagh ma kanga _ tuqute luku _ .
llaaghanwha _ maklag meng _ neghsagh meng _ taglagh qu uute ma lghiik _ mengteghagh megtenun _ .
taagken _ tawani _ kiyaghte ma lghiik _ .
T ay k eg er g en llu _ lli te i yalghiimi _ enngaatall _ un ang y uugh sim akanga _ .
teghig ke te yameng _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ aghtugh nanigh ma lghii _ .
maaten _ ilangani _ yug m _ tagi luni _ ungipaate ma kanga _ , _ â _ unaami _ vuvallate lleqe ukut _ .
I ng l uk l igh h am n neng _ kayaalqe i i ragh yagh ut _ tagi lleqe ut _ sanqutetuumagh meng _ .
tagi lleqe ut _ atungag meng _ tan pegh h meng _ temkag meng _ t ap ghagh meng _ .
ellngit a _ aghula stekaqe aat _ am iq l ug g aq _ .
aghula nghmini _ taawanginaq _ ilagaate inagh kun _ nalughqutagh aqe uq _ .
kayaalqe gkumikut _ s an q ut am n neng _ wayagh lleqe ainkut _ . _ â
taagken _ yuug _ mengteghagh minun _ ag l aam al gh n _ .
enngaatall _ T ay k eg er g en _ nagaqugh luni _ qevuute luni _ alinge ma lghii _ inqun _ w ay aghn ay uk ang is t eng _ .
unug yagu _ T ay k eg er g en _ aane ma lghii _ .
aane luni _ uughqa nun _ esghagh yagh ma lghii _ .
agepsughtu aaghet _ esghagh ma kangi _ .
taku ma kangi _ .
kaate yagh kete ni _ nenglu u uq _ .
itegh ma lghii _ .
taawa _ nanevgagh ghllag llu _ aghn al waagh ll ak lu _ esgh aam ak ang ek _ .
N an ev ghagh llag em _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ sa qu ziin _ ? _ â
T ay k eg er g em _ akite ma kanga _ , _ â _ A pegh t ii s qell unga _ tagi nga _ . _ â
N an ev g agh ll ak pim alghii _ , _ â _ enta _ apeghtugh laken _ !
taawanginaq _ aapte naqe amken _ , _ ing l uk l igh h agh p esi _ aghul as teng at _ naten _ pi yaghqau a _ ? _ â
â _ taawanginaq _ am iq l ug g aq _ nalughqutagh yaghqaa uq _ . _ â
nanevgagh ghllag m _ nuliigh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ Agh nal q w aa y _ , _ enta _ saguyagh gka _ tagivagh kek _ ! _ â
llaaghanwha _ aghn al q w aam _ s ag uy ak nan ev g amun _ tuune ma kek _ .
nanevgagh m _ tugu ma kek _ .
taagken _ pi ma lghii _ , _ â _ nagu _ teghla ghllag _ ?
tea- ai _ whavek _ .
ilagagh te naqe amken _ ! _ â
teghla ghllag _ nanevgagh m _ kaagkagh akun _ nalug ma lghii _ .
N an ev g aam _ ilagagh te ma kanga _ , _ â _ ayag nge i yu a _ , _ y ang iy ang aa _ , _ ayag nge i nga ai _ yanga igh yu a _ ! _ â
teghla ghllag m _ yaqugh gni _ s aag t aat am aag ken ka _ tuye gni _ q ap r ag simak ek _ .
ilagaate _ naange yan _ qetgegh kau magh mi _ q al ghi q aam al gh i _ .
T aag ken nan ev g aam pim akanga _ , _ â _ taawa _ apeghtugh amken _ !
aglagh ghhaaten _ ! _ â
llaaghanwha _ T ay k eg er g en _ aglagh ma lghii _ .
kaate luni _ itegh luni _ am si k agh lluni _ qavaa ma lghii _ .
unaami _ un ang ul uku _ nayag an _ aq f aam akanga _ .
qineghte luni _ aapte ma kanga _ , _ â _ nagu _ T ay k eg er g en _ ? _ â
T ay k eg er g em _ akite ma kanga _ , _ â _ whaante unga _ ! _ â
nayag an _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ Wh ang kun nun _ aglagh a qaa _ !
ugi ka _ v u v all an aq uq _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ T ay k eg er g en _ pilugug luni _ aglagh ma lghii _ .
kaate luni _ itegh ma lghii _ .
mulunghituq _ inglu aneng _ qimugsigh lghute _ kaa t qu sim alghii _ atungag meng _ t ap ghagh meng _ temkag meng _ tan pegh h meng _ usi lug teng _ .
taagken _ tukugh ita _ itghute te ma kangit _ .
V u v all alghiit _ sivuke luteng _ ilagagh ma lghiit _ .
taaqe yata _ aqelqagh it _ ilagagh ma lghiit _ .
llaaghanwha _ am iq l ug g aq _ ke f tagh luni _ nalughqutagh yalghiimi _ tamaani _ aqelqagh t _ kayaalqe i i ma lghiit _ .
T ay k eg er g en _ ugumi yug ma lghii _ .
taagken _ pi ma lghii _ , _ â _ enta _ saguyagh k _ tagivagh tekek _ !
whanga llu _ ilagagh qagh langa _ ! _ â
llaaghanwha _ saguyagh k _ tuune ma kegket _ .
T ay k eg er g en _ kallagte ma lghii _ .
ilagaate ni _ puygu ma kanga _ .
pi ma lghii _ , _ â _ uuk _ , _ ilagaate ka _ puygu aqa _ !
N a tu ng aa w all i _ ? _ â
nayag an _ aanqute ma kanga _ .
liisimake a _ , _ â _ ayag nge i yu a _ , _ year- nge i yanga _ , _ ayag nge i nga ai _ , _ yanga igh yu a _ ! _ â
T ay k eg er g en _ pi ma lghii _ , _ â _ aa _ , _ taawa _ taawa _ !
nagu _ aghula stekaghqagh ka _ teghla _ ? _ â
teghla ghllag _ T ay k eg er g em _ kaagkagh akun _ nalug ma lghii _ .
T ay k eg er g en _ aanqute ma lghii _ , _ â _ ayag nge i yu a _ , _ y ang iy ang aa _ , _ ayag nge i nga ai _ , _ yanga igh yu a _ ! _ â
aga _ tuye gni _ q ap r ag simak ek _ .
ilagaate _ naange yan _ qetgegh kau magh mi _ qalghigh ma lghii _ .
nanevgagh at _ aragh te ma lghiit _ .
â _ T ay k eg er g en _ kayaalqe i i uq _ ! _ â
taagken _ T ay k eg er g en _ pinitun _ kiyaghte yagute ma lghii _ ama _ aklungi igh i ghllag ma lghii _ .
qamagte uq _ .
tefaay _ !
Agh h aghh ang aa w r aq
iimnanguq _ , _ yug t _ tallimat _ anglegute ke te lghiit _ ata leg t _ ama _ naa leg t _ .
maalghug _ mughute lutek _ iil aam alghii k _ .
ila a _ nunivag mun _ aghulaqe luni _ i f l aam alghii _ .
ila a _ qayaghtu luni _ i f l aam alghii _ .
aminaqe ma lghii _ ataasigh _ Agh h aghh ang aa w r aq _ .
maaten _ ilangani _ Agh h aghh ang aa w r aq _ un ug mi _ qaya ngllagh ma lghii _ .
qayagh _ taaqe luku _ amiiragh igh gpenaan _ qavaghni yami _ itegh luni _ qavaa ma lghii _ .
qavagh luni _ taghtugh yalghiimi _ nutaan _ n igh u ug tagh agh aq ef t aa _ .
ata ni _ tagh s as m akanga _ .
ata a _ taghtugh ma lghii _ .
taghtugh yan _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ qaya ghhagh ka _ amiiragh igh qagh ghhu _ ! _ â
ata an _ yaghlegi _ qayugh a _ ayemqe ughtagh ma kanga _ .
Agh h aghh ang aa w r aam _ qaya ni _ q iy aku m akanga _ .
Agh h aghh ang aa w r aq _ uy uq l igh pig aq _ .
ata an _ natmun _ pi sqe igate kanga _ , _ qay ugh ll a g _ â _ qute _ ataasighhaaghte lghii _ ila i _ ifla laghate te lghiit _ .
Agh h aghh ang aa w r aq _ ellng in aghh agh mi _ lliigh lghii _ .
maaten _ ilangani _ allameng _ unug yagu _ qay angll aam alghii l _ .
qayagh _ taaqe luku _ amiiragh igh aa _ .
amiiragh igh nghmeng _ taaqe luku _ a ta mi _ uunghagh i _ awataghpag i _ tegleg luki _ kete ma lghii _ .
kete luni _ angwaagh ma lghii _ .
iiwenllu _ uy av aghq aagh aq uq _ tagitug ughte ghllag ma kanga _ .
kete mun _ angwaagh ma lghii _ .
taagken _ igleghte ma lghii _ .
tumangani _ tag itu g i sim akanga _ .
tagitug ite yagh kete ni _ pennagh ghllag _ al igh um akanga _ .
pennagh m _ qaye ani _ yugrukutaagh ghllag _ ighu gni _ kulngaghllug kek _ , _ megh mun _ itegagh ni _ nepte luki _ , _ aqumga ragh aqe uq _ .
yugrukutaagh ghllag m _ yuggagh _ esghagh ma kanga _ tuq l um akanga _ , _ â _ aagyuq _ tagi aghten _ ! _ â
yuggagh m _ akite aghte mangite ma kanga _ .
yug ghrug qu ta ghllag m _ pi laatagh ma kanga _ , _ â _ iiwen _ evlug ughte ste lleqe aqa _ ! _ â
yugrukutaagh ghllag m _ ighu gni _ aghulate yagh ke gni _ evlug ughte ma kanga _ .
enkaam _ yuggagh _ alinge luni _ yugrukutaagh ghllag meng _ aglagh ma lghii _ .
kaate luni _ uugte ma lghii _ .
uugte yan _ yugrukutaagh ghllag m _ pi ma kanga _ .
â _ yeqay _ iigh ar iigh aa ll u tun g _ ! _ â
yuggagh m _ akite ma kanga _ , _ â _ A - aa - aa _ ! _ â
yugrukutaagh ghllag m _ yuggagh _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ enta _ quneghten _ ! _ â
yuggagh _ quneghte ma lghii _ .
yugrukutaagh ghllag _ n ev egh sim alghii _ .
N ev egh s an _ yuggagh m _ iv am akanga _ .
â _ nagu _ n aan taq si n _ ? _ â
yuggagh _ aqsa anun _ yugrukutaagh ghllag m _ uugte ma lghii _ .
uugte luni _ tukagh ma lghii _ .
yuggagh _ pi ma lghii _ , _ â _ naqam _ aqsaute yu gnite a qaa _ . _ â
yuggagh _ ukig ma lghii _ .
iiwenllu _ ukig aqe uq _ , _ yugrukutaagh ghllag _ aqume ma lghii _ .
pi ma lghii _ , _ â _ whaante unga _ . _ â
yuggagh m _ yugrukutaagh ghllag _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ enta _ quneghten _ . _ â
yugrukutaagh ghllag _ quneghte ma lghii _ .
quneghte yan _ yuggagh _ yugrukutaagh ghllag m _ kameg anun _ itegh ma lghii _ .
yugrukutaagh ghllag m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ yeqay _ tengug put _ negh lteki _ ! _ â
Agh h aghh ang aa w r aam _ pi ma kanga _ â _ wiintaku _ qaya ghhagh ka _ tug m agh sagh tuq agh l akun _ ! _ â
taagken _ Agh h aghh ang aa w r aq _ qaya ghhagh minun _ atghagh ma lghii _ .
ellnga _ tumangani _ negh sagh tek alghii _ .
neghsaghtagh mi _ tengug i _ ighneghagh i _ nusug ma kangi _ .
nusug luki _ atkug ni _ mat- aghte luku _ qaligh ghhagh gni _ aate lukek _ atkug ni _ aate luku _ tafsi ma lghii _ .
tafsi luni _ neghsagh m _ ighneghagh ghhagh i _ qumig ma kangi _ .
qumig luki _ taglagh ma lghii _ .
taglagh yan _ yugrukutaagh ghllag m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ enta _ n ev egh ten _ . _ â
yuggagh _ n ev egh sim alghii _ .
N ev egh lluni _ utaqa i ma lghii _ .
yugrukutaagh ghllag m _ savig ni _ nusug ma kanga _ .
nusug luku _ yuggagh m _ aqsa a _ segge ma kanga _ .
tengug i _ aliighte ma kangi _ .
yuggagh m _ atkug mi _ ilu anun _ tengug t _ qumig kaqe kangi _ .
yugrukutaagh ghllag m _ liigike mangite ma kanga _ .
yugrukutaagh ghllag _ tengug meng _ negh ma lghii _ .
taaqe luni _ yuggagh _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ tengug ten _ llangaqa _ neghsagh m _ tengug i _ . _ â
yuggagh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ whangkuta _ tengug put _ tawatete ut _ neghsaghpagnite aqe ut _ .
enta _ elpek llu _ n ev egh ten _ !
â _ llaaghanwha _ yugrukutaagh ghllag _ n ev egh sim alghii _ .
N ev egh s an _ yuggagh m _ savig ni _ nusug ma kanga _ .
yugrukutaagh ghllag m _ aqsa a _ segge ma kanga _ .
yugrukutaagh ghllag m _ ighneghagh i _ aliigh ma lghiit _ .
I gh saq gh wa _ ku k egh q w aaq ef tuq _ .
yuggagh m _ igh saq gh wa _ kenuqagh yagh kete ni _ tuqute ma kanga _ yugrukutaagh ghllag _ .
maaten wha _ megh m _ evlug ughte mangite ma kanga _ .
tuqute yamigu _ qaya ghhagh minun _ aglagh ma lghii _ .
qaya ghhagh minun _ aglagh luni _ wata _ taagavek _ aghulaqe ma lghii _ .
sukate luni _ qiighqagh kun _ tamlag ma lghii _ .
tamlag luni _ qaya ghhagh ni _ sayug ma kanga _ .
sayug luku _ uunghagh ghhagh ni _ awataghpag ni _ tugulagh luki _ aglagh ma lghii _ .
tumangani _ esla mi _ nanigh ghhagh _ ku mang alghii _ esghagh ma kanga _ .
tawani _ kiyaghte ma lghii _ .
kiyaghte ma luku _ nuna m _ asi aneng _ tughneghagh- ghllag _ aragh magh mi _ tagi ma lghii _ .
nanigh ghhagh kun _ tughneghagh- ghllag _ n ugh qagh sim alghii _ .
Agh h aghh ang aa w r aq _ tuqlugh ma kanga _ , _ â _ Agh h aghh ang aa w r aa y _ , _ Agh h aghh ang aa w r aa y _ qilu ten _ tagivagh ki _ sukate luki _ ! _ â
Agh h aghh ang aa w r aam _ neghsagh m _ qilu i _ tuune ma kangi _ .
tughneghagh _ agitaghte yalghiimi _ talwa _ qam av er ug llak _ ggute ghllag _ .
qilu t _ negh luki _ tughneghagh- ghllag _ kalefkaghte ma lghii _ .
kalefkaghte luni _ allameng _ n ugh qagh sim alghii _ .
N ugh qagh s an _ Agh h aghh ang aa w r aam _ kemagnagh t _ miluute ma kangi _ .
tughneghagh- ghllag _ kalefkaghte ma lghii _ all am eng n u ug umalghii _ .
nuug luni _ Agh h aghh ang aa w r aq _ tuqlugh ma kanga _ , _ â _ Agh h aghh ang aa w r aa y _ , _ Agh h aghh ang aa w r aa y _ , _ ighsaqugh n _ tagivagh ghhu _ . _ â
Agh h aghh ang aa w r aam _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ sangan _ , _ ighsaqugh ka _ tuun aanghi taq a _ !
ighsaqugh ka _ unguva sigh ke aqa _ , _ kiyagh t aagh usi q aqa _ sumeghtaghagh sigh ke aqa _ ! _ â
tughneghagh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ Agh h aghh ang aa w r aa y _ ,
Agh h aghh ang aa w r aa y _ iiwen _ neghe lleqe amken _ ! _ â
Agh h aghh ang aa w r aam _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ agitaghten _ , _ agitaghten _ ! _ â
Agh h aghh ang aa w r aam _ u un gh am in eng _ naghulleg ma kanga _ .
tughneghagh- ghllag _ kalefkaghte ma lghii _ .
awataghpag t llu _ kalefkaghte ma lghiit _ nuna mun _ .
Agh h aghh ang aa w r aam _ tu mang akun _ maligte ma kangi _ .
taagken _ Agh h aghh ang aa w r aam _ malighqagh ma kangi _ awataghpag t _ nuughqaghte luteng _ kalefkaghte aqe luteng _ .
suna _ tughneghagh- ghllag _ mengteghagh mete te _ it qagh ta _ .
Agh h aghh ang aa w r aam _ amig m _ saaghw ani _ utaqa ma kanga _ .
aagra mun _ tughneghagh- ghllag _ itegh ma lghii _ .
awataghpag t _ amig m _ es l at ang ani _ .
itegh luni _ tughneghagh- ghllag _ ngillegte ma lghii _ .
qama _ nulighh an _ aapte ma kanga _ , _ â _ N at u _ aqnigh aqa _ ? _ â
tughneghagh ghllag m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ entaqun _ aqsaqugh ka _ ag r ep em aa _ . _ â
taagken _ Agh h aghh ang aa w r aq _ ila itnun _ mengteghagh anun _ aglagh ma lghii _ .
kaate luni _ iightu ma lghii _ .
itegh yalghiimi _ tugh negh aghh ag ek _ maalghug _ esghagh ma kek _ .
aghnalqwaagh ghhagh k _ ii y ng it alghii k _ .
aghnalqwaagh ghhagh k _ aapte ma ka ak _ , _ â _ kaay _ !
kina u ziin _ ? _ â
â _ whanga u unga _ . _ â
â _ kina _ elpek _ ? _ â
â _ Agh h aghh ang aa w r aq _ . _ â
â _ A aa _ weni _ inga _ umiileg ut _ aqnigh aqe uq _ aqsa mineng _ .
langetaq _ aqfa lleqe aatnga _ . _ â
nepiigh yan _ Agh h aghh ang aa w r aam _ pi ma kanga _ ,
â _ sangaawa _ taana _ uyaqugh gpeni _ kum ag llag uy eng alghii _ ? _ â
aghnalqwaagh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ enta _ esghaqagh ghhu _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ Agh h aghh ang aa w r aam _ taku ma kanga _ .
kaate luku _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ enta _ qeteghten _ ! _ â
aghnalqwaagh _ qeteghte ma lghii _ .
qeteghte yan _ Agh h aghh ang aa w r aam _ ighsalqagh gkenkun _ nunugh yagh kete ni _ aghnalqwaagh ghhagh _ tuqute ma kanga _ .
tuqute yamigu _ amiiragh ghhagh a _ qapigh ma kanga _ .
qapigh yamigu _ Agh h aghh ang aa w r aam _ aate ma kanga _ .
aate luku _ ellnga tun _ q ii pim s ug umalghii _ ilagagh ma lghii _ .
ilagagh ma luku _ yuug _ qineghte ma lghii _ .
pi ma lghii _ , _ â _ naagu _ taana _ aghnalqwaagh _ ? _ â
Agh h aghh ang aa w r aam _ akite ma kanga _ , _ â _ taawa _ ! _ â
yug m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ aqfa amken _ .
umiileg ut _ inga _ aqnigh aqe uq _ .
aglagh qagh a _ . _ â
â _ aglagh nayagh unga _ taawanginaq _ kay ate pig tu nga _ . _ â
â _ amagh laken _ . _ â
â _ aa-a _ ! _ â
taagken _ Agh h aghh ang aa w r aq _ nekeve ma lghii _ .
nekeve yan _ yug m _ amagh ma kanga _ .
amagh yagh kete ni _ uqigtu uq _ .
yug m _ aapte ma kanga _ , _ â _ sangavek _ uq ig tugh q aag aten _ ? _ â
â _ qayughllak _ qugili ghllag lghiinga _ , _ saama _ alignagh m _ . _ â
yug m _ kaat ute ma kagh nge a _ mengteghagh ghllag mun _ .
itghute ma kanga _ .
taagken _ Agh h aghh ang aa w r aam _ tukugh ni _ pi ma kangi _ , _ â _ aghnagh mi _ whani _ enta _ qaagna _ kelgugh ghhu _ .
qamagte luni _ taghnughhagh ke te luni _ tagi laghate li _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ aghnagh m _ kelgugh aa _ qamagte luku _ .
â _ Taa w aa _ qamagte aqa _ . _ â
Agh h aghh ang aa w r aam _ aqnigh lghii _ esghagh yagh kete ni _ q aan gh ani _ uunghagh _ ama _ aneghte aqe uq _ kenegh meng _ .
mulunghituq _ qamagte luteng _ nuna lgu ta it _ tagi laghate te ma lghiit _ .
taagken _ it egh aa tut _ nanevgagh ke te luteng _ aghnalqwaagh ke te luteng _ taghnughhagh ke te luteng _ leganqun _ qamagte luteng _ nuna lgu ta it _ .
Agh h aghh an aa w r aam pim ak angi _ , _ â _ En tan an iq q aam teg gu _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ aghnagh m _ nanigh _ qaamllug qu _ nategh mun _ ateghte ma kanga _ .
Agh h aghh ang aa w r aam _ pi ma kangi _ , _ â _ enta _ kayusigh tengnga _ .
kina _ ilagaate leg _ ilagaate mineng _ ilagagh li _ .
iiwen _ ilagagh ta ite ngughk _ temngi _ aragh li _ .
iiwen _ aanqute kuma _ aan qu llgh a si _ . _ â
taagken _ Agh h aghh ang aa w r aq _ ilagaate meng _ aanqute uq _ .
tamana _ ellmeng _ ilagaate meggneng _ aanqute uq _ .
ilagagh ta ite ngughk _ aragh te ghllag uq _ .
aragh te ma luki _ Agh h aghh aa w r aam _ tughneghagh _ aqnigh lghii _ kenuqagh yagh kete ni _ tuqute ma kanga _ .
tuqute yamigu _ uunghagh ni _ nusug ma kanga _ .
nusug luku _ aanqaghte ma lghii _ eslate mun _ .
aanqaghte luni _ taagken _ qimag ma lghii _ .
tughneghagh t _ nepiigh aghtagh te ma lghiit _ .
nepiigh aghtagh te yata _ tughneghagh m _ nulighh an _ nanigh _ itghute ma kanga _ .
itghute luku _ kum agh sim akanga _ .
ugi ni _ esghagh yagh kete ni _ tuquma lghii _ .
A n qagh ll uteng _ Agh h aghh ang aw r aq _ malighqagh ma kangat _ .
pi ma kangat _ , _ â _ ii teg Ê¼ un _ kaate kumken _ neghe lleqe kemken _ .
sangavek _ iqlengiqe ma ziin _ ? _ â
I w em g a _ Agh h aghh ang aa w r aam _ unite ma kangi _ .
qaya ghhagh ni _ aliigh ma kanga _ , _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ qaya ghhagh _ , _ qaya ghhagh _ megh mun _ piiften _ ! _ â
llaaghanwha _ qaya ghhagh _ megh mun _ piifte ma lghii _ .
Agh h aghh ang aa w r aq _ qaya minun _ kaa tuq _ .
uugte luni _ kete uq _ .
taagken _ tughneghagh t _ esnagh mun _ kaat quute ma lghii t _ .
tughneghagh t _ megh mun _ ate y iil nguut _ .
ataasigh m _ tughneghagh m _ megh _ megh ma kanga _ .
megh yagh kete ni _ Agh h aghh ang aa w r aq _ tug negh aam _ q aan gh anun _ tagi ma lghii _ .
Agh h aghh ang aa w r aam _ qay am in il nguq _ te p l ug g aq _ tugu luku _ megh _ anagutagh yagh kete ni _ megh _ uteghte ma lghii _ .
llaaghanwha _ tughneghagh m _ tugu mangite ma kanga _ .
taagken _ nuna mun _ aglagh ma lghii _ .
tamlag luni _ qaya ni _ sayug ma kanga _ .
sayug luku _ mengteghagh minun _ taglagh ma lghii _ .
kaate luni _ itegh luni _ angayuqagh gni _ esghagh ma kek _ .
qagugh mig te lutek _ aqumga aqe uk _ .
ata an _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ qenwat _ tuqu ni luten _ pi aqe amken _ . _ â
Agh h aghh ang aa w r aam _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ nakaa _ , _ entaqun _ anglegute nka _ nallu te te meggneng _ tuqu laghate te ma ut _ .
maaten _ whanga _ uyavagh nun _ aghulaqe ghngaaghma _ kitum _ tuqute naanghite aanga _ .
whanga _ nanevgagh lunga _ tuqu lleqe unga _ . _ â
qamagte uq _ .
tefaay _ .
ungipaghagh an _ Q ig igh h m ii k
iimnanguq _ , _ Q ig igh h m ii k _ mekelghiigh ghhagh llu _ aghnaghaghhagh llu _ ang leg ut ku ll ghii k y ay w aal ing iigh h aa k _ .
Q ig igh t aq _ mengteghaghtu pigte lghii _ .
ama _ umiileg leg t _ .
umiileg at _ aghvenge yu pigte lghii _ .
awen _ iiwleng _ aghvenge aqe lghiit _ .
Agh v eng en gh aani _ mekelghiigh ghhagh llu _ aghnaghaghhagh llu _ esnagh mun _ at ghagh agh aq elghii k _ .
kaate nghata _ umiileg m _ uqugh mun _ s ii ng waagh atagh aq eg ke k _ .
llaaghanwha _ ava u na tek _ tag l aam aq elghii k _ taawanginaq _ mesiigh mun _ angighte te lutek _ .
wetku _ umiileg _ mengteghagh mun _ taglagh nghaani _ esnagh mun _ yaywaalingiighhagh ak _ at gh aam aq elghii k _ .
kaate negh meggni _ pilagkagh meng _ mangtag meng _ ikugh qu te ma aqe lghiik _ ama _ kemekrag meng _ .
taglagh lutek _ kaate negh meggni _ n ut aan negh um aaq elghii k _ .
ilangani _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ aan en gh ani _ umiileg m _ s ii ng waagh at aam aqegk anga _ .
taagken _ tawani _ kiyaghte ma lghiik _ .
maaten _ ilangani _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ pi ma lghii _ , _ â _ maa nte kumtung _ tuqu lleqe ainkung _ .
upupeng _ qaya ngllagh lutung _ aghul aq el q un g _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ nayag an _ aan gh um akanga _ .
taagken _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ qaya ngllagh ma lghii _ maalghug gneng _ paye ke lghii neng _ .
qayagh _ taaqe yamigu _ tanpegh ghhagh ghhagh meng _ q em g ugh t il u tek _ nayag ke te lghiik _ il agh tu u simak angat _ .
taaqe yamegteki _ qayagh eng _ amigh ma kangat _ .
qaya ghrukutaaghllag _ maalghug gneng _ paye ke lghii _ taa qu m ak an ag t _ .
M ek elghii gh h aam n ay ag g ani _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ wiin _ maani _ ataasigh meng _ qavaa ltung _ .
unaami _ un ang ul uku _ mengteghagh ut _ naafqellug qu _ k ell gh aku n g _ . _ â
nayag an _ angegh ma kanga _ .
unug yagu _ negh ma lghiik _ .
negh nghmeng _ taaqe lutek _ ingaghte uute lutek _ qavaa te ma lghiik _ .
taagken _ unaami _ taghtugh yamek _ mengteghagh eng _ naa f qu m ak an at _ .
U n ang u pig ll uku _ kete ma lghiik _ .
ukiivag m _ tu ng ang anun _ angwaagh ma lghiik _ aghn el qu si q _ .
unug yagu _ qayagh eng _ maghqate te luku _ qavaa ma lghiik _ .
unaami _ taghtugh yamek _ qayagh eng _ q al pegh ll uku _ angwaagh ma lghiik _ ukiivag mun _ .
meghnugh yamek _ qayagh eng _ uyghigh luku _ ang y atagh qu um alghii k _ .
taagken _ negh ma lghiik _ negh nghmeng _ taaqe lutek _ aghnaghaghhagh m _ uyughagh ni _ atugh te ma kanga _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh _ qaya mini _ nalughqutagh ma lghii _ .
M egh nun gh y ami _ nayag ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ enta _ ataasigh meng _ angwaagh ltung _ . _ â
nayag an _ angegh ma kanga _ .
llaaghanwha _ angwaagh uk _ .
unug yagu _ uyghigh laatagh uk _ .
uyghigh lutek _ qayagh eng _ maghqate te luku _ qavaa ma lghiik _ .
unaami _ taghtugh negh megteni _ angwaagh aqe lghiik _ aghn el qu si q _ .
aghnegh m _ qukaghyag u _ mekelghiigh ghhagh m _ nayag ni _ pi laatagh aa _ , _ â _ enta _ negh ltung _ ! _ â
llaaghanwha _ aghuliigh lutek _ qayagh ek _ uyghigh luku _ negh uk _ .
taaqe yamek _ nayag ni _ pi laatagh aa _ , _ â _ enta _ ataasigh meng _ atugh te nga _ , _ aghula naqe unga _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ atugh te luku _ nayag an _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ aghula ma lghii _ .
meghnugh yami _ taaqe luni _ nayag ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ enta _ uy ghi n _ amu gu _ .
angwaagh ltung _ ! _ â
nayag an _ uy ghi n _ amu ma kanga _ , _ enkaam _ angwaagh uk _ .
iiwenllu _ unug yaghtugh aqe a _ nuna _ aliigh ma kangat _ .
taagken _ taku ma kangat _ .
sukate luni _ nuna _ angli ma lghii _ .
taagken _ tamlag ma lghiik _ .
arekull _ ukiivag mun _ kaate aqe uk _ .
qute mun _ ug llegh aa sim alghii k _ .
qayagh eng _ sayug ma ka ak _ .
sayug luku _ aa w gh simak ang ak _ .
mengteghagh nun _ taglagh ma lghiik _ .
S iv ul igh pig agh teg gun _ kaate ma lghiik _ .
I tegh aa s am ek m ek elghii gh h aq _ qiighw ma lghii _ .
aghnagh _ ineqsunagh ghllag lghii _ aagra meng _ nuug ma lghii _ .
aleghqugh yalghiimi _ qagh itu m r aag llag u f tuq _ , _ â _ K aa a y _ , _ s aam _ taghnughhagh ke istek _ ?
maani _ aviite usi _ ! _ â
mekelghiigh ghhagh m _ akite ma kanga _ , _ â _ Q ig igh h m ii ngu u kun g _ . _ â
â _ aa _ , _ sa kun _ tagi stek _ ? _ â
â _ qaya kun _ tagi kung _ .
Q ay ugh ll ak nun am n ni _ seghletun _ kiyaghte lghiikung _ , _ enngaatall _ umiileg ut _ seghlegh pigu uq _ , _ naqam _ aghvenge yu pigte uq _ .
Agh v eng en gh ani _ esnagh mun _ atghagh negh mtung _ neqe mun _ ama _ uqugh mun _ s ii ng v ag atagh aq iin kun g _ .
llaaghanwha _ ava ngunaamtung _ taglagh aqe ukung _ mengteghagh mnnun _ .
kaate negh mtung _ sa meng _ negh ltung _ .
taawanginaq _ igatagh lutung _ kiyaghte aqe lghiikung _ .
wetku _ umiileg _ taglagh nghaani _ itagnatun _ esnagh mun _ atghagh aqe lghiikung _ .
pilagkagh meng _ ikugh qu te aqe lghiikung _ .
enkaam _ taglagh aqe lghiikung _ .
taglagh negh mtung _ wetku _ negh aqe lghiikung _ .
En kaa m am _ tea- ma ken _ ukavek _ tagi kung _ tuqute na yu kanginkung _ . _ â
aghnagh ghllag _ qiya ma lghii _ , _ en kaa m pim alghii _ , _ â _ waran wha _ avaqutagh ke lleqe amtek _ .
qamavek _ aagra mun _ itegh tek _ .
asangsi _ ugi ka _ tagi kuni _ qevuute luni _ quya lleqe uq _ . _ â
I tegh a sim alghii k _ aagra mun _ .
aghnagh m _ ugi mineng _ utaqa i te kete luku _ neqlightugh ma kek _ .
negh ma lukek _ sama _ ugi a _ kavleg u uute ma lghii _ .
