â _ whaante unga _ . _ â
yuug _ itegh ma lghii _ .
tawani _ taghnughhagh ghhagh k _ esghapag ma kek _ .
yaghlegi _ nuliigh ni _ aapte ma kanga _ , _ â _ S aam _ ukuk _ taghnughhagh ke akek _ ? _ â
nulighh an _ akite ma kanga _ , _ â _ entaqun _ el pen eng _ aapte aghte kek _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ yug m _ aapte ma kek _ , _ â _ S aam _ taghnughhagh ke istek _ â _ mekelghiigh ghhagh m _ akite ma kanga _ , _ â _ Q ig igh h m ii ngu u kun g _ , _ yaywaali u ukung _ , _ ata ite ukung _ , _ naa ite ukung _ .
ukavek _ tukughqagh ghhagh leg nun _ ivagh i u kung _ nani _ inqun _ pinitun _ kiyaghte na lutung _ .
qayughllak _ nuna mnni _ seghletun _ kiyaghte lghiikung _ .

yug m _ aapte ma kanga _ , _ â _ naten _ kiyaghte aqa _ ? _ â
â _ Agh v eng en gh ani _ esnagh mun _ atghagh negh mtung _ neqe mun _ mesiigh mun _ s ii ng waagh atagh aq iin kun g _ .
llaaghanwha _ av ang un am tun g _ taglagh aqe ukung _ .
umiileg _ wetku _ taglagh nghaani _ itagnatun _ esnagh mun _ atghagh aqe ukung _ .

qenwat _ tuqute na yu kanginkung _ tagi ukung _ . _ â
nepiigh yan _ yuug llu _ nulighh ghqu te lghiik _ q iyagh u sim alghii k _ .

â _ avangite ukung _ .

yug m _ nuliigh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ enta _ waran wha _ avaqutagh nge ukut _ .
elpek _ angayuqagh ten _ aqfa ki _ ! _ â
nulighh an _ angegh ma kanga _ .

aghnagh _ aane luni _ aglagh ma lghii _ mengteghagh meggnun _ .

â _ qaywa _ , _ tagi naqe ut _ . _ â
aghnagh _ amsikaghte ma lghii _ .

nanevgagh ghllag _ pi ma lghii _ , _ â _ enta _ , _ ungipaghagh langa _ .

enkaam _ nanevgagh ghllag llu _ aghnalqwaagh ghllag llu _ aanleghaate ma lghiik _ .
yaghlegi _ mekelghiigh ghhagh llu _ aghnaghaghhagh llu _ m il eg pag taa sim alghii k _ .

â _ tagi naqe uk _ . _ â

nanevgagh ghllag m _ yaghlegi _ taghnughhagh ghhagh k _ milegmiqe ak _ .

â _ iimnanguq _ , _ nunatagh mii t _ mengteghagh t _ malghugnegh ghhagh t _ .

yuug _ un ang y u pig llegh ii _ .
naqam _ neqete nghmini _ aghnalqwaagh ghhagh _ neqe meng _ awaligh aqe kanga _ .

eltughagh ghhagh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ aqnigh yagh kuma _ ! _ â _ eltughagh ghhagh n _ aapte ma kanga _ â _ sangavek _ ? _ â _ â _ qayughllak _ unguva nghmeng _ qinuyagute unga _ .

ughvughqe i na ma lunga _ iiggagh aneng _ taagken _ ifla nayagh unga _ .
qemall _ aghnagh kun _ tagi nayagh unga _ mekelghiigh ghhagh u lunga _ . _ â _ â _ neghe pigesnagh na luten _ ! _ â _ aghnalqwaagh ghhagh m _ akite ma kanga _ , _ â _ Q ay ugh ll ak kiyagh h negh meng _ qinuyagute unga _ ! _ â _ nepiigh luni _ aqniima lghii _ .

taawa _ ungipaghagh unga _ . _ â

ungipaghagh an _ Y aq ell eng et aq
iimnanguq _ yaq ell eng e taa k _ naa ke te lghiik _ .
nuna m _ a si ng an il ngu uk _ yug stun _ ayuqe lghiik _ .
ighnegh a _ alignagh lghii _ .
aghneq _ tamaghhagh an _ ilagagh aqe lghii _ .
ilagagh nghmeng _ taaqe nghmini _ aneghte aqe lghii _ , _ â _ I iy h ii - h ii - h i - h ii y _ , _ T eng ag er g en tuq _ ( _ 1 _ ) _ nulighh igh yaghtugh kegka _ ! _ â
naa an _ akite ma kanga _ , _ â _ tengagergete _ aange ghllag uq _ nagaqugh lleqe aaten _ .
nepiigh i _ !
ellnga n _ ulima aqe ainkut _ whangkuta _ .
naagu mi _ ikiwan _ q aa y ng an il ngu u m _ nateghqagh meggnun _ angighhe te aqe kanginkut _ . _ â
ighnegh an _ akite ma kanga _ , _ â _ gaymaangi _ n ul iigh h igh naq aqa _ . _ â
ayumigh _ apegh aqe aat _ angegh ghllag lghii _ ighaleqetaagh ghllag _ agh tagh aam _ tu ng ang an il nguq _ ategh a _ tengagergete _ .
ayumigh _ w aam segh agh tet _ yugu na iqe aat _ .
whangkuta nge uq _ T eng ag er g em _ ulima aqe ainkut _ .
maaten _ ilangani _ yaq ell eng et aq _ aane luni _ mengteghagh m _ saaghw ani _ vegtagh ma lghii _ .
vegtagh luni _ vegaagh t _ r at am ii r ag ne kun _ qantagh luki _ itghute ma kangi _ .
itghute luki _ piighhe ma kangi _ .
apeghiigh yamiki _ akmag ma kangi _ .
akmag luki _ aghul aq um simak angi _ .
T eng ag er g e mun _ mayugh ma lghii _ .
mayugh ma lghii _ mayugh ma lghii _ mayugh ma lghii _ .
paye gnun _ kaate ma lghii _ .

esghagh luki _ taku ma kangi _ .

enta _ itegh i _ ! _ â
llaaghanwha _ yaq ell eng et aq _ itegh ma lghii _ .

taagken _ tengagergete _ ilagagh naqe ma lghii _ .
unug yagu _ nanigh _ awite ma kanga _ .
taagken _ tengagergete _ ilagagh ma lghii _ .
tughneghagh- ni _ qagi t _ tuqlugh ma kangi _ .

aagra at _ megh ughte ghllag ma lghii _ .

tagi yalghiimi _ aglu kek _ mengqughtagh ma lghiik _ .

kumaghsagh lghii meng _ yaq ell eng et aq _ qavagh aqe uq _ , _ nanugh m _ negh mangite ma kanga _ .

vuvalla a _ A y apegh yug em
vuvalla m _ s an q ut angi _ sivuligh _ qaligh k _ , _ signegh t _ , _ qaltaghwaagh k _ , _ aghqe sigh ghhagh k _ tughneghagh nun _ , _ saguyagh k _ , _ tagnegh lghii _ nanigh ghhagh _ ku mang alghii _ .
vuvalla m _ yug a _ un ang ul uku _ pi nga yu mi _ kellaag gni _ nekegte aqe aat _ vuvalla _ .
taaqe nghmegteggu _ vuvalla m _ yug a _ aane aqe uq _ esla mun _ .
Kiyagh t all egh mun _ kelgute aqe uq _ mumegh meng _ tugumiigh iigh luni _ nalighmeng _ aquutagh meng _ .
aragh aqe uq _ , _ â _ W u - h uu - h uu - h uu - u u _ , _ w u - h uu - h uu - h uu - u u _ , _ w u - h uu - u u _ , _ w u - h uu - u u _ ! _ â
taagken _ vuvalla m _ yug a _ ategh aqe uq _ nategh mun _ .
nuliigh ni _ pi aqe a _ , _ â _ enta _ saguyagh gka _ tagivagh kek _ ! _ â
nulighh an _ tuune aqe ak _ .
K aag tu u sim ag ken ka _ uzive aqe uq _ ilagagh aqe uq _ uzive te kete luku _ .
ilagagh nghmeng _ taaqe nghmini _ mekelghiigh ghhagh t _ pi aqe ai _ , _ â _ qaagna _ nanevgagh _ ungipaate qugh teggu _ .
legan _ whaten _ pi nakesi _ , _ â _ W u - w uu - u - h uu - u u _ , _ w u - w u - u - h uu - u u _ , _ neghsagh yagh i uute usi _ , _ pugnegh yagh i uute usi _ , _ iqallug yagh i uute usi _ , _ tengug yagh i uute usi _ , _ aku tagh yagh ii tu si _ .
A y apegh y uk _ v u v all aaq _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ mekelghiigh ghhagh t _ avii yaghtugh aqe ut _ mengteghagh nun _ tam aghh anun _ nanevgagh at _ aghnalqwaagh t _ .
aapte aqe ait _ , _ â _ navek _ ? _ â
pi aqe ut _ , _ â _ A y apegh yug mun _ ! _ â
nanevgagh at _ aglagh uute aqe ut _ v u v all alghii nun _ negh na luteng _ qetustaaghhagh meng _ .
tawani _ ungipamsug te aqe ut _ ungipaghagh te aqe ut _ kay al q ii r aagh utaq ut _ saama _ ilagagh te aqe ut _ v u v all am al uki _ alla nun _ neqe meng _ s an q ut aagh meng _ tuune i naagh nghite ngugh t _ .
aghtaghagh nghagu _ nanevgagh at _ aanleghaate aqe ut _ aghnalqwaagh t _ unegte aqe ut _ .
V u v all alghiit _ ateghaate aqe ut _ nategh mun _ aghnalqwaagh t llu _ iiwen _ kinku t _ tawavek _ ila tke aat _ .
ilate naqe negh meggni _ mengteghagh meggneng _ tugutagh ke ut _ tawaqa meng _ alla ghhagh inagh meng _ neqe meng _ ivalu meng _ inqun _ v u v all alghiit _ mengteghagh it _ qilleghte vike na luki _ .
U n ang ul uku _ ungipaghagh te aqe ut _ ungipamsug te aqe ut _ ilagagh te aqe ut _ negh te aqe ut _ si q in ghem _ piite llegh anun _ kenle anun _ .
siqinegh _ piite nghaani _ nanevgagh at _ aanleghaate aqe ut _ aghnalqwaagh t _ unegte aqe ut _ .
nategh mun _ ateghaate aqe ut _ aghnalqwaagh t llu _ v u v all alghii t lu _ .
ateghaate negh meggni _ quy ng ii r aat eng _ tugulagh aqe ait _ alla ghhagh inagh meng _ neqe meng _ ikute uute aqe ut _ .
esla mun _ aane aqe negh meggni _ quy ng ii r aat eng _ ll iv i ku gh aq iit _ .
aanleghaate luteng _ milugh qutagh aqe ut _ tughneghagh nun _ kiyagh taa llegh mun _ megh m _ yug anun _ .
T aq negh meg g ni _ it egh aat aq ut _ .
I tegh all uteng _ aghnalqwaagh t _ uyegte aqe ai _ ataasigh m _ aghnalqwaagh m _ .
taaqe nghatki _ v u v all al ek n ul iigh min un _ saguyagh gni _ tungsigh aqe ak _ .
nulighh an _ saguyagh k _ tuune aqe ak _ .
vuvalla legte aq _ uzive aqe uq _ .
iiwen _ vuvalla yaghtuqagh t _ iiwen _ avaquti a _ .
ellnga _ vuvalla legte aq _ s ag uy ag tu um agh mi _ uzive aqe uq _ .
N an ev g aam _ ilagagh te aqe a _ utuqa meng _ ilagagh ta meng _ .
vuvalla legte aq _ avii aqe uq _ , _ â _ W u h uu u u _ , _ w u h uu u u _ , _ w u h uu u u _ ! _ â
ilagaate _ naa ng en gh ani _ uzive lghiit _ aghuliigh aqe ut _ .
aghuliigh nghata _ vuvalla legtagh m _ kallagte te aqe ai _ .
aghnagh t _ putuugh te aqe ut _ iiwen _ kitum _ ata a _ naten _ pi aqa _ yug a _ .
taana _ aghulasigh ke aqe aat _ .
qamagte uq _ .
tungtu ghllag _ enkaam _ K av eng en gh aghh aq
iimnanguq _ , _ tungtu ghllag _ esnagh mun _ piyaa ma lghii _ .
esghagh ma kanga _ kayengenghaghhagh _ .
K ay eng en gh aghh aam agh iv am akanga _ , _ â _ tungtu _ paagna _ aqsa allugh _ , _ tungtu _ paagna _ sighunegh allugh _ , _ ighu kek _ am es t aghh aa k _ , _ talligh kek _ am es t aghh aa k _ . _ â
tungtu ghllag m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ K ay eng en gh aghh aa y _ , _ kay eng en gh aagh h aa y _ ukapighqaagh i _ !
whanga _ nagaqugh nghite unga _ . _ â
K ay eng egh aghh aq _ ukapighqaagh ma lghii _ .
tungtu ghllag m _ ipug aghte ma kanga _ sighunegh mineng _ enkaam _ eg llegh sim akanga _ esnagh mun _ .
kayengenghaghhagh _ aragh ma lghii _ , _ â _ uvinke a _ tukrug a _ , _ papasqugh ka _ tukrug a _ , _ qanegh ka _ tukrug a _ , _ metengtagh nka _ tukrugtagh i _ ! _ â
itagnatun _ tungtu ghllag m _ kayengenghaghhagh _ megh mun _ ateghte ma kanga _ .
K ay eng en gh aghh aam _ tungtu ghllag _ aghiva laatagh aa _ , _ â _ tungtu _ paagna _ aqsa allugh _ , _ tungtu _ paagna _ sighunegh allugh _ , _ ighu kek _ am es t aghh aa k _ , _ talligh kek _ am es t aghh aa k _ . _ â
tungtu ghllag m _ pilate- aghagh a _ , _ â _ K ay eng en gh aghh aa y _ , _ kay eng en gh aagh h aa y _ ukapighqaagh i _ !
whanga _ nagaqugh nghite unga _ . _ â
K ay eng egh aghh aq _ ukapighqaagh ma lghii _ .
tungtu ghllag m _ ipug aghte ma kanga _ sighunegh mineng _ enkaam _ eg llegh sim akanga _ esnagh mun _ .
kayengenghaghhagh _ aragh laatagh ma lghii _ , _ â _ uvinke a _ tukrug a _ , _ papasqugh ka _ tukrug a _ qanegh ka _ tukrug a _ , _ metengtagh nka _ tukrugtagh i _ ! _ â
tuquma lghii _ tu k r uugh q w aa yaq en ni _ .
T uk r uugh q _ w aa y an _ tungtu ghllag m _ negh ma kanga _ .
tungtu ghllag _ pi ma lghii _ , _ â _ kayengenghaghhagh _ taana _ neq n i r k a pig g aq _ . _ â
qamagte uq _ .
tefaay _ .
nuna meng _ uzive ikagh _ paallghu nkuk _ ama _ Q et ng all egh y an kuk
iimnanguq _ , _ kiyaghte ma uq _ kumag _ umiileg _ qam ar il ak ay uk _ .
ilangani _ kiig m _ kumag m _ nunalgute ni _ pi ma kangi _ paallghu nkut _ , _ q et ng all egh y an kut _ apayepayiigh nkut _ ama _ melngu nkut _ .
pi ma kangi _ , _ â _ Q am ar il an aq unga _ !
Q em g ugh u tek _ ! _ â
llaaghanwha _ aglagh uute ma lghiit _ kumag m _ mengteghagh an _ saaghw anun _ .
taagken _ qamarila m _ ayaviigh a _ kingutagh leg _ napaghte ma kanga _ .
kumag m _ pi ma kangi _ , _ â _ elpek tek _ q et ng all egh yaq lu _ paallghu llu _ nuna _ uzive teggu _ .
elpek tek _ melngu llu _ apayepayiigh llu _ naayghagh _ uzive teggu _ ! _ â
llaaghanwha _ aga _ k il g aq uu sim alghii k _ q et ng all egh y an kuk _ paallghu nkuk _ .
pengughqagh meng _ talughte yamek _ meghnaali ma lghiik _ .
meghnaali yamek _ taana _ pengughqagh _ uzive luku _ tagi ma lghiik _ .
legan _ kaate yamek _ aneghte ma lghiik _ pekagh nigh ke utek _ .
apayepayiigh nkuk _ melngu nkuk _ uzive ma kangat _ naayghagh _ .
qesiqun _ paallghu nkuk _ q et ng all egh y an kuk _ uy gh al qu sigh h aq _ uzive ma kangat _ .
ama _ apayepayiigh nkuk _ melngu nkuk _ uzive ma kangat _ uyghag ghrukutaaghllag _ .
llaaghanwha _ kumag m _ paallghu _ tuune ma kanga _ avaqutagh mi _ atkug aneng _ qatelghii meng _ , _ enraq _ q et ng all egh y aq _ tuune ma kanga _ ayaviigh meng _ .
apayepayiigh _ tuune ma kanga _ negaghpag meng _ enraq _ melngu _ aghyuugh ma kanga _ sumeghnegh ke luku _ .
ellnga _ kumag _ aklungi msuggagh igh te ma lghii _ .
qamagte uq _ .
tungtu _ A q anga
iimnanguq _ , _ kiyaghte ma uq _ aghnaanegh _ tungtu _ .
maaten _ ilangani _ ighni naqe ma lghii _ .
ighni naqe ma luku _ amaa ghllag k _ maalghug _ kaate ma lghiik _ .
amaa ghllag m _ aag llegh an _ alegh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ yeqay _ una _ tuqute lteggu _ ! _ â
legan _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ wiin _ ighni aghte li _ ! _ â
llaaghanwha _ ighni ma lghii _ .
ighni yan _ aghnagh _ taana _ tungtu _ tuqute luku _ negh ma kangat _ qamagte luku _ .
qamagte yatgu _ aag llegh an _ alegh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ yeqay _ una _ taghnughhagh a _ tuqute luku _ negh lteggu _ ! _ â
aag llegh an _ alegh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ wiin _ wetku _ angli kan _ negh nak ef ut _ .
salin _ maaten _ kemgite uq _ . _ â
A t im af taa t _ A q ang ameng _ .
taagken _ aga _ tungtuqu yagh ma lghiik _ amaa k _ taake uk _ .
aga _ talugh qaghte yaag a _ A q ang ang iigh h aq _ nekeve luni _ tan- a _ naayghagh _ mayugh ma kanga _ pegnem _ .
qaygeghte yamigu _ ukig luni _ inglu anun _ mayugh ma lghii _ .
tawaten _ aghn el qu si q _ ulape ma lghii _ .
nasiqute luku _ tagi yaghqaaghte negh an _ ne mineng _ aglagh luni _ unglegh ma lghii _ .
iiwenllu _ p al aghh agh meng _ k iy aq aat ang aa _ tag im al gh h k _ amaa k _ taake uk _ .
tawani _ kiyaghte ma lghiik _ .
aghneqwaaqun _ aghul aq en gh egk en i _ ulape aqe lghii _ .
tawaten _ kiyaghte ma lghiik _ amaa k _ ama _ taana llu _ tungtu _ tawaten _ kiyaghte ma lghii _ .
qenwat _ angli ghllag ma lghii _ .
aag llegh an _ amaa m _ alegh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ yeqay _ una _ tuqute luku _ negh lteggu _ ! _ â
aag llegh an _ angegh ma kanga _ .
I w em g a _ A q ang am _ pi ma kangi _ , _ â _ egyug usi _ .
wiin _ whanga llu _ nanghiiqu aghte ngnga _ kay aal q ii r aagh meng _ . _ â
taagken _ A q ang ay eng _ amaa k _ malighqughtagh ma ka ak _ .
sivuke luni _ A q anga _ temngi _ nal um si meng _ qimag ma lghii _ .
qaygeghte yami _ ukig luni _ naayghagh m _ inglu anun _ tawaten _ qimag ma lghii _ .
amaa k _ malighqugh nghmeng _ pekagh ghllag lutek _ aghuliigh te ma kangat _ .
ila a _ amu a _ pi ma lghii _ , _ â _ T aam eng wh a _ A q anga _ qugili igate uq _ ! _ â
taagken _ ila yan _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ tawa _ ellnga _ alla _ kitum _ qinuyugte naanghite a _ ! _ â
A q anga _ tawani _ kiyaghte ma lghii _ .
uksugh mi _ ilangani _ teghigagh _ tam ag ghagh mi _ q em gu umalghii _ A q anga _ naanghagh igh na luku _ .
legan _ kaynge t _ pi aqe yagh kangat _ .
A q ang am _ sighunegh mineng _ egte ma aqe kangi _ .
tamana _ teghigagh _ qamagte luku _ tuqu qu ma kanga _ .
ungleghtagh aqe lghii _ .
legan _ kaynge t _ esghagh luku _ temngi _ quyngigh u ni luku _ taku aqe yagh kangat _ .
liigike nghmegteggu _ negugh aqe kangat _ aleghqugh magh meng _ , _ â _ A q ang ang iigh h aq _ q av agh si ghagh aq elghii _ . _ â
A q anga _ miiwen llu _ qavagh aqe lghii _ .
qamagte uq _ tefaay _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh k _ iike te ma uk
kiyaghte ma uq _ ungazigh mi _ aghnagh _ ugi leg _ enkaam _ taghnughhagh llgagh ak _ .
ilangani _ ugingighagh u ma lghii _ .
sighineg mii m _ yug m _ nulighh ite ngugh m _ nagaqugh luku _ ungazigh mun _ tagi ma lghii _ .
kaa sa mi _ aghnagh _ tugu ma kanga _ .
llaaghanwha _ sighineg mun _ aghvigh te ma kanga _ .
naqam _ taana _ sighineg mii _ yuug _ ak l ung il nguq _ .
kaa sa mi _ taake uk _ mekelghiigh ghhagh k _ ata an _ ighleke aqe kek _ pi aqe kek _ , _ â _ qaagkut _ amyuqetagh ghllag ut _ .
amyuutke lleqe aisi _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ aag negh megteni _ naayghagh nun _ aghulaqe aqe lghiik _ .
tespagani _ ul ap um al gh n k _ inqun _ iknaqughi na lutek _ .
ata ita _ waamte ma kek _ ighnegh gni _ inqun _ iknaqughi sqellug kek _ .
llaaghanwha _ iknaqughi ma lghiik _ saama _ angli ma lghiik _ .
ilangani _ uksugh m _ un ang ul uku _ tungtuqu yagh ma lghiik _ .
tagi yamek _ nagnegh lutek _ esavghagh te lghii nun _ maligte te ma lghiik _ .
tamana _ yuug _ naghughte qugh luku _ aw al igh pig aal u tek _ ketfagh aqe lghiik _ .
llaaghanwha _ ayveghagh lutek _ taglagh aqe lghiik _ .
tamana _ taglagh uute lghii _ naghughte qugh luku _ kaate aqe lghiit _ mengteghagh meggnun _ .
tawaten _ kiyaghte ma lghiit _ uksulqusigh _ .
ilangani _ un ang ul uku _ tungtuqu yagh te ma lghiik _ .
tungtu nge lutek _ atghagh ma lghiik _ aghneghtu ghllag luku _ .
kaate yamek _ tungtu kekagh teng _ lli luki _ nagnegh lutek _ yuug _ tamana _ maligte luku _ esavghagh ma lghiik _ .
naqam _ ata ita _ pi aqe yagh kangit _ inqun _ aw al igh tagh waagh pen ak i _ pi s qell uki _ .
taagken _ aagh tu um alghii k _ t aan Ê¼ g ani _ .
tamana _ ila a _ ayveghagh luni _ qamagte luni _ taglagh uute ma lghii _ .
El ke kay v egh aghn aq um alghii k _ .
qenwat _ i ghi v g aam akanga _ .
llaaghanwha _ ayveghagh ma lghiik _ .
iiwenllu _ y at aghq aq aat _ uyughagh a _ kelute mun _ qiive yalghiimi _ puyugh ghllag u uq _ .
anengagh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ ii-i _ , _ iike te ainkut _ ! _ â
anengagh an _ ayvegh _ pegte luku _ kelute mun _ k il g aq u um alghii k n u ug em _ esne anun _ siku m _ kaa s alghii m ek n u te m _ ameltughqagh u luni _ .
naqam _ iiwleng _ t aan Ê¼ g avek _ siku _ s aag r uk eg t aq _ .
tamana _ s aag r uk eg t aq _ siku _ anuqe mi _ q at egh mi _ legan _ megh m _ teve yaghqaqe a _ .
taagken _ kete mun _ qimag ma lghiik _ megh m _ teve yagu _ siku _ anuqligh ma kanga _ u v l ug ugh sim akanga _ , _ umegnegh ughte ma kanga _ qanigtuumagh mi _ .
kete mun _ qimag ma lghiik _ .
uyavagh ghllag lutek _ siku _ kaate ma kangat _ aange pigte lghii _ .
tawavek _ mayugh lutek _ tespamagun _ laag luku _ kiyaghte ma lghiik _ .
uyughagh n _ pi ma kanga _ anengagh ni _ , _ â _ weni _ tuqusiigh naqngu nghite kumta _ sa naqagh ten _ ! _ â
taagken _ mekelghiigh _ nuyekligh _ tuun agh min eng _ m agh uy igh luki _ ilagagh ma lghii _ .
ilagagh ma luku _ uy uq lii m m ek elghii gh em nag aq um akanga _ uy av agh p aneng _ meteghllug _ qalghigh lghii _ .
mekelghiigh m _ n uy ek lii m _ ilagaate _ qamagte yamigu _ uyughagh ni _ aapte ma kanga _ , _ â _ sa meng _ nagaqugh te aghte nghite ziin _ ? _ â
uyuqligh m _ nagaqugh ghngaaghmigu _ akite ma kanga _ , _ â _ waniwanllu _ nagaqugh te aghte nghite unga _ ! _ â
alla _ nuyekligh _ ilagagh ma lghii _ .
meteghllug _ qalghigh laatagh ma lghii _ uy av agh p aneng _ iwernga _ maateghniineng _ q an tagh an lluni _ .
aapte laatagh ma kanga _ iwernga _ nagaqugh ma lghii _ nagaqugh ghngaaghmigu _ ama _ n uy ek lii m llu _ .
alla _ ilagagh ma lghii _ tuun ag min eng _ saguyagh ke luni _ .
ilagagh ma luku _ alla _ meteghllug _ qalghigh lghii _ nagaqugh ma ka ak _ q an tagh an ll iigh agh luni _ .
ilagaate _ qamagte yamigu _ uyughagh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ nagaqugh nghite zigu _ ? _ â
â _ nagaqugh nghite aqa _ ! _ â
iwerngangam _ nagaqugh ma lghiik _ uyughagh n llu _ ama _ anengagh an llu _ .
alla _ ilagagh ma lghii _ .
qenwat _ qakma _ uq egh h mi _ qalghigh ma lghii _ , _ qu q qu q qu q qu q qu q _ .
anengagh an _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ awi _ , _ whanga inagh u kuma _ pi naanghite unga _ . _ â
uyughagh n _ pi ma kanga _ anengagh ni _ , _ â _ S am eng p iiq a _ ? _ â
â _ pi aqe aaten _ whanga inagh ma _ taglaate na lunga _ . _ â
alla _ qakma _ qalghigh ma lghii _ meteghllug _ , _ qu q qu q qu q qu q qu q _ .
anengagh a _ aleghqugh ma lghii _ , _ â _ A - aa - aa _ , _ nanghiiqu naqe i _ ! _ â
uyughagh n _ aapte ma kanga _ , _ â _ sa meng _ pi aqa _ meteghllug _ ? _ â
â _ whaten _ pi aqe uq _ nanghiiqu na luta _ maalghug u luta _ .
taawanginaq _ uka _ tume mi _ ataasigh _ siku _ uusqagh lghii _ . _ â
anengagh an _ uyughagh ni _ aanesqe ma kanga _ .
aane ma lghiik _ q em g aag m ek _ .
aane lutek _ anengagh an _ uyughagh ni _ n ev egh tes qu m akanga _ .
uyughagh a _ n ev egh sim alghii _ .
N ev egh s an _ aqume ma kanga _ .
aqume luku _ gginagh a _ kenigh mineng _ saape ma kanga _ .
saape yamigu _ ghhatagh ma lghiit _ , _ igleghte ma lghiit _ qu ul v aq un _ .
mulu luteng _ aghuliigh ma lghiit _ .
sivugte yalghiimeng _ siku mi _ aghuliigh ma lghiit _ .
tawani _ meghnaali luteng _ alla _ anengagh an _ uyughagh ni _ n ev egh tes qu m akanga _ .
tawaten _ aqume luku _ anengagh an _ gginagh a _ saape ma kanga _ kenigh mineng _ .
P al aghh agh meng _ aqumga aghte luteng _ ghhatagh laatagh ma lghiit _ igleghte ma lghiit _ .
mulu luteng _ aghuliigh ma lghiit _ .
esghagh yalghiimeng _ meteghllug m _ meghnaali vig mi _ temngi _ naayghagh mi _ alungutellegh mi _ uyghag mi _ .
tawani _ aghuliigh ma lghiit _ .
taawanginaq _ mayughvig ite uq _ .
anengagh an _ ellmi _ tughneghagh- ni _ tuqlugh ma kanga _ am iq l uk _ .
A m iq l uk _ qalghigh ma lghii _ .
anengagh a _ aleghqugh ma lghii _ , _ â _ whanga inagh u kuma _ pi naanghite unga _ ! _ â
uyughagh n _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ sa meng _ pi aqa _ ? _ â
â _ U u m _ pi aqe aanga _ whanga inagh ma _ mayugh te na lunga _ . _ â
â _ wetku qun _ whanga _ sivuke lunga _ mayugh u uute kuminga _ tu ng ang igh h aani _ elpek _ m ay uu ll i ten _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ uyughagh a _ mayugh ma lghii _ tu ng ang igh h aani _ anengagh a _ mayugh ma lghii _ .
mengteghagh mii it _ ilag aan neq eg s aat aq ut _ .
qagugh m _ nunalgute meng _ alignalghii ngiighhagh t _ ilag aq ayug g aat _ ilagagh te aqe ut _ .
ila ita _ pi aqe kangat _ un Ê¼ g a _ tuquma ni luki _ , _ ila ita _ pi aqe kangit _ salin _ unguva tete ni luki _ , _ tamana _ ila a _ ilagagh te aqe uq _ temngi _ .
ellngit _ aglagh ma lghiit _ .
kaate luteng _ iiyagh mun _ mayugh ma lghiit _ , _ nagate ma lghiit _ .
ata at _ kingulighpigagh u luni _ ilagagh ma lghii _ .
S ag aq es tagh ng aagh mi _ aghuliigh qagh luni _ aleghqugh ma lghii _ , _ â _ llangaqa _ whaa _ siku m _ ilu anite lunga _ ilagagh unga _ .
iqlengiqe unga _ weni _ ! _ â
alla _ ilagagh ma lghii _ .
nepiigh qagh luni _ akuzi ma lghii _ , _ â _ ilagagh ma lunga _ siku m _ ilu ani _ meteghllug m _ qalghigh llegh a _ nagaqugh aqa _ ! _ â
ilagagh aqe lghii _ .
nepiigh qagh luni _ akuzi laatagh uq _ , _ â _ ilagagh kestagh ghngaaghma _ nepiigh lunga _ meteghllug m _ pi unga _ , _ ellmi _ ghhatagh te na lunga _ , _ aygugh mun _ aghulaqe unga _ .
igleghte unga _ siku kun _ aghuliigh lunga _ meghnaali lunga _ .
meghnaali nghmeng _ taaqe yama _ aghulaqe laatagh unga _ .
igleghte unga _ .
aghuliigh unga _ ingani _ meteghllug m _ meghnaali vig ani _ .
weni _ iqlengiqe unga _ . _ â
mekelghiigh k _ nagate ma lghiik _ iiyagh kun _ qineghte lutek _ .
qama _ ilagagh ma lghii _ .
ilagagh aqe luni _ nepiigh aqe luni _ aleghqugh ma lghii _ , _ â _ taagken _ meghnaali lunga _ mayugh unga _ .
mayugh lunga _ tagi nga _ .
kaate yama _ iiyagh mun _ mayugh unga _ ! _ â
nepiigh ma lghii _ ilagagh nghmeng _ nukalpigagh at _ pi ma kangit _ , _ â _ enta _ qakmavek _ iiyagh mun _ esghagh yaghtuqagh tek _ . _ â
nukalpigagh at _ aane yalghiimeng _ avangite ut _ .
itegh luteng _ ungipaate ma kangat _ .
qayughllak _ mayugh naqe yata _ awatmun _ ull ghii tam aat _ .
uteghte luteng _ aglagh ma lghiit _ nenglu m _ saaghw anun _ .
ata at _ ellmi neng _ aane ma lghii _ .
aane luni _ esghagh ma kangi _ .
esghagh yamiki _ itegh sqe ma kangi _ .
itegh ma lghiit _ .
quyake ma kangit _ .
ata ita _ pi ma kegket _ , _ â _ sa lusi mi _ ullegh stek _ ? _ â
akite ma kangat _ , _ â _ taanegken _ ima _ t ak agh pag ll el gu f tuq _ .
Y u llegh pag mun _ taaggun _ taglagh ukut _ . _ â
ata ita _ akite ma kangit _ , _ â _ anighta qun _ t ak aghn all gh ag u usi _ ! _ â
uyuqligh m _ akite ma kanga _ , _ â _ anighta qun _ elpek _ iye ghllag u uten _ ! _ â
Taa m _ kenlanga neng _ awavagh ghllag nanigh ma lghiik _ .
qamagte uq _ .
tefaay _ .
A y mang aa w en
kiyaghte ma ut _ esnagh mii t _ taawanginaq _ quyilleg t _ maalghug _ nulighh ghqu te lghiik _ maalghug _ avaqutagh gket _ mekelghiigh k _ .
A llgh a _ mekelghiigh m _ nuyekligh _ , _ aag llegh a _ uyuqligh _ .
taawanginaq _ ata an _ taana _ nuyekligh _ amyuutke aqe kanga _ .
ilangani _ maaten _ quyngighqwaagh luni _ quyngigh _ uzimun _ kilgaaqu ma kanga _ .
llaaghanwha _ sukaghi ma lghii _ saama _ iknaqughi ma lghii _ .
atghagh luni _ itegh ma lghii _ naqam _ qavagh igate ngughk _ .
repall _ ata an _ q av agh te si g al k anga _ saama _ negh e si g al k anga _ .
nutaan _ negh naqe yagh uq _ ighlegute a _ .
ighlegute yatni _ ingaghte luni _ qavaa ma lghii _ .
ata an _ qavagh lghii _ esghagh luku _ aki n _ iptag aghte ma kanga _ .
mekelghiigh _ upugh te kete luku _ makete qaghte yalghiimi _ aki n _ ay em ll uku _ .
ata a _ sumeghtaghagh ma lghii _ , _ â _ una _ mekelghiigh _ qavngaq _ iknaqughi a _ ? _ â
ata an _ pi ma kanga _ nuliigh ni _ , _ â _ pilugugkagh meng _ ulima te gu _ taawanginaq _ pinigh pigte lghii meng _ ! _ â
llaaghanwha _ ulima te ma kanga _ .
ata an _ ighnegh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ aga _ , _ naalkesaghtugh ghhu _ pinighqe aq _ A y mang aa w en _ .
A y mang aa w e te m _ sakimag anun _ sukate luten _ qavagh yagh a _ .
tawaten _ aghulaqe lghaaten _ ! _ â
apaate ma kanga _ tume kaghqagh meng _ .
unaami _ unaangu luku _ mekelghiigh _ ghhatagh ma lghii _ .
qemi meng _ teve yalghiimi _ esghagh ai _ pilugug t _ seghlegh pestaagh t _ .
aate ma kangi _ mekelghiigh m _ taagken _ igleghte ma lghii _ .
qemi meng _ teve yalghiimi _ esghagh ai _ mengteghagh t _ .
U q egh h mi _ nanevgagh _ qayugtugh aqe uq _ .
amenam _ mekelghiigh _ igleghte uq _ naaghte ghllag aqe luni _ .
N an ev g aam _ nenglagh qu ma kanga _ .
kaate yan _ aapte a _ , _ â _ S aam _ yug ke aten _ ? _ â
akite ma kanga _ mekelghiigh m _ , _ â _ esnagh m _ y uk anga _ ! _ â
aapte laatagh aa _ nan ev g aam _ , _ â _ N a tu m _ esnagh m _ ? _ â
â _ M aa kun mi _ naa y v aagh aam _ esne i _ ategh kaqe ai _ tea- ma kut _ esnagh t _ .

â _ nagaqugh unga _ . _ â
nanevgagh _ sumeghtaghagh ma lghii _ , _ â _ I - i - i _ , _ esnagh m _ esnagh m _ esnagh m _ ! _ â

â _ aa-a _ , _ naqam _ itegh langa _ ! _ â
pegnem _ itegh uq _ .
N an ev g aam _ nuliigh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ gaagh te gu _ quyngigh meng _ una _ esnagh m _ yug a _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ gaagh te luku _ quyngigh t _ ugute ma kangi _ .
negh te ma lghiit _ .
taaqe luteng _ itegh sqe ma yagh kanga _ aagra mun _ .
I gh s aam alghii _ nategh mi _ qavaa ma lghii _ .
unaami _ unaangu luku _ aghulaqe ma lghii _ .

talughte yami _ k il g aa qu meng _ aghulaqe ma lghii _ .
qemi mun _ kaate laatagh uq _ .
kaate luni _ teve laatagh uq _ .
atghagh uq _ mengteghagh nun _ .
esghagh aa _ nanevgagh _ qayugtugh lghii _ .
N an ev g aam _ esghagh gpenaan _ avelghaqiinagh ma kanga _ .
sumeghtaghagh ma lghii _ tughneghaan- i luku _ .

â _ naqam _ itegh i _ , _ negh yagh a _ . _ â
mekelghiigh _ igh s aam alghii _ in q un am en _ kangsugh na yu ka mi _ .
tawatete ghngaan _ itegh sqe ma kanga _ .
llaaghanwha _ kangsugh ghngaaghmi _ itegh ma lghii _ .
negh ma lghii _ nategh mi _ .
taaqe luni _ nan ev g aam _ itegh sqe ma yagh kanga _ inglegh mun _ .
mekelghiigh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ itagnagh unga _ whani _ qavagh lleqe unga _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ qavaa ma lghii _ .
unaami _ aghulaqe ma lghii _ .
uusneghwaagh mun _ mayugh ma lghii _ naaghte aqe luni _ .
nanevgagh _ nulighh ghqu te lghiik _ neng l aan neq eg s aam alghii k _ .
mekelghiigh _ uusneghwaagh mun _ talughte yami _ k il g aa qu meng _ aghulaqe ma lghii _ .

taagken _ uusneghwaagh meng _ atghagh ma lghii _ naaghte aqe luni _ .
llaaghanwha _ nanevgagh _ enngaatall _ nenglagh ma lghii _ .
kaate yan _ nan ev g aam _ aapte laatagh aa _ , _ â _ S aam y uk aten _ ? _ â

â _ naten _ esnagh m _ ? _ â

elpetun _ pinightu te kau nghite uq _ ! _ â
â _ aa-a _ , _ itagnagh unga _ ! _ â

negh yagh a _ . _ â
mekelghiigh _ itegh ma lghii _ am ik naa f q ev z igh luku _ .

mekelghiigh _ negh ma lghii _ .
taaqe luni _ itegherki nghmeng _ tawani _ ing agh t aagh umalghii _ .
wetku _ unug yagu _ qavaa ma lghii _ .

teve yami _ piyug meng _ atghagh ma lghii _ naaghte aqe luni _ kayaate naqe pigte luni _ .

mekelghiigh _ itegh naqe yalghiimi _ kangsugh uq _ .

negh ma luku _ aapte ma kanga _ nan ev g aam _ , _ â _ navek _ iglegh taa z i n _ ? _ â
â _ nunivag mete ngughk _ paamna _ A y mang aa w en _ tugu yaghtugh aqe aqa _ . _ â
â _ upupeng _ n ep iigh el ten _ .
K ay ngu sagh all equ ten _ !
iitek llu _ ungipaate naqe amken _ .
Wh ak en wh aa _ ghhatagh kuvek _ mengteghagh t _ ataasigh t _ kaate lleqe aten _ .
mengteghagh neng _ taagken _ alla _ igleghtekuvek _ kaate lleqe aten _ taawa _ A y mang aa w en kut _ .
taawa _ qamagte uq _ .
nagaqugh ziin _ ? _ â
â _ nagaqugh unga _ ! _ â
taaqe luteng _ negh nghmeng _ ing agh t aagh umalghii _ mekelghiigh _ .
unug yagu _ qavaa ma lghii _ .
unaami _ aghte yagu _ aghulaqe laatagh ma lghii _ .
nenglagh qu ma kangat _ sukangite ni luku _ .
talughte yami _ k il g aa qu meng _ aghulaqe ma lghii _ .
allameng _ uusnegh u aq _ kaate laatagh aa _ .
kaa sa mi _ uusneghwaagh mun _ piyug meng _ igleghte ma lghii _ .
uusnegh u aq _ teve luku _ atghii yami _ sukangite sighwaagh ma lghii _ .

kaate yan _ aapte ma kanga _ , _ â _ S aam _ yug ke aten _ ? _ â

â _ naqam _ itegh i _ .
negh yagh a _ ! _ â
mekelghiigh _ itegh ma lghii _ .
negh ma lghii _ .
taaqe luni _ qavaa ma lghii _ .
unaami _ unaangu luku _ aghulaqe ma lghii _ .
sivuke luni _ pi y u wh agh meng _ aghulaqe ma lghii _ .
wetku _ talughte yami _ uusneghwaagh meng _ kilgaaqu ma lghii _ .
alla _ esghagh laatagh aa _ uusnegh u aq _ aku g aagh n ii neng _ aa ng legh ii _ .
tawavek _ uusneghwaagh m _ qaye anun _ mayugh yalghiimi _ saama _ esghagh ai _ m aal gh uk m eng tegh aa k _ .
ketligh _ aange lghii _ .
K el ut ang an il nguq _ mengteghagh _ mekestaaghhagh _ .
uyavagh ni _ esghagh aa _ quyngigh _ uglagh pigte lghii _ .
quyngigh m _ u v it ang ani _ yugyag ghllag _ .
tamana _ yuug _ A y mang aa w em _ ugi ke aqe a _ .
iwernga _ qavagh igate ngugh t _ ellnga ni _ .
M eng tegh aam _ taa m _ u uq gh aani _ nanevgagh _ esghagh aa _ qayugtagh u lghii _ .
mekelghiigh _ atghagh ma lghii _ naaghte aqe luni _ .
iwernga _ iqlengiqe aqe lghii _ .
taagken _ uusneghwaagh meng _ ukig ma lghii _ .
kaate luni _ aange lghii kun _ mengteghagh nun _ uqegh itni _ aghuliigh ma lghii _ .
N an ev g aam _ avelghaqiinagh ma kanga _ qayughllak _ tughneghaan- i luku _ .
naqam _ atkug a _ aange pigte lghii _ .
nanevgagh _ tunute nghaani _ maligte aqe kanga _ .
qenwat _ nan ev g aam _ aghuliigh te luku _ aapte ma kanga _ , _ â _ S aam _ yug ke aten _ ? _ â
â _ esnagh m _ y uk anga _ ! _ â
â _ navek _ iglegh taa z i n _ ? _ â
â _ A y mang aa w en _ apegh aqe kangat _ .
tugu yaghtugh aqe aqa _ . _ â
sunanguq _ nanevgagh _ taana _ agigte luni _ mekestaaghhagh mun _ mengteghagh mun _ aleghqugh a _ , _ â _ Q am a y _ nengagh u aq _ tawa _ ! _ â
sunanguq _ taana _ aghnagh aq _ qineghte a _ .
ineqsunagh pigte lghii _ pinigh pigte lghii _ .
pi ma kanga _ aghnaghagh m _ , _ â _ ugi ke naanghite aqa _ .
seghlegh pestaagh u uq _ . _ â
aghnagh aq _ uteghte pagte ma lghii _ .
â _ iitek llu _ kuuve i ste u luten _ ! _ â
mekelghiigh _ aglagh ma lghii _ mengteghagh mun _ .
itegh yalghiimi _ esghagh ai _ yugyag ghllaget _ .
qesiqun _ A y mang aa w em _ ugi ke aqe ai _ .
aghnaghagh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ itegh i _ qullug k _ kuuve yaghtugh kek _ ! _ â
mekelghiigh _ itegh luni _ taake uk _ tugu ma kek _ .
tugu lukek _ ugate mii ii aghte ma lghii _ pegnem _ ullegh aghte vzigh aqe luni _ .
maaten _ alla _ amllugh naqe yalghiimi _ kuuve ma kek _ taagavek _ ug at ang an il ngugh nun _ sanqute nun _ .
allameng _ ig l eq agh luni _ inglu anun _ enraq _ kuuve ma kanga _ .
amig mun _ amllugh luni _ aan aq s al ghi mi _ manughagh kun _ qamagte lukek _ kuuve ma kek _ .
A y mang aa w en _ t ap ghagh meng _ es leg alghii meng _ tugu tete luni _ k ag s ag pag at aam akanga _ mekelghiigh _ .
mekelghiigh _ aqnigh nghite uq _ qayughllak _ atkug a _ umu pigte lghii _ .
I ghi v g agh y ag u _ it egh aa tut _ .
negh luteng _ qavaa te ma lghiit _ .
ellnga _ mekelghiigh _ nategh mi _ qavaa ma lghii _ .
unaami _ yuug _ tamana _ kilgaaqu na luni _ an qagh taa sim alghii _ mekelghiigh _ taana _ tu t qagh taq luku _ .
mekelghiigh m _ aki naqe ma kangi _ nagh ugh h naq en gh ata _ ighu mineng _ itegmig qagh nghminiki _ nagh tegh llag aq elghii t _ .
yuug _ tamana _ kilgaaqu te ma lghii _ A y mang aa w en llu _ maligte te luni _ yuug _ taana llu _ mekelghiigh _ .
ghhatagh ma lghiit _ mekelghiigh _ taana _ sivuke luni _ pi yug g agh meng _ .
yug m _ tam a tu m _ nenglagh qu magh an _ naghughte aqe kanga _ .
mekelghiigh _ uusneghwaagh mun _ talughte yami _ pilugug ni _ mat- aghte luki _ kilgaate qugh ma lghii _ qevuute luni _ .
tamana _ y u uk nagh ugh qu um akanga _ .
taana _ naayghagh _ uzive luku _ tagi ma lghii _ .
tagimun _ esghagh ma kanga _ aghnagh aq _ .
aghnaghagh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ aagyuq _ utaqa nga _ ! _ â
mekelghiigh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ utaqa naanghite amken _ ! _ â
mekelghiigh m _ avelghagh luku _ kaate ma lghii _ .
aghnaghagh m _ kaate luni _ tugu luku _ itghute ma kanga _ .
llaaghanwha _ tugu ma kanga _ .
yuug _ tamana _ aglagh uute ma lghii _ ellmeng _ mengteghagh meggnun _ .
tawani _ kiyaghte ma lghii _ mekelghiigh _ .
maaten _ ilangani _ ata an _ aghn agh aam pim akanga _ , _ â _ siingenllu _ aghnagh _ afta kayugu uq _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ mengteghagh meng _ aveg te luteng _ aglagh ma lghiit _ mekelghiigh m _ nuna anun _ .
kaate luteng _ mekelghiigh m _ ata an _ mengteghagh an _ k el ut ang anun _ mengteghagh u ma lghiit _ .
M ek legh iigh em _ naange a _ aane ma lghii _ .
aane luni _ kelute mun _ esghagh yalghiimi _ esghagh ai _ mengteghagh t _ , _ mengteghagh m _ saaghw ani _ quyngigh t _ .
aghnagh _ quyngigh neng _ alinge luni _ itegh ma lghii _ .
Agh n am ug in i _ ungipaate ma kanga _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh _ aane luni _ taku ma kangi _ .
kaate luni _ itegh ma lghii _ .
aghnaghagh m _ ugi minun _ apegh ma kanga _ , _ â _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ sama _ tagi uq _ ! _ â
ugi an _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ negh sqe gu _ ! _ â
aghnaghagh m _ nuug luni _ negh sqesagh aa _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh m _ aghnagh aq _ esghagh luku _ ullegh aghte ma lghii _ .
aghnaghagh m _ itegh luni _ ungipaate ma kanga _ mekelghiigh _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh _ taana _ unaangu luku _ aghnegh m _ qukaa nun _ tuquma lghii _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh _ wetku _ aghnegh m _ qukaa ni _ unguvagh ma lghii _ .
makete luni _ aat gh aam alghii _ .
kaate yan _ ata an _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ sangavek _ muluugh ziin _ ? _ â
mekelghiigh ghhagh m _ akite ma kanga _ , _ â _ qayughllak _ aghnagh aq _ ineqsunagh pigte uq _ .
enkaam _ whanga _ tazingani _ tuquma yagh unga _ . _ â
ata an _ akite ma kanga _ , _ â _ enta _ whanga _ tuqu yagh langa _ ! _ â
ata a _ aane luni _ taglagh ma lghii _ .
kaate luni _ itegh ma lghii _ .
itegh luni _ meghsi ngllagh ma lghii _ , _ â _ Q am a y _ , _ meghsi aghte ngnga _ . _ â
aghnaghagh m _ meghute _ imigh luku _ talligh ghhagh inagh mineng _ tuune ma kanga _ .
yug m _ pateg ma kanga _ meghute _ .
aghnaghagh m _ itagnatun _ imigh ma kanga _ .
naqam _ aghnagh aq _ sungaghaghqwaa luni _ nuug luni _ tuune ma kanga _ .
yug m _ esghagh luku _ aghnagh aq _ tuquma lghii _ .
wetku _ unug yan _ unguvagh luni _ atghagh ma lghii _ .
qavagh luni _ unaami _ yug m _ m ek egh iigh h aq _ kevgaagh qu ma kanga _ mekelghiigh meng _ an kun ameng _ ( _ 1 _ ) _ mughute lgute u luku _ .
mekelghiigh _ angegh ma lghii _ .
llaaghanwha _ ata ni _ mughute lghii _ maligte ma kanga _ .
unaangu ma lghiit _ .
ata an _ aghillug ni _ inglupigagh _ megh mun _ egte ma kanga _ aksaqe luni _ .
ata a _ pi ma lghii _ , _ â _ uuk _ aghillug ka _ megh mun _ at qagh tuq _ . _ â
mekelghiigh m _ akite ma kanga _ , _ â _ sa u luku _ enan _ alla neng _ aghillug igh ghhaaten _ ! _ â
wanlegi _ ata an _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ qayughllak _ nuliigh ma _ ukini kaqe a _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ mekelghiigh _ qukagh mikun _ qaamqaghte luni _ ugmestaaghhagh mun _ siku mun _ ategh uq _ aq f agh ii q _ aghillug meng _ .
whaa _ aga _ ategh yan _ tapghagh a _ nengpagte yagh kete ni _ megh mun _ at qagh tes luku _ ata an _ sayug luku _ siku meng _ maligte ma kanga _ .
maligte luku _ kaape ma kanga _ tuqute luku _ .
tuqute yamigu _ mengteghagh nun _ taglagh ma lghii _ .
( _ 1 _ ) _ ruuseghmii t _ mumigte llegh ani _ q em g agh m e ngu un iit _ ;
U u z ag em _ pi llgh ani _ atg- ke te nagh u na ai _ , _ atg- qu uute yu i aaghek nguq _ q al ii r aagh es tun _ ayuqe lghiik _ .
kaa lli mi _ itegh ma lghii _ .
A y mang aa w en _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ ugi n _ tuquma uq _ qayughllak _ ighleke ghngaamni _ aghillug ka _ aq f aam aa _ .
W as iin mi _ whanga _ ugi ke lleqe kevnga _ . _ â
aghnaghagh m _ nanigh t _ q aam ll uki _ ilagagh ma lghii _ .
yuug _ masisu _ itegh ma lghii _ .
itegh yan _ aghnaghagh m _ esghapag ma kanga _ .
yuug _ qulligeg ii ma lghii _ .
qulligeg iigh luni _ uka _ ellnga nun _ tagi ma lghii _ aleghqugh ma lghii _ , _ â _ ugi n _ elpek _ tuquma uq _ , _ qayughllak _ ig l ek egh ng aam ni _ naa minun _ aghillug _ ulima aqe ni luku _ .
aqfa naqe yagh kete ni _ kaleve uq _ .
W as iin mi _ whanga _ ugi ke lleqe kevnga _ . _ â
aghnaghagh m _ nanigh t _ q aam ll uki _ ilag aagh naq um al uku _ yug m _ taa m _ akughtugh magh an _ qinunaghqe magh mi _ taku ma kanga _ ellnga _ .
aghnagh aq _ ilag aagh y alghii mi _ yuug _ taana _ qavaa ma lghii _ .
qayughllak _ aghnagh aq _ nunanigh ghllag uq _ ilagagh kau luni _ .

aghnagh aq _ atghaghatagh luni _ .

qiighw ma lghii _ .

qayuutagh m _ kayusigh iqe a _ aghnagh
I in mang uq _ kiyaghte ma uq _ yuug _ nula i kek _ avaqutaghtuqagh _ .
uksugh nghagu _ yuug _ mughunniigh aqe lghii _ .

uksugh yagu _ amalleqa _ unange nghmeng _ aghtugh ma lghii _ .
H ang ani _ negh kangit _ palaghhagh ughte yata _ nuliigh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ whaa _ pirughte yaghtugh naqe unga _ amavek _ q an tagh an l eng ugh nun _ quyilleg nun _ ! _ â
aghnagh m _ angegh ma kanga _ .
llaaghanwha _ qamiye gneng _ qamugh luni _ aghulaqe ma lghii _ .

aghnagh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ U taq iig i _ , _ tuune aqe amken _ . _ â
aghnagh _ at qagh lluni _ uughqa nun _ si n um un _ ivagh i luni _ t ig uy ng a 1 _ tugu luku _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ enngaatall _ elpek _ sumeghnegh gpetun _ sa luki mi _ anigu _ q aan gh an it egh ng aan _ nusug ragh aqe zigu _ ? _ â
itegh ma lghii _ .
saama _ tughneghagh _ tu ng sigh waagh aq uq _ avaquti a _ negh na luki _ .
tiguynge _ aanqute yalghiimi _ ilagaate meng _ imani _ nunanigh ghllag uq _ .
llaaghanwha _ qavaa ma lghii _ tughneghagh _ .
tamaani _ ilagagh ma lghii _ i w em g aq un _ ilagaate i _ qamagte ma kangi _ .
qamagte yamiki _ tughneghagh _ taghtugh ma lghii _ .
taghtugh luni _ tu ng sigh waagh umalghii _ .
Agh n am pim akanga _ , _ â _ U taq iig i _ tuune aqe amken _ . _ â
A t qagh lluni _ aywaa nun _ si n um un _ ivgagh i luni _ tugu luki _ neqe mun _ igu qugh sigh _ quyngigh m _ k el p anga _ napaghte ma kanga _ .
aleghqugh magh an _ , _ â _ enngaatall _ elpek _ sumeghnegh gpetun _ sa luki mi _ ug uq n am _ il ung an il nguut _ nusug ragh aqe ziki _ ? _ â
mulu luni _ taama _ ilagagh ma lghii _ .
tughneghagh _ nunaki luni _ qavaa ma lghii _ .
ilagagh ma luku _ unaghsigh _ anegh igh uute ma kanga _ .
A n igh q w aam alghii _ iiwenllu _ nepiigh aqe uq _ tughneghagh _ taghtugh ma lghii _ .
taghtugh nghmini _ tu ng sigh waagh aq elghii _ t aghn ugh h am eng negh nal uni _ .
nuug luni _ anighqute ni _ tugu luku _ napaghte ma kanga _ .
anighqute ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ anighqute mi _ whani _ sumeghnegh gpegun _ sa luki mi _ sa u aat _ gaagh aqe ziki _ ku k il am agh ng ata _ . _ â
anighqute _ ilagagh yalghiimi _ imani _ wata _ nunanigh ghllag uq _ .
talwa _ tughneghagh _ qavaa ma lghii _ umu luku _ .
aghnagh _ at qagh lluni _ vegaagh t _ uygu qu tete luki _ tughneghagh _ amig mun _ qepute ma kanga _ .
anighqute _ naange yalghiimi _ taghtugh ma lghii _ .
taghtugh luni _ qaprag naqe yalghiimi _ aghtugh ma lghii _ .
aghnagh _ tughneghagh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ iteme te nga _ !
pi naanghite amken _ ! _ â
aghnagh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ iteme te naanghite amken _ .
ugi ka _ utaqa naqe aqa _ tuqu tes qell u ten _ . _ â
whaken _ tuune aqe amken _ . _ â
â _ enta _ esghaqagh lakun _ ! _ â
tughneghagh m _ kelgute ma kanga _ qayuutagh ni _ saama _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ enngaatall _ aghtugh sigh ke nghite na yaqen _ sa u a _ neghyuke gkan _ tugu na yaqen _ . _ â
â _ enta _ esghapag laken _ .
piigh ten _ . _ â
T ugh negh aam pim akanga _ , _ â _ taawanginaq _ quunpeng _ aaghte luku _ kiyagh t aagh utaq igu _ saama _ whaten _ pi yaghqaa uten _ . _ â
legan _ mat- ketu te kete luku _ qayuutagh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ qayuutagh mi _ uumi _ quyngigh yug unga _ ! _ â
uqigtughte te ma lghii _ , _ lli yagh kete ni _ quyngigh _ .
â _ tawa _ tawaten _ pi aqe i _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ iteme te ma kanga _ .
aghulaqe ma lghii _ .
aghnagh _ sumeghtaghagh ma lghii _ , _ â _ A gu m _ waamte aanga _ ! _ â
qayuutagh ni _ nusug ma kanga _ .
nusug luku _ qayuutagh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ qayuutagh mi _ uumi _ tughneghagh _ aagna _ esghagh yug aqa _ ! _ â
uqigtughte te ma lghii _ .
tughneghagh _ utegh te sim akanga _ .
tughneghagh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ whanga mnun _ pi u luku _ tuune mangite aqa _ ! _ â
aane luni _ aghulaqe ma lghii _ .
aghnagh m _ megh mun _ nengug te luku _ qayuutagh ni _ pi ma lghii _ , _ â _ qayuutagh mi _ uumi _ neghsagh yug unga _ ! _ â
uqigtughte te ma lghii _ .
ukigsagh kete ni _ neghsagh meng _ .
allameng _ pi laatagh ma lghii _ , _ â _ qayuutagh mi _ uumi _ maklag yug unga _ ! _ â
uqigtughte te ma lghii _ .
U g ig saq en ni _ , _ maklag meng _ .
afta luku _ si n um un _ lli ma kanga _ .
unaami _ aghte yagu _ yuggagh _ quyngigh meng _ qamiye gni _ usi l uk ek _ tagi ma lghii _ mengteghagh minun _ .
kaate luni _ itegh ma lghii _ .
pi ma kanga _ nuliigh ni _ , _ â _ kayusigh qagh nga _ ! _ â
aghnagh _ aatqaghte luni _ kayusi ma kanga _ .
taaqe yamigu _ aghnagh _ si n um un _ ivgagh luni _ si q l ug igh umalghii _ ku y ag agh meng _ .
yuggagh m _ nuliigh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ naqam _ sa meng _ siqlug igh aqe ziin _ , _ avangite aqe luta _ . _ â
â _ K ak ak ak ak a _ , _ n ep iigh el ten _ ! _ â
yuggagh _ itegh ma lghii _ .
itegh yan _ uy uq l igh pig aam _ igh egh an _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ aghnagh _ sama _ qay u ut agh al gu uq _ . _ â
yuug _ legan _ uq eng agh yug sim alghii _ yuuke ma lghii _ quya ma lghii _ .
aghnagh m _ itegh yami _ ungipaate ma kanga _ .
yug m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ enta _ manguna yug qu a _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ aghnagh m _ qayuutagh ni _ nengug te luku _ megh m _ tu ng ang anun _ aleghqugh ma lghii _ , _ â _ qayuutagh mi _ uumi _ manguna yug unga _ ! _ â
uqigtughte te ma lghii _ .
ukigsagh kete ni _ manguna lgu uq _ .
ugi an _ pi laatagh ma kanga _ , _ â _ Agh v egh yug ig ate pig si n _ . _ â
aghnagh m _ megh mun _ qayuutagh ni _ nengug te luku _ aleghqugh ma lghii _ , _ â _ qayuutagh mi _ uumi _ mangtag yug unga _ ! _ â
katag te ma kangi _ mangtag ghllag _ .
taagken _ tawani _ pinitun _ kiyaghte ma lghiit _ .
qamagte uq _ .
tefaay _ .
Y ugh q ut aam _ ighnegh a _ kiighwyagh ughtekagh
kiyaghte ma a _ nalighmeng _ kiyaghte ma ita _ , _ maalghug _ nulighh ghqu te lghiik _ yug k _ avaqutagh ite ngugh k _ .
ilangani _ yuug _ k i w at meg g nun _ pi ma luku _ esghagh ma kanga _ aghnagh _ ighni naqe lghii _ .
ighni yalghiimi _ mekelghiigh meng _ qesiqun _ tuute ma kanga _ yughqutagh _ pi na aqa _ .
taana _ taghnughhagh _ angli ma lghii _ atghagh te yagh kete ni _ .
taagken _ kiyaghnegh mun _ mayugh ma lghii _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ pi ma kanga _ nuliigh ni _ , _ â _ S aam _ una _ pi kagu _ ? _ â
â _ una mi _ y ugh q ut aam _ igh n iigh a _ . _ â
Kiyaghnegh em pim akanga _ taghnughhagh _ , _ â _ aa _ ingavek _ aglagh a _ kiighwyagh nun _ . _ â
taghnughhagh _ aglagh yalghiimi _ kiighwyagh ughte ma lghii _ .
qamagte uq _ . _ tefaay _ .
kiighwyagh
iimnanguq _ yuug _ nuliigh leg _ avaqutagh ite ngughk _ salin _ .
mughunniigh aqe lghii _ naq am un ang aq elghii _ .
ilangani _ maaten _ mughute luni _ aghtugh ma lghii _ .
qenwat _ unug ma kanga _ .
qule mun _ esghagh yalghiimi _ kiighwyagh _ esghagh ma kanga _ .
esghagh yagh kete ni _ kiighwyagh neng _ mengteghagh ite nigh m _ aga _ ifkagh uq _ key- nghhagh _ .
legan _ nekeve luni _ taglagh ma lghii _ .
kaate luni _ it egh y al gh n mi _ nulighh a _ aqsanguma lghii _ .
negh te luteng _ qavaa ma lghiit _ .
unaami _ yuug _ mughute ma lghii _ .
unange luni _ neghsagh meng _ tagi yalghiimi _ nulighh a _ ighni i ma lghii _ mekelghiigh meng _ .
ugi an _ aghnagh m _ atigh ma kanga _ , _ kiighwyagh meng _ .
qavagh ghhagh inagh kun _ angli ma lghii _ .
aghnagh aq _ aqsa nge laatagh ma lghii _ .
ighni yalghiimi _ aghnaghagh meng _ .
taagken _ kenlanga _ alla _ aghnagh _ aqsa nge nanigh ma lghii _ taaqe ma lghii _ .
tawani _ nunugh a mi _ kiyaghte ma lghiit _ .
qenwat _ aghnagh aq _ angli ghllag ma lghii _ ama _ mekelghiigh llu _ taana _ .
maaten _ ilangani _ ata at _ mughute luni _ iike te ma kanga _ .
ima _ tuquma lghii _ .
N aa ng a tug im in eng nag aq uu lluni _ tuqute ma lghii _ ellmi neng _ .
mekelghiigh m _ nayag ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ ata nka _ naa nka _ tuqu laghate te ut _ .
sumeghtaghagh aqe uten _ entaqun _ temngi _ nuna mete ni luki _ .
whaa _ uu m _ kenle aneng _ aqnigh gpenani _ tuqukagh _ kaape luni _ kanagh luni _ meghqe te luni _ taana _ kiighwyagh mun _ mayugh aqe uq _ .
aga _ ata put _ naa put _ may- ma ut _ . _ â
mekelghiigh _ unug yagu _ aane luni _ tapghagh _ qule mun _ miluute yagh kete ni _ kiighwyagh kun _ ag aam alghii _ .
taaggun _ tapghagh qun _ mayugh ma lghii _ .
kaa sa mi _ aghq ut aa ll ghii nun 1 _ ilate ma lghii _ repall _ tegh ig n iq em _ puygu luku _ nayag ni _ .
qesiqun _ uksugh qugh aqe uq _ .
tea- ma kut _ kiighwyagh t _ taana _ mekelghiigh _ um iil g ugh te simak angat _ .
qesiqun _ aane yan _ mengteghagh mineng _ salin _ nuna mete luku _ yug t _ ila ita _ qemite ma ut _ .
llaaghanwha _ mayugh ma lghii _ .
ama _ yuug _ kaapekagh _ , _ qemitekagh _ , _ suflugagh ke aq _ sangami _ tuqu rakegte aqa _ ?
Q ay ugh llag Ê¼ qun _ kiighwyagh ni _ aghqe taute lghii ni _ tegh ig n iq em _ puygu aqe lghiit _ yug t _ unguva lleghqagh teng _ .
qamagte uq _ .
tefaay _ .
neghsagh m _ vuvalla a
iimnanguq _ kiyaghte ma uq _ yuug _ nuliigh leg _ saama _ nunalgutetuqagh t _ .
naqam _ mughunniigh aqe lghii _ taana _ yuug _ unaaqute nghagu _ unange gpenani _ .
talwa _ ataasigh ghhagh meng _ aku r aa si g al nguq _ .
ila i _ unange uute aqe lghiit _ .
ila ngam _ yuug _ taana _ mughute ma lghii _ .
mughute luni _ anglu _ kaate ma kanga _ .
kaate luku _ saaghw akun _ aqume ma lghii _ .
Taw an sim al uku _ neghsagh _ nuug ma lghii _ .
nuug luni _ y u uk pim akanga _ , _ â _ R am k el as a p _ ! _ â _ legan _ taaqe luni _ mughyug aghte ma lghii _ .
Y u uk taana _ sumeghtaghagh ma lghii _ , _ â _ sa meng _ aagna _ pi a _ ? _ â
taagken _ yug m _ ke ng ag ni _ tenglug lukek _ k ak egh qugh y ami _ itegagh mi _ asi i _ kanuughqe ma kangi _ .
sumeghtaghagh ma lghii _ nuliigh ni _ w aam n nal uku _ .
llaaghanwha _ taglagh yami _ nuliigh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ unange ma yagh unga _ ima _ sefkagh te ma uq _ . _ â
L l aagh n aw h a _ nulighh an _ ugpeqe ma kanga _ ugi ni _ .
taagken _ qavaa ma lghiik _ .
unaami _ un ang u pig ll uku _ taghtugh luni _ negh luni _ mughute ma lghii _ .
mughute yalghiimi _ anglu _ kaate ma kanga _ .
kaate yamigu _ saaghw akun _ aqume ma lghii _ .
mulu luni _ neghsagh _ nuug ma lghii _ .
yug m _ pi yagh kete ni _ , _ ighivgaghniimna u uq _ .
neghsagh m _ taa m _ pil at aam akanga _ , _ â _ R am k el as a p _ ! _ â
aga _ mughyug aghte ma lghii _ .
taagken _ yuug _ nekeve luni _ maligte te ma lghii _ neghsagh mun _ .
megh mun _ ategh yalghiimi _ tegh h anun _ pesugh yug qagh nghite uq _ .
masisu _ esghagh ma kanga _ aga _ yuggagh _ talligh leg llu _ ighu leg llu _ takestaaghhagh meng _ naqam _ yugusigh a _ aange pigte lghii _ .
qesiqun _ neghsagh u uq _ .
yug m _ taana _ yuggagh _ malig simak ang an eng l um un _ .
itegh yan _ iteghvig anun _ qineghte yalghiimi _ esghagh ma kanga _ yug m _ taa m _ neghsagh t _ v u v all alghiit _ .
tesqamaken _ neghsagh t _ nanevgagh ita _ yuug _ taana _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ itegh i _ esghapag yagh a _ ! _ â
llaaghanwha _ yuug _ itegh ma lghii _ .
itegh luni _ esghapag ma kangi _ .
N an ev g aam _ neghsagh m _ nuliigh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ saguyagh gka _ tagivagh kek _ !
ilagagh naqe unga _ . _ â
nulighh an _ saguyagh k _ tugu lukek _ tuune ma kek _ ugi minun _ .
ugi an _ tugu lukek _ ilagagh ma lghii _ , _ â _ Q ul igh h am taa nguq _ p aa aa - aam kut _ , _ qu l igh h aam taa nguq _ p aa aa - aam ut _ , _ I y ng igh h ap ut _ mesiighpag llaagllug qu ai _ neqniqe aqe ait _ ! _ â
qalghigh ma lghii _ , _ â _ Q ag is av is av is av ii _ , _ q ag is av is av is av ii _ ! _ â
taagken _ nanevgagh at _ neghsagh t _ aghnaghagh t _ pi ma kangi _ , _ â _ aghnaghagh t _ p u tugh u tek _ ! _ â
llaaghanwha _ nanevgagh _ neghsagh _ aanqute ma lghii _ , _ â _ I quy el q ut aa _ iy aa aa _ , _ qaghpa lug ke a _ iyaa- a _ , _ m an uq ell egh aaq aa _ iyaa- a _ ! _ â
tawa _ vuvalla _ qamagte ma lghii _ .
N an ev g aam _ pi ma kanga _ nuliigh ni _ , _ â _ una _ yuug _ elqwaagh meng _ tuune gu _ . _ â
nulighh an _ yuug _ elqwaagh meng _ tuune ma kanga _ .
N an ev g aam _ neghsagh m _ yuug _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ qaa _ ug g naq eg ku v ek _ quunqagh magh gpek _ qesigh u qagh magh gpek _ uugte lghaaten _ .
ima _ naten _ pi naagh ut _ elqwaagh t _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ yuug _ aane luni _ mayugh ma lghii _ .
U g g naq s ami _ quunqagh magh mi _ uugte ma lghii _ saama _ elqwaagh t _ lli ma kangi _ .
esghagh ma kangi _ neghsagh lghute t _ .
yug m _ nuliigh ni _ ungipaate luku _ angaghqugh ma kangit _ qamagte luki _ .
taawa _ taa m _ kenle aneng _ yuug _ taana _ un ang y u ghi gh llag umalghii _ .
qamagte uq _ .
meteghllug _ nulighhtuqagh _ ayuqligh t _ aghnagh itneng
iimnanguq _ , _ kiyaghte ma ut _ tallimat _ mengteghagh t _ .
taakut _ mengteghagh t _ yug i _ anglegute ke te lghiit _ .
naqam _ k el ul igh negh h it ni _ kiyaghte lghiik _ meteghllug nkuk _ nenge yu qutagh lghiik _ .
ilangani _ n uy ek lii m p an ig a _ meghtagh ma lghii _ .
imigh i ma luku _ meteghllug _ kaate ma lghii _ .
M e tegh ll ug em pim akanga _ , _ â _ M eq p ak p ay a y _ , _ m eq p ak p ay a y _ ! _ â
llaaghanwha _ aghnaghagh m _ meghsi ma kanga _ .
meteghllug _ megh naqe yalghiimi _ megh _ nuna mun _ kuuve ma kanga _ .
Agh nagh aam pim akanga _ , _ pateg magh an _ , _ â _ saa _ una _ megh _ im igh ut aa _ pi q pig ut aa _ . _ â
meteghllug m _ akite ma kanga _ , _ â _ P iy aq taq pe ngu y o y _ , _ pi yaq te l q en _ taana _ m iq iit ig u u _ ! _ â
aghnaghagh m _ akite ma kanga _ , _ â _ M iq in ing il ak _ , _ t as k w igu _ . _ â
aghnagh aq _ atghagh ma lghii _ ama _ meteghllug _ ellmeggnun _ taglagh ma lghii _ .
meteghllug _ kaate luni _ nengyugh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ ukaagh nge uten _ ukaagh n _ aqfaqugh ghhu _ . _ â
aghnalqwaagh ghhagh _ aane luni _ mengteghagh nun _ siv ul igh pig agh nun _ kaate luni _ itegh ma lghii _ .
itegh yan _ aapte ma kangat _ , _ â _ sa aqe ziin _ ? _ â
aghnalqwaagh m _ akite ma kanga _ , _ â _ eltughagh ma _ ukaagh nge ni lunga _ pi yagh aanga _ . _ â
yug m _ ll il a sim akanga _ ng ep egh akun _ savig meng _ pilag sqellug qu _ .
pilag ma kangat _ .
aglagh ma lghii _ .

akite ma kangat _ , _ â _ U q uk lu ku ugh aq uq _ , _ an aq l uk ag uq _ m e ke si tagh ag uq _ . _ â
saama _ savig meng _ n ep egh h ak ek _ pilag ma gkek _ , _ saama _ ketngig kek _ pilag ma kegket _ .
qiya magh mi _ aghnalqwaagh _ taglagh ma lghii _ .
qenwat _ aghnalqwaagh ghhagh m _ q eng ak ek p uu v um ak ek _ .

qavaa ma lghiik _ .
unaami _ taghtugh ma lghiit _ taa m _ nuna m _ yug i _ .

ighsa ma lghii _ .

llaaghanwha _ atghagh ma lghii _ .
kaate luni _ amig meng _ uyatu pigte luni _ pi ma kangi _ , _ â _ eltughagh ma _ ukaagh nge ni lunga _ pi yagh aanga _ . _ â
talwa _ akuzi magh mi _ qimag ma lghii _ .
iwernga _ aghnaghagh m _ ata an _ panig ni _ angegh ma kanga _ .
aghnagh aq _ taglagh ma lghii _ .
kaate luni _ itegh yalghiimi _ kagpestaaghhagh u ut _ .
taagken _ aghnagh aq _ qiya ma lghii _ .
A ghagh aq _ qavaa ma lghii _ .
aghnalqwaagh ghhagh m _ aghnagh aq _ qiya lghii _ esghagh luku _ atugh magh mi _ aghula yalghiimi _ mengteghagh ni _ angli te ma kanga _ saama _ iqa nge i tesi ma kanga _ .
taana _ eltugh aa _ yupig ughte ma lghii _ ama _ taana llu _ aghnalqwaagh _ .
aghnagh aq _ unaami _ taghtugh yalghiimi _ imani _ enngaatall _ pinigh pigte ut _ .
taagken _ aghnalqwaagh ghhagh m _ awaligh ta ii sqe ma kanga _ quyngigh meng _ .
llaaghanwha _ aghnagh aq _ awalightugh ma lghii _ .
T u un egh min ik i _ aghnaghagh t _ ila i _ pi aqe lghiit _ , _ â _ ipa _ whanga _ pik sagh aqa _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ aklungi igh i ma lghiit _ saama _ yupig ughte ma lghiit _ .
qamagte uq _ , _ tefaay _ .
naayghagh mi _ kiyaghte aagh _ quurkeli _ meteghllug
iimnanguq _ kiyaghte ma lghii _ tannge t _ umiileg at _ quyngightu pigte lghii _ .
quyngigh a _ uglagh pigte lghii _ .
naqam _ taana _ umiileg _ ighnegh leg _ .
maaten _ ilangani _ umiileg m _ quyngigh a _ aveg luni _ iil aam alghii _ naqam _ umegnegh ughte ma lghii _ qevuute pigte luni _ .
naayghagh mi _ kiyaghte ma lghii _ quurkeli _ ighnegh leg _ maalghug gneng _ , _ nuyekligh _ ighnegh a _ aghnaasigh _ , _ uyughagh a _ itagnagh lghii _ .
maaten _ ilangani _ aane yalghiimi _ nuyekligh _ esghaate ma lghii _ quyngigh meng _ uglagh pigte lghii meng _ .
itegh luni _ ata ni _ quurkeli _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ S aam _ q ak em n a _ quyngigh ke agu _ ? _ â
â _ enta _ amig mun _ aliighte aghte gu _ . _ â
ata ni _ pi yatni _ n uy ek lii m _ igh egh an _ ivgagh te ma kanga _ .
ata an _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ aa _ , _ tannge t _ umiileg ita _ quyngigh ke aat _ . _ â
uyuqligh _ ighnegh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ aa _ , _ naqam _ T eng ag er g e mun _ pi a _ , _ whaten _ pi naken _ , _ â _ s aam nguq _ una _ quyngigh ke agu _ ? _ â
ungipaate kangaten _ ukig ggaaten _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ uyuqligh _ mayugh ma lghii _ mayugh ma lghii _ .
qaygeghte yamigu _ tamana _ m eng tegh aam _ k i w at ang it ni _ negh niigh ma lghii _ .
T eng ag er g em _ panig ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ weni _ esghapag qaghaqe luten _ sa u aat _ tagi yaaghte ut _ . _ â
aghnagh aq _ aane luni _ esghagh ma kanga _ meteghllug _ .
aghnagh aq _ itegh luni _ tengagergete _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ taawanginaq _ inga _ esghagh aqa _ meteghllug _ . _ â
â _ aqfa gu _ tagi li nguq _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ aghnaghagh m _ aqfa ma kanga _ .
kaate luni _ aghnaghagh m _ meteghllug _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ ata ma _ whanga _ agligh sqe aaten _ . _ â
meteghllug m _ qule mun _ esghaqagh luku _ uugte luni _ negh ma lghii _ .
aghnagh aq _ aglagh ma lghii _ .
kaate luni _ itegh luni _ ata ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ A v el gh aq in agh aa nga _ . _ â
ata an _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ K ev g aa ngu kun i nguq _ tagi li _ sukate luni _ ! _ â
aghnaghagh m _ taku luku _ pi ma kanga _ meteghllug _ , _ â _ K ev g aa ngu ku v eg nguq _ aglagh a _ sukate luten _ ! _ â
â _ whaten _ pi gu _ saamna nguq _ s aam _ quyngigh ke agu _ . _ â
aghnagh aq _ aglagh luni _ pi ma kanga _ ata ni _ , _ â _ pi uten _ whaten _ , _ saamna nguq _ s aam _ quyngigh ke agu _ . _ â
ata an _ panig ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ wanlegi _ whaten _ pi gu _ , _ tagi li nguq _ ellmi neng _ . _ â
aghnaghagh m _ aglagh luni _ meteghllug _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ A g l ang uq _ sukate luten _ ! _ â
meteghllug _ aglagh ma lghii _ .
kaate luni _ itegh ma lghii _ .
itegh yan _ kiyaghnegh m _ T eng ag er g em _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ sa u a mi _ pi aqe zigu _ ? _ â
â _ S aam _ saamna _ quyngigh ke agu _ . _ â
T eng ag er g em _ nanigh _ awite luku _ esghagh yalghiimi _ meteghllug _ asitmun _ esghagh ma kangi _ mengteghagh m _ saaghw ani _ quyngigh t _ ama _ tannge t _ .
T eng ag er g em _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ esgha _ taa ku s ta _ tannge t _ taana _ quyngigh ke aat _ . _ â
meteghllug _ negh nghmeng _ taaqe luni _ aane luni _ ukig ma lghii _ .
uugte luni _ ellmegteggun _ , _ pi ma kanga _ ata ni _ , _ â _ whangkuta nge uq _ pikagh ut _ . _ â
ata ita _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ naqam _ tuqutagh igh tek _ ! _ â
uyughagh ke te lghiik _ aane lutek _ tuqutagh igh ma lghiik _ .
tuqute ma kegket _ ang ep aagh r ug llag ek _ .
itghute luki _ negh ma kangat _ .
taaqe yamek _ uyughagh ke te lghiik _ aane ma lghiik _ .
aane lutek _ quyngigh mi _ nayugh i ma lghiik _ .
tannge t _ q em gu um alghiit _ .
Q agh lu ghi m alghiit _ sughug i na luteng _ .
taaqe yameng _ tannge t _ ghhatagh ma lghiit _ .
ivagh i ma lghiit _ .
taawanginaq _ t aan ang in aghh aq _ mayugh igate kangat _ .
umiileg _ mayugh ma lghii _ tume iigh aqe luni _ .
uugte luni _ aglagh ma lghii _ .
umiileg m _ quyngigh t _ esghagh naqe te inagh _ liisuqe ma kangi _ .
esghaate lutek _ mekelghiigh k _ uyughagh ke te lghiik _ ata eng _ pi ma kangat _ , _ â _ aqelqagh _ qakma _ ! _ â
â _ weni _ itegh sqe i uute ggu _ ! _ â
A an y ag Ê¼ ta _ tannge t _ umiileg ita _ aapte ma kangi _ , _ â _ S aam _ una _ quyngigh ke agu _ ? _ â
â _ whangkuta _ ! _ â
alla _ aapte laatagh ma kangi _ , _ â _ waniwanllu _ , _ esghaate aghte aqe i te n _ quyngigh meng _ ? _ â
â _ waniwanllu _ ! _ â
tannge t _ aga _ qiive luteng _ ukig yalghiimeng _ aga _ quyngigh eng _ ukig sigh u ma kangat _ qam ag agh ll uku _ .
taawanginaq _ ellngit a _ quyngigh gket _ siipte ma lghiik _ .
mekelghiigh k _ taake uk _ am ig u ghi m alghii k _ iwernga _ paninang _ ukig te ma kangi _ .
uyuqligh _ itegh aghte luni _ ilagagh ma lghii _ .
qukaghte yamigu _ atghagha aghagh ma lghii _ .
atghagh aatagh luni _ anuqe _ tuqlugh ma kanga _ qanigpagtuumagh mi _ umegneghtuumagh an _ .
tannge t _ naqam _ umegnegh ughte yagu _ quyngigh teng _ sigh un ghi t gun _ qepe ma kangit _ .
mekelghiigh m _ quurkeli m _ ighnegh an _ taana _ quyngigh _ mayugh te ma kanga _ naayghagh m _ nangaghte te llegh anun _ .
U ug g us am igu _ tuqlugh ma kanga _ anuqe _ umegneghtuumagh an _ qanig ite ngughk _ .
anuqligh yagh kete ni _ taana _ nangaghte llegh _ anigu _ suupe ma kanga _ .
tannge t _ umiileg ita _ ilagagh luni _ taana _ naayghagh _ kaa v e sim akanga _ .
kaave yan _ quy n igh t eng _ veghte ma kangat _ .
veghte nghmeng _ taaqe yamigu _ taana _ naayghagh _ naagh llegh u tesi ma kanga _ nekegneghagh tun _ .
ima _ quurkeli nkut _ avangite te ma lghiit _ quyngigh igh te ma lghiit _ .
quurkeli _ ungipaate ma kangat _ , _ â _ quyngigh ut _ aga _ ukig te ma ut _ ! _ â
quurkeli _ nuug luni _ tengagergete _ kiyaghnegh _ tuqlugh ma kanga _ .
ukig ma lghii _ .
quurkeli m _ pi ma ke aanga _ , _ â _ saamkut _ sama _ quyngigh ut _ ellngit a _ pi naqe aat _ .
K ay usi qagh kut _ . _ â
â _ kayusigh naanghite amsi _ .
tawaten _ pi nghite amsi _ elpenun _ quyngigh ke ni luku _ ! _ â
aga _ ima _ mayugh ma lghii _ .
legan _ quurkeli _ pilugug uq _ .
ukig ma lghii _ .
taawa _ yugtu ut _ .
umiileg m _ ll il a simak angat _ piigigh sqellug qu _ .
llaaghanwha _ piigugh kaqe ma kangat _ iwernga _ tuqute gpenaan _ .
legan _ taaqe yatni _ taghnughhagh _ qavagh lghii _ puvug yagh kete ni _ tuqute luku _ .
umiileg m _ esghagh luku _ tuqu lghii _ taghnughhagh ni _ quurkeli _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ ilagagh a _ maame ste gu _ . _ â
â _ pi naanghite unga _ . _ â
â _ tuqute i tete nayagh amken _ . _ â
â _ wetku _ quyngigh i _ aveg luku _ tagivagh kufsigu _ taawa _ unguvagh lleqe aqa _ . _ â
pi ma kangat _ , _ â _ yeghrat _ taw aa te si g a tut _ alignagh ghngaaghmeng _ ! _ â
quurkeli _ angegh ma lghii _ .
â _ A aa a _ , _ naqam _ ilagagh langa _ . _ â
ilagagh ma lghii _ .
ilagagh luni _ atghagha aghagh ma lghii _ .
atghagh aatagh luni _ mayugh ma lghii _ .
mayugh luni _ itegh ma lghii _ .
itegh luni _ ighnegh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ sama _ quy ng im at iin kut _ . _ â
aane lutek _ ukig lutek _ es ghagh yaq es eng _ quyngigh _ aveg luni _ ayuqe uq _ palaghhagh _ ila a _ , _ ila a _ uglagh lghii _ .
uyuqligh m _ pi ma kanga _ nuyekligh _ , _ â _ uglagh llegh a _ tugu lteggu _ ! _ â
angegh ma lghii _ .
naqam _ p aghq i te f tut _ .
yug ite uq _ .
legan _ mayugh te ma kangat _ .
mayugh ma luki _ umiileg m _ ighnegh an _ malighqagh ma kangi _ .
meteghllug k _ utaqa ma kangat _ .
kaate yan _ tuqute ma kangat _ .
umiileg m _ esghagh luku _ ighnegh ni _ tuqu lghii _ yug ni _ pi ma kangi _ , _ â _ A ag kuk _ wayagh tekek _ ! _ â
llaaghanwha _ kaate luki _ wayagh luki _ quyngigh teng _ pii g ugh tam ak angat _ tuqute gpenaki _ .
naqam _ anuqligh ma kanga _ umegnegh ughte ma lghii _ qevuute luni _ .
mayugh naqe yalghiimek _ aghtugh ma lghiik _ .
mayugh negh megteni _ , _ nagnegh aqe lghiik _ amavek _ naayghagh m _ awata anun _ mengteghagh eng _ naghughte luku _ .
tawaten _ kiyaghte ma lghiik _ .
ivgagh negh megteni _ nagnegh aqe luteng _ .
I w em g a _ pegnem _ uugte ma lghiik _ .

qamagte uq _ .
tefaay _ !
afsengagh ghhagh
iimnanguq _ , _ afsengagh ghhagh _ meqsaghtugh ma lghii _ naayvagh m _ qukaa nun _ .
megh ma lghii _ anglaagh ghhagh _ ukite luku _ .
megh nghmeng _ taaqe luni _ aqume ma lghii _ anglaagh m _ saaghw ani _ .
meghnaali ma lghii _ tawani _ .
meghnaali ma luku _ papeg a _ kum l a tu sim akanga _ .
ilagagh ma lghii _ in q un am en _ papeg ni _ gh h atagh tes qell uku _ , _ â _ K an ak ii i _ , _ k an ak ii i _ , _ k an ak ii i _ , _ k an ak ii i _ , _ uk ig em _ talate anga _ !
K iy ay u v agh l uk tu ng aa aa _ !
A m iq l uk _ pik r ung aa aa aa _ , _ t ay m an al uk aa _ , _ k al al i kaa aa _ , _ t ay m an al uk aa _ , _ k al al i kaa aa _ . _ â
taaqe ma lghii _ ilagagh nghmeng _ .
sunanguq _ taana _ am iq l ug g aq _ ketfagh aghte a _ .
afsengagh ghhagh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ awite te n _ !
uuynite uten _ ! _ â
A m iq l ug g aq _ aghulaqe ma lghii _ .
allameng _ ilagagh laatagh ma lghii _ , _ â _ K an ak ii i _ , _ k an ak ii i _ , _ k an ak ii i _ , _ k an ak ii i _ , _ uk ig em _ talate anga _ !

sunanguq _ taana _ si k ig g aq _ ketfagh a _ .
afsengagh ghhagh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ awite te n _ !
papegtu uten _ ! _ â
