mayeraaghpag
aghnaghaghhagh t _ tallimat _ aghulaghqugh ma lghiit _ .
mayeraaghpag m _ esghagh luki _ taku ma kangi _ .
kaate luki _ r at am ii r eg nun _ kanaghte uute ma kangi _ .
unaghsigh ghllag mun _ petug ma kangi _ .
taaqe luki _ pi yagh kete ni _ , _ â _ U naq ek aa _ ! _ â
unaghsigh _ t ak l aagh agh sim alghii _ .
unite luku _ aglagh ma lghii _ .
tawaten _ kiyaghte ma luki _ aga _ kaynge ghllag _ naghughte ma lghii _ .
â _ kaynge ghllag _ aagyuq _ ll agh an _ yug g ay eng aal ghii ten _ iteme teqaghti kut _ ! _ â
â _ N egh n ii m s ug um al uta _ yug gpesi _ unake naqe aqe ainkut _ . _ â
â _ sa qrugte aqe uq _ aagna _ ! _ â
aga nguq _ m e tegh ll u r uk _ naghughte ma lghii _ .
â _ M e tegh ll u r uk _ aagyuq _ ll agh an yug g ay eng aal ghii ten _ , _ iteme teqaghti kut _ . _ â
â _ iteme teqaghte naanghite amsi _ .
aantagh ni _ negh n ii m s un em ta _ m il ugh pag aat agh aq agh pesi kut _ . _ â
aga _ kaviigh ghhagh _ naghughte ma lghii _ .
â _ kaviigh ghhagh _ aagyuq _ llaaghan _ yug g ay eng aal ghii ten _ iteme teqaghti kut _ ! _ â
â _ iteme teqaghte na aqe amsi _ . _ â
taku luki _ aapte ma kangi _ , _ â _ naten _ pi aqe isi _ ? _ â
aghnaghaghhagh t _ apeghtugh ma kanga _ , _ â _ pi gu _ uqfig _ , _ un aq ek aa _ ! _ â
kaviigh ghhagh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ U naq ek aa _ ! _ â
unaghsigh igh ghllag _ ag ugh agh sim alghii _ .
iteme te ma kangi _ .
aanleghaate ma lghiit _ .
T all im agh t eng _ tagh s an egh em n g _ aghtugh luku _ aligh ni nguq _ unite ma kangat _ .
taake uk _ r at am ii r ek _ qilevri meng _ kevigh lukek _ qimag te ma lghiit _ .
mayeraaghpag m _ ulaagh ni _ ipegsagh luku _ taku ma kangi _ .
kaate luni _ aligh an _ inglu a _ pilag ma kanga _ .
pagunghagh t _ i f aq uu sim alghiit _ .
â _ I y er u ug et _ , _ iy er u ug et _ ! _ â
inglu a _ pilag yagh kete ni _ aghnaghaghhagh m _ iq el q wa _ kepe qaghte ma kanga _ .
enkaam _ qiya ma lghii _ , _ â _ keka _ keka _ kum aghq ugh tek ell eq agh pe nga _ ! _ â
â _ sangan _ uvegte luten _ ungip an n aagh si nga _ . _ â
aglagh te luku _ itghute ma kanga _ .
â _ A p a y _ , _ aane aghte langa _ . _ â
â _ sa meng qun _ kameg luten _ atkug luten _ ? _ â
â _ kameg ghllag gken _ atkug ghllag n _ aate lukek _ . _ â
A an e sim akanga _ uq egh h mun _ uyatagh igh luku _ .
aane luni _ taw an sim al uku _ yuggagh k _ tapghagh mi _ esghagh ma kek _ .
aghnaghaghhagh _ pi ma lghii _ , _ â _ Yug g ag ka _ al iigh h agh tu k _ aa aa _ tapghagh meng _ aa aa _ aligh kaghte uq _ aa aa _ aag llegh a _ pana leg _ aag llegh a _ pi teg si tal ek _ ! _ â
â _ P an ik ell em aa y _ sa meng _ pi aqe ziin _ ? _ â
â _ aatak _ nagh uy aq ell aan kuk _ m e tegh ll ug ll i qell aan kuk _ pi aqe agka _ ! _ â
taagken _ yug k _ kaate lutek _ i tem ll uku _ qimag te ma kangat _ aghnaghaghhagh _ .
mayeraaghpag m _ tuqlugh ma kanga _ , _ â _ P an ik ell em aa y _ , _ p an ik ell em aa y _ . _ â
qalleg kau mangite uq _ .
aane yalghiimi _ aga _ uyavagh utu te ma kangat _ aghnaghaghhagh _ .
taagken _ malighqagh ma kangi _ .
â _ I i teg Ê¼ qun _ kaate kumsi _ neghe lleqe kemsi _ ! _ â
qimag inagh ma luki _ kaate yaghtu ma kangi _ .
â _ aghnaghaghhagh u aagh mi _ siingenllu _ tugh negh aagh tek alghii ten _ sa naqe i _ ! _ â
uyghag meng _ tugu tete luni _ napaghte yagh kete ni _ naayghagh ghllag _ taaqe a _ aghvigh vig ite ngughk _ ava ite ngughk _ .
pegnem _ mayeraaghpag m _ mayugh luku _ malighqagh takagh nge i _ kaa sagh tugh y at eng _ , _ â _ aghnaghaghhagh _ siingenllu _ tughneghagh ughtekau uten _ , _ sa naqe i _ ! _ â
iqelqugh ghhagh ni _ taw e ke nga _ qiipe ma lghii _ suupe magh an _ nuna _ teregh yagh kete ni _ kiiw ghllag k _ taaqe ma kek _ .
â _ P an ik ell em aa y _ naten _ aghv igh l ag ng ek _ ? _ â
â _ megh lukek _ ! _ â
megh yagh ke gni _ megh yagh ke gni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ iitek _ tawa _ naa ng sagh tugh ag ken _ ! _ â
qamagte lukek _ nekeve ma lghii _ aqsa ghllag ni _ qamugh ke luku _ es l eq em _ ang tal ang aneng _ .
pi ma kanga _ aghnaghaghhagh m _ , _ â _ A p a y _ sangan _ pikavek _ uusneghwaagh m _ qaye anun _ p u tugh y an ghi si n _ ? _ â
mayeraaghpag _ mayugh luni _ nutaan _ talligh gni _ qule mun _ neng ug us agh aa k _ aqsa a _ quupeaghaghte ma uq _ .
quupeaghaghte yalghiimi _ qayungllaasigh _ , _ qay usi q _ , _ signegh u aq _ , _ qaltagh _ legan _ allaghhiinaq _ sanqutraagh _ .
qamagte uq _ .
tallimat _ ngelqagh t
kiyaghte ma lghiik _ yug nkuk _ nulighh ghqu te lghiik _ .
taghnughhagh ite ngugh k _ ava ite ngugh k _ .
ugi a _ quyngigh ni _ esghapag yaghtugh aqe kanga _ .
ilangani _ maaten _ piyaa ma lghii _ quyngigh minun _ .
tallimat _ ngelqagh t _ esghagh ma kangi _ .
taku yagh kete ni _ tenge nghite ut _ .
kaate luki _ tugu luki _ atghagh ma lghii _ .
kaate yan _ nulighh a _ quya ma lghii _ .
itghute ma kangi _ .
ugi a _ esnagh mun _ pi ma lghii _ kingu vzeghagh nun _ iqallugagh nun _ .
llaaghanwha _ taglagh yalghiimi _ s aghn aam alghii _ .
llaaghanwha _ negh te ma lghiit _ ngelqagh t _ .
unaami _ taghtugh luteng _ unite luki _ ngelqagh teng _ aane ma lghiik _ .
nulighh a _ esnagh mun _ pi ma lghii _ kingu vzeghagh nun _ iqallugagh nun _ .
taglagh ma lghii _ .
iiwenllu _ mengteghagh mun _ kaate yaghtugh aqe uq _ atugh ghllag meng _ nagaqugh te ma lghii _ .
â _ P ag ell eg r aa y _ , _ pag ell eg r aa y _ , _ si ng t s er aa y _ , _ n i qu r aa ng aa ng aa aa _ aange a _ iyaa- na nga a _ . _ â
I it q es tagh luni _ iiyagh kun _ qineghte yalghiimi _ mekelghiigh t _ estamat _ atugh aqe ut _ ataasigh _ aghula aqe uq _ amiiragh teng _ mat- aghte luki _ .
I t qagh lluni _ amiiragh itgun _ aqume qaghte ma lghii _ .
P ng igh s ii m ak angi _ .
llaaghanwha _ ugi a _ taaqe ma lghii _ quyngigh mun _ pi nghmeng _ .
taakut _ mekelghiigh t _ ellngit a _ taghnughhagh ke ma kangit _ .
yuggagh _ U n ang y iil nguq _ enkaam _ nanugh
iimnanguq _ yuggagh _ kiyaghte ma lghii _ nunaagh mi _ enngaatall _ unange yiite pigte lghii _ .
ila i _ mughu ta lgu ta i _ unange aqe lghiit _ ellnga _ mughute luni _ taglagh nghmini _ ava ngunani _ .
nulighh a _ qagani _ nunalgute meggnun _ tungsigh niigh aqe lghii _ .
nuna lgu ta ita _ unange kaqe kangat _ neghsagh _ , _ maklag _ , _ ayvegh _ , _ nanugh _ .
ellnga _ yuggagh _ sakenge igate ngughk _ .
maaten _ ilangani _ mughute luteng _ t aan Ê¼ g an ll uki _ anuqligh te ma kangi _ .
mughute aat _ nanughagh luteng _ amiiragh igh qiinagh luku _ an uq lii si s t eng _ taglagh ma lghiit _ .
enraq _ alla _ yuggagh _ unange yu i aatagh lghii _ iike te ma kanga _ .
aghtugh luni _ aghvigh naqe nghmeng _ inglu anun _ tu ng em eg g nun _ ellmeng _ , _ kete mun _ anag ma lghii _ iigh w i llgh aan un _ .
kaa sa mi _ ang al gh un un _ aglagh luni _ tawani _ nenglu ngllagh luni _ itegh ma lghii _ .
tesqamani _ aq um g aam al uku _ nagaqugh te ma lghii _ uka _ al igh umalghii _ ghhuu naqe ghllag _ sa u a _ .
yuggagh _ sumeghtaghagh ma lghii _ , _ â _ uuk _ , _ enraq _ alla _ ifla ma yalghiinga _ .
sa u a _ uukna _ tagi a _ ? _ â
uka nguq _ legan _ pi aqe uq _ , _ â _ G h u ut aa nga _ gh uu te pig taa nga _ ! _ â
iiwen _ yuggagh _ qineghte naqe aqe uq _ suna _ taana _ nanugh ghllag _ amiiragh ite ngughk _ , _ enngaatall _ ghhuu naqe aqe uq _ .
nanugh _ pi ma lghii _ , _ â _ yuggagh _ uyuq _ n av ghi tagh t i nga _ pilugug gpeneng _ ghhuute pigte aanga _ . _ â
yuggagh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ sa meng qun _ n av ghi ll ak en _ ? _ â
â _ E s gh aat aa kuk _ at ku g ken _ â _ â _ U ku uk _ ? _ â
â _ nakaa _ ila a _ ! _ â
â _ U ku uk _ ? _ â
kenigh ma kek _ at ku g g aag ni _ il uk l igh pig aghh aa k _ aligh u aatagh lghiik _ nanugh m _ amiiragh aneng _ ulimaagh k _ .
nanugh m _ aan gh um akanga _ .
yuggagh m _ mat- aghte lukek _ tuune ma kek _ .
nanugh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ tea- ai _ maligte nga _ ! _ â
yuggagh m _ maligte ma kanga _ .
quupute gnun _ kaate lutek _ yuggagh m _ atugh kuvinghagh u kek _ nanugh m _ megh mun _ nepte lukek _ nusug yagh ke gni _ ellngaate meng _ m aa qu mal gh n k _ mesiighllug meng _ nuyiigh llegh _ maligte te luni _ .
nanugh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ qayughllak _ unange aqe i _ nulighh n _ ukini aqe lghii _ ellngagh sigh u magh mi _ nuyiigh magh mi _ llaaghanwha _ ukini uq _ taaqe kanga _ nukeggnagh _ maligte te luku _ . _ â
qafsina neng _ nepte aghte lukek _ ukmangigh u sagte a _ alla _ nepte lukek _ nusug yagh ke gni _ nanugh m _ amiiragh ghllag a _ nusug ma kanga _ .
taagken _ nanugh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ wiin _ mengteghagh mnun _ maligte nga _ !
enan _ taglaate naagh amken _ . _ â
nanugh m _ amu i ragh ghllag _ aate luku _ yuggagh nkuk _ aghulaqe ma lghiik _ .
ketmiighte ma lghiik _ .
quupute t _ kaate nghmegteki _ nanugh m _ yuggagh _ amagh luku _ aghvigh te aqe kanga _ .
iiwen _ m aam leg taq aa _ nanugh m _ ne anun _ kaate ma lghiik _ .
nanugh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ tawa _ kaate ukut _ itegh ghhaaten _ . _ â
itegh lutek _ negh nghmeng _ taaqe lutek _ qavaa ma lghiik _ .
unaami _ qakma _ tenglugtugh ma kangit _ , _ â _ naagu _ qaamna _ ? _ â
â _ taawa _ â _ â _ A aam _ aane lghaaten _ . _ â
â _ qaywa _ aane aqe unga _ . _ â
yuggagh _ nanugh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ enngaatall _ esgha _ q ak mun _ amyuutke aqe kanganga _ aqnigh qugh lunga _ .
maame ste gpenanga _ itagnatun _ aq f aqegk ang anga _ tughumgha lgute u lunga _ . _ â
yuggagh m _ aane aqe yan _ ipegsagh llegh meng _ igagh ma kanga _ qenleghwaagh akun _ .
nanugh _ aane ma lghii _ .
tagi gpenani _ mulu yan _ yuggagh _ agipanegh kun _ qineghte ma lghii _ .
maalghug _ nanugh k _ enngaatall _ tugutagh ke uk _ .
nutem _ aag llegh a _ pekagh ma lghii _ igaqe a _ aqume luni _ lliigh ma lghii _ .
aag llegh an _ p a teg pag atagh aq ef t aa _ .
yuggagh m _ ugh lu f gh ani _ y atagh qell uku _ pitegsagh kete ni _ unake ma kanga _ aag llegh a _ .
nanugh _ pategmig kestagh ghngaaghmi _ u llgh agh sim alghii _ .
ullegh aghte yan _ aag llegh an _ esghapagtugh ma kanga _ .
â _ saa _ una _ ? _ â
esghapagtugh kestagh ghngaaghmigu _ esghagh ma kek _ aaygu m _ tagh r ugh h ak ek _ u un gh aneng _ aliite lutek _ .
aagtuqagh ke uq llu _ kii mineng _ .
yuggagh _ aane luni _ tazingavek _ aglagh ma lghii _ .
kaate yan _ nanugh m _ tukugh an _ aapte ma kanga _ yuggagh _ , _ â _ sa zigu _ ? _ â
â _ sa nghite aqa _ ! _ â
â _ taawa _ amyuqetaghteke _ unake an _ .
whaken _ kenlanga _ pinitun _ kiyaghte yagute naqe unga _ .
maame gkuma _ nun av nun _ aglagh u lleqe amken _ saama _ un ang y u ghi s l eq am ken _ . _ â
nanugh ghllag _ nekeve luni _ pegnem _ aglagh ma lghii _ .
yuggagh m _ maligte ma kanga _ .
itegh yan _ tea- ma kut _ amiiragh an _ makreg aghtagh llegh i _ s aghn aam ak angi _ .
yuggagh m _ m a teg taq luki _ uk in igh tegh um ak angi _ .
apeghiigh yamigu _ aane luni _ yuggagh m _ tuqutekagh ni _ nanugh _ afta ma kanga _ .
negh ka aneng _ neq e kum alghii _ maame neghsigh te kete luku _ tukugh ni _ .
llaaghanwha _ maame yami _ nanugh m _ yuggagh _ taglaate ma kanga _ .
Agh v igh y at _ kaate nghmegteki _ nanugh m _ amagh aqe kanga _ yuggagh _ .
Yug aam _ nuna anun _ qute mun _ kaate yaghtugh yamek _ unug neghsi ma kangat _ .
wetku _ unug yagu _ nanugh m _ yuggagh _ qute mun _ maallgute ma kanga _ .
uugte yan _ yuggagh _ nanugh _ qiive luni _ ketmiighte ma lghii _ .
yuggagh _ mengteghagh minun _ taglagh ma lghii _ .
taagken _ kenlanga _ yuggagh _ un ang y iit ku v in gh aaq _ un ang y ugh q aam akanga _ .
qamagte uq _ .
yuug _ N ap aq ut aghh m ii
yuug _ N ap aq ut aghh m ii _ qayaghtugh ma lghii _ pennagh m _ tu ng ang anun _ .
igleghte te kete luku _ esghagh ma kangi _ angyagh t _ kaalgugh lghiit _ aghvegh meng _ .
kaate luki _ esghaghte yagh ke yagh uq _ .
esghagh nghite aat _ .
yuggagh _ sumeghtaghagh ma lghii _ , _ â _ nagun tuq _ aghvegh eng _ maallgute nagh katgu _ ?
esgha _ maligte yagh kumki _ . _ â
yuggagh m _ kaalgugh lghiit _ kingu itneng _ maligte ma kangi _ .
esnagh mun _ kaate luteng _ yuggagh _ esghapag yalghiimi _ nun aq _ all aq _ nuna ke nghitekagh minun _ tamlag uq _ .
esnagh mun _ uugte luni _ qaya ni _ sayug luku _ esghapag yalghiimi _ atghagh uute lghiit _ yug t _ nutaan _ esghagh ai _ .
aghvegh _ pilag ma kangat _ .
qepghagh lghiit _ aku l ang it ni _ yuug _ esghapag ma lghii _ .
K itu r aag g aam _ kiimsigh iqe igate kau nga _ .
aagute ghngaaghmegteggu _ esghagh igate kangat _ .
aghnagh m _ taghnughhagh leg m _ ugi ni _ tuqlugh luku _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ panig n _ atalughagh u te aghte gu _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ yug m _ p an mi _ atalughagh u uute luku _ atalughagh t _ miluute ma kangi _ nuliigh mi _ manu anun _ .
atalughagh t _ tuute yata _ yug m _ tuute ma kangi _ .
aghnagh m _ ii- ligh u ai _ atalughagh t _ .
ivagh ma kangi _ uvite mini _ .
maaten _ agavek _ sa yan _ is ek i yug es qell uku _ aghnagh _ yug m _ , _ atalughagh t _ tugu luki _ ggatmeghrug anun _ lli yagh ai _ .
aga _ atalughagh t _ amighregagh nun _ kii igh i te ma lghiit _ .
aghnagh _ aragh ma lghii _ agrepeni lug ni _ ggatmeghrug mikun _ .
ugi an _ tagi luni _ qamiye gnegun _ qaake luku _ taglaate ma kanga _ .
kingu itneng _ yuug _ maligte te luni _ taglagh ma lghii _ .
tumangani _ kaate ma kanga _ aghnagh _ qamiye gnegun _ mangtag meng _ usi lug ni _ qamugh meng _ taglagh aqe uq _ .
yug m _ kaate yamigu _ aqume ma lghii _ qamiye gnegun _ .
aghnagh _ igleghte nghmeng _ aghtugh yagute ma lghii _ .
pi uq _ aghnagh _ , _ â _ sa yamek _ qamugh ke agka _ qamiye k _ sang yaghq w aag ak ek _ ?
agnepa _ megh n ugh y ing alghii nga _ . _ â
aghnagh _ aghuliigh luni _ meghnaali ma lghii _ .
yuug _ qamiye gneng _ nekeve luni _ taglagh ma lghii _ .
mengteghagh nun _ kaate luni _ qineghte yalghiimi _ aghnagh _ g aagh aq ef tuq neq meng _ .
taawa _ saaghw ani _ qay ut am _ qaye ani _ ugke t _ ug im negh h at _ .
Y u uk pim alghii _ , _ â _ aghnagh _ uyuq _ ug ke v neng _ tuune aghte nga _ .
igatagh pigte unga _ . _ â
â _ kaay _ ava ii aanga _ , _ â _ aghnagh _ pi ma lghii _ .
U r aam r a _ ugke meng _ tungsigh lghii _ .
yuug _ pi ma lghii _ , _ â _ tawani _ avii i _ ! _ â
Q ay ut ameng _ tugu te ma lghii _ ugke meng _ .
aghnagh _ pi laatagh uq _ , _ â _ K aa aa y _ sulleve na ghhalek _ avii laatagh aanga _ al egh qu pig meng _ !
weni _ ugke ka _ aga _ te nguq _ ima _ aga _ aane uq _ !
K aa aa y _ entaqun _ imgagh unga _ ! _ â
yug m _ ugke _ aane te luku _ uq egh h mi _ negh ma kanga _ .
ugke _ qamagte yamigu _ ila itnun _ mengteghagh nun _ aglagh ma lghii _ .
kaate luni _ aqume ma lghii _ amig m _ iiq ng aa kun _ .
maalghug _ aghnaghagh k _ neqe meng _ ing l ug taa l ghii k _ esnagh meng _ kaate lutek _ mengteghagh mun _ neqe _ it gh u tu t k ell uku _ aghnaghagh k _ kangsugh aatagh ma lghiik _ amig mi _ .
pi ma lghiik _ , _ â _ sangami _ amig ut _ k ag p ell igh agh ta _ ? _ â
yuug _ es ghagh saq negh meng _ mataawi uq _ .
taagken _ mengteghagh neng _ aglagh ma lghii _ aq n igh te l g et _ mengteghagh itnun _ .
kaate luni _ uqegh itni _ nagate ma lghii _ paninang _ aghnagh _ qama _ enngaatall _ ngillegte aqe uq _ .
alignagh lghiit _ qanemsug kayug t _ mataawi te ma kangat _ naallghute nghmeng _ .
qama _ y u uk pim alghii _ , _ â _ enta _ enraq _ iigna _ aqfa aghte gu _ .
En an nguq _ aki ligh nagh aqa _ ellnga n _ nakmikegkagh neng _ . _ â
yuug _ uq egh h mi _ nekevgha lghii _ nagh ugh t am _ kiimsigh qagh igate kanga _ qay ugh llag Ê¼ qun _ esghagh igate kangat _ .
tawani _ uq egh h mi _ ne ke v gh aam al uku _ yug m _ kinguligh u luku _ aqfa stekagh a _ uka _ tagi ma lghii _ .
yuug _ t iig m er aagh meng _ pilugug ke lghii _ kaate yaghtugh te ni _ maligte luku _ yug mun _ uq egh h mi _ nekevgha lghii mun _ ayuqe luni _ tagi ma lghii _ .
kaa sa mi _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ S aam _ yug ke aten _ n aku m i ngu z i n _ sangavek _ itegh igate ziin _ ? _ â
yug m _ akite ma kanga _ , _ â _ aghvegh meng _ kaalgugh lghii tgun _ maligte te lunga _ tagi kau unga _ .
whanga _ N ap aq ut aghh m ii ngu unga _ .
nalluke aqa _ n aan si nga _ .
E s ghagh saq negh meng _ aghtugh unga _ .
esghagh igate aatnga _ .
E ll ng iin aghh agh p ek _ whaa _ es ghagh agh pe nga _ .
aghneq _ esnagh mi _ esghaate lunga _ is ek iy u ku ni _ aghnagh m _ ggatmeghrug anun _ lli ma yagh anka _ atalughagh t _ .
taakut _ esgha _ agrepe siigh ke kangi _ . _ â
â _ tea- ai _ maligte nga _ qamavek _ itegh ltung _ ! _ â
llaaghanwha _ itegh ma lghiik _ .
itegh yan _ y u uk n ut aan _ esghagh ma kangat _ .
yuug _ aqfa stekagh at _ pi ma lghii _ , _ â _ esgha _ taana _ aqelqagh _ maame ste i nghmeng _ aghtugh igate ngughk _ .
wetku _ enraq _ nuna anun _ napaqutagh mun _ aglagh te yaghqaqe gkufsigu _ temeghte negh yaghqagh u uq _ . _ â
aqnigh lghii m _ aghnagh m _ ug in a _ pi ma lghii _ , _ â _ ametall _ ag l aa te p es t aagh lleq agh put _ .
N ul igh q a _ ikfiqe pigte uq _ .
temeghte na qaghte ligu _ . _ â
katam _ t aan ang u f tuq _ aghvengekagh t _ angyaleg at _ .
yuug _ aqelqagh _ aghnagh mun _ aqnigh lghii mun _ aglagh luni _ tunute ste luku _ atalughagh t _ aghneq _ llikagh ni _ agha m _ ggatmeghrug anun _ amighregagh an _ kiigh aneng _ nusug luki _ nanigh m _ manu akun _ lli ma kangi _ .
aghnagh _ ig i ghi y ag umalghii _ .
M eng tegh al eg taa m _ yug m _ aghneq _ at al ugh aq ani _ liisuqe ma kangi _ .
unaami _ yug m _ tukugh an _ yug ni _ kelgugh luki _ angyagh eng _ kete luku _ mangtag meng _ usi luku _ yuug llu _ aqelqagh _ qaake luku _ aglagh te ma kangat _ nuna anun _ qayugh a _ qamugh ke luku _ .
kaat ute te luku _ napaqutagh mun _ yuug _ esnagh mun _ uugte yan _ angyagh eng _ usingigh luku _ kete ma lghiit _ .
yuug _ kelute mun _ esghagh luni _ kete mun _ qiive luni _ angyagh t _ esghagh naqe yagh kete ni _ aviite ut _ .
katam _ mesungesag t _ esghagh ma kangi _ .
qamagte uq _ .
tefaay _ !
meteghllug nkuk _ qatelghii nkuk
kiyaghte ma lghiik _ q em g aag m ek _ meteghllug nkuk _ qatelghii ngiighhagh nkuk _ .
maaten _ ilangani _ igagh te iqe ma lghiik _ .
U n ug mi _ qategh lghii _ aqume luni _ pil ug ug lu m _ aane ma lghii _ .
manaate i _ tugu luki _ managh yagh ma lghii _ .
anglaagh mun _ kaate luni _ manaate i _ ateghte luki _ managh ma lghii _ .
managh ma luku _ manaate i _ sama _ eltugh ghpagte te ma lghiit _ .
qatelghii ngiighhagh m _ amu ma kangi _ manaate i _ .
uka nguq _ qiya lghii _ amu ma kanga _ , _ whaten _ pi magh mi _ , _ â _ E ng aa e nga _ , _ aqsa ka _ s eg g ig u u _ ! _ â
qatelghii ngiighhagh m _ qaygeghte yagh kete ni _ taghnughhagh ghrukutaaghllag _ .
naqam _ aqsa ghllag a _ .
savig ni _ nusug luku _ aqsa a _ segge yagh kete ni _ iqallugagh ghllag _ aq sang an i sim alghii _ .
akmagtagh ni _ tugu luku _ iqallugagh meng _ imigh ma kanga _ es l em k agh agh ll uku _ .
imigh i nghmeng _ apeghiigh yami _ taghnughhagh _ ateghte luku _ megh mun _ manaate i _ imeg luki _ akmag aatagh luni _ tag l aam al gh n _ .
kaate luni _ itegh yami _ meteghllug _ taghsagh luku _ negh ma lghiik _ .
unaami _ aghneghte lutek _ unug luku _ qatelghii ngiighhagh _ qavagh yan _ meteghllug m _ qatelghii ngiighhagh m _ manaate i _ tegleg luki _ aane luni _ managh yagh ma lghii _ .
managh ma luku _ managh ta i _ sama _ eltugh ghpagte te ma lghiit _ .
amu ma kangi _ .
amu ma luki _ uka nguq _ taghnughhagh _ qiya lghii _ nagaqugh ma kanga _ .
meteghllug m _ manaate i _ pegte luki _ qimag ma lghii _ .
ilangani _ qatelghii ngiighhagh _ managh yagh naqe yalghiimi _ managh ta i _ ima _ aviite ut _ .
meteghllug _ aapte yagh kete ni _ k al ef sim an il uki _ pi ma kangi _ .
qatelghii ngiighhagh _ tapghagh mun _ piyaa ma lghii _ .
esghaate ma lghii _ mengteghagh neng _ .
kaate luni _ mengteghagh mun _ , _ mayugh luni _ iiyagh kun _ qineghte yalghiimi _ qama _ quyngigh _ uzive aqe uq _ .
nughagh ghhagh _ qesigh yagh kete ni _ ullegh aghte ma lghii _ .
aghnagh m _ tugu luku _ nughagh ghhagh _ eslate mun _ egte ma kanga _ .
qatelghii ngiighhagh m _ ukig luni _ akmag luku _ aglagh te ma kanga _ .
unaami _ enraq _ meteghllug _ t ap gh am i m _ piyaa ma lghii _ .
mengteghagh meng _ esghaate luni _ aglagh luni _ iiyagh anun _ mayugh luni _ qineghte yalghiimi _ quyngigh _ uzive lghii _ esghagh ma kanga _ .
aange lghii ii ghllag _ qesigh yagh kete ni _ ullegh aghte ma lghii _ .
aghnagh m _ aan e sim akanga _ .
meteghllug _ ukig luni _ mengteghagh meng _ akmag naqe yagh kete ni _ tapghi uute uq _ .
quyngigh m _ q il eg y ing i _ nusug luki _ akmagite ngllagh naqe yagh uq _ enraq _ amawha _ kepe qagh ut _ .
aghtugh luni _ akmag nghmeng _ qineghte luni _ mengteghagh mun _ tungsigh ma yagh lghii _ aghnagh mun _ ak m ag it k agh aghh agh meng _ .
yaghlegi _ aghnagh m _ yaqiiraag ni _ akuqagh lukek _ aane luni _ meteghllug _ an ag ul egh taa m akanga _ pi magh mi _ , _ â _ U um lleq a _ quyngigh ghhagh nka _ tuqu qugh aqe kangi _ . _ â
meteghllug _ ava ngunani _ aglagh ma lghii _ .
qatelghii ngiighhagh m _ pi ma kanga _ meteghllug _ , _ â _ kii _ sa luten _ esnegte iqe ughtagh u ziin _ ? _ â
meteghllug m _ akite ma kanga _ , _ â _ aghnagh mun _ akmagite kaghqagh niigh naqe lunga _ quyngigh ke kaqe a _ tagite na luku _ yaghlegi _ aanqaghte luni _ an ag ul egh t aag aa nga _ . _ â
â _ U u m _ n angll ek is teng iigh h aan ka _ seghleghqe aqe ai _ . _ â
N eq s eng _ naange yan _ qatelghii ngiighhagh _ piyaa ma lghii _ pennagh m _ tu ng ang anun _ .
taagani _ mengteghagh _ kaate luku _ itegh yalghiimi _ yuug _ esghagh ma kanga _ nuliigh leg _ .
nulighh ghqu te lghiik _ am el eng es t aagh h aa k _ .
yug m _ upugha te ma kanga _ , _ â _ uuk _ enankinam _ aqelqagh _ !
nategh mun _ tawavek _ itegh i _ ! _ â
Yug em n ul ii ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ gaagh te gu _ aqelqagh _ q all all u ku negh naq elghii _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ qatelghii ngiighhagh m _ atkug ni _ mat- aghte luku _ itegh ma lghiik _ tukuqe te lghiik _ .
ugke t _ ugute yata _ aghnagh m _ itghute luki _ negh ma lghiit _ .
negh nghmeng _ taaqe yameng _ pi ma lghii _ tukugh _ , _ â _ aane aghte naqe unga _ qakmavek _ .
sukate lunga _ itegh naagh unga _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ aga _ aane ma lghii _ .
maateqwaaqun _ sama _ pi ma lghii _ , _ â _ Q am a y _ aqelqagh _ ukavek _ nuug qu a _ ! _ â
qatelghii ngiighhagh _ nuug yalghiimi _ atkug a _ aate ma kanga _ tukugh an _ .
llangaqa nguq _ atkug a _ un agh s iigh waagh meng _ nuuvekagh _ .
Q ate l ghii ng iigh h aam pim akanga _ , _ â _ U uk pii g lleq an _ !
sangan _ aate zigu _ ?
sagiqe ste pigte an _ !
esleqeaghaghte an _ ! _ â
taakut _ tukugh i _ qatelghii ngiighhagh m _ sikughwaagh u aqe ut _ .
llaaghanwha _ si ku gh w aam _ yuuke magh mi _ atkug a _ aqelqagh m _ mataghte ma kanga _ .
S i ku gh waagh em n ul ii ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ aqelqagh _ aghulaqe naqe gkan _ pirughte i tete naken _ i wer ng am _ kepsugh llegh anun _ . _ â
qavagh luteng _ unaami _ qatelghii ngiighhagh _ aghulaqe naqe yan _ si ku gh w aam _ nulighh an _ pirughte i te ma kanga _ aq el qagh teng neq meng _ i wer ng am ke p s u llgh anun _ .
Q ate l ghii h g iigh h aq _ akmag aatagh luni _ aglagh ma lghii _ .
kaate yan _ mengteghagh mun _ meteghllug m _ ungipaghsugh ma kanga _ , _ â _ K ii - i _ , _ naken _ pim gh qugh t a z i n _ ? _ â
â _ aagken _ pennagh m _ tu ng ang aneng _ . _ â
unaami _ meteghllug _ piyaa ma lghii _ taagavek _ .
mengteghagh _ kaate luku _ itegh yalghiimi _ yuug _ esghagh aa _ nuliigh leg _ am el eng es t aagh h aa k _ .
qesiqun _ kaate aqe uq _ si ku gh w aan ku nun _ .
S i ku gh w aam _ tukugh an _ upugha te ma kanga _ itegh sqe magh an _ ilu anun _ .
asanut _ atkug ni _ unite luku _ nategh mi _ , _ nuliigh ni _ g aagh es qu m aan _ .
ugke t _ ugute yata _ negh ma lghiit _ .
taaqe luteng _ sikughwaagh _ aane ma lghii _ .
maateqwaaqun _ meteghllug m _ atkug a _ aate luku _ sama _ pi ma lghii _ , _ â _ Q am a y _ aqelqagh _ uk av ek n u uk aa _ ! _ â
M e tegh ll uk n u ug umalghii _ .
esghagh luku _ sikughwaagh _ neng l aghq w aam alghii _ , _ â _ H a h a h a _ , _ llangaqa _ el pe k k an aq ar uk _ ! _ â
S i ku gh w aam _ aqelqagh mi _ atkug a _ mat- aghte luku _ nuliigh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ taana _ aqelqagh _ aane ste gu _ !
aglagh li _ !
pirughte i te aghte gpenaan _ pi naken _ ! _ â
llaaghanwha _ aghnagh m _ meteghllug _ aan e sim akanga _ .
aglagh ma lghii _ ava ngunani _ pi r ugh t ang un ani _ .
taagken _ kenlanga _ qatelghii m _ unite ma kanga _ meteghllug _ alla _ kiyaghte lgutesaghqagh u gpenaan _ .
qamagte uq _ .
egeghagh mii
yuug _ egeghagh mii _ nukaghagh leg _ .
nuliigh pig a _ avaqutagh ite ngughk _ nukaghagh a _ maalghug neng _ mekelghiigh staghhiinagh neng _ avaqutagh leg _ .
nukaghagh a _ taana _ A ng e te qugh h m ii _ .
angyaghtugh aqe lghii _ yuug _ nuliigh pig ni _ kelqellug qu _ .
yuug _ angyagh nghmini _ aghvenge aqe lghii _ .
aghvenge nghmini _ nukaghagh ni _ miite i stekaqe kanga _ .
aghvenge nghmini _ ataasigh t _ pilagkagh t _ tuune aqe kangi _ negh yaghqaa luki _ n uk agh agh min un _ .
elkek _ nuliigh pig ke te lghiik _ negh aqe lghiik _ quyngigh meng _ .
maaten _ ilangani _ angyagh yata _ aghnagh m _ ighnegh ni _ nuyekligh _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ angyat put _ taglagh yaghqagh t _ esghapag ki _ .
uka _ aliigh kata _ ungipite nakevnga _ . _ â
aghnagh m _ siighnagh m _ aq ef tagh aa _ imigh ma kanga _ megh meng _ .
ila a _ mangtag meng _ avegtugh te luku _ saama _ ugi mi _ ila yan _ nuliigh pig an _ iighagh aneng _ quyngigh meng _ tugu tete luni _ avegtugh luni _ ila ma kangi _ mangtag t _ avegtughagh ni _ .
enkaam _ uyuqligh m _ taghnughhagh mi _ ila a _ maka a _ imigh ma kanga _ peqagh meng _ tukrug lghii meng _ sii ma i te u luku _ .
iiwen _ unug yaghtugh aqe a _ ighnegh an _ n uy ek lii m _ ungipaate ma kanga _ uka _ taglagh ni luki _ angyagh t _ .
itegh sqe ma kanga _ ighnegh ni _ .
itegh yan _ neghe ste luku _ taagken _ atghii sqe ma kanga _ esnagh mun _ .
angyagh t _ tamlag yalghiimeng _ aghvenge ma lghiit _ .
angyaleg ita _ yug ni _ ll il am akanga _ nukaghagh ni _ aqfa sqellug qu _ , _ â _ Agh v e ngu m aku n nguq _ , _ miite i yaghtugh li nguq _ . _ â
K ev g aaq _ taglagh luni _ ungipaate ma kanga _ ugi anun _ aqfa ste ni luku _ miite i yaghtigh sqellug qu _ .
â _ A aa _ atghagh naqe unga _ . _ â
utaqa ma kangat _ .
naagu _ ?
atghagh nghite uq _ .
itagnatun _ yug m _ aqfate ma kanga _ , _ â _ sukate luni nguq _ atghagh li _ .
ghhuute ai nguq _ . _ â
K ev g aaq _ taglagh luni _ ungip aa si kaa nga _ aghnagh _ .
aghnagh m _ pi ma kanga _ ke v g aaq _ , _ â _ enraq _ taghnughhagh ka _ qiyaaqe uq _ , _ atghagh aqe nayagh unga _ . _ â
K ev g aaq _ atghagh luni _ angyaleg _ ungipaate ma kanga _ .
angyaleg m _ nulighh pig an _ ugi ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ whanga _ puughte isaghtugh lakun _ miite i yaghtugh naqe lghii _ . _ â
angegh ma kanga _ .
aghnagh _ taglagh ma lghii _ .
N uk agh aam _ aksaqe luni _ esghapag ma kanga _ taglagh lghii _ .
kaate luni _ nutaan _ qineghte yan _ an ag u um akanga _ naa s q w akun _ tuqute luku _ .
tuqute yamigu _ angyaatagh ni _ akmag luki _ avaqutagh ni _ tugu luku _ qimag ma lghii _ M ay egh ag ne kun _ .
qaygeghte yami _ uyghag m _ aku l ang anun _ iigh ma lghii _ .
siingenllu _ unug kanga _ .
aghvengekagh t _ utaqa i yagh luteng _ esnagh mi _ utaqakagh eng _ aviite yan _ yuug _ taglagh yalghiimi _ nuliigh pig ni _ esghagh ma kanga _ tuqu luni _ amig mi _ naqam _ nukaghagh a _ aviite uq _ .
yuug _ atghagh luni _ yug ni _ ll il am ak angi _ iv agh iyagh t ii s qell uki _ .
I v agh yaq es eng _ mamleg mi _ esghagh nghite aat _ .
aviite uq _ .
aviite yan _ utegh q aa sim alghiit _ .
aghnagh _ ang y atagh qell uni _ apeghiigh yami _ ukig ma lghii _ esnagh mun _ .
esnagh mun _ kaate luni _ meghnaali te kete luku _ tulughagh ma lghii _ .
tulughagh te kete luku _ nagaqugh ma kangi _ suqsughtagh lghiit _ .
enkaam _ kana _ nalla akun _ q en aagh t all a sim alghiit _ .
pi ma lghiit _ , _ â _ piiksuq _ !
sa aqe ziin _ tawani _ ? _ â
aghnagh m _ akite ma kangi _ , _ â _ angetequgh mun _ aglagh yug aqe yagh unga _ , _ i w em g an aten _ aglagh langa _ . _ â
â _ tea- ai _ uugten _ !
A ng e te qugh h m ii ngu u kut _ , _ aglagh te naqe amken _ . _ â
aghnagh _ angyagh mun _ uugte ma lghii _ .
â _ quneghte lghaaten _ ! _ â
taagken _ itagnatun _ suqsughtagh meng _ aghnagh _ nagate ma lghii _ .
maateqwaaqun _ pil atagh aat _ , _ â _ A aam _ esghagh ghhaaten _ aga _ uugten _ ! _ â
aghnagh _ uugte luni _ pi yalghiimi _ angetequgh u nghite ngughk _ all aq _ nuna _ .
maaten _ angyagh ke vig ni _ uteghmun _ esghagh yagh kete ni _ aga _ mesungesag t _ p u ug legh aat aq ef tut _ .
taagken _ aghnagh _ kelute mun _ esghagh yalghiimi _ nenglu ghrukutaagh _ pika _ esghagh ma kanga _ tunuqligh ke luku _ nenglu squghhagh _ .
nenglu ghllag m _ qaye ani _ nekevgha aqe uq _ yuug _ k ap es eg agh luni _ .
K ap es eg ak ek _ ghhuu ghllag lutek _ nasagh ni _ , _ aligh ni _ , _ kenigh ni _ tugh qugh luki _ .
aghnagh mun _ es n am el ngugh mun _ ayuqe luku _ talligh ni _ , _ aligh n _ inglu a _ il em agh aq saq en ni _ anuqligh ghllag ma kanga _ es l all ug pag tu um agh mi _ .
aghnagh _ taghnughhaghtuumagh an _ teng sim akanga _ qagi t _ tun ut ang it gun _ tuute ste luku _ .
naqam _ anuqe _ alpag ma lghii _ .
iiwen _ itagnatun _ uugte aqe uq _ .
yug m _ enraq _ inglu a _ aligh mi _ ilemeaghaghte yagh kete ni _ itagnatun _ anuqligh ghllag laatagh aa _ es l all ug pag tu um agh mi _ .
aghnagh _ teng taq egk anga _ qagi t _ tu ng ang it gun _ tuute ste luku _ .
tawatestaghhiinaq _ alpag nghaani _ anuqe ghllag _ u ug negh ani _ yug m _ nasagh ni _ enkaam _ kenigh ni _ itemqugh yagh kete ni _ aghnagh _ itagnatun _ teng taq luku _ qenwat _ taghnughhagh ke te lghiik _ aghnaa nkuk _ mataghqe uk _ pilugug i uute uk _ .
wetku _ yuug _ ukig luni _ nenglu mineng _ uka _ atghagh ma lghii _ pilugug meng _ tugumiigh iigh luni _ .
aghnagh mun _ kaate luni _ pi ma kanga _ yug m _ , _ â _ taawa _ pilugug meng _ tagite amtek _ qayughllak _ pilugug si _ nukeggnagh pigte ut _ .
whanga _ elpek _ aqfa ste aqe amken _ nanglleg yagute luten _ .
pilugug tek _ .
apeghiigh kufsi _ taglagh ghhaakut _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ pilugug nghmeng _ taa q s ag Ê¼ ta _ taglagh ma lghiit _ nenglu anun _ .
tawani _ kiyaghte ma lghiit _ .
yuug _ tungtuqu yagh aqe lghii _ , _ aghnagh m _ af taq egk angi _ .
qenwat _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ angli uq _ aghnagh m _ ighnegh a _ .
ellmi neng _ igleghte yaaghte uq _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh _ aag nghmini _ aghn el qu si q _ aviite aqe lghii _ .
tespamani _ aghneghte aqe lghii _ nenglu squghhagh mi _ .
I ghi v g aam aan _ tagi nghmini _ igaghtu pigte lghii meng _ pilugug luni _ .
Kiyagh taa llgh em _ tagtala ani _ aghnagh _ ighni ma lghii _ mekelghiigh ghhagh meng _ .
taana llu _ angli ma lghii _ qenwat _ .
taana llu _ uyuqligh _ ellmi neng _ igleghte yagute ma lghii _ .
anengagh ke te lghiik _ aa negh meg m _ aghneghte aqe lghiik _ nenglu ngiighhagh mi _ .
tagi negh megteni _ alla ghhagh inagh meng _ pilugug lutek _ ig agh tu pig llegh ii meng _ .
tagi negh megteni _ legan _ neghe gpenatek _ ingaghte uute lutek _ qavaa te aqe lghiik _ .
yug m _ pi aqe kanga _ aghnagh _ , _ â _ A s an u te l p ek _ espamavek _ tunuqligh ghhagh mnnun _ aglagh gpenang _ pi aqe i _ ! _ â
maaten _ ilangani _ tungtuqu yagh yan _ aghnagh _ pi ma lghii _ , _ â _ S ang an ll aam _ pamavek _ pi s n aan igh aq anga _ .
enta _ esghagh yaghtuqagh lakun _ . _ â
aghnagh _ aglagh ma lghii _ .
kaate luni _ nenglu squghhagh mun _ iiyagh akun _ qineghte yalghiimi _ ilu te mun _ avaqutagh kek _ quulqite m _ qaye akun _ aqume lutek _ ighu teng _ aghulate magh ita _ nagh agh utaq ef tu k _ .
taawa _ aghnagh ghhagh _ quupnegh ghhagh _ gaagh magh mi _ ukini magh mi _ pellugtuumagh mi _ enngaatall _ aveniqe aqe uq _ .
aghnagh m _ iiyagh meng _ esqamavek _ kay agh um ay aq aa nga _ .
aghnagh ghhagh _ quupnegh ghhagh _ ullegh aghte ma lghii _ .
avaqutagh kek _ u llgh agh s an _ q iyagh w aa sim alghii k _ .
aghnagh _ iiwen _ nekeve aqe uq _ yuug _ uka _ aliigh aqe uq _ qefliqe magh mi _ , _ â _ K ii i _ aghnagh _ pineghllug ghllag pigu a _ .
imamta _ ineghte aqe yu i kete te _ ! _ â
nenglu mun _ itegh luni _ saguyagh gni _ tugu lukek _ aglagh luni _ tespamavek _ aghnagh ghhagh _ quupnegh ghhagh _ k all ag agh yaq en ni _ saguyagh gmineng _ unguv agh sim akanga _ .
taagken _ kenlanga _ aghnagh _ aglagh nghmeng _ taaqe ma lghii _ .
enraq _ nenglu m _ te ke r k aan it aq elghii k _ maalghug _ kalngag sngwaaghagh ghhagh k _ ila a _ aywaa n _ tu ng an ani _ ila a _ uughqa n _ .
taake uk llu _ k al ng as ng aagh aghh aa k _ yug m _ iinghute aqe kek _ saafte sqe gpenakek _ .
kiyaghte luteng _ maaten _ tungtuqu yagh yan _ aghnagh _ sumeghtaghagh yalghiimi _ , _ â _ S ang an ll aam _ k al ng ag g aa k _ ukuk _ iinghute aqe akek _ ?
enta _ ila a _ esghaqagh lakun _ ! _ â
ketfagh luku _ aghnagh m _ nusug ragh yagh kete ni _ awergha m _ amiiragh a _ uglagh pigte lghii _ nusug ragh aa _ .
S aagh w am i kun _ may- ughte ghllag aa _ .
iiwen _ wata _ asi anun _ kaaw aqe uq _ , _ ugu qagh ma lghii _ .
asi a _ kalngag m _ ken gh u f tuq _ .
iiwen _ talligh ni _ s ay u w agh taq aa _ yuug _ qefliqe magh mi _ qakma _ kaate aqe uq _ .
â _ ugumi nagh ghhalek _ aghn aq s a _ q aam n a pi negh ll ug ll a pi w aa _ ! _ â
iitghute kete luku _ saguyagh gni _ tugu lukek _ k all ag agh yaq en ni _ uteghte luni _ um yug agh min eng _ awergha _ kanaghte uute ma lghii _ k al ng ag g agh mun _ .
taana llu _ aghnagh m _ tallu i _ k all ag agh yaq en ni _ saguyagh gmineng _ uguqe llghite te yu i ma kanga _ .
taagken _ kenlanga _ aghnagh _ nagate luni _ yug meng _ lliigh uq _ .
pineghlliqe nagh u nighte uq _ .
kiyaghte ma lghiit _ pinitun _ .
ilangani _ yug m _ nuliigh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ aghyuqe igate ziin _ ? _ â
â _ aghyuqe ghngaaghma qun _ naten _ pi langa _ ! _ â
yug m _ pilate- aghagh a _ , _ â _ Wh av eg Ê¼ qun _ tagi aghten _ ! _ â
yug m _ nenglu m _ qukaa nite ngughk _ s ag legh aq _ pakig ma kanga _ .
aghnagh _ agigte yalghiimi _ sama _ egeghagh _ esghagh ma kanga _ enkaam _ mengteghagh _ nayugh kuvinghagh ani _ masisu _ allighagh t _ taawa _ mengteghagh m _ qaye akun _ m at egh qugh luteng _ .
ighnegh a _ aghnagh m _ nuyekligh _ aane ma lghii _ mengteghagh meng _ .
atkug a _ negig llegh ghllag _ saama _ iqa ghllag _ .
aghnagh _ qiya yagh uq _ .
sama _ pi ma lghiit _ , _ â _ eslallugughte a _ .
allighagh t _ it egh qugh tek ii _ ! _ â
yug m _ aghnagh _ tuye akun _ pakig ma kanga _ , _ â _ Taw at en ng am _ ! _ â
enkaam _ s ag legh aq _ ne anun _ lli ma kanga _ .
yug m _ aghnagh _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ aane luten _ yughqutagh meng _ ghhiitagh luten _ ighnegh gpenun _ pamavek _ ag l aa tes q en nak e ten _ uy gu qu u tes qell uki _ .
uygu te uute nghmeng _ apeghiigh kaki _ tag i tes q en nak e ten _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ aghnagh _ tawaten _ pi ma lghii _ .
uygu te uute luki _ tagite ma kangit _ .
yug m _ pi laatagh aa _ , _ â _ M aal gh u m _ quyngigh m _ si g ut angi _ paasqute te ki _ .
enkaam _ ataasigh _ all aghh iin am _ awergha m _ m el q w aneng _ ikute luten _ imeg naken _ ila a _ tungtu m _ amigh aneng _ .
aligh gpek _ inglu a _ quyngigh m _ unguva lghii m _ m el q w aneng _ ikute aqe luku _ imigh naken _ .
enkaam _ ama _ inglu a _ enraq _ mengteghagh meng _ savighhe uute aqe luku _ imigh naken _ . _ â
laagh an wha _ aghnagh _ tawaten _ pi ma lghii _ .
apeghiigh yan _ aghnagh _ yug m _ s ag legh aq _ aw ite u te kete luku _ pi a _ , _ â _ taana _ elpek _ tagite kan _ ighnegh n _ k el q en nak en _ .
una _ uyughagh a _ whanga mni _ unegte lleqe uq _ .
ukig lusi _ nateqlite kufsi _ quneghte luten _ aligh gpek _ inglu a _ efsug te naken _ enkaam _ inglu a llu _ .
enkaam _ mengteghagh mun _ itegh kuvek _ taake uk _ maalghug _ sigute k _ paasqute te nga lghiik _ ama _ quneghte luten _ efsug te nakegken _ .
enkaam _ ighnegh n _ nuyekligh _ taglagh kan _ uq ugh ut aghq aghh aq _ es ghagh yagh t ii s q en nak en _ tekeghagh m _ awata anun _ uyughagh ke te lghii gnun _ anengagh a _ sivulii luku _ . _ â
taagken _ yug m _ naa ke te lghiik _ uk ig simak ek _ .
tuute ma lghiit _ egeghagh m _ k el ut ang ani _ .
tuute yameng _ aghnagh m _ q im egh lluni _ aligh gni _ efsug te lukek _ esghagh yalghiimi _ mengteghagh _ , _ ama _ saaghw itni _ quyngigh _ .
itegh luni _ q un agh mi _ paasqute te nga lghiit _ quyngigh m _ m aal gh u m _ si g ut angi _ efsug te luki _ esghagh yalghiimi _ awergha ghllag _ all aghh n n aq _ amigh ghllag _ mingllite qugh ma kanga _ .
egeghagh mii _ yuggagh _ aane luni _ un ang ul uku _ kelute mun _ esghagh yalghiimi _ pika _ esghagh ai _ quyilleg t _ .
amenam _ yuggagh _ taglagh ma lghii _ .
kaate luni _ itegh yalghiimi _ iflakagh _ nunalgute mi _ nulighh a _ esghagh ma kanga _ .
itegh yan _ aghnagh m _ ungipaghsugh ma kanga _ ighnegh mineng _ n uy ek l igh meng _ enkaam _ ugi mineng _ .
yuggagh m _ ungipaate ma kanga _ .
negh luni _ aane aqe yan _ quyngigh meng _ tuune ma kanga _ .
enkaam _ ighnegh ni _ lipeghsagh ma kanga _ taglagh qigh sqellug qu _ .
llaaghanwha _ ighnegh a _ taglagh ma lghii _ .
naa an _ neghe ste luku _ alla neng _ pilugug luku _ nutaghagh u ta ghhagh inagh meng _ uyughagh ke te lghiik _ llilagh ma kek _ amavek _ tapghagh m _ awata anun _ esnighqwigh sqellug kek _ asanut _ anegh nge aq _ sivulii luku _ .
nagaqugh luni _ ugi a _ aghnagh m _ nutaghagh _ nuliigh ni _ enngaatall _ agligh sqellug qu _ angayuqagh itnun _ aan e sim akanga _ .
taagken _ yuug _ taglagh ma lghii _ tespikavek _ utuqa mun _ nuliigh minun _ .
E s n igh q w ak _ taglagh yalghiimek _ aghvegh meng _ mallu u ma lghiik _ .
nunalgute teng _ kelgugh luki _ pilag ma kangat _ aghvegh _ .
taagken _ aghnagh m _ quyngigh mineng _ amig ligh aqe luki _ awergha ligh aqe luki _ awalightugh ai _ nunalgute ni _ .
taagken _ kiyaghte ma lghiit _ i wer ng am _ aghyugh llegh itnun _ .
qamagte uq _ .
tefaay _ .
esnagh mii _ enkaam _ quyilleg
kiyaghte ma uq _ qigi mi _ yuug _ neqengyuqagh _ .
kiig te nghagu _ qayaghtugh nghmini _ unake aqe kanga _ masingka _ uksugh mi _ naama te kaghqagh _ neqe _ .
ayumigh ite nghagu _ uksaagh mi _ nutaan _ siku ligh nghagu _ Y ag r ak en ut agh m ii _ quyilleg _ yuug _ pirughte yaghtugh aqe lghii _ qigi mun _ .
A g l ag naq en gh ani _ quyilleg ni _ esnagh mii an _ i w em g am _ usitutala atun _ tuune aqe kanga _ neqe meng _ .
naqam _ uksaagh mi _ tuqutiighvig _ kaate nghaani _ qigi mi _ yuug _ quyillegte nghaani _ angyagh ni _ neqe meng _ usi luku _ quyilleg an _ esnagh mii ni _ tuune aqe kanga _ inglu t _ ataasigh t _ amig ligh luki _ q all uk agh meng _ .
naqam _ pi aqe kanga _ , _ â _ enan _ ayumiqun _ tuqute i tete nagh amken _ . _ â
ayumigh ite nghagu _ tawatestaghhiinaq _ .
maaten _ ilangani _ qigi mi _ y uu ku k s aagh mi _ quyillegte yan _ emta _ quyilleg an _ tawaten _ ug l aghq ak aan _ tuune luku _ ang yagh h ut ameng _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ S i ku l igh ak u _ pirughte yaghtugh lleqe unga _ elpenun _ .
tenge ta ghhagh meng _ y at aghq ut aghh nak ev nga _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ esnagh mii an _ angegh ma kanga _ .
qigi mun _ aglagh yami _ amsakaghtagh m _ amiiqagh a _ sa iqe luku _ esne a _ amiiqagh m _ tu ugh ll uku _ siqlugagh m _ paye anun _ pe tug tegh u um akanga _ .
taagken _ ayvegh m _ tengug aneng _ imigh ma kanga _ i w em g am _ esleqeaghaghte luku _ .
enkaam _ megh _ kumlate luni _ lliigh yan _ siqlugagh m _ tenge ta m _ paye a _ megh meng _ kuvughtagh ma kanga _ .
llaaghanwha _ siqlugagh _ imaghtuumagh an _ kum lagh qu m akanga _ .
qigi mi _ yuug _ m eng tegh am e sim al uku _ qakma _ kaate ma lghii _ quyilleg a _ pirughte yagh uq _ .
yug m _ aane vike ma kanga _ aqelqagh ni _ atkug ngunani _ naqam _ nasaperagh luni _ aghillug luni _ .
quyilleg m _ aqelqagh an _ esnagh mii ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ aqlagha ghhalek _ matagh gpek _ sa qu ziin _ ? _ â
â _ S ang w aq un _ aate lakun _ !
naken _ atkugkagh meng _ amu i igate ngugh u nga _ .
elpek _ am iil it aq eg ke v nga _ q all uk agh meng _ . _ â
taagken _ itegh lutek _ negh nghmeng _ taq s ameng _ quyilleg m _ esnagh mii _ aapte ma kanga _ , _ â _ nagu te uq _ uksaagh _ teng ut igh tes qell u ten _ pi yaqemken _ ? _ â
â _ legan _ teskana _ kiyaghte uq _ .
U l im a sim am ken _ .
enmis _ aqfa lteggu _ . _ â
L l aagh ang wh a _ aane lutek _ siqlugagh anun _ atghagh ma lghiik _ .
siqlugagh mun _ kaate yamek _ esnagh mii m _ pi ma kanga _ quyilleg _ , _ â _ esgha _ taana _ sa aqe zigu _ nusug ggu _ . _ â
siqlugagh m _ paye a _ il ang qu ll aq _ katam _ amiiqagh m _ putu i _ aliite luteng _ .
quyilleg m _ akite ma kanga _ , _ â _ uuk _ k ak u _ sa ma m _ ! _ â
quyilleg _ sivughagh u ma lghii _ tenge ta meng _ nusug te nghmeng _ .
S iv ugh agh y an _ quyilleg _ esnagh mii m _ atghileg mineng _ putu nge i kete te _ amaa iqe aq _ kagu luku _ sayug aghte yagh kete ni _ siqlugaghtuumagh an _ pii k si g agh ll uku _ tenge te aq _ amaa iqe aq _ nusug aghte ma kanga _ .
quyilleg m _ esnagh mii _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ uuk _ k ak u _ n all egh it aq u ten _ ! _ â
taagken _ quyilleg _ tengug meng _ usiligh i luni _ aghulaqe ma lghii _ .
ayumiqun _ uksaagh yagu _ awen _ quyillegte llegh meng _ kingute aghagh lutek _ ata ke te lghiik _ Y ag r ak en ut amun _ quyillegsi ma lghiik _ .
kaate yalghiimeng _ quyillegtaghyag ghllag _ q em g ugh u sim alghii _ .
quyilleg ita _ esnevagh vike luki _ pi ma kangi _ , _ â _ kii _ n all egh it aq usi _ !
sangafsi _ m ul ugh taa s tek _ ?
U taq aq ii m si _ . _ â
legan _ tawaten _ aghneghmi _ quyilleg _ tuqutagh igh ma lghii _ .
S iv ul igh pig al uku _ esnagh mii ni _ qigi mii _ tuqlugh ma kanga _ .
pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ elpek u u vag lghii meng _ aghnagh meng _ ataasigh meng _ si g ut ang in naq am ken _ saama _ t all im aneng _ tuqute i lleqe amken _ ugmestaaghhagh meng _ pilugugkagh meng _ am iiligh luki _ . _ â
taagken _ yuug _ ata ke te lghiik _ kete lutek _ aglagh ma lghiik _ qigi mun _ .
uksughte luteng _ upenghagh mi _ quyngigh m _ ighni llegh an _ kingu aneng _ suna _ taana _ kaa ta _ quyilleg at _ qigi mun _ .
kaate luni _ ungipagh ma lghii _ , _ â _ quyngigh ghhagh i _ pama _ maalghug ii ma uq _ .
whangkuta _ quyilleg ni _ quyngigh put _ mal gh ug eg neng _ ighni nghata _ aag llegh i _ tuqute aqe aput _ . _ â
yug m _ qigi mii m _ ata an _ nan ev g aghh aam pim akanga _ , _ â _ quyngigh t _ malghi ghngaita _ whang kun ni _ esnagh mii ni _ avangite ut _ aglegh ite ut _ qayugh ghllag mi _ whangkuta _ qikmigh t _ saghligagh put _ ighni aqe lghiit _ uglagh pigte luku _ tuqu qagh igate ke put _ .
maaten _ quyngigh ghhagh ut _ malghi ghngaan _ ne pi gh ull uku _ tuqute gpenaan _ aag llegh a _ ighni ghngaan _ .
elpek _ quyngigh ke nghite te an _ esnagh mii t _ pi ke aat _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ quyilleg _ aglagh ma lghii _ .
qigi mii t _ quyillegte nghmeng _ taaqe ma lghiit _ .
yuug _ qigi mii _ aghvenge yagute uq _ ukileghyag meng _ .
maaten _ ila ngam _ uksaagh mi _ quyilleg at _ pirughte yaghtugh luni _ pi ma kangi _ , _ â _ quyngigh i _ pama _ nula aqe uq _ sukate luni _ naqam _ pinigh pigte uq _ uk il egh y ap er u w aaq _ . _ â
taagken _ qafsina t _ uksugh t _ atugh luki _ tagi laatagh ma lghii _ quyilleg at _ .
enkaam _ pi ma kangi _ , _ â _ A g mang am 3 _ es n am e teg pen a si _ .
quungvagh ghhagh si _ .
masingka _ pama _ quyngigh i _ uglaghi ma uq _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ qigi mii t _ qamilgugh ma lghiit _ Y ag r ak en ut am _ k el ut ang anun _ .
nekegte ma lghiit _ awen _ quyilleg eng _ sivu liqe luku _ ellngit _ esnagh mii kuvinghagh at _ tunuqligh u luteng _ .
quyngigh eng _ mengteghagh mun _ tagite yatgu _ es ghagh yaq es eng _ imani nguq _ ing l am in agh tuq _ uk il egh y ap er u w aaq _ .
tawani _ kiyaghte ma lghiit _ .
maaten _ ilangani _ Q ig im ii ku v in gh aam _ nanevgagh a _ nanevgagh ghhagh m _ nuliigh ni _ D im akanga _ , _ â _ enta _ ighnegh ut _ pamavek _ quungvagh nun _ tukughqagh ghhagh anun _ v agh is agh tu ul teg gu _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ nutaghagh t _ pilugug teng _ meteghllug meng _ q as pi q ut igh luki _ y atagh qell u tek _ aghulaqe ma lghiik _ .
tespagani _ quungvagh ni _ iglegh ll u tek m eng tegh at m aal gh ug negh et _ esghagh ma kangit _ .
sivuligh tgun _ mengteghagh tgun _ kaate lutek _ itegh gpenatek _ uughqu ii te ni _ qavaa ma lghiik _ .
qesiqun _ kaate vike aqe aat _ quyilleg _ ighnegh leg _ panig leg _ .
taake uk _ avaqutagh kek _ tes p am an taq ef tu k _ aag llegh ani _ mengteghagh m _ .
unaami _ mekelghiigh _ quyngigh meng _ atghagh luni _ a ta mi _ mengteghagh anun _ aglagh ma lghii _ .
kaate luni _ uq egh h mi _ esghagh ma kek _ aqelqagh k _ maalghug _ .
qavagh aqe uk _ .
pilugug ke lghiik _ meteghllug m _ amighqwaagh aneng _ .
qaprag qagh negh megteni _ meteghllug m _ m el q wa _ an uq atagh aam _ teng q at aqegk anga _ .
itegh luni _ mekelghiigh _ a ta mi _ mengteghagh anun _ ungip a sim akanga _ ata ni _ tawaten _ ayuqe lghii neng _ aqelqagh neng _ .
ata an _ mekelghiigh _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ itegh sqe ki _ !
S aq ung w aat _ ? _ â
aane luni _ mekelghiigh m _ itegagh mineng _ taghsagh ma kek _ aqelqagh k _ .
itegh uk nguq _ .
itegh yata _ yug m _ aapte ma kangi _ , _ â _ K ii i _ natmun _ iglegh taa s tek _ ? _ â
â _ arekull _ taawa _ taa w ang iin aghh aq _ wh am igh put _ tukughqagh ghhagh anun _ iv agh it ng waagh put _ . _ â
â _ uuk _ legan _ tawa _ p an il eg pig unga _ .
T uk igh tugh t ill eq am si _ . _ â
yug m _ ighnegh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ aglagh te ki _ elpesi nun _ .
negh yagh uute ki _ . _ â
aane luteng _ aglagh ma lghiit _ .
sivu itni _ mekelghiigh _ kaate luni _ nayag ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ enngaatall _ ata mta _ aan gh ut aaten _ seghlegh pestaagh nun _ .
saki ghhaghqagh ten _ kaate kata _ esghagh lleqe aten _ .
A k l um a si pig ut _ .
talwa _ meteghllug m _ amighqwaagh aneng _ pilugug ke uk _ . _ â
aqelqagh k _ kaate lutek _ it egh y ag Ê¼ ta _ aghnaghagh m _ esghagh yagh kete ni _ imani _ ukuk _ pilugugllug ghllag uk _ .
utuqa _ alla igh aq _ saagllug qu _ taaggun _ aqume sqe ma kegket _ .
neghyaghqagh meng _ ke t f aa saq meg te ke k _ quyngigh m _ nefkuuragh a _ taagkaghtagh _ tu k r uugh q waagh ll ak aq _ iqlugte lutek _ aghtugh lutek _ negh nghmeng _ taaqe te ma lghiik _ .
qavagh luteng _ unaami _ y at aghq es ata _ aqelqagh t _ mekelghiigh m _ ata an _ ighnegh minun _ atghagh te sqe ma kangit _ quy ng il eg t i meng _ .
enkaam _ yug m _ panig ni _ igh sagh waagh ng aan _ qiya ghngaan _ angegh te naqe ni luni _ wanlegi _ maligte te sqe ma kanga _ .
aghtugh yamigu _ ellmi neng _ qagh lu ghi luni _ panig ni _ qaake luku _ atghagh ma lghiit _ .
iiwen _ esnagh mun _ tu ng ang an il ngugh nun _ quyilleg nun _ aliigh aqe ut _ uka _ quyngilegti _ payegh i _ aliigh aqe uq _ .
kaate yalghiimi _ im an ig uq _ quyngigh kek _ pinigh uk _ ukileghyag kegte ta ghhagh inagh k _ .
yug a _ imani nguq _ atkug kegte uq _ n ugh agh meng _ uk il egh y ak eg taa meng _ saama _ mekelghiigh _ n uk al pig aq s a _ seghleghu qagh a _ .
nanevgagh ghhagh _ pil ug ug ll ug alghii _ qaake luku _ aga _ uteghte ma lghii _ .
quyilleg m _ panig ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ qayugham _ wasaq _ ighsa aqe uten _ .
langetaq _ aagna _ ugi kaghqagh ke an _ . _ â
panig an _ akite ma kanga _ iqlighte magh mi _ , _ â _ imatuq _ ! _ â
quyngigh mun _ kaate luteng _ aghuliigh ma lghiit _ .
quungvagh m _ quyilleg ita _ quyngigh _ esgh ap ag yaq es eng _ imani _ uglagh uq _ naqam _ uk il egh y ap er u waagh llak _ .
nanevgagh ghhagh m _ ighnegh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ mekelghiigh _ una _ elpegun _ kaa tes q en naq aqa _ .
itegh kan _ allighaghllug kun _ aqume ste naagh an _ .
enkaam _ ketfagh te naagh an _ upenghaghtagh m _ ayvegh m _ tu k igh ug g neq _ qasiqagh m _ nefkuuragh aneng _ .
enkaam _ negh nghmeng _ aghtugh kagu _ pi naken _ , _ â _ wasaq _ elpek _ nanevgagh t _ neqlightugh aqe aten _ ggutangigh tke aat _ tukrug ghllag meng _ .
whangkuta llu _ esnagh m _ negh ka aneng _ tukrugsigh kayugu kut _ .
ikiwan _ elpek _ ggute kegte aq _ wha _ aghtugh uten _ . _ â _ wetku _ k i nguv aq un _ pinitun _ neghe ste naken _ .
una _ ata a _ panike te lghiik _ whang am n in n aagh tu k _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ nanevgagh ghhagh m _ ighnegh a _ tawaten _ pi ma lghii _ a ta mi _ apeghtuusagh tun _ .

unaami _ aghulaqe naqe yata _ aghnagh aq _ unegte ma lghii _ enngaatall _ awen _ aghnaqe luni _ .
taakut _ quungvagh m _ quyilleg i _ u simak angat _ esnagh m _ negh ka aneng _ alla ghhagh inagh meng _ .
kiyaghte ma lghiit _ i w em g am _ aghyugh i na llegh mun _ .
tefaay _ !
qamagte uq _ .
yuug _ enkaam _ qateghyiighagh ghhagh
yuug nguq _ iimna _ aghvenge yu pigte lghii _ .
maaten _ ilangani _ nuliigh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ enta _ tan pegh h meng _ akmagutagh ngllagh a _ ! _ â
llaaghanwha _ tusaqe i nagh gpenani _ nulighh a _ akmagutagh ngllagh ma lghii _ tan pegh h meng _ .
taaqe yakek _ akmagutagh k _ tan pegh h ek _ qateghyiighagh ghhagh _ akuqagh luku _ kanaghte luku _ tesqamavek _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ keveg aqe naqe amken _ anguyag mnun _ s ugh ug is qell u ten _ . _ â
taagken _ tan pegh h ek _ akmagutagh k _ m il uu ll uk ek megh mun _ kete ma kek _ .
anuqe m _ akmagutagh k _ teng simak ek _ i w em g am _ natmun _ .
megh m _ itegh gpenakek _ u v l ug em _ qapragsagh ke gni _ up- llghite aghte yagh ke gni _ akmagutagh k _ qateghyiighagh ghhagh _ mingughhu te ma lghii _ akmagutagh m _ nukeggnagh anun _ .
tagtalmi _ tepe ma kanga _ esnagh kun _ .
qateghyiighagh ghhagh m _ akmagutagh m _ allungag a _ vuveghte qugh yagh kete ni _ r egh igh sim akanga _ .
taagken _ aane yalghiimi _ tepe ma kanga _ tapghaghte lakun _ .
qateghyiighagh ghhagh _ taglagh luni _ tapghagh m _ qaye anun _ vegaagh kun _ aviightu te ma luku _ sunanguq _ taana _ yuug _ .

P im ak an ag a _ , _ â _ kii _ , _ qateghyiighagh ghhagh _ nani _ n uk eg g n aagh q egh llag si n _ ? _ â
â _ sughug u unga _ elpenun _ . _ â
yug m _ neng l aq luku _ unite ma kanga _ .
mengteghagh minun _ kaate luni _ nuliigh ni _ ungipaate ma kanga _ , _ â _ qateghyiighagh ghhagh _ tapghagh m _ qaye ani _ vegaagh kun _ aviightu te aqe uq _ .
legan _ nukeggnagh ghllagu uq _ .
aapte yaqegka _ whang am nun nguq _ sughug u uq _ . _ â
N eng l aq l aat aam ak angat _ nulighh ghqu te lghiik _ .
unug yagu _ qavagh te yata _ qateghyiighagh ghhagh _ tag lagh lu m _ ungavig itnun _ itegh ma lghii _ .
itegh luni _ nanugh ita _ mesiigh anun _ mingughhu te ma lghii _ .

iwerngaqun _ s ug em g it _ mesiighqe ughtagh u luki _ ug at ang anun _ aglagh luni _ qavaa ma lghii _ .
unaami _ yuug _ nategh mun _ ategh luni _ qefliqe ma lghii _ , _ â _ K ii i _ , _ qam a y _ ungavig mta _ s ug er ng angi _ seghleghu ut _ whaa _ legan _ mesag igh ghllagu ut _ .
ugumi nagh na ghhalek _ enankinam _ s aam _ yeghrat _ n uk eg g n aagh q egh llag um aa _ . _ â
U g ang uq _ u w at ang aneng _ aleghqugh ma lghii _ , _ â _ pi yagh amken ta _ sughug u unga _ ! _ â
â _ ugumi nagh na ghhalek _ qateghyiighagh ghhagh _ una _ ! _ â _ yuug _ pi ma lghii _ .

unug yagu _ qavagh te yata _ qateghyiighagh ghhagh _ iigh w iigh luni _ unguvagh yalghiimi _ j a igh q ut ameng _ gh h it agh luki _ uygu qugh utagh ma lghii _ .
masingka _ t aku yaq min ik i _ yug m _ mengteghagh anun _ mayugh luni _ q aa k g it _ tapghagh ngllaghkagh mineng _ yughqutagh meng _ kenle nge i kete te _ qam qagh simak angi _ .
iqug a _ tapghagh ngllaghkagh mi _ qam ut igh luku _ aate ma kanga _ .

qenwat llu _ kenle akun _ mengteghagh _ ghhatagh aghte ma kanga _ .

ima _ aviite uq _ .

qamavek _ itegh ltung _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ itegh ma lghiik _ .

apa gpek _ sama _ s u um q en negh meng _ elpek _ qavagh _ palaghhagh _ atuqe aqe aat _ .
repall _ iye igh qagh ta iigh ma ut _ .

aghnagh _ aga _ uteghte yan _ aghnaghaghhagh m _ uteghmun _ qiive yagh kete ni _ kaynge _ aga _ maaten _ tu mang it gun _ pangaleg aqe uq _ .

â _ aaqun _ whanga nge unga _ tagi nga _ .

â _ kaay _ eltughagh ut _ tea- uq _ ! _ â
Q al pegh u simak angat _ .
itegh yalghiimi _ apa ita _ iye it _ q av agh l aa ghi g all g j i em _ iqeghtiigh luteng _ .
eltughagh eng _ neghe ste luku _ qavaa ma lghiit _ .
unaami _ aap qugh agh yagh aat _ apa gkenka llu _ enkaam _ aghnaghagh t llu _ tagi luteng _ aghul agh qu l g ut ang it a _ , _ naken _ pi t ang a . Agh nagh aghh aq _ ak saq ng waagh umalghii _ .

sughu ke aq _ tagi laghate te luni _ negh te nghmeng _ taaqe yameng _ ungipaghagh te ma lghiit _ .
taagken _ aghnaghaghhagh m _ apa a _ v u v all am alghii _ .
taagken _ alla _ negh te luteng _ enraq _ eg m iigh t ataa sim alghiit _ alignaghtaagh te ma lghiit _ .
ila ita _ s ung at _ k ag im ll uki _ saguyagh meggnun _ qaake luki _ saguyagh teng _ k all ag negh meg tek i _ s ung at _ iighwigh aqe ut _ .
enraq _ ila ita _ tugu ta i _ ayvegh m _ mengqugh tun _ ul qagh t aagh aqegk ang it _ .

â _ legan mi _ sa aqa _ ! _ â
nutem nguq _ ila i _ sughukagh m _ aghnalqwaagh it _ pi ma lghiit _ yakugh ke luteng _ , _ â _ Agh nagh aq r aag g aq _ ag ghi yug ne pi w aa _ !

aghnaghaghhagh _ ketfagh luni _ saguyagh k _ tugu lukek _ ilagagh ma lghii _ .
ilagagh ma luku _ uka nguq _ suksug ghllag _ aliigh ma lghii _ .
iiwen _ pi aqe ut _ amig kun _ ug a _ qagi t _ kasug te ma lghiit _ ilu te mun _ nategh mun _ .
aghnaghaghhagh m _ saguyagh gni _ k all ag agh yaq en ni _ qagi t _ igh h us alghii meng _ nategh mi _ siipte ma lghii _ tepe aq _ allaghhiinaq _ .
aghnaghaghhagh _ nekeve luni _ signegh gneng _ tugu tete luni _ tea- ma ken _ tepagh meng _ imigh lukek _ signegh gneng _ sughu ke aq _ tunqugh ma kanga _ .
qamagte yamigu _ tunqugh nghmeng _ enraq _ siklagh meng _ tu ng sim alghii _ .
tuune yatni _ u w at ang anun _ aglagh luni _ mingle _ siklagh yagh kete ni _ allaghhiinaq _ tangegh iqe aq _ peksigaghte ma kanga _ .
itagnatun _ signegh k _ tugu lukek _ imigh aqe lukek _ tea- ma ken _ tangighkagh meng _ sughu ke aq _ uyegte ma kanga _ .
qamagte yamigu _ mumegh _ tugu luku _ aghnaghaghhagh m _ mingle _ kenuqagh yagh kete ni _ megh _ meghe rakegte pigte lghii _ maaqe ma lghii _ mingle aneng _ .
meghute meng _ tugu tete luni _ m eq si l aam akanga _ tamaghhagh an _ sughu ke aq _ .
taagken _ kenlanga _ aghnaghaghhagh _ ugpeq s al it aat _ .
V u v all an egh meg g ni _ aq f aqegk angat _ nuna lgu ta ita _ .
qamagte uq _ .
qatelghii nkuk _ amaa nkuk
qategh lghii _ tapghagh m _ qukaa ni _ mallu nge luni _ ayvegh meng _ negh ma luku _ sunanguq _ taana _ amu a _ .
kaate luni _ amaa m _ qategh lghii _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ whanga llu _ neqagh langa _ .
igatagh pigte unga _ . _ â
â _ legan _ negh i _ .
uglagh ghllag uq _ .
Wh ang ang ing agh m a _ naa ng n n aanghi taq a _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ amu a llu _ negh ma lghii _ .
I w em g aq un _ kepsugh lutek _ negh lutek _ tapghagh m _ k el ut ang an il ngugh mun _ uusneghwaagh mun _ mayugh ma lghiik _ .
qaygeghte yamek _ qatelghii m _ amu a _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ whani _ yeqay _ meghnaali ltung _ .
wiin _ qavaa ltung _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ amu a _ aan gh umalghii _ .
tawani _ uusneghwaagh m _ qaye ani _ ingaghte uute ma lghiik _ .
qategh lghii _ qavagh gpenani _ tegh h um aam alghii _ .
amu a _ qavagh yan _ whaa _ tu ngun gh aq as an _ qategh lghii _ nekeve luni _ tamaani _ q em g ugh t im alghii _ ayvegh m _ kuyapegagh aneng _ .
qafsina t _ ayvegh m _ kuyapegagh i _ nuuve te luki _ amaa m _ papeg akun _ qilleghte ma kangi _ .
enkaam _ amu a _ taghsagh ma ke aanga _ .
qatelghii m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ anguyag t _ s ugh ug et _ whaa _ kaate yaghtugh u ngestagh ma i kung _ .
uusneghwaagh mun _ maye ii aqe ut _ .
whanga _ qimag naqe unga _ .
elpek _ sa aqe ziin _ ? _ â
amu a _ qavaa i na ma te te kun _ nekefqaghte luni _ pangaleg yalghiimi _ kelute mun _ uka _ tu ng ang aneng _ k av leg g al ek _ .
naqam _ papeg a _ aqnigh magh mi _ .
amu a _ sumeghtaghagh ma lghii _ , _ â _ S egh legh h al ek k aan naq aat nga _ anguyag t _ .
tuqute naqe aatnga _ .
A w it w u w aq lu _ papeg mkun _ kiitegte aatnga _ .
sangami _ papeg ka _ aqnigh aqa _ ? _ â
amu a _ i w em g aq un _ qevuute luni _ qimagkagh _ tuq un n ay uk ang at ni _ .
qimagugh kestagh ghngaaghmi _ k i ngu min il nguq _ kavleg _ almesiqe nga i nagh yagu _ saama _ pekagh pigte yami _ amu a _ sumeghtaghagh ma lghii _ , _ â _ qaywaam _ tuqu langa _ . _ â
aghuliigh te kete luku _ uteghmun _ qiive yalghiimi _ sughu meng _ esghaate nghite uq _ .
katam _ taawa _ papeg akun _ qilleghte luteng _ qafsina t _ ayvegh m _ kuyapegagh i _ .
amu a _ pi ma lghii _ , _ â _ ugumi nagh na ghhalek _ qatelghii penaagh _ pe k agh te pig taa nga _ .
kergam _ taawa _ esghagh qaghtekumken _ unguva lleqe uten _ . _ â
qatelghii m _ kiiw k _ kaate lukek _ aki mun _ ayuqe lghiik _ maligte ma kek _ i w em g am _ esnagh mun _ .
tawani _ esnagh mi _ tepagh meng _ negh em s ug l i mi _ taglagh ma lghii _ esnagh m _ k el ut ang anun _ .
P eng ugh aghh agh mun _ kaate luni _ tawani _ qavagh naqe yami _ iye gni _ nusug ragh lukek _ saaghw mikun _ lli lukek _ qavaa ma lghii _ .
taagken _ amaa m _ ugumi yagute luku _ qategh lghii _ tea- ma ghhagh ani _ ivaghtagh u yagh kete ni _ .
qenwat llu _ naalke qaghte ma kanga _ .
qategh lghii _ qavagh aqe uq _ enngaatall _ umu luku _ naqam _ saaghw ani _ iye k _ .
A m aam tagh sagh pen aan _ ii s ke k q ate l ghii m tu t m agh taa l uk ek _ qageghqugh lukek _ unite ma kanga _ .
kingu aneng _ amaa m _ qatelghii m _ i w em g aq un _ qavagh gni _ nusug lukek _ taghtugh yami _ iye gni _ tugu naqe yagh ke gni _ aviite uk _ .
K at am n aal kum ak ek q ag egh qugh ll er aa ghi naa k _ .
qategh lghii _ ayaa luni _ panegh luni _ tuquma lghii _ .
qamagte uq _ .
aghnagh aq _ uyughagh leg
aghnagh aq _ kiyaghte ma lghii _ uyughagh leg _ .
mekelghiigh _ aane igate ngughk _ quunpeng _ it gh um agh llak _ .
nayag a _ quyngighqwaagh aqe lghii _ .
atghagh nghmini _ gaagh luni _ uyughagh ke te lghiik _ negh aqe lghiik _ .
aghnagh aq _ quyngigh mun _ aghulaqe nghmini _ quyngighqwaagh te kete luku _ ulape aqe lghii _ .
atghagh nghmini _ gaagh niigh aqe lghii _ saama _ pilugug meng _ ukini aqe lghii _ .
uyughagh ni _ qelegh aqe yagh kanga _ waran _ uugh qagh mun _ aane aghte aqe luku _ pi sqellug qu _ .
iwernga llu _ mekelghiigh _ aan ig al g n uq _ .
maaten _ ilangani _ agh agh aam _ uyughagh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ whaa _ unite naqe amken _ .
miite ta lgigh a _ seghleghu lghiiten _ .
taawa _ whaa _ si n um ig g aan _ ifla naqngu uq _ .
saama _ elpek _ langetaq _ mengteghagh igh te naqe uten _ .
A at ag Ê¼ qun _ tu ku gh q aghh anun _ i _ v agh iyagh naq unga _ .
qavagh luteng _ unaami _ aghnagh aq _ aghulaqe ma lghii _ .
igleghte ma lghii _ qafsina t _ aghnegh t _ .
unug nghagu _ aghuliigh luni _ ayaviigh ni _ napaghte luku _ ang y atagh qell uni _ qavagh aqe lghii _ .
unaami _ taghtugh luni _ ayaviigh ni _ esghagh nghminigu _ iqunighte ma aqe lghii _ .
tawaten _ iq un igh llegh amun _ aghnagh aq _ aghulaqe aqe lghii _ .
maaten _ ilangani _ iiwen _ siqinegh _ tevigh yaghtugh aqe uq _ qemi meng _ agigte yalghiimi _ kana _ negh ghllag _ esghagh ma kanga _ .
ne m _ aku l ang ani _ aa ng q at egh llag aq ef tuq _ taa m _ nuna m _ yug a _ .
aghnagh _ k il g aa qu meng _ ukig ma lghii _ qemi meng _ .
aangqagh te lghiit _ qu ng ang it gun _ aag ma lghii _ enkaam _ nagnegh ma lghii _ ingavek _ siv ul igh pig agh nun _ mengteghagh minun _ .
kaa sa mi _ nagnegh luni _ nategh mun _ itegh ma lghii _ .
taawa _ esghagh ma kangi _ malghugnegh t _ ungavig t _ aywaa n _ tu ng ang an il nguut _ m e ke tagh alghiit _ .
tawavek _ ungavig nun _ aywaa n _ tu ng ang an il ngugh nun _ itegh ma lghii _ .
aangqagh te lghiit _ lengaagh meng _ nagaqugh te ma lghiit _ taagken _ alingyug luteng _ taaqe te ma lghiit _ .
nuna m _ am a tu m _ sukate lleghpigagh a _ aghnagh aq _ talwa _ nukalpigagh neng _ aglagh ma lghii _ mengteghagh minun _ .
taana _ sukate ngughk _ aghnagh aq _ tugu naqute kaqsagh kangat _ aghtugh aqe kangat _ .
aghnaghagh m _ kay al q ii r agh mi _ kay al q aqegk angi _ nukalpigagh at _ .
wetku _ kina _ kay al q iil ghii _ taana _ nulightugh yaghqagh _ sukate ngugh meng _ aghnaghagh meng _ .
aghnagh aq _ mengteghagh minun _ kaate luni _ itegh ma lghii _ .
ungavig minun _ aglagh luni _ s u ug em g en i _ ikighte yagh kete ni _ k el ut ang ani _ ig g a sigh tagh aq ef tuq _ n uk al pig aq s a _ seghleghu qagh a _ .
aghnaghagh m _ naa ni _ tuqlugh luku _ pi ma kanga _ ,
â _ yeqay _ whanga _ gaagh langa _ ! _ â
naa an _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ imukun _ sangavek _ gaagh yug ghllag ziin _ ? _ â
panig an _ akite ma kanga _ , _ â _ I w em g allu _ whanga mneng _ gaagh yug unga _ ! _ â
taana _ aghnagh aq _ gaagh igate yagh lghii _ .
naange a _ g aagh teng w aaq s alghii _ .
aghnagh aq _ ugkelli ma lghii _ tunughtu llegh inagh aneng _ quyngigh meng _ .
ugute yami _ angayuqagh ni _ mani ste vike luki _ ugke meng _ ellmi _ allakagh mi _ taagken _ itegh ma lghii _ .
aqelqagh ke te lghiik _ negh lutek _ taaqe yamek _ ungipamsug te ma lghiik _ .
tukugh an _ aghnaghagh m _ uyguma lgute kete na luku _ at ku g ii s qugh agh aqegk anga _ .
aqelqagh an _ pi aqe kanga _ , _ â _ aglagh lunga _ alla _ tagi kuma _ wetku _ tawani _ mat- aghte naagh unga _ . _ â
Q ay ugh llag Ê¼ qun _ kayngu yug aqe lghii _ mat- aghte nghmeng _ .
ellnga llu _ aghnagh u lghii _ .
qenwat _ pilugugtugh ma lghii _ ingaghte ma lghii _ aqelqagh _ , _ qavaghni pigte ni li mi _ .
unaami _ aghnaghagh m _ tukugh an _ nuna lgu ta ita _ nagaqugh luku _ aqelqagh _ kaate ma ni luku _ keleg ma kangat _ aqelqaghniigh naqe na i luku _ .
llaaghanwha _ aghnaghagh nkuk _ aqelqagh ke te lghiik _ aglagh ma lghiik _ aqelqaghniigh naqe lghii nun _ .
taagken _ kilgaaqu uute ma lghiit _ .
kelgute ma kangat _ naayghagh _ s ung agh yug g iin aq _ aligh ite ngughk _ .
taana _ naayghagh _ uzive luku _ uteghte yaghqagh at _ .
taagken _ aghulaqe te ma lghiit _ .
aqelqagh _ aghnagh aq _ igleghte ma lghii _ aq f aal aa meng _ .
leganqun _ aga _ sivungagh ni _ kilgaaqu lghii nun _ ug legh utaq uq _ siv ul igh pig al uni _ tukagh a _ aghnagh aq _ .
naayghagh _ al iigh waagh y am eg teg gu _ q ev uu ll igh aam alghii _ .
taakwna _ kilgaaqu te lghii _ aghnaghagh m _ naghughte qugh ma kanga _ .
iiwen _ naayghagh mun _ kaate aqe uq _ siv ul igh pig aq _ tukugh ni _ kaate ma kanga _ .
taagken _ qerngagh egmek _ aghnaghagh m _ tukugh ni _ sivu liqe luku _ naayghagh _ uzive luku _ uteghte ma lghiik _ .
igleghte ma lghiik _ .
whaa _ mengteghagh t _ al iigh waagh y ay eg tek i _ aghnaghagh m _ tukugh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ enta _ ingavek _ mengteghagh nun _ kaate ragkiighute aghte luteng _ ! _ â
aghnaghagh m _ tukugh ni _ naghughte luku _ qevuute luni _ kilgaate qugh ma lghii _ .
kaate luni _ aqelqagh _ uteghmun _ esghagh yalghiimi _ taa m _ nunaagh m _ s uk all gha _ tukugh ni _ naghughte luku _ qevuute luni _ kilgaate qugh ma lghii _ .
kaate luni _ aqelqagh _ uteghmun _ esghagh yalghiimi _ taa m _ nunaagh m _ s uk all gha _ tukugh ni _ aghnagh aq _ unite ghllag ma kanga _ , _ nutem nguq _ tea- ma kut _ esghapag lghiit _ aapte ma kangat _ , _ â _ naken _ utegh si n _ ? _ â
A q el q aam _ akite ma kanga _ , _ â _ enan _ kinguligh ghhagh ma _ kaate kumeng _ ungipaate naagh aisi _ . _ â
tukagh a _ aghnagh aq _ kaate luni _ pi ma kangi _ esghapag lghiit _ nunalgute ni _ , _ â _ aqelqagh _ pi yagh ka iitagh i _ .
M a tu m _ nunaagh m _ yug a _ kay al qugh t aag aa _ .
sukate ghllag pigte uq _ .
kitum _ inglu ke naanghite a _ .
Q em g aam tun g _ naayghagh _ u z iv agh p un g _ .
tagimun _ unite ghllag aanga _ . _ â
kilgaaqu te tke aq _ kaat quute te yan _ qamagte luni _ q em g ugh us an _ enraq _ tughumgha tete na aqe ma lghiit _ .
taagken _ yug t _ mat- aghte luteng _ tughumgha te ma lghiit _ .
aqelqagh _ ketfagh yan _ atkugtuumagh mi _ pi ma kangat _ tawaten _ tughumgha naanghite ni luku _ mataghte sqellug qu _ .
A q el q aam _ akite ma kangi _ , _ â _ whangkuta _ ima _ siv im em n neng _ kenlanga _ nunaagh nun _ nutaan _ pi yuggaagh negh mta _ mataghte igate ukut _ .
wetku _ alghigh luku _ tawavek _ nunaagh mun _ pinegh mta _ taawa _ mat- aghte yaghqaaghte aqe ainkut _ .
aglagh lunga _ alla _ tagi kuma _ es ghagh lleq agh si _ uvinke a _ .
enngaatall _ tawani _ mataghte lleqe unga _ . _ â
laagh an wha _ ug pegh simak angi _ aq el q aam _ tea- ma kut _ yug t _ m atagh tes qugh w aal ghiit _ .
tughumgha ma kangat _ yug t _ aqelqagh at _ atkugtugh ma ghngaan _ .
aqelqagh _ imani _ iknaqe ghllag uq _ .
ila i _ tunuvagh nghata _ ila ita _ atg- ghhagh ke luku _ mataawi te aat _ iqute nghmeng _ .
A q el q aam _ kay al qugh tag aa _ nunaagh m _ tam a tu m _ yug a _ iknaqe llegh a _ .
aqelqaghniigh nghmeng _ taaqe yameng _ aglagh uute ma lghiit _ .
aqelqagh _ tukugh minun _ aglagh ma lghii _ .
itegh yan _ tukugh an _ aghnaghagh m _ qevuute luku _ upugha te ma kanga _ itegh sqe magh an _ ungavig t _ ilu itnun _ .
negh nghmeng _ taaqe yameng _ aghnaghagh m _ tukagh a _ itegh luni _ at ku g ii s qugh aagh um akanga _ aqelqagh ni _ .
aqelqagh an _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ ungipaate amken _ leg an ii tek _ s ag iq ut agh pe nga _ .
mat- aghte naanghite unga _ .
aglagh lunga _ tagi kuma _ yugusigh ka _ es ghagh lleq an n ate tu l nga _ . _ â
aqelqagh _ tukugh mi _ uy g um al q iin aghn aq en gh at ni _ pi aqe kanga _ , _ â _ qavaghni pigte aanga _ .
ingaghte naqe unga _ . _ â
atkugtuumagh mi _ ingaghte te kete luku _ qavaa sighwaagh aqe lghii _ qavagh nghite ghngaaghmi _ .
unaami _ tukugh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ aglagh naqe unga _ .
S uk all ung at ag ill equ nga _ .
utaqa nakevnga _ . _ â
aghulaqe ma lghii _ aqelqagh _ .
igleghte te kete luku _ aghnagh aq _ sumeghtaghagh aqe lghii _ , _ â _ miiwen _ inga _ quyngigh ghhagh ut _ uglafqe uq _ .
naagu _ inga _ uyughagh ka _ ighsanitagh lghii _ , _ panegh luni _ tuqu uq _ . _ â
uusnegh u aq _ quy ng igh q waagh v i kum t aani _ kaate luku _ agigte yagh kete ni _ ii tek k an a _ quy n igh t eng _ esghagh ma kanga _ .
quyngigh m _ awatangani _ gu ugh ng agh mi _ yuug _ kameg gni _ pig in gh i _ sivughtugh aqe ai _ .
aghnaghagh m _ ig k agh agh luku _ kaate yaghtugh yamigu _ up- ughte naqe pigte luku _ w aa k es teg pen aan _ teskanavek _ metngeqagh vike yagh kete ni _ ii w en nguq _ ama _ quyngigh m _ awatangani _ .
taagken _ aghnaghagh m _ pi yagh kete ni _ uyughagh ni _ liisuqe ma kanga _ .
piyug meng _ taku luku _ nayag an _ uyughagh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ tawaten _ pi s qell u ten _ pi aqe yagh amken _ .
ahaam _ atghagh luten _ negh yaghtugh ltung _ . _ â
â _ inga _ qantagha m _ tungtuute ma kanga _ .
taana _ aag vike lteggu _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ tungtutagh mikun _ uyughagh n _ nayag ni _ aagute ma kanga _ .
mekelghiigh m _ tungtutagh ani _ ii s qagh m iig um akanga _ .
nayag an _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ gaagh te yaghtugh naqe amken _ .
sivullgaagh naqe amken _ . _ â
aghnagh aq _ uuvganeng _ taagken _ k il g aa qu meng _ ghhatagh ma lghii _ .
M eng tegh am i m _ kaate yaghtugh yami _ uteghmun _ uyughagh ni _ iisqagh mig leg _ tungtu meng _ esghagh yagh kete ni _ tungtu aneng _ maligsaagh aqe a _ uyughagh n _ .
aghnagh aq _ piyug ma lghii _ enkaam _ uyughagh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ enankin _ yugu lghiiten _ .
inglu ke te yagute yaghqaaghte ma uten _ y ul gu te v nun _ . _ â
kaate lutek _ aghnagh aq _ afta uute kete luku _ tungtu meng _ gaagh ma lghii _ .
ugute yami _ negh te kete luku _ uyughagh ni _ ungipamsug te ma kanga _ aqelqaghniigh llegh mineng _ ataasigh mi _ nunaagh mi _ .
pi ma kanga _ uyughagh ni _ , _ â _ iitek _ tazinga _ aghnagh nge te ma yagh amken _ .
miitalgi _ mengteghagh at _ siv ul igh pig aag uq _ .
ayumigh ani _ kaate kuvek _ wiin _ itegh gpenang _ .
U q egh h mi _ mat- aghte naagh uten _ .
atkug igh kuvek _ upag te lghiit _ pinagh aaten _ , _ â _ A t ku g ii s qugh agh aq agh pesi nga _ .
taawa _ yugusigh ka _ esghaghte ggu _ ! _ â
enkaam _ mengteghagh mun _ itegh kuvek _ esghagh naagh an _ aghnaghqagh n _ .
ungavig anun _ itegh kuftek _ aghnagh aq _ pi naken _ , _ â _ A m si k agh tes qugh agh aq eg ke v nga _ .
enngaatall _ am si k aghh naq unga _ . _ â _ naqamllu _ aqelqaghniigh naanghite aaten _ .
whanga _ apeghiigh kaqe aatnga _ .
ikiwan _ whanga _ aghnagh _ kay al q e sim ang itu nga _ . _ â
qavagh luteng _ unaami _ mekelghiigh m _ nayag mi _ ayaviigh a _ wanitagh leg _ tugu luku _ nayag mi _ apaate llegh atun _ aghulaqe ma lghii _ .
wata _ palaghhagh at _ qavagh t _ atugh luki _ qemigh _ agigte yaghqagh ni _ kaate ma kanga _ .
agigte yagh kete ni _ negh ghllag _ esghagh ma kanga _ .
tawani _ aghuliigh ma lghii _ .
Wh an i ku negh s ii m akanga _ .
iiwen _ siqinegh _ ik al iiq aa _ , _ akule mi _ nunaagh m _ yug a _ q em g ugh utegh llag umalghii _ .
taagken _ aangqagh te ma lghiit _ .
katam _ siqinegh _ tevigh yan _ mekelghiigh _ qemi meng _ ukig ma lghii _ k il g aa qu meng _ .
angqagh u te lghiit _ aku l ang it gun _ iglegh aam alghii _ ingavek _ siv ul igh pig aan un _ mengteghagh nun _ .
kaa sa mi _ mengteghagh mun _ uq egh h mi _ aghuliigh ma lghii _ .
aangqagh te lghiit _ l eng agh meng _ nagaqugh te yameng _ taaqe te ma lghiit _ .
pi ma lghiit _ , _ â _ awituwaq _ aqelqagh _ aku waagh n ii m n a _ kaa tuq _ . _ â
enkaam _ tazingavek _ sivuligh nun _ mengteghagh nun _ aglagh uute ma lghiit _ .
aqelqagh _ kaate lghii _ upag ma kangat _ .
U pag ut _ tagi laghate te yata _ mekelghiigh m _ aqelqagh m _ pi ma kangi _ , _ â _ A t ku g ii s q aq agh pesi nga _ .
taawa _ yugusigh ka _ esghaghte ggu _ . _ â
atkug ni _ mataghte ma kanga _ .
U pag ut _ whaten _ pi inagh ai _ , _ â _ ahaam _ aghulaqe utek _ . _ â
U v in Ê¼ g aneng _ esghaate luteng _ nukalpigagh t _ aghulaqe te ma lghiit _ .
aghulaqe te yata _ mekelghiigh _ atkug luni _ itegh ma lghii _ nategh mun _ .
itegh yalghiimi _ nategh mun _ esghagh ma kanga _ aghnagh aq _ gaagh aqe uq _ neqe meng _ .
imagh m nguq _ ineqsunagh uq _ .
â _ kaay _ tagi ziin _ ? _ â
aghnaghagh m _ pi ma kanga _ .
â _ qamavek _ ungavig nun _ itegh i _ .
gaagh aqe unga _ .
sukate luteng _ ugu lleqe ai _ ugke t _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ mekelghiigh _ itegh ma lghii _ ungavig mun _ .
ugute yami _ aghnaghagh m _ angayuqagh ni _ ugke meng _ mani ste vike luki _ itegh ma lghii _ ungavig mun _ .
itegh yan _ mekelghiigh m _ aghnagh aq _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ A m si k agh tes qugh agh aq eg ke v nga _ enngaatall _ am si k aghh naq unga _ . _ â
A m si k aghh negh meng _ taaqe yan _ mekelghiigh _ , _ negh ma lghiik _ al egh qu u sim agh m ek _ aghnaghagh nkuk _ .
qavagh luteng _ unaami _ aghn el qu si q _ y atagh qu m alghii k _ .
unaami _ aghulaqe yaghqagh k _ .
naqamllu _ naagu _ aqelqaghniigh yug nghite te aat _ aqelqagh _ .
llaaghanwha _ qavagh luteng _ unaami _ quy ng il eg t i meng _ atghagh ma lghiik _ mekelghiigh m _ mengteghagh anun _ .
kaate lutek _ mekelghiigh m _ nayag an _ upugha te ma kanga _ ukaagh ni _ .
aghnaghagh m _ ukuk _ esghapag yagh ke gni _ nayag ke te lghiik _ gginagh ik _ ataa s ii s tu k an i k _ .
taagken _ kiyaghte ma lghiit _ .
aghnagh _ aqsa nge luni _ ighni yalghiimi _ mekelghiigh ghhagh meng _ .
maaten _ ilangani _ yug at _ aviite luku _ nayag a _ qulite luni _ qulite sigh ani _ kuuve luku _ esla mun _ , _ itegh ma lghii _ iq l igh agh luni _ .
ukaagh an _ aapte ma kanga _ , _ â _ sa meng _ nun al gu te v neng llu _ waamte i llegh ka _ .
igleghte yuggaagh negh mta _ ima _ sivunegh mneng _ mataghte igate te ni luta _ pi aqe kemsi _ .
naten _ mat- aghte langa _ kayngu yug aqe lghiinga _ mat- aghte nghmeng _ , _ qay ugh llag Ê¼ qun _ aghnagh u lghiinga _ . _ â
ukaagh an llu _ neqangugh luku _ uyguma lleg ni _ ama _ m atagh tes qugh aa ll en i _ , _ q em g aag m ek _ nenglagh te ma lghiik _ .
uyughagh ni _ tagi yan _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ unaami _ ukavek _ uughqa n _ tu ng ang anun _ eslugh lleqe unga _ .
yugusigh ka _ ivagh i lleqe aqa _ tu ku gh q aghh anun _ . _ â
uyughagh n _ aan gh um akanga _ .
uyughagh ni _ pi laatagh aa _ , _ â _ naqamllu _ whaa _ elpek _ pengeg niigh te aaten _ .
masingka _ nemetwha yaaghte aaten _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ unaami _ ang y at aghq ameng _ akmag luni _ aghulaqe ma lghii _ uq egh h mun _ .

saama _ quyngigh t _ nula ma lghiit _ .

aghnagh aq _ ulghaagh ughtekagh

apeghiigh aat _ .

ilagaate

tala ka
iiwleng _ y ay w aal eng iigh h aq _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ quunpeng _ tukugh ita _ negh e si g al k angat _ .
quunpeng _ il aa k waagh min i _ kiyang _ negh aqe lghii _ .
P al as e ke t aghh agh meng _ negh aqe lghii _ .
V u v all an aq en egh meg g ni _ ilag ii s qugh agh aq saq angat _ .
I gh sagh waagh aq elghii _ .
A nag ul gh aqegk angat _ aghtugh nghmegteggu _ .
quunpeng _ yug m _ an ag ul egh t aag aqegk anga _ .
maaten _ ilangani _ uksugh mi _ emta _ tawaten _ v u v all an aq s ata _ , _ whaa _ apeghiighsagh yata _ , _ ellngagh a nguq _ mekelghiigh _ un aghh aan eng _ an Ê¼ g iq aq _ an Ê¼ g iq aq _ an Ê¼ g iq aq _ .
unugtagh u ghllag aa _ .
qenwat _ m am legh q w aag aa _ .
pi ma kanga _ yug m _ , _ â _ sa aqe ziin _ tawani _ ? _ â

kagtaghtaghwaagh aqe unga _ .

â _ aa-a _ , _ enkaam _ elpek _ T al ak ang ul ghii ten _ . _ â

amenam _ aglagh a _ .
tuute lleqe aaten _ . _ â

â _ utaqa nghmeng _ aghtugh luten _ qenwat _ negh te ukut _ .
negh i _ ! _ â

llaaghanwha _ aghte yagu _ vuvalla eng _ napaghte yamegteggu _ pi ut _ , _ â _ sughu ke aq _ qaagna _ kelgugh ghhu _ ! _ â

â _ aa-a _ ! _ â

qamagte uq _ .
pi sta
kiyaghte ma lghii _ ataasigh _ yuug _ nuna mi _ tu ng ang ani _ ava ite ngughk _ nuna lgu ta ite ngughk _ .
E ll ng iin aq el t aghh aq _ unangniigh llegh ke kanga _ taa w ang iin aq _ si k ig g in agh mun _ .
talwa llu _ sikig meng _ neq ek elghii _ .
naqam _ quunpeng _ pi y an iigh aq elghii _ .
piyaa vig meng _ kaate nghmini _ ellmi neng _ gaagh niigh aqe lghii _ .
gaagh niigh nghmeng _ taaqe nghmini _ negh luni _ negh nghmeng _ taaqe nghmini _ ingliigh luni _ qavagh aqe lghii _ .
qavagh luni _ taghtugh nghmini _ piyaa aqe lghii _ .
unange luni _ uteghnigh nghmini _ unakegkagh ni _ sikig t _ afta luki _ aymaake it _ gaagh aqe kangi _ amiiragh it _ kinegh ngllagh aqe kangi _ .
ingleghqagh u luki _ naliini _ tanpeghqagh u luki _ .
ll ang am _ maaten _ un ang ul uku _ taghtugh yami _ sumeghtaghagh ma lghii _ s u v uk luni _ esnighqwagh na luni _ .
taagken _ aane luni _ esnagh m _ tu ng ang anun _ aghulaqe ma lghii _ .
esnagh mun _ kaate luni _ igleghte ma luni _ esghagh ma kanga _ esne mi _ unguva lghii _ tepe nghhagh _ neghnavregagh ghhagh _ .
taana _ neghnavregagh ghhagh _ unguva an _ tugu luku _ mengteghagh minun _ aglagh te ma kanga _ .
taglagh luni _ k ak igh ani _ mengteghagh m _ p u tug t aq _ amigh _ qepe luni _ uk ig sim akanga _ .
ukigllug qu _ i tem sim akanga _ .
I tem ll uku _ negh naa v r eg aghh aq _ unguva an _ q ip u sim akanga _ .
kepe luku _ almesigh tun _ petug ma kanga _ kangighagh anun _ .
taagken _ piyaa laatagh ma lghii _ kilgaa nun _ .
piyaa vig mi _ un angll aat aam alghii _ sikig meng _ .
sikigtagh ni _ akmag igh luku _ uteghnigh ma lghii _ mengteghagh minun _ .
kaate luni _ unakegkagh ni _ sikig _ lli ma kanga _ egllu m _ saaghw akun _ .
lli luku _ ellnga _ akite kun _ aqume ma lghii _ .
aqume luni _ imeg tekagh ni _ neghnavregagh _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ enta _ sa aqe ziin _ ?
P is te min un _ unangkagh ka _ afta gu _ ! _ â
unangkagh a _ sikig _ umyugagh mineng _ qayuutagh mun _ uugte luni _ ellmi neng _ am ii r igh umalghii _ .
amiiragh igh nghmeng _ taaqe luni _ ellmi neng _ llaag it _ uglafqe te ma lghiit _ ama _ ighneghagh igh ma lghii _ .
U g l af q un egh meng _ taaqe yan _ yuug _ pi laatagh ma lghii _ , _ â _ sa aqe ziin _ pi s tem ni _ gaagh te nga _ ! _ â
yug m _ esgh ap ag yaq min igu _ sikig m _ ay im simak ang anga _ ellmi neng _ .
uughqaghte luni _ qulmesiite mun _ kanaghte uute ma lghiit _ ell meg g neng _ , _ egllu m _ qula akun _ agaghte ma lghiit _ .
llaaghanwha _ yuug _ ugke t _ ugute yata _ negh ma lghii _ .
negh nghmeng _ taaqe luni _ pi laatagh ma lghii _ , _ â _ sa aqe ziin _ pi s tem ni _ inglegh u te nga _ !
itegh naqe unga _ . _ â
ellnga _ yuug _ aane ma lghii _ esla mun _ .
mulu gpenani _ itegh ma lghii _ .
itegh yalghiimi _ ungavig _ ellmi neng _ apeghiighsagh ma lghii _ .
itegh luni _ qavaa ma lghii _ .
unaami _ taghtugh yami _ piyaa laatagh ma lghii _ .
I i w en nguq _ qemi neng _ teve aqe uq _ meteghllug _ esghagh ma kanga _ .
esghagh luku _ yug m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ uuk _ aqelqagh _ !
natmun _ igleghte aqe ziin _ ? _ â
â _ temngi _ maagun _ igleghte aqe unga _ . _ â
yug m _ pi laatagh ma kanga _ , _ â _ uuk _ weni _ whanga _ aqelqagh ke laken _ !
atghagh lta _ .
negh yaghtugh lta _ . _ â
taagken _ yug m _ aqelqagh ni _ meteghllug _ mengteghagh minun _ itghute ma kanga _ .
kaate luteng _ itegh ma lghiit _ .
itegh luteng _ yug m _ upugha te ma kanga _ al q el q ani _ meteghllug _ .
meteghllug ke te aqe i ma lghii _ aqume luni _ sikig m _ amiiragh akun _ .
yuug _ pi ma lghii _ , _ â _ sa aqe ziin _ pi s tem ni _ ?
aqelqagh _ gaagh te gu _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ sikig m _ negh kangit _ ell meg g neng _ ketfagh luteng _ ugkelli aqe lghiit _ .
ugkelli luteng _ ell meg g neng _ qulmesiite mun _ itegh luteng _ agaghte ma lghiit _ egllu m _ qula anun _ .
meteghllug _ aqume luni _ qiivaqu aqe lghii _ uzimun _ .
mengteghagh m _ ilu ani _ aghtugh aqe lghii _ esghaate nghmeng _ kitum _ yuug _ apeghiighsagh te aqe agu _ .
negh nghmeng _ taaqe luteng _ itegh ma lghiit _ .
qavagh luteng _ unaami _ taghtugh luteng _ negh luteng _ aghulaqe ma lghiit _ .
yug m _ meteghllug _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ whanga _ piyaa naqe unga _ kilgaa nun _ .
elpek _ navek _ pi naqe ziin _ ? _ â
â _ whanga _ aki yan _ tu ng ang anun _ ivagh i aqe unga _ ne meng _ . _ â
taagken _ pellghute ma lghiik _ .
yuug _ ay g um i m _ aghulaqe ma lghii _ .
meteghllug _ aki yan _ tu ng ang anun _ aghulaqe ma lghii _ .
meteghllug _ pengughqagh meng _ talughte luni _ yuug _ iigh te luku _ esghapag ma kanga _ .
talughte neghsi ma kanga _ .
talughte yan _ qemi meng _ meteghllug _ taayughqe ma lghii _ yug m _ mengteghagh nun _ .
kaate luni _ mengteghagh mun _ itegh luni _ aqume ma lghii _ .
yug tun _ ellnga llu _ pi ma lghii _ , _ â _ En t a pi s tem ni _ gaagh te nga _ !
N egh n av r eg aam _ av el gh aq in aam akanga _ i w em g a _ wata qun _ .
qenwat _ aghtugh luni _ meteghllug _ q e il i qu m alghii _ .
uzimun _ mengteghagh _ ivagh i vike ma kanga _ .
sunanguq _ taana _ esghagh aa _ kangighagh ni _ petug luni _ amigh _ umeg u aqe aq _ .
meteghllug m _ ketfagh luku _ i tem sim akanga _ .
S aagh saq min igu _ esghagh ma kanga _ neghnavregagh ghhagh _ unguva aqe uq _ .
meteghllug _ sumeghtaghagh ma lghii _ , _ â _ U n ang w aaq s eng alghii _ yug m _ kayute a _ . _ â
meteghllug m _ qesugragh luku _ al m es ii s tun _ amigh _ imeg ma kanga _ .
neghnavregagh _ qesugraghkagh ni _ imeg te ma kanga _ .
ne akun _ petug luku _ aane luni _ aghulaqe ma lghii _ .
yuug _ unange luni _ uteghnigh ma lghii _ .
kaate luni _ unangkagh ni _ egllu m _ saaghw akun _ lli luku _ pi ma lghii _ , _ â _ sa aqe ziin _ pi s tem ni _ ?
gaagh te nga _ ! _ â
A v el gh aq in aam akanga _ .
alla _ pi laatagh aa _ .
aghtugh ma kanga _ .
mataawi tete yamigu _ amigh _ ketfagh luku _ s aag saq min igu _ imeg uqagh ni _ esghagh ma kanga _ qesugragh luni _ .
taagken _ al m e si ll aat aam akanga _ .
ellmi neng _ apeghiighsagh luni _ lliigh laatagh ma lghii _ .
